headline: Nyanzvi Dzoshushikana Zvichitevera Kufa kweVanhu Vane Covid-19 Zvisingazivikanwe Kuti Vane Chirwere Ichi
text: Nyanzvi mune zvehutano dzinoti hadzikurudzire kuti vanhu vazivikanwe kuti vanga vaine chirwere cheCOVID-19 mushure mekunge munhu afa sezviri kuitika munyika. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti izvi zvinodziviririka chete kana hurumende ikaongorora vanhu vakawanda kusanganisira vese vanenge varwara. Magwaro anobudiswa nebazi rezvehutano pamusoro pechirwere cheCOVID-19 anoratidza kuti kune vanhu vanozozivikanwa kuti vanga vaine hutachiona hwechirwere ichi ivo vanhu vacho vatoshaya. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano panguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr. Henry Madzorera, vati kufa kwevanhu vasati vazivikanwa kuti vari kunetsekana neyi zvinhu zvinoisa vashandi vezvehutano panjodzi. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomiririra vakoti, reZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo, vaudza Studio7 kuti sesangano vanogarokurudzira hurumende kuti iise zvikwanisiro muzvipatara zvayo zvinoita kuti vezvehutano vaongorore munhu wese zvake anotsvaka rubatsiro munyaya yezvehutano zvisinei nekuti anoratidza kuti ane chirwere cheCOVID-19 here kana kwete. VaDongo vanoti sevashandi vezvehutano vanonetsekanawo nevanhu vanozobatwa chirwere ichi ivo vatoshaya. VaDongo vanoti kusavapo kwezvinoshandiswa kuti vana mukoti vazvidzivirire kuri kuisa nhengo dzavo dzakawanda panjodzi. Vatiwo sangano ravo riri kushushikana kuti vakoti vari kubatwa nehutachiona vari pabasa vari kuwanda. Nyanzvi idzi dzinotiwo kuongorora vanhu vakawanda kuti vane chirwere here kana kuti kwete ndiyo chete yekuti hurumende idzivirire kufa kwevanhu vakawanda pamwe nekupararira kwehutachiona hweCoronavirusm uhwo hunokonzera chirwere cheCovid-19. Asi mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, VaJohn Mangwiro, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanhu ava vanenge vaongororwa vachiri vapenyu asi vanofa vasati vaziva zvinenge zvabuda muongororo dzinenge dzaitwa. VaMangwiro vati izvi zvinoitika sezvo nyika isina michina inobudisa ongororo idzi chiripocho. Vachibvunzwa kuti izvi hazviisi here hutano hwevashandi vehutano panjodzi, VaMangwiro vati vashandi ava vari kutora varwere vese vanouya kuzvipatara sevanhu vane COVID-19 kusvika zvinenge zvabuda muongororo zvazivikanwa nekudaro vanenge vakapfeka zvekudzivirira. Kunyange hazvo hurumende ichiti vashandi vanenge vakapfeka zvekuzvidzivirira, vashandi vezvehutano, kusanganisira VaDongo, vanoti izvi hazvisi izvo zviri kuitika muzvipatara zvehurumende sezvo zvikwanisiro zvinodiwa izvi zviri zvishoma zvakanyanya. VaDongo vanoti kushaikwa kwezvikwanisiro imwe yenyaya dziri kupa kuti vashandi vezvehutano varambe kuenda kubasa. Sangano ravana chiremba vakuru reZimbabwe Senior Hospital Doctors Association rakazivisa hurumende svondo rino kuti inofanirwa kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa muzvipatara, kutadza kwayo vanenge voramwa mabasa. No media source currently available

headline: Madzimai Oyambirwa nezveChirwere CheKusagadzikana Mupfungwa Achongobva Kusunguruka
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kuyambira vanhu kuti vagare vakangwarira nyaya yekurwara nepfungwa kunogona kuita madzimai kana achangobva mukusungunuka zvinogona kuti vamwe vagume vatora hupenyu hwavo. Asi chirwere ichi chinorapika munhu akakwanisa kuwana rubatsiro nekukurumidza. Chirwere ichi chinonzi postpartum chinokonzerwa nekusagadzikana mupfungwa kana mudzimai achangobva mukusungunuka. Dr Vongai Munatsi vanoti pavanhu gumi vanoenda kunotsvaga rubatsiro kuzvipatara nekumakiriniki munyika, panowanikwa vanhu vatatu vanezvirwere zvepfungwa. Vakurudzira kuti kana zvaonekwa kuti mukadzi asununguka aakuita zvinhu zvaaisamboita kare zvinenge kusuwa, kutadza kudya zvakanaka kana kutoramba kuyamwisa mwana , zvinenge zvavekuratidza kuti pfungwa dzake dzinenge dzisisina kugadzikana zvakanaka. Dr Munatsi vanoendera mberi vachiri zvirwere zvepfungwa zvinofamba nedzinza remunhu zvokuti kana zvikasaongororwa nemazvo, panogona kuonekwa kuti kune vamwe vemudzinza vakambobatika nedenda repfungwa. Vatiwo zvirwere zvepfungwa hazvikonzerwi nekuroiwa, madhimoni kana mweya yetsvina asi kuti varapwi ava vanenge vachingoda anoda kukurukura navo kuti vataure misengwa yavakatakura. Mugari wekuChitungwiza Amai Grace Chihuri vanoti nyaya yemadzimai anovhiringika pfungwa kana vabatsirwa inyaya isinganyanye kutambirika mumhuri dzakawanda zvokuti havatozive kuti vakadzi ava vanokwanisa kurapwa nemishonga vakatoita zvakanaka. Nyanzvi yezvehutano hwepfungwa, avo vanoshanda nesangano reZimbabwe National Association for Mental Health kana kuti ZimNamh, Dr Ignatius Murambidzi, vakatsinhirawo mashoko akataurwa naDr Munetsi vachiti vanhu vakawanda havanzwisise nezvenyaya deemadzimai anoshungurudzika mushure mokunge vasununguka izvo zvinozoita kuti varware havo muchinyararire. Dr Murambidzi vanoti zvirwere zvepfungwa zvinorapika nemapiritsi zvokuti varapwi ava vanotogona kutorarama kusvikira vakwegura vachinwa mishonga iyoyi. Chero zvazvo zvisingazivikanwe kuti kuti madzimai mangani ane dambidziko repostpartum depression munyika, Dr Murambidzi vanoti denda repfungwa ratove dambudziko guru nokudaro panofanirwa kutsvagwa dzimwe nzira dzokuti vanhu vanedambudziko iri vakurumidze kuwana rubatsiro vasati vasvika pakuda zvokuzotora hupenyu hwavo. Sangano reWorld Health Organisation rinoti huhwandu hwevanhu varikuzviuraya kwave kuda kuenzana nevanhu vanofira munjodzi dzepamigwagwa. Vanhu mirioni nemazana matanhatu anemakumi mana, 1 640, vakafa nekuzviuraya uye vanhu vanodarika mirioni nemazana masere anemakumi matatu, 1830, vakafira mutsaona dzepamigwagwa mugore 2017 zvinova zvinhu zvave kuratidza kuti firo mbiri idzi dzatove kukwikwidzana. Sangano reWorld Health Organisation rinoti zvakare vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu pasi rose vanorwara nechirwere chekufungisisa kana kuti depression pachirungu, uye vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete, vanozviuraya pasi rose.

headline: VaWadyajena Vokonzeresa Mutauro kuMasvingo neMifananidzo yaAmai Mugabe
text: Nhengo ye Zanu PF inomirira Gokwe Nembudziya muparamende, VaJustice Mayor Wadyajena, vakonzeresa mutauro apo vasvika panzvimbo yanga ichitiriwa musangano wekunzwa pfungwa dzevanhu pabhiri rekuvandudza mutemo wekomishoni yerunyararo nekuregererana. VaWadyajena vasvika pamusangano uyu kuMasvingo vaine mota yange ine zvinyorwa zveZanu PF uye ine mufananidzo wemudzimai wemutungamiriri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe. Izvi zvaita kuti vagari vekuMasvingo vapopote vachiti VaWadyajena vari kutyora mutemo weparamende unorambidza nhengo dzeparamende kupfeka zvipfeko zvebato kana dzichiita basa rekutsvaga pfungwa devanhu. VaWadyajena, avo vanga vari ivo sachigaro wekomiti yezvemitemo, vashoropodzwa nevazhinji vachiti vanga vachida kukonzeresa nyonga nyonga uye kutyisidzira vanhu vange vauya kuzotaura nezvebhiri iri. Mumwe wevanhu vasina kufara nezvaitika pamusangano uyu ndi Amai Sungano Zvarebwanashe. Amai Zvarebwanashe vati VaWadyajena vanofanirwa kuita zvinhu zvinotambirwa neveruzhinji kuitira kuti chirongwa chavari kuita chiite chiremera. Mumwe mugari wekuMucheke, Va Godfrey Kurauone, vati izvi zvaitika apo bhiri iri riine nyaya dzakaoma dzine chekuita nemhirizhonga yakaitika munyika ikatora hupenyu hwevanhu vakawanda. Imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, Muzvare Jessie Majome, vashorawo sachigaro wavo vachiti aita zvinhu zvakashata zvisiri pamutemo. VaWadyajena varamba kutaura nezvemotokari yavo vakangoti musangano waitwa zvakanaka. Asi vagari vanosanganisira Amai Enterance Takaedzwa vati ivo VaWadyajena vakaramba vachifamba nemotokari yakadai vanokonzera kupesana kwevanhu avo vari kuda kugadziriswa nekubatanidzwa nebhiri rerunyararo iri. Vanhu vazhinji vashoropodza bhiri iri rakaitwa patsva mushure mekurambwa gore rapfuura vachiti rangodzoka rakadaro risina kubviswa zvavakaramba zvekupa masimba akawanda kugurukota rezvemitemo. Vataura pamusangano uyu vati gurukota rezvemitemo riri kupihwa masimba akawandisa ekupindira mukutongwa kwenyaya dzemhirizhonga kunyanya panyaya dezvematongerwo enyika. Vanhu ava vati gurukota iri harifanirwe kupihwa masimba akawanda. Veruzhinji vanoti bhiri iri rinofanirwa kuvandudzwa kuitira kuti nyaya dzemhirizhonga dzakaitika kubva nyika yawana kuzvitonga, uye kubvutirwa pfuma kwakaitika kune vanopikisa mugore ra 2008, kugadziriswe kuitira kuti vanhu vagarisane zvakanaka munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari Vaswera Vachizvifambira Zvavo muKwekwe Yakavharwa neMugovera
text:
Vagari vemuKwekwe vari kutambira nenzira dzakasiyana siyana kuvharwa kwakaitwa guta ravo zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19 chemhando yekuIndia muguta iri. Vagari vemuKwekwe vari kutambira nenzira dzakasiyana siyana kuvharwa kwakaitwa guta ravo zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19 chemhando yekuIndia muguta iri.

Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakatara kuti lockdown iyi itange nezuro manheru, zvitoro nemamwe mabhizimisi zvange zvakavhurwa uye veruzhinji vange vachiita mabasa avo semazuva ose kusanganisira kutengesa pamisika nekuchinja mari mumigwagwa, vamwewo vari mumitsetse pamabhangi.

Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti muguta iri muchave nelockdown
kwemasvondo maviri kutanga nezuro manheru zvichitevera kuwanikwa kweimwe mhando yechirwere cheCovid iyo yakauraya mumwe muzvinabhizmisi mudhorobha reRedcliff svondo rapera mushure mekunge ashanya kuIndia.

Vamwe vagari vemuKwekwe vataura neStuio 7 vati vanotyira kuti kungove
nelockdown munzvimbo iyi chete hakuna zvakunonyanyobatsira vamwewo
vachiti vanoona danho iri richibatsira.

Mumwe mugari, Parti Ngozo, anove mutapi wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira ati maonero ake ndeekuti dai nyika yose yaiswa mulockdown sezvo mhando yechirwere cheCovid yekuIndia iyi ichiratidza kuti ine hukasha hwakasimba.

Mumwe mugari wemuguta iri, Muzvare Nyarai Ndawana, avo vanove mukuru wesangano reZichea mudunhu reMidlands, vati veruzhinji vanonzwisisa chose kukosha kwekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 asi vati nekuda kwekutambura vakawanda vanozotadza kutevedzera zvimwe zvezvinodiwa vachitsvaga zvinoraramisa mhuri dzavo.

Meya weguta reKwekwe, Amai Angeline Kasipo, avo vanovewo
muzvinabhizimisi vane nzvimbo inoitirwa michato nezvimwe, vati
kunyange hazvo lockdown ichigona kuvhiringidza mararamiro evanhu, vane chokwadi chekuti veruzhinji vanonzwisisa kukosha kwedanho rekuve
nelockdown.

Mumwe muzvinabhizimisi wemuKwekwe, VaFreddy Kapuya, avo vanove mumiriri weMhondoro Ngezi mudare paramende vari mubato reZanu PF, vati vanotambirawo danho rekuve nelockdown vachiti kukoshesa hutano hweveruzhinji ndicho chinhu chikuru.

Vakambove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, uye vahigarawo muKwekwe, Dr Henry Madzorera, vati danho rekuti muKwekwe muve nelockdown rakanaka.  Asi Dr Madzorera vati danho iri rinofanirwa kutsigirwa nemamwe matanho akasimba anosanganisira kusimudzira ongororo yeveruzhinji kuti vane chirwere cheCovid-19 here kana kuti kwete. Muchizivisa chavo nezuro, gurukota rezvehutano, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vakatiwo mabhawa ose haasi kubvumidzwa kuvhura munguva yelockdown, uye michato nekunamata vanhu vakaungana, zvava kurambidzwawo kwemasvondo maviri.  VaChiwenga vakatiwo vanenge vafirwa vanofanirwa kunge vaine munhu abva kubazi rezvehutano, uye vanhu vanoungana parufu havafanirwe kudarika makumi matatu. Vanhu vanopfuura nemuguta reKwekwe vari kukurudzirwa zvikuru kusamira muguta iri kwenguva yakareba. VaChiwenga vakatiwo hurumende ichaenderera mberi nedzidziso yechirwere cheCovid-19, kucheneswa kwezvitoro nenzvimbo dzose dzinopindwa neveruzhinji.

Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano dziri kukurudzirawo kuti hurumende isimudzire kubaiwa kweveruzhinji nhomba senzira yekubatsira kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Nezuro vanhu zviuru zvipfumbamwe nemazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu nevapfumbamwe, 9 369, vakabayiwa nhomba yekutanga, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga pazviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri nezvina nemazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nevashanu, 624 665.

Hurumende ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi, avo vanove zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana zvevanhu vari munyika senzira yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi, icho chauraya vanhu munyika yose vanosvika chiuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi masere nevatanhatu, 1 586, uye kubata vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi matatu nezvisere nemazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nevana, 38 664. Pasi rose, vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni zana nemakumi matanhatu nematanhatu, 166 million, vabatwa nechirwere ichi, uye vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu nemazana mana nemakumi matanhatu ezviuru, 3, 460 000 vafa nechirwere ichi pasi rose. No media source currently available

headline: Mutengo weMafuta eDzimotokari Unokwidzwa Zvichienda neMadhorobha neMaguta
text: Sechave chigariro musoro wetsuro kushaya nyanga, mutengo wemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari wakwidzwa zvakare kutanga munyika yose. Boka rinoongorora pamwe nekutara mitengo yemafuta edzimotokari, reZimbabwe Energy Regulatory Authority, ZERA, rakazivisa neSvondo usiku kuti mutengo wemafuta uyu unenge uchizosiyana zvichienderana nemadhorobha nemaguta, uchidhurisisa kunzvimbo dziri kure. Semuenzaniso, peturu muHarare yakwira kubva paRTGS$ 9.12 kuenda paRTGS$10.01 parita, dhiziri richikwirawo kubva paRTGS$9.36 kuenda paRTGS$10.32 parita. Asi mitengo iyi yakasiyana nemitengo yekuBulawayo sezvo rita repeturu rave kutengeswa nemari inoita $RTGS10.39, kuchitiwo dhiziri richiita $RTGS10.69 parita. Mitengo yekuVictoria Falls ndiyo inenge iri pamusorosoro munyika yose sezvo rita redhiziri rakwidzwa kuenda paRTGS$10.86 parita, kuchitiwo peturu yave kuita RTGS$10.56 parita. ZERA yazivisa kuti mitengo iyi yasiyaniswa pachitariswa mutengo wekusvitsa mafuta aya kunzvimbo dzakasiyanasiyana idzi. Vemichovha inotakura veruzhinji vanoti mitengo iyi ichavaomesera zvikuru sezvo ivo vachamanikidzwa kukwidzawo mari dzinoripirwa nevanhu vanenge vachifamba zvichienderana nekuti vanenge vachienda kunzvimbo dzipi. Munyori anoona nezvemabasa musangano revemichovha reGreater Harare Association of Commuter Omnibus Operators, VaCaleb Dominic Bepeta, vanoti chiri kunetsa ndechekuti mitengo iri kungokwira asi mihoro yevanhu vavanotakura isina kwairi kuenda. No media source currently available

headline: Veruzhinji Vokurudzirwa Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vakawanda vabaiwe nhomba yeCovid-19 kuitira kuderedza huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa nechirwere ichi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano uye vari mutungamiri wesangano reMedical and Dental Private Practitioners of Zimbabwe Association, Dr Johannes Marisa, vaudza Studio7 kuti kana vanhu vakawanda munyika vakabaiwa nhomba yeCovid -19, zvinoderedza njodzi yedenda iri iro ranetsa pasi rose. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Dr Henry Madzorera, vatiwo vanhu vakabaiwa vakawanda zvinoderedza kufamba kwechirwere ichi. VaMadzorera vatiwo zvakakosha kuti hurumnde izivisewo veruzhinji mashandiro ari kuita nhomba munyika vachiti izvi zvikazivikanwa neveruzhinji zvinobatsirawo mukuwedzera huwandu hwevanhu vanoenda kunobaiwa nhomba idzi. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvehutano sezvo takundikana kubata mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano , Doctor John Mangwiro, pamwe nemutauriri webazi iri, VaDonald Mujiri. Asi hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekumisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti Covid-19 yakauraya vanhu makumi maviri nevatanhatu nezuro, uye vanhu mazana manomwe nemakumi mashanu nevana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika vava zviuru zana negumi nezvipfumbamwe nemazana mashanunevasere(119 508), uye vafa nechirwere ichi vava zviuru zvinanemakumi manomwe nevatatu, (4 073). Vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga munyika yese vave pamamiriyoni mavirinezvuru gumi nezvitatu nemazana matatu nemakumi mana(2 013340). Vabaiwa nhomba yepiri vave miriyoni nezvuru zana nemakumi manomwe nezvipfumbamwe nemazana matanhatu nemakumi masere nevanomwe(1 179 687). No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Working Group Inozeya Zimbabwe Mushure maVaMugabe
text: Nhengo shanu dzesangano remuAmerica rinoshanda rakazvimirira uye risina divi rarakarerekera, reZimbabwe Working Group, dzakashanyira Zimbabwe mwedzi wapera nechinangwa chekuti dzinoona mamiriro akaita zvinhu mushure mehutongi hwevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Sangano iri, iro rine nhengo dzaimboshanda muhurumende, vanamuzvinafundo, pamwe nemagweta vane ruzivo nezveZimbabwe, neChitatu dzaita musangano muWashington D.C. wekuzeya zvadzakawana, uye kupawo pfungwa dzadzo pamamiriro akaita zvinhu. Chikwata chakashanyira Zimbabwe ichi chine nhengo dzinoti vaimbove mumiriri weAmerica kuZimbabwe, VaBruce Wharton, vaimbove mumiriri weAmerica kuKenya, VaMark Bellamy, vaimbove mutevedzeri wemunyori anoona nezveAfrica muAmerica, VaTodd Moss, Amai Michelle Gavin, avo vaimbove mumiriri weAmerica kuBotswana, pamwe naVaAlexander Noyes. Vachitaura zvavakaona mushure mekushanya kwavo kubva musi wa20 kusvika musi wa 25 Chivabvu, VaBellamy vati vanoshushikana zvikuru nekuparara kwezvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi muZimbabwe. VaBellamy vatiwo danho remauto mukufambiswa kwehurumende ratokura zvichienzaniswa nenguva yaVaMugabe, uye ndezvimwe zvezvinhu zvinoshusha vanhu. VaWharton vatiwo kunyange hazvo zvinhu zvakaoma, pane zvimwewo zvinoyemurika zviri kuitika muZimbabwe, zvakaita segwaro idzva revavhoti, iro vati rakanaka kudarika raivepo kubva pawana nyika kuzvitonga kuzere. Vatiwo chivimbiso chehurumende chekuti munyika muchaitwa sarudzo dzakachena chinhu chinotambirika zvikuru, uye muguta reHarare vanhu vave nekutya kushoma pane zvaimboitika munguva yaVaMugabe, uye vemapato anopikisa vari kukwanisa kutsvaga rutsigiro vakasununguka. Asi VaWharton vati chinongoshoreka pagadziriro yesarudzo kunonoka kweZimbabwe Electoral commission, ZEC kuburitsa gwaro revavhoti repepa rinoonekwa nevanhu vose. ZEC yakangoisa gwaro iri padandemutande chete. No media source currently available Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chapindawo mumusangano uyu, VaKuda Bhejana, vanoti vafadzwa chose vachiti America ichine pfungwa yekuti idyidzane neZimbabwe kuburikidza nechido chechikwata ichi chekuda kuona mamiriro akaita zvinhu mushure maVaMugabe. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaDaniel Chigwada, vatiwo vafadzwa zvikuru nemusangano uyu, kunyange hazvo paine zvimwe zvinonzi zvichiri kuda kugadziriswa. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, uye vari gweta, VaAlex Magaisa, ndemumwe wezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvapinda mumusangano uyu. VaMagaisa vanoti zvizhinji zvataurwa nenhengo dzechikwata ichi ndezvinhu zvagara zviri kuonekwawo nevakawanda muZimbabwe. Doctor Magaisa vati ichokwadi kuti pachine zvakawanda zvinoda kuti zvigadziriswe zvakaita semashandiro eZEC, pamwe nekupindira kunonzi kwemauto munyaya dzesarudzo, asi vachiti vafadzwa kuti kupinda kwechikwata ichi munyika kwakaitawo kuti kuvhurire pasi rose mamiriro akaita zvinhu muZimbabwe. Chikwata cheZimbabwe Working Group ichi chakasanganawo nevemapato anopikisa, masangano akazvimirira, vedzisvondo, vemabhizimusi, pamwe nevamiriri vehurumende kuti chinzwe maonero avo pakuti nyika ingaita here sarudzo dzakasununguka. Chikwata ichi chinoti zvachakaunganidza zvichasvitswa kuhurumende yeAmerica, kuchikwata chemutungamiri wenyika VaDonald Trump, pamwe nekudare reSeneti.

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kugadzirisa Dambudziko reKushaikwa kweMagetsi Pave neKutyira Kuti Mitengo yeZvigadzirwa zveMunyika iChakwira
text: Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi, vashandi, vashandirwi pamwe nevezvitoro vari kuyambira kuti kana dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemagetsi rakatarisana nenyika rakasagadziriswa nekukurumidza richakonzera matambudziko akawanda anosanganisira kukwira kwemitengo yezvigadzirwa zvemunyika, izvo zvichazoomesera veruzhinji. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vashandirwi, reConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, CZI, VaKurai Matsheza, vanoti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemagetsi munyika riri kuvabata zvakanyanya zvekuti vanga vakatarisira kuti hurumende neZESA vachakasika kurigadzirisa. VaMatsheza vanoti nekuda kwedambudziko iri, vemakambani vave kumanikidzwa kutsvaga nzira dzekuti varambe vachigadzira zvigadzirwa zvavo dzinosanganisira kushanda usiku nemukupera kwesvondo panenge pauya magetsi. VaMatsheza vanoti vemakambani vanenge vachikwanisa ndivo vari kuisawo magwetsi anoshanda nezuva kana kushandisa majenareta, zvinhu zvavanoti zvinenge zvave kuvadhurira, zvinozoita kuti vasiire mutoro uyu kuvatengi. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nenyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, avo vanoti kushandiswa kwemajenareta nevemakambani kunowedzera mutengo wezvinhu, izvo zvinozodhurisirwa vatengi. Munyori mukuru werimwe sangano rinomirira vashandi, reZimbabwe Federation of Trade Unions, ZFTU, VaKennias Shamuyarira, vanoti dambudziko riripo nderekuti hurumende pamwe nekambani yeZESA havasi kukoshesa zvine basa zvekuwanisa nyika magetsi. Vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa magwenya emarasha mumaguta ose kuitira kuti zvinhu zviitire nyore vashandi nevashandirwi. Saka dambudziko iri ringagadziriswa sei? VaKuchera vanotiwo zvinotoda kuti nyika itange kugadzira magetsi akawanda vachiti kuKariba nekuHwange hakusi kubva magetsi akawanda uye ekutengawo acho mashoma. Vanoti panenge pachitoda hurongwa hwekuti pabikwe magetsi akawanda pachishandiswa zuva, mvura, uye marasha, vachiti munyika zuva rakawanda kwazvo zvekuti magetsi anokwanisa kugadzirika nyore. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto, VaSoda Zhemu, kuti tinzwe kana paine matanho avari kutora sehurumende asi nharembozha yavo yanga isiri kudairwa. Dambudziko rekudzimwadzimwa kwemagetsi rinonzi riri kukonzerwa nekuderera zvakanyanya kwaita mvura mudhamu reKariba uko kunogaiwa magetsi. Zvinonziwo hurongwa hwekuti nyika itenge magetsi kuSouth Africa huri kuvhiringidzwa nekuti kambani yemagetsi munyika iyi yeEskom ine matambudziko ayowo, uyewo Zimbabwe inonzi haina nhoroondo yakanaka pakubhadhara magetsi kumakambani ekunze anomboibatsira. Kunyange hazvo vakawanda vari kukurudzira kuti hurumende ivake magwenya emoto wezuva akawanda, vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti izvi zvinokanganiswa nehuwori sezvakaonekwa mune mamwe makambani akambopiwa basa iri nehurumende mumashure ayo akakundikana kupedza basa iri. No media source currently available

headline: CCC Inoti ZEC, Mapurisa neMatare Opa Kuti Sarudzo Dzisina Mutauro Dzinetse Kutarisira Muna 2023
text: Bato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change raita musangano nevatori venhau nhasi rikati harisi kufara nemamiriro akaita zvinhu nyika yatarisana nesarudzo dza2023. Bato iri raratidza kusafara nezviri kuitwa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission uye mapurisa nematare. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri webato Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere nevakafanobata chigaro chemunyori munyaya dzesarudzo ivari kanzura muHarare VaIan Makone ndivo vakokera musangano uyu. Bato reCCC rinoti harisi kufara nehuwandu hwevanhu vari mugwaro revavhoti vari kunzi neZEC vane mazita sina kunyorwa zvakanaka. Vachitaura neStudio 7, VaMakone vatiwo mutemo unenge uri kutarisa kuti wabuda mumba maani sezvo nhengo dzavo dzinosanganisira mumiriri weChitungwiza North VaJob Sikhala uye VaGodfrey Sithole vari muhusungwa kuChikurubi vachipomerwa mhosva yekukonzera mhirizhonga kuNyatsime vachinyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso nematare. No media source currently available Dzimwe nhengo dzeCCC gumi nevatatu dzakasungwawo. Asi bato iri rinoti riri kushamisika kuti sei veZanu-PF vakatanga mhirizhonga kuNyatsime vamwe vachibuda pamavhidhiyo vasina kusungwa. Mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi vanoti hakuna akamhan’ara. Mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu-PF VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vanoti mutemo hautarise kuti wabuda mumba maani. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vabatwa neCoronavirus Vosvika Mazana Matatu neMakumi Masere neManomwe
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus munyika yose hwasvika pamazana matatu nemakumi masere nemanomwe kana kuti 387. Vanhu vafa vachiri vana uye vapora vave makumi mashanu nevana kana kuti 54. Vanhu vavhenekwa kusvika parizvino vadarika zviuru zvishanu nemakumi mapfumbabwe kana kuti 59, 000. Vanhu vakawanda vobatwa nechirwere ichi vari kubva kuSouth Africa. Vanhu vose vari kubva kune dzimwe nyika vari kumbonzi vagare vakachengetedzwa munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe kuti vasatapurirwa vamwe chirwere kana vainacho. Asi vamwe vanhu vave kutiza kunzvimbo dzinochengeterwa vanhu vachiti hadzina kushambidzika. Izvi zvapa kuti vamwe vakaita sekambani yePerch Media vari kufamba vachidzidzisa vanhu vapindewo mumaruva vachikurudzira vanhu kuti vamhan’arire vanhu vanenge vatiza ava. Mukuzeya nyaya iyi, Blessing Zulu weStudio 7 abata mukuru wePerch Media VaCollen Magobeya. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi mana nemaviri kana kuti 242,000 vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muafrica. Vashaya vadarika zviuru zvitanhatu nemazana maviri nemakumi mana nemana kana kuti 6,244. Vapora vanodarika zviuru zana nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 109,000 Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni manomwe nezviuru zvipfumbamwe kana kuti kuti 7,9 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika zviuru mazana mana nemakumi matatu nemana kana kuti 434, 000.  Vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru zvinomwe kana kuti 3, 7 million.

headline: Vanhu Zana neMakumi Matatu neVapfumbamwe Vofa neKuda kweDutumupengo Idai
text: Bazi rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko raburitswa padandemutande raro reTwitter kuti vanhu zana nemakumi matatu nemapfumbamwe vafa kusvika pari zvino nedambudziko reTropical Cyclone Idai. Vanhu zana nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe havasi kuzivikanwa kuti vari kupi uye vamwe vanosvika zana nemakumi matanhatu vari muzvitsuwa vakamirira kununurwa. Mutauriri werimwe bazi reUnited Nations reWorld Food Programme kana kuti WFP VaHerve Verhoosel vati ongororo yavakaita nezuro inoratidza kuti vanhu zviuru mazana maviri muZimbabwe vakaputsirwa dzimba uye vanoda rubatsiro nechimbi chimbi. WFP inoti kuChimanimani, zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muzana zvezvivakwa zvakaputswa dutumupengo iri. Amai Solinda Ngwenya vekuBulawayo vanoti vakarasikirwa nemhuri yehanzvadzi yavo yese yainge iri kuChimanimani ichiita mabasa ekuparidza shoko raMwari. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, vamwe vanhu vakawirwa nedambudziko iri vanoti havasati vawana rubatsiro. Vamwe vanoti hurumende yeZimbabwe iyo ine zvikopokopo zviviri chete zveAir Force zviri kuManicaland inenge iri kuremerwa nezvinhu zvawedzerwawo nekuti migwagwa nemazambuko zvakaparadzwa. VaBrighton Nyanisi vari muWard 14 kuChipinge East vanoti havasati vawana chikafu kubva nemusi weMugovera. No media source currently available Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemumiriri wenzvimbo iyi mudare reparamende, VaMathew Mlambo veMDC. No media source currently available Asi vachitaurawo nezvechikafu, gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi nemagariro evanhu Doctor Sekai Nzenza vanoti nyaya yekuparara kwemigwagwa nemazambuko ndiyo iri kupa kuti chikafu chitadze kusvika kune dzimwe nzvimbo. Asi vati vari kushanda zvakasimba kuzvigadzirisa. No media source currently available

headline: Varume neVakadzi Vokurudzirwa Kupota Vachivheneka Mazamu Kudzivirira Gomarara
text: Hurumende nhasi yakurudzira vatori venhau kuti vaongororwe gomarara pazammu ichiti izvi zvino batsirawo kuti vanyore nezvenyaya dzemagomarara zvine hudzamu. Bazi rinoona nezvekubuditswa kwemashoko rabatana nemakambani anoita zvehutano akaita sePremier Service Medical Aid Society PSMAS pamwe ne MedPoint mukudzidzisa pamwe nekuongorora chirwere chegomarara kuvatori venhau · Gurukota rinoona nezvekubudiswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa vati hurumende inokoshesa zvikuru hutano hwakanaka munyika. Vachitaurawo mushure mekuongororwa gomarara remazamu, mutevedzeri wavo, VaKindness Paradza vakurudzirawo vanhurume kuti vaongororwe gomarara iri sezvo risingangobate madzimai. Mumwe wevaongororwa ndiBridget Madzimure anoshanda kuZimbabwe Broadcasting Cooperation (ZBC) uyo ati afara zvakanyanya nekuwana mukana wekuongororwa pachena. Nyanzvi munezvikuongorora zvirwere zvemagomarara VaLyman Khumbula zvakakosha kuti vanhu vaongororwe vachiti vazhinji vari kuzobatwa gomarara radzika midzi. Gomarara rezamu ndiro rinonzi rinoteverera gomarara remuromo wechibereko mukuraya madzimai. Mwedzi waGumiguru ndiwo unocherechedzwa chirwere chegomarara remazamu gore negore. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU: Kusavimbika kweHurumende Kuchanonotsa Chibvumirano cheSocial Contract
text: Sangano revashandi reZCTU rinoti harisi kufara nenhaurirano social contract kana kuti chibvumirano chemushandira pamwe pakati pehurumende, vashandi nevashandirwi, richiti hurumende yaVaRobert Mugabe haina kuvimbika. Munyori mukuru wesangano iri, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti chikuru chinoita kuti vasanyanyofara ndechekuti aka hakasi kekutanga mapoka matatu aya achiedza kuita hurukuro dzakadai, asi pasina pundutso inozobuda. Vanoti chikuru chiri kudzosera kumashure nhaurirano dzekuedza kumutsiridza hupfumi hwenyika idzi kusazvipira kwezvevematongerwo enyika. Zvinonzi hurumende yaida kuti chibvumirano ichi chinge chanyoreranwa gore rapera muna Zvita, asi vamiriri vevashandi vakati vakanga vasati vapiwa mvumo yekusaina nevavanomirira. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Svondo rapera mapoka matatu aya akasangana pasi peTripatite Negotiating Forum, apo pakazowiriranwa kuti patange paongororwa kuti zvimwe zvibvumirano zvakamboitwa kare zvakabereka michero here kana kuti kwete. VaMoyo vanoti nekuda kwezvose izvi, sangano ravo harisi kuzosaina gwaro iri pasati pagadziriswa zvematongerwo enyika. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Anonzi Atadzisa Vagari vekuChilonga Kuratidzira
text:
Mapurisa ange negurukota reMasvingo, VaEzra Chadzamira, nhasi arambidza vagari vekuChilonga kuratidzira kusafara kwavo nehurongwa hwehurumende hwekuda kuvabvisa munzvimbo iyi kuitira kuti minda yavo ishandiwe semafuro emombe dzemukaka dzekambani yeDendiary.

Vagari ava vange vachipfuura mazana maviri vanga vatanga kuimba
vachiramba neivhu ravo pasvika VaChadzamira pazvitoro zvepaMutomani. Mumwe mugari wekuChilonga,VaBornface Chidowera, vati kuratidzira kwavo kwamiswa nemapurisa vachangotanga.

Izvi zvatsinhirwa naSabhuku Vheremu vekuChilonga, VaLuckson Mavasa,
avo vati kuratidzira kwavo kwamiswa. Vatiwo vaita musangano uyo usina kubuda zvakanaka sezvo vanhu vanga vachipikisana nevamiriri vehurumende.

VaChadzamira vati hapana ratidziro yaitika kana kurambidzwa vanhu,
asi vaita musangano wavo zvakanaka nevagari wekunzwa pfungwa dzevanhu pachirongwa ichi chirikuda kuitwa nehurumende.

Asi mumwe mugari, Amai Esther Munghomi, vati ratidiziro yaitika
kwenguva diki uye musangano hauna kubuda zvakanaka sezvo ivo
varambidzwa kutaura mushure mekuramba chirongwa ichi. Mutauriri wemapurisa muMasvingo, Inspector Kudakwashe Dhewa, vaudza
Studio 7 parunhare kuti vanga vasati vanzwa mashoko ekuti mapurisa
arambidza vanhu kuratidzira kuChilonga. Hurumende iri kuti haichadi kudzinga vanhu kuChilonga asi vanovafanira
kugarisana nekambani yeDendairy ichapinda munzvimbo mavo yovaitira
budiriro yemadiridziro vowanawo chouviri. Asi vagari vekuChilonga vari kuramba vachiti kambani iyi ikange yauya
inozopedzisira yavadzinga nekudaro vari kuda kubatwa kumeso
nehurumende. Kambani yeDendairy yakavambwa nemhuri yekwaCoetzee muna 2004, pamwe neimwe kambani yekuEurope, Spear Capital, iine zvikamu makumi maviri nezvinomwe kubva muzana, kana kuti 27% zvehupfumi muDendairy, iyo yakatanga kushandira kuRedcliff mudunhu reMidlands.

Vakuru vakuru muDendairy vanosanganisira VaAndrew Bradnick, VaNeville Coetzee, Amai Cherly Coeztee naDarly Archibald. VaCoetzee vanonzi murimi wechichena anowirirana zvikuru
nemutungamiriri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari Voramba Kutambira Bhajeti reGuta reGweru ra2018
text: Sangano revagari vemuGweru, reGweru Residents Forum, rinoti harisi kutambira hurongwa hwebhajeti regore rinouya hwakashambadzwa nekanzuru yavo hwemari inoita $38 million, vachiti huri kutungamidza mberi zvido zvevakuru vekanzuru, kwete zvevagari. Mukuru wesangano revagari, VaCharles Mazorodze, vanoti mushure mekunan’anidza bhajeti iri vakaona kuti kanzuru iri kuda kumanikidzira kupinza dzimwe nyaya nerweseri dzakaita senyaya yema pre-paid water meter. Vanoti danho rekuisa mamita emvura iri rinorwadza varombo zvakanyanya nekuti vanoziva kuti mamita aya achaiswa mumisha inogara veruzhinji, kunyange hazvo vagari vakazviramba kare. VaMazorodze vanoti kanzuru yakanga yati haisi kuzoshandura mamiriro ebhajeti ra2017 mubhajeti rayo ra2018 asi vave kushamisika kunzwa kuti kanzuru iri kuronga kukwidza zvakanyanya mitero yezvivakwa, kuda pamwe nekuronga kutenga maketeni anodhura. Vanoti vave kuronga kusangana nevagari zvakare vasati vadzokera kukanzuru kuti vaipire zvinyunyuto zvavo. No media source currently available

headline: Kushaikwa kweMari Kwovhiringira Vakawanda Zororo reKisimusi
text: Vamwe vagari vemuChinhoyi vanoti vanonoka kutenga zvinhu zvekisimusi nekuda kwekusawana mari nenguva uye vamwe vanga vasina nguva nekuda kwemabasa panguva iyo vakawanda vari kushaya mari kumabhangi. Vamwe vagari ava vanoti vakanonoka kuwana mari sezvo vanga vasati vatambira mari dzavo dzemihoro. Mumwe mushandi wehurumende uyo anoshanda mubazi rezvemigwagwa, VaAnanias Jemedza, vanoti vanga vasati vatambira sezvo mari yavo yazoratidza kuti yapinda mubhanga ravo. VaJemedza vanoti nekuda kwekuti vashandi vehurumende vakawanda vatambira muzvitoro makazara uye mitsetse yekumabhangi yakakura. Mumwe mugari, VaChristopher Zembe, avo vatenga zvekudya zvemhuri yavo vanoti vakatadza kutenga zvinhu zvekisimusi zvemhuri yavo sezvo vainge vari kubasa. VaZembe vanoti vapihwa mukana wekutenga sezvo vachazodzoka kubasa musiwa 27 Zvita. VaJemedza vanoti gore rino zvinhu zviri nani sezvo mari dzavo dzauya vasati vatamba kisimusi uye vachiwana mari dzavo kumabhangi kunyange vari kupihwa madhora makumi mashanu pazuva chete. VaJemedza vanoti ane ganda ane nyama hazvienzane neasina. Zvichakadaro, muChinhoyi manga muine mitsetse yakakura pamabhangi akawanda vanhu vachida kutora mari dzavo. Mabhangi akawanda anga achipa vanhu mari inoita madhora makumi mashanu kunyange vakawanda vachti ishoma kushandisa pazororo rekisimusi. VaMacdonald Muzuva vanoti nyaya yemari idambudziko riri kurwadza sezvo vapihwa madhora makumi maviri kubhanga reCBZ. VaMuzuva vanoti vaifanirwa kunge vachienda kumusha asi vachatadza nekushaya mari sezvo vedzimotokari vari kuramba kuti vafambi vashandise Ecocash mukubhadhara. Zvitoro zvakawanda zvinotengesa zvekudya zvakaita seOK neTM zvanga zvakazara nevatengi vanga vachishandisa makadhi kubhadhara asi vatengi vanoti zvinhu zvavo zviri kudhura kudarika kutenga nemari chaiyo. Vamwe vagari vakatumirwa mari nehama neshamwari dziri kunze kwenyika kuburikidza nemakabhani akaita seMukuru vatadza kuwana mari dzavo vachinzi hapana mari.

headline: VaChamisa Vanotaura Zvakadzama Pamusoro peChirwere cheCovid-19
text: Mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, vaita musangano padandemudande vachitenda vanhu vose vari kushanda panguva ino nyika yakatarisana nedenda reCovid-19. VaChamisa vatiwo hurumende inofanirwa kupanga mazano nenyanzvi kuitira kuti ipedze denda reCovid-19. VaChamisa vati chirwere cheCovid-19 chinoda kuti vana veZimbabwe vaite muonerapamwe kuitira kuti vakwanise kukunda chirwere ichi. VaChamisa vati bato ravo rinotenda zvikuru zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika izvo zviri kubatsira kusimudzira zvipatara zvemunyika apo nyika yakatarisana nechirwere chedzihwa mupengo ichi. VaChamisa vatiwo havaoni zvine huchenjeri kuvhara nyika yese vakati vanoona sekuti zvingabatsire zvakanyanya kana kukaitwa tsvakurudzo kwoonekwa kuti chirwere cheCovid-19 chakawandira nzvimbo dzipi, kovharwa idzodzo. VaChamisa vati hurumende inofanirwa kutanga zvirongwa zvekuderedza huwandu hwevanhu vari mumajere pamwe nekuona kuti vanhu vanopara mhosva diki vapihwa mitongo isingavaise mumajeri senzira yekudzivirira kuapararira kwechirwere ichi mumajeri umo vanhu vari kugara vakamanikidzana. VaChamisa vakurudzirawo hurumende kuti ibatsire vanhu vari kutambura panguva ino vachiti vana veZimbabwe vakawanda vanorarama nekuzvishandira nekudaro kuvharwa kwenyika kuri kuvasiya vari parumananzombe. VaChamisa vakurudzirawo hurumende kuti iite tsvakurudzo dzakazara vanhu vasati vatanga kubaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19. Mumwe muongoroi wezvematongerwo enyika, uye vachishanda nesangano rePlatform for Youth Development, VaOwen Dhliwayo, vati mashoko ataurwa naVaChamisa ekubatana nekuitwa kwetsvakurudzo pasati patorwa matanho ekudzivirira chirwere ichi akakosha. VaDhliwayo vatsigirawo kuti zvakakosha kuti panguva ino nyika iri panguva ye National Lockdown, vanhu vawaniswe rubatsiro. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende nemashoko aVaChamisa aya sezvo nharembozha dzemunyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, yanga ichinetsa kubata. Asi vachitaura kunyika neMugovera, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakatiwo vanhu vashande pamwe chete kurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19. VaMnangagwa vakavimbisawo rubatsiro rwavakati rwuchange rwuchipihwa veruzhinji, asi havana kutaura kuti rubatsiro urwu rwuchapiwa vanhu rinhi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano pamwe nedzematongerwo enyika dzarumbidza zvaitwa naVaChamisa zvekushandisa dandemutande reFacebook kutaura neveruzhinji dzichiti izvi zvinoita kuti vanhu vasaungane munguva ino yechirwere cheCovid-19. Mashoko aVaChamisa ndeekutanga gore rino vachitura mashoko kunyika yose. No media source currently available

headline: America neIran Dzopesana paNyaya yeZimbabwe paZuva Rekupemberera Kuzvitonga Kuzere
text: Hurumende yeAmerica yakatumira mashoko ekukorokotedza mhuri yeZimbabwe kwete kuvatungamiri wenyika Vaemmerson Mnangangwa pazuva rekupemberera kuwana kuzvitonga kuzere. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau, gurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muAmerica VaAntony Blinken vakakurudzira hurumende yeZimbabwe kuti iremekedze kodzero dzevanhu dziri mubumbiro remitemo renyika. Vanotiwo zvakakosha kuti muZimbabwe muitwe nhaurirano kuti muve nekubatana sezvakarwirwa nyika. Hurumende yeZimbabwe inoti hayo America inofanira kubvisa zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vatungamiri venyika vachipomerwa mhosva yekutonga nedemo. Asi mumashoko avo pazuva rekuwana kuzvitonga kuzere kwezimbabwe, mutungamiri wenyika yeIran VaHassan Rouhani vakakorokotedza VaMnangagwa vachishorawo nyaya yezvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe. vakati zvirango izvo zvinofanira kubviswa. Iran yakatemerwawo zvirango neAmerica ichipomerwa mhosva yekuda kugadzira chombo chenuclear.

headline: Dare reDzimhosva Rinobvisisa Muzvare Mahere, Tsitsi Dangarembga neVamwe Mari yeChibatiso
text: Mutauriri weMDC Alliance, Muzvare Fadzai Mahere, munyori wemabhuku ane mukurumbira pasi rose, Tsitsi Dangarembga, nevamwe negumi nemumwe chete vakasungwa neChishanu, vaburitswa muhusungwa zvichitevera kubhadhariswa kwavaitwa mari yechibatiso inoita zviuru zvishanu zvemadhora emaRTGS. Vasungwa ava vamiswa pamberi pedare mushure mekurara vari muchitokisi vachipomerwa mhosva yekutyora mirawu ye Covid-19 Regulations pamwe nekukurudzira zvemhirizhonga. Vasungwa ava vanzi nedare vadzoke kudare musi wa18 Gunyana. Muchichisi wenyaya idzi, VaMichael Reza, vaudza dare kuti vasungwa ava vakaratidzira zviri kunze kwemutemo vachiisa hupenyu hweveruzhinji panjodzi uye vakakurudzira mhirizhonga nekuratidzira kwavakaita. Kunyange hazvo magweta ari kumirira vanhu ava ati ane zvichemo, magweta aya ati achataura zvichemo izvi mudare pachadzoka nyaya iyi kudare. Hurumende haina kupikisa chikumbiro chekuti vasungwa ava vapihwe mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso zvaita kuti mutongi wedare, VaNgoni Nduna, vati vasungwa vese ava vabhadhare madhora zviuru zvishanu pamunhu semari yechibatiso. Zvaturwa nedare zvatsinhirwa nerimwe remagweta evasungwa ava, VaPaidamoyo Saurombe. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, vashora hurumende nekusunga kwayakaita vanhu ava. VaBiti vakurudzira sangano remubatanidzwa wenyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica, reSADC, pamwe nemutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, kuti vashandise chigaro chavo sasachigaro weAfrican Union kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa muZimbabwe vachiti veruzhinji munyika vave kugara muhutapwa. Mumwe wevanhu vanga vari muhusungwa, VaLoveridge Chinzvende, vabhadhariswa zviuru zvishanu zvemadhora kuitira kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo. Vamwe vevanhu vamiswa mudare vanosanganisira Simon Drury, Tinashe Murapatsa, Nyasha Musendu, Josse Lots, Jessica Drury naTinotenda Muswe. Sangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights rinoti vanhu vanodarika makumi matanhatu vasungwa kusvika pari zvino, vachisungirwa nyaya yekuratifdzira kwanezuro, uye vanhu gumi nevatanhatu vakakuvara uye vanoda kurapwa. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rinoona nezvinoitika mukati menyika, VaKazembe Kazembe ,kuti tinzwe pamire hurumende pane zvataurwa neMDC Alliance izvi. Asi VaKazembe vakaudza vatori venhau svondo rino kuti hurumende haisi kuzopeta maoko ichisiya vemapato anopikisa vachikonzeresa kusagadzikana munyika kubudikidza nekuratidzira kwavakati hakusi pamutemo uye kwavakati kwaizopinza veruzhinji panjodzi sezvo chirwere cheCovid19 chiri kuuraya vanhu munyika. Zvichakadai, mapurisa nemasoja nhasi vaswera vachirambidza zvakare veruzhinji kupinda mudhorobha sezvakaitika nezuro pakange pashevedzerwa neveboka reJuly 31st Movement kuti veruzhinji varatidzire vachiti havasi kufara nehuori hwavanoti hwatekeshera munyika. Mapurisa nemasoja vawedzerawo kuvhara migwagwa yose inopinda mudhorobha zvaita kuti vanhu vashomanana vakwanisa kupinda mudhorobha, zvivatorere nguva yakareba kupinda mudhorobha. Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti mauto anofanirwa kunge ari mamakamba awo, asi nepamusana pekuti munyika maita dambudziko reCovid-19, mauto aya ari kubatsira kuona kuti vanhu havasi kutyora mitemo yeCovid-19 Regulations. No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesera muMigwagwa yeGuta reGweru Vosvora Danho reKanzuru rekuti Vabve muNzvimbo Dzavari Kshandira
text: Sangano rinomirira vanotengesera mumigwagwa reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, VISET, rinoti riri kunyunyuta zvakasimba nedanho rinonzi rakaziviswa nekanzuru yeguta reGweru, rekuti vose vanotengesera mumigwagwa vabude mukati meguta, kukundikana kwavo vanozobviswa nechisimba. Mukuru wesangano reVISET, VaSamuel Wadzayi vanoti sangano ravo rinoshamiswa nekurudziro yekanzuru iyi kuburikidza nevakafanobata chigaro chenemunyori mukuru wekanzuru VaEdgar Mwedzi, avo vanonzi ndivo vakazivisa nezvedanho iri. VaWadzayi kanzuru yeGweru ndiyo chete kanzuru yanga yagara ichi zivikanwa nekuda kwayo kuti pashandiswe kutaurirana pane kunetsana kuri pakati pevanotengesa ava nemakanzuru. VaMwedzi vanonzi vakazivisa kuti kanzuru yavo ichatora danho iri sezvo nhaurirano dzanga dziripo mukutsvaga kuwirirana dzichinzi dzatadza kuunza pundutso. VaWadzayi vanoti kana kanzuru yakaenderera mberi nekuburitsa vanhu mukati meguta, vanotengesa ava vanoda kusvika kana kudarika zviuru zvina vanogona kukanganiswa. “Isu tiri kuti kukanzuru ngatirambe tichi taurirana kusvika tawana nzira dzekupedza nadzo gakava iri,pane kuti vashandise chisimba,” VaWadzayi vanodaro. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata VaMwedzi kuti tinzwe divi rekanzuru panyaya iyi. Asi VaWadzayi vanoti nhengo dzavo dzicharamba kubviswa mumigwagwa nechisimba. “Kana zvichireva kuti tichafira mumigwagwa ndizvo zvichaitika. Tiri kuti isu hatina kwatinoenda,” VaWadzayi vanopika. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzira Kushandiswa Magwenya eZuva
text: Zvinhu zvinonzi zviri kuramba zvichioma munyika, zvikuru sei nekushaikwa kwemagetsi pamusoro pemamwe matambudziko agara akatarisanawo nenyika. Kambani yemagetsi yeZimbabwe Electricity Suppy Authority, ZESA, yakatozivisa vagari kuti vachange vachishaiwa magetsi munguva dzayakatara, dzingangosvika maawa manomwe pazuva, asi vazhinji vari kutaura neStudio 7 vanoti magetsi munzvimbo dzavanogara ari kudzimwa kwenguva dzinotodarika maawa makumi maviri pazuva. Vamwe vanototi vave nemazuva matatu vasina magetsi. Mukuedza kurerutsa dambudziko iri, gurukota rehurumende VaSamuel Undenge neChitatu vakakurudzira vanhu kuti vachinyanya kushandisa moto wezuva, kana kuti solar energy seimwe nzira yekuwana nayo magetsi sezvo emvura ave kunetsa. Asi vamwe vanoti kurudziro yehurumende iyi haina zvainoreva sezvo pasina hurongwa hwekuti vanhu vangawana sei magetsi ezuva aya kana hurumende isina kuvapa zvekushandisa zvacho. Mvura mudhamu reKariba, uko kunogaiwa magetsi, inonzi yadzikira zvakanyanya izvo zvoita kuti itadze kutenderedza magwenya anozogaya magetsi. Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vachitungamira sangano reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu vanoti dambudziko rose iri riri kubva pakuti hurumende iri kukundina kuona matambudziko achiri kure. VaMaguwu vanoti dai hurumende yakachenjera ingadai yakaita kuti matunhu ose azvibikire oga magetsi awo, sezvo aine madhamu asina zvaari kuita. “Muchitaura Masvingo kunana Lake Mutirikwi, Manicaland kunana Osborne Dam, saka hurumende yedu ihurumende isingatarisi mangwana,” vanodaro VaMaguwu. Vanotiwo nyika inokwanisa kubata moto wezuva ichishandisa kuita magetsi, sezviri kuitwa nenyika dzakawanda dzisina magetsi anogayiwa nemvura. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemoto wezuva, vachishanda nekambani ye Exempla Solar Systems iri kuBulawayo, VaTendai Mukucha vanoti izano rakanaka riri kukurudzirwa nehurumende rekuti vanhu vatange kushandisa zvakanyanya moto wezuva. Asi VaMukucha vanoti dambudziko riri pakuti vanhu vese vanokwanisa here kuzowana zvikwanisiro zvinodiwa kuti munhu awane magetsi e solar. Vanoti vanofara nedanho ratorwa nehurumende sezvo zvichireva kuti kana yakurudzira kushandiswa kwemoto wezuva, naivovo zvinovasimudzira. “Asi takatarisa kuhurumende, tinenge takatarisawo matanho anotibatsira sevano provider equipment,” vanodaro VaMukucha. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vashandi veHurumende Vanotambira Mari Dzawedzerwa Mihoro Yavo neHurumende, Asi Varairidzi Vanodziramba
text: Vamwe vashandi vehurumende vari pasi peApex Council vatambira zvikamu makumi mana nechimwe kubva muzana zvemari dzawedzerwa nehurumende pamihoro yavo zvichitevera musangano weNational Joint Negotiating Council waitwa muHarare pakati pevamiriri vemapoka maviri aya. Munyori mukuru weApex Council, VaDavid Dzatsunga, vanoti mari itsva idzi dzchatanga kutambirwa nevashandi dzichibva kumusi wa 01 Mbudzi, uye vanoti vawiriranawo zvakare pamusangano uyu kuti vashandi vehurumende vange vachipiwa mari dzebhonasi muzvikamu zviviri, mwedzi uno nemwedzi unouya. VaDzatsunga vanoti zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana izvi zvichasanganisira zvese mihoro pamwe nemari dzekubatsirikana zvagara zvichipiwa vashandi nehurumende. Hurumende svondo rapera yakaisa patafura zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana asi vashandi vakaramba kuzvitambira vachiti zvaive zvishoma, kunyange hazvo hurumende yakati yaizoenderera mberi nekupa mari idzi kuvashandi vayo. VaDzatsunga vanoti mari itsva idzi dzichasiya mushandi wehurumende wepasi ave kutambira madhora emunyika anosvika zviuru gumi nezvina nemazana mashanu, kana kuti $14 500.00 RTGS pamwedzi, kuchitiwo murairidzi wepasi achitambira mari iri pamusoro pemadhora emunyika zviuru gumi nezvipfumbamwe nemazana mashanu pamwedzi. "41 percent iyi iri pamusoro pe 40 percent yatakamboramba. Saka iko zvino mushandi wepasi pasi wemuhurumende unenge ave kuwanawo mari inogona kusvika kuma 14 500 zvichikwira zvakadaro kusvika kuma 22. Kureva kuti chero takatarira mumari yekuAmerica yemaU.S. dollar tinoona kuti mari yacho inenge yatiwo kukumeyiwo kudarika yatakanga tambokonana nezvayo," vanotsanangura VaDzatsunga. No media source currently available Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi sezvo tatadza kubata gurukota rezvevashandi, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima. Asi mutungamiri werimwe sangano revarairidzi, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti hurumende haina kunzwa mativi ose evashandi vayo pamari iyi, uye hurumende haifanirwe kutanga nekungozivisa vashandi kuburikidza nekushambadza kunze isati yavasuma. VaMasaraure vanoti zvakare hurumende yakatyora chibvumiranp chavakaita chekuti vashandi vatambire mari inoita madhora mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri emari yekuAmerica pamwedzi, iyo yavanoti yakamuka yabiwa. "Saka mafiga ese atinonzwa kuti kwakandwa 40 kwakandwa 41 percent, hatineyi nawo, haaenderane nedambudziko riripo. Nyaya ingoripo ndeyekuti ngatidzorereyi mari yedu payakanga iri. Nyaya iripo ndeyekuti ngatidzidzeyi kutaurirana semushandi nemushandirwi, hurumende yedu igozivawo kuti isu hatisi ma slaves ayo," Vanodaro VaMasararure. Vanoti sevashandi, vane kodzero dzavo dziri muchikamu 65 chebumbiroo remitemo yenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Dare reParamende Roomesera Nhengo dzeMDC Dzinozvidza VaMnangagwa
text: Nhengo dzeparamende dzeMDC pamwe nedzakadzingwa mudare iri dzichabhadhariswa faindi yezviuru mazana mana zvemadhora emuno pamwe nekutorerwa madiplomatic passports kana dzikabatwa nemhosva yekuzvidza mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, muparamende. Nhengo idzi kubva kumatare eSeneti neNational Assembly, dzaiimba, kuramba dzakagara pasi kana kubuda mudare kana VaMnangagwa vapinda mudare. Komiti yakaumbwa neparamende kuongorora kuita kwenhengo idzo yakatura gwaro rayo muSeneti ichiti nhengo zana negumi nesere dzeMDC, dzinofanira kubwata nemhosva yekuzvidza mutungamiriri wenyika uye dzinofanira kubhadhara zviuru mazana mana zvemadhora pamunhu. Komiti iyi, iyo yaitungamirwa nemumiriri weMudzi South muNational Assembly, VaJonathan Smakange veZanu PF, inoti nhengo idzi dzinofanirawo kutorerwa maDiplomatic Passsports. Komiti yaVaSamkange inoti mumiriri weMbizo, VaSettlement Chikwinya, avo vakadzingwa mudare svondo rapera,pamwe nemumiriri weZengeza West, VaJob Sikhala, vanofanira kubhadhara zviuru mazana masere zvemadhora emuno nekuti vakazvidza komiti iyi apo yaiita basa rayo. Gwaro iri richazeiwa mumatare eSeneti neNational Assembly matare aya ozopa mutongo wawo. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutauririri weMDC-T, VaWitnesss Dube, vati havasi kufara kuti nhengo dzavo dzakaiswa musaga rimwe chete kunyange hazvo dzaive nenyaya dzakasiyana. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatshwayo, vati nhengo dzebato ravo hadzina chadzakatadza nekuti bato ravo haribvumi kuti VaMnangagwa vakakunda musarudzo dza2018. Vatiwo komiti yaVaSamkange yaive nenhengo dzeZanu PF chete zvionoreva kuti yaiita basa rayo ine divi rayakarerekera. VaChikwinya vaudza Studio7 kuti kunyange vakabatwa nemhosva havasi kuzotambira kana kubhadhara faindi nekuti havana mhosva yavakapara. Vatiwo vaigona kutambira izvi chete dai komiti iyi yaive nenhengo kubva kumapato ese ari muparamende. VaChikwinya vati komiti iyi iri kuda kuvaomesera zvakanyanya nekuti vakaudza nhengo dzayo kuti zvadzaiita zvainge zvisina maturo. Vaikokera nhengo dzeMDC Alliance muparamende, VaProsper Mutseyami, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vachagara pasi sebato voona kuti voita sei. Pakaumbwa komiti yekuongorora nyaya iyi nekomiti inoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa eparamende, yeStanding Rules and Orders, nhengo dzeMDC Alliance mukomiti iyi dzakaramba kupinda mumusangano wacho izvo zvakazoita kuti ive nenhengo dzeZanu PF chete. Amai Priscillar Misihairabwi-Mushonga avo vainge vadomwa kuve nhengo yekomiti iyi vakaramba kupinda mukomiti iyi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemutemo uye vachidzisa paUniversity of Zimbabwe, VaLovemore Madhuku, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange nhengo dzeMDC idzi dzikabatwa nemhosva dzinokwanisa kupikisa mutongo wadzo kumatare edzimhosva. Pane nenhengo dzinodarika makumi mana dzakatodzingwwa muparamende kubva kuSeneti neNational Assembly nekuda kwemakatamwa ari muzvikwati izvi uye VaMadhuku vati paramende inogona kunetseka kuona kuti vakadzingwa ava vatevedza mutongo wayo. Zvose izvi zvinoitika apo MDC Alliance iri kuti Zanu PF iri kuronga kuparadza bato iri ichishanda nemamwe mapato. Asi mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko mubato reZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vakaudza Studio 7 nezuro kuti bato ravo harinei nezviri kuitika muMDC Alliance. Vakadzingwa muparamende vari kunziwo vadzorere motakari dzavakapihwa nechikwereti neparamende sezvo mota idzi dzichinzi dzaifanira kushandiswa pabasa reparamende. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Yotyira Kuti Vashandi Vachagumurwa kuCBZ Vachanonga Svosve neMuromo
text: Sangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions kana kuti ZCTU rinoti kusamira zvakanaka kwemitemo yevashandi kwave kupa kuti vashandi vakaita sevave kudzingwa mabasa kuCBZ vamanikidzwe kuenda pamudyandigere vasina chavainacho. CBZ inoti iri kumisa vanhu mabasa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 uye yave kushandisa michina yakawanda. Mutsamba kuvashandi, mukuru webhanga reCBZ, VaBlessing Mudavanhu, vakati kutanga nezuro kusvika musi wa 18 Chibabvu vashandi vaizozvipira kuenda pamudyandigere asi vakakundikana vaizotanga kumanikidzwa kusiya basa muna Chikumi. Vanoti izvi zviri kuitwa nekuda kwekuoma kwezvinhu zvakonzerwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 uye kushandiswawo kwemichina yechizvino zvino. Mutungamiri weZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mumabhanga uye vashandi vari panyanga dzamushore sezvo vachipihwa mari shoma mushure mekumanikidzwa kusiya basa. Vanoti mutemo unofanira kuvandudzwa kuti vashandi vawane chouviri. Mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru musangano reZimbabwe Banks and Allied Workers’ Union, VaShepard Ngandu, vatiwo havakwanise kumirira vashandi kana vazvipira voga kusiya basa asi kana vatanga kumanikidzwa vanopindira. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutungamiri wesangano revemabhanga reBankers’ Association of Zimbabwe, VaRalph Watungwa, sezvo nhare yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Asi vakatomboyambira kuvatori venhau kuti nekuda kwemichina vashandi vacharasikirwa nemabasa. Gukota rezvevashandi, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, vaudza Studio7 kuti vachaita musangano nevebazi ravo kuti vazeye zviri kutaurwa nevashandi panyaya yemudyandigere. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vati panoda mubatira pamwe chuma chemuzukuru vachiti hurumende munguva ino yeCovid-19 inofanira kugara pasi nevashandi nevashandirwi yoona kuti nyika ingabude sei mukanwa mamupere. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera, vati kumiswa kwebasa kwevashandi hakusi kuvashandisa nekuti hupfumi hwenyika hauna kumira zvakanaka zviri kukonzerwa nekusagadzikana munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga, uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGilbert Muponda, vati zvakakosha kuti vashandi vazvisimudzire panyaya yedzidzo yehumhizha nehumhetura sezvo michina yechizvino zvino yave kushandiswa nemabhanga inoda vashandi vashoma. Asi vakuru vanoti havo panomera muswe panonyerekedza nekuti bhanga iri range ravhara mamwe mapazi muHarare anoti Samora Machel, Cripps Road, Highfield, Msasa, Sapphire House uye Belmont kuBulawayo. Mamwe akavharwa anosanganisira, Gutu, Checheche, Gwanda, Nembudziya, Chegutu ne Nyanga. Bhanga iri range richikurudzira vanhu kuti vashandise nharembozha nemasaisai eInternet pazvirongwa zvaro zvinoti CBZ G-Touch, Internet Banking uye kushandisa makadhi. No media source currently available

headline: VaTsvangirai naAmai Mujuru Vonyorerana Chibvumirano cheMushandirapamwe
text: Mutungamiri webato reMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, nemusi weChitatu vakanyorerana muHarare chibvumirano chekuumba hwaro hwekushanda pamwe chete naAmai Joice Mujuru vebato reNational People’s Party. Chibvumirano ichi chakanyoreranwa kumba kwaVaTsvangirai kuHighlands. Chibvumirano ichi chiri kuuya panguva iyo vatsigiri vemapato anopikisa vari kukurudzira kuti vabatane sarudzo dzemuna 2018 dzisati dzaitwa kuitira kuti vawane mukana wekukunda mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, nebato ravo reZanu-PF. Munyika mune mapato anopikisa anodarika makumi mashanu. Vachitaura mushure mechibvumirano ichi, VaTsvangirai vati zvavaita izvi zvichaitikawo pakati pebato ravo nemamwe mapato ezvematongerwo enyika munguva inotevera. Masvondo mashoma apfuura, Amai Mujuru vakaudza vatsigiri vavo kuMasvingo kuti vakanga vava pedyo nekunyorerana chibvumirano nebato raVaTsvangairai. Mumwe mutevedzeri waVaTsvangirai, VaNelson Chamisa, vanoti chibvumirano ichi chakakosha zvikuru mukuumba mushandirapamwe munguva yesarudzo. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa neMasoja Orambidza Vanhu Kufamba Famba Munyika
text: Mapurisa nemasoja ange achirambidza vanhu vakawanda kupinda mumadhorobha akawanda munyika uye vamwe vanhu vange vapinda mumadhorobha aya vange vachiudzwa kunzi vadzokere kudzimba dzavo. Nhasi mapurisa nemasoja ange akadzika maroadblock pamigwagwa yose inopinda mumaguta achipa chete mvumo vanhu vanobvumirwa nehurumende kushanda munguva ino yeNational Lockdown. Vanga vasina mvumo vanga vachiudzwa kuti vadzokere kudzaimba dzavo, uye varemekedze mutemo we curfew wakatarwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nemusi weChipiri. Izvi ndizvo zvaitikawo mumaguta nemadhorobha akasiyana-siyana munyika kusanganisira Chinhoyi, Gweru, Kadoma, Mutare neMasvingo. Mutori wenhau ane mukurumbira, Tapfuma Machakaire, vati shoko rekuti curfew rinounza ndangariro dzakaipa sezvo mudunhu reMatebeleland makamboitwa curfew munguva yeGukurahundi, iyo yakasiya vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi maviri vauraiwa nemauto eFifth Brigade mumatunhu eMatabeleland nedzimwe nzvimbo mudunhu reMidlands. Asi nhengo yeCentral Committeee yeZanu PF, VaJospeh Tshuma, vati havawone chakapia pakuve necurfew. Vati vanhu vanofanirwa kudzidza kudzidza kubva kunyika dzakaita seItaly, Spain, Brazil neAmerica uko zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zviri kufanechirwere cheCovid-19. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, VaMusa Kika, vati mapurisa nevechiuto havafanirwe kutyora kodzero dzevanhu panguva yakadai. VaKika vatiwo hurumende inofanirwa kusiya tsika yekutonga nyika nekuisa zviga izvo vati zvinotyora bumbiro remutemo yenyika. Kurambidzwa kupinda mumaguta kuri kuitwa vanhu kunonzi kuri kuvhiringa vanhu vanorarama nekutengesa mumigwagwa. Mumwe anotengesera muBulawayo angozvidoma nezita rekuti Mushapo ati vanhu vanozvishandira vange vachirambudzwa kupinda muguta. MuBulawayo Studio 7 yaona vamwe vanorarama nekuchinja mari mumigwagwa pamwe nevanotengesa pamusika wemunaFifth Street vachiita hwekatsi nagonzo nemapurisa ayo ange ari pamabhasikoro, nemamwe ange ari pamabhiza achitenderera achiudza vanhu ava kuti vadzokere kumba. Amai Medeline Mari avo vanoraramawo nekutengesa vati mutemo we curfew uchaita kuti veruzhinji vafe nenzara. Mumwe murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, Muzvare Nozipho Moyo, vati hurumende ine tsika yekungodzika mitemo pasina kunyatsofungisisa nezvainobatsira. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remapurisa kana vechiuto panyaya iyi.Studio7 hainawo kukwanisa kubata munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, sezvo vanga vasiri kubatika panharembozha yavo. Asi VaMnangagwa vakazivisa neChipiri kuti mauto nemapurisa achange ari mumigwagwa achiona kuti mitemo yeNational Lockdown yatevedzerwa nemunhu wese sezvo nyika iri kuedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19, icho chabata vanhu vanodarika zviuru zviviri nemakumi matatu nevana, uye chauraya vanhu makumi maviri nevatanhatu muZimbabwe. VaMnangagwa havana kuzivisa kuti curfew iyi ichapera riini? Hurumende yakavharisa zvikoro zvose zvepamusoro soro kudzamara zvinhu zvanaka munyika munyaya dzeCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Vopesana Pakupa Vana Vasati Vabvazera Maparitsi eKuronga Mhuri
text: Vanhu vakawanda vari kupesana panyaya yekuti vana vasati vabvazera mapiritsi ekuronga mhuri pamwe nemishonga yekudzivirira zvirwere zvepabonde. Masarira, vanoti sangano ravo rakaendesa nyunyuto dzaro kuparamende senzira yekutsvaga nzira dzekuchengetedza hutano hwevechidiki ava. Amai Debra Mwase vanoshanda nesangano re Katswe Sisterhood vanoti nyaya iyi inofanira kuongororwa zvakadzama nokuti vana vari kuita zvepabonde vachiri vadiki zvokuti panofanirwa kuwanikwa nzira yokuvadzivirira kunjodzi yezvirwere zvepaponde zvinotapuriranwa. Nyanzvi yezvehutano, Dr Chido Dziva – Chikwari, vanoti panofanirwa kuwanikwa nzira dzokubatsira vechidiki ava. Mufundisi Mazvarirashe Mabugu vanotenderana nevabereki vari kupikisa danho rekuda kuisa mutemo unobvumidza vana ava kutora mapiritsi okuronga mhuri vachiti ndiko kuparara kuchaita rudzi rwamangwana. Nyazvi yehutano, Dr Josephat Chiripanyanga, vanoti havakurudzire vana vasati vasvitsa makore gumi nemasere kuti vaite zvepabonde nokuti zvinowedzera mukana wokusangana nezvirwere zvakasiyana zvikuru gomarara repamuromo wechibereko. Dr Chiripanyanga vanoti vana ngavarairwe kuti vagare vari mugwara rakarurama zvinozoita kuti varambe vachiendera mberi nechikoro sezvo pfungwa dzavo dzinenge dzakangoteya pakubudirira mudzidzo dzavo. Mutevedzeri wemukuru anoona nazvezvirwere zvisingatapuriranwe mubazi rehutano Dr Justice Mudavanhu vanoti gomarara repamuromo wechibereko ndiro rakanyanyisa kuwanda muvarapwi. Asi vanoti rinokwanisa kurapwa zvokutopera kana madzimai akakurumidza kuenda kunoongororwa kuzvipatara nemakiriniki. Ongororo yakaitwa nesangano reWorld Health Organisation rinoti vana vari pakati pemakore gumi nemashanu nemakore makuni maviri nemana munyika vari kutapurirwa zvirwere zvepabonde zvinenge gomarara repamuromo wechibereko iro rinozobatwa kazhinji risingachakwanisike kurapika nokuti rinenge rapararira kunhengo dzakakosha dzinoita kuti munhu ararame. No media source currently available

headline: Mutemo Unorambidza Vanhu Kufambafamba Wotadzisa Vanorarama neHIV/Aids Kuwana Mishonga Yavo
text: Rimwe sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, rinoti vamwe vanorarama nehutachiwana hweHIV vagere kumaruwa ari kure vari kukundikana kuenda kunzvimbo dzehutano dzavanositorera mishonga yavo yemaARVs. Mukuru wesangano reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, vanoti vanhu vanodarika mazana mashanu ezviuru vanorarama nehutachiwana hweHIV/Aids vari vari kumaruwa vari kukundikana kuwana chekufambisa kuti vanotora mishonga yavo panguva ino yekurambidzwa kufamba kwevanhu senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCoronavirus. VaMaguwu vanoti izvi zviri kukonzerwa nemutemo wakadzikwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, unorambidza vanhu kufambafamba kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe, senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana hwe coronavirus. Vanoti matunhu avawana nyunyuto iyi anosanganisira reMutasa kuManicaland pamwe neHwange kuMatabeleland North. VaMaguwu vanoti mabhazi ari kubvumidzwa kufamba chete munguva yemushanda kwemutemo wekurambidza vanhu kufambafamba ndeehurumende eZUPCO, ayo vanoti haasvike kunzvimbo dzakawanda dzine vanhu vane matambudziko ava. Sangano reNational Aids Council rakazivisa svondo rapera kuti riri kukurudzira vanorarama nehutachiwana vose kuti vange vaine mishonga yemwedzi mitatu munguva ino yekusafamba kwevanhu kuitira kuti vange vakazvidzivirira zvakakwana. VaMaguwu vanoti sesangano, vanoona sekuti hurumende yaifanirwa kushanda nemasangano akazvimirira oga, uyewo kuti iendese mishonga iyi munzvimbo dziri kumaruwa idzi dzakaita sezvikoro nemakiriniki kuitira kuti vanhu ava vakwanise kuwana mishonga yavo pedyo. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Voyaura Zvichitevera Kuoma Kwaita Zvinhu muZimbabwe
text: Vagari vakawanda mudunhu reMashonaland West vanoti hupenyu hwave kuvaomera zvakanyanya kudarika nguva yesarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. Vakawanda vevanhu ava vanoti vaitarisira kuti zvinhu zvichanaka mushure mesarudzo sezvo vaivimbiswa mutambara kede nevatungamiri vemapato apo vaitsvaga rutsigiro munguva dzesarudzo. Asi vanoti hupenyu hwatonyanya kuvaomera mushure mesarudzo apo mitengo yezvinhu zvakawanda iri kukwira, izvo zviri kukonzerawo kuti mari dzekufambisa kuenda kumabasa dzikwire. Kudzingwa wevanhu vanotengesa mumigwagwa kwakaita kuti vanhu vakawanda vashaye mari sezvo vanhu vakawanda vainge vave kurarama nekutengesa. Amai Agatha Karonga vanogara mumusha unogara verizhinji weGadzema. Amai Karonga vanoti hupenyu hwaoma pari zvino kudarika sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. Vanoti zvinhu zvanyanya kuvaomera zvinosanganisira mitengo yezvekudya iri kuwira zuva rega rega uye kushayikwa kwemagetsi. Izvi zvinotsigirwa naAmai Fungai Tembo avo vanoti hupenyu hwave kurwadza sezvo zvekudya zvave kudhura uye kushaikwa kwemvura nemagetsi kwakanyanya mushure mesarudzo. Mumwe mugari wekuKariba, VaMoffat Pedzisai, vanoti havachakwanisa kudya kwemasikati vari kubasa sezvo vave kubhadhara mari yakawanda yekuenda kubasa. Amai Tembo vanoti chinonyanya kuvarwadza ndechekuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, hapana zvavari kutaura pamusoro pekukwidzwa kwemitengo izvo vanoti vanokundwa nevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, avo vaidzikisa mitengo. VaPedzisai vanoti havatarisire kuti zvinhu zviome kudarika zvakamboitika muna2008 apo munyika maishaikwa zvinhu zvekudya izvo zvairatidzwa nekuonda wevanhu. VaMnangagwa vakabuda pachena vachiti zvinhu zvichati omeyi munyika zvisati zvanaka sezvo vari kuedza napose pavanogona napo kugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti tarisiro yekuti zvinhu zvichanaka pasi pehurumende yeVaMnangagwa iri kuramba ichiita shoma sezvo vanhu vave kuswera vachimhanya muzvitoro vachitsvaka zvinhu zvakaita sechingwa, shuga, mafuta pamwe nezvinwiwa uye kushayikwa kwemagetsi nemvura kwenguva dzakawanda. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanosvika kuMusangano weWorld Economic Forum kuSouth Africa
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vasvika muSouth Africa kumusangano weWorld Economic Forum on Africa uri kuitirwa kuCape Town. VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kubatana nevamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica nevamwe venyika dzakabudirira. Musangano uyu uri kutanga neChitatu uchipera nemusi weChishanu kuCape Town International Convention Center. Ko Zimbabwe pane chainobura here pamisangano yakadai sezvo VaMnangagwa vachangobva kumuysangano we Tokyo International Conference on African Development kuJapan vamwe vachiti vakafambira dhongi rakaora? Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaCallisto Jokonya, vanoti misangano yakadai yakakosha zvikuru kuZimbabwe. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo namuzvinabhizimisi ari nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaGilbert Muponda, avo vati musangano uyu unopa Zimbabwe mukana wekuumba hushamwari nenyika dzakaitemere zvirango. VaJokonya vati Zimbabwe inofanira kunyatsouya nemazano akajeka kuti iwane chouviri pamisangano yakadai. Asi mumwe wevatevedzeri vebato rinopikisa reMDC, uye vaimbova gurukota rezvemari muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, VaTendai Biti, vanoti misangano iyi kuteya nzou neriva. Vati VaMnangagwa vanongoenda kumisangano pasina chinobuda nekuti hapana vekunze vanoda kudyidzana neZimbabwe nenyaya yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. VaBiti vati vanhu vemuZimbabwe vanofanira kutanga vabatana, asi vakati havaone VaMnangagwa vari ivo vangatungamire hurongwa uhu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vari mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vemunyika vatange vataurirana vasati vaenda kunze kunotsvaga vanoda kutanga mabhizimisi munyika. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau, mutauriri wemutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, Muzvare Khusela Diko, vati mutungamiri wenyika iyi achatungamira chikwata chemakurukota avo. Musangano uyu uri kuitwa pasi pedingindira rakanangana nekukurudzira kudyidzana munyaya dzezvekutengeserana kuburikidza nehumhizha hwechizvino zvino. No media source currently available

headline: Doctor Kanyenze Vokurudzira Nhaurirano Kuitira Kuti Zimbabwe Ifambire Mberi
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti vakuru vezvematongerwo enyika, vedzisvondo, masangano akazvimirira pamwe neveruzhinji vanofanirwa kuisa misoro pamwe chete kuitira kuti vatsvake nzira dzekubudisa nyika kubva mumadhaka mairi. Zimbabwe yakatarisana nenguva yakaoma zvikuru sezvo munyika musina kumira zvakanaka nekuda kwezvehupfumi uho hwaenda kumawere. Pari zvino vanhu vari kunetsekana kuwana mari dzavo, mitengo yezvinhu iri kuramba ichikwira, ukuwo zvimwe zvinhu zvakakosha zvichishaikwa munyika. Vanhu vari kuswera vakamira mumitsetse kuitira kuti vatenge mafuta edzimotokari, ayo ari kunetsa kuwana munyika yose. Gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vakatoyambira kare nyika kuti igare yakagadzirira sezvo zvinhu zvichati omeyi munyika zvisati zvatanga kuita zvakanaka.  Mukuru musangano ravana chipangamazano, reLabor and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti zvakakosha kuti munyika muve nekutaurirana kuitira kuti vekunze vane mari dzavo vaite chivimbo chekuuya kuzotanga mabhizinesi muZimbabwe. VaKanyenze vanoti vekunze vasati vauya, vanhu vanofanirwa kutanga vabatana munyika kuitira kuti vekunze vauye vachiziva kuti munyika mune vanhu vakabata. VaKanyenze vanoti zviri pachena kuti vanhu havana kubatana, uye havasi kudonzera divi rimwe chete. Vanoti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakatsigirwa zvakasimba nevanhu vekumaruwa, ukuwo mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vakatsigirwa zvine mutsingo nevanhu vanogara mumaguta nemadhorobha. VaKanyenze vanoti zviri pachena kuti VaMnangagwa naVaChamisa vanofanirwa kuita muonera pamwe kuitira kuti nyika ifambire mberi.  Asi vanotiwo zvakakosha kuti vashandi nevashandirwi, masangano akazvimirira pamwe nevedzisvondo vavewo nechekuita mukutsvaga rakanaka renyika remangwana. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti hupfumi hwenyika hwakaondoka nepamusana pekutadza kutonga zvine hungwaru kwebato reZanu PF iro rava nemakore makumi matatu nemasere richitonga nyika kubva nyika yawana kuzvitonga muna 1980. Asi Zanu PF inoti hupfumi hwenyika hwakaparadzwa kuburikidza nezvirango zvinoti zvakatemerwa nyika nenyika dzakaita seBritain neAmerica.  Asi mumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe, Ambassador Brian Nichols, vanoti nyika yavo haina kutemera Zimbabwe zvirango asi kuti yakatemera vakuru vakuru muhurumende pamwe nemakambani avo zvirango zvinovatadzisa kushanya kuAmerica pamwe nekuita mabhizinesi nezvizvarwa zvemuAmerica sezvo vakuru ava vachizivikanwa kuti vanhu vane nhoroondo yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu pamwe nekusaremekedza mitemo yenyika. America inoti iri kubatsira Zimbabwe munyaya dzehutano, dzidzo nezvimwe zvinhu zvinobata veruzhinji. No media source currently available

headline: Vari Kuroja Dzimba kuKanzuru yeHarare Votadza Kubhadhara Mari dzeMitero
text: Vamwe vagari vemuHarare varikugara mudzimba dzekanzuru vokumbira kuti kanzuru ivatendere kushanda pachinzvimbo chekubhadhara mari dzezvikwereti kukanzuru nekuda kwehurombo nekushaya kwavarikuita mari. Vachitaura pamusangano waitwa nevagari nevakamiririra kanzuru, vagari vabva kumisha yakasiyana-siyana inogara vazhinji vati havana kwekuwana mari kuti vabhadhare mari dzezvikwereti kukanzuru idzo dzavati dziri kuramba dzichiwanda mwedzi nemwedzi. Amai Juliet Masiyambiri ndeumwe wevanogara mudzimba dzekanzuru kuGlennorah vati kanzuru dai yavapa mukana wekushanda kuti vabhadhare zvikwereti kukanzuru sezvo vasingakwanise kubhadhara mitero yepamwedzi. Kanzuru inoti vanhu vazhinji varikugara mudzimba dzekanzuru havasi kubhadhara mitero kubva zvakakanzurwa zvikwereti nehurumende paganguva yegadziriro yesarudzo dza2013. Mumwe mukuru mukanzuru VaSaul Marongwe vati kusabhadharwa kwezvikwereti uku ndiko kwave kukonzera kuti kanzuru idzinge vanhu mudzimba idzi. Musangano uyu warongwa nesangano rinomiririra vagari, reHarare Residents Trust mushure mekuwona kuti veruzhinji vanga vowirwa nedambudziko rekudzingwa mudzimba dzekanzuru. VaAlbert Mazula, sachigaro weHarare Residents Trust vaudza Studio 7 kuti nhengo dzavo dzange dzisingahwinzwisisi kuti dzimba dzekanzuru dzavagara kwemakore akawanda zvikuru hadzisi dzavo. Manesi Bell mumwe mugari wekuMbare apinda mumusangano uyu audza Studio 7 kuti musangano uyu wavabatsira zvikuru kuvavhura pfungwa sezvo vaifunga kuti kugara dzimba dzekanzuru kwemakore mazhinji dzinozopedzesira dzave dzavo. Mumwe mugari wekuMabvuku B, VaMuradzi Mapara vafarirawo mukana wekusangana nevashandi vekukanzuru ava vakati izvi zvinovapa mukana wekupiwa zivo. Sangano reHarare Residents Trust rinoti zvakakosha kuti vakuru vekanzuru vaite nhaurirano nevagari vachipangana pfungwa. Musangano uyu wapindwawo naamai Bridget Mandizha vanovawo mukuru wekanzuru kubazi rinoona nezvedzimba. Amai Mandizha vakurudzira vagari kuti vanzwisise kuti imba inozoita yavo kana vawana matitle deeds uye kuti kanzuru kunzvimbo dzavari kugara haina dzimba dzainobvumidza vanhu kuti vagare vachitenga zvishoma zvishoma kana kuti rent to buy. No media source currently available

headline: Health Services Board Inoti Yawirirana navanaChiremba vari Kuramwa Mabasa
text: Bhodhi rezvehutano, reHealth Services Board, nezuro rakabudisa gwaro rinokurudzira kuti vana chiremba vari pakuramwa mabasa vadzoke kubasa, richiti hurumende yave kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavana chiremba ava. Asi mutungamiri wesangano ravanachiremba vezvipatara zvehurumende reHospital Doctors Association, Doctor Mloxisi Ngwenya varamba mashoko aya, vachiti hapana chati chatenderanwa uye vanachiremba havasi kuzodzokera pamabasa. Mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, Doctor Fortune Nyamande, vanoti sesangano, vanoshora zvikuru danho ratorwa nebhodhi rezvehutano iri rekutaura zvisina kuwiriranwa navachiremba Doctor Nyamande vanoti bhodhi iri ranga risingafanirwi kumhanyira kuenda kumapepanhau kunoshambadza kuti vawirirana, pane kuita zvinhu negwara kuti zvinonetsa zvigadziriswe. No media source currently available

headline: Makambani Oyambirwa Kubhadhara Mari kuNSSA
text: Vamwe vamiriri vevashandi pamwe nevashandirwi vanoti vanotambira danho reNational Social Security Authority kana kuti NSSA rekuti makambani ose munyika ave anonyoresa nekambani iyi uye kuti aendese kuNSSA mari yemudyandigere yaanobata kuvashandi sezvinofanirwa pamutemo. Mumashoko avari kubudisa paterevhizheni nemumapepanhau veNSSA vari kukurudzira kuti makambani ose ari munyika ave anonyoresa kukambani iyi. VeNSSA vanotiwo makambani ose ange achibata mari yepenjeni inofanirwa kubatwa pamihoro yevashandi asi asingaendese mari iyi kuNSSA sezvinofanirwa, anofanirwa kugadzirisa nyaya iyi nekukasika. Mukuru wesangano reCommercial Workers Union of Zimbabwe uye variwo zvekare munyori wekomiti yevanhukadzi musangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, Amai Barbara Tanyanyiwa, vanoti zvakakosha kuti makambani aendese mari yaanobata kuvashandi kuNSSA sezvo mari iyi iri iyo inofanirwa kuzobatsira vashandi ava kana vave pamudyandigere. Kune mashoko anombobuda dzimwe nguva munhau emamwe makambani anenge achinzi haaendesi mari yaanobatira vashandi kuNSSA. Mukuru weConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaSifelani Jabangwe, vanobvumawo kuti zvakakosha kuti vemakambani vaendese mari kuNSSA vachiti kana makambani madiki akakwanisa kunyoresa neNSSA sezvinodiwa pamutemo, zvinobatsirawo kusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika. VaJabangwe vanotiwo makambani akawanda ange achinetseka nekuendesa mari kuNSSA sezvinofanirwa nekuda kwekusamira zvakanaka kwezvehupfumi munyika vachiti vanotarisira kuti izvi zvave kuzogadizrika. Pave nenguva yakareba vamwe vashandirwi kana kuti vemakambani vachichema nerekuti mari yemihoro inotambirwa nevashandi munyika iri pamusoro zvikuru zvekuti ichi ndicho chimwe chezvikonzero zvinoita kuti makambani akawanda atadze kunyatsoshanda nemazvo. Asi Amai Tanyanyiwa vanopikisana nemaonero aya vachiti vashandi vakawanda munyika vanonhonga svosve nemurormo nekuti vanowana mari isingavakwanire zvachose. Mutungamiri wesangano reZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vanotsinhirawo vachiti chimwe chezvikonzero zvinoita kuti makambani emunyika atatarike inyaya yekuti vamwe vakuru vakuru vemakambani aya vanopiwa mari yemihoro ine mumvuri asi vashandi vachipiwa shomanana. VaMutasa vanotiwo ivo veNNSA pachavo vanofanirwa kubata mari yevashandi zvakanaka kuitira kuti isatsakatike vashandi vanenge vave pamudyandigere vachizoona nhamo. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kune veNSSA panyaya iyi. Makambani emunyika ari kupiwa kusvika musi wa 28 Kukadzi kuti ave agadzirisa zvekunyoresa neNSSA pamwe nekuona kuti mari dzose dzinofanirwa kuendeswa kukambani iyi, dzaendeswa sezvinofanirwa. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Alliance Yoita Musangano kuCross Dete
text: Mubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance waita musangano nevatsigiri wawo kuCross Dete, kudunhu reMatabeleland North, uyo pindwawo nevatungamiri vemapato ose ari mumubatanidzwa uyu. Vachamirira MDC Alliance musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika, uye vari mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaNelson Chamisa, vanonzi vaudza musangano uyu kuti neSvondo vachaedza kuita musangano nemumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri webato ravo, Muzvare Thokozani Khupe kuti vaedze kugadzirisa makakatanwa ari pakati pavo. Muzvare Khupe vari kuti ivo ndivo vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weMDC-T kusvika paitwa kongiresi ichazosarudza mutungamiri. Mumwe wevatungamiri vataurawo pamusangano uyu, VaJacob Ngarivhume veTransform Zimbabwe, vanoti vavimbisa vatsigiri vavo kuti mubatanidzwa wavo ndiyo chete nzira ichabatsira kusimudzira dunhu reMatabeleland North, iro vanoti rakasarira shure nekuda kwehutongi hweZanu PF. “Ndavimbisa vanhu zvinhu zviviri. Chekutanga, ndaudza vanhu kuti Alliance ndiyo nzira yatinayo muZimbabwe sebato rinopikisa kuti tikunde pasarudzo dzinotevera, saka tinofanira kuibatisisa uye tinofanira kuwirirana mumubatanidzwa wedu, uye vatsigiri vedu ngavatitsigire kuti tigone kubatana,” vanodaro VaNgarivhume. “Chechipiri, ndaudza vanhu kuti zvinokosha kuti vanhu vazive kuti VaMnangagwa vangavari umwe wevakakonzera matambudziko atange tinawo kubva muna 1980 vachishanda naVaMugabe.” No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, Muzvare Khupe vanonzi vasanganawo nevatsigiri vavo kuNkayi, kuMatabeleland North kwakare. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuti zvii zvakurukurwa kumusangano wavo uyu sezvo takundikana kuvabata.

headline: Baba neMwana Vokonzera Mutauro nekuHwina Makwikwi ekwaTM Supermarkets kuChinhoyi
text: Kuhwina makwikwi eTM Bonanza promotion kwababa nemwana ane makore mashanu kokonzeresa mutauro muChinhoyi vamwe vachiti vanoshandisa mushonga kuti vahwine. VaClifton Mandla nemwana wavo Clinton ane makore mashanu ndivo vakahwina mibairo mukuru yeTM Bonanza promotion yakaitwa muChinhoyi neMugovera. Clinton akahwina mubairo mukuru wemari inosvika zviuru gumi, baba vake avo vanogaro vachihwina mibairo pachitoro cheTM muChinhoyi vakahwina zviuru zvishanu zvemadhora. Vamwe vagari vemuChinhoyi vanoti VaMandla vanoshandisa mushonga wekuti vahwine kana kuti vanorotswa. Amai Sobangile Kamudyariwa mumwe wevanofunga kuti VaMandla vanoshandisa mushonga kuti vahwine. Amai Kamudyariwa vanoti chimwe chinoshamisa ndechekuti VaMandla vari kuhwina pamakwikwi echitoro chimwechete izvo vanofunga kuti pane chitsotsi chirikuitwa nevashandi veTM. Asi VaMandla vanoti hapana mushonga wavanoshandisa vachiti vanohwina nekuti vanopinda mumakwiwi ose anoitika muzvitoro. VaMandla vanoramba kuti vanohwina makwiwi anoitwa muchitoro cheTM chete vachiti vanohwina makwiwi emunezvimwe zvitoro. VaMandla vakambohwina mamwe madhora zviuru zvishanu mugore ra2016, gore rakapera vakahwina firiji mumakwiwi ekwaTM Bonanza promotion.
