Vanoti mari yavahwina vachaishandisa kuvaka imba panzvimbo yavakatenga mushure mukuhwina mari yekutanga uye vanoti vacharamba vachipinda mumakwikwi ekwaTM nemunezvimwe zvitoro. Kunyange hazvo mutemo unoona nezvekupinda mumakwikwi usingabvimire kuti vana vane makore ari pasi pegumi nemasere vapinde mumakwikwi, chitoro cheTM chakaiswa panguva yakaomwa sezvo vainge vasina kunyora kuti makwikwi aya ayipindwa nevanhu vane makore mangani. Mukuru anoona nezvekushambadzirwa muzvitoro zvekwaTM Muzvare Paida Moyo vanoti vakaona kukanganisa uku Clinton atohwina vakatya kusamupa mubairo wake sezvo vaizoendeswa kumatare. Muzvare Moyo vanoti zvekuhwinisa mwana mudiki hazvichaitika zvakare. Zvitoro zvakawanda zvave kuita makwiwi ekuwanisa mibairo kuti vanhu vatenge zvinhu zvakawanda nechinangwa chekuhwina mibairo. No media source currently available

headline: Zororo reEaster Rinorangarirwa Gore Rino Vanhu Vasingaungane
text: Vatendi vechiKristu vakawanda pasi rose varangarira zororo reGood Friday vari mudzimba dzavo munyika dzakasiyana siyana nekuda kwechirwere cheCoronavirus, icho chapararira pasi rose, kusanganisira muZimbabwe, umo chauraya vanhu vatatu. Vanamati vechiKirisitu vakawanda muZimbabwe vateerera yambiro yemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, yekugara mudzimba munguva ino yekuvharwa kwenyika apo vakawanda vanoti varangarira kufa kwaJesu nekunamata pamwe nekutora chirairo vari mudzimba dzavo. Amai Tsungai Madhuviko vanoti kunyange hazvo vatadza kuungana nevamwe vavo semakore ese nekuda kwechirwere cheCoronavirus, vari kunamata vari mumba vachitevedza mitemo yesangano ravo rechipositori yekwaMadzibaba Mwazha. Amai Madhuviko vanoti zvakakosha kutevedzera zviri kutaurwa nevezvehutano kuitira kuti vasarasikirwe nevatendi vafa nechirwere ichi. Mumwe mutenderi, Amai Petronela Nyikadzino, vanoti vakaronga nedzimwe nhengo dzekereke yavo yeHwisiri kuburikidza nedandemutande reWhatsup kuti vachange vachinamata nguva dzakafanana. Mumwe mutendi, VaTonderai Makaya, vanoti chikuru hakusi kunamata vanhu vakaungana, asi kunamata mumweya nemuzvokwadi. VaMakaya vanoti Pasika yaidyiwa nemhuri vari mumba mavo sezvaitika kumhuri dzakawanda nhasi. Mufundisi wekereke yePentacostal Assemblies of Zimbabwe, VaTawanda Munaki, vanoti kunamata hausi mudhuri uye kereke yaJesu inoenderera mberi nekunamata mudzimba vachiti panoungana vanhu vaviri kana vatatu, Jesu vanenge varipo sezvinotaura bhaibheri. Mufundisi Munaki vanoti kuvharwa kwezvivakwa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 kwapa mukana vafundisi kuti vataure nenhengo dzavo kuburikidza nemadandemutamde eWhatsup, Livestreaming neFacebook. Svondo rakapera, gurukota rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakayambira vatendi kuti vasaungane vachinamata vachiti achawanikwa achiita izvi achazvionera pamhuno sefodya. Asi vamwe vatendi vanoti danho rekusaungana rinodzorera kutenda kwavo kumashure sezvo vatendi vachikurudzirana kunamata vakawanda. Vatenderi vechiKristu pasi rose vanoremekedza zuva reGood Friday, senzira yekurangarira kuurayiwa kwaJesu Kristu, uyo akafa nemusi weChishanu, akazomuka nemusi weSvondo, zuva rinorangarirwa seEaster Sunday. No media source currently available

headline: Botswana Yovandudza Mapirwo eZvizvarwa Zvekune Dzimwe Nyika Magwaro
text: Mukutanga kwemwedzi waGunyana, mutungamiri weBotswana, VaMokgweetsi Masisi, vakazivisa kuti hurumende yavo ichavandudza kupihwa kwemagwaro ekugara nekushanda kuzvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvizhinji zvange zvave pedyo nekutakura mikwende yazvo zvakananga kumusha sezvo Botswana yakambenge yadzika mitemo inoomesera vekune dzimwe nyika. VaMisheck Chivhembe, avo vane makore makumi matatu nemaviri, vanoti mamiriro ezvinhu muBotswana ava nani kupinda makore apfuura. Mashoko aVaChivhembe atsinhirwa nachimwewo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaMorris Nyamandwe, avo vanoshanda mabasa emaoko muGaborone. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaNkululeko Dube, vanoti havazive kuti vangatenda sei VaMasisi nedanho ravakatora. VaDube vanoti kusapihwa magwaro nehurumende kwakanga kwoita kuti vafunge kuenda kuSouth Africa uko zvizvarwa zvinobva kune dzimwe nyika zvinooneswa ndondo nevanhu venyika iyi. Apo Botswana yaitungamirwa naVaSeretse Khama Ian Khama, zvakanga zvisiri nyore kuti magwaro ekushanda nekugara munyika iyi abude. Machinjiro ezvinhu aya afadza mumwe muzvinabhizimisi mudhorobha reFrancistown, VaPatrick Matenge, vanoti zvakaitwa neBotswana zvinhu zvakanakira mabhizimisi emunyika iyi. Kunyange hazvo kusina humbowo hwakati tsvikiti hwezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogara muBotswana, huwandu hwazvo hunofungidzirwa kuti hunodarika vanhu vemunyika iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi vepaMugodhi weShamva Gold Mine Voramwa Mabasa
text: Vashandi vepamugodhi weShamva Gold Mine, vanonzi vakatanga kuramwa mabasa nezuro vachinyunyuta nemashandiro avari kuita, uye kusatambiriswa mihoro nyavo kwemwedzi mina yadarika. Vashandi vari kuramwa mabasa ava, avo vari pasi pekambani yezvicherwa ye Metallon, vanoti zvimwe zvavari kuda kuti zvigadziriswe inyaya yekuti pasi pavanoshandira hapana mweya wekufema wakanaka, izvo zvinovaisa munjodzi huru. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata vakuru vemugodhi uyu. Asi munyori wesangano revashandi vemugodhi uyu, VaPatrick Mugwambi vanoti vashandi vakazvipira kudzokera kumabasa avo kana zvichemo zvavo zvakagadziriswa nekukasika.

headline: Vanhu Vana Vofa Asi Bazi rezveHutano Rinoti Zvinhu Zvave Kuita Zviri Nani
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu vana vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemusi weMugovera zvasiya vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru zvishanu nemazana makumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri kana kuti 5 292. Vanhu mazana maviri negumi nevasere vakabatwa nechirwere ichi neMugovera zvasiya vabatwa nacho vave mazana maviri ezviuru nemakumi maviri nemasere ane zana nemakumi manomwe nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 228 179. Mukuru anoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika Dr Agness Mahomva vanoti vari kufara kuti huwandu hwevari kubatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi munyika huri kuramba huchidzikira. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu mamiriyoni mana nezviuru mazana maviri nemakumi matatu nevapfumbamwe nemazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nemumwe kana kuti 4 239 261 vabayiwa nhomba kekutanga. Vabayiwa nhomba kaviri vave mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nemanomwe ane mazanamaviri nemakumi mashanu nevatatu kana kuti 3 267 253. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba katatu sezvave kukurudzirwa vave zviuru zvina nechimwe zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi masere nevatanhatu kana kuti 41 986.

headline: Kudhura kweMasaisai Kwotadzisa Vagari vekuMashonaland West Kuwana Mashoko muNzvimbo dzeRuzivo Dziri muNharaunda Dzavo
text: Vamwe vagari vekwaZvimba neMhangura vanoti vari kutadza kuwana mashoko neruzivo munzvimbo dzakavhurwa nehurumende makore mashanu adarika kana kuti Community Information Centres nekuda kwekunetsa kwemasaisai uye kudhura kwemari dzekutenga masaisai aya. Vagari ava vanoti vaifunga kuti nhamo yavo yekushaya masaisai anoita kuti vashandise madandemutande akasiyana yainge yapera nekuvhurwa kwenzvimbo dzainge dziine michina kana kuti Information centres mumatunhu avo. Asi vanoti vari kutadza kushandisa nzvimbo idzi sezvo dzisina michina yechizvinozvino, kushaya masaisai kana kuti network uye kudhura. Mumwe mugari wekwaMurombedzi uko kwakavhurwa nzvimbo iyi muna2016, VaGift Svosve, vanoti nzvimbo iyi yakamira kushanda muna 2019 vachiti hapana masaisai. Mumwe mugari wekuMhangura VaNelson Phiri vanoti kunyange masaisai achimbowanikwa anononoka kushandisa uye hakuna michina yechizvinozvino yekushandisa. Mumwe mwana wechikoro paMhangura High School uyo ati anoda kuzivikanwa nezita rekuti Rugare, anoti mari inobhadhariswa inove dhora rimwechete kwe awa rimwechete yakawandisa sezvo vasina kwavanoiwana. Rugare anoti anenge achida kuita tsvakurudzo yezvidzidzo zvavanopihwa kuchikoro asi nekuda kwekudhura uku anotadza kupedza kuita zvose. Mukuru webazi rinopa masaisai nekuvaka nzvimbo idzi pamwe nekutenga michina yekushandisa munzvimbo idzi rePOTRAZ, VaGift Machengete, vanobvuma kuti dzimwe nzvimbo hadzina michina yechizvinozvino sezvo michina yakatanga iripo isisashande munzvimbo dzinosanganisira Murombedzi. Patavabvunza kuti sei vari kutora nguva yakareba vasati vatenga michini iyi, VaMachengete vanoti vari kuita dambudziko rekushaya mari yekunze yekutenga michini iyi. Sachigaro vesangano rinoongorora nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko munyika reMISA-Zimbabwe, VaGolden Maunganidze, vanoti danho rekuisa ma Information Centre munzvimbo dzakasarira rakanaka zvikuru vakakurudzura vose vane chekuita nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko kuti vaite zvavanogona kuti mashoko asvike kuvanhu vakawanda kusanganisira vekumaruwa. POTRAZ inoti kusvika pari zvino pave nenzvimbo dzekuwanira mashoko kana kuti information centres dzinosvika zana nemakumi manomwe neimwechete kana kuti 171 munyika yose uye vari kutarisira kuisa dzimwe makumi matatu neshanu gore rino. No media source currently available

headline: Dambudziko reMagwaro eKufambisa Rokanganisa Vari Kunze kweNyika
text: Rimwe gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu rinoti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zviri kutyorerwa kodzero dzazvo nekukundikana kwehurumende kuzviwanisa magwaro ekufambisa kana kuti masipoti nenguva inokodzera uye inotarisirwa nemunhu kuti ange awana gwaro rake. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu pasi rose, reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti bumbiro remitemo yenyika rinopa kodzero kuvana veZimbabwe kuti vawane magwaro ekufambisa kana chero magwaro anokodzera kunge achiwanikwa nechizvarwa chenyika. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko ekuti hurumende yave kukundikana kudhinda magwaro ekufambisa aya nekuda kwekushaya mari yekunze yekutenga bepa pamwe ne ink zvinodiwa mukugadzirwa kwemagwaro aya. Vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika kumahofisi amabharani mukuru wenyika kana kuti Registrar-General vanoti pasipoti itsva yave kutora mwedzi inodarika makumi maviri isati yabuda, kuchitiwo kutora pasipoti yechimbichimbi kuchinzi kwave kutora mwedzi gumi nemisere kana kudarika. VaMavhinga vanoti dambudziko iri rinofanirwa kugadziriswa nechimbichimbi sezvo paine vanhu vakawanda vari kunze kwenyika vanoda kumutsiridza magwaro avo, vakaita sevari muSouth Africa vanoda magwaro ekushanda nekugara munyika iyi. Vanoti vamwe vari munyika vari kukanganiswa vanenge vachida kubuda munyika kuenda kunorapwa kunze kwenyika, kuenda kuzvikoro, kana kushanya chaiko. Muna Kubvumbi gore rino gurukota rezvemukati menyika, VaCain Mathema, vakaudza vatori venhau kuti hofisi yaRegistrar-General yaive iine magwaro anodarika mazana maviri ezviuru akanga akamirira kudhindwa. VaMathema vakati kana hofisi iyi ichishanda ine hudzamu hwekudhinda magwaro zviuru zvisere pazuva. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vana Vane Chirwere cheMoyo Vanombonorapwa kuItaly Vofira muNyika neKutadziswa Kufamba neCovid-19
text: Apo pasi rose riri kutarisana nekurwisa chirwere charura cheCovid-19, zvimwe zvirwere zvakaita sezvemoyo zvikuru muvana vadiki zvasara zvisina ari kunyatsozvirapa izvo zvoisa vana vakawanda munyika munjodzi huru vamwe vachifa. Vabereki vevana vane chirwere ichi vanonziwo vanogona kutangawo kurwara nepfungwa sezvo basa rekuvariritira rakaoma. Chimwe chirongwa chakanganiswa nedenda iri ndechekuenda kwevana vemuZimbabwe kuItaly kunorapwa chirwere chemaburi pamoyo kana kuti Congenital Heart Disease-CHD. Vanachiremba vekuItaly vanoenda kuchipatara cheRoman Catholic cheAll Soul’s Mission kwaMutoko uko vanosarudza vana vanenge vari munjodzi huru vovaendesa kuItaly. Vanachiremba ava vanoshandawo nemamwe masangano akaita sereBrave Little Hearts. Sangano reBrave Little Hearts rakaumbwa naAmai Tendai Moyo wekuBulawayo avo vakashaikirwa nemwana wavo Rudorwashe aiva nechirwere cheCHD ichi. Sangano iri rinounza pamwe chete vabereki vane vana vane denda iri kuti vapangane mazano. Mumwe mubereki ane mwana akashaya ave nemakore maviri nekukundikana kunorapwa kuItaly gore rapera nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 ndi Amai Angelina Manda vaudza Studio 7 nezvekurwadziwa kwavari kuita nekurasikirwa nemwana. Vachitaura nezvematambudziko evabereki vari kurwarirwa, Amai Tendai Chatikobo, vanotungamirira sangano reBrave Little Hearts muHarare vati zvinhu zvakaoma kuchengeta mwana ane chirwere chemoyo ichi. Amai Chatikobo, avo vanemwana anemakore matatu ane denda remwoyo iro risingakwanisike kugadzirika, vati maoparesheni aya aisimboitwa kuzvipatara zvehurumende zviri munyika kare asi ikozvino hakuchina vanachiremba vakawanda vanokwanisa kuvarapa. Vashoma varipo vanodhurawo zvakanyanya. Vatiwo Covid-19 yakavhiringidza hurongwa hwavo uye kuda kuzviita munyika kunodhura. Studio 7 yataurawo nemumwe mubereki VaTatenda Katayi vanoti havo vakaita rombo rakanaka sezvo mwana wavo akakwanisa kuenda kuItaly muna 2019 Covid isati yatanga. Vati vari kufarawo kuti mwana wavo ave kukwanisa kuenda kuchikoro nevamwe. Asi vamwe vabereki vanonzi vanonoka kuendesa vana kunorapwa nekushaya ruzivo vachifunga kuti vange varoyiwa. Amai Moyo vanova vakavamba sangano reBrave Little Hearts vati kune mhando makumi mana ematenda emoyo asi denda remaburi epamoyo rakawanda munyika uyezve rinokwanisa kurapika rikakurumidzirwa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Josephat Chiripanyanga vaudza Studio 7 kuti vana vese vanozvarwa vaine maburi aya asi anovhara pavanenge vasungunukwa, asi vakati pane dzimwe nguva anotadza kuvhara. Vanoti vana ava vanozokura vave nedambudziko rokuzarirwa nekuneta uye vasingakure vaine huremu hunoendera nemakore avo. Mukuru weAll Souls Mission Hospital Dr Massimo Migani vati ichokwadi kuti chirongwa chokuendesa vana kuItaly kuti vanoitwa maoparesheni chakambomiswa asi vanotarisira kuti chinogona kusimudzirwa kupera kwegore rino kana kutanga kwegore rinouya. Kubva muna 1985 vana vanodarika mazana mana vaenda kunorapwa kuItaly. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Inoti Vashandi Ngavatambiriswe Mari Yakapetwa Kaviri Sezvo Zvinhu Zvaoma
text: Munyori mukuru musangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions kana kuti ZCTU VaJaphet Moyo vanoti vashandi vari kuda kuwedzerwa mari yepamwedzi nezvikamu mazana maviri kubva muzana sezvo mitengo yezvinhu yave kukwira kana kaviri pazuva. Hurumende iri kutatarika kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi nekuda kwekushaya mari yekunze. Zvimwe zvinhu zviri kudhura zvimwe zvakaita seshuga, mafuta nemupunga zvichitoshayika muzvitoro. Vashandi vehurumende vakaita savanamukoti navanachiremba vanoti vari kuda kubhadharwa nedhora reAmerica kuti vakwanise kurarama. No media source currently available

headline: Muzinda weZimbabwe kuBotswana Woshanda Nguva Pfupi neNyaya yeCovid-19
text: Muzinda weZimbabwe uri muBotswana wave kuvandudza mashandiro nekuda kwekupararira zvakanyanya kwechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika iyi paine kurudziro yekuti vanhu vashandisewo madandemutande nembozhanhare. Vanoona nezve kuburitswa kwemashoko pamuzinda weZimbabwe muBotswana, VaFrancis Chimina vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti iri nderimwe danho rekuderedza mazuva ekushanda kubva pamashanu kusvika pamana pavhiki nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Pataenda pamhepo, VaChimhina vange vasati vakwanisa kupa Studio 7 huwandu hwezvizvazvarwa zveZimbabwe zvafa nechirwere ichi muBotswana . Asi muchiziviso chakaburitswa nemuzinda uyu, vanoda rubatsiro rwekuti vakwanise kutakura mufi kubva kuBotswana kuenda kuZimbabwe vanofanira kuita zvekutumira mapepa anodikwana panharembozha vachishandisa WhatsApp panhamba dzinoti 2677 196 7240 ndinodzokorora zvakare nhamba idzi 267 7 196 72470. Kana munhu achida kuendesa mutumbi kuZimbabwe panodiwa magwaro kana kuti copy anoti rerufu, death certificate, gwaro rekufambisa, passport, tsamba yekuratidza kuti mugtumbi hauna chirwere chinogona kutapurirwa vapenyu, tsamba yekuti mutumbi wachengetedzwa kuti usaore uye kune vanenge vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19, vanofanira kuiswa mubhokisi risingavhurike kana kuti zinc-hermatically filled coffin. Izvi zvinodiwa nenyika yeBotswana zvekare. Asi pane vanoda kuradzika hurumende muBotswana panodiwa gwaro rerufu, gwaro rekufambisa kana chitupa uye gwaro rekufambisa rehama yepedyo. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinorarama nechamuka inyama muguta reGaborone, VaEken Tendai Chidarikire vaudza Studio7 kuti hurongwa uhu huri kuomesera zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogara munyika iyi. Vanotiwo dai muzinda weZimbabwe watsvaga dzimwe nzira dzekubatsira nadzo vanhu nokuti vakasadaro ruzhinji rwuchatsvaga nzira dzekuendesa Asi chimwewo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinogara muguta reGaborone VaHoward Munemo vanoti danho ratorwa nemuzinda weZimbabwe muBotswana idanho rakanaka kwazvo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano hweruzhinji uye vari mukoti pachipatara chikuru cheNyangabgwe Referral Hospital muguta reFrancistown, Muzvare Jestina Mayambutse vanoti vanhu vanofanira kuziva kuti hutachiona hunokonzera COVID-19 hunogona kutapuriranwa nekugamuchidzana mapepa chaiwo. Botswana ine vanhu zviuru zana nematanhatu zvine mazana matanhatu ne makumi mapfumbabwe (106, 690) vakabatwa nechirwere icho chauraya vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 1, 569. Mizinda yenyika dzakawanda pasi rose iri kuderdza huwandu hwevashandi mukuyedza kumisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Musoja Akabvutira VaMugabe Masimba Anoitwa Mutevedzeri weMutungamiri weNyika
text: Vaimbove mukuru wemauto, VaConstantine Chiwenga, pamwe naVaKembo Mohadi, vatoreswa mhiko yekushanda sevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika pachirongwa chaitirwa kuState House neChina mangwanani. VaChiwenga naVaMohadi vachitora mhiko yekushandira nyika pamberi pemutongi mukuru wematare edzimhosva, VaLuke Malaba. izvi zvaitirwa pangungano rapindwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, makurukota ehurumende, mhuri dzavo, pamwe neshamwari. Vanhu vakawanda vafara nezvaitika vachiti zvinozadzisa basa rakatangwa pakabviswa pachigaro vaive mutungamiri wenyika,VaRobert Mugabe, muna Mbudzi. Mudzidzisi wezvidzidzo zvePolitical Socience paUniversity of Zimbabwe, Professor Charity Manyeruke, vati zvichitevera kugadzwa kwevaviri ava, zvava kureva kuti VaMnagwagwa vave kukwanisa kuita basa ravo nemazvo sezvo vave nevatevedzeri. Vati kutoreswa mhiko kwaitwa VaChiwenga naVaMohadi kwazadzisa hurongwa hwekuumba hurumende itsva sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Patavabvunza kuti vanooana sei pahutungamiri hwepamusoro muhurumende husina madzimai, Professor Manyeruke vati VaMnangagwa vakasarudza vatevdzeri vavo kubva pasi pemoyo wavo. Vatiwo havana chichemo nevaviri vagadzwa avo sezvo vari vanhu vanogona basa ravo uye vanoda runyararo. Mumiriri weNyanga South muparamende zvakare vari gurukota rezvehunyanzvi hwekushandisa michina yechizvino zvino, VaSupa Mandiwanzira, vaudza Studio7 kuti hurumende yakwakana, chasara kuchiita basa. Hanzvadzi yaVaMohadi, Amai Melissa Singo, vaudza Studio7 kuti vafara nekugadzwa kwehanzvadzi yavo uye zvaratidza kuti nyika inovimba nemhuri yavo. Vati vanovimba kuti VaMohadi vachaita basa nemazvo uye pavanotadza vanofanirawo kuregererwa. Munin'ina waVaChiwenga, VaMasimba Chiwenga, vati vanovimba nemukoma wavo uye vanotarisira kuti vachashanda sezvakatarisirwa veruzhinji. VaChiwenga naVaMohadi vagadzwa sevatevedzeri vaVaMnangagwa muhurumende zvichetevera kugadzwa kwavo sevatevdzeri vaVaMnangagwa zvakare mu Zanu PF. VaChiwenga ndivo vakatungamira mauto kubvisa vaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pachigaro pasi pechirongwa cheOperation Restore Legacy, icho chakatanga musi 13 Mbudzi, vachiti vaida kugadzirisa zvinhu zvanga zvashata munyika, kusanganisira kubvisa nhubu dzakanga dzakakomberedza VaMugabe apo vaitonga. No media source currently available

headline: Murwiri weKodzero, VaItai Dzamara, Vanorangarirwa muHarare
text: Varwiri vekodzero dzevanhu vaungana muHarare neChipiri vachirangarira VaItai Dzamara, avo vakapambwa makore matatu apfuura nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori. Vanhu vanosvika makumi mashanu vaudza hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuti vanoda kuona VaDzamara vachidzoswa kumhri yavo vangave vari vapenyu, kana mapfupa avo. Vachitaura pahurongwa hwekurangarira VaDzamara muAfrica Unity Square, vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vati kunyange hazvo VaDzamara vachinzi vakapambwa nevasori makore matatu apfuura vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vachiri pachigaro, vanoda kuti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa ibude pachena panyaya yaVaDzamara. VaDzamara vanozivikanwa nekuratidzira kakawanda vachiti VaMugabe vabve pachigaro panguva yavakange vachiri kutonga. Munin'ina waVaDzamara, Doctor Patson Dzamara, vati ivo semhuri vanoziva kuti mukoma wavo ari mumaoko evari muhurumende yeZanu PF. Mufundisi Evan Mawarire avo vanga vari mumwe wevatauri pagungano iri vati Mwari havafari kana vanhu vachinyangaditswa sezvakaitwa VaItai Dzamara. Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa re Progressive Democrats of Zimbabwe, Muzvare Barbara Nyagomo, avo vanga vari pakati pechita ichi, vatiwo hurumende inofanira kuona kuti moyo yemhuri yekwaDzamara yanyaradzwa nekutora matanho akasimba kuitira kuti VaItai Dzamara vazivikanwe kwavari. Zvichakadai, Doctor Dzamara vati vari kudawo kuti hurumende ipindure tsamba dzavakainyorera pamusoro pekushaikwa kwemukoma wavo. Vaenderera mberi vachiti pachaitwa gungano rakakura kwazvo musi wa9 Kurume rekurangarira mukoma wavo vachitiwo hurumende inofanira kuita sarudzo dzakachena gore rino vachiti ndizvo zvimwe zvairwirwa nemukoma wavo. Doctor Dzamara vatiwo hurumende inofanirwa kuona kuti mhuri yemukoma wavo yachengetwa naiyo hurumende. Vamwe vevaishanda naVaItai Dzamara vati vachaedza kuti vasangane nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, neChitatu nechinangwa chekuti nyaya yekupambwa kwaVaItai Dzamara igadziriswe. VaItai Dzamara vaive mutori wenhau akakanda mapfumo ake pasi vachiti vava kupinda munyaya dzekurwira kodzero dzevanhu kudzamara VaMugabe vasiya basa. Vanhu vaigara vachishungurudza VaItai Dzamara vakazoonekwawo vopandukira VaMugabe zvichitevera kupindira kwakaita mauto pasi pechirongwa cheOperation Restore Legacy icho chakatanga musi wa Mbudzi 13, 2017. VaMugabe vakazosiya basa musi wa 21 Ndira 2017 mushure mekutorerwa masimba nemauto achishanda ari pasi pevaimbove mukuru wemauto, VaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vava mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kupona kuChirwere cheCOVID-19 Munyika Hwuri Kukwira
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChina kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwasvika pazviuru zvishanu zvine mazana manomwe nemakumi mana nevashanu, kana kuti 5,745. Bazi iri rakaisawo huwandu hwevanhu vapona kuchirwere ichi pazviuru zvina zvine mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nevashanu, kana kuti 4,525. Vanhu vafa vasvika pazana nemakumi mashanu nemumwe, kana kuti 151. Izvi zvinoreva kuti vanhu vachiri kurwara neCovid-19 munyika yose vave chiuru nemakumi matanhatu nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 1,069. Dunhu reMasvingo, iro ranga risati rashaikirwa nemunhu nekuda kwechirwere ichi, nemusi weChina rakazove nemunhu wekutanga kushaya anove munhu mumwe chete akashaya nemusi weChina. Vanhu vari kushaya vanonzi ndevaya vane makore ari pakati pemakumi mana nemakumi masere, vanhurume vachinzi ndivo vari kufa vakawanda nekukwirawo kwemakore. Asi Zvinonziwo pave netarisiro yekuti kudziya kwekunze kuchaderedza kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Mukuru anoona nezvezvirwere zvinotapuriranwa mubazi rezvehutano, Doctor Portia Manangazira vakaudza bepanhau reHerald kuti vanotarisira kuti kupera kwechando kuchabatsira kuti vanhu vasarambe vari munzvimbo dzakamanikidzana vachitsvaga kudziirwa, izvo zvichabatsira kuti vasatapurirane chirwere. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano vari chiremba, Dr. Edgar Munatsi, vanoti kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kupona kubva kuCovid-19 kune chekuita netsanangudzo itsva yeWorld Health Organisation iyo inoti kana munhu akavhenekwa akawanikwa aine chirwere nekuti anga achinzwa kurwadziwa kana kuti anga aine zviratidzo, akazoita mazuva matatu asisina zviratidzo anobva anzi apora. Chimwe chinonzi naDr. Munatsi chakashandurwa neW-H-O ndechekuti munhu akavhenekwa akawanikwa aine chirwere asi akazoramba asina zviratidzo kwemazuva gumi anotevera anenge ave kutonzi apora. Zvichakadaro, vanhu vabatwa ne covid-19 pasi rose vanonzi neJohns Hopkins University Hospital vadarika pamamiriyoni makumi maviri nemaviri nezviuru mazana manomwe, kana kuti 22,700 000. Vanhu vashaya vanonzi vadarikawo zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvina kana kuti 794 000. America ndiyo ichiri pamusoro panyika dzose pavanhu vane Covid-19, iine vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe nezvitanhatu, kana kuti 5,576 000, vafa vachidarikawo zviuru zana nemakumi manomwe nezvina kana kuti 174 000. South Africa ndiyo iri pamusoro muAfrica iine vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvipfumbamwe, kana kuti 599 000, vafa vachidarika zviuru gumi nezviviri nemazana matanhatu kana kuti 12,600. No media source currently available

headline: Mutengo weMafuta eKufambisa Dzimotokari Wowedzerwa Zvekare
text: Zimbabwe Regulatory Authority kana kuti ZERA yazivisa kuti mutengo wemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari uri kuwedzerwa zvekare kutanga mangwana. Dhiziri rawedzerwa nemasendi gumi nematanhatu kubva pamadhora gumi nemanomwe nemana kana kuti $17, 74 kusvika pamadhora gumi nemakumi masere nemasendi makumi mapfumbamwe kana kuti $17.90. Peturu yawedzerwa nemasendi makumi matatu nemasere kubva pamadhora gumi nemasere nemasendi masere $17.07 kusvika pamadhora gumi nemasere nemasendi makumi mana nemana kana kuti $17,44. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa murimwe sangano remakombi reGreater Harare Association of Commuter Omnibus Operators VaDominic Bepeta vanoti kunyangwe vari kuomerwa nezvinhu, havakwanise kuwedzera mari dzimichovha nekuti vanhu vari kuomerwa. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vanodarika Mamiriyoni Matanhatu (6M) Vafa neCovid-19 Pasi Rose
text: Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 pasi rose inoti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matanhatu kana kuti 6 million vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kubva zvachatanga kupararira pasi rose muna 2019. MuAmerica chete vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe zvine makumi matanhatu nechimwe kana kuti 961 000 vafa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vasina kubayiwa nhomba vakawanda ndivo vari kunzi vari kufa zvakanyanya. Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rinoti nezuro vanhu mazana mashanu nemumwe vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kusanganisira vana vechikoro zana nemakumi matatu nevatanhatu. Vanhu makumi manomwe vanonzi vari kurwara neCovid-19 vari muzvipatara zvakasiyana siyana munyika. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti nezuro hakuna munhu akafa nechirwere cheCcovid-19 zvasiya vafa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira munyika muna 2020 vachiri zviuru zvishanu nemazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 5 399.

headline: Zvizvarwa zve Zimbabwe Zvoratidzira Kutsigira Mauto eZimbabwe
text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muWashington DC nematunhu akapoteredza zvakaungana neMugovera pamuzinda weZimbabwe uri mu Washington DC zvichitsigira zviitiko zviri kuitika kumusha, zvichitevera kupindira kwemauto mune zvematongerwo enyika, uye kumanikidzwa kwaVaMugabe nebato ravo re Zanu PF, kuti vasiye chigaro, izvo zviri kutsigirwawo neveruzhinji. Mumwe wevakaronga kufora uku, Muzvare Shingi Mangwiro, vanoti vashamiswa nekubuda kwakaita zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe, kunyange hazvo kwaitonhora zvekukwidza hamba mumuti. No media source currently available Ukuwo zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinonzi zvakabva kumatunhu ari kure akaita se Pennsylvania, New Jersey, New York, Virginia ne Maryland Zvizvarwa zve Zimbabwe nevamwe vanofarira Zimbabwe vanogara ku Texas, vaunganawo paCity Hall muDallas vachiratidzira kutsigira kwavo zviri kuitika kuZimbabwe. Mumwe wevakaratidzira Dr. Prisca Ngondo, vanoti vanotarisira kuti Zimbabwe itange patsva uye vanotarisira kuti dzimwe nyika hadzipindire munyaya yekupindira kwemauto mukutongwa kwenyika. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Inoti Mashandiro eZUPCO Ari Kuisa Vanhu Munjodzi yeCovid-19
text: Munyori mukuru wesangano revashandi, reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti nyaya yekukundikana kuita basa kwekambani yeZUPCO kuchapa kuti chirwere cheCovid-19 chipararire zvakanyanya sezvo vanhu vari kugara vakaunga vakamirira kutakurwa. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu havafanire kuungana vakawanda kuitira kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 chotanga kupararira zvekare zvine mutsindo.Vanhu vakawandisa vanotarisirwa kuungana vanenge vari makumi matatu asi pari parufu chete. Hurumende yakabvisa makombi ose mumugwagwa ichiti vanoda kushanda vanofanira kushanda pasi pekambani yeZUPCO asi vakawanda vacho vanoti kambani iyi haibhadhare. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakatiwo vemakombi vainge vokonzera njodzi mumigwagwa nekudaro vaifanira kubviswa. Mukuru wekambani yeZUPCO, Engineer Evaristo Madangwa, vakaudza bepanhau reSunday Mail kuti vanoda mabhazi zviuru zviviri kuti vashande zvakanaka asi ikozvino vane mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nemaviri chete.Vanotiwo mwedzi uno vari kutarisira mamwe mabhazi kubva kuBelarus. No media source currently available

headline: Kupindira Mumatongerwo eNyika Kwaitwa neMauto Kozeyiwa
text: Imwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika uye vari mutungamiri wesangano revarairidzi reProgressive Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti zvakaitwa nemukuru wemauto, VaConstantino Guvheya Chiwenga, neMuvhuro zvekutaura pamusoro pezviri kuitika mubato reZanu PF mucherechedzo wekuti mauto haasi kutevera bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Doctor Zhou vanoti bumbiro remitemo rinoti mauto haafanirwe kupindira mune zvematongerwo enyika, asi munhoroondo yemauto vachitsigira bato riri kutonga reZanu PF. Asi Doctor Zhou vanoti mauto ane kodzero zvawo yekupindira kana paonekwa kuti kugadzikana kwenyika kwave kukanganisika, kwete nekuti vanhu muZanu PF vatadza kugarisana zvakanaka. VaChiwenga vakaita musangano nevatori venhau neMuvhuro, apo vakayambira vanhu vari kukonzera kusagadzikana muZanu PF kuti vachatorerwa matanho, vachiti mauto haangarambi akapeta maoko zvinhu zvichiwondomoka munyika. Doctor Zhou vanoti VaMugabe vanogona kutorera VaChiwenga matanho kana kuti ivo VaMugabe vanogona kutokumbira kumauto kuti vagarisane zvakare sezvavaiita kare. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yorangarira Magamba Ayo Nhasi
text: Nhasi kuNational Heroes Acre, Zimbabwe inocherechedza zuva remagamba, vanhu vachipiwa mukana wekurangarira nekukudza avo vakazvipira kusunungura nyika uye neavo vakaishandira nemoyo wose. Dangandira regore rinoti ndi ‘Lest We Forget’, kukurudzira vanhu kuti vasakanganwa zvakaitwa nemagamba. Mangwana kuNational Sports Stadium, pasi pedangandira rinoti ‘ZDF: Guaranteeing Peace and Security for National Development’, nyika ichapemberera zuva remauto. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, VaTapiwa Kapurura, vanoti kunyange hazvo bato reZanu-PF, pamwe chete nehurumende, rakasvibisa hugamba uye vachituma mauto kunetsana nevanhu pachinhambo chekuvabatsira, mazuva maviri aya mazuva anokosha zvikuru. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokundikana Kutengera Vashandi vemuZvipatara Zvinodzivirira Covid-19
text: Mutungamiri wesangano revakoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnoch Dongo vanoti chimwe chave kupa kuti chirwere checoronavirus chipararire zvakanyanya munyika inyaya yekuti vakoti navanachiremba havana zvikwanisiro zvekuzvidzivirira kutapurirwa chirwere ichi kana kuti maPPE. VaDongo vanoti vave nenguva yakareba vachikumbira kuti vawane zvikwanisiro zviri kukona n’anga murapwa achida. No media source currently available Kubva zvakatanga kupararira chirwere ichi munyika muna Kurume, vashandi vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika mazana matau nemakumi maviri nevatatu. Vakoti vanoti zvekupfeka vave kutozviona kumarinda eHeroes Acre sepakashaya gamba renyika VaPerrance Shiri avo vakaradzikwa nemusi weChina.

headline: Zimbabwe Human Rights Commission Yofara neMamiriro Akaita Zvinhu Musarudzo
text: Sachigaro veZimbabwe Human Rights Commission, Doctor Elasto Mugwadi, vanoti komisheni yavo inofara nemamiriro akaita zvinhu mayererano nesarudzo dzichaitwa nemusi weMuvhuro. VaMugwadi vanoti kunyange hazvo pange pane zvichemo zvakasvitswa kukomisheni yavo, zvange zviri zvishoma uye vakagadzirisa zvichemo zvizhinji. Mamwe mapato anopikisa anotaura kuti haasikufara ne Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, kana kuti Zec, pamusoro pemabatiro airikuita gadziriro yesarudzo idzi. Izvi zvakakonzera kuti mamwe mapato nemasangano akazvimiririra aende kumatare edzimhosva kuti Zec imanikidzwe kuteerera zvichemo zvavo. “Ndingati zvinhu zvinenge zvakamira zvirinani kana tichienzanisa nemamwe makore apfuura aya,” VaMugwadi vaudza Studio7. “Kana tichitarira runyararo huripo uye tichitarira kodzero dzevanhu kuti vari kukwanisa here kuungana sezvavanoda uye vanokwanisa here kuita misangano yavo pavanodira uye vanokwanisa here kutaura zvavanoda vasina anovashungurudza. Izvi tiri kuona kuti zviri kuitika.” Svondo rapera, sangano revadzidzisi rakabudirira kumatare edzimhosva kwarakange raenda richimanikidza Zec kuti ibvumidze vadzidzisi kuvhota kunzvimbo dzavanenge vaendeswa neZec kunovhotesa vanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi, Vashandirwi neHurumende Votarisirwa Kusangana neChipiri paNyaya yeVashandi Vari kuDzimba Nekuda kweCoronavirus
text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi, reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, rinoti rashevedzwa nehurumende kuti vazeye nyaya yekuti vashandi nevashandirwi vangabatwa sei munguva ino yekuvharwa kwemamwe makambani senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere che coronavirus. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti hurumende yavashevedza kumusangano neChipiri wekuti ivo sesangano rinomirira vashandi vapewo pfungwa dzavo pakuti vashandi vangabatsirwa sei pamazuva makumi mavbiri nerimwe avanenge vasiri kuenda kumabasa. VaMoyo vanoti kunyange hazvo sangano ravo riri iro rakatanga kuuya nepfungwa yekuti makambani ambovharwa kuitira kudzivirira vashandi kubva kuchirwere ichi, vakazoshamisika votonzwa mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vozivisa kuti vanhu vagare kudzimba, asi pasina kuziviswa kuti vashandi nevanozvishandira pamwewo nemakambani anenge achitatarika vachabatsirwa sei. Vanoti musangano weTripartite Negotiating Forum wavakapedzisira kuita hauna kubuda nechisungo panyaya iyi nekuda kwekuti chirwere ichi chakanga chisati chapinda munyika panguva iyi. Asi vakanga vawirirana kuti paumbwe chikwata chaizotarisa nezvenyaya iyi, icho chisati chaumbwa kusvika pari nhasi. VaMoyo vanoti vanoona sekunge musangano wemusi weChipiri uyu uchatadza kubudirira sezvo naivo vari kutyawo kufambafamba, kunyange hazvo vachiti mushandi haafanirwe kukanganiswa panguva iyi. No media source currently available Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi revashandirwi panyaya iyi. Asi mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Doctor Energy Mutodi vanoti vashandirwi vose vanofanirwa kubhadhara vashandi vavo kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe iwayo, kunyange hazvo vari kuti vambonzwa vamwe vari kuti mushandi kana asina kushanda haawane mubhadharo wake. “Tambonzwa vamwe vari kuti no work no payment, saka izvozvo tiri kuti kwete. Hatisi kuda kunzwa mushandirwi anotadza kubhadhara mushandi wake nechikonzero cheCOVID-19,” VaMutodi vanodaro. Vanoti kana ivowo sehurumende, vashandi vavo vari kudzimba zvichireva kuti havafanirwe kutadza kuvabhadhara. Panyaya yekuti kune vamwe vari kuti vanogona kufa nenzara panguva yekusaenda kumabasa iyi, Doctor Mutodi vanoti vanhu ava vanofanirwa kuzivisa bazi rezvekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu uyewo mapurisa kuitira kuti vakwanise kuwaniswa rubatsiro rwakakodzera.

headline: Veruzhinji Vokurudzirwa Kutsigira Hurumende Kuita Mabasa eKurwisa Covid-19
text: Apo huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa kana kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 huri kuramba huchikwira, vemakereke vanoti vari kushanda zvakasimba vachirwisa kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19, kuburikidza nekuwanisa zvipatara zvemachechi zvikwanisiro, mvura pamwe nekupa dzidziso kune veruzhinji pamusoro pedenda iri. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Council of Churches, Reverend Kenneth Mtata, vanoti basa guru riri kuitwa nemakereke kugadzirisa zvipatara zvemachechi, izvo vanoti zvakawanda kumaruwa, kuwanisa zvipatara izvi mvura yakachena, kuwanisa vashandi vemuzvipatara zvipfeko zvekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere ichi, pamwe nekuwanisa vanhu zvekudya munguva ino ye lockdown. Reverend Mtata, avo vakaita zvidzidzo zvepamusoro soro zvePhD munyaya dzezvidzidzo zvebhaibheri, vanoti nyaya yakatarisana nenyika yedenda reCovid-19 haichisiri nyaya ingangonzi ingasiirwa kuhurumende chete, asi kuti yave nguva yekuti munhu wese pamwe nemasangano vawane chavangaisa mukubatsiridza kuti zvinhu zvirerukire nyika. Panyaya yekuti nyika yakagadzirira here kupa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19, Reverend Mtata vanoti pasi rose nyika zhinji hadzina kugadzirira, kusanganisirawo dzakaita seAmerica, hadzinawo kugadzirira pakugoverwa kwenhomba idzi, kusanganisirawo Zimbabwe. Munyika mune vamwe vemakereke vanonzi vari kukurudzira nhengo dzavo kuti dzisazotora nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19, asi munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Council of Churches ava vanoti vemakereke ava havafanirwe kutsvaga mbiri nekushambadza mashoko asina humbowo. Vanoti zvinozivikanwa pasi rose kuti nhomba dzinogona kukonzerawo mamwe matambudziko pamunhu, asi vachiti zvinozivikanwawo cjose kuti nhomba dzinoponesa. Reverend Mtata vanoti vemakereke ava vanofanirwa kutobatsira mukushanda pamwe kuburikidza nekusvitsawo pfungwa dzavo kuti dzishandiswe, uyewo kuti ivo kana vasingade kupiwa nhomba idzi vanofanirwa kusiya vanoda zvavo vachibaiwa. No media source currently available

headline: Gweta reZec Ropa Huchapu Mudare reConstitutional Court
text: Gweta reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, VaTawanda Kanengoni, vaudzawo dare reConstitutional Court kuti zvakabuda musarudzo zvinoratidza kuti mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa ndivo vakakunda musarudzo. VaKanengoni varamba kuti Zec yakabirira mukuverengwa kwemavhoti vachiti veMDC Alliance havana kupa humbowo hwakakwana kuti sarudzo dzainge dzabirirwa. Varambawo nyaya yekuti pane dzimwe nzvimbo dzekuvhotera dzakaverengwa kaviri kuti dziwedzere mavhoti aVaMnangagwa. Vatendawo kuti painge paine zvimwe zvakakanganiswa mukuverengwa kwemavhoti asi vakati hazvichinje nyaya yekuti VaMnangagwa vakakunda. Panyaya yekuti Zec yakarambidza vamwe kuvhota vakaita sevarairidzi, vati hapana humbowo hwekuti pane vashandi vehurumende varairidzi nevamwe vashandi vehurumende zviuru makumi mana zvisina kuvhota. Vatiwo havazivi kuti veMDC Alliance vakawanepi huwandu hwevanhu vanosvika zviuru mazana manomwe vanonzi havasi kuzivikanwa kuti vakabva kupi. VaKanengoni vanoti vanhu vakawanda vakavhota pane vainge vachinzi vakavhota neMDC Alliance. Panyaya yekuti pane vanhu vakawanda vakavhota pane dzimwe nzvimbo dzekuvhotera, VaKanengoni vanoti hapanawo humbowo hwacho.

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zvinobatana nezveBotswana paMhemberero dzeKuzvitonga
text: Zvizwarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muBotswana nhasi zvabatana nezvizvarwa zvenyika iyi mukupemberera makore makumi mashanu nematatu Botswana yawana kuzvitonga kuzere. Botswana ndeimwe yenyika dzemuAfrica dzakazvipira mukubatsira Zimbabwe kuti isununguke. Botswana yakawana kuzvitonga kubva kunyika yeBritain musi wa30 Gunyana 1966, muchiitiko charumbidzwa nevakawanda semukana wakaita kuti Zimbabwe ibatsirikane mukuwanawo kwayo kuzvitonga. Zimbabwe, iyo yakanga iri pasiwo pehutongi hweBritain, ikazove pasi pehutongi hwamushakabvu, VaIan Douglas Smith mushure mekunge Rhodesia yazvipa rusununguko yega kubva kuBritain isati yadzokera zvakare mumaoko eBritain, inonzi yakawana rubatsiro rwakakosha zvikuru kubva kuBotswana kusvika iwane kuzvitonga kuzere musi wa18 Kubvumbi 1980. Mutungamiri webato reMavambo/Kusile/Dawn, Doctor Simbarashe Makoni, vakagara muBotswana kwemakore gumi mushure mekudomwa semunyori wesangano reSADC mugore ra1983. Doctor Makoni vaudza Studio7 kuti Botswana yaive nhengo hombe yechikwata chenyika dzaitsigira hondo dzerusunguko munyika dzinosanganisira Zimbabwe, Mozambique, Angola, Namibia neSouth Africa. Doctor makoni vaenderera mberi vachiti Botswana yakapa zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvizhinji hupoteri pamuzinda wevapoteri weDukwi Refugee Camp, apo paichengetwa vanhu vaitiza hondo munyika. Hukama pakati penyika mbiri idzi hunofadza ruzhinji rwevana veZimbabwe vanogara nekushanda muBotswana, izvo zvaita kuti vabatatane nezvizvarwa zveBotswana mukurangarira zuva iri. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinogara mudhorobha reFrancistown, VaPatson Mushayabasa, vaudza Studio7 kuti kugokedzana moto kwenyika mbiri idzi ndiko kuri kuita kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvigamuchirike muBotswana. VaChristopher Chingwanangwana, avo vanorarama nechamuka inyama mudhorobha reFrancistown, vati chikumbiro chavo chikuru ndechekuti Botswana iratidze zvakare chido chayakamboratidza munguva yehondo kuitira kuti ibatsire kubvisa Zimbabwe mumadhaka mairi nhasi mune zveupfumi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaNorman Mufandaedza, vati Botswana inyika yakabvira kare mukuchengeta zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakanyanya zvichiyenzaniswa nedzimwe nyika. VaMokgweetsi Masisi, mutungamiri wenyika iyi, vanga vari pakati pezvizvarwa zveBotswana zvaswera zvichipemberera zuva iri munhandare yeNational Stadium muguta guru renyika iyi reGaborone. No media source currently available

headline: Musangano weVarairidzi neHurumende Inotadza Kugadzirisa Zvinetswa
text: Masangano anomiririra vadzidzisi aita musangano nevakuru mubazi rezvedzidzo umo munyori mubazi rezvedzidzo, Amai Tumisang Thabela, vakurudzira masangano aya kuti vanyorerane pasi mashandiro avanoda kuita nebazi rezvedzidzo. Vamwe vapinda mumusangano uyu uye vari mutungamiriri weAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vaudza Studio 7 kuti musangano uyu hauna kubata zvinonetsa vadzidzisi kana kuedza kugadzirisa zvinhu zvinonetsa munyaya yedzidzo. “Zvizhinji zvatange tichitaura hazvinei nezvemashandiro atinoita kumabasa kwedu. Musangano uyu wange uri waPermananat Secretary mutsva achizivana nemaUnion; achikumbira maUnion kuti vanyorerane pasi mashandiro avanoda kuita nebazi rezvedzidzo,” VaMasaraure vaudza Studio 7. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata Amai Thabela kuti tinzwe divi ravo. VaMasaraure vati musanagano uyu hauna zvikuru zvawabatsira nazvo uye chirongwa chevadzidzisi chekurega basa svondo rinouya hachina kuchinja. Svondo rakapera, sangano reARTUZ rakazivisa kuti kutanga musi wa 7 Ndira 2019, nhengo dzaro dzicharamwa basa kwenguva isingazikanwi kusvika hurumende yanzwa zvichemo zvavo. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata vamiriri vemamwe masangano evarairidzi. Asi VaMasaraure vati hurongwa hwekurega basa huchaenderera mberi svondo rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Varimi Votsigira Kurambidzwa kweZvirimwa Zvekunze Munyika
text: Rimwe sangano revarimi reZimbabwe Commercial Farmers Union, ZCFU, rinoti rinotsigira zvakanyanya danho rakaziviswa nehurumende rekuti yave kumisa kupinzwa munyika kwezvirimwa zvakaita sehanyanisi, matomati, nechibage pamwe neupfu. Asi sangano iri rinoti panyaya yechibage hurumende yaifanirwa kutanga yaona kuti goho remwaka uno rakamira sei, yozoti yoona kuti chibage chingadiwa kubva kunze kwenyika chakawanda zvakadii. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekurima vachiona nezvezvirimwa nemadiridziro, VaDavis Mharapira, vakaudza bepanhau reSunday Mail kuti hurumende pari zvino yambomira kupa marezinesi ekupinzwa kwehanyanisi nemadomasi, uye kubva musi wa 30 Kubvumbi gore rino inenge isisabvumidzi kupinzwa kwechibage neupfu munyika. VaMharapira vakati hurumende yatora danho iri senzira yekudzivirira varimi vemunyika kubva kuzvirimwa zvekunze izvo zvine mitengo yakaderera. Asi mutungamiri wesangano reZCFU, VaWonder Chabikwa, vanoti ongororo yezvirimwa iri kuitwa nebazi reAgritex inoratidza kuti matunhu ari kuchamhembe kwenyika atotarisana nedambudziko rekushaikwa kwemvura, izvo zvichaita kuti nyika ide chibage chakawanda kubva kunze. VaChabikwa vanoti kunyange hazvo goho remwaka wapera rakanga riri nani pane mamwe makore adarika, harikwanisi zvakare kuyambutsa nyika kusvika pakukohwa kwemwaka uno. Vanotiwo ongororo yeAgritex ndiyo ichabatsira kuti paonekwe kuti goho rawanikwa rakadii, chikafu chingada kuwedzerwa chakadii, izvo zvichaita kuti hurumende itange zvakare kubvumidza kupinzwa kwechibage munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHutano Dzofara neKusashaya kweVanhu neCovid-19 muMazuva Manomwe Adarika
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChina kuti huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hwaramba huri pamazana maviri nemakumi maviri nevana kana kuti 224, sezvo pasina munhu akafa nedenda iri. Izvi zvinoreva kuti kwemazuva manomwe, hapana munhu afa munyika neCovid-19, chiitiko chiri kutambirwa nenyanzvi mune zvehutano dzichiti ichi chiratidzo chekuti matanho ekurwisana nechirwere ichi ari kutorwa nenyika ari kushanda. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika hwakakwira kusvika pazviuru zvinomwe nemazana matanhatu ane makumi matatu nevatatu, kana kuti 7 633 mushure mekunge vanhu makumi matatu nevashanu kana kuti 35, vawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi. Pavanhu ava vanhu makumi matatu nevaviri kana kuti 32 vagara vari munyika, vaviri vakadoka kubva kuSouth Africa kuchiti mumwe chete ari akadzoka munyika kubva kuNamibia. Vanhu vakanga vapona kubva kucovid-19 kusvika nemusi weChina vanonzi vakanga vasvika pazviuru zvishanu nemazana masere ane makumi mana nemumwe, kana kuti 5 841. Huwandu hwevanhu vachiri kurwara neCovid-19 hwakakwira kuenda pachiuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nevasere, kana kuti 1 568.

headline: Hurumende Yotora Matanho Kuitira Kuti Mari Iri Kunze Zvisiri paMutemo Idzoke
text: Bhanga guru renyika razivisa neChitata kuti pane matanho ari kutorwa kudzora mari dzakabudiswa kunze kwenyika zvisiri pamutemo, uye imwe yemari yacho yakatodzoka munyika. No media source currently available Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti dzinotyira kuti hurumende ichatadza kudzora mari yese yakabuda munyika zviri kunze kwemutemo sezvo mari iyi yakaburitswa nevanhu vane chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika. Vachitaura muHarare mushure mekubuda kwenyaya yekuti pane zvizvarwa zvemuZimbabwe zvaichengeta mamiriyoni mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe emadhora mubanga reHSBC kuSwitzerland, iro riri kunzi raishanda richityora mitemo yekufambiswa kwemari zvakanaka pasi rose, mukuru weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, vati hurumende iri kutora matanho ekuona kuti mari dzakaburitswa zviri kunze kwemitemo yadzorwa munyika. VaMangudya vati patori nehurongwa hwekudzora mari idzi, uye dzimwe dzemari dzakaburitswa zviri kunze kwemutemo, dzatova munyika. VaMangudya vazivisa kuti mamiriyoni zana emadhora ange iri kunze kwenyika zviri kunze kwemutemo yakatodza zvichitevera zvisungo zvebhanga ravo zvekuregerera nekupa mukana kune avo vari kuchengeta mari kunze zvisiri pamutemo kuti vaidzore. Vati mamiririyoni makumi matanhatu nemasere emari iyi akatodzoka uye bhanga ravo riri kuramba richitaura nevanhu nemakambani anochengeta mari zviri kunze kwemutemo kuti adzore mari iyi. Asi varamba kutaura zvakawanda pamusoro penyaya yeHSBC vachiti pari zvino vachiri kuongorora kwakabva mari yevanhu vanonzi vaichengeta mari kubhanga iri. Pasi pemutemo zvizvarwa zvemuno zvinoshanda kunze kwenyika zvinobvumidzwa kuchengeta mari kunze kwenyika. Asi mutemo haubvumidze kuti vanoshandira munyika kana vemabhizimisi emuZimbabwe vachengetedze mari kunze kwenyika vasina kupihwa mvumo neRBZ. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi uye vakamboshanda kubazi rezvemari, VaMasimba Manyanya, vati mari iyi ichanentsa kudzoka kwayo. Vati izvi zvaiitwa nevakuru vakuru muhurumende nemunyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye hapana anokwanisa kuti vadzore mari idzi. Vatiwo panofanira kudzikwa mitemo inopa masimba kubhanga guru renyika kuitira kuti rinongorore mapindiro nemabudiro emari munyika. Vamwe vanoongorora nyaya dzehufpumi uye vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaJames Johwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvinotoda kuti veRBZ kuti vasunge dzisimbe kuti mari iyi idzoke kumusha. Asi VaMangudya vati vane mari dzichiri kunze vanosanganisira vaye vasina kuunza mari mushure mekutengesa zvinhu kunze kwenyika, vakatanga kuchengeta mari kunze kwenyika vasina mvumo yeRBZ pamwe nevaya vaiita bhizimisi munyika asi vachinochengeta mari yavo kunze kwenyika. VaMangudya vati pave nezvizvarwa zvakawanda zvemuZimbabwe zvinogara kunze kwenyika uye zvizhinji zvavo zvave kutumira mari kumusha. Vati mari inotomirwa nezvizvarwa zviri kunze kwenyika yakakwira kusvika pa$840 million gore rapfuura, kubva pa$790 million muna 2013.

headline: Mapurisa Oparura Chirongwa Chekudzinga Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa, 'veMishikashika' neVana Vasina kweKugara muGuta reHarare
text: Mapurisa aparura chirongwa chekubvisa muguta reHarare mishikashika, vana vanogara mumigwagwa uye vanotengesa zvinhu. Mamwe masangano akaita sePassengers Association of Zimbabwe anoti zvinogona kupinza hupenyu hwevanhu munjodzi panenge poitwa hwakiti nagonzo mapurisa achimhanyisa vanhu ava. Mapurisa aabatana neve ZINARA, VID, kanzuru dzeRuwa, Chitungwiza,ye Epworth, neye Harare nevebazi rezvemagariro evanhu muchirongwa ichi. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri we Mapurisa mudunhu re Harare, Assistant Inspector Webster Dzvova, vakazivisa mutsamba yavo nezuro kuruzhinji rwenyika kuti Harare yese ichange ichi mhanyidzana nechirongwa ichi kubva nhasi kusvika mukupera kwesvondo rino. Asi vanotengesa mumigwagwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti havazi kuzotyityidzirwa ne mapurisa kuti varege kushanda. Mukuru wesangano re vanotengesa, reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation (VISET), VaSamuel Wadzayi vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotengesa mumigwagwa havabve nekuti nyika haina mabasa. No media source currently available

headline: Nhomba yeKutanga yeCovid-19 Yotarisirwa muNyika neMuvhuro Kubva kuChina
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika uye vari gurukota rezvehutano VaConstantino Chiwenga ndivo vachagashira nhomba yeCovid 19 yakapihwa Zimbabwe neChina panhandare yendege yeR.G. Mugabe International Aiport muHarare nemusi weSvondo. Nhomba iyi, inosvika zviuru mazana maviri, inonzi Sinopharm iri kutarisirwa kusvika muZimbabwe nenguva dza 3 mangwanani. Kunyangwe dzimwe nyanzvi dziri kuti China haisi kunyatsobuda pachena nezvenhomba iyi, nyika dzakaita seTurkey, Indonesia neBrazil dziri kuishandisa dzinoti iri kushanda nezvikamu makumi mashanu kusvika pamakumi mapfumbamwe nerimwe kubva muzana kana kuti 50% to 91%. Hurumende inotiwo veMedicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe vachaongororawo kuti mushonga uyu unoshanda here usati wabayiwa vanhu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Brighton Chireka vakurudzira vanhu kuti vatambira nhomba iyi kuti chirwere chisarambe chichipararira zvakanyanya. Tichiri panyaya iyi, huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa nekubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 huri kuramba huchiderera uye bazi rezvehutano rinoti nemusi weSvondo kwakafa vanhu vaviri nechirwere ichi. Izvi zvinorevea kuti vanhu vafa kubva chirwere ichi zvachakatanga kupararira vave vave chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mamana kana kuti 1, 400. NeSvondo vanhu makumi matanhatu nevasere kana kuti 68 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru makumi matatu nemashanu anezana nemakumi manomwe nevaviri kana kuti 35, 172. Vanhu mazana mashanu negumi nevaviri kana kuti 512 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi nezuro zvasiya vanhu vapora vave zviuru makumi matatu nemazana matanhatu nemumwe kana kuti 30, 601. Vanhu vachiri kurwara zviuru zvitatu nezana nemakumi manomwe nemumwe kana kuti 3, 171. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 3,7 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zviuru makumi mapfumbamwe nemanomwe nemazana masere nemakumi manomwe kana kuti 97, 870. Vapora muAfrica vadarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana maviri kana kuti 3,2 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Dunhu reSADC ndirozve rine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 1,7 million. North Africa ine vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika zana remamiriyoni nemasere kana kuti 108 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zviuru mazana mana nemakumi masere nevatatu zvine mazana matanhatu kana kuti 483, 600 vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemanomwe ane zviuru zvishanu kana kuti 27, 5 million. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 2,3 million. Asi vapora pasi rose vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu nezviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 60, 7 million. No media source currently available

headline: Masangano Akazvimirira Okurudzirwa Kuzokera Kuvavhu Kuti Anzwe Zvido Zvavo
text: Masangano akazvimirira akasangana muAmerica muWashington neChipiri pamusangano wekuzeya mabasa angaitwe nemasangano akazvimirira mukukurudzira hutongo hwejekerere muZimbabwe. Musangano uyu wakarongwa neNational Endowment for Democracy yakabatana ne Robert F. Kennedy Center for Justice And Human Rights. Chipangamazano che Zimbabwe Human Rights NGO Form mu London, VaArthur Gwagwa, vakaudza musangano uyu kuti masangano akazvimirira anofanirwa kudzokera kuvanhu kuti vanzwe zvido zvevanhu. Vati pane zvisungo zvakaitwa nemasangano akazvimirira paakasangana muna 1999 muZimbabwe, uye zvisungo izvi hazvisi kuzadziswa nemasangano aya. VaGwagwa vakaita ongororo yemafambisiro anga achiitwa mabasa nemasangano akazvimirira ega kubva gore ra 1999 kusvika pari zvino. VaGwagwa vari muWashington umo vari kuita zvidzizvo pasi pechirongwa che Reagan-Fascell Democracy Fellow kwemwedzi mitanhatu. No media source currently available

headline: Zvizvarwa ZveZimbabwe Zviri Kunze Kwenyika Zvotumira Chikafu Kumusha
text: Apo pasi rose rakacherechedza zuva reWorld Food Day nezuro, zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogara nekushanda kunze kwenyika zvinoti zviri kushanda nesimba kuitira kuti zvibatsire vari kumusha nechikafu chiri kunetsa kuwana kuZimbabwe. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogara nekushanda muBotswana nedzimwe nyika zviri kutenga chikafu pamwe nekutumira mari kumusha kuitira kuti hama neshamwari dziwane chikafu, sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyika. VaCosta Zimhunga, avo vanotyaira mubhazi anofamba pakati peGaborone neKasane muBotswana, vanoti kukwira kwemitengo pamwe nekuoma kwezvinhu munyaya dzehupfumi, kuri kukonzera kuti vanhu vakawanda vashaye chikafu. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaTafadzwa Makamudze, vanoti kusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu kwava kuita kuti vagare vakatumira chikafu kumusha. Mumwe mudzidzi paUniversity of Botswana, Muzvare Memory Musavengane, vanoti vari kubatanidza zvechikoro nekushanda kuitira kuti vakwanise kubatsira vabereki vavo kumusha. Chimwewo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaRobson Muroiwa, vanoti nzara yapfunya chisero munyika inoda kuti munhu asunge dzichisimba pakuriritira mhuri yake. Mwedzi wakapera, sangano reWorld Food Program rakati vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete vakatarisana nedambudziko renzara muZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vatatu Vofa neCovid-19
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu vatatu vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro kuHarare, Bulawayo neMasvingo. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizvino vave mazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe kana kuti 294. Vanhu zana nemakumi maviri nemumwe kana kuti 121 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro. Vanhu vose vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro ava Havana nhoroondo yekubuda munyika. Matababeland North ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro vanove makumi manomwe nemana, Bulawayo ine makumi matatu nevaviri, Midlands gumi uye mumwe chete kuMasvingo. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga vave zvuru gumi nemazana masere nemakumi matatu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 10, 839. Vanhu vapora kusvika parizvino zvuru zvisere nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi manomwe nevaviri kana kuti 8, 972 mushure mekunge vanhu makumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri vapora nezuro. Vanhu vachiri kurwara churu chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe nevatatu kana kuti 1, 573. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa studio 7 neafrican union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezvuru mazana maviri kana kuti 2, 2 million vabatwa nechirwere checovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zvuru makumi mashanu nezvitatu zvine mazana masere nemakumi mashanu nevatatu kana kuti 53, 853. Vapora vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezvuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 1,9 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu nemanomwe ane zviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 67, 7 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muamerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vadarika zvuru mazana maviri nemakumi masere nematatu kana kuti kuti 283, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nemana nezvuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 14, 9 million. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 1, 5 million. Asi vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi mana nematatu kana kuti 43 million.

headline: VaMakamba, VaChiyangwa, VaMatemadanda naVaSibusiso Moyo Vopinda Musarudzo dzeZanu-PF
text: Nhasi bato reZanu-PF riri kupeta chirongwa chekutambira mapepa evanhu vanoda kukwikwidza musarudzo dzemaprimary ebato iri. Sarudzo idzi dziri kuitwa musi wa5 Chivabvu uye vanhu vanoda kukwikwidza vakatotanga kuendesa mapepa avo. Vamwe vari kukwikwidza musarudzo igurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzinwe nyika, Lieutenant-General Sibusiso Moyo vari kukwikwidza musarudzo dzesenate kuMberengwa, gurukota rezvematunhu VaJuly Moyo vari kukwikwidza kuRedcliff. Mutungamiri weZIFA VaPhilip Chiyangwa vari kuda kukwikwidza kuZvimba South. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weZIFA VaOmega Sibanda vari kukwikwidza kuVhungu, VaVictor Matemadanda vachikwikwidza kuGokwe Central. Vamwe vari kuda kukwikwidza vanosanganisa muzvinabhizimisi Vajames Makamba, vatori venhau veZBC VaAndrew Neshaba naVaTendai Munengwa, VaGarikai Mazara uye VaWebster Mubaiwa. Zvichakadaro, gurukota rinoona nezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi vanoti dare reparamende harifanire kuenda kuzororo kusvika razeya zvizere bhiri rekuvandudza mutemo wesarudzo kana kuti Electoral Amendment Bill. Mapato anopikisa ari kugunun’una zvikuru achiti hurumende iri kunonoka kuvandudzwa kwemitemo iyi. Sarudzo dziri kutarisirwa kuitwa pakati pemwedzi wa31 Chikunguru na31 Nyamavhuvhu gore rino. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzopesana Maonero paNyaya yeKudhura kweZvinhu
text: Vakuru vemabhizimisi nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi havasi kuwirirana panyaya yekuti dambudziko rekushomeka kwezvinhu muzvitoro uye kudhura kwazvo riri kukonzerwa nei. Vamwe vanoti zviri kukonzerwa nevanhu vakangovhunduka ndokutanga kututa zvinhu vachiisa mumatura. Asi vamwe vanoti mashoko aya manyautsa mukanwa chembere kurota ichiyamwa. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, avo vakadzoka munyika nemusi weMuvhuro, vakaudza vatsigiri vavo kuti pane vanhu vari kuda kupidigura hurumende yavo uye vanhu ava ndivo vari kuita kuti zvinhu zviite manyama amire nerongo. VaMugabe vakati dambudziko iri rinokwanisa kugadziriswa mumazuva maviri. Mukuru weConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaSifelani Jabangwe, vanoti vanhu vari kungomhanyirira kuhodha zvinhu vachiisa mumba ndivo vari kupa kuti zvinhu zvishaikwe. VaJabangwe vatiwo zvinokwanisika kuti dambudziko iri rigadzirike nechimbi chimbi sezvo bhanga guru renyika rakawana chikwereti kubva kubanga reAfriexim Bank. VaJabangwe vatiwo nyaya yekuti musika wefodya wakavharwa pari zvino iri kupawo kuti pamboita dambudziko. Asi sangano reOil Expressers Association of Zimbabwe, iro rinogadzira mafuta ekubikisa, rinoti dambudziko iri riri kukonzerwa nekuti mari yavari kupihwa neReserve Bank of Zimbabwe kuti vatenge zvinodiwa kusvina mafuta ishoma zvikuru. Sangano iri rinoti rakwereta mari yakawandisa kumakambani ekunze uye havachadi kupa nhengo dzavo zvikwereti. Vaimbova gurukota rezvemari vachitungamira bato rePeople’s Democratic Party, VaTendai Biti, vanoti zvinhu munyika zvaita manyama amire nerongo. VaBiti vanoti nyika haina mari yekunze inodiwa kutenga zvinhu nekudaro zviri kuitika izvi hazvishamise. VaBiti vatiwo zvakakosha kuti varombo nevari pamudyandigere vachengeterwe mari dzavo dziri mumabhanga. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vari muzvinabhizimisi, VaCalisto Jokonya, vanoti Zimbabwe haingakwanise kugadzirisa hupfumi kana isiri kugadzira zvinhu. VaJokonya vatiwo nyaya yehuwori ndiyo yapawo kuti zvinhu zvisamire zvakanaka. Zvinhuwo hazvina kumira zvakanaka pakushandiswa kwema bond note sezvo mari iyi iri kuramba ichishaya simba. Vamwe vanhu vari kutyira kuti Zimbabwe inogona kudzokera kumakore a 2008 apo mitengo yezvinhu yakakwira zvisina mukare akamboona uye ma bearer checks achishaya simba. No media source currently available

headline: South Africa Yozeya Nzira dzeKuti Zimbabwe Yobuda Sei Mukanwa Mamupere
text: Nhasi bazi rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muSouth Africa raita musangano muPretoria wange wakanangana nekuzeya matambudziko ari muZimbabwe uye kuti angagadziriswe sei. Gurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muSouth Africa Amai Naledi Pandor vanoti South Africa inofunga kuti vana veZimbabwe vakabatana vanokwanisa kugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika yavo vavakidzani vozongobatsirawo zvishoma. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemumiriri weZimbabwe kuSouth Africa VaDavid Hamadziripi avo vange vari mumwe munyarikani pagungano vatambirawo mashoko aAmai Pandor ekuti zvirango zvavati zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe zvibviswe. No media source currently available Vaive mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wehurumende yeZimbabwe Muzvinafundo Arthur Mutambara vange vari pamusangano uyu vatiwo zvakakosha kuti zvirango zvibviswe asi Zimbabwe inofanira kutanga yazvichenura nekuita zvido zvevana vayo vose. No media source currently available Vamwe vataura pamusangano uyu vanosanganisiri mukuru wechikoro cheUNISA VaMandla Makhanya uye VaSomadoda Fikeni vepaUNISA zvekare, VaPhilani Mthembu veInstitute for Global Dialogue, VaShingirirai Mutanga veAfrica Institute of South Africa, VaPhilani Mthembu veInstitute for Global Dialogue, VaShingirirai Mutanga veAfrica Institute of South Africa

headline: Vanotengesa muMigwagwa Vonetsana neVana Muzvinazvitoro
text: Munyika maita kusawirirana nenyaya yekuti poitwa sei nevanhu vanonzi vanodarika mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana manomwe avo vari kurarama nekutengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa nenyaya yekushaikwa kwemabasa kunyanya. Dzimwe nhengo dzedare reparamanende dziri kukurudzira hurumende nemakanzuru kuti vabvise vanhu ava mumigwagwa sezvo vave kukonzera nyonga nyonga zviuru muHarare. Rimwe sangano ravana muzvinabhizimisi re Confederation of Zimbabwe Retailers rinotiwo riri kushaiswa hope nevanhu vanotengesa mumigwagwa ava sezvo vezvitoro vari kutadza kubhadhara mari dzemitero nevashandi nekutorerwa bhizimisi nevanotengesa mumigwagwa vasina chavari kubhadhara kuhurumende. Asi gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakatiwo hurumende ine hurongwa hwekutanga kubhadharisa vanhu ava mari dzemitero. Mukuru wesangano reNational Vendors Union Zimbabwe, VaSamuel Wadzai, vanoti hurumende haifanire kuvadzinga vasina kwekuendeswa. Asi vamwe vakavamba sangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers, VaGift Juawo, vanoti panodiwa kutauriranwa kuti dambudziko iri dzigadziriswe sezvo vemabhizimisi vari kurasikirwa nebhizimisi nekuda kwevari kutebngesa mumigwagwa. No media source currently available

headline: Mapato Anopikisa Okurudzira Vanhu Kugara Kumba neMugovera
text: Mapato mana makuru anopikisa akurudzira neChishanu veruzhinji munyika kuti vacherechedze zuva rakawana nyika kuzvitonga neMugovera vari kudzimba dzavo achiti haazi kuzopinda mumhemberero dzakarongwa nehurmende yeZanu PF sezvo bato iri richishandisa mukana uyu kunyomba vamwe. No media source currently available Mapato aya anoti MDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, Mavambo Kusile Dawn, ZAPU neNational Consitutional Assembly anoti zvinosuwisa kuti vammwe vakarwira hondo yerusununguko vave kushungurudza vamwe vavo vechitema. Vachiverenga mashoko emapato ayo pachiitiko chapindwa naVaTsvangirai nemukuru weMKD VaSimba Makoni, munyori kukuru muMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vati hapana chekupemberera sesvo vanhu vari kuyaura nenhamo nenzara. Vatiwo mapato avo azvipira kushanda pamwe chete kuti asunungure vanhu kubva kuhutongi hweZanu PF. Vakurudzira vanhu kuti vacherechedza zuva iri mudzvimba dzavo sezvo pasina chikonzero chekuenda kumhemberero dzinorongwa neZanu PF mumatunhu akasisyana siyana munyika. VaTsvangirai vati vaimbosienda kumhemberero idzi apo vaive muhurumende yemubatanidzwa asi vakazowona kuti hazvibatsiri sezvo vainyombwa pamhemberero idzi. Mutauririri weNCA, VaMaddock Chivasa,vati kutambura kuri kuita zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvichenda kunze kwenyika uko zviri kushungurudzwa sezviri kuitika kuSouth Africa pari zvino kunoratidza pachena kuti hurumende haina hanya nezvido zveveruzhinji. Asi bato ReZanu PF rinoti zvinhu zviri kufamba zvakanaka munyika uye richaita mhemberero kunhandare yeNational Sports Stadium muHarare apo mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vanotarisirwa kutaura. Munyori anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mubato iri, VaIgnatius Chombo, vanoti mhemberero idzi dzichaitwa pasi pedingindira rinosimbaradza kubatana, runyararo pamwe nekuzvida seznyika. Makurukota ematunhu anotarisirwawo kutaura mashoka aVaMugabe mumatunhu ese munyika.

headline: VaMorgan Tsvangirai Votaura Pamusoro peHutano Hwavo
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, varamba mashoko ari kuburitswa nemamwe mapepanhau ekuti vakaudzwa navanachiremba kuti vasarirwa nemwedzi mishoma vachirarama zvakapa kuti vadaidzire dare remhuri yavo. “Ndakatonzwa vamwe vanhu vachiti ndafa, vari pamubhedha…Nyaya iripo ndeyekuti ndiri kurapwa. Asi kana munhu achirapwa afa? Ndinoda kuti ndiudze vanhu veZimbabwe kuti inini ndiri kunzwa zviri nani,” vadaro VaTsvangirai. Vatiwo zviri pachena kuti vavengi vavo munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vari kuvashuvira zvakaipa. “Vanoda kusevenzesa nyaya yehutano hwangu as an election issue, so vanoramba vachimutsiridza nyaya yacho,” vadaro VaTsvangirai. VaTsvangirai vakazivisa nyika kuti vane chirwere chegomarara muna 2016 uye vari kurapwa kuSouth Africa mushure mekunge vanachiremba vavo vapa kurudziro yekuti vaende ikoko. Vatiwo nemusi weChishanu vanenge vari muBulawayo vachisangana nenhengo dzebato ravo kuMcdonald Hall kuMzilikazi. Zimbabwe yakatarisana nesarudzo muna 2018 asi semakore ose kana munyika moitwa sarudzo munoita semakaberekera ingwe nenyaya yekurwisana nekukandirana makobvu nematete. No media source currently available

headline: Varairidzi Vanombomisa Kuramwa Mabasa Mushure meMusangano neHurumende
text: Varairidzi vanga vachiramwa mabasa vachida kuti hurumende igadzirise zvichemo zvavo zvemihoro nemari nekubatsirikana, vanoti vambomisa kuramwa mabasa uku mushure mekuvimbiswa nehurumende kuti iri kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo nekukasika. Izvi zvinotevera musangano wechimbichimbi waitwa nevamiriri vevaraidzi vemasangano ose evarairidzi negurukota rezvedzidzo yepasi Muzvinafundo Paul Mavhima masikati. Nhengo yerimwe remasangano apinda mumusangano uyu, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaAbiot Moyo, avo vanomirira varairidzi vakaremara, vanoti masangano ose awirirana kuti vambopa hurumende mukana wekugadzirisa zvinhu, ivo vachimbomisawo kuramwa mabasa uku. VaMoyo vanoti vari kutarisira kusangana zvakare nevamiriri vehurumende pakati pesvondo rino. Vanotiwo hurumende yavavimbisa kuti vose vakanga vari pakuramwa mabasa havasi kuzotorerwa matanho sezvakanga zvamboziviswa neboka reCivil Service Commission, iyo yakanga yazivisa kuti vose vakaramwa mabasa vaizobatirwa mari dzemazuva avasina kushanda. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata Muzvinafundo Mavhima kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: VaMatemadanda Vopomera VaMugabe Mhosva Yose yeGukurahundi
text: Munyori wesangano revakamborwa hondo yerusununguko, VaVictor Matemadanda, vanoti hapana zvazvinobatsira kuti nyika irambe ichitsvaka munhu wekupomera mhosva yeGukurahundi izvo zviri pachena kuti vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, ndivo vanofanirwa kubvunzwa uye kutsanangura mhosva yavakapara iyi. VaMatemadanda vanoti VaMugabe ndivo vanofanira kutaurira vanhu kuti zvipangamazano zvavo vaive vanaani panguva yeGukurahundi. Vanoti VaMugabe ndivo vaive mukuru wemauto, kana kuti "Commander-in-Chief", panguva iyi, uye semukuru wemauto, mutungamiri wenyika ndiye anotanga kana kumisa hondo. “Hapana minister kana commander wemauto ane simba rekutanga hondo. Hondo inotangwa napresident, yomiswa napresident,” VaMatemadanda vanodaro. Vanoti hurongwa hwemauto eFifth Brigade hwakatoshevedzerwa varairidzi vakabva kuNorth Korea, nekudaro hazvishandi kuramba vanhu vachinyenyeredza dambudziko rakatarisana nenyika. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika dzinoti mashoko aVaMatemadanda ekuda kuedza kuchenura mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa haana zvaanobatsira, sezvo VaMnangagwa vaive ivo gurukota rezvekugadzikana kwenyika vachiona nezvevasori panguva iyi. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti maoko aVaMnangagwa akangosvibawo sezvakaita aVaMugabe panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: NSSA Yobatsira Vakuvari, Asi Vari paMudyandigere Votsamwiswa neMari Dzavari Kupihwa
text: Apo vanhu vari kutambira mari yemudyandigere vari kuramba vachichema-chema kuti mari yacho ishoma, gurukota rezvekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu, Amai Prisca Mupfumira, vanoti hurumende iri mushishi kugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Vachipindura mibvunzo kubva kuvatapi venhau pamusoro pekuti mari inotambirwa nevanhu vari pamudyandigere ichawedzerwa riinhi, Amai Mupfumira vati bazi reNSSA riri mushishi kugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Amai Mupfumira, avo vange vari munyarikani pachiitiko cheOpen Day yeNSSA Workers’ Compensation Rehabilitation Centre, vatiwo hurumende ine hurongwa hwekuti vanhu vanozvishandira pachavo vega vagokwanisa kuvewo vachibhadhara mari kuNSSA kuti vagozokwanisawo kuwana mari yemudyandigere kana vakwegura. Pari zvino vanhu vari pamudyandigere vanotambira madhora makumi mana pamwedzi uye hurumende yaive yati ichawedzera mari iyi kuti isave iri pasi pezana remadhora kubva muna Kurume wegore rino, asi izvi hazvina kuitika. Amai Mupfumira vati kubvira muna Kubvumbi wegore rino NSSA yakatanga hurongwa hwekubatsira nemari pakuviga nhengo dzeNSSA dzinenge dzafa. NSSA Rehabilitation Centre inzvimbo inorapa vanhu vanenge vakuvara vari pamabasa uye nzvimbo iyi ine mimwe michina yechizvino-zvino isingawanikwe kune zvimwe zvipatara. Mukuru weNSSA, Muzvare Liz Chitiga, vabvuma kuti vanhu vakawanda havazive nezvenzvimbo iyi, asi vati kambani yavo ine hurongwa hwekuti veruzhinji vakwanise kurapiwa panzvimbo. Mumwe wevanhu vakarapwa paNSSA Rehabilitation Centre ndiVaZuze Nzerere avo vakakuvara vari mumugodhi mavaishanda. VaNzerere, avo vasisakwanise kufamba vega, vati vakarapwa vakadzidziswawo mabasa ekusona uye vanofara kuti kambani yavaishandira yakavadzorera pabasa. Panguva imwe chete NSSA Rehabilitation Centre inokwanisa kuve nevanhu makumi manomwe vanenge vachirapwa vachigarapo. Nzvimbo iyi, iyo iri pedyo nechipatara chikuru cheMpilo yakavhurwa mugore ra1971. No media source currently available

headline: Vari muSouth Africa Votsigira Kuratidzira Kuri Kuitwa muZimbabwe
text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwezviri muSouth Africa zvinoti zviri kufara zvikuru kuti vanhu vemuZimbabwe vabatana kekutanga vachiramba hutongi hwenutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. Mashoko aya anotevera hurongwa hwevakarwa hondo yerusununguko ekuti vari kukoka munhu wese wemuZimbabwe kuti aende kumusangano wekuratidza kuti VaMugabe havachidiwa nevanhu. Vagere muSouth Africa vanoti vari kurongawo kuita musangano wekuratidzira kuti vari kufarira zvirongwa nevamwe vavo vari kumusha. Moreblessing Munjoma weStudio7 anoti hurongwa uhu huri kutarisirwa kuitwa muJohannesburg neMugovera. VaMugabe vakatorerwa masimba nemauto nemusi weChipiri manheru vachinzi vasiye basa sezvo vakundikana kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika zvakaita sehuori, kushaikwa kwemabasa, uye kudzinga muhurumende nemubato vanhu vakarwa muhondo yerusunguko pasina mhosva yavakara. Zvinhu zvakanyanya kuipa mushure mekunge VaMugabe vadzinga mumwe wevatedzeri vavo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachivapomera mhosva yekuda kuvabvutira masimba zvisiri pamutemo pamwe nekusavaremekedza. No media source currently available

headline: Buy Zimbabwe Yokurudzira Vanhu Kutenga Zvinogadzirwa muNyika
text:
Panguva yezororo reKisimisi negore idzva munyika munopindazvinhu zvakawanda zvakasiyana siyana zvinotengwa kubva kunze. Sangano reBuy Zimbabwe rinoti nyika inrasikirwa nemari yekunze yakawanda uye maindasitiri emuno anotadza kusimukira nekuda kwekutengwa kubva kunze kwenyika kwezvinhu zvinogona kugadzirwa muno. Nekudaro sangano iri riri kukurudzira kuti veruzhinji vafarire kutenga zvinhu zvinogadzirwa munyika

Mukuru wesangano reBuy Zimbabwe VaAlois Burutsa vanoti zvakakoshera nyika kuti veruzhinji vatenge zvinhu zvinogadzirwa munyika kuitira kubatsira kuchengetedza mari yekunze iyo inogona kushandiswa pakutenga zvimwe zvakaksoha zvisingagadzirwe muno zvakadai semichina.

VaBurutsa vaudza Studio 7 kuti kubvira zvakatanga sangano ravo muna2011 vanofara kuti chinangwa chavo chabatsira kusimudzira kutengwa kwezvigadzirwa zvemuno munyika. Zimbabwe inoshandisa mari yakawanda gore rega rega mukutenga zvinhu kubva kunze kwenyika. Gore rakapera nyika yakashandisa mabhiriyoni manomwe nemamiriyoni mazana matanhatu kana kuti 7.6 billion zvichienzaniswa ne4.6 billion yakashandiswa muna2020.

Zvimwe zvezvinhu zvinonyanya kutengwa kunze zvinosanganisira mafuta edzimotokari, mafetireza, nemichina asi pane zvimwewo zvakawanda zvinogadzirwa muno zvinobvawo kunze.

Mutungamiri wesangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries VaKurai Matsheza vatsinhirawo kuti zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vafarire kutenga zvinhu zvinogadzirwa muno vachiti izvi zvinobatsirawo kuti munyika muve nemabasa.

CZI inoti pari zvino maindasitiri emunyika ari kushanda zvinosvika pazvikamu makumi manomwe kubva muzana uye kushomeka kwemagetsi nderimwe dambudziko guru rinoita kuti asashanda nemazvo.

VaBurutsa vanopokana nemaonero ekuti zvnhu zvakawanda zvinogadzirwa munyika zvinodhura uye hazvinyatsogadzirwa nemhando yepamusoro sezvinoita zvinobva kunze.

VaFelix Chari, mudzidzisi wezvidzidzo zvepamusoro panyaya yezvehupfumi vanoti vanobvumirana nemaonero ekuti zvinhu zvakawanda zvinogadzirwa munyika zvinodhura vachiti izvi zvinoitika nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakawanda. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vaachishanda nesangano relabour and Economic Developmemt Research Institute of Zimbabwe Dr Prosper Chitambara vatiwo chirongwa cheBuy Zimbabwe chakanaka asi zvimwe zvinogadzirwa zvinozodhura sezvo kugadzira zvinhu munyika kuchidhura. Vachitaura pakuparurwa kwevhiki rekukurudzira kutengwa kwezvinhu zvinogadzirwa muno muHarare nezuro, mutungamirir wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakati hurumende inotsigira chirongwa ichi nekuti chinobatsira kudzivirira kuunzwa munyika kwezvinhu zvinogadzirwa kunze
zvinenge zvine mutengo wakadereresa izvo vakati zvinokanganisa budiriro yenyika.  Zvitoro zvikuru zvinosanganisira OK Zimbabwe zvirimowo muchirongwa cheBuy Zimbabwe ichi. Zimbabwe inonyanya kutenga nekutengesearana neSouth Africa, China, United Araba Emirates, Singapore, United Kingdom neRussia. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzedzvehupfumi dzinoti VaMnangagwa vanotaura zvinhu zvisiri kuitwa nehurumende. Semuenzaniso, mushure mekunge zvigadziraw zvemunyika zvawedzerwa mutengo nekuda kwekushaya simba kwedhora remunyika, gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakabva vabvumidza vezvitoro kutenga zvinhu kunze pasina kubhadhara mitero.

headline: Vanhu Vafa neCovid-19 muZimbabwe Vadarika Zana
text: Vanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika vave zana nevaviri kana kuti 104. MuHarare muri imo mune vanhu vakawandisa vafa nechirwere ichi vanosvika makumi mashanu nevashanu kana kuti 55. Bulawayo ndiyo iri kutevera pavanhu vafa vanosvika makumi maviri nevatatu. Dunhu reMasvingo chete ndiro risina kana munhu mumwe chete ati afa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika vadarika zviuru zvina nemazana mashanu ane makumi manomwe nemashanu kana kuti 4, 575. Vapora vachidarika chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mana ane gumi nevatanhatu kana kuti 1,416. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Brighton Chireka vanoti havo vanhu vazhinji vanopora kunyangwe vamwe vashoma vachida kuzoendeswa kuchipatara. No media source currently available Dr Chireka vatiwo kudziya muviri, kurutsa, kutonhorwa zvakanyanyisa, kubvunda nezvimwe munongedzo wekuti munhu anogona kunge abatwa nechirwere ichi. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Vafa vadarika zviuru makumi maviri nemaviri ane mazana mapfumbamwe nevatatu kana kuti 22, 903. Vanhu vapora vadarika zviuru mazana masere nemakumi maviri kana kuti 720, 000. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni gumi memapfumbamwe ane zviuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 19, 6 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana ne makumi matanhatu nemaviri kana kuti 162, 000. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vadarika zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi maviri nemanomwe ane mazana mashanu kana kuti 727,000. Vapora pasi rose vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nerimwe nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 11,9 million.

headline: Africa Yotadza Kusvitsa Zvikamu Zvakatarwa neWHO zveVanhu Vabayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19 Gore Rino Risati Rapera
text: Sangano reWorld Health Organisation-WHO-rinoti nyika dzakawanda dzemuAfrica kusanganisira Zimbabwe dziri kutadza kubaya nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 kusvika pazvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana gore rino risati rapera sezvanga zvakatarwa nesangano iri. Vachitaura nezuro pamusangano we International Conference Public Health in Africa, mukuru weWHO, Dr Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, vakati nyika makumi mana nesere panyika makumi mashanu neina dziri muAfrica dzichatadza kubaya zvizvarwa zvadzo zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana sezvanga zvakatarwa neWHO. Dr Tedros vakati rimwe dambudziko riri kuitika mudunhu reAfrica nderekuti nyika idzi hadzisi kuburitsa huwandu hwechokwadi hwevanhu vari kufa kana kurwara nechirwere cheCovid-19. Mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, Va Itai Rusike, vanoti kusabuda nehuwandu chaihwo hwevanhu vari kubatwa neCovid-19 zvinokonzerwa nekuti munyika hamuna zvikwanisiro zvemhando yepamusoro zvekuongorora kuti munhu ane Covid-19 here kana kuti kwete.
