VaRusike vanoti zvimwe zviri kutadzisa nyika dzemuAfrica kusanganisira Zimbabwe kubaya vanhu vakawanda idambudziko rekushandisa nhomba dzinobayiwa kaviri pamwe nekusawana kweveruzhinji ruzivo rwechokwadi nenguva. Mukuru munyaya dzekurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 munyika, Dr Agnes Mahomva, vanoti sehurumende vachiri vakatarisira kuti vachabaya vanhu zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana sezviri kukurudzira neWHO vachiti vachazobvuma kuti vatadza musiwa 31 Zvita 2021 wapfuura. Kusvika pakupera kwezuva nezuro, Zimbabwe yakazivisa kuti yakange yabaya nhomba yekutanga vanhu mamiriyoni mana nezviuru makumi maviri nezvitatu negumi nevatu (4 023 013). Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba mbiri kusvika mukupera kwezuva nezuro vainge vava mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu nezana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri, (3 035 192). WHO inoti vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni makumi manomwe nemanomwe, kana kuti zvikamu zvisere chete kubva muzana vakabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 muAfrica yose. Zimbabwe yakwanisa kubaya zvikamu gumi nezvipfumbamwe kubva muzana, zvinoreva kuti mumazuva gumi nemana asara kuti gore ripere, Zimbabwe inofanirwa kubaya vanhu zvikamu makumi maviri nechimwe kubva muzana, kana kuti 21%, unova mutoro mukuru pakatariswa nguva yatorwa kuti isvika pazvikamu gumi nezvipfumbamwe kubva muzana, kana kuti 19%. Zimbabwe inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Vanorwira Kodzero dzeVanhu Voratidzira neKurara neKuswera muAfrica Unity Square
text: Nhengo dzemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu anoti reZimbabwe Activists Alliance, Occupy Africa Unity Square Movement neZimbabwe Women in Politics Alliance, dzakabatana nevamwe vana veZimbabwe, dziri kurara pamwe nekuswera muAfrica Unity Square dzichiratidzira kwemazuva gumi nematanhatu. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reZimbabwe Activists Alliance, Muzvare Tendayi Lynnette Mudehwe vanoti vari kurara pamwe nekuswera munzvimbo iyi senzira yekuratidzira kusafara kwevana veZimbabwe nezvavanoti zviri kuitwa nehurumende zvekusateerera vanhu. “Tiri kuda kutaura nyaya dzatinoti hurumende yeZimbabwe igadzirise nekukurumidza, zvakaita senyaya dzeupfumi, matongerwo enyika pamwe nekurarama kwevanhu,” Muzvare Mudehwe vanodaro. Vanoti vakaona kuti nyaya yekuratidzira zvezuva rimwe chete hainyatsoburitsi zvinyunyuto zvavo, saka vakafunga zvekuti vangogarira panzvimbo kwemazuva aya. “Takasarudza mazuva gumi nematanhatu kuitira kuti zvinangane nezuva rakakosha munhoroondo yeSouth Africa neAfrica yose, reDay of the African Child, apo tinocherechedza mwana weAfrica,” vanowedzera Muzvare Mudehwe. Vanoti vakatanga kurara munzvimbo iyi usiku hwemusi weChipiri uye havasati vasangana nematambudziko kubva kumapurisa, asi vanoti vanotarisira kuti vanogona kuzokanganiswa. No media source currently available

headline: Muzvare Khupe Voendesa MDC yaVaChamisa kuMatare
text: MDC- T inotungamirirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe inoti iri kuenda kumatare edzimhosva nechinangwa chekuda kumisa MDC-T inotungamirwa na VaNelson Chamisa kuti isashandise mari yakabva kuhurumende pasi pemutemo we Political Parties Finance Act. Mutemo uyu unosungira hurumende kupa mari kumapato anenge aine nhengo mudare reparamende. Muzvare Khupe vanoti mari iyi inofanirwa kushandiswa mushure mekunge matare atara kuti ndiyani chaiye mutungamiri we MDC –T pakati paMuzvare Khupe naVa Chamisa. Vaviri ava vari kunetsana panyaya yehutungamiri zvichitevera kushaya kwevaive mutungamiri webato iri, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, muna Kukadzi gore rino. Mutevedzeri waMuzvare Khupe, VaObert Gutu, vanoti danho rakatorwa nehurumende rekupa mari ye MDC T kune chikwata chaVaChamisa kwaive kusiri pamutemo sezvo nyaya dzekuti mutungamiriri chaiye webato iri ndiyani dzichiri kumatare. VaGutu vanotiwo magweta avo ari mubishi kugadzirisa magwaro avanofanira kuendesa kumatare edzimhosva nezvenyaya iyi kuti ivo nechikwata chavo vawane mugove wavo pamari iyi sezvavakatarisira. VaGutu vanoti havazoregi kufambira nyaya idzi sebato sezvo vachiziva kuti ndivo vanofanirwa kunge vakapihwa mari iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Amai Mliswa Chikoka Vokurudzira Kusungwa kweVanhu Vanoita Huori Munyaya dzeKutengeswa kweMasitendi
text:
Imwe nhengo huru muhurumende yabvuma nhasi kuti vashandi vehurumende pamwe nevamwe vanhu muZanu PF vari kutengesa nzvimbo dzekuvakira zvisiri pamutemo, nokudaro vanofanirwa kusungwa nemitemo yenyika. Vachitaura paCooksey Hall muChinhoyi pamusangano wavaita
nevakuru vemapazi ehurumende, gurukota redunhu reMashonaland West, Amai Mliswa-Chikoka, vati mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, havasi kufara negwaro reongororo yezvekushandiswa kwenzvimbo dzehurumende iro rakaburitsa pachena kuti nhengo dzebato reZanu PF nevashandi vehurumende vari kuita zvehuori munyaya dzekuwanisana pekugara. Amai Mliswa-Chikoka vaudza mapurisa kuti vave nebasa rekusunga wose
ari kuita kana akaita zvehuori pasina kutarisa kumeso. Amai Mliswa Chikoka vakurudzira vematare kuti vaite basa ravo nemazvo kuitira kuti mutemo ubate wose akaita zvehuori. Amai Mliswa-Chikoka vati vose vakawana nzvimbo kubva kuhurumende kana kumakanzuru dzekuvakira dzimba zvechitsotsi, vanofanirwa
kusungwa. VaMnangagwa vakaumba komisheni yakaongorora kupihwa kwaiyitwa nzvimbo dzehurumende mumakanzuru pamwe nekutambira zvichemo zvevanhu vainge vatenga nzvimbo dzekugara asi votadza kudziwana. Konisheni iyi yaive nemutongi wedare repamusoro, Justice Tendai Uchena, sasachigaro wayo. Ongororo yaVaUchena inoti muChinhoyi pane nzvimbo yeDestiny iyo
yakapihwa VaObediah Musindo vanotsigira bato reZanu PF avo
vakatengesera vanhu nzvimbo dzekugara asi kusvika nanhasi vanhu ava
havasati vapihwa pekugara kunyange vakabhadhara mari yavainge vanzi
vabhadhare. Imwe nhengo yevechidiki yeZanu PF, VaMike Chimombe, vakapihwa nzvimbo yekuvakira dzimba asi kusvika pari zvino hapana chakavakwa asi vanhu vachiti vakabhadhara mari dzavo. Asi VaChimombe vati vakapedza kubhadhara nzvimbo iyi vangomirira
kuvaka dzimba dzavo. KuChitungwiza, imwe nhengo yeZanu PF, Dr Fredrick Mabamba, vemushandira pamwe wedzimba weUnited Westand Housing Cooperative, vakasungwa nebazi rezvekudzivirirwa kwehuori masvondo matatu apfuura vachipomerwa mhosva yekupa vanhu nzvimbo dzekuvaka dzimba zvisiri pamutemo. Muguta reNorton, kambani yeBeyond Reality yenhengo yeZanu PF
yeConsultative Assembly, VaJimayi Muduvuri, iri kunetsanawo nevechidiki
pamusoro penzvimbo inosvika mahekita mazana maviri inofanirwa kuvakirwa dzimba iyo iri mumatare edzimhosva. Vechidiki ava, avo vakabhadhara mari asi havana kuzopihwa nzvimbo
dzekuvakira dzimba, vave kunzi mari inofanirwa kuwedzerwa. Mashoko aAmai Mliswa-Chikoka anouya apo vaimbove gurukota rezvematunhu, VaIgnatius Chombo, vari kumiswa pamberi pematare edzimhosva vachipomherwa mhosvo yekusashandisa hofisi yavo zvakanaka vachiita zvehuori munyaya dzekupa vanhu nzvimbo dzekugara. Hatina kukwanisa kubata munyori wezvematunhu mubato reMDC Alliance, VaSesil Zvidzai, kuti tinzwe pamire bato ravo panyaya iyi. Asi mutevedzeri mumutauriri webato iri, VaClifford Hlatywayo, vanoti Zanu PF haikwanise kugadzirisa nyaya yevanhu vakawana nzvimbo dzekuvakira zvisiri pamutemo kana kuti ma Land Barons sezvo nhengo dzayo dziri idzo ma land barons. Gwaro rekomisheni yaVaUchena rinoti pane huori hwemhando yepamusoro hwakaitika pakupihwa kwenzvimbo dzekuvakira dzimba mumaguta akawanda munyika. No media source currently available

headline: VaZuma Votarisirwa muZimbabwe neMusi weChina
text: Hurumende yeSouth Africa nemusi weMuvhuro yakaburitsa mashoko ekuti mutungamiri wenyika iyi VaJacob Zuma vari kutarisirwa kupinda muZimbabwe nemusi weChina kuzoita misangano yekudyidzana nemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. VaZuma vachaenda nemakurukota akawanda anosanganisa gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika amai Maite Nkoana-Mashabane, gurukota rezvekuchengetedzwa kwenyika amai Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula, gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika VaRob Davies; gurukota rezvemukati menyika VaMalusi Gigaba, gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvino VaDipuo Peters uye gurukota rezvevashandi Amai Mildred Oliphant. Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika VaMike Bimha vanoti vanofunga kuti musangano uyu uchabatsira nyika mbiri idzi. No media source currently available

headline: CZI Yozeya neChina Mamiriro Akaita Hupfumi
text: Sangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, CZI, iro riri kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mumaindasitiri, riri kuita musangano wakakosha svondo rino kuti rione kuti zvinhu zvavandudzwa kuitira kuti makambani atange kushanda zvakanaka. Musangano uyu uri kuitirwa kuCrown Plaza muHarare neChina. Vari kutarisirwa kupinda mumusangano uyu vakamirira mapazi ehurumende vanosanganisira gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, gurukota rezvemigodhi, VaWalter Chidhakwa, uye gurukota rezvemaindasitiri, VaMike Bimha. Mukuru weCZI, VaClifford Siwela, vaudza Studio7 kuti vamwe vari kutarisirwa kuvako vamiriri veInternational Moneteray Fund neWorld Bank vari munyika, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi nevamwe. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, uye vachishanda neResources Exploitation, VaWashington Mehlomakulu, vanoti CZI inofanira kubuda nezvisungo zvainozoendesa kuhurumende kwete kumirira hurumende kuti iuye nezvisungo nekuti inenge yawandirwa nezvekuita. VaMehlomakulu vanoti basa rehurumende ndere kugadzira migwagwa, magetsi nezvimwe kwete kuronga zvemakambani. No media source currently available Sangano reCZI rinoti makambani emuZimbawe ari kushanda ari pasi pezvikamu zvitatu nezvitanhatu kubva muzana izvo zvopa kuti vanhu vakawanda varasikirwe nemabasa.

headline: Nyanzvi Dzokurudzira Vanhu Kuti Vagare Mudzimba Asi Vakawanda Vachiti Havana Chekudya
text: Apo vanhu vari kukurudzirwa kuti vatange kugara mumba kutanga mangwana senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kuyambira kuti vangwarire kutapurirwa chirwere sezvo parizvino vanhu vari kuvhenekwa vachiri vashoma. Mumiriri wesangano reWorld Health Organization muZimbabwe Dr Alex Gasasira vati vatambira kurudziro yekuti vanhu vambogara mumba nekuti zvinopa kuti vannhu vasatapurirane chirwere. Munyori mukuru wesangano ravanachiremba reSenior Hospital Doctors Association, Doctor Aaron Musara vati huwandu hwevanhu varikubatwa nechirwere ichi hunoratidza pachena kuti zvinhu hazvisisina kumira zvakanaka. VaMusara vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vatevedzere kurudziro dzavanachiremba kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire. Vanhu vanhu vasaende pane magungano, vapfeke mamask zvakanaka vakavhara mhuno nemuromo uyewo kugeza maoko nguva dzose. Sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, Dr Ruth Labode, vatiwo danho rakatorwa nehurumende reLockdown rakakosha zvikuru vachiti kusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi munyika kunopa kuti ruzhinji rufambe zvakanyanya izvo zvinowedzera kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Amai Labode vati kunyangwe hazvo Lockdown ichikanganisa mararamiro evanhu, kudzivirira kurambopararira kwechirwere kwakakosha vachitiwo kuvhurwa kwemuganhu pakati peSouth Africa neZimbabwe kunogona kuriko kwakonzera kukwira kwehuwandu hwevari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti zviri pachena kuti hurumende yamomoterwa. VaMadzorera vati hurumende haina mari yekuongorora zvakanyanya vakati chakakosha panguva ino kuti munhu wega wega azvigarire kumba kuchengetedza hutano. Asi Muzvare Joylene Nyachuru mumwe mugari weku Glenview vati kuisa nyika mulockdown vanhu vasina chouviri hakuna zvakunobatsira. VaChristopher Gohori mumwezve mugari wemuHarare vatiwo pasina kugadzirisa dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemvura muHarare, vanhu kunyanya kumisha inogara vazhinji vacharamba vachiungana pazvibhorani sezvo vasingakwanisi kugara vasina mvura. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa kuti nekuda kwekukwira kuri kuita chirwere cheCovid-19 No media source currently available , vanhu vanenge vokurudzirwa kugara mumba kana kuti Lockdown kutanga mangwana. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisawo kuti kubva neChipiri, mamwe makambani anenge asingachashandi uyewo rakatorambidza magungano kusara kwevanenge vachienda kurufu asi vasingadarike makumi matatu. Vanhu vanenge vasisabvumidzwe kuenda kune mamwe maguta.

headline: Varume Vari Kupomerwa Mhosva yeKuuraya Musoja kuChivhu Vanonzi Vapfurwa Vakafa neMauto neMapurisa
text: Varume vaviri vakapfura masoja maviri mumwe wacho akafa muChivhu nezuro\nvapfurwa vakafa nhasi kuNyazvidzi pedyo nekuBuhera. Nunurai Jena\nanotipa nyaya inotevera. Vaviri ava, avo vasati vave kuzivikanwa mazita avo vapfurwa nemasoja achibatsirana nemapurisa. Mutauriri wemapurisa Asst Comm Paul Nyathi vabvuma kuti vaviri ava vapfurwa vose vakafa uye pfuti dzavakatora dzawanikwa vachinadzo. Masoja maviri aya akapfurwa pane imwe kamba yemapurisa diki pedyo neChicken Inn kuChivhu. Kamba yemapurisa iyi ine mauto nemapurisa ari kubatsirana kuona kuti vanhu vatevedzera here kurudziro yekuti vagare mudzimba senzira yekutevedzera mitemo yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. VaNyathi vanoti munhu akapfura mauto aya akapinda pakamba apa ndokukumbira mumwe muuto kuti vataura panze ndokuzodzoka mukamba vose achibva apfura nekuuraya mumwe muuto mumwe akakuvara zvakaipisisa asati atiza nemumwe wake. Kupfurwa kwemasoja uku kuri kuuya apo hukama hwevanhu nemasoja husina kumira zvakanaka nekuda kwekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kuri kupomerwa mamwe masoja munyika. Makore maviri apera mugore ra2018 muna Nyamavhuvhu vanhu vatanhatu vakapfurwa vakafa nevanofungidzirwa kuti masoja vachiratidzira asi hapana musoja akasungwa kunyange pakaitwa ongororo yaitungamirwa nevaive mutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaKgalema Mothlanthe. Asi vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vakawanda vataura neStudio 7 vati kunyangwe vanhu vakanetsana hapafanire kudeurwa ropa sezvo paine matare anofanira kutonga nyaya dzose. Gweta uye vari mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu VaDzikamai Bere vanoti hukama hwevanhu nemasoja hauna kunaka zvachose vachiti hukama uhu hunofanirwa kugadziriswa kuti vanhu vakwanise kuyamura mapurisa nemasoja mubasa ravo. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reMDC Alliance VaClifford Hlatswayo vanoti masoja, mapurisa nevanhu vanofanirwa kuremekedzana kuti nyika ifambire mberi zvakanaka. Mamwe magweta ataura neStudio 7 ati kufa kwevanhu vakuraya muuto uku kuchapa kuti nyika isazive kuti chii chaizvo chakapa kuti padeuke ropa asi vachiti zvinonetsa kubata vanhu vanenge vachipomerwa mhosva yekuuraya uye vaine pfuti. Vanhu nemasoja vakamboita hukama hwakasimba apo masoja akabatsira kupidigura vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika mushakabvu Robert Mugabe. Asi vamwe vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vanoti masoja haafanire kupindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika sezvinokurudzirwa nebumbiro remitemo. Nezure wakare vamwe vanhu vakaonekwa vakatakura nekumhanyisa muuto ainge akuvara kuchipatara.

headline: Nhengo Nhatu dzeCCC kuChimanimani Dzinosungwa Dzichipomerwa Mhosva yeKupamba Nhengo yeZanu PF
text: Mapurisa kuChimanimani mudunhu reManicaland anonzi akasunga nhengo nhatu dzebato rinopikisa reCitizen’s Coalition for Change, CCC, idzo dziri kupomerwa mhosva yekupamba nhengo yeZanu PF uye vari sachigaro vevechidiki vebato riri kutonga iri mudunhu reBumba, VaNicholas Madzianike. Vatatu vakasungwa ava vanoti VaChengetanai Musudu, VaHakata Musudu pamwe naVaAaron Chizemo, vanonzi vakasungwa mazuva mashanu adarika uye vanonzi vachiri mumaoko emapurisa uye vachiri kubatsira nekuferefetwa kwenyaya iyi. Mutauriri webato reCCC mudunhu reManicaland, VaDavid Panganayi, vati ichokwadi kuti vane nhengo dziri mumaoko emapurisa kunyange hazvo vasati vave nehumbowo hungadai huine mapurisa kuti nhengo dzavo ndidzo dzakapara mhosva iyi. VaPanganayi vati chinozivikanwa ndechekuti vatatu vakasungwa ava vanonwirawo panzvimbo inonzi ndiyo yakatsakatikira nhengo yeZanu PF iyi. Vati vavari kutaura navo mukubvunzurudza kwavari kuita kuti vanyatsonzwisisa kuti zvingadai zvakafamba sei, vari kuti ivo nhengo yezanu PF iyi inenge yanga yave kurasika pfungwa. “Nhengo dzedu tine chokwadi chekuti hadzineyi nekushaikwa kwaari kuita,” vanodaro VaPanganayi.  No media source currently available Mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vabvuma kuti mapurisa ane vanhu vakasungwa pamusoro penyaya iyi, uye vati mapurisa ari kuferefeta kuti vaone kana nyaya iyi iine chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika, uyewo kuti vaone kuti VaMadzianike vachiri vapenyu here kana kuti kwete. “Isusu tiri kuferefeta nyaya iyoyo. Pari zvino hatisati tave nemashoko akazara kuti titi mhosva yakaparwa nangana kana kuti haina kuparwa nangana. Tichiri kuongorora. Saka pakuongorora kwedu ndipo patichaona kuti ndezvipi zvichabuda,” VaNyathi vanodaro. No media source currently available Asi mushandi mukuru muboka rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vati bato ravo reZanu PF riri kushushikana kwazvo nekupambwa kwaVaMadzianike nevanofungidzirwa kuti inhengo dzebato reCCC. “Ndinoda kuzivisa ruzhinji rweZimbabwe kuti musangano weZanu PF kubva kune mutungamiri wedu VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vari kushushikana kwazvo nekuda kwekupambwa kwakaitwa nhengo yedu, vanova chairman we Ward 6 Chayamiti kuChimanimani, Comrade Nicholas Madziyanike,” VaMugwadi vadaro. Vati zvichitevera zvaburitswa nemapurisa kuti pane vanhu vatatu vari mumaoko avo nechekuita nenyaya iyi, semusangano weZanu PF vari kukurudzira ruzhinji rweZimbabwe, kunyanyanyanya, vechidiki vebato ravo, avo vavati vane hukasha nenyaya iyi, kuti varambe vachitevera gwara rinoparurwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaMnangagwa, rerunyararo. VaMadzianike vanonzi vakatsakatika musi wa 19 Chikumi uye vakapedzisira kuonekwa pabhawa reChisedze riri panzvimbo yemabhizimusi yeBumba, apo vainwira. No media source currently available

headline: Vanorarama neKutengesera Mumigwagwa Vochema Kuti Hurumende Haina Kuvabvumidzawo Kutanga Kushanda
text: Vanotengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa vari kuchema-chema zvikuru vachiti hurumende inofanirwa kuvabvumidzawo kuti vadzokere pamabasa avo sezvo vachirarama nekutengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa uye vanhu ava vakawanda kudarika vanhu vanoenda kumabasa. Masangano anomirira vanhu ava, anoti reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, (VISET) neSurvival Vendors Union of Zimbabwe anoti hurumende yaifanirwawo kuona kuti vanozviitira mabasa emaoko ava vabvumidzwawo kudzokera kumabasa avo sezvayakaita kubvumidza vemakambani kuti vavhure. Hurumende yakabvumidza vemakambani kuvhura asi vachiita kuti vashandi vavo vaongororwa kuti havana COVID-19 here kana kuti kwete. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemakambani madiki neepakati, Amai Sithembiso Nyoni kuti tinzwe kana paine hurongwa hwavari kuitira vanozvibatira mabasa emaoko ava. Makanzuru mazhinji munyika ari mushishi kuparadza nzvimbo dzinosishandirwa nevanozvishandira ava, kunyange hazvo dare repamusoro rakapa mutongo richiti mamwe emakanzuru aya akanga atyora mutemo nekuparadza nzvimbo idzi. Asi mukuru weVISET, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vanoti vane kunyunyuta uye kushamisika kuti sei hurumende yakasvika padanho iri isinawo kutarisa vanorarama nekutengesera mumigwagwa, vavanoti ndivo vakabata hupfumi hwenyika. No media source currently available Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru wesangano re Survival Vendors Union of Zimbabwe, VaObey Mwariwangu, vanoti kunyange hazvo hurumende iri kuita zvakawanda mukurerutsa zvinhu yakanangana nechirwere che coronavirus, kune vanotengesera mumigwagwa hapana chinhu chati charerutswa, sezvo vasiri kukwanisa kupinda mumigwagwa, munove mavanogara nekushandira. No media source currently available

headline: Vari Kunze Voshaya Vimbiso Yakadzama Kuitira Kuti Vadzoke Kumusha
text: Vanhu vemuZimbabwe vane mabhizimisi muSouth Africa vanoti havasi vose vachatambira mashoko emutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ekuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvidzokere kumusha kundosimudzira hupfumi hwenyika sezvo pasina zvakajeka zvinoratidza kuti Zimbabwe yava nyika inoremekedza kodzero dzemunhu wese. Vazhinji vane mabhizimisi muSouth Africa vanoti dambudziko guru nderekuti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa haizi kuvimbisa zvakadzama kuti vari kunze vakadzoka kumusha, vachazokwanisa here kuzovhura mabhizimisi matsva kana kushanda nehurumende murunyararo. Sachigaaro wemabhizimisi emhuri yeZimbabwe achiri kusimukira muSouth Africa yeZimbusinessLink Forum SA, VaMarshal General Sankara, avo vane nguva refu vachigara muSouth Africa, vanoti hapana shanduko yati yaitika mu Zimbabwe inokodzera kuti nhengo dzebato ravo dzikwanise kudzokera kumusha. Muzvinabhizinesi ane makambani akawanda muSouth Africa, VaAustin Moyo, avo vanova zvakare munyarikani musangano re Diaspora Care Forum, vanoti mashoko aVaMnangagwa ekuti vanhu vadzoke kumusha, hapana zvaanoreva nekuti kumusha hakuna mabasa kana mari uyewo hurumende yavo haizombokwanisa kugutsa mhuri yeZimbabwe iri munyika kana vose vari kunze kenyika. VaGarai Madziva, avo vanobva kwaRusape, vanoti ivo nemhuri yavo vangangode kudzokera kumusha asi matambudziko akaita sekushaikwa kwemari mumabhanga, kuipa kwemigwagwa, ndiko kuri kunyanyokonzera kuti mhuri yeZimbabwe iri kunze kwenyika isafarira kudzokera kumusha. Vanoti panguva yose yavanoshanyira kumusha, kushaikwa kwemari hakunyanye kuvatambudza nekuti vanenge vakagadzirira nguva dzose. VaMadziva vanoti pari zvino ivo nemhuri yavo havangakwanise kudzokera kumusha. Vazhinji vatakurukura navo varatidza kuti havasi kuzokurumidza kudzokera kumusha vamwe nekuda kwekudhura kwezvinhu muzvitoro, kushaikwa kwemabasa nezvimwe. No media source currently available

headline: Kusagadzirisa Zvipatara Ndiko Kunonzi Kwakapa Kuti VaMugabe neVamwe Vatungamiri veAfrica Vafire Kunze
text: Vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika muchakabvu Robert Mugabe vakashaya kuSingapore vachirapwa chirwere chegomarara muna 2018 vari kurangarirwa zvakasiyana nevana veZimbabwe nevekunze. VaMugabe vakaita sevamwe vatungamiri vemuAfrica vanoenda kunorapwa nekufira kunze kwenyika dzavo vanosanganisira vaive mutungamiri wenyika yeZambia, VaMichael Sata vakafira kuLondon, vaive mutungamiri wenyika iyi zvekare VaLevy Mwanawasa vakashaikira kuFrance, mutungamiri wehurumende yeEthiopia VaMeles Zenawi vakashaikira kuBelgium, VaOmar Bongo vekuGabon vakashaikira kuSpain nevamwe. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachidzidzisa paFriends University kuKansas Dr Moses Rumano vaudza Studio 7 kuti veruzhinji vanorangarira VaMugabe zvakasiyana siyana sezvo kune rimwe divi vane mabasa avakabata akasimudzira nyika senyaya yedzidzo nenyaya yekupa ivhu kuvatema kunyengwe hazvo chirongwa ichi chisina kunyatso itwa zvakanaka. Kune rimwe divi vanorangarirwa semutongi aitonga nedemo uye asina kugadzirisa zvinhu zvakadayi sezvipatara nehupfumi hwenyika zvakazokonzera kuti vasarapwe munyika nevana vavakapa dzidziso yepamusoro, "Zvinosiririsa kuti VaMugabe vakazoshaikira kuSingapore, dai vakange vakagadzirisa zvipatara panguva yehutongi hwavo vakarapirwa munyika vachipepwa nevana vevhu avo vakapa dzidzo yakanaka asi ikazoparadzwa nehuwori nehutongi husiri wejeketrere," Dr Rumano vaudza Studio 7. No media source currently available Vamwe vemhuri yavo vaudza Studio 7 kuti Amai Grace Mugabe nevana vavo vari kuSingapore kwakashaikira VaMugabe parizvino vachivarangarira.

headline: Musangano weUNGA Unozeya Nzara Pamwe neHutano
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmeron Mnangagwa vanyora neChishanu padandemutande ravo reTwitter vachiti musangano wavo wekutanga kuUnited Nations General Assembly muNew York wakafamba zvakanaka chose. Asi zviri kubuda kuUnited Nations zviri kuratidza kuti zvinhu zvakaomera sangano iri, uye pane nyaya dzehutano nezvekudya Zimbabwe inofanira kusunga dzisimbe. VaMnangagwa vanoti chinangwa chavo chaive chekuti Zimbabwe itange kudyidzana nedzimwe nyika uye kuti vatungamiri venyika idzi vashanyirewo Zimbabwe. Kunze kwevatungamiri ava, VaMnangagwa vanoti vakasanganawo nevemabhizimisi kuti vauye kuzotanga mabhizimisi muZimbabwe zvikuru vekuAmerica. VaMnangagwa vanoti misangano yavo yakafamba zvakanaka uye Zimbabwe yadzokera mugungano renyika dzepasi rino. Zimbabwe yakaonawo mupupuriri akanaka kubva kumutungamiri weRwanda, VaPaul Kagame, vanove sachigaro weAfrican Union. Mumashoko avo kuUnited Nations, VaKagame vakati Zimbabwe inoda rubatsiro kubva kunyika dzepasi rino. Asi vachitaura kumucheto wemusangano uyu, munyori anoona nezvekudyidzana nenyika dzemuAfrica muhurumende yeAmerica, VaTibor Nagy, vakati Zimbabwe inofanira kuvandudza mitemo yakaita saana AIPPA nanaPOSA uye vakati Zimbabwe inoziva zvairi kuda kunzi iite kuti itange kudyidzana neAmerica. KuUnited Nations kuri kubudawo nyaya yekuti zvinhu munyaya dzekurwisa chirwere cherurindi kana kuti TB haina kumira zvakanaka. Mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru weUnited Nations, Amai Anna Mohammed, vakanoti pagore, mari yekurwisa chirwere ichi iri kushomeka nemari inosvika mabhiriyoni gumi nematatu. Zimbabwe pari zvino iri kutatarika kuwana mari yekutenga mapiritsi ekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Rimwe dambudziko riri kubudawo kumusangano weUnited Nations inyaya yekuti vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni mazana masere nemakumi maviri nemumwe kana kuti munhu mumwe chete pavapfumbamwe anoziya nenzara. Vakawanda vakatarisana nenzara kunyanya muAfrica neSouth America. Nzara inonzi yatove nemakore matatu ichiwedzera. MuZimbabwe vanhu mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mana vakatarisana nenzara gore rinouya nekuda kwemhepo yeEl Nino iri kutarisirwa kukanganisa kunaya kwemvura. Musangano weUnited Nations uyu uri kupera musi wa 5 Gumiguru vatungamiri venyika vachitaura mudare reUnited Nations General Assembly uye vamwe vachiitawo misangano kumucheto wemusangano mukuru uyu. Imwewo nyaya yakasimudzwa kumusangano uyu ndeyezvinotarisirwa neUnited Nations kuti zviitwe nevechidiki. Munyori mukuru weUnited Nations VaAntonio Guterres vanoti vanoda kuti sangano ravo risimbaradze kushanda nevechidiki avo vanosvika bhiriyoni imwe chete mazana masere emamiriyoni pasi rose. Kuita izvi, VaGuterres vanoti kodzero dzevechidiki dzinofanira kuremekedzwa uye vachiwaniswa mikana. No media source currently available

headline: ZEC Yotanga Kunyoresa Vanhu Kuti Vavhote Ichienda Pedyo neMisha Yavo
text: Sangano rinoona nezvesarudzo munyika reZimbabwe Electoral Commission ratanga chirongwa chekunyoresa vavhoti munharaunda dzavagere. Ongororo yakaitwa neStudio 7 inoratidza kuti vanhu vashoma ndivo vange vachinyoresa kuvhota. Pakashanyirwa imwe yenzvimbo dziri kunyoresa vavhoti neStudio 7 paTown House muHarare kwemaawa maviri hakuna akanyoresa kuvhota uye munhu mumwe akuya akanga achida kutarisa kuti zita rakerange richiri mugwaro revavhoti. Mumwe wevechidiki akanyoresa kuvhota akangoda kuzivikanwa nekuti Rumbidzai ati zvamuitira nyore chose kunyoresa sezvo awana pasina vanhu. VaTawanda Magunje vakatiwo vaenda kunonyoresa kumusha weHighfield mushure mekunge vapihwa dzidziso nebato ravo reZanu PF. Mumwe anorarama nekutengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa asina kuda kudomwa nezita akatiwo haana chaange arikuziva nezvenyaya yechirongwa cheZEC chekufamba kunzvimbo dzinowanda vanhu vachinyoresa vavhoti. ZEC iri kuita chirongwa chekunyoresa kuvhota ichi nyika yese kusvika musi wa28 Kukadzi. Harare nemusi weChipiri yainge iine nzvimbo dzekunyoresa makumi matatu neimwe. Amai Fiona Kurima vanove mukuru weZEC mudunhu reHarare vakaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyangwe hazvo vange vasina huwandu hwevakanyoresa, pazuva rekutanga kazhinni, vashoma ndivo vanoenda kunonyoresa. Vakatiwo ZEC yakatanga kudzidzisa vanhu nezvekuuya kwechirongwa ichi muHarare nemusi wa30 Ndira. Vakatiwo chirongwa ichi ndechekungonyoresa kuvhota pamwe neavo vanoda kuchinja kwekuvhotera uye havasi kubatsira vanoda kutarisa mazita avo kuti arimo here mugwaro revavhoti. Vatiwo veZEC vachange vachifamba nzvimbo dzakasiya siyana pamazuva akatarwa aya. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri weZEC Amai Leticia Kazembe kuti tinzwe huwandu hwevanyoresa kuvhota muzuva rekutanga. Asi ZEC inoti vari kunyoresa ava havakwanisi kuvhota musarudzo dzemaby-elections muna Kurume asi vanokwanisa kuvhita muna 2023. No media source currently available

headline: Munhu Mumwe Anofa muHarare neChirwere cheTyphoid
text: Munhu mumwe chete anonzi akafa nechirwere che typhoid, vamwe makumi maviri nevatatu vachinzi vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva pakatanga kuonekwa chirwere ichi muHarare mwedzi wapera. Munhu mumwe chete anonzi akafa nechirwere che typhoid, vamwe makumi maviri nevatatu vachinzi vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva pakatanga kuonekwa chirwere ichi muHarare mwedzi wapera. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti kunyange hazvo kanzuru yavo iri kuita zvose zvainokwanisa mukudzivirira kupararira pamwe nekupedza chirwere ichi, iri kushushikanawo nekukwira kwehuvandu hwevanhu vabatwa nacho. “Sekanzuru tinoti tine hurombo nekurasikirwa kwehupenyu kwakaitwa nemugari akashaya uyu, uye kuramba huwandu hwevanhu huchikwira,” VaChideme vanodaro. Chirwere ichi chakatanga kuonekwa mwedzi wapera mumisha inogara veruzhinji inoti Glen Norah, Glen View, Budiriro, Hatfield neHopley, uye chinokonzerwa nekunwa mvura isina kuchena kanawo kudya chikafu chine tsvina. VaChideme vanoti kanzuru yavo iri kuita zvose zvainogona kuti idzidzise veruzhinji nezvenzira dzavanofanirwa kutevera kuti chirwere ichi chisaramba chichipararira, uye mapoka ose ekanzuru akatotanga kutora matanho ekudzivirira kupararira kwacho. Vanoti matanho atorwa nekanzuru yavo anosanganisira kugadzirira zvakakwana kwemapazi ekanzuru akaita serekutakurwa kwemarara pamwe nekuona kuti vanhu vawaniswa mvura yekunwa yakachena. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vanoti Vave Kufa neNzara Vari Mudzimba
text:
Vanhu mudunhu reMashonaland West vane maonero akasiyana zvikuru padanho rehurumende rekuti vagare mudzimba kwemamwe mavhiki maviri senzira yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus. Amai Judith Chikwari avo vanorarama nekutenga nekutengesa mbatya vanoti vave kufanenzara mudzimba sezvo vasiri kutengesa kuti vawane zvekudya.

Amai Chikwari vanoti VaMnangagwa vangadai varerutsa nguva dzekuvhura kuti vatenge zvinogona kupa kuti vatenge zvekudya.

Izvi zvatsigirwa naVaTavengwa Kamuchokoto vekuKadoma avo vasingaone vanorarama nekupemha vanoti rwendo rwuno Mwari avaseke sezvo vari kutadza kuwana ruyamuro kunyange kubva kubazi reSocial Welfare. Asi gurukota rinona nezvemagariro evanhu Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vanoti hurumende iri kupa vanhu mazana maviri emadhora pamwedzi kuti vabatsirikane mari inonzi nevamwe ishoma zvikuru. No media source currently available Sachigaro weboka revadzidzisi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe-PTUZ- mudunhu reMashonaland West VaWeston Mutapa vanoti vatambira kuwedzerwa kwemazuva nemufaro sezvo hupenyu hwevadzidzisi nevadzidzi hwanga huri parumananzombe dai vadzokera kuzvikoro
parizvino. VaMutapa vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kutora nguva yavawedzera kuvharwa kwenyika kugadzirira vadzidzisi kuti vawane zvipfeko nemishonga yekuderedza hutachiona hwecoronavirus kana vave kudzokera kumabasa.

Munyori mukuru muboka guru rinomirira vashandi munyika reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Union-ZCTU- VaJaphet Moyo vanoti vafarawo dedanho ratorwa naVaMnangagwa sezvo hupenyu hwevanhu hwakakosha kudarika hupfumi vachiti kana munhu afa hapasisina zvekuita.

Asi VaMoyo vanoti havasi kufara nemari inoita madhora mazana maviri ari kupihwa pamunhu kuti vanhu abastirikane nebazi rezvemagariro evanhu panguva iyo nyika inenge yakavharwa vachiti ishoma zvikuru.

Mumiriri weNorton muparamende VaTemba Mliswa vanoti pamusoro pekuwedzera mazuva ekuvhara nyika mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanofanirwa kuona kuti motokari dzose dzinotakura zvinhu kunze kwenyika dzichipfuura nemuno munyika dzimbomira. Vatiwo vashandi vakaita sanamukoti nemapurisa vanoshanda vachisangana nevanhu vangangodaro vaine chirwere cheCoronavirus havafanirwe kushanda vachibva kumba asi kuti vatsvagirwe nzvimbo dzekugara.

VaMnangagwa vakawedzera mazuva nyika yakavharwa kusvika musi wa3 Chivabvu nekuda kwekuti nyika haisati yazadzisa zvinokurudzirwa nebazi rezvehutano muUnited Nations reWorld Health Organisations kana kuti WHO-kuti nyika ivhurwe vachiti huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 huri kuramba huchikwira munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Nyaya yaVaMugabe Yogara Yakazeyiwa Nguva Dzose
text: No media source currently available Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dziri kunze kwenyika dziri kugara dzakatarisa zviri kuitika muZanu PF, umo mune hurongwa hwekubvisa mutungamiri webato iri, VaRobert Mugabe. Musangano weCentral Committee yeZanu PF uri kuzeya nyaya yekudzinga VaMugabe mubato. Kana VaMugabe vakadzingwa, bato iri riri kubva rasarudza munhu achafanobata matomu kudzamara bato iri raenda kukongiresi. Mashoko atiri kutambira anotiwo VaMugabe vari kutarisirwa kusangana nevakuru vemauto. Hapana mashoko ati aburitswa anoratidza kuti musangano uyu ndeweyi. Nhengo yeZanu PF muWashington, VaFrenk Guni, vanoti sebato vakatora danho rekudzinga VaMugabe nokuti vakange voisa zvido zvemudzimai wavo mberi. Ukuwo sachigaro weMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, VaDen Moyo, vanoti VaMugabe neZanu PF hazvisisina remangwana.

headline: VaZuma Voendeswa kuMatare
text: Masangano maviri ezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe aendesa kudare repamusoro muSouth Africa mutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaJacob Zuma, achida kuti vadzike mutemo wechimbichimbi nekutonga nemauto kana kuti State of Emmergency munzvimbo dzaberekera ingwe muSouth Africa. Nzvimbo idzi, Durban neJohannesburg dzanga dziine mhirizhonga iri kuitwa kune zvizvarwa zvekunze nezvizvarwa zvemuSouth Africa. Masangano eZimbabwe Exiles Forum neBlack Business Forum Zimbabwe akakwidza nyaya iyi kudare repamusoro muSouth Africa sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remutemo wenyika iyi. Masangano aya anoda kuti hurumende yeSouth Africa isungewo mambo wevanhu verudzi rweZulu, Goodwill Zwelithini, nemwanakomana waVaZuma, Edward, avo vanonzi vakapesvedzera mhirizhonga. Asi muzvinafundo munyaya dzemitemo, uye vari mutungamiri we National Constitutional Assembly, VaLovemore Madhuku, vanoti zvinonetsa zvikuru panyaya yakadai kuti matare ati VaZuma vasungirwe kuita zviri kudiwa nemasangano aya. VaMadhuku vanoti masangano aya anofanira kuva nehumbowo hwakasimba nekuti matare kazhinji haadi kuonekwa achipindira munyaya dzekutongwa kwenyika. Mashoko aVaMadhuku atsinhirwawo nerimwe gweta, VaTerrence Hussein, avo vati matare anowanzoita pfungwa dzekuti kana vanhu vasarudza mutungamiri wenyika, vanenge vaine chivimbo nematanho aanotora munguva dzakaoma nekudaro vanowanzogeza maoko sapirato panyaya dzine chekuita nemutungamiri wenyika. Asi rimwe gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, uye vari chipangamazano musangano re Human Rights Watch, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti masangano aya anogona kubudirira nekuti VaZuma vakaita hwakamba vachinonoka kugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Munyori musangano reBlack Business Forum Zimbabwe, VaWashington Mehlomakulu, vanoti hurumende yeSouth Africa haisi kutevedzera bumbiro remitemo mukupedza mhirizhonga iri munyika iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chopona Nepasaka reShumba kuSouth Africa Mushure Mekutemwa neDemo
text: Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe VaImmanuel Zinja vanoti vanotenda Mwari kuti vachiri vapenyu mushure mekuda kupondwa kwavakaitwa kunzvimbo yeBredasdorp kuWestern Cape mavhiki apfura nezvizvarwa zvemuSouth Africa zvainge zvapihwa mvumo yekuratidzira murunyararo nemapurisa asi zvikazotanga mhirizhonga. VaZinja vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakapona nepaburi retsono mushure mekutemwa nedemo mumusoro nemhomho yevairatidzira ichiti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvidzokere kumusha kwazvo sezvo zvainge zvotorera zvizvarwa zveSouth Africa mabasa. VaZinja vanoti vakaenda kuSouth Africa mugore ra 2014 umo vange vachiita basa rekutema huni vakazotora mudzimai wavo kuti auye kuzogara vano. Vanoti mudzimai wavo uyu akazvitakura parizvino. Vaenderera mberi vachiti vamwe vana vavo vari kuZimbabwe uye vari kutsvaga rubatsiro rwekuti vadzokere kumusha sezvo basa rakapera uye vave kurwara.

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe kuCanada Zvoronga Kuendesa Tsamba yeNyunyuto kuUnited Nations
text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muCanada zvinoti zviri kuronga kuratidzira uye kuendesa tsamba yenyunyuto kumunyori mukuru weUnited Nations VaBan Ki Moon. Mumwe wevari kuronga kuratidzira uku ndi Muzvare Francisca Mandeya avo vanoti vachabatana nevamwe munyika iyi neMugovera voenda kunoratidzira kumuzinda weZimbabwe. Muzvare Mandeya vanoti parizvino vave nezviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zviri kunyunyuta uye kuisa ruoko rwazvo patsamba iri kuda kuendeswa kuUnited Nations. ​Muzvare Mandeya vanoti vanoita zvekuimba. Vanoti vanoita nezvezvinhu zvavanosangana nazvo muhupenyu hwavo. Muzvare Mandeya vanoti vanobatwa moyo nemabatirwo anoita madzimai anenge akazvitakura muzvipatara zvemuZimbabwe. "Ndanga ndisingazive kuti ndine chipo chekuimba kusvika ndasangana nematambudziko mukurarama zvakandiita kuti ndinyore nzimbo nekuimba," Muzvare Mandeya vaudza Studio 7. Zvichakadaro, zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muNew York zviri kutarisira kuratidzira pamuzinda weZimbabwe uri munzvimbo iyi nemusi weChina. Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muAmerica zviri kutarisirwa kuratidzira zvekare pamuzinda we Zimbabwe muWashington pakupera kwemwedzi uno. Vanoda kuziva nezve petition tarisai pano. https://www.change.org/p/ban-ki-moon-secretary-general-of-the-united-nations-protect-zimbabweans-pursuing-their-liberation-thisflag?recruiter=575197&utm_source=petitions_share&utm_medium No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Voenzanisa Kubvutwa kweMasimba neMauto kuMali neZvakaitika muZimbabwe 2017
text: Vanhu vakawanda muAfrica nepasi rose vari kutevera nemaziso matsvuku zviri kuitika munyika yeMali, uko mauto akabvisa mutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaIbrahim Boubacar Keita, pachigaro nemusi weChipiri uye kumusunga pamwechete nemutungamiri wehurumende yake VaBoubou Cisse nemamwe makurukota ehurumende. Izvi zvinonzi zvakatanga mushure mekunge chikwata chemauto chakatora nechisimba akamba yemauto ye Kati iri makiromita gumi nemashanu kubva muguta guru renyika iyi re Bamako. Mauto aya akazofora achipinda muguta guru umo akasvikosunga mutungamiri wenyika nevamwe vake pamwe nekuumanikidza kuti asiye basa. VaKeita vakabuda panhepfenyuro yenyika iyi vachizivisa kuti vakanga vosiya basa senzira yekudzivirira kudeuka kweropa. Masangano akawanda kusanganisira sangano rinoona nezvekugadzikana munyika dzepasi rose reUnited Nations Security Council, European Union, sangano reAfrican Union, pamwe nere Economic Community of West African States (Ecowas) iro Mali iri nhengo akatozivisa nezvekusatambira kwawo kubvutwa kwemasimba uku nemauto. Sangano reAfrican Union neChitatu rakamisa Mali kuve nhengo yesangano iri nekuda kwechiitiko ichi. Gurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muAmerica, VaMike Pompeo vakazivisawo kuti nyika yavo iri kubatana nemasangano eAfrican Union neECOWAS mukushoropodza zvakaitika neChipiri muMali. Sachigaro veAfrican Union vari mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, vakakurudzirawo kudzoserwa kwehutongo hweveruzhinji nekukasika. Mutungamiri weFrance, VaEmmanuel Macron vakakurudzirawo kudzoswa kwehutongo hwejekerere munyika iyi. Pave nemaonero akasiyanasiyana pakubvutwa kwemasimba mu Mali nemauto nekubvutwawo kwemasimba nemauto muZimbabwe, vamwe vachiti masangano ari kubuda paachena achishoropodza zviri kuitika kuMali aifanirwa kuita zvimwechete muZimbabwe muna 2017, apo mauto akabvisa vaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe pachigaro pamwe nekuvamanikidza kusiya chiogaro. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vachitungamira bato reDemocratic Party, Doctor Urayayi Zembe, vanoti pane kufanana kezvakaitika kuMali nezvakaitika muZimbabwe muna 2017, zvikuru panyaya yehuwori nekubirwa kwesarudzo. Vanoti zviviri izvi zvakafanana uye ndizvo zvakasimudza kuti munyika mbiri idzi mauto atungamire mukubviswa kwehutungamiri. Asi Doctor Zembe vanoti musiyano uripo chete ndewekuti muZimbabwe veruzhinji vakapinda mumigwagwa mushure mekuridzirwa huwi nemauto pamwe nevesangano revakarwa hondo yerusununguko kuti vanhu vauye vatsigireVaMugabe vabve pachigaro. Izvi zvinotsinhirwa nevanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, Doctor Simba Mavaza, avo vanoti vanhu vari kuenzanisa Zimbabwe neMali havasi kunzwisisa zvakaitika. Vanoti nyaya yekuMali inyaya yemauto akabvisa mutungamiri pachigaro isina vanhu mukati uye paramende yeMali haina kugara kuti itorere matanho mutungamiri wenyika, VaKeita kuti vadzingwe kana kuti varegedze basa sezvakaitika muZimbabwe. Doctor Mavaza vanoti VaMugabe vakabviswa pachigaro nebato ravo, iro rakazoshevedza vaive mutewedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti vadzoke munyika mushure mekunge vatizira kuSouth Africa. Vanotiwo VaMugabe havana kumbobvira vasungwa nemauto sezvakaitika kuMali uko VaKeita vakaiswa muhusungwa nemauto. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari Vodyira Marasha Kanzuru yeHarare
text: Rimwe sangano rinomirira vagari vemuHarare, reHarare Residents Trust, rinoti rakaendesa nemusi weChipiri gwaro renyunyuto kukanzuru yeguta reHarare pamusoro pemitero ya 2021, iyo rinoti iri pamusoro uye iri kuremera vagari sezvo vachinzi vaibhadhare ichitangira musi wa 01 Ndira 2021. Gwaro iri, iro rinonzi rakasainwa nevagari vanodarika zviuru zvishanu, avo vari kunyunyuta kuti vazhinji vave kumanikidzwa kubhadhara mari dziri pakati pemadhora emari yekuAmerica makumi mana kuvagari vekumisha yeveruzhinji, nemadhora makumi manomwe kusvika kuzana kuvagarai vari kumisha yevashoma pamwedzi. Mukuru weHarare Residents Trust, VaPrecious Shumba, vanoti mitero iri kubhadhariswa vagari nekanzuru yeHarare haikwanisike, haina kukodzera uye inotowedzera matambudziko agara aine vagari ari kukonzerwa neCovid-19 sezvo vazhinji vasati vave kukwanisa kushanda zvizere. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna meya weHarare, VaStewart Mutizwa, sezvo vasati vapindura mibvunzo yedu yatavatumira pamusoro penyaya iyi. Ngatinzweyi hurukuro yaitwa naJonga Kandemiiri weStudio 7 naVaShumba. No media source currently available

headline: South Africa neAmerica Dzoronga Kudzika Mitemo Inochengetedza Mabasa eZvizvarwa Zvadzo
text: Bato reANC muSouth Africa rinonzi riri kuronga kuti padzikwe mutemo unoderedza huwandu hwevanhu vekunze vanenge vachishanda munyika iyi. Vachitaura nevatori venhau nemusi weMuvhuro, munyori mukuru webato reANC, VaGwede Mantashe, vanonzi vakati bato ravo rakabuda nechisungo chekuti zvizvarwa zvemuSouth Africa hazvingarambi zvichitorerwa mabasa nevekunze. Bato iri rinonzi richazeya zvakare nyaya yekutorwa kwemabasa nevekunze iyi kumusangano waro mukuru uchaitwa muna Zvita gore rino, uko kunotarisirwa kuti hurongwa hwekuti pave nemutemo wakadai hunogona pasiswa zvisina dambudziko. Kana mutemo uyu ukabudirira, zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zvinonzi zvinogona kurasikirwa nemabasa, zvikuru mumakambani anoita zvekuvaka, zvekubika zvekudya pamwe nemumapurazi. Asi vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reZimbabwe Exiles Forum, Muzvare Diana Zimbudzana, vanoti havazivi kuti chiri kukurudzirwa neANC chitsva chii, sezvo pagara paine mutemo nechekare wekuti makambani anosungirwa kupinza vekunze vangani mabasa. Zvichakadaro, mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, vazivisa nezvebhiri remutemo uri kuronga kudzikwa, uyo uchaderedza huwandu hwevanhu vanopinda vachizogara munyika iyi zviri pamutemo. Mukutanga kwegore rino maseneta maviri anoti VaTom Cotton naVaDavid Pardue vakaparura mutemo unogona kudimura huwandu hwevanhu vanopinda vachigara kubva pamiriyoni imwe chete kuenda pamazana mashanu ezviuru pagore roga-roga. Bhiri iri, iro risati rapinda mudare reseneti, riri kukurudzirawo kuderedzwa kwemhuri dzemunhu anopinda muAmerica semushandi, kumisa chirongwa chekuhwinhisa vanhu mavhiza ekunogara muAmerica che diversity visa lottery, uyewo kuomesa nzira dzekuwana nadzo mvumo yekushanda kuburikidza ne “green card”. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoti Pane Mapurisa Asungwa neMhosva yeKurova Zvakaipisisa Nhengo yeCCC iri muHusungwa
text: Bazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko razivisa nhasi kuti pane mapurisa asungwa nenyaya yekushungurudzwa pamwe nekutochwa zvakaipisisa kwenhengo yebato reCitizens’ Coalition for Change, VaGodfrey Chidhau Karembera, avo vanozivikanwa saMadzibaba veShanduko, vari mumaoko emapurisa. Bazi iri razivisa nezvekusungwa kwemapurisa uku kuburikidza nemashoko aiswa padandemutande reTwitter, kunyange hazvo risina kutaura kuti mapurisa mangani asungwa uye risina kuburitsa mazita avo, uye rati richazivisa ruzhinji zvimwe zvinenge zvawanikwa mukuferefetwa kuri kuitwa. VaKarembera vakaudza Studio 7 manheru eChina kuti vakasungwa vachitozvifambira zvavo muHarare, vachibva vakandwa mumotokari yaive isina nhamba ndokuendeswa kukamba yemapurisa yeHarare Central Police Station, uko vakasvikooneswa chitsvuku vachirohwa nekushungurudzwa. Vakati mapurisa aivarova pasi petsoka nekumusana vakatsikwa mutsipa vachinzi mushure mekurohwa uku vakanga vasingazofi zvakare vakapfeka gemenzi ravo reruvara rwe yellow, rwunove ruvara rwebato reCitizens' Coalition for Change. Mapurisa akazivisa kuti VaKarembera vaipomerwa mhosva yekutsvaga rutsigiro mukati meguta zviri kunze kwemutemo uye kutuka mapurisa. Asi neChishanu mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vaudza bepanhau reHerald kuti VaKarembera vakasungwa mushure mekunge vawanikwa vachida kukanganisa chiumbwa chaMbuya Nehanda chiri muHarare, icho vanoti chakachengetedzwa. Asi gweta ravo, VaDouglas Colart, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanga vasati vaziviswa nezvemhosva itsva iyi uye vari kutoshamiswa kunzwa mashoko aya. VaColtart vatiwo vanga vasati vaudzwa kuti VaKarembera vachaendeswa kudare redzimhosva here kana kuti kwete uye riinhi? Mutungamiri weCitizens’ Coalition for Change, VaNelson Chamisa, vanonzi shanyira 'Madzibaba veShanduko' kuchipatara cheParirenyatwa uko kwavari kurapwa vakachengetedzwa nemapurisa. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weCCC, VaOstalos Gift Siziba, vanoti VaChamisa vatora danho iri sezvo tsika dzebato ravo reveruzhinji reCitizens Coalition for Change dzichiti vanokoshesa nyaya yekubatana nevanhu vavo. Vanotiwo VaChamisa vataura mashoko akanangana nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa ekuti vanosungirwa nebumbiro remitemo kuti munyika muve nekugadzikana nerunyararo, uye kuti vamise mhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika. No media source currently available

headline: Makakatanwa eZita reMDC-T Otsviriridza Pakati paVaChamisa naMuzvare Khupe
text: Zvikwata zviviri zveMDC-T zviri kurwira kushandisa zita rekuti MDC-T zvapinda parumana nzombe zvichitevera danho ratorwa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission rekuti hapana bato riri kuzobvumidzwa kuti rive nevanhu vanodarika mumwe chete vachakwikwidza musarudzo pachinzvimbo chimwe chete. Vachitaura neStudio7 pamuzinda weZimbabwe Electoral Commission, kana kuti ZEC, sachigaro wekomisheni iyi, Amai Priscilla Chigumba, vati hapana bato richabvumidzwa kuisa vanhu vaviri kana kudarika kuti vakwikwidze pachinzvimbo chimwe chete. Izvi zvinouya apo MDC-T inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa iri kurwisana nechimwe chikwata chiri kutungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe panyaya yekushandisa zita rekuti MDCT. Mutevedzeri wasachigaro muMDC-T inotungamirwa naVaChamisa, VaMorgen Komichi, vati sebato vatotora matanho akawanda anosanganisira kuenda kumatare kuitira kuti vacherechedzwe nezita rekuti MDC-T. Asi mutauriri weMDC-T iri kutungamirwa naMuzvare Khupe, VaObert Gutu, vati vacharwa semvumba kuti varambe vachishandisa zita iri. Kusawirirana pakati paVaChamisa naMuzvare Khupe kwakatanga pakafa vaimbova mutungamiri webato iri VaMorgan Tsvangirai muna Kukadzi mushure mekurwara nechirwere chegomarara. VaChamisa ndivo vakasarudzwa nekomiti yepamusoro-soro mubato iri pakati pemakongiresi yeNational Council kuti vave mutungamiri webato zvichitevera kushaya kwaVaTsvangirai. Asi Muzvare Khupe vanoti ndivo vakafanobata matomhu emutungamiri webato vakamirira kuti paitwe kongiresi yekutsvaga mutungamiri mutsva sezvo VaTsvangirai vakaenda kwamupfiganebwe vachiti ndizvo zvinotaura bumbiro ravo remitemo. Muzvare Khupe nevamwe vavo vari kuita kongiresi yavo musi wa 21 Kubvumbi vachiti vari kutevedza zvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo. Asi VaChamisa nevamwe vavo vakaramba kuenda kukongiresi vachiti hapana nguva yekuita izvi sezvo nyika yatarisana nesarudzo. No media source currently available

headline: VeMabhizimisi Voramba Kudzikisa Mitengo Sezviri Kudiwa neHurumende
text: Kunyangwe hazvo hurumende yakapa kurudziro yekuti mitengo yezvinhu zvakawanda zvinodyiwa nevanhu idzikiswe kusvika payaive musi wa25 kurume, izvi zvinenge zviri kukona n’anga murapwa achida. Mitengo yezvinhu haisi kudzika. Hatina kukwanisa kubata vamwe vakuru veConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries kana Zimabwe National Chamber of Commerce tinzwe divi ravo. Asi gurukota rezvemaindustry Doctor Sekai Nzenza vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kushushikana nekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu vakati pamisangano yavakaita nevamwe vemabhizimisi vakatenderana kuti mitengo yezvinhu idzikiswe. Vatenda havo kuti vemabhizimisi varik kuti vari kuremerwawo nezvinhu kunyanya mari yekunze yekutenga zvinhu. No media source currently available Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vanodzidzisa paNelson Mandela Metropolitan University vanoti zvekuda kutara mitengo yezvinhu hazvishande uye zvichatopa kuti zvinhu zvishaikwe muzvitoro. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano rePTUZ Ronyunyuta neKunyoreswa Mafomu Kwarinoti Kuri kuitwa Varairidzi neHurumende
text: Rimwe sangano rinomirira varairidzi, reProgressive Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, rinoti harisi kufara nedanho rarinoti riri kutorwa nehurumende rekumanikidza varairidzi kunyora mafomu arinoti ari kuda kushandiswa mukubata mari dzekufambisa zvitoro zvemauto kana kuti garrison shops. Mutungamiri wePTUZ, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti vakuru vezvikoro, zvikuru mudunhu reMasvingo, vari kumanikidza varairidzi kuzadzisa mafomu aya vachiisa nhamba dzavo dzezvitupa, pamwe nemazita avo vachiudzwa kuti zvichazovabatsira kuti vapiwe makuponi ekutenga zvinhu muzvitoro zvemauto izvi. Doctor Zhou vanoti kunyange hazvo hurumende yakati ichaisa zvitoro mumakamba emauto, haina kujekesa kuti mari yacho ichabve, panguva iyo yakati ichaumba homwe yekubatsira vashandi nemari. Hurumende yakati homwe iyi ichaumbwa nemari inoita zvikamu zviviri nezviga zvishanu kubva muzana (2.5 percent) zvichabatirwa vashandi vehurumende vanoda zvavo kupinda muchirongwa ichi. Asi Doctor Zhou vanoti hapana mushandi achapinda muchirongwa ichi sezvo vashandi vari kutotambura nechakare, izvo zvave kuita kuti hurumende iite chitsotsi ichi. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata mukuru wezvedzidzo mudunhu reMasvingo, VaZedius Chitiga sezvo nhare yavo yanga isiri kudairwa. Asi Doctor Zhou vanoti vari kukurudzira nhengo dzavo kuti dzirambe kunyora mafomu aya. No media source currently available

headline: Mutori weNhau, Hopewell Chin'ono, Oramba Ari Muhusungwa
text: Mutori wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira, Hopewell Chin’ono, akamiswa pamberi pedare ramejasitiriti nemusi weMugovera akasawaniswa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso izvo zvapa kuti apedze wikendi ari mutirongo. Mutori wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira, Hopewell Chin’ono, akamiswa pamberi pedare ramejasitiriti nemusi weMugovera akasawaniswa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso izvo zvapa kuti apedze wikendi ari mutirongo. Chin’ono akasungwa nemusi weChishanu achipomerwa mhosva yekuburitsa manyepo anonzi nehurumende anosvibisa zita rayo. Hurumende inoti Chin’ono akanyora mashoko asiri echokwadi padandemutande rake reTwitter. Muchuchisi wenyaya iyi, Muzvare Faith Nyamutowa, vakaudza dare kuti Chin’ono akanyora padandemutande rake reTwitter kuti pane mupurisa akarova mwana nemboma akafa muHarare svondo rapera iye achiziva kuti mashoko aya haasi echokwadi. Mashoko akaburitswa nemutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, mazuva mashoma adarika, anoti mwana uyu akanoongororwa nanachiremba mushure mekunge mapurisa apwanya mahwindo ekombi yevaiva nemwana uyu namai vake akati mwana uyu haana kufa kana kukuvara kunyange hazvo vhidhiyo yaitenderedzwa nevanhu pa indaneti yaiti mwana uyu akafa. Chin’ono akaudza Studio 7 kuti ari kushungurudzwa nehurumende nekuti ari kuburitsa nyaya dzehuori. Muzvare Nyamutowa vakati hurumende iri kupikisa kuti Chin’ono apihwe mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso vachiti Chin’ono anogona kunge aine chirwere cheCovid-19 vachiti kumugarisa mujeri kunoita kuti veruzhinji vachengetedzeke kubva kuchirwere. Izvi zvinotevera nhuna dzakasvitswa kudare nerimwe remagweta ake, VaHarrison Nkomo, avo vakati Chin’ono, uyo akange ari kuSouth Africa, akasangana nevanhu vaviri vaiva vaine chirwere cheCovid 19 uye akatozozviziva adzoka muZimbabwe. VaNkomo vakati pakasungwa Chin’ono nemusi weChishanu akanga achitogara ari pake ega sezvakatarwa nesangano reWorld Health Organization kuti munhu anenge asangana nevanhu vane chirwere cheCovid 19 vanofanira kumbozvisasamura kuruzhinji kudzamara vaongororwa kuti vane chirwere ichi here kana kuti kwete kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire. Chin’ono akati mapurisa akamusunga kunyange akavaudza kuti akanga achizvisasamura kuruzhinji. Mutongi wedare, VaLanzini Ncube, vakati Chin’ono anogara muimba yake ega kujeri uye atakurwe nemotokari isina vamwe vasungwa kuenda kujeri kuitira kuti asatapurire vashandi vekumajeri chirwere cheCovid19 ndokunge aine chirwere ichi sezvo asati aongororwa nanachiremba. VaNcube vakati Chin’ono agodzoka kudare neMuvhuro sezvo magweta ake audza dare kuti haasi kutoda kuti aiswe pa remand sezvo mhosva yaari kupomerwa isina kana gumbo rainomira naro. Vakati nekuda kwenguva yakanga yapera, vakanga vasisakwanise kunzwa zvikonzero kubva kumagweta ake sezvo matare ari kukurumidza kuvhara achitevedzera mirawu yekuvharwa kwakaitwa nyika nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid 19. Rimwe remagweta aChin’ono, VaPaidamoyo Saurombe, vakaudza Studio 7 kuti havasi kufara nezvakaturwa nedare kuti Chin’ono aendeswe kujeri asati aongororwa nanachiremba kuti ane chirwere cheCovid 19 here kana kuti kwete. Nyaya iyi yakanonoka kutanga mudare mushure mekunge vachuchisi varamba kupinda mudare vachiti vanoda kutanga vapihwa zvipfeko zvekuzvidzivirira kuCovid 19 izvo zvakaita kuti pazounzwa mahovhorosi nema gloves akazouya akapfekwa nevachuchisi. Chin’ono akambosungwa gore rapera akagara mujeri kwemazuva makumi mana nematanhatu asati apihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso pamhosva yaari kupomerwa yekukurudzira veruzhinji kuti varatidzire zvine mhirizhonga mukati. Akazosungwa zvakare achipomerwa mhosva yekuvhiringidza mafambisirwo enyaya mumatare uye nyaya dzose dziri mbiri idzi dzichiri mumatare. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoti Mitemo yeSarudzo Inoenderana neZvisungo zveSADC neAU
text: Sangano ronoongorora nyaya dzesarudzo reElection Resource Centre rakanyora tsamba kumutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, richivakurudzira kuti vaone kuti mitemo yesarudzo yagadziriswa kuti ienderane nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Mukuru wesangano iri, VaTawanda Chimhini, vati mutsamba yavo vakayeuchidza VaMnangagwa kuti zvimwe zvavari kuda kuti zvienderane nemitemo yenyika zvinhu zvavakambovaudza kare mumakore avainge vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika uye gurukota rezvemitemo. Vachipa muenzaniso mitemo inofanira kuringana nebumbiro remitemo, VaChimhini vati Zimbabwe Electoral Commission inofanira kunge yakazvimirira. Vati ZEC ikasaita mutongi gava pachaita mutauro pakuvhota. Vatiwo mutemo wenyika unoti munhu wose ane kodzero yekuvhota kusanganisira vari kunze kwenyika uye vari mumajeri, izvo vati hazvisi kuitika. Sangano reERC rakanyorawo tsamba kugurukota rezvemitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, uye mutauriri wedare reparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, vachivakurudzira kuyananisa mitemo yesarudzo nebumbiro remitemo pamberi pesarudzo dzegore rino. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kuongororwa Hutachiwana hweCoronavirus Munyika Hunoramba Huchikwira
text: Gurukota rezvehutano, Doctor Obadiah Moyo, vazivisa kuti munyika mave nevanhu vanosvika makumi manomwe nemakumi mana nemumwe vari kuongororwa kana vaine hutachiwana hwe coronavirus vanonzi vakabva kunyika dzine dambudziko rechirwere ichi. Dandemutande reTwitter rebazi rezvehutano razivisa kuti VaMoyo vataura mashoko aya pamusangano wemapazi akasiyanasiyana wekutarisa nezvegadziriro iripo pakudzivirirwa kwechirwere ichi kuti chisapararira munyika. Kanzuru yeguta reHarare inonzi yasarudzawo zvipatara zviviri zvinoti Wilkins neBeatrice Infectious Disease Hospital senzvimbo dzichashandiswa mukudzivirirwa kwechirwere ichi. Coronavirus inonzi yauraya vanhu vanosvika mazana mana nemakumi maviri nevanomwe muChina chete, kuchitiwo mumwe chete kunze kweChina, kunove kuPhilippines. Vamwe zviuru makumi maviri nemazana manomwe nevana vanonzi vabatwawo nechirwere ichi muChina chete. Studio7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvehuutano Doctor Moyo kuti tinzwe zvizhinji panyaya iyi. Asi gurukota iri rakaudza Studio7 mukupera kwesvondo kuti bazi raro rakagadzirira kurwisana nehutachiwana uhwu. Vakambove gurukota rezvehutano, uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMDC, Doctor Henry Madzorera, havaone sekunge hurumende yakagadzirira zvakakwana mukudzivirira hutachiwana uhwu sezvo vasati vambonzwa kana pave nevashandi vakadzidziswa kurwisana nedambudziko iri. Doctor Madzorera vanoti panofanirwa kutorwawo matanho akasimba ekuongorora vanopinda vachibva kunyika dzine chirwere ichi, pachiitwawo zvakare matanho ekuvarambidza kupinda muvanhu sezvo chirwere ichi chiri nyore kuparadzirwa muvanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yofunga Kutengesa Makambani Ayo
text: Hurumende inoti iri kuronga kutengesa zvikamu zvehupfumi mumakambani ayo, kana kuti ‘parastatals’. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvemari nekurongwa kwehupfumi, VaTerrence Mukupe, vanoti izvi zviri kukonzerwa nekusapinza mari kwemamwe makambani ehurumende aya. VaMukupe vanoti hurumende inogona kuenda mberi ikatengesa kambani yese kwete zvikamu zvayo chete kana zvichinge zvakakodzera. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti zvavakuda kuitwa nehurumende kuda kupa makambani aya kuvanhu vanozivikanwa kare, kana avo vanodyidzana nehurumende. Sangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions rakagara richiti makambani ehurumende aifanirwa kuitwa makambani akazvimirira kuitira kuti ashande nemazvo. VaMukupe vati kutengeswa uku kuchaitwa pachena kune ani zvake ane mari kunyange havo vachaedza kubatsira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvingada kutengawo zvikamu mukambani iyi kana kambani yose. “Pari zvino, hapana hurongwa hwekuti makambani aya ngaatengeswere vari muZimbabwe chete. Kana ave kuzoburitswa, kunokwanisa kutariswa kuti wauya uri munhu wemuZimbabwe, uri wemuno, unayo mari yako, unokwanisa kupiwa mukana nokuti uri mwana wemuZimbabwe asi chikuru ndechokuti tinoda kuti makambani aya atange kufamba,” VaMukupe vaudza Studio 7. Mamwe emakambani aya anosanganisira Air Zimbabwe, Zimbabwe Electricity Supply Authority, pamwe neNational Railways of Zimbabwe. Makambani mazhinji aya ane zvikwereti zvikuru kunyanya Air Zimbabwe iyo inonzi zvikwereti zvayo zvinosvika mazana matatu emamirioni emadhora. VaMukupe vanoti mamwe makambani akaita seZESA haagoni kutengeswa nekuti makambani akakoshera nyika nehurumende. No media source currently available

headline: Tajamuka Inoti VaMkhwananzi Vambomira Kutaurira Sangano Iri
text: No media source currently available Chikwata cheTajamuka chinoti chatambira chikumbiro chemutauriri wacho, VaPromise Mkwananzi,chekuti vambosuduruka apo nyaya dzehuwori nekusashandisa mari zvine mwero dzavari kupomerwa dziri kuongororwa. Komiti inoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muTajamuka yaita musangano muHarare neMuvhuro apo yaumba komiti ichaongorora nyaya dziri kupomerwa VaMkwananzi. VaGift Ostallos Siziba ndivo vacbata chinzvimbo chemutauriri wechikwata ichi. VaSiziba vaudza Studio 7 kuti nyaya dzaVaMkwananzi dzakatanga kubuda pamadandemutande mazuva apfuura uye komiti yadomwa iyi ichaunganidza humbowo isati yapa pfungwa dzayo kuti zvingaitwe. Zvichitevera zvainyorwa nekutaurwa pamadandemutande nedzimwe nyaya dzavaipomerwa, VaMkwananzi vakazivisa nezuro manheru kuti vainge vave kumbosuduruka kuti vagadzirise nyaya iyi. Pane zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinoti zvaibatsira Tajamuka nemari zvave kupomera VaMkwananzi mhosva yehuwori pamwe nekusashandisa mari zvine mwero. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaMkwananzi kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi sezvo vange vasiri kudaira mbozhanhare yavo. Asi vachinyora padandemutande, VaMkhwananzi vakati vari kumbomira kuita mutauriri wesangano iri zvichitevera kupomerwa kwavari kuitwa nyaya nemunhu wavati anonzi Fadziso Doyce nee Jena, kuitira kuti zita ravo risikanganise mafambiro ezvinhu muTajamuka. Munyori mukuru weMDC – T Youth Assembly mudunhu reHarare, VaDenford Ngadziore, vaudza Studio 7 kuti senhengo dzeTajamuka/Sesijikile, zvaitikika izvi hazvifaniri kudzorera basa rechikwata ichi kumashure. Vati chikwata ichi chine nhengo dzakawanda uye dzinofanira kuenderera mberi nebasa. Munyori mukuru musangano revadzidzi vemuzvikoro zvepamusoro, reZimbabwe National Students Unions, VaMakomborero Haruzivishe, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvaitika muTajamuka/Sesijikile zvakakosha uye zvinoratidza kuti kana paita nyaya, dzinofanira kuongororwa, zvisinei kuti ndiani anenge aidziita. Vati ZINASU yakapinda muTajamuka/Sesijikile nekuti vanotsigira zvinorwirwa nesangano iri. Chikwata cheTajamuka/Sesijikile icho chinove mubatanidzwa wemasangano evechidiki anorwira kodzero dzevanhu pamwe nevechidiki kubva kumapato anopikisa chakaumbwa gore rapfuura. Chikwata ichi chinorwira kuti munyika muve nehutongi hwejekerere pamwe nekuti vanhu vagare zvakanaka.

headline: Vakawanda Votarisira Kuti Hurumende Itsva Ichavandudza Hupfumi
text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zvinoti zvinotarisira kuti hurumende itsva ichagadzwa zvichitevera sarudzo dzakaitwa musi wa 30 Chikunguru gore rino ichagadzirisa nyaya yehupfumi nekukasika senzira yekurerutsa dambudziko remari riri munyika. Mumwe wevana veZimbabwe vari kukurudzira kuti hurumende ikoshese nyaya yekumutsiridzwa kwehupfumi ndaVaAudrick Chocho vekuMufakose, avo vanoti zvishuvo zvevanhu vakawanda ndezvekuti zvinhu zvireruke munyika. Mashoko aVaChocho aya anotsigirwa naVaNorman Masunda vemuHarare, avo vanoti chishuvo chavo chikuru ndechekuti hurumende ichagadzwa igadzirise hupfumi hwenyika nekukasika, zvikuru sei dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari kumabhanga. Mabhanga mazhinji emunyika ari kukundikana kuwanisa mari dzinenge dzichidiwa nevanhu vanochengetera mari dzavo kumabhanga aya panguva dzavanenge vachida mari dzavo, asi mari ichiwanikwa chero nguva pamisika mitema. Izvi zvinoshoropodzwa zvikuru naVaIbrahim Chitambo vekuBindura, avo vanokurudzira kuti nyika ive nemari yayo, kwete kushandisa yekune dzimwe nyika sezviri kuitika iye zvino. VaChitambo vanoti chimwe chinofanirwa kugadziriswa nani zvake achange achizogadzwa semutungamiri wenyika kuvhurwa kwemaindasitiri kuitira kuti vanhu vawane mabasa. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vachitungamira sangano reMedia Center, VaErnest Mudzengi, vanoti chikuru chave kudiwa munyika ndechekuti pave nekuwandudzwa kwemaitiro ehurumende inenge yapinda isiyane nemaitirwo ebasa nehurumende yakanga iripo. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti dambudziko riri muZimbabwe rinogona kutora kanguva kugadzirisa kana dai pakave nehurumende itsva. Nyika yakamira negumbo rimwe munyaya dzezvehupfumi, zvikuru sei pasati pazvikanwa kuti ndiyani achagadzwa semutungamiri wenyika mutsva pakati paVaEmmerson Mnangagwa veZanu PF, naVaNelson Chamisa veMDC Alliance zvichitevera kupikiswa naVaChamisa kwezvakabuda musarudzo yemutungmiri wenyika mushure mekunge Zimbabwe Electoral Commission yazivisa kuti VaMnangagwa ndivo vakakunda. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Vanoshamisa Veruzhinji Vachiti Vasiya Basa
text: Vange vari mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vasiya basa rekutungamira hurumende mushure mekunge vazivisa paramende kuti vasiya basa semutungamiri wenyika. VaMugabe vatora danho iri panguva iyo paramende yanga ichitora matanho ekuvapomera mhosva sezviri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika, pachishandiswa nzira ye impeachment. Mutauriri wedare reparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, vaudza nhengo dzeparamende dzanga dzaungana kuHarare International Conference Centre, kuti hurongwa hwe impeachment hwava kumiswa sezvo VaMugabe vabvuma kubva pachigaro. Gurukota rezvemutemo, VaHappyton Bonyongwe, ndivo vanonzi vatura shoko rekusiya basa kwaVaMugabe kuna VaMudenda, izvo zvinonzi VaBonyongwe vatombopengerwa nedzimwe nhengo dzeparamende dzanga dzafunga kuti vari kuda kukanganisa hurongwa hwe impeachment hwanga hwatanga. VaMugabe vasiya basa zvichitevera kupindira kwakaita mauto nemusi weChipiri svondo rapera achiti zvinhu zvanga zvaipa munyika, kusanganisira kuparara kwehupfumi munyika. Bato reZanu PF rakatobuda nechisungo chekuti vakadzingwa semutevedzeri waVaMugabe muhurumende nemuZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ndivo vari kutora basa raiitwa naVaMugabe. VaMugabe vakaberekwa musi wa 21 Kukadzi 1924 kwaKutama mudunhu reMashonaland West. Vakadzidza paKutama neku Fort Hare University kuSouth Africa, mushure vakazoshanda semurairidzi. Zanu PF yatosvitsa zita raVaMnangagwa kuti vatambirwe zviri pamutemo semutungamiri wenyika. Pasi pemitemo yenyika, VaMnangagwa vanofanirwa kutora mhiko yekuva mutungamiri wenyika achabata matomu kusvika panoitwa sarudzo gore rinouya. Muna 1963, VaMugabe vakasarudzwa semunyori mukuru webato idzva rakanga raumbwa reZimbabwe African National Union, Zanu. Vakazosarudzwa semutungamiri webato iri muna 1975, muna 1980 vakazosarudzwa kuve mutungamiri wehurumende yeZimbabwe zvichitevera kukunda kwebato ravo musarudzo. Muna 1987, vakazove mutungamiri wenyika kusvika kusiya kwavo basa neChipiri, Mbudzi 21, 2017. No media source currently available

headline: Nhengo dzeZIBAWU Dzinoratidzira paBhanga reStanbic
text: Nhengo dzeZimbabwe Banks and Allied Workers Union (ZIBAWU) dzaratidzira muHarare pabhanga reStanbic riri muna Samora Machel dzichinyunyuta nekudzvanyirirwa kwadzinoti kuri kuitwa vanhukadzi nebhanga iri. Vashandi vemumabhanga ava vanga vachinyunyuta nekudzingwa kwemumwe mushandi wechidzimai nebhanga reStanbic, Amai Verity Mutsamwira. Amai Mutsamwira vaitungamirira sangano revashandi vekuStanbic. ZIBAWU inoti ndivo vaive mukadzi wekutanga kumiririra vashandi vebhanga. Vachitaura neStudio7 apo vanga vachiratidzira, Amai Bernice Maluleke, avo vanoona nezvekuenzaniswa kwemikana pakati pevanhurume nevanhukadzi muZIBAWU,vati nhengo dzavo dziri kunyunyuta zvikuru nekumbunyikidzwa kunoitwa kodzero dzemadzimai kubanga reStanbic. Amai Maluluke vanoti Amai Mutsamwira vakadzingwa nekuda kwekuti vaimirira kodzero dzevashandi. Imwe nhengo yeZIBAWU, MuzvareRumbidzai Choto, vati kutsikirirwa kwevanhukadzi pamabasa ndozviri kukonzera kuti vanhukadzi vasawana zvigaro zvepamusoro mumapazi akasiyana-siyana munyika. Muzvare Choto vayambiro bhanga reStanbic vachiti rikasagadzirisa mabatiro ariri kuita vanhukadzi, sangano ravo richaramba richiratidzira. Mutungamiriri weZIBAWU, VaFarai Katsande, vati vanoda kuti bhanga reStanbic ridzosere Amai Mutsamwira pabasa. VaKatsande vapomerawo bhanga iri mhosva yekuramba richidzvanyarira vashandi vakati izvi zvinofanirwa kuchinja sezvo nyika yakasununguka. Vamwe vashandi vebhanga iri varamba kudomwa nemazita vati hutungamiriri hwebanga iri hauremekedzi vanhukadzi uye vanotsikirira vanhukadzi kuti vasawana hutungamiriri kana kusimukira pabasa ravo. Nhengo dzeZIBAWU idzi dzakatozoenda kumatare edzimhosva kuti vapiwe mvumo yekuratidzira mushure mekunge mapurisa avarambidza. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rebhanga iri sezvo vakuruvebanga iri vanga vasiri mumahofisi avo.

headline: Zimbabwe Yokurudzirwa Kubvuma Kuti Zvinhu Zvakaita Manyama Amire neRongo Munyika
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzerunyararo pamwe nedzematongerwo enyika dzinoti zvinhu zvicharamba zvakaita manyama amire nerongo muZimbabwe kana hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ikaramba yakaomesa musoro ichiti munyika hamuna matambudziko. Mukuru weZimbabwe Peace Project, Muzvare Jestina Mukoko, vanoti Zimbabwe haisi kuzofambira mberi kana hurumende ikaramba achiratidza kuti haisi kunzwisisa matambudziko akatarisana neveruzhinji. Muzvare Mukoko, avo vakambopambwa vakatochwa vari mumaoko ehurumende muna 2008,vanoti kunyange hazvo vari kutonga nyika vasiri kubvuma kuti zvinhu zvakaminama muZimbabwe, veruzhinji munyika vari kugara vari panyanga dzamushore. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzerunyararo, Reverend Ray Motsi, vanoti kana pasina muonera pamwe unoitwa nrvanhu vemuZimbabwe, hapana chinogadzirisika munyika. VaMotsi vanoti kunyange hurumende iri kuti munyika hamuna dambudziko, chokwadi chiripo ndechekuti veruzhinji vari kutambura zvakanyanya munyika yavo. Munyori mukuru musangano reZimbabwe Council of Churches, Reverend Kenneth Mtata, vanoti semachechi, maonero avo ndeyekuti nhaurirano ndiyo chete nzira ingagadzirise zviri kunetsa munyika. VaMtata vanotiwo zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe pachazvo, kana zvikabatana zvichiita muonera pamwe, ndizvo chete zvinogadzirisa matambudziko akasunga nyika mbiradzakondo. Mumwe muongorori wezvematongerwo enyika, Dr Tinashe Mawere, vanotiwo kana pasina kuwirirana kuti munyika mune zviri kunetsa, hapana kufambira mberi kungaite Zimbabwe senyika. Zviri kutaurwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzerunyararo zvakatsigirwawo nemizinda iri muZimbabwe yenyika huru dzinobatsira Zimbabwe munyaya dzakasiyana. Vamiriri vemizinda iyi vakaburitsa gwaro riri kushora zvikuru kutyorwa kuri kuitwa kodzero dzevanhu muZimbabwe pamwe nehuori huri kuitwa munyaya dzezvicherwa. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi, sezvo gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, vange vasingabatike panhare mbozha yavo. Asi vachipindura padanho rakatorwa nemizinda iyi, iyo inosanganisira Canada, America, Netherlands nemimwe, mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vakati nyika iyi dzinofanirwawo kuteerera zviri kutaurwa nehurumende yeZimbabwe. Sachigaro veZimbabwe Human Rights Commission, VaElasto Mugwadi, vanoti vanhu vanofanirwa kuisa misoro pamwe chete vogadzirisa zvinenge zvichinetsa munyika mavo. Komisheni yaVaMugwadi, iyo inovawo boka rakaumbwa nehurumende, rakaburitsawo mashoko enyunyuto pamusoro pekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika. Komisheni iyi yakakuridzirawo hurumende kuti iferefete nyaya dzose dzekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika. Asi hurumende inoti kunze kwedambudziko reCovid-19, hapana matambidziko ari munyika, uye vari kuti munyika mune matambudziko, vanhu vari kushandiswa nevavengi vane chinangwa chibvisa hurumende iripo. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vovimbisa Kusimbaradza Kuzvitonga kweMatunhu
text: Mutungamiri weZanu PF, uye vari mutungamiri wenyika, Va Emmerson Mnangagwa, vaita musangano nevatsigiri vavo kuGwanda kuMatebeleland South uko vapa vagari veko matsiru anodarika chiuru nemazana matanhatu, vasati vatanga musangano wekutsvaga rutsigiro mu Phelandaba Stadium. VaMnangagwa vati hurumende yavo ichasimudzira hupfumi, kugadzirwa kwemigwagwa uye kuvandudza mitemo inokwezva vemabhizinesi. No media source currently available Va Mnangagwa vatiwo vane shungu dzekusimbaradza kuzvitonga kwematunhu kana kuti “Devolution” sezvinodiwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. No media source currently available Va Mnangagwa vati vacharamba vachitsigira madzishe vachivapa motokari dzekushandisa sezvo vari kufara nebasa ravanoita rekuchengetedza chivanhu. Vatiwo chirongwa che Command Agriculture chicharamba chichivandudzwa kusvikira murimi wese awana rubatsiro. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vachidzidzisa ku Pretoria University, Doctor Tyanayi Masiya, vanoti vanoona sekuti VaMnangagwa vari kungoita zvaiitwa nevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, avo vaivimbisa zvinhu zvakawanda pasina chinozobatika mune zvivimbiso izvi. Vati kubatanidza kuparurwa kwechirongwa che Command Livestock nekusangana nevatsigiri vavo hazvaifanirwa kuitwa nekuti zvinotaridza kuti pane kutengwa kwesarudzo pachishandiswa hupfumi hwenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Kimberly Process Yotarisirwa Kuzeya Nyaya dzeKodzero dzeVanhu Vari Mune Zviwanikwa
text: Kimberly Process Certification Scheme iri kutarisirwa kusangana muna Chikumi muguta reBrussels, kuBelgium, kuti izeye chikumbiro chemasangano akazvimirira oga anoti nyaya dzekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu vanogara munharaunda dzinenge dzawanikwa mangoda, dzakaita seMarange dzinofanira kukosheswa zvikuru. Masangano aya anoti kana izvi zvisina kuitwa vanotenga mangoda kubva kunyika dzakabudirira vanofanira kuramba kuatenga sezvinoitwa mangoda anocherwa panodeuka ropa, kana kuti “blood diamonds”. Izvi zvakabuda kumusangano weKimberley Process wakapera neSvondo kuFrance. Mukuru weCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, avo vakange vari kuFrance kumusangano uyu, vanoti emasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, vari kuda kuti kodzero dzevagari vemunharaunda idzi dzichengetedzwe. VaMaguwu vanotiwo vari kuda kuti Kimberly Process ivandudze zvinoreva mangoda emhirizhonga, kana kuti conflict diamonds, kuitira kuti zvisanganisirewo mangoda ari kucherwa nehurumende dziri pamutemo, asi dziri kuponda vanhu vadzo nekuti kwekuti dzichere mangoda. No media source currently available

headline: Nhasi Zimbabwe Yoyeuka VaJoshua Nkomo Vakatisiya Makore Makumi Maviri Apfuura
text: Nhasi, 1 July, pave nemakore makumi maviri kubva zvashaika vaimbove mutevedzeri wemutungamiriri wenyika, VaJoshua Nkomo. VaNkomo vakaita chirwere chegomarara, vakashaika muna 1999 vave nemakore makumi masere nemaviri. Vakaradzikwa paHeroes Acre muHarare. Vaimbove nhengo yeparamende yeZanu-PF, VaJoseph Tshuma, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange VaNkomo vakashaika makore mazhinji apfuura, Zimbabwe ichine zvinhu zvizhinji zvaingadzidza kwavari. Vati chishuvo chavo ndechekuti mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nemutungamiriri webato rinopikisa, VaNelson Chamisa, vakwanise kugara pasi vachitaurirana pamusoro pezvingabatsira nyika sezvakaitwa naVaNkomo nevaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. No media source currently available

headline: Kushaiswa Bhonasi Kokonzeresa Mutauro
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, neMuvhuro vakazivisa kuti hurumende haisi kuzobhadhara vashandi vayo mari dzebhonasi kwemakore maviri anotevera. VaChinamasa vanoti hurumende yaremerwa nezvinhu uye haichakwanisi kuti irambe ichimanikidza makambani kuti abhadhare mari dzemitero sezvo iwo ari kutatarikawo. VaChinamasa vanoti mugore ra 2014, hurumende yakabhadhara mabhonasi nemari inosvika zana nemakumi manomwe nemaviri emamiriyoni emadhora. Asi mapato anopikisa hurumende akaita seMDC-T, Nationalm Constitutional Assembly, pamwe nemasangano akaita seRural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe ari kushora zvikuru danho rehurumende iri achiti kuita izvi kuomesera mushandi. Hurumende iri kumbotiwo iri kuda kugumura vamwe vashandi kubva pavashandi vayo vanonzi vanosvika mazana mashanu ezviuru. Mutungamiri weProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaTskavafira Zhou, vanoti danho rehurumende iri rinoodza moyo. Asi mutungamiri wesangano reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, VaJohn Mufukari, vanoti zvakaoma kuti hurumende irambwe ichibhadhara vashandi vayo mari nemitero yemakambani ari kunetsekawo. No media source currently available

headline: Vechidiki Voyambirwa Kuti "Morning After Pill" Haridziviriri Kubatwa neHIV
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezveutano dziri kuyambira vanasikana kuti vasajairira kugaronwamapiritsi ekudzivirira kubata pamuviri anonzi pachirungu ma “emergency contraceptive pills,” asi kuti vashandise nzira dzekuronga mhuri kana voiita zvepabonde. Mapiritsi ekudzivirira pamuviri aya anonwiwa mangwanani mushure mekunge munhu aita zvepabonde asina kuzvidzivirira nemakondomu. Mapiritsi aya anonyanyozivikanwa nezita rekuti, “Morning after pill.” Nyanzvi munyaya dzeHIV/AIDS, Amai Muchanyara Mukamuri, vanoti kunyanyoshandiswa kwema morning after pill kunongoratidza kuti vechidiki vari kuita zvepabonde vasina kuzvidzivirira. Amai Mukamuri vanoti vechidiki vanonyanyotya kubata pamuviri pachinzvimbo chekuti vatye zvirwere zvepabonde zvakadai seHIV/AIDS. Amai Mukamuri vanotiwo tsvakiridzo dzakaitwa dzinoratidza kuti kushandiswa kwakanyanya kwemapiritsi aya kunoita kuti vanhu vawedzere kusimba, kuita zvirwere zvakadai sema Ovarian Cysts nezvimwewo. Chiremba vanoshanda nesangano re Zimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, Doctor Nicholas Wazadza, vanotiwo pamusoro pekuwedzera kusimba, mapiritsi aya akaramba achinwiwa, haazokwanisi kudzivirira pamuviri. VaWazadza vanotiwo vanoyambira vechidiki kuti kunwa mapiritsi aya hakudziviriri zvirwere zvepabonde. Doctor Moses Macheka, avo vanoshanda neZimbabwe National Family Planning Council, vanoti vanhu havafanirwi kushandisa nzira iyi senzira yekuronga mhuri. Ma Morning after Pill anoshandiswa kudzivirira pamuvirikana anwiwa mukati memazuva matatu mushure mekuita zvepabonde pasina kushandiswa makondomu senzira yekuzvidzivirira. No media source currently available

headline: Vane Marezenisi Okutengesa Zvinhu Mumigwagwa Vobatwa Zvisina Kunaka
text: Vanorarama nekutengesa mumigwagwa yemuHarare vanoti havasi kufara kuti kanzuru iri kuvabvisa munzvimbo dzavari kutengesera kunyange hazvo vaine magwaro anovabvumidza kutengesa. Vamwe vanotengesera pakati pedhorobha reHarare uye vaine magwaro avakapihwa nekanzuru anovabvumidza kushandira pavari kushandira, Amai Letwin Nyadzayo, vanoti vatorerwa zvinhu zvavo nemapurisa pamwe nevashandi vekanzuru vakasiyiwa vasina chekubata. Amai Nyadzayo vati vane magwaro anovabvumidza kutengesera pakati pedhorobha asi vari kungodzingwawo sezviri kuitwa vamwe vasina magwaro akadai. Mumwe anotengesera paCopaCabana, VaChencellor Musinami, vatiwo hurumende inofanira kuwanira vanhu mabasa kwete kusweromhanyisana nekugadzirisa dambudziko risiriro. Mumwe anoraramisa mhuri nekutengesa mumigwagwa, VaDennis Munava, vati hurumende inofanira kugadzirisa nyaya dzehupfumi hwenyika kuitira kuti veruzhinji vasaende kunotengesera mumigwagwa Vanhu vanotengesesra mumigwagwa vari kudzingwa zvichetevera kurudziro yakaitwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, masvondo maviri adarika vachiti vanotengesera mumigwagwa vari kusvibisa dhorobha reHarare. Kanzuru yeHarare inoti vanhu vanofanira kutengesera munzvimbo dzakatarwa kuitira kuti kanzuru igowanawo mari pamitero. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naMeya weHarare, VaBenard Manyenyeni, kana mutauriri wekanzuru,VaMichael Chideme, kuti tinzwe kuti sei vane marezenisi ekutengesa mumigwagwa vari kudzingwa nekutorerwa zvinhu zvavo ivo vaine magwaro ebasa.

headline: Hurumende Inonzi Ndiyo Iri Kutungamira Mukutyorwa kweKodzero dzeVanhu
text: Sangano remubatanidzwa wemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyika, reZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, rinoti kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika kuri kunyanya kuitwa nehurumende. Pakodzero dzakatyorwa mugore rakaongororwa iri, Zimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum inoti zvikamu makumi manomwe nezviviri kubva muzana zvekodzero idzi, zvakatyorwa nemapazi aehurumende anosanganisira mapurisa, mauto nevasori. Vachitaura mushure mekuparura gwaro ravo rinonzi “ State of Human Rights Report Zimbabwe 2018,” chipangamazano muZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, VaDzikamai Bere, vati mumwaka uyu mapaziehurumende ndiwo akanyanyotyora kodzero dzeveruzhinji. VaBere vatiwo kuremekedza kodzero zvinoda kuti hurumende izvipire mukuchengetedza kodzero dzeveruzhinji. VaBere vati kodzero yakanya kutyorwa gore rapera ikodzero yekuungana kwevanhu vakasununguka. Vatiwo vanhu vakafa apo vaiita zvinhu zvinobvumidzwa nebumbiro remitemo yenyika. Mukuru weZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, Amai Blessing Gorejena, vatiwo kutyorwa kwekodzero munyika kwawanda zvakanyanya kupfuura makore mashoma apfuura.
