Amai Gorejena vatiwo kuti Zimbabwe ibudirire mukuchengetedza kodzero dzevanhu, hurumende inofanirwa kuona kuti yaremekedza kodzero dzemunhu wese pasina kutarisa kuti abuda mumba maani. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende paongororo yeZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum iyi. Asi mumwe wechidiki mubato reZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vati kunyange hazvo vanhu vane kodzero munyika, kodzero idzi hadzifanirwi kukanganisa mafambiro ebasa munyika. VaMugwadi vati magwaro anoburitswa aya haana mature ose. Zimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum inotiwo hurumende inofanirwa kuumba hwaro hwenhaurirano nezvizvarwa zvese zvenyika; kuona kuti bumbiro remitemo yenyika yaremekedzwa; kugadzirisa mitemo inotyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika; kuona kuti vese vanokanganisira vamwe vamiswa pamberi pematare vachitongwa nemhosva dzavanenge vapara, uye kusimbaradza dzidziso muvanhu pamusoro pekodzero dzavo. Masangano anorwira kodzero pamwe nemamwe mapato anopikisa akapomera hurumende mhosva yekusaremekedza kodzero yehupenyu pakapfurwa vanhu nemasoja muna 2018 mushure mesarudzo izvi zvakaitika zvakare muna Ndira gore rino.

headline: Vamwe Votadza Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19 yeKutanga Ichinzi Yapera
text:
Vanhu vakawanda vari kuda kubaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 yekutanga mudunhu reMashonaland West vari kutadza kubaiwa zvichinzi hakuna nhomba yekutanga asi vanhu vachikwanisa kubayiwa nhomba yechipiri chete. Mumwe wevanhu vanga vachida kubayiwa nhomba muChinhoyi nhasi, VaTendayi Masakasa, vati vanzi vadzoke svondo rinouya sezvo kuri kungobayiwa nhomba yepiri chete.

Mumwe chiremba ari kuona nezvekubayiwa nhomba mudunhu reMakonde, Dr Paradzai Mudzengerere, vabvuma kuti pane dambudziko rekushaikwa
kwedzimwe mhomba asi vati zviri kukonzerwa nevanhu vari kunobayiwa
nhomba kunzvimbo dzisiri dzavakabayiwa nhomba yekutanga. Dr Madzengerere vati vave kupa nhomba yeSinopharm chete munzvimbo
dziri kubayirwa vanhu sezvo nhomba iyi iripo yakawanda kudarika dzimwe
nhomba. Dr Mudzengerere vakurudzira vanhu kuti vanobayiwa nhomba yepiri
kunzvimbo yavakambobayiwa nhomba yekutanga. Dambudziko riri kuMashonaland West rinonziwo riri kuwanikwa kumamwe matunhu ari munyika. Svondo rapera, mukuru anoona nezvehutano muBulawayo, Dr Welcome Mlilo, vakaudza bepanhau reThe Chronocle kuti dunhu ravo rakanga richitarisana nekushomeka kwenhomba dzeCovid-19 zvekuti vakanga vachibaya chete vabiyiwa nhomba kepiri. Mukuru anoona nezvezvirongwa zveCovid-19 National Task Force, Dr Agnes Mahobva, vati vakuru vezvehutano mumatunhu vari kuongorora nezvenyaya yekushaikwa kwenhomba mudzimwe nzvimbo sezvo vakatanga kuzvinzwa pama dandemutande. Asi vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMDC Alliance,Dr Henry Madzorera, vati kudzoserwa kwevanhu vari kuda kubaiwa nhomba zviri kuratidza kusarongeka kwehurumende munyaya yekutenga nekupa matunhu
nhomba dzinokwanirana.

Hurumende inoti mava nenhomba dzinodarika miriyoni imwe chete nemazana manomwe ezviuru idzo dzinosanganisira Sinopharm, Sinovac nedzimwe. Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Mutsvangwa, vakazivisa svondo rapera kuti nyika iri kutarisira dzimwe nhomba zviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 500 000 kubva kuChina mwedzi uno. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kusvika
pari zvino vave chiuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevana kana kuti 1594 zvichitevera kufa wevanhu vaviri nezuro. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 vave zviuru makumi matatu nezvisere zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matanhatu nemumwe chete kana kuti 38 961, zvichitevera kubatwa kwevanhu gumi nevanomwe nezuro. Vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 yekutanga vave zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nezvishanu zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nevasere kana kuti 675 678. Vabaiwa nhomba yepiri vave zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi mana nezvina zvinemazana mana kana kuti 344 400. Izvi zvinoreva kuri nhomba dzashandiswa munyika yose dzasvika pamiriyoni imwe chete nezviuru makumi maviri nemakumi manomwe nesere, kana kuti 1 020 078. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba vanhu vanosvika
mamiriyoni gumi, 10 million, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva
muzana, 60%, zvevanhu vari munyika senzira yekudzivirira kupararira
kwechirwere cheCovid-19.

headline: Interpol Yoramba Kubatsira ZRP Kusunga VezveMatongerwo eNyika Vakatiza muZimbabwe
text: ZRP, inoti iri kushushikana zvikuru kuti iri kutadza kudzora munyika vanhu vaimboita zvematongerwo vakatiza vari kupomerwa mhosva nekuda kwekuti, Interpol, haisi kuda kuvabatsira. Interpol inonzi yakaudza vezvematongerwo enyika kuti haipindire munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Vachipa pfungwa dzavo pamusoro peInternational Treaties Bill, pamusangano wange wakarongwa nekomiti inoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, mukuru wemapurisa VaGodwin Matanga vati kunyange hazvo Interpol ichusingirwa kubatsira ZRP kana ichida vanhu vanenge vari kune dzimwe dzinyika, pari zvino izvi handizvo zviri kuitika. Vati nekuda kwaizvozvo vachanyorera kubazi rezvemukati menyika kuti kana zvichibvira riite zvibvumirano nenyika dzine vanhu vanodiwa neZimbabwe kuti vadzorwe vazomiswa mumatare edzimhosva muno. Imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, Amai Barbra Rwodzi, vaudza VaMatanga kuti ZRP inofanira kusunga vanoita zvematongerwo enyika pavenenge vapara mhosva kwete kuzovatsvaga kana vachinge vasiyana nezvematongerwo enyika kana kuti vachinge vaenda kunogara kune dzimwe nyika. Asi VaMatanga vati munhu asingasungwe chete ari pabasa mutungamiriri wenyika. VaMatanga havana kudoma vanhu vaimboita zvematongerwo enyika vari kudiwa kuti vazomira mumatare edzimhosva muZimbabwe. Munyori mubazi rezvemukati menyika, VaMelusi Matshiya, vati chinodiwa panyaya yeZRP neInterpol kutaurirana pamwe nekuona kuti chibvumirano chavo chekudyidzana chinoti chii. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reInterpol panyaya iyi. Sachigaro vekomiti yekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaKindess Paradza, vati musangano wanhasi wange uine chinangwa chekunzwa kubva kupmapazi ehurumende kuti sei Zimbabwe ichisaini zvibvumirano nemasangano akaita sanaUnited Nations, African SADC nemamwe masangano asi isingazo iise zvibvumirano izvi mumitemo yayo. VaParadza vati zvinosuwisa kuti kutanga kwegore rino, Ishe Charumbira vakatadza kusarudzwa kuve mutungamiriri wePan Africa Parliament nekuda kwekuti Zimbabwe haisati yaisa runyoro rwavo chibvumirano chePan African Parliament. Asi VaMatshiya pamwe nevange vakamirira munyori mubazi rezvekudydzana nedzimwe nyika, Steward Nyakotyo, vati hurumende iri kuedza napose painogona napo kuona kuti nyika yaiisa mumutemo zvibvumirano zvese zvainenge yasaina.

headline: Nyanzvi Dzozeya Zvirango Zvakatemera Zimbabwe neAmerica
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi nekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika dzinoti zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe igadzirise hukama hwayo nenyika yeAmerica iyo inopa Zimbabwe rubatsiro rwakakuririsa kudarika dzimwe nyika dzose. Asi hukama uhu hauna kufamba zvakanaka kubva muna 2001 apo Zimbabwe yakatemerwa zvirango ichipomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu nekubirira sarudzo. America yakabva yadzika mutemo unonzi Zimbabwe Democracy and Economic Recovery Act kana kuti ZIDERA muna 2001 wakanangana nekumanikidza Zimbabwe kudzoka mugwara rehutongo hwejekerere. Seneta Bill Frist vebato remaRepublican vari vekuTennessee, uye VaRus Feingold vebato remaDemocratic Party vari vekuWinsconsin ndivo vakapinza mudare reSeneti bhiri reZIDERA muna Kurume 2001. Vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vaigara vachishora zvirango izvi vachiti zvainge zvakanangana nekupidigura hurumende yavo pachigaro. Asi ikozvino vamwe muAmerica vanoti vanogona kutanga kudyidzana neZimbabwe zvakakwana kana munyika maitwa sarudzo dzakachena nekuremekedzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. Munyori mukuru weMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vanoti zviri kudiwa neAmerica hazvina kunyanya kuoma kutevedzera asi unenge mutoro chaiwo. Vanomirira Zanu-PF kuBritain, VaNick Mangwana, vanoti vari kutarisira kuti nyika ichaita sarudzo dzakachena, zvirango zvobviswa. Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, vakatozivisa kuti havasi kuzobvisa zvirango zvakatemerwa mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nevamwe vakuru muhurumende yavo. No media source currently available

headline: Mamwe Masangano eVarairidzi Anonyorera Mutungamiri weNyika Tsamba Achisvitsa Zvichemo zveVarairidzi
text: Nhengo dzerimwe sangano revarairidzi, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, dzapinda mumigwagwa dzichiratidzira pamwe nekusiya gwaro renyunyuto kumahofisi akasiyanasiyana richikurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise zvinyunyuto zvevarairidzi. Mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure vanoti gwaro iri, iro ranyorerwa kumutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, rasiiwa muzvikoro, kubazi redzidzo, kubazi revashandi nemabasa, pamwe nekumahofisi emutungamiri wenyika, uye rine zvinyunyuto zvitatu zvanoda kuti zvikasike kugadziriswa nehurumende. VaMasaraure vanoti zvichemo zvavo zviri pamusoro pemihoro yavo iyo vanoda kuti idzoserwe pamari dzavaitambira muna 2018, kuchengetedzeka kwehutano hwevarairidzi nevadzidzi muzvikoro kubva kuCovid-19, uyewo kuti hurumende ibatsire vana vasiri kukwanisa kubhadhara mari dzechikoro kuburikidza nekuvaisa muchirongwa che Basic Education Assistance Module, BEAM. Izvi zviri kuitikawo panguva iyo masangano evarairidzi manomwe ari pasi pemubatanidzwa we Federation of Zimbabwe Education Unions (FOZEU) anyorawo gwaro kuna VaMnangagwa achiti ari kushushikana nekuparara kwaita zvinhu muzvikoro, uye kwaanoti kushaya han;ya kwehurumende kugadzirisa nyaya dzemihoro yevarairidzi. VaMasaraure vanoti kana hurumende yakakundikana kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo vacharambawo vachingoratidzira. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvevashandi nemabasa, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima kuti tinzwewo divi ravo. Asi neSvondo VaMavima vakaudza bepanhau reSunday Mail kuti hurumende iri kugadzirisa zvichemo zvevashandi vayo zvemihoro, vachiti iri kuronga kuvapa zvikamu makumi manomwe nezvishanu kubva muzana kubva mwedzi uno kusvika muna Chikumi. Vamiriri vevashandi vari pasi pesangano reZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions svondo rapera vakaramba kutambira zvikamu makumi maviri nezvishanu kubva muzana zvakanga zvaiswa patafura nehurumende. Mutauriri webazi rezvedzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro vanoti varairidzi havafanirwe zvavo kutya kudzokera kumabasa nekuti bazi ravo rakaisa hurongwa hwekudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana hweCovid-19 muzvikoro. VaNdoro vanotiwo hurumende yagara ichibatsira vana vanotambura kuburikidza nehomwe yeBEAM saka hazvisi zvinhu zvingatadzisa varairidzi kudzokera kumabasa sezvo paine hurongwa hwekubatsira vanoshaya nechakare. No media source currently available No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanomutsiridza Chibvumirano cheKudyidzana kweZimbabwe neTanzania
text: Mutungamiriri wenyika Va Emerson Mnangagwa vadzoka kumusha neChishanu masikati mushure mekushanya kuTanzania kwemazuva maviri. VaMnangagwa nemutungamiri weTanzania, VaJohn Magufuli vakanyorerana chibvumirano chekudyidzana kwenyika mbiri idzi, icho chinobata zvehutano, kudzivirirwa kwenyika, magariro, dzidzo pamwe nezvemitambo. VaMnangagwa vaenderera mberi nemharidzo yavo yekuti Zimbabwe yakavhura mikana yemabhizinesi. Vasati vasimuka, VaMnangagwa vashanyirawo chikoro chezvekurima cheKaole Wazazi, vakazopendera rwendo rwavo nekusangana nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri munyika iyi izvo zvavavimbisa kuti hurumende yavo ichaita pese painogona napo kugadzirisa zimbabwe patsva. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera vanoti kuumba hukama pakati penyika dzemuAfrica kwakanaka uye kunogona kupa Zimbabwe mikana yekuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika. VaKuchera vanoti mharidzo yaVaMnangagwa yakanaka asi zvave kuda kuti vachiitawo zvavanotaura. Vanoti chibvumirano cheJoint Permanent Commission chakaitwa muna 1980 pakati penyika yeZimbabwe neTanzania chakakosha zvikuru, vachiti kumutsiridzwa kwechibvumirano ichi kwakanaka kuchibatsira nyika. No media source currently available

headline: VaManyenyeni Vanoti Hurumende Yaivhiringidza Mashandiro Avo
text: Meya weguta reHarare, VaBernard Manyenyeni, vanoti vakakundikana kuita basa ravo nemazvo sameya weguta sezvo paive nekupindira kwaiitwa nehurumende yeZanu PF uko kwaibvongonyodza mashandiro ekanzuru yavo. Vachionekana nevatori venhau neChishanu muHarare, VaManyenyeni vatiwo kushomeka kwemari yaipinda mukanzuru kwakadzorera shure mabasa ekanzuru yeHarare. VaManyenyeni vakurudzira makanzura ari kuzopinda muhofisi mushure mekusarudzwa neMuvhuro kuti vagadzirise nyaya yemihoro yevashandi iyo vati iri pamusoro zvakanyanyisa. VaManyenyeni vati ivo vakakundikana kuita izvi vachiti vakuru vehurumende vaisavatsigira panyaya iyi. VaManyenyeni vatiwo kanzuru yakakundikana kugadzirisa migwagwa iyo isisina kumira zvakanaka nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakawanda. VaManyenyeni vati ZINARA, iyo inobata mitero yedzimota, ikaenderera mberi nekushaisa makanzuru mari, zvichaita kuti makanzuru atsvakewo nzira dzekubhadharisa vedzimotokari. VaManyenyeni, avo vasiri kukwikwidza musarudzo vatiwo guta reHarare rinodawo mamwe madhamu anouyisa mvura kuti dambudziko remvura rigadziriswe. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaGodknows Homwe,vati kunyange hazvo kanzuru yaikundikana kuita mabasa nemazvo, varumbidza VaManyenyeni avo vavati vaikoshesa vagari sezvo vaishandisa madandemutande akadai seFacebook neTwitter kunzwa zvichemo zvevagari. Asiwo VaHomwe vati VaManyenyni vaifanirwa kugadzirisa dambudziko remihoro yevashandi vekanzuru iyo vati iri pamusorosoro. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaIan Mapura, vatiwo kunyange hazvo kanzuru yanga isiri kuwana mari zhinji kuvagari, vakakwanisawo kufambisa mamwe mabasa ekanzuru. VaMapura vatiwo chakanyanyotadzwa nekanzuru yaVaManyenyeni kuwanisa vagari mvura yakachena. No media source currently available

headline: VaMwonzora Vanoti VaSox Chikowero Vakasungiswa neVaida Kuti Vasatungamire MDC-T
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vari kupomera mhosva vamwe vanopikisa yekusungisa imwe nhengo yebato ravo, VaSox Chikowero, nemapurisa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rinoona nezvemukati menyika, VaKazembe Kazembe, sezvo vanga vasungadaire nharembozha yavo. VaMwonzora havana kuda kudoma vanhu ava nemazita asi vachiti vanhu ava vaisafara kuti VaChikowero vaivatsigira ivo VaMwonzora. Asi VaChikowero vakasungwa gore rapera muna Zvita paiitwa sarudzo dzekongiresi yekutsvaga mutungamiri mutsva webato wekutsiva mushakabvu VaMorgan Tsvangirai sezvainge zvanzi zviitwe nedare repamusoro soro. VaChikowero vakamiswa pamberi pedare nezuro vakanyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso. VaChikowero, avo vanove sachigaro wesangano reGlobal Zimbabwe Forum, vange vari muhupoteri kuSouth Africa kwemakore akawanda vachiti vaityira hupenyu hwavo sezvo vainge vovhimwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori. No media source currently available

headline: WHO Inoti Haisati Yatambira Nhomba dzeCovid-19 Dziri Kushandiswa muZimbabwe
text: Sangano reWorld Health Organisation, WHO,rinoti nhomba dziri kushandiswa muZimbabwe dzakagadzirwa kuChina hadzisati dzatambirwa nesangano iri zviri [amuteno kuitira kuti dzishandiswe neveruzhinji mukudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19. WHO inoti ichiri kuongorora nhomba mbiri idzi dzeSinovac neSinopharm. Mumiriri weWHO muZimbabwe, Dr Alex Gasasira, vati nhomba dzekuChina dzeSinovac neSinopharm dzave padanho repamusoro soro mukuongororwa, uye vanotarisira kuti panopera mwedzi uno waKubvumbi, WHO inenge yapedza kuongorora nhomba idzi. Mashoko aVaGasasira anoburitsa pachena kuti nhomba dzeSinovac neSinopharm dziri kushandiswa munyika, hadzisati dzapihwa chitambi neWHO kuti dzishandiswe neveruzhinji. Vachipindura mubvunzo weStudio7 wekuti zvinhu zvinotarisirwa here kuti nyika dzishandise nhomba dzisati dzakomekedzwa neWHO, VaGasasira vati sesangano vanokurudzira masangano anotarisa mishonga munyika dzakasiyana siyana kuti aongorore nhomba idzi dzisati dzashandiswa kune veruzhinji. VaGasasira vati sangano rinoongorora nekubvumidza mishonga munyika reMedicine Control Authority of Zimbabwe, MCAZ, rakati rakatarisa nhomba idzi rikagutsikana kuti dzakanakira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe. VaGasasira vatiwo Zimbabwe hasi iyo yega nyika iri kushandisa nhomba dzekuChina idzi. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuMCAZ kuti yakaita ongororo yayo riini, uye kuti zviyi zvakabuda muongororo iyi. Zimbabwe pari zvino iri kushandisa nhomba mbiri dzekuChina, yeSinovac neSinopharm Nhomba dzekuChina idzi dzinonzi dzaita mitauro kune dzimwe nyika kunyanya nhomba yeSinovac inonzi dziviriro yayo yakaderera pane zvaive zvataurwa neChina. Asi mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira madhokotera anoshanda akazvimiririra, Dr Johannes Marisa, vaudza Studio7 kuti kana nhomba ichidzivirira nezvikamu zvinopfuura makumi mashanu, chinhu chakakosha mukudzivirira ndufu nezvikamu izvozvo. VaMarisa vatiwo kana vanhu vakabaiwa pamwe nekutevedzera zvinokurudzirwa, zvekupfeka mamasiki, kusaungana nekugeza maoko zvinobatsira mukurwisa chirwere ichi. VaMarisa vatiwo mimwe mishonga inodzi ine dziviriro iri pamusoro inonetsa kushandisa nekuda kwezvinodiwa pakuichengetedza. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano uye vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano, VaHenry Madzorera, vati chakanyanyokosha pari zvino kuti Zimbabwe iite tsvagiridzo yayo yekuona kuti nhomba idzi dziri kushanda zvakadii munyika. VaMadzorera vati hapana change chakaipa mukusanobaya vanhu nhomba idzi, vakati vanhu vapiwa nhomba iyi munyika vawanda zvekuti hurumende ine mukana wekuchiongorora kuti iri kushanda zvakanaka here. VaMadzorera vati mashandiro enhomba anosiyana siyana, uye hapana chakaipa mukumira kushandisa nhomba idzi kana zvaonekwa kuti hadzisi kushanda zvakanaka. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kudivi rebazi rezvehutano nezvenyaya yenhomba dzekuChina. Asi vachitaura pakasvika nhomba yekutanga munyika, mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, VaJohn Mangwiro, vakati zvimwe zvinotariswa neZimbabwe panhomba, machengeterwo enhomba idzi vakapa muenzaniso wenhomba yeSinopharm iyo vakati iri nyore kuchengeta munyika sezvo zvikwanisiro zvaidiwa zvakagara zviripo munyika. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanoti Zimbabwe imwe yenyika dzemuSADC dziri pamusoro mukushandisa nhomba dzakagadzirwa kuChina. No media source currently available

headline: Madhokotera neVakoti Voshanda Hana Dzichirova Vachityira Kubatwa neCovid-19
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa pamwe nekubatwa nechirwere che Covid-19 hwava kupa kuti vashandi vanobatsira vanhu vanenge vachirwara nedenda iri, vapindwe nekutya, vachityira kuti vanogona kupinzwawo munjodzi nechirwere ichi, icho chava kuita chamurambamhuru munyika. Vashandi vezvehutano vanoti vave kusangana nevanhu vane chirwere ichi nguva dzose pavanenhge varipabasa sezvo huwandu hwevanhu vanenge vachibatwa nechirwere ichi huru kuramba huchikwira Mumwe mushandi wezvehutano, uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMD Alliance, Dr Henry Madzorera, vati vari kusiririswa zvikuru nehuwandu hweavo vari kufa nechirwere cheCovid-19. VaMadzorera vati vashandi vezvehutano vanotoda kubatsirwa mukugadzikana kwepfungwa nekuti zvavari kuona vari pabasa zvinotyisa. VaMadzorera, avo vakambove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, vatiwo apo vashandi vezvehutano vanenge vodzokera kumba, vanenge vakutyirawo kutapurira mhuri dzavo kana vachinge vabatwa nedenda iri asi risati rabuda pachena. Asi VaMadzorera vati sevashandi vezvehutano varikutorawo matanho ekuderedza njodzi iyi sezvo riri basa ravo rekubetsera vanenge vachirwara Mumwe mukoti anoshanda muguta reHarare, VaSimbarashe James Tafirenyika, avo vanotungamira Zimbabwe Urban and Rural Council Nurse Worker’s Union, vati zvinhu zvinotyisa zvakanyanya kuenda kubasa. Asi vati kubaiwa kwavakaitwa nhomba kwakadzikamisa hana yavo. VaTafirenyika vatiwo zvakakosha kuti vashandi vezvehutano vapiwe zvekushandisa zvakakwana kuitira kuti vasabatwe neCovid-19 apo vanenge vachibetsera veruzhinji. VaTafirenyika vatiwo zvakakosha kuti vashandi vezvehutano vese vapiwe zvekufambisa kuitira kuti vasasangane neveruzhinji. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaGodknows Homwe, vati vashandi vezvehutano vanofanirwa kuwedzerwa mari dzemihoro sezvo vari kubata basa rakakosha huye rinotyisa. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu makumi matanhatu nevaviri vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi pazviuru zviviri nemazana masere nevapfumbamwe 2809. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vave zviuru makumi mapfumbamwe nechimwe nezana nemakumi maviri,91,120 , zvichitevera kubatwa kwevanhu zviuru zviviri nemazana manomwe nevashanu 2705 nezuro wakare. Kusvika nezuro, hurumende inoti vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga vakange vave miriyoni imwechete nezviuru mazana maviri makumi mapfumbamwe nezviviri nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mana nevaviri, 1 292, 642 Vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yepiri vave zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nezvitanhatunemazana maserenemakumi matatu, 656 830. Huwandu uhwu hunogona kukwira apo hurumende ichazivisa zvabuda muongororo dzanhasi. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhutu kubva muzana kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe chichipararira munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Dzimwe Nyanzvi dzeHupfumi Dzoti Dambudziko reMagetsi Rinogona Kukanganisa Chimiro cheNyika paMeso peChikwata cheIMF Chiri muNyika
text: Chikwata cheInternational Monetary Fund (IMF), chiri munyika umo chiri kuita hurukuro dzakasiyanasiyana nemapoka akasiyanasiyana dzinosanganisira dzemamiriro ehupfumi hwenyika, zvirongwa zvehupfumi, pamwe nemisangano ye 2023 Article IV. Chikwata ichi chinonzi chiri kuita misangano nevakuru vehurumende, vemakambani akazvimirira, masangano anoita zvebudiriro, pamwe nevemasangano akazvimirira. Asi vamwe vari kuti chikwata cheIMF ichi chauya panguva yakaipa apo nyika yakatarisana nedambudziko remagetsi. Izvi zvinotsinhirwa nenyanzvi mune zvehupfumi uye vakambotungamira sangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, CZI, VaCallisto Jokonya, avo vanoti zvinogona kusanakira Zimbabwe. Asi VaJokonya vanoti yave nguva yekuti Zimbabwe ichizvimirira yoga pane kuramba ichidzokera kuIMF, iyo vanoti yakamirira kugutsa zvido zvevanoitungamira. Asi kushanya uku kwakakoshera nyika here? Imwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaRejoice Ngwenya vanoti kushanyirwa neIMF kunobatsira Zimbabwe nenzira mbiri. Vanoti yekutanga ndeyekuti varidzi vemari vanoona vega mamiriro ezvinhu pasina kunyeperwa nehurumende, uye yepiri ndeyekuti kuti Zimbabwe inomboedza kugadzirisa zvinhu sevanhu vanenge vachida mari, kunyange hazvo zvichizoramba. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachitungamira sangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti vanotarisira kuti nyaya yehurongwa hweZimbabwe hwekuedza kudyidzana zvakare nedzimwe nyika pamwe nemamwe masangano ndeimwe yemisoro yenhau dziri kukurukurwa kumisangano iri kuitwa nechikwata ichi. Asi Doctor Kanyenze vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa zvirongwa zvayo zvekubatsira vanoshaya kana ichida kuti izadzikise zvirongwa zvayakatara. VaMasimba Kuchera, vanove zvakare nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi, vanotiwo chinonakidza ndechekuti kana misangano yeArticle IV yapera, Zimbabwe neIMF vanenge vaine maonero akasiyana panyaya yekufamba kwehupfumi hwenyika. Asi mubvunzo mukuru ndewekuti pane chakanaka here chichabuda kubva mukushanya uku? VaNgwenya vanoti havaone paine chine makushe chinobuda. Chikwata ichi, icho chiri munyika kubva kutanga kwemwedzi uno kusvika musi wa 15 mwedzi uno, chinonzi chiri kutungamirirwa naVaDhaneshwar Ghura uye chine nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi VaWayne Mitchell naAmai Concha Verdugo-Yepes. Vamwe varimo inyanzvi mune zvemari VaMoses Kitonga, nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi yakamirira Zimbabwe, VaChuku Chuku, pamwe nenyanzvi munyaya dzetsvakurudzo, Amai Rohan Ahluwalia. Rwendo rwechikwata ichi rwunotevera rwumwe rwakaitwa zvakare nechimwe chikwata cheIMF muna Gunyana wegore rino, icho chakapembedza matanho ari kuitwa nehurumende anosanganisira ekudzikamisa mutengo wemari yekunze, asi chakakomekedza kuti panodiwa mamwe matanho ekunyatsodzikamisa hupfumi ane hupenyu hunoenda mberi. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi dzinoti kunyange hazvo hurumende iine hwaro hwezvirongwa zvairi kuita mukumutsiridza pamwe nekudzikamisa hupfumi hwenyika, huwori pamwe nekushaikwa kwemagetsi nguva dzose ndizvo zvimhingamipinyi zvikuru zvayakatarisana nazvo vachiti izvi zvinogona kunge zvichizoiswa pamusoro mugwaro rinozoburitswa neIMF pane zvainenge yawana. No media source currently available

headline: Vatsigiri veMDC-T Vanorohwa Zvakaipisisa muHarare
text: Imwe nhengo ye MDC-T yechidiki, Va David Mazibiye, vanoti vakarohwa zvakaipisisa neSvondo nevanofungirwa kuti inhengo dze Zanu PF kuMbare uko vaifanirwa kuita musangano wevechidiki webato ravo. Imwe nhengo ye MDC-T yechidiki, Va David Mazibiye, vanoti vakarohwa zvakaipisisa nezuro nevanofungirwa kuti inhengo dze Zanu PF kuMbare uko vaifanirwa kuita musangano wevechidiki webato ravo. VaMazibiye vanoti ivo nevamwe vavo vanodarika gumi vakarohwa mapurisa akatarisa kunyange hazvo bato ravo rakanga rawana mvumo yekuita musangano wavo. "Takarohwa takawanda isu vechidiki ve MDC-T uye vamwe vachiri muchipatara mushure mekukuvara pachiitiko chanezuro. Isu tinofungidzira kuti inhengo dze Zanu PF dzakatirova sezvo vakaita izvi pamberi pemapurisa asina kana kusunga munhu," VaMazibiye vaudza Studio7. "Chakanyanya kutirwadza ndechekuti takange tawana mbumo kubva kumapurisa kuti tiite musangano uyu asi takawana panzvimbo pataida kuitira musangano uyu pakazara nhengo dze Zanu PF dzainge dzichitamba bhora nekunwa doro nekuputa mbanje zvakaita kuti tizive kuti havasi vamwe vekubato kwedu nekuti vekwedu havaite izvi zvisina hunhu," VaMazibiye vaenderera mberi. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata bato re Zanu PF kana mapurisa kuti tinzwe divi ravo. No media source currently available

headline: Dhora remuNyika Roramba Richishaya Simba paMusika weRBZ
text: Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe yazivisa kuti dhora remunyika riri kuramba richishaya simba pamusika wekutenga nekutengeserana mari wekunze kana kuti RBZ auction rate. RBZ yazivisa izvi padandemutande rayo reTwitter. Nhasi dhora rekuAmerica range richitengwa nemashora mazana makumi matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nemana nezviga zvisere nezvinoraudzira kana kuti 1 US dollar to ZWL654, 8651. Svondo rapera dhora rekuAmerica raitengwa nemadhora zana nemakumi matanhatu nemaumi mana nematanhatu nezvigag zviviri nezvinoraudzira kana kuti 1 US$1To ZWL 646, 2415. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vati RBZ iri kuyedza kuda kuti huremu hwedhora kumusika wayo huenzane nehwepamusika wemukoto uri kutengesa dhora rekuyAmerica nemadhora mazana masere kusvika pamazana mana kana kuti ZWL800 to ZWL 900 asi vati izvi zvichanetsa.

headline: Vakabaiwa Nhomba yeCobvid-19 yeCovaxin Kamwe Chete Vokurudzirwa Kubayiwa Imwe Mhando
text: Hurumende inoti zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zvakabaiwa kamwe chete nhomba yeCovid-19, yeCovaxin yakabva kuIndia zvinofanira kubaiwa chero imwe mhando yenhomba irti munyika. Izvi zvinonzi zviri kukonzerwa nekushomeka kwenhomba iyi munyika. Mukutanga kwegore, India yakabatsira Zimbabwe nenhomba yeCovaxin inosvika zviuru makumi matatu nemashanu kana kuti 35,000. Asi mamiriro akaita zvinhu muIndia iyo ine dambudziko rechirwere ichi rakomba anoni ave kutadzisa nyika iyi kuti iwane nhomba yekuendesa kune dzimwe nyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano, Doctor Frenk Guni, vanoti hapasati pave nehumbowo hunoratidza kuti kuvhenganisa mishonga yenhomba yeCovid-19 kune njodzi, vachiti parizvino zvinoonekwa sekuti kubaiwa nhomba iyi katatu zvinotobatsira vanhu. No media source currently available Asi ongororo dziri kuitwa muAmerica dziri kuratidza kuti kusanganisa nhomba yeJohnson and Johnson nedzimwe dzakaita sePfizer neModerna.

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri Kunze kweNyika Zvoramba Zvichisimudza Mureza weNyika
text: Chimwe chizvarwa ichi ndaVaVakirai Mawema avo vari muWashington D.C umo vakadomwa nebepanhau reWashington Business Journal semumwe wevanhu makumi mana vane makore ari pasi pemakumi mana vane hunyanzvi hwekutungamira mune zvemabhizimusi. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zviri kuramba zvichisimudza mureza wenyika kuburikidza nemabasa akasiyanasiyana azviri kuita anoendesa mberi budiriro. Chimwe chizvarwa ichi ndaVaVakirai Mawema avo vari muWashington D.C umo vakadomwa nebepanhau reWashington Business Journal semumwe wevanhu makumi mana vane makore ari pasi pemakumi mana vane hunyanzvi hwekutungamira mune zvemabhizimusi. VaMawema vanoshanda sa senior associate kukambani yeGensler iyo ino zivikanwa pasi rose nehunyanzvi hwayo hwekudhirowa mapurani ezvivakwa pamwe nekuvaka. “Ndingazvitsanangura senyanzvi ndichiti ndiri architect anonyanyove nechekuita nesimba pamwechete nehudzamu hunounzwa nekufunga kwakadzama kunounzwa nebasa rangu zvikuru mukugadzirisa zvinetswa pasi rose,” vanodaro VaMawema. VaMawema vakapinda muAmerica 1997 vakasvikira kudunhu re California uko vakadzidza vakamboshanda vasati vatama vachinovaka musasa muWashington DC umo vagara kwemakore masere. Pamabasa anokosha avaita mukushanda kwavo sa architect, VaMawema vanoti mumwe wevanhu vakagadziridza nhandare yechikwata chenhabvu yemuAmerica, chePhiladelphia Eagles. “Ndaivewo muchikwata chakaedza kukwezva kuti mutambo we2024 Olimpics uitirwe muguta reWashington D.C. asi takazita vepiri mushure meBoston iyo yakazowana mukana uyu,” vanodaro VaMawema. Vanoti vanofarira mutambo we rugby uyo vakambotambawo pamwe nekuve muridzi wepembe vasati vaturika shangu dzebasa. VaMawema vanoitawo zvemumhanzi nechikwata chavo chinonzi Honey Band chiri mumusha weTakoma, uye vanoti vatsikisa mhanzi dzakati kuti. “Ndinoitawo zvakare mabasa ekubatsira vanotambura nekupavo nguva yangu kana kuti ku volunteer. Ndinoshanda nemasangano akati kuti asi randingadoma nezita ndere Junior Achievement, iro rakazvimirira uye richishandawo pasi rose. Tinobatsira vechidiki nekuvapfekedza hunyanzvi hwekufambisa upfumi nezvimwe zvakadaro,” VaMawema vanodaro. VaMawema, avo vane mudzimai nevana vaviri, vanoti vane tarisiro yekudzokera kumusha kana zvinhu zvagadzikana zvikuru munyaya dzeupfumi nemabasa kuitira kuti vakwanise kuzoshanda basa ravo chairo. Asi vanoti vane tarisiro yekuti zvinhu zvichagadzikana nekukasika kumusha. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende yoKurudzirwa Kurapa Zvirwere zveGomarara Pachena
text: Veruzhinji vari kuchema-chema kuti dai hurumende yaita kuti chirwere chegomarara chirapwe pasina muripo, uye kuti kuzvipatara zvese kusanganisira zvekumaruwa kuiswe michina inoongorora magomarara akasiyana-siyana. Apo nyika iri pakati pekuchema vaive mutungamiriri webato reMovement for Democratic Change, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, avo vakafawo nechirwere chegomarara, veruzhinji vanoti hurumende ikasakoshesa chirwere ichi sezvakaitwa chirwere cheHIV/ AIDS, vanhu vakawanda vacharasikirwa nehupenyu. Amai Thandaza Mhlanga vaudza Studio 7 kuti shuviro yavo ndeyekuti hurumende ione kuti zvipatara nemakirinika zvarapa chirwere chegomarara pachena sezvo chopedza vanhu vakawanda. Izvi zvatsigirwawo naMuzvare Fortune Moyo avo vawedzerawo vakati pamusoro pekurapwa pachena hurumende inofanirwa kuita dzidziso dzakasimba zvakanyanya kuti veruzhinji vazive nezvechirwere chegomarara. Muzvare Moyo vati zvinosuwisa kuti nguva zhinji vanhu vanobatwa chirwere ichi chakomba. Muzvare Petronella Furusa vakurudzirawo kuti hurumende itsvage mari yakangonangana nekurwisa chirwere chegomarara. Vati kuchengetedza hutano hweveruzhinji hurumende inofanirwa kutora matanho yowona kuti kuzvipatara zvese kusanganisira kumamisha zvawaniswa michina nemishonga inoongorora gomarara kuti veruzhinji vapote vachitariswa. Munguva shoma yapfuura, sachigaro wekomiti inoona nezveutano mudare reparamende, Amai Ruth Labode vakaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakakosha kuti hurumende iite dzidziso nezvechirwere chegomarara sezvakaitwa kuneHIV/AIDS. Amai Labode vakati zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vazive kuti chirwere chegomarara chikakurumidza kubatwa chinorapika. Cancer Registry inoti huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa negomarara huri kuramba huchikwira. Chirwere chegomarara ichi chinoda mari yakawanda kuti munhu arapwe, uye veruzhinji vanoti havaikwanisi kuwana mari dzinodiwa idzi. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reSACU Rowanisa Nhengo Dzaro muAmerica Ruzivo Pamusoro peCovid-19
text: Sangano rinomirirra zvizvarwa zvekuchamhembe kweAfrica zvinogara munharaunda yeD.C, Maryland neVirginia, reSouthern African Community USA, nemusi weSvondo rakakokera hurukuro padandemutande pamusoro pedenda reCovid-19 senzira yekuti veruzhinji vanzwisise pamusoro pedenda iri uye kuti ringabatwa sei. Nhengo yebhodhi reSACU vachiona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano iri, Muzvare Omega Tawonezvi, vanoti sangano ravo rakatora danho iri kuitira kuti veruzhinji vawane ruzivo rwuzere pamusoro pedenda reCovid-19, iro rashungurudza pasi rose. Muzvare Tawonezvi vanoti kuti vanhu vanzwisise kukosha kwenzira dzekudzvirira nadzo pamwe nekurapa denda iri, vakakoka nyanzvi mbiri dzinoti chiremba vari nyanzvi yemishonga yechirungu Dr. Bukhosi Dube vanove chizvarwa chekuZimbabwe, pamwe nemumwe godobori wemishonga yechivanhu anobva kuSouth Africa kuti vatsanangurire veruzhinji pamwe nekupindura mibvunzo yaive nevanhu. Vamwe vakataurawo pamusangano uyu vanhu vaakapona kubva kudenda iri avo vakagoverawo kune vamwe nzira dzavakashandisa mukurwisana nedenda reCovid-19. Sangano reSouthern African Community USA rinoshandawo nemakanzuru pamwe nehurumende dzematunhu mukubatsira zvizvarwa zvekuAfrica muzvirongwa zvakasiyanasiyana zvinosanganisira zvehutano nezvehupfumi. Muzvare Tawonezi vanoti sangano ravo rine hurongwa hwekuita mimwe misangano nenhaurwa pamusoro pedenda reCovid-19 senzira yekupa ruzivo nedzidziso kunhengo dzavo. No media source currently available

headline: MDC-T Yoronga Kuendesa vaKasukuwere kuDare neKuvhiringidza Mashandiro eKanzuru yeGweru
text: Munyori mukuru mubato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, VaDouglas Mwonzora vanoti vari kuzoendesa kumatare gurukota rezvematunhu VaSaviour Kasukuwere nenyaya yekuvhiringidza kushanda kwameya weguta reGweru VaHamutendi Kombayi nemakanzura avo. VaKasukuwere vakamisa makanzura aya basa gore rapera asi dare repamusoro reHigh Court rakati zvavainge vaita kutyora mutemo. Vakabva vakwira kudare repamusoro reSupreme Court asi vakazobvisa nyaya yavo mudare. Asi vachiramba kudzora VaKombayi nevamwe vavo pabasa. Vachibvunzwa mudare reparamende VaKasukuwere vakati vari kuda kushandisa mutemo mutsva wekutongwa kwematunhu kuendesa makanzura aya pamberi pedare kana kuti tribunal. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaKasukuwere kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Asi VaMwonzora vanoti rwendo rwuno vanoda kuti VaKasukuwere vabhadhariswe mari nedare kuripa vanhu vavanoti vari kutyorerwa kodzero dzavo. No media source currently available

headline: Iran Inoti Yabuda Muchibvumirano Chekumbomisa Kugadzira Zvombo zve’Nuclear’
text: Zvichitevera kuurayiwa ne America kwakaitwa General Qassem Soleimani veku Iran mazuva maviri apfuura, Iran yazivisa kuti ichatsiva zvinorwadza kuurawa kwakaitwa General Soleimani avo vaionekwa semunhu wechipiri pamasimba evatongi veIran. VaSoleimani vakaurawa apo America yakapfura nendege dzema'drone' motikari dzakange dzichifamba naVaSoleimani padyo nenhandare yendege muBaghdad. Nemusi weSvondo, Iran yakazivisa kuti haisisiri muchibvumirano chekumbomira kugadzira zvombo zve nuclear. America inoti yakauraya VaSoleimani nekuti vakange vachironga kurwisa America asi hapana humbowo hwakabudiswa hunoratidza zvinonzi zvairongwa neIran kana naVaSoleimani. Vanotevera zvematongerwo enyika, VaFrenk Guni, vaudza Studio 7 kuti, sekuona kwavo, mutungamiri wenyika, VaDonald trump, vakauraya VaSoleimani senzira yekuti vanhu muAmerica vambomira kutaura pamusoro pekuwanikwa neparamende kwavo vaine mhosva yekuedza kumanikidza Ukraine kuti iongorore vaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaJoe Biden nemwanakomana wavo uye nekuedza kudziviridza kuti paramende iongorore nyaya iyi. No media source currently available Asi VaMike Pompeo vanoona nezvekudyizana nedzimwe nyika muAmerica vanoti Suleimani aive munhu anopfurikidza mwero uye akaurayiwa kuchengetedza hupenyu hwevanhu vemuAmerica.

headline: Madzimai Onetsekana Munguva Yaanenge Achitevera kuChimanimani
text: Madzimai ekuChimanimani anoti ari kushaya zvipfeko zvekushandisa kana vachitevera, uye nzvimbo yavanogara haina kuchena izvo zvinogona kukonzera kupararira kwezvirwere zvakawanda. Madzimai ekuChimanimani mazhinji anoti akatarisana nedambudziko rekushaya zvipfeko zvinopfekwa nemadzimai kana achitevera kana kuti ma sanitary pads. Mumwe mugari wemubhuku rekwaChinamira kuSkyline, Amai Sarudzai Kubvenyika, vanoti madzimai mazhinji ave kushandisa madhende ayo avari kutyira kuti anogona kuvakonzeresa zvirwere kunhengo dzavo dzakavandika. Izvi zvakatsinhirwa naAmai Locadia Mapetuka vanogara mubhuku rekwaManzou avo vanoti zvitoro zvizhinji zvakapwanywa nemvuramupengo yeCyclone Idai uye zvimwe zvakavharwa nepamusana pekuti nzira zhinji hadzisi kufambika. Mumwe mugari wemubhuku rekwaMuusha, Amai Idah Mwandiambira, vanotiwo hapana pekurasira madhende anenge ashandiswa nemadzimai anenge achitevera sezvo zvimbuzi zvavaimboshandisa zvakatorwawo nemvura. Amai Mwandiambira vanoti zvirwere zvemanyoka zvinogona kudzika midzi munharaunda yavo sezvo veruzhinji vave kuzvibatsira kuseri kwemakwenzi uye pasina mvura yekunwa yakachena munvimbo zhinji dziri muChimanimani. Kunyange hazvo bazi rehurumende rinoona nezvemvura reZimbabwe National Water Authority rakaisa matangi emvura mune dzimwe nzvimbo dziri muChimanimani, mvura iyi haisi kutora nguva isati yapera sezvo yakawandirwa. Mumwe mugari wemubhuku rekwaMuusha zvakare, VaLiberty Sigauke, vanotiwo vari kufara zvikuru kuti hurumende nevemamwe masangano ari kubatsira vagari vekuno vakavapa mishonga yekuisa mumvura kuti inge yakachena pavanoimwa. Asi VaSigauke vanoti mishonga iyi haizofi yakadzivirira zvachose zvirwere zvemanyoka zvakaita sekorera ne typhoid. Sangano re World Health Organization rinoti vanhu vanosvika zana nemakumi mana vakabatwa nechirwere chekorera muMozambique, sezvo munzvimbo dzakawanda munyika iyi musina mvura yakachena zvichitevera kurohwawo kwakaitwa nyika iyi neCyclone Idai masvondo maviri apfuura. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubazi rehurumende kuti vanhu vangani vabatwa nekorera zvichitevera kurohwa kwakaitwa matunhu eManicaland neMasvingo nedutumupengo reCyclone Idai. Zvichakadai, vanhu vakawanda vakaita sasabhuku Charles Manzou vemubhuku rekwaManzou vanoti hurumende inofanira kupira vanhu chikafu munzvimbo dzavanogara senzira yekuderedza mikana yekuti vagari vatapurirane zvirwere. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rezvehutano VaObediah Moyo, kuti tinzwe matambudziko ari kusangana nevanhu vekuChimanimani vachaagadzirisa sei uye riinhi sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakaudza vagari vekuChimanimani masvondo maviri adarika kuti hurumende yavo ichaedza napose painogona napo kuti igadzirise matambudziko ari kusangana neveruzhinji vakawirwa nedambudziko remafashamu. Kudzamara hurumende yatora matanho nekukasika, veruzhinji muChimanimani vacharamba hupenyu hwavo huri patambo sezvo nyaya yehutsanana iri kuvatemesa misoro zvichitevera mafashamu eCyclone Idai ayo akasiya vanhu zana nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe vafa uye vanhu vanodarika mazana matatu vasiri kuzivikananwa kuti varipi. No media source currently available

headline: NAC Yotsutsumwa neKurambidzwa kweMakondomu muMahotera
text: Vesangano reNational AIDS Council (NAC) vanoti vari kutsutsumwa nenyaya yekuti vemahotera havachabvumidzwa kupa makondomu pachena kuvanhu vanopinda mumahotera avo senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweHIV. Izvi zvakamiswa zvichitevera zvichemo zvakapihwa nevanoshanya kubva kunyika dzechitendero chechiMoslem. Mumahotera senzvimbo dzinowanzosasanirwa nevakawanda manga muchiiswa makondomu senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwemukondombera. Asi izvi zvakamiswa nguva pfupi yapfuura mushure mekunge vechitendero chechiMuslim vatsutsumwa nazvo. Mumwe mukuru muNAC, VaAmen Mpofu, vanoti izvi zvave kukanganisa mabasa avo ekurwisana neHIV/AIDS. Sachigaro veSupreme Council on Islamic Affairs in Zimbabwe, Sheik Ishmael Duwa, vanoti ichokwadi kuti vechitendero chechiMuslim havafarire zvekuti makondomu aiswe mumahotera vachiti izvi zvange zvave kuitwa nemamwe mahotera muZimbabwe. Vanoti kukurudzira kushandiswa kwemakondumu kukurudzira hupombwe. Sheik Duwa vanoti chitendero chavo chinosungira kuti vanhu vasaite zvechipfambi, vamire nemudiwa mumwe chete uye vasapinda pinda vachiti izvi ndizvo zvaita kuti HIV isapararire zvakanyaya munyika dzechiMuslim. Vanoti kunyange hazvo mahotera mazhinji asisina makondomu, pachine zvekwanda zviri kuitika maari zvisingafadze. Vanotiwo vanozwisiziva basa reNAC asi zvakakosha kuti NAC pamwe nevemahotera vashande nezvitendero zvose pazvirongwa zvavo mubasa ravo kuitira kuti vanhu vese vafare. Asi munyori mubazi rezvehutano, Dr. Gerald Gwinji, vanoti zvirongwa zveNAC kusanganisira chekupa vanhu makondomu zvakakosha chose mukurwisana neHIV uye zvinofanira kuremekedzwa nevanhu vese. Dr Gwinji vanoti hausi mutemo wehurumende wekuti mahotera asave nemakondomu. Sachigaro vekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, Dr Ruth Labode, vaudza Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo vanhu vachisungirwa kushandisa makondomu, makondomu aya haafaniri kuve pose pose mumahotera. Zvichakadai mukuru weZimbabwe Council for Tourism iyo inomirira vane makambani anoona nezvevashandi kusanganisra mahotera, VaTich Hwingwiri, vati sangano ravo rinotsigira zvikuru basa reNational Aids Council uye vakazvipira kuita zvese zvinoita kuti nyika ifambire mberi mukudzivirira zvirwere. Vati handinyaya yevanhu vanobva kunze chete iri kuita kuti vemahotera vasaise makondoimu vachiti mahotera inzvimbo dzinopindwa nemhuri nekudaro haafaniri kuonekwa pese pese. VaHwingwiri vatiwo vanhu havarambidzwe kushandisa makondomu uye mamwe mahotera anotori nezvitoro zvinotengeswa makondomu nezvimwe. Patainda pamhepo tange tisati tanzwa kubva kubazi rezvekushanyirwa kwwenyika kuti Zimbabwe inowana vashanyi vangani kubva kumaMuslim countries pagore. Humbowo kubva kuUNAIDS hunoratidza kuti nyika idzi dzine vanhu vashomanana vanHIV kana zvichienzaniswa nenyika dzemuSub Sahara Africa dzakaita seZimbabwe uko vanhu zvikamu gumi kubva muzana zvevanhu vese vaine HIV. No media source currently available

headline: Chimwe Chirwere Chakafanana neCovid-19 Chinonzi Chatangidza Kubata Vana
text: Vanachiremba vanoti chimwezve chirwere chavanoti chakaita se Covid-19 asi chakanangana nevana, chave kunetsa mumatunhu mazhinji muAmerica neku United Kingdom. Matunhu gumi nemashanu muAmerica anoti arikuongorora chirwere ichi, icho chiri kubata vana asi chisati chazivikanwa zvakakwana, vachiti chirwere ichi chakaita se coronavirus. Gavhuna vedunhu reNew York, VaAndrew Cuomo, vanoti vezvehutano mudunhu reNew York vawana vana vanopfuura zana vanechirwere ichi, icho chinonzi chakafanana nechimwezve chirwere chinonzi Kawasaki Desease. Vati magavhuna ematunhu gumi nemashanu muAmerica vave kuongororavo chirwere ichi mumatunhu avo. VaCuomo vati avo vane vana vakamboenda padyo nemunhu ane Covid-19 masvondo apfuura, vanofanirwa kuziva kuti iyi iyambiro uye vanofanirwa kuenda nemwana kuna vanachiremba nekukurumidza. Vana vatatu vane makore mashanu, makore manomwe neumwe ane makore gumi nemasere vatofa nechirwere ichi mudunhu reNew York. Vachipa humbowo mberi kweparamende ye America nemusi weChipiri, chiremba vanoona nezvezvirwere zvinotapuriranwa, Dr Anthony Fauci, vakayambira hurumende nemagavhuna mu America kuti vangwarire chirwere chave kutanga kuonekwa muvana, vachiti chirwere ichi chinoratidza sekuti chine hukama necoronavirus. Vanachiremba kuUnited Kingdom ndivo vanonzi vakatanga kuona chirwere ichi, vachichifananidza nechirwere chinonzi Kawasaki Disease, chirwere chakaipisisa kuvana vanenge vambobatwa nezvimwe zvirwere. Tabvunza nyanzvi mune zvehutano, Doctor Frenk Guni, kuti varondedzere pamusoro pechirwere ichi chanangana nevana vadiki. No media source currently available

headline: Chimwe Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chiri muAmerica Choshuvira Kuti Zvinhu Zvinake Kumusha
text: Mumwe wevanhu vari kushuvira kuti dai zvinhu zvagadzikana kuZimbabwe nekukasika, ndaVaNyanhi Bote, vari kuBoston, mudunhu re Massachusetts, avo vari kushanda samakanika pari zvino. Hazvisi zvose zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kugutsikana nemagariro azviri kuita kunze kwenyika, sezvo vakawanda vachingoshuvira kuti dai kumusha kwaita zvakanaka vadzokera zvavo. Mumwe wevanhu vari kushuvira kuti dai zvinhu zvagadzikana kuZimbabwe nekukasika, ndaVaNyanhi Bote, vari kuBoston, mudunhu re Massachusetts, avo vari kushanda samakanika pari zvino. VaBote, avo vakaberekerwa mumusha weMbare makore makumi mashanu nerimwe apfuura, vanoti vave nemakore gumi nemashanu vapinda muno muAmerica. Kunyange hazvo vakambokwanisa kudzokera kumusha muna 2012 negore rapera ra 2015, vanoti pavakauya muno vaifunga kuti vachangogara kwemakore maviri kana matatu vobva vadzokera zvavo kumusha. Asi zvino vanoti zvinhu hazvisi kuvafambira sematarisiro avaiita vachabva kumusha, ukuwo kumusha kwacho hakuna chiri kufambawo. VaBote, avo vaive foromani mukanzuru yeguta reHarare pavaive vachiri kumusha, vanoti pavakasvika muno vakashanda mabasa akawanda vachitsvaga kurarama kusvika vazowana basa ravo chairo rekugadzira dzimotokari. Kunyange hazvo vave kuita basa ravo chairo, vanoti harisi kuvabhadhara zvakanaka sezvo vari kushanda maawa mashoma pazuva, izvo zvoita kuti vashandewo mazuva akawanda kuitira kuwedzera maawa avo pamwe nekushandisa motokari yavo kutakura vanhu pasi pekambani ye Uber. "kumusha kwacho ndakamboedza kuita maproject ekuvaka dzimba, but vanhu vari kugara mudzimba dzacho vanenge vachingochemawo kuti havana mari, saka hakudzokereke kumusha kwacho," VaBote vanodaro. VaBote vanozivikanwawo zvakare vachiita zvemumhanzi, uye vakatotsikisa dambarefu ravo richaparurwa munguva pfupi iri kutevera. “Ndakatsikisa CD rangu rekutanga naMono rinonzi Shungu. Ndakaripa zita iri maererano nekurarama kwatinoita muhupenyu,” VaBote vanodaro. Vanoti vakapa CD ravo zita iri vachitarisa makuriro avakaita muMbare umo maive neshasha dzairatidza kuti dzine mari, asi kazhinji kacho mari iyi inenge isina kuwanikwa nemabasa akanaka, izvo zvaionekwa nemadyirwo ayaiitwa pamwe nekuvhaira kwevanenge vaine mari ava. Vachiri kumusha VaBote vakamboridza nezvikwata zvinosanganisira Akwaba, vakazobatana nezvimwe zvizvarwa zvemuAfrica zviri muBoston vakaumba chikwata cheMatimba, icho chaipemha mari yekubatsira muzvirongwa zveHIV/Aids muSouth Africa. No media source currently available

headline: Harare Residents Trust Yoronga Kusangana naMeya weHarare Pamusoro peKudzuriswa Chibage kweVagari
text: Rimwe remasangano evagari vemuHarare, reHarare Residents Trust, rinoti rine hurongwa hwekusangana nameya weguta reHarare, VaBernard Manyenyeni, pamusoro pemashoko ekuti kanzuru yakati vagari vari kuSt. Martins nenzvimbo dzakapoteredza, vadzure chibage chavo chakarimwa munzvimbo dzisina kuvakirwa. Mukuru wesangano iri, VaPrecious Shumba, vanoti vanoona sekunge danho rekanzuru iri risiri kukoshesa mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika munyaya dzechikafu, sezvo riri kuuya panguva iyo nyika iri kutatarika nenzara. Svondo rapera kanzuru inonzi yakakurudzira vagari vakarima munzvimbo dzisina kuvakirwa kuSt. Martins, Airport Road nepedyo neCatholic University kuti vabvise chibage chavo kuitira kuti kanzuru ikwanise kutanga kuita basa rekugadzirisa masitendi ekuvakira dzimba zvakarongeka. Kanzuru inonzi ine hurongwa hwekugadzirisa masitendi anodarika mazana maviri nemakumi matatu kuitira kuti itange kupa vanhu pekuvakira dzimba. VaShumba vanoti kanzuru yaVaManyenyeni inofanirwa kunge iri kanzuru iri kushanda nevanhu vakasarudzwa nevanhu, kwete vatungamiri vezvematongerwo enyika. “Dambudziko riripo nderekuti kanzuru yedu yatsemuka nepakati, nekuti pane vamwe vashomashoma vane kwavanowana mashoko ekutaurira nyika, saka kana kanzuru ichitaura kudai iri kurwisa vagari,” VaShumba vanodaro. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri weguta reHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti hachisi chokwadi kuti kanzuru yavo iri kuda kuti chibage chose chakarimwa munzvimbo idzi chibviswe. VaChideme vanoti kanzuru yavo inongove nehurongwa hwekuti vagari vashomashoma vabvise chibage chavo munzvimbo dikidiki yavari kuda kuisa migwagwa nepombi dzemvura netsvina. “Takazivisa vagari venzvimbo inonzi St. Martins kuti pavakarima chibage pane patinoda kuvhura nzira, patiri kusevhisa masitendi ekuti vanhu vawane pekugara panotenderwa,”VaChideme vanodaro. Vanoti vanhu ava vagara vachingoudzwa makore ose kuti apa pachauya dzimba, apa pachauya dzimba, asi iye zvino kanzuru yeHarare ndipo payave kuda kuchitanga kuita basa rayo. VaChideme vanoti kanzuru yavo iri kutanga svondo rino kugadzira migwagwa yekuti vatange kuita basa rekugadzira pekuvakira dzimba iri. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoti Iri Kuongorora Zvakaitika muKanzuru yeBulawayo
text: Meya veguta reBulawayo, VaSolomon Mguni, vanoti bazi rezvekutongwa kwematunhu ravazivisa kuti richatuma chikwata chevanhu kuBulawayo kunoongorora zvakaitika mukanzuru yeBulawayo, zvinosanganisira kumiswa basa kwakange kwaitwa munyori weguta, VaChristopher Dube, nemutevedzeri wameya, VaTinashe Kambarami, pavakambofanobata chinzvimbo chameya. VaMguni vati zvichawanikwa nevaongorori ava zvichabudiswa nehurumende mumavhiki mashoma arikutevera. MuBulawayo makamboita kusagadzikana pakati pemarudzi kusvika meya, pamwe chete nebato reMDC rinotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, rapindira. Asi nyanzvi mukurongwa kwemaguta, VaPrince Sibanda, vanoti bazi rezvekutongwa kwematunhu harifanirwi kupindira munyaya iyi zvachose, vachiti nyaya iyi inofanirwa kugadziriswa nekanzuru yeBulawayo. VaSibanda vanoti havanzwisisi kuti sei hurumende ichida kupindira munyaya dzekanzuru iyo kanzuru isati yashandisa mapazi ayo ese mukugadzirisa nyaya iyi.

headline: ZCTU Yoyambira Kumwe Kuratidzira Sezvo Mitengo Yoita Chamurambamhuru
text: Rimwe sangano revashandi re Zimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions kana kuti ZCTU rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru nemitengo yezvinhu kana kuti inflation zvekuti hazvishamise vashandi vakaratidzira. NeMugovera sangano reZimbabwe National Statistics Agency kana kuti Zimstats rakazivisa kuti mitengo yezvinhu kana kuti inflation yakwira kusvika pamazana masere nemakumi matatu nemanomwe kubva muzana kana kuti 837, 53%. Muna Chikumi mitengo yezvinhu yaive pazvikamu mazana manomwe nemakumi matatu nemanomwe kubva muzana kana kuti 35, 53%. Gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vanoti nhaurirano dzemihoro dziri paviri, kuTripartite Negotiating Forum dzinobata nyika yose, asi dzimwe dzinoitwa kumaindustry nemaNational Employment Councils. No media source currently available Munyori mukuru weZCTU VaJaphet Moyo vanoti mushandi aomerwa nezvinhu zvekuti havashamisike akatanga kuratidzira. No media source currently available Sezvo tisina kusimbira divi rimwe chete setsvimbo, tabatawo mutungamiri wesangano revashandirwi reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe kana kuti EMCOZ Doctor Israel Mure avo vati vanoda kuwedzera vashandi mari asi vari kutatarikawo nekushaya mari sezvo makambani asiri kushanda nemazvo nekuda kwechirwere checoronavirus. No media source currently available

headline: Zvitoro Zvovharwa kwaMutare nekuChinhoyi
text: Vanhu vakawanda muChinhoyi vakateerera kurudziro yekuti vasaende kumabasa sezvo zvitoro zvakawanda, mabhangi nezvipatara zvanga zvakavharwa. Kuratidza kuti zvinhu zvanga zvisina kumira zvakanaka vanhu vanoita mabasa emaoko havana kuenda kubasa kana kumisika. Mabhangi akaita seStandard Bank neBancABC anga akavhara ukuwo mabhangi anga akavhura anga asina mari yekupa vanhu. Izvi zvakakonzera kuti vanhu vashoma vanga vauya mudhorobha vakurumidze kudzokera kumba. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, muguta reMutare mange muine runyararo asi muine mapurisa anodzivirira nyonga nyoga akawanda mumigwagwa nemumisika. Mabhazi anotakura vanhu kuenda kunzvimbo dziri kure ange ari mashoma pamusika weHuku. Muzvikoro zvizhinji vadzidzisi vange vachitoonekwa vari panze vachitodziya zvavo mushana, zvigaro zvevana zvakakwidibirwa, vamwe vana vachitamba pazvivanze zvezvikoro zvavo. Chikoro che 3 Brigade chete ndicho change chakavhurwa. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari vemuMaguta Voshora Makanzuru neKutadza Kuwanira Vanhu Mvura Yakachena
text: Masangano anomirira vagari mumaguta nemadhorobha ari kushoropodza makanzuru achivapomera mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu nekutadzayekutadza kuwanisa vanhu mvura yakachena. Izvi zvakabuda pamusangano wakaitwa muHarare nemusi weChina wakapindwa nemapazi ehurumende akasiyana siyana, makanzuru uye vagari vemumadhorobha. Sachigaro weCombined Harare Residents Association, VaSimba Moyo, vanoti musangano uyu wakabatsira kuti vakwanise kuonesana neve makanzuru nezvekukomba kwedambudziko remvura. VaAnoziva Muguti, mutungamiriri weMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance kana kuti MURRA vati mudhorobha ravo kodzero dzevanhu dziri kumbunyikidzwa nekanzuru iri kuvavharira vagari mvura. Vemasangano aya vataura kuti makanzuru ari kutyora chikamu chechimakumi manomwe nemanomwe chebumbiro remutemo renyika icho chinopa vagari kodzero yekuwana mvura yakachena nguva dzose. Vamwe vakaita saVaPrecious Shumba, veHarare Residents Trust (HRT), vati mune dzimwe nzvimbo muHarare dzakaita seMabvuku, vanhu vatove nemakore akawanda vasingawani mvura. Vatizve mvura yemuguta mavo hainwike nekuti haisi kucheneswa zvakakwana nekanzuru yavo. Asi vanotungamirira bazi remvura mukanzuru yeHarare, Engineer Hosiah Chisango, vati kanzuru yavo inochenesa mvura vachisvitsa pachipimo chinodiwa ne bazi reUnited Nations rinoona nezvehutano reWorld Health Organization. “Tinoshanda nemaresidents representative ose muno muHarare tichivaudza kuti mvura yedu yakachena ngavanwe.” Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Tiri kuonesana kuti quality yedu iri kuimprover, ikozvino 96% ye masamples atiri kutesta ari kupasa saka hapana hutachiona hunowanikwa.” Meya weguta reMasvingo, VaHubert Fidze vaudzavo musangano uyu kuti nyaya yekushwaikwa kwemari munyika nemariro ehupfumi hwenyika zviri kukanganisa makanzuru kuti ape vagari mvura yakakwana. “Dambudziko remvura sekuona kwandaita muno mukati meZimbabwe ririko sezvabuda mumusangano uno.” Vanotiwo, “Dambudziko guru riripo nderemari. Vanhu vawanda mumaguta asi supply yakaramba akadaro. Tine mari yatiri kuda kuti tiwedzere mvura asi mari hatisi kuiwana.” Vemasangano anomirira vagari vatenderana kushanda pamwe nevanotungamira maguta kuti vabude nemazano ekupedza dambudziko remvura, vachikurudzira kuti vagari vabhadhare mvura uye vemakanzuru vashandise mari iyi zvakanaka. Nyaya yekushaikwa kwemvura yakachena ndiyo inopa kuti nyika itarisane nematambudziko akaita serecholera uye typhoid. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vanoti Mitemo yeCovid-19 Haisi Kushanda Kudzivirira kweMhando Itsva yeOmicron.
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemakumi masere nemaviri kana kuti 1082 vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 chikauraya munhu mumwe chete. Izvi zvinoreva kuti vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave zviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 4, 709. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vave zviuru zana nemakumi matatu nemasere zvine mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nematatu kana kuti 138, 523. Mumazuva matatu adarika, vanhu vanodarika chiuru chimwe chete vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi pazuva. Vanhu mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi matanhatu nemashanu zvine mazana maviri nemakumi masere nemanomwe kana kuti 3 867 287 vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kekutanga. Vanhu vabayiwa kaviri sezviri kukurudzirwa vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi manomwe nematanhatu zvine makumi mashanu nematanhatu kana kuti 2 876 056. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba mukupera kwemwedzi uno kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana. Zvichakadaro, apo huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi hwave kukwira zvakanyanya, vaimbova gurukora rezvehutano Doctor Henry Madzorera vanoti mimwe mitemo yakadzikwa nehurumende kwemavhiki maviri kuyedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi haina zvakawanda zvainobatsira. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakadzika mitemo inosungira vashanyi munyika kumbogara pavo vega kwemazuva gumi uye kuvhenekwa Covid-19 panhandare yendege.

headline: Dare Ropa Mutongo Waro paNyaya yeVashandi veNRZ neChipiri
text: Nyaya yekuramwa mabasa kwevashandi vekambani ye National Railways of Zimbabwe, NRZ, yapinda mudare re labour court muBulawayo neChishanu zvichitevera kukwira kwakaita NRZ kudare iri ichiti kuramwa mabasa kwevashandi uku kuri kunze kwemutemo. Nyaya yekuramwa mabasa kwevashandi vekambani ye National Railways of Zimbabwe, NRZ, yapinda mudare re labour court muBulawayo neChishanu zvichitevera kukwira kwakaita NRZ kudare iri ichiti kuramwa mabasa kwevashandi uku kuri kunze kwemutemo. Mutongi wedare iri, Evangelista Kabasa, vanonzi vati achapa mutongo wavo nemusi weChipiri svondo rinouya. Mumagwaro ayo kudare iri, NRZ inoti vashandi vayo vanosvika mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mana nevaviri havana kupa chiziviso chemazuva gumi nemana chekuti vachapinda pakuramwa mabasa. Masvondo maviri adarika gurukota rezvemabasa nevashandi, Amai Prisca Mupfumira, vakakurudzira vashandi ava kuti vadzoke pamabasa vachimirira kuti nyaya yavo inzwikwe kudare asi vashandi havana kutambira kurudziro iyi. Vashandi vanoti vakapinda pakuramwa mabasa kuburikidza nezvinhu zvakawanda zvinosanganisira mashandiro avo pamwe nekusauya kwemihoro yavo. Vashandi ava vanoti vave nemwedzi inodarika gumi nemishanu vasati vatambiriswa mari dzemihoro idzi. Mutungamiri werimwe sangano rinomirira vashandi veNRZ, re zimbabwe Amalgamated Railways Workers’ Union, VaKamurai Moyo, vanoti NRZ inofanirwa kubhadhara vashandi vayo kana ichida kuti varambe vari pamabasa. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inocherechedza Zuva reMagamba VaMugabe Vachishora Vanopikisa
text: Zimbabwe yakacherechedza zuva remagamba nemusi weMuvhuro mutungamiriri wenyika,VaRobert Mugabe vachishora zvakaitwa nemasoja zvekurova mapurisa nguva pfupi yapfuura vachiti izvi zvinokanganisa mabasa ekuchengetedza nyika. Vachitaura pamarinda eHeroes Acre, VaMugabe vakati vakataura nevakuru-vakuru vemasoja vakavaudza kuti izvi hazvifaniri kuitika zvakare. VaMugabe vatiwo vanoda runyararo sezvo nyika yatarisana nesarudzo dzegore rinouya. Mukuru webato re Multi Racial Christian Democracts, VaMathias Guchutu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mashoko aVaMugabe akanaka chose sezvo nyika ichifanira kuva nerunyararo. VaMugabe vakashorawo vamwe varimi vechitema avo vati vave kushanda nevamwe varimi vechichena avo vakambenge vatiza munyika. Mutungamiri wenyika akashorawo vamwe vanhu vemuZimbabwe avo vati vanotsigira zvirango zvehupfumi zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nenyika dzakaita seBritain. Vakaenderera mberi vachitiwo hazvigoni kuti nhengo dzebato rinopikisa dziradzikwe panzvimbo inovigwa magamba yeHeroes Acre. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaJonstone Chirwai vaudza Studio 7 kuti zuva remagamba rakakosha chose uye vanhu vemuZimbabwe vano remekedza magamba kunyange hazvo vasiri kufara nemaitiro emamwe magamba akaita semutungamiriri wenyika VaMugabe. Vatiwo zuva remagamba izuva ravanonyanyorangarira magamba aya asina kudzoka kubva huhondo. Mukuru webato rinopikisa reFreezim Congress, VaJoseph Busha vati zuva remagamba rakakosha chose uye magamba ose anofanira kuchengetedzwa nehurumende. Mumashoko avo pazuva remagamba, mutungamiriri webato guru rinopikisa reMovement for Democractic Change, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vati zuva riri rakakosha chose uyewo zvinofadza kuti vakarwa muhondo yerusununguko vave kuonawo kuti vakarwira munhu mumwe chete nemhuri yake. Vakaendera mberi vachiti magamba akarwisa hurumende yehudzvanyiriri yeRhodesia asi hapana kana mutsauko uripo pakati payo nehurumende yaVaMugabe. VaTsvangirai vati vanhu vese vanofanira kunyoresa kuti vavhote musarudzo dzegore rinouya kuitira kuti vachengetedze rusununguko rwavo. Vatiwo vechidiki havafanire kubatwa kumeso naVaMugabe pamisangano yavari kuita mumatunhu akasiyana siyana, vachiti vechidiki ava vanofanira kuziva kuti remangwana renyika riri mumaoko mavo. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reVarairidzi, reARTUZ, Rokurudzira Varairidzi Kutora Zororo reKugadzirisa Matambudziko Avo
text: Rimwe sangano revarairidzi, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, rinoti riri kukurudzira varairidzi vane matambudziko anoda kugadziriswa nechimbichimbi kuti vatore zororo remazuva mashanu ekugadzirisa matambudziko avo kutanga neMuvhuro 16 kusvika Chishanu 20 mwedzi uno, inove svondo inouya. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaObert Masaraure vanoti mutemo unobvumidza varairidzi kutora zororo iri, iro rinonzi Compassionate Leave, pasi pechikamu 41 (g) chemutemo yePublic Service kana kuti Public Service Regulations. VaMasaraure vanoti varairidzi vakatarisana nematambudziko akawanda ari kukonzerwa nemari dziri pasi dzavari kutambiriswa anoda kugadziriswa, uye vanoti havaoni vakuru vezvikoro vachinyima varairidzi mukana uyu. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuPublic Service Commission panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: ZEC Inoti Sarudzo dzeMakanzuru kuBulilima Dzatanga neNguva Uye Dziri Kufamba Zvakanaka, ZESN Ichiti Yagutsikanawo neGadziriro yeZEC
text: Komisheni inotungamira sarudzo munyika, yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, inoti sarudzo dzemakanzuru mumawadhi anoti 1, 14 ne 16, kuBulilima dzatanga zvakanaka uye nzvimbo dzose dzekuvhotera dzavhurwa nenguva yakatarwa ya 7 dzemangwanani. Ongororo yaburitswa nguva dzemasikati nesangano reZESN, iro riri kuongorora mafambiro ari kuita sarudzo idzi, inoti sangano iri riri kugutsikana negadziriro yeZEC pamwe nekuvhura nenguva kwaitwa nzvimbo dzekuvhotera. ZESN inotiwo yaona kuti zvikwanisiro zvose zvinodiwa pakuvhota zvanga zvave panzvimbo dzekuvhotera dzose nenguva. ZESN inoti kusvika panguva dzemasikati vanhu makumi mana vanga vabatsirwa kuvhota munzvimbo nhatu dziri kuvhoterwa, makumi matatu nemumwe wavo vari vanhu vasingaoni. Sangano iri rinotiwo vanhu vashoma ndivo vabuda kunovhota musarudzo idzi. Mapato anoti ZANU-PF, Citizens’ Coalition for Change neZAPU ndiwo ane nhengo dziri kukwikwidzana musarudzo idzi.

headline: Nyanzvi dzezveMatongerwo eNyika Dzopesana paMaonero Adzo Pane Zviri Kukonzera Mhirizhonga muNyika
text: Imwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika inoti kusamira kwezvinhu zvakanaka munyika kuri kuitika iye zvino kuri kukonzerwa nekunonoka kwehurumende kugadzirisa zvinhu, izvo zvave kuita kuti vana veZimbabwe vanyunyute. Izvi zvinotevera mhirizhonga yaitika muHarare yakonzerwa nevemakombi vanga vachinyunyuta nekuwanda kwemapurisa mumigwagwa, vanonzi vanenge vachida chioko muhomwe. Kutaridzira nemhirizhonga izvi zvinouya mazuva mashoma nyika yasangana nekumwe kuratidzira kukuru kwakaitika kuBeitbridge neChishanu chapfuura, vanhu vachinyunyuta nemutemo unorambidza vanhu kupinza zvinhu munyika. VaCharles Mutasa, avo vanoshanda vakazvimirira vanoti hurumende yakarara nezamu mumukanwa payakaregerera zvinhu zvichienda kumawere munyaya dzekuwondomoka kweupfumi, izvo zvoita kuti imukirwe nevana vayo. “Hurumende yedu yakaregerera zvinhu nekuti kana wakaona kuti kunetsa kwemari mumabhanga, hakuna kungotanga, asi kuti zvinhu zvakaitika munguva hombe,” VaMutasa vanodaro. Asi imwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika uye vari sachigaro weZanu PF kuUnited Kingdom, VaNick Mangwana vanoti hurumende iri kuziva nezvematambudziko ose aya, uye iri kuita zvose zvainogona kuti igadzirise zvinhu. “Hurumende iri kuziva matambudziko ose aya, uye iri kuita zvose zvainogona kugadzirisa zvinhu. Chainokumbira chete ndechekuti vanhu vaipe nguva yekugadzirisa zvinhu,” VaMangwana vanoti zvinhu zvichanaka kubva muna Gunyana, vachiti kuuraya midziyo kuri kuitwa nevanhu vari kuratidzira hakuna zvakunobatsira. No media source currently available

headline: Covid-19 Yoramba Ichiuraya Vanhu Vakawanda Munyika
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa pamwe nekubatwa nechirwere che Covid-19 huri kuramba huchikwira mazuva ose, izvo nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti mucherechedzo mukuru wekukomba kwaita chirwere ichi munyika. Izvi zvinotevera kufakwevanhu makumi matatu nevatatu nezuro nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19, pamwe nekubatwa nechirwere ichi kwevanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mana nemakumi mana nevaviri, 1 442, nezuro wakare. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano uye vakambove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa,Dr Henry Madzorera, vati kukwira kwehuwandu nekufa kwevanhu mucherechedzo mukuru wekudzika kwemidzi kwaita chirwere cheCovid-19. VaMadzorera vati chitsvambe chave kumumhu wese kuitira kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Imwe nyanzvi munya dzezvehutano uye vari mumiririri weChinhoyi mudare reNational Assembly, VaPeter Mataruse, vatiwo zvinoshungurudza kuti vanhu vari kuzara kundufu izvo zvinoita kuti vatapurirane chirwere ichi. VaMataruse vati veruzhinji vanofanirwa kutevedzera mitemo inobata Covid-19, uye vagare mudzimba. Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, Va Donald Mujiri, vati bazi ravo riri kurwadziwa zvakanyanya nekufa kuri kuramba kuchiita vanhu munyika zvichikonzerwa neCovid-19. VaMujiri vakurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vanobaiwa nhomba pamwe nekutevedzera mitemo yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 kusanganisira kupfeka mamasiki vakavhara mhuno nemuromo, kugeza maoko nguva dzose, kusaungana uye kumira mumitsetse vanhu vakatarangana. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vava chiuru nemazana masere nemakumi mana nemumwe(1841), uye vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vava zviuru makumi mashanu nezviviri nemazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nevatatu, 52, 663. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga vakanga vava zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi masere nezvisere nevana, 788,004, uye vabayiwa nhomba yepiri vakanga vava zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nezvina nemazana manomwe negumi nevana, 564,714. Huwandu uhu hunotarisirwa kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichizivisa zvayawana nhasi. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba yeCovid-19 vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti pachine mutoro mukuru wekuti hurumende ibaye vanhu nhomba nehuwandu hwairi kutaura pachitariswa huwandu hwevanhu vabayiwa nhomba kusvika pari zvino. No media source currently available

headline: Homwe yeAmerica yePEPFAR Inopa Mari Kune Vanorarama neH-I-V Yekudzivirira COVID-19
text: Hurumende yeAmerica yapa rubatsiro rwemari inoita madhora zana nemakumi mashanu ezviuru zvemari yekuAmerica kuburikidza nehomwe yePresident’s Emergency Plan for Aids Relief, (PEPFAR), iyo ichabatsira vanorarama nehutachiwana hweH-I-V mukudzivirira chirwere che COVID-19. Mashoko aburitswa nemuzinda weAmerica uri muZimbabwe anoti mari iyi ichashandiswa kutenga zvinhu zvakaita sesipo, migoro, nzvimbo dzekugezera maoko, pamwe nemishonga inouraya hutachiwana yekuzora mumaoko kana kuti sanitizers, zvichapiwa kumasangano agara achibatsirwa nehomwe iyi. Mari iyi inonzi ichashandiswawo zvakare mukudhinda magwaro anopa ruzivo pamusoro pechirwere cheCOVID-19 ichi. Mwedzi wapera America yakapa World Health Organisation mari inoita mazana mana nemakumi manomwe ezviuru zvemadhora yekuti ibatsire Zimbabwe mukurwisana ne COVID-19. Mukuru anoona nezvezvirongwa musangano reNational Aids Council, VaRaymond Yekeye, vanoti sesangano vanotenda zvikuru nezvaitwa nehomwe yePEPFAR izvi sezvo Zimbabwe iri kudawo rubatsiro rwekurwisanawo nechirwere cheCOVID-19 senyika dzose pasi rino. Mari iyi inonzi ichasvitswa kumasangano matatu agara anoshanda nePEPFAR anoti OPHID, I-TECH neZACH, ayo achazoita basa rekugovera zvinhu izvi. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzonetsa neNyaya yeMishonga yeChivanhu
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti vanhu vanofanirwa kungwarira kusashandisa mishonga inenge isina kubva kuna vana chiremba vakadzidzira kuita basa rekupa vanhu mishonga inorapa zvirwere zvakasiyana siyana. Kurudziro iyi inouya mushure mekunge vanhu vakawanda vava kushandisa mishonga yechivanhu sezvo vari kutadza kuwana mishonga zvichitevera mari yekunze yavasina, iyo iri kudiwa nezvitoro zvinotengesa mishonga. Mumwe chiremba anoshanda nekiriniki yePublic Medical Services International, Dr Sydney Mukonoweshuro, vari kukurudzira zvikuru vanorwara neHigh Blood Pressure pamwe nechirwere cheshuga kuti vasashandisa mishonga yechivanhu isina kuongororwa, sezvo mishonga iyi ichikwanisa kuwedzera kuvhiringa hupenyu hwemurwere. Kunyange hazvo munyika musina mari yekunze, Dr Mukonoweshuro vanoti hazvina kunaka zviri kuitwa nezvitoro zvemishonga zvinoomesera vakwegura nekuvabhadharisa madhora ekuAmerica. Dr Mukonoweshuro vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kuumba homwe yemari inotenga mishonga yeshuga nokuti murwere haafanirwe kupedza mazuva maviri asina kupihwa mushonga we insulin. Asi maonero aDoctor Mukunoweshuro anopesana zvikuru nemaonero aSister Yulittah Chirawu, avo vanoshanda neNature Is The Pharmarcy, iyo iri pasi pechita cheLittle Children of Our Blessed Lady. Sister Chirawu vanoti mishonga yema herbs iri kubatsira zvikuru varwere veshuga nezvimwe zvirere zvakasiyana siyana. Sister Chirawu, avo vakadzidzira kushandiswa kwema herbs kuBritain, vanoti donzvo rekereke yavo yeRoman Catholic, nderekubatsira vanhu vanoshaya, zvikuru madzimai kuitira kuti varapwe zvirwere zvakasiyana siyana vachibhadhara mari shoma. Mumwe chiremba asina kuda kudomwa nezita rake anoti zvakakosha kuti munhu ane chirwere cheshuga apote achinwa mishonga nguva dzose, kuitira kuti asawedzere kuvhiringa hutano hwake. Dr Mukonoweshuro vanoti sezvo munyika muine dambudziko remari yekunze, zvakakosha panguva ino kuti hama dziri kunze kwenyika dzibatsire hama dziri kumusha nekudzitengera mishonga inogona kushandiswa kwemwedzi mitatu, kana kudzitumira mari yekunze. Masangano anoshanda munyaya dzehutano muZimbabwe ari kukurudzirawo kuti zvirwere zveshuga ne BP, zvirapwewo pachena sezvinoitwa zvimwe zvirwere. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rebazi rezvehutano pakurudziro iri kuitwa iyi. Asi vachitaura nguva pfupi yapfuura pamberi pekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, munyori mubazi rezvehutano, Doctor Gerald Gwinji, vakati bazi ravo rakanzi richapihwa chidimbu chemari yarakanga rakumbira yebhiriyoni imwechete nemazana matatu emamiriyoni emadhora mubhajeti regore rinouya. VaGwinji vakati izvi zvichatadzisa bazi ravo kuita basa raro nemazvo, uye kutadza kuwanisa mishonga kuvanhu vanoshaya. Ongororo yakaitwa nebazi rezvehutano inoratidza kuti munhu mumwe chete kubva pavanhu gumi, ane chirwere cheshuga muZimbabwe. Izvi zvinoreva kuti zvikamu gumi kubva muzana zvevanhu vemuZimbabwe, vane chirwere cheshuga. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inoti Hupfumi Hwayo Huchakwira neZvikamu Zvishanu neChidimbu Kubva Muzana
text: Zimbabwe inoti iri kutarisira kuti hupfumi hwenyika huchakwira nezvikamu zvishanu nechidimbu kubva muzana gore rinouya. Izvi zvataurwa negurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, apo vaparura bhajeti renyika regore rinouya remazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nematatu emabhiriyoni emaRTGS. VaNcube vati hurumende inotarisira kuunganidza mari inosvika pamabhiriyoni mazana masere nemakumi mashanu nemamiriyoni mazana manomwe (850.7 billion RTGS) asi ichitarisira kushandisa mabhiriyoni mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nematatu (923 billion RTGS). Vati vanhu havafaniri kushushikana nekuti hurumende ichashandisa mari yakawanda kudarika mari yaichawana sezvo vachashandisa dzimwe nzira kuti mari iyi ikwane. VaNcube vatiwo vanotarisira kuwana rutsigiro rwemazana manomwe nemakumi matanhatu nemana emamiriyoni emadhora ekuAmerica (US$764million) kubva kumasangano nenyika dzinopa rubatsiro. Vati kurima, nekutengesa zvicherwa, kugadzira nekutengesa zvinhu kunze kwenyika ndizvo zvimwe zvichaita kuti nyika iwane mari Mapazi ezvekurima nedzidzo yepasi ndiwo awana mari dzakawandisa uye apihwa 124 billion RTGS pabazi rimwe. VaNcube vapa bazi rehutano mabhiriyoni 111.7 emaRTGs vachiti vasara padiki diki kusvika pazvikamu gumi nezvishamu zvebhajeti rese izvo zviri zvinosungirwa nechisuungo cheAbuja Declaration. VaNcube vapawo mari yakawanda kumaguta nemadhorobha vachiti anofanira kuvandudza mabasa ekupa vanhu mvura yakachena, kugadzira migwagwa kuti vanhu vagare zvakanaka. Kunyange hazvo mamwe makomisheni akazvimirira apihwa mari dziri pasi pebhiriyoni kana dziri pamusoro zvishoma, Zimbabwe Electoral Commission yapihwa maRTGS 11.6 billion sezvo pachitarisirwa kuitwa sarudzo dzemaBy-Elections. VaNcube vatiwo vanoda kuti vashandi vagare zvakanaka nekudaro vashandi vanotambira mari iri pasi pe30 000 RTGS havachabhadhari mutero. Vatiwo vashandi vanohora mari iri pasi pe100 000 RTGS vanowana bhonasi vasingatirwi mutero. VaNcube vataura nzira dzakawanda dzekuunganidza mari dzinosanganisira kubata mutero pafodya kuti mari yacho igoshandiswa kurapa zvirwere zvakaita segomarara. Izvi zvatambirwa nemufaro nevakawanda vanosanganisira sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, Dr Ruth Labode. Asi Dr Labode vati havana kufara nemari yapihwa kubazi rezvehutano vachiti mari iyi ishoma kana pachitariswa kuti denda reCovid 19 richipo. VaJohnson Madhuku, vanove nhengo yekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvedzidzo, vati vafara nemari yapihwa kubazi rezvehutano vachiti zvichasimudzira dzidzo munyika. Asi sachigaro wekomiti inoona nezvemhando dzemoto, VaJoel Gabuza, vati kunyange hazvo bhajeti rakanaka, chakakosha kuti mapazi ehurumende apihwe mari idzi vachiti kusvika pari zvino mapazi akawanda apihwa zvikamu makumi matatu chete kubva muzana zvemari dzebhajeti regore rino. Bhajeti raturwa nhasi rinofanira kupasiswa nematare eNational Assembly neSenate kuitira kuti ritange kushanda. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi Munyika Vocherechedza Zuva Ravo reVashandi Vakaomerwa
text: Sangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Union, ZCTU, rinoti gore rino vashandi vari kucherechedza zuva ravo revashandi mangwana zvinhu zvakavaomera kudarika mamwe makore ose aya. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo vanoti gore rino vashandi vakaomerwa zvakanyanya nekuda kwekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu asi mihoro yavo isina kwairi kuenda. Vanotiwo chimwe chakanyanya kuomesera vashandi kuvharwa kwemakambani pamwe nekushaikwa kwemabasa kune vanga vasiri kushanda. ZCTU inoti ichacherechedza zuva revashandi iri munzvimbo makumi maviri neimwe munyika yose, asi gungano guru richange riri kunhandare yeDizvarasekwa muHarare. Dingindira resangano iri gore rino, iro rinoti “We are at a Crossroads! Unite, Fight Neoliberalism and Austerity,” riri kukurudzira vashandi kuti vabatane, varwise kuraswa kwetsika dzavo pamwe nekudzikwa kwemitemo inovaomesera, zvikuru mune zveupfumi. No media source currently available Asi munyori werimwe sangano revashandi, reZimbabwe Industrial Revolution Worker's Federation, VaPascoe Ekemu Chakanetsa, vanoti nekuda kwekuoma kwezvinhu, sangano ravo raona zvakakodzera kuti vashandi vasaungana zvavo gore rino. VaChakanetsa vanoti sangano ravo rine huron gwa hwekusangana nehurumende mushure mezuva revashandi, kana zvabudirira vozozivisa vashandi zvinenge zvabuda mumusangano uyu. No media source currently available

headline: Mabhizimisi Akagarwa Matunduru neCovid19 Anoti Dambudziko reMagetsi Rauya Panguva Yakaipa
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kuyambira kuti Zimbabwe haisi kuzokwanisa kuti hupfumi hwayo hukure nezvikamu zvinodarika zvinomwe kubva muzana nekuda kwekushaikwa kwemagetsi. Zesa yakazivisa kuti inenge yodzima magetsi kwemaawa gumi nemaviri pazuva sezvo magwenya ayo asiri kushanda zvakanaka. Kambani iyi inoti iri kuwana magetsi mashoma kubva kugwenya rinoshandisa marasha reHwange uye iri kugadzirisawo magwenya anoshandisa mvura kuKariba. ZETDC inotiwo magetsi airi kutenga kubva kuMozambique neSouth Africa mashoma pane ari kudiwa. Mushure mekutatarika kwemakore maviri nekuda kwekusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura uye chirwere cheCovid-19, gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Nthuli Ncube vakati vanenge vachitarisira kuti hupfumi hwenyika huchakwira zvakanyanya gore rino. Bhanga guru rinokweretesa mari pasi rose reInternational Monetary Fund rinoti kana zvihu zvose zvakaringana, hupfumi hweZimbabwe huchakwira nezvikamu zvitanhatu kubva muzana. Asi vaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato reMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, vanoti nyaya yemagetsi igangaidzwa kumukwenyi mhezi yavavira mudumbu vati hurumende yakundikana kugadzirisa dambudziko remagetsi kwemakore anodarika makumi mana. Mukuru weZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, VaChris Mugaga, vatendawokuti magetsi anokwanisa kugwadamisa hupfumi hwenyika. Vati vemabhizimisi vachanyanya kuomerwa sezvo vachiri kuyedza kubuda mumadhaka mavari zvakonzerwa nechirwere cheCovid-.19. Vachipawo pfungwa dzavo, pakugadzirisa dambudziko, vaimbova gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto, VaFortune Chasi, vati hurumende inofaira kubuda negwara rakajeka kusanganisirawo kukurudzira vanhu kushandisa simba rezuva uye kugadzira mamwe magwenya. ZETDC inotiwo nzvimbo dzakakosha dzakaita sezvipatara, kunocheneswa mvura yekunwa uye kunzvimbo dzinoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwenyika ndidzo dzichawana magetsi. Hatina kukwanis akubata gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto, VaSoda Zhemu, kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vabatwa neCovid-19 Hunoramba Huchikwira Munyika
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika huri kuramba huchikwira zvakanyanya zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwevamwe gumi nevanomwe (17) vaine chirwere ichi pakati pevanhu zviuru zviviri nemazana mana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu (2 495) vakavhenekwa nemusi weChina. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neChina manheru kuti huwandu hwevanhu vane chirwere cheCovid-19 munyika yose hwange hwave pazana nemakumi mana nevapfumbamwe (149). Vanhu vapona kubva kuchirwere ichi vasvikawo pamakumi maviri nevasere (28), uye vafa nechirwere ichi vachiri vana (4). Izvi zvinouya panguva iyo vanachiremba pachipatara cheGweru Provincial Hospital vakabudirira neChina wakare kusunungutsa mudzimai aive nepamuviri ane chirwere cheCovid-19, muchiitiko chinove chekutanga muZimbabwe. Sangano ravanachiremba vakuru, reZimbabwe Senior Hospital Doctors Assciation, rinoti vanachiremba ava vakakwanisa kusunungutsa mudzimai uyu kuburikidza nekumuvhiya kuti vakwanise kuburitsa mwana. Huwandu hwevanhu vavhenekwa kuti vane chirwere cheCovid-19 here kana kuti kwete munyika yose hunonzi hwasvika pazviuru makumi mana nemazana masere ane makumi mana nevanomwe (40 847). Chipatara cheJohns Hopkins chemuAmerica chinoti pasi rose huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi hwadarika mamiriyoni mashanu nemazana masere ezviuru (5,8 million), kuchitiwo vafa vadarika mazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu ezviuru (360 000). Chipatara ichi chinoti vanhu vaongororwa pasi rose vadarika mamiriyoni gumi neshanu nemazana matanhatu ezviuru (15.6 million). Muno muAmerica vanhu vanodarika miriyoni nemazana manomwe ezviuru (1.7 million) vabatwa nechirwere ichi, uye vashaya vadarikawo zviuru zana nechimwe nemazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri nemumwe chete (101.621). Mumwe chiremba ataura akazvimirira, Doctor Gilson Mandigo, vanoti zvinotyisa kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa chirwere che Covid-19 hwanyanya kukwira zvikuru svondo rino. Asi vanoti chakanaka panyaya iyi ndechekuti vanhu ava vari munzvimbo dzavakachengetedzwa kana kuti quarantine centres, zvekuti havakwanise kuparadzira chirwere ichi kune vamwe vagara vari munyika.
