Doctor Mandigo vakorokotedzawo kubudirira kwakaita vanachiremba vekuchiptarata cheGweru Provincial Hopsital, vachiti mucherechedzo wekuti hazvisi zvinhu zvose zvakashata zviri kubuda mubazi rezvehutano, kune zvimwe zvakanakawo zviri kuitika, kunyange hazvo vanachiremba navanamukoti vari kushupika. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kufa neCovid-19 Hunokwira muNyika
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nezuro kuti huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwakanga hwasvika pazana nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 189, mushure mekushaya kwevamwe vanhu gumi. Vanhu makumi mana nemumwe kana kuti 41 ndivo vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi pavanhu mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mashanu nemumwe kana kuti 951, vakavhenekwa kuona kana vaine chirwere ichi. Pavanhu ava, makumi matatu nevasere kana kuti 38 vanhu vagara vari munyika, kuchiti vamwe vatatu kana kuti 3, vari vanhu vakadzoka munyika vachibva kuSouth Africa. Vanhu zviuru zvitanhatu nemazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri kana kuti 6 292, vakabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose, kunyange hazvo paine vamwe vanosvika zviuru zvishanu negumi kana kuti 5 010. vapora kubva kuCovid-19. Izvi zvinosiya vanhu chiuru nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatatu, kana kuti 1 093 vachine chirwere ichi. Izvi zvinouya panguva iyo sangano reCommunity Working Group on Health riri kudzidzisa vanotungamira nyaya dzehutano munharaunda pamusoro peCovid-19 uye kuti chirwere ichi chingadzivirirwa sei. Mukuru wesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti sangano ravo rakabatana nebazi rezvehutano riri kushanda pamwe nemakanzuru kupa ruzivo kune vanoita zvehutano mumadhorobha nemumaruwa. Vanoti vawaniswawo mabhasikoro akawanda kwazvo nesangano re World Bicycle Relief, ayo achashandiswa zvikuru mumaruwa mukurwisana nedenda iri. Zvichakadaro, Johns Hopkins University Hospital, iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kweCovid-19 pasi rose, inoti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemana nemazana mana ezviuru, kana kuti 24,400 000 vabatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose, icho chaurayawo vamwe vanodarika zviuru mazana masere nemakumi matatu nezviviri kana kuti 832 000. America ndiyo iri pamusoro pasi rose iine vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi matanhatu nezvipfumbamwe, kana kuti 5, 869 000 Vanhu vafa muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana nemakumi masere kana kuti 180 000. South Africa, iyo iri pamusoro muAfrica yose, ine vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matanhatu negumi nezvisere kana kuti 618 000 vabatwa nechirwere ichi, kuchitiwo vafa nacho vadarika zviuru gumi nezvitatu zvine mazana matanhatu, kana kuti 13 600. No media source currently available

headline: VaChamisa Vanoti muNyika Munoda Nhaurirano dzeChokwadi neKuti Zanu-PF Yoremerwa
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMDC VaNelson Chamisa vanoti munyika mave kuda kuitwa nhaurirano sezvo zvinhu zvaramba zvakaita manyama amire nerongo munyaya dzezvehupfumi nematongerwo enyika. Mitengo yezvinhu iri kuramba ichiitachamurambamhuru uye vakawanda vave kunonga svosve nemuromo. Mashoko aVaChamisa aya anotevera mashoko akataurwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa ekuti VaChamisa vakaramba kuti bumbiro rivandudzwe kuti vapihwe chiremerachekuti vaite mutungamiri webato rinopikisa mudare reparamende senzira yekutanga nhaurirano. VaMnangawa vakataura mashoko aya aponyika yaipemberera zuva rekuzvitonga kuzere panhepfenyuro yeZBC. Asi VaChamisa vanoti havawirirane nenyaya yekungopihwa ivo chigaro asi mhuri yeZimbabwe ichitambura. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri waVaMngangagwa vaGeorge Charamba kuti tinzwe divi ravo sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vana Vanobata Chirwere cheTyphoid muHarare
text: Mukuru webazi rezve hutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Dr Prosper Chonzi, vanoti chirwere chetyphoid chadzoka muHarare zvikuru mumisha yevazhinji yeBudiriro neGlenview. Pari zvino pane vanhu vana vari kunzi vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vamwewo vachinzi vachiri kuongororwa. VaChonzi vari kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vafashaidze mvura yekumwa uye kudziyisa chikafu nekuteedzera kurudziro dzose munyaya dzezvehutano kuti vadzivirire kutapuriranwa kwechirwere ichi. Dr Chonzi vanoti vanenge vachifungidzira kuti vabatwa nechirwere ichi vanofanirwa kuenda kukiriniki iri pedyo navo kuitira kuti vawane rubatsiro nguva ichiripo. Vanoti kanzuru iri kuyedza kudzidzisa veruzhinji nezvenzira dzekuzvidzivirira kuti vasatapurirwe kana kutapuririrana chirwere ichi. No media source currently available Vamwe vanhu vakawanda muguta reHarare vari kubatwawo nemanyoka nekuda kwekushaikwa kwemvura yakachena, kana kuti kushaikwa kwayo zvachose. Meya weguta reHarare, VaBernard Manyenyeni, vanoti vari kuyedza nepavanogona napo pose kugadzirisa dambudziko remvura muguta.

headline: Murume Akambotiza kuWilkins Anowanikwa Asina Coronavirus
text: Chizvarwa chekuThailand chekumbokatiza muchipatara cheWilkins muHarare neSvondo kwachaifanirwa kuongororwa kana chiine coronavirus chinonzi chazoongororwa neChipiri chawanikwa chisina hutachiwana uhwu. Mukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeguta reHarare, Doctor Prosper Chonzi, zvabuda muongororo yaitwa iyi zvinoratidza kuti murume uyu haana chirwere ichi, izvo zvaita kuti abva aregwa achienda kumba kwake. Murume uyu anonzi adzoka ega kuchipatara ichi mushure mekutsvagwa nemapurisa achishaikwa. Murume uyu anonzi akabva kuThailand mazuva makumi maviri adarika akaitwa ongororo ye coronavirus pakupinda kwaakaita munyika, izvo zvakaratidza kuti muviri wake waidziya zvakanyanya. Izvi zvinonzi zvakazoita kuti aendeswe kuWilkins Hospital, uko akazongotsakatika. Hapana ati awanikwa aine chirwere ichi muZimbabwe kunyange hazvo paine vanhu vanoVanhu vana muSouth Africa vanonzi vakawanikwa vaine hutachiwana hwecoronavirus neMuvhuro, izvo zvasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vave nechirwere ichi pavanomwe munyika iyi. Vakambove gurukota rezvehutano uye vari ivo munyori anoona nezvehutano muMDC inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vanoti panofanirwa kutorwa matanho akasimba ekuchengetedza vanenge vafungidzirwa kuti vangave nehutachiwana hwechirwere ichi, vachiti zvakaitika paWilkins Hospital hazvifanirwe kodzokororwa nekuti zvinoisa ruzhinji rwevanhu munjodzi. Doctor Madzorera vanoti bazi rezvehutano rinofanirwawo kushambadza zvakasimba nezvechirwere ichi, uyewo kuisa nhare mumatunhu ose emunyika ekuti vanhu vanokwanisa kufona chero nguva vachitaura pamusoro pechirwere ichi. Vari kukurudzirawo kuti pave navanautsanana vanofamba vachiongorora vanhu kuti vane hutachiwana here kana kuti kwete, pane kumirira kuti munhu anofungidzira kuti ane chirwere ichi aende iye kuchipatara. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reARTUZ Ronyunyuta Kuti Nhengo Dzaro Dziri Kuramwa Mabasa Dzave Kutyisidzirwa
text: Kuramwa mabasa kwenhengo dzesangano revarairidzi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, kwapinda muzuva rechina nhasi, sangano iri richiti dzimwe nhengo dzaro dzinosanganisira munyori mukuru, VaRobson Chere, dzave kutyisidzirwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori pamwe nenhengo dzebato reZanu PF. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reZanu PF kanawo divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure vanoti kune vakaita musangano ku Acturus mudunhu reMashonaland East kunove kunodzidzisa VaChere, vachida kuti mudzidzisi uyu abviswe pachikoro ichi. VaMasaraure vanotiwo hakusi kuActurs chete kwavari kusangana nekutyisidzirwa kwenhengo dzavo, sezvo varairidzi vari kusangano nedambudziko iri mune mamwe matunhu. Asi vanoti huwandu hwevarairidzi vari kuramwa mabasa huri kuramba huchiwedzera zuva nezuva vachiti ongororo yavo inoratidza kuti varairidzi vangangoda kusvika pazvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana ndivo chete vaenda kumabasa mune zvimwe zvikoro. Varairidzi vanoti vari kuda kuti mihoro yavo idzoserwe pamari dzavaitambira muna Gumiguru 2018, uye kuti vanyorerane zvibvumirano nehurumende zvekuti vabhadharwe kunyoresa vana bvunzo. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro, kuti tinzwe kuti kuramwa mabasa uku kwakanganisa zvakadii dzidzo muzvikoro? No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVana Vanotapurirwa HIV paKuzvarwa Hwoderera
text: Hurumende inoti madzimai zviuru makumi manomwe ndivo chete vakabatwa vaine hutachiwana hweHIV/AIDS gore rino. Mutevedzeri wemukuru anoona nezvekutapuriranwa kweHIV kubva kuna amai kuenda kuvana, kana kuti Prevention of Mother To Child Transmission, PMTCT, Dr Nyikadzino Mahachi, vanoti pamadzimai aya, vana vanosvika zvikamu zvipfumbamwe kubva muzana ndivo vakatapurirwa chirwere cheHIV naamai vavo. Hurumende inoti uyu munongedzo wekuti zvirongwa zvawo zvekudzivirira kutapurirwa kwechirwere ichi kuvana huri kushanda. Chirongwa ichi chakaparurwa muna 2001 nehurumende ichishanda nemasangano akazvimirira. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera veMDC-T, vanoti zviri kuitwa nehurumende zvinofadza uye chinangwa ndechekuti pasave kana nemwana mumwe anotapurirwa hutachiona naamai vake. No media source currently available

headline: WHO Inoti Iri Kufara neZviri Kuitika Mukurwisa Covid-19 muZimbabwe
text:
Mumiriri wesangano reWorld Health Organization muZimbabwe, Dr
Alex Gasasira, varumbidza zviri kuitwa nehurumende mukurwisa denda
reCovid-19 asi vayambira kuti vanhu havafanirwe kurivara mukuramba
vachitevedzera zvose zvinokurudzirwa nenyanzvi dzezvehutano
pakudzivirira denda iri. Vachitaura pagungano rekudzidzisa vamwe vagari vemuBulawayo
nezvekodzero dzavo dzakasiyana-siyana munzvimbo inogara veruzhinji yeSidojiwe, Dr Gasasira vati vanofara zvikuru kuti hapana vanhu vemunzvimbo iyi vati vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19, zvisinei nematambudziko akawanda avakatarisana nawo, kusanganisira kugara vakawanda panzvimbo imwe chete.

Dr Gasasira varumbidzawo hurumende nematanho airi kutora pakurwisa
denda reCovid-19 kusanganisira kuunza nhomba munyika. Asi vayambira kuti veruzhinji havafanirwe kuvarairwa pakuramba vachitevedzera zvose zvinotaurwa nenyanzvi dzezvehutano pakurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 sezvo chichiri kutekeshera pasi rose, vakakurudzirawo kuti vanhu vabaiwe nhomba.

Dr Gasasira vaudza Studio7 kuti sangano ravo riri kubatsirawo
nyika nenzira dzakasiyana siyana kusanganisira kuona kuti vashandi
vezvehutano varamba vachipiwa dzidziso pamusoro pechirwere
cheCovid-19 pamwe nekubatsira kuwana zvipfeko nezvimwe zvinodiwa
pakurwisa chirwere ichi. Vachipawo maonero avo pamabatiro aita hurumende denda reCovid-19
kusvika pari zvino, vakambove gurukota rezvehutano uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Dr Henry Madzorera, vati hurumende ine zvayakagona zvakawanda kusanganisira kuedza kutevedzera matanho anokurudzirwa neveWorld Health Organization pakudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19.

Asi VaMadzorera vati hurumende ichine basa guru rekupa vashandi vezvehutano pamwe neveruzhinji dzidziso izere pamusoro pechirwere checovid-19 vachiyambirawo kuti nyika haifanirwe kuvarairwa
pakurwisa chirwere ichi.

Studio7 haina nkukwanisa kunzwa kumutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isingabatike.

Gungano raitwa paSidojiwe range riri chikamu chechirongwa chekushanya
kwevakuru vakuru vemapoka esangano reUnited Nations, International Organisation for Migration, International Labour Organisation vachiona
zvirongwa zvakasiyana siyana zviri kuitwa nemasangano anoshanda
akazvimirira avanotsigira mukubastira veruzhinji, kunyanya
vanotambura, nenzira dzakasiyana-siyana.

Mumashoko akabudiswa nebazi rezvehutano nezuro, vanhu vashanu
vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro wakare, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ihi pachiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nevashanu, 1565. Vanhu makumi matanhatu nevaviri vakabatwa neCovid-19 nezuro izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi pazviuru makumi matatu nezvesere nezana nemakumi matanhatu nevana, 38 164. Vanhu vapora kuchirwere ichi munyika yose vava zviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu nemazana mana nemakumi masere, 35 480.

Kusvika nezuro munyika mange mave nevanhu mazana matatu
nemakumi manomwe ezviuru nemazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe netanhatu nevanomwe, 370 676, vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga, uye pave nevanhu zviuru makumi matanhatu nezvitatu nemazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nevatatu, kana kuti, 63 263 vabaiwa nhomba yepiri kusvika nezuro. Huwandu uhu huri kutarisira kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichazivisa zvayawana muongororo dzaitwa nhasi. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba yeCovid-19 vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoyambira Nhengo dzeZanu PF Kuti Dzingwarire veMasangano Akazvimirira
text: Mutungamiriri wenyika, vari zvakare mutungamiriri webato reZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanoyambira nhengo dzebato ravo kuti dzichenjerere masangano akazvimirira munyika. Vachivhura musangano wePolitburo kumuzinda webato ravo muHarare neMugovera, VaMnangagwa vati nhengo dzebato ravo dzinofanirwa kungwarira masangano akazvimirira nevamwe vasori avo vasingadi kuona Zimbabwe yakasununguka, vachiti masangano aya ari kuhwanda nenyaya yekudzidzisa veruzhinji nyaya dzekuvhota. Asi murongi wemabasa musangano reZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, unova mubatanidzwa wemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaWilbert Mandinde vati havana chinangwa chekuve hurumende uyewo vanokatyamadzwa nekutya kunoita bato reZanu PF masangano akazvimirira. VaMandinde vakurudzirawo bato iri kuti rishande pamwechete nemasangano akazvimirira. VaMnangagwa vatiwo vanoda kuti bato ravo rikwanise kuhwina sarudzo dzema by-elections pamwe nekutora zvigaro zvaive nenhengo dzemapato anopikisa. Vakurudzira nhengo dzavo kuti dzienderere mberi nezvirongwa zvekukwezva vavhoti vachiti vanoda kukunda zvine mutsindo pasarudzo dzema by-election pamwe nesarudzo dziri kutarisirwa 2023. Vayambirawo nhengo dzebato ravo idzo vati dziri kukonzera nyonga nyonga pamwe nekusawirirana mubato vachiti avo vanoda kuparadza bato iri ndivo vachazoguma vaparara. VaMnangagwa vakatomisa basa vaimbove gurukota rezvekuchengetedzwa kwenyika, VaOwen Mudha Ncube, avo vainzi vaikonzerawo nyonga nyonga, kunyanya mudunhu reMidlands. VaMnangagwa vatiwo vari kushushikana nemafashamu emvura kune dzimwe nzvimbo, vakakurudzira vanobatsira veruzhinji munguva yenjodzi dzakadai, veCivil Protection Unit kuti vagare vakagadzirira kubatsira vanenge vawirwa nedambudziko iri. Vakurudzirawo avo vasina kubaiwa nhomba kuti vabaiwe vachiti nyika ine nhomba dzakawandisa. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari vemuHarare Vanoti Mitemo yeHurumende Yopa Kuti Nzara Ipfunye Chisero Mudzimba Dzavo
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti kunyange hazvo hurumende ichibvuma kuti hupfumi hausi kufamba zvakanaka uye kuti veruzhinji havasisina mabasa gore rino yakatora matanhano akawedzera kutambudzika kweveruzhinji akaita sekuvatandanisa mumigwagwa umo vaitengesa kuti vawane raramo pamwe nekuvaputsira dzimba ichiti dzimba idzi dzainge dzavakwa munzvimbo dzisingabvumidzwe. Gore rino hurumende yakapa mvumo kumakanzuru kuti adzinge vanotengesa mumigwagwa zvikuru sei panzvimbo dzisingabvumidzwe ichiti vaisvibisa maguta nemadhorobha. Asi vanhu ava vanoti makunzuru aya ari kutadza kuvapa nzvimbo dzavano kwana vese sezvo vawanda zvikuru nekuda kwekushaikwa kwemabasa. Izvi zvaita kuti gore ra2015 ripere vashandi vemakanzuru nemapurisa vachiita hwakiti nagonzo nevanotengesa mumigagwa. Mukuru werimwe remasangano anomirira vanotengesa mumigwagwa reZimbabwe Informal Sector Organization zvakare vari mutauriri wemubatanidzwa wemasangano anomiriria vanotengesa mumigwagwa reInformal Economy Coalition, VaPromise Mkwananzi, vanoti kunyange nhengo dzavo dziri kushungurudzwa vacharamba vachitengesa mumigwagwa sezvo pasina zvimwe zvavangaite. VaMkwananzi vanoti nhengo dzemasangano avo dziri kurasikrwa nemari yakawanda chose apo dzinotorerwa zvinhu zvadzo nemakanzuru nemapurisa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaMasimba Manyanya vanoti pane kushungurudza vanhu, makanzuru pamwe nehurumende vanofanira kugadzirisa dambudziko raita kuti vanhu vagume vave mumigwagwa vachitsvaga chouviri. Asi VaPaddington Japajapa avo, vanomirira sangano remabhizimisi reZimbabwe Centre for Business for Opportunities, vanoti kunyange hazvo vanhu vayaura nenhamo havafaniri kurarama nekuita zvinhu zviri kunze kwemutemo. VaJapajapa vanoti sangano ravo rinotsigira vemabhizimisi madiki nevanotengesera mumigwagwa asi rinodawo kuti vatevedze mitemo vachiti zvimwe zvave kutikita mumaguta hazvina kunaka sezvo vanhu vave kutengesera pese pese. V ashorawo danho rakatorwa nehurumende rekurambidza kupinda munyika mbatya neshangu tsaru vachiti izvi ndizvo zvave kuraramisa veruzhinji sezvo makambani anogadzira mbatya akavhara. Imwe nyaya isina kufadza veruzhinji kuputsirwa dzimba dzavo nekanzuru muHarare neChitungwiza nekanzuru vachinzi vainge vadzivaka panzvimbo dzisingabvumidzwe. Asi VaManyanya vanoti zvinoshamisa kuti makanzuru anorega vanhu vachivaka nekushandisa mari dzakawanda achimirira kuzoparadza chete. VaManyanyaya vanotiwo masangano anomiriria vagari a anofanirawo kudzidzisa veruzhinji mutemo nematanho anofanira kutedzwa nemunhu asati avaka. Asi VaJapajapa vanoti vanhu havafanira kuvakapa pese pese vachiti dzimwe dzimba dziri kuputswa dzakavakwa panzvimbo dzisingaite dzakaita sepasi petambo dzemagetsi kana nzvimbo dzinofanira kuvakwa zvikoro kana machechi. Vanotiwo vamwe vanhu vaivaka nechisimba vachishandisa zvematongerwo enyika. Vanongorora nyaya dzehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakaitika zvese izvi zvakakonzera kutambura kwanyanya sezvo zvakaita kuti vanhu varasikirwe nemari yakawanda. VaKuchera vanoti mhuri zhinji munyika hadzichakwanisa kurarama sedzaiita kare. VaKuchera vanoti hurumende inofanira kuisa mutemo inokwezva vemabhizimisi kuti vatange mabhizimisi munyika kuti veruzhinji vakakwanise kuchengeta mhuri dzavo. Vanoti mhuri zhinji dzaparira nepasi rese dzichitsvaga raramo uye zvinofungidzirwa pane zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinodarika mamiriyoni matatu zvave kugara kunze kwenyika. Vazhinji vevanhu ava vari kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa neBritain. No media source currently available

headline: America Yobatsira Kanzuru yeHarare
text: America inoti ichabatsira kanzuru yeguta reHarare kuitira kuti ikwanise kupedzisa kuvandudza chipatara cheWilkins pamwe nekugadzirisa mamwe matambudziko akatarisana neguta guru renyika. Vachitaura neStudio7 mushure mekusangana nemumiririri wemuzinda weAmerica muZimbabwe, Ambassador Brian Nichols, meya weguta reHarare, VaHerbert Gomba, vati vakumbira kubatsirwa kupedzisa hurongwa hwekuvakapachipatara cheWilkins uhwo hwakamira makore gumi nemaviri apfuura. VaGomba vati kanzuru iri kuda mari inosvika mamiriyoni mashanu emadhora emuZimbabwe kuti vaenderere mberi nehurongwa hwepaWilkins. VaGomba vatiwo vapira kuna VaNichols matambudziko avari kusangana nawo munyaya dzekuchenesa mvura yekunwa pamwe nedambudziko remvura dzetsvina. Vatiwo vakurukura nezvekuvandudzwa kwematongerwo eguta kuitira kuti vapote vachipiwawo hunyanzvi. Meya weHarare atiwo awirirana kushanda pamwechete neAmericamukugadzirisa nharaunda iri pedyo nekune muzinda uyu. Ambassador Brian Nichols vatsigirawo vachiti vaita hurukuro vachitsanangurirwa matambudziko ari kusanganwa nawo neguta reHarare. Kanzuru yeHarare inoti kuwondomoka kwehupfumi hwenyika kuri kukonzera kuti itadze kuita mabasa ayo nemazvo sezvo veruzhinji vari kutadzawo kubhadhara mitero kukanzuro yavo.

headline: Hurumende Yoita Nhaurirano dzeMari neMusi weChina neVashandi Vayo Vange Voronga Kuramwa Mabasa
text: Hurumende nemusi weChina iri kutarisirwa kuita musangano nevashandi vayo vari pasi pesangano reZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions raimbozivikanwa nekuti Apex Council nezvenyaya yemuhoro. Izvi zvinotevera yambiro yevashandi ava yekuti vainge voronga kuratidzira sezvo hurumende isiri kuratidza kuzvipira pakuvawedzera mari. Asi gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, negurukota rezvevashandi, VaPaul Mavima, vanoti vakazvipira kuti vataurirane nevashandi nenekuvawedzera mari. Musangano uyu uri kuitwa pasi pegungano reNational Joint Negotiating Council. Nhaurirano dzakamboitwa mavhiki maviri adarika asi hapana chakabuda nekutadza kuwirirana panyaya yekuti vashandi vobatirwa here mari pahomwe yakaumbwa nehurumende yeGovernment Employees Mutual Savings (Gems) yavanozokwanisa kukwereta uye nyaya yemari yemuhoro yekubatsirikana kana kuti Cost of Living Adjustment. Hurumende inonzi yaida kuwedzera vashandi nemari inosvika zvikamu makumi maviri nemashanu kubva muzana kana kuti 25% zvakarambwa nevashandi vari kuti hurumende yakawedzera vari muchiuto nevamwe nemari inodarika zana nemakumi mashanu kubva muzana kana kuti 150%. VaMavima vati nhaurirano dzakakosha uye dzinofanira kuitwa sezvo kuramwa mabasa kuchidzosera nyika kumashure. No media source currently available Mutauriri weZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions, VaGibson Mushangu, vanoti vanoda kutambiriswa mari inosvika pamazana mashanu nemakumi maviri yekuAmerica kana kuti US$520. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Vanoti Hapana Chekupemberea Kuzvitonga Ivo Vasina Chikafu
text: Apo nyika iri kucherechedza neMugovera kusvitsa makore makumi matatu nemashanu yawana kuzvitonga, nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi pamwe neveruzhinji vanoti hapana chekupemberera sezvo vanhu vazhinj vari kutambura uye hupfumi hwenyika hwadzikira zvakanyanya kudarika zvahwaive huri muna 1980. No media source currently available Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Instititute of Zimbabwe, VaProsper Chitambara, vanoti Zimbabwe yakawana zvayo kuzvitonga munyaya dzematongerwo enyika asi pane kutambura kukuru munyika sezvo hupfumi hwenyika hwadzikira uye kutambura kwanyanya zvikuru munyika. Vanoti semuenzaniso hupfumi hwenyika hwange hwakasimba muna 1980 pane zvahwave nhasi. VaChitambara vanoti kudzikira kwehupfumi kwakakonzerwa nemitemo yehurumende pamwe nemamwe matanho ayakatora akaita sekubhadhara vaimbove varwiri verusununguko izvo zvange zvisina kurongwa mubhajeti remuna 1997, kupindira muhondo yemuDemocratic Republic of Congo, pamwe nezvirongwa zvehupfumi zvakaita seEconomic Structural Adjustment Program icho chakaitwa muna1991 kusvika muna 1995. VaChitambara vanoti zvese izvi nezvimwe zvirongwa zvehurumende zvakaita sekutorwa kweminda zvakasiya hupfumi hwenyika huchidonha izvo zvakakonzera kuvhara kwemakambani, nekurasikirwa kwebasa kwevanhu vakawanda. Vanoti kunyange vashandi vashomanana vasara vari kuwana mihoro iri pasi peyaiwanikwa muna1979 Zimbabwe isati yawana kuzvitonga. Mumwe mutapi wenhau anonyora nhau dzemabhizimisi akazvimirira, Tawanda Karombo, anoti hapana chekupemberera nekuti vanhu vave kutotambura kudarika zvavaive pasati pave nkuzvitonga kwevanhu vatema. Imwewo nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, VaJames Johwa, vanotiwo hapana chekupemberera sezvo zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichishata munyika. Vanotiwo zviri pachena kuti kubvira muna 1980, kusvika pari zvino, hurumende iri kukoshesa zvematongerwo enyika isingasimudzire mabasa ehupfumi munyika. Vechidiki vakawanda vanoti vari kushishikana chose kuti havasi kuona rubatsiro rwerusununguko sezvo vari kushaya mabasa kunyange hazvo vakaenda kuchikoro. Mumwe wevechidiki ava ndiVaDenford Ngadziore, munyori wevechidiki mudunhu reHarare mubato reMDC inotungamiririrwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai. Vanoti vanoda chose kushanda vachisimudzira nyika asi vari kushaya mukana nekuti hakuna mabasa. Muzvare Natalie Nyakanyanga, avo vanogara mumusha Braeside muHarare, vanotiwo havana chikonzero chekupemembera sezvo vasina mabasa uye vari kutonetseka nehupenyu. Nyanzvi dzinoti kunyange hazvo hurumende yakaedza napose painoga napo kugadzirisa zvinhu munyaya dzedzidzo nehutano mumakore gumi ekutanga nyika yawana kuzvitonga, haina zvayakaita kugadzirisa nyaya dzehupfumi. Maindasitiri, mabhanga, nemakambani ari kuvhara zvekutoti vanhu vazhinji munyika vave kuzvishandira. Sangano revashandi, reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, rinoti vanhu vasina mabasa vasvika pazvikamu zvinodarika makumi masere kubva muzana. Mamwe makambani mahombe aive nezviuru nezviuru zvevashandi anosanganisira Shabanie and Mashaba Mines, Ziscosteel, Mhangura Mines nemamwe akawanda. Zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyika zvekuti nyika yakatomira kushandisa dhora remuno muna 2009 mushure mekunge rarambwa neveruzhinji nekuda kwekushaya simba zvakanyanyisa. VaJohwa vanoti chinodiwa kugadzirisa hupfumi kuita sarudzo dzakajeka, posarudzwa hurumende inoisa zvirongwa zvekukwezva vemabhizimisi vekunze kuti vazodyara mari dzavo munyika. Zimbabwe inocherechedza neMugovera makore makumi matatu nemashanu yawana kuzvitonga. Asi veruzhinji vanoti zvinhu zviri kunetsa munyika zvekuti kana hurumende chaiyo iri kunetseka kubhadhara vashandi vayo uye yakatozivisa kuti haichakwanisa kubhadhara mari dzemabhonasi kutanga gore rino.

headline: Bhodha reBeitbridge Rinombovharwa Zvichitevera Mhirizhonga
text: Zvinhu zvinonzi hazvina kumira zvakanaka pabhodha reZimbabwe neSouth Africa reBeitbridge apo panonzi vanhu varwisana nemapurisa zvichitevera kuratidzira kwaita nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe, vemabhazi, vedzimotokari dzinotakura zvinhu pamwe nevezvitoro, vachinyunyuta nedanho rakatorwa neZimbabwe rekurambidza kupinzwa kwezvinhu zvakasiyanasiyana munyika. VaDennis Juru, vesangano reInternational Cross Borders Association, avo varatidzira vari kudivi reSouth Africa vanoti vezvitoro, vanosanganisira verudzi rwechi India nevekuChina vabatanawo navo pachiitiko ichi, icho chinonzi chavharisa divi rebhodha rekuMessina kwemaawa anosvika kana kudarika mashanu. Asi kudivi reZimbabwe zvinhu zvinonzi zvanga zvakasiyana zvikuru sezvo vanhu varatidzira ava vazopedzisira vapisa hofisi yeZIMRA inochengeterwa zvinhu zvinenge zvatorerwa vanhu. VaJuru vanoti danhu rehurumende rekurambidza kupinzwa kwezvinhu iri richaita kuti mhuri dzakawanda dzinorarama nekutengesa dzitambure. “Isuwo ticharamba tichi ratidza kunyunyuta kwedu kuburikidza nekuratidzira kusvika hurumende yeZimbabwe yatinzwa,” VaJuru vanodaro. Hurumende yakadzika mutemo unorambidza kupinzwa munyika kwezvigadzirwa zvakaita sadovi, jam, mikaka, zvekuvakisa zvakaita semadhoofuremu, madhoo acho, mabhara nezvimwe zvakawanda zvainoti zvinogadzirwawo munyika nemakambani emo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Mamiriyoni Matatu Vofa neCovid-19 Pasi Rose
text: Pasi rose, huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hwadarika mamiriyoni matatu. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi inoti vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose vadarika zana nemakumi mana nezviuru mazana masere zvemamiriyoni kana kuti, 140, 800 million. MuAfrica mune vadarika mamiriyoni mana vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Vapora pasi rose vadarika mamiriyoni makumi masere kana kuti 80, million. Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weMugovera kuti munhu mumwe chete akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kuManicaland zvasiya vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kuparaira gore rapera vave chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nevaviri kana kuti 1, 552. Vanhu zana nemakumi matanhatu nevashanu kana kuti 165 vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 neMugovera zvasiya huwandu hwevabatwa nacho hwave pazviuru makumi matatu nemanomwe zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 37, 699. Vanhu makumi maviri nevana kana kuti 24 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ich zvasiya vanhu vapora vave zviuru makumi matatu nemashanu nevashanu kana kuti 35, 005. Vanhu vakabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 yekutanga vave zviuru mazana maviri zvine makumi manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu kana kuti 276, 095. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kaviri sezvinokurudzirwa nenyanzvi vave zviuru makumi matatu nemashanu zvine mazana masere nevatanhatu kana kuti 35, 806. Zvichakadaro bazi rezvedzidzo raburitsa mashoko kuvatori venhau richiti rave kusimbaradza zvirongwa zvekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 muzvikoro. Mutauriri webazi rezvedzidzo VaTaungana Ndoro vati zvakakosha kuti paitwe mushandirapamwe pakati pevabereki, varairidzi uye vadzidzi uye bazi rezvedzidzo richange roshanda nebazi rezvehutano kuona kuti patevedzerwa zviri kukurudzirwa kuti chirwere chisapararire. No media source currently available Bazi rezvehutano riri kuyambira kuti zvikoro zvisingatevedzere mitemo iyi zvinogona kuvharwa. Munyori mukuru musangano werimwe sangano rinomiririra vararaidzi reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe kana kuti ARTUZ VaRobson Chere vanoti hurumende haisi kuita zvakakwana kuwanisira zvikoro zvikwanisiro zvekurwisa denda reCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Vodomwa seMunyarikani weWHO Anomirira Zvirwere Zvisingatapuriranwe muAfrica
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakadomwa nesangano reWorld Health Organisation, WHO, semunyarikani achange akamirira Africa munyaya dzezvirwere zvisingatapuriranwe, kana kuti non communicable diseases. VaMugabe, avo vane makore makumi mapfumbamwe nematu, vakadomwa mazuva maviri apfuura pamusangano uri kuitirwa ku Uruguay. VaMugabe vakaenda kumusangano uyu vachiperekedzwa negurukota nezvekunze, VaWalter Mzembi, gurukota rezvehutano, VaDavid Parirenyatwa, pamwe nemamwe makurokota ehurumende. Vachitaura vari kuUruguay, VaMzembi vaudza Studio7 kuti ichokwadi kuti VaMugabe vadomwa semunyarikani izvo zviri kufadza nyika. "Ichokwadi VaMugabe vawana ruremekedzo rwekuve, WHO Ambassador for NCD's, Africa," VaMzembi vaudza Studio7. VaMugabe vachange vari pachinzvimbo ichi kwemakore maviri, uye basa iri haribhadharwe mari. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti dziri kushamiswa nezvaitwa neWHO zvekudoma mutungamiri ari kukundikana kugadzirisa nyaya dzehutano munyika make izvo zviri kupa kuti vakuru vakuru muZimbabwe varapwe kunze kwenyika. VaMugabe pachavo vanogara vachibuda munyika vachinorapwa kuSingapore.

headline: National Economic Consultative Forum Yokurudzira Kurwiswa kweHuwori muNyika
text: Sangano rinotarisa nyaya dzehupfumi munyika reNational Economic Consultative Forum nhasi raparura gwaro idzva rinotarisa mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika munyaya dzezvehupfumi richi kuridzira kuti huwori hupere kuitira kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire. Gwaro raparurwa iri rinoti hupfumi hwenyika huri kutadza kukura pamusana pehuori hwatekeshera munyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vachishanda nesangano reNECF, VaGodwin Murehwa, vanoti huwori hukaramba hwakapfunya chisero munyika zvinhu zvinoramba zvakamira nemusoro munyika. VaMrehwa vati imwe nyaya inofanira kusimbaradzwa kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire inyaya yekurima. Vanga vari muenzi ano remekedzwa pakuparurwa kwegwaro reNECF iri uye vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mngangagwa vati huwori hukapera munyika zvinoitawo kuti hurumende ikwanise kudyidzana nedzimwe nyika pamwe nemasangano anobatsira nemari. “Tinofanira kushanda zvakasimba kuti huwori hupere munyika. Kupera kwehuwori munyika kunoitawo zvakare kuti vanoda kuzosima mari dzavo munyika vauye vakasununguka,” VaMnangagwa vanodaro. Mashoko aVaMnangagwa aya anouyawo apo mumwe wevatedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika VaPhelekezela Mphoko vari kutsoropodzwa nevamapato anopikisa pamwe nevemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira. VaMphoko vanonzi vari kuvhiringidza kurwisana nenyaya dzehuwori nenyaya yekuvhariridza kwavanonzi vakaita kuferefetwa kwenyaya yegurukota rezvedidzo yepamusoro, Muzvinafundo Jonathan Moyo. VaMphoko vanonzi vakapindira kuti VaMoyo vasasungwe nevekomisheni inorwisana nehuori yeZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission. VaMoyo, avo vanove zvakare nhengo yeparamende inomirira Tsholotsho, vanonzi vakatora mari inoda kusvika kuzviuru mazana mashanu zvemadhora kubva kuhomwe yeZimbabwe Manpower Development Fund, iyo vakashandisa mukutenga mabhasikoro akapiwa madzishe nevamwe kuTsholotsho. Asi vari kuzvidzivirira vachiti vakatora mari iyi kuti vabatsire vanhu vanotambura vachizvifananidza naRobin Hood, mbavha yekuEngland yaibira vapfumi ichipa varombo kunyika iyi. VaMphoko vakati kusunga VaMoyo kwaizokonzera kusagadzikana muhurumende. Zvichakadai, munyori mukuru musangano revashandi reZimbabwe Industrial Revolution Workers Federation, VaPascoe Chakanetsa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti nyaya yehuwori inonetsa kupedza munyika kana pane makororo anobatwa sezai. Zvichakadai, VaMnangangwa vakurudzira kuti pave nekutaurirana pakati pehurumende, vemabhizimusi, vashandi nevashandirwi nechinangwa chekutsvaga nzira dzekupedza huwori munyika. NECF inotiwo chimwe chiri kuita kuti zvinhu zvisafambe zvakanaka mukuitwa kwemabhizimusi munyika inyaya dzekuti vemabhizimusi havasi kukwanisa kuwana mari kumabhanga pamwe nekunonoka kunoita mapazi ehurumende mazhinji kufambisa mapepa anenge asvitswa kwaari nevemabhizimusi. Zvichakadai, VaMnangagwa vati hurumende ichaedza pose painogona kugadzirisa matambudziko ese ataurwa aya kuitira kuti zvemabhizimusi munyika zviite mutserendende. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHutano Dzoshushikana neKukwira kweHuwandu hweVanhu Vari Kubatwa neCovid-19 Munyika
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa kuti vanhu makumi matanhatu nevashanu kana kuti 65, vakabatwa vaine chirwere cheCovid-19 munyika yose, uye vamwe vanhu vana vakafa nacho kuBulawayo pavanhu chiuru nezana rine makumi maviri nevatatu, kana kuti 1123 ,vakavhenekwa nemusi weChina. Dunhu reBulawayo, iro ratarisana nedambudziko rekuve nevanhu vakawandisa vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi, rine vanhu makumi matatu nemumwe kana kuti 31 vakabatwa vaine chirwere, kuchitiwo dunhu reMashonaland West rine vanhu gumi nevatatu kana kuti 13. Matabeleland North ine vanhu vashanu, vana kuManicaland, vana kuMashonaland Central nevamwe vana kuMashonaland East, Matabeleland South vaviri, kuchitiwo matunhu anoti Midlands neMasvingo aine munhu mumwe chete padunhu. Dunhu reHarare harina munhu akabatwa aine chirwere ichi. Izvi zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 munyika yose vave zviuru zvipfumbamwe nemakumi mana nevatanhatu, kana kuti 9 046, kuchitiwo vanhu vapora vave zviuru zvisere nezana rine makumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu, kana kuti 8 195. Vanhu vachiri kurwara nyika yose vave mazana mashanu nemakumi masere nevatanhatu, kana kuti 586. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano vachitungamira sangano reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti vari kushushikana zvikuru nekukwira zvakare kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi, zvikuru kumatunhu ari kuchamhembe kwenyika. Pave nekutyirwawo kuti chirwere ichi chinogona kusazokwanisa kurwiswa kana kudzivirirwa kana hurumende yakaenderera mberi nekuvhura miganho yenyika musi wa 01 Zvita sezvakayavimbisa pachitariswa kuti vanhu vazhinji vanenge vopinda nekubuda muSouth Africa, iyo inove nyika ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica yose. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata mukuru anoona nezvekurwisana neCovid-19, Doctor Agnes mahomva kuti tinzwe nezvematanho avari kutora mukudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Mukuru anoona nezvezvirwere zvinotapuriranwa mubazi rezvehutano, Doctor Portia Manangazira, vati vanga vari mumusangano vakati tivabate neMugovera. Asi VaRusike vanoti zviri kuonekwa kuBulawayo mucherechedzo wemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika ekuti vanhu havachakoshesa kuzvichengetedza kubva kuchirwere ichi kubva pakanyevenutswa mutemo wairambidza vanhu kufambafamba uye pakabviswa mapurisa nemauto vaimanikidza mutemo wekuti vanhu vapfeke mamasiki nekutevedzera zvimwe zvose zvinokurudzirwa nebazi rezvehutano. Vanoti chitsvambe chave kune vanhu pachavo kuti vaone kuti vachengetedza hutano hwavo sezvo vari kuona kuti vanhu vakawanda havachina shungu nekutyira kuti chirwere chingangovabatawo, vachiti veruzhinji vanofanirwa kuziva kuti chirwere chichiriko. VaRusike vanoti chimwe chinogona kunge chiri kukanganisa mabasa ekurwisana nechirwere ichi kushaikwa kwemvura yekugeza maoko munzvimbo nemaguta zvakawanda, uye vari kukurudzira makanzuru pamwe nehurumende kuti vaone kuti vawanisa vanhu mvura yekushandisa kuzvishambidza. No media source currently available

headline: Mutemo weBritain Unorambidza Vanobva kuZimbabwe Unonzi Unobata Vashanyi Chete.
text: Gweta vari chizvarwa cheZimbabwe uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF kuBritain, Doctor Simba Mavaza, vanoti danho rakatorwa nehurumende yeBritain rekumborambidza vanhu vanobva kuZimbabwe nedzimwe nyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica rakangonangana nevanhu vanenge vachida kushanyira nyika iyi, kwete vanenge vaine magwaro ekugara pamwe nekushanda muBritain. Doctor Mavaza vanoti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvagara zviine mabasa azvo kana kudzidza muBritain, uye zvine magwaro ekuzvarwa enyika mbiri idzi zvakabatwa nemutemo uyu zviri kunze kweBritain zvinokwanisa kudzokera zvisina dambudziko kana zvichingokwanisa kuzadzisa zvinodiwa nemiutemo wekudzivirira kuparadzirwa kweCovid-19. Muzinda weBritain muZimbabwe wakazivisa kutanga kwesvondo rino kuti hurumende yawo yakadzika mutemo unomborambidza vashanyi vanobva kuZimbabwe pamwe nedzimwe nyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica kupinda muBritain, senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19, icho chabata zvakasimba dunhu reSADC, kusanganisirawo neZimbabwe. Doctor Mavaza vanoti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zvichiri kunze kweBritain zviri kuda kunzwisisa nekujekeserwa pamusoro pemutemo uyu. Asi vanoti danho ratorwa neBritain iri rakanaka chose sezvo rcihidzivirira kupararira kwedenda ranetsa pasi rose iri. No media source currently available

headline: Cholera Yobata Munhu kuChiredzi Zvotyisa Vakawanda
text: Vagari vemudhorobha reChiredzi nenzvimbo dzakapoteredza vari kutyira kubata chirwere cheCholera icho chinonzi chakabata vamwe vanhu munzvimbo iyi nezuro zvinonzi zvakonzerwa nekushaikwa kwemvura yakachena. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti munhu mumwe chete akabatwa nechirwere checholera uye pane vamwe gumi vachiri kuongororwa. Mumwe mugari wemumusha weTshovani Vamwe vagari vakaita saAmai Enia Mukarati vemumusha weTshovani muChiredzi vanoti vave kutyira hupenyu hwavo sezvo vari kutarisana ne ndambudziko remvura iyo yave nemwedzi inodarika miviri ichinetsa\n\nizv zvatsinhirwa nevanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano rinomirira vagari reUnited Chiredzi Residents and RatePayers Association kana kuti UCHIRA Amai Constance Chikumbo Kanzura weward 18 mumusha weTraingle kuChiredzi, VaGilbert Mutubukiti vanoti vagary vave kumanikidzwa mvura ine tsvina yekudiridza nzimbe inodarika nemumigero yakavhurika. Vanotiwo nyaya yekuti vanhu vanozvibatsira pedyo nemigero iyi inobva yapa kuti itonyanye kusviba zvichiisa vanhu munjodzi yekubatwa necholera. VaMutubuki vati kanzuru yavo iri kuvaka zvimbuzi nekuchera zvibhorani kuyedza kuti vanhu vasarware nezvirwere zvakaita secholera. Munyori wekanzuru yeChiredzi, Engineer Wesley Kauma vati havasati vanzwa nezve denda iri kubva kubazi rezvehutano. Mukuru mubazi rezvehutano mudunhu reMasvingo, Dr Emedus Shamu vatenda kuti chirwere ichi chakabata munhu kuChiredzi vachiti bazi ravo richiri kuongorora vamwe vanofungirwa kuti vanacho. Muna 2008, vanhu vanoda kusvika zana rezviuru kana kuti 100 000 vakabatwa nechirwere checholera munyika vamwe zviuru zvina vakafa. Kuti vanhu vasabatwe nechirwere checholera, nyanzvi dzinoti vanofanira kunwa mvura yakachena, kugeza maoko nesipo vasati vabika nekudya, kubhoirisa chikafu uye kushandisa zvimbuzi. Kana munhu abatwa nechirwere ichi anoita manyoka, kunzwa nyota zvakanyanya, kurutsa kana kunzwa kuneta. Anenge achinzwa izvi anokurudzirwa kumhanya kuchipatara. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari vekuMasvingo Vochema neKukwira kweMitengo yeZvekudya
text: Vagari vemudhorobha reMasvingo vochema-chema kuti mitengo yezvinhu, kunyanya chikafu, yakakwira zvisingaiti muzvitoro apo hurumende iri kuti mamiriro ehupfumi hwenyika hwaka gadzikana. Vamwe vagari vataura neStudio 7 vanoti vakashamisika svondo rino mitengo yezvikafu zvakaita sehupfu, mafuta ekubikisa pamwe nenyama zvamuka zvakakwira mutarara. Amai Rumbidzai Magomo vemumusha we Mucheke F, vanoti hupenyu huri kuramba huchivaomera nekukwira kwaita mitengo svondo rino. Chisaga chehupfu cinorema makirogiramu gumi chave kuita mazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu emadhora e RTGS kubva mumazana mana muchitoro che OK. Apowo kirogiramu imwe chete yenyama, yaiita mazana matatu emadhora eRtgs yave kuita mazana matanhatu emadhora akaraudzira, zvimwe chete nemafuta ekubikisa. Marita maviri aiita zana nemakumi manomwe emadhora ave kuita mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu emadhora e RTGS. Vagari vazhinji vanoti mitengo iri kukwira asi mihoro yavo isiri kukwira nekudaro zvichawedzera kutambura kwavo sezvo kuwana chikafu chakakwana kunenge konetsa. Muzvare Eve Mamombe, vanoti kukwira kuri kuita mitengo yechiakafu munyika kwovashaisa hope. Sangano rinomiriria vashandi munyika, reZimbabwe Congress of Trades Unions(ZCTU), rinoti mihoro yakatarwa nehurumende yevashandi vepasi inokwana zvikamu gumi nezviviri kubva muzana pamari inodiwa kushandiswa nemhuri yevanhu vashanu munyika. Sangano rinomirira vatengi munyika reConsumer Council of Zimbabwe rinotiwo mhuri yevanhu vatanhatu inoda mari inosvika zviuru makumi maviri nechimwe yemaRTGS apo vashandi vazhinji vachiwana mari isingapfuuri zviuru zvishanu zvemadhora emunyika pamwedzi. Mutungamiriri we ZCTU munyika VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti vashandi vari kunonga svosve nemuromo uye vadzorerwa munguva yehutongi hwevapambepfumi. Studio 7 yatadza kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi sezvo gurukota rezve maIndasitiri nekutengeserana munyika, Amai Sekai Nzenza vanga vasingadairi nharembozha yavo. Asi vachitaura mudare reparamende munguva pfupi yapera Amai Nzenza vakati hurumende iri kushushikana nekukwira kwemitengo uye vachashanda nemamwe mapazi ehurumende kuti vagadzirise nyaya iyi. Asi vamwe vagari vanoti zvinoshamisa kuti hurumende inogara ichiti zvinhu zvakanaka munyika iyo mitengo ichikwira kudai. VaLovemore Mashinga vanoti ivo nenyaya yekudhura kuri kuita zvinhu vave kutodya kashoma pazuva. Vanoona nezve hupfumi hwenyika vanoti mitengo iri kukwira mumari yemunyika nekuti iri kukwikwidzana ne mari yekunze yakasimba yeku America iyo yave kubvumidzwa kutenga. No media source currently available

headline: Chikwereti cheRBZ Chotemesa Hurumende Musoro
text: Komiti yeparamende inoona nezvemari yagara neMuvhuro ichikurukura bhiri remutemo rinopa masimba ekuti hurumende itore chikwereti chebhanga guru renyika, kana kuti Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe Debt Assumption Bill. Izvi zvaitwa panguva iyo makomiti akasiyana siyana atanga kusangana kekutanga gore rino. Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, uye gavhuna vebhanga guru renyika, VaJohn Mangudya, ndivo vange vari mudare vachibvunzwa nenhengo dzeparamende. RBZ ine chikwereti chinopfuura bhiriyoni rimwe chete remadhora icho yakaita pasi pevaive gavhuna vebhanga iri, VaGideon Gono, avo vaonzi vaiita mamwe mabasa ainge asineyi nezvaifanira kuitwa nebhanga iri. Mabasa aya aisanganisira kutenga matirakita, fotereza nezvimwe zvaipihwa vanhu vari kunzi nehurumende havafanire kuburitswa mazita avo. Asi vachitaura kukomiti yezvemari, VaChinamasa naVaMagudya vati chikwereti ichi wave mutoro kuRBZ zvopa kuti bhanga iri ritadze kushanda zvakanaka. Gore rapera vanhu vazhinji munyika vakati havaida kuti hurumende itore chikwereti ichi uye vakati vanoda kuti vose vakapihwa mari vaburitswe mazita avo. Asi RBZ nehurumende zviri kutsika madziro kuburitsa mazita aya. Dzimwe nyanzvi munya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti hazvibatsire kuti hurumende, iyo iri kutatarika nechimwe chikwereti chinosvika mabhiriyoni masere emadhora, izviwedzere mumwe mutoro. Nhengo yekomiti yezvemari, uye vari nhengo yeMDC Renewal Team, VaWillas Madzimure, vanoti vakumbira VaChinamasa naVaMangudya kuti vanogadzirisa zvimwe zvavange vasingatenderane nazvo zvikuru pamitero iri kubhadhariswa nevamwe pazvikwereti. No media source currently available

headline: Varwere Voomerwa neKushaikwa neKudhura kweMishonga
text: Vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kuchema chema nekushaikwa uye kudhura kuri kuita mishonga zvopa kuti hupenyu hwevarwere vakawanda huve munjodzi. Zvipatara zvikuru zvehurumende zvinonzi zvasara nemishonga yakakosha isingadarike mazuva gumi. Vanotengesa nekugadzira mishonga vanoti hurumende haisi kuvapa mari yakakwana yekunze yekutenga mishonga kubva kuIndia neSouth Africa kunyanya. Sachigaro wePharmaceutical Manufacturers Association of Zimbabwe ,VaEmmanuel Mujuru, vatenda kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka nenyaya yekushaya mari vachiti vanoda mamiriyoni maviri emadhora asi vari kuwana zvikamu gumi kubva muzana zvemari iyi. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo naMuzvare Emily Nyathi vanotengesa mishonga muHarare. Amai Nyathi vati nyaya iyi yave nenguva ingatosvika makore maviri isina kugadziriswa. Hurumende inoti iri kuyedza kutsvaga mari yekubatsira mukutenga mushonga uye nemusi weChina yakapa vanotenga mishonga mari inosvika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru zviviri mushure mekunge yambovapa mari inosvika mamiriyoni matanhatu nezviuru zvisere svondo rapera. Asi chiremba Dr Rutendo Bonde vanoti mari iyi idonwe remvura mugwenga. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo naAmai Nyathi. Mukuru wechipatara cheMpilo Hospital, Dr Solwayo Ngwenya, vaudza nhepfenyuro yeZBC kuti vasara nemishonga inokwana mazuva gumi chete. Matambudziko aya ndemamwe kuParirenyatwa, Harare Hospital, UBH nezvimwe zvipatara zvehurumende. Mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vatendawo kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzemishonga. Vanotiwo vamwe vanhu vave kutopotera kumaporofita nekun’anga Vakawanda vataura neStudio 7 vati vave kutoita mapiritsi ekudimbura nepakati kuti vakwanise kutombowana chekunwa pazuva. Vamwewo vanoti vave kutopona nekuenda kunyika dzakaita seZambia neSouth Africa kunotsvaga mishonga. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vanoti hurumende inofanira kumutsiridza makambani anogadzira mushonga kuti varerutse dambudziko iri. Mari zhinji yeZimbabwe inosvika zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muzana inobva kumasangano akazvimirira akaita seUnited Nations Children’s Fund, Global Fund neUS Presidents Emmergency Plan for Aids Relief neDepartment for International Development yekuBritain. Pharmaceutical Society of Zimbabwe inogadzira mishonga inoti inoda mari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi mana nemashanu kuti itange kushanda zvakanaka. VePharmaceutical Wholesalers Association vanoti nekuda kwechikwereti chemari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemashanu, havachapihwe mishonga kwavaitenga. Vanoti pamwedzi vanoda mari inosvika mamiriyoni masere. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Gumi Vanoshaya Vamwe Vachiparadzirwa Misha neMafashamu eMvura
text: Mhuri dzakawanda kuMashonaland Central, Mashonaland West, Manicaland, Midlands neMatabeleland North dzasara dzisina misha mushure mekunge yakukurwa nemafashamu emvura anotyisa asati amboonekwa mumatunhu aya kwenguva yakareba. Vanhu gumi vanonzi varasikirwa nehupenyu kusvika parizvino. Zvipfuyo, minda, mabhiriji nemigwagwa zviri kuparadzwawo nemafashamu emzvura aya. Civil Protection Unit iyo yakazivisa kuti inoda mari inosvika mamiriyoni matatu ekubatsira vanhu vanenge vawirwa nematambudziko akadai iri mubishi kuyedza kubatira vanhu ava ichibatsirana nemamwe mapazi ehurumende akaita sevemauto emuchadenga nevamwe. Mukuru weCivil Protection Unit VaMadzudzo Pawadyira vati vari kukwanisa kununura vanhu vange vavhiringidzwa nemvura iyi asi vakati titaure negurukota rezvematunhu VaIgnatious Chombo. Nyaya dzekubatsira vanhu vanenge vapinda mumatambudziko akadai dziri kubazi raVaChombo. Asi Vachombo vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari pazororo asi vakatiwo titaure nevakafanobata matomu mubazi ravo VaJoseph Made avo vange vasingadaire nharembozha yavo. Mumiriri weMakonde mudare reparamende VaKindness Paradza vanove nhengo yeZanu-PF vatenda kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mudunhu ravo uye misha yakawanda yaparadzwa nemafashamu emvura aya. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vakawanda Vanonyoresa Kuitira Kuti Vakwikwidze Musarudzo Dzichaitwa Muna Kurume
text:
Zimbabwe Electoral Commission (ZEC ) nhasi yatambira magwaro evanhu vachapinda musarudzo dzichaitwa musi wa26 Kurume, mapato makuru munyika anoti MDC Alliance, Citizens Coalition for Change pamwe neZanu PF achinyoresa mazita evanhu vachakwikwidza zvigaro zvesezveNational Assembly gumi muHarare, Chitungwiza neEpworth. ZEC yatambirawo mazita evanhu vachapinda musarudzo idzi mumatunhu ese munyika. Zvigaro zvese gumi zveNational zviri kukwikwidza muHarare, Chitungwiza neEpworth. Kunze kwemapato makuru matatu aya mamwe mapato ari kupinda mussarudzo anosanganisira Lead Party iyo ichamiririrwa nemutungamiri wayo, Muzvare Linda Masarira kuHarare Central. Ichi ndicho chigaro chete chiri kukwidzwa nebato iri. Mamwe mapato ari kupinda masarudzo ndeanoti United Democractic Alliance, NPF, Patriotic Zimbabwean Party pamwe nevamwe vari kupinda musarudzo idz vakazvimirira.

Amai Betty Kaseke avo vachamirira bato reZanu PF kuKuwadzana Consituency vati zvinhu zvafamba zvakanaka uye vanotarisira kukunda.

Amai Zalerah Makari veZanu PF avo vakambomirira Epworth vanotiwo havanachimwe chavari kutarisira kunze kwekukunda.

Amai Susan Matsunga avo vakadzingwa muparamandeneMDC Tuye vachamirira, Citizens Coalition for Change, kuMufakose Constituency vaudza Studio 7 kutivanokumbira vanhu vekuMufakose kuti vavhotere.

Sachigaro weCitizens Coalition for Change muHarare, VaWellington Chikombo, avo vari kumirira Glen Norah vati veruzhinji vari kufarira shanduko yakaitwa nebato ravo uye vachakunda zvine mutsindo.

VaNorest Marara Chiureki, veMDC Alliance avo vari kukukwidza kuve nhengo yeNational Assembly kutHarare Central, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotarisira kukunda nekuti vanhu vakawanda vari kugunun’una nemumiriri ange aripo.

Sarudzo idzi dizichaitwa musi wa26 Kurume, uye dziri kusarudza vanhu vachatsiva vakadzingwa basa kana kufa. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yokurudzirwa Kutevedzera Bumbiro reMitemo Zvizere Kana Yoita Sarudzo Dzayo
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo nesarudzo dzinoti Zimbabwe inokwanisa kuita sarudzo dzakachena chete kana ikatevedza bumbiro remitemo yaro uye kana mauto akasapindira munyaya dzesarudzo nedzematongerwo enyika. Vachitaura pamusangano wakarongwa neZimbabwe Democracy Institute kana kuti (ZDI wekuzeya kuti chii chingaitwa kuitira kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzakachena muna 2023, mukuru weSAPES Trust, VaIbbo Mandaza, vati kunze kwekuteedza bumbiro pamwe nekudzorera mauto kumabharaki hapana chimwe chingaitwe kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzisingakipikiswe. Vati kunyange hazvo vamwe vachiti mutemo wesarudzo unofanira kushandurwa chikuru chiri kuita kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzinopikiswa nguva nenguva inyaya yekupindira kwemauto panyaya dzematongerwo enyika pamwe nekufambiswa zvakanaka kwesarudzo. Vati mapato anopikisa pamwe nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira anofanira kushanda zvakasimba kuona kuti bumbiro remitemo ratevedzwa uye kuti mauto adzokera kumabharaki. VaMandaza vati hapana chikonzero chekuti mapato anopikisa apinde musarudzo kana bumbiro risingatevedzwi uye kana masoja akaramba achipindira munyaya dzematongerwo enyika sezvo bato reZanu PF richingokunda musarudzo idzi. VaMandaza vati bato reZanu PF rinoshandisa mauto uye range riri kuruza sarudzo dzese kubva muna2 000 asi richabatsirwa kuramba iri panyanga nemauto. Izvi zvatsigirwa nemutauriri webato rinopikisa reNational Patriotic Front, VaJelousy Mawarire, avo vati mauto pachawo akabuda pachena apo akabvisa vaive mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, muna Mbudzi 2017. Vachitaurawo pamusangano wanhasi, mutevedzeri wasachigaro webato guru rinopikisa munyika, reMDC Alliance, VaJob Sikhala, vabvumirana naMuzvinafundo Mandaza vachiti Zanu PF haigoni kukunda musarudzo kana ikasashandisa mauto. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remauto kana kubva kugurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri, sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kuita. Asi mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, varamba mashoko VaMandaza ekuti bato ravo range richikundikana musarudzo kubva muna 2000 vachiti kunongova kutaura kwevavengi. VaMugwadi vatiwo manyepo kuti mauto anobatsira Zanu PF musarudzo vachiti mauto anopindira chete kana pachinge paita mhirizhonga. VaMandaza vatiwo mapato anopikisa pamwe nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira anofanira kusunga dzisimbe kuunganidza mari yemaAgents, kuona kuti vanhu vanyoresa kuvhota pamwe nekudzivirira vhoti panguva yesarudzo. Asi VaMawarire vati mapato anopikisa anokwanisa kukunda chero pasina shanduko yaitika. Mumwe mushandi mukuru muZDI, VaBekezela Gumbo, vati musangano wanhasi waburitsa pachena kuti kunyange mutemo wesarudzo ukasandurwa, zvakakoshawo kuti bumbiro ritevedzwe uye kuti mauto asapindire musarudzo. Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakaudza musangano webato ravo wePolitiburo svondo rapfuura kuti Zimbabwe yakatoisa zvese zvinodiwa neSADC kuti paitwe sarudzo dzakachena uye vakati vaye vanochema kuti mutemo wesarudzo unofanira kushandurwa havasi kubuda pachena kuti ndezvipi chaizvo zvavari kuda. Asi izvi zviri kurambwa nevemapato anopikisa pamwe nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira avo vanoti VaMnangagwa vanoziva zvese zvinodiwa kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzakachena. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Yoita Misangano Yekurangarira VaMorgan Tsvangirai neMugovera
text: Mukurangarira vaimbove mutungamiri webato reMDC, muchakabvu Morgan Tsvangirai, bato iri rinoti richange richiita misangano mumatunhu ose mangwana, Mugovera. Munyori mukuru webato iri, VaCharlton Hwende, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakuru vebato ravo vachaendeswa kumatunhu akasiyana siyana kunotaura nevanhu. Vatiwo musangano wemu Harare uchaitwa nemusi weChitatu paAmbassador Hotel, apo mutungamiri webato iri, VaNelson Chamisa, vachange vachitaura pamwe chete nemukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, avo vakamboshanda naVaTsvangirai kuZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions. VaHwende vati iyi misangano yekurangarira vaTsvangirai naizvozvo mapurisa haana chikonzero chekunetsana nevanhu vachaunganira. VaMorgan Tsvangirai vakashaya musi wa 14 Kukadzi, 2018. No media source currently available

headline: Zanu PF Yokurudzira Nhengo Dzayo Kunoviga VaTsvangirai neChipiri
text: Sachigaro webato reZanu PF, Amai Oppah Zvipange Muchinguri-Kashiri pamwechete nasachigaro webato iri mudunhu reManicaland VaMike Madiro, nhasi vakurudzira nhengo dzebato ravo reZanu PF kuti dziende kunochema mutungamiriri weMDC VaMorgan Tsvangirai pavacharadzikwa nemusi weChipiri kumusha kwavo kwaHumanikwa, kuBuhera Amai Muchinguri-Kashiri vataura mashoko aya pamusangano webato ravo weProvincial Coordinating Committee, PCC, wekuvagamuchira pakusimudzirwa kwavo kuve sachigaro wezanu PF munyika yose. Vaudza nhengo dzavo kuti hapana chakaipa pakuenda kunochema uye kubata maoko pachavigwa VaTsvangirai sezvo ari mwanakomana weZimbabwe, wekudunhu reManicaland uye vakashanda vose muhurumende yemubatanidzwa. Amai Muchunguri-Kashiri vashora pfungwa dzekuti kunochema VaTsvangirai kana uri werimwe bato unenge watengesa. “Takaenda isusu tichinobata maoko kuMDC, asi vamwe vakabva vati aaah vaakutengesa ndakaona magroup group, ukaona wakadaro handi pfungwa dzakanakaba.Dzigeze dziite right, nokuti tingatadza kuwirirana as a party asi tiri maZimbabweans, ndiri kukukurudzirai kuti muende in your numbers seZanu PF, ainge ari mumwe wedu mugovernment endai munobata maoko makasununguka.” Mashoko aAmai Muchinguri-Kashiri atsinhirwa nasachigaro weZanu PF mudunhu reManicaland VaMike Madiro. VaMadiro vati kunochema VaTsvangirai neimwe nzira kunobatsira kuti vakwanise kuwana rutsigiro pasarudzo dzichaitwa mwedzi mishoma inotevera. VaMadiro vati vatsigiri veZanu PF havafanirwi kuenda kunochema mufi vakapfeka mbatya dzemusangano wavo sezvo zvichizokwanisa kuitisa mhirizhonga sezvakamboitika parufu rwemudzimai vaVaTsvangirai Amai Susan Tsvangirai makore akati kuti apfuura, apo vakashayika mutsaona yemotokari. VaGift Kagwida, vaoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muZanu PF kuno kuManicaland. VaKagwida vakurudzira nhengo dzebato ravo reZanu PF kuti dzisarege kuenda kunovigwa VaTsvangirai senzira yekunotapa hurongwa hwebato iri nemusi weChipiri. “Mashoko atiri kutambira isu ndeekuti burial yaTsvangirai is on Tuesday saka isisu seZanu PF tinofanirwa kuenda kuti tinoita neutralise the opposition pane zvainenge ichiita ikoko kurufu kwacho.” Asi sachigaro weMDC-T kuManicaland VaDavid Chimhini vachitaura vari parunhare vati kuda kutsvaga mavhoti parufu hazvisi zvinhu zvinotarisirwa sezvo VaTsvangirai vaive munhu ane chiremera nekudero vanoda kupihwawo ruremekedzo pakuvigwa kwavo. VaChimhini vati ino inguva yekubatana kwete kupatsanurana nenyaya yezvematongerwo enyika kana kuda kutsvaga rutsigiro nepanhamo. Mune imwewo nyaya, Amai Muchinguri-Kashiri vayambira nhengo dzebato ravo kuti vasiyane nemhirizhonga apo nyika yatarisana nesarudzo. Amai Muchinguri-Kashiri vati mhirizhonga inokanganisa bato ravo sezvo ichitanda vangade kuritsigira uye zvichishoresa. Vati ngozi yevaurayiwa haiuyi kuZanu PF. “Isusu Zanu PF must lead by example hatidi violence, hatidi, youths hatidii! Vanamai ngatidzidziseyi vana wedu zvakanaka, inini ndakambozvitaura kuti ukauraya munhu ngozi haiuyi kuZanu PF, ukaita violence uri kudzingira wanhu kubva kuZanu PF, ngatibataneyi hatidi violence please.” Pamusangano weZanu PF uyu pataurwawo nyaya yekuunganidza mari kuti vakwanise kuvaka mahofisi emuzinda wavo, uye nekuita mhemberero dzekusimudzirwa kwaAmai Muchinguri-Kashiri mubato. Nhengo dzebato iri zvakare dzayambira vechidiki kuti varemekedze hutungamiriri huripo. No media source currently available

headline: Mutori weNhau, Hopewell Chin'ono, Anorambirwa Chibatiso neDare
text: Mutori wenhau ane mukurumbira, Hopewell Chin’ono, anyimwa nedare repamusoro mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso kuitira kuti atongwe achiba kumba kwake pamhosva yaari kupomerwa yekukurudzira veruzhinji kuti varatidzire zvine mhirizhonga. Mumutongo waverengwa namutongi VaWebster Chinamhora, uyo wakanyorwa naVaTawanda Chitapi, dare repamusoro ratura kuti Chin’ono haakodzere kubuditswa mujeri. Zvaturwa nedare zvatsinhirwa nerimwe remagweta raChin’ono, VaGift Mtisi. VaMtisi vati vachatora matanho kana vachinge vanzwisisa zviri mumutongo uyu. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevatori venhau reMisa Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vati matare anofanira kushanda asina divi raakarerekera vakakurudzira kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe idzokere pahutongo hwejekerere. Chin’ono ari kupomerwa mhosva yekunzi akanyora padandemutande rake reTwitter achikuridzira kuti veruzhinji varatidzire zvine mhirizhonga mukati vachipandukira hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Mutongo pachikumbiro chemutungamiri weTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume, avo vakadaidzira kuti munyika muratidzirwe musi wa31 Chikunguru, chekuti vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo wakatarisirwa kuturwa nedare reHigh Court mangwana zvichitevera kunyimwa kwavakaitwa mukana uyu nedare ramejesitiriti. Zvichakadai, sangano reParadigm Initiative iro rinova mubatanidzwa wemasangano akawanda pasi rose anorwira kodzero dzevatori venhau, raburitsa gwaro richitsoropodza kusungwa kwaChin’ono. Sangano iri rati kusungwa kwaChin’ono kunoratidza kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe iri kutyora bumbiro remitemo zvikurusei kodzero dzekutaura kwakasununguka. No media source currently available

headline: Paramende Yokomekedzwa Kuongorora Zvakadzama Zvibvumirano zveChina neZimbabwe
text: Mutauriri weNational Assembly, VaJacob Mudenda, vakurudzira neChipiri nhengo dzedare reparamende kuti dziongorore zvibvumirano zvese zvakasainiranwa pakati peZimbabwe neChina svondo rapfuura pamwe nekuona kuti mari ichabuda pazvibvumirano izvi yashandiswa zvine mwero. Vachitaura pamusangano wezuva rimwe wekuzeya bhajeti regore rinouya, VaMudenda vati nhengo dzeparamende dzine basa guru rekuona kuti mari yese inenge yawanikwa nehurumende yashandiswa nemazvo uye sezvinenge zvakarongwa pabhajeti. No media source currently available Vati zvakakosha kuti nhengo dzeparamende dzione kuti zvibvumirano zvese zvakasainwa neZimbabwe neChina zvashanda mukubatsira veruzhinji. China neZimbabwe zvakasainirina zvibvumirano zvekuita zvirongwa zvakati kuti zvinokosha mabhiriyoni angangosvike mana emadhora uye pasi pemutemo zvibvumirano izvi zvinofanira kuzozeiyiwa neparamende. Mutauriri weMDC inotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, VaObert Gutu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vachaudza nhengo dzedare kuti dzirambe zvibvumirano izvi pazvichaunzwa kuparamende. VaMudenda vatiwo nhengo dzedare reparamende dzinofanira kuona kuti bhajeti rinoita zvinodiwa neveruzhinji vakati zvinosuwisa kuti bhajeti regore rinouya remadhora mabhiriyoni mana harina mari yakawanda yekuita mabasa ekusimudzira hupenyu hwevanhu sezvo mari yaro zhinji ichienda kumihoro yevashandi vehurumende. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kunyange hazvo gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vachiti hupfumi huchakura nezvikamu zviviri nechidimbu kubva muzana, kukura uku kuri pasi kweuko kunotarisirwa neveruzhinji pasi pechirongwa chehupfumi chehurumende cheZimAsset kana kuti Zimbabwe Agenda for Sustainable Socio-Economic Transformation icho chinotarisira kuti hupfumi huchakura nezvikamu zvinomwe nechidimbu kubva muzana gore rinoouya. VaMudenda vati vanotarisira nhengo dzeparamende dzese kuti dzipenengura bhajeti iri apo richazeiwa muparamende svondo rinouya dzisati dzaripasisa pamwe nekupa gurukota rezvemari mazano ekuti vakangavandudze sei hupfumi hwenyika. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzepfumi, vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaGodfrey Kanyenze, vaudzawo nhengo dzedare reparamende idzi kuti hupfumi hwenyika hausi kuzokura sezvinotarisirwa nekuti hurumende inokoshesa zvisina maturo. Vanoti semuenzaniso hurumende inotengera makurukota ayo motokari dzinodhura asi ichitadza kuita zvinhu zvinoita kuti vanhu vararame zvakanaka sekuvapa mvura yakachena nekuvawanisa hutano. VaKanyenze vatiwo havawoni hupfumi hwenyika huchikura sezvinotarisirwa nehurumende nekuda kwekusanaya kwemvura. Vakurudzira kuti nhengo dzedare reparamende kuti dziite basa radzo nemazvo pamwe nekuona kuti hurumende yashandisa mari nemazvo. Sachigaro wekomiti yeNational Assembly inoona nezvekushandiswa kwemari yehurumende kana kuti Public Accounts, Amai Paurina Mpariwa, vati nhengo dzeparamende dzine samba chose rekumanikidza makurukota ehurumende asi haadzina zvadzingaite kana pasina mari yakakwana. Nhengo dzedare reparamende dzichatanga kuzeya bhaejeti regore rinouya svondo rinouya uye dzinotarisirwa kuripasisa dzisina kusandura zvakawanda sezvinowanzoitika makore ese.

headline: Inflation Yokwira Zvisati Zvamboonekwa Mumakore Gumi Apfuura
text: Zimbabwe National Statistics Agency kana kuti Zimstats inoti inflation yemunyika yakwira kusvika pazvikamu makumi matatu nechiga chimwe kubva muzana kana kuti 31.01% kubva pazvikamu makumi maviri nezviga makumi masere nemashanu kubva muzana kana kuti 20, 85%. Aka ndekekutanga mitengo yezvinhu kukwira zvakadai mukati memakore gumi. Zimstats inoti mitengo yezvinhu zvakaita sechingwa, zvinwiwa nehembe ndizvo zvapa kuti mitengo yezvinhu ikwire. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze vanotungamira sangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inotara Coronavirus seDambudziko Guru Rakatarisana neNyika
text: Hurumende yatara chirwere cheCoronavirus sedambudziko guru rabata nyika yose, kana kuti National Disaster, uye ndokukanzura zvirongwa zvakawanda zvinosangana vanhu vakawanda senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Vachitaura nevatori venhau kuState House, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vati vaona zvakakodzera kutora matanho aya nekuti nyika inogona kuwirwa nedambudziko reCoronavirus sezvo ratove munyika dzakavakidzana nayo dzakaita seSouth Africa. Vati kutara Coronavirus sedambudziko renyika yese kunoita kuti nyika ikwanise kuunganidza mari, nezvimwe zvinodiwa kurwisana nechirwere ichi. Vati hurongwa uhwu huchange huchitungamirrwa nebazi rezvehutano. VaMnangagwa vati zvipatara zvese munyika zvave kutarisirwa kugara zvakagadzirira kuongorora pamwe nekurapa chirwere ichi. Vatiwo hurumende iri kugadzira nzvimbo dzakawanda dzekuchengetera vanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vane hutachiwana hweCoronavirus. VaMnangagwa vati vese vari kuronga kuenda kunyika dzine chirwere ichi vanofanira kumbomira nzendo dzavo kudzamara zvinhu zvadzikama. Vatiwo hurumende yambomisa zvirongwa zvinounganidza vanhu vakawanda zvakaita seZimbabwe International Trade Fair nemhemberero dzekucherechedza zuva rekuwana kuzvitonga idzo dzange dzichifanirwa kuitwa mwedzi unouya. Zimbabwe yakanzurawo mitambo pamwe nekukurudzira kusaungana kwevanhu pamichato pamwe nedzisvondo kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire. VaMnangagwa vati hurumende ichazoongorora danho iri mukati memazuva makumi matanhatu ari kutevera. Panyaya yezvikoro, VaMnangagwa vati sezvo pasina kana mumwe chete abatwa nechirwere ichi, zvikoro zvicharamba zvakavhurwa sezvo zvave pedyo nekuvhara asi vakati hurumende ichaongorora danho iri kana pane zvinenge zvaitika. Vatiwo mahofisi ese ehurumende anofanira kuchitanga kuongorora kuti vanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vane hutachiwana hweCoronavirus. Vati kunyange vatora matanho aya nzvimbo dzese dzekupinda nadzo munyika dzicharamba dzakavhurwa asi vakati vachasimbaradza nzira dzekuongorora vanhu vanobva kune dzimwe nyika zvikuru sei kunyika dzine hutachiwana uhwu. Vati vanhu vanofanira kuchinja maitiro nekuregedza kuita zvimwe zvinhu senzira yekuzvidzivirira kubva kuCoronavirus. Vatiwo kunyange hazvo pasina ati abatwa nechirwere ichi, chave kutokanganisa nyaya dzehupfumi munyika zvekuti nyika inogona kutadza kubata zviga zvayo zveVision 2030. Chirwere cheCoronavirus chauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvinomwe nekubata vanodarika zana nemakumi masere ezviuru pasi rose. No media source currently available

headline: Kanzuru dzeChitungwiza neHarare Dzoenderera Mberi Dzichiputsa Zvivakwa Zvisiri paMutemo
text: Makanzuru eHarare neChitungwiza nhasi aenderera mberi nekupwanyira vanhu midziyo yavo achiti zvivakwa izvi zviri kunze kwemutemo. Panguva yanga ichiitika izvi, dare repamusoro reHigh Court ranga richinzwa chikumbiro chekuti kupwanywa kwezvivakwa izvi kumiswe. Kanzuru yeHarare ichishanda pamwechete nemapurisa nhasi yapwanya zvivakwa zvevanotengesera mumigwagwa pamwe nedzimwe nzvimbo dzinotengeserwa motokari kuMbudzi round-about ukuwo kanzuru yeChitungwiza ichipwanyawo zvimwe zvivakwa zvakadai mudhorobha iri. Mutungamiri wesangano revanotengesera mumigwagwa reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, VaSamuel Wadzai, vati sangano ravo rarwadziwa zvikuru nedanho ratorwa nekanzuru yeHarare. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vaudza Studio7 kuti kanzuru yavo haisi kuzoramba yakapeta maoko vanhu vachiita madiro aJojina muguta ravo. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reChitungwiza Residents Trust, Muzvare Alive Kuveya, vati kanzuru yemudhorobha ravo yakabvira nezuro kupwanyira vanhu midziyo yavo. Muzvare Kuveya vatiwo chiri kuvarwadza ndechekuti vamwe vari kupwayirwa zvivakwa zvavo ivo vachibhadhara mitero kukanzuru vachiti pari zvino havachazive chekubata sevagari. Meya wedhorobha reChitungwiza, VaLovemore Maiko, vati zviri kuitwa izvi hazvisi kuitwa nekanzuru iri yoga vachiti chirongwa ichi chirongwa chiri kuitwa nemapazi ehurumende akawanda. VaWadzai vakurudzira hurumende kuti itange yatarisa raramo yevanhu pakatariswa kusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi hwenyika kwete kuti imhanyire kutorera veruzhinji chingwa chiri pamuromo. Panguva yanga ichipwanya zvivakwa zviri muHarare neChitungwiza, dare repamusoro iro ranga richifanira kunzwa chikumbiro cheChitrest chekuti kupwanywa kuri kuitwa zvivakwa izvi kumbomiswa rati richazonzwa chikumbiro ichi nemusi weChina. VaTafadzwa Muguti, vanove Provincial Development Coordinator wedunhu reHarare vakaburitsa mashoko nezuro vachiti chirongwa chekupwanya zvivakwa zviri kushanda zviri kunzwe kwemutemo chichaitwa muHarare, Chitungwiza neRuwa senzira yekuchenesa dunhu reHarare. Zvichakdai, rimwe sangano rinomirira vagari vemuHarare, reCombined Harare Residents Association, raburitsa mashoko richikurudzira hurumende kuti isiye makanzuru aite zvisungo zvawo ega kwete kuaudza zvekuita. Pakamboitwa chirongwa chakadai muna 2005 icho chaidaidzwa kuti Operation Murambatsvina, nhume yeUnited Nations, Amai Anna Kajumulo Tibaijuka, vakati chirongwa ichi chakasiya vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana manomwe (700 000) vasina pekugara uye zvekudya. No media source currently available

headline: Zviuru neZviuru zveVanhu Zvoratidzira muHarare
text: Zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu nhasi zvaratidzira muguta reHarare nezvikonzero zvakasiyana siyana asi kuratidzira kwatanga murunyararo kwazopera kwaita mhirizhonga apo mapurisa ange iota hwakiti nagonzo nevanhu. Vebato reTransform Zimbabwe, vakapedza zvidzidzo asi vasina mabasa, veTajamuka neveHastag This Flag nevanhuwo zvavo vabatana nhasi mukutaridzira muHarare vamwe vachiti havadi nyaya yekuparurwa kwemabond notes nebhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe muna Gumiguru. Vamwe vesangano reZimbabwe Coalition for Unemployed Graduates kana kuti Hash Tag This Gown vange vachichema chema kuti havana mabasa. Mutungamiri weTransform Zimbabwe VaJacob Ngarivhume vanove vakatungamirira kuendesa nyaya kudare kuti vabvumidzwe kuratidzira mushure mekunyimwa mvumo nemapurisa vati havasi kuzotambira nyaya yemabond notes. Mumwe wevange vachiratidzira ati anoinzi Danai uyo ataurira nhepfenyero yeStudio 7 kuti atombosiya basa rake rechigweta kuti aratidzire kusada kwake mari yemabond notes. Tadini Wenyika Masaya mumwe wevatungamiriri ve#ThisGown vanga vachiratidzirawo audzawo Studio 7 kuti shuviro yavo ndeyekuti hurumende yaVaMugabe isiye matomu. VaEarnest Mupoperi ashorawo zvikuru mapurisa awo anogarorova vanhu vanenge vachiratidzira. Vati hurumende inofanirwa kuteerera zvirikutaurwa neruzhinji kuti mari dzemabond notes hadzidiwi. VaRoddy Takaruza veTransform Zimbabwe vati vafadzwa nehuwandu hwevanhu vabuda vachiratidzira. VaNgarivhume nevamwe varatidzira vashoma ndivo vazotenderwa kupinda negwaro renyunyuto kumahofisi egurukota rezvehupfumi iro ratambirwa nevakafanobata chigaro chemunyori mukuru muhofisi iyi VaZvinechimwe Churu avo vavimbisa kuti vachasvitsa gwaro iri kuna VaPatrick Chinamasa. VaChinamasa vange vachinzi havapo. Asi apo vanhu vange vachiratidzira ava vange voda kuenda kudare reparamende, mapurisa ange akapakatira pfuti, hutsi hunokatyidza nemboma abva atanga kukanda hutsi hunokatyidza uye kuvarova. Mumwre arohwa nemapurisa mutori wenhau VaChris Mahove vanonyorera African News Agency. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo kuti tinzwe divi remapurisa uye kuti pane asungwa here. Asi zvinhu munyika hazvina kumira zvakanaka nenyaya yehupfumi uho hwaenda kumawere. Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vanoti chapa kuti zvinhu zviite manyama amire merogo inyaya yezvirango zvakatemerwa nyika nehurumende dzekunze. Asi nyika idzi dzinoti kutonga nedemo kwaVaMugabe ndiko kwapa kuti Zimbabwe iite seyakageza negoka munyama.

headline: VaTsvangirai neVatungamiri veMapato ari muMDC Alliance Vanoita Musangano Wavo weKutanga
text: Vatungamiri vemapato manomwe ari mumubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa weMDC Alliance vaita musangano wavo wekutanga muHarare nhasi mutungamiri weMDC VaMorgan Tsvangirai vari sachigaro. Mapato manomwe anoti MDC-T, MDC, PDP, Zanu Ndonga, Zimbabwe People First, Transform Zimbabwe neMutiracial Democratic Party, akasaina chibvumirano chekuumba mubatanidzwa uchakwikwidzana nebato riri kutronga reZanu PF. VaTsvangirai ndivo vakasarudzwa kuti vamirire mubatanidzwa uyu vachikwikwidzana nemutungamiri weZanu PF, VaRobert Mugabe. Mutauriri weMDC Alliance, uye vachitungamira Transform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume vanoti musangano wavo wekutanga uyu wanga uri wekuchitanga kuronga hwaro hwekutevera kugadziriro yavo yesarudzo dzegore rinouya. VaNgarivhume vanoti vawiriranawo kuti vaenderere mberi nekuparura mubatanidzwa uyu mumatunhu ose emunyika, vachitanga nekuBulawayo musi wa 26 mwedzi uno. Vatiwo zvakare nhaurirano dzekuti ndiani vachamirira mubatanidzwa musarudzo dzenhengo dzeparamende nedzemakanzuru dzichiri kuenderera mberi mumubatanidzwa wavo. No media source currently available

headline: Bata Murefu, Bata Mupfupi Yonetsa muZanu PF
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mubato reZanu PF zvichitevera kushoropodzwa kwakaitwa mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pamusangano wakaitirwa kuBindura neMugovera. Vachitaura pamusangano wakaitwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, nevechidiki kunhandare yeChipadze mudhorobha reBindura mukupera kwesvondo, mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, vakatsoropodza VaMnangagwa vachiti havafanire kuramba vakanyarara kana vatsigiri veZanu PF vari muchikwata chiri kuzvidaidza kuti Team Lacoste vachitsoropodza VaMugabe naivo Amai Mugabe. Amai Mugabe vakati VaMnangagwa kana vakamira pachokwadi kuti vari kutsigira VaMugabe havafanire kuwanikwa vachishamwaridzana nevanhu vakadzingwa mumusangano wavo. Ukuwo VaMugabe vakataura mashoko akaonekwa nevamwe sekunge anoti VaMnangagwa kuti vasvike pavari, pamusana pavo ivo VaMugabe. VaMugabe vakati pakanga potsvagwa munhu aifanirwa kunge ari mukuru we security mubato muna 1976, VaMugabe vakaita kuti VaMnangagwa vatore basa iri kunyange hazvo vakanga vambosiya zvehondo vachienda kuchikoro. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vari mutungamiri wesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, Muzvare Memory Kadau, vati VaMnangagwa vave patambo zvekuti vanogona kudzingwa muZanu PF chero ipi nguva. Zvataurwa naMuzvare Kadau zvatsinhirwa neimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaMasimba Kuchera, avo vati VaMnangagwa havakwanise kupindura zvinenge zvataurwa naAmai Mugabe sezvo zvichiratidza kuti Amai Mugabe vane masimba akawanda pari zvino. Amai Mugabe vakati havasi kufara nemashoko ari kubuda ekuti vari kuda kutora matomhu kubva kumurume wavo kana achinge asiya chigaro. Asi Muzvare Kadau vanoti muitiro waAmai Mugabe uri kuratidza pachena kuti vari kuda masimba kunyange hazvo vachihwanda nemunwe. VaKuchera vanotiwo mashoko aAmai Mugabe ekuti VaMugabe vakashevedza gurukota rinooona nezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, VaSidney Sekeramayi, kuti vazotaura navo mushure mekurwara kwavakaita mushure mekunge vadya chikafu pavakanobata maoko kuManicaland zvichitevera kufa kwakaita murume wemutungamiri wedare reseneti, Amai Edna Madzongwe, kunoratidza kuti VaMugabe vari kuda kuti VaSekeramayi vatore matomhu kubva kuna VaMugabe. Asi VaMugabe pachavo vanoti havasi kuzodoma munhu achatora matomhu kubva kwavari vachiti izvi zvichaitwa pamusangano wekongiresi yebato ravo sezvinotaurwa nebumbiro remitemo reZanu PF. Vanhu vakawanda vanoti zviri kuitika muZanu PF zvinoratidza kuti bato iri harichina pfungwa dzekugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika zvakaita sekuwanira vanhu mabasa, kuwanikwa kwemari nezvimwe zvinokosha muhupenyu. Dzimwe nyanzvi dzinoti zvose zvakataurwa kuBindura zvinhu zvaifanirwa kunge zvakataurwa mu Politburo yeZanu PF kwete kuzvifumura kwava kuyita bato iri richitaura zvinhu pachena zviri kunetsa. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Voparura Musangano weZvekurima kuVictoria Falls
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnagagwa vakasvika muVictoria Falls nezuro sezvo vari munyarikani pamusangano uri kuitwa mudhorobha iri weSouthern African Confederation of Agicultural Unions. Musangano uyu uri kutarisirwa kutanga nhasi. VaMnangagwa vakaendawo negurukota rinoona nezvekurima VaPerrance Shiri. Nyika dzinosvika gumi nenhatu dziri kutarisirwa pamusangano uyu dzichizeya nyaya dzekutengeserana mune zvekurima. Masangano anoti Zimbabwe Farmers Union neCommercial Farmers Union ndiwo akaronga musangano uyu. Panopera musangano uyu pari kutarisirwa kuti panenge pave sachigaro mutsva wesangano iri sezvo aripo ikozvino, Doctor Theo de Jager, vanenge voenda pamudyandigere. Muzvinafundo munyaya dzezvekurima VaMandivamba Rukuni vanoti musangano uyu wakakosha zvikuru kunyika dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica munyaya dzekutengeserana. No media source currently available

headline: Musangano weNational Convergence Platform Unombomiswa
text: Vari kuronga musangano weNational Convergence Platform wekuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvigare pasi zvizeye matambudziko akatarisana nenyika, Mufundisi Sebastian Bakare, vanoti musangano uyu wava kumbomira kuitwa sezvo vanhu vazhinji vasiri kutambira musangano uyu. No media source currently available Vachitaura nevatori venhau mu Harare, Bishop Bakare vati vanhu vazhinji havasi kutambira hurongwa uhwu uhwo hwanga huchifanira kuitwa musi wa 24 Gumiguru, 2015. Mutauriri we National Convergence Platform, Va Vince Museve, vatiwo chimwe chiri kunetsa kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvigare pasi zvizeye matambudziko azvakatarisana nawo pamwe nekutsvaga nzira dzekugadzirisa zviri kunetsa inyaya yemari. Ve National Convergence Platform vave nenguva inokwana gore vachiedza kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviungane. Va Bakare varamba mashoko akabuda mune mamwe mapepanhau ekuti musangano uyu uri kutadza kubudirira nepamusana pekuti vanga vane vatungamiri vavanga vachida kuti vatungamire mubatanidzwa wemapato ezvematongerwo pamberi pesarudzo dzemuna 2018 kana kuti grand coalition. Mutungamiri weProgressive Democratic Party, Va Tendai Biti, pamwe nemutungamiri werimwe boka reMDC, Va Welshman Ncube, vakabuda pachena kuti havadi kuti mutungamiri weMDC, Va Morgan Tsvangirai, vatungamirire grand coalition iyi. Asi vamwe vakaita saVa Simba Makoni, vebato reMavambo, Kusile, Dawn vanoti vanhu havafanire kumhanyira kugoverana mhuka yavasati vabata vachiti mapato anofanirwa kuita chirwirangwe kuti abvise hutongo hweZanu PF yavari kupomera mhosva yekuondomora hupfumi hwenyika. Va Museve vati zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvikaungana kuti zvizeye matambudziko akatarisana nenyika, panogona kubuda gwara razvingatevedzera mukugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika. Zvichakadai, Va Bakare vati seNational Convergence Platform, vachakoka munhu wese ane chekuita nekugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika kusanganisira vari muhurumende, vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika, masangano anoshanda akazvimirira neruzhinji rweZimbabwe. VaBakare vati musangano wavari kuda kuti uitwe uyu hausi kuzotarisa kuti munhu anotsigira bato ripi rezvematongerwo enyika sezvo munhu wese achibatwa nezviri kuitika munyika.

headline: Mutungamiri weNyika, VaMnangagwa, Vanotambira Nyomba yeCovaxin Kubva kuIndia
text: Chikamu chekutanga chenhomba yeCOVAXIN inodzivirira Covid-19 yakapiwa Zimbabwe neIndia serubatsiro chapinda munyika, mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachigamuchira mushonga uyu panhandare yendege yeRobert Gabriel Mugabe International Airport muHarare. Bepanhau reHerald rinoti vachigamuchira rubatsiro urwu, VaMnangagwa vatenda zvikuru mutungamiri weIndia pamwe nehurumende yeIndia, vachiti rubatsiro urwu rwauya panguva yakakodzera. VaMnangagwa vanonzi vati Zimbabwe iri panyika dzekutanga dzakave nehurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba. Vanonzi vakokawo vemabhizimusi vekuIndia vanoda kuzotanga mabhizimusi munyika kuti vashandise mikana iri kuunzwa nechirongwa cheNational Development Strategy NDS 1. Mumiriri weIndia muZimbabwe VaVijay Khanduja ndivo vasvitsa nhomba iyi kumutungamiri wenyika. VaKhanduja vatiwo rubatsiro urwu mucherechedzo wehukama hwakasimba pakati peZimbabwe nenyika yavo yeIndia. VaMnangagwa vaperekedzwa nemutevedzeri wavo uye vari gurukota rezvehutano VaConstantino Chiwenga pamwe nemamwe makurukota ehurumende. India yakapa Zimbabwe nhomba inosvika zviuru makumi manomwe nezvishanu, 75 000, asi zviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu, kana kuti 35 000 ndizvo chete zvakwanisa kupinda munyika, zvichireva kuti imwe nhomba inosvika zviuru makumi mana ichatevera munguva pfupi inotevera.
