Zimbabwe yakawana zvakare rubatsiro rweimwe nhomba yeSinopharm kubva kuChina mukutanga kwemwedzi uno uye yakatengawo zvakare imwe nhomba yekuChina yeSinovac. Hurumende yakabvumidzawo kushandiswa kwenhomba yekuRussia, yeSputnik V. Nhomba yeCOVAXIN iyi yakagadzirwa nekambani yeBharat Biotech ichishanda pamwechete nesangano rinoona nezvetsvakurudzo dzemishonga muIndia, reIndian Council of Medical Research. Nhomba iyi inobayiwa kaviri, kepiri kachibaiwa mushure memazuva makumi maviri nemasere, kana kuti 28 ekunge munhu atora nhomba yekutanga. Nhomba yeCOVAXIN inonzi yakaratidza zvikamu makumi masere nechimwe kubva muzana, kana kuti 81 percent, zvekushanda kwayo kudzvirira Covid-19 pavanhu vanenge vasina nhoroondo yehutachiwana hunokonzera chirwere ichi mushure mekunge vabaiwa nhomba yepiri. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano vachidzidzisa pa Nottingham Trent University kuBritain, Doctor Mathew Nyashanu, vanoti chinhu chakanaka chose kuti Zimbabwe yawana imwe nhomba kubva kuIndia, asi vanokurudzira kuti dai hurumende ichifanodzidzisa veruzhinji pamusoro penhomba inenge ichizopinda munyika nhomba iyi isati yapinda. Doctor Nyashanu vanoti izvi zvinozobatsira kuti veruzhinji9 vanenge vave neruzivo nechakare panozopinda mushonga uyu munyika, pane kuti vanhu vatange kudzidziswa nezvawo iwo wazara munyika. Doctor Nyashanu vanotiwo hurumende inofaniorwa kutenga mushonga wakawanda unenge wafarirwa nevanhu wakawanda kuitira kuti vanhu vasazosanganisirwa mishonga kana vachinge vonobaiwa nhomba dzepiri vachizopiwa unenge wakasiyana nenhomba yekutanga. No media source currently available

headline: Mvura Yonetsa Vagari vekwaGutu kuMasvingo
text:
Vagari vakawanda kwaMpandawana kwaGutu vanoti vari kutyira kubatwa nezvirwere zvakaita seCholera sezvo vave nemasvondo anodarika matatu vasina mvura mudzimba dzavo zvichinzi mushina unopomba mvura wakafa. Vagari vanoti vakaudzwa nebazi reZinwa rinovapa mvura kuti kune mishina yakafa kudhamu rinopombwa mvura asi havafari nenguva yareba yatorwa dambudziko iri risina kugadziriswa. Vagari vemumisha yeve ruzhinji yakaita seku Hwiru nekuGona vanoti nekushomeka kwemvura vave kushandisa mvura yemumatsime asina kuvharwa pamwe nezvikova iyo iri kukanganisa hutano hwavo. Sachigaro wesangano rinomiririra vagari reGutu United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance, VaLloyd Mufudze, vanoti vagari vazhinji vave kugara vachinzwa midumbu nekushandisa mvura yakasviba yemumatsime.

Mumwe mugari wemumusha weGona, VaTafunga Mamombe, vanoti kushaikwa kwemvura kwenguva refu kwave kutyorwa kodzero dzavo. VaMamombe vati vakaudzwa kuti mushina uchagadziriswa nekukurumidza asi nanhasi chabuda hapana. Vamwe vagari vari kupomera kanzuru yeGutu, mhosva yekusaita hany’a nedambudziko ravo nekusunda bazi reZinwa kuti rigadzirise dambudziko iri. Asi mukuru webasa mukanzuru yekwaGutu, VaAlexender Mutembwa, vaudza Stduio 7 parunhare kuti dambudziko iri riri kuZinwa, ivo havana simba rekuvamhanyisa kuti vagadzirise. Kanzura veward 34 maMupandawana, VaBernard Chimwango, vanoti vakambozama kutaura ne Zinwa kuti igadzirise zviri kunetsa, asi bazi iri riri kuisa zvitanda munzeve.

Asi mutaururi weZinwa, VaTsungirai Shoriwa, vati vane hurombo nekutadza kugadzirisa dambudziko iri, asi vati riri kugadziriswa nechimbi chimbi. Vagari vanoti dambudziko remvura rinotyirwa kuti ringango wedzera kupararira kweChirwere cheCovid-19 icho chinokurudzirwa kushandiswa kwemvura yakakwanda uye yakachena. No media source currently available

headline: Nyakuda Kusunga VaMnangagwa, VaChiwenga naVaMohadi Omiswa Pamberi Pedare
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa, reIdeal Party Zimbabwe, VaTinashe Jonasi, vamiswa pamberi pedare nhasi vachipomerwa mhosva yekuzvidza mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pasi pemutemo weCriminal Law Codification Reform Act. Mapurisa anoti VaJonasi vakati VaMnangagwa vakambouraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi matatu nekudaro hapana munhu anofanira kupa huchapupu achivatsigira padzimwe mhosva dzavanenge vachipomerwa. VaJonasi vanonziwo vainge vachironga kusunga VaMnangagwa, nevatevedzeri vavo, General Constantino Chiwenga naVaKembo Mohadi apo vakasungwa pa Jameson Hotel nemusi weMuvhuro. Asi vaJonasi vari kuramba mhosva idzi, vachitiwo pavainzi vakataura mashoko aya yainge iri nguva yesarudzo uye VaMnangagawa vainge vangori mutungamiri webato reZanu-PF chete kwete mutungamiri wenyika. Vanotiwo chikamu chavari kutongwa nacho hachisi pamutemo. Pavamira mberi pedare, VaJonasi vaudzwa nemutongi, Amai Rumbidzai Mugwagwa, kuti havasi kuzoregwa achienda kumba kusvika nyaya yavo yatongwa nedare. Gweta raVaJonasi, Amai Nontokozo Dube, vanoshanda neZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, vati vanenge vari kudare redzimhosva magwana mangwanani vachisvitsa mapepa echikumbiro chekuti VaJonasi vapiwe mukana wekubvisiswa mari yechibatiso. Mutauriri weZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaKumbirai Mafunda, vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaJonasi vari kuRemand Prison, muHarare. No media source currently available

headline: Madzimai Aishungurudzwa Mudzimba Owana Raramo neKutengesa Huku
text: Mamwe madzimai emudunhu reMashonaland West ayishungurudzwa mudzimba akawana rubatsiro rwekudzikamisa pfungwa kana kuti counseling pamwe nemari dzekuvamba mabasa ekuzvishandira nemaoko vanoti hupenyu hwavo hwashanduka. Madzimai aya avekusvika makumi matanhatu ari kupfuya huku dzekutengesa mazai pasi pechirongwa chinotsigirwa nesangano rakazvimirira reFamily Aids Caring Trust kana kuti FACT rinoshandawo neNational Aids Council-NAC-pasi pechirongwa chinonzi Safe Place. Mumwe mudzimai wekuNorton Amai Chenai Chipuriro avo vairohwa nemurume wavo pose paaidzoka kumba akadhakwa vanoti hupenyu hwavo hwashanduka zvakanyanya kubva zvavakatanga kuchengeta huku dzemazai ayo vanotengesa vachiwana mari yekutenga zvekudya izvo vaigaro netsana nemurume wavo. Mumwewo mudzimai ari kuchengeta nekutengesa huku ndiAmai Irene Gweshe vanoti vave kukwanisa kuriritira mhuri yavo. Asi vanoti dambudziko guru rinoita kuti mhirizhonga iwande mudzimba kushaikwa kwezvekudya. Amai Shupikai Chiwashira vanotiwo vainge vave nechirwere chemoyo kana kuti BP nekuda kwekushungurudzwa vanoti vave kunzwa zviri nani kubva zvavatanga kuzviitira mabasa avo emaoko. Mukuru weFACT mudunhu reMashonaland West, Amai Virginia Tausa vanoti Safe Place chirongwa chinosangana madzimai nevanavasikana vachikurukura matambudziko avanosangana nawo mudzimba. Amai Tausa vanoti sangano ravo rakaona kuti kubatsira madzimai nemashoko chete pasina chekubata hakuna zvakunobatsira. Chirongwa ichi chakatanga nehuku zana nemakumi mashanu dzakapihwa madzimai gumi nevashanu avo vakadzichengeta ndokuwanda kusvika pamazana manomwe namakumi mashanu. Vakapawo mamwe madzimai gumi nevashanu huku zana nemakumi mashanu kuti vatangewo bhizimisi ravo. Izvi ndizvo zvinoitika nguva dzose zvopa kuti madzimai akawanda awane chouviri. Amai Tausa vanoti madzimai akashungurudzwa chete ndiwo anopinda muchirongwa ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Chirwere cheCovid-19 Chovhiringa Pfungwa dzeVashandi Vakawanda
text:
Vamwe vana mukoti nanachiremba vakawanda vanonzi vave kubatwa nedambudziko rekusagadzikana kwepfungwa nekuda kwemashandiro avari kuita munguva ino yekurwisa dambudziko rechirwere cheCovid-19. Izvi zvakabuda pamusangano wakaitwa nezuro wakapindwa nevagari vemudunhu reMashonaland West. Vachitaira pamusangano uyu, m ukuru anoona nezvehutano hwepfungwa mudunhu reMashonaland West kana kuti Provincial Mental Health Officer, Dr Tichaona Mahachi, vakati vana mukoti navana chiremba vanosvika mazana matanhatu nemakumi masere nevatatu kana kuti 683 vakarwara nekusagadzikana kwepfungwa uye vamwe vanomwe vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 mudunhu kubva patanga chirwere ichi gore rapera. Dr Mahachi vakatiwo hurumende iri pakati pekuita dzidziso yakanangana
nevashandi vebazi rezvehutano kuvagadzirira kuti vasavhiringwe hutano
hwepfungwa pavanenge vachiita basa ravo nerutsigiro kubva kubazi
reUnicef.

Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, vanoti dambudziko
rekusagadzikana kwepfungwa riri kuitikawo mune mwamwe matunhu. Vati hurumende iri kuita dzidziso kunana mukoti navana chiremba mumatunhu aya. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa huwandu hwevana chiremba nevakoti vari kusangana nedambudziko iri munyika yose. Asi mukuru mubazi rezvehutano mudunhu reMashonaland Central, Dr
Cremance Tshuma, vati dambudziko iri harisi mudunhu mavo.

Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vanomwe
vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu
hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose pazviuru zvina nemazana
mashanu ane makumi mashanu, 4,550. Vamwe vanhu mazana mana ane gumi nevasere vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare izvo zvasvitsa vanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19
kubva zvachatanga pavanhu zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nazvitanhatu
nemazana masere ane gumi nevanomwe, 126 817.

Kusvika pakupera kwezuva nezuro, vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga
yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 vakanga vave mamiriyoni maviri ane
zviuru mazana masere nemakumi manomwe nezvitatu zvine mazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatatu, 2 873 893. Vabayiwa nhomba dzose dziri mbiri sezvinokurudzirwa vave miriyoni
imwechete ine zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nezvitanhatu nemazana maviri ane makumi mana nevanomwe, 1 926 247. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu
mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana
kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe chichipararira munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Dhiziri nePeturu Zvonetsa Kuwana Zvakare muZimbabwe
text: Vakawanda munyika vari kuchema chema nekushaikwa kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari zvapa kuti vemichovha vawedzere mari nezvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana. Asi hapana kujeka kuti chii chaizvo chiri kukonzera kushomeka kwemafuta aya. Hurumende inoti kunyange hazvo pombi inotakura mafuta kubva kuBeira yakambovharwa, nyika ine mafuta ekutakura dzimotokari akakwana kumatura avo anokwana mwedzi miviri. Gurukota rinoona nezvemhando dzemoto, Doctor Joram Gumbo, vanoti vanhu havafanire havo kuvhunduka panyaya yemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari sezvo Zimbabwe yagara yakagadzirira. Mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muzana anouya nepombi kubva kuBeira, Mozambique, guta rakaparadzwa nemvura. Mozambique ndiyo inotakura mafuta nepombi yayo kubva kuBeira kusvika kuFeruka kwaMutare kuburikidza nekambani inonzi Companiya Du Pipeline Mozambique-Zimbabwe. Kubva kuFerruka kusvika kuMabvuku inenge yave yekambani yemuZimbabwe yeNational Oil and Infrastructure Company. VaGumbo vanoti pombi iyi haina kuparadzwa asi kuti imba inoshandiswa kupomba mvura kana kuti control room kuBeira ndiyo yakange yaparadzwa. Asi munyori mukuru musangano revashandi reZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti kushaikwa kwemafuta kwave kukonzera kuti venmakombi vawedzere mitengo izvo zvopa kuti vashandi vaomerwe nehupenyu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paNelson Mandela Metropolitan University, Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, vanoti kushaikwa kwemafuta edzimotokari kunokanganisa mabhizimisi zvakanyanya. VaMugano vati zviri pachena kuti hurumende haina mari yekunze yekutenga mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. Muna Ndira, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakawedzera zvakanyanya mutengo wemafuta vachiti zvaizopa kuti awanikwe. Izvi zvakakonzera kuratidzira kwakazopa kuti vamwe vanhu vapfurwe nemauto. Asi zvekuti mafuta awanikwe munyika zvinenge zvakona n’anga murapwa achida. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi Vazhinji Vanoti Havatarisire Kupiwa Mabhonasi Gore Rino
text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, rinoti haritarisiri kuti vashandirwi vachanyima vashandi vavo mari dzekuvatenda dzemabhonasi gore rino sezvo zviri muzvibvumirano zvemabasa zvakanyoreranwa pasi pakati pemapoka maviri aya kuti vashandi vanobhadharwa mabhonasi. Mamwe makambani anotanga kubhadhara vashandi mari dzemabhonasi mwedzi uno waGumiguru, asi gore rino zvakanyarara nekuda kwemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi munyika. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti makambani mashoma kwazvo anobhadhara mabhonasi nekuti zvinobva pakuti gore iroro awana marii yakawanda zvakadii. Mukuru wesangano revashandirwi, reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, EMCOZ, VaJohn Mufukare, vaudza Studio 7 kuti panyaya dzemabhonasi, sangano ravo rinowanzo kuzvisiira kuboka rimwe nerimwe kuti rinokwanisa zvakadii kubhadra vashandi varo mabhonasi avo. No media source currently available

headline: Maonero eHurumende yeAmerica Mukudyidzana neChina.
text: Kwemakore akawanda, hurumende yeAmerica yange ichikumbira China mune zvakanaka kuti imire mabasa ehutsotsi, kumbunyikidza uye kusora muAmerica. Asi kwemakore ose aya China yange ichiramba kuteerera. Nenyaya yekuita hunhinhi uku, America yakazomanikidzwa kuvhara muzinda weChina kuHouston, Texas mushure mekunge China yayedza kutora zvisiri pamutemo hunyanzvi hwezvekugadzia mishonga uye kuda kupa chiokomuhomwe kune vanhu makumi mashanu vanoshanda pamakambani anogadzira mishonga aya kuti vapihwe magwaro akakosha ekugadzira mishonga nehumwe humhizha. China iri kuyedzawo kutyisidzira zvizvarwa zvenyika iyi zviri muAmerica zvinopikisa kuti zvidzokere kumusha. Zvakaitwa neChina kuHouston zvakapfurikidza zvakanyanya zvakasiya hurumende yeAmerica isina chimwe chekuita kunze kwekuvhara muzinda uyu. Iri rimwe danho rakaomarara ratorwa neAmerica kudzivisa China iyo yopinda nemwenje mudziva. Kwemakore, vamiriri veChina vange vachibatwa zvakanaka neAmerica asi ivo vachibata vamiriri veAmerica munyika yavo neseri kweruoko. Izvi handi zvinhu zvakanaka. Asi hamusi muAmerica chete umo vamiriri veChina vanozvidza nyika inovaremekedza. Kubiwa kwemagwaro enjere neChina rave dambudziko rakomba pasi rose. Mazuva mashoma adarika matare emuAmerica akawana zvimwe zvizvarwa zvekuChina zviviri Li Xiaoyu naDong Jiazhi zviine mhosva yekusora makambani emuAmerica nekuba zvakakosha pamacomputer. Vaviri ava vakange vapedza makore gumi vachisora nekuba magwaro akakosha ane humhizha hwepamusoro hwemaindustry kunyika dzinosanganisira United States, Australia, Belgium, Germany, Japan, Lithuania, the Netherlands, Spain, South Korea, Sweden, ne United Kingdom. Zvose izvi zvinoratidza kuti China inodya zvevapfupi nekureba mukuda kwayo kuti ive nyika ine hupfumi hwakasimba pasi rose. No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesa muMigwagwa Voratidzira muHarare
text: Vanhu vakawanda vanotengesa mumigwagwa vakaratidzira muHarare nemusi weChishanu pamuzinda wameya weHarare, paTown House vakakandirwa hutsi hunokatyidza nekurohwa nemapurisa. Vanhu ava vainge vachiti havasi kufara nekutorerwa zvinhu kwavari kuitwa nemapurisa ekanzuru. Vamwe vanhu gumi nevana kusanganisa sachigaro weNational Vendors Union Zimbabwe VaSten Zvorwadza vasungwa nemapurisa. No media source currently available MuZimbabwe hamuna kugadzikana sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kugara vachiratidzira nenyaya yekuti hupfumi hauna kumira zvakanaka.

headline: Kushandiswa kweMitemo yeRhodesia Kwopa Kuti Vanhu Vatorerwe Minda neMakambani ekuChina
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemitemo nekodzero dzevanhu dzinoti mitemo yeminda uye yezvicherwa isina kuvandudzwa kubva munguva yeRhodesia ndiyo yave kupa kuti vari mumamisha vakawanda vagare vakabatira hura mumaoko sezvo vave kumanikidzwa kutama vachisiya misha, makuva nenzvimbo dzavanoyeresa. Zvinhu zvakaita manyama amire nerongo kune vanhu variMashonaland East kwaKaseke kuUzumba, uye misha inoti Tome, Karimazonde, Kahwa neKatsukunya kwaMutoko uye kuChikomba kuChivhu. Vanhu ava vari kutamiswakuitira kuti makambani ekuChina achere matambo akakosha eGranite. Vamwe vakatarisana nekutamiswa vari kuChipinge Manicaland neChilonga kuChiredzi. Minda iyi iri kupihwa makambani evachena vanonzi vanodyidzana nehurumende. Pasi pemutemo weCommunal Areas Act, mutungamiri wenyika ndiye ane masimba ekuona kuti minda iri kumamisha iyi yashandiswa sei. Vanhu vemumaruwa havana magwaro kana kuti maTittle Deeds uye mitemo iripo inonzi haisi kunyatsovachengetedza. Gweta rinombomirira mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, VaTinomudaishe Chinyoka, vanoti mitemo inofanira kuvandudzwa. Mukuru werimwe sangano rinoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu munharaunda dzine zviwanikwa reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, vanoti hurumende iri kukundikana kuona kuti kodzero dzevanhu vari kumaruwa dzachengetedza. Vatendawo kuti mitemo ivandudzwe. No media source currently available

headline: Matare eDzimhosva Ovhiringwa neCovid-19
text: Komisheni inoona nezvekufambiswa kwenyaya dzemumatare, yeJudicial Services Commission, yazivisa nhasi kuti kunyange hazvo matare achange akavhurwa pamazuva eLockdown Level Four, matare achange asingaiti mabasa ese anotarisirwa kuti ave achiitwa semazuva ose. Mutauriri weJudicial Services Commission, Muzvare Rumbidzai Takawira, vati kunyange hazvo matare anenge akavhurwa panguva iyi, haakwanisi kuita mabasa awo sezvinotarisirwa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 nezvimwe zvipingaidzo. Muzvare Takawira vati nekudaro matare achange achingonzwa nyaya dziri kupinda mumatare kekutanga, nyaya dzechimbichimbi pamwe nenyaya dzeavo vanenge vachida kukumbira mukana wekutongwa vachibva kumba chete Muzvare Takawira vati izvi zvinoreva kuti vese vane nyaya dziri mumatare avo vaive vapiwa mazuva ekudzoka ari mumazuva makumi nematatu anotevera, vachazodzokera kumatare mumashure memazuva aya zvichitariswa mitemo inenge yaiswa nehurumende mukuedza kudzivirira kupararira kwedenda reCovid 19. Judicial Services Commission yazivisawo kutiwo vese vachange vachiuya kumatare vanosungirwa kutorwa temperature, kupfeka mamasiki pamwe nekugeza maoko, uye kuona kuti havabatani nevamwe zvakanyanya. Sangano iri ratiwo vanhuwo zvavo vanenge vasingabvumirwi kupinda pamatare mukati memazuva akatarwa eLockdown. Asi rimwe gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaObey Shava, vaudza Studio 7 kuti matanho atorwa neJudicial Services Commission aya anotyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika. VaShava vati izvi zvinoreva kuti vanhu vane nyaya mumatare, nyaya dzavo dzichanzwikwa mushure menguva yakareba zvisinei nebumbiro remitemo yenyika iro rinoti nyaya dzinofanirwa kunzwika nechimbichimbi mumatare. VaShava vatiwo zvinoomeserawo avo vasina kupiwa mikana yekutongwa vachibva kumba vachiti nguva yavo yekugara mutirongo inenge yorebeswa kunyange hazvo vasati vabatwa nemhosva. Izvi zvatsigirwawo nerimwezve gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaMartin Kadzere, vachitiwo kunyange matare ati pane nyaya dzaanenge achinzwa, magweta ari kurambidzwa kuenda kumabasa pamaroadblocks. VaKadzere vati nhasi ivo pachavo vadzorerwa kumba. Kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 zvakanyanya kwakaita kuti hurumende ikurudzire veruzhinji kuti vagare kudzimba kutanga nhasi, kwemazuva makumi matatu. No media source currently available

headline: VaBiti Vanoti Vanopikisa Vacharwa seMvumba Kuti Bumbiro Risavandudzwe
text: Danho rehurumende rekuda kuvandudza zvimwe zvikamu zvebumbiro remitemo yenyika rakonzera mutauro wakanyanya munyika. Vanopikisa vanoti vari kozorwa semvumba kuona kuti hurumende haisi kuzotanga kuisa chigamba pambumbiro remitemo yenyika. Asi gurukota rinoona nezvemitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vanoti bato reZanu-PF rakasarudzwa nevanhu nekudaro rine kodzero yekuita madiro pakuvandudza bumbiro. No media source currently available Hurumende yakatoburitsa bhiri iri mugwaro reGovernment Gazette musi wa 31 Zvita. Pamutemo, bhiri iri rinofanira kuenda kudare reparamende musi wa 31 Kurume sezvo richifanira kumira mazuva makumi mapfumbamwe kubva zvaraburitswa mugwaro rehurumende. Asi mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa reMDC, VaTendai Biti, vanoti hurumende ikaenderera mberi kuchatsva matemo mipini ichisara. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi veHurumende Vonyunyuta neKusabuda Pachena kweHurumende Panyaya yeBhonasi
text: Rimwe sangano revarairidzi, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, rinoti ranyorera kugurukota idzva rezvevashandi nemabasa, Amai Priscah Mupfumira richikumbira kuitaa musangano wechimbichimbi pakati pevashandi vehurumende nehurumende kuti vajekeserwe nezvenyaya yemari dzebhonasi. Danho resangano iri rinotevera kupesana kwemashoko kwarinoti kuri kubva kuhurumende, zvichitevera kusiyana kwemazuva ari kunzi ndiwo achabhadharwa vashandi mari dzavo dzemabhonasi. Svondo rapera vaive mutevedzeri vegurukota rezvevashandi, VaTongai Muzenda vakabuda vachizivisa kuti hurumende yaizobhadhara vashandi vayo vasati vapiwa mabhonasi mwedzi unouya. VaMuzenda vakabva vadzingwa basa neSvondo nemutungamiri wenyika VaRpbert Mugabe. Asi bepanhau reChronicle rinoti Amai Mupfumira vakavimbisa kuti vamwe vashandi vachapiwa mari dzavo mwedzi uno, vanenge vasara vopiwa mwedzi unouya. Asi munyori mukuru wePTUZ VaRaymond Majongwe vanoti hurumende haina zvairi kuita kuti ifambise mashoko aya nenzira kwayo, kunze kwekuzviona mumapepanhau. Hurumende yakazivisa kuti nekuda kwekushaiwa mari yaizopa vashandi vayo mari dzemabhonasi nezvikamu zvikamu. Mauto nemapurisa vanonzi vakatopiwa kare mari dzavo muna Mbudzi. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata Amai Mupfumira kanawo gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende. Asi VaMajongwe vanoti nhengo dzavo dzicharamwa mabasa temu inouya muna 2015 kana nyaya iyi isina kugadziriswa nekukasika. Hurumende yakazivisa kuti iri kutatarika kuwana mari inoikwanira sezvo iri kuwana mari shoma iri kupinda muhomwe yayo, iyo iri kubva yangoperera kumari dzemihoro yevashandi vayo. No media source currently available VaChinamasa vakatozivisa kuti hurumende ichagumura vamwe vashandi basa nekuti haina mari yekuvabhadhara.

headline: Muzvare Mamombe naMuzvare Chimbiri Vanonyimwa Mukana weKubhadhara Mari yeChibatiso
text: Mumiriri weHarare West muparamende, Muzvare Joanna Mamombe neimwe nhengo yebato ravo reMDC Alliance, Muzvare Cecelia Chimbiri, vanyimwa mukana wekutongwa vachibva kudzimba dzavo nedare ramejasitiriti pamhosva dzavari kupomerwa dzekuzvidza mapurisa nekutyora mirawu yeCovid-19 Regulations. Mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti, VaStanford Mambanje, vati Muzvare Mamombe naMuzvare Chimbiri vane hudokwadokwa hwekugara vachipara mhosva saka nokudaro vanofanira kugara mujeri kudzamara nyaya yavari kupomerwa yapera kutongwa. VaMambanje vati vasungwa ava, avo vanoti vakasungwa vachibva kunorapwa mushure mekutochwa kwavanoti vakaitwa pavanoti vakapambwa vari mumaoko ehurumende, vane mhosva dzichiri mumatare uye pose pavaipihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso vaipara mhosva saka vaona zvakakodzera kuti vagare mujeri kuti vasarambe vachipara mhosva. Gweta revasungwa ava, VaCharles Kwaramba, vati havana kufara nemutongo waturwa nedare nokudaro vave kukwidza nyaya iyi kudare repamusoro. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatshwayo, avo vanga varimowo mudare paturwa mutongo uyu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvanga zvisingakodzere kuti vasungwa ava vanyimwe mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso pakatariswa mhosva dzavari kupomerwa vachiti zviri pachena kuti zvematongerwo enyika zvave kupinzwa mumafambisirwo enyaya mumatare. Mutauriri wesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vati chinhu chinonyadzisa zvikuru kuti vari kuita zvehuori vari kupihwa mukana wekutongwa vachibva kudzimba dzavo asi vari kurwira kodzero dzevanhu nevezvematongerwo enyika vachiona pfumvu yekugariswa mumajeri kwenguva yakareba. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaJoy Mabenge, vati zviri kuitwa nemamejasitiriti zvekunyima vanhu mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso asi vachizonopihwa mikana iyi kudare repamusoro zvinoshoresa matare edzimhosva pamwe nekusvibisa chimiro chenyika. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemunyori mukuru muJudicial Services Commission, VaWalter Chikwanha, sezvo nhare dzavo dzanga dzisiri kudairwa kuti tinzwe pavamire sezvo vari ivo vanowona nezvatongi vematare. VaMambanje vati vasungwa ava vagodzoka kudare musi wa18 mwedzi uno. Zvichakadai, VaMambanje vazoswera vave kunzwa chikumbiro chaVaFredrick Mabamba, avo vari kupomerwa mhosva gumi neshanu dzekutengesera vanhu masitendi ekanzuru yeChitungwiza zvisiri pamutemo, chekuti vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo asi hurumende yanga ichipikisa chikumbiro ichi. VaMabamba vakasungwa nemapurisa eSpecial Anti Corruption Unit neChipiri vakazomiswa mudare nezuro vave kupomerwa mhosva idzi. VaMambanje vati VaMabamba vadzoke kudare mangwana apo pavati vachatura mutongo wavo pachikumbiro chaVaMabamba chekuti vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo. No media source currently available

headline: Bato reCCC rinoti Misangano Yaro muKupera kweSvondo Yave Kuzoenderera Mberi Mushure Mekugara Pasi neMapurisa
text: Mapurisa anonzi amborambidza bato rinopikisa reCitizens’ Coalition for Change kuita misangano nevatsigiri varo mukupera kwesvondo kuMarondera nekuBinga North. Tsamba dziri mumaoko eStudio 7 dzinoratidza kuti mapurisa anga ashandisa mutemo weMaintenance of Peace Act, kana kuti MOPA, kurambidza bato reCCC kuita misangano nevatsigiri varo kuMarondera mangwana uye neMuvhuro kuBinga North. Asi mutauriri weCCC, Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere, vaudza Studio 7 kuti misangano yavo yave kuzoenderera mberi kuMarondera, Binga North, Beitbridge neTsholotsho mushure mekuita musangano nemapurisa. Mutauriri weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaObert Masaraure vashora kumborambidzwa kweCCC kuita misangano yayo panguva iyo bato reZanu PF risiri kurambidzwa kuita misangano yaro. VaMasaraure vakurudzira komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission kuti imire pakati ichigadzirisa nyaya dzakadai. Asi mutauriri weZEC, Amai Joice Leticia Kazembe, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti komisheni yavo haina kwayakarerekera, vakakurudzira kuti mapato ane zvichemo asvitse zvichemo zvawo kukomiti ye multi-party liason kuti nyaya idzi dziongororwe. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vari mutungamiri webato reDemocratic Party, VaUrayazi Zembe, vati zviri kuitwa nemapurisa zvekurambidza VaChamisa nebato ravo kuita misangano zvinoratidza kuti munyika hamuna hutongi hwejekerere. Studio 7 yakundikana kunzwa divi remapurisa panyaya iyi sezvo tatadza kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi. Zvichakadai, Zanu PF yakatarisirwa kuitawo misangano mikuru miviri nevatsigiri vayo mukupera kwesvondo. Musangano uchaitwa ku Karoi mangwana Mugovera uchange uchitungamirwa nasachigaro vebato iri Amai Oppah Muchinguri-Kashiri kuchitiwo nemusi weSvondo mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato reZanu PF uye vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga vachange vachisangana nevatsigiri vebato ravo kwaMutare.

headline: Varimi Vonetseka neMbeu neZvikwereti zveKurimisa
text: Kunyange hazvo mvura yakaturuka, vakawanda mudunhu reMashonaland West vanoti havasati vaisa mbeu pasi sezvo vasina zvekurimisa, kushaya mbeu pamwe nefotereza izvo zviri kudhura zvakanyanya. Varimi vari kubhadhariswawo mari dzakasiyana zvichienderana nekuti vane dhora rekuAmerica here, mari yemunyika kana kuti Ecocash nedzimwe dzemakadhi. Hurumende nekune rimwe rutivi iri kukurudzira vamwe vemakambani akazvimirira kuti vabatsirewo varimi nezvikweti kurima zvakaita sesoya beans nezvimwe Varimi ava vanoti havana mbeu yekudyara sezvo iri kuvadhurira zvakanyanya. Mumwe murimi anorima kuMakonde VaIshmael Nyikadzino vanoti havana mari yekutenga mbeu nekudaro vave kutodyara chibage chemudura chavakakohwa gore rino icho vanofunga kuti chichadzikisa gohoo ravo. Pakiti yembeu yechibage yemakirogiramu gumi iri kutengwa nemadhora ari pakati pemazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe kusvika pamadhora mazana mana nemakumi maviri zvichienderana nekuti imbeu yemhando ipi. VaNyikadzino vanoti vagari vanofanirwa kupihwa chibage chehupfu sezvo kuine nzara zvekuti vanhu vachapedzisira vokanga mbeu. Zimbabwe yakatarisanawo nenzara inotyisa sezvo vanhu mamiriyoni masere vari kuda kubatsirwa nechikafu. Mumwe mugari akagariswa patsva kuBanket VaUpenyu Dzvove vanoti varimi vakawanda havana mombe dzekurimisa sezvo dzakafa. (The onus is on you to probe kuti what killed the cattle not write that he did not say) Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Farmers' Union (ZFU) VaWonder Chabikwa vanotiwo mbeu yakanonoka kuuya uye vakawanda vari kukundikana kuzadzikisa zviri kudiwa nemabhanga paine nguva kuti vakwerete mari pasi pechirongwa checommand agriculture. Vanhu vanokwanisa kukwereta mari pasi pechirongwa cheCommand Agriculture kuburikidza nebhanga reCommercial Bank of Zimbabwe (CBZ), Agribank, CBZ, Stanbic ne Zimbabwe Women’s Microfinace Bank. Mari iri kunzi ichashandiswa pachirongwa ichi inosvika mabhiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana maviri. Chirongwa cheCommand Agriculture ichi mukakore adarika change chichishorwa zvakanyanya sezvo dzimwe mari dzinodarika mabhiriyoni matatu dziri kunzi hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka. Kunyange hazvo varimi vari kuti vakaomerwa, mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakaudza vagari vekuMahusekwa mudunhu reMashonaland East nguva pfupi yapera kuti mvura zvayaturuka vanofanirwa kubuda mudzimba varime vachiti vasina mbeu vanopihwa mbeu yehurumende pasi pechirongwa chePresidential Scheme. Asi vakanofanobata chigaro chevanotungamira mabasa edunhu reMashonaland West kana kuti Provincial Administrator VaChenai Media Mugandani vanoti mbeu iyi inongopihwa chete vanhu vanoshaiwa vasina kana mombe. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvekurima vachishanda neZimbabwe Farmers Unio VaPrince Kuipa vanoti varimi vari kusangana nematambudziko ekushaya zvekurimisa nekupihwa mbeu nehurumende nguva yapera. VaKuipa vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kupa varimi mbeu nguva iripo. Kunze kwekushaya mbeu vakawanda vanoti varimi vane minda asi havana zvikwanisiro. Mutungamiriri webato reMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa vachitaurawo pamusangano wakamboitirwa kuKariba vakashoropodzawo hurongwa hwehurumenda hwekutadza kupa varimi matirakita ekurimisa vachiti kurima nemombe zvinotadzisa varimi kurima minda yakakura kuti vakohwe pakuru. Hurumende inoti varimi vanosvika zviuru mazana manomwe vari kupihwa mbeu nefotireza pasi pechirongwa chePresidential Scheme vamwe vanosvika zviuru mazana mana vanotora zvikwereti pasi pechirongwa cheCommand Agriculture. No media source currently available

headline: Kubviswa kweLockdown Kuchanetsa Sezvo Vanhu Vakawanda Vasati Vaongororwa Covid-19
text: Sangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights rinoti danho rekuwedzera kana kusawedzera mazuva ekuti nyika irambe yakavharwa, richanetsa kutora sezvo vanhu vazhinji munyika vasina kuongororwa kuti vane chirwere cheCovid-19 here kana kuti kwete. Izvi zvinoitika apo hurumende ichiti yave kutora matanho matsva ekuti vanhu vakawanda vaongororwe, zvikuru vari munzvimbo dzine vanhu vakabatwa neCovid-19. MuZimbabwe mava nevanhu makumi maviri nevatatu vabatwa nechirwere ichi, uye vanhu vatatu vafa nacho, asi pasi rose riine vanhu vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvinomwe vafa neCovid-19 kubva zvayakatanga kuChina gore rapera. Munyori musangano iri, Doctor Norman Matara, vaudza Studio7 ruzhinji rwevanhu munyika harwuna kuongororwa kuti rwune chirwere cheCovid-19 here kana kuti kwete panguva iyo nyika yakavharwa kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe akatarwa nemutungamiri wenyika zvichaita kuti hurumende itemeseke musoro kuti nyika yoramba yakavharwa here kana kuti kwete pachapera nguva yakatarwa naVaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Pari zvino, bazi rezvehutano rinoti raongorora vanhu mazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nevashanu chetekuti vane chirwere ichi here kana kuti Havana munyika ine vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nematanhatu. Nekuda kweizvi, VaMatara vati zvinonetsa kuti hurumende itore danho rine hudzamu isina humbowo hwakati tsvikiti hwekuti zvinhu zvakamira sei munyika pamusoro pechirwere ichi. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMDC, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vanoti huwandu hwevanhu vaongororwa kusvika pari zvino hunoratidza kuti kuvharwa kwakaitwa nyika hakuna chakwabatsira. Mutauriri wesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vakurudzirawo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti vambomira kufamba-famba kwavari kuita. Asi VaMnangagwa vanoti vari pakati pahurongwa hwekutenderera nenyika yose vachiona mamiriro akaita zvinhu pamusoro pechirwere cheCovid-19 ichi uye kuona kuti veruzhinji vari kutevedzera here kurudziro yavo yekuti veruzhinji vagare kudzimba senzira yekuderedza kuapararira kwechirwere ichi. VaMnangagwa vakazivisa kutivachazoongorora pakupera kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe avakatara kuti veruzhinji vange vari kudzimba senzira yekuderedza mikana yekupararira kwechirwere ichi kuti zvinokodzera here kuti veruzhinji varambe vari mudzimba kana kuti kwete. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rezvehutano, VaObediah Moyo, sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi munyori mubazi ravo, Doctor Agnes Mahomva, vaburitsa mashoko ekuti komiti yakaumbwa nemutungamiri wenyika kuti itungamire nyaya dzekurwisa chirwere che Coronavirus yeInter-Ministerial Taskforce on Covid-19 inotungamirwa nemumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika, VaKembo Mohadi, yakabvumirana kuti patorwe matanho akasimba ekuti vanhu vazhinji munyika vaongororwe kuti havana chirwere cheCvoid-19 here. Gwaro raburitswa naDoctor Mahomva iri rinoti vanhu vese vanga vachienda kumabasa panguva iyo nyika yanga yakavharwa, kunyanya vashandi vehurumende, vachaongororwa kuti havana kutapukirwa nechirwere ichi here. Doctor Mahomva vati munhu wese anofungidzirwa kuti ane chirwere ichi anosungirwa kuongororwa, uye vose vari kupinda munyika vachibva kunyika dzine chirwere ichi pamwe nevane zvirwere zvedzihwa vanofanira kuongororwa zvakare. Doctor Mahomva vatiwo vanhu vakwegura vane makore makumi matanhatu zvichikwira vari muzvipatara vane zvirwere zvakaita se asthma, shuga, BP, nezvirwere zvemoyo vanofanirawo kuongororwa zvakare. Vati zvose izvi zvichaitwa kuti hurumende inyatsoziva kuti nyika yakamira papi chaizvo pachirwere cheCovid-19. Pari zvino, chirwere cheCovid-19, icho chakatangira kuChina, chinonzi nehurumende chauraya vanhu vatatu munyika, uye kubata vanhu gumi nevasere, ukuwo pasi rose, vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni maviri vabatwa neCovid-19, uye vanhu vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvonomwe, vafa nechirwere ichi pasi rose. No media source currently available

headline: ZRP Inoti Mari Yayakapihwa muBhajeti naVaNcube Haikwane Kutenga Pfuti, Hutsi Hunokatyidza neZvimwe
text: Mubhajeti risati ratambirwa nedare reparamende kana kuti budget proposal ravakatura vhiki rapera, gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakapa mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police kana kuti ZRP mari inosvika mabhiriyoni makumi matanhatu emunyika kana kuti 60 billion dollars ekuita mabasa. Asi vakuru vemapurisa vanoti kuti vakwanise kuita zvavanotarisirwa kuita, vanoda mari inosvika mabhiriyoni mazana mashanu nemakumi masere kana kuti 580 billion yemunyika.  Mumwe mutevedzeri wemukuru wemapurisa achiona nezvevashandi, Deputy Commissioner General (Human Resources) VaElliot Ngirandi, vaudza nhengo dzeparamende kuti ZRP mari yavari kunzi vapihwe kana bhajeti rikatambirwa nedare iri ishoma zvikuru pane zvavange vachitarisira.  Semuenzaniso, vatiwo vaida mari inosvika mabhiriyoni mazana mana nemakumi maviri emadhora kana kuti 420 billion pamabasa akasiyana siyana akafanana nekutenga zvombo, motokari nezvimwe zvikwanisiro asi vakapihwa mabhiriyoni gumi nemaviri emadhora emunyika chete kaba kuti 12, 6 billion. VaNgirandi vati vaida mari inosvika makumi mashanu emabhiriyoni kana kuti 50 billion doallrs kuti vakwanise kuendesa mapurisa kunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana siyana. Vati mapurisa anoenda kubasa asina mari yekubatsirikana kana kuti maallowances vakatiwo mapurisa ari kushandisa mbozhanhare dzavo pachinhambo chekushandisa zviovha zvepabasa. VaNgirandi vatiwo zvinosuwisa kuti vane vanenge vari muhusungwa kuzvitokisi havawani chekafu. Vatiwo kana zvipatara nemakirinika zveeZRP hazvina mishonga uyewo vaida mabhiriyoni matanhatu ekutenga mishonga asi vakapihwa mabhiriyoni maviri chete pabhajeti regore rinouuya. VaNgirandi vakumbira nhengo dzeparamende kubva kukomiti inoona nezvemukati menyika nekomoti yeSeneti inoona nezverunyararo munyika kuti vataure negurukota rezvemari kuti riwedzere mapurisa mari . Asi munyori mubazi rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, VaAaron Nhepera, vavimbisa nhengo dzeparamende kuti munyika hamusi kuzoita nyonga nyonga nekuda kwekuti ZRP yakapihwa mari shoma vachiti vakatoudza mutungamiriri wenyika nezvenyaya iyi. Vakumbirawo nhengo dzeparamende kuti dzitaure nebazi rezvemari kuti ripeZRP mvumo yekushandisa mari yefaindi nedzimwe dzainowa vachiti izvi zvinoita kuti mmapurisa awane mari yekushandisa yakakwana.  Zvichakadai mukuru mubazi reCivil Registry, Registrar General, VaHenry Machiri, vaudzawo nhengo dzeparamende kuti bazi ravo harina kuwana mari yaraida mubhajeti vachiti vakapihwa mabhiriyoni gumi reimwe kana kuti 1, 1 billion chete asi ivo vaida zana remabhiriyoni emadhora kana kuti 100 billion dollars.  VaMachiri vati vashandi vebazi ravo vakatoresa vanhu zvitupa mumatunhu ese munyika pasi pechirongwa cheNational Mobile Registration gore rino havasti vabhadhra. Varatidzawo kusafara nenyaya yekuti havana kupihwa mari yekunyoresa vanhu kuvhota zvakare kana Zimbabwe Electoral Commission ichinge yapedzeda kutara miganhu yenzvimbo dzekuvhotera gore rinouya kana kuti Delimitation. VaNhepera vatiwo kunyoreswa kwevanhu kwakashosha uye vakumbira nhengo dzeparamende dzione zvadzingaiite kuti mari yekuita izvi iwanike. Sachigaro wekomiti inoona nezvekudzvirirwa kwenyika, VaAlbert Nguluvhe pamwe nasachigaro wekomiti inoona nezverunyararo, VaDavid Parirenyatwa vaudza VaNhepera nevamwe kuti vataure zvinhu zvakakosha zvavanoda kuti zviwedzera mari vachiti zviri pachena kuti hapana mari yakawanda yekupa kuzvirongwa zvese zvabazi ravo.  Pari zvino mapazi ese ehurumende ari kusangana nemakomiti eparamende achitaura kuti anoda kuwedzerwa mari yakawanda zvakadii paramende isati yapasa bhajeti re4.5 trilllion rakaturwa svondo rapfuura. Mapazi ehurumende ainge achida mari inosvika matrillion masere nemabhiriyoni manomwe kana kuti 8,7 trillion.

headline: Kunyoresa Kuvhota Kwounza Mutauro Munyika
text: Kunyangwe hazvo paine kunetsa kukuru pamabatirwo ari kuitwa basa nesangano reZimbabwe Electoraal Commission, ZEC, pakunyoresa vavhoti, sachigaro wesangano iri, Amai Rita Makarau, vanoti vane chivimbo chekuti vachakwanisa kunyoresa vanhu mamiriyoni manomwe. Nemusi weChina, mapato anopikisa anoti rePeople Democratic Party, PDP, neMDC inotungamirwa naMuzvinafundo Welshman Ncube anyora mashoko kuvatori venhau achigunun’una kuti ZEC haina kugadzirira zvachose kunyoresa vanhu uye nekuti zvichemo zviri kubva kuvanhu zvawandisa. Mutauriri wePDP, VaJacob Mafume, vati vatsigiri vavo vari kuvaudza kuti vanhu veZEC havasi kukwanisa kushandisa maBiometric Voter Registration Kits ekunyoresa vavhoti. VaMafume vati Amai Makaru vari kuita zvemahumbwe nechirongwa chenyika. Mutauriri weMDC inotungamirwa naVaNcube, VaKurauone Chihwayi, vati ZEC iri kushanda neZanu-PF mukuda kudzivisa vanhu zvikuru mumaguta kuti vasanyorese kuvhota. Amai Makarau vanoti vanhurume vakawanda vari kuita matambudziko pakuti michina iverenge minyore yeminwe yavo kana kuti finger prints sezvo vasingashandise mafuta ekuzora minwe yavo. No media source currently available Gwaro revavhoti idzva rechizvinozvino riri kushandiswa kekutanga munyika musarudzo dzegore rinouya uye range richitarisirwa kuti richapedza mutauro unosimuka pose panoitwa sarudzo. Asi nekunetsana kuri kuitika pakati peZEC nemapato anopikisa, zvinoratidza pachena kuti sarudzo dzemuZimbabwe dzichangoita mutauro sezvakaitika kuKenya zvakapa kuti dare repamusoro soro munyika iyi rigume rati sarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika dzidzokororwe. Sangano reZEC riri kupomerwawo mhosva yekungotevera zvinotaurwa nebato reZanu-PF richiremera divi rimwe setsvimbo. Asi ZEC inoti haiudzwe zvekuitwa nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika. Mutauriri weMDC-T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti ZEC yange isina kugadzirira kunyoresa vavhoti. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vakarerekera havo kudivi reZanu-PF, VaGadzira Chirumanzu, vanoti vanopikisa vagara vachida kungoshora ZEC. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzoshoropodza Mhirizhonga Yakaitika paCapitol Hill neMusi weChitatu
text: Mapato ezvematongerwo enyika emuZimbabwe ari kushora zvikuru mhirizhonga yakaitika paCapitol Hill muWashington DC, uye ari kukurudzira mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, kuti vatambidzane masimba murunyararo naVaJoe Biden veDemocratic Party. Mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mhirizhonga yakakonzereswa naVaTrump paCapitol Hill chinhu chinoshoresa zvikuru panguva iyo America ichigara yakatsoropodza Zimbabwe nemafambisiro ainoita sarudzo. Munyori anoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe muMDC Alliance, Muzvare Gladys Hlatswayo, vashorawo mhirizhonga yekuAmerica iyi vachiti izvi zvapa mukana vatungamiri venyika dzisina hutongi hwejekerere pasi rose dzakaita seZimbabwe kuti vatsoropodze America vachikangamwa kugadzirisa zvinonetsa munyika idzi. VaMugwadi vati nekuda kwezvakaitika kuparamende yeAmerica neChitatu, hurumende yeAmerica haichakwanise kuudza dzimwe nyika pasi rose nezvehutongi hwejekerere. Sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaKindness Paradza, vatsinhirawo zvakataurwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti America inofanirwa kubvisa zvirango zvayakatemera Zimbabwe zvichitevera mhirizhonga yakaitika kuWashington DC. VaParadza vati kufa kwakaita vanhu vana kunokodzera kuti VaTrump vanotongwa kuInternational Criminal Court. Zvichakadai, gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu uye vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vati kunyange hazvopakaita mhirizhonga kuCapitol Hill, mapurisa ekuAmerica haana kushandisa chisimba chakanyanya sezvinowanzoitwa muZimbabwe. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda nesangano rePlatform for Youth Development Initiative in Zimbabwe, VaClaris Madhuku, vatiwo hapana chakaipa pakuratidzira kwakaitwa kuAmerica nevatsigiri vaVaTrump kunyange hazvo kuratidzira uku kwakazopedzisira kwave nemhirizhonga. VaMadhuku vati zvakaitika izvi hazvina chazvinonyanyochinja pachimiro cheAmerica kana zvichienzaniswa nenyika dzemuAfrica. VaTrump vakazobvuma havo kuti vape matomhu kunaVaBiden, uye VaBiden vakatarisirwa kugadzwa musi waNdira 20 semutungamiri weAmerica wechimakumi mana nematanhatu mushure mekunge dare reCongress yekuAmerica ratsinhira kuti VaTrump vakakundwa naVaBiden musarudzo dzakaitwa muna Mbudzi 2020. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Oparadza Zvinotengeswa Mumigwagwa
text: Vanotengesera mumigwagwa vari kurasikirwa nezvinhu zvavo zvinokosha zviuru nezviuru zvemadhora izvo vari kutorerwa nemakanzuru mumaguta zvichetevera mashoko emutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, ekuti makanzuru anofanira kubvisa mumigwagwa vese vari kutengesa zviri kunze kwemutemo. Kunyange hazvo mamwe madhorobha asati atanga kubvisa vanotengesa mumigwagwa, mumaguta akaita seHarare neMasvingo, mapurisa ekanzuru pamwe neeZimbabwe Republic Police, ZRP, ari kufamba mumigwagwa achitora zvinhu zvevanhu vanonzi vari kutengesera panzvimbo dzisangabvumidzwe. KuMasvingo vaye vanenge vatorerwa zvinhu zvavo vanokwanisa kunozvitora kumahofisi ekanzuru kana ZRP kana vachinge vabhadhara faindi. MuHarare kanzuru inoti iri kuparadza mirivo, michero nezvimwe zvinhu zvinosvika matani maviri zuva rega rega. Mutauririri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti zvinhu izvi, zvinogona kuora, hazvibvumidzwe kudzorerwa mumigwagwa. Asi vanoti vaye vanenge vatorewa zvinhu zvakaita sembatya kana mbozhanhare vanokwanisa kuenda kunotora zvinhu zvavo kumahofisi ekanzuru vabvisa mubhadharo. VaChideme vanoti nyaya yekuparadza chikafu, michero nemiriwo inoitirwa kudzivirira zvirwere zvakaita sekorera sezvo zvinhu izvi zvinenge zvatorwa munzvimbo dzisingabvumidzwe. VaChideme vati kana zvinhu zvikagarisa zvisina kutorwa, kanzuru inozvitengesa. Zvichakadai, VaChideme varamba mashoko ekuti mapurisa nevamwe vashandi vekanzuru vari kutora zvinhu zvinenge zvatorerwa vanoitengesera mumigwagwa vachiti izvi hazvibvumidzwe nemutemo. Imwe nhengo yeZimbabwe Home Industries Association, Amai Martha Shumba, vati manyepo kuti vese vari kutorerwa zvinhu vari kutengesera panzvimbo dzisingabvumidzwe. Vati semuenzaniso, kanzuru nemapurisa vari kutora zvinhu zvevanhu vari pane mimwe misika yakavhura kare kare. Zvichetevera mashoko aVaMugabe, gurukota rinoona nezvedunhu reHarare, Amai Mirriam Chikukwa, vakaita musangano nekanzuru yeHarare, mapurisa, masoja nemagadhijere vakatanga chirongwa chekubvisa vanotengesera mumigwagwa icho chinonzi chicharamba chiripo kusvika guta rachena. Izvi zviri kuitwawo mune mamwe maguta nemadhorobha asi mamwe madhorobha achiri kuronga kuti ofambisa chirongwa ichi sei. Vanhu vakawanda munyika havana mabasa izvo zvave kuita kuti vararame nekutengesa mumigwagwa. No media source currently available

headline: Chipatara cheChegutu Chovharwa Mushure Mekunge Mumwe Anopa Mushonga Ashaya neCovid-19
text:
Chipatara chikuru chemuChegutu chakavharwa nemusi weChina mushure mekubatwa kwevashandi vaviri nechirwere cheCovid-19, mumwe wacho ndokufa nezuro. zvi zvasvita huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose pamazana maviri nemakumi matatu nemumwe chete. Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru mubazi rezvehutano mudunhu
reMashonaland West, VaGift Masoja, vazivisa veruzhinji kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka pachipatara chikuru chemuChegutu neimwe kiriniki iri pedyo zvichitevera kufa kwemumwe mushandi nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro. VaMasoja vati mushandi akashaya uyu munhu aishanda kudivi rinochengetwa mishonga inopihwa varwere vepachipatara ichi. Vati vavhara chipatara ichi kuitira kuti vapfapfaidze mushonga chipatara chose sezvinokurudzirwa nebazi ravo pamwe nesangano reWorld Health Organization. VaMasoja vati bazi ravo riri kushushikana zvikuru nehuwandu hwevanhu vave kufamba vasina kupfeka zvinodzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Vayambira vagari kuti chirwere cheCovid-19 chichiripo uye kuti vatevedzere zvose zvinodikanwa zvakaita sekupfeka mamasiki anovhara muromo nemhino pamwe nekugara vanhu vakapatsanurana kana kuti social distancing.

Munguva pfupi yadarika bazi rezvehutano rakambovhara makiriniki anoti Chikonohono muChinhoyi, Madzorera kwaZvimba neChikangwe kuKaroi nekuda kwekuti vamwe vashandi vepamakiriniki aya vainge vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Studio7 yaona vanhu vakawanda muChinhoyi vasina kupfeka mamasiki mumisha inogara veruzhinji, vanhu vanozopfeka mamasiki aya kana vave kupinda muguta. Mumwe wechidiki anga asina kupfeka masiki, VaArthur Changara, vati vanofunga kuti chirwere cheCovid-19 chaderera uye mapurisa haachafamba famba mumisha inogara veruzhinji. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Inoti Ngapaitwe Hurukuro paNyaya yeMitengo Yoita Chamurambamhuru
text: Munyori mukuru wesangano revashandi reZCTU VaJaphet Moyo vanoti panofanira kuitwa musangano wechimbi chimbi weTNF kuzeya nyaya yemitengo yezvinhu yoramba yoita chamurambamhuru. Mitengo yezvinhu zvekudya uye michova yakawedzerwa zvakanyanya mumazuva mashoma adarika. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende sezvo gurukota rezvevashandi Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vati vange vachangopinda munyika kubva kuAmerica nekudaro vange vachida kumbotura befu. Mutungamiri weEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe Doctor Israel Murefu vati vange vakabatikana vakati tigozovafonera. No media source currently available

headline: Madhokotera neVakoti Votanga Kuramwa Mabasa neKushaya Zvekuzvidzivirira kuCoronavirus
text: Vanachiremba navana mukoti munyika vatanga kuramwa mabasa kunyangwe nyika yatarisana nechirwere chouraya vanhu vakawanda pasi rose cheCoronavirus. Vanachiremba navanamukoti ava vanoti hurumende iri kukundikana kuvapa zvekushandisa kuti vazvidzivire kutapurirwa zvirwere zvakaita seCoronavirus. Mutsamba kubazi rezvehutano, iri mumaoko eStudio 7, vanamukoti kuburikidza nesangano reZimbabwe Nurses Association vati vakasuma bazi rezvehutano mazuva maviri apfuura kut vanoda zvekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere cheCoronavirus, mvura muzvipatara uye mari yekushanda kwavachaita nguva yakareba vachirapa vane chirwere cheCoronavirus. Mutsamba kubazi rezvehutano nevakuru vezvipatara zvehurumende munyika, mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vanachiremba reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr Tawanda Zvakada, vatiwo nhengo dzavo hadzichakwanise kuramba dzichishanda kutanga nhasi sezvo dzisina zvekuzvidzivirira. Vati vakaita musangano nehurumende neMuvhuro nezvenyaya iyi asi kusvika pari zvino hapana chabuda. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvehutano, Dr Obadiah Moyo, kana munyori mubazi ravo, Dr Agnes Mahomva, sezvo vose vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha dzavo. Kusvika pari zvino hurumende inoti vanhu vatatu vabatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus munyika uye mumwe chete, mutori wenhau, Zororo Makamba, akashaya vakavigwa neChipiri. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo, vatenda kuti vanoda zvikwanisiro muzvipatara nechimbi chimbi uye vakanda mapadza pasi.. No media source currently available

headline: Kusapa Bazi rezveHutano Mari KweMakore Akawanda Kunonzi Kwopa Kuti Kurwisa Coronavirus Kunetse.
text: Vanhu vakawanda munyika vanoti kunyangwe hazvo Zimbabwe yasvitsa makore makumi mana yawana kuzvitonga kuzere, zvinhu munyaya dzezvehutano hazvina kumira zvakanaka zvaburitswa pachena nenyaya yechirwere checoronavirus. Vanhu vakawanda vataura neStudio 7 kusanganisira nyanzvi munezvehutano vanoti Zimbabwe inofanirwa kusunga dzisimbe kugadzirisa matambudziko munyaya dzezvehutano. Amai Pepukai Shava vanoti kunyangwe haazvo nyika yakakwanisa kuvaka zvipatara mushure mekuwana kuzvitonga kuzere, zvipatara izvi zvangove midhuri isisina zvinhu zvakakosha zvekushandisa. Mutungamiri webato reLabour Economists African Democrats, Muzvare Linda Masarira, vanoti hurumende haisi kuita zvakakwana kusimudzira nyaya dzezvehutano munyika zvopa kuti kana kurwisa chirwere checoronavirus kunetsa nekuti zvipatara hazvina zvikwanisiro zvakaita semichina yekubatsira vanhu kufema kana varwarisa. Vatiwo zvingabatsire kana nyika ikaisa mutemo unosungira kuti vatungamiriri vehurumende varapwe munyika vakati izvi zvinogona kubatsira kusimudzirwa kwezvipatara munyika. Izvi zvatsigirwawo naVaKudzai Kwangwari avo vatiwo kunyangwe hazvo zviripowo zvakagonekwa nenyika mushure mekuwana kuzvitonga kuzere vati kune zvizhinjiwo zvichiri kuda kuzadzikiswa vakati izvi zvinosanganisirawo nyaya yehutano. Munyori musangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, Doctor Norman Matara, vanoti kunyangwe hazvo mumakore ekutanga Zimbabwe ichangosungunuka, hurumende yakamboedza kusimudzira zvinhu munyaya dzezvehutano kusanganisira kuvaka makirinika. Asi vanoti makore makumi maviri apfuura, Zimbabwe yatadza kuvandudza zvinhu munyaya yezvehutano kuburikidza nekusapiwa mari yakawanda kubazi rezvehutano. VaMatara vati kunyangwe hazvo nyika dzemuAfrica dzakanyorerana pasi chibvumirano cheAbuja Declaration icho chinosungira hurumende kuti iise zvikamu gumi nezvishanu kubva muzana zvemari yebhajeti yenyika kune zvehutano, Zimbabwe haina gore rayakambozadzikisa zvinotarisirwa izvi. VaMatara vanotiwo kusaisa mari yakakwana kubazi rezvehutano zvinobudawo kunyangwe panguva ino nyika iri kurwisa chirwere cheCOVID-19 vachiti bazi rezvehutano rakatora nguva kuwana mari chirwere chapinda munyika izvo zvakaita kuti zvizhinji zvaidiwa kushandiswa zvibve kune masangano ekunze kwete kuhurumende. Vanomirira Chinhoyi mudare reparamende vari nhengo yeMDC Doctor Peter Matarutse vanoti kunyangwe hazvo nyika yakakwanisa kudzivirira zvirwere zvakaita se Kwashiorkor, T.B nezvimwewo kuondomoka kwehupfumi munyika kwasiya zvinhu zvakaita manyama amire nerongo munyaya dzezvehutano. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvehutano Dr Obadiah Moyo kuti tinzwe divi ravo sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaEnergy Mutodi vati hurumende iri kuyedza napose painogona kugadzirisa zvinhu munyaya dzezvehutano. Nyaya yechirwere checoronavirus iri kuburitsa pachena kuti zvinhu munyanya dzezvehutano zvaderera uye zvipatara zvizhinji hazvina zvikwanisiro uye midhuri yacho yave kuondomoka. No media source currently available

headline: VanaChiremba Vanoti Hurumende Iri Kutenga Mishina Yakafa Kubva kuIndia
text: Munyori mukuru wesangano ravanachiremba reZimbabwe Senior Hospital Doctors Association Dr Aaron Musara vanoti mimwe michina yakatengwa nehurumende haisi kushanda zvachose izvo zvoodza moyo yavanachiremba vachiti hurumende haisi kuratidza kuzvipira kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Mimwe mishina isiri kushanda zvakanaka iyi yakatengwa kuIndia. Vanachiremba vanoti hurumende iri kungorova bembera ichitaura nezvekuti vanoda mari yemihoro asi ivo vachitiwo vakaudza vakuru mubazi rezvehutano kuti havana zvikwanisiro zvakaita semichina nemishonga nekudaro kunyangwe vakadzokera kubasa hakuna zvinenge zvichiitwa. Vachipindura panyaya yekuti hurumende iri kutenga michina yakafa, sachigaro weHealth Service Board Dr Paulinus Sikosana vakaudza studio 7 kuti iendese mibvunzo kumunyori mubazi rezvehutano Dr Agnes Mahomva avo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Vanachiremba vave nemwedzi mitatu vachiramwa mabasa.  No media source currently available

headline: Mamwe Mapato Anopikisa Oshoropdzawo MDC Alliance neNyaya yeZvirango
text: Danho rakatorwa nechikwata chaipa humbowo hwemamiriro akaita zvinhu muzimbabwe kudare reSeneti remu America yekuti zvinhu zvirambe zvakamira sezvazviri panyaya dzezvirango zvinonzi zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe yasimudza mutauro mukuru muvana veZimbabwe nevamwe vekunze vari kutevera zviri kuitika munyika. Vamwe vanhu vakawanda vari kundokodzera bato reMDC-T nekwavari kuti kukumbira kuti zvirango zvirambe zviripo. Vamwewo ndivo vari kuti chikwata cheMDC Alliance chakatumwa nemutungamiri weMDC-T, VaMorgan Tsvangirai ichi chaive nekodzero yekuti chiudze America kuti kana zvinhu zvisina kushanduka muZimbabwe zvinhu zvirambe zvakamira sezvazviri. Izvi zvinotevera kupa humbowo kwaVaTendai Biti vakanga vakamirira MDC Alliance, VaDewa Mavhinga vanove gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vachishanda neHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, pamwe naPeter Godwin, anove mutori wenhau ari muno muAmerica asi ari chizvarwa cheZimbabwe. Kunyange hazvo munhu wese aine kodzero yekutaura pfungwa dzake, vamwe vari kuti zvakaitwa nevana veZimbabwe ava zvinhu zvavakanga vasingatarisire kuti zvingaitike. Vakawanda kusanganisira mapato anopikisa, vari kupomera mhosva vatatu ava yekukumbira kuti America isabvise zvirango, izvo zvinogarochemwa nazvo neZanu PF kuti ndizvo zvakonzeresa matambudziko ari munyika. Rimwe remapato ari kushoropodza danho rakatorwa nemubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance rekuenda kuAmerica kunomira pamberi pedare rekongiresi, ibato reNCA rinotungamirirwa naProfessor Lovemore Madhuku. Mutairiri weNCA, VaMadock Chivasa vanoti sebato rinomirira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe haringatsigiri kushupika kwevana veZimbabwe kusvika pakukumbira zvirango, izvo vanoti zviri kuuraya vanhu. VaChivasa vanoti zvaifanirwa kuitwa nemubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance kutanga yatsvaga nhaurirano nehurumende yavepo, kwete kumhanyira kukwira ndege kuenda kuAmerica. Asi mutauriri weMDC-T VaObert Gutu vanoramba mashoko ekuti bato ravo rakaenda kunokumbira kuti zvirango zvisabviswa, vachiti naivovo sebato havatodi kuti pakurudzirwe zvirango zvinozonetsa vana veZimbabwe. “Zvirango izvi zvinotambudza varombo nekuti vane mari dzavo vanonorapwa kunanaSingapore. MDC-T haife yakakokera muchetura unourayisa vana veZimabwe,” VaGutu vanodaro VaGutu vanoti vanotonetsekanawo pamusoro pezvirango izvi, vachiti bato ravo harina simba rekubvisa kana kuwedzeresa zvirango sezvo izvi zvichiitwa chete nekongiresi yeAmerica. Asi VaChivasa vanoti vana veZimbabwe havafanirwi kuvhotera vanhu vari kukumbira zvirango izvi, avo vanoti vatengesi. No media source currently available

headline: RBZ neZimtrade Dzoyedza Kumutsiridza Mabhizimisi emuBulawayo
text: Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe ichishanda neZimtrade svondo rino riri kuparura hurongwa hwekuyedza kumutsiridza maindasitiri ekuBulawayo. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi hadzisi kuwiririrana kuti zviri kuda kuitwa izvi zvinoshanda here kana kuti kwete. Nhumwa kubva kuRBZ neZimtrade dziri kutarisirwa kupinda muBulawayo nemusi weChitatu dzotaura nevemaindasitiri ava kusvika musi weChishanu. Maindasitiri akawanda muBulawayo akavharwa nekusamira zvakanaka kwenyaya dzezvehupfumi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachitungamira zvidzidzo paZimbabwe Ezekiel Guti University, Doctor Gift Mugano, vanoti zvekutumira chikwat kuenda kuBulawayo kupedzera hoko padehwe retsindi sezvo zviri kuda kuitwa zvichizivikanwa. Vati pane ongororo dzakaitwa nemasangano akaita saana Confederation of Zimbabwe Industries dzinotaura zvinoda kuitwa. Vatiwo chiri kunetsa inyaya yemari nekuti maindasitiri anoda mabhiriyoni maviri kuti asarambe achitatarika. Doctor Mugano vatiwo kuti Bulawayo ibudirire inofanira kukwanisa kukwikwidzana nemamwe makambani ari kuchamhembe kweAfrica vachiti mitero inobhadharwa muZimbabwe yakawandisa zvekuti inogona kupa kuti vekunze vasade kuita bhizimisi neZimbabwe. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaCalvin Mdzingiri, avo vanodzidzisa paUniversity of the Free State kuSouth Affrica, vati vanotenderana naDoctor Mugano vachiti zvinoda kuitwa yave garoziva. Vatiwo zvakakosha kuti pave neongororo yekuti maindasitiri anoda kuvhurwa ane zvaanokwanisa kutengesa nyore kuvanhu. Mumiriri weMpopoma-Pelandaba mudare reparamende vari nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaJoseph Tshuma, vati zvinhu zvakakosha kuti maindasitiri emuBulawayo amutsiridzwe. Asi nhengo yeparamende inomirira Bulawayo East mudare reparamende, Muzvare Thabitha Khumalo, vati Zanu-PF iri kuda kubata vanhu kumeso. MuZimbabwe vamwe vakazvimirira vanoti vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muzana havana mabasa nenyaya yekuvharwa kwemaindustry. Ongororo yakaitwa ne International Monetary Fund inoratidza kuti Zimbabwe inyika iri pachidanho chechipiri pasi rose kuva nevanhu vanozviitira mabasa emaoko kana kuti informal sector. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi Vononga Svosve neMuromo neKudhura kweZvinhu
text: Zimbabwe National Statistics Agency yakazivisa nemusi weMuvhuro kuti kukwira kwemutengo zvinhu, inflation, kwasvika pazvikamu zana nemakumi manomwe nezvishanu kubva muzana, uchibva pazvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe nezvinomwe kubva muzana. Izvi zvasiya vashandi vakawanda munyika vasina chekubata uye munyika musisina kugadzikana sezvo poita ropa rakaipa pakati pevashandi nehurumende. Pavewo nekutyityidzirana kwava kuitika munyika zvikuru kuvanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vanogona kukonzera kuti munyika vanhu varamwe mabasa. Mutungamiri wesangano reZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vati vatumirwa bara repfuti kuhofisi kwavo. Asi VaMutasa vati kusungwa kana kutyisidzirwa uku hakusi kuzovakanganisa kurwira kodzero dzevashandi avo vave kunonga svozve nemuromo. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemutungamiri werimwe sangano revarairidzi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, Doctor Takavafira Zhou. Mukuru weConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaChris Mugaga, vanoti zvinonetsa kuti vemakambani vawedzere vashandi mari nekuti naivo vari kuremerwa sezvo kusina magetsi nezvimwe. Vaimbova gurukota rezvemari uye vari mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weMDC, VaTendai Biti, vanoti zvinhu hazvife zvakagadzirika munyika kana maindasitiri asiri kushanda zvakanaka. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo neimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaVictor Bhoroma. Asi vachipawo pfungwa dzavo nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaCallisto Jokonya, avo vanova nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, vanoti vanhu havafanire kunyanya kuvhunduka nekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu nekuti hurumende iri kuyedza kugadzirisa zvinhu kwete zvaiitika muna 2008. Gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vakabvisa mari dzakasiyana siyana dzaishandiswa munyika kuti pashandiswe dhora remunyika chete nechinangwa chekuti mitengo yezvinhu idzikiswe. Asi kusvika pari zvino zvinenge zviri kukona n’anga murapwa achida.

headline: Vanachiremba Vakuru Vanozivisa Kuramwa Mabasa Kana Zvichemo Zvavo Zvisina Kugadziriswa
text: Vanachiremba vakuru vari pasi pesangano reZimbabwe Senior Hospital Doctors Association, neChitatu vakapa hurumende mazuva gumi nemana ekuti igadzirise matambudziko ari muzvipatara pamwe nenyaya yemihoro yavo, kukundikana kwayo voramwa mabasa. Izvi zvinouya panguva iyo bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa zuva rimwero kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere che Covid-19 munyika hwakakwira kusvika pachiuru nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 1 089, zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwevamwe vanhu makumi maviri nevashanu vaine chirwere ichi pavanhu zviuru zviviri nemazana matanhatu negumi nevaviri kana kuti 2 612 vakavhenekwa. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi kusvika nezuro vaive mazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu kana kuti 395, uye vashaya vachiri makumi maviri. Tsamba yakanyorwa nesangano ravanachiremba vakuru iyi, iyo yakanyorerwa kuboka reHealth Services Board, kumunyori mukuru mubazi rezvehutano pamwe nekuvakuru vezvipatara, kana kuti hospital clinical directors, iri kuda kuti hurumende iise mishonga nezvikwanisiro muzvipatara, iwanise vanachiremba zvekuzvidzivirira kubva ku Covid-19, uye kuti mihoro yavo ive iri mumadhora ekuAmerica ichienzaniswa nemari dzavaitambira muna Gumiguru 2018. Vanachiremba ava vari kudawo kuti zvichemo zvevamwe vashandi vemuboka rezvehutano vari pakuramwa mabasa pari zvino zvigadziriswe kuitira kuti vabatsirane mabasa, uyewo kuti nhengo dzavo dzinoshanda kuUniversity of Zimbabwe asi iye zvino dziri kushanda muzvipatara munguva ino, dzinge dzichibhadharwa mari dzekushanda uku. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Pasi rose vanhu vabatwa ne Covid-19 vadarika mamiriyoni gumi nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 15.5 million, uye vanhu vafa vadarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi masere nezvina kana kuti 584 000. Imwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano vachidzidzisa zvehutano pa Nottingham Trent University, ku Britain, Doctor Mathew Nyashanu, vanoti vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti igare pasi navanachiremba ava vakurukure zvichemo zvavo kuti zvinhu zvisaipa kudarika zvazviri pari nhasi muzvipatara. Doctor Nyashanu vanoti chinonyanyorwadza ndechekuti vanachiremba ava vari kuda kuramwa mabasa munguva iyo nyika iri mudambudziko re Covids-19, izvo zvinozoisa varwere vagara vaine zvimwe zvirwere zvinovanetsa munyodzi huru kana vakazobatwa neCovid-19. Vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa zvinhu muzvipatara nekukasika, umo munonzi hamuna mishonga nezvimwe zvikwanisiro. Doctor Nyashanu vanotiwo kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubata chirwere cheCovid-19 chinhu chinityisa nekuti kana vanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 vanenge vachida kubatwa zvakanaka, uye kuti vabatwe zvakanaka vanofanirwa kunge vachienda kuzvipatara, uko kunofanirwa kunge kuine vanamukoti navanachiremba. No media source currently available

headline: VaMudzvova Vofunga Kunotariswa Kunze kweNyika Mushure Mekubayiwa Jekiseni neVanofungidzirwa Kuti Vasori
text: Nhengo yesangano reTajamuka yakaitwa kafiramberi muHarare VaSilvanos Mudzvova vanoti vave kutarisira kuti vanorapwa kunze kwenyika sezvo zvisiri kuzivikanwa kuti vakabayiwa jekiseni rainge riinei. Vanoti vesangano reZimbabwe Doctors for Human Rights vakavakurudzira kuti vanotariswa navanamazvikokota vekunze sezvo pasina ari kuziva kuti vakabayiwa jekiseni reyi. Vati nyaya iyi iri kuvadya moyo nekuti havazive kuti hutano hwavo huchange hwakamira sei. VaMudzvova vakapambwa nemusi weChipiri svondo rapera kumba kwavo nevanhu vatanhatu vanofungidzirwa kuti vasori vakatochwa pedyo neNharira Hills kuNorton. Vanhu vakapamba VaMudzvova vainge vakapakatira pfuti. Pari zvino VaMudzvova avo vari kuchipatara cheAvenues Clinic muHarare vanoti vave kutyira hupenyu hwavo asi vachitiwo vakavhiyiwa neMuvhuro kugadzirisa matumbu avo ainge asina kumira zvakanaka kubva zvavakarohwa. No media source currently available

headline: Bazi rezveKugara Kwakanaka kweVanhu Rinoti Vakaremara Vari Kubatsirwa muNguva Ino yeCovid-19 Lockdown
text: Gurukota rezvemabasa, vashandi nekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, vanoti bazi ravo riri kubatsira vakaremara vakarasikirwa nemihoro munguva ino yemutemo unorambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu, kana kuti lockdown, kuburikidza nechirongwa chavakaparura chakanangana nekubatsira vanotambura. Vachitaura neStudio 7 vari kuCongo Brazzaville, uko vari kumusangano wechinomwe webudiriro mudunhu reAfrica, kana kuti "Africa Regional Forum on Sustainable Development", uyo wakapetwa nemusi weChina, Professor Mavima vanoti bazi ravo rakakwanisa kunyoresa vanhu vanosvika zviuru mazana matatu negumi, kana kuti 310 000, pasi pechirongwa ichi. Vanotiwo vave nemakore maviri vaumba bazi rinomirira vakaremara, iro riri kutungamirwa naDoctor Christine Peta. Professor Mavima vanoti munguva ino bazi ravo riri kubatsira vakaremara kuburikidza nehomwe yemari yavakaisa parutivi yekubatsira vanoda kutanga zvirongwa zvekuzvibatsira, uye ivo segurukota vari kukurudzira kuti vanhu vanyorese kumahofisi ebazi ravo ari nyika yose kuti vabatsirwe. No media source currently available

headline: VaBiti Vanoti Kudzika Mutemo weKutara Mitengo Kunoratidza Kuti Njuga dzeHupfumi Dzoremera VaMthuli Ncube
text: Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, avo vakambove gurukota rezvemari, vanoti mutemo wechimbi chimbi wakadzikwa nehurumende wekutara mitengo yezvinhu munongedzo wekuti Zimbabwe yatadza kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi. Mashoko aya anopesana nezviri kutaurwa negurukota rezvehupfumi, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, avo vakaudza vanoita zvekushanyirwa kwenyika svondo rapera kuti hupfumi hwagadzikana uye mutemo uyu unobatsira kuzvisimbaradza. Svondo rapera hurumende yakadzika mutemo wechimbi chimbi kana kuti Presidential Powers (Temporary Measures) (Financial Laws Amendment) Regulations 127 of 2021 unosungira vemabhizimisi vose kuti vatengese zvinhu nemutengo wedhora rekuAmerica wepamusika weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, Foreign Currency Auction kwete pamukoto. Asi mumashoko kuvatori venhau masangano anomirira vemabhizimisi akaita seZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, Confederation of Zimbabwe Industries neEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe anoti mutemo uyu uri kuomesera vemabhizimisi vakawanda sezvo vasiri kukwanisa kuwana mari pamusika weRBZ uyu. VaBiti vanoti vanowiriranawo neveZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights vakakwira kudare repamusoro nemusi weChina vachipikisa mutemo mutsva uyu vachiri unotyora bumbiro remutemo. No media source currently available Ko masimba ekuti mutungamiri wenyika adzike mitemo zvechimbi chimbi pasina kuenda kudare reparamende unoshanda sei chaizvo? Gweta VaTinomudaishe Chinyoka avo vanombomirira mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, uye vakasarudzwawo nemusi weChina kuva sachigaro webhodhi rePetrotrade rinoona nezvemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari vanoti hapana chakaipa pamutemo uyu sezvo uchishandiswawo nenyika dzakawanda dzakaita seAmerica sezvo kuenda kudare reparamende kuchigona kutora nguva. No media source currently available  .

headline: Kongiresi yeMDC yaChamisa Yokonzera Mutauro
text: Kongiresi yeMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa yave kutokonzera mutauro zvikuru pamusoro penyaya yezvigaro zvichakwikwidzwa pakongiresi iyi hutungamiri hwebato huchiburitsa mashoko anopesana. Mutauriri webato iri, VaJacob Mafume, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvigaro zvichakwikwidzwa pakongiresi ndechemutungamiri webato nevatevedzeri vake, uye chasachigaro webato nemutevedzeri wake. Kongiresi yeMDC ichaitwa muna Chivabvu kutanga musi 24 ichipera musi 26. Mashoko aVaMafume anotevera mashoko aiswa paTweeter nemutevedzeri wemubati wehomwe, VaChalton Hwende. Asi mashoko aya anopesana nemashoko akataurwa nemunyori mukuru weMDC, VaDouglas Mwonzora, avo vakati zvigaro zvose zvichakwikwidzwa pakongiresi. VaChamisa vakabudawo pachena vachiti zvinzvimbo zvose zvichakwikwidzwa pamusangano mukuru webato ravo wekutsvaga hutungamiri hutsva. Asi VaMafume vanoti bumbiro remutemo webato ravo rinobvumira kuti mutungamiri webato adome vanhu vachashanda semunyori mukuru webato nezvimwe zvigaro. No media source currently available Asi VaMwonzora vanoti zvigaro zvese zvichakwikwidzwa naani zvake anenge adomwa nematunhu ebato sekutaurwa kwakaitwa naVaChamisa nemusi weSvondo kumusangano wakaitirwa kuGweru vachiti bumbiro remitemo webato rinoti zvigaro zvese zvinokwikwidzwa. VaMwonzora vati chisati chazikanwa nebato ravo mazita eavo vachakwikwidza uye kuti vanenge vachikwikwidza zvigaro zvipi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti zviri kuitika muMDC munongedzo wekuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvanaka mubato rinotarisirwa neveruzhinji kunge richiratidza musiyano nemaitiro eZanu PF. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti zviri pachena kuti zvinhu zvikasagadziriswa bato iri rinogona kutsemuka sezvo mubato iri musina kuwirirana. VaChamisa vakatora chigaro chemutungamiri webato zvine mutauro mukati zvichitevera kushaya kwevaive mutungamiri webato iri, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, muna Kukadzi gore rapera. Mubato iri makaita makakatanwa Muzvare Thokozani Khupe vachiti ndivo vaifanirwa kufanobata chigaro chemutungamiri webato. Kunetsana uku kwakaita kuti bato iri ritsemuke, Muzvare Khupe ndokuenda nevamwe vaivatsigira kunoumba MDC yavo, asi rezhinji rwevanhu rwakaramba rwuri muMDC yaChamisa. No media source currently available

headline: Gurukota rezveMari, Muzvinafundo Ncube, Vanoti Havasi Kuzowedzera Mari Yavakapa kuBazi reHutano muBhajeti ra2023
text: Gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vanoti havazi kuzowedzera mari yavakapa kubazi rehutano mubhajeti regore rinouya vachiti mari yavakapa bazi iri, iyo inosvika ZWL$473 billion pamwe neUS$213 million yavanotaririsira kubva kumasangano anopa rubatsiro, inokwana pane zvese zvinodiwa nebazi iri, Muzvinafundo Ncube vataura mashoko aya vachipindura nhengo dzeparamende mudare re National Assembly nhasi idzo dzange dzichida kuti bhajeti rehutano riwedzerwe dzichiti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara zvese munyika. Vati mari inowana bazi iri kubva kuhurumende nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira yakawanda chose uye vakaona kuti bazi rehutano haritori mari yose kubazi ravo sezvo richinyanyoda kushanda nemasangano anopa rubatsiro uko rinowana madhora ekuAmerica. Vaenderera mberi vachiti bazi rehutano rinofanira kushanda nesimba kutsvaga mari kubazi ravo vachiti mapazi akaita serekurima nerekutakurwa kwezvinhu anopedza mari dzese dzaanopihwa mubhajeti nekuti anoshanda nesimba. Asi vamwe vakaita semumiriri weMberengwa North, VaTafanana Zhou veZanu PF, vaudza Muzvinafundo Ncube kuti vanofanira kupa mapazi mari dziri mubhajeti nekuti kutadza kuita izvi kuri kudzorera zvinhu kumashure. Mumiriri weMabvuku, VaJames Chidhakwa veCitizens Coalition for Change, vatiwo VaNcube vanofanira kupa bazi rehutano mari yakawanda vachiti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara zvese munyika. Muzvinafundo Ncube vaudza nhengo dzeparamende idzi kuti vari kuona kuti zvipatara zvakazvimirira, kana kuti ma Private Hospitals, zviri kuwanda munzvimbo dzese munyika uye vachaita hurongwa hwekuti zvipatara zvehurumende nezviparata izvi zvishande pamwechete. Vatiwo zviri pachena kuti mamwe mapiritsi anotengwa nehurmende kuendesa muzvipatara zvayo anotsakatika nekukasika achienda kuzvipatara izvi. Mutungamiriri wesangano ravanachiremba vanoshanda vakazvimirira, Doctor Johannes Marisa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mune huwori muzvipatara zvehurumende uye mapiritsi nemimwe mishonga iri kutorwa muzvipatara ichitengeswa kwakasiyana siyana. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubazi rehutano sezvo vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yedu patatenda pamhepo. Mari yakapihwa kubazi rezvehutano ye 473 bhiriyoni emadhora emunyika inoita zvikamu gumi nechimwe zvebhajeti rese re ZWL$4.5 trillion iri kutarisirwa kushandiswa nehurumende gore rinouya. Nhengo dzeparamende dzange dzichida kuti Muzvinafundo Ncube vawedzera bhajeti rebazi rehutano iri kusvika pazvikamu gumi nezvishanu sezvinodiwa nechiga cheAbuja Declaration. Zvichakadaro, dare reNational Assembly rinotarisirwa kupasisa bhajeti ra2023 rozoriendesa kudare reSeneti. Kana rikapasa kuSeneti rinozonosainwa nemutungamiriri wenyika kuti ritange kushanda. No media source currently available

headline: EU Yopa Zimbabwe Rubatsiro rweMari
text: Zimbabwe nhasi yapihwa rubatsiro rwemamiriyoni makumi mana nematanhatu emadhora ekuAmerica, US$46 million, kubva kusangano reEuropean Union (EU) pasi pechibvumirano chasainwa nehurumende neEU muHarare nhasi. Pasi pechibvumirano chaisainwa nemuriri weEU muZImbabwe, VaJobst von Kirchmann negurukota rezvamari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, bazi rezvehutano richawana mamimiriyoni makumi mana ekusimbaradza nyaya dzehutano uyewo Zimbabwe Electoral Commission (ZEC) yapihwa mamiriyoni makumi mashanu nemazana mapfumbamwe nezviuru zvemadhora ekushandisa pasarudzo. VaNcube vatenda EU vachiti rubatsiro urwu ruchabatsira zvikuru mukuchengetedza hupenyu pamwe nekuti vanhu vave nehutano hwepamusoro soro. Vatiwo kutsigirwa keZEC kwakakosha sezvo kuchiuya apo hurumende iri kuda kuti munyika muve nehutongi hwejekerere sezvo zvakaonekwa kuti izvi ndizvo zvinoita kuti nyika ibudirire munyaya dzehupfumi. VaKirchmann vati vanofara kutsigira mabasa ehutano munyika vachiti vanhu vane hutano vanorarama kwenguva yakareba vachishandisa nyika yavo Vatiwo sarudzo dzakajeka uye dzinotwa murunyararo dzakakosha kuti munyika muve nebudiriro. Vanotiwo vachatsigira masangano anoshanda akazvimirira. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, Doctor John Mangwiro, vati rubatsiro rwavawana nhasi rwakakosha zvikuru pakusimbaradza hutano hwevanhu munyika. Dr Mangwiro vatiwo mari iyi ichaita kuti nyika igare yakagadzirira kana pakanyuka zvirwere zvakaita seCovid-19. Vaenderera mberi vachiti, mari iyi ichashandiswawo pakusimbaradza vashandi vehutano mumisha kana kuti maVillage Health Workers avo vati ndivo vanhu vanotanga kubatsira vanhu panyaya dzehutano vasati vaenda kumakirinika kana zvipatara. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano, Dr Henry Madzorera, vati danho rekuti mari iyi ishandiswe kutsigira hutano pachidanho chepazasi zaisi rakanaka chose. Vachitaurawo pachiitiko ichi sachigaro veZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Justice Priscillar Chigumba, vatenda rubatsiro rweEU vachiti runobatsira zvikuru pabasa rekuronga sarudzo. Vati rubatsiro rwava kawana kubva kuEU mu2016 kusvika muna2020 rakwakabatsira munyaya dzekunyoresa vanhu kuvhota pamwe nekuita misangano nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika akapinda musarudzo dza2018. Justice Chigumba vati kunyange hazvo ZEC ichiwana mari kubva kuhurumende zvinofadza kuti EU iri kuramba ichitsigira komisheni yavo nemari yekunze kuti ikwanise kuita sarudzo. Sachigaro werimwe remasangano anoongoorora sarudzo munyika, reZimbabwe Election Support Network (ZESN), VaAndrew Makoni, vanoti zvaitwa neEU zvakanaka nekuti bumbiro rinobvumidza kuti makomishen akaita seZEC awane mari kubva kunze kwenyika. Vatiwo pane basa rakawanda rinoda kuitwa sarudzo dzisati dzasvika uye ZEC inofanira kuva nemari inokwana kuita basa rese iri. Zimbabwe iri mushishi rekukagadzirira sarudzo dzemutungamiriri wenyika, paramende nemakanzuru kana kuti, Harmonised Elections, gore rinouuya. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vanhu Votamba Kisimusi Vasina Chekubata muZimbabwe
text: Vanhu vakawanda muHarare vanoti kisimusi yegore rino yanga isinganakidze kudarika yemakore ose sezvo vatadza kuenda kumisha yavo uye vashaya zvinwiwa nezvokudya muzvitoro. Veruzhinji muHarare vanoti vatadza kuenda kuzororo rekisimusi nekunetsa kwanga kuchiita mabhazi kuwana kuMbare Musika. Mumwe wevanga vachida kuenda kunoona hama neshamwari ndiAmai Nancy Sakarombe avo vati vashaya chekufambisa kuenda kumusha kwavo kuGokwe. Vamwewo vanga vasina nzendo vakaita saAmai Rosyln Masiyazi vanoti vaswera vachimbeya vachitsvaga zvinwiwa nezvokudya muzvitoro kuti vakwanise kutandara nemhuri asi zvinhu izvi zvanga zvisiri kuwanikwa semakore ose. VaKennedy Chigiji vanogara mumusha weWarren Park vaudzawo Studio7 kuti mumabhawa manga musiri kuwanikwa doro vachiti izvi zvazoita kuti vaswere varere. Vezvitoro vatataura navo vanoti zvinwiwa zvisingadhake pamwe nedoro zvawandirwa panguva ino yekisimusi sezvo vagara vachiwana zvinwiwa izvi zviri zvishoma kubva kumakambani anobika doro nezvinwiwa zvisingadhake izvi ayo ari kuchemawo kuti ari kushaya mari yekunze yekutenga zvinodiwa pakugadzirisa zvinwiwa izvi. VaGibson Rukobo, avo vanogara mumusha weGreendale, vanoti vatadzawo kushanyira hama dzavo kuUzumba sezvo vaswera vari mumutsetse wekutsvaga mafuta emotokari vaine mhuri yavo vachida kuenda kumusha. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakati dambudziko remafuta edzimotokari richapera mukupera kwemwedzi uno asi zviri kuitika zviri kuratidza kuti dambudziko iri riri kutotandavara. Zvichakadai, hurumende inoti veruzhinji vanofanira kumbotiwirira kwemakore mashomanana iyo ichiedza kugadzirisa kusamira zvakanaka kwakaita hupfumi hwenyika. No media source currently available

headline: VaCharamba Vokonzera Kugeda Geda KweMeno neMashoko Avo paNyaya yeKuratidzira
text: Mutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika VaGeorge Charamba vakonzera mutauro wakanyanya pasi rose nemashoko avanonzi vakataura kubepanhau reSunday Mail vari ku Azerbaijan uko vari kushanya nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. VaCharamba vanoti zviri kuitika munyika umo muri kupomerwa mauto nemapurisa mhosva yekupfura vanhu gumi nevaviri, kukuvadza mazana nemazana uye kusunga vanhu vanodarika mazana manomwe inzwisa chete. VaCharamba vanoti mhirizhonga iri kukonzera nebato reMDC nemapato akazvimirira. Mapepa nhau emunyika dzakawanda aratidza kukatyamadzwa zvikuru nemashoko aya. Asi masangano akaita seUnited Nations, nyika dzakaita seAmerica, Britain nesangano reEuropean Union ari kushora zvikuru nyaya yekushandisa mauto mukushungurudza vanhu iri kuitwa neZimbabwe. Sangano ravanasorojena rinozivikanwa nekuti The Elder’s rashorawo zviri kuitwa nehurumende yeZimbabwe zvekushungurudza vanhu uye kudzima masaisai einternet. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaCharamba kuti tinzwe zvizere nezvemashoko avo sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Vakawanda vanoti munyika maberekera ingwe. Asi gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa vanoti zvinhu zvave kuita zviri nani avo vakurudzira vanhu kuti vasaite mhirizhonga. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Ozara muHarare Kudzivirira Vanhu Kuratidzira
text: Kunyange hazvo zvitoro nemisika yakawanda zvange zvakavhurwa muHarare nemusi we, vange vakaronga kuramwa mabasa vechikwata cheTajamuka/Sesijikile vanoti kuramwa mabasa uku kwabudirira sezvo vanhu vakavhundutsirwa nemapurisa nemusi weChitatu manheru. Vasori nemapurisa vanonzi vakavhunditsirawo vemabhizimisi ichiti yaizovatorera marezenisi kana vasina kuvhura mabhizimisi avo. Mapurisa ange aine zvombo zvehondo ange akawanda mukati meguta pamwe nemimisha inogara vazhinji zvichitevera kurudziro yekuramwa mabasa yakaitwa neveTajamuka senzira yekuti mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vagadzirise hupfumi pamwe nekupa vanhu mabasa. Mumisha yakaita seMufakose, Dzivaresekwa, Hatcliff neGlen Norah vanhu vambopisa mati emotokari mumigwagwa pamwe nekutema makombi ange achitakura vanhu asi mapurisa apindire nekukasika. Imwe nhengo inoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko muchikwa cheTajamuka/Sesijikile, VaSilavanos Mudzova, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pane nenhengo dzavo nhatu dzasungwa nemapurisa VaMudzova vanoti semaonero avo kuratidzira kwabudirira chose uye mapurisa akarova vanhu mumisha yakaita seDzivaresekwa neKuwadzana neChipiri manheru. VaMudzova varamba mashoko ekuti nhengo dzavo dzakapisa bhazi mumusha weWarren Park vachiti havaite zvemhirizhonga. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri wemapurisa Senior Assistant Commmissioner Amai Charity Charamba sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi ongororo yaitwa neStudio 7 yaratidza kuti zvitoro zvhinji muguta zvange zvakavhura.
