Mapurisa eSupport Unit pamwe nemamwewo ange akamira munzvimbo dzakawanda uye mamwe ange achitendenderera muguta pamwe nemisha inogara vazhinji. Mutevedzeri wasachigaro wesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaGeorge Makoni, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mawandiro ange akaita mapurisa mumigwagwa muHarare aita sekuti ndiwo ange achiratidzira. Vatiwo muguta mange muine runyararo asi vati zviri pachena kuti vanhu vari kuteerera kurudzira yekuramwa mabasa kusvika zvinhu zvanaka munyika. Veruzhinji vange vaine maonero akasiyana panyaya yekuratidzira vamwe vachizvitsigira vawe vachiti hazvina chiyamuro. VeTajamuka avo vakatsidza kuti mutungamiriri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vanofanira kusiya basa musi wa31 Nyamavhuvhu kana vasina kugadzirisa nyaya dzehupfumi vacharamba vachiratidzira kusvika izvi zvaitika uye vari kutsigira hurongwa hwekuratidzira uhwo huri kurongwa nemapato anopiksa pasi pechirongwa cheNational Electoral Reform Agenda kana kuti NERA nemusi weChishanu. VaHardlife Mudzingwa vanoti zvaitika neChitatu igadziriro yekuratidzirwa kweNERA. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Voshaya Chikafu paRujeko Isolation Center kuMasvingo
text:
Hurumende iri kukandirana nyoka mhenyu nekanzuru yeMasvingo panyaya yekuti ndiyani anofanirwa kupa chikafu varwere veCOVID-19 vakachengetwa paRujeko Isolation Center. Hama dzevanhu vari kugara paRujeko Isolation Center dzinoti varwere vari panzvimbo iyi havasi kuwana chikafu nguva dzose, zvokuti zvinhu zvatonyanya kuipa svondo rino. Nzvimbo iyi inotakura vanhu gumi, uye yakapihwa hurumende nekanzuru yeMasvingo pasi pehirongwa chehurumende chekuchengeta vanhu vanenge varwarisa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Mumwe mugari ane hama yake pachipatara apa ada kuzivikanwa nekunzi Baba Gari, nekutyira kuti hama yavo inozopinzwa panguva yakaoma, vati
varwere vari kuchema chema kuti vave nemazuva vasingapuhwi chikafu, uye hama dzevarwere ava dzisingabvumidzwi kuigira hama dzavo chikafu Mukuru webazi rezvehutano muMasvingo, Dr Amedus Shamu, vati ivo
havasi kuziva kuti sei chikafu chiri kushaikwa nekuti chinofanaira
kubva kukanzuru sezvo iri iyo yakapa hurumende nzvimbo iyi.

Asi meya weguta reMasvingo, VaCollen Maboke, vati harisi basa rekanzuru yavo kupa varwere chikafu sezvo varwere ava vari mumaoko ehurumende. VaMaboke vati kubva pavakapa nzvimbo iyi kuhurumende, hurumende ndiyo yanga ichipa varwere ava chikafu chichibva kuchipatara chikuru cheMasvingo General Hospital.

Hama dzevarwere ava dzinoti hurumende inofanirwa kugara pasi nekanzuru dambudziko iri rogadziriswa sezvo varwere ava vachida chikafu chinovalka muviri panguva iyo vanenge vari kurwara. Mumwe mugari wemuMasvingo ane hama iri paRujeko Isolation Center, uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita rake, ati dambudziko iri rinofanirwa kugadziriswa nekukasika nekuti hupenyu hwevarwere huri kuiswa panguva yakaoma. Kushaikwa kwechikafu uku kuri kuitika panguva iyo vanhu mazana maviri nevanomwe vakatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro mudunhu reMasvingo chete. Hurumende inoti vanhu makumi masere nemumwe chete, 81 vakafa munyika ne chirwere che Covid-19, uye vanhu zviuru zviviri nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe, 2 089 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vava zviuru zvitatu nemazana mana nemakumi maviri nemumwe chete, 3,421, uye vvabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vava zviuru zana nezvishanu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nevatanhatu, 105,656. Vanhu zviuru makumi matatu nechimwe nemazana matatu nemakumi
manomwe nemumwe chete, 31,371 vakabaiwa nhomba yekutanga nezuro, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga pamirioni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvitatu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nevatanhatu, 1,593,656. Vakabaiwa nhomba yepiri nezuro vaive zviuru gumi nezvinomwe nemazana maviri ane makumi mana nevanomwe, 17,247 izvo zvakasvitsa vabaiya nhomba iyi pazviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi matatu ane mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe nevasere, 730,378. Hurumende inoti inoda kubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi munyika mese kana
kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekurwisa denda
reCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yovandudza Mitemo yeKuvamba Mabhizimisi
text: Zimbabwe Investment Authority inoti kuvandudzwa kuri kuda kuitwa mitemo gumi nemitatu nehurumende ine chekuita nezvehupfumi kusvika muna Chikumi kwakanangana nekurudziro dzinoitwa nebhanga guru repasi rose reWorld Bank. Sangano reZimbabwe Investment Authority, ZIA, rinoti kuvandudzwa kuri kuda kuitwa mitemo gumi nemitatu nehurumende ine chekuita nezvehupfumi kusvika muna Chikumi kwakanangana nekurudziro dzinoitwa nebhanga guru repasi rose reWorld Bank iro rinoburitsa gwaro rinoratidza nyika dziri nyore kutanga bhizimisi kana kuti Ease of Doing Business Report. Munyori wedare remakurukota, Doctor Misheck Sibanda, vakaudza vemabhizimisi kuZimbabwe International Trade Fair kuti chirongwa chekuvandudza mitemo ichi chiri kufambira mberi zvakanaka uye vanofunga kuti chichabatsira kukwezva vemabhizimisi vekunze. Pagwaro reWorld Bank rekutanga mabhizimisi ra2016, Zimbabwe iri pachidanho chezana nemakumia mashanu kubva panyika zana nemakumi masere nepfumbamwe. Munyika dzepasi rose Singapore ndiyo iri pamusoro soro, uye muAfrica i Rwanda. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti Zimbabwe inofanira kuvandudza mutemo wekuendesa hupfumi kuvatema uyo unonzi nevakawanda hauna kumira zvakanaka. Makurukota ehurumende anogara achipokana nezvemashandiro awo mutemo uyu. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Investment Authority, VaRichard Mbaiwa, vanoti zvakakosha kuti mitemo ivandudzwe kuitira kuti ikwezve vekunze uye kuti vanhu vatange kuwana mabasa. No media source currently available

headline: America Inombomisa Vanhu Kupinda Munyika kweMazuva Makumi Matanhatu
text: Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, vasaina gwaro rinombomisa vanhu vekune dzimwe nyika kupinda muAmerica kwemazuva makumi matanhatu. Gwaro iri haribati avo vanemapepa ekugara munyika zviri pamutemo asi richarambidza avo vasati vave nemavhiza pari zvino kuti vapinde mu America. Vachinyora paTwitter pavo, VaTrump vati mutemo uyu wakaunzwa nechido chavo chekurwisana nemuvengi asingaonekwi, kureva Coronavirus, uye nechido chavo chekuchengetedza mabasa ezvizvarwa zveAmerica. Mutemo uyu haubati vanoshanda mune zvehutano kana vabereki vezvizvarwazveAmerica. Hazvisati zvave pachena kuti mutemo uyu uchabatsira papi uye kuti waitirwei sezvo vanhu varikuuya mu America vave vashoma pamusoro pechirwere cheCoronavirus. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika uye vachiita dzidzo dzepamusorosoro paHoward University, VaCalvin Manduna, vanoti mutemo uyu hauna zvaunobatsira, vachiti VaTrump vanongoda kufadza vatsigiri vavo sezvo vakatarisana nesarudzo muna Mbudzi gore rino. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzinoti Zimbabwe Inofanirwa Kupedza Huori, Kuitira Kuti Nyika Ibudirire
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika pamwe nenyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti Zimbabwe inofanirwa kuona kuti hupenyu hwemunhu wese hwasimudzirwa uye huori hwaparadzwa kuitira kuti nyika ienderere mberi. Mashoko aya abuda pahurukuro dzaitwa muhurongwa hweMedia Centre neVoice of America hwaitirwa muHarare. Nyanzvi idzi dzanga dzichitarisa kuti ramangwana renyika rinenge rakamira sei zvichitevera kugadzwa kwemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi nebudiriro, VaButler Tambo, vati kuti nyika ibudirire, huori hunofanirwa kupedzwa kuburikidza nekusunga nekuripisa vakabira nyika. VaTambo vatiwo hurumende inofanirwa kuonawo kuti zvicherwa zviri munyika zvashandiswa mukusimudzira hupenyu hweveruzhinji. VaTambo vatiwo VaMnangagwa vanofanirwa kugadza makurukota ane chiremera huye kuti zvikwereti zvenyika zvibhadharwe kuitira kuti Zimbabwe ive nehukama hwakanaka nevanokweretesa mari pasi rose. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika, VaTakura Zhangazha, vatiwo kuti nyika ifambire mberi, hurumende haifanirwi kungotarisira budiriro yemabhizimusi chete, asiwo kuti ivandudze hupenyu hweveruzhinji. Nhengo yeZanu PF yapinda mumusangano uyu, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vatiwo danho rakatorwa nehurumende yaVaMnangagwa rekuvhura mikana yemabhizimusi kune vekunze, richabatsira mubudiriro yenyika. VaMugwadi vati zvekupa hupfumi kuvatema hazvina kuvaka mabasa munyika. Asi munyori wevechidiki muMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaLovemore Chinoputsa, vati nyika haigoni kubudirira kana sarudzo dzichibirwa, ukuwo vemauto vachipindira munyaya dzenyika. Chirongwa chanhasi chimwe chezvirongwa nhepfenyuro yeVOA ichange ichiita munyika senzira yekupa vanhu mukana kutaura vakasununguka kuitira kuti veruzhinji vazive nezuro, nhasi nemangwana. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vatatu Vofa, Vana veChikoro Makumi Matatu neVana (34) Vachibatwa neChirwere Ichi
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti nezuro vanhu vatatu vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro zvasiya vafa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave zviuru zvina nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemumwe kana kuti 4, 691. Vanhu makumi matanhatu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi uye pavanhu ava pane vane vechikoro makumi matatu nevana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi. Pavana ava makumi maviri vari kuMatabelaland South, gumi nevana vari kuMasvingo. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yeCovid 19 vave mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana mana nemasere ane mazana matanhatu negumi kana kuti 3 408 610. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba kaviri sezvinokurudzirwa vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nemapfumbamwe zvine mazana manomwe nemakumi mana nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 2 669 749. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuti inyatsoshanda,

headline: Kushandiswa Zvakanyanya kweZvinodhaka Kunonzi Kwawedzera Zvakanyanyisa Dambudziko reChirwere chePfungwa muHarare
text: Kushandiswa zvakanyanya kwezvinodhaka nevanhu kunonzi nemukuru anoona nezvehutano mudunhu reHarare kwawedzera zvakanyanyisa dambudziko rechirwere chepfungwa. Mukuru anoona nezvehutano mudunhu reHarare VaInnocent Hove vanoti nekuda kwekuwedzera kwedambudziko rechirwere chepfungwa zvakakosha kuti vanhu vapihwe dzidziso. VaHove vakataura mashoko aya paiitwa mhemberero dzekucherechedza dambudziko rechirwere chepfungwa nemusi weChitatu. Pasi rose, United Nations inoti zuva iri rinocherechedzwa musi wa10 Gumiguru asi zvakanonoka kuitwa nedunhu reHarare. Amai Betty Zephania vanova mumwe wevakaronga mhemberero idzi vachishanda kubazi rinoona nezvehutano vatsigira vachiti dambudziko rehutano hwepfungwa idambudziko ririkukura. Amai Zephania vati vazhinji vari kutamburawo nezvirwere zvepfungwa izvi varikushandisa zvinodhaka vachiti munhu wese arikufanirwa kushanda kuona kuti dambudziko iri rapedzwa. Mumwe wevechidiki, VaFarai Gutu vati vechidiki vanoda kudzidziswa kuti zvinodhaka zvine njodzi. Mumwe aishandisa zvinodhaka akakwanisa kuzobuda mazviri aona kuti zvinokuvadza, ndiVaJacob Shamuyarira, avo vakazotanga sangano rakazvimiririra rinobatsira avo vanoda kusiya zvinodhaka. Vati kushandisa zvinodhaka kunokanganisa hupenyu hwevanhu vachiti zvakakoshawo kuti vanhu vazive kwekuwana rubatsiro kana vawirwa nedambudziko iri. Kutanga kwegore rino mutungamiriri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakazivisa kuti gore rino igore rekurwisa dambudziko rekushandiswa kwezvinodhaka. Vechidiki ndivo vanonzi vari kunyanyoshandisa zvinodhaka izvi zvakaita semutoriro, krango, mbanje, mishonga yechikosoro yakaita seHistalix kana bronco nezvimwewo. Mhemberero dzegore rino dzakaitwa paine kurudziro yekuti pasi rese rikoshese hutano hwepfungwa. World Health organization inoti muAfrica, vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemaviri kana kuti 792 million vane chirwere chepfungwa. No media source currently available

headline: VaRamaphosa Vokwikwidzwa Zvakasimba naVaMkize Pasarudzo Dzekutungamira ANC
text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa nebato reANC VaCyril Ramaphosa, vanonzi vari kukwikwidzana zvakasimba naVaZweli Mkize vaimbova gurukuta rezvehutano musarudzo dzekutungamiri bato iri. Bato iri riri kuita musangano wechimakumi mashanu nemashanu kana kuti 55th National Elective Conference kuNasrec muJohannesburg kubva musi weChishanu uchipera nemusi weChipiri. Vari kukwikwidzana pachigaro chemutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato iri ndiVaLubabalo Oscar Mabuyane, VaOaul Mashatile naVaRonald Lamola. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaRicky Mukonza vanodzidzisa paTshwane University of Technology vanoti kunyangwe VaRamaphosa vambotanga vakatungamira, VaMkize vanonzi vari kutsigirwa nechikwata chevaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaJacob Zuma vanonzi vave kuwana rutsigiro kumatunhu akawanda. Anenge akunda musarudzo idzi ndiye achatungamira bato iri musarudzo dzemuna 2024. No media source currently available

headline: VaChiwenga Vokurudzira Kuti Vanhu Vangwarire Covid-19
text: Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vanoti veruzhinji vanofanirwa kuramba vakangwarira kurwisana nechirwere cheCovid-19 sezvo chiri kuramba chichitekeshera pasi rose. Vachitaura semunyarikani pakuparura chirongwa Covid-19 Charity Cycling Campaign muBulawayo, VaChiwenga vati veruzhinji munyika havachakoshesi kutevedzera zvinokurudzirwa kuitwa nevehutano pakudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwehutachiwana hwecoronavirus uho hunokonzera chirwere cheCovid-19. VaChiwenga, avo vanovewo gurukota rezvehutano, vati Covid-19 iri kudzoka nehukasha kunyanya kunyika dzekumadokero vakayambira veruzhinji kuti vasaite sekuti chirwere ichi hachisisiko. VaChiwenga vati zviri kubuda pakuongorora chirwere cheCovid-19 munyika zvinoratidza kuti huwandu hwevanhu vanobatwa nechirwere ichi munyika huri kukwira kupfuura huwandu hwevanhu vanobatwa nechirwere ichi vabva kunze kwenyika. Vati muAfrica, South Africa ndeimwe yenyika dziri kubatwawo nechirwere ichi vakatiwo sezvo zvizvarwa zvemuZimbabwe zvakawanda zviri muSouth Africa, zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vangwarirewo chirwere ichi. VaChiwenga vati muBulawayo kunyanya dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemvura rinoisa vanhu panjodzi yekubatwa nechirwere cheCovid. Vati hurumende iri kuita zvose zvainogona kuti igadzirise dambudziko iri asi havana kutsanangura zvizere. Vanhu gumi nevanomwe vachachovha mabhasikoro kubva muBulawayo vachienda kuHarare senzira yekukurudzira veruzhinji kuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere ichi. Mukuru wesangano reRotary Club International muBulawayo, VaAlbert Mkandla, avo vakabatsira kuronga chirongwa ichi vaudza Studio7 kuti vaona iyi iri nzira inogona kubatsira kuti vanhu varambe vachikoshesa kudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19. Gurukota rezvemitambo, Muzvare Kirsty Coventry, pamwe nemutevedzeri wegurukota rezvemaindasitiri, VaRaj Modi, vabatana naVaChiwenga mukusangana nevachachovha mabhasikoro ava mushure mekunge mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika vaparura chirongwa ichi. Mumwe wevachovhi vemabhasikoro ari muchirongwa ichi, Nqobani Gatsheni, ati ari kufara zvikuru kuve muchirongwa ichi chekukurudzira veruzhinji kuti varambe vachirwisa chirwere cheCovid-19. Vachovhi ava vachabva muguta reBulawayo mangwana mangwanani uye vanotarisirwa kusvika muHarare mushure memazuva matanhatu. Zimbabwe yave nevanhu mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu nevashanu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19, uye vanhu zviuru zvisere nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu, vakabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose. No media source currently available

headline: Kushaikwa kwePeturu neDhiziri Kwotemesa Vakawanda Musoro
text: Vanhu vakawanda vari kuswera vari mumitsetse nemotokari dzavo vakamirira kuwana peturu mumagaraji akawanda. Vanoshandisa motokari dzavo mukufamba vanoti panzvimbo yekuti dambudziko remafuta edzimotokari rigadzirike, zvinhu zviri kutoramba zvichishata. VaJoseph Tanyanyiwa, avo vanga vakamirira mafuta paHigh Glen Shopping Center, vati vange vamira mumutsetse kubva na7 mangwanani uye vanga vasati vawana mafuta na 2pm dzemasikati. VaTanyanyiwa vati munyika munofanirwa kuita hurukuro dzinobata munhu wese kuitira kuti nyika ibude mumadhaka mairi. VaMicheck Chawatama vatiwo nhasi ranga riri zuva repiri vari mumutsetse wemafuta epeturu. Mumwe muruume ada kuzivikanwa nezita rekuti Talent Bhachi ati zvinomushungurudza zvakanyanya kuti vari kupedza nguva yekushanda kumabasa kwavo vari pamutsetse. VaBhachi vati izvi zvinokonzera kuti nyika isafambira mberi. Mumwe murimi, VaGoodknows Homwe, vati kushaikwa kwemafuta kuri kukanganisa mabasa avo, sezvo zvirimwa zvavo zviri kusvika pakushata vachishaya mafuta ekuti vaunze zvirimwa zvavo kumusika muHarare kubva kuGoromonzi. Gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto, VaFortune Chasi, vakaudza vatori venhau nezuro kuti hurumende haisi kufara nezviri kuitwa nemakambani ane marezinesi ekutengesa mafuta izvo zvavakati zviri kupa kuti veruzhinji vashaye mafuta edzimotokari kunyange hurumende ichinge yaita zvose zvinodikanwa kuti munyika muve nemafuta anokwanira veruzhinji. Hurumende yakati ichatorera makambani aya marezenesi. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kutaura nevemagaraji kuti tinzwe kuti seyi vasina mafuta sezvo vashandi vemugaraji aya vanga vachiti havabvumidzwe kutaura nevatori venhau. No media source currently available

headline: Amai Dongo Vanoti VaMugabe Vakajaidzwa neZanu PF
text: Vaimbova nhengo yeZanu PF vakadzingwa mubato iri Zimbabwe yawana kuzvitonga, Amai Margaret Dongo, vanoti kunetsana kuri kuitika muZanu PF hakushamise sezvo bato iri riine nhoroondo yekudzinga anenge apikisa vakuru mubato. No media source currently available Vachitaura pamusoro pezviri kuitika muZanu PF zvichitevera hurongwa huri kuitwa naVaDidymus Mutasa nevamwe vavo, Amai Dongo, avo vakambova mutungamiri weZimbabwe Union of Democrats, vanoti Zanu PF yakaregererwa kwenguva yakareba isingapikiswe izvo zvava kupa kuti vanhu vakaita saVaMutasa nevamwe vavo vadzingwe. Amai Dongo vanoti VaMutasa nevamwe vavo ndivo vakajaidza vakuru mubato ravo kuti havapikiswe nokudaro zvava kuvawana ivo rwendo rwuno. Mashoko aya anobuda panguva iyo mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vari kutarisirwa kupinda munyika chero nguva. Vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika muZanu PF vanoti VaMugabe vari kutarisirwa kusvikovandudza zvekare dare ravo remakurukota uye kudzinga vamwe vanhu mubato iri. VaMugabe vari pazororo ravo repagore vari kunyika dzekumabvazuva. Vachitaura nevatsigiri vavo kuMidlands, vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakati vanhu vasiri kutevera gwara rebato vachadzingwa. Asi vari kupikisa VaMnangangwa, uye vachinzi vanotsigira vaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru, vaudza Studio7 kuti magweta avo ari kuzeya navo nyaya yekuenda kumatare vachiti havasi kutambira kongiresi yebato yakaitwa muna Zvita. Vamwe vatsigiri veZanu-PF vanoti vamwe vari kutarisirwa kudzingwa kana kuendeswa kune mamwe mapazi ari pasi vanosanganisira gurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, VaSydney Sekeramai, uye gurukota rezvedzidzo, VaLazarus Dokora, vatevedzeri vemakurukota uye vanyori mumapazi ehurumende. Vamwe vechidiki mubato iri vari kutiwo vanoda kutora mapurazi nezvimwe zvinhu zvine vanhu vari kuramba vachishora bato iri. Vanoona nezvemabasa ematongerwo enyika muZanu PF, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, vanonzi vakatiwo VaMutasa vakada zvekutyisidzira nhengo dzebato vachazorora vave mapisi mapisi. Vachitaura neStudio7 svondo rino, vakadzingwa mubato iri, VaRugare Gumbo, vakati VaMnangagwa munhu asingadi zvehutongo hwejekerere.

headline: Nyanzvi Dzokurudzira Hurumende Kuti Igadzirise Dambudziko reMari Munyika
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kuyambira hurumende kuti ikasarovanisa misoro nevashandi nevashandirwi, Zimbabwe ichadzokera kumakore ekuma 2007 uko mitengo yezvinhu yaikwira katatu pazuva. Nemusi weMuvhuro, Zimbabwe National Statistics Agency kana kuti Zimstats yakazivisa kuti inflation yemunyika yakwira kusvika pazvikamu makumi matatu nechiga chimwe kubva muzana kana kuti 31.01% kubva pazvikamu makumi maviri nezviga makumi masere nemashanu kubva muzana kana kuti 20,85%. Aka ndekekutanga mitengo yezvinhu ichikwira zvakadai mukati memakore gumi. Zimstats inoti mitengo yezvinhu zvakaita sechingwa, zvinwiwa nehembe ndizvo zvapa kuti mitengo yezvinhu ikwire. Kukwira kwemitengo uku kuri kupesana zvikuru nemashoko egurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, avo vainge vati inflation mukupera kwegore yaizopera iri pazvikamu makumi maviri nemashanu kubva muzana kana kuti 25%. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi muAmerica ichidzidzisa paJohns Hopkins University, Muzvinafundo Steve Hanke, vanoti inflation yemuZimbabwe yakatodarika zana kare kare uye yananga kumakore ekuma2008 apo vanhu vakaomerwa nehupenyu zvisina mukare akamboona. Vaimbova gurukota rezvemari, Doctorr Simba Makoni, vanoti zvainge zviri pachena kuti inflation ichakwira zvakanyanya nenyaya yemashandisirwo ari kuitwa mari munyika zvikuru kuda kuenzanisa dhora rekuAmerica nemari yemaRTGS nemabond. Mashoko aya anotsinhirwao nenyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Dr Godfrey Kanyenze. Munyori mukuru musangano reZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti vashandi vakaomerwa zvakanyanya sezvo zvinhu zvaramba zvichiita chamurambamhuru. Ko zviri kunzi naVaNcube vakwanisa kuisa mari parutivi inosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe emadhora mukushanda kwavo? Vachipindura, Dr Makoni vati chiri kunetsera hurumende inyaya yekungoita gudziramukanwa. Kugadzirisa dambudziko iri, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kukurudzira mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti vasiyane nemari dzebond notes nemaRTGs uye kumutsiridza nyaya dzekurima kuti nyika isarasikirwe nemari yekunze. Vamwe vari kukurudzirawo kuti hurumende igadzirise hukama hwayo nedzimwe nyika kunyanya America nenyika dziri muEU kuti isabatwe seyakageza negoka munyama. No media source currently available

headline: Matambudziko eMari Akatarisana neChitungwiza Oramba Kupera?
text: Matambudziko emari akatarisana nekanzuru yeChitungwiza anonzi ari kure nekupera kunyange hazvo kanzuru iyi yakamisa vamwe vashandi mabasa. Vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika mukanzuru iyi vanoti iri kunetsekana zvakare kuti ibhadhare vamwe vashandi vayakamisa mabasa pamwe nevakaenda pamudyandigere mari dzavo nezvimwe. Vaive mutungamiri wesangano revashandi vekanzuru yeChitungwiza, VaEphraim Katsina, avo vakambomiswa basa pari zvino vachipomerwa mhosva yekufurira vamwe vashandi kupinda mukuramwa mabasa, vanoti pane vamwe vashandi vakamiswa mabasa mugore ra2012 vasati vapiwa mari dzavo. VaKatsina vanoti mukutanga kwegore rino kanzuru yakamisa zvakare vamwe vashandi vanodarika zana mabasa asi vasere chete ndivo vati vapiwa dzimwe dzemari dzavo kusvika pari nhasi. VaKatsina vanoti ndivo vari kumirira vashandi vose vari kumiswa mabasa ava munhaurirano dzavari kuita nekanzuru. Meya weChitungwiza, VaPhilip Mutoti, svondo rapera vakazivisa kuti kanzuru yavo ine hurongwa hwekumisa zvakare vamwe vashandi vanoda kusvika kumazana matanhatu mabasa sezvo isiri kukwanisa kuunganidza mari inokwana kuvabhadhara. VaMutoti vakati dambudziko ndere kuti vagari havasi kukwanisa kubhadharawo mitero yavo paine nguva, izvo zviri kuita kuti kanzuru yavo ikundikane kuunganidza mari inoikwanira. Studio 7 yaedza kubata VaMutoti asi nharembozha yavo yanga isingadairwi. No media source currently available

headline: Kanzuru yeMasvingo Yopomerwa Mhosva Yekuita Zano Ndega Pakushandiswa kweMari
text:
Komiti yeparamende inoona nezvekutongwa kwematunhu pamwe nevagari vemuMasvingo yashora zvikuru kanzuru yeguta reMasvingo vachiipomera mhosva yekushandisa mari dziri kuendeswa nehurumende kusimudzira matunu kana kuti devolution pasina Kusuma vagary sezvinotarisirwa. Musangano wanhasi waitwa mushure metsamba yenyunyuto yakanyorwa kukomiti iyi nerimwe sangano rinomiririra vagari reMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance(MURRA) gore rapera richiti harisi kusumwa nezvemari dzekusimudzira matunhu kana kuti devolution inobva kuhurumende. iri rinoti kanzuru yakashandiswa mari inopfuura mirioni zana yema RTGS, kubva gore ra2019 kusvika parizvino pachirongwa chekuchera nekuisa mapaipi emasuweji asi ivo vakatarisana nedambudziko guru rekushomeka kwemvura mudzimba. Mumwe mugari wekuwadhi 4, Amai Sungano Zvarebwanashe vati kanzuru iri kuita zano ndega.

Pastor Cover Mugwadi, vanomirira vagari vakaremara vati kanzuru inofanora kupinda mumapoka evagari vane zvido zvakasiyana siyana ichivabvunzawo zvavanoda kuti zviitwe.

Munyori wekanzuru, VaEdward Mukaratirwa, vapokana nevagari nevedare reparamande apo vati vanoshandisa misangano yebhajeti rekanzuru pakupera kwegore kutora pfungwa dzevanhu panyaya yemari yedevolution. Sachigaro wekomiti yekutongwa kwematunhu muparamende, Amai Miriram Chikukwa, vaudza kanzuru yeMasvingo kuti inofanira kupinda muvanhu yotora pfungwa dzavo pose panouya mari yedevolution nekuti chirongwa chakazvimirira choga.

Mukuru webasa muMURRA, VaAnoziva Muguti, vati vafara nemusangano uyu vachivimba kuti uchabatsira vagary. Amai Chikukwa vati musangano wafamba zvakanaka uye vave kudzokera kuparamende nezvavawana kuti zvigotaurwa mudare rinenge rine nhengo dzakakwana vozonyora zvisungo zvavo pasi nekupa kurudziro kukanzuru.

headline: EU Yoshushikana neHurutungamiri hweNyika yeZimbabwe
text: Mumiriri wenyika dzemuEurope muZimbabwe,VaPhillipe Van Damme vanoti nyaya dzehuwori dziri kubuda mumapenhau munyika pamwe nekutadza kuita shanduko munyaya dzehupfumi sezvakabvumiranwa kumusangano wakaitwa kuLima, Peru gore rapera zviri kupa chimiro chakaipa kunyika pamwe nekutadzisa vekunze kuzotanga mabhizimizi muZimbabwe. Vachitaura pachirongwa chekucherechedza makore maviri vatanga basa muZimbabwe change chakarongwa neve263 Chat muHarare nemusi weChishanu, VaVan Damme vanoti mwedzi mishomanana yapfuura yaona mapepanhau achiburitsa nyaya dzehuwori mumapazi akawanda ehurumende asi pasina vanhu vari kusungwa kana kutora matanho ekuongorora nyaya idzi. Makukurukota ehurumende anoti VaJonathan Moyo vedzidzo yepamusoro nemutevedzeri wavo VaGodfrey Gandawa vanonzi vakashandisa mari inodarika mazana mana ezviuru zvemadhora zvisina mwero uye kunyange hazvo komisheni inoona nezvehuwori yakada kuvasunga yakarambidzwa kuita izvi nemutevedzeri wemutungamiriri wenyika,VaPhelekezela Mphoko. VaMphoko vakaburitsawo muhusungwa kuAvondale muHarare vakuru vakuru vekambani yeZimbabwe National Road Authority vanosanganisira VaDavison Norupiri avo vaipomrewa mhosva yekuba mazana matanhutu ezvuru zvemadhora. Gurukota rezvemando dzemoto, VaSamuel Undenge varikupomerwawo nyaya dzehuwori vachinzi vakamanikidza kambani yeZESA kupa basa kuna muzvinabhizimisi Wicknell Chivhayo zvechikiribidi. VaVan Damme vatiwo pasi pechibvumirano cheLima hurumende yainge yavimbisa kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo kuInternational Monetary Fund nekuWorld Bank mwedzi wapfuura usati waperi asi izvi hazvisati zvaitika. Vatiwo hurumende yakavimbisa kugadzirisa nyaya dzehuwori asi huwori huri kutowedzera. Vati zvese izvi zvinoita kuti vekunze vasauye munyika kuzotanga mabhizimisi pamwe nekusimudzira hupfumi. Vati nyika dzeEU dzicharamba dzichibatsira Zimbabwe munyaya dzenzara, hutano nemabasa ebudiriro asi vakati rutsigiro rwakawanda ruchauya chete kana hurumende yagadzirisa zvayakatidza, kutevedza mutemo pamwe nekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. Svondo rino vemabhizimisi vemuno vaichemachemawo pamusangano weNational Economic Consultative Forum kuti hurumende inongotaura chete nezvekuti iri kutora matanho ekugadzirisa hupfumi asi pasina zvairi kuita. VaMisheck Gondo vesangano reNational Assocition of Youth Organisations vati maonero aVaVan Damme akafanana nemaonero avo uye zviri pachena kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe iri kutadza kuita zvayakavimbisa. Mumwewo wechidiki, Thembinkosi Rushwaya uyo akasungwa nguva pfupi yapfuura mushure mekuratizira paUniversity of Zimbabwe pamberi pemutungamiriri wenyika,VaRobert Mugabe audza Studio 7 kuti pachinzvimbo chekugadzirisa zvinhu hurumende iri kuwedzera kuparadza hupfumi pamwe nekushungurudza veruzhinji. Kunyange hazvo EU yakabvisa zvirango zvehupfumi kuZimbabwe, vakawanda vapinda mumusangano uyu vanoti kutyorwa kwekodzerp dzevanhu kuri kotowezedzera zvichitevera danho rakatorwe neEU. VaVan Damme vati mukati megore rapfuura sangano iri pamwe nenyiak dzeEU vashandisa mari inodarika zana remamiriyoni emadhora munyaya dzechikafu nehutano. Vanotiwo mukati menguva imwe cheteyo, nyika idzi dzashandisa mari inodarika mamiriyoni makumi mashanu emadhora mumabasa ekuwanisa vanhu mvura yakachena pamwe nemamwe mabasa ebudiriro. VaVan Damme vanoti pane mukana mukuru wekuwedzera rubatsiro munyaya dzehupfumi, budiriro nezvimwe kana hurumende yeZimbabwe ikatevedza chitsidzo chayo cheLima pamwe nekutevedza mutemo, kuvandudza mitemo yavo yemabhizimisi pamwe nekurmekedza kodzero dzenhu. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaChris Mushowe kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoshorwa neKumisa Sarudzo dzeNyika Asi DzeZanu-PF Dzichienderera Mberi
text: Masangano anoongorora sarudzo munyika anoti sarudzo dzematunhu madiki dzeZanu PF dzemaDistrict Coordinating Committes- DCC’s – dzinoratidza kuti nyika inokwanisa kuita sarudzo dzema by-elections ayo akambomiswa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Sachigaro weZimbabwe Election Support Network-ZESN-VaAndrew Makoni vanoti zvinoshamisa kuti hurumende yakabvumira kuti paitwe sarudzo dzemuZanu-PF kunyangwe yakambomisa sarudzo dzose dzemakanzuru nedare reparamende ichiti iri kutyira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano rinoona zvesarudzo rakazvimririra reElection Resource Centre-ERC-VaSolomon Bobosibunu.\nVaBobosibunu vanoti sarudzo dzeZanu PF dzaratidza kuti sarudzo dzinofanirwa kurongwa zvakanaka kukurudzira hutongo hwejekerere. Gweta uye vari mukuru weZimbabwe Human Rights kana kuti ZimRights, VaDzikamai Bere vanoti kodzero dzevanhu dzekusarudza vamiriri vavanoda dziri kutyorwa pachishandiswa manyepo ekuti hurumende iri kuyedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Asi mutauriri weZimbabwe Electoral Commission kana kuti ZEC, VaQhubani Moyo vanoti hurumende ndiyo inovapa bvumo yekuita sarudzo. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi sezvo gurukota rezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi vanga vasingabatike panharembozha yavo. Asi munguva pfupi yapera mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika uye vari gurukota rezvehutano, VaConstantino Chiwenga vakamisa sarudzo dzema by-elections munyika sedanho rekumisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika. Asi masangano anowongorora sarudzo akazvmirira aya anoti kana paine mari nezvikwanisiro zvinodiwa hapana chinotadzisa kuti sarudzo dzema by-elections dziitwe. Sarudzo dzaitwa munyika dzakaita seTanzania, Ghana, America nedzimwe pachitevedzerwa kurudziro yakapihwa neWorld Health Organization yakakurudzirawo kuti nyika dzepasi rino dzienderere mberi nesarudzo.

headline: Zimbabwe Yobatana neWHO neMamwe Masangano Kurwisa Chirwere cheBharaziya
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Muzvinafundo Francisca Mutapi vanoshanda nesangano reTracking Infections To Benefit Africa vari kuScotland vanoti sangano ravo riri kuita ongororo rakabatana nebazi rezvehutano nesangano guru reWorld Health Organisation yekuona kuti chirwere chebharazira chadzoka here munyika uye kuti chingarapwe seyi pachena. Vanoti chirwere ichi chinoratidza nekuita weti kana tsvina ine ropa uye vanenge vaoona izvi vanofanirwa kuenda kunavana chiremba sezvo chirwere ichi chichirapika. Vamwe vagari vemuHarare vanonzi vakabatwa nechirwere ichi chinokonzerwa nehutachiwona hunogara mumvura ine tsvina. Muzvinafundo Mutapi vanoti pakambenge pane zvirongwa zvekurapa chirwere chebharazia pachena munyika munguva yapfura chakange chakanangana nevana vadiki vemuzvikoro asi chakambomiswa uye chinotarisirwa kutanga gore rinouya. "Kurudziro yedu ndeyekuti pachadaidzirwa nebazi rezvehutano kuti vanhu vauye kuzorapwa denda rebilharzia munguva inotevera vanhu vachabuda nehuwandu hwavo sezvo chirwere ichi chichirapika uye chichange chichi rapwa pachena," Muzvinafundo Mutapi vaudza Studio7. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata mukuru wezvehutano muguta reHarare VaProsper Chonzi kana mutauriri webazi rezvehutano VaDonald Mujiri sezvo nharembozha dzavo dzange dzisiri kudairwa . No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vanoti VaMnangagwa Vakaita Zano Ndega paMitemo yeKudzivirira Covid-19
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti mimwe mitemo yakatarwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nemusi weChipiri yakananganga nekudzivirira kupararira kwemhando itsva yeCovid-19 inonzi omicron inoratidza kuti havana kutanga vataura nevane ruzivo nezvehutano. VaMnangagwa vakazivisa nyika kuti vashanyi vose kusanganisira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe vanofanira kuvhenekwa hutachiona hweCovid-19 panhandare yendege, kuitwa izvi kunoda madhora makumi matanhatu ekuAmerica. Vanenge vapinda munyika vanonzi vanofanira kugara pavo vega kwemavhiki maviri vachibhadhara mari dzavo. Vanhu vave kunzi vagare mudzimba kubva nenguva dza9 manheru kusvika na 6 mangwanani. VaMnangagwa vanoti izvi vari kuzviitira kuti nyika idzivirire kupararira kwemhando itsva yeCovid-19 iyi. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano Dr Henry Madzorera vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kuitwa nehurumende hazvibatsire vachiti kuungana pavanhu zvikuru mumabhazi neparufu. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyaya dzezvehutano reCommunity Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvimwe zvakaitwa naVaMnagangagwa zvinoratidza kuti vange vasina kutaura nenyanzvi sezvo zvichinetsa kuzadzikisa. Vati Zimbabwe haina nzvimbo dzakakwana dzekuti vanhu vagare mavhiki maviri vari voga uye vati kuti vanhu vanzi vamire kufamba nenguva dzepfumbamwe manheru zvinonetsa nekuti hakuna mabhazi ekufambisa.. Zvichakadaro, mumashoko kuvatori venhau, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti zvichatora mavhiki akawanda kuti dzizive kuti mhando itsva iyi yakamira sei. Imwe kambani inogadzira nhomba yenstraZeneca inoti yatotumira nyanzvi kuBotswana neEswathini kuti dzitange kuita tsvakiridzo yezvemhando itsva iyi. Mamwe makambani anoti Johnson, Pfizer neModerna anoti atangawo kuita tsvakiridzo dzezvemhando itsva iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi veHurumende Vanoti Vanoda Kutaura neHurumende
text: Vashandi vehurumende nhasi vanyorera hurumende vachiratidza kusafara nekunonoka kwairi kuita kusheveredzera musangano weNational Joint Negotiating Council. Musangano uyu ndewekuzeya nyaya yemari yavanotambirisirwa nezvimwe zvinobata raramo yavo panguva iyo vashandi ava vari kugunun’una kuti mari yavo yemihoro haisisina chainokwana. Mutsamba yavasvitsa kuhofisi yegurukota revashandi,VaPaul Mavhima, pamwe negurukota rezvemari VaMthuli Ncube, nasachigaro wePublic Service Commission, VaVincent Hungwe, mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende reZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions, Amai Cecelia Alexander, vati sangano ravo harisi kufara nekunonoka kuri kuita hurumende kushevedzera musangano weNJNC kuti vapedzise nhaurirano dzavakasiira panzira musi waNdira 14 pasina chisungo chakabuda pamusangano uyu. Amai Alexander vatiwo havasi kufara kuti mushandi wehurumende ari kutambira mari iri pasi ari kupihwa mari inoita madhora zviuru gumi nezvisere iri maRTGS asi mhuri imwe chete ichida zviuru makumi manomwe nezvipfumbamwe zvemadhora ari maRTGS pamwedzi kuti ikwanise kurarama. Izvi zvatshinhirwa nemurongi wemisangano musangano reZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions, VaCharles Chinosengwa. VaChinosengwa vati musangano wavakaita mavhiki maviri adarika hauna chawakabuda nacho kunyange hurumende nevashandi vayo vakabvumirana kuti mari iri kupihwa vashandi ishoma zvikuru zvekuti vashandi vehurumende vave kudya nhoko dzezvironda. VaChinosengwa vati izvi zvinogona kukonzera kusagadzikana munyika. Asi mutungamiri wesangano revadzidzisi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vati hapana zvizhinji zvavari kutarisira kubva kumusangano weNJNC kunyange ukaitwa sezvo vachiti hurumende haina kuzvipira kugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nevashandi vayo. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezveshandi, VaLovemore Matuke, vati vanga vakabatikana vakati titaure naVaMavhima avo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo kusvikira tiende pamhepo. VaHungwe vati titaure nemunyori wePublic Service Commission, VaJonathan Wutaunashe avo vanga vasati vapindurawo mibvunzo yatavatumira. Zvichakadai, mamwe masangano evarairidzi akaita seARTUZ, Progressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe pamwe neZimbabwe Teachers Association anotiwo nhengo dzawo dzinogona kutadza kuenda kubasa pachavhurwa zvikoro svondo rinouya sezvo achiti nhengo dzawo hadzisi kufara nemari yadziri kutambiriswa nehurumende. Masangano aya ari kukurudzira hurumende kuti ibhadhare vashande vayo mari inoita madhora mazana mashanu nemakumi mana iri mari yekuAmerica sezvo achiti mari yemuZimbabwe haisisina simba. No media source currently available

headline: IMF Inoti maBond Notes Haangagadzirise Dambudziko reMari muZimbabwe
text: Bhanga guru rinokweretesa mari nyika dzepasi rino reInternational Monetary Fund, kana kuti IMF, rinoti kuparurwa kwakaitwa mari yemabond notes neZimbabwe hakupedze dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari munyika. Mashoko aya ari kuuya apo Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe iri kutumira matikitivha kuzvitoro kuti isunge vanonzi havasi kuendesa mari kumabhanga nechimbi chimbi zvave kunzi zviri kukonzera dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari munyika. Asi mukuru weIMF muAfrica, VaAbebe Aemro Selassie, vakaudza vatori venhau muWashington DC kuti kuparura mabaond notes hakungapedze dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari munyika. Vanoti Zimbabwe inotofanira kusunga dzisimbe kuti igadzirise mitemo inopa kuti hupfumi hugadzikane ikwanise kutanga kutengesa zvinhu kunze kwenyika yowana mari. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vari mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti vanotenderana neIMF asi vachiti Zimbabwe inofanira kumira nyaya dzehuori. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paUniversity of Zimbabwe Doctor Gift Mugano vanotenderanawo nemaonero eIMF. Asi mukuparura mari yemabond notes gavhuna weRBZ, Doctor John Mangudya, vakati anobatsira. VaMangudya vanoti chimwe chiri kunyanya kuita kuti dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari rinyanye kunetsa inyaya yevemakambani vasiri kuendesa mari kumabhanga. Nekuda kwefungidziro iyi RBZ yave kutumira matikitivha eFinancial Intelligent Unit kunomanikidza vemabhizimisi kuendesa mari kumabhanga. Vachitsinhira, gurukota rezvehupfumi VaPatrick Chinamsa vanoti pasi pemutemo we Bank Use Promotion Act [Chapter 24:24] vemabhizimisi vanofanira kuendesa mari kumabhanga mukari mezuva rimwe chete. VaDenford Mutashu mutungamiri wesangano re Confederation of Zimbabwe Retailers vanoti vanotenderana nedanho raVaMangudya. Mutungamiri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaBusisa Moyo, vanotiwo vanotenderana neRBZ. VaMoyo vati mari ikasaenda kumabhanga zvinopa kuti vanogadzira zvinhu vatadze kuhodha zvinhu kunze. Asi Doctor Mugano vanoti zviri kuitwa naVaMangudya kupedzera hoko padehwe retsindi. Zimbabwe yakatanga kushandisa dhora rekuAmerica nedzimwe mari dzekunze muna 2009 mushure mekunge dhora remunyika ratanga kushaya simba zvisina mukare akamboona. Kusvika parizvino, RBZ inoti yakwanisa kudhinda mari inosvika mamiriyoni zana nemakumi maviri nerimwe yemabond notes. No media source currently available

headline: Zvirwere zveManyoka Zvotarisirwa Kuwedzera Kunzvimbo Dzakaparadzwa neDutumupengo
text: Mukuru mubazi rezvehutano Dr Robert Madyiradima vanoti huwandu wezvirwere zvemanyoka huchawedzera munzvimbo dzakaparadzwa nedambudziko renemafashamu emvura nemhepo kana kuti Tropical Cyclone Idai sezvo kusina mvura yekunwa yakachena kune dzimwe nzvimbo uko kusiri kusvikika parizvino. Dr Madyiradima vanoti chikuru parizvino ndechekuti vanhu vazvichengetedze vakamirira kuwana rubatsiro. Chiremba ava vanoti bazi ravo riri kushanda nebazi reCivil Protection Unit nemamwe mapazi ehurumende mukuyedza kuendesa rubatsiro kune vakakuvara nevarwere. Vanhu vanodarika makumi mapfumbamwe nevasere vanonzi vafa kuChipinge, Chimanimani neMasvingo nekuda kwedutumupengo iri. No media source currently available

headline: Kuteresa Makambani Ane Minda Munyika Kotambirwa neNyanzvi
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvekurima dzinoti dzinotambira danho rakatorwa nedare remakurukota rekuti makambani makuru ane minda munyika abhadhare mitero. Bepanhau reHerald rinoti makambani aya akanzi anofanirwa kubhadhara madhora gumi pahekita pagore kubvira muna Ndira wegore rino. Danho iri rinozi richabatsira hurumende kuti iunganidze mari yekushandisa mubudiriro pamwe nekubhadhara varimi vechichena vakatorerwa minda. Danho iri rinotevera rimwe rakadai rakaziviswa zvakare nehurumende mwedzi mishoma yadarika rekuti varimi vakagariswa patsva pamwe nevekumaruwa, vanonzi ma A1 ne A2, vabhadharewo mitero. Vekumaruwa vanofanirwa kubhadhara madhora mashanu kuchitiwo vemapurazi madiki vachibhadhara madhora gumi nemashanu pagore. Asi imwe nyanzvimune zvekurima, VaBernard Manyadza, avo vanoshanda vakazvimirira, vanoti zvakakoshawo zvikuru kuti patariswe kuti munhu ari kushandisa ivhu iri ari kuwanawo cheuviri here kubva mariri. VaManyadza vanotiwo havatambiri pfungwa yekuti varimi vatsva kana vekumaruwa vahwandirwe nehurumende mukubvisiswa mari yekubhadhara vachena, avo vakatobuda munyika, vazhinji vacho vachinzi vave kurima vari kuZambia, kunove kwave kutengwa chibage neZimbabwe. Asi mumwe murimi mukuru, uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vanotiwo havaoni varimi vachiita dambudziko rekukundikana kubhadhara mitero iyi, sezvo iri pasi zvikuru, uye vagara vachiibhadhara. VaChirumhanzu vanoti havaoni hurumende iri iyo ine dambudziko kana hurongwa uhwu hwakasabudirira, sezvo paine zvipangamazano zvinoipa mazano nekunyora zvekuti itevere. Mamwe makambani makuru ari kurima munyika, anosanganisira yeTongaat Hulett, anonzi ane minda mikuru kwazvo, izvo zvinogona kuti azoguma obhadhara mari dzinodarika miriyoni yemadhora pagore. No media source currently available

headline: VeZanu-PF neCCC Vokakavadzana nezveKusagadzikana Kwoita Nyika paMberi peSarudzo dza2023
text:
Vebato reZanu-PF neveCitizens Coalition for Change vatatsurana muMasvingo nhasi pakuti ndiyani ari kukonzera mhirizhonga nekusagadzikana munyika pamberi pesarudzo dza2023. Vachitaura pamusangano wekutaura nezvegadziriro yesarudzo dzegore rinouya wakokerwa nesangano revatori venhau reZimbabwe Union of Journalists nhasi paChevron Hotel, vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri weCCC muMasvingo, VaDereck Charamba nemunyori mubazi revechidiki muZanu PF muMasvingo, VaCharles Munganasa vati mapato avo akagadzirira zvakakwana kupinda musarudzo dzegore rinouya.

VaCharamba vati bato ravo riri kugadzirira sarudzo idzi nekutsvaga rutsigiromurunyararo asi vakapomera Zanu-PF mhosva yekuita nekuvakanganisa VaCharamba vati huwandu hw mhirizhonga yezvematongerwe enyika nekumbunyikidzwa kwekodzero dzavatsigiri vavo huri kukura munyika apo sarudzo dzave pedyo. Izvi zvarambwa naVaMunganasa avo vapomera mhosva yekukwira kwemhirizhonga dzematongerwe enyika kubato rinopikisa re CCC vachiti ndiro rinotanga mhirizhonga.

VaMunganasa vanoti bato reCCC rinobatsirwa nemasangano akaozvimirira oga kunemera bato ravo mhosva dzenhema vachiti vanhu varikuita izvi varikuita voga vasina kutumwa nebato ravo.
Vaenderera mberi vachiti vanotarisira kukunda musarudzo gore rinouya nekuti mabasa ari kuitwa nebato ravo ari kuonekwa nevavhoti.

VaCharamba vati hapana mabasa anoonekwa akaitwa nebato reZanu PF kubva muna 2018 sezvo hupfumi hwenyika huri kumawere uye vanhu varikutambura. Munyori mukuru musangano reZUJ muMasvingo, VaTatenda Chatagu vatiwo vaita musangano uyu pakati pevatori venhau nevatungamiriri vemapato aya kuti vazeye nyaya yemhirizhonga pasarudzo iyo inobatawo vatori venhau vanenge vachita mabasa avo

Mapurisa ange akakokwawo kumusangano wanhasi haana kuuya. Bato reCCC riri kupomera bato reZanu PF mhosva yekuponda nhengo dzaro dzinoti VaMboneni Ncube, KuKwekwe pasarudzo dzema by-election muna Kurume, Muzvare MoreBlessing Ali kuNyatsimwe mwedzi wapera pamwe na Nyasha Zhambe Mawere kwaGutu gore rapera muna Zvita. Asi Zanu PF inoramba mhosva idzi ichiti vanhu vakazviita vakapara mhosva vakazvimirira ndosaka vakasungwa nemapurisa.

Mugwaro rayo rezvekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu nemhirizhonga munyika mumwedzi waChikumi, sangano rakazvimirira roga reZimbabwe Peace Project rinoti bato reZANU PF ndiro rakanyanya kutyora kodzero dzevanhu nezvikamu zvinodarika makumi mana nematatu kubva muzana 43,8%, ukuwo bato reCCC rinewo zvikamu zvinodarika zvitatu nechidimbu kubva muzana kana kuti 3.5%. No media source currently available

headline: America Inoti Zimbabwe Haisi Kuzadzikisa Zvivimbiso zveKuvandudza Nyaya dzeMatongerwo eNyika
text: Hurumende yeAmerica inoti Zimbabwe haina zvizhinji zvairi kuvandudza munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika zvingapa kuti zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vatungamiri vehurumende zvibviswe. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano waitwa neChitatu muWashington DC nesangano reCentre for Strategic and International Studies Strategic kana kuti CSISS razeya nyaya yemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika zvikuru nyaya yezvekudya uye zvingaitwe kugadzirisa matambudziko aya. Vachivhura hurukuro iyi, mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru mubazi rezvekudyidzana nenyika dzemuAfrica muhurumende yeAmerica kana kuti Deputy Assistant Secretary of State, Bureau of African Affairs Ambassador Mathew Harrington, vati kunyange hazvo America yakabuda pachena kuti zvii zvainoda kuti zviitwe isati yabvisa zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru vehurumende, zviri pachena kuti kuvakuru vehurumende yeZimbabwe muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi sezvo vari kungotaura kuti vari kuda kugadzirisa zvinhu asi pasina chabuda. Vamwe vakataura pamusangano uyu mukuru mubazi rezverubatsiro muZimbabwe mubazi reUSAID, VaJason Taylor. Vamwe vange varipo ndevakafanobata chigaro chemukuru anoongorora mamiriro ezvekudya musangano reFewsnet, VaPeter Thomas, uye nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vari chipangamazano chehurumende, Muzvinafundo Ashok Chakravarti. Muzvinafundo Chakravarti vati zvirango zviri kukonzera matambudziko uye zvinofanira kubviswa. Asi vachipindurawo VaJason vati handi chokwadi kuti Zimbabwe iri kutadza kubudirira nenyaya yemutemo wezvirango weZimbabwe Democracy and Economic Recovery Act kana kuti (ZIDERA) vachiti chiri kupa kuti Zimbabwe itadze kupihwa mari inyaya yekutadza kubhadhara zvikwereti. Panyaya dzezvekudya, VaThomas vati vanhu vakawanda munyika vakatarisana nenzara inotyisa. VaTaylor vanoti zvinhu zvikasagadziriswa munyika munogona kusagadzikana vanhu vachiratidzira sezvakaitika muna Ndira pakawedzerwa mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari kunyangwe havo vatenda kuti vanhu vemuZimbabwe havadi zvekurwisana zvinopa kuti munyika musadeuke ropa. Mutemo weZIDERA wakadzikwa nedare reCongress remuAmerica iro raipomera vatungamiri venyika yeZimbabwe mhosva yekutonga nedemo. No media source currently available

headline: Makambani ekuZimbabwe Oratidzira Zvigadzirwa kuBotswana
text: Makambani emuZimbabwe anosvika makumi matatu ari kuratidzira zvigadzirwa zvawo pagungano rezviratidzwa re2022 Botswana Global Expo, iro rakatanga nezuro muguta reGaborone uye riri kutarisirwa kupera musi wa4 Mbudzi. Muna 2019 makambani gumi nemashanu kubva kuZimbabwe ndiwo akaenda kunoratidzira pamusika uyu. Sangano rinoona nezvekutenga nekutengeserana munyika reZimTrade riri kutungamira vemabhizimisi vemunyika kuBotswana rinoti ongororo yarakaita muna 2018 yakaburitsa pachena kuti muBotswana mune mikana yakawanda kune makambani anoita zvekuvaka, chikafu chakagadzirwa kare kana kuti processed foods, zvemigodhi, zvekurima nezvimwe. Chipangamazano musangano reZimTrade, Muzvare Nozipho Maphala vanoti kushambadzira zvinhu pamusika mukuru wakadai kunosimudzira hupfumi hwenyika kuburikidza nekuwana mari yekunze inodiwa zvakanyanya munyika. Muzvare Maphala vakakurudzira makambani emunyika kuti atorewo mukana wechibvumirano chakaitwa pakati penyika mbiri idzi muna1988 cheZimbabwe-Botswana Bilateral Trade Agreement. Chibvumirano ichi chinobvisa mimwe mitero uye kupa kuti kutengeserana pakati penyika mbiri idzi kuve nyore zvikuru pane zvigadzirwa, zvirimwa nezvimwe. Panyaya dzekutengeserara muAfrica, Botswana iri pachidanho chechina mumashure meSouth Africa, Zambia neMozambique. Zimbabwe neBotswana inhengo dzeSADC neCOMESA zvinopawokuti kutengeserana kuve nyore. Amai Sibusisiwe Chitehwe wekambani yeDasfoods Enterprise inogadzira jamhu ichiwanikwa muguta reBulawayo, vaudza Studio7 kuti vari kuona chiedza kunyangwe kari kekutanga kupinda muchirongwa ichi. Mumwe muzvinabhizinesi anogadzira zvigadzirwa zvematehwe, uyo ari kuratidzira pagungano iri, VaThompson Chinyengetere vanoti vaona kuti vane mukana wakakurisa sezvo vanhu venyika iyi vasingadi kutamba nematehwe kunyangwe hazvo Botswana iine mombe dzakawandisa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhizinesi uye vachishanda vakazvimirira muguta reGaborone muBotswana, VaWilbert Mutoko vanoti hurongwa uhu hunokwanisa kuvhurira vanamuzvinabhizinesi ava mikana mukuru kwazvo sezvo gungano iri richikwezva vanhu vazhinji kubva kumativi mana enyika. Botswana Investment and Trade Center kana kuti BITC inotungamira hurongwa hwekutengeserana uhu inokwezva vemabhizimisi kubva kunyika dzepasi rino. Hurongwa uhu hwakaparurwa muna 2006. Hurongwa hwegore rino ndehwe makore gumi nematanhatu kana kuti 16th edition uye uri kuitwa pasi pedingindira rakanangana nekushandisa humhizha nehumhetura mukutengeswa kwezvinhu kuti remangwana rive rakajeka kana kuti “Reimagining our economy for a Better Future Tomorrow through digitalization and the application of robust export led strategies.  No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vatatu Vofa neChirwere cheCovid-19 neMugovera
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu vatatu vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemusi weMugovera zvasiya vafa kubva zvatanga chirwere ichi kupararira vave zviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nemakumi maviri kana kuti 4, 782. Vanhu zviuru zviviri nezana nevatanhatu kana kuti 2, 106 vakabatwawo nechirwere ichi zvasiya vanhu zana rezviuru nemakumi mapfumbamwe nechimwe zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nematatu kana kuti 191 673 vabatwawo nechirwere ichi kusvika parizvino. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba kaviri vave mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru zvitanhatu nezvitatu zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matatu nemana kana kuti 3 063 934. Vanhu vabayiwa kekutanga vave mamiriyoni mana nezviuru makumi mana nemanomwe zvine mazana manomwe nemakumi mana nematatu kana kuti 4 047 743. Hurumende inoti ine chinangwa chekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana mukupera kwemwedzi uno kuti inyatsoshanda. Kuuya kwemhando itsva yeCovid-19 kwapa kuti huwandu hwevari kurwara neCovid-19 huwedzere zvakanyanya. Pakazivisa hurumende kuti mhando itsva yechirwere ichi yainge yawanikwa munyika musi wa 5 Zvita painge paine vanhu zviuru zviviri nemazana masere nemakumi mana nematatu kana kuti 2 843 vairwara. Asi neMugovera vari kurwara vainge vave zviuru kamumi mashanu nechimwe nezana nemakumi matatu nematanhatu kana kuti 51 136. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Enoch Mayida vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vabayiwe nhomba sezvo iri iyo chete nzira inopa kuti vasarware zvakanyanya kana kufa neCovid-19.

headline: Chirongwa cheTNF Chinoparurwa VaMnangagwa Vachikurudzira Vanhu Kuti Vasaramwe Mabasa
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaparura neChitatu nhaurirano pakati pehurumende, vashandi nevashandirwi vachikurudzira kuti vashandi vasaratidzire kusafara kwavo nekuoma kuri kuita zvinhu munyika. Vachitaura pakuparurwa kwenhaurirano idzi idzo dzichaitwa pakati pehurumende, vashandi nevashandirwi pasi peTripartite Negotiating Forum kana kuti TNF, VaMnangagwa vakurudzira kuti vashandi vasapinde mumigwagwa vachiratidzira kusafara kwavo nekusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyika vachiti kuratidzira uku kunoputsa hukama pakati pehurumende nevashandi. Asi mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vashandi munyika reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vaudzawo musangano uyu vashandi vachapinda mumigwagwa kana hurumende ikaramba yakaisa zvimiti munzeve panyaya yemari dzemihoro dziri kunzi nevashandi ngadziwedzerwe. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vati vaitawo musangano naVaMnangagwa pamberi pekuparurwa kweTNF uku apo pavati vasvitsawo nhuna dzavo sevashandi. VaMoyo vati vashamisika kuti VaMnangagwa havasi kutomboziva kuti mushandi anotambira mari iri pasi ari kuwana marii pamwedzi. Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru wesangano rinomirira vashandirwi reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe kana kuti Emcoz, VaIsrael Murefu, vaudzawo mutungamiri wenyika kuti vemakambani vari kutadza kubhadhara vashandi kubudikidza nekusagadzikana kwakaita mari yemunyika. Zvichakadai, VaMnangagwa vati nhaurirano pakati pehurumende, vashandi nevashandirwi ndidzo chete dzinokwanisa kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa muhupfumi hwenyika kana mapandiko matatu aya akazvipira kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika. Vatiwo sehurumende vari kuvandudza mitemo yakawanda kuitira vanoda kuzosima mari munyika vakwanise kuita mabasa avo pasina zvimhingamipinyi. Kuparurwa kwaitwa nhaurirano dzeTNF kwaitwa naVaMnangagwa kunotevera kupasiswa kwakaitwa bhiri remutemo weTNF neparamende. Mutemo uyu unosungira hurumende kuti isangane nevashandi nevemabhizimusi kaviri pagore. No media source currently available

headline: MDC-T yaVaMwonzora neMDC-T yaMuzvare Khupe Dzopesana paNyaya yeMari Inopiwa Mapato ane Nhengo muParamende
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti dzinoona pachiita makakatanwa pakati peMDC-T inotungamirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora neimwe inotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe pamusoro pemari inopiwa mapato ane nhengo muparamende. Izvi zvinotevera kuziviswa kwakaitwa nehurumende kuburikidza negwaro reGovernment Gazzette kuti mapato eMDC neZanu PF achawana mari iyi pasi pemutemo wePolitical Finance Act. Gwaro iri, iro rakaburitswa nemusi weChipiri, rinoratidza kuti MDC ichawana mari inoita ZWL$ 149 850 000, 00, kuchitiwo Zanu PF ichiwana ZWL$350 150 000, 00. Asi vamwe vane ruzivo nezvinoitika muMDC vanoti havaoni paine makakatanwa sezvo hurumende ichitumira mari iyi kukero inenge yakanyoreswa nebato, zvichireva kuti kuMDC inenge ichienda kumuzinda wayo weHarvest House sezvagara zvichiitika makore ose. Asi chipangamazano chaMuzvare Khupe, VaNtando Ndlovu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo vakanzwa kuti bazi rezvemitemo rakazivisa nezvemari idzi, havana kuziviswa zviri pamutemo. VaNdlovu vanoti tarisiro yavo ndeyekuti mari iyi igovanwe nepakati nemapato eMDC-T ose ari maviri, vachiti vanofunga kuti bato rinotungamirirwa naMuzvare Khupe ndiro chairo MDC-T iri pamutemo nekuti Vamwonzora vakazivisa kuti vakaumba bato idzva rinonzi MDC Alliance. VaNdlovu vanoti hapana zvitsva pahurongwa hwekuti pamato anogonavana mari iyi sezvo izvi zvakamboitika muna 2014 apo yakagovanwa pakati paVaTendai Biti namushakabvu VaMorgan Tsvangirai. Asi mutauriri weMDC-T inotungamirirwa naVaMwonzora, VaWitness Dube, vanoti bato ravo ndiro rinokodzera kupiwa mari iyi, haingokandwi sechibage chinokandirwa huku chichinzi yanhonga yanhonga. VaDube vanoti panotove nehurongwa hunopiwa nahwo mari iyi, vachiti Muzvare Khupe vanotove nebato ravo idzva ravakaumba kuBulawayo svondo rapera, iro rakanga risipo pasarudzo dza 2018. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vachishanda vakazvimirira VaRejoice Ngwenya, vanoti nemamiriro akaita gakava remapoka maviri eMDC-T aya, Muzvare Khupe ndivo vavanoona vachikodzera kupiwa mari iyi nekuti VaMwonzora vakabuda pachena kuti vave veMDC Alliance, bato rakatodzingiswa muparamende muparamende naivo VaMwonzora. No media source currently available No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoshanyira Glen View Yanetseka neKorera
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vashanyira musha weGlen View uko kwapararira chirwere chekorera panguya iyo hurumende ichiti iri kuda mari inodarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu emadhora achashandiswa mukurwisa nechirwere ichi. VaMnangagwa vatambirwa nemufaro mukuru nevatsigiri veZanu PF vanga vaungana pachipatara pamwe nevana vechikoro vanga vachibva kuchikoro pavaenda kunoona vanhu vari kurwara nechirwere chekorera mumusha unogara veruzhinji muGlen View. Vachitaura pazvitoro zveTichagarika zviri mumusha weGlen View mushure mekushanyira chipatara cheGlen View Polyclinic uko kuri kurapwa vanhu vakati kuti vari kurwara nechirwere chekorera, VaMnangagwa vati hurumende yavo ichabatsira kanzuru yeHarare mukutakurwa kwemarara, kugadzirwa kwepombi dzinotakura tsvina pamwe nekuwanisa vagari mvura yakachena kuitira kuti chirwere chekorera chipere muHarare uye chisarambe chichipararira kune dzimwe nzvimbo dziri kunze kweHarare. VaMnangagwa vakurudzirawo kuti veruzhinji vagare vakashambidzika pose pavari kuti vasatapurirane chirwere ichi. Meya weguta reHarare, VaHerbert Gomba, avo vanga varipowo pashanywa naVaMnangagwa, vati sekanzuru vari kuedza pose pavanogona napo kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe chichipararira. VaGomba vati pane zvibhorani zviviri zvavatovhrara zviri muGlen View zvange zvave kukonzera kupararira kwechirwere chekorera. Mugari wekuGlen View, Amai Mascelyn Chibweya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kufara zvikuru kuti kanzuru iri kugadzira pombi idzo dzanga dzave kusanganisa mvura yekunwa pamwe netsvina kana kuti masuweji. Mumwe mugari wemuGlen View, VaJoe Kadzviti, vati zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zvingadai zvakafa dai pasina kumhanyidzana kuri kuitwa nevemasangano akazvimirira, vemabhizimusi, kanzuru pamwe nehurumende mukurwisana nechirwere ichi icho chapfunya chisero muHarare. Gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vaparura homwe yavari kukumbira kuti izadzwe nemari neveruzhinji yakanangana nekurrwisa chirwere chekorera. VaNcube vati hurumende iri kuda mari inodarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhati emadhora ichashandiswa mukurwisa chirwere chekorera. Gurukota rezvehutano, VaObediah Moyo, vanoti pane vanhu makumi matatu nevaviri vafa nechirwere chekorera kusvika pari nhasi uye huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi hwave kudzikira. Chirwere chekorera chakauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvina muna 2008. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vaviri Vofa neCovid-19 Kusanganisira Mumwe Mukuru weChikoro kuMasvingo
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa nechirwere cheCovid-19 huri kuramba huchikwira mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu vaviri vafa nechirwere ichi. Munhu mumwe chete akafa kuManicaland neMasvingo. Bepanhau reThe Masvingo Mirror rinoti akashaya mudunhu iri mukuru wechikoro cheMukaro High Amai Pauline Dzapasi avo vakashaya neChishanu vakavigwa neSvondo. Varairidzi vose vapachikoro ichi vanzi vambondogara pavo voga pasina mhuri pachityirwa kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Vana vechikoro avo vakavhara neChishanu vanziwo vari kuongororwa. Mukuru wezvehutano mudunhu reMasvingo Dr Amadeu Shamu vakatenda kuti Amai Dzapasi vakashaya mushure mekurwara nechirwere cheCovid-19. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave mazana matatu nemakumi maviri kana kuti 320. Vanhu zana nemakumi manomwe nevana vabatwa nechirwere ichi nemusi weSvondo. Vakawanda vacho vari muHarare uye matunhu ose ane vanhu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro kunze kwekuMashonaland West. Izvi zvasiya huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga hwave pazvuru gumi nezviri zvine mazana matatu nemakumi maviri nemashanu kana kuti 12, 325. Vanhu pora kubva kuchirwere ichi vave zvuru gumi zvine nemakumi maviri nevana kana kuti 10, 024 mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu makumi mana vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi. Vanhu vachiri kurwara vave churu chimwe chete chine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi masere nemumwe kana kuti 1,981. Asi kunyangwe hazvo vanhu vari kurwara nekufa nechirwere ichi, mutungamiri wesangano revakoti reZimbawe Nurses Association VaEnock Dongo vanoti hurumende haisi kuvapa zvekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere cheCovid-19 zvopa kuti vakawanda vavo varware. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezvuru mazana mana kana kuti 2,4 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zvuru makumi mashanu nemasere zvine mazana manomwe nemakumi matanhatu nevaviri kana kuti 58,762. Vapora vadarika mamiriyoni maviri kana kuti 2 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Dunhu reSADC ndirowo rine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi manomwe nematanmhatu ane zvuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 76,7 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zviuru mazana matatu negumi nevanomwe kana kuti 317,000 vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nemanomwe nezvuru mazana masere kana kuti 17,8 million. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 1,6 million. Asi vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi mana nematatu kana kuti 43 million.

headline: WFP Inoti Zimbabwe Yakakwanisa Kupinza Munyika Matani 305 000 eChibage
text: Sangano reWorld Food Programme, WFP, razivisa kuti kubva kutanga kwegore rino kusvika mukupera kwaKubvumbi, Zimbabwe yakwanisa kutenga kubva kunze chibage chine huremu hunosvika mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu ezviuru zvematani. Vachitaura kuvatori venhau neChina muJohannesburg, mukuru we WFP muZimbabwe VaEddie Rowe vati Zimbabwe inoda kutenga chibage chinosvika matani miriyoni nemazana matatu ezviuru, zvichienzaniswa nematani miriyoni nemazana masere ezviuru anodiwa nenyika. NeMuvhuro sangano reUnited Nations Development Programme, UNDP, rakazvisawo kuti vanhu vangangosvika mamiriyoni mana nechidimbu vari kuda rubatsiro rwechikafu kusvika muna Kurume wegore rinouya. Sangano iri rakati riri mushishi kutsvaga mari inoita $290 million uye kubva pakakumbirwa rubatsiro nemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe, rakwanisa kuunganidza mamiriyoni makumi manomwe emadhora. VaHenry Makiwa vanove mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko musangano reWorld Vision vanoti kunyange hazvo nyika yakwanisa kupinza chibage, vanoona chiri chishoma kwazvo pachitariswa huwandu hwevanhu vari kuda chikafu. “Panotodiwa kuwedzerwa kwechikafu nekuti huwandu hwevanhu vari kuda chikafu huri kuramba huchikwira,” VaMakiwa vanodaro. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari veGuta reHarare Vonyunyuta neDanho reKanzuru reKutevera Zvikwereti neMasamanisi
text: Rimwe sangano rinomirira vagari vemuHarare, reHarare Residents Trust, rinoti hazvisi pamutemo kuti kanzuru itange nekutumira masamanisi kuvagari vane zvikwereti isati yagara navo pasi kuti vatsvage nzira dzekubhadhara zvikwereti zvavo. Izvi zvinotevera danho rakaziviswa nekanzuru yeHarare rekuti yave kutevera zvikwereti zvayo zviri muvagari kuburikidza nemasamanisi. Kanzuru inoti vagari vemuHarare vane zvikwereti zvinosvika mabhiriyoni gumi nemanomwe emadhora emunyika, ana kuti (ZWL$17 billion) yemitero isiri kubhadharwa. Mukuru wesangano reHarare Residents Trust, VaPrecious Shumba, vanoti zvinozivikanwa kuti kanzuru haisi kukwanisa kutumira magwaro emitero kuvagari, izvo zvinoita kuti panetse kuziva kuti mugari ane chikwereti chakakura zvakadii.  No media source currently available Asi mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme vanoti vatora danho iri maringe nekuona kuti zvikwereti zviri kukurisa vanhu vasingabhadhare. Vanoti kanzuru inoda kuti mabasa ayo ainotarisirwa kuita arambe achienderera mberi, akaita sekutakurwa kwemarara, kupa vanhu mvura, kugadzira migwagwa, kuisa magetsi, kugadzira zvipatara uye kuti zvikoro zvirambe zvichishanda, VaChideme vanoti nekuda kwaizvozvo, vakaona zvakaringana kuti vanhu vapiwe masamanisi kuti vange vachibhadhara mari dzinodiwa kukanzuru. No media source currently available

headline: Chirongwa cheYALI Chinopera muWashington Vatatu Vanobva kuZimbabwe Vachiwana Rubatsiro rweMari
text: Chirongwa cheMandela Washington Fellowship chasvika kumagumo neChitatu muWashington vechidiki vekuZimbabwe vatatu vachifara zvikuru mushure mekupihwa mari dzichavabatsira mukukudza mabhizimusi avo. Vatatu ava ndiVa Andrew Chikomba, VaFarai Chizengeni naVa Kudakwashe Makuzwa. Vechidiki ava vakapihwa mari inosvika zviuru makumi maviri nezvishanu zvemadhora nebazi re United States African Development Foundation. Vatatu ava ndevamwe vechdiki makumi mana vemu Africa vakapiwa mari yekusimudzira mabhizinesi avo mushure mekupedza chirongwa cheMandela Washington Felloship. Vechidiki ava vachadzokera kunyika dzavo dzakasiyana siyana kutanga neChishanu. Mumwe wechidiki wemuZimbabwe anga ari muchirongwa ichi, uye ari mutori wenhau anoshandira bepanhau reHerald, Rose Sachiti, anoti afara zvikuru neruzivo raawana kubva kuchirongwa ichi. Mumwe wevechidiki ari muchirongwa ichi, VaKelvine Mutize, vanoti ivo nevamwe vake vari kufara nekubudirira kuri kuita sangano ravo re Yali Creatives, iro rinobatanidza vechidiki vari munyika dzemuAfrica ravakaumba apo vaive muAmerica. Va Mutize vanoti vakaita musangano neChipiri nevamwe vavo wekuzeya kuti chirongwa ichi chichafamba seyi kana vadzokera kunyika dzavo. VaMutize nevamwe vavo vanobva munyika dzakasiyana siyana vakaungana vachitandara pamwe nekuzeya remangwana avo pamabiko akaitwa neChipiri manheru. Mumwe muzvinabhisinisi wechidiki kuZimbabwe anoshandira ari muWashington, Va Augustine Mhlanga, avo vane kambani ye Swift And Gentle Moving, ndivo vakatsigira mabiko aya kuti avepo. Vachitaura pamabiko aya, VaMhlanga vakati zvakakosha kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviwanikwe zvichibatsira mumatunhu avonogara. VaMutize vanoti zvakaitwa naVa Mhlanga zvakavabata uye vachayedzawo kuita zvakadai kana vadzokera kumusha. No media source currently available No media source currently available No media source currently available

headline: VaDouglas Tapfuma Vanonyimwa Mukana weKubvisa Mari yeChibatiso
text: Mumwe mukuru mukuru muhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika nedare remakurukota, VaDouglas Tapfuma, vamiswa pamberi pedare ramejasitiriti nhasi vachipomerwa mhosva nhatu dzehuori. Muchuchisi wenyaya iyi, VaCharles Muchemwa, vaudza dare kuti VaTapfuma vakashandisa masimba avo zvisirizvo pavakakonzeresa kutengwa kwemotokari nomwe kubva kuSouth Africa dziri muzita rehurumende asi vakazodzishandisa sedzavo. VaMuchemwa vati motokari dzose idzi dzakakonzera kuti hurumende irasikirwe nemari inoita madhora ekuAmerica zviuru gumi nechimwe nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matatu nenhanhatu (US$11 936) sezvo pasina kubhadharwa mari yekupinza motokari idzi munyika kana kuti import duty. Rimwe remagweta aVaTapfuma, VaEsau Mandipa, vaudza dare pavanga vachikumbira mukana wekuti musungwa abhadhariswe mari yechibatiso kuti VaTapfuma vari kuramba mhosva yavari kupomerwa sezvo vachiti motokari idzi ndedzehurumende sezvo mapepa ekuti dzisabhadhare mari yekupinzwa munyika akasainwa nemunyori mukuru muhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika pamwe nedare remakurukota, VaMisheck Sibanda. Mupurisa ari kuferefeta nyaya iyi achishanda nekomisheni inorwisa huori yeZimbabwe Anti Corruption Commission, VaTimothy Guta, vaudzawo dare kuti VaTapfuma havafanire kubuditswa muhusungwa sezvo vachiti vachiri kuvaferefetwe nenyaya yekupinzwa kwedzimwe motokari munyika dzinodarika zana vachishandisa chinzvimbo chavo zvisirizvo. Vati VaTapfuma, avo vave Chief Director Monitoring and Evaluation kuhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika, vanogona kuvhiringidzana nevafakazi vasina kudomwa mudare uye vanogona kusazomirira kana vakapihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso sezvo vachiti humbowo huri kuvaroverera huri fararira. Asi mutongi wedare, VaHosea Mujaya, vatura mutongo wekuti VaTapfuma varambe vari muhusungwa sezvo vachiti vanogona kuvhiringidzana nevafakazi zvisinei nekuti havachashanda kuState House. Zvaturwa nedare zvatsinhirwa nerimwe remagweta aVaTapfuma, VaValentine Mutatu. VaMutatu vati vave kukwidza nyaya iyi kumatare epamusoro. VaMujaya vati VaTapfuma vadzoke musi wa15 Nyamavhuvhu pachaenderera nyaya iyi Mberi. VaTapfuma vakambodomwawo munyaya yehuori kukambani yemarasha yeWankie Colliery uko kunonzi kwakashayikwa mamiriyoni matanhatu emadhora ekuAmerica. VaTapfuma ndivo vave musungwa wechipiri anove mukuru muhurumende asungwa nenyaya yehuori kubva pakagadzwa komisheni itsva yeZacc nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa musi waChivabvu 30, 2019. Asi MDC yakaburitsa mashoko ekuti komisheni iyi, iyo inotungamirwa naAmai Loice Matanda Moyo, vanove mudzimai wegurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, haina mazino. VaMoyo, ndivo vakabuda pachivhitivhiti muna Mbudzi 2017 vachizivisa nyika kuti mauto ainge opindira mune zvematongerwo enyika zvakazokonzeresa kuti vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vasiye basa. No media source currently available

headline: Kushungurudzwa kweVabva Kure Kwoenderera Mberi muSouth Africa
text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveSouth Africa zviri kuenderera mberi zvichityidzira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe nezvekune dzimwe nyika muzvipatara nemumisha inogara vazhinji. Izvi zviri kuitika kunyangwe hazvo mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, neChipiri vakashora zvikuru vamwe vanhu vemuSouth Africa vari kuratidzira pane zvimwe zvipatara, vachidzivirira kuti vabvakure varapiwe. VaRamaphosa vakaudza dare reparamende kuti maitiro aya anokonzera kuvengwa nekurwiswa kwevabvakure uye haasi pamutemo. Vakati South Africa inyika ine hutongo hwejekerere asi ine dambudziko revabvakure vane magwaro ekugara munyika iyi nevasina, vachiti kuvhundutsira nekushungurudza vabvakure vose hakubvumidzwi nemutemo wenyika. . Chikwta chinonzi Operation Dudula chiri kuratidzira pachipatara che Kalafong, muguta reAtteridgerville riri pedyo neguta re Pretoria, chichirambidza kupinda muchipatara kwevarwere vasiri zvizvarwa zvenyika iyi. Asi VaRamaphosa vakati mapurisa ari kurwisa kupedza nekumisa vabvakure vari muSouth Africa zvisiri pamutemo, vachiti zviri kuitwa nevanhu veOperation Dudula hazvienderani nezvinangwa zvehutongo hwe jekerere, vachiti vanhu vemuSouth Africa havavengi vabvakure uye vanovatambira zvakanaka. Vanodzidzisa zvematongerwo enyika paWellesley College kuMassachusetts, Muzvinafundo Chipo Dendere, vanoti VaRamaphosa vakamanikidzwa kutaura izvi zvichitevera mabasa esangano reOperation Dudula. Muzvinafundo Dendere vanoti nyaya iyi inogona kupedzwa nenhaurirano pakati pehurumende yeSouth Africa nehurumende yeZimbabwe, pamwe nemapato anopikisa nevamwe vane chekuita nezve magariro evanhu mu Zimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vomira naVaKasukuwere kuMashonaland West
text: Kusawirirana kuri muZanu PF kwabuda zvakare mudunhu reMashonaland West uko dzimwe dzinoti dziri kuti hachisi chokwadi kuti vakatora danho rekuti mukokeri wemisangano mubato, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, vamiswe basa. Vachitaura neMuvhuro zvichitevera mashoko ekuti dunhu reMashonaland West pamwe nemamwe matunhu mashanu anoti Harare, Midlands, Masvingo, Bulawayo pamwe neMashonaland Central akatora danho rekuti VaKasukuwere vambomiswa basa mubato nekuti vari kutadza kufambisa basa ravo nemazvo, mutevedzeri wasachigaro muMashonaland West, VaKieth Guzah, vanoti danho richatorwa nemusiwe Chitatu apo pachaitwa musangano wedunhu. Vachipindura mubvunzo wekuti ainge ari manyepo here ekuti vakaita musangano, VaGuzah vadzambadzamba vakati havana kusununguka kupindura asi kungoti vanoda kuziva chokwadi vauye kuzozvinzwirwa vega nemusiweChitatu kubva kuna sachigaro. Asi mashoko ari kubuda anoratidza kuti hapana musangano wakagarwa neSvondo kana rimwe zuva wakakabuda nechisungo chakadaro sezvo nhengo dzepamusoro dzataura neStudio7 dzaramba kuti hapana musangano wakaitwa kunze kwekuti pane gwaro renyunyuto iro vakasaina. Nhengo idzi, idzo dzaramba kudomwa nemazita dzinoti dunhu ravo richaita musangano neChitatu apo pachaitwa zvisungo zvakawanda kwete chisungo chimwe chete sezviri kufungidzirwa. Zvinonzi pane nhengo dzinosvika makumi matatu nesere kubva munhengo makumi mashanu dzakawirirana nepfungwa yekuti VaKasukuwere vambomiswa basa. Asi imwe nhengo yedunhu inoti hazvisi pamutemo kuti VaKasukuwere vamiswe basa neboka (structure) repasi sezvo vari nhengo yebazi guru rePolitiburo neCentral Committee. Nhengo iyi inoti bato reZanu PF rikabvumira kuti VaKasukuwere vadzingwe mumusangano nevanhu vari pasi, ibviro bviro dzakaipa sezvo zvinoita kuti vanhu vamwe chete vazofuma mumwe musi vachiti havachada mutungamiri webato, VaRobert Mugabe. VaKasukuwere vanoti havana mashoko ekutaura panyaya iyi ndokubva vaseka zvavo. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna sachigaro weZanu PF kuMashonaland West. Zvinonzi zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka mubato reZanu PF kubva mugore ra2014 apo dzimwe nhengo dzinosanganisira vaimbove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru, VaDydmus Mutasa naVa Rugare Gumbo nemasachigaro ematunhu, vakadzingwa mubato. Kudzingana uku kwakaenderera mberi mwedzi wapera apo nhengo dzemadzimai dzinosanganisira mutevedzeri wasachigaro wemadzimai, Amai Sandi-Moyo, pamwe nemubati wehomwe yemadzimai, Amai Sarah Mahoka, vakabviswa pazvigaro vachipomerwa mhoswa yehuori nekuda kubvisa Amai Grace Mugabe pachigaro chavo. Kurwisana kuri kuitika muZanu PF kunonzi kuri kukonzerwa nenyaya yekuti ndiyani achatora chigaro chaVaMugabe kana vabva pamasimba. Izvi zvakonzera kuti pave nezvikwata zviviri zviri kurwira masimba, che Team Lacoste, neche Generation 40. Vanoziva zviri kuitika muZanu PF vanoti Team Lacoste iri kutsigira mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri venyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ukowo G40 ichinzi ine vanhu vanosanganisira Amai Mugabe, VaKasukuwere mbune, VaJonathan Moyo nevamwe. Asi hapana kujeka kuti ndiyani chaizvo ari kutungamira G40, izvo zviri kuita kuti chikwata ichi chibvumburudzwe pari zvino ne Teamn Lacoste. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti kushaya mutungamiri wechikwata che G40 kuri kuitawo kuti nhengo dziri kutungamira chikwata ichi dziite zvechibhubhubhu, kungorova bhora zvisina musoro. No media source currently available

headline: Masangano Akazvimirira Ogunun'una neMitero Yobhadhariswa Mumamwe Matunhu
text: Mamwe masangano anoshanda akazvimiriri kana kuti maNGO’s anoti haasi kufara nemari yavari kubhadhariswa nemakanzuru kuti vashande munzvimbo dziri pasi pemakanzuru. Imwe yemakanzuru mudunhu reMashonaland West, yeMakonde yakazivisa nezuro kuti masangano ose anoda kushanda munzvimbo mavo vanofanirwa kubhadhara madhora zana ekuAmerica uye vagara vachishanda vanofanirwa kubhadhara madhora makumi mashanu pamusoro pekuwana gwaro rinovabvumira kushanda kana kuti Memorandum Of Understanding-MOU. Vanoshanda mukanzuru yeMakonde mubazi rinodyidzana nemasangano akazvimirira Amai Geytta Moyo vanobvuma kuti vose vanoda kushandira munzvimbo iri pasi pekanzuru yavo inosanganisa Chinhoyi, Mhangura neMakonde vanofanirwa kubhadhara mari iyi vasati vatanga kuita mabasa avanenge vakabvumirana navo. Sachigaro weZimRights mudunhu reMashonaland West VaAdrian Zarimba vanoti havasi kufara nedanho ratorwa nekanzuru yeMakonde vachiti hazvisi pamutemo. Makanzuru ekunemamwe mutunhu makuru akaita seMidlands anonzi ari kubhadharisawo mari dzekushanda munzvimbo asi dzinenge dzichingodaidzwa nemazita akasiyana. Nhengo yerimwe sangano rinoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwezviwanikwa zvemunzvimbo asina kuda kuzivikanwa nezita anoti zviri kuita makanzuru hazvisi pamutemo. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nemukuru weZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum, VaMusa Kika avo vanoti chekutanga ndechekuti kunyange maMOU ari kudiwa nemakanzuru haasi pamutemo uye mari dziri kutaurwa hazvisi pamutemo zvakare. VaKika vanoti mari dziri kudiwa nemakanzuru inzira yekutsvaka mari zvisiri pamutemo. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemukuru weCentre for Natural Resource Governance VaFarai Maguwu vanoti mamwe makanzuru ari kubhadharisa masangano akazvimirira nechinangwa chekuda kuti varegere kushanda. Asi mamwe makanzuru akaita seBindura anoti vanongoda wirirano yeMOU chete kuti sangano rishande munzvimbo yavo. Gurukota redunhu reMidlands VaLarry Mavima vakamboudza Studio 7 kuti munyika mune masangano akazvimirira oga akawandisa vachiti ngavaende kuUkraine kune vanhu vanoda ruyamure sezvo kuine hondo. Kunyange mubatanidzwa wemasangano anoshanda akazvimiririra weNational Association of Non Governmental Organisation-NANGO- richiti pane masangano anosvika chiuru chimwechete akanyoresa nesangano ravo, VaMavhima vakati masangano akazvimiririra ega zviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu kana kuti 36 000 arikushanda munyika yose. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Vokurudzira VaTrump Kusaita Zvemangoromera
text: No media source currently available Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakakatyamadza vanhu vakawanda pasi rose nemusi weChina nekushora kwavakaita mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica, VaDonald Trump, vachiti vanofanira kukurudzira runyararo pasi rose kwete kuda kuita zvemangoromera. VaMugabe vakataura mashoko aya kuNew York muAmerica kumusangano mukuru wepagore weUnited Nations General Assembly, UNGA. Mutungamiri wenyika haana kutaura nezvenyaya dzezvirango zvavanoti zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nyaya inova yange yave rwiyo rwavo kumusangano uyu. VaMugabe vakati hapana chakaipa kuti VaTrump vazviridzire hwamanda asi vakati inofanira kunge ichitaura nezverunyararo pasi rose. VaTrump vakasiya vamwe vatungamiri venyika dzepasi rose vasina neremuromo mushure mekunge vayambira North Korea kuti vaigona kuiparadza ikaramba ichipinda nemwenje mudziva ichisvokosva America neshamwari dzayo nekupota ichivhundutsira nekukanda zvombo zvemuchadenga. Mutungamiri weAmerica akatsoropodzawo Iran, Venezuela nedzimwe nyika dzavakati hadziremekedze kodzero dzevanhu. VaMugabe vakasetsa vamwe vatungamiri mudare iri apo vakafananidza VaTrump naGoriyati wemubhaibheri anongoziva kushandisa chisimba. Vakatyorazve vanhu mbabvu apo vakati VaTrump vanofanira kuridza havo hwamanda yavo asi vachiita izvi mukuunza runyararo munyika dzepasi rose. VaMugabe vakashorawo America nekubuda muchibvumirano chakanangana nekuchengetedza mamiriro ekunze cheParis Climate Agreement. Asi VaMugabe vakati Zimbabwe haisi kuzongorega nyika dzakabudirira idzi dzichityora zvisungo zvechibvumirano ichi. VaMugabe vakatiwo Zimbabwe ine hukama hwakanaka nesangano reUnited Nations asi vakati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti bazi rakakosha reUnited Nations Security Council rivandudzwe. Dare reSecurity Council rine nyika shanu chete dzisingabude mudare iri uye dzine masimba ekuchinja zvinhu dzinoti Russia, America, China, France neBritain, uye nyika gumi dzisina masimba dzinoita majanho kugara mudare iri kwemakore maviri. Panyika gumi idzi pane nyika nhatu chete dzemuAfrica dzinoti Ethiopia, Senegal neEgypt. Asi Africa nedzimwe nyika dzinoda kuti nyika dziri mudare iri dzine masimba ekuchinja zvinhu dziwedzerwe kubva pashanu dziripo. Sachigaro weMDC-T muAmerica, VaDen Moyo, vashora zvikuru VaMugabe vachiti vanoda kupindira nyaya dzisinei neZimbabwe uye vanoshora vatungamiri vavanoti vanotyora kodzero dzevanhu asi ivo kunyika kwavo vasingaremekedze vanovapikisa uye vachitonga nedemo. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa naMuzvare Tsitsi Chiriseri, chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe icho chakaratidzira muNew Yorl chichishora matongero aVaMugabe. Muzvare Chiriseri vanoti muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi nekuti dai VaMugabe vaiita zvavanotaura, dai Zimbabwe isiri mukanwa mamupere. Asi mumwe muzvinafundo paMalone University kuOhio muAmerica, VaMoses Rumano, vanoti vafadzwa zvikuru nemashoko aVaMugabe ekutsiura VaTrump. Kunyange hazvo zvakabuda pachena kuti VaMugabe vakange vachinetsekana nekufamba pavakange vachienda kunotura mashoko avo kudare reGeneral Assembly, vakawanda vanoti vange vachiratidza kuti hutano hwavo huri nani. Musangano weUNGA uyu ndewechimakumi manomwe nembiri.

headline: Kupararira kweCoronavirus Kune Vasina Kubuda muNyika Kwotemesa VanaChiremba Musoro
