text: Mumwe chiremba Dr Edgar Munatsi vanoti vanhu vanofanira kungwarira zvikuru kupararira kwave kuita chirwere checoronavirus munyika zvikuru kune vanhu vasina nhoroondo yekumbobuda munyika kana kusangana nevane chirwere ichi vanozivikanwa. Dr Munatsi vanoti kurwara kwevanhu kuMhondoro, Mrewa neChegutu vasina nhoroondo yekushanya kunze kwenyika idambudziko guru chaizvo zvinogona kuti hurumende haisi kuita zvakakwana kuvheneka hutachiona uhu. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muZimbabwe hwasvika pamakumi matatu nematanhatu kana kuti 36. Vanhu vapora kubva muchirwere ichi vapfumbamwe uye vafa vachiri vana. Tichiri panya iyi, huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni mana nezvuru mazana mana kana kuti 4,1 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere. Vanhu vafa vave kuda kwechirwere ichi vadarika zvuru mazana maviri zvine makumi masere nematatu 283, 000. Asi pavanhu ava vapora ndivo vakawanda vanosvika miriyoni imwe chete nezvuru mazana mana kana kuti 1, 4 million. Mashoko atumirwawo Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kubazi rezvehutano resangano iri reAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zvuru makumi matanhatu nematatu, 63, 000 vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muAfrica uye vashaya zvuru zviviri nemazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe  2, 290. Vapona vanosvika zvuru makumi maviri nechimwe 21, 000. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanobudirira Mukurwira Chigaro cheMutevedzeri weMutungamiri weZanu PF
text: Mutungamiri weZanu PF, VaRobert Mugabe, vadoma vatevedzeri vavo vaviri pamwe nenhengo dzekomiti yepamusoro soro yebato ravo. Sezvanga zvakatarisirwa nevazhinji, VaMugabe vadoma vanga vari munyori wezvemitemo mubato, uye vari gurukota rezvemitemo muhurumende, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuva mutevedzeri wavo wekutanga. VaMnangagwa vanga vachirwira chinzvimbo ichi nevange vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato vakatadza kupinda mu Central Committee, Amai Joice Mujuru. VaMugabe vakadzinga Amai Mujuru muhurumende nemusi weMuvhuro manheru. Munhu apihwa chigaro chemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wechipiri, ndiVaReport Phelekezela Mphoko, avo vakamboshanda semumiri weZimbabwe kune dzimwe nyika. Munyori wezvemashandiro emabasa mutsva ndiVa Ignatius Chombo. Izvi zvinoreva kuti pahukuru mubato, VaChombo vava munhu wechinhanho chechina kubva kuna VaMugabe, VaMnangagwa naVaMphoko. Murongi mutsva wemisangano ndiVaSavior Kasukuwere, ukuwo VaObert Mpofu vari munyori wezvemari. Basa rekudzivirirwa kwenyika mubato rapihwa VaKembo Mohadi, mutauriri webato mutsva ari VaSimon Khaya Moyo, avo vanga vari sachigaro. VaMugabe vabvisa chinzvimbo chasachigaro, vachiti basa iri rinogona kuitwa nevatevedzeri vavo vaviri. Munyori wezvemitemo mutsva ndiVaPatrick Chinamasa, ukuwo munyori wezvekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu ari Muzvare Oppah Muchinguri. Munyori wezvehumhizha mubato ndiVaJonathan Moyo, ukuwo VaSydney Sekeramayi vari munyori anoona nezvevakarwira rusununguko. VaMugabe vadoma mapazi makumi maviri nerimwe, uye vamwe vanyori vanosanganisira mudzimai wavo, Amai Grace Mugabe, vachange vari mukuru wezvemadzimai mubato. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, uye vachidzidzisa zvematongerwo enyika paHuddersfield University ku Britain, VaNkululelo Sibanda, vanoti hapana zvinoshamisa pavanhu vadoma naVaMugabe sezvo VaMnangagwa vagara vachida kutora chigaro chaVaMugaro. Ukuwo imwe nyanzvi inoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, Muzvare Gladys Hlatshwayo, vanoti VaMugabe havana kubata zvakanaka vanhukadzi pakuvapa mapazi ekutungamira mubato. VaMugabe vadoma madzimai matanhatu kuti vatungamiri mapazi ebato, ukuwo vanhurumende vachitungamira mapazi gumi nemashanu. No media source currently available No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kutaura neIzwi Rimwe Chete paNyaya yeCovid-19
text: Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzehutano, reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende itaure nezwi rimwe chete panyaya yekubayiwa kwevanhu nhomba yeCovid-19 uye kuti inopinda munyika riini. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pamwe nemutevedzeri vavo, uye ari gurukota rezvehutano, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vakazivisa nyika nezuro, China, kuti vanhu vachabayiwa nhomba iyi pachena sezviri kuitwa kune nyika dzakawanda. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko anopesana ainge ataurwa negurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, avo vakamboti vanhu vachabhadhariswa mari yenhomba, asi vakazobuda vachiti vatori venhau vainge vasina kubata mashoko avo nemazvo. Kunyange hazvo VaNcube vakabuda vachipikisa zvainge zvaburitswa nesangano enhau, pane vhidhiyo iri kuburitsa VaNcube mbune vachiti mushonga uyu uchange uchitengeswa. Asi VaNcube vakazoti nhomba iyi ichapihwa vainoida pachena. Izvi ndizvo zviri kunzi naVaRusike hurumende inofanirwa kutaura neizwi rimwe chete zvikuru panyaya yakakosha kudai. No media source currently available

headline: Boka rePlatform of Concerned Citizens, PCC, Roronga Musangano weKuzeya Mamiriro eZVinhu Munyika
text: Vatungamiri vemapato ose ezvematongerwo enyika vari kutarisirwa kusangana nemusi weChina muHarare kumusangano wekuzeya matambudziko ari munyika pamwe nekutsvaga nzira dzingashandiswa kuti paumbwe hurumende ichafanobata matomu, kana kuti National Transitional Authority. Vamwe vari kutarisirwa kupinda musangano uri kukokerwa nePlatform of Concerned Citizens (PCC) uyu vamiriri vemasangano akazvimirira, vadzidzi, vechidiki pamwe nemadzimai. Mumwe wevari kuronga musangano uyu, Doctor Ibbo Mandaza vanoti chinangwa chemusangano wavo ndechekunzwa pfungwa dzevanhu pamusoro mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika. "Musangano wacho tadaidzira kuti tione kuti maZimbabweans senyika vanoti chiinenyaya ye crisis yatatarisana nayo senyika yeZimbabwe. Ndo main purpose yedu yemusangano wemusi weChina," Doctor Mandaza vanodaro. Vanoti nyaya yekuti ndiani achatora masimba kana VaMugabe vachinge vasiya chigaro iri kunetsa, saka boka ravo riri kuda kudzivirira mhere nekuurayana kuburikidza nekuumbwa kwe National Transitional Authority. "Inenge iri nguva yekuti makore maviri or 18 months,vanhu vagara pasi vaine National Transitional Authority yevanhu vasiri ma politicians asi vanhu vakanangana nekuti nyika ipore." Vanoti kusvika pari zvino vatungamiri vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika vazivisa kuti vachange vari pamusangano uyu vanosanganisira VaTendai Biti vePeople’s Democtratic Party, VaDumiso Dumiso Dabengwa vebato reZapu pamwe naVaSimba Makoni veMavambo/Kusile/Dawn. Asi Doctor Mandaza vanoti havasati vanzwa kubva kumapato anoti MDC T yaVaMorgan Tsvangirai, Zimbabwe People First yaAmai Joice Mujuru, pamwe neZanu PF inotungamirirwa naVaRobert Mugabe. Asi mutauriri weMDC-T VaObert Gutu vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo harisi kukwanisa kuve pamusangano uyu sezvo pari zvino riri kumbonangana nekurwisa kuti mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo ivandudzwe riri pasi pemubatanidzwa weNERA. Ukuwo mutauriri weZimbabwe People First, VaJealousy Mawarire vatiwo mutungamiri webato ravo Amai Mujuru havakwanisi kunge vari pamusangano uyu nemusi weChina sezvo vachisimuka kuenda kuSouth Africa zuva iroro kumusangano wavari kuronga kuita neMugovera. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kudivi reZanu PF kana VaMugabe vachabudirira kunge varipo pamusangano uyu. No media source currently available

headline: Mapazi eHurumende Onakurirana Nyoka Mhenyu neSakunda paMabhiriyoni eCommand Agriculture Akatsakatika
text: Grain Marketing Board (GMB) nhasi yaudza komiti yeparamende inoona nezvekushandiswa kwemari yehurumende yePublic Accounts Committee (PAC) kuti yainge isineyi nechekuita nechirongwa chehurumende cheCommand Agriculture ichiti Sakunda Holdings ndiyo yaitungamira chirongwa ichi. Izvi zvinopokana nezvakataurwa neveReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, bazi rezvemari nebazi rezvekurima avo vakaudza paramende kuti GMB ndiyo yakapihwa mari yechirongwa cheCommand Agriculture. Komiti yePAC iri kuongorora mashandisirwo akaitwa mabhiriyoni emadhora nehurumende pachirongwa cheCommand Agriculture zvisina mvumo yeparamende. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa muGMB, VaClemence Guta, vaudza PAC, kuti basa reGMB raive rekuchengeta nekupa varimi mbeu, fotereza nezvimwe zvaishandiswa pachirongwa icho vati chaitungamirwa neSakunda Holdings. Asi sachigaro vekomiti iyi, VaTendai Biti, nevamwe vavo varatidza kusafara nemhinduro iyi vachiti semuenzaniso, vaive munyori mukuru mubazi rezvemari, VaRingison Chitsiko, vakaudza komiti yavo kuti vainge vasingazive kuti mari inosvika mamiriyoni mazana masere nemakumi mana nemanomwe yakapihwa nehurumende kutsigira mabasa ekurima muna 2017 yainge yashandiswei vachiti GMB ndiyo yaiziva kuti mari iyi zvakaitika. Asi VaGuta pamwe nevakafanoba chigaro chemukuru anoona nezvemari muGMB, Amai Constansia Dzenga, vati havana chavanoziva pamusoro penyaya iyi vachiti ivo vaingo tambira mbeu nefotereza zvaiuyakumatura avo vachizviendesa kuvarimi. Vati havana kana gwaro ravakasaina reCommand Agriculture vachiti Sakunda, nechikamu chaiona nezveCommand Agriculture mubazi rezvekurima ndivo vaiziva zvaitika. Amai Dzenga vati nekuda kwaizvozvo havatomboziva kuti zvinhu zvavaichengeta zvaiita marii sezvo zvange zvisiri zvinhu zvavo. Panyaya yekuti GMB yakapihwa mari inosvika bhiriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti $1.3 billion muna 2017 na2018 kuti itsigire mabasa ekurima, VaGuta vati pane musiyano pamari dziri kutaurwa idzi pamwe nedzavakawana. Amai Dzenga vatiwo semuenzaniso muna 2018 vakapihwa mamiriyoni mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti $900 million kwete bhiriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti $1.3 billion iri kutaurwa. Imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, VaMarko Raidza vati zvinonetsa kutambira zvinoitaurwa nevakuru vakuru veGMB pasina humbowo. Asi VaBiti zviri kutika kuGMB ishura chairo uye zviri pachena kuti zvinhu zvakaita manyama amire nerongo mukambani iyi. Vati komiti yavo inogona kuti kambani iyi iongororwe zvakanyanya kana kuti Forensic Audit nekuti zvinhu hazvisi fambiswa negwara chairo. Dzimwe nhengo dzekomiti iyi dzati kuti nyaya iyi inatsobuda pachena, GMB, RBZ, bazi rezvemari pamwe nerekurima vanofanirwa kubvunzurudzwa pamwe chete kuti pasaite kukandirana nyika mhenyu. Pane mari inodarika mabhiriyoni mapfumbabwe emadhora yakashandiswa zvisvina mvumo yeparamende pachirongwa cheCommanda Agriculture uye PAC iri kuita ongororo yekuti marii iyi yakashandiswa sei. Kambani yeSakunda inotarisirwa kumira pamberi pekomiti iyi munguva pfupi inotevera. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHutano Dzokurudzira Veruzhinji Kukoshesa Mitemo Inodzivirira Kupararira kweCovid-19
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neSvondo kuti hapana munhu akashaya nekuda kweCovid-19 uye vanhu gumi nemumwe, kana kuti 11, ndivo vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi kubva pavanhu mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nevashanu, kana kuti 535, vakavhenekwa nyika yose. Izvi zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nedenda iri kubva parapinda munyika gore rapera muna Kurume vave zviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu zvine mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nemumwe, kana kuti 36 271. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga vakasvika pachiuru nemazana mana nemakumi masere nevashanu, kana kuti 1 485, kuchitiwo huwandu hwevanhu vapona kubva kuCovid-19 hwakasvika pazviuru makumi matatu nezvitatu zvine mazana masere nemakumi matatu nevana, kana kuti 33 834. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisawo kuti vashandi vari pamberi mukurwisana neCovid-19 vanosvika mazana maviri nemakumi maviri nevatanhatu, kana kuti 226, vakabaiwa nhomba yeSinopharm, yekudzivirira hutachiwana hunokonzera Covid-19. Izvi zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabaiwa nhomba iyi kubva zvatanga chirongwa ichi pazviuru makumi matatu nezviviri zvine mazana maviri nemakumi mana, kana kuti 32 240. Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano pamwe nemapurisa vanoti vari kushushikana zvikuru nehuwandu hwevanhu vasiri kutevedzera mitemo yekudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana yakatarwa neW-H-O pamwe nebazi rezvehutano kubva pakanyevenutswa mutemo we lockdown svondo rapera. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano uye vari munyori anoona nezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vanoti lockdown yakabatsira chose kuderedza huwandu hwevari kubatwa neCovid-19. Asi vanoti panofanirwa kuramba paine dzidziso pamusoro penzira dzekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri kunyange hazvo mitemo yakanyevenutswa. Svondo rapera mapurisa akazivisa kuti kusvika neChishanu chapfuura vanhu vaidarika zviuru zvishanu vakanga vasungwa kubva musi wa 01 nemhosva yekusapfeka zvivharangozi,kana kuti ma mask, danho rinonzi nemapurisa vari kushushikana naro. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe, kana kuti 3,9 million, vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vadarika zviuru zana nezvishanu rine mazana manomwe nemakumi maviri nevaviri, kana kuti 105, 722. Vapora muAfrica vadarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 3, 5 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere che coronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni zana negumi nematanhatu nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe, kana kuti 116, 9 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica, iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose, inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa muAmerica vanodarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nezvishanu, kana kuti kuti 525, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemasere ane zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 28, 9 million. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 2,5 million. Asi vapora pasi rose vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu nematanhatu kana kuti 66, million. No media source currently available

headline: Homwe yeItai Dzamara Trust Yoparurwa
text: Komiti iri kutungamira hurongwa hwekutsigira mhuri yemurwiri wekodzero akatsakatika, VaItai Dzamara, inoti neChipiri muHarare iri kuparura homwe yeItai Dzamara Trust, iyo inonzi ichange ichi batsira mhuri dzose dzinosangana nematambudziko akafanana neakawira VaDzamara. Sachigaro wekomiti iyi, Bishop Ancelimo Magaya vanoti vachashandisawo mukana uyu kutsvagirawo mhuri yaVaDzamara rubatsiro rwekuti mudzimai pamwe nevana vaVaDzamara vakwanise kurarama. VaDzamara vave nemwedzi mitanhatu vapambwa kubva mumusha weGlen View muHarare nevarume vasingazivikanwi, uye kusvika pari nhasi hapana anoziva kwavari. Bishop Magaya kunyange hazvo pave nemwedzi mitanhatu VaDzamara vapambwa, denga nenyika hazvisi kuzonyarara kuti vakazviita izvi vafunge kuti zvichangotsakatika. “Iko zvino izvi takazvipira chaizvo chaizvo kuti eeh, munhu weZimbabwe akasikwa nemufananidzo waMwari ane kodzero yehupenyu,” vanodaro Bishop Magaya. Zvichakadaro, vaimbova nhengo yeZanu PF vachimirira Hurungwe West mudare reparamende, VaTemba Mliswa vanonzi vapa mhuri yekwaDzamara tani rimwe chete rechibage kuti ibatsirikane. No media source currently available

headline: Guta reHarare Rotarisira Mibhedha Inodarika Mazana Matanhatu Ichashndiswa neVarwere veCovid-19
text: Hurumende inoti kutanga svondo rinouya dunhu reHarare richange rave nemibhedha mitsva inodarika mazana matanhatu muzvipatara zveveruzhinji, uye mibhedha makumi mana nemiviri ichange iri mibhedha yevaye vanorwara zvakanyanya kana kuti vanenge vaiswa muchikamu cheIntensive Care Unit, (ICU). Izvi zvaziviswa nemutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, Dr John Mangwiro, mushure mekushanyira zvimwe zvipatara zvichange zvichirapa varwere veCovid-19, zvakaita seParirenyatwa, Wilkins neBeatrice Infectious Diseases Hospital. VaMangwiro, avo vange vaine gurukota redunhu reHarare, VaOliver Chidhau, vati vari kufara chose negadziriro iri kuitwa pachipatara cheParirenyatwa icho chichange chave chipatara chikuru chinorapa Covid-19 munyika yose. VaMangwiiro vati pane zvinhu zvishomanana zvakatengwa kuSouth Africa zviri kusvika mukupera kwesvondo uye svondo rinouya, chipatara ichi chinenge chave kutambira varwere veCovid 19. Parirenyatwa ichange iine mibhedha mazana mana nemakumi mashanu uye makumi maviri nemisere inenge iri yeICU. Wilkins, iyo iri kurapa varwere veCovid 19, ine mibhedha makumi matanhatu nemumwe chete, mishanu iri yeICU. Kana ichinge yapera kugadzirwa, Beatrice ichange yave nemibhedha makumi masere, gumi iri yeICU. Dr Mangwiro vati chinofadza ndechekuti kuParirenyatwa neWilkims michina inobatsira varwere kufema kana kumaVentilators, atoveko. PaParirenyatwa vashandi vange vari mushishi rekugadzira mipanda kuchikamu cheCovid-19 uye zvinhu zvizhinji zvatove muWard. Vakuru vepachipatara ichi vati pane zvavakamirira kubva kuSouth Africa zvekuisa mumaTheatres nemaLabaoratories zvekuti svondo rinouuya chipatara ichi chinenge chave kurapa pamwe nekuvheneka hutachiwana hweCoronavirus, Mukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Dr Proper Chonzi, vaudza Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo chipatara chavo cheWilkins chave kukwanisa kurapa varwere veCovid -19, vachiri kuda zvekushandisa zvakawanda. Pavanhu vese makumi matatu nevanomwe vakakabatwa neCovid 19, makumi mashanu vakarapwa paWilkins, uye pavana vakafa, vaviri vakafira pachipatara ichi. Pari zvino paWilkins pane murwere mumwe weCovid 19 ari pachipatara ichi. Gurukota redunhu reHarare , VaOliver Chidhau, vati vangafara chose kana pakava nemibhedha inodarika chiuru yakamirira varwere beCovid -19 chete mudunhu ravo rese. Kunyange hazvo zvipatara zviri kuhadzirwa kuti zvikwanise kurapa Covid-19, Dr Mangwiro vati kana chirwere ichi chikaparira zvakanyanya, vachashandisa nhandare dzenhabvu nemimwe mitambo, nezvivakwa zvakaita semachechi kurapira varwere veCovid-19. Zimbabwe, senyika dzakawanda pasi rose, yakavharwa senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiona hwe corona virus, uhwo hunokonzera chirwere che Covid-19. Kusvika pari zvino, chirwere ichi, icho chakatanga kuChina gore rapera, chabata vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mana nemazana mana ezviuru, uye chauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvisere pasi rose. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi veHurumende Votadza Kutevedzera Kurudziro yeKuramwa Mabasa
text: Vashandi vehurumende vakawanda nhasi vanga vari kumabasa munyika yose kunyange hazvo rimwe remasangano anomirira vashandi ava reZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions, kana kuti Zicopstu, ranga raita kurudziro yekuti vashandi varamwe mabasa nhasi nemagwana pamusana pekushomeka kwemari dzemihoro. Ongororo yaitwa neStudio muHarare yaratidza kuti mahofisi ehurumende mumapazi akasiyana-siyana, zvikoro pamwe nezvipatara zvanga zvizere vashandi zvisineni nekurudziro yakaitwa nesangano reZicopstu yekuti vasaende kumabasa kwemazuva maviri kutanga nhasi. Mune mamwe maguta akaita seBulawayo, Chinhoyi, Gweru, Mutare neMasvingo zvinonziwo zvange zviri zvimwechetezvo kunyangwe hazvo vamwe vashandi vashomanana vasina kuenda kumabasa. Mutauriri webazi rezvedzidzo VaTaungana Ndoro vaudza Studio 7 kuti varairidzi vange vari muzvikoro. Mumwe mushandi wehurumende wemuHarare uyo aramba kudomwa nezita nekuti haabvumidzwe kutaura nevatori venhau ati aenda kubasa sezvo achityira kuti anozobvisirwa mari kupera kwemwedzi kubva pamari shoma yaagara achitambira. Asi murongi wemisangano musangano reZicopstu, VaCharles Chinosengwa, vatiwo vafamba muzvikoro zvakawanda vakaona kuti varairidzi vane chitsama havana kuenda kumabasa. Asi vatenda kuti vashandi vazhinji vaenda kumabasa vachipomera vazhinji vevaenda kubasa ava mhosva yekuita zvehuori munzvimbo dzavanoshandira kuitira kuti vawane cheuviri sezvo mari dzavari kutambiriswa nehurumende dzisiri kuvakwanira pakuraramisa mhuri dzavo. Mutungamiri werimwe remasangano evarairidzi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaTakavafira Zhou, vati vashandi vehurumende vanofanira kutambiriswa nemari yekuAmerica uye hurumende haifaniri kungobvisira vashandi mari pasina tsanangudzo dzakakwana. VaZhou vati vane tarisiro yekuti hurumende ichagadzirisa nhuna dzevashandi vayo kunyange hazvo vashandi vakawanda vaenda kumabasa nhasi. Studio 7 yabatawo gurukota rezvevashandi Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima avo vati nhaurirano dzinofanira kuenderera mberi pakato pevashandi nehurumende. Nekune rumwe rutivi vashandi vehurumende vanotiwo hapana chiri kubuda kunhaurirano dzavari kuita kuNJNC uye vanoti kana vapedza hurongwa hwavo hwekuramwa mabasa kwemazuva maviri huchapera mangwana vachazokanda mapadza pasi zvachose muna Gunyana kana hurumende ikaramba yakaisa zvimiti munzeve isingavawedzere mari dzemihoro. Hurumende yakawedzera vashandi vayo mari nezvikamu zana kubva muzana mwedzi uno asi vashandi vanoti hurumende yakaita zvemusoro wayo isina kubvumirana anvo uye mari yavakapihwa haisi kuvakwanira pakatariswa kusamira zvakanaka kwakaita hupfumi hwenyika. Panyaya yekupa vashandi mari nemadhora ekuAmerica, gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakati hurumende haina mari yacho. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Yokurudzira Nhaurirano dzeMihoro Kuti Dziitwe Izvozvi
text: Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vari kukurudzira makambani ose kuti atange misangano nemasangano evashandi vachikurukura nyaya dzemihoro. Kurudziro yaVaMoyo inotevera kusawirirana pakati pehurumende, ZCTU nesangano revashandirwi reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, Emcoz, panyaya yekuti Tripartite Negotiating Forum itare mari inotambirwa nemushandi wepasi pasi kana kuti minimum wage. Asi VaMoyo vanoti kukwira kuri kuita mitengo yezvinhu kwave kupa kuti ZCTU ide kuti paitwe nhaurirano dzechimbi chimbi dzekugadzirisa nyaya dzemari yemihoro. No media source currently available Asi mutungamiri weEmcoz, Doctor Israel Murefu, vanoti mitengo iri kukwira hongu asi zvinogona kusaramba zvakadaro nekupindana kwenguva. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Gumi Vofa neCovid-19 neMugovera
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti nemusi weMugovera vanhu gumi vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya vafa nechirwere ichi vave chiuru chimwe chete nemazana matanhatu nematanhatu kana kuti 1, 666. Vanhu mazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatatu kana kti 293 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatatwa nacho vave zviuru makumi mana nechimwe zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri nevasere kana kuti 41, 628. Vanhu makumi maviri nevana vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvasiya vapora vave zviuru makumi matatu nemanomwe zvine zana nemakumi matanhatu nemanomwe kana kuti 37, 167. Vanhu vachiri kurwara nechirwere ichi vave zviuru zviviri zvine mazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu kana kuti 2, 795. Hurumende inoti nzvimbo dzave kunyanya kupararira chirwere ichi zvekuti dzinogona kuiswa mitemo yakati omei kuti vanhu vasafambe fambe dzinoti Karoi, Chirundu, Magunje, Mhangura, Chinhoyi, Chidamoyo kuMashonaland West, uyeChiredzi mudunhu reMasvingo. Dzimwe nzvimbo dzinoti Nkulumane, Emakhandeni nekunzvimbo dziri kumaodzanyemba kana kuti Northern Surbubs muguta reBulawayo, uye kuMt Darwin kuMashonaland West. Nzvimbo dzakaiswa mitemo yakaomarara kare kuyedza kumisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi dzinoti Kariba, Karoi, Makonde neKwekwe. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu zviuru mazana manomwe nechimwe zvine mazana matatu nemakumi mana nevasere kana kuti 701 348 vabayiwa nhomba yekudzvirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Vanhu zviuru mazana mana nemakumi matatu nevaviri zvine mazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe nevaviri kana kuti 432, 572 ndivo vabayiwa nhomba kechipiri sezviri kukurudzirwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana nhomba senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Enoch Mayida avo vaimbotungamira chipatara cheChitungwiza vanoti vanhu vanofanira kungwaria kubatwa nechirwere ichi vachikurudzira vanhu kuti vabayiwe nhomba. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi veKanzuru yeChitungwiza Vovhiringwa neChirwere cheCovid-19
text: Kanzuru yeChitungwoza inoti vashandi vayo vanomwe vakabatwa neCovid-19, uye vamwe makumi maviri nemumwe vari pavo vega mushure mekusangana nevanhu vane chirwere ichi. Vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori wekanzuru yeChitungwiza, Doctor Tonderai Kasu, vanoti izvi zvawedzera kuderera kwehuwandu hwevashandi veboka ravo rezvehutano zvekuti kanzuru yavo yamanikidzwa kuvhara kiriniki yayo yeSaint Mary’s. Dr Kasu vanoti mushandi mumwechete akatofa neCovid-19 mushure mekunge awanikwa aine chirwere ichi. Vashandi vekanzuru yeChitungwiza vaigara vachichemachema kuti havana zvekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwewre ichi zvakakwana, asi Doctor Kasu vanoti kanzuru yavo yanga ichiedza napose painogona napo kuti zvikwanisiro izvi zviwanikwe. Doctor Kasu vanoti kunyange hazvo vavhara kiriniki yeSaint Mary’s, ichange ichingobatsira varwere vanenge vachida kubatsirwa zvechimbichimbi chete, asi vamwe vose vanofanirwa kuenda kune dzimwe nzvimbo dzinenge dzakavhurwa vonobatsirwa ikoko. No media source currently available

headline: MDC yaVaChamisa Inoti VaMnangagwa Havana Kuzvipira paNyaya yeNhaurirano
text: Bato raMDC rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru nekusavimbika kwemutungamiri wenyika, uye vari mutungamiri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa panyaya yenhaurirano dzekugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nevana veZimbabwe, uye kuti munyika muve nekugadzikana. Mutauriri weMDC, VaJacob Mafume vanoti Hutungamiri hwebato ravo hwakaita musangano wemaawa matanhatu nezuro wekuzeya nezvenyaya yekuti munyika muve nenhaurirano iyi, hwakabuda nezvisungo zvakati kuti, zvinosanganisira kuyeuchidza VaMnangagwa kukosha kwekuti munyika muve nenhaurirano. Asi VaMafume vanoti bato ravo, sezvaragara richitaura, harisi kuzopinda munhaurirano dzisiri kukokerwa nemuyananisi asina divi raakarerekera, anovimbika, uye achitambirika. No media source currently available Studio 7 yakundikana kubata mutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaGeorge Charamba, kanawo mutauriri weZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya kuti tinzwewo pamire VaMnangagwa panyaya yenhaurirano iyi..

headline: Vanhu Makumi Mana neVaviri (42) Vofa muMavhiki Maviri muZimbabwe neCovid-19
text: Vanhu makumi mana nevaviri kana kuti 42 vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika, vamwe churu nemazana masere nemakumi mashanu nevasere kana kuti 1, 858 vachibatwa nechirwere ichi mukati memavhiki maviri adarika. Pamavhiki amaviri aya pane vanhu gumi nevanomwe vakabva kuSouth Africa vakabatwa nechirwere ichi. Izvi zviri kutemesa nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano musoro nekuti chirwere cheCovid-19 kuSouth Africa, Britain, France, Japan, Nigeria, Denmark, Canada, Italy, Lebanon, Netherlands, Singapore, Sweden ne Spain chatanga kuzvivanddza kana kuti mutate. Mhando yeCovid-19 itsva iyi inopararira zvakanyanya ichifungidzirwa kuti inobatawo zvakanyanya vana vadiki. Kamhando katsva aka kakatanga kutaurwa nezvako kuBritain musi wa 14 Zvita. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weSvondo kuti vanhu vasere vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika muvhiki rapera zvasiya vafa kubva zvakatanga chirwere ichi kupararira munyika vave mazana matatu nemakumi mana nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 349. Vanhu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi neSvondo izana negumi nevana kana kuti 114. Izvi zvinoreva kuti vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizvino vave zvuru gumi nezvitatu zvine manomwe nevanomwe kana kuti 13, 077. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvuru gumi nemazana mashanu ane makumi mapfumbamwe nematatu kana kuti 10, 593 zvichitevera kupora kwevamwe vanhu makumi manomwe nevana neSvondo. Vanhu vachiri kurwara vanosvika zvuru zviviri nezana nemakumi matatu nevashanu kana kuti 2,135. Vakawanda vari kurwara vari muHarare neBulawayo. Africa Covid-19 Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezvuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 2,6 million vabatwa nechirwere checovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zvuru makumi matanhatu nemaviri ane mazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu nematanhatu kana kuti 62, 366.  Vapora vadarika mamiriyoni maviri nezvuru mazatuna maviri kana kuti 2,2 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Dunhu reSADC ndirozve rine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete. Pasi Rose Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi masere nezvuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 80, 7 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zvuru mazana matatu zvine makumi matatu nematatu kana kuti 333, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 19 miillion. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 1,7 million. Asi vapora pasi rose vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi mana nemashanu ane zvuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 45, 6 million.

headline: VaGumbo Vanoti Vakazvipira Kudzokera kuZanu PF
text: Vaimbove mutauriri weZanu PF, VaRugare Gumbo, vanoti vakagadzirira kudzokera kuZanu PF, kana nhaurirano dziri kutungamirirwa nesangano revakarwa hondo reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association dzakapera zvakanaka. VaGumbo vanoti vakagara vari nhengo yeZanu PF, musangano wavanoti vakavamba, saka havatarisiri kuti vanoita dambudziko, zvikuru kudzokera musangano revakarwa hondo. VaGumbo vanoti kudzokera kuZanu PF ndiko kungatonetsa, asi vachiti zvakare hazvifanirwi kunetsa nekuti ivo vave kutonga vakambenge vadzingwawo mumusangano, asi vakadzokera zvisina dambudziko. Asi vanoti havasi kuzonyorera kuti vatambirwe muZanu PF vachiti vakawanda mune vatungamiri vave mumasimba vakanga vakadzingwawo muZanu PF, asi havana kunyorera kudzokera mubato iri. Mutemo weZanu PF unoti anenge adzingwa mumusangano kana oda kudzokera anofanirwa kutanga anyorera kuCentral Committee yebato, yozozeya nyaya yake. Svondo rapera nemusi weChina sangano revakarwa hondo rakakurudzira kuti VaGumbo, pamwe naVaDidymus Mutasa naVaJabulani Sibanda pamwe nevamwe vose vakadzingwa muZanu PF nevaive mutungamiri webato iri, VaRobert Mugabe muna 2014 vachinzi vaitsigira vaive mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika Amai Joice Mujuru. Dzimwe nhengo dzebato iri, kusanganisira mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, dzakazodzingwawo muZanu PF mumakore akatevera dzichipomerwa mhosva dzekupandukira VaMugabe. No media source currently available

headline: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chiri kuChina Chotaura nezveCoronavirus
text: Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri kushanda kuChina chinoti zvinhu hazvisati zvanaka munyika iyi sezvo vanhu vasati vobvumidzwa kufamba pamadiro nepamusoro pechirwere che coronavirus chanetsa munyika iyi. VaTinashe Bare, avo vanodzidzisa chirungu muguta reZhengzhou mudunhu reHenan kuChina kwakare, vanoti vari kubvumidzwa chete kubuda mudzimba kuitira kuti vanotenga chikafu, uye vanoenda kunotenga chikafu ichi vakachengetedzwa nevashandi vehurumende muguta reZhengzhou. VaBare vanoti hapana munhu wekuZimbabwe wavanoziva ati abatwa ne coronavirus, iyo yauraya vanhu vanodarika chiuru nemazana masere. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kugadzirisa Zvichemo zveVarairidzi Panguva Iyo Vashandi Vayo Vari Kuti Vave Kushanda Mazuva Maviri Chete
text: Vabereki nevadzidzisi vokurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise nyaya yemihoro yevashandi vehurumende kusanganisira varairidzi vachiti izvi zvikasaitwa zvinokanganisa zvakanyanya dzidzo yevana. Izvi zvinouya panguva iyo rimwe sangano remubatanidzwa wemamwe masangano evashandi vehurumende, reZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions (ZCPSTU), iro raimbozivikanwa se Apex Council, rakazivisa neChishanu kuti vashandi vehurumende vese vachange vachizoshanda mazuva maviri chete pasvondo kutanga neMuvhuro unouya. Mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru wesangano iri, VaGibson Mushangu vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakatora danho iri mushure mekuona kuti mari dzavari kupiwa dzekufambisa dzinongokwana mazuva maviri chete. Nhaurirano pakati pesangano iri nehurumende nemusi weChina hadzina zvadzakabudisa. Mutevedzeri wemunyori wesangano iri, VaGibson Mushangu, vanoti nhengo dzavo dzakabvumirana kuti nemari irikupiwa nehurumende vashandi vachange vachienda kubasa mazuva maviri chete, Muvhuro neChipiri kutanga nemusi wemuvhuro. Amai Sandra Gavi, avo vane vana vaviri vari kudzidza pane chimwe chikoro chehurumende muHarare vati kana varairidzi vakabatana nevamwe vashandi kuenda kumabasa mazuva mashoma zvinosiya vana vavo vari munataisireva. Amai Gavi vati nekuda kwekuvharwa kwakamboitwa zvikoro gore rapera, vana vavo vakasarira shure zvakanyanya sezvo vakange vasiri kuita zvidzidzo zvepadandemutande. Mumwe mubereki, VaBanny Manokore, vanotungamirira National Association of School Development Associations and Committes, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanoshungurudzika zvakanyanya nekuti panorwa nzou huswa ndihwo hunokuvara. VaManokere vati varairidzi vakaenda kuzvikoro mazuva mashoma pavhiki rega rega vana vechikoro havakwanisi kupedza zvidzidzo zvinotarisirwa zvepagore. VaManokore vakurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise zvinhu dambudziko remari yemihoro yevarairidzi risati radzika midzi. Mutungamiriri wesangano rinomirira varairidzi vekumaruwa reAlmagamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure vakurudzira hurumende kuti ingopa varairidzi mari yavaiwana muna 2018. VaMasaraure vati nekuda kwedenda ririko reCovid-19 zvakakosha kuti nguva shoma vadzidzi yavari kuzvikoro vadzidze zvakakwana. Mutungamiri werimwe sangano revarairidzi, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vayambirawo vakatiwo injodzi kuendesa varairidzi vasina rufaro kunodzidzisa vachitiwo kunyangwe pamazuva anenge achiendwa kubasa, varairidzi havanodzidzisi nemoyo yese sezvo vanenge vachinetsekana nekuti vorarama sei nemari shoma yemihoro. Mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti havana zvavangataure pamusoro penyaya iyi vakati titaure nebazi rinoona nezvevashandi vehurumende. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rebazi iri, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoti Iri Kugutsikana neChirongwa Chayo Chakangana neKubaya Nhomba yeCovid-19 Vanhu Mamiriyoni Gumi
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba yeCovid-19 huri kufamba zvakanaka chose munyika asi dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano dzichiti pane zvimwe zvakawanda zvinoda kugadziriswa. Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, vaudza Studio7 kuti chirongwa chekubaya vanhu nhomba chiri kufamba mugwara rakanaka, uye vanotarissira kuti hurumende ichagona kuzadzikisa shuviro yekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana zvevanhu munyika yose. VaMujiri vatiwo mangwana hurumende iri kutambira nhomba dzeCovid-19 mamiriyoni maviri dzakatengwa kuChina. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira machiremba anoshanda akazvimirira, Dr Johannes Marisa, vatsigirawo kuti chirongwa chekubaya nhomba chiri kufamba zvakanaka kana zvichienzaniswa nedzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica. VaMarisa varumbidzawo danho rakatorwa nehurumende rekuti zvipatara, nemakirinika akazvimirira zvitange kubayawo nhomba yeCovid-19. Asi VaMarisa vatiwo vana chiremba vakazvimiririra ava vanoda kubatsirwawo nemabhokisi anochengeta chando sezvo nhomba idzi dzine matemperature adzinofanirwa kugara dziri. Asi vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vati chirongwa ichi hachisati chanyatsopinda mugwara. VaMadzorera vati hurumende inofanirwa kusimba mukupinza nhomba munyika kuitirakuti ikwanise kubaya nhomba vanhu zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana. VaMadzorera vatiwo kune dzimwe nzvimbo dzichiri kuita mitsetse mirefu yevanhu vanenge vachida kubayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kutivanhu mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matanhatu nevatatu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi, izvo zvakasvitsahuwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 pazviuru zana negumi nezvina nemazana mana nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe,kana kuti 114,489. Vanhu makumi mana nevatatu vakafa nechirwere ichi nezuro izvo zvakasiya vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vave zviuru zvitatu nemazana manomwe nemakumi mashanu nevana 3,754 Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi mmasere nemazana mashanu nemakumi mana nemumwe chete 1, 780, 541vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yekudzivirira Covid-19. Vabayiwa nhomba yepiri vave maza mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri ezviuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu nevana,kana kuti 920,554. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu mamiriyoni gumi. kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe hichpararira. No media source currently available

headline: VaDonald Trump Vanoti Vanogona Kuvharisa Kambani yeTwitter
text: Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, vaudza kambani yeTwitter kuti vanogona kuivhara, pamwe chete nemamwe makambani e’social media’. Izvi zvinotevera mushure mekunge vanhu vazhinji vaudza Twitter kuti ibvise zvakange zvaiswa paTwitter naVaTrump vachiti ndezvemanyepo. VaTrump vanogara vachinyora zvinhu zvakawanda paTwitter pavo. Nyaya yakashatirisa vanhu ndeyezvavakanyora pamusoro pesarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika, vachiti kunoitwa kubira kukuru pasarudzo kana vanhu vakabvumidzwa kuita zvekuvhota vachiita zvekuposita mavhoti avo. Vanhu vazhinji vakakurudzira Twitter kuti ibvise mashoko aya asi Twitter yakaramba. Twitter yakangoisa chiziviso pazasi pezvakange zvanyorwa naVaTrump ichiudza vanhu pekutarisa kana vachida chokwadi pamusoro pezvakange zvanyorwa naVaTrump. Izvi hazvina kufadza VaTrump avo vati vanogona kuvhara kambani yeTwitter, vachiipomera mhosva yekuita rusarura pavatsigiri vavo. Vanodzidzisa zve kutapanhau paIndiana University, mudunhu rePennsylvania, Muzvinafundo Stan Mukasa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hakasi kekutanga VaTrump vachitaura mashoko ekuvhara makambani avasingawirirani nawo, vachiti VaTrump havana simba rekuvhara makambani ezvenhau nekuti vatori venhau nemakambani avanoshandira vakachengetedzwa zvakasimba nemutemo weFirst Amendment. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Votadza Kutevedzera Mitemo Yakaturwa naVaChiwenga yeKudzivirira Kupararira kweCovid-19
text: Nzvimbo dzakawanda munyika dzakapinda muzuva repiri neChipiri dzichitevera mitemo yakadzikwa nehurumende kuyedza kumisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Asi kune mamwe madhorobha akaita seKwekwe, Kariba neKaroi, mitemo iriko yakati omei sezvo kuri kunzi kune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Mitemo mitsva inobata mamwe matunhu ose munyika yakaziviswa kuvatori venhau nemusi weMugovera kuti vave kusimbaradza mitemo yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Mitemo yehurumende yekuyedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 cheCovid-19 iri kutambirwa zvakasiyana munyika. Kunzvimbo dzakaita seKaroi mutauriri wemapurisa Chief Superintendent Helena Mahonde vaudza bepanhau reNew Zimbabwe.com kuti vamwe vagari vemunzvimbo iyi vave kunonwira doro kudzimba vakawanda mumashabhini. Superintendent Mahonde vanoti vanhu vakawanda vakasungwa nekutyora mitemo yeCovid-19. Mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyath vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti zvinonetsa parizvino kuti vanyatsoziva kuti vanhu vari kutevedzera here kana kuti kwete mitemo mitsva yakaturwa nehurumende vachiti zvinotoda svondo rose. Asi mapurisa akazivisa neMuvhuro kuti achange achifamba famba kuona kuti vanhu havasi kuungana vakawanda. Ongororo yakaitwa neStudio 7 neMuvhuro neChipiri inoratidzawo kuti vanhu vachiri kuramba vakaungana zvikuru panzvimbo dzinokwirirwa mabhazi eZUPCO sezvo achiri mashoma. Mutungamiri wesangano rePassengers Association of Zimbabwe VaTafadzwa Goliati avo vari kuKwekwe vatendawo muhurukuro neStudio 7 kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka. Vati vemabhazi havasi kutevedzera kurudziro yekuti vatakure vanhu vashoma. KuKariba zvinhu hazvinawo kumira zvakanaka sezvo kirinika yeNyamhunga yakambovharwa kuti ifiritwe mushonga mushure mekunge mumwe anorapa vanhu abatwa nechirwere ichi. Mutauriri wesangano reKariba Urban Residents Association VaSamson Coffee vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti kutevedzera mitemo yeCovid-19 kuri kunetsa mudhorobha iri. KuMasvingo hurumende yakazivisa kuti yange isisatendere vanhu kupinda kana kubuda paMorgenster Teachers College pane vari kudzidzira hurairidzi makumi matanhatu nevatatu vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Vamwe vanorarama nekutengesa mumigwagwa vakaita saAmai Amber Zhou vemuHarare vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kutya kuti vachamanikidzwa kugara kumba kana vanhu vakawanda vakaramba vachibatwa nechirwere ichi. Vachitaurawo neStudio 7 mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaDoubt Phiri vachemachema nekudzokawo zvakanyanya kwechirwere cheCovid-19 vachiti zvichakonzera kuti vanhu vatadze zvakare kushandira mhuri dzavo. Mukuru weZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, Doctor Tinashe Manzungu vatiwo chirwere cheCovid -19 chiri kuramba chichiomesera vemabhizimisi zvakanyanya. Asiwo vatenda kuti zvakatarwa negurukota rezvehutano vhiki rapera hazvina kunyanyoomera vemabhizimusi sezvo pachine mukana wekuti mabhizimusi anoramba akavhurwa. Mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira madhokotera anoshanda akazvimiririra, reMedical and Dental Private Practitioners of Zimbabwe Association Dr Johannes Marisa vanoti matanho ari kutorwa nehurumende ekurambidza zvinhu zvakadai semagungano akanaka zvikuru vachiti huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa huri kuramba huchiwedzera. VaMarisa vati zvakakosha kuti hurumende idzivirire kupararira kwechirwere ichi vakati matanho akatorwa aya anodzivirira ndufu nehurwere hwakanyanya. Pamusoro pekurambidza magungano ese kusara kwerufu panofanira kunge paine vanhu makumi matatu, VaChiwenga vakatiwo hurumende ichawedzera kuongororwa kwehutachiona hweCovid-19 kuteverera vavanenge vasangana navo. Vanotengesa zvinhu pamisika yefodya vakanzi vambomira kuita izv. Vose vanopinda nepamiganhu yenyika vachange vachiongororwa zvikuru vanenge vachibva kunyika dzorura chirwere ichi dzakaita seIndia neBrazil.

headline: Varairidzi Vokurudzira Hurumende Kuti Ivadzivirire Kubva kuCovid-19 Panovhurwa Zvikoro
text: Masangano evarairidzi, anoti reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, neZimbabwe Teachers Association, ZIMTA, ari kukurudzira hurumende kuti ione kuti panovhurwa zvikoro varairidzi nevadzidzi vanenge vakadzivirirwa kuti vasabatwe nechirwere che coronavirus. Masangano aya ari kukurudzira kuti pave nemichina yekuti vakwanise kuongororwa kuti vane hutachiwana here kana kuti kwete muzvikoro zvose uye kuti muve nezvikwanisiro zvose zvinodiwa mukudzivirira chirwere ichi. Masangano aya anoti atora danho iri zvichitevera mashoko ekuti bazi rezvedzidzo rinotarisira kuwana mvumo kubva kumutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa yekuti zvikoro zvivhurwe, asi hapasati pave nenguva chaiyo yekuti zvingavhurwa riini. NeMuvhuro PTUZ yakanyorera kumunyori webazi redzidzo ichipa zvainofunga kuti zvingabatsira mukuenda mberi panyaya yedambudziko rechirwere cheCovid-19 nebandiko redzidzo. Mutungamiri wePTUZ, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti kunyora kwavakaita tsamba iyi kunotevera kukokwa kwavakaitwa nemunyori mukuru mubazi ravo kuti vapewo pfungwa dzavo pamusoro pedambudziko iri. Doctor Zhou vanoti kana hurumende yakavhura zvakare zvikoro panguva iyo panenge pasati pave nekujeka kuti nyika iri kuenda mberi here kana kuti kwete mukurwisana nechirwere ichi, inenge yarasika zvikuru. Vanotiwo sezvo vabereki vasiri kukwanisa kuenda kumabasa nekuda kwekumbovharwa kwenyika kana kuti lockdown, hurumende inofanirwawo kuita kuti vabhadhare chidimbu chepakati chemari dzechikoro kotoro inouya, sezvo vachiona vabereki vasiri kukwanisa kubhadhara mari dzose. Ukuwo, sangano reZIMTA svondo yapera rakanyorerawo mutungamiri wenyika, VaMnangagwa, richisvitsawo pfungwa dzaro pamusoro pekuti zvikoro zvingadzivirirwa sei kubva ku coronavirus. Zvikoro zvaifanirwa kunge zvichivhurwa musi wa 5 Chivabvu, asi hurumende haisati yatara zuva razvichavhurwa. Doctor Zhou vanotiwo vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti ione kuti zvikoro zvose zvinenge zviine mvura senzira yekuchengetedza hutsanana munguva ino yedambudziko reCoronavirus. No media source currently available

headline: Dare Rinoudza Muzvare Mamombe, Muzvare Chimbiri naMuzvare Marova Kuti Vaise Mapasipoti Avo Mumaoko eDare
text: Dare ramejasitiriti ratura mutongo wekuti mumiriri weHarare West muparamende, Muzvare Joanna Mamombe, nevamwe vavo vaviri, vasvitse magwaro avo ekufambisa kudare. Vatatu ava, avo vanoti vakatochwa vari muhusungwa, vari kupomerwa mhosva yekutyora mitemo yakadzikwa nemutungamiri wenyika yeCovid-19 Regulations. Vachitura mutongo wavo pachikumbiro chakasvitswa nehurumende chekuti zvakaturwa nedare pachikumbiro chevatatu ava zvivandudzwe, mutongi wedare, Amai Vongai Muchuchuti Guriro, vati Muzvare Mamombe nevamwe vavo vanoti Muzvare Cecilia Chimbiri naMuzvare Netsai Murova, vasvitse mapasipoti avo panokwana nguva dza 4 neChitatu masikati. Vanziwo vadzoke kudare musi wa13 Nyamavhuvhu apo pakatarisirwa kuenderera mberi kwenyaya yavari kupomerwa. Vatatu ava vakange vabhadhariswa mari yechibatiso uye kuti vazvipire kumapurisa kamwe chete mukati memasvondo maviri, asi vachuchisi vehurumende vakadzoka kudare kuti izvi zvivandudzwe vachiti vakawana runyerekupe rwekuti vatatu ava vanga vachida kutiza munyika. Amai Guriro vati zvakakosha kuti vatatu ava vamirire kutongwa kwavo nokudaro vati vaona zvakakodzera kuti vabvume chikumbiro chehurumende. Gweta revatatu ava, VaJeremiah Bhamu, vati vachakwidza nyaya iyi kudare repamusoro kuitira kuti vadzoserwe mapasipoti avo vachiti hapana mhosva yavanganzi vangatize kutongwa kwayo. Zvichakadai, baba vaMuzvare Marova, VaRunesu George Marova, vati vari kushungurudzika zvikuru nekushungurudzwa kuri kuitwa mwana wavo pamwe chete nevamwe vaakasungwa ainavo. Baba vaMuzvare Chimbiri, VaHenry Chimbiri, vati vari kushushikana zvikuru nemapurisa ari kuramba achishanyira mwana wavo nevamwe vari kuchipatara kwavari kunyange hazvo vatatu ava vakapihwa mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso nematare pamhosva yavari kupomerwa. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, kuti tinzwe divi remapurisa sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Muzvare Mamombe nevamwe vavo vanoti vakasungwa mwedzi wapera pa roadblock mushure mekuratidzira kunonzi kwakaitwa nevechidiki veMDC Alliance mumusha weWarren Park. Kunyange hazvo bepanhau reHerald nemamwe masangano enhau akaburitsa kuti vatatu ava vaive mumaoko emapurisa, mapurisa akazobuda achiramba mashoko aya mushure mekunge vatatu ava vazowanikwa kuBindura vachiti vakatochwa vari mumaoko ehurumende. Parizvino, vatatu ava vari kugara muchipatara vachirapwa zvichitevera kutochwa kwavanoti vakaitwa uku. Asi hurumende kuburikidza negurukota rinoona nezvinoitika mukati menyika, VaKazembe Kazembe, inoti ichiri kuferefeta nyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kufa neKubatwa neCovid-19 Hwowedzera Zvakare muZimbabwe
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa nekubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwatanga kukwira zvekare mushure mekumbodzika kwemavhiki apera. NeMugovera bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa kuti vanhu vatatu vakafa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave chiuru chimwe chete chine mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nevasere kana kuti 1,538. Asi mukati memazuva manomwe adarika kusvika Mugovera, vanhu gumi nevatatu kana kuti 13 vashaya nechirwere ichi zvichienzaniswa nevanhu vashanu vakafa vhiki rapera. Vanhu zana nemakumi maviri nevatanhatu kana kuti 126 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi neMugovera zvasiya vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru makumi matatu nemanomwe nemazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nevatatu kana kuti 37, 273. Mumazuva manomqwe kusvika Mugovera chete vanhu mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu kana kuti 350 vabatwa nechirwere ichi zvachienzaniswa nevanhu zana nemumwe kana kuti 101 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi mumazuva manomwe svondo rapera. izvi zviri kuwedzerwao nekusamira zvakanaka kwaita zvinhu muzvikoro. Zvikoro gumi nezvishanu zvine vana nevarairidzi vakabatwa nechirwere ichi. Bazi rezvedzidzo rinoti vana vechikoro zana nemakumi matatu nevaviri kana kuti 132 vainge vabatwa nechirwere ichi pachikoro cheSacred Heart Primary neSacred Heart Girls Gigh kuEsigodini, Matabeleland South. Zvikoro zve Girls College ne Mzilikazi Primary zvine vana vabatwawo nechirwere ichi. Mutauriri webazi rezvedzidzo VaTaungana Ndoro vanoti vabereki havafanire kutya hazo nekuti hurumende iri kuita zvose zvakakodzera kuti chirwere chisapararire zvakanyanya vakati hapana munhu ari kubvumidzwa kupinda pachoikoro cheSacred Heart kusvika dambudziko riripo ragadziriswa. Zvichakadaro, vanhu makumi matatu nemumwe kana kuti 31 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvasiya vanhu zviuru makumi matatu nemana nemazana masere nemakumi matanhatu nevaviri kana kuti 34, 862 vapora kusvika parizvino. Vanhu vachiri kurwara mazana masere nemakumi manomwe nevatatu kana kuti 873. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yeCovid-19 vave zana rezviuru nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatatu nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matatu nevatanhatu kana kuti 193, 936. Vabayiwa nhomba kaviri zviuru makumi maviri nemasere nemazana manomwe nemakumi manomwe nevanomwe kana kuti 28, 797.

headline: Varwere Voshaya muZvipatara Sezvo Musina Varapi
text: Sangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association rinoti richiri mubishi kuongora kuti huwandu hwevacheche nemadzimai vakashaya apo vaisununguka apo vana chiremba vairatidzira kutanga neChishanu hwakamira sei. Mutungamiri wavana chiremba ava, Dr Fortune Nyamande, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mari dzemihoro dzave kuoneka mumabhanga kunyangwe vachikwanisa kudzitora neChipiri chete. Mumashoko aburitswa nesangano ravana chiremba neravana mukoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association mushure memusangano wavakaita neMuvhuro, masangano aya ati achadzokera kubasa chete kana vabata mari yavo nemusi weChipiri. Vatiwo vanoda kuti vapihwe mabhonasi avo musi wa 31 Ndira. Asi vakuru vemamwe maasangano evashandi vehurumende vakasangana nagavhuna webhanga guru renyika, VaJohn Mangudya, vakaudzwa kuti hurumende haina mari uye mabhonasi angangopihwa vanhu mukati memwedzi mitanhatu. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvehutano, Dr David Parirenyatwa, kanawo gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha dzavo. Dr Nyamande vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaProsper Chitambara, vanoti dambudziko rekutadza kubhadhara vashandi hari kuvashamisa uye zvichatora nguva kuti hurumende irigadzirise. No media source currently available

headline: VaChamisa Vanorambidzwa neMapurisa Kutsvaira kuChitungwiza
text: Mapurisa arambidza MDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa kuparura hurongwa hwayo hwekutsvaira kuChitungwiza. Mapurisa aya, ayo anga akatakura zvombo, afumira panzvimbo yemabhizimusi paUnit L muChitungwiza akatakura tsamba yanga ichirambidza MDC kuenderera mberi nehurongwa hwayo hwekuparura kutsvairwa kwenzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana munyika kuitira kuti nyika igare yakachena. Pasvika Studio 7 pamabhizimusi epa Unit L panga pasara mapurisa mashomanana anga achingotenderera uye vanhu vanga vauya kuzoona VaChamisa vachiparura chirongwa ichi vanga vadzokera mudzimba dzavo. Mumwe wevanhu ava, Amai Viola Taderera, vaudza Studio7 kuti veruzhinji vanga vabuda chaizvo kuti vanotsvaira pamwe chete naVaChamisa, asi izvi zvatadziswa nemapurisa. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC, VaLuke Tamborinyoka, vati zvaitwa nemapurisa izvi zvinoratidza kuti hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa inotya veruzhinji nepamusana pekutadza kutungamira zvakanaka kwavanoti kuri kuitwa naVaMnangagwa. VaTamborinyoka vaenderera mberi vachiti sebato iye zvino vatarirana mutsetse nehurumende yaVaMnangagwa zvichitevera kuramba vongorambidzwa nemapurisa kuenderera mberi nezvavanenge vakaronga. Asi hurumende, kuburikidza negurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vati VaChamisa vanofanirwa kuteerera zvinotaurwa nemapurisa, uye kana vari pachokwadi chekuda kuchenesa nzvimbo vanofanirwa kubatana nemutungamiri wenyika muchirongwa chake chekutsvaira munzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji. Tsamba yemapurisa yekurambidza hurongwa hwaVaChamisa hwanhasi iyo yanyorwa nemukuru wemapurisa munharaunda yeChitungwiza, Chief Superintendent S. Mujiwa, iyo iri mumaoko eStudio 7, yakurudzira MDC kuti ibatane nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pavanenge vachiita hurongwa hwavo hwekutsvaira uhwo hunoitwa kutanga kwemwedzi wegawega. Mutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, vati tigovabata zvakare patavafonera asi pataenda pamhepo nharembozha yavo yanga isiri kudairwa. No media source currently available

headline: Mari Yotadzisa Vakawanda Kuenda Kuzororo reEaster
text: Vanhu vakawanda vange vachikwira mabhazi vachienda kunotambira zororo reEaster kunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana, kunyange hazvo vanga vachichema nerekushaya mari. Kunyange hazvo munyika vanhu vari kunetsekana kutora mari dzavo kumabhanga, change chiri chipata pata paMbare Musika vanhu vachikwira mabhazi vachienda kunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana vachinoshanyira hama neshamwari. VaSteven Masocha vaudza Studio7 kuti vange vakatarisira kuti zororo reEaster richanakidza zvikuru. Asi izvi zvichakundikana sezvo vasina mari yakawanda. Mumwe mudzimai akwanisa kuenda kumusha kwake kuHurungwe, Amai Dorothy Jack, vati mushure mekutadza kuwana mari kubhanga kwavo, vakatozokwereta mari kuti vakwanise kuenda kuzororo. Muzvare Nomatter Chiwenga vatiwo zvange zvakaoma kuti vakwanise kuwana mari nokuti vaimukira husiki kuti vanomira mumitsetse kubhengi kwemazuva akawanda kusvikira mari yavaida yakwana. VaMambo Mandungu Mandedza varatidza kufara kuenda kumusha kwavo kwavakapedzesira kuenda makore masere apfuura. Vati kana vasvika kumusha kwavo vachauraya mombe kuti vafare nemhuri yavo pazororo reEaster iri. Baba Trymore Muvhunza vanoti vana vavo vatadza kuuya kubva kuBuhera nepamusana pekushaya mari. Asi Baba Gibson Chanakira vati vachazoenda kumusha kana zororo rapera sezvo vari mubishi rekutengesa zvinhu zvavo paMbare Musika. Kunyange hazvo vamwe vanhu vakwanisa kuenda kuzororo reEaster, ongororo yaitwa neStudio7 yaratidza kuti vanhu vakawanda vatadza kufamba nepamusana pekushaya mari iyo iri kunetsa kutora kumabhanga. No media source currently available

headline: VaTsvangirai Vanoti VaMbeki Mutengesi, Ngavakumbire Ruregerero
text: Mutungamiri we MDCT, Va Morgan Tsvangirai, vapomera neChitatu vaimbova mutungamiri we South Africa, Va Thabo Mbeki, mhosva yokushanda pamwe chete nemutungamiri wenyika, Va Robert Mugabe, mukubirirwa kunonzi kwakaitwa sarudzo dzemuna 2002. VaTsvangirai vatiwo Va Mbeki vanoziva zvakaitika pasarudzo dzemuna 2008 idzo dzakazokonzera kuti pawumbwe hurumende yemubatanidzwa mushure mekunge VaTsvangirai vakunda VaMugabe musarudzo idzi. Vachitaura nevatori venhau pamuzinda webato ravo pa Harvest House zvichitevera kubuda kwakaita gwaro revatongi vematare edzimhosva veku South Africa, reJudicial Observer Mission, iro rakange richiongorora sarudzo dzemuna 2002, Va Tsvangirai vapomera hurumende yeSouth Africa yaiva pasi paVa Mbeki mhosva yekushanda neZanu PF mukudzvanyirira zvido zvevana veZimbabwe. Zvichitevera sarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika dzemuna 2002, Va Tsvangirai vakaenda kumatare vachiti sarudzo idzi dzakange dzabirirwa naVaMugabe, asi kusvika pari zvino matare haasati atura mutongo panyaya iyi. Nekune rumwe rutivi, bepanhau reku South Africa rakaenda kumatare richida kuti gwaro revaongorori ve South Africa ava ribuditswe pachena asi rakazobuda nemusi weChishanu svondo rapera mushure mekunge matare epamusoro soro munyika iyi ati gwaro iri riburitswe. Hurumende yeSouth Africa yakanga yapikisa kuburitswa kwegwaro iri. VaTsvangirai vaendererera mberi vachiti pakaitwa musangano wenyika dziri kuchamhembe kwe Africa muguta guru re Zambia re Lusaka muna Kubvumbi 2008, Va Mbeki vakataurawo zvakare kuti mu Zimbabwe maizoitwa sarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika dzechipiri, kana kuti presidential runoff, kunyange hazvo zvakange zvabuda musarudzo zvakange zvisati zvave kuzivikanwa. Vati izvi zvinoratidza kuti Va Mbeki vakange vachiziva zvose zvakanga zvichiitwa neZanu PF pakange pakapfimbikwa zvakange zvabuda musarudzo izvo zvakatora nguva inodarika mwedzi mumwe chete zvisati zvaziviswa kune veruzhinji. Zvichakadai, mukuru wesangano rinoongorora nyaya dzekufambiswa kwesarudzo munyika re Election Resource Centre, Va Tawanda Chimhini, vanoti hurumende ye South Africa inofanira kukumbira ruregerero panyaya iyi kuvana veZimbabwe. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende ye South Africa panyaya iyi. Gwaro re Judicial Observer Mission iri rinotiwo sarudzo dzemuna 2002 hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka uye rinoti pakange pane mhirizhonga yakanyanyisa yakavhiringa hupenyu hwenhengo dze MDC, vatungamiri vebato iri vakasungwa pamberi pesarudzo uyewo kuti gwaro revavhoti rakanga risiri mumawoko e MDC. Kunyange hazvo pakaitwa dzimwe sarudzo kubva muna 2002, MDC-T ichiri kungochema nenyaya dzimwe chetedzo uye kusvika pari zvino bato iri rinoti harisati rave negwaro revavhoti. Va Tsvangirai vati kubva muna 2000 pakaitwa sarudzo dzeparamende, Zimbabwe haisati yamboita sarudzo dziri pachena. Zvichakadai, Va Tsvangirai vati kusawirirana kuri kuitika mu Zanu PF kunoratidza kuti Va Mugabe havasisina nguva yakareba vari muhutongi. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko emudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, avo vari kukurudzira kuti mutevedzeri wemurume wavo mubato nemuhurumende, Amai Joice Mujuru, vasiye chigaro chavo vachivapomera mhosva dzehuori, kusagona basa pamwe nekuronga zvekubvisa Va Mugabe pachigaro zvechisimba. Kunyange hazvo vachiti gakava riri mu Zanu PF harinei nebato ravo, chinovarwadza sebato ndechekuti veruzhinji ndivo vari kutambura uku vari muhurumende vachiswera vachirwira masimba. Asi Amai Mujuru vari kuramba mhosva dzose dzavari kupomerwa vachiti mawoko avo akachena semukaka uye vanoti vakatokwidza nyaya iyi kumagweta avo nepamusana pekusvibiswa kwavanoti kuri kuitwa zita ravo. No media source currently available

headline: Meya Mutsva weBulawayo, VaSolomon Mguni, Vokurudzira Kusaita Rusarurarudzi
text: Vachangosarudzwa sameya mutsva weguta reBulawayo, VaSolomon Mguni, vari kukurudzira vagari kuti vasaite zverusaruro pachishandiswa zvemarudzi vachiti kubatana nekushanda pamwe chete ndiko kunoita kuti guta ravo rive nebudiriro. Vanhu vane chitsama vange vachitevera sarudzo dzameya nemutevedzeri wake vachiona paterevhizheni yange yakaiswa muLarge City Hall vapembera nemufaro mushure mekunge VaMguni vakunda VaNorman Hlabano pasarudzo yameya weguta. Musarudzo yameya nemutevedzeri wake yaitwa neChishanu muBulawayo, VaTinashe Kambarami ndivo vasarudzwa kuve mutevedzeri wameya mushure mekukunda VaMalandu Ncube. Mumashoko avo ekutambira chinzvimbo chehumeya, VaMguni avo vanove gweta, vakurudzira vagari vemuBulawayo kuti vasapatsanurane kuchitariswa zvemarudzi vachiti zvizvarwa zvose zvemuZimbabwe zvine kodzero yekuve vagari venzvimbo ipi neipi zvayo munyika pasina kutarisirana pasi. Mumashoko avo ekutambira kuvhoterwa kwavo semutevedzeri wameya, VaKambarami, avo vanove muzvinabhizimisi, vatenda vamwe vavo asi vati vange vasina zvakawanda zvekutaura sezvo vange vachiri vakabatwa nemufaro wakawanda. Mudzviti wedunhu reBulawayo vanove ivo vange vachiitisa sarudzo vati vafara nekuti zvinhu zvose zvafamba zvakanaka. Mushure mekudomwa kwaVaKambarami semutevedzeri wameya vamwe vagari vange vachitevera zvange zvichiitika vari muCity Hall varatidza kusafara sezvo vange vachitarisira kuti VaNcube ndivo vachakunda. Sarudzo yameya muBulawayo yange iine mutauro sezvo vamwe vagari kusanganisira dzimwe nhengo dzebato reMthwakazi Republic Party, vange vachiti havazi kuzotambira meya werudzi rwechiShona. Vakawanda vari kuratidza kushamiswa zvikuru nedanho renhego dzeMRP idzi sezvo dzakakundwa musarudzo yemakanzura muBulawayo, asi pari zvino dzichionekwa dziri mberi mukuda kupatsanura vanhu pachishandiswa marudzi. Mumwe mugari, VaKillion Dube, vakurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vatambire zvabuda musarudzo sezvo vasarudzwa ava vakavhoterwa neveruzhinji. No media source currently available

headline: Varimi Votambira Kurudziro Yekuti Varimi Vatengese Dzimwe Mombe
text: Rimwe sangano revarimiri, reZimbabwe Commercial Farmers’ Union, ZCFU, rinoti varimi vanofanirwa kutambira kurudziro yehurumende yekuti vatapudze zvipfuwo zvavo munguva ino yekushaikwa kwemafuro, kuitira kuti vasazorasikirwa nepfuma yavo. Rimwe sangano revarimi, reZimbabwe Commercial Farmers’ Union, ZCFU, rinoti varimi vanofanirwa kutambira kurudziro yehurumende yekuti vatapudze zvipfuwo zvavo munguva ino yekushaikwa kwemafuro, kuitira kuti vasazorasikirwa nepfuma yavo. Mukuru wesangano iri, VaJeremiah Tevera, vanoti sangano ravo ragara richikurudzira varimi vari mumatunhu ane nzara kuti vatengese zvimwe zvipfuwo zvavo kuitira kuti vawane mari yekutenga chikafu chekupa kune zvimwe zvipfuwo zvavanenge vasara nazvo. “Ishoko rakanaka ravari kutaura asi isu sesangano tinoona sekunge ranga ranonoka kuuya nekuti zvipfuwo zviri kufa,” VaTevera vanodaro. Mutevedzeri wegurukurota rezvekurima vakanangana nezvipfuwo, VaPaddy Zhanda, vanonzi nedandemutande renhau reThe Source vari kukurudzirawo varimi kuti vaite nhimuramiswe, vasachiva kuverenga mombe dzakawanda asi idzo dzichizofa dzoga nenzara. Vazhanda vanonzi vari kutarisirwa kushanya kumatunhu eMatabeland South neMatabeleland North neChitatu kuti vasangane nevarimi kuti vakurukure nezvemamiriro akaita zvinhu pamwe nezvekurudziro yavo iyi. Takundikana kubata VaZhanda kuti tinzwe nezvehurongwa hwavo uhwu. Mombe dzinodarika zviuru zvinomwe dzinonzi dzafa mukati memwedzi mina yapfuura nekuda kwekushaiwa mafuro. Hurumende mwedzi wapera yakaparura chirongwa chekubatsira varimi nechikafu chezvipfuyo zvavo mudunhu reChiredzi, asi vamwe varimi vanonzi vari kukundikana kuwana madhora masere ekuti vatenge tsaga rimwe chete rechikafu ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Kuvhurwa kweZvikoro Kuchanetsa Rwendo Rwuno
text: Kuvhurwa kwezvikoro kunogona kusafamba sezviri kutarisirwa mushure mekunge masangano akawanda anomirira varairidzi azivisa kuti nhengo dzawo dzakawanda dzichatadza kudzokera kumabasa nekuda kwekushaiwa mari dzekufambisa. Varairidzi vari kuda kuti hurumende idzosere mihoro yavo pamari dzavaitambira muna 2018, uye kuti nyaya dzehutano hwavo dzigadziriswe maringe nekudzivirirwa kubva kuCovid-19. Varairidzi vanodzidzisa zvidzidzo zveGrdae 7, Form 4 neForm 6 vanofanirwa kunge vadzokera kumabasa avo nhasi vachigadzirira kuvhurwa kwezvikoro muchikamu chekutanga nemusi weMuvhuro svondo rinouya. Studio 7 yakundikana kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi mukupera kwesvondo hurumende yakazivisa kuti varairidzi vose vanoda kubaiwa nhomba vachabaiwa kana zvikoro zvavhurwa. Mutungamiri wesangano reProgressive Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, VaTakavafira Zhou, vanoti hapana chikoro chingavhurika kana zvichemo zvevashandi zvisati zvagadziriswa. No media source currently available Asi vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri wesangano reZimbabwe Teachers Association, ZIMTA, VaGoodwill Taderera, vanotiwo sesangano, vanotarisira kuti hutano hwevarairidzi huiswe pamberi kunyanya, uye vari kugumburwa nehurongwa hwekuti varairidzi vadzokere kumabasa vasina mari. VaTaderera vanoti sesangano vari kuda kuti musi wa 15 Kurume uchavhurwa zvikoro, usati wasvika, hurumende inofanirwa kutanga yavapa mari dzichaita kuti varairidzi vakwanise kudzokera kumabasa. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mubatanidzwa wemamwe masangano anomirira vashandi vehurumende, weZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions, uyo waimbozivikana seApex Council, nezuro wakanyorerawo gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi vehurumende tsamba richipa hurumende mazuva manomwe kubva nezuro ekuti inge yagadzirisa zvichemo zvevashandi zvemihoro yavo, kukundikana kwayo vashandi vanozozivisa nezvehurongwa hwekuramwa mabasa. Gwaro rinoti hurumende iri kukundikana kushevedzera musangano weNational Joint Negotiating Council, uyo waifanirwa kunge wakaitwa muna Ndira wegore rino sezvakanga zvabvumirwa pamusangano wakapedzisira kuitwa muna Zvita, wekuti hurumende idzosere mihoro yevashandioo pamari dzavaitambira muna Gumiguru 2018.

headline: Hurumende Yovimbisa Kugadzikana Mune zveMafuta Panguva iyo Magetsi ave Kunetsa muNyika
text: Gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto, Doctor Joram Gumbo, vanoti zvinhu zvave kuzogadzikana munyaya dzemafuta edzimotokari zvichitevera kuibva kwemari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi mashanu emadhora ekuAmerica yakapiwa makambani anopinza mafuta munyika kana kuti ma 'letters of credit'. Doctor Gumbo vanoti kubva kupera kwesvondo rapera kusvika pari zvino, motokari dzinotakura mafuta dziri mubishi kumhanya nemafuta dzichidira mumagaraji emunyika. Asi vanoti sezvo munyika manga mave negaha nechekare, zvinoda kanguva kakati kuti kuti vakwanise kudzora zvinhu pazvinofanirwa kunge zviri. Ukuwo, vamwe vedzimotokari vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinhu hazvisati zvave kuratidza shanduko, sezvo mitsetse ichiri kuwanikwa munyika yose. Zvichakadaro, kambani yemagetsi yeZimbabwe Electricity Transmission and Distribution Company yazivisa nezvehurongwa hwekumbodzimwa kwemagetsi pane dzimwe nguva senzira yekuchengetedza magetsi mashoma ari kuwanikwa munyika. Kumbodzimwa kwemagetsi uku kuchaitwa munyika yose panguva dzatarwa nekambani iyi. Kambani yemagetsi iyi inoti yamanikidzwa kutora danho iri nekuda kwekuderera zvakanyanya kwemvura kudhamu rinogaiwa magetsi reKariba, pamwe nekudzikira kwemagetsi ari kugaiwa kugwenya remarasha reHwange Power Station. Kambani iyi yatiwo rimwe dambudziko riri kukonzera kushaikwa kwemagetsi anokwana nderekushomeka kwemagetsi ari kutengwa kubva kunze kwenyika, zvikuru kuMozambique. Magetsi achadzimwa kubva nenguva dzeshanu mangwanani kusvika nenguva dzegumi mangwanani, kuchizotiwo kubva nenguva dzeshanu manheru kusvika nenguva dzegumi usiku. Doctor Gumbo vanoti hurumende iri kugadzirisa dambudziko remagetsi iri kuburikidza nekupa marezinesi kwayakaita kumakambani makumi matatu nemana anoshandisa simba rezuva kuti awanise nyika magetsi, uye kugadziriswa kuri kuitwa magwenya ekuHwange. No media source currently available Asi mukuru werimwe sangano rinomirira vagari vemuHarare, reHarare Residents Trust, VaPrecious Shumba, vanoti vagari havasi kufara nenyaya yekumbodzimwa kwemagetsi iyi sezvo vanenge vakatobhadhara kare magetsi emwedzi wese. VaShumba vanotiwo nyika haisati yave nezvikwanisiro zvekuti magetsi ezuva ave iwo nhungamiri munyaya dzemhando dzemoto, izvo zvichaita kuti ruzhinji rwuomerwe zvakanyanya. No media source currently available

headline: Mari Yoshomeka Munyika Zvokatyamadza Nyanzvi Dzakawanda
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kuyambira kuti nyika yananga kumawere uye zvinogona kukonzera kusagadzikana kwenyika sezvo mari mumabhanga iri kuramba ichishaikwa kunyange hazvo hurumende iri kuti iri kugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, VaJohn Mangudya, vakati Zimbabwe yainge yawana mari inosvika mamiriyoni mazana matanhatu emadhora senzira yekugadzirisa dambudziko remari asi vakawanda vanoti zvinhu zvatonyanya kuita manyama amire nerongo. Kunyange hazvo huremu hwemabond notes hwaderera, vemabhizimisi makuru vanoti vari kumanikidzwa kutengesa zvinhu nemutemo wakafanana pamabond notes nemadhora ekuAmerica. Mamwe mabhangi akaita seSteward Bank neStandard Bank ange achibvumidza kuti vanhu vatore mari pamaATM cards kana vari kunze kwenyika mumazuva mashoma apfuura, amira kuita izvi achiti mumabhanga hamuchina mari kunyange hazvo vanhu ava vakaisa mari dzavo mumabhanga acho. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti vemabhizimisi makuru ndivo vave kunyanya kuomerwa nezvinhu sezvo vachisungwa vakasatevera mitemo yeReserve Bank of Zimbabwe. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wesangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaCallisto Jokonya, avo vati havana zvavangaite kunze kwekutevedzera mutemo. Vaimbova gurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaTendai Biti, vanoti mari mumabhanga hamuchina sezvo hurumende ichiramba ichikwereta mari kumabhanga isingadzosere. Nyaya yekushomeka kwemari iyi yakambopawo kuti mafuta ekubikisa ashaikwe munyika. Asi ikozvino mukuru wesangano reOil Expressers Association, VaBusisa Moyo, vanoti zvave nani. Ko dambudziko iri ringagadziriswe sei chaizvo? VaJokonya vanoti panoda kuti Zimbabwe ikwezve vemabhizimisi vekunze. VaChitambara vanotiwo aya ndiwo maonero avo. Nekuona kuti zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi zvainge zvaenda kumawere, mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakadoma gurukota idzva rezvemari, VaIgnatius Chombo, vachibvisa VaPatrick Chinamasa. Asi VaChitambara vanoti havaone VaChombo vachikwanisa kugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti kunetsana mubato reZanu-PF, uye sarudzo dziriko gore rinouya, zviri kupawo kuti zvinhu zvinetse kugadzirisa sezvo pasina ari kunyatsotarisa zvingabatsira nyika. Kudzamara vakuru muZanu PF nemuhurumende vaisa zvido zvenyika pamberi pezvido zvavo, matambudziko akadai acharamba achiwanda munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inomisa Chirongwa Chekupa Vadzidzi Zvitupa neNyaya yeCovid-19
text: Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakamisa neMugovera chirongwa chekuti vana vanoda kunyora bvunzo dzeOrdinary neAdvanced Level vatore zvitupa nekuda kwekutyira kupararira kweCovid-19, nyanzvi munyaya dzedzidzo dzinoti zvakakosha kuti chirongwa ichi chienderere mberi kuitira kuti pasaita nhubu dzinonyorera vamwe mazamanishoni. Hurumende yainge yaisa parutivi zuro nanhasi semazuva maviri ekuti vaya vanoda kunyora bvunzo gore rino vatore zvitupa, asi yakazomisa chirongwa ichi chave pakati nezuro masikati yave kutyira kuti denda reCovid-19 ringapararire zvakanyanya mushure mekunge vanhu vabuda zvine mutsindo. Bazi rezvemukati menyika pamwe nevakafanobata chigaro chaRegistrar-General, VaHenry Machiri, vakazivisa nezuro kuti vakamisa chirongwa ichi mushure mekunge vanhu vakawandisa vaenda kumahofisi avo kunotorerwa zvitupa. Mapurisa akatozoshevedzwa kuzochengetedza runyararo uye vamwe vakanga vatorara pamahofisi aRegistrar General aya vachida zvitupa. Mumwe mudzidzi wepane chimwe chikoro muHarare, Chipo Zhou, uyo akamukira pamahofisi aRegistrar-General ari paMachipisa mumusha weHigfiled muHarare, audza Studio 7 kuti akawana paine vanhu vaidarirka chiuru vakanga vave mumutseste nechakare uye akazobva asina kutora chitupa mushure mekuudzwa kuti chirongwa ichi chaitirwa vaye vanodzidza muzvikoro zvakazvimirira kana kuti private colleges. Mumwe murairiridzi wepane chimwe chikoro mumusha weGlen View uyo aramba kudzomwa nezita, audza Studio 7 kuti ichokwadi kuti chirongwa ichi chinobata vana vanodzidza kuma private collegel. Ati vanhu vari muzvikoro zvehurumende, makunzuru kana zvemakereke havadi zvitupa kuti vanyore bvunzo. Murairidzi uyu atiwo vana vakawanda vaida zvitupa nekuti vanodzidza muzvikoro zvakazvimirira kana kuti zvisina kunyoreswa nehurumende uye zvisingabvumidzwe kunyoresa bvunzo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzedzidzo uye vari mutungamiriri wesangano rinomirira varairidzi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakakosha kuti vanoda kunyora bvunzo vasingadzidzi muzvikoro vatore zvitupa vachiti izvi zvinodzivirira hutsotsi nechikiribidi pabvunzo. Doctor Zhou, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinosuwisa kuti vanhu vanotambura kutora zvitupa munyika vachiti hapafaniri kuitwa zvematongerwo enyika pakutora zvitupa. Mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro, vanoti ichokwadi kuti vaya vasiri muzvikoro zvakanyoreswa kana kuti vari kudzidza kuma Non-Formal school, kana kuti vanganzi External Candidates, ndivo chete vanosungirwa kunge vaine zvitupa pabvunzo, kwete vanodzidza musvikoro zviri pasi pehurumende, makanzuru kana mamishoni. Zimbabwe Schools Examinations Council yakazivisa mwedzi wapera kuti vanoda kunyora bvunzo vanofanira kunge vabhadhara mari dzebvunzo musi wa9 Chikunguru uye vano nonoka vanofanira kubhadhara mari iyi musi wa30 Chikungururu. Doctor Zhou vaudza Studio 7 kuti vasina kukwanisa kutora zvitupa nezuro vachinenguva yekutora zvitupa izvi sezvo pachine nguva pazonosvika 30 Chikunguru. Vatiwo Covid-19 inogona kukanganisa kunyorwa kwebvunzo idzi uye semaonero avo, gore rino vana vachafoira zvakanyanya sezvo vasina nguva yekudzidza yakakwana uye varairidzi vasiri kudzidzisa nekuti havasi kufara nemihoro yavanotambira. Hurumende yakambomisa kuvhurwa kwezvikoro nekuti Covid-19 iri kupararira zvakanyanya. No media source currently available

headline: Madzimai Obatwa Chibharo neKubirwa Zvowedzerwa Nekushomeka kweMabhazi eZUPCO
text: Sangano rePassengers Association of Zimbabwe rinoti danho rehurumende rekubvisa makombi mumigwagwa nechinangwa chekuda kuvamanikidza kuti vaite mushandirapamwe nekambani yehurumende yeZUPCO rave kuisa hupenyu hwevanhu vakawanda munjodzi. Izvi zvinotevera kukwira kwehuwandu hwemadzimai ari kubatwa chibharo uye kubirwa zvakanyanya kwevanhu nevanhu vane motokari dzinozivikanwa nekuti mishikashika. Vachinyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter, mapurisa anoti vanhu havafanire kukwira motokari dzemushikashika idzi uye havafanire kutakura mari yakawanda. Mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi mumashoko kuvatori vanhu vanotiwo muHarare ndimo manyanya nyaya dzekubatwa chibharo kwemadzimai uye kubirwa kwevanhu. Motokari dziri kushandiswa nematsotsi aya dzinosanganisira maHonda Fit nemaToyota Wish, vanhu vari kubirwa mari nenharembozha. Vanhu vakawanda vaudza Studio 7 kuti mabhazi eZUPCO mashoma nekudaro vanozogumisira vakwira chero motokari. Mutungamiri wePassengers Association of Zimbabwe VaTafadzwa Goliati vaudza Studio 7 kuti mabhazi mashoma zvosiya vanhu vokwira motokari dzematsotsi. No media source currently available

headline: Kanzuru yeHarare Inoti Ichaputsa Zvakare Zvivakwa Zviri kuBudiro 5
text: Kanzuru yeHarare iri kuyambira vanhu vane dzimba dzakaputswa kuBudiriro 5 kuti vasiyane nekuvaka zvakare nekuti vacharamba vachirasikirwa nemari sezvo kanzuru icharamba ichiputsa dzimba idzi. Vanhu vazhinji vakaputsirwa dzimba dzavo nemusi weChitatu neChitatu vakaswera vachivaka dzimba dzavo zvekare pamwe nekunyorera matsamba kukanzuru yeHarare pamwe nehurumende vachitsanangura kuti vari kuvaka zviri pamutemo uye vanoda kuripwa kuputswa kwakaitwa dzimba dzavo. Chipangamazano mumubatanidzwa weHannah Housing Co-operative, Amai Stella Bhingari, vaudza Studio7 kuti vari kutoda kuripwa sezvo zvakaitika zviri kunze kwemutemo. Asi mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanhu ava vari kutambisa nguva nemari yavo nekuti vari kuvaka panzvimbo isingabvumidzwe sezvo iri matoro. Asi Amai Bhingari vati vanoshamiswa neizvi sezvo mamwe mapazi ehurumende akatotarisa nzvimbo iyi akavapa magwaro ekuti vavake. VaChideme vayambira vanhu nekuramaba vachityora mutemo. VaChideme vati zvakakosha kuti vanhu vasabhadhare mari pasina kujeka uye vanofanira kuenda kukanzuru kunobvunza pamusoro penzvimbo dzavanoda kutenga pokuvakira vasati vabhadhara mari kungave kumushandirapamwe, vanhuwo zvavo kana makambani anotengesa nzvimbo dzekuvakira. VaChideme varatidza Studio 7 mutongo wakaitwa nemutongi wedare repamusoro reHigh Court, Justice Benjamin Chikowero musi wa28 Nyamavhuvhu wekuti vanhu vese vari panzvimbo iyi inonzi The Remainder of Glen Eagles Farm Budiriro Township vabve panzvimbo mukati memazuva gumi nemana kana vatadza kuita izvi vozobviswa nechikonzi nemapurisa. No media source currently available

headline: VaChamisa Vanodoma Makurukota eBato Ravo
text: Mutungamiri webato reMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, neChitatu vakadoma vanhu vachange vachifambisa mabasa akasiyanasiyana mubato ravo, vachishanda semakurukota ebato, kana kuti shadow cabinet. VaChamisa vakatorawo mukana uyu kuzadzisa zvigaro mumakomiti anoti National Standing neNational Executive, zvakanga zvisina kuzadziswa pakongiresi yebato iri yakaitwa kuGweru mwedzi wapera. Vamwe vakadomwa muzvigaro zvekuve makurukota emapazi vanosanganisira VaDaniel Molokele, avo vachatungamira bazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, vari mutauriri webato zvakare, vachiteverwa naVaLuke Tamborinyoka. Muzvare Gladys Hlatswayo vachange vachiona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika vachitevererwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora, VaElias Mudzuri vachiona nezvekutongwa kwematunhu, kuchitiwo Muzvare Farai Mahere vachidomwa kuve munyori anoona nezvedzidzo nemitambo. Muzvare Mahere vachangobvawo kupinda mubato reMDC. VaMorgen Komichi vakadomwawo kuve chipangamazano chemutungamiri webato, VaChamisa. Vamwe vakapiwa zvhigaro vanosanganisira Muzvare Maurine Kademaunga, avo vakaitwa munyori anoona nezvevashandi nemabasa. VaMolokele vakatora chigaro chaive naVaJacob Mafume, avo vave kuona nezvesarudzo. Bato iri rakadzikawo mutemo unotara nguva inofanirwa kunge munhu ari pachigaro, iyo inove matemu maviri chete, kana kuti makore gumi. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vachiita zvidzidzo zvepamusorosoro paUniversity of Johannesburg, Doctor Pedzisai ruhanya, vanoti vanoona sekunge VaChamisa vakabaya dede nemumukanwa, sezvo vanhu vavakasarudza vaine hunyanzvi husingapikiswa nevari mubato kana vari kunze kwebato reMDC. Vanotiwo mutungamiri webato rinopikisa uyu akaitawo zvakanaka mukusanganisa vanhu vane nhoroondo yebato iri kana kuti ruzivo rwebato, nevechidiki vachiri kutemwa dzinobva ropa. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari vemuHarare Vanoratidzira paMuzinda weKanzuru Vachinyunyuta neHuwori
text: Vagari vemuHarare varatidzira pamahofisi ekanzuru yeguta iri vachiti havasi kufara nehuwori huri kuitwa mukanzuru iyi. Vagari vemuHarare vasvika pamahofisi ekanzuru paTown House zuva rorova nhongonya vachiimba vachiti havasi kufara nehuwori hwavanoti hwapfunya chisero mukanzuru yeHarare. Varatidziri ava vanga vakatakura zvinyorwa zvakasiyana-siyana zvanga zvichitsoropodza nyaya yehuwori pamwe nekusatakurwa kwemarara munzvimbo zhinji dzeguta iri. Mumwe wevanga vachitungamira kuratidzira uku, VaGeorge Makoni, avo vanoshanda nesangano reCenter for Community Development in Zimbabwe, vaudza meya weHarare, VaBenard Manyenyeni, kuti havasi kufara nenyaya dzehuwori dzavanoti dzanyanya mukanzuru yeguta. Mumwe wevaratidziri ava, VaDenford Ngadziore, avo vanoshanda nesangano re hashtag Tajamuka/Sesijikile, vatiwo havasi kufara nemari dzekubatsirika dziri kupihwa vakuru-vakuru kana kuti ma allowances. Meya vasati vapindura, mapurisa anodziwirira mvongamupopoto abva asvika ndokutanga kudzinga varatidziri ava paTown House. Paitika izvi, mapurisa abva asunga VaMakoni, avo vanga vave kuita semutauriri wevaratidziri ava ndokuenda navo, meya akasara asina wekutaura naye pavaratidziri ava. VaMakoni vapomerwa mhosva yekuita zvemusarinya pavanhu kana kuti criminal nuisance sezviri pasi pechikamu 46 (2) (a) (ii) chemutemo weCriminal Law (Codification and Reform) Act Chapter 9:23. VaMakoni, avo vanga vachimirirwa negweta rinoshanda neZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaObey Shava, vanonzi vazosunungurwa mushure mekubhadhariswa mari yenhendamurandu inoita madhora gumi. Zvichakadai, VaManyenyeni vaudza Studio 7 kuti nyaya dzehuwori inyaya dzagara dzirimo mukanzuru asi vari kuedza nepavanogona napo kudzipedza.  Panyaya yemari dzema allowances dzinonzi dziri kupihwa vamwe vakuru-vakuru mukanzuru, VaManyenyeni vakurudzira kuti pawunzwe makambani asingadyidzane nekanzuru kuti azoferefeta nyaya iyi.
