Panyaya yemarara, VaManyenyeni vakurudzira kuti hurumende igadzirise zviri kunetsa munyaya dzehupfumi vachiti marara mazhinji ari kuiswa nevanhu vanotengesera mumigwagwa kana nguva dzebasa dzadarika vachiti vanhu ava vari kuedzawo kutsvaga kuraramisa mhuri dzavo. Vakurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vasarambe vachingorasira marara pese pese kuitira kuti guta rigare rakashambidzika. Vagari vemuHarare nhasi varatidzira pamahofisi ekanzuru yeguta iri vachiti havasi kufara nehuwori huri kuitwa mukanzuru iyi. Mutori wedu wenhau Thomas Chiripasi anotipa nyaya iyi... Vagari vemuHarare vasvika pamahofisi ekanzuru paTown House zuva rorova nhongonya vachiimba vachiti havasi kufara nehuwori hwavanoti hwapfunya chisero mukanzuru yeHarare. VaMakoni, avo vanga vachimirirwa negweta rinoshanda neZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaObey Shava, vanonzi vazosunungurwa mushure mekubhadhariswa mari yenhendamurandu inoita madhora gumi. headline: Masangano eVarairidzi Oramba Kutambira Mari Yakawedzerwa neHurumende
text: Masangano makuru anomirira varairidzi anoti reZimbabwe Teaches Association ZIMTA, Progressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ neAlmalgamated Rural Teachers Union, ARTUZ, abatana mukuramba kutambira mari yakawedzera varairidzi nehurumende neChipiri. Masangani aya anoti anoda kuenzaniswawo dzimwe mari nemapurisa, mauto nemajerighadhi ayo akapihwa mari yakawanda mushure mekunge mamwe makurukota ehurumende ati vakasapihwa mari vanogona kupandukira hurumende. Muna Chikunguru hurumende yakapa mapurisa nemauto mari iri pakati pezviuru zvishanu nezvisere ichinzi ndeyeCovid Allowance asi ikapa vamwe vashandi yavo vose mari inosvika churu chimwe chete nemazana maviri emadhora chete. Asi vachitaura nebepanhau reHerald mutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika VaGeorge Charamba vakati masangano anomirira vashandi anenge otaura nezvematongerwo enyika akada kuenzanisa mari dzavo nedzemauto nemapurisa vachiti vanofanira kuramba vachitaurirana nehurumende chete kusvika vapihwa mari yavari kuda kwede kuda kukonzera kusagadzikana. NeChipiri gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakati hurumende yainge yawedzera mari yevarairidzi zvekare kusvika pazvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana. Asi mutungamiri weZimta, VaRichard Gundani, uye mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, vaudza Studio 7 kuti havasi kuzodududza pamari yavari kuda inosvika madhora mazana mashanu emadhora ekuAmerica pamwedzi. Mutungamiri wePTUZ, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti havasi kuzodzokera kumabasa kusvika vapihwa mari yavari kuda iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Gumi neVanomwe Vofa neCovid-19 Hurumende Ichikurudzirwa Kutevedzera Zvainotaura paNyaya yeKudzivirira Chirwere Ichi
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu gumi nevanomwe vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemusi weMugovera zvasiya vafa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave zviuru zvina nemakamumi mapfumbamwe kana kuti 4, 090. Vanhu mazana matatu nemakumi mana nevashanu kana kuti 345 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatwa nacho vave zana rezviuru negumi nepfumbamwe nemazana masere nemakumi mashanu nevatatu kana kuti 119, 853. Vanhu mazana mashanu nemakumi masere nemumwe kana kuti 581 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvasiya vapora kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru makumi mapfumbamwe nematanhatu zvine mazana manomwe negumi nevatanhatu kana kuti 96, 716. Vanhu mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu zvine mazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 2, 036, 299 vabayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kekutanga. Vanhu miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevasere zvine mazana matatu nemakumi masere nechimwe kana kuti 1, 198, 381 vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kechipiri. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kuyedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti chirwere ichi hachichanyanye kupararira zvakanyanya munzvimbo dzange dzichinzi dziri munjodzi huru richiti izvi zvakakonzerwa nedzidziso iri kupihwa nezvechirwere ichi. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nemusi weMuvhuro svondo rapera vakawedzera nguva yekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba nemamwe mavhiki maviri vachiti kunyangwe huwandu hwevari kyabtwa nechirwere ichi have kudzikira, huwandu hwevari kufa huchiri hwakawandisa pane zvinotarisirwa. Vachipawo pfungwa dzavo, munyori anoona nezvehutano mubato reMDC Alliance Dr Henry Madzorera vanoti zvekungoti vanhu vagare mudzimba asi vamwe vachienderera mberi vachiunganidza vanhu vachiita zvematongerwo enyika hazvibatsire. Mamwe madzishe nebato reZanu-PF nevamwe vari mumubatanidzwa wemapato ari muPolitical Actors Dialogue kana kuti POLAD vari kuenderera mberi nekuita misangano kunyangwe veMDC Alliance nevamwe vasiri mugungano iri vari kurambidzwa kuita misangano yavo nemapurisa achiti ari kuda kumisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vakawanda Vari Kutadza Kutora Mari Dzavo Mumabhangi
text: Vanhu vakawanda varikutadza kutora mari dzavo mumabhangi vakatarisana nezororo rekisimusi. Vamwe vevanhu ava vanoti vabva kunzvimbo dziri kure dzakaita seMhangura, Banket neMtorashanga kuzotsvaga mari muChinhoyi asi vaishaiwa. Mumwe wevashaya mari pabhangi reZB ndiVaTapera Gombami vekuMhangura. VaGombami vanoti kushaya mari kuchaita kuti zororo rekisimusi risanakidze sezvo vanenge vasina mari yekufamba. VaGombami vanoti dai vemabhangi vachipa vanhu vose kamari kashoma zvako kuta vawane mari dzekufambisa sezvo vanotakura vanhu vasingade mari yekupihwa mufoni kana kuti ecocash. Mumwe afumira kubata jongwe muromo kubata nzvimbo pamutsetse wekutora mari akaishaya ndiVaMirosi Chipfunde. VaChipfunde vanoti vashaya mari zvekuti havana yekudzokera kumba kwavo nhasi. VaChipfunde vanoti kunyange vachikwanisa kutenga zvinhu zvakaita sezvekudya nenhumbi zvinenge zvichidhura uye vanenge vachida mari yekufambisa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemari, VaPersistance Gwanyanya, vanoti havashamiswe nemitsetse pamabhangi munguva ino yezororo rekisimusi asi vanoshushikana nenyaya yamekuti mitsetse pamabhangi ndiwo wavemugariro. VaGwanyanya vakamboshanda mubhangi kwenguva yakareba vanoti havaone dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari richipera sezvo nyika iyine mari shoma kudarika iri kudiwa nevanhu. VaGwanyanya vanoti nyika ine mari inobatika inosvika mamiriyoni mazana maviri emabhondi nemamiriyoni mazana mana emari yekuAmerica zvichienzaniswa nemari ingangodiwa nevanhu nemakabhani inodarika mabhiriyoni mapfumbamwe. Vanhu vakawanda vanoti nekuda kwekushayikwa kwemari zuva rekisimusi richapfuura semamwe mazuva. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Gumi neVashanu Vofa neKudya Hohwa hweMusango Hune Muchetura
text: Vanhu vana kubva kumhuri imwe chete vakafa mushure mekudya hohwa une muchetura kumusha weThandanani kuFilabusi Matabeleland South. Vamwe vanhu vana vanonzi vari kurwara zvakaipisisa vari muchipatara. Izvi zvave kureva kuti vanhu vanosvika gumi nevashanu vafa nekudya hohwa usingafanire kudyiwa nevanhu uhu. Bazi rinoona nezvehutano rinoti vanhu havafanire kungodya chero hohwa hwemusango sezvo humwe huchiuraya. Vamwe vanhu gumi nemumwe vakafawo kuMberengwa, Midlands svondo rapera mushure mekudyawo hohwa hune muchetura.

headline: Mudzimai Osungunukira Muchimbuzi muHarare
text: Vagari vemumusha weGlen View nhasi vasvitsa gwaro renyuto kuna meya weguta weHarare, VaJacob Mafume, vachigunun’una mushure mekunge mumwe mudzimai anogara mumusha uyu, Amai Estina Swaba, vazvarira muchimbudzi chekirinika yekanzuru Glen View Polyclinic, mushure mekunge vakoti vepakirinika iyi varamba kuvabatsira vachiti vaifanira kuenda kuchipata cheSally Mugabe. Izvi zvakatika nemusi weChipiri svondo rapfuura izvo zvakatsamwisa vagari vemumusha uyu. Murume waAmai Swaba, VaBlessing Chaodzemoyo vaudza Studio 7 kuti havasi kufara nezvakaitika. Mumwe mugari wemusha uyu zvakare vari nhengo weCombined Harare Residents Association, Amai Joylin Nyachuru, vati zvinosuwisa kuti vanhu vari kubatwa neseri kweruwoko muzvipatara zvekanzuru. Mugwaro rakasainwa nevagari vanodarika zchiuru nemazana matanhatu, vagari ava yave nguva yakareba madzimai akazvitakura achishungurudzwa paGlen View Polyclinic Zvinonzi vakoti vakati vainge vasingakwanise kuvabatsira nekuti vaida kuzvara mwana mwana weChishanu vachiti kirinika iyi inobatsira vanhu vanozvara mwana wekutanga kusvika pane wechina chete. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemukuru wevakoti mumakirinika nezvipatara zvekanzuru, Matron Amai Perpetua Kaseke. Meya weHarare VaJacob Mafume vatambira gwaro iri vakati vachaongorora kuti zvakafamba sei uyewo vati vachaona kuti makoti vese vapihwa zvikwangwani zvine mazita avo kuti zvikwanise kuzivikanwa kuti ndiana anenge atadza kuita basa. Vatiwo vachabhadhara mari dzese dziri kudiwa muSally Mugabe kudzamara Amai Swaba nemwana wavo vadzokera kumba. VaMafume vati vano zviziva kuti pamabasa pane vamwe vasingaiite basa ravo nemazvo asi vakati chakakosha ndechekuti kanzuru yatambira zvakaitika uye yave kubatsira mhuri. Vatiwo kanzuru yavo ine dambudziko rekushomeka kwevakoti mumakirinika nezvipatara zvayo zvese uyewo vati vakurudzira hurumende kuti ibatsire kanzuru nemari kuti ikwanise kupa vagary hutano hwakanaka. Vagari vakawanda muHarare havasi kufara nebazi rekanzuru rehutano uye madzimai akawanda aka zvitakuura anozvarira panze pemakirinika kana zvipatara mushure mekurambidzwa kupinda muzvipatara izvi zvikuru sei kana huri husiku. Paramende iri kuongorora nyaya iyi uye inotarisira kuburitsa zvakayakwana mutsvakurudzo yayo kunguva ipi zvayo. No media source currently available

headline: Musangano weCODEPA Unopera muBulawayo
text: Vamwe vanoita mabasa emaoko vanoti musangano weCoordination Committee for the Development and Promotion of African Handicraft, CODEPA, wabatsira zvikuru mukushambadza zvavanogadzira, mutauriri wedare reparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, vachitiwo zvakakosha kuti nyika dzemuAfrica dzibatane mukusimudzira mabasa azveigadzirwa zvemaoko. Vachivhura zviri pamutemo musangano weCODEPA VaMudena vati pasi rose mabasa emaoko anowanisa dzimwe nyika mari yakawanda zvikuru. VaMudenda vati nyika dzakadai seChina neIndia idzo dzinotungamira mukuwana mari kubva kumabasa emaoko, dzinokwanisa kuita zvigadirwa zvakawanda panguva imwe chete nekuda kwekushandisa hunyanzvi hwechizvino zvino mukugadzira zvinhu izvi. Vati zvakakosha kuti hurumende dzenyika dzemuAfrica dziise misoro pamwe chete kuti dziwane nzira dzekusimudzira mabasa emaoko sezvo achikwanisa kusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika idzi zvakanyanya. Vachitaurawo pamusangano uyu, gurukota rezvemabhizimisi madiki, Amai Sithembiso Nyoni, vati mari inowanikwa nenyika kubva mukutengeswa kwezvigadzirwa zvinogadzirwa nemaoko yakaderera kubva pamamiriyoni makumi mashanu mugore ra2008, kusvika pamamiriyoni gumi nemashanu muna 2015, vakati izvi zvakakonzerwa nezvirango zvavati zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nenyika dzekumadokero. Chizvarwa chekuSouth Africa, Muzvare Yolanda Msutwana, vanogadzira zvigadzirwa zvakasiyana-siyana kusanganisira zvigaro kubva kumataya emotokari asakara. Muzvare Msutwana vatsinhirawo kukosha kwakaita kuti nyika dzemuAfrica dzibatane muzvinhu zvakadai sekusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika idzi. Kunyange hazvo South Africa isati yave nhengo yeCODEPA, inotarisirwa kuve nhengo yeboka iri munguva pfupi inotevera, uye Amai Lindiwe Zulu vanove gurukota remabhizimisi madiki muSouth Africa vange varipowo pamusangano uyu. Amai Rose Vambe avo vanogadzira mbatya dzinoziikanwa dzichinzi ‘African Attire’ ndemumwe wevanhu vanoita zvigadzirwa zvemaoko vange varipowo pamusangano uyu. Amai Vambe vati musangano uyu wabatsira zvikuru kusimudzira bhizimisi ravo. VaJustice Dzapasi avo vanogadzira zvivezwa zvakasiyana-siyana, vatiwo musangano uyu wavapa mukana wekudzidza kubva kune vamwewo vekunze nevemuno munyika vanoita basa rakafanana neravo. VaEmmanuel Noko vanoshanda nesangano reHand in Hand Zimbabwe iro rinobatsira vanhu, kunyanya madzimai, vanoita mabasa ezvigadzirwa zvemaoko. VaNoko vati musangano weCODEPA, uyo wasvika kumagumo neChishanu, wavabatsira kuti vazive kuti zvigadzirwa zvemaoko zveingatengeswa kupi. Zimbabwe yapiwa husachigaro hwemubatanidzwa uyu uye Amai Nyoni vachiitwa sachigaro kwegore rinotevera. CODEPA ine nyika makumi maviri nenhanhatu dzemuAfrica, chinangwa chiri chekusimudzira mabasa emaoko. No media source currently available

headline: Mabhanga Maviri muZimbabwe Anobviswa paZvirango Zvakatemerwa neAmerica
text: Hurumende yeAmerica yabvisa mabhanga maviri anoti reAgribank nere International Development Bank of Zimbabwe pazvirango zvakatemerwa makambani nevamwe vari muhurumende yeZanu-PF kusanganisira mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. Hurumende yeAmerica yabvisa mabhanga maviri anoti reAgribank nere International Development Bank of Zimbabwe pazvirango zvakatemerwa makambani nevamwe vari muhurumende yeZanu-PF kusanganisira mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. Bazi rinona nezvemari muAmerica re U.S Treasury Department neChina rakati munhu anenge oda kuita bhizimisi nemabhanga maviri aya haachafanire kutanga akumbira rezinesi kuhurumende yeAmerica. America, ichatungamirwa naVaGoerge Walker Bush, yakatemera mamwe makambani nenhengo dzeZanu-PF zvirango muna 2003 ichivapomera mhosva yekutonga nedemo. Zvirango izvi zvinowedzerwa nguva gore rega, uye pakapinda VaBarack Obama mukutonga, vakaramba vachizvichengetedza vachiti zvichabviswa chete kana hurumende yeZanu PF yava kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu pamwe nemitemo yenyika. Asi Zanu-PF inoti zvirango zvakatemerwa nyika mushure mekunge hurumende yagovera ivhu kuvatema. Hurumende yeAmerica yabvisawo zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvange zvakatemerwa zvirango kusanganisa nhengo dzeZanu-PF nhatu dzakashaya dzinosanganisa vaive sachigaro webato iri mudunhu reHarare, VaAmos Midzi, vaiva nhengo yePolitburo VaStanley Sakupwanya uye VaSikhanyiso Duke Ndlovu, vaive gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko. Mudzimai waVaNdlovu amai Rose Jaele Ndlovu uye vamwe vanonzi Amai Nalinee Taveeesin vekuThailand vakabviswawo pavanhu vainge vatemerwa zvirango mushure mekunyora tsamba vachizvichenura. Amai Nalinee vaive gurukota kuThailand vakatemerwa zvirango muna 2008 nekudyidzana kwavo naVaMugabe. Asi vairamba kuti vanodyidzana naVaMugabe vachiti vainge vozorwa mafuta enguruve yavasina kudya vachiti vaingozivawo VaMugabe. Mutauriri weZanu-PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvirango izvi hazvisi pamutemo uye zvinofanira kubviswa zvose kwete muzvidimbu. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vachishanda neHuman Rights Watch, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti America haifanire kubvisa ziso rayo pahurumende yeZimbabwe zvikuru panyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu.  No media source currently available

headline: Botswana Inoti Zimbabwe Inofanirwa Kuzeyiwa neSADC Yose, Kwete Trioka
text: Mutungamiri weBotswana, VaMokgweetsi Masisi, avo vari kutarisirwa kutora mwedzi uno husachigaro hwebazi reSADC Troika rinoona nezvekudzivirirwa nekugadzikana kwedunhu, vanoti nyaya yekumbunyikidzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu muZimbabwe yakora muto naizvizvo inoda kuti iturirwe kuna sachigaro weSADC mutsva, kwete we Troika. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mushure mekunge vapinda musangano weSADC Organ Troika of Politics, Defense and Security, uyo vakaitirwa padandemutande (virtual meeting) neChitatu manheru, VaMasisi vati Zimbabwe yafanira kutora nzira yakatorwa neLesotho makore mashanu apfuura. Makore mashanu apfuura, Lesotho yakaturira SADC nyaya yekusamira zvakanaka kwezvematongerwo nyika munyika iyi mushure mekuuraiwa kwevaimbove mukuru wemauto enyika iyi, VaMaaparankoe Mohao, muna 2015. VaMasisi vati vakatarisira kuti Botswana ichashanda nesimba kuti kuve nerunyararo uye remekedzo yekodzero dzevanhu munyika dziri muSADC panguva iyo vari panyanga sezvo nyika yavo ichizivikanwa nekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. Masangano akawanda kusanganisira reSouthern Africa Trade Unions Coordination Council kana kuti SATUCC, iro rine nhengo munyika gumi neina munyika gumi nenhanhatu dzinoumba sangano reSADC kusanganisira sangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions kana kuti ZCTU, ari kushora kumbunyikidzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu muZimbabwe. Munyori mukuru wesangano iri, Muzvare Mavis Koogotsitse, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti sangano ravo richabatsirana nemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevashandi munyika mukumang’arira Zimbabwe kusangano revashandi pasi rose reInternational Labor Organization kana kuti ILO. Asi vanoona nezvekurongwa kwemabasa mubato rinopikisa reMDC Alliance mudunhu reBotswana iro riri pasi peSouth Africa Province, VaTaurai Mavhoko, vanoti vatungamiri venyika dzemuSADC vanodya mundiro imwe chete, ndosaka vasiri kuda kuomesera mumwe wavo wemuZimbabwe, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Nyanzwi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vari mudzidzisi wemitemo paGaborone University College of Law and Professional Studies, VaCharles Kungwengwe, vaudza Studio7 kuti kuisa nyaya yeZimbabwe kuti izeyiwe pamisangano yeSADC kungabatsira zvikuru. Chizvarwa cheZimbabwen chinorarama nechamuka inyama mudhorobha reGaborone, VaPedzisai Mombeshora, vati yambiro yaVaMasisi ndiyo chete ingapedza mhirizhonga munyika nokuti kupedza nyota kuenda padziva. Sangano reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica raburitsa gwaro richikurudzira SADC neAfrican Union kuti masangano ayo apindire munyaya yekutyorwa kuri kuitwa kodzero dzevanhu nehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Human Rights Watch yati pane vanhu vanodarika makumi matanhatu vakasungirwa kuratidzira kwanga kwakarongwa nesangano re July 31st Movement. Vanhu ava vanosanganisira munyori ane mukurumbira, uyo akadomwa kukwikwidza mubairo weBooker Prize, Tsitsi Dangarembgwa; mutori wenhau, Hopewell Chin’ono, mutauriri weMDC Alliance, Muzvare Fadzai Mahere; murongi we July 31st Movement, VaJacob Ngarivhume, nevamwe vakawanda. Mudzidzi wezvekutorwa kwenhau, Tawanda Muchehiwa, akapambwa akarohwa kusvika itsvo dzake dzakuvara zvokuti achiri muchipatara achirapwa. Human Rights Watch inoti nyaya yekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu inofanirwa kuferefetwa, uye kusunga vanhu vacho vari kutyora kodzero dzevanhu muZimbabwe. Asi munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, vaudza vatori venhau kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe haisi kutyora kodzero uye kupamba vanhu. VaMangwana vati aya mashoko ari kufambiswa nevanopikisa, avo vakanzi naVaMnangagwa nemusi weChipiri, vanhu vari kushanda sematororo muZimbabwe. Musangano weSADC wepagore uri kutanga musi wa 10 kusvika 17 Nyamavhuvhu uchiitirwa padandemutande apo pari kutarisirwa kuti mutungamiri weMozambique, VaFilipe Nyusi, vatore husachigaro hweSADC, ukuwo VaMasisi vatore husachigaro hweSADC Troika. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanokunda Musarudzo yeMutungamiri weNyika
text: Mutungamiri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika mushure mekuwana mavhoti 2,460 463, izvo zvavapa zvikamu 50.8%, vachiteverwa naVaNelson Chamisa veMDC Alliance, avo vawana mavhoti 2,147 436 kana kuti 44.3% musarudzo yakaitwa nemusi weMuvhuro. Izvi zvaziviswa mambakwedza emusi weChishanu nasachigaro veZimbabwe Electoral Commision, Zec, Amai Priscilla Chigumba, pavana vachiudza veruzhinji zvabuda musarudzo iyi vari muHarare. Vatsigiri vebato reZanu PF vafara zvikuru vachipembera mushure mekukunda kwemutungamiriri webato ravo. Vaive gurukota rinoona nezvemutemo muhurumende yapfuura, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, avo vange vakamirira VaMnangagwa musarudzo idzi kana kuti agent, vaudza Studio7 kuti vafara nekukunda kwaVaMnangagwa. Vamwe vanoti vafara zvikuru ndiMuzvare Roselyn Shuro, avo vaudza Studio7 kuti vanoda kuti VaMnangagwa vachiunza shanduko munyika. Asi MDC Alliance yati haitambiri zvabuda musarudzo sezvo pasina kutevedzwa mutemo wesarudzo. Sachigaro weMDC-T inotungamirwa naVaChamisa, VaMorgan Komichi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti Zec haina kutevedza mutemo pakuzivisa zvabuda musarudzo idzi. Mutauriri waVaChamisa, Doctor Nkululelo Sibanda naVaKomichi vamboedza kuvhiringa musangano weZec wekuzivisa zvabuda musarudzo uyu mushure mekunge vatanga kutaura kuvanhu, asi vazoburitswa nemapurisa nechisimba. VaZiyambi vati zvaitwa naVaKomichi zvinonyadzisa asi vati hazvivashamisi nekuti MDC Alliance yakagara yataura kuti haitambiri zvinenge zvabuda musarudzo kana isina kukunda. VaChamisa vakakunda VaMnangagwa zvine mutsindo muHarare umo vakawana mavhoti 548,889 - VaMnangagwa vachiwana mavhoti 204,710. VaMnangagwa vakundawo VaChamisa zvine mutsindo kuMashonaland Central uko vawana mavhoti anosvika 366,785 - VaChamisa vachiwana mavhoti 97,097. Matunhu akabuda seizvi: Harare - VaChamisa 548,889; VaMnangagwa 204,704. Masvingo - VaChamisa 171,196; VaMnangagwa 319,073 Mash East - VaChamisa 189,024; VaMnangagwa 334,617 Mash Central - VaChamisa 97,097; VaMnangagwa 366,785 Midlands - VaChamisa 255,059; VaMnangagwa 350,754 Manicaland - VaChamisa 296,429; VaMnangagwa 292,938 Bulawayo - VaChamisa 144,107; VaMnangagwa 60;168 Mat North - VaChamisa 137,611; VaMnangagwa 111,452 Mat South - VaChamisa 90,292; VaMnangagwa 107,008 Mash West - VaChamisa 217,732; VaMangagwa 312,958 No media source currently available

headline: Kusasununguka kweUpfumi Kwodzikisa Chimiro cheZimbabwe
text: Kusamira zvakanaka kwenyaya dzeupfumi munyika kunonzi kwaita kuti Zimbabwe ive imwe yenyika nhatu dziri pasi dzinonzi hadzina rusununguko munyaya dzezveupfumi. Izvi zvakaburitswa netsvakurudzo yakaitwa nemakambani maviri avana chipangamazano anoti Heritage Foundation ne Wall Street Journal akabatana pamwechete. Tsvakurudzo iyi, iyo inonzi 2015 Index of Economic Freedom, inoratidza kuti Ziri pachinzvimbo chezana nemakumi manomwe neshanu, kubva munyika zana nemakumi manomwe nesere, iine zvibodzwa makumi matatu nezvinomwe. Masangano makuru maviri aya aitarisa zvinhu zvinobata rusununguko rweupfumi zvakaita semitemo yenyika, mitemo yezvemabhizimusi, kuvhurika kwemisika nezvimwe zvakadaro. Nyika nhatu dziri kumashure kweZimbabwe dzinoti Venezuela, Cuba neNorth Korea. Nyika gumi dziri pamusoro dzinoti Hong Kong, Singapore, New Zealand Austria, Canada, Switzerland, Chile, Ireland, Estonia neMauritius. Gore rapera Zimbabwe yaive pachinhambo chezana nemakumi manomwe nenhanhatu, zvichireva kuti gore rino yakakwira nechinzvimbo chimwe chete chete. Kutseketuka kweZimbabwe uku kunonzi kwakakonzerwa nekubatwa zvakanaka kwenyaya dzinosanganisira kushandiswa kwemari nehurumende. Studio7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamsa, kuti tinzwewo divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi nyanzvi mune zveupfumi uye vari mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti Zimbabwe inokwanisa zvikuru kukwira kubva pachinhambo chinonyadzisa chayagara iri ichi kana chete ikabvuma kushandura mitemo yayo inobata zvemabhizimusi. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vakawanda Voenda Kunobayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19 Vachibhadhara Mari
text: Vamwe vagari vekuMasvingo vava kuona zviri nani kuenda kunobayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 munzvimbo dzinobhadhariswa mari sezvo vasiri kubatsirwa munzvimbo dzinobayiwa vanhu nhomba pasina muripo. Mumwe mugari wemumusha weRujeko, VaKnowledge Matumba,vati vakandobayiwa nhomba kuchipatara chisiri chehurumende nekuti vakapedza masvondo maviri vachienda kunomira mumutstse asi vachitadza kubayiwa sezvo zvipatara zvehurumende zviri kubaya vanhu vashoma pazuva. VaMatumba vati kuzvipatara zvisiri zvehurumende hakuna mitsetse uye vanhu vanobhadhariswa mari inosvika madhora maviri ekuAmerica iyo yakatarwa nehurumende. Mumwe mugari, VaJohanes Chihwani, avo vati vakabayiwawo kuchipatara chakazvimiririra vati kunyange kuchibhadhriswa, mari yacho ishoma uye haupedzi nguva yakareba wakamirira kubayiwa. Mutauriri weZimbabwe National Family Planning Council muMasvingo, VaHebert Chikosi, vati vanhu vazhinji vari kuuya kuzobaiwa nesangano ravo senzira yekutiza mitsetse kuzvipatara zvehurumende. Chimwe chipatara chakazvimirira cheCIMAS, chiri kubayawo vanhu muMasvingo asi chinobaya nhengo dzacho dziri pachirongwa chekurapiwa chemedical Aid. Mumwe mushandi ataura ne Studio 7 paCIMAS aramba kudomwa nezita rake nekuti haabvumidzwi kutaura nevatori venhau ati nhengo dzavo zhinji dziri kubayiwa nyore dzisingabhadariswi. Muridzi weMakurira Private Hospital, Dr Phenias Makurira, vati zvipatara zvakazvimiririra zviri kubetsera hurumende chaizvo kutapudza huwandu hwevanoda kubayiwa nhomba vachiti chipatara chavo chiri kutangawo kubaya vanhu svondo rinouya. Mutauriri weCovid-19 Taskforce muMasvingo, VaRodgers Irimayi, vati hurumende inotenda kubatsirwa kwairi kuitwa nevezvipatara zvakazvimirira uye inokurudzira vanhu kuti vaende ikoko senzira yekutapudza huwandu kuzvipatara zvehurumende. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano dziri kukurudzira hurumende kuwedzera nzvimbo dzinobayiwa vanhu nhomba pamwe nekutenga nhomba dzakawanda. Nezuro vanhu makumi maviri nevaviri vakafa nechirwe che Covid-19 munyika izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vanhu vafa pazviuru zvina nemazana maviri nemakumi maviri, 4 220. Vanhu mazana matatu nemakumi masere nevatanhatu, 386 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose pazviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezviviri nemazana maviri nemakumi masere nevasere 122 288. Vanhu vabayiwa nhoba yekutanga munyika vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana maviri nemakumi manonwe nechimwe nemazana manomwe nemakumi maviri nevapfumbamwe, 2 271 729. Vabiawa nhomba yepiri vave miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mana nemakumi maviri nezvinomwe nezana nemakumi mashanu nevapfumbamwe, 1 427 159. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekurwisa denda reCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Masoja Akashungurudza Vanhu kuKwekwe Otarisirwa Kurangwa
text: Nhengo yebato rinopikisa rePeople’s Democratic Party, VaSettlement Chikwinya, vakabatsira neMuvhuro vamwe vagari vemuKwekwe nekusungisa masoja anonzi ainetsa pamwe nekutyora kodzero dzevanhuwo zvavo mudunhu reMidlands. VaChikwinya vanoti vakakwanisa kuita izvi kuburikidza nesdanho rakatorwa nemauto rekuburitsa nhamba dzenhare dzekuti veruzhinji vanogona kufona vasingazivikanwe vachimhang’ara kutyorerwa kodzero dzavo kunenge kuchiitwa nemauto. Vanoti vakamboedza kuti vanhu vakashungurudzwa nemauto ava vamhang'are kumapurisa, asio mapurisa akati akatorerwa masimba nemauto, izvo zvakazoita kuti vashinge kuenda kumauto. Mauto anonzi akashambadza nhamba dzinoti 0712 223 65 95 ne 0712 961 451 kuti dzishandiswe mukumhang’ara uku. VaChikwinya vanoti mushure mekufona manhamba idzi, vakanzi vaende kumahofisi emauto e 5 Brigade HQ ekuBattlefields. Vanoti vakazoenda nemumwe wevanhu vakashungurudzwa nemauto vakanokwanisa kumhang’ara nyaya yavo, uye vakabatwa zvakanaka chose. VaChikwinya vanoti vanofadzwa kwazvo nedanho remauto iri rekuedza kugadzirisa chimiro chawo uye hukama neveruzhinji. No media source currently available

headline: Zvitunha Zvoworera muMamochari neKushaya Magetsi kuMasvingo
text: Zvinhu zvaita manyama amire nerongo pachipata chikuru mudunhu reMasvingo cheMasvingo General Hospital sezvo kudzimwa dzimwa kwemagetsi kwave kupa kuti mitumbi yevanhu iri mumochari iwore. Chipatara ichi chatarisanawo nerimwe rekushomeka zvakanyanya kwemvura zvoomesera vanachiremba kuita basa ravo. Mukuru webasa pachipatara ichi, VaShadreck Zangairai, vaudza Studio 7, kuti dambudziko remagetsi nemvura riri kudzosera kumashure zvakanyanya basa pachipatara ichi. Vanoti pachipatara pari kuswera paine munhuwi wakaipa unobva kumochari nenyaya yekudzimwa kwemagetsi. Vakumbira ZESA kuti isavadzimire magetsi. Vatiwo genareta ravainaro harisi kushanda zvakanaka sezvo rave kuremerwa nekudaro vanoda rubatsiro rwekutenga rimwe rinoti dhonzei. Magetsi ari kudzimwa kunyangwe hazvo gurukota rinoona nezvemhando dzemoto VaFortune Chasi vakati ZESA hayaizodzima magetsi kunzvimbo dzose dzakakosha kusanganisira zvipatara nekunogayiwa mvura. Panyaya yekushomekwa kwemvura, VaZangairai vatiwo chipatara chiri kutopemha kuti chikwanise kucheresa zvibhorani. Mumwe chiremba asina kuda kudomwa nezita ati kushaikwa kwemagetsi nemvura kuri kuvaomesera. Dzimwe hama dzevarwere dzakaita saVaDreck Mujinga, dzinoti dzanzwa nekukumbira mvura kuvanhu vanogara mumusha weRhodene avo vari kutonetsekawo nekuiwana. Studio 7 yashanyira chipatara ichi ikaona hama dzevarwere dzichipinda pachipatara nezvigubhu uye migomo yemvura. Dhorobha reMasvingo rave nemwedzi yakawanda rakatarisana nedambudziko rekushomeka kwemvura zvichikonzerwa nekudzimwa kuri kuitwa magetsi kunocheneswa mvura kuBushemead Water Works. Mvura iyi inenge yadhonzwa kubva kudhamu reMutirikwi. Mumwe murwere, VaKudzai Manatsa vari mu ward yevarume pachipatara apa nechirwere cheshuga vanoti kushaikwa kwemvura kuri kupa kuti zvimbuzi zvisashande zvakanaka. Imwewo hama yemurwere , VaThomas Marume vanoti kushaikwa kwemvura kwavashaisa mufaro. Mayor weguta reMasvingo VaCollen Maboke vanoti dambudziko remvura riri kukonzerwa nekudzimwa kwe magetsi neZESA vachiti vakambozama kutaura neve bazi iri asi zviri kuramba. Vanachiremba pachipatara cheMasvingo ichi havana havo kuramwa mabasa sezvakaita vamwe muHarare neBulawayo asi vanoti havasi kushanda zvakanaka nematambudziko avasangana nawo aya. No media source currently available

headline: Bhanga reCBZ Rinofaindiswa $385m neAmerica
text: Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, Doctor John Mangudya, vanoti vane chivimbo chekuti America ichabvisa mari yezvirango iri kunzi ibhadharwe nebhanga reCBZ iro rinonzi rakatyora mutemo weAmerica une chekuita nezvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru vehurumende muna 2003 vachipomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Hofisi yeUnited States Treasury’s Office of Foreign Assets Control kana kuti OFAC inoti CBZ yakatyora mutemo sezvo yaibatsira vanhu vebhanga reZB iro rainge rakatemerwa zvirango. OFAC yakatanga yati CBZ ibhadhare mari inosvika mabhiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana masere zvemadhora asi mari iyi ikazodzikiswa kusvika pamamiriyoni mazana matatu nemakumi masere nemashanu emadhora mushure mekuchema chema kwakaita CBZ. Doctor Mangudya vati vane chivimbo chekuti mari iyi ichabviswa yose asi vashora zvikuru nyaya yekutemerwa zvirango kwevamwe muhurumende pamwe nemakambani anodyidza nehurumende yeZimbabwe vachiti zvinokanganisa nyaya yemabhizimisi. Asi gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaDewa Mavhinga, vaudza Studio7 kuti Zimbabwe haingaudze America zvekuita maererano nekudyidzana kwenyika mbiri idzi. Vati zviri kuAmerica kuona kuti zvirango zvobviswa here ichionawo nyaya yekuremekedzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Mari Inonzi neCCZ Inodiwa neMhuri paMwedzi Inonzi Inotambirwa neVashandi Vashoma Kwazvo
text: Sangano reConsumer Council of Zimbabwe rinoti kusvika musi wa 09 Chikumi, unove mwedzi uno, mhuri ine vanhu vatanhatu yaida madhora emunyika zviuru makumi mana nemazana matanhatu ane makumi masere nemaviri, kana kuti RTGS$40 682.84, kuti ikwanise kurarama. Asi mutungamiri werimwe sangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti mari iyoyo iri kutaurwa neConsumer Council of Zimbabwe yatove pasi kwazvo pachitariswa kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu. VaMutasa vanoti iyo mari yacho yaidiwa nemhuri kuti irarame hakuna mushandi ari kuitambira sezvo vashandi vari kupiwa mihoro iri pasi kwazvo isina chaichatenga. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo nemunyori mukuru werimwe sangano revashandi, reZimbabwe Federation of Trade Unions, ZFTU, VaKennias Shamuyarira, avo vanoti mhuri ine vanhu vatanhatu yave kutoda mari inoita madhora zviuru zvishanu pamwedzi kuti ikwanise kurara nekuda kwekukwira kuri kuita mitengo yezviinhu. Mukuru werimwe sangano rinomirira vanorarama nekutengesa, reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vanotiwo dambudziko rekushaya mari inokwanira mhuri ratonyanya munyika nekuda kwekuti vazhinji vave kuzvishandira. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti mari yakataurwa neConsumer Council of Zimbabwe inoratidza kuti mutengo wekurarama muZimbabwe uri kuramba uchikwira, zvikuru mushure mekudzikwa kwemutemo weStatutory Instrument 127. Doctor Chitambara vanotiwo mihoro iri kutambirwa nevashandi vakawanda mumapoka mazhinji iri kure kwazvo pachitariswa mari inonzi inodiwa nemhuri yevanhu vatanhatu iyi. Vanoti semuenzaniso, vashandi vemuboka rezvekurima vari kutambira madhora zviuru zvitatu nemazana matanhatu ane makumi mapfumbamwe nematanhatu kana kuti RTGS$3 696.00 pamwedzi, kuchitiwo vari muboka remachira vachitambira madhora zviuru gumi nezitatu pamwedzi, (RTGS$13 000.00), vari mukuvaka vachinziwo vari kutambira madhora zviuru zvisere, kana kuti RTGS$8 000.00. Doctor Chitambara vanoti mari iyi ishoma zvikuru pane inonzi neConsumer Council of Zimbabwe inodiwa kuti mhuri ine vanhu vatanhatu vararame iyi. Saka dambudziko iri ringagadziriswa sei? VaShamuyarira vanoti chasara chinofanirwa kuitwa nevana veZimbabwe kubatana kwevashandi pamwe nevarimi voenda kuhurumende, kwete nnechinangwa chekuibvisa pachigaro, asi kuti vagare pasi vataurirane vese voisa misoro pamwechete. Studio7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvevashandi nemabasa, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, kuti tinzwewo kuti vanoti kudii namararamiro anonzi ari kuita vashandi aya sezvo vanga vasiiri kudaira nharembozha yavo, uye vanga vasati vapindura mubvunzo wedu pataenda pamhepo. Nhaurirano dzemihoro pakati pevashandi nevashandirwi kusanganisirawo vashandi vehurumende, dzinonziwo nevashandi hadzisi kuburitsa chimuko sezvo dzisina kwadziri kuenda. Nekuda kwaizvozvo, nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti vashandi vacharamba vachinoga svosve nemuromo. No media source currently available

headline: Victoria Falls Inokwanisa Kubaya Nhomba Vanhu Vakawanda Zvekukwanisa kuDzivirira Kupararira kweCovid-19
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neSvondo kuti munhu mumwechete akafa neCovid-19 uye vamwe vanhu makumi maviri nevaviri kana kuti 22, vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi. Izvi zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nyika yose pachiuru chimwe nemazana mashanu ane makumi mashanu nevanomwe, kana kuti 1 557. Ukuwo, vanhu vasere, vazhinji vavo vari vana vechikoro, vanonzi vakaiswa kwavo voga (quarantine) kuBulawayo mushure mekuwanikwa kwedenda reCovid-19 pachikoro cheMzilikazi Primary School. Mukuru wezvehutano mudunhu reBulawayo, Dr. Edwin Sibanda, vaudza bepanhau reChronicle kuti vasere ava vakaendeswa kuchipatara cheThorngrove neku Elangeni Training Centre mushure mekuona kuti vamwe vevanhu ava vanogara mudzimba diki izvo zvinovatadzisa kuzogara kwavo voga. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvakachatanga hwakasvika pazviuru makumi matatu nezvisere zvine makumi masere nevatanhatu, kana kuti 38 086. Ukuwo, bazi rezvehutano rakazivisawo kuti vanhu zviuru gumi nezviviri nezana negumi nevaviri, kana kuti 12 112, vakabaiwa nhomba yekutanga neSvondo izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabaiwa nhomba iyi pazviuru mazana matatu nemakumi matatu nezvitanhatu zvine mazana matanhatu, kana kuti 336 600. Vamwe zviuru zvishanu nemazana masere nevanomwe, kana kuti 5 807, vakabaiwa nhomba yepiri zvakasvitsawo huwandu hwevabaiwa nhomba iyi pazviuru makumi mashanu nezvitatu zvine mazana mana negumi nevasere, kana kuti 53 418. Izvi zviri kuuya panguva iyo dhorobha reVictoria Falls rakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vakwanisa kubaiwa nhomba dzose pazvikamu makumi manomwe nezvinomwe kubva muzana, kana kuti 77 percent. Izvi zvinopa kuti Victoria Falls, iyo inonzi ine vanhu vanokodzera kubaiwa nhomba vanosvika zviuru makumi maviri nezvishanu, kana kuti 25 000, rive dunhu rekutanga munyika kudzivirirwa kubva mukupararira kwedenda iri, kana kuti herd immunity. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, avo vakabaiwa nhomba yavo yekutaga vari kuVictoria Falls, varumbidza zvikuru danho rakatorwa nedhoorobha iri rekubaya vanhu vakawanda kudaro nhomba. Studio 7 yabata mukuru anoona nezvekudzivirirwa kweCovid-19, Dr. Agnes Mahomva kuti tinzwe zvizhinji, asi vati vanga vari mumusangano. Asi mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti zvinofadza chose kuti Victoria Falls yakwanisa kuwana vanhu vakawanda kudaro vabaiwa nhomba, asi vanoti dhorobha iri rakakwanisa kuita izvi sezvo rakangotanga nekubaya munhu wese. VaRusike vanoti mamwe madhorobha nemaguta vakatanga kubaya nhomba iyi muzvikamu zvikamu, izvo zvakaita kuti vanhu vaibaiwa vave vashoma. Asi vanoti kubayiwa nhomba kwevanhu vanosvika zvikamu makumi manomwe nezvinomwe kubva muzana uku kunogona kushaya basa kana vashanyi pamwe nevanhu vanobva munzvimbo dzakapoteredza dhorobha iri vasina kubaiwawo sezvo vachikwanisa kusiya zvakare hutachiwana hweCovid-19 pavanopinda nekubuda mudhorobha iri. Dhorobha reVictoria Falls rinonzi rakawaniswa nhomba inoita makumi matanhatu ezviuru, zvichireva kuti vagari vanosvika makumi matatu ezviuru vanokwanisa kubaiwa nhmbo dzose dziri mbiri. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weSouth Africa, VaRamaphosa, Vanodimurira Rwendo Rwavo kuUNGA Panzira Vomhanyira Kumusha Kunogadzirisa Dambudziko reMagetsi
text: Mutungamiri we South Africa, VaCyril ramaphosa, vamanikidzwa kudimurira rwendo rwavo rwekumusangano weUnited Nations General Assembly kuNew York svondo rino nekuda kwedambudziko rinonzi rabata nyika yavo rekudzimwa-dzimwa kwemagetsi, uko kunonzi kuri pa stage 6. Mutauriri waVaRamaphosa, VaVincent Ngwenya, vakazivisa neSvondo kuti VaRamaphosa, avo vari ku Britain kurufu rwaMambokadzi Elizabeth Vepiri, vave kubva vangodzokera kumusha mushure mekuvigwa kwaMambokadzi, kwete kunanga ku New York kumusangano weUNGA sezvakanga vakaronga. Aka hakasi kekutanga kuti VaRamaphosa vadimurire rwendo rwavo pakati nekuda kwedambudziko remagetsi. Muna 2019, vakadimurira zvakare rwendo rwavo kuEgypt pakati mushure medambudziko rimwechetero remagetsi. Kambani yemagetsi ye eskom inonzi iri kunetseka zvikuru kuwanisa nyika magetsi anoikwanira. T Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, vachidzidzisa paTswane University of Technology, Muzvinafundo Ricky Munyaradzi Mukonza, vanoti vanoona sekuti VaRamaphosa vatora danho rakakodzera rekuti vadzoke kumusha kunoona nezvedambudziko iri vari pamwechete nezvizvarwa zvenyika yavo, sezvo matambudziko ose achizongoguma aiswa pamakumbo pavo. No media source currently available

headline: Nhengo dzeZanu PF Dzoratidzira Dzichiti Sarudzo dzeMubato Ngadzidzokororwe
text: Dzimwe nhengo dzeZanu PF dzaratidzira pamuzinda webato iri dzichiti dziri kuda kuti sarudzo dzekutsvaga nhengo dzichamirira bato ravo musarudzo dzenyika dzidzokororwe zvichitevera kusafamba zvakanaka kunonzi kwakaita sarudzo idzi. Dzimwe nhengo dzeZanu PF dzinobva munzvimbo dzakasiya-siyana dzaungana pamuzinda webato iri neChina mangwanani padzaratidzira dzakatakura zvinyorwa zvakasiya-siyana dzichiti hadzisi kufara nemafambisirwo akaitwa sarudzo dzema primary mubato radzo. Vanhu ava vaimba zvakaomarara vachiti sarudzo dzekutsvaga vachamirira bato kuHatfield, Goromonzi North, Goromonzi South, Mbare, Harare South nedzimwe nzvimbo dzinofanira kudzokororwa sezvo dzichiti sarudzo idzi hadzina kufamba zvakanaka. Mumwe wevanga vachiratidzira ava, VaWilson Nyamuchena, avo vanogara kuHatfield, vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaDanny Masukume havana kukunda musarudzo dzavakaita neMuvhuro vachiti VaDaniel Makanga ndivo vakanga vachidiwa nevatsigiri vakawanda. VaNevson Dube vanotiwo vanhu vakawanda vakarambidzwa kuvhota pasarudzo idzi munzvimbo dzakawanda vachiti vanhu vave kunzi vamirire bato iri musarudzo vanhu vasina rutsigiro rwenhengo dzebato. Amai Beula Chinyika vanotiwo kuGoromonzi kwakaitika mashura apo Amai Petrolla Kagonye vanove gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi vakanzi ndivo vakunda musarudzo ivo vachinzi vakanga vakundwa. Mumwe wevabva kuGoromonzi kuzoratidzira pamuzinda weZanu PF, VaGenius Garande, vati Amai Kagonye vakabirira VaOzwell Gwanzura zviri pachena vachiti migoro yakange yakatakurirwa mavhoti yakambobuditswa mumba yaaiverengerwa ikazodzoka zvave kunzi ndivo vakunda. Muzvare Tracy Nyamapfeni vekuMbare vatiwo kubirirwa kwakaitwa sarudzo kwakaitwa kuchishandiswa mapurisa ayo anonzi ndiwo aivhotesa vanhu musaridzo dzeZanu PF idzi. VaTendai Savanhu ndivo vari kunzi vakakunda kuMbare asi vatsigiri vebato iri vanoti VaSavanhu vakangodzimikirwa kuvanhu ivo vakundwa musarudzo. Vamwe vakakundwa musarudzo idzi ndiVaChristopher Mutsvangwa vanove mukuru wesangano revaimbova varwi vehondo yerusununguko uye vari chipangamazano muhofiis yemutungamiri wenyika. VaMutsvangwa vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti havasi kufara nemafambisirwo akaitwa sarudzo kuNorton uko kwavaikwikwidza vakati vachiri kubanatidza humbowo hunoratidza kuti sarudzo dzakabirirwa sei ku Norton hwekuratidza murongi wemisangano mubato ravo, VaEngelbert Rugeje. Vanga vachiratidzira ava havana kukwanisa kuona VaRugeje avo vanga vachinzi vari muhofisi mavo vachitambira zvichemo zviri kunzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana munyika yose uko kunonzi sarudzo idzi hadzina kufamba zvakanaka. Patavabata parunhare, VaRugeje vati vari mumusangano vakati tigozovafonera mukupera kwezuva. Varatidziri ava vatiwo kana nhuna dzavo dzikasatambirwa vanogona kuvhotera mapato anopikisa musarudzo dzenyika dzakatarisirwa kuitwa mumwedzi mishoma iri kutevera. No media source currently available

headline: ILO Yoyambira Zimbabwe nezveKushandiswa kweFacebook neWhatsApp Mukunyengedzwa kweVanhu Kuenda Muhunhapwa
text: Mumwe mukuru muhofisi yesangano reInternational Labour Organization kana kuti ILO muZimbabwe neNambia akaudza komiti yedare reSenate muHarare nhasi kuti vamwe vanhu vanoshambadzira mabasa pamadandemutande akaita seFacebook ndivo vari kukwezva vanhu kuti vagume vapinda muhunhapwa kana kuti human trafficking. VaAdolphus Chinomwe, mukuru weILO vaudza komiti yedare reSenate kuti madandemutande mazhinji ari kushandiswa anenge asina kunyorweswa zviri pamutemo. Vanhu vanenge vanyeperwa kuti kune mabasa vanozoguma vobatwa senhapwa kana kubatwa chibharo. Vatiwo madandemutande akaita seFacebook, Twitter neWhatsApp ndiwo avewo kushandiswa zvakanyanya nemakoronyera aya kukwezva vanhu kuenda kunze kwenyika vachivimbiswa mabasa anobhadhara mari yepamusoro kana kuvimbiswa nzvimbo dzechikoro. VaChinomwe vati basa rekutengesa vanhu kana kuti human trafficking, rine mari yakawanda chose zvekuti pagore rega rega pasi rese rinoburitsa mazana matanhatu emabhiriyoni emadhora. VaChinomwe vati zvakakosha kuti dzihurumende dziongorore vanhu vanoita izvi. Vanotiwo zvakakosha kuti hurumende inyorese kana kuvanechekuita nevanhu vayo vanenge vachibuda munyika vachiti izvi zvinogona kubatsira kuti vaye vanenge vachishanda kunze kana vachinge vapinda mumatambudziko vakwanise kuwana rubatsiro. Vaenderera mberi vachiti nyaya yekubuda kwevanhu munyika vachinotsvaga basa kana kuenda kunoshanda inonetsa nekuti kazhinji kazhinji vanhu vanongobuda munyika vasina kutaura kwavari kuenda uye vamwe vanongoenda vasina ruzivo rwekwavanoenda. VaChinomwe vati handi vashandi vemumba chete vanobatwa chibharo kana kushandiswa senhapwa vachiti kana vanhu vakadzidzira mabasa avo mumakoreji nemaUniversity pamwe nevatambi vebhora nemimwe mitambo vari kubatwa nemambure aya. Vatiwo zvinonetsa kurambidza vanhu kuti vasabude munyika kunotsvaga mambasa sezvo kuita izvi kuri kutyora kodzero dzavo. Sachigaro vekomiti iyi, Rtd General Mike Nyambuya, vati komiti yavo inoshushikana chose nekubuda kwevanhu munyika vachinobatwa chibharo kunze kwenyika uye vanoti vari kuita ongororo yekuona kuti kodzero dzevanhu vemuZimbabwe hadzisi kutyorwa here. VaChinomwe vati nyika inogona kuwana mari yakwanda chose kana ikaronga nekuona kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinoshanda kunze zvagara zvakanaka. Gore rapera munyika makamboita dambudziko guru mushure mekunge mamwe madzimai apinda muhunhapwa kunyika dzakaita seKuwait neSaudi Arabia. Hurumende yakatozomanikidzwa kuti ipindire mushure mekunge vakawanda vachema chema nemabatirwo ezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe izvi. Zvinofungidzirwa kuti vanhu vari pakati pemamiriyoni makumi maviri nematatu vari muhunhapwa munyika dzepasi rino. Bazi reUnited States Department rinoti vanhu vari pakati pezviuru mazana matanhatu kusvika zviuru mazana masere vanopinzwa muhunhapwa vanosvika makumi masere kubva muzana vari madzimai uye vamwe vakawanda vari vana vadiki. No media source currently available

headline: VeMDC-T neZanu-PF Votatarika Kuita Sarudzo dzemaPrimary Zvoshorwa neVakawanda
text: Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika pamwe neveruzhinji vanoti kunyunyuta kuri kuita vatsigiri vemapato makuru munyika eZanu PF neMDC-T inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa pamasarudzirwo ari kuitwa vachamirira mapato aya musarudzo kunoratidza kuti mapato aya haasi kuita zvinhu pajekerere. Bato riri kutonga reZanu PF rakaita sarudzo dzemaprimary svondo rapfuura idzo dzakasiya vazhinji mubato iri vasina mufaro. Sarudzo idzi dziri kuitwa zvekare mune mamatunhu umo dzisina kufamba zvakanaka. MDC T yaChamisa iri kuita chirongwa chekuti vanoda kumirira bato iri vataurirane uye muHarare veruzhinji vakaramba izvi pamisangano yakaita mhirizhonga, nekupopotedzana. Sezvaitika muZanu PF vamwe vanoti mazita avo akabviswa pavanhu vachakwikwidza zvisina tsananguro asi vakuru vebato iri vanoti vari kutevedza gwara resarudzo ravakabvumirana. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Tafadzwa Shumba, audza Studio 7 kuti zviri kuitika mumapato makuru aya zvinoratidza kuti mapato aya haasarudze vatungamiriri vawo pajekerere. Izvi zvatsinhirwa naVaOwen Dhliwayo avo vati matambudziko aya ari kukonzerwa nevakuru vakuru mumapato aya avo vari kusima vanhu vavanoda munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana. Vanoti semaonero avo izvi zvinogona kukanganisa mapato aya musarudzo. Mutungamiriri webato rinopikisa reDemocratic Party, Dr Wurayayi Zembe, uye risiri kukwikwidza musarudzo dzegore rino, vaudza Studio7 kuti hapana zvinoshamisa pane zviri kuitika mumapato maviri aya nekuti haana tsika yekudoma vanoamirira pajekekere. Zanu PF yave mutungamiriri mutsva zvichitevera kubviswa pachigaro kwevaive mutungamiriri webato iri, VaRobert Mugabe, gore rapfuura. MDC T yavewo nemutungamiri mutsva zvichitevera kufa kwevaive mutungamiriri webato iri, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, muna Kukadzi gore rino. Mukuru wePlatform For Youth Development, VaClaris Madhuku, vanoti kunetsana kuri kuitika mumapato maviri aya kunogona kupinda musarudzo dzemunyika. Vati zvinosuwisa kuti zviri kuitika muZanu PF ndizvo zvave kuitika muMDC-T. Vanoongorora zvematongwero enyika vakazvimirira, VaVivid Gwede, vaudza Studio7 kuti zviri kuitika muZanu PF neMDC-T zvinoratidza pachena kuti nyika ichiri kumashure panyaya dzekuita sarudzo dzakachena. Vamwe vakakundwa musarudzo dzeprimary dzeZanu PF vakatozivisa kuti vachakwikwidza musarudzo dzenyika vakazvimirira. MuMDC-T mune vamwe vasiri kufara nemafambisirwo ari kuitwa zvinhu uye vari kumirira bato iri kuHarare West, Muzvare Jessie Majome, vazivisa nhasi kuti vachakwikwidzqa vakazvimirira sezvo vari kupokana nezviri kuitika mubato ravo. VaMadhuku vatiwo veruzhinji havafaniri kungovhotera munhu nekuti ndewe bato ripi uye vanofanira kuvhotera vanhu vanokwanisa kuvamirira kunyange vasina mapato vaanomirira. Zvichakadai veZimbabwe Electoral Commission nhasi vazivisa nzvimbo dzekuti veruzhinji vaenda kunoongorora mazita avo mugwaro revavhoti kana kuti Voters Roll mumatunhu ose munyika kutanga musi wa 19 mwedzi uno. ZEC yazivisawo kuti vanhu vachange vachikwanisawo kuita izvi pambozhanhare dzavo. No media source currently available

headline: VaMthuli Ncube Voparura Bhajeti reZWL$4, 2 Trillion
text:
Gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube nhasi vaparura bhajeti regore rinouuya reZWL4.2 trillion vachitarisira kuti hupfumi hwenyika huchakura nezvikamu zvitatu nechidimbu kubva muzana kana kuti 3,5%,.

VaNcube vati hurumende inotarisira kuwana ZWL$3.9 trillion dollars yemuno asi inotarisira kushandisa ZWL$4.2 trillion uye vanenzira dzavachandisa kuti mari iyi ikwane.

Vati zvinangwa zvikuru zvebhajeti ravo zvinosanganisira kutsigira mabasa ekurima, kusimudzira mabasa ezvicherwa, hutano ndezidzo.

Vati nekuda kwaizvozvo vapa mari yakawanda kubazi redzidzo yepasi.

Basi redzidzo yepasi rapihwa ZWL$631 billion yemadhora emuno inova mari yakawanda kudarika mamwe mapazi.

Pamakomisheni ese Zimbabwe Electoral Commission ndiyo yawana mari yakawanda, 76 billion. yemadhora emuno kuti igadzirire sarudzo dzegore rinouuya.

VaNcube vatora mamwe matanho ekuwedzera kana kubvisa mitero yakaita seValue Added Tax iyo yawedzerwa kusvika pazvikamu gumi kubva muzana.

Vadzorawo mutero pachikafu chinotengwa kunze kwenyika. Mutero uyu wainge wambobviswa senzira yekurerutsira veruzhinji kuti vatenge chikafu chinemutengo uri pasi.

Vaimbove gurukota rezvemari VaTendai Biti veCCC vachimirira Harare East vaudza Studio 7 kuti varwadziwa kuti VaNcube vawedzera mitero, inobata varombo.

VaBiti vati bhajeti iri ringadai raitwa pachishandiswa madhora eku America

Vanokokera nhengo dzeMDC - T muparamende, VaDavid Tekeshe, vachimirira Makoni Central vatiwo bhajeti ravaNcube harina matanho anopedza kutambura kweveruzhinji munyika.


Asi muzvinabhizimisi zvakare varisachigaro weGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe VaTafadzwa Musararavati vanofara chose nematanho atorwa naVaNcube mubhajeti ravo.


Nhengo yeZanu PF yekuMashonaland East Amai Tatenda Mavetera vanoti vafara kuti mapazi edzidzo yepasi nerehutano ndiwo awana mari yakawanda.


Bhajeti richazeiwa neparamende kutanga musi 6 mwedzi unouya uye rinogona kupaswa sezvariri kana kusandurwa semaonero anenge achiita nhengo dzedare reparamende. No media source currently available

headline: Amai Jennifer Rupiya Voshura Mare neKuveza Masofa neZvimwe muHarare
text: Mumwe mudzimai wemuHarare Amai Jennifer Rupiya vakatanga bhisinesi re kuveza mugore ra 2010 kunyangwe hazvo vainge vasina kuzvifundira. Asi parizvino vave nyanzvi mubasa ravo kunyangwe zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka panyaya yehupfumi. Amai Rupiya vakataura nenhepfenyuro yeReuters nezve basa ravo. Amai Rupiya mumwe wemadzimai mashoma munyika vari kuita basa rekuveza masofa nezvimwe zvinoshandiswa mudzimba. Mahofisi avo ari kumucheto kweguta reHarare. Vakatanga kambani yavo inonzi Charlywood Investments makore matanhatu apfura mushure mekumboita bhizimisi rekutengesa zvidyiwa. Asi mushure mekuona zvaiitwa nevamwe vakabva vakwezva kuti vadewo kuita basa rekuveza. Vakabva vatanga kudzidzira kubva kune vamwe vari mudzimai ega pabasa rinowanzoitwa nevarume. Amai rupiya avo vane makore makumi mana neshanu (45) vanoti zvange zvisiri nyore kupinda mubasa iri sezvo vamwe vanhu vasingadi kuti basa ravo riitwe nemunhukadzi. Asi vanoti havo vaiwana kurudziro kubva kune vamwe vaiuya kuzogadzirwa midziyo yakaita semasofa . Masofa aAmai rupiya anotengeswa nemari inotangira pa $100 kusvika ku $1000. Vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matanhatu munyika vanonzi vave kuzviitira mabasa emaoko nekuda kwekusamira zvakanaka kwakaita zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Zvitoro zvizhinji zvine mukurumbira munyika zvakavhara uye parizvino zvavekushandirwa nevanhu varikuzviitira mabasa emawoko. Kushaikwa kwemari nekushaikwa kwehutongo hwejekerere zvinonzi zvakonzeresawo kusagadzikana kwezvinhu munyika. Kunyangwe zvinhu zvirikuramba zvichiwona Amai Rupiya avo vane vana vatatu vanoti shuwiro yavo ndeyekuti bhizinesi ravo rirambe richifamba zvakanka kunyanya panguva ino yezororo yekusimusi. Kambani yavo ye Charlywood Investments ine vashandi vatatu vanopota vachiuya kana basa rakawanda. Vamwe vanoshanda naamayi Rupiya Va Enoch Manhunha vanoti kubudira kwavo kunoyemurika. Mumwewo muvezi VaRonny Katerere vanoti varikufarawo nemashandiro avo. Amai Rupiya vanokurudzira mamwe madzimai kuti ayedzewo mamwe basa anozivikanwa sevarume sezvo izvi zvichizovapa mukana wekuratidza hunyanzvi hwavo mune mabasa ese ese. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Vosvika kuSouth Africa kuMusangano weSADC
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vasvika muSouth Africa kumusangano weSADC Summit wechimakumi makumi matatu nenomwe. Mamwe makurukota kusanganisa gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika VaSimbarashe Mumbengegwi vatori kumusangano uyu kare kunopinda mumisangano yamakurukota yapera nhasi. Dingindira remusangano uyu rakanangana nekuunza mushandirapamwe pakati pehurumende nevemabhizimisi.  Musangano weSADC uri kutanga Mugovera uchipera nemusi weSvondo. Mutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaJacob Zuma ndivo vanenge votora chigaro chekuva sachigaro weSADC kubva kuna Mambo Mswati vechipiri vekuSwaziland. Musangano uyu uri kutarisirwa kuva wakaomera VaMugabe nenyaya yemudzimai wavo Amai Grace Mugabe avo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekurova mumwe musikana, Gabriella Engel ainge aine vanakomana vavo Chatunga Bellamin naRobert Junior yakonzera mutauro munyika yeZimbabwe nepasi rose. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachidzidzisa paMulungushi University kuZambia VaShakespear Hamauswa vanoti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvine mukana wekukurudzira SADC kuti itaure nezvesarudzo dzichaitwa gore rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzinoti Huori neMitemo Isina Kujeka Zvodzosera Nyika Kumashure paNyaya yeZvicherwa
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanoti chido chavo ndechekuti zvicherwa zviunze mari inosvika mabhiriyoni gumi nemaviri panosvika gore ra2023. VaMnangagwa vakataura mashoko aya svondo rapera pakunyoreranwa kwechibvumirano chekuchera lithium pakati pekambani yekuChina ye Zhejing Hayou Cobalt neyekuAustralia inonzi Prospect Resources Limited. Kambani yekuChina yakabhadhara mari inosvika mamiriyoni mazana mana nemakumi maviri nemaviri kana kuti US422 million. Mugodhi weLithium uyu unonzi Arcadia Mine. Ko Zimbabwe yakakomborerwa nezvicherwa zvakaita segoridhe, Lithium, koromo, mangoda, platinum nezvimwe ingakwanise kuona chouviri sei pazviri uye nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinooona sei chibvumirano chitsva ichi? Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vanoti chibvumirano ichi chakakosha asi vanoda kuita zvechioko muhomwe ndivo vanopa kuti vanhu vasade kupinda munyika kuzotanga mabhizimisi. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Doctor Prosper Chitambara vanoshanda nesangano eeLabour and Economic Development Research Institute avo vatiwo zvinorwadza kuti nyika haina zvakawanda zvairi kuwana mukutengesa zvivanikwa vakati panoda kuumbwa masangano ekuti pasaitwe huori. Vatiwo makambani akawanda anochera zvicherwa ari kunzi ambomira kubhadhara mitero zvopa kuti nyika inyanye kurasikirwa nemari. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reAnti Corruption Trust of Southern Afica VaAlois Chaumba vanoti zvakakosha kuti pazvibvumirano zvakadai, hurumende inyatsobude pachena kuti zvinofamba sei pazvibvumirano zvakadai kumisa nyaya dzehuori. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi VaVictor Bhoroma vanoti Zimbabwe inofanira kukurudzira vekunze kuti vakwenenzvere zvicherwa zvavo munyika kuti nyika iwane mari yakawanda nekuvamba mabasa. Zimbabwe iri kuyedza kuita chibvumirano chakadai nekamabani yeZimplats kuti ikwenenzvere chiwanikwa ichi munyika kuti nyika iwane chouviri. Asi izvi zvave nemakore akawanda zvichiyedza kuitwa kubva mushakabvu Robert Mugabe vachiri mutungamiri wenyika. Sezvo Zimbabwe iri makara asionane nedzimwe nyika dzakabudirira dzakatemera vatungamiri venyika zvirango, makambani ekuChina akawanda ndivo ave kuchera zviwanikwa munyika zvinosanganisira mangoda kwaMarange nezvimwe. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi , Vashandirwi Vopesana paBhiri Richavandudza Mutemo weMabasa neVashandi
text: Gweta riri kumirira vashandi veZuva Petroleum vakadzingwa basa, Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku, vanoti vanotambira nemaoko maviri bhiri rehurumende iro riri kuda kuvandudza mutemo wevashandi nemabasa. Bhiri iri riri kutarisirwa kununura vashandi vanodarika makumi maviri ezviuru avo vanonzi varasikirwa nemabasa kusvika pari nhasi zvichitevera mutongo wakapiwa nedare reSupreme Court mwedzi wapera. Bhiri iri riri kutarisirwa kupinda mudare reparamende nemusi we Chipiri, rozonzwikwazve mudare reseneti nemusi weChina. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vanozotarisirwa kuisa runyoro rwavo pabhiri iri chero nguva kubva nemusi weChishanu kuti uve mutemo. Kana rave mutemo, bhiri iri rinotarisirwa kubatsira vashandi vakadzingwa mabasa vakaenda vasina chekupukutisa dikita, kuti vakwanise kupiwa mihoro yemasvondo maviri pamagore roga-roga ravakagara pabasa. Muzvinafundo Madhuku, avo vanotungamirawo bato reNational Constitutional Assembly, NCA, vanoti chakangoipa chete pabhiri iri ndechekuti riri kuda kuti vashandi vakamiswa mabasa vapiwe mari shoma kana pachitariswa zvavakaitira makambani akavamisa mabasa aya. “Mutemo wakanaka chose,” Muzvinafundo Madhuku vanodaro. “Ndizvo zvatagara tichifunga kuti mutemo wedu unofanirwa kuita.” No media source currently available Asi mukuru wesangano revashandirwi reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, EMCOZ, VaJohn Mufukare, vanoti bhiri iri ramhanyiswa zvakanyanya pasina kutarisiswawo huipi hwaro, izvo zvichaita kuti vanoda kusima mari dzavo munyika vasauye. “Handizvo zvakataurwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaMugabe pazuva rekucherechedza magamba,” vanodaro VaMufukare. “Tinofunga kuti pane zvizhinji zvaifanirwa kutanga zvatariswa kuitira kukwezva vanoda kupinda munyika.” No media source currently available

headline: RBZ Yoti Inomira neGwaro reMazita eVanhu Vari Kubira Nyika Mari Vachiburitsa Kunze
text:
Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika Doctor John Mangudya vanoti vanomira negwaro ravakaburitsa revanhu vavanoti vari kubira nyika mari vachiiyendesa kunze kwenyika zvisiri pamutemo. Arthur Chigoriwa anotipa nyaya inotevera. Gwaro rakaburitswa iri riri kushorwa nevakawanda vanoti vaitarisira kuona mazita evakuru-vakuru vezvematongerwo enyika sezvo vakawanda vavo vachinzi vanoendesa mari yehuwori kunze kwenyika. Asi VaMangudya vanoti vanomira negwaro ravo sezvo zviri kuita makabhani aya nevanhu ava zviri kuita kuti vanhu vashaye mari munyika. Panyaya yekuti pane vanhu vari kufungidzirwa nevakawanda kuti vari
kuita zvehuwori vachiburitsa mari, VaMangudya vanoti kana pane anoziva vanhu vacho ngaamhan'are. Mumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi, VaJasper Kawondera, vanoti gwaro rakaburitswa harina mazita evanhu vanofungidzirwa nevakawanda kuti vane mari dzakawandisa kunze kwenyika. VaKawondera vanoti zviri pachena kuti vanhu vakatiza munyika
vakaendesa mari kunze kwenyika zvisiri pamutemo iyo yavave kushandisa
pari zvino. Vanoti kune mazita ari pamiromo pevakawanda asiri mugwaro reRBZ iri, zvikuru vakuru-vakuru muhurumende, nemamwe mapoka ezvemabhizimusi, nematongerwo enyika. Mumwe mushandi weimwe kambani anoda kuzivikanwa nezita rekuti
Tambudzai anoti mazita akaburitswa mashoma sezvo kambani yavo iyo
inotengesa nzvimbo dzekuvaka dzimba kuvagari vari kunze kwenyika, asi
vachibhadharira mari yekutenga kuBritain. Mamwe makambani nevanhu vakaburitswa mazita avo vanoti zvakabuda mugwaro reRBZ manyepo sezvo vakapedzerana nebhanga guru renyika iri kare. Kunyange vakuru vemakambani varamba kudomwa nemazita vanoti vakapedzerana nebhangi guru renyika. Mumwe mushandi wekambani yeUnilever asina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti zita rekambani yake rakadomwa nekuda kwekusagona basa kwebhangi guru
renyika sezvo vakabhadhara mari yakabuda kare kare. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti vanhu vakaburitswa mugwaro iri vashoma zvichienzaniswa nemari yakambotaurwa iyo inosvika kumabhiriyoni ane chitsama. VaChitambara vanoti hurumende ichine mukana wekuzvichenesa kana ikaita
komishoni inoongorora kuburitswa kwemari munyika nemunhu wese. Kuburitsa mari zvisiri pamutemo kana kuwana mari kunze kwenyika munhu
asingataure kuhurumende mari yaanenge awana kuti abhadhare mutero
imhosva. Vamwe vanoona nezvehupfumi vanoti mitemo yakafanana nekurambidza
vemabhizinisi kudzosera mari yavanenge vashanda kumusha kwavo zvimwe
zvezvinhu zvinodzinga vemabhizinisi vekunze. Mamwe magweta anotiwo zvinonetsa kusunga vakaburitsa mari ava sezvo mutemo wacho usina kujeka. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari veBuhera South Voranga Kuramba Kubhadhara Mitero kuKanzuru Yavo
text: Vagari pamwe nevemabhizimusi vekuBirchenough Bridge kudunhu reBuhera South, kuManicaland, vari kunyunyuta nekushaya budiriro kwenzvimbo yavo kunyange hazvo vachiti vari kubhadhara mari dzemitero kukanzuru yavo. Vagari ava vanoti vava nechisungo chekuti vasabvisa mari dzemitero kudzamara vagutsikana nezvavari kuitirwa nekanzuru. Vagari ava vanoti kubva pakatarwa kuti Birchenough Bridge yave imwe dzenzvimbo dzichange dziri kuzosimudzirwa kuitwa madhorobha maduku makore anoda kupfuura makumi maviri adarika, hapana chinobatika pabudiriro chakaitwa nekanzuru. Venharaunda iyi vanoti Birchenough Bridge pamwechete neMurambinda Growth Point zvakatangirana pamwechete pakupiwa chidanho chekuti zvive mizinda yebudiriro kumaruwa asi Birchenough Growth Point yakasarira kwazvo. Amai Mercy Saize Mtsveta mumiriri wavana muzvinabhizinesi paBirchenough Growth Point. Amai Mtsveta vanoti kunyangwe vachiziva kuti nzvimbo yavo yakatangwa kudomwa kuti ichange ichizova ichisimukira, hapana chiri kufamba asi uku ivo vachibvisa mari kukanzuru yavo yeBuhera Rural District Council. “Kuno kuBirchenough, kuBuhera South takasungwa neCouncil nendaa yeGrowth Point ino zvichinzi tinoda maDevelopment Levy but maDevelopment Levy acho anoshandi chinyi asi imo muno muri mudondo? Vanotora mari dzedu muno vachinodzishandisa kwaMurambinda, izvozvi Murambinda yava taundi, but Murambinda isecond pamaGrowth points emuno muBuhera, Birchenough ndiyo growth point yekutanga. Nyangwe mukanozvitarisa pakubvisa mari dzemarates isusu kuno veBirchenough tiri number one pakubvisa uye nemitero yacho yemashops, but hapana kana chimwechete chatakaitirwa chinotaridza kuti mari dzedu pane chedzinoshanda.” Muzvinabhizinesi ava vanoti nekuda kwenyunyuto dzevagari, varovera mwoyo kudombo kuti vave kumbomira kubvisa mari dzemitero kukanzuru yavo. Amai ava vanoti paifanirwa kunge paine musika wemabhazi hapana kana nechimbuzi chekuti vanhu vazvibatsire, asi kanzuru iri kungovabvisisa mari kwemakore nemakore. VaFrancis Magaa ndivo sachigaro vevagari vekuBirchenough Bridge Growth point. VaMagaa vanoti vanogarochema nekanzuru yavo pamusoro pekusarira kuri kuita nharaunda yavo mune zvebudiriro. “Zviri kutitambudza ndaa yekuti growth point yedu iyi zvatinobhadhara zvinoenda kunotorwa zvoenda kwaMurambinda, Murambinda waakutokura isusu kuno takafa asi apo panga pagadzirwa zvakanaka asi patofazve. Handizivi kuti Murambinda chii achitora zvinhu zvedu kuendesa ikoko; kuti ndiko kune mahofisi edistrict here hameno? Isusu tinoda kuti panapa pakure pasimukirewo growth point yedu isumukire, pano pachigara pakafa! Hatichazivi kuti tochemera kupi,” vadaro VaMagaa. VaMagaa vanoti musika wange wovakwa nekanzuru yavo wakaregwa makore gumi apfuura pasina chikonzero chakapihwa asi vagari nevemabhizinesi vachibvisa mari mwedzi wega wega. Vanoti mugwagwa unobva paBirchenough wakananga kwaMurambinda haugadziriswe nenguva izvo zvinoita kuti usafambike; uye chikoro chekanzuru cheBirchenough Bridge Primary hachina makamuri ekudzidzira akakwana. Vemabhizinesi vanotarisirwa kubvisa madhora zana nemakumi maviri pagore, vane misha muGrowth Point vachibvisawo madhora makumi matanhatu. VaZodai Chamutsa mumwe mugari wekuBirchenough. VaChamutsa vanochema nerekuti nzvimbo yavo haina migwagwa yetara zvichienzaniswa neyave kwaMurambinda, uye hakuna magetsi emumigwagwa kanawo ma tower lights, anoita kuti vakwanise kufamba usiku, uye kuderedza njodzi dzekubatwa kwiyo kana kubhinywa. Kanzuru iyi iri kuyambira zvakare vane masitendi munzvimbo iyi ayo vasiri kusimudzira kana kuvaka kuti vachazoatorerwa achitengeserwa vamwe vari kuda zvavo kuvaka nenguva. Studio7 hainda kukwanisa kutaura naMudzviti weBuhera VaChris Mavhisa sezvo vanzi vange vari mumusangano. No media source currently available

headline: Nyaya yeKutemerwa Zvirango neBritain kweVanodzivirira Nyika Yokonzera Mutauro
text: Mumavhiki maviri anotevera, sangano reEuropean Union riri kutarisirwa kuti rizeye zvekare nyaya yezvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru vakuru muhurumende. Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaJoe Biden, vari kutarisirwawo mukutanga kwaKurume kuti vazeyewo zvakare kuti vowedzera here kana kuti kwete zvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vatungamiri vari kupomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Asi semunongedzo wekuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka, hurumende yeBritain yakatemera zvirango gurukota rezvevasori, VaOwen Ncube, mukuru wevasori, VaIsaac Moyo, vaive mutungamiri wemauto ePresidential Guard uye vave mumiriri weZimbabwe kuTanzania, VaAnselem Sanyatwe, pamwe nemukuru wemapurisa, VaGodwin Matanga. Vana ava vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuva nechekuita nekupfurwa kwevanhu gumi nevanomwe vairatidzira kukwira kwemutengo wemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari muna 2019. Asi zvirango zvakatemerwa vakuru ava zvinoshanda here uye zvii zvingaitwe kuti zvibviswe? Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, uye vari mukuru wesangano reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, vanoti vatungamiri venyika vanofanira kugadzirisa hukama nevanhu vemuZimbabwe kuburikidza nekuremekedza kodzero dzavo. Asi nhengo yeZanu-PF vakambotungamira bato rinopikisa reDARE, VaGilbert Dzikiti, vanoti Britain haina kodzero yekutemera Zimbabwe zvirango nekuti haisi iyo United Nations. No media source currently available

headline: Kukwira kweMari dzeMabhazi Kotadzisa Zvimwe Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri muSouth Africa Kudzokera Kumusha kuZororo reKisimusi
text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa zviri kuedza kudzokera kumusha kunopedza zororo reKisimusi negoredzva zviri pamwechete nehama neshamwari, zvinoti zviri kusangana nedambudziko rekudhura kwemari dzekubhadhara kumabhazi, izvo zvinonzi nevamwe zvavatadzisa kufamba. Vemabhazi vanonzi vakakwidza muripo munguva ino yezororo, vane magwaro ekufambisa vachinzi vari kubhadhariswa marandi chiuru nemazana mashanu, kana kuti R1,500.00, kuchiti vasina magwaro vachibhadhariswa marandi chiuru nemazana mapfumbamwe, kana kuti R1,900.00. Vemabhazi nevedzimotokari vanonziwo vari kubhadharisa mari dzakawanda kune vanenge vaine mitoro inoda kuendeswa kumusha. Mumwe mushandi weimwe kambani yemabhazi ari kutakura vanhu kubva kuSouth Africa, yeDivine Luxury Coaches asina kuda kudomwa nezita aramba kuti kambani yake iri kubhadharisa vanhu mari dzakawanda, achiti zvisineyi kuti munhu ane magwaro ekufambisa here kana kuti kwete. Mushandi uyu ati kukambani kwake vanhu vari kubhadhara marandi chiuru nemazana matatu, R1300.00 kubva muJohannesburg kusvika kuHarare, zvisineyi kuti munhu ane magwaro here kana kuti kwete. Mutungamiri wesangano revanotenga nekutengesera kunze kwenyika, reInternational Cross Border Traders Association, VaDennis Juru, vanoti sesangano vari kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vashandise mabhazi kunyange vasina magwaro ekufambisa, kwete kuti vaite zvekusvetuka muganhu zviri kunze kwemutemo. VaJuru vanoti dambudziko riri pakusvetuka muganhu nderekuti vamwe vanopedzisira vaeredzwa nemvura murwizi Limpopo kana kubirwa zvinhu zvavanenge vachienda nazvo kumusha. Vanotiwo sangano ravo rine nhengo dzaro dziri mumiganhu yose yenyika dzakamirira kubatsira veruzhinji vanenge vachida rubatsiro, vachiti nhengo dzavo dzinenge dzakapfeka zvipfeko zvinooneka uye zvakanyorwa. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi vekuMizinda yeNyika Voyawura neKusatambiriswa Mihoro kweMwedzi Yakawanda
text: Vashandi vekumizinda yeZimbabwe pamwe nevamiriri venyika munyika dzakawanda pasi rose vanonzi vari kunonga svosve nemuromo sezvo vachinzi vamwe vatove nemwedzi inodarika mitanhatu vasati vawaniswa mihoro yavo. Izvi zvinonzi zvave kukonzera kuti vamwe vashandi vaburitswe mudzimba dzavari kugara, vamwe vachikundikana kubhadharira vana vavo mari dzezvikoro munyika dzakasiyanasiyana dzavari kudzidza. Vamwe vashandi vekumizinda iyi vataura neStudio 7 vatisingakwanisi kudoma nemazita sezvo vasingabvumidzwi kutaura nevatori venhau, vati havachamboziva kuti remangwana ravo rakamira sei, sezvo pasina kana tarisiro yekuti vanobhadharwa riini. Vashandi ava vati chiri kunyanya kuvarwadza ndechekuti vanoudzwa kunzi nyika haina mari yekunze inodiwa kuti vakwanise kubhadharwa asi vanoona vamwe vakuru-vakuru muhurumende vachiita nzendo dzimwe dzisina kana nekukosha kwese. Mumwe mushandi ati haaonewo njere pakuti hurumende inodoma vamwe vamiriri venyika vatsva iyo ichikundikana kubhadhara vari pamabasa kare. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachangobva kudoma vamiriri venyika gumi nevashanu kutsiva vakaenda pamudyandigere nevamwe vakashaya. Zvinonzi mimwe mizinda yenyika yakatarisana nekuvharwa nekuda kwekukundikana kubhadhara mari dzekushandisa zvivakwa izvi. Kutanga kwegore rino bepanhau reNew Zimbabwe rakazivisawo nezvekuramwa mabasa kwevamwe vashandi vekumuzinda weZimbabwe kuMozambique, vachinyunyuta nekusatambiriswa mihoro yavo kwemakore matatu. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, Ambassador James Manzou, avo vanga vachinzi vabuda muhofisi mavo, kuti tinzwewo divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi sachigaro vekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, vari mumiriri weMakonde, VaKindness Paradza vanoti komiti yavo inoziva nezvematambudziko akatarisana nevari kumizinda yenyika iyi, asi dambudziko guru rakatarisana nenyika ndere kushaya mari yekunze inodiwa pakubhadhara vashandi ava. VaParadza vanoti vave nehurongwa hwekuti vashandi vekumizinda yenyika vese vadzokere pasi pebazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika kuitira kuti zvigove nyore pakuvabhadhara mihoro yavo. Vanoti pari zvino vashandi ava vari kutambira mihoro yavo pamwechete nevamwe vashandi vehurumende vose, danho ravatenda kuti harisi kufamba zvakanaka. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHutano Dzotyira Kuti Kuungana kweVanhu paMabhazi eZUPCO Kuchakonzera Kuparadzirwa kweCovid-19
text: Nyanzvi mune zvehutano vari mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirisa nechimbichimbi dambudziko rechekufambisa vachiti kukundikana kwekambani yeZUPCO kutakura vanhu kuri kukonzera kuungana nekutsikirirana kwevanhu pamisika yemabhazi. VaRusike vanoti izvi zviri kuzoisa vanhu vakawanda munjodzi huru yekutapurirana hutachiwana hunokonzera chirwere cheCovid-19. Vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kuwedzera mabhazi eZUPCO, kana kudzosera mumigwagwa makombi aimbotakura vanhu, poonekwa kuti atevera mutemo wekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Svondo rapera mapurisa akazivisa kuti achange achisunga vedzimotokari dzisiri pasi peZUPCO, uye vafambi vanowanikwa vakakwira motokari idzi vachabhadhariswa madhora zviuru zviviri pamunhu sefaindi. VaRusike vanotiwo nekuda kwekuwanikwa kwehutachiwana hutsva hunokonzera Covid-19 hwe C.1.2 munyika dzakaita seSouth Africa, hurumende inofanirwa kusimbisa nyaya dzedzidziso pamusoro pedenda iri. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neSvondo kuti vanhu gumi nevatanhatu (16) vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika yose, uye vamwe zana nemakumi maviri nevashanu (125) vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi nezuro wakare. Izvi zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose pazviuru zvina nemazana mana ane makumi masere nevaviri, (4,482). Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kubva zvachatanga vakasvikawo pazviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvishanu zvine mazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu (125,550). Vanhu vapora vave zviuru zana negumi nezvitanhatu zvine mazana mana nemumwe, (116,401). Kusvika pakupera kwezuva neSvondo, vanhu vakanga vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 vakanga vave mamirioni maviri ane zviuru mazana manomwe negumi nezvitatu zvine mazana mashanu ane makumi mana nevasere (2 million 713 548). Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba dzose mbiri sezvinokurudzirwa vakanga vave miriyoni imwechete ine zviuru mazana manomwe negumi nezvinomwe zvine mazana mana nemakumi matatu kana kuti (1 million 717 430). Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana, senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi.

headline: Dare Rinombosendeka Mutongo Waro paChikumbiro chaVaHlalo Vakadzingwa muMDC-T
text: Asi munyori mukuru weMDC-T, uye vari gweta riri kumirira bato iri munyaya yaVaHlalo, VaDouglas Mwonzora, varamba mashoko aVaHlalo vachiti bato reMDC-T rine mitemo yakajeka inotevedzerwa nenhengo dzose dzinenge dzine zvichemo. Mumwe mutongi wedare reHigh Court muBulawayo anoti achazivisa munguva inotevera mutongo wake pachikumbiro chakasvitswa kudare iri naVaMatson Hlalo, avo vakadzingwa mubato reMDC-T pamwe nekubviswa pachigaro chekuve seneta weMzilikazi anomirira bato iri. Mushure mekunzwa neChishanu kubva kumagweta aVaHlalo pamwe neMDC-T, mutongi wedare repamusoro, Justice Nokhuthula Moyo, vati vachazozivisa mutongo wavo munguva pfupi iri kutevera. VaHlalo vakakwidza chikumbiro chechimbi-chimbi kana kuti Urgent Application kudare reHigh Court munguva pfupi yapfuura vachida kuti dare iri rimbosendeka parutivi nyaya yekudzingwa kwavo kuve nhengo yedare reseneti uyewo kudzingwa kwavo kuve nhengo yeMDC-T. Muchikumbiro chavo VaHlalo vakatiwo vanoda kuti dare rimbomisa bato reMDC-T kudoma mumwe munhu achavatsiva pahuseneta kusvika nyaya yavo yapera kunzwikwa nedare. VaHlalo, avo vari kumiririrwa naVaGodfrey Nyoni, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanotarisira kuti dare richatambira chikumbiro chavo. Pavabvunzwa kuti havafunge here kuti hazvina zvazvinonyanyobatsira kuti vaendese nyaya iri pakati pavo nebato ravo kumatare, VaHlalo vati zvakakosha kuti bato rakaita seMDC-T iro rinoti rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, riremekedzee mutemo. VaHlalo vati bato reMDC-T harina kutevedzera gwara rebumbiro remitemo yaro pakuvadzinga kwavakaita. Asi munyori mukuru weMDC-T, uye vari gweta riri kumirira bato iri munyaya yaVaHlalo, VaDouglas Mwonzora, varamba mashoko aVaHlalo vachiti bato reMDC-T rine mitemo yakajeka inotevedzerwa nenhengo dzose dzinenge dzine zvichemo. VaMwonzora vati VaHlalo vakapiwa mikana yose yange iripo yekuti vagadzirise nhunha dzavo vachitevedzera gwara rebato reMDC-T asi vakaramba kuita izvi, vachitiwo bato reMDC-T rinotarisra kuti nhengo dzaro dzitevedzere gwara remusangano. VaMwonzora vati kunyange zvavo vasingakwanise kutaurira dare zvekuita, nyaya yaVaHlalo haifanirwe kutemesa dare musoro nekuti kune nyaya dzakawanda dzakaitika dzakafanana naidzodzo vachipa muenzaniso wekudzingwa muparamende kwevaimbove munyoro mukuru webato reMDC-T, VaTendai Biti, nevamwe vane chitsama mushure mekunge vadzingwa mubato reMDC-T. Kusawirirana pakati paVaHlalo nebato reMDC-T kwakatanga mushure mekunge VaHlalo vaenda kumatare vachitsvaga kuti VaGift Banda vabviswe pakuve sachigaro weMDC-T weBulawayo Province, vachiti sarudzo dzehusachigaro idzi dzaive dzisina kufambiswa zvakanaka. Asi bato reMDC-T rakatsigira kusarudzwa kwaVaBanda rikati VaHlalo vaifanirwa kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo vachishandisa gwara rebato reMDC-T kwete kuenda kumatare edzimhosva. VaHlalo vachiri kupikisa kusarudzwa kwaVaBanda mumatare. Vanoziva zviri kuitika vanoti kunetsana kuri kuitika pakati paVaHlalo neMDC-T kuri kukonzerwa nekurwira masimba kuri kuitika mubato iri mudunhu reBulawayo. VaHlalo vanonzi havadiwi nemutevedzeri wemutungamiri we MDC-T, Muzvare Thokozane Khupe, avo vanonzi vari kutsigira Va Banda. VaHlalo vanonzi vari kutsigirwa nevamwe vakuru vebato muBulawayo, avo vanonzi hvasi kutsigira zviri kuitwa naMuzvare Khupe. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanovhura Harare Agricultural Show yeGore Rino Zviri paMutemo
text: Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vavhura zviri pamutemo Harare Agricultural Show vachiti hurumende yavo icharamba ichidzika mitemo nekuita zvirongwa zvinoita kuti munyika muve nechikafu chakakwana. Vachitaura pakuvhurwa zviri pamutemo kweHarare Agricultural Show, mutungamiri wenyika ati vanhu havafaniri kungorima chete asi kuti vanofanira kutora kurima sebhizinesi vachiti kana izvi zvikaitika nyika ichabudirira. Vati hurumende yavo ichadzika mitemo nekuita zvirongwa zvinoita kuti mabasa ekurima abudirire munyika. VaMnangagwa vati zvirongwa zvePfumvudza/ Intwasa, Presidential Input Scheme, Jonh Deree neBelarus ndezvimwe zvezvirongwa zvakanangana nekupedza dambudziko renzara munyika. Vatiwo hurumende iri kugadzira migwagwa kuitira kuti varimi vasanetseke kuwana mbeu pamwe nekuendzesa zvirimwa kumisika. Vatenda Zimbabwe Agricultural Society nekuronga showo kunyange hazvo kuine denda reCovid -19 vachiti izvi zvakakosha nekuti mwaka unotevera unotarisirwa kunge wakanaka. VaTawanda Mangisi vekambani yeSygenta iyo yapa mimwe mibairo nhasi, vati zvakakosha kuti varimi vatambire kana kupinda muzvironga zvehurumende sezvo zviine chinangwa chekuti nyika iwane chikafu chinokwanira munhu wese. Kanzuru yeHarare ndiyo yawana mubairo wekutanga pakurwisa denda reCovid 19. Mutauriri wekanzuru iyi, VaMichael Chideme, vaudza Studio 7 kuti uyu mucherechedzo mukuru webasa guru riri kuitwa nekanzuru yavo. VaEdson Kulungwe vekuGokwe North avo vakawana mbeu yedonje pasi pechirongwa chePresidential Input Scheme vakaburitsa mabhero mazana maviri nemakumi maviri nemana akavawanisa zviuru makumi maviri nezvitatu zvemadhora ekuAmerica ndivo vatora mubairo wekutanga pavairimi vedonje. Vapihwa mubairo wetarakita. Showo yegore rino iri kupinda vanhu vashoma nekuda kwedenda reCovid-19 uye ichapera nemusi weMugovera. No media source currently available

headline: VanaChiremba, Vakoti, Voronga Kuramwa Mabasa Kutanga kweGore
text: Vana chiremba nana mukoti vanoshanda muzvipatara zvehurumende vazivisa hurumende kuti vacharega kuenda kubasa panotanga mwedzi unouya kana vasina kupihwa mari dzavo mwedzi uno waZvita usati wapera. Izvi zvataurwa nemutungamiri wesangano ravanachiremba vemuzvipatara zvehurumende, reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, VaFortune Nyamande, avo vanoti sangano ravo rakabatana nesangano ravana mukoti reZimbabwe Nurses association vanyorera hurumende tsamba vachiizivsa nezvedanho iri. Doctor Nyamande vanoti vanyorera hurumende vachiizivisa nezvedanho ravachatora rekusaenda kumabasa kubva musi wa 1 Ndira gore rinouya. Vanoti ivo nevakoti vemuzvipatara zvehurumende vatora danho iri nezvikonzero zvekushaiwa mari dzekufambisa sezvo vasati vatambira mihoro yavo yemwedzi uno pamwechete nemari dzebhonasi dzavakavimbiswa nehurumende. Doctor Nyamande vashorawo mafambisirwo avanoti ari kuitwa mashoko nehurumende, ekushandisa mapepanhau ichisiya nzira dzagara dziripo kare dzekutaurirana. Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakatozivisa kuti hurumende ichatadza kubhadhara vamwe vashandi vayo gore rino nekuda kwekushomeka kwemari iri kupinda muhomwe dzayo. “VaChinamasa vakashandisa mapepanhau kuti zivisa nezvekushandurwa kwemazuva edu ekutambira mihoro yedu, saka nesu tichashandisawo nzira idzodzo,” Doctor Nyamande vanodaro. Varairidzi, avo vaifanirwa kutambira mari dzavo neMuvhuro, vanzi vave kutambira neChipiri, asi ruzhinji rwose kusanganisira vanachiremba nevakoti, vachinzi vachazowana mari dzavo musi wa 5 Ndira gore rinouya. Asi vashandi vazhinji vehurumende vataura neStudio 7 vanoti havana chivimbo chekuti vanowaniswa mari dzavo pamazuva matsva akatarwa. Takundikana kubata gurukota rezvehutano, VaDavid Parirenyatwa, pamwe negurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Priscah Mupfumira, kuti tinzwe kana pane matanho avachatora ekudzivirira dambudziko ringaitika kana vanachiremba nanamukoti vakaramwa mabasa. No media source currently available

headline: Vekumaruaa Vazhinji Vorarama neZvikwereti Sezzvo Hupfumi hweNyika Hwaenda kuMawere
text: Sangano re Zimbabwe Vulnerability Assessment Committee (ZIMVAC) muongororo yaro yakanzi 2016 Rural Livelihoods Assessment Surveys rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vari mumaruwa huri kutambura nezvikwereti nekuda kwekusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu hwakwira zvakanyanya kusvika pazvikamu makumi masere kubva muzana. Izvi zvinonzi zviri kukonzerwa nekushaya chikafu. Ongororo iyi inoti vazhinji vari mumaruva vari kutengesa midziyo nezvipfuyo zvavo senzira yekutsvaga raramo.
