Nzvimbo dziri kunyanya kutarisana nedambudziko iri dzinosanganisira Matabeleland South ne North, Masvingo, ne Manicaland. Zvikwereti zvakawanda zvinonzi zvange zviri zvekubhadhara mari dzezvikoro nechikafu. Gurukota rinooona nezvemagariro evanhu Amai Prisca Mupfumira vakaudza bepanhau re Herald kuti vari kushanda nematunhu akasiyana siyana kuti vawedzere huwandu hwevari kuwana chikafu kubva kuhurumende. Vamwe Amai vekwaChivi Gogo Matizorofa vanoti ichokwadi kuti vakawanda mumaruwa vari kurarama nezvikwereti. "Ichokwadi zvinhu zvaooma kuno kwaChivi tinotokwereta zvekudya kuzvitoro mwedzi woga woga zvinosvika pa$40 tozopota tichidzosera asi zviri kuramba zvichiwedzera kuoma," Gogo Matizorofa vaudza Studio 7. Gogo Matizorofa vanoti vane vazukuru gumi nepiri nevana vavo vari pamusha sezvo varikushaya mabasa sezvo hupfumi hwenyika hwuri kuramba uchienda kumawere zvinoreva kuti ivo ndivo vanofanirwa kupa mhuri yese zvekudya. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kusanaya kwemvura mudunhu iri nekutsva kwakaita zvirimwa ndiko kuri kuwedzera dambudziko rekukwereta mumaruwa. No media source currently available

headline: Paramende Inoudza IMF Kuti Igadzirise Hukama Hwayo neZimbabwe
text: Asi VaFanizza vati hapana rubatsiro ruchapihwa Zimbabwe kudzamara yabhadhara zvikwereti zvayo kuIMF. Nhengo dzekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvebhajeti nekufambiswa kwemari dzaudza chikwata cheInternational Monetary Fund, IMF, chiri kushanya munyika kuti hadzisi kufara nekuti sangano iri harina zvariri kuita mukubatsira nyika nemari kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe iri kuita zvese zvayakanzi iite pasi pechirongwa che Staff Monitored Program Chikwata ichi cheIMF chaita musangano nekomiti iyi apo nhengo dzeparamende dziri mukomiti iyi dzati hadzisi kufara kuti IMF haina zvairi kuita kuona kuti Zimbabwe yatanga kuwana ribatsiro rwemari kubva kuIMF neWorld Bank. Sachigaro vekomiti iyi, VaDavid Chapfika, vaudza chikwata ichi chiri kutungamirirwa naVaDomeninco Fanizza kuti chirongwa cheStaff Monitored Program chakatanga panguva yehurumende yemunatanidzwa muna 2013 uye kusvika pari zvino chiri kungoenderera mberi. Vati munguva pfupi nyika inenge yave kugadzirira sarudzo uye hapana achazenge ave kutarisa nezvechirongwa ichi kana IMF ikasabatsira nekuti munhu wese anenge ave kuita zvesarudzo. Imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, VaSamson Mukanduri, vatiwo IMF inofanira kudzora moyo kuti Zimbabwe ikwanise kuwana rubatsiro sezviri kuitawo dzimwe nyika dzinotambura. Asi VaFanizza vati hapana rubatsiro ruchapihwa Zimbabwe kudzamara yabhadhara zvikwereti zvayo kuIMF. Vatiwo Zimbabwe inofanira kugadzirisa hushamwari hwayo nenyika dzayakakwereta mari vachiti nyika idzi inhengo dzeIMF uyewo ndidzo dzinotora danho rekuti Zimbabwe yobatsirwa here kana kuti kwete. Vatiwo nyaya iripo haisi nyaya yechikwereti chete asi kuti dzimwe nyika dzinoda kuti Zimbabwe igadzirise nyaya dzekutorwa kweminda sezvayakatsiidza kuti ichaita mubumbiro remitemo yenyika Vanoti havawoni chingatadzise kuti Zimbabwe ibatsirwe neIMF, World Bank nemamwe masangano kana izvi zvese zvikange zvaitwa. VaMasimba Manyanya avo vakamboshanda mubazi rezvemari vanoti nhengo dzeparamende dzine kodzero yekutsutsumwa neIMF sezvo pasina zvavari kuona zviri kuitika pahupfumi kubva pakatanga chirongwa ichi. Vanotiwo hapana ruzivo rwakanyanya pamusoro pechirongwa ichi uye chinodiwa chete inyaya yekuti nyika igadzirise zvinhu zvayo kuti isapedzesera yave kuenda kumasangano akaita seIMF kuti iwane rubatsiro. Zimbabwe ichekwereti chinodarika mabhiryoni masere kumasangano akaita seIMF, World Bank nedzimwe nyika izvo zvave kuitadzisa kuwana rubatsiro rwemari zvinova zvaita kuti hupfumi hwenyika husasimuke. VaFanizza nechikwati chavo vari kuongorora chirongwa cheStaff Monitored Program pamwe nekunzwa pfungwa dzehurumende, vemabhizimisi nemasangano akasiyana siyana uye vachandotura gwaro ravo kubhodhi yeIMF muna Kubvumbi apo pachatorwa danho rekuti Zimbabwe yobatsirwa here kana kuti kwete. No media source currently available

headline: Mukuru weDare raMajastiriti Omiswa Basa neNyaya yaVaKasukuwere naVaMandiwanzira
text: Mukuru wedare ramajistiriti kana kuti Chief Magistrate, VaMishrod Guvamombe, vambomiswa basa nhasi vachiferefetwa nemhosva yekuti vakapa mukana wekudzidzira basa rehugweta kuna VaSavior Kasukuwere naVaSupa Mandiwanzira avo vari kupomerwa mhosva dzehuori pavaive makurukota ehurumende. Imwe mhosva iri kupomerwa VaKasukuwere ndeyekupa nzvimbo yekuvakira dzimba kuhama yaAmai Grace Mugabe, Amai Shuvai Junior Gumbochuma. VaMandiwanzira vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuita kuhuori kuNetOne kambani yhurumende yembozhanhare. Vaviri ava vari kudzidzira hugweta pa University of Zimbabwe. Tsvakiridzo yaitwa neStudio 7 inoratidza kuti vaviri ava vange vari padare reCivil Court uye vakabva vamiswa kushanda svondo rapera naVaGuvamombe mushure mekunge vamwe vakuru vehurumende vagunun’una kuti sei vainge vapihwa mukana wekuenda kudare ivo vaine dzimwe nyaya dzehuori dzavari kutongerwa kudare ramejastiriti reRotten Row. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemutemo dzinoti dai paifungidzirwa kuti vaviri ava vaizokanganisa kutongwa kwenyaya dzavo, vangadai vakaendeswa kune mamwe matunhu ari pedyo. Asi vamwe vane ruzivo nezvenyaya iyi vanoti izvi zvinonetsa zvekare sezvo pavakapihwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso vakanzi vagare kudzimba dzavo muHarare nekupota vachienda kumapurisa ari pedyo navo. Gweta vachimbomirirawo mutungamiri wenyika uye vari vari nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaTinomudaishe Chinyoka, vanoti VaKasukuwere naVaMandiwanzira havaifanira kupihwa mukana wekudzidzira hugweta mumatare emuHarare asi kune mamwe matunhu. No media source currently available Asi vanodzidzisa mutemo paUniversity of Zimbabwe, uye vari mutungamiri weNational Constitutional Assembly, Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku, vati havaone mhosva yakaparwa naVaGuvamombe vachiti vaviri ava vanokwanisa kudzidzira hugweta pasina dambudziko. No media source currently available

headline: VeMuzvitoro Voramba Kutambira Makadhi ekuBhanga
text: Veruzhinji muHarare vanoti havasi kufara nezvave kuitwa nevezvimwe zvitoro zvekunzi vatenge nemari chaiyo pakutenga zvimwe zvinhu kwetese kushandisa makadhi ekubhanga. Zvimwe zvitoro zvinonzi zvakumanikidza vatengi kuti vashandise mari kutenga zvimwe zvinhu zvakaita semafuta kwete kushandisa makadhi ekubhanga kana dzimwe nzira dzakaita seEcocash. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Amai Takudzwa Dzumbunu vati dambudziko iri rafararira nezvitoro zvakawanda zvavanoti zviri kukonzera kuti vashaye zvekuita sezvo vanhu vazhinji vanga vorarama nekushandisa makadhi ekubhanga kana kubhadhara neEcocash sezvo mari dziri kushyaikwa kumabhanga. Asi Amai Winnet Bhasera vanoti ivo semunhu ave pamudyandigere zviri kuvawomera kuti vanzi vasashandise makadhi ekubhanga pakutenga zvimwe zvinhu muzvitoro vachiti havakwanise kuswera vakamira pamitsetse yekumbhanga kuti vakwanise kuwanisa mari yekutenga zvavanenge vachida. Asi Muzvare Kudzai Chaparadza vatiwo kunyangwe hazvo iri riri dambudziko kuvatengi, vezvitoro vanenge vachidawo kubhadhara vashandi nemari yacho saka zvakakoshawo kuti veruzhinji vashandise musvo wemari pakutenga. Vaenderera mberi vachiti makambani anogadzira zvinhu akaita semafuta anodawo mari yekutenga kubva kunze kwenyika zvaanoshandisa mukugadzira zvinhu. Vamwe vakuru munezvimwe zvitoro zvashanyirwa neStudio 7 varamba kutaura nezvenyaya iyi vachiti havabvumidzwe kutaura pamhepo nevakuru vavo. Kunyangwe hazvo varamba kutaura, zvinyorwa zvanga zvakanamatidzwa muzvitoro izvi zvanga zvichiti vanhu vanofanira kutenga nemari chaiyo kwete makadhi sezvo kwavanohodha kuchidiwa musvo wemari. Umwe mushandi pane imwe kambani inogadzira mafuta iri muHarare uyo aramba kudomwa nezita ati imwe yemichina yavanoshandisa pakusvina mafuta inoda kutengerwa zvinhu kana kuti ma parts kubva kunze kwenyika saka zviri kuvatorera nguva yakareba kuti vawane mvumo yekuburitsa mari iyi kubva kubhanga guru renyika reRBZ. Kubva pakatanga kunetsa kushayikwa mari kumabhanga, RBZ yakabva yatora danho rekuti vese vanoda kutenga zvinhu kunze vanofanira kutanga vapihwa mvumo neRBZ. Zvichakadai, tsvangiridzo yaitwa neStudio 7 yaburitsa pachena kuti zvimwe zviteshi zvinotengesa mafuta edzimotokari zvavekuti munhu awedzere imwe mari pamusoro kana achishandisa kadhi rekubhanga pakutenga mafuta emotokari. Vashandi pane chimwe chiteshi chepeturu chiri pakati pedhorobha vati chikonzero chiri kuita kuti vaite izvi ndechekuti vanobatirwa mari kubhanga kana voda kutora mari iyi zvavati zvinoita kuti varuze mari yakawanda kana vasingawedzere mari shomanana pamusoro pemari yakatarwa kuti vatengese nayo mafuta edzimotokari. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nevasangano rinomirira vatengi reConsumer Council of Zimbabwe kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: VaCephas Msipa Voita Nhengo yeZanu-PF yeChipiri Kuramba Kuradzikwa kuHeroes Acre
text: Vaimbova gavhuna wedunhu reMidlands uye vari nhengo yePolitburo VaCephas Msipa avo vakashaya nemusi weMuvhuro kuchipatara cheWest End kuHarare vave kutarisirwa kuvigwa kumarinda edunhu reGweru kana kuti Gweru Provincial Heroes Acre pedyo nemudzimai wavo sechaive chido chavo. VaMsipa vanotarisira kuradzikwa nemusi weMugovera. VaMsipa vakaitwa gamba renyika uye vaifanira kuradzikwa kumarinda eHeroes Acre muHarare. Asi hama dzavo dzinoti vakasiya vataura kwavanoda kuradzikwa. Aka hakasi kekutanga kuti munhu aiita zvematongerwo enyika achiti haaadi kuvigwa pamarinda eHeroes Acre kunyangwe ainge aitwa gamba nehurumende yeZanu-PF. Muna 2010 mhuri yaVaWelshman Mabhena yakaramba kuti vavigwe kumarinda eHeroes Acre vakazoguma vovigwa kuLady Stanley Cemetery kuBulawayo. VaMabhena vanonzi vakasiya vati havaida kuradzikwa kuHarare vakashaya. Zvichakadaro, vaive mutauriri weZimbabwe People First mudunhu reMasvingo Retired Colonel Kudzai Mbudzi vakavingwa kumusha kwavo kwaNemamwa kuMasvingo. Mashoko atiri kutambira anoti hurumende yaramba kubatsira mukuvigwa kwavo kunyangwe vaive murwi wehondo yerusununguko uye vaive muchiuto.

headline: Vanhu Mazana Mana neMakumi Matanhatu neVaviri (462) Vakafa neCovid-19 Mumazuva Manomwe Chete
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu makumi mashanu nevapfumbamwe vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemusi weMugovera zvasiya huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera hwave zviuru zviviri nezana nemakumi masere nemashanu kana kuti 2,185. Mumazuva manomwe adarika chete, vanhu mazana mana nemakumi matanhatu nevaviri kana kuti 462 vakafa zvichienzaniswa nemazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nevanomwekana kuti 267 vakafa munguva imwe chete svondo rapera. Vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mana nemakumi mana nevashanu kana kuti 1, 445 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi neMugovera. Izvi zvasiya vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru makumi masere nemaviri zvine mazana matanhatu negumi nevatatu kana kuti 82, 613. Vanhu mazana manomwe nemakumi masere nevana vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvasiya vapora kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru makumi mashanu nechimwe zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nevatatu kana kuti 51, 923. Vanhu vachiri kurwara zviuru makumi maviri nemasere zvine zana nevaviri kana kuti 28, 102. Pavanhu ava mazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevasere kana kuti 798 ndivo vari muzvipatara kunyangwe chipatara cheInyathi chisina kuzivisa huwandu hwevari kurawara. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo Nzvimbo dziri kupararira chirwere ichi zvinotyisa dzinoti Chegutu, Hurungwe, Sanyati, kuMashonaland West, kochiti Guruve, Mazowe kuMashonaland Central, Marondera, Murewa kuMashonaland East, Bikita neMasvingo, nemuHarare, kuchizotiwo Northern Suburbs, Nkulumane, Emakhandeni kuBulawayo uye Kwekwe mudunhu reMidlands. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru zana nemakumi matatu nevaviri ne mashavashanu kana kuti 1, 132 05 vabayiwa nhomba kekutanga kudzivirira Covid-19. Vanhu vabayiwa kaviri sezviri kukurudzirwa vave zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi matatu nepfumbamwe zvine mazana matatu nemakumi masere nepfumbamwe kana kuti 639, 389. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kuti inyatsoshanda zvakanaka. Gurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa vanoti chinangwa chehurumende ikozvino ndechekuona kuti vanhu vakawanda vabayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Vati vachatora vanachiremba nevakoti kubva kumauto nemapurisa. No media source currently available Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano varizve munyori munyaya dzezvehutano mubato rinopikisa reMDC Alliance Dr Henry Madzorera vati vanhu vanofanira kuziva kuti kudzivirira Covid-19 kunotanga naivo nekutevedzera kurudziro iri kupihwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano zvikuru kupfeka zvivhara muromo nemhuno. No media source currently available

headline: Madhokotera Anoramba Kutambira Mari Yakawedzerwa neHurumende Achiti Ishoma Zvikuru
text: Sangano ravana chiremba re Zimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association rinoti nhengo dzaro hadzisi kuzodzokera kubasa kudzamara hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavana chiremba. Sangano iri rinoti rakaramba kutambira mari dzakawedzerwa nehurumende pamusangano wakaitwa neChishanu, richiti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana zvakanzi zviri kuwedzerwa nehurumende, zvishoma zvichienzaniswa nekukwira kwaita mitengo yezvinhu. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutevedzeri wemutungamiri we Zimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr. Masimba Dean Ndoro, vanoti nhengo dzesangano ravo dzichadzokera kubasa kana sangano re Health Services Board ragadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Studio7 yakundikana kubata sachigaro weHealth Services Board, Dr. Paulinas Sikosana, sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga ichinetsa kubata. Asi hurumende inonzi yazivisa vana chiremba kuti vanofanirwa kuenda kubasa nemusi weMuvhuro mangwanani sezvo yakawedzera mihoro yavo, pamwe nemari dzekubatsirikana. Asi Dr. Ndoro vanoti vana chiremba vacharamba vachiramwa kubasa kudzamara hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Dr. Ndoro vanoti savanna chiremba vanonzwa tsitsi nekutambura kuri kuita varwere muzvipatara, asi havakwanisi kuenda kuzvipatara zvavanoshandira nepamusana pekushaya mari inoita kuti vararamewo zvakanaka. Dr. Ndoro vanoti vanachiremba havagoni kuenda kubasa vaine nzara, nokudaro hurumende inofanirwa kuona kuti yagadzirisa dambudziko rakatarisana navana chiremba vemuzvipatara zvehurumende. Vanachiremba vakatanga kuramwa mabasa musi 3 Gunyana vachiti vanoda kuti hurumende igadzirise zvichemo zvavo. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr. Peter Magombeyi, vakapambwa nevanhu vasiri kuzivikanwa musi waGunyana 14, vakatochwa zvakaipisisa. Vakazowanikwa vari kuNyabira manheru emusi waGunyana 19, vakabva vaendeswa kuchipatara kuti vanorapwa. Kupambwa kwaDr. Magombeyi kwakaita kuti vamwe vashandi mubazi rezvehutano varamwewo mabasa vachiti vachadzokera kubasa chete kana Dr. Magombeyi vawanikwa vari vapenyu. Kunyange hazvo Dr. Magombeyi vakazowanikwa vari vapenyu, vana chiremba ava havana kudzokera kubasa. Pari zvino Dr. Magombeyi vari kurapwa vari kuSouth Africa. No media source currently available

headline: Madzimai muZanu PF Osimudza Nyaya yeMutevedzeri weMutungamiri weBato weChidzimai
text: Nhengo dzemadzimai dzebato reZanu PF dzinoti dzingafara zvikuru kana mutungamiri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakadoma mudzimai kuti ave mumwe wevatevedzeri wavo mubato panopera musangano wekongiresi yechimbi chimbi neChishanu. Kunyange nyaya yekuti panofanirwa kunge paine munhukadzi pavatevedzeri vaviri vemutungamiri weZanu PF isina kuiswa sechisungo pamusangano weInter-District Conference neChina muChinhoyi nhengo dzeZanu PF dzemadzimai dzinotarisira kudomwa kwemudzimai pachinzvimbo ichi. Nhengo yepurovhinzi yemadzimai, Amai Marther Munondo, vati vanoda mumwe wetevedzeri vemutungamiri webato kuti ave mudzimai. Amai Munondo vanoti mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wechidzimai ndiye chete anonyatsomirira zvido zvemadzimai kumusoro. Patabvunza Amai Munondo kuti madzimai pane wavakasarudza here, Amai Munondo vanoti mutungamiri webato ndiye chete anodoma vatevedzeri vake vachiti zviri pachena kuti Amai Oppah Muchinguri-Rushesha ndivo mukuru pamadzimai ose nekudaro vanofanirwa kupihwa mukana wavo. Mumwe mudzimai wekuHurungwe, Amai Gladys Takavarasha, vanoti vanotarisira kudomwa kwemudzimai semumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato sezvo madzimai ari mashoma muzvinzvimbo zvepamusoro. Dunhu reMashonaland West rasunga zvisungo zvitatu zvekuti VaMnangagwa vave mutungamiri webato uyezve vari munyori wekutanga zvichivaita mutungamiri webato, kuti VaMnangagwa vamirire bato musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika gore rinouya. VaKieth Guza, avo vatungamirira musangano wanhasi sezvo sachigaro VaZiyambi Ziyambi vanga vasipo, vaverenga zvisungo pakupera kwemusangano. Sachigaro wevaimbove varwiri verusununguko mudunhu reMashonaland West, VaCornelius Muoni, vakatyamadza vanhu vakawanda pavarambidza vanhu kuti vaite maslogan ekushoropodza bato reMDC vachiti hapana chakaipa nekuve nepfungwa dzakapesana nedzemumwe munhu. VaMuoni vanoti zvekuti pasi nemunhu zvakaipa sezvo zvisingaite kuti munhu ave nechishuwo. Kongiresi yeZanu PF iri kuitwa zuva rimwe chete, Chishanu, kunyange hazvo yaimbonzi ichaitwa kwamazuva matatu uye ichapindwa nenhengo dzebato iri dzinosvika zviuru zvitanhatu kubva pazviuru gumi nezvishanu. No media source currently available

headline: Umwe Mukuru Wesangano Rinomirira Vashandi VeMenisiparati YeChitungwiza Anombomiswa Basa
text: Menisiparati yeChitungwiza yambomisa basa mukuru we St Marys Clinic, Sister Shingirai Tsvangirai, zvichitevera kushanda zvishomazvishoma kwakatangwa kuitwa nevashandi svondo rapera. Vashandi vemenisiparati varikuratidzira vachiti vanoda kupiwa mbatya dzekuzvidzivirira kana vari pabasa, uye vanoda mari yekuenda kumabasa sezvo vamwe vavo vachifamba mamaira matanhatu netsoka kuenda kumabasa avo. Vanotizve havasi kupiwa mihoro yavo. Pamusoro pekuva Sister-In-Charge veSt Mary's Clinic, Sister Tsvangirai mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vashandi, reChitungwiza Municipal Workers Union. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaEphraim Katsina, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakuru mumenisiparati vagara vachishora Sister Tsvangirai vachiti vanotaurisa mumisangano yevashandi. VaKatsina vanoti vashandi vashatirwa zvikuru pavanzwa nezvekumbomiswa basa kwaSister Tsvangirai vakabvumirana kuti vave kuregera zvekuratidzira vachiti vave kutangidza kuramwa mabasa. Taedza kutaura ne vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori weguta reChitungwiza, Dr Tonderai Kasu, vakatitumira gwaro vachiti ichokwadi kuti Sister Tsvangirai vambomiswa basa, vachiti havagoni kutaura zvakawanda sezvo nyaya iyi ichiri kukurukurwa kuona zvakakanganiswa naSister Tsvangirai uye kuona kuti vanorangwa sei kana vaine mhosva. No media source currently available

headline: Meya veGuta reHarare VaMafume Vanoti Havasi Kuzotevedzera Kurudziro yeGurukota rezveKutongwa kweMatunhu, VaJuly Moyo paNyaya yePomona
text: Meya veguta reHarare VaJacob Mafume, vanoti kanzuru yavo haisi kuzotevera kurudziro yegurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu, Va July Moyo, yekuti idzosere chibvumirano chayo nekambani yeGeo Pomona Waste Management (Pvt) Ltd chekuchengetedzwa kwemarara kuPomona, icho chayakakanzura. VaMoyo vakanyorera kanzuru tsamba svondo rino vachiti irase chisungo chayo chemusangano wayakaita musi wa 03 Nyamavhuvhu vachiti chinopesana nechikamu 314 (Chapter 29:15) chemutemo wekutongwa kwematunhu weUrban Councils Act uye hachinakire veruzhinji. Kanzuru yakanga yanyorera bazi rezvekutongwa kwematunhu tsamba musi wa 26 Gunyana ichizivisa nezvechisungo chayo ichi, ichiti haina mari iri kunzi ibhadhare pamwedzi, iyo inonzi naVaMafume inodarika miriyoni yemadhora ekuAmerica pamwedzi. Studio 7 yaedza kwazvo kubata VaMoyo asi vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi mutsamba yavo kukanzuru, VaMoyo vanoti kanzuru yeHarare haifanirwe kupikisana nematare edzmimhosva. Ukuwo, VaMafume vanoti vachaverenga zviri mutsamba iyi vogara pasi kuti one matanho ekutora, asi vanokurudzira veruzhinji kuti vatore matanho vachiti mari iri kubiwa muhuwori hwavanoti huri kuitika muchibvumira ichi haisi kubva muhomwe yavo, asi kuti muhomwe dzeveruzhinji. No media source currently available

headline: Kushandiswa kweMari yeChina neIMF Koshandura Zvinhu Pasi Rose?
text: Kutambirwa kwemari yekuChina semari inogona kushandiswa nesangano rinokweretesa mari pasi rose, reInternational Monetary Fund, kana kuti IMF, kunonzi mucherechedzo mukuru wekuti dhora rekuAmerica rava kukwikwidzwa zvine mutsindo pasi rose. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemari pasi rose dzinoti IMF yakatora danho iri mushure mekuona kuti China iri kufambira mberi zvikuru munyaya dzebudiriro, uye nyika dzakawanda dzinoshandisa zvinhu zviri kugadzirwa kuChina. Kunyange hazvo mari yekuChina, Yuan, iine huremu huri pasi pedhora rekuAmerica, nyanzvi munyaya dzemari dzinoti kusimukira kuri kuita hupfumi hweChina kuchaita kuti mari yayo ive nesimba mumakore mashoma anotevera. Dzimwe nyanzvi dziri kuyambira kuti mune remangwana vane mari dzavo vachaonekwa vachidyara mari dzavo mumakambani ekuChina, sezvo nyika iyi iri kuratidza kusimukira kune mutsindo. IMF isangano rinoziva zvinoitika muna zana nemakumi masere neshanu, uye ndiro sangano rinobatsira nyika dzinenge dzichida mari yerubatsiro. Vanoziva zviri kuitika muIMF vanoti kupinda kweChina mudura remari dzinoshandiswa nesangano iri, zvava kureva kuti maitiro esangano iri ava kuchinja, kuburikidza nekupihwa nzeve kunenge kwava kuitwa China. Kutengeserana kweChina nenyika dzemuAfrica kuri kuramba kuchikwira. Mugore ra2009, China yakapfuura America mukutengeserana nenyika dzemuAfrica uye muna Ndira gore rino, China inoti kutenga nekutengeserana pakati penyika iyi nenyika dzemuAfrica kwakapfuura mabhirioni gumi nemanomwe emadhora. Kutengeserana pakati peChina nenyika zhinji kuri kuramba kuchikwirira izvo zvave kukonzera kuti vanhu kana makambani anoisa mari mune dzimwe nyika, aise mari yavo mumakambani ekuChina. Zvichitevera kupinda kwe Yuan mudura reIMF, nyika dzinoita gumi nenomwe dzemuAfrica dziri kuzeya kushandiswa kwe Yuan mukutengeserana pakati padzo. Asi nyanzvi munezvemari nehupfumi uye vachidzidzisa zvemabhizimisi paDevry University kuOhio, Professor Elliot Masocha, vanoti havavimbi nemaitiro eChina. Asi imwezve nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi uye vachishanda neLabour, Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti China iri kubata nyika dzepasi rose nekuti hupfumi hwenyika iyi huri kukwirira zvekuti vemabhizimisi vemunyika dzakaita seAmerica vave kuda kuisa mari mumakambani ekuChina. VaChitambara vanobvumirana naVaMasocha kuti Zimbabwe ngaigadzirise hupfumi hwayo. Vanotiwo Zimbabwe inofanira kurega kutengesa zvinhu kana zvicherwa zvinozonogadzirwa kunze kwenyika sezviri kuitika kufodya nemangoda. VaChitambara vanoti hapana zvekuchadzvenga China nekuti masimba ezvehupfumi ari kuchinja asi Zimbabwe inofanira kushanda nesimba kuti isasaririra. Zvamira zvakadai, VaChitambara vanoti America inofanirwa kusunga dzisimbe kuitira kuti isapinzwe parumananzombe neChina. Nyanzvi dzinoti China iri kushandisa hunyanzvi hwavo mukutenga zvicherwa semubhadharo wainopihwa nenyika, zvikuru dzemu Africa dzinenge dzatenga zvinhu zvayo, kanawo nyika dzinenge dzapihwa mari yekusimudzira nyika idzi. Izvi zvinoita kuti China ive nehupfumi hwakasimba, kuburikidza nezvicherwa zvainenge yaunganidza, kana kuti sound money. Dzimwe nyika dzakabudirira dzine hupfumi hwe fiat currency, uhwo hunovapo kuburikidza nekuvimbika kwehurumende uko kunopa veruzhinji kuti varemekedze mari inodhinda nedzihurumende dzakadai. No media source currently available

headline: Chirwere cheKorera Chonetsa muHarare
text: Hurumende inoti chirwere chekorera chauraya vanhu makumi maviri nemumwe, uye vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitatu nemakumi matanhatu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kusvika pari zvino. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mushure mekusangana kwemapazi akasiyana-siyana ehurumende, gurukota rezveutano, VaObadiah Moyo, vati zvinosuwisa kuti nyika iri kurasikirwa nehupenyu hwevanhu nekuda kwezvirwere zvinorapika zvakaita sekorera. VaMoyo vati hurumende iri kutora matanho akasiyana siyana senzira yekupedza chirwere ichi, icho chanetsa mumisha inogara veruzhinji muHarare yakaita seGlen View, Budiriro neGlen Norah. VaMoyo vati kunyange hazvo kune dzimwe nzvimbo dzakaitawo seBuhera neMasvingo kwabatwa vanhu nekorera,tsvakiridzo dzavakaita dzinoratidza kuti vanhu ava vakabva muBudiriro neGlenview muHarare. VaMoyo vati hurumende iri kuendesa mvura yakachena kunzvimbo dzine dambudziko, kudzidzisa veruzhinji hutsanana pamwe nekubvisa vatengesi vemumigwagwakuGlenview nekuBudiriro. VaMoyo vati mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police ndovachange vachibvisa vatengesi mumigwagwa vachiti mapurisa ekanzuru akatadza kuita izvi. VaMoyo vabvumawo kuti hutachiona hwekorera huriko hauchaurayiki nemishonga yekutanga first line antibiotic drugs. Vatiwo mishonga inodiwa kurapa chirwere ichi inodhura. Kunyange hazvo kune dzimwe nzvimbo kuri kurapwa chirwere ichi kuri kunzi hakuna mishonga yakakwana, VaMoyo vati pari zvino vanayo mishonga. Hurumende neChipiri yakatara korera sedambudziko guru rawira nyika. Zvichitevera danho rakatorwa nehurumende, mapurisa abva azivisawo kuti hapana misangano kana ma rally achaitwa muguta reHarare zvichitevera dambudziko rekorera. Zimbabwe inogara ichinetseka kurwisa dambudziko rezvirwere zvekorera neTyphoid nekuda kwemvura isina kuchena inoshandiswa nevagari pamwe nekuputika kwemvura dzetsvina kunyanya kumisha inogara veruzhinji. Pamusangano uyu, kanzuru yatiwo haina zvikwanisiro zvakakwana zvekuti igadzire nechimbichimbi kunenge kwaputika mvura dzetsvina idzi. Sangano reZimbabwe Doctor’s for Human Rights rinoti hurumende inofanirwa kuisa musoro pamwe chete kuitira kuti igadzirisa dambudziko rezvirwere zvemudumbu zvinoputika gore negore. Munyori musangano iri, VaEvans Masitara, vakurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vakurumidze kuenda kuchipatara kana vakafungidzira kuti vane chirwere ichi huye kuti vanhu vabike zvekudya zvakanaka. Mugore ra2008 vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvina vakafa nechirwere chekorera. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti chirwere chekorera hachifanirwe kunge chichinetsa mukore uno sezvo chichikwanisa kudzivirirwa kuburikidza nekuita hutsanana pamwe nekunwa mvura yakachena. No media source currently available

headline: Dare reConCourt Rinorasa Chikumbiro cheMisa Zimbabwe
text: Dare repamusoro-soro reConstitutional Court rarasa chikumbiro chesangano reMisa Zimbabwe chekuti vatori venhau vapihwe mukana wekutora mifananidzo yemavhidhiyo pachange pachinzwikwa nyaya yakakwidzwa kudare nemutungamiri weMDC Alliance VaNelson Chamisa. VaChamisa vari kuda kuti zvakabuda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika yakaitwa musi wa30 Chikunguru zvisendekwe parutivi, vachiti ivo ndivi vakakunda musarudzo iyi, kwete zvakataurwa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, zvekuti mutungamiri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ndivo vakakunda. Vachisvitsa chikumbiro ichi mudare, gweta reMisa Zimbabwe, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, vati vatori venhau vanobva kumakambani akasiyana-siyana vanofanirwa kubvumidzwa kutora mifanananidzo yemavhidhiyo mudare vagoibuditsa pamadandemutande nepazvivhitivhiti panguva imwecheteyo inenge ichiitika zvinhu kwete kuti komisheni inoona nezvematare yeJudical Services Commission ibvumidze kambani yeZBC yoga kuita izvi. Amai Mtetwa vatiwo kambani yeZBC haifanirwe kuva iyo yoga inobvumidzwa kutora mifananidzo mudare mangwana sezvo mamwe makambani enhau akazvimrira akangofananawo neZBC ane marezenesi ekutepfenyura. Vati zvakaitwa neJudicial Services Commission zvekupa ZBC chete mvumo yekutepfenyura zvichange zvichiitika mudare zvinoita sekuti kambani yeZBC yakakosha kupfuura mamwe makambani enhau uye vati zvichadhurira mamwe makambani enhau ari kuda kutepfenyura kunzwikwa kwenyaya ichange iri mudare mangwana sezvo kambani yeZBC yati ichange ichibhadharisa mari inoita zviuru gumi nezvitatu zvemadhora pazuva kumakambani achada kushandisa mifananidzo ichange ichitorwa nekambani iyi mudare mangwana. Amai Mtetwa vaenderera mberi vachiti ZBC haibatike kune dzimwe nzvimbo munyika uye ruzhinji rwevanhu rwave kukwanisa kuona zvinenge zvichiitika munyika kubudikidza nekutepfenyurwa kunoitwa nevanoshandisa mbozhanhare vachiisa pamadandemutande panguva inenge ichiitika zvinhu. Vatiwo zvakanaka kuti mamwe makambani akazvimirira abvumidzwe kutepfenyura ari padare riri kunzwikwa nyaya iyi mangwana sezvo achitepfenyurira vanhu vari muZimbabwe pamwe nevari kunze kwenyika vari kuda kuziva zvichange zvichiitika panyaya iyi mangwana. Asi gweta ranga rakamirira VaMnangagwa, VaTinomudaishe Chinyoka, vati Misa Zimbabwe haina nhepfenyuro yainotepfenyura zvingapa kuti inzwikwe. Gweta ranga rakamirira Judicial Services Commission, VaAddington Chinake, vatiwo mutori wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira, Busani Bafana, uyo anga achigitsigira chikumbiro cheMisa Zimbabwe ichi achiti anodawo kutora mifananidzo mudare, haana rezenesi rekutepfenyura nokudaro nyaya yake haina kusimba. Magweta anga akamirira ZBC panyaya iyi atiwo ZBC inokwanisa kupa makambani ose mifananidzo yaanoda nemhando yaanenge achida zvisinei nekuti ndeemuno kana kuti ndeekunze sezvo achiti ZBC yave nemichina yechimanjemanje inokwanisa kuita izvi. Mukuru wevatongi munyika, VaLuke Malaba, avo vanzwa nyaya iyi, varasa chikumbiro cheMisa Zimbabwe vachiti Misa Zimbabwe naBafana havana marezenesi ekutepfenyura saka nokudaro havana chavangarwira panyaya iyi. VaChinyoka, vati vafara nemutongo waturwa nedare. VaChinyoka vati zvasvitswa kudare neMisa Zimbabwe hazvina musoro. Zvichakadai, kambani yeZBC yaswera ichiita gadziriro dzekuti igotepfenyura zvinenge zvichiitika mudare mangwana pachanzwikwa nyaya yakakwidzwa kudare naVaChamisa yekuti zvakabuda musarudzo zvisendekwe parutivi sezvo vachiti sarudzo idzi dzakabirirwa zvemhando yepamusoro-soro naVaMnangagwa nebato ravo reZanu PF. Rimwe remagweta ari kumirira VaMnangagwa panyaya iyi, VaPaul Mangwana, vati vagadzirira zvizere kunzwikwa kwenyaya iyi vachiti vane tarisiro yekukunda panyaya iyi. VaJacob Mafume, vanove gweta riri kumirira mumwe wevakakwidza musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, VaNoah Manyika, avo vari kutsigira chikumbiro chaVaChamisa chekuti zvakabuda musarudzo zvisendekwe parutivi, vaudzawo Studio7 kuti nyaya yavo iri pachena semhanza zvekuti dare harifanire kutora nguva richinzwa nyaya iyi. Zvichakadai, munyori muJudicial Services Commission, VaWalter Chikwanha, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti vatongi vedare reConstitutional Court vachanzwa nyaya iyi neChitatu vachaita basa ravo nemazvo vasina divi ravakarerekera. Magweta aVaChamisa neaVaMnangagwa achange achisvitsa nyaya dzavo zviri pamutemo, ukuwo vatongi vedare iri vachivabvunzurudza. Dare iri rinofanirwa kupa mutongo waro mukati memazuva gumi nemana kubva musi waziviswa nyika nezvesarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available

headline: America Inoti Zimbabwe Haisi Kujekesa Mashandisirwo eMari dzeHurumende neKupihwa kweMarezinesi eZvicherwa
text: Gwaro raburitswa nebazi rehurumende yeAmerica rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika kana kuti State Department rinoratidza kuti hurumende dzinoshandisa mari yeruzhinji zviri pachena here pamwe nekuti dzinopa sei marezinesi ezvicherwa rinoratidza kuti kunyangwe zvazvo Zimbabwe ichinzi yakaedza zvichienzaniswa negore rapera, haisati yasvika panotarisirwa. Gwaro raburitswa nebazi rehurumende yeAmerica rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, kana kuti State Department iri rinoratidza kuti Zimbabwe iri panyika makumi matanhatu nepfumbamwe dzinonzi hadzisati dzoratidza pachena mashandisirwo emari yehurumende . Asi panyika idziwo Zimbabwe iripanyika makumi maviri nenomwe dzinonzi zvichienzaniswa negore rapera dzirikuvavarira kuita zvinhu zvavo pachena. Kuti nyika inzi inoshandisa mari pachena inenge ichizivisa veruzhinji hurongwa hwemari kusanganisira mashandisirwo nekuwana mari kunoita mapazi nemakambani ehurumende. Nyika inonziwo yakachena kana hurumende ichibudisa pachena magwaro anechekuita nekupiwa kwemarezinesi ezvicherwa pamwe nekuti vanenge vawana marezinesi awa vaawana sei. Vachitaura nezvegwaro iri, Amai Megg Riggs vanoshanda kumuzinda weAmerica muZimbabwe vati gwaro ravo regore rino rinoratidza kuti Zimbabwe yakaedzesera zvichienzaniswa negore rapera kuratidza mashandisirwo emari munyika asi vachiti izvi hazvina kukwana. Amai Riggs vati Zimbabwe yakabudisa pachena hurongwa hwebhajeti pamwe nekushandiswa kwemari. Vatiwo hurumende yeZimbabwe yakakwanisawo kuwanisa ruzivo rwezvekushandiswa kwemari kuneveruzhinji pamwe nekuzivisawo zvimwe zvezvikwereti zvinenyika. Asi Amai Riggs vati Zimbabwe yakakundikanawo kuzivisa zvikwereti zvine makambani ehurumende pamwe nemari inowanikwa nemakambani awa. Amai Riggs vatiwo Zimbabwe haisiwo kuzivisa pachena veruzhinji kuwaniswa kwemarezinesi ezvezvicherwa. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvezvicherwa kuti tinzwe maonero avo nezvekupiwa kwemarezinesi ezvezvicherwa sezvo tatadza kubata gurukota rebazi iri VaWinston Chitando. Patafonera mutevedzeri waVaChitando Va Polite Kambamura vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanga vachazotaura nesu kana vasununguka asi vanga vasati vatibata pataenda pamhepo. Tatadzawo kubata gurukota rinoona nezvemari VaMthuli Ncube. Vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko kubato reZANU PF vanga vasatiwo vapindura mibvunzo yedu pataenda pamhepo. Asi mukuru wesangano rinorwira kuchengetedzwa kwezvivanikwa munyika, reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFari Maguwu vati nyaya yezvezvicherwa muZimbabwe haibudiswi pachena vachiti kurudziro yavo kuhurumende kuti ibudise ruzivo urwu pachena. Gwaro iri rakaongorora nyika dzinosvika zana nemakumi mana neimwe idzo dzinowana mari yerubatsiro kubva kuhurumende yeAmerica. Zimbabwe nedzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica dzakadai se Algeria , Angola, Lesotho, Liberia ,Malawi Mozambique nedzimwewo hadzisati dzasadzikisa zvinotarisirwa. Gwaro iri rinotiwo dzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica dzakadai se Botswana, The Gambia, Ghana, Nigeria, South Africa, Kenya nedzimwewo dzakachena panyaya dzekufambiswa kwemari. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Unobvuma Kuripa Muzvare Jestina Mukoko
text: Dare repamusoro reHigh Court rakapa mutongo wekuti Muzvare Jestina Mukoko vapihwe mari inosvika zviuru zana nemakumi mashanu zvemadhora semuripo wekupambwa nekushungurudzwa kwavakaitwa vari muhusungwa. Pamari iyi, Muzvare Mukoko vachapihwa mari inosvika chiuru zana imwe inosvika zviuru makumi mashanu ichienda kumagweta avo anove nhengo dzesangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights. Hurumende nemagweta aMuzvare Mukoko akawirirana pamari iyi pamberi pedare. Dare iri rati mari iyi ibhadharwe musi wa31 Gumiguru usati wadarika. Muzvare Mukoko vakapambwa kumba kwavo kuNorton musi wa3 Zvita 2008 vakazoendeswa kumatare musi wa24 Zvita. Vaipomerwa mhosva yekuda kupidigura hurumende yevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Dare reSupreme Court rakambotara kuti vose vainge vapamba Muzvare Mukoko vaigona kuendeswa kumatare ivo pauzima. Muzvare Mukoko vati kuripwa uku hakubvise bundu riri mumoyo mavo asi zvichabatsira vamwe vanotyorerwa kodzero kuti vazive kuti kwekupotera kuripo. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Votaura paKutoreswa Mhiko kwaVaLungu vekuZambia
text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeZambia VaEdgar Lungu vakatoreswa mhiko nemusi weChipiri mushure mesarudzo dzakaitwa mwedzi wapera. VaLungu vakatora mhiko kunhandare yeHeroes Stadium muLusaka. Asi vemapato anopikisa vanoti sarudzo idzi dzakabirirwa uye VaLungu vaishandisa mhirizhonga. Valungu vanoti vari kuzorwa mafuta enguruve yavasina kudya. Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe ndevamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vashoma shoma vakange vari kuZambia. VaMugabe ndivo vakataura vakamirira vamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica. VaMugabe vati nyika dzine hutongo hwejekerere hadzidi vanhu vanoda kushandisa mhirizhonga kutora masimba. Vakatiwo Zambia yainge yabuda pachena kuti sarudzo ndidzo dzinofanira kushandiswa munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika kuMulungushi University of Zambia VaShakespeare Hamauswa vanoti mashoko aVaMugabe akatambirwa zvakasiyana muZambia vamwe vachiti vainge vabaya dede nemukanwa asi vamwe vachishora vachiti makudo ndemamwe zvikuru vachitarisa nyaya yemhirizhonga. No media source currently available

headline: Mapazi eHurumende neVamwe veParamende Voramba Kutambira Bhajeti ra2022
text: Apo hurukuro dziri kuenderera mberi kuti bhajeti rakaparurwa negurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube rotambirwa here nedare reparamende kana kuti kwete, pave kubuda mutauro wakanyanya. Mapazi ehurumende akawanda ari kuti mari dzavakapihwa hadzina zvadzinobatsira uye VaNcube vane nhoroondo yekusavapa mari dzavanenge vataura mubhajeti. Bhajeti rakaparurwa naVaNcube rinofanira kutambirwa nematare ose eparamende anoti reHouse of Assembly neSenate kuti ritange kushanda zviri pamutemo. Asi rwendo rwuno dzimwe nhengo dzedare reparamende dziri kuti haiziyiwe. Vamwe vasiri kufara nebhajeti rakaparurwa iri mumiriri weNorton VaTemba Mliswa. Vanoti VaNcube havafanire kuvimbisa mari dzavasingazope mapazi ehurumende. Vakafanobata chigaro chemubati wehomwe mubazi rezvehutano Amai Lynette Tennis vakaudza dare reparamende kuti mari yakapihwa bazi ravo haikwane uye inotoisa hupenyu hwevanhu munjodzi. Bazi iri rakapihwa mari inosvika mabhiriyoni zana negumi nemanomwe kana kuti 117 billion yemunyika mubhajeti regore rinouya. Amai Tennis vakati zvikamu makumi masere nemashanu kubva muzana zvemari yekurapa TB, Malaria, hutano hwemadzimai nezvimwe yakabva kumasangano akazvimirira anoti Global Fund nehomwe yemutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica yePresident’s Emergency Plan For Aids Relief. Asi muzinda weAmerica wakatozivisa hurumende kuti itsvage nzira dzekubatsira vanorarame nehutachiona hweHIV/Aids. Hurumende yaibatsirikana zvikuru nemari yehomwe yeAIDS Levy inobatirwa vashandi asi inonzi yave shoma sezvo vakawanda vari kuzviitira mabasa emaoko vasingabhadhare. Rimwe bazi riri kuti rakapihwa mari ishoma nderedzidzo riri kuti zvirongwa zvakaita sezve Continuous Assessment Learning Activity kana kuti CALA zvichazviringidzwa zvakanyanya nemari shoma yarakapihwa. VaMliswa vanoti kugadzirisa dambudziko iri dai hurumende yaita bhajeti nemari yekuAmerica. VaMliswa vanoti zviri nani hazvo kuti dai VaNcube vakaparura bhajeti iri nemari yekuAmerica. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemunyori mukuru musangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions VaJaphet Moyo. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi VaVictor Bhoroma vanoti mari inoshandiswa haina hayo kunyanya kukosha nekuti. VaNcube vakazivisa havo kuti mapazi ehurumende akanga akumbira mari inoda kusvika matrilion maviri nemabhiriyoni manomwe kana kuti 2, 7 trillion yemunyika asi ivo vainge vaine mari inodarika zvishoma mabhiriyoni mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nemanomwe kana kuti 927 billion yemunyika. VaNcube vakati chavari kuyedza kuita mubhajeti yavo kubatsira varombo kunyanya.

headline: Mutungamiri weNyika, VaMnangagwa, Vanosimuka Kuenda kuDavos kuMusangano weWorld Economic Forum
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakasimuka neSvondo manheru vakananga kuSwizterland kumusangano wekuzeya matambudziko akatarisana nepasi rose weWorld Economic Forum, uyo unoitirwa muguta reDavos. Musangano uyu wakatanga neSvondo uye unopera musi weChina svondo rino. VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kuita misangano yepamusorosoro nevatungamiri vedzimwe nyika pamwe nevakuru vezvemabhizimusi emuEurope muhurongwa hwavo hwekuedza kukwezva vemabhizimusi kuti vapinde munyika. Musangano weWorld Economic Forum uyu uri kutarisirwa kupindwa nevatungamiri venyika, vemabhizimusi pamwe nevemasangano akazvimirira vanoda kusvika kuzviuru zviviri nemazana mashanu, avo vari kutarisirwa kuzeya nyaya dziri kutambudza pasi rino dzinosanganisira denda reCovid-19, hondo iri pakati peRussia neUkraine, kusagadzikana kwehupfumi pamwe nekushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze. Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha, vanove nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi nekudyidzana kwenyika dzapasi rose, vari zvakare mudzidzisi mukuru wezvemabhizimusi paDevry University muAmerica, vanoti musangano uyu wakakosha zvikuru kuZimbabwe nepasi rose Panyaya yekuti VaMnangagwa vane chavanodzoka nacho here kubva kumusangano uyu, Muzvinafundo Masocha vanoti havaoni paine chinokohwe nekuda kwekuti nhoroondo yeZimbabwe munyaya dzezvikwereti pamwe nekumabatiro ayo enyaya dzezvemabhizimusi nehupfumi zvinogona kuvakanganisa. No media source currently available

headline: Bato reMDC-T Rokurudzira Hurumende Kuti Iburitse muMajeri Vakasungirwa Zvematongerwo Enyika
text: Vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weMDC-T, VaElias Mudzuri, vakurudzira hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuti iburitse mujeri vasungwa vose vakasungirwa zvematongerwo enyika pasi pehurumende yevaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mushure mekushanyira jeri reChikurubi, uko kwakachengetwa dzimwe nhengo dze MDC-T dzinoti Yvonne Musarurwa, Last Maengehama naTungamirai Madzokere, VaMudzuri vati vasungwa vazhinji vakasungirwa zvematongerwo enyika pasi pehurumende yaVaMugabe vakaita saMuzvare Musarurwa nevamwe vavo vari kupikira mhosva dzavasina kupara. Nekudaro, VaMudzuri vakurudzira hurumende itsva yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuti iburitse vasungwa vezvematongerwo enyika mumajeri ose ari munyika. VaMudzuri vanoti sebato vakatosvitsa chikumbiro ichi kubazi rinoona nezvemitemo. Muzvare Musarurwa nevamwe vavo vaviri, avo vakatongerwa kugara mujeri kwemakore makumi maviri mushure mekubatwa nemhosva yekuponda mupurisa VaPetros Mutedza mumusha weGlen View muna 2011, vakasvitsa chikumbiro kumatare chekuti nyaya yavo iongororwe zvakare vachiti havana mhosva yavakapara, asi nyaya iyi haisati yanzwikwa. Gurukota rezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti bazi ravo rakatambira chikumbiro cheMDC chekuti vasungwa vezvematongerwo enyika vaburitswe mumajeri asi vachiri kuongorora nyaya iyi sehurumende. Zvichakadai, VaMudzuri vakurudzira komisheni inowona nezvesarudzo kuti inyorese vasungwa vari mumajeri sevavhoti vachiti ikodzero dzavo sezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe kuti vave nechokutaura mukutongwa kwenyika yavo. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nevakafanobata chigaro chasachigaro weZEC, VaEmmanuel Magade, kuti tinzwe divi rekomisheni yavo panyaya iyi sezvo vanga vachiti vari mumusangano. No media source currently available

headline: Michina yeChizvinozvino Yobatsira Vamwe Vabereki kuBhadhara Mari dzeChikoro
text: Apo zvikoro zvichangovhurwa kwekotoro yekupedzisira yegore, zvimwe zvikoro zvave kushandisa ma swipe machines izvo zvave kuita kuti vabereki varerukirwe nekubhadhara mari yechikoro yevana vavo. Asi zvisinei vamwe vanoti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari munyika rinofanirwa kugadziriswa zvachose. Nekuda kwedambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari rave nenguva richiitika munyika mumabhangi munogara makatsokodzerana nevanhu vanenge vachitsvaga mari kunyanya pamazuva ekuvhurwa kwezvikoro. Asi zvimwe zvikoro zviri munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana munyika zvave nema swipe machine uye zvave kubvumawo kuti vabereki vabhadhare nenzira yekushandisa mari yepafoni kunyanya yeEcocash. Vamwe wevabereki vataura neStudio 7 vati vanotambira danho iri sezvo rave kuvarerutsira panhamo yekutsvaga mari yekubhadharira vana vavo mari yechikoro. Mumwe wevanhu ava ndiMuzvare Mutsa Sibanda avo vati chikoro chemwana wavo chakatanga kushandisa swipe machine pakutanga kwemwedzi uno. Mumwezve mubereki VaBruce Tagwirei vati kunze kwekuve neswipe machine, chikoro chemwana wavo chave kutambirawo mari paEcocash izvo zvavati zvinobatsira kuti vasarasikirwe nenguva vachitsvaga mari pane kuita zvimwe zvinoraramisa mhuri yavo. Asi nekuda kwekuti kunetsa kwemari kuri kuramba kuchienderera mberi munyika vanhu vave kutambira kuti huremu hwemari yemabond note nemari yekunze uye nemari yekubhadhara munhu uchishandisa zvakasiyana. Semuenzaniso kana munhu uine zana remadhora ekuAmerica unogona kuwana zana nemakumi matanhatu emabond note. Kana munhu uchishandisawo card kutenga kana kubhadhara chezana remadhora unogona kubhadhariswa mari iri pakati pemadhora mashanu nemadhora gumi pamusoro. Mumwe mubereki asina kuda kudomwa nezita kana kubuda pamhepo ati chikoro chemwana wake icho chinove chimwe chezvikoro zvakazvimirira zvega muguta reBulawayo, chinoti chinoda kuti mari yechikoro ibhadharwe imwe iri mari chaiyo imwe kuchishandiswa card. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvedzidzo panyaya iyi. Nyanzvi munayaya dzezvehumhizha mukufambiswa kwemashako VaNigel Gambanga vatsinhirawo kuti danho rekuti vabereki vakwanise kubhadhara mari yevana vavo yechikoro idanho rakanaka chose. VaGambanga vati havawone chakaipa pakuti zvikoro zvakawanda zvishandise Ecocash sezvo zviri pachena kuti ndiyo nzira yekutumira kana kutambira mari iri kushandiswa nevanhu vakawanda munyika. VaButler Tambo vanove mutevedzeri wemukuru wesangano reCentre for Public Engagement, vachitaura semuongorori wezvehupfumi akazvimirira ega vati kunyange hazvo pane matanho ari kuedza kurerutsira vabereki kuti vabhadhare mari yevana vavo yechikoro, zvakosha kuti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari rigadziriswe zvachose risati ranyanyoipisisa. Mumwewo mubereki variwo mutori wenhau VaAdmire Kudita vatsinhira mashoko aya vachiti pane pamwe pakadai sekukwira makombi pekuti vanhu vanoda kushandisa mari chaiyo. Pakutanga kwegore rino bazi rezvedzidzo rakazivisa kuti raive ratora danho rekuti zvikoro zvinosvika zviuru zvipfumbamwe munyika zvive nema swipe machine senzira yekuita kuti vabereki varerukirwe nekubhadhara mari yechikoro asi zvikoro zvakawanda hazvisati zvave nemichina iyi. Senzira yekupedza dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari, gavhuna weRBZ Dr John Mangudya vakati munguva shoma inotevera vachaparura imwe mari yemabond notes. No media source currently available

headline: Vanochengetedza Mhuka Vaviri Vourayiwa neVanovhima Zvisiri paMutemo kuKariba
text: Vashandi vaviri veZimbabwe National Parks and Wildlife kana kuti Zimparks vanofungidzirwa kuti vakauraiwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vanovhima mhuka zvisiri pamitemo vekuZambia nemusi weChipiri. Vane ruzivo nezvakaitika vanoti vamwe vaviri vanochengetedza mhuka kubva kubazi reZimparks vakaita mahwekwe nevanofungidzirwa vaizvhima zvisiri pamutemo mudhamu reKariba. Panonzi pakaita kakurwisana apo vanochengetedza mhuka ava vakange voyedza kuendesa vanofungidzirwa kuti vaivhima zvisiri pamutemo ava pakamba yeChanga kuKariba. Zvinonzi nyaya iyi yakazozivikanwa mushure mekunge chikepe chevanochengetedza mhuka ava chaonekwa chichiyangarara chisina munhu uye chisina injini. Mutauriri weZimparks VaTinashe Farawo vatenda kuti izvi ndizvo zvakaitika vachiti vashandi vavo vaviri havasikuzivikanwa kwavari parizvino. VaFarawo vanoti vaendesa nyaya iyi kumapurisa uye kuferefetwa kwekushayikwa uku kuri kuenderera mberi uye vari kushanda pamwechete nevebazi rezvekuchengetedzwa kwemhuka kuZambia. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commisioner Paul Nyathi kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Kubatwa kwevanhu vanovhima zvisiri pamutemo kunonzi kwakanyanya pamuganhu weZimbabwe neZambia. Vanovhima mhuka zvisiri pamutemo munyika mbiri idzi vari kusungwa vachitongwerwa makore akawanda mujeri. No media source currently available

headline: Kukwira kweHuwandu hweVane Covid-19 Kwoita Kuti Hurumende Ikurudzirwe Kuvheneka Vanhu Vakawanda
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChina kuti vanhu vanosvika zviuru zvitatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri, kana kuti 3 092, vakabatwa nechirwere charura pasi rose cheCovid-19, uye huwandu hwevanhu vafa hwakakwira kusvika pamakumi mashanu nevatatu, kana kuti 53. Bazi iri rakazivisawo kuti huwandu hwevanhu vakanga vapora kusvika nezuro hwakanga hwave pavanhu mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nevana, kana kuti 924. Vanhu vanosvika mazana maviri negumi nevatatu kana kuti 213, vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi pavanhu zviuru zvitatu nezana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemumwechete, kana kuti 3 191, vakavhenekwa kuona kana vaine chirwere ichi. Dunhu reHarare ndiro riri pamusoro pahuwandu hwevanhu vane chirwere ichi, riine vanhu vanosvika chiuru nemakumi manomwe nevashanu, kana kuti 1 075, richiteverwa nedunhu reBulawayo, iro rine vanhu mazana masere nevashanu kana kuti 805 vabatwa nechirwere ichi kusvika nemusi weChina. Makambani akawanda munyika anonzi ari kumbovhara zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwevamwe vashandi vaine chirwere ichi. Nemusi weChitatu, kambani yemabhazi yeZUPCO, iyo inove ndiyo chete ine mvumo yekutakura veruzhinji munguva ino yemutemo unorambidza kufamba famba kwevanhu, yakazivisa kuti vashandi vayo gumi vakanga vawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi mushure mekuvhenekwa nevashandi vebazi rezvehutano. Izvi zvinonzi neimwe nyanzvi yezvehutano vari chiremba, Dr. Edgar Munatsi, hurumende inofanirwa kusimbisa hurongwa hwekutevera vese vakambosangana nevashandi ava pamwewo nevanho vose vari kuwanikwa vaine chirwere ichi, uyewo vose vanofamba nemabhazi eZUPCO vanofanirwa kuvhenekwawo kuti havana chirwere ichi here. Dr. Munatsi vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kutarisisa zvakare hurongwa hwayo hwekuti ZUPCO ndiyo chete inofanirwa kunge ichitakura veruzhinji munyika, kuitira kuti ibvumidzewo vamwe vane dzimotokari dzavo kutakurawo vanhu. Johns Hopkins University Hospital yemuno muAmerica inoti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nemanomwe nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 17.3 million vabatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose, icho chaurayawo vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nezvitatu kana kuti 673,000 pasi rose. Dr. Munatsi vanoti kunyange hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kuongororwa kana vaine chirwere cheCovid-19 pazuva hwave kuwanda, hurumende inofanirwa kutokwinya kuti iwedzere kuitira kuti irwisane nechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Votadza Kushanyira Botswana Kunyangwe Bhodha Ravhurwa neKushaya Tsamba dzeCovid-19
text: Kunyange hazvo Botswana yavhura zvizere mabhoda ayo mashanu nhasi kusanganisira muganhu waro uri pedyo neguta rePlumtree weRamokgwebana, kwanga kuine motokari nevanhu vashomanana vanga vachipinda nekubuda munyika iyi. Ongororo yaitwa neStudio7 pamuganhu uyu nhasi inoratidza kuti ruzhinji rwezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvanga zvichidzoserwa kumusha nekuti zvanga zvisina chitambi chinoratidza kuti havana chirwere cheCOVID-19. Botswana yakatsidza kuti haina kubvumidza ani zvake anobva kuine imwe nyika kupinda munyika iyi asina gwaro rinoratidza akavhenekerwa COVID-19 akawanikwa asina chirwere ichi chashura mare pasi rose senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri. Asi hurongwa hwaitwa neBotswana uhu huri kuita kuti vazhinji vatadze kufamba famba nekuti hazvisi nyore kuti munhu avhenekerwe hutachiwana hweCOVID-19 sezvo vanovheneka vari kubhadharisa makumi matanhatu emadhora ekuAmerica. Amai Gertrude Maravanzira vaudza Studio7 kuti vakambofunga kujamba bhodha sezvo nyika dzakavharwa murume vavo ari kuGaborone ivo vari kuZimbabwe asi vakatya izvo zvaita kuti vaite nhangemutange. Asi chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chisina kuita rombo rakanaka saAmai Maravanzira ndiVaWalter Mukanga avo vaudza Studio7 kuti vava nemazuva maviri vari gere pabhodha reRamokgwebana sezvo vashandi vebazi rehutano munyika iyi vari kuramba gwaro ravo vachiti ndere kunyeba.  VaMukanga pamwe chete nevamwe vavo vaviri vanoti Agrippa Murimba naRaymond Uchena vane chivimbo chekuti vachakunda kuti vano joina chikwata chebhora cheMorupule Wanderers munyika iyi.  VaMurimba, avo vanoti vaitambira chikwata cheHarare City, vanoti chirwere cheCOVID-19 chaunza kusagadzikana kukuru uko chaita kuti vatambi vebhora vave nedambudziko rekutsvaga mafuro manyoro. Mukuru wesangano reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation kana kuti VISET VaSamuel Wadzai vaudza Studio7 kuti mari dziri kudiwa nevanovheneka denda iri dzakawandisa. VaWadzai vakurudzira hurumende kuti ive nehurongwa hwekubatsira nhengo dzesangano ravo nevamwe vanorarama nekutenga midziyo kuBotswana vachinotengesa kumusha kuitira kuti vasashandire dhongi rakaora. Kunyange hazvo ruzhinji rwuri kuchema chema, gurukota rinoona nezvehutano muBotswana VaEdwin Dikoloti vanoti nyika yavo haisi kuzodududza shure panyaya yezvitambi vachiti ndiyo nzira chete ingabatsira kuti hutachiwana uhu husapararire. Botswana ine vanhu zviuru gumi nemazana manomwe ane makumi mana nemaviri vabatwa nechirwere ichi kotiwo makumi matatu nevana vafa nokuda kwedenda iri. No media source currently available

headline: Musangano weKimberly Process Wotanga KuAngola
text: Musangano weKimberly Process Certification Intercessional Plenary Scheme watanga kuLuanda, Angola neChipiri Zimbabwe ichichema nerekuti pane dzimwe nyika dzichiri kurwisa kuti isabvumidzwe kutengesa mangoda ayo. Musangano uyu uri kupera nemusi weMugovera. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu, gurukota rinoona nezvezvicherwa VaWalter Chidhakwa vanoti Zimbabwe iri kuita zvose zvinodiwa neKPC mukutengeswa kwemangoda. Vanoti Zimbabwe iri kuita zvose zvinodiwa neKPC mukutengeswa kwemangoda. Vamwe vakuru muhurumende vanoti sangano reWorld Policy Institute rinoda kuti Zimbabwe isatengesa mangoda nekuti iri kutengesa mangoda pamusika wekuDubai zvinonzi zvinogona kupa kuti mari dzemangoda dzigume dzave mumaoko evanopfurikidza mwero. Imwe kambani yekuBelgium inonzi Omega Diamonds yakabhadhariswa mari inosvika mamiriyoni zana nemamukumi mapfumbabwe nemashanu madhora ne KPC ichinzi yaisabhadhara mitero. Mangoda anotengeswa nekuDubai sezvinoitwa eZimbabwe anonzi anozoguma ave mumaoko emakoronyera uye vanhu vashoma ndivo vanoguma vowana mari yemangoda nenyaya yechikiribidi. Asi mukuru wekambani yePartnership Africa Canada, VaAllan Martin, avo vari kumusangano uyu vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakuru vehurumende yeZimbabwe vari kungorova bembera dzenhema panyaya iyi. VaMartin vati KPC inofanira kuona kuti mangoda atengeswa zviri pamutemo uye haafanire kuguma ave mumaoko evanopfurikidza mwero. VaMartin vatiwo Zimbabwe haifanire kungovhunduka chati kwatara. Kunyange hazvo makambani ekuMarange ave nemakore achichera mangoda, vakawanda, kusanganisira mamwe makurukota ehurumende vanoti havasi kuziva kuti mari yacho inofambiswa sei. Vashandi vakawanda kumakambani ekuMarange vari kupedzawo mwedzi vasina kubhadharwa vamwe vachigumurwa. Vakawanda vaifunga kuti mangoda achavandudza hupfumi asi zvinenge zviri kukona n’anga murapwa achida. Sachigaro wesangano reResources Exploitation Watch iro rinorerekera zvakanyanya kuhurumende, VaTafadzwa Musarara vanoti zvekunakumisa Zimbabwe kutengesa mangoda hazvishande. No media source currently available

headline: "Munodei paMuchato weDhongi neBere"-VaKasukuwere paNyaya yeKutyisidzirwa neRufu
text: Mubato reZanu-PF mapinda zinyekenyeke zvichitevera mashoko ekuti vamwe vakuru vebato iri vari muchikwata chinonzi Generation 40 kana kuti G40 vavekutumirwa mashoko ekuti vanogona kupfuudzwa pambozhanhare dzavo. Vanonzi vatumirwa mashoko aya vanosanganisa gurukota rezvematunhu VaSaviour Kasukuwere, gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro muzvinafundo Jonathan Moyo, gurukota rezvekuendeswa kwehupfumi kuvatema VaPatrick Zhuwawo uye vanomirira Harare South mudare reparamende VaShadreck Mashayamombe. Bepanhau reNewsday ndiro rakatanga kuburitsa nyaya yekuti pane vakuru mubato reZanu-PF vainge vatumirwa mashoko ekuti vanogona kuitwa kafiramberi nemunhu asiri kuzivikana. Izvi zvinonzi zvakaitwa nemusi weSvondo. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba vati vange vasati vapirwa nyaya iyi. VaMoyo havana kudaira nharembozha yavo. VaZhuwawo vati havasati vatarisa nharembozha yavo kuti pane mashoko akadai here sezvo paine vanhu vakawanda vari kuvatumira mashoko ekuvakorokotedza nekudomwa kuva gurukota. Asi VaKasukuwere havana kuda kutaura zviri kuitika vachiti Studio 7 igare kuAmerica kwede kuda kutaura zviri munyika. Tabatawo VaMashayamombe asi zvakona n’anga murapwa achida vachiti havana kusununguka kutaura parunhare. Mumusangano weZanu-PF hamuna kugadzikana sezvo pari kufungidzirwa kuti paita kunetsana kwakanyanya panyaya yekuti ndiyani achatora chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe avo vari kunzi vakwegura. Pakuvigwa kwegamba renyika VaSikhanyiso Ndlovu kumarinda eHeroes Acre neMugovera nhengo dzeZanu-PF dzakawirasanawo. Nyaya yekunetsana muZanu-PF iyi inonzi yave kukanganisa nhaurirano nemapato anopikisa idzo dzinonzi dzakatanga kuitwa kuGhana dzichitarisirwa kuitwa zvekare kuVictoria Falls neChina. Mapato anopikisa arikuramba kuti nhaurirano idzi dzakananganana nekuumba hurumende yemubatanidzwa. Zanu-PF nekune rimwe divi iri kutoramba kuti pane nhaurirano dziripo. Zanu-PF haina kubvira yagadzikana kubva zvayakadzinga vaive mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika amai Joyce Mujuru nevamwe vachipomerwa mhosva yekuda kubvisa VaMugabe pachigaro nechisimba. Asi amai Mujuru nevamwe vakadzingwa mubato vari kuramba nyaya yekuti vaida kubvisa VaMugabe pachigaro vachiti vari kuzorwa mafuta enguruve yavasina kudya. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoronga Kuongorora Madzimai Akawanda Chirwere cheGomarara
text: Hurumende inoti inotarisira kuve yaongorora gomarara remuromo wechibereko pamadzimai mamiriyoni matatu nemazana maviri panozosvika gore ra2020. Asi hurumende iri kutendawo kuti kune mamwe maruwa uchava mutoro sezvo kusina michina. Amai Yeukai Zhou vanobva kwaNhema kuShurugwi vanoti kunyanyangwe hazvo vachiziva kuti zvakakosha kuongoorwa gomarara rechibereko kusavepo kwezvipatara pedyo navo zvinoisa hutano hwavo panjodzi. Aya ndiwo matambudziko akasangana nemadzimai akawanda ari mumaruwa kunova kunogara vanhu vazhinji. Vamwe chiremba vari nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano hwemadzimai Dr Angeline Mapanga vanoti gomarara remuromo wechibereko iri rinokonzerwa neHuman Papiloma Virus inotapuriranwa pabonde. Gwaro reNational Cancer Prevention and Control Strategy for Zimbabwe (2014-2018) rinoti pamagomarara ese, gomarara remuromo wechibereko ndo ririkunyanyouraya madzimai nezvikamu makumi matatu nechidimbu kubva muzana. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo gomarara rechibereko idambudziko guru munyika. Mumwe mukuru mubazi rezvehutano, Doctor Bernard Madzima vanoti vari kuvavarira kuve vaongorora gomarara iri pamadzimai mamiriyoni matatu nemazana maviri ezviuru panozosvika gore ra2020. VaMadzima vanoti parizvino pagore kuri kuongororwa madzimai anosvika zana rezviuru vachiti huwandu uhwu huripasi zvakanyanya uye nyika inofanirwa kuwedzera huwandu hwevanhu vanoongororwa. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo Zimbabwe rine nzvimbo dzinosvika zana nemakumi matatu dzinoongorora gomarara remuromo wechibereko. Mumwe mushandi wekuZimbabwe Association of Church Related Hospitals Amai Anna Machakata Rufu avo vane zvipatara zvinopawo madzimai mikana yekunoongororwa gomarara remuromo wechibereko pachena vanoti hapana chingakonese Zimbabwe kusvitsa huwandu hwemadzimai avanotarisira kuve vaongorora gomarara iri muna 2020. Amai Muchakata Rufu vanoti zvakakosha parizvino kupa madzimai ruzivo rwekuti zvii zvakanakira kuongororwa gomarara remuromo wechibereko. Vatiwo madzimai anofanira kubvunza pazvipatara zviri pedyo navo kuti vaziviswe kwavanogona kunoongororwa pachena. Gwaro rakaburitswa nekomiti yeseneti inoona nezvekuenzaniswa kwemikana nebudiriro mushure mukushanyira zvipatara zvine michina yekuongorora gomarara iri rakaburitsa pachena kuti pavanhu zviuru zvinomwe vakaongororwa pachipatara cheParirenyatwa, zviuru zviviri vakashaya. Rufu urwu runonzi rurukukonzerwa nekuti vanhu vanenge vanonoka kuenda kuchipatara kana kuti vanenge vasina mari yekutenga mushonga uyo unodhura. Komiti iyi inotiwo muna 2018 bazi rezvehutano rakapihwa mari inosvika zviuru mazana makumi mashanu zvekushambadzira chirwere ichi asi gore rino rakapihwa zviuru makumi manomwe nemashanu chete. Komiti iyi yakakurudzira hurumende kuti ishambadzire nezvechirwere ichi kumunhu wese uye kuumba homwe yekurapa gomarara sezvakaitwa HIV/AIDS. No media source currently available

headline: VaMangoma, VaNcube, VaMakoni neVamwe Voita Mushandirapamwe
text: Mapato mashanu anopikisana nehurumende yeZanu PF nemusi weChipiri akanyorerana chibvumirano chemushandirapamwe pamberi pesarudzo dzichaitwa muna 2018 achiti kubatana kunowoedzera mukana wekubvisa hutungamiri hwaVaRobert Mugabe nebato ravo avo vave nemakore makumi matatu nematanhatu vari muhutongi. Mapato mashanu anopikisa anoti MDC yaVa Welshman Ncube, Mavambo Kusile Dawn kana kuti MKD, Zunde, Dare pamwe ne Renewal Democrats of Zimbabwe kana kuti RDZ anyorerana chibvumirano chekuumba mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa achiti kupinda musarudzo akapatsanurana hakuna zvakunobatsira pakukwikwidzana neZanu PF. Mutungamiri weRDZ, VaElton Mangoma, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vafara zvikuru nekunyorerana kwavaita chibvumirano ichi nemamamwe mapato. Kunyangwe hazvo mapato mashanu aya anyorerana chibvumirano ichi, MDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai pamwe neZimbabwe People First inotungamirwa naAmai Joice Mujuru vanga vasina kumiririrwa asi VaMangoma vati mapato aya angangopinda mumubatanidzwa uyu. Izvi zvatsinhirirwa nemutungamiri weMKD, VaSimba Makoni avo vaimbove gurukota rezvehupfumi. VaTendai Biti, avo vanotungamira bato reProgressive Democratic Party kana kuti PDP, vanga varipowo pakusainwa kwechibvumirano ichi. VaBiti vaudza Studio 7 kuti vachiri kuda kumbonokumbira mvumo yekusaina gwaro iri kukomiti huru yebato ravo. Mutauriri weZapu, VaMjobiza Noko, vatiwo vakamirira kuenda kukongiresi yebato ravo kuti vazive gwara richatorwa nebato ravo panyaya iyi. Mutauriri weMDCT, VaObert Gutu, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti havana kunge vakokwa pakusainwa kwechibvumirano asi sebato vanotsigira nyaya yekuti mapato aite mushandirapamwe. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri wePeople First, VaRugare Gumbo vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti havanawo kukokwa kumushandirapamwe uyu uye havana kana kumbotaurwa navo nezvenyaya iyi. Zvichakadai, VaMangoma vati mapato anenge asaina chibvumirano chemushandirapamwe ichi achazogara pasi owirirana kuti ndiyani achakwikwidza pachigaro chemutungamiri wenyika akamirira mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa aya paine nguva yekutsvaga rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo dzemuna 2018. Asi vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika munyaya dzenhaurirano idzi vanoti mapato aya amhanyira kuumba mubatanidzwa kuti agokwanisa kuve nemasimba ekuti achatora chigaro chipi ndiyani sezvo variwo vatanga kunyorerana chibvumirano ichi. Zvinonzi nyaya yekuti achataungamira mubatanidzwa uyu ndiyani ndiyo iri kunyanyonetsa kunyangwe zvazvo paine kuwirirana mumapto anopikisa ose kuti panofanira kuve nemubatanidzwa wemapato ose anopikisa uchakwikwidza musarudzo dzemuna 2018. No media source currently available

headline: Vatori veNhau Voyambira Kuti Mitemo Mitsva Iri KUrongwa Isavambunyikidze
text: Sangano reMedia Alliance of Zimbabwe rinoti rinoda kuti mitemo ine chekuita nezvenhau isambunyikidze vatori venhau kuitira kuti vashande vakasununguka nguva dzose. Mashoko aya anouya apo nyika iine hurongwa hwekuvandudza mitemo inobata kutorwa kwenhau. Pamusangano wayaita nevatori venhau muHarare neChipiri, Media Alliance of Zimbabwe yati kodzero dziri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika dzinofanirwa kuzadziswa. MAZ yati inoshungurudzikana zvikuru nekusungwa, kurohwa pamwe nekuvhiringwa kunoitwa vatapi venhau munyika. Gweta rinoshanda neMedia Institute of Southern Africa – Zimbabwe Chapter, VaKuda Hove, vati basa rekutapa nhau harifanirwe kutorwa semhosva uye vanotarisira kuti mitemo mitsva ine chekuita nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko igadzirise dambudziko iri. Hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa inoti ine chido chekubvisa mutemo we Access to Information and Protection of Privacy Act, kuvandudza Broadcasting Services Act nemitemo ine chekuita nezvekushandiswa kwemadandemutande - Cyber Security Laws. Hurumende inoti ichaunza mitemo mitatu mitsva ine chekuita nezvekutapwa kwenhau uye pakatotanga hurukuro. Bazi rinoona nezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, richitsigirwa nezvipangamazano mukunyorwa kwemitemo mubazi rezvemitemo, riri mubishi rekunyorabhiri rekuvandudza mutemo we Information, Broadcasting Services Ammendment Bill pamwe neZimbabwe Media Commission Bill. VaHove vatiwo vari kutarisira kuti hurumende igadzirise zvavakataura pamusoro pemutemo iyi zvinosanganisira kuti vanhu vanoda kutanga terevhizeni kana radio stations, havafanirwi kupiwa mari pachena anonzi madonations. Vatiwo vari kushushikanawo kuti Zimbabwe Media Commission iri kupiwa masimba ekusungisa vanhu vanenge vakanganisa zvine chekuita nenhau. Vachitaurawo vakamirira zvakare MAZ, VaNigel Nyamutumbu, vati kunyange hazvo vachigamuchira zviri kuitwa, uye vari kupindawo mumisangano ine chekuita nekuvandudzwa kwemitemo iyi, vakangomirira kuona kuti hurumende ichazadzikisa here zvainovimbisa. Kunyange hazvo tisina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kugurukota rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, makurukota ari kuona nezvekunyorwa kwemitemo iyi akazivisa patwitwer svondo rapera kuti vaive vakaungana kuNyanga nevane chekuita nezvekodzero dzekufambiswa kwemashoko zvakasununguka vachikurukura mitemo iyi. Hurumende inotiwo mitemo iyi inofanirwa kuti ifambirane nezviri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika. Asi MAZ inotiwo kuchine mitemo yakawanda inobata vatori venhau nekufambiswa kwemashoko kwakasununguka inofanirwa kutariswa. Mitemo iyi inosanganisira Official Secrets Act, Censorship and Entertainment Act, Criminal Law Codification and Reform Act pamwe ne Interception of Communications Act. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vabatwa neCoronavirus muHarare Voda Kusvika paZana
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muHarare chete hwasvika pamakumi mapfumbamwe nemasere kana kuti 98 apo bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus munyika yose hwasvika pamazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nemapfumamwe kana kuti 279. Vanhu vafa vachiri vana uye vapora vave makumi matatu nevatatu kana kuti 33. Vanhu gumi nevana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi neMugovera vose vakadzoka kubva kuSouth Africa. Harare ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi, ichiteverwa neMatabeleland South ne Masvingo. Nyazvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kuyambirawo kuti munzvimbo dzinochengeterwa vanenge vadzoka kubva kunze kwenyika zvikuru vanouya nemabhazi hadzina kushambidzika uye kune huori hunotyisa vamwe vachinzi vabhadhare mari yechiokomuhomwe vasati vabuditswa kana kuti kuvhenekwa. Munyori mubazi rezvehutano VaNick Mangwana vachinyora padandemutande ravo vakatenda kune munhu akadzingwa basa paBelvedere Teachers College nenyaya yehuori uye inyaya yavanoda kuferefeta. Mutungamiri wesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike vanoti hurumende inofanira kuona kuti munzvimbo dziri kugara vanhu vanenge vadzoka kubva kune dzimwe nyika kana kuti maqurantine centres dzive dzine hutsanana kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi masere nemana nematanhatu kana kuti 184, 000 vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muAfrica. Vashaya vadarika zviuru zvishanu nemakumi manomwe nemumwe kuti 5,071. Vapora vanodarika zviuru makumi manomwe nemasere kana kuti 81,000. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni matanhatu nezviuru zvipfumbamwe kana kuti kuti 6,9 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika zviuru mazana mana kana kuti 400,000. Vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni matatu kana kuti 3 million. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe neGermany Dzoronga Kuumba Komisheni Inoona nezveKusimbaradza Hukama
text: Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakasangana neChipiri negurukota rekuGermany rinoona nezvekudyidzana munyaya dzehupfumi pamwe nebudiriro, VaGerd Muller, vakabvumirana kuumba komisheni ichaone nezvekusimbaradza hukama nekudyidzana pakati penyika mbiri idzi. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mushure memusangano wavo, VaChinamasa vakati vafara kushanyirwa naVaMuller. Vakati vatura nyaya dzakawanda dzinosanganisira kudyidzana kwenyika mbiri idzi, chikwereti cheZimbabwe kuGermany, zvirango zvehupfumi pamwe nekuti Zimbabwe itange zvekare kuwana rutsigiro rwemari nehunyanzvi kubva kuGermany. Vakatiwo vakazeya zvimwe zvingaitwe neZimbabwe kuti ikwanise kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo kune dzimwe nyika nemasangano epasi rose pamwe nekuti igadziridze hukama hwayo nenyika dzepasi rose. VaChinaamasa vakati vakabvumiranawo kushanda pamwe chete panyaya yekudzidzisa vanhu zvidzidzo zvemabasa emaoko kana kuti vocational training nechinangwa chekuti vanhu vakwanise kuzvishandira pamwe nekupinza vamwe mabasa. Zimbabwe yakatarirwa zvirango zvehupfumi nenyika dzekumavirira dzakaita seAmerica, Australia nenyika dzekuEurope nekuda kwehutongi hwehudzvanyiriri, kutyora kodzeo dzevanhu pamwe nekuita sarudzo dzisina kujeka. VaMuller vakati vakafara kuuya kuZimbabwe mushure mekunge Zimbabwe yagadza mutungamiriri mutsva zvichitevera sarudzo dzemwedzi wapfuura idzo dzakazosimbiswawo nedare repamusororo munyika. Vakati zvakakosha kuti mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaite zvakavimbisa kuita zvekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu kusanganisira mapato anopikisa pamwe nekuremekedza nekutevedza mitongo yematare edzimhosva. VaMuller vakati Germany nedunhu rese reEurope vanoda runyaro muZimbabwe ndosaka vachida kuti VaMnangagwa vaite zvavakavimbisa. Vakatiwo Germany inoda kuona hupenyu nehupfumi hwevanhu vekumaruwa huchisimudzirwa ndosaka iri kuda kushanda neZimbabwe mukusimudzira ruzivo rwevanhu pamabasa emaoko. Vakatiwo Joint Commission yavachaumba neZimbabwe ichazeya zvese zvingaitwe uye kuti Germany ingabatsirei sei vanhu vemuZimbabwe kuti vabudirire. Zvichakadai, nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo dzinoti kunyange hazvo makurukota aVaMnangagwa ari kuramba achiita basa rawo, ari kuita izvi zviri kunze kwemutemo sezvo mutemo uchiti zvigaro zvavo zvinopera panogadzwa mutungamiri wenyika mushure mesarudzopapera. Izvi zviri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika pasi paSection 108 (1) (c). VaMnangagwa vakagadzwa kuve mutungamiriri wenyika nesvondo uye havasati vadoma dare remakurukota avo. No media source currently available

headline: Varwere Vodzoserwa Kudzimba Apo Kuramwa Mabasa kweMadhokotera, Vakoti neVamwe Kwoenderera Mberi
text: Varwere vakawanda vanonzi vari kudzoserwa kudzimba apo kuramwa mabasa kwevakoti, vanachiremba nevamwe vashandi vemuzvipatara kuri kuenderera mberi. Kunyange hazvo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vari kuti hurumende yavo vakazvipira kugadzirisa zvichemo zvevashandi vayo, hapana hurukuro dzati dzaitwa kubva zvakatanga kuramwa mabasa vashandi vemuzvipatara ava svondo rapera. Nyaya yekukwira zvakanyanya kwemitengo yezvinhu muzvitoro uye zvave kuitwa nevemichovha nevaridzi vedzimba zvekubhadharisa vanhu nemari yekuAmerica, zvave kupa kuti zvinhu zviomere vashandi avo vari kubhadharwa nedhora remunyika iro riri kushaya simba zuva nezuva. Kuramwa mabasa uku kuri kuuya panguva yakaoma sezvo Zimbabwe, sedzimwe nyika pasi rose, iri kurwisa chirwere cheCovid19. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvehutano pamwe nesangano reHealth Service Board kunyangwe hazvo takavatumira mibvunzo paWhatsApp. Asi mutungamiri musangano reZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnoch Dongo, vanoti hurumende haisi kuratidza kuzvipira kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo zvavakaipa neChina svondo rapera. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yombomira Kupa Magwaro Ekurima Mbanje
text: Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehupfumi, VaTerrance Mukupe, vanoti hurumende yambomira kupa vanhu marenzenise ekurima mbanje nokuti vanhu vanyorera kuti vanoda marezenisi aya vawandisa. VaMukupe vativo hurumende inoda nguva yekumbotura mafemo ichiona kuti hurongwa uhu hungafambiswa sei. "Tanga tisingatarisiri kuti kuchaita vanhu vakawanda kudaro vanoda marezenisi nekuti vanhu vauya vapfuura mazana matatu vanoda marezenisi. Saka unoona kuti kana wange uchida kupa vanhu vashanu chete, unozosarudza sei pasingaitwe huori," VaMukupe vakaudza Studio 7. Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, "Saka tirikunyatsotarisa kuti tozviita sei. Tinofanira kunyatso kunzwisisa kuti chinofanirwa kuitwa chii uye tinozviita sei. Uyezve tinofanira kuronga kuti kunorimirwa kwacho ndekupi uye kuti kune masoja here anochengeta." No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Inoudza Dare Kuti Mushandi Haafanirwe Kumakidzwa Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Sangano revashandi, reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZTCU, raenda kumatare nechikumbiro chechimbichimbi chekuti vashandi vasamanikidzwe kubayiwa nhomba dzekudzivirira Covid-19 richiti zviri kuitwa pari zvino zviri kutyora kodzero dzevashandi. ZCTU yaendesa kudare gurukota revashandi, VaPaul Mavima, gweta guru rehurumende, VaPrince Machaya, pamwe nemamwe makambani ari kurambidza vashandi vasina kubayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kuenda kubasa. Makambani aya anosanganisira makambani ehurumende anoti NetOne neZimbabwe National Road Administration kozitiwo makambani akaita seWindmill, Zimnat Insurance, SeedCo Zimbabwe pamwe neManicaland State University of Applied Science. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vaenda kudare mushure mekuwana zvichemo zvakawanda kubva kuvashandi vari kurambidzwa kushanda nekuti havana kubayiwa nhomba dzekudzivirira Covid-19. VaMoyo vati vanhu vane zvikonzero zvakasiyana siyana zvekuti vasabayiwe zvinosanganisira kutoshaya nhomba dzacho. Vatiwo hazvina zvazvinobatsira kuti makambani aya anorambidza vashandi vasina kubayiwa kushanda asi vatengi vemakambani aya vachibvumidzwa kupinda mukambani aya vasina kubayiwa izvo vati rusarura rwunifanuira kumiswa. Vatiwo zvinosuwisa kuti hurumende iri kuramba yakapeta maoko kodzero dzevanhu dzichitsikwa tsikwa. Mutungamiriri wesangano revashandirwi reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, Dr Israel Murefu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pana nhengo dzavo dziri kutora matanho ekuchetedza hutano hwevashandi. Dr Murefu vati sekuziva kwavo hapana vashandi vari kudzingwa basa nekuti havana kubayiwa nhomba vachiti vari kungonzi vagare kumba kuitira kuti vasaparadzire chirwere ichi kune vaya vakabayiwa. VaMavima vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kupikisa chikumbiro cheZCTU kudare. Vati kuenda kumatare handiko kungagadzirisa nyaya iyi vachiti hurumende, vashandi nevashandirwi vanofanira kuita nhaurirano dzekugadzirisa nyaya iyi pasi peTripatite Negotiating Forum. Vatiwo zvakakosha kuti vashandirwi nevashandi vataurirane mumakambani avo. Vatiwo denda reCovid-19 riri kupedza vanhu pasi rese uye hurumende haingaregi vanhu vachipera nekuda kwekuti pane vamwe vasingade kubayiwa nhomba dzekudzivirira Covid-19. Dare repamusoro rinotarisirwa kutara zuva rekuti nyaya yeZCTU ichanzikwa rini svondo rinouya. Zimbabwe inoti iri kuronga kubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzanakuitirakuti Covid-19 isarambe ichipararira munyika.

headline: Vamwe Vatungamiri veMapato Anopikisa Vokurudzira Vanhu Kuti Vabayiwe Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa, reLabour, Economists and Democrats (LEAD), Muzvare Linda Masarira, vanoti vari kukurudzira vana veZimbabwe kuti vasatarisa denda reCovid-19 sedambudziko renyika yeZimbabwe chete izvo zvinozoita kuti varitarise neziso rezvematongerwo enyika. Muzvare Masararira, avo vakave mumwe wevatungamiri vemapato anopikisa vakabatana nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pakuparurwa kwechikamu chechipiri chekubaiwa kwenhomba yeSinopharm, yekudzivirira Covid-19 kuVictoria Falls nezuro, vanotiwo kunyange hazvo vana veZimbabwe vaine kodzero yekusarudza chakavanakira, zvakakoshawo kuti vasarudze kuzvidzvirira kubva kuchirwere ichi kuburikidza nekubaiwa nhomba iyi. Mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, ndemumwe wevatungamiri vanopikisa vakavewo pachiitiko ichi. VaMnangagwa vakatora mukana uyu kubaiwawo nhomba yavo yekutanga, pamwechete negurukota rezvekudzviririrwa kwenyika, Amai Oppah Muchinguri-Kashiri, naMuzvare Masarira. VaMwonzora vakabaiwawo nhomba yavo yepiri kuWilkins muHarare nezuro wakare. No media source currently available

headline: VaJob Sikhala Votanga Kutongwa Muna Ndira Gore Rinouya
text: Mutevedzeri wasachigaro veMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaJob Sikhala, vaudzwa nedare redzimhosva kuMasvingo kuti nyaya yavari kupomerwa inofanirwa kuenda kunotongwa nedare repamusoro, sezvo vari kupomerwa mhosva huru ine chekuita nekuda kubvisa hurumende zvisiri pamutemo. VaSikhala vakasungwa muna Chikunguru vachipomerwa mhosva yekutaura mashoko anonzi nehurumende aive akanangana nekuda kubvisa hurumende zvisiri pamutemo. Munyori anoona nezvemitemo muMDC, VaInnocent Gonese, vanoti havana kufara nedanho iri sezvo zvose zviri kuitwa zviriine chinangwa chekushungurudza VaSikhala, avo vanove nhengo inomirira Zengeza West mudare reNational Assembly. VaGonese vanoti vachaenda kudare iri panotanga kunzwikwa nyaya yaVaSikhala vachivatsigira sezvo VaSikhala vasina mhosva yavakapara. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vokurudzira Runyararo, Vanopikisa Vachiti Muromo Hauzarirwe neRwizi
text: Mutungamiri we bato re ZANU PF varizve mutungamiri we nyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakakurudzira runyararo nekubatana munyika pamberi pesarudzo dzegore rinouya. VaMnangagwa vataura mashoko aya pamusangano wePolitiburo yebato ravo muHarare nhasi. Mashoko aya ari kuuya apo vanopikisa nevanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vari kuti mhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika iri kuwedzera. VaMnangagwa vatiwo vari kufara negadziriro iri kuitwa nebato ravo pamberi peCongress iri kuitwa muna Gumiguru apo pachasarudzwa vatungamiri vatsva vebato. Vaenderera mberi vachiti vari kufara kuti hupfumi hwenyika hwave mugwara rakanaka. Asi Muatauriri webato rinopikisa re CCC Muzvare Fadzayi Mahere vaudzaStudio 7 kuti mashoko aVaMnangagwa kungotaurawo zvisina pundutso.

headline: Vamwe Vonyunyuta neMari Dziri kuBhadhariswa Vanoda Marezinesi eKutepfenyura
text: Vanorwira kodzero dzekufambiswa kwemashoko kwakasununguka nekodzero dzevatori venhau vochema- chema nemari yemarezinesi ekutepfenyura yakatarwa nehurumende. Muzviga zvakabudiswa nehurumende pasi pe Statutory Instrument 27 yegore rino nhepfenyuro dzenharaunda vanotarisirwa kubhadhara mari inosvika zviuru zvisere zvinezana remadhora kuti vakwanise kungonyorera kuti vanoda rezinesi iyo isingazodzoserwi kunyangwe vakashaya rezinesi iri. Pamusoro pemari iyi vanenge vabudirira vanozobhadharawo mari inosvika zviuru gumi nezvinomwe pagore rega rega kwemakore makumi erezinesi. Avowo vachange vachida rezinhesi yekutepfenyura nhepfenyuro yenyika yese vanobhadhara mari yekutsvaka rezinesi iri inoita zviuru makumi mana nezviviri zvine mazana mashanu emadhora iyo isingadzorerwi zvakare. Vanozobhadhara zvakare zviuru zana nemakumi maviri anezviuru zvinomwe nemazana mashanu kuti vakwanise kudaniwa kumusangano unouya veruzhinji kuti vatsanangure pamusoro penhepfenyuro yavo iyo isingadzorerwi zvakare vakasapiwa rezinenesi. Vanoshandisawo madandemutande pakutepfenyura vanotarisirwawo kubhadhara kubhadhara mari inoraudzira miriyoni kana yahwerengedzewa zvese zvinodiwa Mukuru weMedia Institute of Southern Africa- Zimbabwe VaTabani Moyo vati mari yakatarwa nehurumende iyi inotyisa zvakanyanya. VaMoyo vati mutengo wakatarwa kunevanotepfenyura pamadandemutande we miriyoni imwechete yemadhora emuno vakadai sanaBus Stop TV vanonakidza veruzhinji, 263 Chat nevamwe vakawanda mucherechedzo wekuti hurumende inoda kuti masangano awa avhare. VaMoyo vashoropodzawo mari dzakatarwa kuneavo vachange vachida marezinesi ekutepfenyura nhepfenyuro dzematunhu. VaMoyo vati havaoni veruzhinji vachikwanisa kubhadhara mari idzi vakati zvobva zvapa hurumende mukana wekuva iyo chete inogona kukokwikwidza kuwana marezinesi awa. Izvi zvatsigirwa neimwe nyanzvi munezvekutepfenyura VaKudzai Kwangwari vati mari irikudiwa kunyanya kune avo vanenge vachizoda rezinesi yenhepfenyuro yenharaunda (Community Radio) yakawandisa. VaKwangwari vanotiwo nekunetsa kurikuita zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi nekudawo kwehurombo munyika havaoni nharaunda dzichizokwanisa kubhadhara marezinesi awa.
