VaMoyo vatiwo mutemo urikugadzirwa weBroadcasting Services unoti kune avo vachazoda kuita bhizimusi rekutepfenyura munyika vanogona chete kuwana rubatsiro kana rutsigiro kubva kunze kwenyika hwezvikamu zvisingadariki makumi maviri kubva muzana izvo zvinoreva kuti mari zhinji yacho vanofanira kuzvitsvagira. VaMoyo vati izvi zvinosiya veruzhinji vangade kutepfenyura kunze sezv vanenge vasina mari. Kunyangwe zvazvo mumutemo uyu hurumende yakaisa mari yerezinhesi dzenharaunda, parizvino munyika hakuna vakambopihwa rezinesi dzemhando iyi izvo zvopawo vamwe kuti vafungidzire kuti hurumende ingangodaro yoda kuvhura masaisai. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuhurumende panyaya iyi asi munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuudiswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vanogaroti hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa inechido chekuvhura masai sai pamwe nekuona kuti kodzero yenhau munyika yazadzikiswa. No media source currently available

headline: Vechidiki Vochenesa Guta Ravo reChinhoyi
text: Vechidiki vedzisvondo vari kubatana nekanzuru yeChinhoyi mukuchenesa guta ravo pamwe nenzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji kuitira kuti vadzivirire zvirwere zvinobatwa nekuda kwemvura yakasviba. Vechidiki ava vanosvika makumi mashanu, vachibva kumasangano akasiyana siyana, vakafamba vachinhonga marara pamwe nekubvisa tsvina munofamba nemvura kuti isajenge kana kuyeredza tsvina ichienda munzvimbo munotorwa mvura yekunwa nevamwe vanhu izvo zvinozokonzeresa kuti varware. Mumwe wechidiki, Memory Godzwa, anonamata neApostolic Faith Mission, AFM, anoti apinda muchirongwa chekuchenesa nharaunda kuti adzivirire zvirwere muvanhu pamwe nekufa kwezvipuka zvinogara mumvura kana mvura yakasviba. Mumwe wechidiki, Jonathan Manyere, uyo anonamata nechechi yeFaith Ministry mumusha unogara veruzhinji weChikonohono, anoti kuchenesa nharaunda kwevechidiki vedzichechi dzakasiyana vari pamwechete zvinosimbaradza humwe pakati pemachechi. Mukuru wechirongwa chekuchenesa nharaunda, VaVisitor Munangi, vanoti vakaona kuti zvirwere zvinokonzerwa nekunaya kwemvura zvinowanda nekunaya kwemvura. Mumwe wevakuru vemubatanidzwa wemachechi, Rev Andrew Chikomo, vanoti danho rakatora machechi rinoratidza pachena kuti machechi havatarise pane zvemweya chete, asi kuti vane hany'a nehutano hwenhengo dzavo. VaMunangi vanoti chirongwa chekuchenesa nharaunda mutoro wevanhu vose nekudaro vachakoka vemamwe masangano asiri emachechi pamwe nevana vechikoro kuti vadyare pfungwa yekuita hany'a nekusviba kwenharaunda. VaChikomo vanoti vachatanga kuisa pekurasira marara munzvimbo dzakawanda kuti munhu asafambe akabata marara kwenguva yakareba asati asvika pane bhini. No media source currently available

headline: Dare rePamusoro Rinoti Kudzingwa Muparamende kwaVaBiti neVamwe neVavo Hakusi paMutemo
text: Dare repamusoro reHigh Court rapa mutongo wekuti kudzingwa mudare reparamende kwakaitwa nhengo dzePeople’s Democratic Party, PDP, dzakakwikwidza dziri pasi pemubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance hakusi pamutemo. Izvi zvave kureva kuti mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, avo vanomirira Harare East, nevamwe vavo vave kudzokera mudare iri kunyange mutongo uyu uchikwanisa kukwikwidzwa mudare repamusoro soro reSupreme Court. Mutauriri wedare reparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, vakadzinga VaBiti nevamwe vavo vashanu vanoti; VaWillias Madzimure (Kambuzuma), VaSettlement Chikwinya (Mbizo), VaKucaca Ivumile Phulu (Nkulumane), VaSichelesile Mahlangu (Pumula), uye VaRegai Tsunga (Mutasa South). VaMudenda vakavadzinga vachiti vainge vanyorerwa tsamba naVaBenjamin Rukanda vaizviti ndivo munyori mukuru webato rePDP. VaRukanda vaiti VaBiti nevamwe vavo vainge vabuda mubato. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaRukanda kuti tinzwe divi ravo sezvo nharembosha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Asi vakambomiswa basa sameya weHarare, VaJacob Mafume, vanova nhengo yeMDC Alliance vatenda kuti mutongo uyu wapihwa uye vari kutarisira kuti nhengo dzavo dzidzokere mudare reparamende. No media source currently available

headline: Electoral Court Yotarisirwa Kupa Mutongo paNyaya Yekuti Ndiani Akakunda kuChegutu West
text: Dare rinotonga nyaya dzine chekuita nesarudzo, reElectoral Court, riri kutarisirwa neMuvhuro kupa mutongo waro panyaya yakakwidzwa kudare iri nevaimirira MDC Alliance musarudzo yemumiriri weChegutu West mudare reparamende, VaGift Konjana, avo vari kupikisa kugadzwa kwaVaDexter Nduna veZanu PF semumiriri wedunhu iri. VaKonjana vari kupikisa danho iri vachiti ndivo vakakunda musarudzo dzemusi wa30 Chikunguru asi Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, iyo yakati VaNduna ndivo vakakunda, yakavhiringidza manhamba akabuda musarudzo iyi. ZEC yakazivisa kuti VaNduna vakakunda VaKonjana mushure mekuwana mavhoti anoita 10 932, VaKonjana vachiwana navhoti anoita 10 828. ZEC inonzi yakabvuma kuti yakakanganisa manhamba ayakazvisa, asi yakakurudzira VaKonjana kuti vakwire kudare resarudzo iri kuti nyaya yavo iongororwe. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata VaNduna kana magweta avo kanawo ZEC kuti tinzwe mativi avo. VaKonjana vanoti vanoda kuti dare ritonge kuti ndivo vakakunda uye kuti vagadzwe senhengo yeparamende inomirira Chegutu West muparamende, kwete VaNduna. Asi VaNduna vanonzi vari kutiwo dare iri harina masimba ekushandura zvinenge zvaitwa neZEC, uye kudoma mumwe munhu kuti ndiye akakunda. No media source currently available

headline: America Inorumbidzwa Pakukudza Bumbiro Remutemo
text: Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemitemo iri kurumbidza America nekutevedzera bumbiro remutemo wayo zvinopa kuti mapisha pisha nekunetsana kuite kushoma. Chizvarwa chemuZimbabwe vachishanda nekambani yemagweta yeScanlen and Holderness muHarare, VaGodwin Nyengedza, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakagara nekushanda munyika dzakasiyana siyana, kusanganisa kuUnited Kingdom, asi kana vachienzanisa nyika idzi, America iri pamberi pakutevedzera mitemo. “Kana ndichienzanisa nedzimwe nyika, chandinonyanya kukudza pamusoro peAmerica ndechekuti inoremekedza bumbiro remutemo kusanganisa kodzero nekusununguka kwevanhu,” VaNyengedza vakaudza Studio 7. Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Ichi chinhu chikuru chandiri kuona muAmerica zvekuti dzimwe nyika dzinofanira kudzidza pazviri. Munhu ari muAmerica anokwanisa kutaura zvinhu zvaanoda pasina kutya kuti anogona kubatwa nemurawo kana kusungwa.” VaNyengedza, avo vari kushanda pari zvino nekambani yeCovington and Burling muWashington D.C vanoti chimwe chezvavari kuona ndechekuti zvekudya zvemhando dzose zvinowanikwa muAmerica. Vanoti apa America iri mberi senyika ine vanhu vemarudzi ese anobva kunyika dzese pasi pane zvinokonzera kuti nyika iyi ive nezvekudya zvenyika dzese dzese. Chimwe chezvinovafadza inyaya yedandemutande, kana kuti ‘internet’. “Ikozvino nyika dzese dziri kushandisa madandemutande, internet. MuAmerica hapana painotadza kubata internet nokuti makambani anouyisa internet akawanda zvekuti kukwikwidzana kwawo kunobatsira vanhu veruzhinji sezvo mitengo ichizodzikiswa,” VaNyengedza vakaudza Studio 7. Vanoti sarudzo dzichangopera kuitwa muAmerica dzakaratidza zvekare kuti vanhu vanotsvaka rutsigiro musarudzo vanotaura zvavanoda, vakasununguka uye vasingatyiri hupenyu hwavo. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vokurudzira Kusimbiswa kwekuChengetedzwa kweMutungamiri weNyika
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi dzechiuto dzinoti kuchengetedzo kwemutungamiri wenyika hakuna kusimba sezvinotarisirwa nekuti vanochengetedza vacho havana ruzivo nekudzidziswa basa iri zvakadzama sezvo vakawanda vavo vari vechiuto. Zvichitevera kuputika kwakaita chinofungidzirwa kuti chombo chikakuvadza vanhu vanosvika makumi mana nevapfumbamwe neMugovera munhandare yeWhite City kuBulawayo pakupera kwemusangano webato reZanu PF, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvekuchengetedzwa kwevakuru vakuru dzinoti zviri kuitika hazvishamise sezvo kuchengetedzwa kwemutungamiri wenyika kuri zinyekenyeke. Nyanzvi idzi dzinopa muenzaniso wemunhu akaenda paitaura mutungamiri wenyika kumusangano wekuGweru akabata VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kumusana semucherochedzo wekusasimba kwekuchengetedzwa kwavo. Vaimbove mupurisa mukuru vakasiya basa gore rapera, VaOnisimo Ngirandi, vanoti mukuru wenyika ave kuchengetedzwa nemauto ayo vanoti haana ruzivo rwakadzama nekuchengetedzwa kwepedyo, kana kuti close security, kwemutungamiri wenyika. VaNgirandi vanoti vanochengetedza mutungamiri wenyika vanofanirwa kunge vakadzidzira basa iri kunyika dzakaita se Israel ne Egypt, idzo dzakadzidzisa vakawanda kusanganisira ivo vaichengetedza vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. Asi vamwe vanoti zvakaitika kuBulawayo ndezvemugotsi matsuro sezvo chiri chiitiko chekunyepera. VaCanisius Muremba, avo vakarwa muhondo yerusununguko kudivi reZIPRA, vanoti dai rainge riri girinedhi chairo sezviri kufungidzirwa nevamwe, ringadai rakauraya vanhu vakawanda vainge vari mukati memamita matanhatu kusanganisira VaMnangagwa. VaMuremba vanoti chiri kunyanya kushamisa ndechekuti hapana ari kusungwa saka vakawanda vave kubvunza kuti ndiyani muvengi waVaMnangagwa chaiye. Mahofisi aVaMnangagwa akambopindwa zvisiri pamutemo gore rapera apo vainge vachiri mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika asi hapana akasungwa. Imwe nyanzvi yezvechiuto yaramba kudomwa nezita sezvo ichiri muchiuto inoti zviri pachena kuti bhambu rinonzi rakaputika harina kukandwa sezvo rakaputika richibva pasi. Nyanzvi iyi inoti chombo chakaputika chinofanirwa kunge chakakagadzirwa nemunhuwo zvake sezvo pakaitwa basa risina hunyanzvi. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nemumwe murwi wehondo yerusununguko VaTinashe Chinengundu, avo vanoti dai riri bhambu chairo pangadai pakafiwa nekuparadzwa kwezvinhu zvakawanda. Mumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi, VaChristopher Chirimuta, vanoti mapurisa nemasoja hapana zvavakaita zvine chekuita nekutarisa kuti hapachisina here rimwe bhambu uye vanoti havanzwisise kuti sei munhu akatora vhidhiyo iri kutenderera asina kutya sezvo akaramba achingotora mifananidzo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaIbbo Mandaza, vanoti vari kushamisikawo nemashoko ari kubuda ekuti bhambu rainge rakateyerwa VaMnangagwa chete sezvinonzi vatevedzeri vavo havana basa. VaMandaza vanoti vatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika VaConstantino Chiwenga naVaKembo Mohadi vakakosha zvakafanana naVaMnangagwa. Vakawanda vari kushamisikawo nezviri kuitika zvakafanana nekuburitswa kwemumhanzi uri kutaura nezvekubhombwa kwakaitika kuBulawayo pasina zuva rimwechete pamwe nehuwandu hwevanhu vari kunzi vakakuvara asi vamwe vanoti vanhu vasingadarike makumi maviri vakakuvara muchiitiko ichi.

headline: Sangano rePlatform for Youth Development Robatsira Mhuri Dziri Kuda Kubviswa kuChipinge
text:
Sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevechidiki pamwe nebudiriro yematunhu, rePlatform for Youth and Community Development, riri mushishi kubatsira vagari vemudunhu reChipinge rose vanonzi vakatarisana nekubviswa munzvimbo dzavagere.

Mukuru wesangano iri, Claris Madhuku, vanoti vagari vanodarika zviuru zvishanu mumatunhu eChipinge anosanganisira Munyokowere, Ndiyadzo, Beacon, Chibuwe, neKondo vakapiwa matsamba akabva kubazi rezveminda vachipiwa mazuva manomwe chete ekuti vange vabva munzvimbo dzavagere.

VaMadhuku vanoti mhuri idzi dzakatanga kugara mumatunhu aya mumakore ekuma 1950, zvekuti vanotove nemasabhuku nemadzishe avo, zvekuti vari kutokatyamadzwa kuti vave kubviswa munzvimbo dzavo nehurumende yevatema.

Vanotiwo sangano ravo riri kubatsira vagari nekuvadzidzisa kodzero dzavo dziri mubumbiro remitemo. Vanoti vakasvitsa nyaya iyi kumakomisheni anomirira kodzero dzevanhu eZimbabwe Human Rights Commission neNational Peace and Reconciliation Commission kuti apindirewo mugakava iri.

Asi VaMadhuku vanoti vamiriri vehurumende vakavazivisa kuti hurumende iri kutarisa nyaya iyi sezvo panga paine hurongwa hwekuona kuti vanhu vakapiwa sei minda senzira yekugadzirisa nyaya yeminda. Vanoti vari kushandawo nekanzuru yeChipinge pakutsvaga nzira dzekupedza gakava iri.

VaMadhuku vanoti bumbiro remitemo rinoti kana munhu achibviswa paagere, anofanirwa kutanga aratidzwa paari kunogariswa, kwete kuti munhu anongonzi ibva asiri kuziva kwaari kuenda.

Vanoti tsakurudzo yavo inoratidza kuti pane makambani ari kuda kupiwa minda iyi kuti arime rudzi rwenzungu rwe macadamia pamwe nemabhanana. No media source currently available

headline: Zvikoro Zvovhurwa Vakawanda Vachinetsekana Kuwana Mari
text: Vabereki vakawanda vanonzi vachakundikana kugadzirira zvakakwana kudzokera kuchikoro kwevana vavo neChipiri pachatanga kotoro yepiri, nekuda kwekunetsa kwemari kumabhanga pamwe nemunyika yose. Mutungamiri werimwe sangano revarairidzi, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti sesangano vatambira mashoko ekuti mitsetse yekutora mari kumabhanga yanga yakareba kudarika mamwe mazuva, uye mamwe mabhanga apererwa nemari. Mumwe mubereki ane mwana anodzidza kuMazowe asina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti azokwanisa kuwana mari yekuti mwana afambise mushure mekumira mumutsetse wepabhanga kwenguva ndefu kwazvo. Mabhanga mashoma asara achipa mari anonzi anga achipa madhora makumi maviri chete pamunhu, mari inonzi nevakawanda haina zvikuru zvainobatsira nazvo. Doctor Zhou vanotiwo zvikoro zviri kuvhurwa pasina zvati zvagadziriswa pane zvinetswa zvekotoro yapera zvinosanganisira hwaro hwedzidzo hutsva, kana kuti curriculum. Doctor Zhou vanoti vadzidzi nevadzidzisi vane dambudziko rekuona vanofunga kuti vari kusiiwa kunze panyaya yehwaro hwedzidzo hutsva sezvo pasina zvati zvaitwa zvekuvabatsira kuti vave nemabhuku ekushandisa. Vanotiwo nyaya dzemari dzemihoro dzevarairidzi hadzina kutaurwa nezvadzo, izvo zviri kuita kuti varairidzi vanyunyute zvikuru. No media source currently available

headline: Chenjerai Hove Anorangarirwa Zvine Mutsindo muHarare
text: Vanyori, vana nyanduri, vaimbi pamwe nehama neshamwari dzemushakabvu, VaChenjeral Hove, kubva mativi mana enyika, dzakasangana muHarare nemusi weMugovera manheru dzichipemberera hupenyu hwavo pamwe nemabasa avo munyaya dzekunyora mabhuku nenhetembo. Paive nemufaro mukuru kuQueensade Sports Club uye mhuri yaVaHove inoti yakafara zvikuru kuti shamwari dzavo pamwe nevamwe vavaishanda navo vakaronga mutambo wakadai uyo vakati wakabudirira zvikuru. Mudzimai wamuchakabvu, Amai Tekla Hove, vakatsanangura murume wavo semunhu aive nerudo nemhuri nebasa rake uye vanoti vanotenda chose kuti vakadzisisa vana vavo uye vanokwanisa kurarama pasina dambudziko kunyange baba vavo vasisipo Amai Hove vakati chimwe chinonyanyovafadza rudo rwakaratidzwa neshamwari dzemurume wavo nevamwe vavaishanda navo uye vati izvi zvinoratidza kuti vakasiya vadyara rudo. Mmwe mwana VaHove, Tanatswa, akaudza Studio7 kuti baba vake munhu aive nerudo uye izvi zvakaratidzwa nekuuya nehuwandu kwakaita vanhu, vanyori, shamwari dzavo, vaimbi nevanhuwo zvavo kumutambo wekupemberera hupenyu hwavo nekuvarangarira. Mumwe mwana wavo, Tafadzwa, akatiwo mafariro aita vanhu neMugovera ndozvaigara vachiita nebaba vavo uye zvinorwadzo kuti havasisipo. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Human Rights Association, VaOkay Machisa, avo vakaridzawo mimhanzi pamutambo wekurangarira VaHove, vanoti vakaona zvakakodzero kunge varipowo sezvo VaHove vaive mumwe wevanhu vakavamba sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimRights. VaMichael Mabwe, avo vanoitawo nhetembo dzekukurudziro kodzero dzevanhu, vanoti vanorangarira VaHove nemabasa avo uye mabasa avo ndivo akaitawo kuti vapinde mumabasa ekusimudzira kodzero dzevanhu. Munyori wesangao rinomirira vanyori reZimbabwe Writers Association, Memory Chirere, akati mutambo wekurangarira VaHove wakafamba zvakanaka uye zvinoratidza kufamba kwavaiita nevamwe vavo. Vamwe vanyori, vaimbi nananyanduri vakapinda mumutambo weMugovera vanosanganisira, David Mungoshi, Conte Mhlanga, Shimmer Chinodya, Virginia Phiri, Hope Masike nevamwe. VaHove vaive nemukurumbira uye vakahwina mibairo yakwanda yekunyora mabhuku. Mibayiro iyi inosanganisira we Noma Aaward for Publishing in Africa. Vakashayikira kuNorway munaChinkunguru uko vange vave kugara muhupoteri. Asi vakazochengetwa kumusha kwavo kuGokwe. No media source currently available

headline: South Africa Yoshorwa Nekuda Kupa Zimbabwe Zvombo Zvekurwisa Vanoratidzira
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muSouth Africa, Amai Lindiwe Sisulu, vakazivisa nemusi weChipiri kuti hurumende yavo iri kuronga kubatsira mapurisa ezimbabwe kuburikidza nekuapa zvombo zvisingauraye zvekushandisa mukuparadza vanhu vanenge vachiratidzira. Bepanhau reDaily Maverick rinoti Amai Sisulu vakaudza vatori venhau kuti zvombo zvisingauraye zvinobatsira kuderedza kudeurwa kweropa munguva dzekusagadzikana kwezvinhu. Bepanhau iri rinoti Amai Sisulu vakati dambudziko reZimbabwe nderekuti mapurisa haana zvekushandisa zvinokodzera mukudzivirira mhirizhonga nekudaro ari kuzopedzisira apa basa iri kumauto, ayo anongoshandisa mabara mukudzivirira mhirizhonga kana kuratidzira. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata Amai Sisulu panyaya iyi. Takundikanawo kubata mutauriri webazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana, sezvo nhare yavo yanga isingadairwi. Vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, uye vachitungamira sangano reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu vanoti dambudziko remuZimbabwe harisi rezvombo zvekushandisa, asi kuti ndere hutungamiri hunoremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Paramende Yokurudzirwa Kuti Iferefete VaKuda Tagwirei
text: Vanhu vakawanda vari kukurudzira kuti paramende iferefete zvakadzama zvakaburitswa nesangano re The Sentry, remu America rinoongorora huori hunoitwa pasi rose, pamusoro pamuzvinabhizinesi, uye ari chipangamazano chemutungamiri wenyika, Va Kudakwashe Tagwirei, avo vanonzi vari kuita zvehuori vachiburitsa munyika mamiriyoni nemamiriyoni emadhora ekuAmerica nenzira dzisina kujeka vachishandisa makambani avo The Sentry yakaburitsa gwaro rinonzi Shadows and Shell Games – Uncovering an Offshore Business Empire in Zimbabwe, iro rinoratidza kuti VaTagwirei vanoshanda nevakuru vakuru muhurumende kusanganisira mahofisiemutungamiriri wenyika, gavhuna webhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Dr John Mangudya. Mutsambambozha yakanyorerwa VaTagwirei nemumwe mukuru wekambani yavo iri kunze kwenyika, yeSotic International, Ronelle Sincliar, yakazivisa mazita evanhu vachange vari mumakambani eThe Lighthouse Trust, The Lionaides Trust, The Alcaston Trust, The Amphion Trust neThe Norfolk Trust, muchengetedzi wemakambani aya ari Dr John Mangudya. Asi The Sentry inoti hapana kujeka kuti VaMangudya vane ruzivo nazvo here kana kuti kwete. Asi Dr Mangudya vaudza Studi 7 kuti vakaverengwa gwaro reThe Sentry asi vakati havana zvavanoziva nezvenyaya iyi. Asi vamwe vanoti VaMangudya vanofanirwa kutora matanho ari pachena kana chiri chokwadi chekuti hapana zvavanoziva nemakambani aVaTagwirei, ayo ari kupomerwa nyaya yekuburitsa mari munyika nenzira dzisina kujeka ivo VaMangudya vari ivo mukuru webhanga rinopa mvumo yekuburitswa kwemari munyika. Mumiriri weDzivaresekwa muNational Assembly zvakare vari nhengo yekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekufambiswa kwemari dzehurumende yePublic Accounts Committee, VaEdwin Mushoriwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti nekuda kwekuti vakuru vakuru muhurumende vanoshanda naVaTagwirei, paramende ndiyo yega yasara inofanira kuongorora mashandiro ari kuita makambani aVaTagwirei nehurumende. VaMushoriwa vati vanoziva kuri nyaya iyi yakaoma asi vakatiwo veruzhinji munyika vanofanira kutaura kana kuita ruzha pamusoro penyaya iyi nekuti ndivo vanorasikirwa apo mari inoburitswa munyika nenzira dzisina kujeka sezvinonzi zviri kuitwa nemakambani aVaTagwirei. VaMushoriwa vati zviri mugwaro reThe Sentry zvinotsigira zvakagara zvichitaurwa nevakawanda munyika uye vati komiti yakatoita imwe ongororo pamusoro peimwe kambanani yaVaTagwirei, yeSakunda Holdings, iyo yakapihwa basa nehurumende zvisina kujeka. VaMushoriwa havana kuda kutaura nezviri muongoro yavakaita kunze kwekuti zvakabuda mungororo yavakaita zvichaburitswa muparamende mwedzi uno. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi uye vari mukuru wezvirongwa musangano reZimbabwe Network for Social Justice, VaTendai Ruben Mbofana, vaudza Studio 7 kuti gwaro reThe Sentry rinotyisa sezvo richidoma vakuru vakuru muhurumende. Vati zvave pachena kuti nyika yakabatwa pahuro neVaTagwirei nechikwata chavo uye zvave kutoda ongororo inotungamirwa neparamende kana nematare edzimhosva kuongorora zviri kuitika sezviri kuitwa kuSouth Africa. Vati munhu wese ane chekuita nenyaya iyi anofanira kubvunzurudzwa uye vanowanikwa vaine mhosva voendeswa kumatare zvisinei nezvinzvimbo zvavo muhurumende kana kumapato avo ezvematongerwo enyika. VaMbofana vatiwo vana veZimbabwe vanofanirawo kutora matanho panoitika nyaya dzakadai vachiti ndivo vega vanokwanisa kudzivirira huwori hunoita kuti vatambure mari dzichiburitswa munyika. South Africa yakaumba Zondo Commission kuti iongorore huwori hunozi hwaiitwa nemhuri yekwaGupta iyo inonzi yange yabata vaive mutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaJacob Zuma, makurukota avo pamwe nemakambani ehurumende. The Sentry inoti nyika nemasangano ekunze anofanira kuongorora makambani aVaTagwirei muZimbabwe nekunze sezvo ari kuita bhizimisi zvisina kujeka. Intoyambirawo kuti vanoda kuita mabhizinesi muZimbabwe vangwarire kupinda mumabhizinesi anodyidzana nemakambani anonzi ari pasi paVaTagwirei, sezvo achikwanisa kutemerwa zvirango neAmerica sezvakaitwa VaTagwirei neSakunda Holdings yavo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, vashishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Dr Propser Chitambara, vati havawoni VaTagwirei vachiferefetwa pakatariswa kudyidzana kwavanonzi vanoita nevakuru vakuru munyika. Muimwe tsambambozha inoratidza kuti yakabva kuna VaTagwirei musi wa Chivabvu 31, 2019, ichienda kuvakuru vakuru vemakambani ari pasi paVaTagwirei, VaTagwirei vakanyora vachiti “HE wants that money to be paid after I show him the directors, owners of Sotic documents.” Kunyange hazvo zita remutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangangwa, risina kudomwa, nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dziri kutevera nyaya idzi dzinoti tsambambozha yaVaTagwirei payakati HE, yaireva His Excellency, izvo zvigona kuburitsa pachena kuti mutungamiri wenyika arimowo mudandemutande remakambani aya ari pasi paVaTagwirei. Kunze kwekuva chipangamazano chaVaMnangagwa, VaTagwirei vanonzi ihama zvakare yemutungamiri wenyika. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumutauriri waVaMnangagwa, VaGeorge Charamba, sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga ichinetsa kubata. Studio7 yakaedza kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvemari, asi gurukota rebazi iri, VaMthuli Ncube, vakanga vasingabatike panharembozha yavo. Gwaro reThe Sentry rinoti VaNcube vanoramba kuti bazi ravo rinoziva zviri kuitwa naVaTagwirei. No media source currently available

headline: MDC-T Inoti VaMnangagwa Havadi Kuvandudza Mitemo yeSarudzo
text: Kunyangwe hazvo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmerson Mnangagwa, vakavimbisa kuti vari kuda kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzakachena, vanopikisa nemamwe masangano ekuzne vari kuti vari kungoita gudzira mukanwa nekuti hakuna zvakawanda zvachinja panyaya yemitemo yesarudzo. Asi veZanu-PF vanoti pane zvakawanda zvachinja kusanganisira nyaya yekuti matare ari kutonga akasungunuka vachipa muenzaniso wekuti neChitatu, dare repamusoro rakapa mutongo wekuti madzishe asapindire munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Iyi inyaya yange ichinetsa musarudzo dzemunyika sezvo madzishe nemasabhuku ange achipomerwa mhosva yekumaninikidza vanhu kuti vavhotere Zanu-PF. Vanokokera MDC-T mudare reparamende, VaInnocent Gonese, vanoti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakavimbisa kuvandudza mitemo yesarudzo asi hapana chavari kuita . Asi mutevedzeri wemunyori wezvemutemo muZanu-PF, VaFortune Chasi, vanoti Zanu-PF iri kuyedza kuita zvose zvinodiwa. No media source currently available

headline: Musangano weNyika Dzine Nzou Unopetwa kuHwange Nyika Dzine Nzou Dzichikurudzira CITES Kuti Isapindira Muzvirongwa Zvadzo
text: Musangano wemazuva matatu wekutsvaga nzira dzekuti nyika dzemuAfrica dzine nzou dzitaure nezwi rimwechete kumusangano weCOP uchaitwa mukupera kwegore rino, uyo wakanga uchiitirwa kuHwange wkapetwa nemusi weChina, makurukota ezvekuchengetedzwa kwezviwanikwa akapinda mumusangano uyu achiti sangano reConvention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora kana kuti CITES haifanirwe kupindira mukutengeswa kwenyanga dzenzou nenyika dzakazvimirira. Makurkota emunyika dzemuAfrica aya akati nyika dzakazvimirira dzine kodzero dzadzo dzekushandisa zviwanikwa zvadzo sezviri mumitemo yadzo. Musangano uyu wakabuda nechibvumirano cheHwange Declaration, icho chine zvisungo gumi nezvina, zvinosanganisira chekuti sangano re CITES rinofanirwa kuongorora zvakare zvisungo zvaro panyaya yekutengeswa kwenyanga dzenzou. Nyika dzine nzou idzi dzakakurudzirwa kuti dzitambirewo chibvumirano cheHwange Declaration ichi. Zimbabwe iri kuda kuti ibvumidzwe kutengesa nyanga dzayo dzenzou dzainoti dzakawandisa. Hurumende yakambotiwo inogona kubuda mugungano reCITES kana zvido zvayo zvakasatevedzerwa. Mukuru wesangano reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu musangano uyu wavive musangano wakakosha zvikuru asi donzvo riri kurwirwa nemakurukota akapinda mumusangano kusanganisira weZimbabwe rakanangana nekuuraya nzou, izvo zviri kurambwa nesangano reCITES. No media source currently available

headline: Southern African Community USA Yobatana neManna Food Center muKuwanisa Chikafu Kune Vakakanganiswa neCovid-19
text: Sangano rinomirira zvizvarwa zvekuchamhembe kweAfirca zviri muAmerica, reSouthern African Community USA, kana kuti SACU, rakabatana nesangano reManna Food Center riri muMontgomery County mudunhu reMaryland mukupa rubatsiro rwechikafu kune zvizvarwa zvemuSADC zvinogara muMontgomery County zvakakanganiswa nedenda reCovid-19. Nhengo yeSACU, Muzvare Omega Tawonezvi, vanoti sesangano vakaona zvakakosha kuti vabatane neManna Food Center kuitira kubatsira nezvekudya zvizvarwa zvekuchamhembe kweAfrica kusanganisira vana vangadai vari kuAmerica kuchikoro asi vakazokanganiswa neCovid-19. Muzvare Tawonezvi vanoti vari kukurudzira zvizvarwa zvekuchamhembe kweAfrica zvingadai zvichida rubatsiro rwechikafu pane ino nguva kuti zvisanyare asi kuti zvibude pachena zvononyoresa kuti zviwane rubatsiro urwu, kwete kutambura chinyararire. Vanoti vanhu vari kubuda vachizivisa kuti vanoda rubatsiro kana zvichienzaniswa nekare. "Chirwere ichi cheCorona chavharisa zvinhu saka vanhu havasi kunyanya kutya kana kunyara sezvavaimboita pane dzimwe nguva nekuti vanoziva kuti zviri kuitika mazuvano zviri beyond their control," vanodaro Muzvare Tawonezvi. Vanoti pakunyoresa kuManna Food Center hakubvunzwi munhu paamire panyaya dzemapepa ehugaro hwake kunze kwekungoti aburitse chitupa chinoratidza kuti anogara muMontgomery County, uye pane nzira nhatu dzinosanganisira kunyoresa kuManna kana kushambadza kuri kuitwa neSACU dzekuti vanhu vakwanise kunyoresa. "Ende uye tine ma outreach workers vari kuita basa rekufamba muma community akasiyanasiyana kutsvaga kuti vanonidha rubatsiro ndivanaani." Sangano reSouthern African Community USA rakaumbwa pamwe nekanyoreswa zviri pamutemo mudunhu reMaryland muna 2013 nechinangwa chekusimudzira tsika nemagariro ezvizvarwa zvekuchamhembe kweAfrica zviri muAmerica pamwe nekuzvibatanidza kuburikidza nemitambo yakasiyanasiyana. No media source currently available

headline: MDC-T yaVaChamisa Yorwisa Kuti Vari kuChikwata chaMuzvare Khupe Vadzingwe muParamende
text: MDCT inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa inonzi yanyorera kuparamende ichikumbira kuti vaimbova mutevedzeri webato iri Muzvare Thokozani Khupe nevamwe vabviswe kuve nhengo dzeparamende zvichitevera makatanwa ari mubato iri. Vakafanobata chigaro chasachigaro webato reMDCT rinotungamirwa naVaChamisa, VaMorgen Komichi, vanoti bato ravo rakaendesa tsamba kumutauriri wedare reparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, nechinangwa chekuti Muzvare Thokozani Khupe nevamwe vavo vari kuvatsigira vadzingwe muparamende. Izvi zvinotevera kudzingwa kwakaitwa Muzvare Khupe, avo vaiva mutevedzeri wemutungamiri muMDCT, pamwe naVaAbednigo Bhebhe, avo vaiva murongi wemisangano mubato iri. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaMudenda kuti tinzwe divi reparamende panyaya iyi. Asi mutauriri weboka reMDC-T inotungamirwa naMuzvare Khupe, VaObert Gutu, vanoti zviri kutaurwa naVaKomichi izvi ndezvemugotsi matsuro. Zvichakadai, imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaVivid Gwede, vanoti kunyorwa kwetsamba yekubvisa Muzvare Khupe nevamwe vavo muparamende hachisi chinhu chinoshamisa. Aka hakasi kekutanga kuti MDC-T idzinge nhengo dzayo muparamende. Vaimbova munyori mukuru weMDCT, VaTendai Biti nevamwe, vakambodzingiswa kuparamende mushure mekunge vanetsana nevaimbova mutungamiri webato iri, mushakabvu VaMorgan Tsvangirai. Kunetsana pakati paVaChamisa naMuzvare kwakatanga pakafa VaTsvangirai apo komiti yepamusorosoro yeMDCT, yeNational Council, yakabuda nechisungo chekuti VaChamisa vatsive VaTsvangirai, nekune rumwe rutivi, Muzvare Khupe vachiti panofanirwa kuitwa kongiresi yechimbichimbi kutsvaga anotsiva VaTsvangirai. Zvichakadai, Muzvare Khupe vanoti hurongwa hwekuita kongiresi hwave pachinhanho chepamusoro vachiti kongiresi iyi ichaitwa musi wa 21 mwedzi uno. Nekune rumwe rutivi, VaChamisa vanoti hapasisina nguva yekuita kongiresi gore rino sezvo patarisanwa nesarudzo. Zvikwata zviviri izvi zviri kurwirawo zita rekuti MDC-T, uye nyaya iyi yakatosvitswa kudare redzimhosva. No media source currently available

headline: Zvikoro Zvogadzira Zvikwanisiro Zvekushandisa Kurwisa Kupararira kweCovid-19
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus hwakaburitswa nehurumende neMuvhuro, hwasvika pavanhu vasere, uye munhu ashaya nechirwere ichi achiri munhu mumwe chete. Huwandu uhu hunogona kukwira chero nguva apo hurumende ichazivisa zvinenge zvaitika. Pavanhu vasere vakabatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus, vana vanobva kudunhu reMashonaland East, vatatu kuHarare uye mumwe chete kuVictoria Falls. Mukuru mubazi rezvehutano mudunhu reMashonaland West, Dr Wensilus Nyamayaro, vanoti zvave kuziviswa manheru ega ega kana pane zvinenge zvashanduka pahuwandu hwevanhu vanenge vabatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus. Zimbabwe yakatara mazuva makumi maviri nerimwe ekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba dzavo senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi, icho chabata vanhu vanodarika mazana maviri nemakumi mana muZimbabwe, uye vanhu vanosvika mazana masere ezviuru pasi rose. Senzira yekubatsira varwere munyika iyo yakatarisana nekushaikwa kwema ventilators anobatsira kufema vanenge varwarisa zvakanyanya nechirwere ichi, zvimwe zvikoro zvepamusoro zvinoti zviri kushandisa hunyanzvi hwazvo kugadzira ma ventilators, ma sanitisers nemasiki. Chikono chepamusoro cheHarare Institute of Technology chinoti chiri pakati pekugadzira muchina wekufambisa mhepo mudzimba dzinochengeterwa vanhu vanenge vachirwara nechirwere cheCOVID-19. Ukuwo Chinhoyi University of Technology, CUT, inotiwo iri pakati pekugadzira mamasiki apo kune rumwe rutivi iri kutsvaka zvikwanisiro zvekugadzira ma sanitisers sezvo chikoro ichi chine hunyanzvi hwacho. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muChinhoyi, mutauriri weCUT, VaMusekiwa Tapera, vati vari kugadzira mamasiki senzira yakaonekwa nechikoro ichi yekurwisa chirwere cheCoronavirus. VaTapera vati vamwe vana muzvinafundo vari mubishi kuita hurongwa hwekugadzira ma sanitisers. Asi mukuru weCUT, Muzvinafundo Jambwa Simbi, vati basa rekugadzira mamasiki riri kudzoserwa kumashure nekushaikwa kwemagetsi nguva dzakawanda. Zvikoro izvi zviri kutora matanho aya sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyika munyaya dzehutano panguva iyo hurumende iri kutatarika kuwanira vashandi vemuzvipatara zvipfeko zvekuzvidzivirira zvakakwana pavanenge vachirapa varwere vanofungidzirwa kuti vane Coronavirus. Zimbabwe yapinda muzuva repiri vanhu vachigara kudzimba dzavo senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCoronavirus, iyo yakatanga kuChina gore rapera, uye kusvika pari zvino, yauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi matatu nezvisere pasi rose, kusanganisira Zororo Makamba wemuZimbabwe, uyo akashaya svondo rapera. No media source currently available

headline: Zvinhu Zvinonzi Hazvisati Zvagadzikana paChipatara cheMpilo Kunyange Vanachiremba Vakadzoka paBasa
text: Kunyange hazvo vanachiremba vadiki vakazivisa munguva pfupi yapfuura kuti vave kudzoka pabasa, zvinhu hazvisati zvave kunyatsofamba zvakanaka pachipatara cheMpilo muBulawayo chinove ndicho chipatara chikuru chechipiri munyika. Pasvika Studio 7 pachipatara ichi pakati penguva dza12 na 3 masikati, pange pane madhokotera anoverengeka navanamukoti vakawanda vange vachiwona varwere kuzvikamu zvinorapa varwere vachibva kumba kana kuti Casualty neOutpatients. Vamwe vanamukoti vange vachionawo varwere mumawadhi akasiyana-siyana. Mumwe murume asina kuda kudomwa nezita audza Studio 7 kuti ave nemazuva maviri achiuya kuzoona hama yake iri kurwara pachipatara apa uye ati haazi kugutsikana kuti vanachiremba vadzoka pabasa nemwoyo yavo yose here achiti hama yake iyi haisati yanyatsotaurirwa navanachiremba ava kuti iri kunzweyi. Mumwewo murume angozvidoma nezita rekuti Nyoni atiwo ane hama yake iri muchipatara mekare. VaNyoni vati hama yavo iyi iri kuwonekwa navanachiremba asi vati dambudziko nderekuti vari kunzi vanotenga mishonga sezvo mishonga iyi isiri kuwanikwa pachipatara ichi. Dr Mthabisi Bhebe, munyori weMpilo Doctors Association variwo nhengo yeZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti vana chiremba vadiki vave nenguva inosvika mwedzi vadzokera kubasa. Asi vatiwo sekuziva kwavo zvinhu hazvisati zvanyatsomira zvakanaka muzvipatara zvikuru munyika vachitiwo pane vanachiremba vadiki vanosvika makumi mashanu nevatatu vakasiya mabasa munyika yose uye kune vamwewo vakawanda vari kuda kusiya vachienda kumafuro manyoro. Mukuru wechipatara cheMpilo, VaLeonard Mabande, vaudza Studio 7 kuti havasati vave kukwanisa kutaura kuti zvinhu zvakamira sei uye kuti ndivanachiremba vangani vadzoka pabasa kusvika pari zvino sezvo vachiri kuita ongororo. VaMabande vati vanofara kuti munguva pfupi yapfuura chipatara chavo chakakwanisa kuwana magwenya emagetsi anoita kuti michina inobatsira kurapa vane chirwere chigomarara ishande isingakanganiswe nekuenda kwemagetsi. Vati vanotarisira kuti izvi zvichabatsira varwere zvikuru. Chipatara cheMpilo chaive chine vanachiremba vadiki mazana maviri nevana uye panguva yekuramwa kwavo mabasa, vana chiremba makumi mashanu nemumwe ndivo vakadzingwa basa. Vanoziva zviri kuitika vanoti zvinhu hazvisati zvave kunyatsofamba zvakanaka nekuti vaive vadzingwa ava vanofanirwa kutanga vanyatsodzorwa pabasa zviri pamutemo uye izvi zvinogona kutora nguva. No media source currently available

headline: Munhu Mumwe Chete Akafa neChirwere cheCovid-19 kuMatabelaland South neMusi weChipiri
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChipiri kuti munhu mumwe chete akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kuMatabeleland South, izvo zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera, hwave pachiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu ane makumi mashanu nevana, kana kuti 1,554. Vanhu gumi nevatanhatu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare, izvo zvakasiyawo vanhu vabatwa nacho vave zviuru makumi matatu nezvinomwe ane mazana masere nemakumi manomwe nevashanu, kana kuti 37, 875. Vanhu makumi maviri nevanomwe vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvasiya vanhu vapora vave zviuru makumi matatu nemashanu nemakumi mashanu nevasere kana kuti 35, 058. Vanhu vachiri kurwara vave chiuru chimwe chete chine mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nevatatu kana kuti 1, 263. Huwandu uhu hunogona kukwira neChitatu manheru apo hurumende ichazivisa zvayakawana. Zvichakadaro, vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yecovid-19 kekutanga hwave zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi masere nezvisere nemazana maviri nemakumi maviri nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 288, 229. Asi vabayiwa. Nhomba yepiri sezviri kukurudzirwa navanachiremba vave zviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu ane mazana manomwe nemakumi manomwe nevasere, kana kuti 36, 778. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kumukuru munyaya dzekurwisa chirwere checovid-19 muhurumende dr agness mahomva sezvo vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yedu. Asi hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba vanhu mamiriyoni gumi ichishandisa nhomba dzakabva kuChina dzinoti Sinovac neSinopharm, idzo dzisati dzapihwa chitambi neWorld Health Organization kuti dzishandiswe neveruzhinji. Imwe nhomba yakabva kuIndia uye imwe iri kutarisirwa kubva kuRussia. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano uye vakambove mukuru weChitungwiza Hospital varizve munyori wesangano reZimbabwe Medical Association mudunhu reMashonaland, Dr Enock Mayida, vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vabayiwe nhomba uye kuramba vachiteerera kurudziro iri kuitwa nebazi rezvehutano kuti chirwere ichi chisadzoke zvine hukasha. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Voenderera Mberi Vachiita Misangano kuChina.
text: Mutungamiriri we nyika, VaEmerson Mnangagwa, vari kuenderera mberi nemisangano yavo ku China vachitsvaga nzira dzekusimbaradza kudyidzana kwe China neZimbabwe munyaya ndzehupfumi. VaMnangagwa vasangana nemutungamiri wehurumende yeChina, VaLi Keqiang. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu Va Li vati vafara kuona VaMnangagwa vachishanyira China. VaMnangagwa vaitawo musangano nasachigaro we National People’s Congress, VaLi Zhanshu. Vaendawo kumarinda anovigwa magamba emu China. VaMnngagwa vapedza zuva ravo nekunoona muzinda we Huawei Communications uko vapihwa mari inoita zviuru mazana matatu zvemadhora yekutsigira chirongwa che Presidential Scholarship Fund Muongorori wezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano re Percycon Global Fund Managers, VaPersistence Gwanyanya, vanoti hazvina kuipa kuenda kunze nekupindawo misangano yakawanda yezvehupfumi asi, VaMnangagwa vanofanira kuziva kuti havangadzoki vasina chavakabata kunyika kuti zviratidze kuti mari yose inoshandiswa pakufamba kwavo ine zvairi kuunza munyika. Vatiwo hazvingagoni kusiyanisa zvematongerwo enyika nezvehupfumi sezvinhu zvinofambidzana saka VaMnangagwa vanotobatanidza zvese kana vachifamba nenzendo dzavo kunyika dzekunze semutungamiriri wenyika. VaGwanyanya vatiwo mari yapihwa VaMnangagwa sechipo kuhomwe ye Presidential Scholarship Fund chiratidzo chekuti Huawei iri kusimbisa hukama nekutsveterawo kuti irambe ichiwanawo mikana yebhizinesi munyika . No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoburitsa Gwaro reMasangano neNyika Dzingangokokwa Kuzoongorora Sarudzo
text: Bazi rinoona nezvekunze kwenyika pamwe nekutengeserana, iro rinotungamirirwa naVaSibusiso Moyo, neMuvhuro rakaburitsa gwaro rinotaridza nyika, masangano, pamwe nevanhu vanotarisirwa kuzokokwa nehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuti vazoongorora sarudzo, idzo dziri kutarisirwa kuitwa mumwedzi mishoma inotevera. Nyika dziri pagwaro iri dzinosvika makumi mana nenhanhatu, masangano gumi nemashanu, uye vanhuwo zvavo vaviri vanoti Seneta Jeffrey Flake, vanove nhengo yedare reseneti muAmerica, vari zvakare mukomiti yezvekunze kwenyika iyi inoona nezvenyaya dzeAfrica, pamwe naVaAndrew Jackson Young, vakambove mumiriri weAmerica kuUnited Nations uye vakambovewo meya weguta reAtlanta kuGeorgia, makare muAmerica. Masangano anotarisirwa kutumira nhume kunoongorora sarudzo anosanganisira reEuropean Union, African Union Commission, Pan-African Parliament, SADC Parliamentary Forum, Common Market for Eastern and South Africa-COMESA. Nyika dzinotarisirwawo kutumira nhume dzinosanganisirawo Palestine, Cuba, Iran, Mexico, neAmerica. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vachidzidzisa paTswaane University of Technology, kuPretoria, South Africa, Doctor Ricky Mukonza, vanoti izvi zvinogona kureva kuti VaMnangagwa nehurumende yavo vari kushandura zvinhu munyaya dzesarudzo, idzo dzinonzi dzinofanirwa dzakachena, kuitira kuti Zimbabwe itaridze pasi rose kuti yashanduka mumaitiro ayo kubva zvakabva vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe pachigaro. No media source currently available

headline: Mumwe Munhu Ofa neCovid-19 kuBulawayo, Vanodarika Zana Vachibatwa neChirwere Ichi muHarare
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwasvika pamazana maviri nevasere kana kuti 208 zvichitevera kufa kwemumwe munhu kuBulawayo neSvondo. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vasvika zviuru zvinomwe nezana rine gumi nevatanhatu kana kuti7, 116. NeSvondo vanhu zana nemakumi matatu nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 139 vakanzi vabatwa nechirwere ichi zana nemakumi maviri nevana kana kuti 124 vari vemuHarare. Asi bazi rezvehutano rinoti vamwe vanhu ava vainge vavhenekwa kare asi vasati vaziviswa zvainge zvabuda kwemazuva akati wandei. Vanhu vapora zviuru zvishanu nemazana matatu nemakumi manomwe nevatatu kana kuti 5, 373. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano uye vakambotungamira chipatara chechitungwiza central hospital dr enoch mayida. zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana ma`viri kana kuti 1, 2 million vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Vafa vasvika zviuru makumi matatu nechimwe zvine makumi mashanu nevatanhatu kana kuti 31, 056. Vapora vadarika miriyoni imwe chete. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nematanhatu nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 26, 9 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana zvine mazana masere nemasere kana kuti 188,000. Vanhu vafa pasi rose vasvika zviuru mazana masere ane makumi masere kana kuti 880, 000. Vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nemanomwe ane zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 17, 9 million.

headline: Varwiri veKodzero Vashanu Vanomiswa Mudare Vachipomerwa Mhosva yeKuronga Kubvisa Hurumende
text: Varwiri vekodzero vashanu vakasungwa mushure mekupinda musangano wezvekodzero dzevanhu kuMaldives vamiswa pamberi pedare vachipomerwa mhosva yekuronga zvekupidigura hurumende. Asi vasungwa ava vasvitsa chikumbiro kudare chekuti nyaya iyi iraswe vachiti havana mhosva yavakapara uye kodzero dzavo dzakatyorwa vari muhusungwa. Hurumende yati vasungwa vashanu ava, avo vanoti VaTatenda Mombeyarara vesangano reCitizens Manifesto, VaGamuchirai Mukura vesangano reCommunity Tolerance Reconciliation and Development, VaNyasha Frank Mpahlo veTransparency International Zimbabwe, VaGeorge Makoni veCentre for Community Development in Zimbabwe, naMuzvare Farirai Gumbonzvanda vesangano reRosaria Memorial Trust, vakaronga zvekupidigura hurumende kumusangano wavakapinda kuMaldives wakarongwa nesangano rinoshanda rakazvimirira rekuSerbia rinodaidzwa kuti Centre for Apllied None Violent Action and Strategies kana kuti CANVAS. Hurumende yatiwo vasungwa ava vakadzidziswa zvekushandisa pfuti diki pamwe nezvekupidigura hurumende vachishanda nevamwe vavo vavati vachiri kutsvagwa nemapurisa. Vachuchisi venyaya iyi vatiwo vasungwa ava vakadzidziswa nzira dzekukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vanopandukira sei hurumende uye nzira dzekutiza nadzo kusungwa mukuratidzira pamwe nekuita zvechitororo. Hurumende yatiwo ine humbowo hwainahwo hwayakakawana munharembozha dzevasungwa ava pamwe nemuma computer avo ayo akapambwa nemapurisa pakasungwa varwiri vekodzero ava pavakasvika panhandare yendege yeRobert Gabriel Mugabe International Airport neMuvhuro manheru. Asi rimwe remagweta evasungwa ava, Muzvare Jessie Majome, vasvitsa chikumbiro kudare chekuti nyaya iyi iraswe vachiti vasungwa ava havana mhosva yavakapara uye vati vasungwa ava vakatyorerwa kodzero dzavo pavakasungwa. Vachipa humbowo hwavo kudare, VaMombeyarara vati vakatyisidzirwa zvakakomba nemapurisa uye havana kuudzwa chikonzero chekusungwa kwavo pavakasungwa sezvinotaurwa nebumbiro remitemo. VaMakoni vatiwo vakamanikidzwawo kuvhura nharembozha dzavo nema computer avo vese mapurisa asina matsamba ekuita izvi sezvakatarwa mumurawu. Vasungwa vese ava vatiwo vakarariswa mumatirongo akasiyana-siyana aive nerima uye ane zvimbuzi zvakange zvakapfachukira tsvina yevanhu neweti uye vakanyimwa chikafu nemvura yekunwa kubva pavakasungwa kusvika pavakazobvumidzwa kuti vaonekwe nemagweta avo nezuro Chipiri masikati. Vasati vapinda mudare, VaMombeyarara vaudza Studio7 kuti vari kushubgurudzwa nehurumende zvisina maturo. Vasungwa vese ava vaudza dare kuti musangano wavakanopinda kuMaldives wakange usinei nezvekupidigura hurumende asi kuti waive wekurwira kodzero dzevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Zvimwe Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zvodzidza Zvakawanda Kubva kuMusangano weRepublican Uri kuCleveleland, Ohio.
text: Panopera svondo rino, bato remuAmerica re Republican rinenge radoma zviri pamutemo shoroma VaDonald Trump semunhu acharimirira musarudzo dzekutsvaga mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica dzichaitwa muna Mbudzi wegore rino. Kutanga kwemusangano mukuru webato iri neMuvhuro kuCleveland mudunhu reOhio, kuri kutarisa zvakanyanya nezve kugadzikana kwemukati menyika iyi pamwe nenyaya dzevanhu vari kupinda munyika iyi. Vanotarisirwa kutaura kumusangano uyu vanosanganisira vaimbowe gavhuna weTexas, VaRick Perry, amai vane mwana akaurayiwa kuBenghazi, kuLibya, vakawanda vanorwira kodzero dzevapoteri pamwe nemudzimai waVaTrump Amai Melania Trump. Bato reDemocratic rinove riri kutonga pari zvino, riri kutarisirwawo kuita musangano waro mukuru wekutsigira pamwe nekudoma zviri pamutemo Amai Hillary Clinton semumiriri webato iri musarudzo dzemunaMbudzi idzi. Musangano uyu uchaitirwa kuPhiladelphia, mudunhu re Pennsylvania svondo rinouya. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri kuCleveland kuri kuitirwa musangano weRepublican Party, Doctor Maxwell Shumba, vanove mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reZimbabwe First, vanoti semutungamiri webato rinotarisirawo kuzopinda mukutonga, vari kudzidza zvakawanda kubva kumisangano miviri iyi. “Sebato tiri kudzidza zvakawanda kubva mumisangano iyi. Chatiri kudzidza fanika kuma Democrat, VaObama havasi ivo vari ku leader succession yavo zvamuri kuona kuZimbabwe, kuti vanhu vaakunetseka. "Vamwe vane ma vice president maviri, vamwe vane ma vice president matatu. Isu tinoti vanhu ndivo vanofanirwa kunge vachi chuza vanofanira kunga vari chii, vari vakuru,” Doctor Shumba vanodaro. Vanoti sebato vane hurongwa hwekutsvaga rutsigiro uhwo hwunozodoma mutewedzeri wemutungamiri webato kana vave kusvika kusarudzo. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe neBotswana Dzoita Mushandira Pamwe paCovid-19
text: Zimbabwe neBotswana dzakaita chibvumirano chekubairana nhomba yeCovid-19 zvizvarwa zvadzo zvinogara munyika mbiri idzi. Izvi zvakaziviswa negurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaFrederick Shava, avo vakati danho iri rakatorwa nokuti chara chimwe hachitswanyi inda. VaShava, avo vari murwendo rwemazuva matatu ekubvakachira nyika nhatu dzinoti South Africa, Botswana neNamibia, vakati hurongwa uhu hwakabvumiranwa mumusangano wavakaita negurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muBotswana, VaLemogang Kwape. Kuburikidza nehurongwa uhu, VaShava vakati nyika mbiri idzi dziri kutarisira kusvika pachinhanho chekuti kupararira kwedenda iri kuve kushoma nekukurumidza. Vakatiwo kana nyika mbiri idzi dzikakwanisa kuderedza kupararira kweCOVID-19, musangano wechitatu weZimbabwe/Botswana Bi-National Commission uri kutarisirwa kuitirwa mudhorobha reVictoria Falls mumwedzi mishomanini iri kutevera. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende yeBotswana panyaya iyi nokuti VaKwape vanga vasingabatike panharembozha yavo sezvo vari murwendo rwekubvakachira Lesotho. Nyanzwi munyaya dzehutano uye vari chiremba pachipatara chikuru cheNyangabgwe Referral Hospital mudhorobha reFrancistown, VaTarisai Garanevako vaudza Studio7 kuti Zimbabwe ndiyo ichakohwa pahombe kuburikidza nechibvumirano ichi. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinorarama nekutenga nekutengesa mudhorobha reGaborone, Muzvare Florence Manzungu, vagamuchira hurongwa uhu vachiti COVID-19 inotoda kuisa misoro pamwe chete. Pari zvino, Botswana yabaya nhomba vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi matanhatu ruzhinji rwavo vari vashandi vezvehutano, mapurisa, masoja nevebazi rinoona nekupinda nekubuda kwevanhu munyika. Nyika iyi ine vanhu vanodarikazviurumakumimashanu nemazabna masere vabatwa neCovid-19,uye vafa nechirwere ichi vari mazana manomwe nemakumi manomwe nevana. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Varairidzi Vombosungwa Apo Hurumende Yotadza Kuwirirana neVashandi paNyaya yeMari Dzavanotambira.
text: Nhengo pfumbamwe dzesangano revadzidizi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe kana kuti ARTUZ, dzakambochengetedzwa nemapurisa zvichitevera kuratidzira kwakaitwa nesangano iri muHarare panguva iyo vamwe vashandi vehurumende vanga vachiita musangano nemamwe makurukota hurumende. Mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, nedzimwe nhengo sere dzesangano ravo vakambochengetedzwa kwechinguvana nemapurisa mushure mekusungwa kwavaitwa vachida kutanga kuratidzira paAfrica Unity Square. VaMasaraure vaudza Studio vari pakamba yeHarare Central kuti kunyange hurumende ikavasunga havasi kuzodzokera shure panyaya yekurwira kuti vadzidzisi vabhadharwe nemari yekunze pamwe nekupihwa zvimwe zvikwanisiro zvinoita kuti vaite basa ravo nemazvo. Pavaregedzwa nemapurisa vasina mhosva yavapomerwa zvichitevera kupindiria kwaita magweta avo, VaMasaraure nevamwe vavo vabva vaenda kunoratidzira pahofisi yegurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Muthuli Ncube vachiti vanoda kuwedzerwa mari dzemihoro vachiti havasi kuzoenda kumabasa panovhurwa zvikoro nemusi weChipiri. Tichiri panyaya iyi, mutauriri wesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaTabani Moyo vati sangano ravo harisi kufara nechisimba chiri kushandiswa nehurumende pavashandi vayo vari kuda kuwedzerwa mari dzemihoro. Zvichakadai, masangano ese anomirira vashandi vehurumende aita musangano negurukota rezvevashandi VaJuly Moyo achida kuti vashandi vehurumende vawedzerwe mari asi hapana chinobatika chabuda mumusangano uyu. Mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru muApex Council, VaGibson Mushangu, vaudza Studio 7 mushure memusangano wavo kuti hurumende yati haikwanise kubhadhara vashandi vayo nemari yekunze. VaMushangu vati sevashandi vehurumende havasi kuzoramwa mabasa parizvino kunyange hazvo vati vashandi vazhinji vanogona kutadza kuenda kumabasa sezvo vaine mari isingavakwanire kuti vakwire mabhazi kuenda kumabasa pamwe nekuraramisa mhuri dzavo. VaMushangu vati vave kutarisira kuti nhuna dzavo dzichagadziriswa mumusangano weNational Joint Negotiating Council wakatairisirwa kuitwa munguva pfupi iri kutevera. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nevakafanobata chigaro chegurukota rezvemaindustry VaJuly Moyo mushure memusangano wavaita nevemasanagano anomirira vashandi kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Vashandi vehurumende vanoti vanoda kuwedzerwa mari dzavanotambiriswa pamwe nekugadzirisirwa zvikwanisiro zvose zvinoita kuti vakwanise kuita basa ravo zvakanaka. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yotadza Kubhadhara Mabhonasi a2016
text: Makurukota ehurumende anosanganisira rezvevashandi, Amai Prisca Mupfumira, nere zvehutano, Dr David Parirenyatwa, pamwe nagavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe VaJohn Mangudya, vasangana nemasangano evashandi vehurumende kuti vazeye nyaya yemabhonasi egore rapera.. Asi vapinda mumusangano uyu vati zvabuda pachena kuti hurumende haina mari yacho. Mukuru wesangano reZIMTA, VaSifiso Ndlovu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pane zvinhu zvitatu zvaunzwa nehurumende zvikarambwa nevashandi. Chekutanga hurumende yange yati inoda kupa vashandi mastands semuripo. Chechipiri hurumende yati inoda kupa vashandi ma bonds anopihwa vemabhizimisi asi pasina kujeka kuti zvinofamba sei. Chekupedzisira vazoti vanokwanisa kupa vashandi zvikamu zvishanu kubva muzana asi ichibhadharwa kwenguva yakareba. Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakambozivisa kuti mari iyi hapana. Asi mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakati vanoda kuti mari iyi itsvagwe. Nenyaya yekusawirirana uku, rimwe sangano revarairidzi reRural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe rati rave kuronga kuratidzira. Hatina kukwanisa kubata vachinamasa kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Asi sachigaro wesangano revashandi, reAPEX Council, Amai Cecilia Alexander vati mumwe musangano uchaitwa musi wa 20 Kukadzi asi havasi kufara nezviri kurongwa nehurumende. No media source currently available

headline: Chirwere cheCovid-19 Chovhiringa Zvakanyanya Vadzidzi Vakawanda Munyika
text:
Huwandu hwevadzidzi vari kuramba vachibatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 horamba huchikwira kuMasvingo nemamwe matunhu. Izvi zvinotevera kubudiswa kwemashoko evana vakabatwa nedenda iri
nezuro mudunhu Masvingo ayo anoti vana makumi matanhatu nevashanu
vakabatwa neCovid-19 nezuro muzvikoro zvitanhatu. Bazi revehutano rinoti mwana mumwe chete akabatwa paMashoko High nevana makumi maviri paChinorumba High kuBikita, vana vatanhatu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi paGutu High, vana makumi maviri nemumwe vakabatwa paMushayavanu High uye paDeure High pakabatwa vana gumi nevatanhatu. Mumwe mubereki, Amai Joyce Mhungu, vati vave kutyira hupenyu hwevana vavo uye kukanganisika kwedzidzo muvana nenyaya yedenda iri. Mumwe mubereki, Amai Entrance Takaedza, vati huremende yakamhanyira kuvhura zvikoro isina kugadzirira kudzivirirwa kwedenda iri zvakanaka muzvikoro.

Mutungamiri wesangano revadzidzisi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaTakavafira Zhou, vati dambudziko iri ratekeshera muzvikoro zvose zviri munyika. Asi mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro, vati hurumende
yakange yakagadzirira asi kuti vadzidzi nevadzidzisi vakauya vane chirwere ichi muzvikoro. Mutauriri weProvincial Covid-19 Task Force muMasvingo, VaRodgers
Irimayi, vati panodiwa zvirongwa zvekudzidzisa vana mirawo
yekudzivirira denda iri muzvikoro kuti ridzikire.

Vamwe vabereki vanoti vava kutyira kuti vana vakawanda vachatadza kugadzirira kunyora bvunzo dzavo, kana kutotadza kunyora bvunzo idzi nepamusana pekurwara nedenda reCovid-19. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vapfumbamwe vakashaya nedenda reCovid-19 nezuro munyika yose, uye vanhu mazana maviri nemakumi masere nevashanu 285 vakabatwa nechirwere cheCOVID-19 nezuro wakare. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vava zviuru zvina nemazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu, uye vabatwa nechirwere ichi vava zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvinomwe nemazana matatu ane makumi matanhatu nevasere, 127, 368. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga munyika vave mamirioni maviri
nezviuru mazana mapufumbamwe nezvisere nemazana mashanu ane gumi nevana, 2 908 514. Vabayiwa nhomba yepiri munyika vave mamiriyoni maviri nechiuru chimwe chete nemazana mapfumbamwe ane makumi masere nevanomwe, 2,001
987. Huwandu uhu hunogona kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichazivisa zvayawana muongororo dzaitwa nhasi. Hurumende inoti iri kuda kubaya nhomba vanhu mamiriyoni gumi munyika kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekurwisa denda reCovid-19

headline: Vasungwa Vodzidziswa Kurima Fodya kuBanket
text: Vasungwa nevakange vari muhusungwa vanosvika gumi nevatanhatu vepajeri rekuBanket, Mashonaland West vakaita zvidzidzo zvekurima fodya vakapiwa zvitupa. Mumwe wevakapiwa chitupa chekurima fodya pamhemberero yakaitwa svondo rino ndiVaMathias Mushambe vanogara kuMutorashanga. VaMushangwe avo vakagara mujeri kwemakore matanhatu mushure mekuwanikwa vaine mhosva yekutsika munhu nemotokari vanoti zvidzidzo zvekurima fodya zvakavayamura sezvo vave murimi wefodya anemukurumbira. VaMushangwe vanoti vave kutopinza vamwe vanhu basa mumunda wavo wefodya. Mumwe musungwa akapiwa chitupa chekurima fodya ndiVaWebster Tafadzwa Mubayiwa vekuDomboshava avo vakaburitswa mujeri mushure mekuregererwa nemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe mwedzi wapera vanoti varikutarisira kupiwa chidimbu chemunda kuti vagoratidza hunyanzvi hwavo hwekurima fodya. VaMubayiwa vanoti vanofara nekuburitswa mujeri vasati vapedza makore avakakatarirwa pamwe nekudzidziswa kurima fodya izvo vanoti zvichavayamura mukurarama. VaMushambe vanoti parizvino vave kutodzidzisawo vamwe vari munharaunda mavagere kurima fodya. Mutevedzeri wemukuru weZimbabwe Prison and Correctional Services (ZPCS) VaMoses Chihobvu vanoti kuti musungwa akwanise kupinda muchirongwa chekudzidziswa kurima fodya anofanirwa kunge aine chido nekudzidzira kurima fodya. VaChihobvu vanoti vanodzidzisa vasungwa vanenge vasarirwa negore rimwe chete kuti vabude muhusungwa. VaChihobvu vanoti dai hurumende yakwanisa kupa vasungwa ava mabasa kana vabuda sezvo vaveneruzivo. Asi mukuru mubazi rePublic Service Commission Amai Muchada vanoti izvi hazvikwanisike sezvo hurumende yakamira kupinza vanhu mabasa. Vasungwa vakapihwa zvitupa zvekurima fodya kubva zvatanga chirongwa ichi muna 2008 vanosvika zana namakumi manomwe nevapfumbamwe.

headline: Sangano reProudly263 Global Robatsira Vana veZimbabwe Vari Kunze Kutanga Mabhizimusi
text: Sangano reProudly263 Global, iro rakaumbwa nezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa mushure mekunge zvaona kuoma kwakaita kutanga mabhizimusi kana usiri chizvarwa chenyika iyi, riri kubatsira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika pamwe nezviri munyika nemikana yekutanga mabhizimusi azvo zvega. Vakavamba sangano iri uye vari ivo CEO veProudly263 Global, VaStanley Makwara, vanoti vakaonawo kubatana kwezvimwe zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika zviri muSouth Africa, uye kutsigirana kwazvinoita mune zvemabhizimusi, izvo zvakaita kuti vati kana vana veZimbabwe vanozvigonawo. VaMakwara vanoti chinangwa chesangano ravo, iro rave nenhengo dzinodarika zviuru zvitatu, ndechekusimudzira mabhizimusi nemagariro evanhu kuburikidza nekubatana vachizivana. Vanotiwo seProudly263 Global, vakaumbawo bhanga rinonzi Hello Sahwira Mhlobo (HSM Bank), rinove remubatanidzwa wezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa, mushure mekuona kunetsa kwazvinoita kuti munhu ange achikwanisa kukwereteswa mari nemabhanga emo yekuti atange bhizimusi. VaMakwara vanoti bhanga ravo rinokurudzira kuchengetedza mari uye rinowanisa nhengo dzaro zvikwereti zvine mutengo wakaderera kudarika kumamwe mabhanga. Vanoti remangwana resangano ravo rakajeka zvekuti vanoona vana veZimbabwe vari kunze vachikwanisa kuvaka upfumi hweZimbabwe ivo vari kunyika dzavagere. No media source currently available

headline: Chizvarwa chekuChina Hachina Kufa neCoronavirus:Wilkins Hospital
text: Mukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare Dr Prosper Chonzi varamba mashoko ekuti munyika mune chizvarwa chekuChina chakafa nechirwere checoronavirus. Dr Chonzi vati ongororo yavakaita yakaratidza kuti chainge chisina chirwere ichi. Chizvarwa chekuChina chechidzimai ichi chakatanga kurwara chiri kwaMutare chichibva chaenda kuna chiremba wacho wekuChina uyo akati chiende kuWest End Clinic. Asi vanachiremba pachipatara apa vakabva varamba kumuona vachibva vati aendeswe kuWilkins Hospital uko akafa ari munzira. Dr Chonzi vanoti kune chimwe chizvarwa chekuItaly chakaendeswa kuchipatara ichi chichiti chairwara asi chakazonzi hachinawo chirwere ichi. Vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitatu vafa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose uye muAfrica chiri kuSouth Africa, Nigeria, Algeria neEgypt. Vabatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose vanodarika chiuru zana. No media source currently available

headline: Veruzhinji Voyambirwa Kuti Vakoshese Hutsanana Kuitira Kuti Vasa Batwe neTyphoid
text: No media source currently available Veruzhinji vari kuyambirwa kuti vakoshese hutsanana uye kuti vaende kuchipatara kana vakaona vachiita manyoka ane ropa sezvo vangange vane chirwere chetyphoid. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano, Dr Rutendo Bonde, vanoti dambudziko retyphoid rakatekeshera muGweru. Sangano re Gweru Residents Forum nhasi razivisa kuti pane vanhu vapfumbamwe vakashaya nechirwere ichi, vamwe vanhu mazana matatu vakarapwa chirwereichi. Sangano iri rinoti dambudziko iri riri kuwanda kuMkoba township nzvimbo inogara vazhinji. Dr Bonde vanoti vanhu vanofanirwa kukoshesa kugeza michero yavanotenga pamisika uye kuziva pekuchengetedza mvura yakachena kuitira kuti dambudziko iri risavabate. Dr Bonde vanoti panguva iyo dambudziko iri ririkunetsa kunzvimbo dzakadayi seGweru, vanhu vanofanirwa kumbomira kukwazisana uye kuchenjera kutapurirana chirwere chemanyoka ichi pamichato nendufu sezvo vanhu vanenge vasingazive kuti chikafu chavanenge vachudya chinenge chabikwa pakachena uye nehutsanana here. "Dambudziko iri rinokwanisa kuderera kana vanhu vakaita hutsanana uye vakakurumbidza kuenda kuchipatara kana vachinge vawona vava kuita manyoka aneropa nekupisa muviri zvakanyanya," Dr Bonde vaudza Studio7.

headline: Vamwe Vokurudzira Kuti Nyaya yeKupinda paChigaro kwaVaMnangagwa Itaurwe Nezvayo
text: No media source currently available Zvisineyi nekuti mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanotaura vachikurudzira runyararo munyika pamwe nemharidzo yavo yekuti Zimbabwe yakavhura mikana yekuita bhizinesi kana kuti “Zimbabwe is open for Business”, imwe yenyaya dzinotaurika kakanyanya ndeyekupinda kwavo pachigaro chekuve mutungamiri wenyika. Studio 7 inotsvakurudza kuti nyaya iyi inosiya Zimbabwe yakamira papi mukukwanisa kana kutadza kwayo kugadzirisa zvinhu munyika. Nhengo dzebato rinopikisa reMDC dziri muparamende nanhasi hadzisati dzatambira kuti VaMnangagwa ndivo vakakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika yakaitwa gore rapera. Izvi zvinonzi nevamwe zvinotadzisa basa reparamende kufamba zvakanaka kana nyaya iyi isina kugadziriswa nemapoka maviri aya vachiwirirana. Vamwe vanotiwo nyaya iyi inotadzisa budiriro mune zveupfumi kana zvematongerwo enyika. Mukokeri wenhengo dzeMDC muparamende Va Prosper Mutseyami ndemumwe wevanhu vanoti nyika haigoni kufambira mberi kana zvinhu zvakadai. Gweta uye vari munyori wezvemitemo muZanu PF, VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana, vanoti VaMnangagwa vakasarudzwa zviri pamutemo saka vanhu ngavavatsigire kuti zvinhu zvinake munyika. Nyanzvi munezvesarudzo vari mukuru wesangano reElection Resource Center, VaTawanda Chimhini, vanoti mafambisirwo esarudzo munyika ndiwo anoratidza kuti pane matambudziko munyaya dzekutambirwa kwehutungamiriri huripo. Zvinhu zvinonzi hazvina kumira zvakanaka muZimbabwe zvichitevera mhirizhonga yakaitika mwedzi wapera iyo yakasiya vanhu gumi nevashanu vafa mushure mekupfurwa nemauto Nesvondo mitengo yechingwa yakamuka yakakwira munyika nezvikami makumi matanhatu kubva muzana. Ukuwo, mitsetse yatanga kuonekwa zvakare munzvimbo dzinotengeserwa mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. Vakawanda vanoti kana zvinhu zviri kunetsa munyaya dzehutungamiri zvisina kugadziriswa zvinhu zvhicharamba zvichisunga munyika.

headline: Vamwe Voyaura Zvichitevera Kupera kweMabasa nePamusana peCovid-19
text: Vanhu vakawanda vakarasikirwa nemabasa avo munguva ino yeCovid-19 vanoti vari kutambura zvikuru sezvo vasina chekubata. Mumwe wevanhu vakarasikirwa nemabasa, Va Luck Moyo, vanoti ivo nemhuri yavo vave kudya kamwe chete pazuva kubva pavakasiya basa kukambani yavaishandira. VaMoyo vanoti basa ravo rinokwanisa kuraramisa mhuri yavo asi ikozvino havakwanisi kuenda kunoita basa iri sezvo vasina tsamba inovapa mvumo yokuenda kunzvimbo yavanenge vadaidzwa. Mumwe akatarisana nedambudziko iri, Muzvare Melissa Jairosi, avo vane dhigiri reEngineering, vanoti vakapererwa nebasa muna Nyamavhuvhu gore rapera pakambani inoita zvokuvaka. Vanoti nekushaya chekuita, vakafunga kuita basa rekutengesa hembe dzemumabhero nemuriwo wavanotenga kuMbare, sezvo vari kushaya basa ravakadzidzira kuEngland. Mumwe mudzimai, Amai Mary Makuyana, vanoti vakamiswa basa vachangotanga kupfuya huku kumba kwavo zvokuti ndizvo zvave kuvararamisa. Asi vanoti bhizimisi radzikira nokuti vanhu vavaitengesera huku idzi kum hofisi emuguta vakamiswawo mabasa uye mahofisi makuru akavharwa kubva gore rakapera. Muzvare Dadiso Mudziwepasi vanoti vakadzingwa basa muchitoro chinotengesa zvokudya nembatya zvokuti vave kushanda mumba memumwe mudzimai ane tuckshop pamba pake, asi vanoti mari yavanotambira haisi kuvakwanira nemhuri yavo. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaPeter Gift Mutasa, vanoti panofanirwa kuitwa hurukuro nehurumende kuti pawanikwe nzira dzokubatsira vanhu vane mabhizimisi akaparara uye nekubatsira vanhu vakadzingwa mabasa nenyaya yeCovid 19 iyo yakavharisa nyika. VaMutasa vanoti huwori ndihwo hwasvitsa nyika pairi nhasi nokuti zviri pachena kuti mabhizimisi ari kubudirira ane chekuita nevanhu vari kutonga nyika ino. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kuziva huwandu hwevanhu vakarasikirwa nemabasa avo nekuda kweCovid-19. Gurukota revashandi nemagariro evanhu akanaka, Professor Paul Mavhima, vakaudza Studio7 nguva pfupi yapfuura kuti hurumende ine hurongwa hwekubatsira vanhu vakarasikirwa nemabasa avo munguva ino yeCovid-19. Asi masangano anomirira vagari pamwe neevashandi munyika anoti hapana ruyamuro rwuri kupihwa vanhu nehurumende kuti vabatsirikane munguva ino. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi veHurumende Vanoratidzira Vachiti Mari Dzavari Kutambiriswa Ishoma
text: Vashandi vehurumende varatidzira muHrarare vachiti vanoda kuti mari dzavo dziwedzerwe kuitira kuti vararame hupenyu huri nani. Vashandi ava vasvitsa magwaro enyunyuto kuhurumende. Hutungamiri hwemasangano anomirira vashandi vehurumende ari pasi pesangano reApex Council hwaratidzira muHarare nhasi pamahofisi egurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Sekai Nzenza, pamwe negurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, husati hwasiya magwaro enyunyuto kumapazi ehurumende aya pamwe nekudare reparamende. Varatidziri ava, avo vanga vakatakura zvinyorwa zvakasiyana-siyana zvanga zvichitsoropodza kushomeka kwemari yavanotambiriswa nehurumende iyo yavati yakafanana nemhepo, vamborambidzwa nevanochengetedza pamahofisi emapazi ehurumende maviri aya asi vazobvumidzwa kuti vashoma vavo vapinde mushure mekunge varamba vachiimba vari pamisuwo yemahofisi aya. Mutungamiri weApex Council, Amai Cecelia Alexander, vati vashandi vazhinji havachakwanisi kuenda kubasa pamwe nekuraramisa mhuri dzavo zvichitevera kushomeka kwemari dzavanotambiriswa nehurumende dzavanoti dzakafanana nemutero wembwa. Gwaro revaratidzira ava, iro ravapa hurumende, rinoti vashandi vanoda kupihwa mari inoita kuti mushandi anotambira mari iri pasi pasi apihwe madhora zviuru zvina zvine mazana manonwe nemakumi mashanu pamwedzi, iri mari yema RTGS. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rezvemari VaMthuli Ncube sezvo vanzi vanga vasiri muhofisi avo. Asi mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvevashandi, VaLovemore Matuke, vaudza varatidziri ava pavasvika pahofisi pavo kuti hurumende ichaedza napose painogona napo kugadzirisa nhuna dzavo. Zvichakadai, mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vadzidzisi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vati nhengo dzesangano ravo dzichatanga kusaenda kubasa zvachose kubva neMuvhuro svondo rinouya vachiti hurumende yaramba yakaisa zvimiti munzeve pachikumbiro chavo chekuti vashandi vatambiriswe mari yakaringana nemadhora ekuAmerica avaisimbotambiswa pamwedzi hurumende isati yaunza ma bond notes. Kuratidzira kwaitwa nehutungamiri hweApex Council nhasi kwauya zvichiteverawo kuchechema kuri kuita vashandi munyika yose avo vari kuti mari yavanotambiriswa haisisina huremu pakatariswa kushaya simba kuri kuita mari yemunyika pamwe nekusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi hwenyika. Hutungamiri hweApex Council hwaratidzira uhwu hwati huchadzoka nemhomho yevashandi kumahofisi aVaNcube mumazuva mashoma ari kutevera kana hurumende ikasateerera zvichemo zvavo. Vashandi vehurumende vakaramba kutambira mari yavakanga vanzi vachapihwa nehurumende inoita madhora emaRTGS makumi mapfumbamwe nemanomwe pamunhu. Hurumende yakanga yati ichawedzera mari dzevashandi vose nemari inoita zana nemakumi masere emamiriyoni emadhora emaRTGS kubva mwedzi uno kusvika panopera gore kuvashandi vayo vose vari pasi peApex vanosvika mazana matatu negumi rezviuru. Vashandi ava havasanganisiri vana chiremba, vanamukoti, mapurisa, mauto nevamwe vasingapinde muApex Council

headline: Vashandi Vanoti Vari Kubatwa Kwiyo paChirongwa cheGEMS
text: Zvichitevera kuparurwa kwehomwe yevashandi vehurumende yekuchengeta mari, yeGovernment Employees Mutual Savings Fund (GEMS), iyo yakaumbwa muna Kukadzi gore rapfuura, vamwe vashandi vehurumende vanoti havasi kufara nezvakaitwa nehurumende pamusoro penyaya iyi. Hurumende inoti homwe iyi ichange ichipindwa nevashandi vanoda zvavo uye vashandi ava vachange vachibatirwa zvikamu zviviri nezviga zvishanu kubva muzana, kana kuti 2.5% yemuhoro mwedzi wega wega. Hurumende inoti chinangwa chehomwe iyi ndechekubatsira vashandi vachiri pamabasa neavo vave pamudyandigere. Asi rimwe sangano rinomirira varairidzi, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe (ARTUZ) rinoti vashandi havana kuudzwa zvakakwana kana kubvunzwa pamusoro pechirongwa ichi. Sangano iri rinotiwo harifari nemabatiro anoitwa mari dzevashandi nehurumende. Mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti chekutanga ndechekuti vashandi vaifanirwa kupihwa mukana wekupa pfungwa dzavo pachirongwa ichi chisati chaumbwa. VaMasarure vanotiwo panotanga chirongwa ichi, mushandi wese anobatirwa mari inoenda kuhomwe iyi. Kana achida kuramba ari nhengo anongozvisiya zvakadaro. Asi kana mushandi asingadi kuva muchirongwa ichi, anomanikidzwa kunyorera kuhomwe iyi achiti haasi kuti kupinda muchiri panguva iyo mari yake inenge ichibatwa nehurumende kudzamara homwe iyi yamubvisa muchirongwa ichi. Tatadza kubata gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi, VaPaul Mavima, uye vanga vasati vapindura mibvunzo yatavatumira pataenda pamhepo, asi taita hurukuro naVaMasaraure. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vapfumbamwe Vofa neChirwere cheCovid-19 neMugovera
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti nemusi weMugovera vanhu vapfumbamwe vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya vafa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore raopera vave zviuru zvina zvine mazana mana nemakumi matanhatu nematanhatu kana kuti 4, 466. Vanhu makumi mapfumbamwe nevana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi, zvasiya vabatwa nacho kusvika parizvino vave zana rezviuru nemakumi maviri nemashanu zvine mazana mana nemakumi maviri nemashanu kana kuti 125, 425. Vanhu mazana mana nemakumi mashanu vakapora kubva kuzchirwere ichi zvasiya vapora vave zana rezviuru negumi nemashanu zvine makumi masere nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 115, 089. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kekutanga vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemasere zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi matatu nemaviri kana kuti 2 698, 632 .Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba kechipiri sezvinokurudzirwa vave miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana manomwe nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe kqna kuti 1 700, 993. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba yeCovid-19 kuti inyatsoshanda zvakanaka munyika.

headline: Nyika Inovharwa kweMazuva Makumi Matatu Ichirwisa Covid-19
text:
Vanhu vakawanda vatevedzera kurudziro yehurumende yekuti vanhu varemekedze mutemo weNational Lockdown Level Four uyo achange uripo kwemazuva makumi matatu. Asi vakawanda vari kuchemachema nerekuti hurongwa uhu huchavasiya vari munzara.

Veruzhinji muBulawayo vagara kudzimba dzavo pakutanga kwelockdown
nhasi uye nzvimbo dzakawanda dzinosive dzakazara vanhu mudhorobha
dzange dziine vanhu vashoma-shoma kusanganisira kunoziikanwa kunzi
kuMarket muna Fifth Avenue.

Pange paine ma roadblock mumigwagwa yakawanda inopinda mudhorobha uye vamwe vanhu vange vachida kupinda mudhorobha vasina magwaro anodiwa vange vachidzorerwa kumba. Asi vamwe vataura neStudio7 vati izvi zvange zvichiitwa nenzira yakanaka pasina kutyisidzira kana kuvhundutsira vanhu kunosiitwa nemapurisa nemasoja panguva dzakadai.

Vakawanda vange vachichema-chema vachiti pane kuti hurumende iise
lockdown zviri nani kuti iite zvose zvainogona kuti vanhu vatevedzere
zvinotaurwa nenyanzvi dzezvehutano pakudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19.

Mumwe ane chitoro chinotengesa zvakasiyana-siyana mudhorobha uyo
angoda kuzvidoma nezita rekuti Moyo ati kuvharwa kuchasiya
vakawanda vari munzara.

Mumwe anorarama nekutengesa zvirimwa zvakasiyana-siyana paMarket,
VaTyson Shumba, vati vanonzwisisa kuti sei hurumende yakaisa mutemo
wekuvharwa kwenyika asi vati ivo semumwe wevanhu vanozvishandira, shuviro yavo ndeyekuti dai hurumende yakavapa mukana wekuti varambewo vachishanda.

Mumwe anorarama nekutengesa, Amai Memory Gaviro, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanhukadzi kunyanya ndivo vanonyanya kuomerwa nekushaiswa mukana wekuita mabasa avo nekuda kwekuvharwa kwenyika. Vati vanhu vakawanda vanogona kufa nenzara sezvo pasina matanho akatorwa nehuruemende ekuti ape veruzhinji vanotambura mari yerubatsiro panguva yelockdown.

Mumwewo mugari, VaFarai Zowa, vati kunyange hazvo vachibvuma kuti
mitemo iyi inoomesera veruzhinji, zvakakosha kuti ivepo senzira yekuedza
kurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 icho choramba chichikura munyika nepasi
rose.

Mudzidzisi wezvidzidzo zvepamusoro zvehupfumi uye vari muongorori
akazvimirira, VaFelix Chari, vati nekuda kwekuti hupfumi hwenyika
hwagara husina kumira zvakanaka, Lockdown Level Four ichawedzera kutambura kweveruzhinji. Vati zvange zviri nani kuti hurumende isimudzire dzimwe nzira dzekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi.

Mutauriri wemutungamiri weMDC T, VaWitmess Dube, vati bato ravo riri
kushushikana nekutekeshera kwechirwere cheCovid 19 munyika uyewo kuti chave kubata vechidiki. Vati dai hurumende yawana dzimwe nzira dzekurwisa chirwere vachitiwo
vanhu vanozvishandira pachavo vega vanofanirwa kubvumidzwa kuramba
vachishanda.

Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo, vashora hurumende vachiti maitiro ayakaita lockdown anoomesera
veruzhinji.

Gurukota revashandi pamwe nekugara zvakanaka kwevanhu, VaPaul Mavima, vabvuma kuti hurumende yange isati yatora danho rekupa
vamwe veruzhinji vanotambura mari yerubatsiro nekuti lockdown yerwendo
rwuno yakaitwa nechimbi-chimbi. Asi vati nekuda kwekuti lockdown inogona kuvepo kwenguva yakareba bazi ravo riri mushishi kutaura nebazi rezvemari kuti rubatsiro urwu rupiwe kuvanhu. No media source currently available

headline: VaTsvangirai Voshora VaMugabe neKumanikidza Vanhu Kufora Vachitiwo Vave Kunzwa Zviri Nani
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMovement for Democratic Change VaMorgan Tsvangirai nemusi weChitatu vakatumira mashoko kumhuri yeZimbabwe vachivimbisa kuti munguva pfupi inotevera vachange vodzoka kumusha vachibatsirana navo kurwira rusununguko. VaTsvangirai parizvino vari muchipatara kuSouth Africa uko vati vari kunaya. Vatenda mhuri yeZimbabwe nemudzimai wavo amai Elizabeth Tsvangirai nekuvatsigira vari muchipatara. Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa atiwo achadzoka munyika kuzoenderera mberi nekumirira zvido zvevanhu vachinetsana nevanhu vari kutyora kodzero dzevanhu munyika. Vati vari kuzvizivawo kuti vanhu vemuZimbabwe vari kunetseka zvikuru. VaTsvangirai vati vari kunzwawo kuti bato reZanu-PF ravharisa nyika yose nekumanikidza vanhu kusanganisa vanotengesa mumigwagwa kuti vaende kunofora vachitsigira mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. VaTsvangirai vati chinofanira kunge chichifora kuenda mberi handi vanhu asi kuti hupfumi. VaTsvangirai vatiwo vari kuenderera mberi vachinaya uye kurwarwa kwavo hakufanire kukonzera kusagadzikana munyika. Vatiwo nyika yeZimbabwe itori pakaoma kudarika hutano hwavo. Mutauriri waVaTsvangirai vaudza Studio 7 kuti mhuri yeZimbabwe ngaigadzikane zvayo sezvo VaTsvangirai vachange vobatana nawo mukurwira hutongo hwejekerere. No media source currently available

headline: Maonero Osiyana paMashoko aVaMugabe Anoti Hupfumi Huchasimuka
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakavimbisa kuti hupfumi hwenyika hwagadzirira kusimuka kuburikidza nechirongwa cheZIM-ASSET. Vachitaura muparamende pachirongwa cheState of The Nation nemusi weChipiri, VaMugabe vakati hurumende yavo yakabuda nezviga gumi zvaichatevera mukusimudzira kwayo hupfumi hwenyika, uye kukwezva vekunze pamwe nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika kuti vasime mari dzavo munyika. Vakatiwo hurumende yavo iri kuita hurongwa hwekuti itange kudyidzana zvakare nenyika dzekunze, kusanganisira dzekumawirira. Asi mutauriri weMDC Renewal Team, VaJacob Mafume, vanoti hapana zvitsva pamashoko aVaMugabe aya, sezvo zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichienda kumawere munyaya dzeupfumi. Vanotiwo VaMugabe vanofanirwa kutanga nekuvandudza mitemo iri kutyisidzira vekunze kuti vatadze kusima mari dzavo munyika. Asi nhengo yeZanu PF, uye vachiongororora zvematongerwo enyika, VaGoodson Nguni,vanoti hurumende yeZanu PF yagara itori kuita hurukuro nevekunze kuti Zimbabwe itange kudyidzana zvakare nenyika dzekunze. VaNguni vanoti izvi zvakaonekwa kana munguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa apo pakaumbwa komiti yemakurukota yaiita hurukuro nenyika dzekumawirira. No media source currently available

headline: SADC neAU Dzokurudzirwa Kupindira Pakurwiswa kweZvizvarwa zveDzimwe Nyika muSouth Africa Zvisati Zvapera Rumwe Rumwe
text: Sangano reZimbawe Exiles Forum riri kurudzira kuti SADC neAfrican Union dzipindire pakugadzirisa kurwiswa kwoitwa zvimwe zvizvarwa zvenyika dzemuAfrica zvirimu South Africa. Mukuru wesangano iri vari gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu VaGabriel Shumba vanoti zviri pachena kuti Zimbabwe neSouth Africa dzakundikana kugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Asi mumiriri weZimbabwe muSouth Africa VaDavid Hamadziripi vanoti vari kutaura nehurumende yeSouth Africa kuyedza kugadzirisa dambudziko iri. South Africa inotiwo iri kuyedza kugadzirisa dambudziko iri ichiti vanhu vanomwe vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuponda chizvarwa cheZimbabwe mushakabvu Elvis Nyathi vakasungwa vakamiswa pamberi pedare muJohannesburg nemusi weChipiri. Asi VaShumba vanoti muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi sezvo vatungamiri vachingotaura pasina zvavari kuita. Zvizvarwa weSouth Africa zvakaita sezviri kutsigira chikwata cheOperation Dudula zviri kupomera zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika mhosva yekuzvitorerea mabasa uye kutengesa zvinodhaka nekuba.

headline: Matare Onzwa Gakava Pakati paMuzvare Khupe naVaChamisa
text: Mutevedzeri wemukuru wevatongi, Amai Elizabeth Gwaunza, vatara musi wa 30 Chivabvu sezuva richanzwikwa nyaya yakakwidzwa mudare reConstitutional Court nemumwe mutungamiri weMDC-T, Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, vachipikisa kudzingwa kwavakaitwa mudare reparamende nechimwe chikwata cheMDC chinotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa. MDC-T yaChamisa yakadzinga Muzvare Khupe muparamende ichiti havasisiri nhengo yeMDC-T. Asi Muzvare Khupe vakabva vaenda kumatare vachiti nyaya iyi inzwikwe chimbi chimbi nokuti ivo ndivo vakafanobata matomu muMDC zviri pamutemo zvichitevera kushaya kwaVaMorgan Tsvangirai muna Kukadzi. Ukuwo VaChamisa vanoti ndivo vakapihwa masimba ekutora matomu zvichitevera zvisungo zvakabuda neNational Council yeMDC-T. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri weMDC-T inotungamirwa naVaChamisa, Muzvare Tabitha Khumalo, vati hapana zvekutaura sezvo nyaya ichiri kumatare. Asi mutauriri weMDC inotungamirwa naMuzvare Khupe, VaObert Gutu, vaudza Studio7 kuti bato ravo richakunda nyaya dzose dziri mumatare nekuti ndiro riri kutevedzera zviri mubumbiro remitemo yebato. No media source currently available

headline: Paramende Yoenda kuZororo Isina Kuvandudza Bhiri reMitemo yeSarudzo
text: Nhengo dzeparamende idzo dzakakokwa zvechimbichimbi svondo rino, kuti dzizozeya bhiri rekuvandudza mutemo wesarudzo, reElectoral Amendment Bill, dzadzokera zvakare kuzororo dzisina kuzeya bhiri iri mushure mekunge dzabvumirana kuti dzinoda nguva yekuongorora zvitsva zviri mubhiri iri. Nemusi weChipiri nhengo dzeMDC-T dzakaramba kunzwa bhiri iri dzichiti dzaida kumboongorora zvitsva zvainge auuya negurukota rezvemutemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi. VaZiyambi vakaramba nemusi weChitatu kutura bhiri iri vachiti Amai Priscillah Misihairambwi Mushonga, avo vanewo mitemo mitsva yavari kuda kuti izeyiwe, vange vasiri mudare. Amai Misihairambwi Mushonga vange vasi mudare zvakare nhasi. Vanokokera nhengo dzeMDC-T muparamende, VaInnocent Gonese, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vafonerwa naVaZiyambi kuti vapanane nguva yekuzeya ma amendments matsva kubva kumapato ese vozeya bhiri pavanodzoka kuzororo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzemutemo vachishanda nesangano Human Rights Watch, VaDhewa Mavhinga, vaudza Studio7 kutihapachina nguva yekuti nhengo dzeparamende dzirambe dzichienda kuzororo dzisina kugadzirisa mutemo uyu nekuti nguva yesarudzo yave pedyo.
