Mukuru weDemocracy Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Pedzisai Ruhanya, vati nhengo dzeparamende hadzifaniri kumhanyira kuzororo nyaya iyi isina kugadziriswa. Zvichakadai munyika maita mutauro zvichitevera kusvika munyika neChitatu kweimwe ndege yakatengwa nehurumende kuMalayasia pasi pekambani yeZimbabwe Airways. Dzimwe nhengo dzeparamende dzakumbira gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, VaJorum Gumbo, kuti vatsanagurire kunyika yese kuti zviri kufamba sei uye kuti muridzi wekambani iyi ndiyani. Nhengo isina bato rainomirira asi vachimirira Norton, VaTemba Mliswa, vati VaGumbo vanofanirawo kutsanangura kuti ndivanani varidzi veZimbabwe Airways uye pamwe nekuti varidzi vekambani yeZimbabwe Aviation Leasing Company (ZALC) ndivanani sezvo pane runyerekupe rwekuti kambani iyi yakanyoreswa kuSingapore. VaGumbo vati vachaita izvi uyewo manyepo ekuti ZALC ikambani yekuSingapore vachiti ikambani yemuZimbabwe. Bato rinopikisa rePeoples Democratic Party, PDP, rati pane zvakawanda zvisina kujeka panyaya iyi zvinoda kuongororwa. PDP inoti iyo nevamwe vayo vari muMDC Alliance vanoda kuti paumbwe komisheni ichaongoroa kuti chii chakaitika uye paramende iongorore kutengwa kwendenge idzi. PDP inodawo kuziva kuti kushandisa ndege idzi hakupinzi vanhu munjodzi here sezvo Malaysian Aiarways yakatengesa ndege idzi mushure mekurega kudzishandisa. No media source currently available

headline: Chirwere cheCovid-19 Chodzoka Zvine Hukasha Apo Vakawanda Vamira Kuzvidzivirira
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti munhu mumwe chete akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muHarare nemusi weChina zvaunza huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kusvika pamazana matatu ane gumi kana kuti 310. Nemusi weChitatu wakare vanhu zana nemakumi matanhatu nevana kana kuti 164 vakabatwawo nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vose ava havana nhoroondo yekubuda kunze kwenyika. Izvhi zvave kureva kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizvino hwave zvuru gumi nechimwe zvine mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nemaviri kana kuti 11, 522. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vave zvuru zvipfumbamwe nemazana mashanu ane makumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 9, 599 mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu makumi mana nevashanu vapora nezuro. Vanhu vachiri kurwara churu chimwe chete nemazana matanhatu ane gumi nevatatu kana kuti 1, 613. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kuyambira kuti chirwere ichi chadzoka kechipiri zvine mutsindo kana kuti second wave sezvo huwandu hwacho hwawedzera zvakanyanya. Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevarwere kana kuti Community Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike vanoti vanhu vakawanda havachaterere kurudziro yekuzvidzivirira kubva kudenda iri zvopa kuti vakawanda vabatwe nechirwere ichi. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa kuStudio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezvuru mazana mana, kana kuti 2,4 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zvuru makumi mashanu nemanomwe ane makumi mashanu nevanomwe kana kuti 57, 057. Vapora vadarika mamiriyoni maviri kana kuti 2 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica yose. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere che coronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi manomwe nematatu ane zvuru mazana manomwe, kana kuti 73, 7 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica, iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose, inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vadarika zviuru mazana matatu ane zvuru zvitatu kana kuti 303, 000 kuchitiwo vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nematanhatu ane zviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 16, 7 miillion. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matanhatu, kana kuti 1, 6 million, asi vapora vachidarikawo mamiriyoni makumi mana nerimwe ane zvuru mazana manomwe. Vanhu vapora pasi rose vave mamiriyoni makumi mana nemanomwe ane zvuru mazana matatu kana kuti 47,3 million. No media source currently available

headline: Kushaya Dzidziso Kwopa Kuti Vakawanda Vatapurirwe Chirwere cheCovid19 Vadzoka kuZimbabwe
text: Mukuru mubazi rezvehutano anoona nezvemamiriro enharaunda uye nzvimbo dziri kuchengeterwa vanhu vari kubva kunze kwenyika kana kuti maqurantine centres VaVictor Nyamandi vanoti kushaya ruzivo rwakakwana ndiko kwopa kuti vanhu vakawanda vatapurirane chirwere checoronavirus munzvimbo idzi. Vanoti vari kushushikanawo zvikuru nekutiza kuri kuita vanhu munzvimbo idzi mushure mekunge mapurisa azivisa kuti vanhu zana nemakumi masere nevana vainge vatiza. Pavanhu mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nevashanu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika, mazana mana nemakumi mana nemasere vakabva kunze kwenyika, makumi manomwe nemanomwe vachitapurirwa chirwere ichi munyika. Dare repamusoro rakatombopa mutongo wekuti hurumende igadzirise zvinhu kunzvimbo dzinochengeterwa vanhu idzi mushure mekunge sangano ravanachiremba reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights rakwidza nyaya kumatare richiti hakuna hutsanana. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vashanu Vofa neCovid-19
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChishanu kuti vanhu vashanu vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nemumwe kana kuti 1, 501. Vanhu makumi mana nevasere kana kuti 48 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vave zviuru makumi matatu nematanhatu ane makumi namomwe nemumwe kana kuti 36, 471. Vanhu gumi nevashanu kana kuti 15 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvichireva kuti vapora kubva zvatanga chirwere ichi kupararira vave zviuru makumi matatu nemana ane gumi nemumwe kana kuti 34 011. Vanhu vachiri kurwara mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mashanu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 959. Zvichakadaro, huwandu hwevashandi vemuzvipatara nevamwe vanoita mabasa anopa kuti vasangane neveruzhinji kusanganisira vatori venhau nevanochengetedza majeri vabayiwa nhomba yeSinopharm yakapihwa Zimbabwe neChina hwasvika pazviuru makumi matatatu nezvitanhatu zvine mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 36, 359. Vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubazi rezvehutano VaDonald Mujiri vanoti chinangwa chehurumende ndechekuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi vabayiwe nhomba kuti inyatsoshanda. Pasi Rose Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nevaviri kana kuti kuti 532, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 29 million. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 2,6 million. Asi vapora pasi rose vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu nemanomwe zvine zviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 67,5 million. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yotsvaga Rubatsiro rwe$188m Ichabatsira Vakawirwa neMatambudziko
text: Zimbabwe iri kutsvaga rubatsiro rwemariu inodarika zana nemakumi masere emamiriyoni emadhora. Mari iyi ndetekubatsira vanhu vakawirwa nedambudziko remafashamu emvura. Izvi zvaziviswa nevakasanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika, VaPhelekezela Mphoko, pamusangano wavaita nevamiriri vedzimwe nyika. Musangano uyu wapindwawo nesangano reUnited Nations Development Program, vemabhangi pamwe nevemakambani akazvimirira VaMphoko vati vamiriri ava nemakambani aya vanoziva dambudziko rakawirwa neZimbabwe uye hurumende yavo iri kuda rubatsiro rwemhando yese. Vatiwo hurumende ichaedza nepainogona napo kuona kuti mari yese ichabviswa ichaenda kunobatsira vanhu vakawirwa nedambudziko iri. VaMphoko vati mari yese iri $188m yavari kutsvaga ichange ichibatwa neveReserve Bank of Zimbabwe uye vese vanenge vabvisa mari yavo vanogona kupihwa humbowo hwekuti mari yavo yakashanda sei. Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vati hurumende ichiri kuongorora kuti mari iri kudiwa imarii, asi vati vakawana $188 million, mari iyi inogona kubatsira zvakanyanya. Vatiwo musangano weSouthern Africa Development Community uchangobva mukuitwa wakaratidza kuti mashafamu akaparadza zvinhu zvakawanda muZimbabwe kudarika zvakaitika munyika dziri mudunhu rese. Mukuru weUNDP muZimbabwe, VaBishaw Parajuli, vati vatambira chikumbiro chehurumende uye vari kushanda nehurumende yeZimbabwe mukubatsira vese vakawirwa nedambudziko iri. Vatiwo zvinofadza kuti pane rubatsiro rwave kutopinda munyika. Mumiriri weChina muZimbabwe, VaHuang Ping, vati chikamu cheRed Cross chekunyika kwavo chakabvisa rubatsiro rwezviuru zvishanu zvemadhora uyewo vashandi vemuZimbabwe vanobva kuChina vakabvisa zviuru gumi zvemadhora zvekubatsira vakawirwa nedambudziko remafashamu. Rumwe rubatsirwo rwematende, mishonga nezvimwe zvasvika munyika neMuvhuro kubva kuJapan. Namibia yazivisawo kuti iri kuunza rubatsirwo rwechikafu runosanganisira magaba ehove miriyoni. Mukutanga kwemwedzi kwaKurume, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakati dambudziko remafashamu idambudziko renyika yese izvo zvinoita kuti hurumende ikwanise kutsvaga rubatsiro kunze. Pane vanhu vanodarika mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu vakatofa munyika yese uye nemafashamu, ukuwo mhuri dzinodarika zviuru zviviri nemazana mashanu dzakaparadzirwa misha yadzo, zvikoro, mabhiriji nemakirinika zvikaparadzwawo munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana. No media source currently available

headline: Masangano Anorwira Kodzero Oshora Hurumende Mabatiro Airi Kuita Madhokotera
text: Zvichitevera kudzingwa basa kwemadhokotera makumi manomwe nemanomwe mushure mekuwanikwa aine mhosva yekuzvidza mutongo wedare re Labor Court wekuti vadzokere kumabasa avo, sangano revanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, re Zimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, rinoti hurumende haina hany'a nevanhu kana hutana hwavo. Munyori wesangano iri, Dr. Evans Masitara, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvebhajeti zvakataurwa negurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, zvinoratidza kuti hurumende haina basa nevanhu kana hutano hwavo vachiti hurumende yaifanirwa kunge ichishandisa mari pazvinhu zvinorerutsa hupenyu hwevanhu uye mune zvehutano zviri kunetsa munyika. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mukuru wesangano re Human Rights Watch kuchamhembe kwe Africa, VaDewa Mavhinga, vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti iremekedze madhokotera uye kuti igare pasi itaurirane navo zvakanaka nekuti zvichemo zvavo zviri pachena. VaMavhinga vati hurumende isakanganwa kuti kuitira vanachiremba zvehasha hakubatsiri varwere uye kunokonzera kuti vanachiremba vatsvake mabasa kunyika dzekunze idzo dzakatovamirira. No media source currently available

headline: Vatsigiri veZanu PF Vakawanda Votsamwiswa neMabatirwo eSarudzo dzeMubato Iri
text: Vatsigiri vebato reZanu PF vakawanda vanoti havasi kufara nekusafamba zvakanaka kwakaita sarudzo dzemubato ravo dzekutsvaga vachamirira bato iri musarudzo dzichaitwa munyika yose. Vatsigiri veZanu PF vakawanda vanoti havasi kufara nekufambiswa kwakaitwa basa nemurongi wemisangano mubato ravo, VaEngelbert Rugeje, pasarudzo dzekutsvaga vachamirira bato iri musarudzo dzenyika dzichaitwa mumwedzi mishoma iri kutevera. Mumwe wevanhu ava, VaAcie Lumumba, vanoti bato ravo rine basa guru rekubatanidza vanhu kuitira kuti rigokunda musarudzo. VaLumumba vanoti VaRugeje vakatadza kuita izvi nechimbichimbi vanofanira kusiya basa. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda nesangano reHuma Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti kusafamba zvakanaka kwaita sarudzo muZanu PF hakusvibise zita raVaRugeje chete. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda nesangano reZimbabwe Organization for Youth in Politics, VaNkosilathi Emmanuel Moyo, vaudza Studio7 parunhare vari kuKwekwe kuti kushomeka kwevanhu vakabuda kunovhota musarudzo dzemuZanu PF kunoburitsa pachena kusawirirana kuri mubato iri pakatariswa kubviswa kwakaitwa vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pachigaro nemauto  Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda nesangano re Heal Zimbabwe Trust, Muzvare Stabile Dewa, vati kushomeka kwevanhu vakabuda kunovhota musarudzo idzi zvikurusei munzvimbo dzagara dzichizivikanwa kuti Zanu PF ine rutsigiro rwakakura kwazvo, pamwe nekukundwa kwakaitwa vamwe vakuru-vakuru muZanu PF kunoratidza pachena kuti veruzhinji havasisina chivimbo nehutungamiri hwebato iri. VaMavhinga vanotiwo mapato anopikisa haafanire kurara nezamu mukanwa achiti Zanu PF yaita zinyekeyeke vachiti bato iri rinogona kumuka chibhebhenenga musarudzo dzenyika dzichaitwa gore rino. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naVaRugeje kuti tinzwe divi ravo pamafambiro akaita sarudzo dzemubato ravo sezvo vanga vachiti vakabatikana patavafonera. Hatinawo kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri weZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, sezvo vanga vasingadaire nhare yavo. Sarudzo dzemuZanu PF dzaifambiswa mumatunhu akawanda nevanhu vaimbove masoja, uye vari pasi paVaRugeje, avo vaimbovawo musoja. No media source currently available

headline: Kubva Zvavhurwa Mabhodha, Vanhu Makumi Mapfumbamwe Vobatwa neCovid-19 Vabva kuSouth Africa
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu zana nemumwe kana kuti 101 vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemusi weSvondo. Pavanhu ava, makumi mana nevatanhatu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika vamwe makumi mashanu nevashanu vakabva nacho kuSouth Africa. Kubva zvavhurwa miganhu yenyika musi wa 1 Zvita, vanhu makumu mapfumbamwe vakabva kuSouth Africa vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi munyika. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira munyika vave zvuru gumi nemazana manomwe ane gumi nevasere. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vave zvuru zvisere nemazana masere nemakumi masere kana kuti 8, 880 zvichitevera kupora kwevamwe vanhu makumi matatu nevatanhatu nezuro. Vanhu vachiri kurwara vave churu chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nemakumi mana nevanomwe kana kuti 1, 547. Vanhu vafa vachiri mazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemumwe kana kuti 291 uye nezuro hakuna akarasikirwa nehupenyu. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezvuru mazana maviri kana kuti 2, 2 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zvuru makumi mashanu nezvitatu zvine mazana mashanu nemakumi mana nevatatu kana kuti 53, 543. Vapora vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezvuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 1,9 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu nemanomwe kana kuti 67 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vadarika zvuru mazana maviri nemakumi masere nemaviri kana kuti kuti 282, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nemana nezvuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 14, 5 million. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 1, 5 million. Asi vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi mana nematatu kana kuti 43 million.

headline: Vana Chiremba Voronga Kuramwa Mabasa Zvekare
text: Sangano ravanachiremba reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association ranyora tsamba kuhurumende richiizivisa kuti vanachiremba vari kuzombomira kuenda kubasa sezvo mari dzavo dzisisakwane. Vanachiremba vanoti mitengo yezvinhu zvose yawedzerwa asi mari yavo yemihoro isina kuwedzerwa. Vanachiremba ava vanoti hurumende haisi kuratidza kuzvipira munhaurirano dzemari dzavanotambiriswa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvehutano, Doctor Obadiah Moyo, sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Mutungamiri wesangano ravanachiremba iri, Doctor Peter Magombeyi, vanoti basa vanoda asi zvinhu zvakaita manyama amire nerongo zvekuti havachakwanisi kuenda kubasa nekuomerwa nezvinhu. No media source currently available

headline: Mubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance Unoita Musangano Wekutanga muHarare
text: Mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa weMDC Alliance, waita musangano wawo wekutanga mumusha weEpworth muHarare, uyo unonzi wapindwa nemazana evatsigiri vemapato ari mumubatanidzwa uyu. Mumwe wevatungamiri vemapato ari mumubatanidzwa, VaJacob Ngarivhume vanoti vatora mukana uyu kutsanangurira vatsigiri vavo vapinda mumusangano uyu pamusoro pehurongwa hwemubatanidzwa wakatarisana nesarudzo dzegore rino. Vangarivhume vanoti nyaya huru yavaudza vatsigiri vavo ndeyekuvandudzwa kunofanirwa kuitwa mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo idzo sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. VaNgarivhume vanoti zvavanyunyuta nazvo nedezvekusachinja maitiro kweZanu PF muzvinhu zvakaita sekuwaniswa kwemapato ose mikana yakaenzana panhepfenyuro dzehurumende. “Saka tati isusu zvimwe zvezvinhu zvatichagara tichipusha, kana kuti tichirwa kuti tiite hondo yekuti zvinhu izvozvo zvirongeke, zvigadzirisike,” vanodaro VaNgarivhume. Musangano uyu unonzi wapindwa nevatungamiri vemapato ari muMDC Alliance ose kunze kwemutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, avo vanonzi vanga vakamirirwa nevatevedzeri vavo VaElias Mudzuri naVaNelson Chamisa. Mutungamiri werimwe bato reMDC, VaWelshman Ncube vanonzi havanawo kukwanisa kunge vari pamusangano uyu, asi vachinzi vanga vakamirirwawo nemutevedzeri wavo, VaEdwin Mushoriwa. VaTsvangirai ndivo vachamirira mubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available

headline: VaMasaraure Vanoti Havasi Kuzorega Kurwira Mihoro Yakakwana yeVarairidzi
text: Mutungamiriri wesangano rinomiririra varairidzi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, avo vakapambwa nevanhu vatanhatu pakati pehusiku, vanoti vakarohwa zvakaipisisa, uye vakatorerwa mbatya dzavainge vakapfeka. VaMasaraure vanoti vakakuvadzwa mumusoro, kumusana, maoko nemakumbo, vachiti vamwe vevanhu vakavapamba ndevamwe vechikwata chakambovapamba muna Ndira gore rino, vachiti izvi hazvisi kuzovadzorerwa sure mukurwira kodzero dzevarairiridzi. VaMasaraure vanoti hurumende yave kutora vanorwira kodzero dzevashandi sevavengi vachiti hapana anoda kupidigura hurumende asi kuti vanhu vanoda kuti vakwanise kuriritira mhuri dzavo. VaMasaraure vaudza Studio7 kuti vaudzwa navana chiremba kuti vambozorora kuenda kubasa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, kuti tinzwe pamire hurumende panyaya yekupambwa kwava Masaraure sezvo vanga vasingadaire nharembozha yavo. No media source currently available

headline: Paramende Yozeya Bhiri reNhaurirano Pakati peVashandi neVashandirwi
text: Dare reparamende richiri kuzeya bhiri rekuyedza kudzika mutemo wenhaurirano pakati pevashandi, vashandirwi ne hurumende kana kuti Tripartite Negotiating Forum Bill. Komiti yeparamende inoona nezvemutemo yakatozeya bhiri iri ikati hapana chiri mariri chinganzi chinotyora bumbiro remutemo. Komiti yeparamende inoona nezvevashandi iri kutarisirwawo kuti mumwedzi uno inge ichitaura nevanhu mumatunhu akasiyana siyana nezvavanodawo kuti zvinge zviri mubhiri iri. Gurukota rezvevashandi Doctor Sekai Nzenza vari kutarisirwa kupira bhiri iri kudare musi wa 5 Kurume. Hatina kukwanisa kubata Doctor Nzenza kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Asi munyori mukuru wesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Union VaJaphet Moyo vanoti hurumende iri kudya manonoko pakut bhiri iri rive mutemo uye vanovimba kuti kana rikapasiswa richabatsira kuunza kuyanana munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inokurudzirwa Kuti Iwedzere Nzvimbo Dzinobaiwa Vanhu Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Hurumende Inokurudzirwa Kuti Iwedzere Nzvimbo Dzinobaiwa Vanhu Nhomba yeCovid-19 Imwe yenyanzvi mune zvehutano, Dr. Edgar Munatsi, vanoti vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti iwedzere zvipatara nemakiriniki ari kubairwa vanhu nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kuitira kuti vanhu vasaungane nehuwandu huri kuonekwa iye zvino munzvimbo shoma dzakadomwa kuti dziite basa iri. Doctor Munatsi vanoti kuungana kuri kuita vanhu uye kutsikirirana vachirwira kuti vakwanise kuwana mukana wekubaiwa nhomba, pavanhu vashoma vanonzi vari kukwanisa kuwana nhomba iyi pazuva, kunogona kuzove dambudziko guru mune ramangwana, sezvo vanhu vachigona kutapurirana Covid-19 ipapo. Kunyange hazvo hurumende ichinzi yakawedzera nzvimbo dzekubaira vanhu, kusanganisira makirinikiemakanzuru, vanhu vanonzi vari kuramba vachizara munzvimbo idzi sezvo vave kubuda nehuwandu kudarika zviitika kare. Doctor Munatsi vanotiwo nekuona kukwira kuri kuita huwandu hwevanhu vari kumaruwa vave kubatwa nedenda iri, zvakakosha zvikuru kuti hurumende ikasike kuvhura nzvimbo dzekubaira vanhu nhomba mumaruwa ose emunyika. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, kuti tinzwe hurongwa hwehurumende panyaya iyi sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga ichinetsa. Asi Dr Munatsi vanoti hurumende inofanira kuwedzera nzimbo dzekubaya vanhu nhomba, pamwe chete nekuendesa mushonga uyu kunzvimbo idzi. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: VaDabengwa Voitwa Gamba reNyika Asi Votarisirwa Kuradzikwa Kumusha Kwavo
text: Mutumbi wegamba renyika VaDumiso Dabengwa wange uchitarisirwa kusvika munyika nhasi watadza kusvika sezvo zvanzi bhokisi ravo kana kuti casket ratadza kukwana muzvimbo yekutakurira zvinhu kana kuti cargo mundege diki yange ichitarisirwa kuvatakura kubva kuSouth Africa. VaDabengwa vakashaikira kuNairobi, Kenya nemusi weChina vachibva kunorapwa kuIndia. Izvi zvave kureva kuti wave kutarisirwa munyika mangwana. Vachitaura panhandare yendege yeJoshua Nqabuko Nkomo International Airport kuBulawayo nhasi kuvanhu vange vauya kuzotambira mutumbi wavo. Mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaKembo Mohadi vati Politburo yeZanu-PF yatenderana kuti vaitwe gamba renyika. Asi vachitaura neStudio 7, sachigaro weZapu VaIsaac Mabuka vanoti vaDabengwa vari kutarisirwa kuradzikwa kumusha kwavo kuNtabazinduna sechido chavo kwete kumarinda eHeroes Acre. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weNyika VaMnangagwa, Vanosaina Mutemo Mutsva weSarudzo
text: Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vasaini bhiri reElectoral Amendment Act of 2018 kuti uve mutemo wenyika, izvo zvave kupa mukana wekuti nyika iite sarudzo pachishandiswa mutemo mutsva uyu. Izvi zvaziviswa mugwaro rehurumende reGovernment Gazette, iro raburitswa neChipiri, uye chiziviso ichi chinoti mutemo uyu wakatanga kushanda neMuvhuro. Vachiutaura mushure mekuburitswa kwechiziviso ichi, vanokokera nhengo dzebato guru rinopikisa munyika reMDC-T inotungamiririrwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaInnocent Gonese, vati havana kufara nekuti VaMnangagwa vasaina mutemo uyu usina zvizhinji zvaidiwa nevemapato anopikisa kuti zvigadziriswe kana kuwedzerwa. Vati semaonero avo nyika haigona kuve nesarudzo dzisina mutauro kana pasina kuwirirana pazvinhu zvakawanda zvakaita sekudhindwa kwemagwaro ekuvhotesa kana kuti maballot paper. MDC-T yaida kuti kudhindwa nekwema ballot paper kuitwe pachena vese vari kupinda musarudzo varipo. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kunyange hazvo mutemo mutsva uyu uchirambidza zvemhirizhonga, haupi matare mazino ekuranga vanenge vakonzera mhirizhonga panguva yesarudzo. Munyori anoona nezvemutemo mubato riri kutonga reZanu PF, VaPaul Mangwana, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vafara chose nedanho ratorwa nemutungamiriri wenyika, vachiti vave kugadzirira sarudzo pasi pemutemo mutsva uyu. Panyaya yekunyunyuta kuri kuita vemapato anopikisa, VaMangwana vati mapato aya aifanira kugadzirisa zvichemo zvawo kuparamende uye mutungamiriri wenyika anoshanda nezveanenge apihwa neparamende. VaMnangagwa vanotarisirwa kudoma zuva richaitwa sarudzo nguva ipi zvayo, uye izvi zvinoteverawo kupera kwechirongwa chekuongororwa kwegwaro revavhoti neveruzhinji. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe neDzimwe Nyika Dzozvipira Kuderedza Zvinosvibisa Mweya weKufema
text: Musangano wezvekushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze wechimakumi maviri nenhanhatu kana kuti Cope26 wakapinda muzuva retatu nemusi weChitatu vatungamiri venyika dzakanyanya kutarisana nekuchinja kwemamiriro ekunze dzinoti Nigeria, Madagascar neBarbados vachitaura. Musangano unokokerwa neUnited Nations uyu uri kuitirwa kuGlasgow, Scotland. Asi neChipiri vatungamiri venyika zana vari kumusangano uyu kusanganisira VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, VaJoe Biden vekuAmerica, VaBoris Johnson, Britain vakatsidza kuzvipira kuti nyika dzavo dzidzikisa zvakanyanya zvinosvibisa mweya wekufema zvakaita semethane inobuda pakudhonza mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari, kutema miti nezvimwe. VaBiden vakavimbisa kudzikisa methane iyi nezvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana panosvika gore ra2030. Asi vakashora vatungamiri veChina neRussia nekusaenda kumusangano uyu. Nyanzvi mubazi rezvekushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze kana kuti Climate Mitigation Department VaLawrence Mashungu vaudza Studio 7 kuti musangano uyu wakakosha zvikuru sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumiara zvakanaka nekuda kwekushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze. No media source currently available

headline: Vana Chiremba Vanoti Havasi Kuzoita Basa Kusvika Zvinonetsa Zvagadziriswa
text: Vana chiremba vanoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara huye havasi kuzodzokera kumabasa kusvika hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Vana chiremba vaudza vatori venhau kuti zvinovasuwisa zvakanyanya kuti vasvitsa mazuva gumi nemaviri vasiri kuenda kubasa uku hurumende isiri kumboedza kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Association, Dr Elias Muzoremba, vati vanoshungurudzika zvikuru vachishanda muzvipatara zvisina zvikwanisiro zvakakwana. Vatiwo muzvipatara zvehurumende hamuna mishonga izvo zvinoita kuti kunyange vakaona varwere, havana zvavanokwanisa kuvabetsera nazvo. VaMuzoremba vatiwo vanachiremba vazhinji havasi pamabasa kunyange hazvo gurukota rezveutano, VaObadiah Moyo, vakaudza makurukota ehurumede neChipiri kuti vana chiremba vashoma ndovari kuramwa mabasa. Munyori musangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Asssociation, VaMthabisi Anele Bhebhe, vati zvinosuwisa kuti matambudziko avari kuchema nawo vanogarotaura nezvawo gore negore asi hurumende haisi kuagadzirisa. VaBhebhe vati vana chiremba vekumatunhu vabatanawo nana chiremba vanga vari pakuramwa mabasa. VaBhebhe vatiwo hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa dambudziko rekushaikwa kwezvekushandisa muzvipatara pamwe nekuona kuti vanachiremba vararamawo hupenyu hwakanaka. Vana chirembawo vari kuti mari dzemihoro dzavari kuwana hadzikwani uye vanoda kuti hurumende ivabhadharewo nemari yekuAmerica. Gurukota rezveutano, VaObadiah Moyo, vakaudza vatori venhau nezuro mushure medare remakurukota ehurumende kuti havasi kuzobhadhara vana chiremba nemari yekunze. VaMoyo vakatiwo vakaita hurukuro nana chiremba uye vakati vazhinji vari kumabasa izvo zvarambwa nanachiremba. No media source currently available

headline: Dare Rinoti Vakaroorana Vanogona Kusiyira Hupfumi Hwavo Kumunhu Wavanoda
text: Zvichitevera mutongo wakapiwa nedare reHigh Court unoti kunyange hazvo vanhu vakachata zviri pamutemo, mumwe nemumwe ane zvake zvaanogona kusiyira munhu waanoda pakufa kwake. Izvi ndizvo zvinoremera vamwe kutambira vachiti zvinokonzera kunetsana kwevanhu mushure mukushaya kwemumwe wevaviri ava. Kwemakore mazhinji, vanhu vakange vachifunga kuti kana vaine muchato unobvumira mudzimai mumwe chete, zvaireva kuti panofa mumwe wevaviri ava, anenge asara anopiwa hupfumi kana kutora zvinhu zvese mushure mekushaya kwemumwe wake. Asi dare remajaji mashanu, aitungamirwa naChief Justice Luke Malaba, rakatonga kuti kunyange mumuchato wakadayi, mumwe nemumwe ane zvake zvinonzi ndezvake uye zvaanogona kusiyira chero munhu waanoda. Nyaya iyi yakabva panyaya yakasvitswa kudare redzimhosva naVaGerald Chigwada vakange vachiti dare redzimhosva rakakanganisa mukuramba kutambira gwaro rekupedzisira remufi, kana kuti ‘Will’, rababa vake, rakange richivapa hupfumi hwakasiyiwa nababa vavo, dare richiti zvipiwe mudzimai wavo wechipiri. Dare remajaji mashanu iri rakatonga kuti vakachata zviri pamutemo vanogona kusiya hupfumi hwavo kumunhu wavanoda asiri wavakange vakawanana naye. Nyanzvi mune zvemutemo, VaGodwin Nyengedza, vekambani yemagweta ye Hogwe Nyengedza, vanoti mutemo uyu wakagara wakadaro asi vanhu vange vasingazvizivi. VaNyengedza vanoti hapana chinoshamisa pamutongo wedare uyu kunze kwokusimbisa zviri mubumbiro remitemo yeZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoramba Ichizvicherera Gomba neKuramba Ichikwereta Mari
text: Hurumende yeZimbabwe iri kuramba ichienderera mberi nekukwereta mari yekushandisa munyika kana kuti domestic debt. Izvi zviri kuuya panguva iyo bhanga reIMF nereWorld Bank akayambira kuti kuita izvi kuchapa kuti nyika itadze kubuda mumadhaka mairi. Kunyange hazvo gurukota rinoona nezvehupfumi, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vari kuti hurumende hakuna zvimwe zvaingaite kunze kwekukwereta mari kuita mabasa ayo, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti zviri kuitwa izvi kukokera mhepo wakasenga mamera mutswanda. Vaimbova gurukota rinoona nezvehupfumi vachitungamira bato rinopikisa rePeople's Democratic Party, VaTendai Biti, vanoti nyaya yehurumende yekuramba ichikwereta mari iri kudzosera zvikuru chirongwa chekugadzirisa hupfumi uho huri kutatarika. VaBiti vati mari yakweretwa munyika yave kusvika mabhiriyoni matanhatu emadhora. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paUniversity of Free State muSouth Africa, VaCalvin Mdzingiri, vanoti vanowirirana naVaBiti vachiti mari inokweretwa inofanira kushandiswa pazvinhu zvinobatsira nyika zvakaita semigwagwa, zvipatara, magwenya emagetsi nezvimwe. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reZimbabwe Coalition on Debt and Development, VaTinashe Gumbo, vanoti nyaya yezvikwereti inofanira kunyatsodorongodzwa kuti paonekwe kuti imarii chaiyo yakakweretwa nekuti parizvino hazvina kujeka kuti chikwereti chakamira sei. Vaimbotungamira ZIMCODD kwemakore gumi uye vari nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaJoy Mabenge, vanotiwo mari isati yatanga kudzoserwa inofanira kuzivakanwa kuti chii chayakatenga. International Monetary Fund inoti Zimbabwe ikaramba ichikwereta mari munyika zvichapa kuti mitengo yezvinhu irambe ichikwira zvichapa kuti inflation yemunyika ikwirewo zvakanyanya. Asi nesarudzo dziri kuitwa gore rinouya VaBiti vanoti havaone nyaya yekukweretwa kwemari ichimira. Zimbabwe iri kutatarikawo kubhadhara chimwe chikwereti kuWorld Bank neAfrican Development Bank chinosvika bhiriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matanhatu emadhora. Kunyangwe hazvo VaChinamasa vainge vati vawana mari yekubhadhara chikwereti ichi uye vainge vatotenderana neWorld Bank neIMF, mabhanga aya anoti hapana chatenderanwa . Nyaya yekusabhadhara zvikwereti iri kupa kuti Zimbabwe itadze kukwereteswa mari nevamwe. No media source currently available

headline: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chinosarudza Kunoshanda neVarwere Vane Covid-19 MuNew York
text: Dunhu reNew York muAmerica ndiro ririkuona hudzamu hukuru hwechirwere checoronavirus kupfuura mamwe nematunhu ose muAmerica. Kutaura kuno, kunyange hazvo huwandu hwevarwere nevarikufa hwave kudzika, dunhu reNew York rarasikirwa nevanhu vanopfuura zviuru makumi maviri nezvisere (28,000) asi vanhu vachingori kubatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi kupfuura mune mamwe matunhu muAmerica. Gavhuna wedunhu reNew York, VaAndrew Cuomo, vakakumbira rubatsiro kubva kune vanamukoti navanachiremba nevamwe vari mubasa rezvehutano, kusanganisa vari pamudyandigere, kuti vaende kuNew York kunobatsira dunhu iri mukurapa nekuchengeta varwere vane Coronavirus. Vazhinji kubva kumatunhu akasiyanasiyana vakazvinzwa vakaenda kuno batsira varwere vane coronavirus mudunhu reNew York. Umwe wevakanzwa chikumbiro chaGavhuna Cuomo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, Muzvare Chiwoneso Mpofu, uyo panguva iyo akange achishanda mudunhu re Ohio, muno muAmerica. Muzvare Mpofu anoti panguva yaakange achifanirwa kunyorerana chibvumirano chebasa chitsva nechipatara chaaishandira kuOhio, akaona zvakakodzera kuenda kuNew York, uko kuchakangotarisana nedambudziko rechirwere che coronavirus, achiti ruzivo rwake rwurikudiwa zvakanyanya nevarwere ava kuNew York. Muzvare Mpofu anoti kuve mukoti haisi nyaya yekutsvaka mari asi kuti chinhu chinenge chagara chiri muhana yemunhu. Studio 7 yabata Muzvare Chiwoneso Mpofu kuti vatitsanangurire kuti sei vakafunga zvekupinda munzvimbo irikufiwa nevanhu vazhinji, pamwe chete nevanamukoti. No media source currently available

headline: Zanu-PF Yokanganisazve Makomiti eParamende Anotungamirwa neMDC Kuita Basa
text: Nhengo dzedare reZanu PF nhasi dzavhiringa musangano wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, dzichiti hapana nhengo yeMDC ichabvumidzwa kutungamira misangano yemakomiti kudzamara dzatambira VaEmmerson Mnangagwa semutungamiriri wenyika. Komiti iyi yange ichifanira kunzwa kubva kune vaimbove makomishina eZimbabwe Media Commission pamusoro pebhiri reZimbabwe Media Commission iro rave kutozeiwa neparamende. Sachigaro vekomiti iyi VaPrince Dubeko Sibanda veMDC vaudza Studio 7 kuti nhengo dzekomiti yavo kubva kuZanu PF dzaramba kuti vatungamire musangano pamwe nekuti musangano wacho uenderere mberi. VaSibanda vati mangwana chaiwo vange vachifanira kuita musangano neveMedia Institute of Southern Africa-Zimbabwe pamusoro pekuvandudzwa kwemitemo yezvekufambiswa kwemashoko asi musangano uyu hauchaenderera mberi. Vati vamisa misangano yese yekomiti iyi kudzamara vatungamiriri weparamende vagadzirisa zvinhu. Imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi kubva kuZanu PF, VaWebster Shamu, vati nyaya yakonzera kuti musangano usanderere mberi inyaya yekuti nhengo dzeMDC hadzitambite hutungamiriri hwaVaMnangagwa. Imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, VaRegai Tsunga veMDC, vati makakatanwa aya ave kukanganisa basa reparamende uye nyaya iyi inofanira kugadziriswa. Nhengo dzeZanu PF dzave nemasvondo maviri dzichivhiringidza misangano yemakomiti anotungamirirwa neMDC. Nyanzvi yemutemo zvakare vachidzidzisa paUniversity of Zimbabwe muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku vati Zanu PF iri kukanganisa chose uye nhengo dzeZanu PF dzinofanira kurega paramende ichiita basa rayo. Vati hapana chakaipa pane zvinoitwa nenhengo dzeparamende dzeMDC zvekubuda mudare kana VaMnangagwa vapinda kana kurega kupinda mudare kana varimo vachiti ndozvinotarisirwa kuitwa nebato rinopikisa. Rimwe gweta, VaKudzayi Kadzere, vaudza Studio 7 kuti nhengo dzeZanu PF dziri kutotyora mutemo. Vanoongorora nyaya dzematongerwo enyika, vachishanda nesangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedzisayi Runhanya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvave kuitwa nenhengo dzeparamende dzeMDC kushambadza nyaya yeMDC yekuti haibvumi hutongi hwaVaMnangagwa. Dr Ruhanya vati semaonero nyaya iyi yave kuda kuti VaMnangagwa naVaNelson Chamisa vataurirane pahuviri hwavo kuti vagadzirise dambudziko iri. Zvichakadai komiti inotungamira paramende yeStanding Rules and Orders Committee iyo yaita musangano nhasi wekugadzirisa nyaya iyi haina chayabuda nacho sezvo nhengo dzeMDC dzabuda mumusangano uyu dzichiti hadzibvumirani dedanho range rave kuda kutorwa nekomiti iyi. Zvinonzi komiti iyi inotungamirirwa nemutauriri weNational Assembly, Advocate Jacob Mudenda, yange yave kuda kuumba komiti ichaongorora maiitiro enhengo dzeMDC muparamende. No media source currently available

headline: Chirwere cheCovid-19 Chonetsa Mumajeri
text:
Bazi rinoona nezvekuchengetwa kwevasungwa mumajeri reZimbabwe Prisons and Correctional Services, ZPCS, raramba kuzivisa huwandu hwevasungwa vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika panguva iyo vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika mumajeri vari kuti dambudziko reCovid-19 ranetsa zvikuru mumajeri ari munyika. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri weZPCS munyika, VaPeter Chaparanganda, avo vakanga vavimbisa kutipa huwandu hwevasungwa vane chirwere cheCovid-19, vadududza nhasi vachiti tipihwe nachiremba mukuru wemajeri, Dr Evidence Gaka. VaChaparanganda varamba kutipa nhamba dzaDr Gaka vachiti vanoda
kutanga vataura navo asi vazodzima foni yavo vasati vatipa nhamba
dzacho. Asi svondo rakapera Dr Gaka vakaudza bepa nhau reHerald kuti vari
kushushikana nehuwandu hwevasungwa vari kubatwa mumajeri nechirwere cheCovid-19 vachiti muChinhoyi vasungwa gumi nevatatu vainge vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Mutauriri weZPCS mudunhu reMashonaland West, VaPeter Kondowe,vati
mumwe musungwa abatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvakwidza huwandu kusvika pagumi nevana. Kunyange nzvimbo inochengeterwa vasungwa muChinhoyi iine vasungwa gumi nevana vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19, vashandi vepo vanoti huwandu uhwu hunogona kunge hwuri pamusoro sezvo manhamba evasungwa vanenge vabatwa nechirwere ichi asingaziviswe kune vashandi vose. Kusaburitswa kwemanhamba kunonzi kwakamboita kuti vamwe vashandi
varambe kukwira motokari imwechete nevasungwa kuenda kumatare
edzimhosva vachiti vanofamba netsoka sezvo pari pedyo vachityira
kutapurirana chirwere cheCovid-19. Asi zvinonzi vakazokwira motokari imwechete mushure mukunge vashandi
vayambirwa kuti vakatizwa nevasungwa vachaiswa panguva yakaoma. VaKondowe vati vanofunga kuti huwandu hwevasungwa vari kubatwa
nechirwere ichi hwakawanda muChinhoyi nekuda kwekuti matare
edzimhosva ekuKaroi akambovharwa vasungwa vakawanda vakaendeswa
kuChinhoyi.

Panyaya yenhomba yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19, VaKondowe vati
vasungwa, vanochengeta vasungwa, pamwe nemhuri dzavo vanosvika makumi mashanu nevana vakabayiwa nhomba pazororo reEaster chete. Pajeri reMutimurefu rekuMasvingo zvinonzi kune vasungwa makumi manomwe nevasere vakabatwa chirwere cheCovid-19 masvondo maviri akapfuura. Zvinonzi mujeri reRemand muHarare vasungwa vakawanda vari kurwara
nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvekuti vaimbove meya weguta reHarare, VaJacob Mafume, vakabata chirwere ichi pavakambosungwa vakaendeswa kuremand mwedzi mishoma yapfuura. Mukuru wesanganore Zimbabwe Association for Crime Prevention and
Rehabilitation, VaEdison Chihota, vati vari kushushikana
nevasungwa vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 vachiti hurumende
inofanirwa kuburitsa vamwe vasungwa sezvayakavimbisa. VaChihota vati vasungwa vanofanirwa kubayiwa nhomba nekukurumidza
sezvo vachipinda nekubuda nguva dzose mujeri. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nevaimbove gurukota rezvehutano, Dr Henry Madzorera,
avo vanoti vasungwa vanopara mhosva diki vanofanirwa kubhadhariswa
fayindi uye kuti vasungwa vapihwe mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso kuitira kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba.

Hurumende yakazivisa kuti pane vasungwa vanosvika zviuru makumi maviri nezviviri kana kuti 22 000 mumajeri anofanirwa kunge ayine vasungwa zviuru gumi nezvisere kana kuti 18 000. Tatadza kubata gurukota rezvemitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, kuti tinzwe kuti
danho rehurumende rekudzikisa huwandu hwevasungwa mumajeri richaitwa riini. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu zviuru zvitanhatu nezana
nemakumi mashanu nevanomwe kana kuti 6157 vakabayiwa nhomba yekutanga nezuro izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga pazviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvitatu zvine mazana mana nemakumi mashanu nevana kana kuti 123 454.

Bazi iri rakazivisawo kuti nezuro hapana munhu akafa nechirwere
cheCovid-19 izvo zvakaita kuti vanhu vafa nechirwere ichii varambe vari
chiuru chimwechete nemazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nevashanu kana kuti 1525. Vanhu gumi nemumwe chete vakabatwa nechirwere ichii
nezuro izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechichere cheCovid-19 pazviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matatu nevana kana kuti 36 934.

Vanhu vachiri kurwara nechirwere ichi vava mazana matanhatu nemakumi
mashanu nemumwechete kana kuti 651.

headline: Vanozvibatira Mabasa eMaoko Votambira neMufaro Kuvhurwa kweNzvimbo dzeKutengesera muHarare
text: Kanzuru yeguta reHarare inoti boka revanorarama nekuzviitira mabasa emaoko ravhurwa zvakare muguta iri asi pachiteverwa zvakasimba mitemo yezvehutano yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Kanzuru yazivisa nezvekuvhurwa kwemusika weCopacabana Traders Mall, uko vachange vachitengesera mumusika uyu vachange vachibhadhara madhora mashanu emari yekuAmerica pazuva. Kanzuru yazivisawo kuti musika mukuru weMbare wave pedyo nekuvhurwa zvichitevera kuvandudzwa kwawanga uchiitwa kuti ufambirane nenyaya dzekuchengetedzwa kwehutsanana. Vanorarama nekutengesa vanoti vanotambira nemufaro kuvhurwa zvakare kwenzvimbo dzekutengesera uku vachiti vazhinji vavo vanga vave kunonga svosve nemuromo kubva pakadzikwa mutemo unorambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Mukuru wesangano reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vanoti vanotambira danho iri nemufaro asi vanofunga kuti madhora mashanu ari kunzi vanhu vabhadhare pazuva imari yakawandisa. Asi mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vaudza Studio 7 kuti musika weCopacabana Traders’ mall hausi pasi pekanzuru yeHarare izvo zvinoita kuti vasave nechekuita nekutarwa kwemari dzinobhadharwa nevanhu pazuva. Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru weSurvival Vendors Union of Zimbabwe, VaObey Mwariwangu, vatiwo sesangano vanotambira danho rekuvhurwa zvakare kwemisika iri, asi vanoona sekunge mitemo yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19 yakanyanya kuomera vanhu. VaMwariwanguu vanoti vanotengesa ava ndivo vachange vachitarisirwa kutenga voga mishonga inouraya hutachiwana pamwe nema face mask, izvo vanoti zvinogna kudhurira vakawanda. Hatina kukwanisa kubata varidzi veCopacabana Mall kuti tinzwewo divi ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Makambani eZvicherwa Anoti Haakwanise Kuwedzera Vashandi Mari yeMihoro
text: Makambani aya anoti akatarisana nematambudziko munyaya dzemutengo wemagetsi, kuwanikwa kwemari yekuwedzera mabasa pamwe nezvimwe zvaanoshandisa zvisiri kuwanikwa. Ongororo yakabuda nemusi weMuvhuro inotarisa mamiriro ezvinhu munyaya dzezvicherwa inonzi “State of the Mining Industry Survey” inoti makambani ose anochera zvicherwa, kusanganisira Anglo Platinum, Caledonia Mining Corporation nemamwe, haakwanise kuwedzera vashandi mari gore rinouya. Makambani aya anoti akatarisana nematambudziko munyaya dzemutengo wemagetsi, kuwanikwa kwemari yekuwedzera mabasa pamwe nezvimwe zvaanoshandisa zvisiri kuwanikwa. Asi vashandi vari kuchema chema vachitiwo zvinhu zvavaomera sezvo mitengo yezvinhu iri kuramba ichiita chamurambamhuru. Gore rapera mari inotambiriswa mushandi yepasi pasi yakawedzerwa kusvika pamadhora mazana maviri ane makumi mana nematanhatu emadhora. Kunyange hazvo vemakambani vari kuti zvinhu zvavaomera, mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvezvicherwa, VaFred Moyo, vakaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kuyedza napose pavanogona kudzikisa mitero kumakambani aya kuti awane chouviri. Asi zvinhu zvinenge zvaramba zvakaitawo manyama amire nerongo sezvo kambani yeZesa yave kuda mari pamberi kubva kumakambani aya kuti ikwanise kubhadhara magetsi ayiri kutenga kuEskom yekuSouth Africa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutungamiri weChamber of Mines, VaToendepi Muganyi, sezvo vanzi vange vari mumusangano. Mutungamiri wesangano revashandi reNational Mine Workers' Union of Zimbabwe, VaNdodana Sithole, vanoti vari kushungurudzwa nemashoko ekusawedzerwa mari kwevashandi. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vave Kufa neCovid-19 Hunokwira Panguva Iyo Chirwere Chadzika Midzi Munyika
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neMuvhuro kuti huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwasvika pamakumi masere kana kuti 80, zvichitevera kushaya kwevamwe gumi. Bazi iri rakatiwo huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose hwakanga hwakwira kusvika pazviuru zvina nemakumi manomwe nevashanu, kana kuti 4 075, mushure mekunge vanhu zana nemakumi mashanu nevana, kana kuti 154 vawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi. Vanhu vapona kubva ku Covid-19 vanonzi vakanga vasvikawo pachiuru nemakumi mashanu nevanomwe, kana kuti 1 057. Vanhu vose vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi ndevaya vanonzi vagara vari munyika, vasina nhoroondo yekumbobuda munyika. Vanhu vanodarika chiuru nemazana maviri kana kuti 1 200, vanonzi vabatwa nechirwere ichi muHarare chete, izvo zvaita kuti rive dunhu ringanzi mwoyo wechirwere ichi pari zvino. Pasi rose Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica inoti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nemasere nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 18,300 000 vabatwa nwechirwere ichi, icho chaurayawo vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvina nemazana manomwe, kana kuti 694 700. Nyanzvi mume zvehutano vari chiremba kuCharlotte kuNorth Carolina muAmerica, Dr. Simbiso Ranga, vanoti kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi pamwe nekufa nacho zvinhu zvinoshungurudza zvikuru. Dr. Ranga vanoti izvi zvave kureva kuti vanhuwo zvavo pamwe nhurumende vanofanirwa kuongorora zvakare nzira dzavari kushandisa mukudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi kuti vaone kana dziri kushanda sezvinotarisirwa. Vanokurudzirawo vanenge varasikirwa nehama dzavo kuburukidza nechirwere ichi kuti vatore matanho akasimba anoita kuti vasatapurirwe chirwere kubva kumufi, anosanganisira kusageza mufi, uye kupfeka nhumbi dzinodzivirira kutapuriranwa kwehutachiwana. No media source currently available

headline: MISA Yoshora Hurumende neKuvhiringidza Internet VaChamisa Vachiita Musangano kuHighfield
text: Sangano reMISA Zimbabwe riri kushora hurumende nedanho rainonzi yakatora nemusi weSvondo kukanganisa masaisai einternet kuti vanhu vasaone nekunzwa zvaitaurwa nemutungamiri webato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change VaNelson Chamisa. VaChamisa vaiparura hurongwa hwekutsvagira nhengo dzavo rutsigiro musarudzo dzemaby-elections muHarare. Mukuru weMISA Zimbabwe VaTabani Moyo vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakaitwa nehurumende kutyora zvibvumirano zveUnited Nations uye zveAfrican Union zvinoti kudzima madandemutande kutyora kodzero dzevanhu. MISA Zimbabwe inoti madandemutande eZOL, Telecel Zimbabwe neNetOne, Liquid Telecom neUtande ainge asiri kushanda sezvinotarisirwa. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaKindness Paradza vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende iri kuzorwa mafuta enguve yaisina kuduya vachiti haina kuvhiringidza dandemutande reinternet. MISA Zimbabwe inoti izvi zvinombitwawo kunyika dzakaita seNigeriam Tanzania, Eswathini, Zambia, DRC, Uganda neCameroon. MISA inoti aka hakasi kekutanga hurumende ichiita izvo sezvo yakambozviita muna 2019.

headline: Dr Mahomva Vokurudzira Vanhu Kuti Vabayiwe Nhomba yeCovid-19 Apo Vakawanda Vobatwa neChirwere Ichi Zvakare
text: Mukuru anoona nezvekurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 munyika Dr Agnes Mahomva vari kukurudzira vanhu munyika kuti vabayiwe nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire zvakanyanya munyika. Dr Mahomva vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti ongororo dzose dziri kuitwa munyika nekunze dziri kuratidza kuti vakabayiwa nhomba vane mukana wakakura wekurarama kunyangwe vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Bazi rezvehutano rakatozivisa kuti mhando yeCovid-19 inopararira zvakanyanya yeomicron yave kutotenderera munyika. Nemusi weSvondo, bazi rezvehutano rinoti munhu mumwe chete akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro zvasiya vabatwa nacho vave zviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nemumwe kana kuti 4, 701. Vanhu mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nevatatu kana kuti 523 vabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatwa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zana rezviuru nemakumi matatu nepfumbamwe zvine makumi mana nematanhatu kana kuti 139, 046. Vanhu mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi manomwe nemana zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevana kana kuti 3 874 694 vakabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kekutanga. Vanhu vabayiwa kaviri sezviri kukurudzirwa vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi masere nemana zvine makumi mana nemashanu kana kuti 2 884 045. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba mukupefra kwemwedzi uno kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana.

headline: Kanzuru yeHarare Yosendeka Parutivi Chibvumirano CheNzvimbo Yekurasirwa Marara yePomona
text: Kanzuru yeHarare nemusi weChina yakagara dare rakakosha kana kuti “special council” ikabuda nechisungo chekuti ikanzure chibvumirano chayaamboia chekupa kambani yeGeoGenix BV basa rekugadzirisa nzvimbo inorasirwa marara yePomona. Chibvumirano ichi ndechemari inodarika mamiriyoni mazana matatu nemakumi mana nemana kana kuti US$344 million. Kambani iyi inonzi inofanira kuvaka nzvimbo yekugaya magetsi nezvimwe kuPomona yoshanda kwemakore makumi matatu isati yadzosera nzvimbo iyi kukanzuru yeHarare. Kanzura weWard 16, Harare West VaDenford Ngadziore vatsinhira kuti vatora chisungo ichi nhasi. Vati paumbwa komiti yekuona kuti chibvumirano ichi chakafambiswa sei uye pachatorwa matanho api kana ongororora iyi yapera. Vaive vakabata chigaro chameya muHarare VaStewart Mtizwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kuda kuti chibvumiranwe chisatevedzerwa vanofanira kuuya negwara rekuti poitwa sei. Asi vachipawo pfungwa dzavo, mukuru werimwe sangano revagari reHarare Residents Trust VaPrecious Shumba vati chibvumirano ichi hachina kunakira vagari. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remumwe mukuru wekambani yeGeoGenix BV VaDelish Nguwaya sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Gurukota rezvematunhu VaJuly Moyo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi mumagwaro avo kudare zvichitevera kupikiswa kwenyaya iyi nemumiriri weHarare North, VaAndrew Markham, VaMoyo vakati vanotsigira chibvumirano chePomona vachiti, kambani yeGeorgenix yakevedza zvese zvinodiwa payakauuya munyika kuzoshanda nekanzuru nehurumende.

headline: Kanzuru yeGuta reHarare Inotara Nzvimbo dzeKubaira Vanhu Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Kanzuru yeguta reHarare yazivisa kuti ine nzvimbo makumi matatu neimwe, kana kuti 31, dzayakatara dziri mumisha inogara vanhu kuti dzinge dzichibairwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti kanzuru yavo, ichishanda nebazi rehutano, yakatora danho iri senzira yekurerutsira veruzhinji kuti vasafamba mitunhu yakareba kunobaiwa nhomba, uyewo kuitira kurerutsa dambudziko rekuungana kwevanhu vave kuda kubaiwa nhomba pari zvino. Nzvimbo dzaziviswa nekanzuru dzinoti: Braeside FHS Clinic, Hatfield Satellite Clinic, Sunningdale Satellite Clinic, Waterfalls Satellite Clinic, Tariro Satellite Clinic, Rutsanana Polyclinic, Western Triangle Satellite Clinic, Glenview Satellite Clinic, Glen View Polyclinic, Glen Norah Satellite Clinic, Budiriro Polyclinic. Budiriro Satellite Clinic, Mufakose FHS Clinic, Kambuzuma Polyclinic, Kuwadzana Satellite Clinic, Kuwadzana Polyclinic, Warren Park Polyclinic, Rujeko Polyclinic, Belvedere Satellite Clinic, Mabelreign Satellite Clinic, Marlborough Satellite Clinic, Avondale Satellite Clinic neMt. Pleasant Satellite Clinic. Mbare Polyclinic, Hatcliffe Polyclinic, Borrowdale Satelite Clinic, Highlands FHS Clinic, Eastlea FHS Clinic, Greendale FHS Clinic, Mabvuku Satelite Clinic, pamwe chete neHighfields Polyclinic. VaChideme vazivivasawo kuti zvipatara zviviri zvehurumende zvinoti Parirenyatwa Central Hospital neSally Mugabe Central Hospital, uyewo zvakazvimirira zvoga zvinoti Cimas Borrowdale Clinic ne Health Point zviri kubairwawo nhomba yekudzvirira Covid-19. Panyaya yekuti vamwe vari kutadza kubaiwa nhomba ivo vaswera vari mumitsetse, VaChideme vanoti dambudziko riripo nderekuti vakoti vaita vashoma zvichienzaniswa nehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubuda vachida kubaiwa, asi vanoti vanotarisira kuti dambudziko iri richagadzisirwa nekukasika. Vanovimbisawo kuti makirinika avo ane nhomba inokwanira vanhu vose vachiti vachawaniswa zvakare nehurumende imwe yenhomba mamiriyoni maviri yapinda munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Paramende Inopasisa Bhiri reRBZ Kuti Hurumende Itore Zvikwereti Zvayo Zvose
text: Dare reNational Assembly rapasisa bhiri reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe Debt Assumption iro rinopa hurumende mvumo yekutora zvikwereti zvese zvebhanga guru renyika. No media source currently available Banga iri rine zvikwereti zvinosvilka bhiriyoni nemazana matatu ezviuru zvemadhora. Bhiri iri rapasa mushure mekupopotedzana pakati penhengo dzebato reMovement for Democratic Change pamwe nhengo dzeZanu PF, MDC ichiti vose vane zvikwereti kuRBZ havafanirwe kuvhota. Zvichitevera kupopotedzana uku, dare razovhota uye nhengo dzeZanu PF zana negumi neshanu dzatsigira bhiri iri, nhengo makumi matatu nenomwe dze MDC dzapikisa bhiri iri. Vachitaura mushure mekuvhota uku, mumiriri weKuwadzana East, VaNelson Chamisa, vebato reMDC vati zvaitwa nedare zvakashata chose sezvo rabvumidza dzimwe nhengo dzeZanu PF dzakapihwa zvinhu neRBZ kuti dzivhote. Asi gurukota rezvamari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, avo vakaunza bhiri iri kudare vati kugunununa kwaVaChamisa nebato ravo hakuna maturo ose. Mumiriri weBulawaro Central, Amai Dorcus Sibanda, vati vasuwa nezvaitika sezvo veruzhinji vave kuzobhadhara zvikwereti zvakatorwa nenhengo dzeZanu PF. RBZ yakaita chikwereti ichi mushure mekutengera nhengo dzedare dzeZanu PF nevamwe vatsigiri vebato iri matirakita, motokari nezvimwe. Amai Sibanda vanoti vanhu vemudunhu ravo vanoda kuti wese akapihwa zvinhu neRBZ abhadhare kana kudzora zvinhu zvacho kana asingakwanise kubhadhara. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kuitwa nehurumende zvekutora zvikwereti zveRBZ zvakashata chose uye zvichaita kuti chikwereti chayo chirambe chichikura. Vatiwo izvi zvinokanganisawo mukana wekuti hurumende iwane rubatsiro rwemari kubva kune dzimwe nyika nemasangano anobatsira. Dzimwe nhengo dzeMDC dziri kukurudzira kuti nhengo dzebato dziri mudare reparamende dzibude zvadzo sezvo pasina zvido zve MDC zvadziri kumirira. Asi vamwe vashoma vanoti vacharamba vari muparamende vachimirira zvido zvevanhu vakavavhotera. Bhiri iri rave kuenda kudare reSenate uko rinotarisirwa kupasa nyore nyore sezvo Zanu PF ine nhengo dzakawanda kudarika MDC mudare iri. Kana rabva ikoko rinobva ranosainwa nemutungamiriri wenyika kuti rive mutemo.

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kuvanduza Mitemo Kuti MaIndustiri Asarambe Achivharwa
text: Vamwe vakuru vakuru vemaindasitiri vanoti kuve nemitemo isina kujeka uye kuchinja chinja kwemitemo ndizvo zvimwe zvezvikonzero zvikuru zviri kuita kuti kumutsiridza maindasitiri kunetse munyika. Pave nekubudirana pachena pasina kurova imbwa pakavigwa mupinyi pamusangano waitwa nhasi muBulawayo pakati pevemaindasitiri, vemabhizimisi negurukota remaindasitiri Doctor Sekai Nzenza. Mutevedzeri wemukuru wesangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, CZI, mudunhu reMatabeleland VaShepherd Chawira vaudza musangano uyu kuti gore rakapera kushanda kwemaindasitiri kwakadzikira kubva muzvikamu makumi mana nemasere kubva muzana kusvika pazvikamu makumi matatatu nezvitanhatu kubva muzana (capacity utilization fell from 48% to 36). VaChawira vati kuchinja chinja mitemo ine chekuita nezvehupfumi kunoitwa nehurumende ndechimwe chinhu chikuru chiri kuita kuti maindasitiri arambe achitatarika. VaChawira vati hurumende inofanirwa kukoshesa kumutsurudza makambani akaita seZiscosteel uye kuona kuti National Railways of Zimbabwe, neHwange zviri kushanda zvakanaka vachiti makambani aya akakosha zvikuru mukumutsurudza maindasitiri munyika. Vati kudomwa senzvimbo yeSpecial Economic Zone kwakaitwa nzvimbo dzemaindasitiri muBulawayo kwange kuchagona kubatsira kumutsurudza maindasitiri muguta iri asi hurumende yakachinja mitemo yavati yaive ichabastira kuti izvi zviitike. Mutevedzeri wemukuru wesangano reZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce VaGolden Muwoni avo vataurawo pamusangano uyu vatsinhirawo maonero aVaChawira vakati maindasitiri nemabhizimisi munyika ari kutatarika nekuda kwekuti mari yemuno haina simba vachitiwo hurumende inofanirwa kuita kuti izvi zvigadziriswe. VaMuwoni vati hurumende haifanirwe kuramba ichichema nerekuti zvinhu hazvisi kufamba zvakanaka munyika nekuda kwezvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru vakuru vehurumende nedzimwe nyika dzekumawirira. Vati kana hurumende ikagadzirisa nyaya dzezveminda zvinogona kubatsira kuti nyika iwane chikafu chakakwana zvobatsirawo kumutsurudza maindasitiri. Vamwe vataurawo pamusangano uyu vati kushomeka kwemagetsi nemafuta edzimotokari kuri kukanganisawo mashandiro akanaka emabhizimisi nemaindaistiri. Doctor Nzenza vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanonzwisisa chose matambudziko akatarisana nevemabhizimisi nevemaindasitiri. Vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti guta reBulawayo ridzokere pakuve muzinda wemaindasitiri akasiyana-siyana izvo vati zvinogona kubatsira kumutsurudza mamwe maindasitiri munyika yose. Vaenderera mberi vakati vane chivimbo chekuti kutaurirana sekwaitika pamusangano uyu kunobatsira kugadzirisa matambudziko ataurwa. Doctor Nzenza vati vachapira kudare remakurukota zvose zvakurukurwa pamusangano wanhasi. Vachitenda kuuya kwaDoctor Nzenza kuzosangana navo, mutevedzeri wemukuru weCZI VaJoseph Gunda vati hurumende inofanirwa kusiya tsika yekutaura zvaisingazoite vakatiwo vemabhizimisi nemaindasitiri vane chitsvambe chikuru chekuti vashande pamwe nehurumende kuitira kuti hupfumi hwenyika hugogadzikana. Musangano uyu uri kuuya apo maindustiri akawanda kuMatabeleland akatarisana nematambudziko makukutu. Kambani yeAnolle Castings and Engineering inoti inogona kuvhara nekushaya simbi dzekushandisa sezvo ZISCO isiri kushanda zvakanaka. Kambani yeFootwear and Rubber Industries (Pvt) Ltd yakatovhara muna Gunyana ikagumura vashandi mazana mashanu. CZI iri kuyambira kuti kushanda kwemaindastiri kunogona kuderera kusvika pazvikamu makumi maviri nemanomwe kubva muzana mukupera kwegore kana zvinhu zvikasagadziriswa nechimbi chimbi. Musangano uyu wange wakarongwa nesangano reCZI richishanda pamwe chete nebazi remaindasitiri. No media source currently available

headline: VaTrump Votemesa Vakawanda Musoro neKuramba Kutambira Sarudzo
text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaDonald Trump nemusi weSvondo vanenge vakatenda kekutanga kuti mutungamiri webato remaDemocrats VaJoe Biden ndivo vakakunda musarudzo dzemusi wa 3 Mbudzi kunyangwe havo vari kuti havasi kutambira zvakabuda musarudzo. VaTrump vakanyora mashoko avo pandemutande ravo reTwitter asi hapana kana humbowo hwavari kupa hwekuti sei vari kuti sarudzo hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka. Kunyangwe VaTrump vakaendesa nyaya dzimwe kumatare vachiti sarudzo hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka, zhinji dzacho dzakaraswa nematare nenyaya yekushaya humbowo. Vari kutungamira mabasa muhurumende iri kuuya yaVaBiden, VaRon Klan vanoti zviri kutaurwa naVaTrump hazvina nematuro ose uye hazvikanganise vaBiden kutungamira nyika. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika Doctor Gadziro Gwekwerere, vanoti zviri kuitika izvi zvinoshaisa nyika yeAmerica chiremera pasi rose uye zvino fanirwa kugadziriswa nechimbi chimbi. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoshorerwa Chinono paKuvandudza Mitemo Yakaita sePOSA neAIPPA
text: Nyika dzakawanda dzakabudirira dziri kuratidza pachena kuti hadzisi kufara nekukundikana kwehurumende yeZimbabwe kuvandudza mitemo inonzi iri kutyora kodzero dzevanhu uye yezvekudyidzana munyaya dzekutengeserana. Mumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe, VaBrian Nichols, vanyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter nhasi kuti pavanhu mamiriyoni gumi nematanhatu vari muZimbabwe, vanhu zana nemakumi mana chete ndivo vakatongerwa zvirango uye America ichabvisa zvirango zvakatemerwa vatungamiri venyika chete kuburikidza nemutemo weZIDERA ndokunge vaunza hutongo hwejekerere. Kushorwa uku kwapa kuti hurumende iite chipatapata kutumira makurukota ayo kuti aite misangano nevamiriri vedzimwe nyika vachitaura nezvemitemo yavanoti vari kuvandudza kusanganisa yakaita sePOSA neAIPPA. Nezuro gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, vakasangana nevamiriri veBritain neCanada kumahofisi avo eMunhumutapa. Gurukota rezvemitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vaudzawo Studio7 kuti vari kusangana nevamwe vamiriri vedzimwe nyika ava vachivaudza nezvavari kuita panyaya yekuvandudza mitemo. Vanoti vakatosangana nevamiriri kubva kunyika gumi dzakabudirira. No media source currently available Mutauriri wedare reparamende, VaJacob Mudenda, vari kuitawo zvimwe chetezvo. Asi vanopikisa nemasangano anoongorora zvemitemo akaita seVeritas vanoti hurumende iri kungobata vekunze kumeso nekuti hakuna zvakawanda zvairi kuvandudza. Mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri weMDC, VaTendai Biti, vanoti hurumende haina zvairi kuita kuvandudza zvinhu uye vachapikisa mabhiri ose achaunzwa kudare reparamende nekuti anopa hurumende mukana wekuramba ichimbunyikdza vanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Breaking...America Yotemera Zvirango Emmerson Mnangagwa Jnr neMudzimai waVaTagwirei
text: Hurumende yeAmerica nhasi yatemera zvirango mwanakomana wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa Junior naAmai Sandra Mupunga mudzimai weshoroma VaKudakwashe Tagwirei avo vagara vakatemerwa zvirango. Office of Foreign Assets Control kana kuti OFAC iri mubazi rezvehupfumi muAmerica inozivisa nezvezvirango izvi yati Mnangagwa Junior ndiye anomirira baba vake, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, mumabhizimisi avo mamwe avanodyidzana naVaTagwirei. Mumwe atemerwa zvirango ndi VaObey Chimuka vekambani inonzi Fossil Contracting inoshanda naVaTagwirei yakapihwa basa remari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi masere nemashanu emadhora kana kuti US$85 million yekuvaka besaniswa kana kuti Mbudzi Round About muHarare. Mumwe atemerwa zvirango ndiAmai Nqobie Magwizi vanoshanda nekambani yeSakunda yaVaTagwirei. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau, America yati yabvisa pazvirango vamwe vaiva makurukota vakaita saVaRugare Gumbo, VaIgnatius Chombo, Amai Flora Buka, VaChenhamo Chimutengwende nevamwe. Hatisati takwanisa kubata gurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende.

headline: Vasope neVamwe Vasingaone Zvakanaka Vobatsirwa neMagirazi Pachena
text: Mukuru weAlbino Trust of Zimbabwe, VaBrian Nyoni, vanoti vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matatu, 300 000, vachawana rubatsiro rwekupiwa magirazi okuverengesa pachena pachirongwa cheSight To the World. Sangano iri riri kushanda nebazi rezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare. VaNyoni vanoti chirongwa ichi chichabatsira vanhu vanemazera ari pakati pemakore makumi mana nemashanu, 45, nemakumi matanhatu nemashanu, 65. Vaendera mberi vachiti chirongwa ichi chichaendawo kumatunhu mashanu enyika kwemakore mashanu anotevera. VaNyoni vatiwo chirongwa ichi hachisi kunangana nevanhu vanorarama nehusope chete. Vaendera mberi vachiti zvakakosha kuti munhu wese apinde muchirongwa ichi pasina rusarura izvo zvinozoita kuti vanhu vaone kukosha kwemasangano anomirira vanorarama nehusope uye nekunzwisisawo matambudziko avanosangana nawo. Imwe nyanzvi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano isina kudomwa nezita yaudza Studio 7 kuti kune zvakawanda zvinokonzera kuti vanhu varware maziso uye vaendera mberi vachiti vanosanganawo nevana vari pasi pemakore gumi nemashanu, 15, vanenge vavhiringidzwa maziso nenzira dzakasiyana siyana. Vati rimwe donzvo rechirongwa ichi nderekudzikisa huhwandu hwevanhu vanoita tsaona pamigwagwa nenyaya yekusaona zvakanaka. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Chiripanyanga vatsanangura zvimwe zvezvirwere zvinokonzera kupofomara kwemaziso. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti kune vanhu vakawandisa vanoda magirazi okuonesa zvekuti vari kukurudzira varapwi kuti vaende kumakiriniki anosanganisira Sekuru Kaguvi iri paParirenyatwa Hospital, Norton Eye Hospital, Sakubva Clinic kwaMutare ne Richard Morris Hospital kuBulawayo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano hwemaziso ine mukurumbira pasi rose Dr Solomon Guramatunhu vanoti zvinorwadza kuona varwere vachishaya rubatsiro munyika, asi dzimwe nyika dzichisimbaradza zvipatara zvehurumende kuitira kuti veruzhinji vakwanise kubatsirwa.

headline: Munyori Mukuru weUnited Nations Okurudzira Kupera kweHondo muUkraine
text: Munyori mukuru weUnited Nations VaAntonio Guterres vaita musangano nemutungamiri wenyika yeUkraine VaVolodymyr Zelenskyy muguta guru renyika iyi reKyiv vakati kurwiswa kwenyika iyi neRussia kuri kupa kuti vanhuwo zvavo varasikirwe nehupenyu. VaGuterres vashanyira nzvimbo dzakaita seBorodianka, Irpin neBucha uko kwakawanikwa mitumba yevanhu vakaurayiwa pakabuda mauto eRussia munzvimbo idzi. Izvi zvakapa kuti vakawanda vati idzi dzitorwe semhosva dzehondo dzinofanira kuongororwa. VaGuterres vakurudzira Russia kuti ishande neInternational Criminal Court mukuongorororwa kwenyaya iyi. Vatiwo vari kuda kuti vanhu vemuUkraine vapihwe chikafu zvinova zvavati vakataurawo nemutungamiri wenyika yeRussia VaVladimir Putin. Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden vanotiwo vaendesa kuCongress chikumbiro chekuti vakwanise kutumira zvimwe zvombo nerubatsiro kuUkraine. Vanoongogora nyaya dzezvehupfumi VaMasimba Kuchera vanoti hondo iyi iri kukukonzera matambudziko makukutu kunyika dzakaita seZimbabwe dzi sezvo kunyika iyi kuchitengwa gorosi, chibage nemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. No media source currently available

headline: ZIMTA Inoti Covid-19 Yava Kupararira Kubva Muzvikoro Ichienda Kumisha
text: Rimwe sangano rinomirira varairidzi, reZimbabwe Teachers’ Association (ZIMTA) rinoti kunyange haro richirumbidza basa riri kuitwa nehurumende mukurwisa kupararira kwedenda reCovid-19 muzvikoro, zvikwanisiro zvishoma uye mari yezvikoro yekuti zvirwisane nedenda iri pamwe nekuchengetedza hutano hwevana vechikoro nevadzidzisi haisi kusvika kuzvikoro. Mutungamiri weZIMTA, VaRichard Gundani, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vana vechikoro vanofanirwa kupiwa zvikamu zvavo zvemushonga wenhomba uye zvikoro zvinofanirwa kupiwa zvikwanisiro zvose zvinodikanwa, vachiti chirwere ichi chavakupararira kubva muzvikoro chichiendeswa kumisha nevana vechikoro. VaGundani vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kushanda nesimba kuti panovhurwa zvikoro gore rinouya, vana vasazonzi vadzidze vari kudzimba dzavo, vachiti hurumende inogonawo kuchitanga kugadzirisa zvose zvinodiwa kana vana vechikoro vakazonzi vadzidze pamadandemutande vari kudzimba dzavo. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri webazi rezvedzidzo, VaTaungana Ndoro, vauza Studio 7 kuti hurumende iri kuzvirova dundundu nekuti irikugona kurwisa denda reCovid-19 muzvikoro. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzopesana naVaMthuli Ncube Mashandisiro Avari Kuita Mari yeNyika
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti hurongwa hwekushandiswa kwemari hwakaturwa muparamende nemusi weChina negurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, hadzisi kugutsikana nahwo. Mukuru wesangano ravana chipangamazano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaGodfrey Kanyenze, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kutaurwa naVaNcube hazvina musoro kana pakatariswa nyaya yekuti mvura haina kunaya zvakanaka mwaka uno pamwe nekutambura kuri kuita veruzhinji munyika. Vachitura hurongwa hwekushandiswa mari pakati pegore, VaNcube vakati vashandi vanotambira mari isingadarike zviuru zvishanu zvemadhara vachange vasisabatirwe mari yemutero. Asi mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaPeter Mutasa, vati kugadzirisa dambudziko rekushaya simba kwemari, hurumende inofanira kubhadhara vashandi nemari yekunze ichitorawo mitero yayo nemari dzekunze. Kunyange hazvo vashandi vachida kubhadharwa nemari yekunze, VaNcube vanogara vakataura kuti homwe yehurumende haina mari yekunze yekuti vakwanise kubhadhara vashandi nemari yekunze. VaNcube vakati mukushandisa kwavakaita mari vakasara nemari inoita mamariyoni mazana masere emadhora. Asi imwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi, VaMasimba Manyanya, avo vaimboshanda nebazi rezvemari, vati mashoko aVaNcube haatambirike pakatariswa huwandu hwemari inofanira kunge yakashandiswa mukurwisana nechirwere cheCovid-19. Munyori musangano rinomirira vanachiremba vadiki reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, VaEmmanuel Masosota, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvinovarwadza kuti VaNcube vanotambanudza muromo wavo vachitaura kuti vane mari yakawanda yavakasara nayo muhomwe yavo asi vanachiremba nanamukoti vasina zvikwanisiro zvakakwana kuti vakwanise kuita basa ravo zvakanaka. Mashoko aVaMasosota atsinhirwa nevaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidza, Doctor Henry Madzorera. Vachitura gwaro remashandisirwo akaitwa mari nenyika kusvika pakati pegore nemusi weChina muparamende, VaNcube vakati mari yakashandiswa zvakanaka zvekuti hapana chikonzero chekuti pave nekuwedzerwa kwemari mubhajeti renyika kana kuti supplementary budget vachiti hupfumi hwenyika huchaderera gore rino nezvikamu zvina nechidimu kubva muzana nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Asi vakati hupfumi uhu huchazosimuka nezvikamu zvinomwe kubva muzana gore rinouya . Mushandi mukuru anoona nezvehupfumi mubato reZanu PF, VaTafadza Muguti, vati havakwanise kutaura pamusoro pezvakaturwa naVaNcube mu budget review statement vachiti vari kuda kutanga vagara pasi sebato kuti vaongorore mashoko aVaNcube. VaNcube vakati hupfumi hwenyika munyaya dzekurima nekucherwa kwezvicherwa huchaderera zvishomanana gore rinouya kuburikidza nekunonoka kunaya kwemvura pamwe nekushayikwa kwemagetsi munyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti VaNcube vanogona havo kunge vakada kufadza nyika nekuratidza kuti mari haisi kungoshandiswa zvisina musoro, dambudziko riripo nderekuti VaNcube havangazvirovi dunhu vachiti vakachengetedza mari panguva iyo Zimbabwe isina zvikwanisiro munyaya dzekurwisana neCovid-19, vana mukoti navana chiremba vachiti vari kutadza kuita basa ravo nemazvo nepamusana pekushaya mari. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti kuita kwakadai kunoratidza kusarongeka kwehurumende inozviti mudura muzere nechikafu asi vanhu vasina chekudya. Studio7 haina kuykwanisa kunzwa divi raVaNcube panyaya iyi sezvo vanga vasiri kubatika panharembozha yavo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhukadzi Vokurudzirwa Kuita Mabasa eZvicherwa
text: Vanhukadzi vari kukurudzirwa kuti vaite mabasa ezvicherwa zvisinei nezvimhingamupinyi zvavakatarisana nazvo. Kururdziro iyi yaitwa pamusangano wekuzeya pamusoro pemikana nezvimhingamupinyi zvinosangana nevanhukadzi vari kuita mabasa ezvicherwa weWomen in Mining. Musangano uyu waitwa sechikamu chavhura gungano regore rino reMining Engineering and Transport Expo kana kuti Mine Entra. Mumwe mudzimai wechidiki ange ari pamusangano uyu, Muzvare Letenia Kwiripi, audza Studio7 kuti akatanga kuita zvekunhadzurudza matombo neivhu zvine goridhe gore rakapera mushure mekuwana shungu kubva kuna baba vake avo vane mugodhi wegoridhe. Muzvare Kwiripi vati kunyange hazvo vari kuwana cheuviri kubva pakuita izvi, dambudziko guru nderekuti vanoshaya kwekukwereta mari kuti vavandudze basa ravo vachitiwo havana ruzivo rwakakwana rwekuti vangawane kupi rubatsiro rwakadaro. Amai Letwina Nyagano, avo vanotungamira chimwe chikwata chemadzimai anoita zvezvicherwa kuNorton vaudza musangano uyu kuti vave nenguva vachida kuti vawane magwaro akakwana kuti vatange kuita zvekuchera goridhe asi vanoshungurudzwa nekusada kuvabatsira kwavati kuri kuitwa nevamwe vashandi vehurumende vari mubazi rezvezvicherwa. Gurukota rezvemadzimai nekuenzaniswa kwemikana, Amai Sithembiso Nyoni, avo vange vari munyarikani pachiitiko ichi, vaudza gungano iri kuti vanoziva chose kuti vanhukadzi vanosangana nezvimhingamupinyi zvakawanda kunyanya munyaya dzezvicherwa. Asi vati vanhukadzi havafanirwe kuwora moyo vachiti bazi ravo richishanda pamwe nemamwe mapazi ari kubatisra vanhukadzi vanoda kuita zvezvicherwa kana mamwewo mabhizimisi. Vati vose vanenge vavhiringidzwa nevashandi vehurumende vanofanirwa kuvamhang’arira kuvakuru vakuru vavo. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Mining Federation, Muzvare Henrietta Rushwaya, vati kunze kwezvimhingamupinyi zvavanosangana nazvo, vanhukadzi pachavo vanozeza kuvandudza mabhizimisi avo vachiti sangano ravo rine hurongwa hwekudzidzisa vanhukadzi vari kuita zvezvicherwa nevanoda kupinda mazviri. Musangano weWomen in Mining ndewechipiri kuitwa pasi pegungano reMine Entra. Gungano iri rinowanzoitwa muna Chikunguru wegore rega rega asi wakanonoka kuitwa gore rino nekuda kwesarudzo. Gungano iri rinoenderera mberi apo parinotarisirwa kuvhurwa neChina zviri pamutemo negurukota rezvezvicherwa, VaWinston Chitando. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Gumi neVatatu (13) Vofa neCovid-19 Mukutanga kweGore ra2022
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti mukutanga kwegore ra2022, vanhu gumi nevatatu vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya vafa nechirwere icho kubva zvachatanga kupararira muna 2019 vave zviuru zvishanu negumi nevanomwe kana kuti 5 017. Vanhu mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mashanu nevashanu kana kuti 955 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro zvasiya vabatwa nacho vave mazana maviri ezviuru negumi nevana ane mazana maviri negumi nevana kana kuti 214 214. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga vave mamiriyoni mana nezviuru zana nemakumi maviri nemapfumbamwe zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mashanu nemaviri kana kuti 4 129 952. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba kaviri vave mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru zana nemakumi mana zvine mazana matatu nemakumi mana nemashanu kana kuti 3 140, 345. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba katatu zvikuru vanoshanda muzvipatara, vakwegura nevamwe vane zvirwere zvinovaisa munjodzi yekurwara zvakaipisisa vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vave zviuru zvishanu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri nematatu kana kuti 5, 623. Bazi rezvehutano rine hurongwa hqwekubaya vanhu mamimiriyoni gumi nhomba kuti inyatsoshande zvakanaka. Hurongwa hwaivepo hwaive hwekuti izvi zviitwe mukupera kwaZvita gore rapera asi hazvina kubudirira.

headline: Vanoita zveChipfambi Vozeza Kunotora Mapiritsi kuZvipatara
text: Ongororo yakaitwa neCenter for Sexual Health and HIV/AIDS Research inoratidza kuti vanoita mabasa echipfambi vakawanda vave kutya kuenda kunotora mishonga yavo yeHIV/AIDS kana kunorapwa zvimwe zvirwere pamwe nekuwana dzidziso, sezvo vachiti vari kunyombwa kana kushungurudzwa nanamukoti. Ongororo iyi yakaitwa mushure mekuona vakawanda vevanhu ava vasisaendi kuzvipatara nemakirinika, zvisineyi kuti bazi rezvehutano nemasangano akasiyana siyana ari kukurudzira kuti vanhu vaongororwe hutachiwana pamwe nekuenda kunopihwa mushonga kana vachinge vawanikwa vainahwo. Vachitaura pamusangano wange wakarongwa neveZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights maererano neongororo yavo, vanoona nekufambiswa kwezvirongwa muCESHHAR, Amai Sibongile Mtetwa, vakati vanoita mabasa echipfambi vari kushungurudzwa pamwe nekupomerwa mhosva yekuparadzirwa hutachiwana hweHIV/AIDS. Vanoti ongororo yavo yakaitwa pasi pechirongwa che“Sisters With a Voice” yakaburitsa pachena kuti vanhu ava ndivo vanonekwa pekupedzisira kana vachinge vaenda kumakirinika. Vanoti semuenziso mumwe mudzimai akashungurudzika chose mushure mekuudzwa namukoti wepane imwe kirinika yavasina kuda kudoma kuti sei ainge achiita zvivindi zvekuuya kukirinika kuzotora mapiritisi asi iye akazvitsvakira hutachiwanda ega. Vanotiwo pane zvakawanda zvinoitika muzvipatara nemakirinika zvave kuita kuti vanoita zvechipfambi veregedze kuenda kuzvipatara izvi sezvo vachitya kunonyadziswa pamberi pevamwe varwere. Amai Mtetwa vanoti kuita kwakadai hakuna kunaka uye sangano ravo richishanda nebazi rezvehutano nemamwe masangano vave kushanda nanamukoti nevamwe vanoshanda muzvipatara kuti vabate vanhu ava pamwe nevarwere zvakanaka. Vanoti kana izvi zvikaitika vanhu vanosununguka kuenda kunotora mapiritsi avo eHIV/AIDS pamwe nekurapwa zvirwere zvepabonde. Ongororo iyi yakaratidzawo kuti pane vanhu vanoita zvechipfambi vanodarika zviuru makumi mashanu vakaenda kumakirinika eCESHHAR kubva muna2009 kusvika pari zvino uye zvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana zvevanu ava zvaive neHIV/AIDS. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti nyika haigoni kukunda muhondo yekurwisana neHIV/AIDS kana ikasapinza vanoita mabasa echipfamibi muzvirongwa zvayo zvekunwa mapiritsi anowedzera hupenyu ema anti-retorivals, kudzivirira chirwere ichi pamwe nekurapwa zvirwere zvepabonde. Sangano reNational Aids Council rinoti ririkubatsira vanoita mabasa echipfambi kuumba sangano ravo kuti vakwanis kuzeya nyaya dzavo pamwe nekurwira kodzero dzavo. NAC inoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu ava vapewo pfungwa dzavo maererano nezvinoitika mubasa ravo kuitira kuti vanogadzira mitemo vaumbe mutemo vachiziva zvinoitika mubasa iri. Mumwe anorarama nemabasa echipfambi akaita hurukuro neStudio 7 Amai Sharo Mazviwa vakati nhamo ndiyo inovasunda kupinda mumabasa aya Sachigaro wesangano reDoctors for Human Rights Doctor Rutendo Bonde vanoti kodzero dzevanhu ava dzinofanira kukosheswa. Chirongwa cheSisters With a Voice chinobatsira vanoita mabasa echipfambi nemapiritsi emaARVs, kuvarapa zvirwere zvepabonde, kuvapa dzidziso pamusoro pezvirwere izvi , kuvadzidzisa kodzero dzavo, pamwe nekuvakurudzira kuti vaende kuzvipatara kuti vandoongororwa hutano hwavo. No media source currently available

headline: VekuZimbabwe Vari Kushambadza Zvigadzirwa Zvavo kuBotswana Voronga Kuvamba Mabhizimusi Munyika Iyi
text: Vamwe vane makambani madiki ekuZimbabwe ayo ari kuratidzira pamusika wekutenga nekutengeserana weBotswana Consumer Fair muGaborone, kuBotswana, vanoti vari kutsvaga mikana nemazano ekuti vave nehushamwari navanamuzvinabhizimisi vemunyika iyi. Vanoti vari kurongwawo kutanga mabhizimisi munyika iyi sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzezvehupfumi muZimbabwe. Vamwe vataura neStudio7 mudhorobha reGaborone muBotswana vati kushaikwa kwemari kuri kuita kuita mabhizimisi avo asafambe zvakanaka. VaInnocent Dzumbunu avo vari kuratidzira pamusika wekuratidzira uyu vanoti shungu yavo kuwana wekuita mushandirapamwe naye muBotswana nekuti bhizimisi riri nani munyika iyi. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kutenderera kwemari munyika yeBotswana ndekwemhando yepamusoro soro zvichienzaniswa nezviri kuitika kuZimbabwe. VaDzumbunu vaudza Studio7 kuti kuva nebhizimisi muBotswana, iyo ine mombe dzinodarika mamiriyoni matatu nekuraudzira, kungavabatsira kuderedza mitengo yekugadzira zvinhu sezvo vanenge vowanira matehwe pedyo. Mumwe ari kuratidzira pamusika uyu ndiVaTafadzwa Gukwe avo vanogadzira mabhegi, bhutsu nezvikwama nematahwe emombe. VaGukwe, avo vari kuratidzira rwechipiri pamusika uyu vanoti vanhukadzi vakawanda vekuBotswana vanofarira kwazvo mabhegi echidzimai anogadzirwa nedehwe. Vachitaurawo neStudio7, Amai Gertrude Kachisi avo vanoita zvekusona nekuruka madhoiri vanoti Botswana inyika ichakanakira vanamuzvinabhizimisi avo vachiri kukura. Amai Kachii vanoti basa rinogona kumira nenyaya yekuti vanenge vasina mari mumaoko yekuti vahodhe zvavanoshandisa mukusona nekuruka madhoiri avo. VaGeorge Chuma, nyanzwi munezvekutengesa nekutenga uye vachidzidzisa paGaborone University College of Law vanoti kushaikwa kwemari kungaita ruzhinji rwevemabhizimisi madiki vakundikane. Musika wekutengeserana weBotswana Consumer Fair uyu wave nemakore gumi nematatu uchiitwa. Vanhu vanouya pamusika uyu vanotombodarika zviuru makumi matanhatu mukati mevhiki rimwe chete. Musika wekuratidzira uyu wakatanga neMuvhuro uye uchapetwa nemusi wa 2 Gunyana. Nyika dzakawanda dzinoratidzirawo gore negore. No media source currently available

headline: Mabhanga Otanga Kupatsanura Mari dzemaRTG's neDhora rekuAmerica
text: Mabhanga emunyika anoti atanga kutevedzera kurudziro yeReserve Bank of Zimbabwe yekuti apatsanure mari dzeReal Time Gross Settlements kana kuti RTG’s nemari dzekunze dzakaita semadhora ekuAmerica, marhanzi, mapula nedzimwe mari. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi hadzisi kuwirirana kuti izvi zvingashande here. Gavhuna weRBZ, Doctor John Mangudya, vakapa vemabhanga kusvika neMuvhuro kuti vange vatanga kupatsanura maRTG’s nemari dzimwe dzekunze kana kuti Foreign Currency Accounts-FCA. Vanotengesa zvinhu kunze vakafanana nevarimi vefodya nevanotengesa zvicherwa vachavhura inonzi Nostro Account, inopinda mari dzinenge dzakweretwa kunze. Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvinokwanisa kuvhurawo FCA kusanganisira vemasangano akazvimirira, uye vanenge vapihwa mari dzekubatsirikana nevari kunze. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vaimbova mutungamiri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaCallisto Jokonya, vanoti VaMangudya vabaya dede nemukanwa. Hurumende inotiwo yakawana mari kubva kuAfreximbank kuti RTGs iti gedye nedhora rekuAmerica.
