Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paNelson Mandela Metropolitan University, Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, vanoti kupatsanura mari yeRTGs nedzimwe mari munongedzo wekuti hadzina kuenzana. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nevaive gurukota rezvehupfumi vari nhengo yeMDC muparamende, VaTendai Biti. Muzvinafundo Mugano vanoti hurumende inofanira kuuya negwara rakasimba kuona kuti yatengesa zvinhu kunze. VaBiti vanotiwo zvaitwa neRBZ kuderedza huremu hwemari yemaRTG’s kuteya nzou neriva. Mukuru webhanga reCABS, VaSimon Hammond, vaudza bepanhau reHerald kuti vatotanga kugadzira hurongwa hwekupatsanura mari dzinoiswa mumabhanga. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaMangudya sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha ravo.

headline: VaMnangagwa Vowedzera Dr Mangudya Mamwe Makore Mashanu Vari Gavhuna weRBZ
text: Mukuru wedare remakurukota Doctor Misheck Sibanda vanoti mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vawedzera nemakore mashanu temu yagavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe Doctor John Mangudya. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau VaSibanda vati izvi zvakatanga musi wa 1 Chivabvu mwedzi uno. Izvi zvaitwa pasi pemutemo weReserve Bank Act. VaMangudya vakatora chigaro ichi kubva kuna VaGideon Gono muna 2014. VaMangudya vakamboshanda kuRBZ kwemakore gumi senyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi kusvika muna 1996 vasati vaenda kunoshanda kubhanga reAfrican Export-Import Bank kana kuti Afrexim.

headline: Hurumende Yotenda Kuti Kushaya Simba kweMari Kwopa Kuti Vari Pamudyandigere Vaomerwe neHupenyu
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, vatenda kuti mari dziri kuwedzerwa vari pamudyandigere neNational Security Authority kana kut NSSA kutanga mwedzi uno hadzikwani nekuda kwekushaya simba kwedhora asi vachiti havo atsunya arwa. VaMavima vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende ichaita zvose zvainogona kuona kuti mari iyi hairambe ichishaya simba. Vatiwo vari kutambira mari yepasi vanenge vachiwana mari inosvika madhora makumi matanhatu ekuAmerica asi pachishandiswa chikero chemari chiri pamutemo kwete zviri kuitika pamukoto vakati mari iyi inosvika pamadhora mazana matatu kune vakabatirwa mari dzakati wandei vachiri kushanya. Mari idzi dziri kutangira pamadhora makumi matanhatu ekuAmerica asi pachishandiswa chikero chiri pamutemo kwete mari dzepamukoto. Vari pamudyandigere vane makore akawanda vachichema chema kuti mari kutambiriswa haisi kuvakwanira zvopa kuti vanonge svosve nemuromo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vatendawo kuti mari iyi ishoma zvichinyanya kukonzerwa nekuti dhora remunyika riri kutengeswa nemari inodarika mazana maviri emadhora padhora rekuAmerica kana kuti 1”200. Vatiwo vemabhizimisi vakawanda vanotengesa zvinhu vachishandisa chikero chemaei yepamukoto. Munyori mukuru wesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaJaphet Moyo, vatiwo vari pamudyandigere vachiri vakaomerwa nehupenyu sezvo mari iyi isingakwane kuti vatenge kana mishonga chaiyo kana vave kurwara. Munyori mukuru werimwe sangano revari pamudyandigere reAssociation of National Social Security Retirees Trust, VaGideon Shoko, vatiwo panotanga kubatwa zvimwe zvirehwa rehwa nevemabhanga mari iyi ishoma. Vatiwo haisvike pane inotarisirwa kuti mhuri irarame pamwedzi kana kuti Poverty Datum Line Vashandi vemumakambani nemuhurumende vanobatirwa mari pamwedzi neNSSA kuti vazopihwe kava vave pamudyandigere kana kuremara vari pabasa. Asi kwemakore vashandi vagara vachichema kuti huori hunotyisa hunoitika muNSSA hunopa kuti itadze kuvapa mari dzekuti vakwanise kurarama. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Makumi Matatu neVashanu Vofa neCovid-19 neMusi weChitatu
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu makumi matatu nevashanu vakashaya nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemusi weChitatau zvasiya huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi hwave zviuru zvitatu nemazana manomwe negumi nemumwe kana kuti 3, 7011. Vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemumwe kana kuti 1, 091 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatwa nacho kusvika parizvino vave zana rezviuru negumi nevatatu nemazana mashanu nemakumi maviri nematanhatu kana kuti 113, 526. Vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mana nemakumi maviri nevana kana kuti 1, 424 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvasiya vapora vave zviuru makumi masere nemaviri zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemana kana kuti 82 994. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi mananemazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevasere vabayiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kekutanga. Vabayiwa kechipiri sezviri kukurudzirwa vave zviuru makumi masere nemakumi matanhatu nematatu zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nevanomwe kana kuti 863, 667. Hurumende inoti ine chinangwa chekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuti ishande zvinotarisrwa

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoshorerwa Nyaya yeGukurahundi
text: Apo VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vari kugadzwa kuve mutungamiri wenyika, vakawanda vanoti VaMngangwa vanofanirwa kutora mukana uyu vogadzirisa nemazvo matambudziko emunyika uye kuyananisa vanhu vose, pamwe nekuba pachena nekukumbira ruregerero kuvanhu vakatadzirwa nehurumende yaVaMugabe iyo VaMnangagwa vakanga vari nhengo inokosha. Murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, Muzvare Nozipho Moyo, vanoti kwavari kugadzwa kwaVaMnangagwa kuve mutungamiri wenyika kwakafanana nekuenderera mberi nehutungamiri hwaVaMugabe vachiti vaviri ava vakafanana. Muzvare Moyo vanoti VaMnangagwa ndemumwe wevatungamiri vebato reZanu PF vane chekuita nekuurayiwa kwevanhu mumatunhu eMatabeleland neMidlands panguva yeGukurahundi. Mumwe mugari wemuBulawayo uyo akangozvidoma nezita rekuti Chirandu anotsinhirawo achiti vanhu vanogona kukasika kufara vachitambira hutongi hutsva hwaVaMnangagwa, asi vozoona kuti makudo mamwe chete naVaMugabe. Vamwe vanoti mumamwe mashoko avakataura kuvatsigiri vavo neChitatu, VaMnangagwa vakatadza kutora mukana wekuratidza kuti vanoregerera VaMugabe nemudzimai wavo, Amai Grace Mugabe, pamwe nevamwe vanhu vaisada kuti vave mutungamiri webato nenyika. Asi VaDidmus Dewa, vachitaura semuongoriri wezvematongerwo enyika anoshanda akazvimirira, vanoti mashoko aVaMnangagwa anofanirwa kunzwisiswa seaitaurwa nemunhu ange aine mufaro mukuru mushure mezvakaitika kwavari. VaDewa vanoti munhu wese anotarisira kuti VaMnangagwa vagadzirise zvakakanganiswa zvose panguva yehutongi hwaVaMugabe kusanganisira nyaya yeGukurahundi. Mutori wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira ega, Thelma Chikwanha, anoti VaMnangagwa vane mukana wakakura wekuyananisa vanhu munyika pamwe nekubuda pachena pamusoro penyaya yeGukurahundi senzira yekugadzirisa nyaya iyi. Asi VaMnangagwa vakaudza mapepanhau ekuBritain kare vachiti munhu chaiye anofanirwa kurovererwaa panyaya yeGukurahundi ndi VaMugabe pachavo sezvo vaive ivo mutungamiri wenyika panguva iyi. Izvi zvinotsigrwawo naVaMagura Charumbira vanove mutsigiri weZanu PF, avo vanoti VaMnangagwa pachavo munhu anodiwa nevanhu nekuti vane mutsa. Asi murongi wemabasa musangano reAbammeli Human Rights Lawyers Network, VaTineyi Mukwewa, vanoti zvakakosha kuti VaMnangagwa vave vanotaura nezvenyaya yeGukurahundi. Vanhu vanopfuura zviuru makumi maviri vanonzi vakaurayiwa panguva yeGukurahundi. VaMugabe havana kumboda kukumbira ruregerero panyaya iyi kunze kwekufananidza nguva iyi nekupenga kunogona kuitika kuvanhu. Vanhu munyika nepasi rose vakamirira kunzwa nekuwona zvichaitwa naVaMnangagwa mumazuva mashoma ari kutevera mukugadzirisa nyaya iyi pamwe namatambudziko akatarisana nenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoti Vane Makore Gumi neMatanhatu Vave Kukwanisa Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Bazi rinoona nezvehutano razkaivisa kuti vechidiki vari pakati pemakore gumi nematanhatu negumi nemanomwe vave kukwanisa kuti vatange kubaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 yemhando yeSinovac. Mugwaro ravo kuvatori venhau bazi rezvehutano rinoti danho iri rakatorwa mushure meongororo dzakaitwa uye nekurudziro kubva kusangano reZimbabwe Medicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe. Hurumende inoti yazivisa matunhu ose, zvikoro zvepamusoro, pamwe nenzvimbo dzinobayirwa nhomba kuti dzichitange kubaya nhomba vana vemazera aya. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano Dr Henry Madzorera, vanoti vazhinji havasati vanzwa nezveongororo yakaitwa iyi asi vachiti havo idanho rakanaka chose. Vakurudzirawo hurumende kuti ibudise zvakabuda muongoro iyi kuti vashandi mune zvehutano vaite basa vakasununguka uyevo kuti vezvehutano vakwanise kukurudzira vana ava kuti vabaiwe nhomba. No media source currently available Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo.

headline: Gamba reNyika, VaKenneth Manyonda, Vanoradzikwa kuNational Heroes' Acre
text: Gamba renyika, VaKenneth Vhundukai Manyonda, avo vakashaya svondo rapfuura varadzikwa panzvimbo inovigwa magamba enyika yeNational Heroes Acre muHarare, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachikurudzira makanzuru ekumaruwa kuti aise zvese zvinodiwa kukwezva vemaindasitiri nevemabhizimisi. VaMnangagwa varumbidza mushakabvu semurwi wehondo yesununguko, mumiriri wevashandi pamwe nemushandi wehurumende aida kusimudzira vanhu kuti vagare zvakanaka. Vati VaManyonda vakaratidza izvi pakurarama kwavo kwese vachiti vakaita zvirongwa zvakawanda zvekusimudzira vanhu kumaruwa apo vaimirira Bhuhera North muparamende, vachiti hurumende yavo yave kutevedza zvido zvavo nekuvaka maindasitiri pamwe nekumakwezva kuti aendewo kumaruwa. Vanoti nekuda kwaizvozvo, makanzuru ekumaruwa anofanira kuona kuti maGrowth Point ese ane zvikwanisiro zvinokwezva vemaindasitiri. Vatiwo mari inobva kuhomwe yeDevolution Fund inofanira kushandiswa pamabasa ekusimudzira hupenyu hwevanhu, vakatiwo vanhuwo vanofanira kutsigira hurumende mukusimudzira maruwa nekuvaka kunzvimbo idzi nekuita mabasa anoita kuti vagari veko vawanewo mari yakawanda. Vatiwo kumaruwa kunoda magetsi kuti kubudirire vachiti ivo pachavo vatove nezvirongwa zvekusimudzira vanhu nekuvawanisa mvura zvakaita sePresidential Borehole Drilling Scheme. Asi mutungamiriri wesangano rinomirira varairidzi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanhu kumaruwa vachiri kurarama hupenyu hwepasipasi izvo zvasingatarisirwi makore anodarika makumi mana nyika yawana rusununguko. Izvi zvatsigirwa nevanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakazvimirira, Dr Wurayayi Zembe, avo vati hazvigoni kuti kumaruwa kuve nebudiriro iwo magetsi achitonetsa mumaguta nemadhorobha. VaMnangagwa vati VaManyonda munhu akaziva kuti kutorerwa ivhu zvainge zvisina kunaka ndosaka vakazotanga basa rekuona kuti ivhu radzoka kuvanhu vari mumasangano anomirira vashandi pamwe nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika. VaManyonda, avo vakazvarwa muna 1934, vakave nhengo yemapato akaita seNational Democractic Party, ZAPU neZANU uyewo vakambotungamira sangano reAfrican Trade Union Congress. Pakapera hondo, VaManyonda vakave mumiriri weBuhera North muparamende kubva muna 1985. Vakaitawo mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, (Information, Posts and Telecommunications), vakazove Gavhuna wedunhu reManicaland vasati vaenda pamudyandigere. VaManyonda, avo vakashaya nemusi weChitatu chapfuura vari kuchipatara cheNew Marlborough Hospital, vave nemakore makumi masere nemasere (88), ndivo vange vave Ishe Nerutanga, uye vasiya vana vana. No media source currently available

headline: Mafuta eKufambisa Dzimotokari Oshaikwa muNyika
text: Pane mashoko ekuti Zimbabwe yasara nemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari asara munyika anokwana svondo rimwe chete chete sezvo Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe iri kutatarika kuwana mari yekunze yekupa vemagaraji kuti vatenge mafuta aya. Mune dzimwe nzvimbo dzakawanda munyika, motokari dzakawanda dzange dziri mumutsetse dzichitsvaga mafuta peturu nedhiziri. Izvi zviri kuitika kunyangwe hazvo mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakazivisa vanhu kwaZvimba, Mashonaland West neMugovera kuti mafuta aya harisi dambudziko. Hurumende yakambozivisawo kuti yainge yawana chikwereti chekutenga mafuta. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gavhuna weRBZ Doctor John Mangudya kuti tinzwe divi ravo sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto Doctor Joram Gumbo vanoti zvinhu zvinenge zvisina kumira zvakanaka kuRBZ panyaya yemari. Vati izvi zviri kukonzerwa nenyaya yekuti zvinhu zvinoda mari yekunze zvawandisa. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo negurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube avo vati mari yave kushomeka sezvo RBZ yave kubhadhara mari dzakawanda kune vanochera goridhe neplatinum. Vamwe vemakambani ekunze akaita seRio Zimbabwe vange voendesa RBZ kumatare idzimhosva nekukundikana kuvapa mari dzavo. No media source currently available

headline: Bazi rezveHutano Rinoti neSvondo Hakuna Akafa neCovid-19 Uye Vatanhatu Chete Ndivo Vakabatwa neChirwere Ichi
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu vatanhatu chete ndivo vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika yose pavanhu vanodarika mazana matanhatu nevaviri kana 602 vavhenekwa uye hapana kana mumwe chete akafa. Vanhu vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 ava vose havana nhoroondo yekumboshanya kunze kwenyika. Izvi zvave kureva kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi hwasvika pazviuri zvitanhatu zvine mazana mana negumi nevaviri kana kuti 6,412. Huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika huchiri pazana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu kana kuti 196. Vanhu vapora vanosvika zviuru zvishanu zvine makumi matanhatu nemumwe kana kuti 5, 061 zvichitevera kupora kwevanhu vashanu kuMashonaland East. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano nehama dzevafi dzinoti vamwe vanhu vari kufa vangadai vasiri kufa dai vashandi vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba vasiri kuramwa mabasa. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika vari gurukota rezvehutano VaConstantino Chiwenga vari kukurudzira vashandi ava kuti vadzokere kumabasa zvichemo zvavo zvichizeyiwa asi zvinenge zvakona n’anga murapwa achida. Sachigaro weHealth Services Board Dr Paulinus Sikosana vatendawo kuStudio 7 kuti hapana chati chafamba muhurongwa hwekuti vashandi mubazi rezvehutano vadzoke kumabasa. Mutungamiri wesangano revakoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnoch Dongo vanoti havasi kuzodzokera kumabasa kusvika zvichemo zvavo zvagadziriswa. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana maviri kana kuti 1, 2 million vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Vafa vasvika zviuru zviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemazana mana nemakumi matatu kana kuti 29, 430. Vapora vave kuda kusvika zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe zvine makumi matanhau nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 969, 000. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemashanu kana kuti 25 million.  Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana ne makumi masere nemaviri kana kuti 182,000. Vafa pasi rose vachidarika zviuru mazana masere zvine makumi mana nematatu kana kuti 843, 000. Vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nematanhatu nezviuru mazana mana kana kuti 16, 4 million.

headline: Vatungamiri veSADC Votarisirwa Kuparura Gwara reHupfumi
text: Vatungamiri veSADC neChitatu vari kutarisirwa kunyorerana chibvumirano chekuita mushandira pamwe pakugadzirisa maindasitiri kuitira kuti nyika dzavo dziwane pundutso. Chibvumirano ichi chiri kutarisirwa kuti chinge chiri chemakore makumi mana nemanomwe kubva muna 2015 kusvika muna 2063. Munyori weSADC, Dr Stergomena Lawrence Tax, vanoti chibvumirano ichi chikanyoreranwa, nyika dzemuSADC dzichabudirira zvakanyanya munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Hurongwa hwe SADC hwakanangana nekuumba maindasitiri, kuita mushandira pamwe mukutengeserana sezvinoitika mu European Union, pamwe nekukwenenzvera zvinotengeswa neSADC kuitira kuti zviwane mari yakawanda kana zvotengesa. Misangano yemakurukota navana mazvikokota yakatanga neMugovera senzira yekuronga hwaro hwemusangano wevatungamiri venyika idzi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Reserch Institute of Zimbabwe, VaProsper Chitambara, vanoti havaone Zimbabwe ichibuda nechouviri. Asi mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, VaDavison Norupiri, vanoti Zimbabwe ichakwanisa kubudirira ikashanda zvakanaka nedzimwe nyika. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVari Kufa neCovid-19 Hwoderara Asi Nyanzvi Dzinoti Haisi Nguva yeKupemberera
text: Apo huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nekufa nechirwere cheCovid-19 huri kuramba huchiderera, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kukurudzira vanhu kuti vasarivare nekuti chirwere ichi chinogona kudzoka zvakare zvine hukasha. Nemusi weChina mukuru anoona nezvezvirwere zvekutapuriranwa mubazi rezvehutano Dr Portia Manangazira, vanoti vanhu vanofanira kuramba vachitevedzera kurudziro iri kupihwa yekuzvidzivirira nekupfeka mamamasiki, kugeza maoko, kusaita magungano nezvimwe. Mukuru musangano reCommunity Working Group on Heath, VaItai Rusike, vatsinhirawo mashoko aya vachiti vanhu vanofanira kuramba vakangwarira kuti vasatapurirwe chirwere. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 3,7million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zviuru makumi mapfumbamwe nezvitanhatu zvine mazana manomwe nemakumi matatu nevaviri kana kuti 96, 732. Vapora muAfrica vadarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana maviri kana kuti 3, 2 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Dunhu reSADC ndirozve rine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 1,7 million. North Africa ine vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 pasi rose hwadarika zana remamiriyoni nemanomwe kana kuti 107 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zviuru mazana nemakumi manomwe nechimwe kana kuti 471 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemanomwe kana kuti 27 miillion. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 2,3 million. Vapora pasi rose vadarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu ana kuti 60 million. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi muNyaya dzeHutano hwePfungwa, Doctor Nzuzu, Vobatsira Vane Matambudziko eZvinodhaka Vari kuZimbabwe
text: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinogara muJacksonville mudunhu reFlorida muAmerica, Doctor Emmanuel Nzuzu, avo vanove nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano hwepfungwa pamwe nezvekubatsira vane dambudziko nezvinodhaka, vanoti vakazvipira kubatsira vane dambudziko rezvinodhaka vari kumusha. Doctor Nzuzu pari vari zvino vari kumusha kuZimbabwe uko vari kushanda nevanhu vane matambudziko ekutadza kusiya zvinodhaka zvakasiyanasiyana zvinosanganisira mbanje, mapiritsi nedoro, kuburikidza nekuita misangano. Doctor Nzuzu, avo vave nemakore anodarika gumi nemanomwe vachiita basa rekudzidzisa vane matambudziko nezvinodhaka kuburikidza nekushanda muzvipatara zvakasiyanasiyana pamwe nedandemutande ravo, vanoti vakaenda kuZimbabwe nekuona kukura kwedambudziko nezvinodhaka ravanoti rabata nyika. Vanoti kubva pavasvika kuZimbabwe muna Mbudzi, vaita misangano miviri muHarare, uye vane tarisiro yekuti vachange vachiita mimwe misangano kunze kweHarare. Doctor Nzuzu vanoti kune vanoda kubatsirwa vanokwanisa kuvabata panharembozha yavo yavari kushandisa muZimbabwe inoti + 263 776 505 052, kanawo kutsvaga bhuku ravo rakanangana nekubatsira vanenge vaine matambudziko ekukundikana kusiya zvinodhaka rinonzi, “How to Stay Sober”. Vanoda rubatsiro vanokwanisawo zvakare kuenda padandemutande ravo rinoti https://www.howtostaysober.info, apo vanhu vanogona kuenda vachiwana zvidzidzo zvekuti vangakwanise sei kusiya zvinodhaka. Doctor Nzuzu vakaberekerwa kuChipinge vakazoenda kuAmerica muna 2003. No media source currently available

headline: Kutongwa kweMhosva Kunovhurwa Nyika Ichikurudzirwa Kurwisa Huori
text: Mutevedzeri wemukuru wetatongi vematare edzimhosva, VaLuke Malaba, vanoti zvakakosha kuti vatongi vematare nemamwe mapazi ose ane chekuita nemitemo kusanganisira bazi rezvemitemo, mapurisa, pamwe nemagweta, vave pamberi mukurwisa huwori munyika. Vachitaura pakuvhurwa zviri pamutemo kwekotoro yekutanga yematare muBulawayo, VaMalaba vati zvakakosha kuti vebazi reJudicial Services Commission, kana kuti JSC, vashande pamwe nehurumende kuti pave nematanho akasimba mukurwisa huwori munyika. VaMalaba vati huwori hunokanganisa veruzhinji kunyanya varombo kuti vawane kutongwa kwakanaka panyaya dzavanounza kumatare, vakati veJSC vari mushishi kushanda nemapurisa pamwe nehofisi yemuchuchisi mukuru, pakuita chibvumirano pamusoro pemabatirwo anofanirwa kuita nyaya dzine chekuita nehuwori. VaMalaba vatiwo zvakakosha kuti vanhu vose vanenge vane nyaya kumatare vawane magweta anovamiririra uye kuti mari dzinobhadharwa kumatare epamusoro dzive dziri pasi kuitira kuti veruzhinji vakwanise kushandisa matare aya zviri nyore. Mamwe magweta ataura neStudio 7 varumbidza mashoko avaMalaba. Gweta, VaDumisani Dube, vati Justice Malaba zviri pachena kuti huwori huri kukanganisa zvakawanda munyika vakati Justice Malaba vagona pakusimbisa kuti huwori hurwiswe. Mukuru mukuru weZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaLizwe Jamela, kuchamhembe kwenyika vati semagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu sangano ravo rinotambira nemufaro mashoko aJustice Malaba ayo vati anoburitsa pachena kukosha kwakaita kuti veruzhinji vakwanise kuti nyaya dzavo dzinzwikwe mumatare pasina chinovhiringidza. Kuvhurwa zviri pamutemo kwekotoro yematare uku kwatanga nekufora kwaitwa nemagweta ehurumende nevanoshanda vakazvimirira pamwe nevatongi vemumatare epasi nevamwewo vashandi vehurumende vanoshanda kumatare edzimhosva vachiperekedzwa neband reZimbabwe Prisons and Correctional Services. Vamwe vagari vange vachiwona vati vafadzwa zvikuru nechiitiko ichi vachiti zvinobatsira kuti veruzhinji vazive mafambisirwo anoitwa zvematare emunyika. No media source currently available

headline: Masangano eVarairidzi Onyunyuta neHurongwa hweHurumende Hwekuchengeta paZvikoro vana Vakanyora Bvunzo dzeGrade 7
text: Mamwe masangano anomirira varairidzi munyika ari kunyunyuta nedanho rebazi redzidzo yepasi rekuti vana vakapedza kunyora bvunzo dzeGrade 7 svondo rino varambe vachienda kuchikoro kuitira kuti vadzidziswe nezvavachanosangana nazvo mberi, kana kuti “Life Orientation”. Sangano renhau repadandemutande, reZIMLIVE inoti sangano reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, rakati hurumende haina kunzwawo kubva kwariri payakatora danho iri. Ukuwo, sangano reZimbabwe Teachers Association, ZIMTA, ratiwo kunyange hurongwa hwehurumende hwakanaka, rinoona sekunge hurumende yakaona kuti vana ava vari kukasika kunyora bvunzo zvoita kuti hurumende ide kuramba iinawo vachiwana zvekuita. Mutauriri wesangano iri VaGoodwell Taderera vanoti havaoni vana vachizoramba vachienda kuzvikoro sezviri kutarisirwa nehurumende kana vachinge vatonyora bvunzo dzavo. Mutungamiri weAmalagamated Rural teachers Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure vanotiwo sangano ravo harina kubatwa naro nebazi redzidzo yepasi pahurongwa uhwu, vachiti danho iri rekudzidzisa vana remangwana ravo rangorohwa zvechibhubhubhu nehurumende sezvo varairidzi vacho vasina kumbudzwa kuti chii chavachange vachiita. No media source currently available VaMasaraure vanoti sesangano vanokurudzira kuti pane vekurongwa kwakakwana. Ukuwo mutungamiri weProfessional Educators Union of Zimbabwe, PEUZ, VaWilson Makanyaire vari kungoimbawo rwiyo rwumwechete rwekuti hurumende yakaita zano ndega isina kugara pasi nevashandi vayo, vanove varairidzi. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi VaTaungana Ndoro, vaudza Studio 7 kuti chirongwa chekuti vana veGrade 7 varambe vari pachikoro kunyange vakapedza kunyora bvunzo dzavo chakanangana nekuti vawane mukana wekudzidziswa nezvavachanosangana nazvo mberi, kana kuti “Life Orientation”. VaNdoro vanoti varairidzi vanofanirwa kunzwisisa kuti hazvirevi kuti kana vana vanyora bvunzo zvikoro zvave kubva zvavharwa.

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zvoronga Kuratidzira Pamberi peMusangano weUNGA
text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zviri kuronga kunoratidzira kuNew York, panguva ichaitwa musangano weUnited Nations General Assembly, UNGA, wechimakumi manomwe nembiri, uyo mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vari kutarisirwa kupinda svondo rinouya. Mumwe wevari kutungamira hurongwa uhwu, Muzvare Savanna Madamombe vanoti vane zvakawanda zvavari kunyunyuta nazvo zvinosanganisira kurambidzwa kuvhota kwevari kunze kwenyika uye kuti hurumende haisi kuzvipa mukana wekutaura nhuna dzavo. Muzvare Madamombe vanoti zvimwe zviri kuvashungurudza kushandiswa kwemari kwavanoti kusina kutsarukana munzendo dzaVaMugabe, avo vanonzi vari kutarisirwa kusimuka nechikwata chevanhu vanodarika makumi manomwe. Zvinonzi mumwe nemumwe wevanhu ava, avo vanonzi vanosanganisira mhuri yavo, anonzi achange achipiwa mari inoita chiuru nemazana mashanu emadhora semari yekushandisa pazuva. Gore roga roga zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinoungana muNew York zvichiratidzira panoitwa musangano uyu. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inopihwa $961 Million neIMF
text: Zimbabwe nhasi yatambira mazana mapfumbwamwe nemakumi matanhatu nerimwe emamiriyoni emadhora ekuAmerica (US$961m) kubva kuInternational Monetary Fund (IMF) pasi pechirongwa chesangano iri chekugadzirisa nyaya dzehupfumi munyika dzepasi rose uhwo hwavhiringwa nedenda reCovid-19. Izvi zvaziviswa negurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, pamwe nagavhuna webhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Dr John Mangudya. Mumashoko avo kuvatori venhau, vaviri ava vati zvaitwa neIMF izvi zvichasimbisa mari yemuno. Vati mari iyi ichashandiswa zvakajeka kutsigira mabasa ehutano, dzidzo, vanotambura, kusimudzira maindasitiri, mabasa ekurima, kugadzirisa migwagwa nezvimwe. Vati imwe mari yabva kuIMF, iyo yapihwa Zimbabwe pasi pechirongwa cheSpecial Drawing Rights, ichashandiswawo mukurwisa Covid-19, nyaya dzehutano, dzidzo nekubatsira vanotambura nezvimwe ichashandiswa kutenga nhomba. Asi mamwe mapato anopikisa munyika audza Studio 7 kuti VaNcube vanofanira kutsvaga mvumo yekushandisa mari iyi kubva kuparamende. Mumiriri weHatfield muparamende, Dr Tapwia Mashakada veMDC-T, vanove zvekaare gurukota rinoona nezvemari mubato iri vati zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe yawana ruyamuro rwekusimudzira hupfumi hwayo panguva ino yeCovid-19. Vatiwo chinodiwa chakakosha kuti mari iyi ishandiswe pajekerere. Vati dare reparamende rinofanira kuve nechekuita nekushandiswa kwemari iyi. Izvi zvatsigirwa nemutevedzeri wemutauririri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo, avo vaudza Studio 7 kuti paramende ndiyo inomirira vahu nekudaro ndiyo inofanira kugara pasi kuti mari iyi yoshandiswa sei. Vati vana veZimbabwe vanofanira kubatana mukuona kuti mari iyi yashandiswa zvakanaka. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubato reZanu PF sezvo mushandi mukuru mubazi rekuburitswa kwemashoko mubato iri, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yedu pataenda pamhepo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, vachishanda nesangano reLabour, Economic Devopment Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Dr Prosper Chitambara, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mari yabva kuIMF iyi hachisi chikwereti nekudaro inofanira kushandiswa zvine hungwaru. Vatiwo mari iyi inofanirawo kushandiswa panyaya dzekuvandudza mabasa emuvura nekugaya mumagetsi vachiti kana izvi zviripo vekunze vanouya kuzosima mari dzavo munyika. IMF yakapa nyika dzepasi rose mazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu emabhiriyoni emadhora ekuAmerica kuti dzisambaradze hupfumi hwadzo uhwo hwuri kuvhiringwa nedenda reCovid-19. Mune imwewo nyaya komisheni inoona nezvekushanda kwevatongi vematare munyika, Judicial Service Commission, (JSC),nhasi yaziviisa kuti bvunzo dzekutsvaga vatongi vapfumbamwe vedare repamusoro idzo dzakambomiswa zvichitevera kuvharwa kwenyika nekuda kwedenda reCovid-19, dzave kuzoitwa svondo rinouya kutnga musi wa30 Nyamavhvhu kusvika musi wa1 Gunyanya. Pane vanhu makumi matatu nevashanu vachapinda mubvunzo idzi vanosanganisira mukuru wevatongi vematare amajisitiriti, kana kuti Chief Magistrate, VaMunamato Mutevedzi. Muchiziviso chayo nhasi, JSC yati bvunzo idzi dzichaitirwa kuhotera yeRainbow Towers. Munguva ino yedenda reCovid-19, JSC inoti haisi kukurudziri veruzhinji kuti vaende kubvunzo idzi ichiti dzichange dzichiburitswa pamadandemutane ayo eFacebook neTwitter uyewo panhepfenyuro yeZimbabwe Broadcasting Corporation. No media source currently available

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri muSouth Africa Zvotaura nezveCoronavirus
text: Mutungamiriri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa nemusi weSvondo vakatora matanho akaomarara mukuyedza kurwisa pamwe nekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus chatekeshera pasi rose Vanhu makumi matanhatu nevana vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika iyi. VaRamaphosa vakazivisa kuti South Africa kutanga nemusi weChitatu inenge yave kuvhara mimwe miganhu yayo uyo kurambidza kushanyira kana kutambira vanhu vari kubva kunyika dzabatwa nechirwere ichi dzinosanganisira Italy, Iran, South Korea, Iran, Spain, Germany, US, Britain ne China. Zvikoro zviri kuvharwawo musi uyu uye vanhu vari kurambidzwa kuungana kusanganisirawo kumiswa kwemitambo. MuSouth Africa mune zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zviri kubatwa mumambure ezviri kuitwa kudzivirira chirwere ichi. VaOffice Jaka, avo vanobva kuKwekwe, vanoti vane chivimbo chekuti South Africa ichakwanisa kupedza dambudziko iri kunyange hazvo riri basa guru. Asi va Jaka vanoti varikunyanyo shungurudzika zvikuru, nevana vavo vaviri varikuita zvidzidzo zveElectrical Engineering kuChina. VaEmmanuel Mboti vanotiwo kunyangwe hazvo zvaitwa naVaRamaphosa zvakanaka, vichakanganisa hupfumi hwenyika yavo. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kumiswa kwemitambo kuchakanganisa kurarama kwevakawanda. Chimwewo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chechidiki, chinogara muSouth Africa, VaMunyaradzi Mukanyiwa, vanoti vanowirirana nemashoko ataurwa naVaMbote. No media source currently available

headline: Mapato eMDC Alliance neMDC-T Otarisirwa Kunetsana Pamusoro peZita
text: Pave nemaonero akasiyanasiyana pagakava ramuka pamberi pesarudzo dza2023 pakati pemapato eMDC Alliance neMDC-T pamusoro pezita rekuti MDC Alliance, zvichitevera mashoko emutungamiri weMDC-T, VaDouglas mwonzora ekuti vanogona kupinda musarudzo dz2023 vari pasi pezita rekuti MDC alliance. Mmwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaTendai Biti, vakazobudawo zvakare panhepfenyuro yeHeart and Soul Television vachiti bato ravo ringangopinda musarudzo riri pasi perimwe zita kuitira kuti nyaya yezita isazovakanganisa. Asi VaBiti vanonzi vakati vanofanirwa kuramba vachishandisa zita rekuti MDC, vozoisa rimwe mberi risiri Alliance kuitira kuramba vakabata rutsigiro rwavanga vaunganidza pasi peMDC Alliance. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaRejoice Ngwenya, vanoti VaMwonzora nebato ravo reMDC-T havafanirwe kuswera vachida kukambira zita rekuti MDC Alliance nekuti kubva zvakabuda mutongo wedare reSupreme Court uchiti MDC-T ndiro bato riri pamutemo, pamwe chete nekutora pfuma yose yeMDC Alliance, zvakatoratidza kuti mapato aya akasiyana. VaNgwenya vanoti MDC-T inofanirwa kuramba iri mudanga rayo, kwete kuti ide kukanganisa zvakare vari kumhanya vari mugwanza reMDC Alliance. Vanotiwo hazvizoshamisi kuona MDC-T ichipinda musarudzo ichinzi MDC Alliance, vachiti pasi peZanu PF chese chinhu chinogona kuitika. Vamwe vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGilbert Dzikiti, vanotiwo sezvo MDC-T riri iro bato rakaonekwa nedare reSupreme Court kuti ndiro riri pamutemo, zviri pamutemo kuti bato iri rive iro rinopinda mumubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance. VaDzikiti varambawo zvakare mashoko kana muono wekuti Zanu PF ndiyo ine chekuita nekunetsana kuri mumapato maviri aya, vachiti matambudziko ari muMDC haana kutanga nhasi asi kuti akakonzerwa nevaive mutungamiri webato iri, mushakabvu VaMorgan Tsvangirai mushure mekudoma kwavo vatevedzeri vavo vaviri, uye nekuda masimba kwevamwe vari mubato iri. No media source currently available

headline: Amnesty International Inoti Zimbabwe Irikuramna Ichityora Kodzero dzeVanhu
text: Sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reAmnesty International neChitatu rakaburitsa gwaro remamiriro akaita nyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu pasi rose rikati kodzero dzevanhu dzirikuramba dzichityorwa munyika dzakawanda kusanganisa Zimbabwe. Gwaro iri rinonzi Amnesty international 2014/15: The State of the Worlds Human Rights. Sangano iri rinoti hurumende yeZimbabwe iri kuenderera mberi ichityora kodzero dzevanhu nekuvaita kafiramberi uye kudzinga zvisiri pamutemo vanhu vakagara kunzvimbo dzakaita seChingwizi uye kupurazi reManzou kuMazowe iro riri kupihwa mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika amai Grace Mugabe. Nyaya yekusaitawo kuti mitemo yose ienderana nebumbiro idzva remitemo inonzi irikupawo kuti kodzero dzevanhu dzityorwe. Sangano iri rati mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe avo vanove sachigaro weAfrican Union neSADC vanofanira kuona kuti kodzero dzevanhu dzachengetedzwa. Chipangamazano muAmnesty international kuchamhembe kweAfrica VaSimeon Mawanza vanoti zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe igadzirise zviri kunetsa munyika izvi. No media source currently available Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaJonathan Moyo kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende. Asi tabata nhengo yePolitburo yeZanu-PF VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana avo vanoti mashoko eAmnesty International ndeemugotsi matsuro sezvo iri kunyora ichida kufadza hurumende dzekumawirira. Vanoti hurumende idzi dzakarimirana kumuganhu kubva zvayakatorera minda. No media source currently available Asi Amnesty International inoti haiwane rutsigiro kuhurumende idzi asi kubva kuvanhuwo zvavo.

headline: VaHaruzivishe Vanowanikwa Vaine Mhosva yeKukurudzira Mhirizhonga
text: Nhengo ye MDC Alliance National Executive Council, VaMakomborero Haruzivishe, vakawanikwa nezuro vaine mhosva yekukuridzira mhirizhonga uye kuramba kuteerera zvaitaurwa nemapurisa. Izvi zvaitika zuva rimwe chete mushure mekunge hurumende yeAmerica yabudisa gwaro rinoshora kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu muZimbabwe. Richinyora paTwitter paro, bato reMDC Alliance rinoti kuwanikwa kwaitwa VaHaruzivishe vaine mhosva, ndehumwe humbowo hwekushandiswa kwemitemo sechombo chekushungurudza vanopikisa. Gweta raVaHaruzivishe uye richishanda ne Zimbabwe Lawyers For Human Rights, VaKossam Ncube, vaudza Studio 7 kuti dare redzimhosva richapa VaHaruzivishe mutongo wavo uzere musi weChipiri, svondo rinouya. No media source currently available Asi, mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanonzwira VaHaruzivishe tsitsi nekuti vari kushandiswa nevanhu vekunze kwenyika.Vati VaHaruzivishe vanotumwa kuita zvinhu zvisingagoni kuitwa nevanhu ava kunyika dzavo. No media source currently available

headline: Dzimwe Nyanzvi Dzinoti Hapana Chichabuda Mukushanya kuZimbabwe kweNhumwa yeUnited Nations
text: Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vanoti vari kukatyamadzwa zvikuru kuona kuti gwaro rabudiswa nehurumende pamusoro pevanhu vachasangana nenhumwa yeUnited Nations, Amai Alena Douhan, hapana mapato anopikisa kana masangano akazvimirira. Amai Alena Douhan vari muZimbabwe mavari kutarisirwa kuongorora nyaya dzezvirango zvakatemerwa mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nevamwe vakuru mubato reZanu-PF, pamwe chete nemabhizimisi avanodyidzana navo. Amai Douhan vachitarisirwawo kuongorora nyaya yekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika. Gwaro rakabudiswa nehurumende rinoratidza kuti Amai Douhan vachangosangana nemakurukota ehurumende, vakuru veReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Zimbabwe Human Rights Commission naJustice Luke Malaba. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, vachidzidzisa zvematongerwo enyika paWellesley College, kuMassachusetts, Muzvinafundo Chipo Dendere, vanoti havaoni kuti rwendo rwaAmai Douhan pane zvaruchabudisa sezvo United Nations pachayo isina simba rekubvisa zvirango izvi, vachiti zvirango izvi zvakatemerwa neAmerica, pamwe nemadzisahwira ayo, anosanganisa Britain nedzimwe nyika muEuropean Union. Vanoti chingabatsira vakatemerwa zvirango ndechekuti vataure nenyika dzakatemera zvirango izvi, vachiti panoenda VaMnangagwa kuBritain apa, vanogona kutaura nehurumende yeko, vachiratidza chido chekugadzirisa zvinhu pakati penyika mbiri idzi. Muzvinafundo Dendere vanoti Amai Douhan vanozikanwa zvikuru pamusoro peongororo dzavanoita munyika dzinotyora kodzero dzevanhu, dzakaita seVenezuela, vachiti izvi zvinogona kukonzera kuti vakatemerwa zvirango muZimbabwe vasawana mukana wekumbotererwa nenyika dzakatemera zvirango izvi. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vokurudzirwa Kugwinyisa Muviri Kuti Vasarwarisa Vakabatwa neCovid-19
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti vanhu vanofanirwa kugara vakagwinyisa miviri yavo nguva dzose kuitira kuti kana vachinge vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19, vave nemukana mukuru wekupora kubva kuchirwere ichi. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vagare vachiita zvirongwa zvekugwinyisa miviri yavo nguva dzose kuitira kuti vave nehutano hwakanaka. Kugwinyisa muviri uku kunogona kuitwa nenzira dzakawanda, idzo dzinosanganisira kuita zvemitambo, kumhanya, pamwe nekufamba zvinoitakuti vabude, unova mucherechedzo wekuti huwandu hwemafuta ari mumuviri, hunenge huchideredzwa. Mumwe mudzidzisi wepachikoro chemapusoro soro, Doctor Tendai Charity Nhenga, vanoti pavakarwara nedenda reCovid 19 gore rino, vakapiwa mubhedha kwaMutare uko kwavakaona vanhu vaiva vapihwawo mibhedha vakange vaine miviri yakakurisa zvikuru. Doctor Nhenga vanoti pavakaziva nezvedenda iri gore rakapera, vakatanga kuita zvokufamba vachigwinyisa muviri wavo. Vanoti vane chokwadi kuti kusimbisa kwavaiita nyama dzavo kwakabatsira zvikuru mukupora kwavo. Doctor Nhenga vanoti mudzinza ravo mune vanhu vane mhumhu mukuru, pamwe nehuremu husingawirirane nehurefu hwavo. Vanoti vazhinji vevanhu ava vanorwara nezvirwere zveshuga, High Blood Pressure izvo zvinoita kuti vadhererwe nezvirwere zvakawanda, zvinosanganisira Covid-19. Mukuru weDepartment of Chemical Pathology paUniversity of Zimbabwe School of Medicine, Muzvinafundo Hilda Matarira, vanoti veruzhinji vanofanirwa kugara vachigwinyisa miviri yavo kuburikidza nekuita mitambo kana mabasa anoita kuti vabude dikita. Muzvinafundo Matarira vanoti kubudisa dikita mumuviri kunoita kuti tsinga dzinoendesa mweya kumapapu, dzigare dzakavhurika. Muzvinafundo Matarira vanoti paongorora yavakaita kuEpworth nemuHarare, zvakaonekwa kuti vanhu ava vaisaziva kuti denda reCovid 19 rinokwanisa kuparadzirwawo nevanhu vasina zvinoratidza kuti vane denda iri, asi vainaro, izvo vanoti zviri kuita kuti denda iri ripararire zvakanyanyisa. Sangano reDiabetic Association of Zimbabwe rinoti nepamusana pekuti vanhu vakawanda havaongororwi chirwere cheshuga, ndizvo zviri kukwidzawo matenda emoyo, hupofu, nekugurwa kwemakumbo zvokuti Covid 19 ikabata vanhu vakadai vasiri kutora mishonga, inokwanisa kuvauraya. Ongororo yakaitwawo zvakare nebazi rezvehutano inoratidza kuti munhu mumwe chete kubva muvanhu gumi munyika, ane chirwere cheshuga. Mutevedzeri wemukuru anoona nazvematenda asingatapuriranwe mubazi rehutano, Dr Justice Mudavanhu, vanoti hurumende ine hurongwa hwekupinda munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana ichichenjedza veruzhinji pamusoro pechirwre cheshuga nokuti zvakaonekwa kuti vanhu vanonyanya kuvhiringwa nedenda reCovid 19, vanhu vane zvirwere zveshuga, High Blood Pressure, uye nguva zhinji, vari vanhu vanenge vasiri pamishonga. Asi Dr Madavanhu vanoti chirongwa ichi chakambomiswa nekuda kwemitemo yakatarwa nebazi rehutano iyo isingabvumidze kuungana kwevanhu munguva ino yekurwisa Covid 19.

headline: VaTsvangirai Voita Misangano kuMashonaland East
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMovement for Democratic Change VaMorgan Tsvangirai kutanga nemusi weChishanu vachange vari mudunhu reMashonaland East kwemazuva matatu vachiita misangano nevatsigiri vavo. Bato reMDC-T rinoti VaTsvangirai vari kuitawo misangano iyi kugadzirira sarudzo dzemuna 2018. VaTsvangirai vachange vari paKotwa Growth Point neChishanu vozoita mumwe musangano wechipiri paMutoko Growth Point. Nemusi weMugovera, VaTsvangirai vachange vari kuMarondera kuRudhaka Stadium vasati vasimuka vakananga kuZaire Business Centre kuHwedza. VaTsvangirai mumwedzi yapera vange vachishanyirawo mamwe matunhu akaita seMatabeleland, Mashonaland Central neMasvingo. Mutauriri waVaTsvangirai VaLuke Tamborinyoka vanoti vanhu vakawanda vari kufarira VaTsvangirai vachiti vachavavhotera muna 2018. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kuzadzisa Zvivimbiso Zvaichapa Kune Vachatamiswa kuChimanimani neChipinge
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nhasi vasangana nemadzishe gumi nematatu ekuChimanimani neChipinge kuti vaonesane nezvekukosha kwekuti mhuri dzine misha yakaparadzwa neCyclone Idai dziendeswe kunzvimbo dzinofungidzirwa kuti hadzina kunyanya kutarisana nematambudziko akadai. Bepanhau reHerald rinoti hurumende yakatowana nzvimbo yekuendesa vanhu ava, kunyange hazvo risina kutaura kuti vachaendeswa kudunhu ripi. Kunyange hazvo hurongwa hwekutamisa vanhu uhwu huri kunzi hahusi kumanikidza vagari kutama, vamwe vagari vemumatunhu aya vanoti havasi kuzotambira kurudziro yekuti vasiye misha yavo iyi nezvikonzero zvakasiyanasiyana. Vamwe vanonzi vari kuti havasi kuda kusiya makuva emadzitateguru avo, vamwewo vachiti havasi kuda kusiya minda yavo, umo vanga vachikwanisa kurarama kuburikidza nekurima vachidiridzira nemvura iri mutunzizi twakavapoteredza. Vamwewo ndivo vanonzi vari kuti havasi kufara nedanho iri vachiti havana chivimbo nehurumende panyaya dzekutamisa vanhu idzi, vachipa semuenzaniso kwaChiadzwa nekuTokwe Mkorsi, uko kunonzi vanhu havasati vanyatsogarika. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo nenyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vachitungamira sangano reCentre For Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, avo vanoti zvakakosha kuti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa izadzise zvivimbiso zvainenge yapa kuvanhu. VaMaguwu vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kuvakira vanhu vese dzimba, kwete kuti pazowanikwa vebato reZanu PF chete vachibatsirwa. Vanotiwo nyaya yehuwori inofanirwa kutarisisiswa vachiti hazvishamisi kuti midziyo yekuvakisa nemari zvinogona kupedzisira zvatsakatika. Asi mumwe wevechidiki vebato reZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vanoti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa yakazvipira kuona kuti vanhu vayo vabatsirwa, saka mutungamiri wenyika aenda pauzima kunosangana nemadzishe. No media source currently available

headline: Vadzidzi Vakawanda Vovhiringirwa Dzidzo neCoronavirus muZimbabwe
text:
Vamwe vabereki vane vana vanofanirwa kunyora bvunzo dzakakosha
gore rino vanoti vari kutyira kuti vana vavo vacharasikirwa nenguva
yakakosha yekudzidza nekuda kwechirwere cheCoronavirus. Vanwe vadzidzi vari kuzvikoro zvepamusoro vari kuchemawo nerekuti havana mari yekuti vaite zvidzidzo zvavo zvepaiundaneti sezviri kukurudzirwa nehurumende.

Vamwe vabereki vataura neStudio7 vati hurumende inofanirwa kubuda
pachena panyaya yekuti dzidzo yevana vekuprimary nesecondary
ichaenderera mberi sei uye kuti vanofanirwa kunyora bvunzo vachaita
sei.

Mumwe mubereki ane mwana ari kufanirwa kunyora bvunzo dzeGrade7 gore rino, Amai Rudo Makamure, vati vanofunga kuti dai bvumzo dzaendeswa mberi.

Muzvare Tafadzwa Musika avo vanochengeta vana vemukoma wavo vari
muGrade 7 neForm 4, vatiwo kunyange hazvo vana vachigona kuverenga vari kumba, maverengero aya anosiyana nepavanenge vari kuchikoro. Vati dai bvunzo, kunyanya dzemuna Chikumi dzaendeswa mberi kuitira kuti vadzidzi vawane nguva yekugadzirira yakakwana.

Zvimwe zvikoro zviri kukurudzira kuti vabereki vatengere vana vavo nharembozha kana makombiyuta kuitira kuti vakwanise kudzidza vari kumba vachishandisa indaneti.

Mumwe mubereki, Amai Oster Magqoka, vati havazi vose vabereki
vanokwanisa kuwana mari yekutenga zvinhu zvakadai, uye kubhadhara mari
inodiwa pakushandisa indaneti. Amai Magqoka vatiti hurumende inofanirwa kupindira ichitaura pachena kuti nderipi gwara rinofanirwa kutorwa panyaya iyi.

Murongi wemabasa mumubatanidzwa weNational Association of School
Development Associations and Committees, NASDAC, VaBanny Manokora, vati hurumende inofanirwa kuenzanisa kukosha kwehupenyu hwevana uye kukoshakwedzidzo.

Mutungamiri wesangano reProgressive Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, VaTakavafira Zhou, vatiwo hurumende haifanirwe kuda kumhanyira kuti zvikoro zvivhurwe kana chirwere chichiri kutekeshera. VaZhou vati pane vadzidzisi vari kudzidzisa vana nenzira dzakadai seWhatsApp vakati zvakakosha kuti hurumende itsigire nekuvandudza hurongwa uhu.

Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi regurukota rezvedzidzo, VaCain Mathema,
panyaya iyi sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isingabatike. Asi VaMathema vanogara havo vakaudza Studio7 kuti havafi vakataura nayo nepamusana pezvirango zvavanoti zvakatemerwa hurumende yavo neAmerica. Asi vachipindura mubvunzo wekuti ndeapi matanho ari kutorwa mune zvedzidzo kwakatariswa chirwere cheCoronavirus, munyori mubazi rezvekufambiswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, vati hurumende iri kugadzira hurongwa hwakazara hwekuona kuti dzidzo ingaenderere mberi sei. VaMangwana vabvuma kuti vadzidzi vakawanda, kusanganisira vekumaruwa, havakwanise kudzidza vachishandisa indaneti vakati hurumende ichabudisa hurongwa hwainahwo panyaya iyi uyewo pakuti zvikoro zvichavhurwa riinhi.

Zvichakadaro, vamwe vaddzidzi vemuzvikoro zvepamusoro vari kuchemawo
nerekuti havazi kukwanisa kudzidza vachishandisa indaneti nekuda
kwekudhura kunoita nzira iyi.

Mumwe mudzidzi uyo angozvidoma nezita rekuti Tafadzwa ati vabereki
vakawanda havakwanise kubhadharira vana vavo mari yeindaneti nekuda
kwekuoma kwakaita zvinhu munyaya ndzemari munyika.

Mumwezve mudzidzi, Tabeth Magigwana, ati dai vemakambani enharembozha neindaneti achipa vadzidzi mutengo wepasi.

Mudzidzisi wezvidzidzo zvepamusoro munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vari
muongorori akazvimirira ega, VaFelix Chari, vaudza Studio 7 kuti
kushandiswa kweindaneti mukuita zvidzidzo zvepamusoro hakusati
kwasvika padanho rakakura muZimbabwe nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakasiyana-siyana.

Pari zvino zvikoro zvepamusoro zvemunyika zvakavharwawo senzira
yekuedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCoronavirus icho
chauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi manomwe nezvisere pasi rose, kusanganisira vanhu vana vemuZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoti Kutengesa Peturu neDhiziri paMukoto Kowedzera Kushomeka Kwawo
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemhando dzemoto, VaJoram Gumbo, vanoti chimwe chave kupa kuti mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari anyanye kushaika inyaya yevamwe vanhu vari kuhodha vachinotengesa peturu nedhiziri pamukoto. Asi VaGumbo vabvumawo kuti mari yekunze yekutenga mafuta aya ishoma kunyange hazvo vari kuyedza napose pavanogona napo kuti vawane mafuta anokwanira nyika nekukwereta pane dzimwe nguva. Mashoko aya anouya apo vakawanda vari kuchema chema kuti varara pamutsetse mumagaraji vakamirira kuti vakwanise kutenga mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. Vamwe vari kuchema chema kuti mabhazi awedzera mutengo vatyairi vachiti vari kutenga mafuta pamukoto. Nyika yave nemwedzi yakawanda isina mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari zvichikonzerwa nekutatarika kwakanyanya kwebhanga guru renyika kuti riwane mari yekuAmerica inodiwa kutenga mafuta aya. No media source currently available

headline: America Yobatsira Zimbabwe Kuti VanaChiremba naVanaMukoti Vasatapurirwe Zvirwere
text: Hurumende dzeAmerica neZimbabwe nemusi wenhasi dzakaparura chirongwa chemakore mashanu icho chakanangana nekudzivirira vanachiremba navanamukoti kuti vasatapurirwe chirwere cherurindi kana kuti TB. Chirongwa ichi chiri kuitwa nebazi rezvehutano nekuchegetedzwa zvakanaka kweavana nemamwe masangano akaita seveThe Union, Biomedical Research and Training Institute chiri kutsigirwa neveCenters for Disease Control vekuAmerica zvichiburikitsa nemari inopihwa nemutungamiriri wenyika yeAmerica pachirongwa chake chekurwisana neHIV chePresident’s Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief kana kuti PEPFAR. Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru weCDC muZimbabwe Amai Laurie Fuller vati vari kutsigira chirongwa ichi nekuti vashandi vezvehutano vakakosha uye zvakawonekwa kuti hapana change chiri kuitwa kuvadzviriri kubva kuchirwere cherurindi kana kuti TB. Amai Fuller vanoti vachashandisa miriyoni yemadhora nechidimbu pachirongwa ichi mugore rekutanga. Vange vakamirira munyori mubazi rezvehutano pachiitiko chanhasi, Dr Angela Mushavi vanoti chirongwa ichi chakakosha chose kuvashandi vezvehutano munyika. Vanoti vashandi vehutano vari padambudziko rekutapurirwa zvirwere vari pababsa uye chirongwa ichi chichaita kuti vagare vachiongororwa nguva nenguva. Mukuru wesangano reThe Union iro rine hunyanzvi mukurwisana nechirwere cherurindi, Dr Christopher Zishiri vaudza Studio 7 kuti sangano ravo richabatsira nehunyanzi hwaro mukuronga chirongwa chekudzidzisa vanachiremba navanamukoti kuti vakangazvidzivirire sei kubva kuTB. Vanoti chirongwa ichi chakakosha chose nekuti hapana ange ari kutarisa vanachiremba navanamukoti pamwe nekuona kuti vazvidzivirira here kubva kuTB. Chirongwa ichi chinotarisirwa kuitwa muzvipatara nemumakirinika munyika yose. Zimbabwe ndeimwe yenyika gumi neina dzinevanhu vakawanda vanotapurirwa chirwere cherurindi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti zvikamu makumi manomwe kubva muzana zvevanhu vane chirwere cherurindi vanenge vaine hutachiwana hweHIV/AIDS kozotiwo vanhu vazhinji vane HIV/AIDS vanofa neTB. No media source currently available

headline: Zanu-PF Yorambidza VaVan Hoogstraten Kupa Huchapupu Ichityira Kuti Vangafukura Hapwa paNyaya yeHwange Colliery
text: Nhengo dzeZanu PF nemusi weMuvhuro dzakaramba kuti muzvinabhizinisi, VaNick van Hoogstraten, avo vanove mumwe wevaridzi vekambani yemarasha, yeHwange Colliery, vape humbowo mudare iri. VaVanHoogstraten vaida kupa humbowo maererano nemafambisirwe ebasa mukambani iyi izvo zvisina kufadza sachigaro wekomiti yezvezvicherwa, VaTemba Mliswa, avo vazivisa kuti vanogona kusiya basa ravo. Godwin Mangudya anotipa nyaya inotevera. Kunze kwehurumende, VaVan Hoogstraten, ndivo vane zvikamu zvakawanda muHwange Colliery uye vange vakokwa neparamende kuti vazopa humbowo maerarano nemashandiro ekambani iyi sezvakaita vamwe asi izvi zvarambwa nenhengo dzeZanu PF. Nhengo dzeZanu PF dzakaita ruzha dzichiramba kuti VaVanHoogstraten vasape humbowo dzinosanganisira, mumiriri weBuhera West VaSoul Nzuma, mumiriri weChiredzi North, VaRoy Bhila, mumiriri weGutu West VaJohn Paradza. Nhengo idzi dzakapopotedzana nasachigaro wekomiti iyi VaTemba Mliswa avo vakati nhengo dzange dziri kusvibisa zita nechimiro chebato radzo sezvo izvi zvose zvange zviri kuitika mumaziso aVaVan Hoogstraten. VaVan Hoogstraten vakaratidza kusafara nezvange zviri kuitika uye vakati dai zvaibvira nhengo dzainge dziri kuita ruzha dzadzingwa mudare nenyaya yekurizvidza. Asi VaVan Hoogstraten vakaudzwa nenhengo idzi kuti harisi basa ravo kudziudza zvekuita. Mushure meawa rimwe rekukandirana makobvu nematete mabharani wedare reparemende, VaKenneth Chokuda, vakazokwanisa kudzima gakava iri pakatorwa danho rekuti VaVan Hoogstraten vachirega kupa humbowo sezvo nyaya kugadziriswa kana kuti Reconstruction yeHwange Colliery yave kumatare edzimhosva. VaMliswa vakatiwo zvakaitika hazvina kuvafadza zvachose uye vanoona sekuti hazviratidzi chimiro chakanaka chenhengo dzeparamende. VaMliswa avo vanozvimirira vati vakapihwa chigaro ichi neZanu PF uye zvinosuwisa kuti dzimwe nhengi muZanu PF hadzisi kuda kuti vari kuita huwori vasasikwe pachena. VaMliswa vakati vachataura nevakuru uye vachizivisa veruzhinji kuti vacharamba vari sachigaro wekomiti iyi here kana kuti kwete. Zvichakadai, VaVan Hoogstraten vakaudza vatori venhau kuti vachapikisa danho rakatorwa nehurumende rekuisa kambani yeHwange paReconstruction. Nyaya iyi yakaiswa kuHigh Court svondo rapfuura sezvinodiwa nemutemo weReconstruction Act, uye ndipo pachapihwa muakana vese vanezvikamu mukambani iyi wekupikisa kana kubvuma danho rakatorwa nehurumende. VaVan Hoogstraten vakati muHwange Colliery mune huwori hunotyisa zvekuti mukambani iyi muri kubuda mamiriyoni nemamiriyoni emadhora ekuAmerica asi pasina chiri kuuenda kuhurumende kana vamwe varidzi vekambani iyi. Vakati huwori hwakanyanya kukwira mukati memakore matatu apfuura apo gurukota rezvezvicherwa pari zvino VaWinston Chitando vaive sachigaro wekambani iyi. Vakati zvinhu zvakatombonyanya kuipa muHwange zvekuti pane imwe nguva vakatombokurudzira kuti mauto apinde mukambani iyi kuti apedze huwori hunotyisa hwainge hwoitika. VaVan Hoogstraten vakati kambani iyi iri kuita mibatanidzwa nemishandirapamwe nemakambani akawanda kubva kunyika dzakaita seChina uye kunyange ivo vaine zvikamu zvakawanda mukambani iyi havana chavari kuudzwa. Vakati hapana chingamutsiridze kambani iyi kunze kwekubvisa huwori uhwo vanoti hunozivikanwa nevatungamiriri venyika. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yotenga Michina yeMuzvipatara Inodarika Miriyoni yeMadhora ekuAmerica Isingashande
text: Komiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano nhasi iri kutarisirwa kushanyira chipatara cheParirenyatwa kuonoona michina yakanzi navanachiremba vakuru nezuro yakatengwa nehurumende asi isiri kushanda. Michina iyi yakanotengwa kuIndia nemutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano VaJohn Mangwiro, avo vatiwo vakatenga michina iyi vachibatsirana nevashandi vemuzinda weZimbabwe kuIndia. Vachitaura kukomiti iyi, vanachiremba vakuru vari pasi pesangano reSenior Hospital Doctors Association kana kuti SHDA vakati zvinhu zvichiri zvakaita manyama amire nerongo muzvipatara uye hakuna michina inodiwa kuzvipatara zvehurumende kuti ibatsire varwere. Mutungamiri weSHDA Amai Shingai Nyaguse vakati pamichina yakatengwa nehurumende iyi zvikamu gumi kubva muzana chete ndiyo iri kushanda. Amai Nyaguse vatiwo kunyangwe hazvo vamiriri vekambani yekuIndia kwakatengwa michina vakazodanwa kuuya munyika kuzoigadzirisa vakakundikana. Amai Nyaguse vakatiwo pamichina iyi, mizhinji yacho yakamboshanda uye yakatengwa kukambani isingazivikanwi. Vakapawo muenzaniso wekuti mimwe mibhedha yakauya inofanirwa kushandiswa pakusununguka kwemadzimai akazvitakura yakanyorwa kuti ishandiswe nemadzimai asingaremi zvinodarika makirogiramu makumi matanhatu nemashanu, vakati madzimai mazhinji munyika anenge akazvitakura anodarika huremu uhwu. Vachitaurawo kukomiti iyi, VaMangwiro vakaramba kuti michina iyi haisi kushanda vachiti mishoma chete ndiyo ine zvimwe zvaive zvisipo asi vakati zvinhu izvi zvakazogadzirwa uye vamiriri vekambani yekuIndia kwavakatenga michina iyi vari kuuya kuzoisa zvaive zvisipo izvi kuti itange kushande. Imwe nhengo yeSHDA, Doctor Bothwell Mbuvayesango vanoti zvipatara zvinofanira kupihwa mvumo yekuzvitengera michina yazvo. Vanachiremba ava vakaudzawo komiti yeparamende iyi kuti vanhu vazhinji vari kufa nekuda kwekushaikwa kwezvikwanisiro muzvipatara zvehurumende zvinodiwa mukurapwa kwavo. Vanachiremba vakuru ava vakapawo chichemo kudare reparamende kuti ribvise bhodhi rinovamiririra reHealth Services Board iro vanoti harimiririre zvido zvavo. Asi gurukota rinoona nezvehutano VaObadiah Moyo vakati kubviswa kweHealth Services Board kunonetsa kana pasina kuvandudzwa mutemo. VaMoyo vakabvumawo kuti zvinhu zvakaparara munyaya dzehutano vachiti kugadzirisa matambudziko aya kunoda mari yekunze iyo hurumende isina. Komiti inoona nezvehutano iyi yatiwo nhasi ichaenda kunozvionera pamhuno sefodya kuzvipatara zveParireyyatwa pamwe neSally Mugabe kuti zvinhu zvakamira sei chaizvo munyaya dzezvehutano, sezvo pasina kuwirirana nezvekuti michina iyi iri kushanda here kana kuti kwete. No media source currently available

headline: United Nations Yoshora Kupondwa kwaVaElvis Nyathi muSouth Africa
text: Sangano reUnited Nations rashora zvikuru kupondwa nekupiswa kwakaitwa chizvarwa cheZimbabwe kuSouth Africa VaElvis Nyathi muDiepsloot, Johannesburg svondo rapera. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau, vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru wesangano reUnited Nations muSouth Africa VaAyodele Odusola vashora zvikuru kupondwa kwaVaMoyo avo vakasiya mudzimai nevana vana vachiti zvinosuwisa kuti zvinhu zvakadai zvinoitika munyika ine bumbiro remutemo rinopembedzwa pasi rose. VaOdusola vati South Africa yakaisa ruoko rwayo pazvibvumirano zvakawanda zveUnited Nations zvinokurudzira kuremekedzwa kwekodzero dzevapoteri nevanhuwo zvavo nekudaro inofanira kuzviremekedza. United Nations yati inotambira zviri kuitwa nevamwe vatungamiri vehurumende yeSouth Africa zvekushora kurwiswa kuri kuitwa zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika. Mutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa vakaburitsa mashoko nezuro kumhuri yenyika yavo vachiti vasarwise zvizvarwa zvekune dzimwe nyika.

headline: Zviuru neZviuru Zvinoratidzira muAmerica Kusafara Kwazvo neMitemo yePfuti
text: Zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu zvaungana muguta guru remuAmerica, reWashington, pamwe nemamwe maguta zvichikurudzira kuti munyika mudzikwe mitemo yakaomarara pakupihwa kweveruzhinji mvumo yekutenga pfuti. Kuratidzira uku, ukwo kwanga kuchadaidzwa nerekuti "March For Our Lives" kwaitika munzvimbo dzinosvika mazana masere mumatunhu makumi mashanu ari muAmerica, asi hurongwa hukuru hwaitirwa muWashington DC. Vana vechikoro vanga vaine hama neshamwari vanodarika mazana mashanu ezviuru varatidzira muWashington DC , umo maona mimwe migwagwa pamwe nezviteshi zvezvitima zvichivharwa kuitira kuti kuratidzira uku kufambe zvakanaka. Kuratidzira uku kunotevera kupfurwa kwakaitwa vana vechikoro chepa Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School, muguta reParklands mudunhu reFlorida musi wa Kukadzi 14, 2018. Vana vechikoro gumi nevana, uye vamwe vashandi vepachikoro ichi vatatu, vakapfurwa vakafa musi uyu. Izvi ndizvo zvakatungidza moto wekuti vanhu vasimuke vachishora mitemo inobvumidza veruzhinji kutenga pfuti dzinoshandisa muhondo. Vakawanda vari kuda kuti mitemo ine chekuita nekutengwa kwepfuti iyi ivandudzwe, kuitira kuti vanhu vatange vaongororwa zvakasimba vasati vapihwa mvumo yekutenga pfuti. Vamwe vaungana muWashington vabva kumaguta akaita seLos Angeles, kuCalifornia, uko kune makiromita zviuru zvina nemazana matatu kubva muWashington. Mwana wechikoro, Edna Chavez, uyo ane makore gumi nemanomwe ekuberekwa, anoti abva kuLos Angeles kuitira "kuti izwi revana vechikoro rinzwike panyaya dzepfuti." "Ndagara hupenyu hwangu hwese kuLA uye ndarasikirwa nevadikani vangu vakawanda kuburikidza nekupfurwa nepfuti," adaro Chavez. "Wava mugariro. Mugariro zvekuti ndakatanga kudzidza kunzvenga mabara epfuti ndisati ndatanga kudzidzira kuverenga muchikoro." Apo vanhu vanga vachiratidzira, mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, vanga vari kuhotera yavo yembozha yeMar-a-Lago resort kuFlorida. Asi mutauriri weWhite House, Amai Lindsay Walters vaburitsa gwaro. "Tinoremekedza vechidiki vakawanda vemuAmerica varatidza hushingi hwavo kuburikidza nekushandisa kodzero dziri mubumbiro remitemo rinovachengetedza. Kuchengeta vana vedu vasiri munjodzi idonzvo guru remutungamiri wenyika, izvo zvakapa kuti vakurudzire paramende kuti igadzirise mitemo inobata mhirizhonga inokonzerwa nepfuti." Vadzidzi vari kuda kuti paramende igadzirise dambudziko iri, asi zvishoma ndizvo zviri kuitwa nenhengo dzeparamende sezvo pasina kuwirirana panyaya yepfuti idzi pakati penhengo dzeRepublican Party nedze Democratic Party. Vadzidzi ava vari kunyoresa kuvhota kuitira kuti vasavhotera nhengo dzeparamende dziri kuramba dzakaomesa musoro panyaya yepfuti dzapedza hupenyu hwevanhu vakawanda muAmerica. America iri kuita sarudzo dze mid-term congressional elections mwaka unotevera. Vatambi vane mukurumbira, George Clooney nemudzimai wake, Amal Clooney, vapa sangano reMarch For Our Lives mazana mashanu ezviuru zvemadhora, ukuwo Oprah Winfrey akabvisawo mari imwe cheteyo. Jeffrey Katzenberg, na Ellen DeGeneres vabvisawo zviuru makumi mashanu zvemadhora. Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muAmerica, Amai Danisai Maluwa, vanoti zviri kuitwa nevana vechikoro ava zvinhu zvinofanirwa kuremekedzwa nekuti ndivo vatungamiri vemangagwa vari kuona dambudziko rakatarisana nenyika. Vati vanovimba kuti kuratidzira kwaitwa uku kuchapa kuti nhengo dzeparamende dziite chido chekugadzirisa nyaya dzepfuti dzanetsa muAmerica. No media source currently available

headline: Harare Yopihwa Mari Shoma yeBudiriro Mumatunhu
text: Meya weHarare VaJacob Mafume vanoti pamari yechirongwa chekuendesa masimba kuamatunhu kana kuti devolution inodarika mabhiriyoni maviri, kanzuru yavo yakangopihwa mamiriyoni zana nemakumi mashanu kana kuti 150 million. VaMafume vanoti mari yavakapiwa kubva kuhurumende yematunhu ishoma zvikuru sezvo vakawana madhora mamiriyoni zana nemakumi mashanu chete. Vati kusauya kwemari iyi nenguva kuri kudzosera kumashure mabasa ekanzuru vachiti dai vakawana mari iyi vangadai vari kugadzirisawo nyaya dzemvura muguta nemamwe matambudziko. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi rezvemari sezvo tatadza kubata gurukota VaMthuli Ncube huyewo nharembozha yemunyori mubazi iri VaGeorge Guvamatanga yanga isingadairwi. Asin yaya yemari inofanira kupihwa kanzuru yeHarare pacchirongwa chiri mubumbiro remutemo rakavandudzwa muna 2013 iyi haina kunyatsojeka. Munyori mubazi rezvematunhu VaZvinechimwe Churu vakamboburitsa mashoko kuvatori vanhau vachiti imwe mari yaifanira kupihwa kanzuru munyaya dzebudiriro yaizenge yobhadhara chikwereti che Geogenix BV. Kambani iyi yakapihwa basa rekusimudzira mabasa pagomba rinorasirwa marara rePomona kuti igadzire magetsi nezvimwe kanzuru ichibhadhara isati yadzoserwa zvivakwe negomba iri kwapera makore makumi matatu. Asi VaMafume vakatsika madziro vachiti chibvumirano ichi hachina zvachinobatsira kukanzuru. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nhasi neverimwe sangano rinomiririra vagari reHarare Resident Trust ratambidza VaMafume tsamba yenyunyuto iyo iriku kurudzira kanzuru kuti ichidambura zvachose chibvumirano ichi. Mukuru weHarare Residents Trust VaPrecious Shumba vati vanoda kuti chibvumirano ichi chiraswe. VaShumba vatiwo sevagari vari kutarisira kuti kanzuru itore nzvimbo yayo yemarara yePomona. VaShumba vatiwo izvi zvikasaitwa, vagari vacharatidzira vachivharidzira mota dzekanzuru kuti dzirege kutakura marara anoenda kuPomona. Vati kanzuru kana isati yatora nzvimbo yemarara iyi inofanirwa kutsvaga kumwe kwekurasira marara kusiri kunzvimbo yePomona. Vachitaura mushure mekutambira tsamba yenyunyuto iyi VaMafume vati vanotsigirana nevagari vachiti chibvumirano ichi chakaipa zvikuru. VaMafume vatiwo tsamba yavatambira iyi inemasiginicha anodarika zviuru zvishanu vachitiwo izvi zvakakosha zvakanyanya uye zvinoratidza kuti kanzuru yavo iri kumiririra vagarai mukuramba kuenderera mberi nechibvumirano ichi. Pasi pechibvumirano ichi icho chakamboiswa padivi nekanzuru, kanzuru yeHarare inofanira kubhadhara kambani yeGeogenix BV makumi mana emadhora ekuAmerica patani yegayega yemarara anoendeswa kuPomona zvichireva kuti pakupera kwegore kambani Iyi inenge ichifanira kubhadharwa mari inodarika mamiriyoni masere emadhora ekuAmerica kana kuti 8 million.\n\nChibvumirano ichi, chakanyoreranwa nekanzuru nekambani yeGeogenix BV panguva yaitungamirwa kanzuru yeHarare nemakanzura eMDCT uye chakonzera mutauro wakanyanya munyika. Muneimwe nyaya, VaMafume nhasi vatambirawo zvipo zveMayors Cheerfund zvinosanganisira magumbeze, mibhedha nezvimwewo zvabva kuhotera yeBronte muHarare. Vakurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vakwanisewo kupa kune vanoshaya kuburikidza nekuisawo mari nezvipo muhomwe yeMayors Cheerfund iyo inozobatsira vanotambura muguta pamhemberero dzekisimusi. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Voshushikana neKuwanda kweVanhu Vari Kubatwa neCovid-19 Munyika
text:
Vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kushushikana zvikuru nekukwira kuri kuita huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Vanhu vakawanda vataura neStuduio7 kuChiredzi vanoti huwandu huri kubudiswa hwevanhu vari kubatwa neCovid-19 kwemazuva mana apfuura huri kuvatyisa sezvo guta iri raramba riri roga rine vanhu vakawanda vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi zvichienzaniswa nemamwe maguta mudunhu rose reMasvingo. Dzimwe nzvimbo mudunhu reMasvingo dziri kubuda dzisina kana munhu
mumwe chete anobatwa nechirwere ichi panoongororwa vanhu zuva nezuva. Musi wechipiri 8 Chikumi pavanhu gumi nemumwe vakawanikwa vaine
chirwere ichi mudunhu rose reMasvingo, vapfumbamwe vaiva vekuChiredzi
vaviri vari vemudhorobha reMasvingo. Musi weChitatu 9 Chikumi, pavanhu gumi nevapfumbamwe vakabatwa neCovid-19 mudunhu rose, vese vaiva vekuChiredzi uye nezuro musi wa 10 Chikumi, vanhu vapfumbamwe vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vose ndeve kuChiredzi.

Mumwe mugari wemumusha weTsvovani, VaMalcom Mugodzwa, vanoti vave kutyira hupenyu hwavo.

Mumwewo mugari wemumusha wekwa Zava, VaTiyani Chauke, vanofunga kuti guta ravo riri pedyo nemazambuko ekuenda kunyika dze South Africa neMozambique uko vagari vanobira zvisiri pamutemo nekudaro vanogona
kuuya nechirwere ichi.

Izvi zvatsigirwawo naMuzvare Nyasha Sigauke vachiti ivo hurumende
inofanira kuona kuti vanochengetedza mitemo vapinda mumisha
yemudhorobah iri kuitirakuti vanhu vatevedzere zvisungo zvekuti chirwere
ichi chaisapararire.

Hurumende yati iri kushushikanawo nekukwira kuri kuita chirwere ichi
muChiredzi kunyange hazvo kusati kwave nemunhu arasikirwa nehupenyu.

Mukuru webasa mubazi rezvehutano muMasvingo, Dr Amedus Shamu, vanoti hurumende iri kuita tsvakurudzo yekuti ione kuti chi chiri kukonzera kukwira kwechirwere ichi muChiredzi. Asi mutauriri wekomiti yeCovid-19 Task Force muMasvingo, VaRodgers Irimayi, vati kukwira uku kuri kukonzerwa nevanhu vari kubva kwakasiyana siyana vachinotsvaga mabasa ekukohwa nzimbe muminda yeTongaart Hullert nevamwe varimi. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vana vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika yese, uye vanhu makumi matanhatu nevana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere munyika yose vave zviuru makumi matatu
nezvipfumbamwe nemazana mana ane makumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu, 39 496. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vava chiuru chimwe chete nemazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri nevatanhatu, 1 626. Vanhu mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nevaviri vakaibawa nhomba
yekutanga nezuro izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevabaiwa nhomba yekutanga pamazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe ezviuru nemazana mana nemakumi mashanu nevavviri 690 452. Vanhu zviuru zvina nemazana mapfumbamwe nemamkumi mapfumbamwe nemumwe chete 4 991 vakabaiwa homba yepiri nezuro, izvo zvakasvitsa
vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yepiiri pa zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi mapfumambawe nezvipfumamwe nemakumi mashanu nevana, 399 054. Zimbabwe inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana, 60%,
zvevanhu vari munyika senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere
cheCovid-19. Kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe iine chirongwa ichi, nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti kubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kuchanetsa sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kutadza kubayiwa nhomba yekutanga munzvimbo dzakawanda, sezvo nhomba idzi dziri kushaikwa mumatunhu akawanda munyika. Zvichakadaro, hurumende yeAmerica yazivisa kuti ichabatsira Zimbabwe nemari yekurwisa denda reCovid-19 inotangira pamamiriyoni makumi manomwe nemashanu emadhora kusvika pazana nemakumi
mashanu emamiriyoni emadhora ekuAmerica. No media source currently available

headline: Zvicherwa neSarudzo Zvinokurukurwa muWashington paHurukuro dzeGlobal Press Institute
text: Sangano reGlobal Press nemusi weChina muWashington D.C., rakakokera hurukuro dzakanangana neZimbabwe munyaya dzekucherwa zviri kunze kwemutemo kwezviwanikwa nemakorokoza, pamwe nesarudzo, idzo dziri kutarisirwa kuitwa munyika gore rino. Hurukuro idzi, idzo dzaive pasi pechirongwa cheGlobal Press Influencer Series, dzakaitirwa paNewseum, pasi pedingindira rekuti “Zimbabweans Take Action”, kana kuti “Vana veZimbabwe Torai Matanho”, uye dzaitsigirwa nemasangano anosanganisira reNewseum Institute, neMetropolitan Group. Vakataura pamusangano uyu vanosanganisira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinoti mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Diaspora for Democracy Inc., VaCharles Mutama, Muzvare Wadzanayi Mhute veNew York Times, Muzvare Linda Mujuru veGlobal Press Journal, naMuzvare Cristina Maria Villegas, vanove mukuru anoona nezvezvicherwa musangano rakazvimirira rePACT. Muzvare Villegas vakati munyika dzese dzavakafamba pasi rose, Zimbabwe ndiyo ine zvicherwa zvakawanda asi zvisina anochengetedza nenzira dzingaite kuti zvibatsire veruzhinji. Panyaya yesarudzo, vatauri vose ava vakawirirana kuti mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanogona kukunda musarudzo idzi, vachiti dzichabiridzirwa pachishandiswa mauto. Vatauri ava vakatiwo kunyangwe mapato anopikisa akakunda, havaoni achipiwa mukana wekutonga. Muzvare Mujuru vakati vanoona sekunge VaMnangagwa vachakunda musarudzo, sezvo pasina vanopikisa vakasimba, uye pachiratidza sepasina gwara chairo mumapato anopikisa. No media source currently available

headline: VaTsvangirai Vanoti Vachaongorora Mhirizhonga Yakaitika Paivigwa VaMahlangu
text: Mutungamiri webato reMovement for Democratic Change, MDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vanoti bato ravo richaongorora nyaya yekuti pane vamwe vechidiki vebato ravo vakanganisa kuvigwa kwemumiriri weNkulumane muparamende, VaThamsanqa Mahlangu, neMugovera. Vachitaura kekutanga nezvenyaya iyi, VaTsvangirai vaudza Studio 7 kuti pane mashoko ekuti vamwe vakuru vemusangano vakatengera vechidiki doro kuti varwisane. Asi VaTsvangirai vati chikuru chakaita kuti vasaenda kumarinda eLady Stanley kunoviga mufi inyaya yekuti paive nekunetsana kwakanyanya mumhuri. Kunetsana uku kwakapa kuti VaMhlangu vachemerwe kudzimba nhatu. Pakuvigwa kwavo dzimwe hama dzainge dzisipo. Kunze kwekunetsana kwemhuri, painge paine kukandirana makobvu nematete pakati pevechidiki veMDC vanobva kuNkulumane nekuLuveve. Kuratidza kuti zvinhu zvakaita manyama amire merongo mubato iri, mutauriri webato, VaObert Gutu, vakaburitsa mashoko ekuti chikuru change chapa kuti VaTsvangirai nevamwe vakutu vebato vasaende kumarinda inyaya yekunetsana kwemhuri. Asi sachigaro webato, VaLovemore Moyo, vakaburitsawo mashoko vachipikisana naVaGutu vachiti kusawirirana mubato kwainge kwapawo kuti zvinhu zviite manyama amire nerongo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanachiremba Voenderera Mberi Vachiramwa Mabasa
text: Kusaenda kubasa kwavanachiremba munyika kwapinda muzuva retatu kunyange hazvo hurumende iri kuti iri kupa vashandi mari yekubatsirikana yavakawirirana inosvika zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana yemari yavo yemuhoro inonzi inosvika mazana matanhatu emadhora emaRTGS. Vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, vanoti hurumende iri kuyedza napose painogona napo kugadzirisa nyaya yemihoro. No media source currently available Asi vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr Peter Magombeyi, vati kusaenda kwavo kubasa kuri kuenderera mberi. No media source currently available Vanachiremba vanoti vari kuda mari inosvika zviuru gumi nezvisere pamwedzi kana kuti inenge ichifambirana nedhora rekuAmerica pakutengeswa kwaro kumabhanga. Vamwe vanamukoti vari pabasa vataura neStudio7 asi varamba kutaura mazita avo sezvo vasingatenderwe kutaura nevatori venhau vati zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara zvehurumende uye varwere vakawanda vasiri kunyanya kurwara vari kudzoserwa kumba. Vati vanachiremba vakuru varipo vave kuremerwa nebasa zvekuti mumazuva mashoma vanenge votoda kubatsirwa nevechiuto.

headline: WFP Inoti Mhuri Zhinji muMaguta emuZimbabwe Dzatarisana neNzara Inotyisa
text: Sangano rinobatsira nechikafu pasi rose reWorld Food Programme kana kuti WFP rinoti gwaro rakaburitswa nesangano reZimbabwe Vulnerability Assessment kana kuti ZIMVAC richikokerwa neFood Nutrition Council rinoratidza kuti vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mana kana kuti 2,4 million vanoda rubatsiro rwechikafu mumaguta emuZimbabwe. Sangano iri rinoti kubva gore rapera kusvika gore rino nyaya yekuti vanhu vari kumanikidzwa kuti vambogara mudzimba kuyedza kurwisa chirwere cheCoronavirus kana kuti Lockdown yapa kuti vakawanda vatoziye nenzara sezvo vasingakwanise kuenda kumabasa mumadhora kana kunoita maricho kumamisha. Sezvo pasina mabasa, ongororo iyi inoti vanhu zvikamu makumi mana nezviviri kubva muzana kana kuti 42% vemumadhorobha havakwanise kuwana zvekudya zvakakwana zvichienzaniswa nezvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana kana kuti 30% muna 2019. Mumiriri weWFP muZimbabwe Amai Francesca Erdelmann mumashoko avo kuvatori venhau vati vanhu vakawanda vave kumanikidzwa kudya kamwe chete pazuva kana kutorara nenzara. Vanotiwo kusadya zvinovaka muviri kuchakanganisa hutano hwevakawanda. WFP inoti mararamiro evakawanda mumaguta aderera zvakanyanya zvapa kuti vanhu vanodarika zvikamu makumi masere nematatu kubva muzana kana kuti 83% vatadze kuwana zvekudya zvakaringana zvinosanganisira hupfu, munyu nemafuta ekubikisa zvichienzaniswa nezvikamu zvinodarika makumi manomwe nematanhatu kubva muzana kana kuti 76, 8% muna 2019. Mitengo yezvinhu inonzi yawedzerawo zvakanyanya sezvo dhora riri kushaya simba. WFP inoti iri kupa mari kumhuri dzinosvika zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi maviri nematanhatu kana kuti 326, 000 mumadhorobha makumi maviri nematatu munyika uye iri kuda kuwedzera rubatsiro kusvika pazviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu kana kuti 550,00 mumadhorobha makumi maviri nemasere. Gurukota rezvemagariro akanaka evanhu, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende iri kubatsirawo vanhu nezvekudya ichishanda nemasangano akaita seWFP. No media source currently available Mukuru wesangano rinomirira vagari reHarare Residents Trust VaPrecious Shumba vanoti ichokwadi kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka kune vagari vemuHarare vakawanda wavari kutaura navo vachiti vave kudya kamwechete pazuva. Vanoti mitengo yezvinhu iri kukwirawo zvakanyanya. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yotsika Madziro PaNyaya yeKumisa Zvimwe Zvinogadzirwa Kunze Kuti Zvisapinde muNyika
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemaindustry VaMike Bimha vanoti kutanga muna Chikunguru, ZIMRA inenge yotevedzera mutemo wakadzikwa hwekumiswa kwekupinda kwezvimwe zvinhu munyika nevanhu vasina marezinesi. Hurumende yakaparura mutemo unonzi Statutory Instrument Number 64 uyo uchapa kuti zvinhu zvakatarwa mumutemo uyu zvisabvumidzwe kupinda munyika. Zvinhu izvi zvinosanganisa masalad creams, mukaka, mafuta ekubikisa, zvekuvakiusa, mafotereza, matayi edzimotokari, cheese nezvimwe. VaBimha vanoti masangano akaita saana Confederation of Zimbabwe Industries neZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce ndiwo akakumbira kuti vambomisa kupinda kwezvinhu izvi munyika. Vanotiwo hurumende inokwanika kuwana mari yemitero yakawanda kana vemunyika vakwanisa kugadzira zvinhu zvakawanda. Vatiwo izvi zvinopa kuti vanhu vakwanise kuwana mabasa. Hurumende mavhiki apera yakamboyedza kurambidza zvinhu munyika asi pakaita mhirizhonga pabhodha reBeitbridge vangu vachiramba kutambira hurongwa uhu. Asi rwendo rwuno hurumende inonzi ichaendesa mapurisa akawanda mumabhazi nekusunga vemabhazi vanenge vabatsira kupinza zvinhu munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Vanoti Kugadzikana kweHupfumi Hakuna Zvakuri Kubatsira Varombo
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti zvirongwa zvehurumende zvairi kuparura ichiti zviri kusimbisa hupfumi hwenyika, zviri kutopa kuti varombo vanyanye kushupika. Gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, naGavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, Doctor John Mangudya, vakaparura zvirongwa zvavo zvemafambisirwo emari nehupfumi asi vachivimbisa kuti havasi kubuda mugwara ravari sezvo vachiti rinodzikamisa hupfumi. Zvirongwa izvi zvakatambirwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi asi dzichiyambira kuti zvirongwa zvehurumende zvakawanda zvinenge zviri kusiya varombo vachinonga svosve nemuromo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, vanoti zakaturwa naVaMangudya zvakanaka chose panyaya yekusadhinda mari yakawanda uye kuwanise mari makambani kuburikidza nemusika wemari. Asi vakurudzirawo hurumende kuti iwedzere vashandi mari vachiti izvi ndizvo zvinosimudzira hupfumi hwenyika. Mashoko aya atsinhirawo neimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga vari nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaGilbert Muponda, avo vanoti hurumende yakwanisa kudzikamisa mitengo, dhora remunyika nekusimudzira zvigadzirwa kumaindustry asi vachitsinhirawo nyaya yekuti vashandi vabhadharwe mari dzinovakwanira kuti vakwanise kutenga zviri kugadzirwa kumaindasitiri zvacho. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vari mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vatiwo VaNcube vanofanira kuendesa mari kuzvirongwa zvekubatsira varombo munyaya dzedzidzo uye hutano sezvo vakawanda vari kutatarika nekuda kwekunzi vagare mudzimba vasingashande nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Vachitaura kumarinda eHeroes Acre nezuro, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakatiwo chinangwa chavo ndechekuti Zimbabwe inge yave nyika ine vashandi vakati wandei vanotambirawo mari dziri nani kana kuti upper middle-class economy mugore ra2030. Zimbabwe inoti iri kutarisira kuti hupfumi huchakwira nekuda kwegoho rakanaka regore rino asi nyaya yekupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19 inonzi inogona kukanganisa zvakanyanya hupfumi sezvo vanhu vakawanda vasiri kuenda kumabasa. No media source currently available

headline: Muzvare Dondo Votarisira Kuve kuMusangano weU.S. Leaders' Summit Uchange Uri muWashington, D.C., Svondo Rinouya
text: Mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzemadzimai, rePhumulani Minnesota African Women Against Violence, Muzvare Comfort Dondo, vanoti vachange vachizeya nezvematambudziko ari kusangana nemadzimai munyika panyaya dzekutyorwa kwekodzero dzavo. Muzvare Dondo vanoti vachaita izvi kumucheto kwemusangano wevatungamiri veAmerica nemuAfrica, weU.S Africa Leaders’ Summit, uyo uchange uri muWashington DC svondo rinouya. Vanoti vachange vari kuita izvi panguva iyo chirongwa chemazuva gumi nematanhatu ekurwisana nemhirizhonga, kana kuti 16 Days of Activism Against Gender-Based Violence chichangopera, vachiti vari kuita izvi senzira yekuti nyaya iyi igare ichizeyiwa, kwete kungomirira mazuva echerechedzo chete. 'Tiri kutarisira kuti pachave nehurukuro dzakadzama dzichange dzichiitwa kumisangano iyi,"Muzvare Dondo vaudza Studio7. No media source currently available

headline: Masangano Ofara Kuti VaMagombeyi Vakawanikwa Vari Vapenyu
text: Sangano remagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu rinoti riri kufara kuti vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr. Peter Gabriel Magombeyi, vakawanikwa vari mupenyu neChina manheru. Sangano reZimbabwe Doctors for Human Rights rinoti kunyange haro riri kufara kuti Dr. Magombeyi vapenyu mushure mekupambwa nevanhu vasiri kuzivikanwa, riri kukurudzira zvikuru hurumende kuti iferefete zvakadzama zvakapa kuti Dr. Magombeyi vapambwe, uye vakavapamba vacho vamiswe pamberi pematare edzimhosva. Mutauriri weZimbabwe Doctors for Human Rights, Dr. Fortune Nyamande, vanoti Dr. Magombeyi vane kodzero dzekuti kodzero dzavo dzichengetedzwe. Dr. Nyamande vanoti pari zvino Dr. Magombeyi vari kuongororwa navana chiremba vavo, uye vanofanirwa kupihwa kodzero dzavo dzekuti vambove vega panguva iyo vanenge vachiongororwa navana chiremba. Dr. Magombeyi vakapambwa nemusi weMugovera wapfuura nevanhu vasiri kuzivikanwa kuti ndivanani.
