No media source currently available Kuwanikwa vari vapenyu kwaitwa Dr. Magombeyi kwatambirwawo nemufaro nesangano revarairidzi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe. Mutungamiri weAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti vatambira nemufaro kuwanikwa kwakaitwa Dr. Magombeyi vari vapenyu. Asi VaMasaraure vanoti kunyange hazvo Dr. Magombeyi vawanikwa vari mupenyu, sangano ravo richaenderera mberi nekuramwa mabasa nepamusana pekuti mari dzavari kutambiriswa, hadzisi kukwanira varairidzi. No media source currently available  Mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vati ichokwadi kuti Dr. Magombeyi vari kuongororwa navana chiremba vehurumende pamwe navana chiremba vavo ivo Dr. Magombeyi, kuitira kuti vaonekwe mamiriro akaita hutano hwavo. VaNyathi vatiwo Dr. Magombeyi havasi muhusungwa sezviri kuburitswa mumadandemutande akasiyana siyana. Asi vati kana Dr. Magombeyi vapedza kuonekwa navana chiremba, uye kana vava kunzwa zvakanaka, mapurisa achida kuzovabvunzurudza kuti chii chakaitika kwavari apo vaive muhunhapwa. No media source currently available

headline: VaPsychology Maziwisa Vanosungwa neNyaya dzeHuwori kuZESA
text: Zimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission, ZACC, inosunga mumiriri weHighfield West muparamende uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaPsychology Maziwisa nenyaya dzine chekuita nehuwori kukambani yemhando dzemoto yeZESA. Mumwe komishina weZACC, VaGoodson Nguni, nezuro usiku vakaudza Studio 7 kuti VaMaziwisa vakasungwa pamwechete nemumwe wavo mukambani yavo yekushambadzana, yeFruitful Communications, uye ari mushandi weZBC, Oscar Pambuka. VaNguni vakati vaviri ava varara kukamba yemapurisa yeAvondale Police Station, uye VaNguni vakati vaviri ava vari kutarisirwa kumiswa pamberi pedare. Vaviri ava vari kupomerwa mhosva yekukama kambani yemhando dzemoto iyi zviuru zvemadhora kuburikidza nemari dzinonzi dzaibhadharwa kukambani yavo neZESA zvine huwori mukati. Nhengo yesangano reZimbabwe Citizens Initiative, VaPromise Sande vanoti vanotambira nerufaro danho riri kutorwa neZACC iri, kunyange hazvo vari kuti panofanirwa kunge pachisungwa munhu wese, kusanganisira vari muhurumende, kwete kungosunga vanofungidzirwa kuti ndeve kuchikwata cheG40 chete. Vaive gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto, VaSamuel Undenge vakatosungwa vakamiswa pamberi pedare nenyaya dzine chekuita nehuwori hunonzi hwaiitika muZESA. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Gumi neVashanu (15) Vofa neCovid-19 neMugovera
text: Vanhu gumi nevashanu kana kuti 15 vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika neMugovera vamwe mazana masere nenakumi matatu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 839 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave mazana mana nemakumu masere nevatatu kana kuti 483. Vanhu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kuparira gore rapera vave zvuru makumi maviri nemazana mana ane makumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 20, 499. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vave zviuru gumi bezviviri zvine mazana mana nemakumi matatu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 12, 439 zvichitevera kupora kwevanhu mazana maviri nemamakumi mashanu nevashanu nezuro. Vanhu vachiri kurwara vanosvika zvuru zvinomwe nemazana mashanu ane makumi manomwe nevanomwe kana kuti 7, 577. Kunyangwe muHarare nemuBulawayo muri imo mune vanhu vakawandisa vari kurwara, huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi mumatunhu ose hwawedzera zvave kutyisa kana nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano. Mukuru mubazi rezvirwere zvekutapuriranwa Dr Portia Manangazira vanoti svondo rino hurumende iri kutarisira ongororo inobuditsa pachena kuti kufa nekubatwa kwevanhu nechirwere ichi kuri kukonzerwa nekamwe kamhando katsva kechirwere ichi kakabatwa kuSouth Africa neBritain uye kanzoni kanopararira zvakanyanya kana muvana. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu kana kuti 3 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zviuru makumi manomwe nemaviri zvine zana nemakumi maviri nerimwe kana kuti 72,121. Vapora vadarika mamiriyoni maviri nezvuru mazana mana kana kuti 2,4 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Dunhu reSADC ndirozve rine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 1,3 million. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi masere nemapfumbamwe ane zviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 89, 7 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zvuru mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe nemaviri kana kuti 372, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemaviri kana kuti 22 miillion. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 1, 9 million. Asi vapora pasi rose vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi mana nemapfumbamwe ane zviuru zvisere kana kuti 49, 8 million.

headline: Vakawanda Vochema Kuti Zvinhu Zvave Kuparara Zvakare Munyika
text: Mamiriro ezvinhu munyika mune zvematongerwo enyika, zveupfumi, pamwe nezvehutano ave kuita kuti vakawanda vatye kudzoka kwezvakaitika muna 2008, apo vakawanda vakanonga svosve nemuromo nekuda kwekuoma kwezvinhu. Pari zvino nyika yakatarisana nematambudziko mumapoka ose anodiwa nevanhu kuti vararame, kubvira kumafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari, kushaikwa kwemari kumabhanga, kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu, kusanganisira mishonga, pamwe nekuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba. Kodzero dzevanhu dzinonzi dzichiri kurambawo dzichityorwa pasi pehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Muchidimbu, zvinhu munyika zvinonzi zvaremera kumusoro setsvimbo. Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reDemocratic Party, Vaurayayi Zembe vanoti zvose zviri kukonzerwa nekusatonga zvakanaka kuri kuitwa nemutungamiri wenyika pamwe chete nebato ravo reZanu PF, vavanoti havasi kukoshesa zvinhu zvine basa. Doctor Zembe vanoti chiri kuwedzera kuipa kwezvunhu munyika inyaya yekuti bato reZanu PF rinoona nyika sechinhu charo. Zvii zvingaitwa kuti zvinhu zvigadzirisike zvisati zvanyanya kuita manyama amire nerongo? Nhengo yeCentral Committee yeZanu PF, VaJoseph Tshuma, vanoti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa iri kuita zvose zvainogona mukuona kuti nyika yadzokera painofanirwa kunge iri, mushure mekuparadzwa nevaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. VaTshuma vanoti VaMnangagwa vakavhura maoko avo izvozvi kumirira kutambira vemapato anopikisa kuti vaite muonera pamwe chuma chemuzukuru, asi vanopikisa vacho havasi kuda kutambira kukokwa uku. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Vofarira Kudzikiswa Kwaitwa Mitengo yeDhata
text: Kukwidzwa kwemitengo uku kwaive kwaitika mushure medanho rakatorwa neboka rePost and Telecommunications Regulatory Authority, kana kuti POTRAZ rekutambira chikumbiro chemakambani enharembozha chekuti mitengo iyi ikwidzwe. Vanhu vakawanda vari kutambira nemufaro danho rakatorwa negurukota rehumhizha hwekufambiswa kwamashoko, VaSupa Mandiwanzira, rekumisa kukwidzwa kwemitengo wekushandisa internet panharembozha kwaive kwaitwa namakambni enharembozha. Kukwidzwa kwemitengo uku kwaive kwaitika mushure medanho rakatorwa neboka rePost and Telecommunications Regulatory Authority, kana kuti POTRAZ rekutambira chikumbiro chemakambani enharembozha chekuti mitengo iyi ikwidzwe. Vanhu vakawanda avo vaive varatidza kusafara kwavo vachishandisa Facebook, Twitter neWhatsapp, vadzokera zvakare painternet vachiratidza kufara kwavo nedanho ratorwa naVaMandiwanzira iri. Vamwe vataura neStudio 7 vatiwo vari kufara vachiti izvi zvinoratidza kuti vanhu vakataura nezwi rimwe chete pane zvinhu zvinenge zvichivanetsa, hurumende inogona kuvateerera. Mumwe mugari wemuBulawayo, Muzvare Nozipho Moyo, vanoti vari kufara nedanho rekumisa kukwidzwa kwemitengo yedhata. Asi Muzvare Moyo vanoti mitengo iyi yange isingafanirwe kuve yakakwidzwa kubvira pekutanga kuchitariswa kuti mitengo yeinternet muZimbabwe yagara iri pamusoro. VaMandiwanzira vakazivisa nezvekumisa kukwidza kwemitengo yedhata uku nemusi weChina mushure mekunge veruzhinji varatidza kusafara kwavo. Mumashoko avo, VaMandiwanzira, avo vaive vamboti havaikwanisa kupindira munyaya iyi sezvo vari pazororo, vakazivisa kuti mushure mekutaura nevakafanobata chigaro chegurukota rezvehumhizha hwekufambiswa kwemashoko, Amai Prisca Mupfumira, pamwe nePotraz, vakaona zvakakodzera kuti kukwidzwa kwemitengo iyi kumbomiswa. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna Amai Mupfumira kana kubva kuPotraz. Asi Potraz yaburitsawo mashoko ekuti yamisa danho rekukwidza mitengo yeinternet. Vamwe vanhuwo vakawanda vange vachishora kambani yeEconet iyo inonzi ndiyo yaive yauya nezano rekukwidzwa kwemitengo uku uye inova iyo yaive yakwidza mitengo iyi zvakanyanyisa uye nechimbi-chimbi. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuEconet panyaya iyi asi kambani iyi yazivisawo kuti yave kudzokera kumitemgo yakare. Mumwe anotengesa airtime uyo angoda kuzvidoma nezita rekuti Moyo ati kukwidzwa kwemitengo kwaive kwaitwa uku kwange kwave kukanganisa basa rake nevamwewo vanotengesa airtime saiye. Mutungamiri wekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reAbammeli Human Rights Lawyers Network, VaTineyi Mukwewa, vati danho ratorwa nehurumende rinoratidza masimba evanhu kana vakataura nenzwi rimwe chete. VaNigel Gambanga avo vanoshanda nebepanhau repainternet rinonyora pamusoro pezvehumhizha hwekufambiswa kwemashoko, vanoti ichokwadi kuti makambni enharembozha ari kudurirwa nekuwanisa vanhu internet vachitiwo vanowona mitengo ichizokwidzwa zvekare asi zvisina kunyanya sezvange zvaitwa pari zvino. Gore rakapera Potraz yakakonzerazve mutauro apo yakatora danho rekuti makambani enharembozha asaite zvirongwa zvakasiyana-siyana zvekuderedza mitengo

headline: Vakaremara Vanoti Hurumende Ngaishanda neMakambani Kuti Ivabatsire neZvikwanisiro
text: Vamwe vakaremara vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti ishande pamwechete nemakambani nemasangano akazvimirira mukutsvaga nzira yekuti vawane zvekushandisa zvinoita kuti hupenyu hwavo hureruke. Pastor Thomas Muchadenyika, avo vanogara kuNew Marimba muHarare vakaremara makumbo ese uye vanoshandisa madondoro vanoti kushayikwa kwezvikwanisiro kuri kuita kuti vakaremara vakawanda mumadhorobha nekumaruwa vatadze kushanda mabasa avo akasiyana siyana nekuendawo kuzvikoro. “Pane zvekushandisa zvevakaremara hazvisi kutowanikwa munyika muno.” Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, “Hongu hurumende yakanga yati yabvisa mutero kana kuti duty pane zvinoshandiswa nevakaremara zvakaita semadondoro, ma wheel chair nezvinoshandiswa nematsi kana mahearing aids, asi kuti munhu aende kunze kwenyika kunozvitenga mari yacho anenge asina, nekuti haasi kunopihwa mahara.” Mukuru weZimbabwe Albino Association Mai Mercy Maunganidze Chimanga vanoti nyaya yekushayikwa kwezvekushandisa zvevakaremara yave nenguva yakareba isingagadziriswe, “Nyaya yema assistive technologies yakakoshera vanhu vakaremara muhupenyu hwavo,”vanodaro Amai Chimanga. Vanotiwo, “Kubva tichitanga organisation muna 1996 tanga tichichema nehurumende yeZimbabwe kuti dai ma sunscreen lotion aiswa pa essential drugs list sezvo anoshandiswa zuva nezuva. Taitaura takatarisa vanhu vari HIV positive vanotora ma ARVs. Ma assistive devices aya anodhura uye vazhinji vedu havakwanise kuatenga. Uye zvikashayikwa zvinokoresa disability yemunhu.” Mai Chimanga vanoti hurumende inofanira kupa rutsigiro kumakambani kuti zvikwanisiro zvevakaremara zvigadzirwe muZimbabwe. “Iye zvino mukazvitarisa vanhu vane mental health vane mapiritsi avo anoda kutorwa pamwedzi pega pega, ve epilepsy vanoda mishonga yavo zvekare asi havasi kuzokwanisa kuzviita.” Vaenderera mberi vachiti mamwe matanho ari kutorwa nehurumende akanangana nekurerutsira vakaremara haasi kushanda. VaShingirai Nyakupinda vekuSunningdale muHarare vanova nhengo yeTracy Nyakupinda Albino Foundation vanoti zvikoro zvepamusoro zvinofanira kunge zvichiita ongororo netsvagurudzo pamusoro pezvikwanisiro zvevakaremara. “Hakuna chati chaitwa in terms of research pane zvinhu zvinobatsira vanhu, tichizvigadzirira tega tisingamirire kupihwa nema donors,” vanodaro VaNyakupinda. Vanoenderera mberi vachitiwo, Mahigher educational institutions edu pane ma projects avanoita vanokwanisa kugadzira zvakawanda. Tikatarisa ma hearing aids kana ma white cane, zvinhu zvinokwanisa kugadzirwa muno pasina zvekuzombomira pa waiting list. Saka tanga tichitarisira kuti kupera kwegore rino kana kutanga kwerinouya zvinhu zvichashanduka mu Zimbabwe tikwanise kuve ne progress paku addressa zvinhu zvakadai.” VaNyakupinda vanoti masangano evakaremara ndiwo anofanira kutaurirana nezvikoro zvepamusoro kuti vabatsirane nehurumende kugadzira zvinoshandiswa nevakaremara. VaEvans Tarwirei Chigariro vanodzidzisa mechanical engineering paHarare Polytechnic vanoti vakaremara ndivo vanofanira kutungamirira hurongwa hwekugadzirwa kwezvikwanisiro zvavo muno, asi chekutanga vanofanira kupihwa mukana wekuzviita. VaChigariro vanoti chinhu chinobatsira vakaremara chinofanira kugadzirwa naivo varidzi nekuti ndivo vanoziva zvavanoda. “Asingagone kutaura asi achiona anodzidziswa language yacho iyoyo, zvinoita, asingaone anodzidziswa, asinganzwe anotichwa, “ vanodaro VaChigariro. Vatiwo, “ Tiri mubishi rekunyora mapepa ekuti pamwe President akazviona anozvipasisa zvopindawo muma colleges edu. Zvototanga kushanda mugore ratiri kupinda ra2020. Research yatiri kutaura iyi haiitwi nemunhu ari able-bodied nekuti haana disability maari. Zvinoda kuti tidzidzise ari disabled wacho iyeye topedzisira tave nema leaders anoziva zve disability.” Sangano World Health Organisation rinoti munhu mumwechete pagumi rega rega revanhu vakaremara ari kurarama asina zvikwanisiro nekuda kwekudhura kwazvo pamwe nekutadza kunzwisisa nyaya dzevakaremara nevatungamiri venyika dzose zvadzo. No media source currently available

headline: China Inoti Hapana Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chati Chabatwa neCoronavirus
text: China inoti hapana zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kuChina kusanganisira zvri kudzidza kunyika zvati zvabatwa neCoronavirus. China inotiwo iri kutora matanho kuitira kuti Zimbabwe isaite munhu anobatwa neCoronavirus. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wavaita negurukota rezveutano, VaObadiah Moyo, mutevedzeri wemumiriri weChina muZimbabwe, VaZhao Baogang, vati pari zvino havasati vawana shoko rekuti pane zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvawirwa netsaona yeCoronavirus iyi. VaBaogong vati nyika yavo iri kuita zvese zvaingagona kuchengetedza veruzhinji vari munyika yavo. VaBaogang vatiwo mukuedza kuona kuti chirwere cheCoronavirus hachisviki muZinbabwe, vari kukurudzira zvizvarwa zvekunyika yavo kuti zvimbomira kushanyira Zimbabwe. Vatiwo vanenge vauya vari kuvachengetedzwa kwemazuva gumi nemana kuti vasasangana neveruzhinji. VaMoyo vatenda zvikuru matanho ari kutorwa neChina mukuedza kudzivirira kuti Coronavirus isapinde muZimbabwe. VaMoyo vati vari kuwana rubatsiro rwakawanda vakatiwo China yazvipirawo kubatsira Zimbabwe kugadzirisa nzvimbo dzakatarwa kuti vanenge vabatwa nechirwere ichi, vachengeterwe. Kusvika pari nhasi, vanhu vanosvika mazana matanhatu varasikirwa nehupenyu nekuda kweCoronavirus, uye vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi maviri nezvina vakabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachaputika muChina gore rapera. Mubati wehomwe musangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Doctors for Human Rights, Doctor Norman Matara, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti zvakakosha kana China ichigadzirira kubatsira Zimbabwe sezvo isina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzezvehutano. VaMoyo vazivisawo kuti hapana munhu ati abatwa nechirwere ichi mZimbabwe kunyange hazvo vanhu vanodarika mazana manomwe vari kuongororwa kana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi. VaMoyo vatiwo vari kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vambomira kuenda kuChina pamwe nekune dzimwe nyika dzakatapurirwa chirwere ichi. Dzimwe dzenyika dzave neCoronavirus dzinosanganisira Malaysia, France, Canada, Belgium, Malaysia, America, Germany, Britain Japan nedzimwewo. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reCitizens Forum Rokurudzira Kuomeserwa kweVanotengesa Nyika
text: Rimwe sangano rinozviti Citizens Forum rinoti ranyora tsamba dzenyunyuto kumasangano akazvimiririra avanoti akabatsira mukurongwa kwekuratidzira kwakaitwa mwedzi wapera. Vachitaura nevatori venhau, mukuru musangano iri, VaAlex Gakanje, vati masangano aya akapesvedzera mhirizhonga, uye vachaavharisa. Mamwe emasangano adomwa neCitizens Form anosanganisira Crisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, Law Society of Zimbabwe, Zimbabwe lawyers for Human Rights nemizinda yeAmerica neBritain. Asiwo mukuru wePlatform for Youth Development inove nhengo yeCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaClaris Madhuku, vashora zvikuru Citizens Forum vachiti kutyityidzirana kunodzorera nyika shure. VaMadhuku vatiwo vese vane moyo wekuda kuona kubudirira kwenyika, vari kukurudzira nhaurirano, izvo zviri kuitwa nemasangano avanodyidzana nawo. Studio7 haina kukwamisa kunzwa divi reBritain neAmerica pamusoro pemashoko eCitizens Forum. Nyika mbiri idzi dzakabuda pachena dzichishora mabatirwo akaitwa mhirizhonga nemauto nemapurisa. Vanhu vanodarika gumi nevashanu vakapfurwa vakafa, uye vanhu vanodarika makumi manomwe vakarapwa maronda akakonzerwa nemabara epfuti. Hurumende yeZanu PF iri kupomera MDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa mhosva yekuronga mhirizhonga. Asi MDC inoti haisi iyo yakaronga kuratidzira uku, uye zviri kuitwa nehurumende, zvakafanana nekutsvaga uta mugate. Mune imwewo nyaya, vechidiki mubato reZanu PF vari kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vatsungirire mumatambudziko akatarisana nenyika vachiti vane chivimbo chekuti mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachagadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika. Vachitaura nevatapi venhau muHarare, vechidiki vebato reZanu PF vati vawirirana kuti mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanofanirwa kupiwa mukana. Mumwe wevechidiki ava, Muzvare Yeukai Simbanegavi, vati vanonzwisisa kutambura kuri kuita veruzhinji nekuda kwekusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu munyaya dzezveupfumi. Muzvare Simbanegavi vati VaMnangagwa vanofanirwa kupiwa mukana wekurwisa huori, kutsvaka mari dzekunze pamwe nekugadzirisa matambudziko ari kusangana neveruzhinji muhupenyu hwavo. Muzvare Simbanegavi vatiwo sevechidiki vari kushora zvikuru nekwavanoti kushandiswa kwevechidiki mukuratidzira kwakaitika muna Ndira.

headline: Crisis in Zimbabwe Coalition Yopomera Zanu PF Mhosva yeKuvhundutsira Vashandi Vayo, Asi Zanu PF Ichiti Haineyi neSangano Iri
text: Sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, rinoti vashandi varo vatadza kuenda kubasa vachityira kupenyu hwavo zvichitevera kutyisidzirwa kwavanonzi vakaitwa nemusi weChina nevanofungidzirwa kuti inhengo dzeZanu PF. Sachigrao vesangano iri, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti motokari nhatu dzakanga dzakanyorwa kuti "Zanu PF" dzakapakwa panze pemahofisi avo muHarare, vanhu vaive mumotokari idzi vakamboramba vakagaramo, asi vakazobuda ndokuedza kupinda mumahofisi vakakundikana. VaMutasa vanoti pamotokari nhatu idzi, mbiri dzaive dziine manhamba asi imwechete yakanga isina, uye dzakazobva pamahofisi avo dzakaenda kunomira zvakare panzvimbo yezvitoro yeBelvedere Shopping Centre. VaMutasa vanoti sangano ravo rinoona chiitiko ichi sekutyisidzirwa nekuda kwemabasa avari kuita ekurwira kodzero dzevanhu munyika. Vanoti vari kushanda nemagweta avo kuti vamhan’are chiitiko ichi kumapurisa. No media source currently available Asi mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubato reZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vanoti manyepo avagara vachiziva kuti anoitwa nemasangano akaita seCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition ekuda kutsvaga kunzwirwa tsitsi pamwe nekuwaniswa mari nevanobatsira masangano akazvimirira. VaMugwadi vanoti semaziviro avo, mahofisi eCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition ari mumusha unogara vanhu weBelvedere, vachiti vanoshamisika kuti sangano iri rakaziva kuti motokari idzi dzakanga dzaenda pamahofisi aro. VaMugwadi vanoti bato ravo haringashaiswi hope nesangano risina vatsigiri vachitadza kushaiswa hope nevanhu vakaita semutungamiri weCitizens' Coalitionf for Change, VaNelson Chamisa kana mutungamiri werMDC VaDouglas Mwonzora kana mutungamiri weNCA, VaLovemore madhuku, vachiti vatatu ava nevamwe vanopikisa vari kuzvifambira zvakasunguka muZimbabwe. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, sangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition rinoti ranyorera zvakare mapurisa richiiazivisa nezvehurongwa hwaro hwekuda kuratidzira musi wa 05 Nyamavhuvhu. Sangano iri rinoti rwendo rwuno raisa zvose zvakambonzi nemapurisa rakanga risina kuisa mugwaro rekutanga zvinozadzisa mutemo weMaintenance of Peace and Order Act, zvakaita kuti rinyimwe mvumo yekuratidzira svondo rapera. Sangano iri riri kukurudzira vana veZimbabwe kuti vapinde mumigwagwa vachiratidzira kunyunyuta kwavo nekwarinoti kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu, kushungurudzwa kwevemasangano akazvimirira, vemasangano evashandi, vemapato anopikisa pamwe nevana veZimbabwe nehurumende.

headline: Madzimai Anoita Mabasa eMaoko Ocherechedza Zuva reMadzimai
text: Madzimai anorarama nekutengesa zvinhu pamwe nekuzviitira mabasa emaoko anobva mumatunhu akasiyanasiyana aungana nhasi muHarare achipemberera pamwe nekurangarira zuva remadzimai, kana kuti International Women’s Day, iro rakacherechedzwa musi wa 8 Kurume pasi rose. Madzimai aungana aya anosanganisira nhengo dzesangano reZimbabwe Chamber of Informal Economy Association, iro rinonzi ndiro raronga musanganu uyu, pamwe neVendors Initiative for Social Economic Transformation, VISET. Imwe nhengo yeVISET yapinda mumhemberero idzi, Muzvare Tariro Munyereyi, vanoti madzimai ataura nezvematambudziko aanosangana nawo mukuita mabasa avo emaoko, zvikuru vanotengesera mumigwagwa. Muzvare Munyereyi vanoti madzimai asunga kuti pave nekudyidza kwakanaka pakati pevanotengesera mumigwagwa ava, makanzuru pamwe nehurumende kuitira kuti vakwanise kushanda pamwechete. Vanoti madzimai akawanda ari kushungurudzwa uye kutyorerwa kodzero dzavo kana vachinge vasungwa, izvo vanoti zvinozosiya vamwe vavo vave kuzvikandira mumaoko emapurisa aya kuti vasashungurudzwa. Vanotiwo panofanirwa kuve nedzidziso yakakwana pamusoro pezvirwere zvakaita seHIV/AIDS mumadzimai nevanasikana vanorarama nekutengesa ava. No media source currently available

headline: VaChiwenga Havasati Vaita Musangano naVanachiremba neVakoti Vari Kuramwa Mabasa
text: Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika varizve gurukota rezvehutano, VaConstantino Chiwenga, pamwe nemunyori mukuru mubazi rezvehutano, VaJasper Chimedza, havasati vaita musangano nevashandi vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba avo vave nemwedzi miviri vachiramwa mabasa. Vari kuramwa mabasa vanoti vari kuda kuwedzerrwa mari uye kuti vawaniswe zvikwanisiro muzvipatara. Asi vachitaura nezvekudomwa kwaVaChiwenga nemusi weChipiri svondo rapera, munyori mukuru mudare remakurukota, Doctor Misheck Sibanda, vakati mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangangwa, vaida kuti VaChiwenga vatange basa nechimbi chimbire kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa mubazi rezvehutano munguva iyo nyika yatarisana nedambudziko reCovid-19. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaChiwenga kuti tinzwe divi ravo sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Asi tabata munyori mukuru wesangano ravanachiremba reSenior Hospital Doctors Association Doctor, Aaron Musara, avo vanoti hakuna musangano wati waitwa. No media source currently available Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemutungamiri wesangano revakoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnoch Dongo vati hakuna chavati vanzwa kuvakuru mubazi rezvehutano nezvekugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. No media source currently available

headline: Botswana Inodzika Mutemo Unoti Vanhu Vagare Mudzimba Dzavo kweMwedzi Mitanhatu
text: Hurumende yeBotswana yadzika mutemo we State of Emergency uyo uchange uchishanda kwemwedzi mitanhatu senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCoronavirus. Mutemo uyu, uyo wasainwa nemutungamiri weBotswana, VaMokgweetsi Masisi, unosungira kuti vanhu vagare mudzimba dzavo kwemwedzi mitanhatu, uye kuti makambani ape vanhu zvikwanisiro zvekuti vashande vachibva kudzimba dzavo. Mutemo we Emergency Covid-19 Amendment Number 2 Regulations of 2020, watanga kushanda zviri pamutemo mushure mekunge wapasiswa nedare raparamende, uye kusainwa naVaMasisi. Mutemo uyu unorambidza makambani kudzinga vashandi munguva iyo unenge uchishanda, uye wapawo mutongi mukuru wematare edzimhosva, masimba ekutara zvinofanirwa kuitwa nematare edzimhosva munguva yeLockdown iyi. Mutemo mutsva uyu wadzikwa panguva iyo hutungamiri hweBotswana, kusanganisira nhengo dzeparamende, makurukota ehurumende pamwe nemutungamiri wenyika, hwange hwatotanga kare kuita hurongwa hwekumbogara kudzimba, kana kuti self quarantine, kwemazuva gumi nemana zvichitevera kusangana kwahwakaita nemushandi wezvehutano ane chirwere cheCoronavirus. Asi chiitiko ichi chichaita kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogara muBotswana zviomerwe nehupenyu sezvo pasisina achabvumirwa kuenda kubasa panguva iyi. Muzvare Sandra Sondelelo, avo vanoshanda mumba, vanoti dai zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvabvumirwa kuti zvidzokere kumusha nokuti hakuchina chavachagarira muBotswana kwemwedzi yose iyi. Chimwewo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, Amai Pesilah Tarisai, vati vabereki nehama dzavanga vachibatsira vachadya nhoko dzezvironda sezvo vasingakwanise kutumira zvekudya. Botswana yaita nyika yekutanga mudunhu rekuchamhembe kweAfrica kutora danho rakadai, iro rine nguva yakareba vanhu vachinzi vagare mudzimba dzavo senzira yekudzivirira chirwere cheCoronavirus, icho chauraya munhu mumwe chete muBotswana, uye kubata vanhu gumi nevatatu munyika iyi. Asi zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogara muBotswana zvinoti zviri kubatsira vamwe vavo vasina zvekudya uye pekugara panguva iyo nyika iyi inenge yakavharwa. Muzvare Faith Musesekedzi avo vanogara mudhorobha reFrancistown muBotswana vanoti vari kuchengeta zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvitatu izvo zvakapererwa nemabasa mushure mekuparurwa kwechirongwa chekugara mudzimba. Chimwewo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri kubatsira vamwe nezvekudya uye kuvabhadharira mari epavanogara, VaMorgan Tambaoga, vanoti vakazvipira kuita izvi kusvikira zvinhu zvanaka. Mumwe wevari kubatsirwa nechikafu uye kubhadharirwa mari yepamba pavanogara, Muzvare Primrose Moyo, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanotenda zvikuru nerubatsiro rwavari kuwana. Ongorororo yaitwa neStudio7 inotaridza kuti ruzhinji rwevana veZimbabwe vari muBotswana vari kugara vari muzvikwata zvavanhu vatanhatu kana vanomwe senzira yekuti vaite muonera pamwe netwushoma twavainatwo. Asi nyanzwi munyaya dzezvehutano, VaChristopher Mbewe, vanoti kugara vanhu vakaungana mukanzvimbo kadiki kunoita kuti cherwere cheCOVID-19 chipararire nekukurumidza. Chirwere cheCoronavirus, icho chakatangira mudhorobha reWuhan kuChina gore rapera, chabata vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nemazana mashanu ezviuru, uye chauraya vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi mapfumbamwe pasi rose. No media source currently available

headline: Ishe Makore Vanoti Havana Kufara neZvakaitwa naVaTsvangirai Mudunhu Ravo
text: Ishe Makore vekumMasvingo mudunhu reGutu South vanoti havana kufara kuti bato reMDC rakaita musangano waro mudunhu ravo risina kuvapira. Ishe Makore vekumMasvingo mudunhu reGutu South vanoti havana kufara kuti bato reMDC rakaita musangano waro mudunhu ravo risina kuvapira. Pamusangano wakaitwa kwaGutu nemusi weChipiri, Ishe Makore vakabuda pachena kuti ndeve Zanu PF, vakapika kuti havasi kusiya dunhu ravo richiitirwa misangano neMDC. Pamusangano uyu vanhu vanonzi vakaenda kumusangano wakaitwa naVa Morgan Tsvangirai nemusi we Mugovera vakaudzwa kuti vachaurayiwa. Asi Ishe Makore varamba mashoko aya vachiti ivo chavanopokana nacho, kuitwa kwemisangano ivo vasingazive. Vachitaura pamusangano wakaitwa neChipiri, uyo wakapindwa nemabhuku anosvika makumi matatu, Mambo Makore vakati vari kurwadzikana nevanhu vavo vakaenda kumusangano waVa Tsvangirai vakati havachabvumidzi misangano ye MDC mudunhu ravo. Ishe Makore vakatiwo vachadzinga masabhuku pamwe chete nemakanzura eMDCT akasangana naVaTsvangirai vasina kuziviswa saMambo wedunhu iri. Ishe Makore vakapomera kanzura wemubhuku eumnzvimbo iyi anomirira MDC kuita zviri kunze kwemutemo, vakati vachadzinga kanzura uyu mudunhu ravo. Musangano uyu wakasiya vagari vazhinji vaine kutya sezvo wakavimbisa kudzoka kwemhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika mudunhu iri. No media source currently available

headline: Makambani eNharembozha Anobvuma Kuderedza Mitengo
text: Veruzhinji vanoshandisa nharembozha munyika vanonzi vatanga goredzva zvakanaka zvichitevera danho ratorwa nemakambani enharembozha rekudzikisa mutengo wekufona nezvikamu zvingada kusvika makumi matatu kubva muzana. Makambani matatu anoti Net-One, Telecel Zimbabwe neEconet Wireless Zimbabwe anonzi abvuma kutevera kurudziro yakaitwa muna Gumiguru wegore rapera neboka rinoongorora mafambisirwo emashoko munyika rePostal and Telecommunications Regulatory Authority of Zimbabwe, POTRAZ, yekuti mitengo yekushandisa nharembozha ideredzwe. POTRAZ inonzi yakaita ongororo yayo iyo yakaburitsa kuti mutengo wekushandisa nhare munyika wakakwira nezvikamu makumi matatu kubva muzana. Danho iri rinonziwo richaita kuti mutengo wekushandisa nhare udzike kubva pamasendi makumi maviri nematatu kusvika pamasendi gumi nemashanu paminiti imwe chete. Kambani yeEconet Wireless Zimbabwe yazivisawo kuti yatambira kurudziro iyi uye ichadzikisa mutengo wayo kusvika pamasendi gumi nematanhatu paminiti kana munhu achifonera imwe kambani uye masendi gumi nemashanu kana vanhu vachifonerana nenharembozha dzeEconet dzega dzega. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi uye vachitungamira sangano reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, EMCOZ, VaJohn Mufukare, vanoti izvi zvichanakira veruzhinji asi mutengo uyu uchakakwira zvichienzaniswa nedzimwe nyika. Zimbabwe inonzi ndiyo nyika ine mitengo yakakwira zvakanyanya zvichienzaniswa nedzimwe nyika kuchamhembe kwe Africa. No media source currently available

headline: Kuramwa Mabasa kwaVana Chiremba Kwava neMazuva Makumi Matatu neMaviri
text: Vanhu vakawanda vanonzi vari kufa muzvipatara zuva-nezuva sezvo vana chiremba vari kuramwa mabasa vachiti vanoda kuwedzerwa mari dzemihoro pamwe nezvikwanisiro zvinoita kuti vakwanise kuita basa ravo. Varwere vanonzi vari kufa muzvipatara nekushaya anovapa mishonga uku hurumende nanachiremba vachikakaVadzana panyaya yemari dzemihoro. Mugari wemuHarare, VaTendai Chapeyama, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira mushe muzvipatara zvikuru zvehurumende zvakaita secheParirenyatwa umo varwere vari kuswera varere muzvipatara vasina kana rubatsiro rwavari kuwana. Amai Nomalanga Chemhere avo vane murwere ari muchipatara vanoti vave kutorapisa murwere kunana chiremba vakazvimirira asi izvi zvave kuvadhurira. Muzvare Primrose Chimimba vakurudzirawo hurumende kuti igadzirise nhuna dzanachiremba kuitira kuti vanhu vasarambe vachirasikirwa nehupenyu. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuhurumende kuti vanhu vangani varasikirwa nehupenyu hwavo kuburikidza nekuramwa mabasa kwavana chiremba. Kuramwa mabasa uku nemazuva rechimakumi matatu nemaviri. Asi Amai Chemhere vati kana vanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa vasingdadi kudzoka kumabasa, zviri nani hurumende ibvise vana chiremba ava pabasa yoisa vamwe vanhu vakaita savana chiremba vechisoja vazobatsira vanhu muzvipatara. Vamwe vana mukoti vatataura navo vanoti vanga vachidzoserwa kudzimba nevakuru vavo sezvo muzvipatara manga musina vanachiremba. Zvichakdai, mumwe chiremba wepaParirenyatwa watataura naye, VaWallace Hlambelo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti havasi kuzodzokera kubasa kudzamara hurumende yagadzirisa nhuna dzavo. Kusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu muzvipatara kwabva kwawedzera kuipa sezvo vana chiremba vakuru vave kuramwawo mabasa vachiti havakwanise kuitawo basa ravo nemazvo kana vana chiremba vadiki vasiri parutivi pavo. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vakaudza vatori venhau neChipiri kuti hurumende yakabvuma kutambira dzimwe nhuna dzanachiremba asi kwete dzose. Vakatiwo hurumende haina mari yekunze yekubhadhara vana chiremba ava sezvavari kuda izvo zviri kuramba kutambirwa nana chiremba ava. No media source currently available

headline: Vadhomeni Vanoti Hurumende Haisi Kukoshesa Mabasa Avo
text: Sangano rinomirira vanoshanda mubazi rezvekurima, re Zimbabwe Agricultural Professionals and Technical Association (ZAPTA), rinoti vashandi vebazi iri, zvikuru sei vadhomeni, vanofanirwa kupiwa mari yerubatsiro, kana kuti ‘risk allowance’, panguva ino yekurwisana necoronavirus sezvo basa ravo richivamanikidza kusangana nekushanda nevanhu vakasiyana siyana. Munyori mukuru weZAPTA, VaZivaishe Zhou, vaudza Studio 7 kuti sezvo hurumende yakapa varairidzi mari yekubatsirikana panguva iyi, haifanirwi kusarudza vashandi vainobatsira, naizvozvo hurumende inofanirwa kuziva kuti vadhomeni vanodavo rubatsiro rwakadai. VaZhou vati sangano ravo harisikufara nemabatirwo arikuitwa nyaya yezvimidhudhudhu zvinofanirwa kushandiswa nevadhomeni, vachiti vadhomeni vazhinji vari kushaya mari yokuenda kumahofisi eCMED kunotora zvimidhudhudhu izvi. VaZhou vati pane zvizhinji zvinofanirwa kugadziriswa mubazi iri, vachiti vanokurudzira hurumende kuti itarisise nekugadzirisa zvirikuitika mubazi iri kuti vashandi vaite basa ravo zvakanaka. Tatadza kubata mukuru anoona nezvevashandi mubazi iri, VaGibson Chijarira, sezvo mharembozha yavo yange isingadavirwi. Tichienda pamhepo, gurukota rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yatavatumira. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kushanda neMasangano eVashandi muKushambadza Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Hurumende iri kukurudzirwa kuti ishande nemasangano anomirira vashandi mukushambadza kwairi kuita nhomba inodzivirira Covid-19, kuitira kuti chirongwa chekubaya nhomba ichi chibudirire. Kurudziro iyi inobva kumukuru wesangano reCommunity Workin Gropu on Health, VaIta Rusike, uye inouya panguva iyo vanhu vari kuzvipira kubaiwa nhombaye Sinopharm iripo iye zvino vari kuramba vari vashoma. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa kuti vanhu zana negumi nevasere kana kuti 118, ndivo chete vakabaiwa nhomba munyika yose nemusi weChina, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabayiwa nhomba iyi munyika yose pazviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu zvine gumi nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 36 019. VaRusike vanoti kana pakasatorwa matanho akasimba nekukasika pakushambadzwa kwenhomba iyi, chirongwa chePhase 2 chichangotanga ichi chinogona kungofanana nechePhase 1, icho chisina kuwana vanhu vakawanda. Asi mukuru ari kutungamira hurongwa hwekurwisana neCovid-19, Dr. Agnes Mahomva, vanoti kubva pakutanga, hurumende yanga ichingoshanda nemapoka ose muhurongwa uhwu saka nekudaro hapana vari kusiiwa kunze. Dr. mahomva vari kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vatambire chirongwa ichi sechavo, vachitri hurumende iri kuita payo saka zvasarira veruzhinji kuti vapindewo mazviri. Zvichakadaro, hurumende yakazivisawo nemusi weChina kuti vanhu vatatu vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19, vamwe makumi matatu nevatanhatu vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi. Izvi zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga hwasvika pazviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu zvine mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe nevanomwe, kana kuti 36 377. Huwandu hwevanhu vafa hwakasvikawo pachiuru nemazana mana ane makumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri, kana kuti 1 492. Vanhu vapona kubva kuchirwere ichi vakasvika pazviuru makumi matatu nezvitatu zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi manomwe nevaviri, kana kuti 33 972. No media source currently available No media source currently available

headline: Kambani yeHurumende yeFidelity Printers Ndiyo Ichadhinda "Ballot Papers"
text: Komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yazivisa makambani achadhinda mapepa ekuvhotesa pamusangano wayaita nevemapato ari kukwikwidza musarudzo dzegore rino. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu, imwe nhengo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec, VaQubani Moyo, vati mapepa ekuvhotesa achadhindwa nemakambani maviri emuno anoti Fidelity Printers nePrintflow. Fidelity ndiyo ichadhinda magwaro ekuvhotera mutungamiri wenyika, uye ekuvhotera nhengo dzedare reparamende. Printflow ichadhinda mapepa ekuvhotera makanzura. Makambani maviri aya ndeehurumende. VaMoyo vatiwo mapato achabvumidzwa kuona kudhindwa kunenge kuchiitwa mapepa aya. Mashoko eZec aya atambirwa nevari kumirira MDC Alliance musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, VaNelson Chamisa, VaJameson Timba. Asi munyori mukuru muMDC-T inoutngamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe, VaNixon Nyikadzino, vati kunyange hazvo Zec yazivisa kuchadhindwa mapepa ekuvhotesa aya, nyaya iyi haiperere ipapa sezvo vachiti pane zvimwe zvinoda kugadziriswa. Mapato aya paapihwa mukana wekubvunza mibvunzo maererano nekomiti yanga ichida kuumbwa neZec pakati pevanhu vari mumapato ari kukwikwidza musarudzo ichange ichitarisa nhuna dzinenge dzichibva mumapato pamberi pesarudzo, ye Multi-party Liason Committee, imwe nhengo yebato reFreedom Movement #1980 Chinhu Chedu, VaFrancis Danha, vakonzera zhowe zhowe vachiti sachigaro weZec, Amai Priscilla Chigumba, nevose vari mukomsheni yavo vanofanira kusiya basa. VaDanha vati Amai Chigumba nevamwe vavo vakatadza kufambisa basa zvakanaka pavakatadza kupa mapato ezvematongerwo gwaro revavhoti pamberi pekugara kwakaita dare raitambira mazita evachakwikwidza musarudzo svondo rapera. VaDanha vati kutadza kuwana gwaro revavhoti kwakakonzera kuti nhengo dzebato ravo zhinji dzitadze kukwikwidza musarudzo vachiti havachavimbi kuti Zec ichakwanisa kufambisa sarudzo munyika. Zvaitwa naVaDanha, avo varambidza VaMoyo nechikwata chavanga vachifamba nacho kuenderera mberi nekutaura kudzamara Amai Chigumba vasiya basa, zvabva zvakaonzera kuti musangano uyu utadze kuenderera mberi uye komiti yanga ichida kuumbwa iyi itadze kuumbwa. Vanga vakamirira Zanu PF pamusangano uyu, VaFortune Chasi, vashora zvaitwa naVaDanha. Asi VaTimba vatiwo zvaitwa naVaDanha zvinoburitsa pachena kurwadziwa kwemapato anopkisa nemafambisirwo ari kuitwa basa neZec Zvichakadai, VaMoyo vati komisheni yavo ichazoshevedzera mumwe musangano kana vagadzirisa nyaya dzekuchengetedzeka kwevanhu nemapurisa kuitira kuti misangano isakanganiswe sezvaitwa naVaDanha. No media source currently available

headline: Muchuchusi weHurumende Anoti Anoda Kuti Nhengo dzeMDC-T Dzitongerwe Rufu paMhosva yeKuponda Mupurisa
text: Nhengo dzeMDCT dzakabatwa nemhosva yekuponda mupurisa mumusha weGlen View muHarare muna 2011 nhasi dzakumbira kunzwirwa tsitsi nedare kunyangwe hazvo dzichiri kutsika madziro dzichiti hadzina mhosva yadzakapara. Muchuchisi wehurumende panyaya iyi, VaEdmore Nyazamba, vakurudzira dare kuti ritongere rufu vasungwa vanoti VaTungamirai Madzokere, Muzvare Yvonne Musarurwa pamwe naVaLast Maengehama avo vakabatwa nemhosva yekuponda Assistant Inspector Petros Mutedza pamhirizhonga yakaitika muna 2011 pakati pemapurisa nevechidiki veMDCT. VaNyazamba vati chiitiko ichi chakakanganisawo pfungwa dzevanhu vakawanda vakaona izvi zvichiitika vanosanganisira vana vadiki pamwe nevanhuwo zvavo vasinei nezvematongerwo enyika. Asi rimwe remagweta evasungwa ava, Amai Beatrice Mtetwa, vati vasungwa ava havana mhosva yavakapara uye vati mukupa mutongo, dare rinofa kutarisa kuti humbowo hwakasvitswa kudare hauburitse pachena kuti ngana ndiye akakanda dombo rakatema VaMutedza zvakazokonzera kuti vafe. Vaenderera mberi vachiti mutongo wakaturwa nemutongi wedare VaChinembiri Bhunu unoita sekuti imhosva kuti munhu anzi inhengo yeMDCT nepamusana pekuti hazvisi kubuda pachena mumutongo wavo kuti nhengo dzeMDCT dzakabatwa nemhosva yekuponda iyi dzakanyatsoita chii chaizvo chakakonzera kuti VaMutedza. Zvichakadai, Amai Mtetwa vakurudzira dare kuti mumtongo wango ribude pachena kuti hurumende inofanira kuferefeta nyaya dzevanhu vese vanonzi vakapondwa pamwe nekushayikwa zvinechekuita nezvematongerwo enyika vachiti vamwe vanhu varikupomerwa mhosva dzekuponda vari kungoswerombeya nemigwagwa vasina zvavari kuitwa zvinopedzisira zvaita sekuti mutemo une vamwe vanhu vaunoshandisirwa. Amai Mtetwa vatiwo bumbiro remitemo idzva haribvumidzwe kuti munhukadzi atongerwe rufu sezvakumbirwa naVaNyazamba; naizvozvo vati Muzvare Musarurwa havafanire kutongerwa nyangwe zvodii. Amai Mtetwa vatiwo vasungwa ava vakagara mujeri kwemakore anoda kusvika kumatatu nyaya iyi ichizeyewa mumatare saka vanofanirwa kutorwa sevanhu vakatombopika. Zvichakadai, mutongi wedare, VaBhunu, vatambira chikumbiro chasvitswa kudare nemagweta evasungwa ava chekuti VaPhineas Nhatarikwa, avo vakabatwawo nemhosva yekubatsira VaMadzokere naMuzvare Musarurwa kubva panzvimbo yakaparirwa mhosva, vabuditswe muhusungwa. Amai Mtetwa vati hazvikodzere kuti VaNhatarikwa, avo vanove mutyairi weMDCT vabatwe nemhosva iyi sezvo vaive munhu aiita basa rake panguva yaakasungwa. VaBhunu vabvuma chikumbiro chekuti VaNhatarikwa vabuditswe muhusungwa vakamirira kupihwa panyaya iyi. Zvichitevera zvasvitswa kudare nemagweta ari kumirira vasungwa, VaBhunu vati nyaya iyi ichadzoka mudare musi wa19 mwedzi uno pavachatura mutongo wekuti vanhu ava vanogara mujeri kwenguva yakareba zvakadii. Imwe nhengo yeMDCT yanga iri mudare ichinzwa nyaya iyi, VaSimon Mpande, vati varikuwona sekuti VaBhunu vane divi ravakarerekera pakutongwa kwenyaya iyi. VaSydney Chisi avo vanoshanda nesangano reYouth Initiative for Democracy in Zimbabwe kana kuti Yidez vati vanowona sekuti nyaya iyi inyaya yakatongwa kare pasiri kutariswa humbowo hwakasvitswa kudare. Mudare nhasi manga makazara kuti maku nevatungamiri veMDCT vanga vachisanganisira vatevedzeri vaVaMorgan Tsvangirai muMDCT vanoti Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, VaNelson Chamisa naVaElias Mudzuri. Vamwewo vanga vari mudare vanosanganisira mutungamiri weTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume pamwe nenhengo dzeparamende dzeMDCT dzakati wandei. No media source currently available

headline: ZIMASCO Yodzinga Mhuri Mudzimba Pamusaka Perendi
text: Mhuri mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu dziri kudzingwa mudzimba dzekambani yezvicherwa yeZIMASCO dzadziri kugara nekuda kwetadza kubhadhara mari dzerendi. Kambani yeZIMASCO yakapa vagari ava magwaro ekuvazivisa kuti vabude mudzimba idzi musi wa31 Zvita gore rapera usati wasvika kana kuti vabhadhare mari dzezvikwereti zverendi dzose. Asi vagari ava vanoti vakakundikana kubhadhara mari dziri kudiwa nekambani iyi nekuti vazhinji vavo havasevenzi, sezvo vakagumurwa pamabasa nekambani iyi kare. Vakawanda vevanhu ava vane zvikwereti zverendi zviri pakati pemadhora mazana matanhatu kusvika pachiuru chemadhora. Vagari ava vanobhadhara madhora makumi matatu nemanomwe pamwedzi. Chiri kushamisa nekurwadza vagari ava ndechekuti mapurisa ekambani yeZIMASCO haasi kuburitsa midziyo yavo panze asi kuti vari kuvharira midziyo iyi mudzimba vachiisa svumbunuro dzavo. Mumwe wevavharirwa imba ndiAmai Stella Ngandu avo vanoti vakagara paimba yavharwa iyi kwemakore makumi maviri apfuura sezvo murume wavo asina kupihwa mari dzake dzose nekambani yeZIMASCO. Amai Ngandu vanoti havarambi kuti vane chikwereti cherendi chinosvika mazana masere emadhora asi vanoti havana kwekuenda. Sachigaro wemadzimai mubato reZanu PF munzvimbo iyi, Amai Edna Chimwanza, vanoti vanzi vabudewo mumba kana vakasabhadhara mari inoita madhora mazana mana sezvo chikwereti chavo chiri chiuru chemadhora. Asi Amai Chimwanza vanoona ruoko rwezvematongerwa enyika mukudzingwa mudzimba idzi. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nasachigaro wedunhu reMutorashanga muZanu PF, VaMaricosi Mapuraganda, avo vanoti vanhu vanodzingwa gore rese rinenge riine sarudzo munyika. VaMuparaganda vanotyira kuti nhengo dzavo dzichatadza kuvhota dzadzingwa. Asi patabvunza VaMuparaganda kuti sei vachifunga izvozvo sezvo kanzura wenzvimbo iyi iri nhengo yeZanu PF, vati kanzura Amai Ellen Mwachirimba vari kushanda nekambani yeZIMASCO. Vatiwo Amai Mwachirimba vaitsigira chikwata cheLacoste icho chairwisana neG40 kuti vatore masimba apo vaimbove mukuru wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakanga vasati vabviswa pachigaro gore rapera muna Mbudzi. Asi Kanzura Amai Mwachirimba vanoti vanhu vanga vajaira kugara mahara mudzimba dzeZIMASCO vachishandisa zita reZanu PF vachiramba kubhadhara. Amai Mwachimbira vanoti munhu anofanirwa kubhadhara mari yerendi kana kunotaurirana nevaridzi vedzimba kuti anobhadhara sei. Mukuru wekambani yeZIMASCO kuMutorashanga, Amai Fadzai Gono, varamba kutaura nevatori venhau vachiti havabvumirwe nemutemo webasa. Havasi vashandi veZIMASCO chete vari kutarisana nedambudziko iri, sezvo vashandi vemumigodhi vakawanda vari kudzingwa mudzimba dzavaigara vasati varasikirwa nemabasa avo. No media source currently available

headline: America Yogadzirira Kutumira Vaongorori veSarudzo
text: Muzinda weAmerica muZimbabwe unoti gadziriro dzeAmerica dzekuzongorora sarudzo dzemuZimbabwe dzave pachidanho chepamusorosoro. America inoti chikwata chayo chekutanga chatove muZimbabwe chakamirira chikwata chihombe chevaongorori vesarudzo vachazenge vari muZimbabwe vachiongorora sarudzo. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wavaita nemutauriri weNational Assembly, Advocate Jacob Mudenda muHarare, mumwe mushandi mukuru pamuzinda uyu, Amai Jennifer Savage, vati vanofara nezviri kuitwa mukuvandudza mutemo wesarudzo. Asi Amai Savage varamba kutaura pamusoro pekuti vemapato havasi kufara nebhiri rekuvandudza mitemo yesarudzo vachiti vachazopa pfungwa dzavo kana richinge rapasa muparamende. Bhiri iri, iro rakapasa muNational Assembly svondo rapfuura, ratanga neChipiri kuzeiwa mudare reseneti. Amai Savage vati vari kunzwa zvakawanda pamusoro pesarudzo dzegore rino uye tariro yavo ndeyekuti hurumende ichaita zvese zvairi kuvimbisa kuti sarudzo dzinge dzakachena. Amai Savage vati musangano wavo naVaMudenda wange wakanangana nekuvandudza kudyidzana kweZimbabwe neAmerica. Vati America icharamba ichibatsira Zimbabwe mune zvakasiyana siyana uye pari zvino ichangobva mukupa rubatsiro rwemamiriyoni zana nemakumi mashanu emadhora pasi pechirongwa chemutungamiriri wenyika iyi chekurwisana neHIV/AIDS, chePresident’s Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief kana kuti PEPFAR. Zimbabwe iri kuita sarudzo gore rino kekutanga vaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vabva pachigaro uye mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnanangagwa vari kuvimbisa sarudzo dzakajeka. VaMnangagwa vanotiwo vese vanoda kuongorora sarudzo idzi vakasununguka kuita izvi uye hurumende yavo yakatokoka nyika makumi mana neshanu nemasangano gumi nemashanu pasi rese kuti vazoongorore sarudzo idzi. No media source currently available

headline: Vakoti Vanoramba Kuti Vakatambira Mari Dziri Kupiwa neHurumende
text: Sangano rinomirira vakoti, reZimbabwe Nurses Association, ZINA, raramba mashoko ari kuti nhengo dzaro dzakatambira zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana zvemari dzemihoro zvakaziviswa nehurumende svondo rino richiti harina kumbobvira raita musangano nehurumende wekuzeya nezvemari idzi. Mutungamiri weZINA, VaEnock Dongo, vanoti havana kumbobvira vagara pasi nehurumende vachipirwa nezvemari idzi kana kuzeya nezvadzo, uye havatozivi kuti zvikamu zviri kutaurwa nezvazvo zvinenge zviri zvikamu zvemihoro yavo yakasangana nemari dzekubatsirika here kana kuti kwete. VaDongo varambawo zvakare mashoko ekuti vakoti vakawanda vadzokera kumabasa, vachiti vagara vachienda kumabasa asi vachishanda mazuva maviri pasvondo avakawirirana nemushandirwi sezvo vasina mari dzekufambisa mazuva ose. Vanoti vashandi vari kunzi vadzokera kumabasa kana kuti vari kuonekwa kumabasa kwavo vazhinji vacho vanogona kunge vakadzokera sezvo vakoti vari kutyisidzirwa. Vanoti vakatoenda kumatare vachipikisa nyaya yekumanikidzwa kudzokera kumabasa iyi uye ichapinda mudare neChishanu. Bepanhau reHerald razivisa kuti vakoti vagamuchira zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana zviri kuwedzerwa kuvashandi vose vehurumende kutanga mwedzi uno, kunyange hazvo vari kuti hazvisvitsi mihoro yavo pavanotarisira chaipo. Mamwe masangano evashandi vehurumende anosanganisira evarairidzi akatobuda pachena kare achiramba zvikamu zvakaziviswa nehurumende izvi achiti zvishoma. Vashandi vehurumende vari kuda kuti mihoro yavo idzokere pamadhora mazana mashanu nemakumi maviri emari yekuAmerica, iyo vaitambira muna Gumiguru 2018. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi VaDongo vanoti mashoko ekuti vakatambira zvikamu izvi akanangana nekupesanisa vashandi vehurumende. Vanoti mari dzemihoro dzavanotambira chete imari dzinenge dzawiriranwa kumusangano weNational Joint Negotiating Council, NJNC, kwete dzinotaurwa mumapepanhau. Vamiriri vevashandi vehurumende nevamiriri vehurumende vari kutarisirwa kusangana zvakare kumusangano weNational Joint neChishanu uye hurumende yatokoka vashandi kumusangano uyu. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari Vopengera Mitero yeMigwagwa kuMasvingo
text: Vagari vemudhorobha reMasvingo vanoti havasi kufara nezviri kuitwa nekanzuru yavo zvekuti vabhadhariswe mitero yekushandisa migagwa yeguta iri, kana kuti roda levy, ivo vasina kuwirirana nekanzuru yavo. Vagari vanoti vakatsamwa nedanho iri nekuti kanzuru haina kuuya kwavari kuzotsvaga pfungwa dzavo. Zviri kunyanya kuvarwadza ndezvekuti pachine mutauro pamusoro pechimwe chirongwa chakadai, icho vagari vanoti havana kuona zvakashandiswa mari dzavaibatirwa. Mumwe mugari, VaPaul Rimai, vanoti kanzuru yavo haina kupinda muvanhu zvakakwana kuti ipihwe mvumo yekutora mari inoita madhora mana paimba yoga yoga. Masvingo ine vagari vanosvika zviuru makumi matatu. Izvi zvinoreva kuti kanzuru ichange ichiwana mari inoita zana nemakumi maviri ezviuru zvamadhora pamwedzi kubva kuvagari. Mugari wekuMucheke, VaSamson Gororo, vanoti havaoni kushanda kwechirongwa ichi sezvo munharaunda yavo musina migwagwa yakagadzirwa pavakambobhadhara mari dzavo. Asi meya weguta reMasvingo, VaHubert Fidze, vanoti chirongwa ichi chakadzoswa mushure mukuwirirana nevagari paigadzirwa bhajeti regore rino. VaFidze vanoti chirongwa ichi chakakosha kugadzirisa migwagwa yashata mudhorobha sezvo mari yemigwagwa inobva kuhurumende nebazi reZinara iri shoma, Vati vachatsanangurira vagari kuti mari iyi vachaishandisa sei. Asi vanotungamirira kufambiswa kwebasa musangano rinomirira kodzero dzevagari, reMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance, VaAnoziva Muguti, vanoti vagari havana kupihwa mukana wakakwana kuti vape pfungwa dzavo panyaya iyi "Zvavari kutaura kuti vakaita ma consultations nevanhu pamabhajeti tinozviramba nekuti ma meeting avo vaimaita vasina kushambadzwa zvakakwana kuchiinda vanhu vashoma uye nguva dzavakaita vanhu vaiva kumabasa, ivo chavakakonewa sema councilors vaifanira kuenda ku maward avo kwete zvebhajeti,: Vadaro VaMuguti. Sangano iri rinoti riri kukurudzira nhengo dzaro kuti dzisabhadhare mari iyi kusvikira vagara pasi nekanzuru vachionesana zvakanaka panyaya iyi. Kanzuru inotarisirwa kuwana mari inoita miriyoni imwe nemamazana mana ane makumi mana ezviuru zvemadhora pagore kubva kumitero yemigwagwa. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vorasikirwa neMari Vachiyedza Kunotsvaga Mabasa paMuzinda weSouth-Sudan muHarare
text: Vanhu vazhinji nemusi weChipiri vakafambira dhongi rakaora kumuzinda weSouth-Sudan muZimbabwe kuBelgravia mushure memashoko aifamba pamadandemutande eFacebook neWhatsApp kuti muzinda uyu wange uchizotora vanhu vanoda mabasa kuti vaende kunyika iyi. Nyika yeSouth Sudan haina kugadzikana sezvo muguta guru renyika iyi reJuba muchigara muine hondo. Vari kurwisana muSouth-Sudan ndevanotsigira mutungamiri wenyika iyi VaSalva Kiir nevaimbova mutevedzeri wavo VaRiek Machar. Vakawanda vaenda kumuzinda uyu muHarare vabva vachiridza tsamwa sezvo mashoko ekuti pange pachida kutorwa vanhu kuti vange vachipinda mabasa anzi ndeemanyepo. Asi aka handi kekutanga vanhu vachiita chipata pata chekuenda pamuzinda uyu sezvo vanamukoti vakambonyeperwa kuti kwaita mabasa muna Chikumi vakaendawo kumuzinda uyu. Gurukota rinoona nezvehutano Dr David Parirenyatwa vakati kunyangwe hurumende yainge yazivisa kuti iri kushanda neSouth-Sudan kutsvagira vanhu mabasa, kusvika parizvino hapana chibvumirano chati chaitwa. Izvi zvakakonzerwawo nekuti pana vanamukoti vanodarika zviuru zvitatu vasina mabasa. Nyaya yekunyeperwa kwavanamukoti yakatozeyiwa mudare reparamende. Mumwe wevanhu vapumha dova vachienda kumuzinda weSouth Sudan ndiVaSamson Chitema avo vati kunyangwe kuSouth Sudan kusina kugadzikana, kuri nani pane kugara muZimbabwe. Muzvare Miriam Mugodhi avo vange vachiratidza kurwadziwa zvikuru pamwe nekushupikana vati vabva kuBulawayo chaiko. Vati vange vatofunga kuti mudzimu wavaona sezvo vaine magwaro anodiwa. . VaPeter Museve avo vakaita zvidzidzo zveMasters vaudza Studio 7 kuti mamiriro aita zvinhu munyika apa kuti vanhu vaende havo kuSouth-Sudan uko kunogara kuchirira pfuti. Studio 7 yataurawo naVaJames Mukomva avo vati havasisina tarisiro yemabasa pasi pehurumende yemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Kunyangwe zvazvo nyika yeSouth-Sudan ichitevedza tsika dzechiMuslim Mukurru weZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Dr Pedzisai Ruhanya avvanoongorora magariro evanhu pamwe nezvematongerwo enyika vati vana veZimbabwe vazhinji vacho vanotendera muchiKristu havasisina hanya nekwavanowana mabasa. Dr Ruhanya vati kuoma kwehupenyu munyika kuri kuita kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvitsvake mabasa chero kwaamuka. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende inofanira kudzika mitemo inokwezva vemabhizimisi vekunze nekuti nyika yaenda kumawere. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemunyori mukuru musangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions VaJaphet Moyo avo vati vashandi vari pamabasa paerizvino havasi kutambiriswa mari dzemihoro uye makambani akawanda ari kuramba achivharwa. Mutungamiri webato rePDP uye vaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi, VaTendai Biti vanoti zvakawanda zvinoda kuitwa nehurumende kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi. Vachitsvaga rutsigiro pasarudzo dzemuna 2013, vebato reZanu PF vakavimbisa kuti vachaumba mabasa anosvika mamiriyoni maviri. Asi kusvika pari zvino makambani ari kuramba achivharwa zvichisiya vazhinji kunyangwe vakadzidza vasina chekubata. Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vanoti nyaya yezvirango ndiyo iri kupa kuti Zimbabwe itadza kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti VaMugabe ndivo vari kutadza kutungamira zvikuru vachitadza kugadzirisa nyaya dzehuori. Kunyangwe zvazvo Studio 7 isina kukwanisa kutaura nemumiriri wemuzinda weSouth-Sudan muZimbabwe uyo ange asipo, pamukova wemuzinda uyu pange pakanamirwa mapepa ange achizivisa veruzhinji kuti mashoko aishambadzwa ekuti vaitora vanhu vekunoshanda kunyika yavo ange ari emanyepo. Munguva pfupi yapfuura, zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakanyeperwa kuti kwainge kwaita mabasa kuKuwait neSaudi Arabia asi zvikazoguma zvobatwa senhapwa munyika idzi.  No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weNyika, VaMnangagwa, Vovimbisa Kuti Hurumende Yavo Iri kuGadzirisa Matambudziko Akanangana neZvehupfumi
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vati hurumende yavo haisi kuzosiya vezvitoro vachitara mitengo inobira veruzhinji uye vachaona kuti madiro ajojina ari kuitika mune zvehufumi amiswa. Vachitaura pakuvhura zviri pamutemo musangano wezvebudiriro yehupfumi, weZimbabwe Economic Development Conference 2022 vanga uri kuVictoria Falls, VaMnangagwa vatiwo hurumende yavo ichadzika matanho achavedzera chivimbo muboka rezvehupfumi. VaMnangagwa vapindawo musangano wevatongi vematare edzimhosva weRegional Judicial Services Conference uri kuitirwa kwakare kuVictoria Falls kuti zvirongwa zvehurumende yavo zvakanangana nekuvhurwa kwemabhimusi matsva nekuwedzera zvigadzirwa nekutengeserana, zvinofanirwa kuwedzerwa kuburikidza nekusimbiswa kwemitemo yeCompetition Act neConsumer Protection Act. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vanoti misangano iyi yakanaka chose, asi inofanirwawo kunge ichipindwa nevose vane chekuita nebandiko remabhizimusi kuitira kugadzirisa matambudziko aripo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanachiremba Voramba Nyaya yeHurumende yeKugumura Vashandi Mabasa
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvezvehupfumi dzichiri kuzeya mashoko egurukota rinoona nezvehupfumi VaPatrick Chinamasa ekuti zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi hazvina kumira zvakanaka uye vave kuda kugumura vamwe vashandi nekuwedzera mitero yavanobatirwa nehurumende. Nemusi weChipiri, sangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association rakabatanawo nevamwe vashandi kushora danho iri. Vanachiremba mumashoko avo kuvatori venhau vakati vari kushanda vari vashoma uye vari kushanda kwenguva yakareba. Vanotiwo vari kuda kuwedzerwa mari yavanopihwa kana vadaidzwa kubasa kana kuti on call allowance kubva padhora nemakumi mashanu paawa kusvika pamadhora mazana manomwe nemakumi maviri pamwedzi. Vanachiremba vanoti zvichemo zvavo zvikasagadziriswa uye vakanyimwa bhonasi muna zvita vachazotora matanho akaomarara avasina kutaura. Mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike vanoti zvinhu muzvipatara hazvina kumira zvakanaka uye vati hurumende inofanira kubvisa pabasa vechidiki vebato iri vari mumatunhu ose vari kungopihwa mari dzehurumende vasina zvavari kuita. No media source currently available

headline: Zambuko reKazungula Rozeyiwa neZvaro
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kupesana pfungwa panyaya yekuti Zimbabwe inowana chouviri here pazambuko reKazungula kana kuti kwete. Zambuko iri riri pakati peZimbabwe, Zambia neBotswana. Zimbabwe iyo yakange yambobuda mumushandirapamwe neBotswana neZambia muna 2010 inoti yakazoona zvakakosha kuti ipindezve muhurongwa uhu. Nemusi weSvondo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakabatana nemutungamiri wenyika yeBotswana, VaIan Khama, uye mutungamiri weZambia, VaEdgar Lungu, kuti vaone zvaitwa pari zvino pakuvakwa kwezambuko reKazungula riri pakati penyika nhatu idzi. Asi nekuda kwekusawirana nevaive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, zambuko iri riri kuvakwa richinyenyeredza Zimbabwe richienda kuNamibia zvishoma. Izvi zvapa kuti mari yekurivaka iwande sezvo rakazowedzera nemamwe makiromita mazana matatu. VaMnangagwa mushure memusangano naVaKhama vakati vaida kuti Zimbabwe idzoke muhurongwa uhu. Chibvumirano chiripo ndechekuti Zimbabwe ipinde muchikamu chepiri apo ichavakirwa One Stop Border Post kudivi reBotswana. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wesangano re Confederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaCallisto Jokonya, vanoti zvakaitwa naVaMnangagwa zvinokudzwa zvikuru. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvezvehupfumi vari mukuru wezvedzidzo paZimbabwe Ezekiel Gutu University Doctor Gift Mugano vanoti zambuko iri rakakosha kuZimbabwe. Asi Doctor Mugano vatiwo zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe isangoti yapinda muchibvumirano asi isingakwanise kushandisa zambuko iri nemazvo. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemutungamiri wePeople's Democratic Party, uye vari vaimbova gurukota rezvemari, VaTendai Biti, avo vati zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe igadzirise mugwagwa weHarare Chirundu sezvo uri iwo ungabatsira mukupundutsa nyika. Doctor Mugano vanoti kuti Zimbabwe ibudirire zvinotoda kuti nyika ive nezvivakwa zvakaita semazambuko aya uye migwagwa. Asi VaJokonya vanoti kunyangwe mugwagwa weHarare kusvika kuBeitbridge wakakosha, zambuko reKazungula harifanire kutarisirwa pasi. Zambuko reKazungula riri kutarisirwa kushandisa mari inosvika mamiriyoni mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu emadhora uye chikwereti kubva kukambani yekuJapan yeInternational Cooperation, African Development Bank neEU-Africa Infrastructure Trust Fund. Kuvakwa kwezambuko iri kuri muzvikamu zvitatu, chekutanga izambuko rine njanji yakareba makiromita mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nematatu, chikamu chechipiri ndeche One Stop Border Post kuBotswana chekupedzisira kuZambia. Zvose zvinoda kuitwa zvinotarisira kupera muna Zvita gore rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: Chirongwa cheTony Elumelu Chobatsira veMabhizinesi Vechidiki muAfrica
text: Vechidiki vemuZimbabwe gumi nemaviri vakapedza zvidzidzo zvavo munyaya dzemabhizimusi kuNigeria mukupera pesvondo pasi pechirongwa che Tony Elumelu Entrepreneurship Program. Vechidiki ava vanoti vakawana ruzivo rwakadzama ruchavabatsira mukusimudzira mabhizimusi avo. No media source currently available Zvidzidzo zvavo izvi zvakaitwa mukati memwedzi mitatu yapfuura vari muZimbabwe uye nemusi weChishanu vakanopedzisa hurongwa uhu kuNigeria. Mumwe wevechidiki ava, ndiVa Tawanda Musvaire, vanova muridzi wekambani yeGoshen International Private Limited, iyo inogadzira zvinhu zvakasiyana siyana kubva mumarara. Va Musvaire vanoti kusangana nevamwe vadzidzi pasi pechirongwa ichi kwakavavhurisa dzepfungwa nebasa ravanoita, uye vanotenda chirongwa ichi. Vanoti izvi zvichavabatsira mukusimudzira bhizimusi ravo. Zvinonzi gondo rashaya nhiyo rinokumba chero marara. Asi VaMusvaire vanoti ivo vari kukumba marara kwete nekuti vashaya nhiyo, asi kuti iri ibasa ravanofarira zvikuru uye rinobatsira kuchengetedza zvakatikomberedza. Muzvare Mellisa Mazingi ndemumwe wevechidiki vanga vari muchirongwa ichi. Muzvare Mazingi, avo vane website inotengesa mbatya, vatsinhirawo mashoko ava Musvaire ekuti chirongwa ichi chavabatsira zvikuru. Chirongwa cheTony Elumelu Entrepreneurship Program chakaparurwa nemuzvinabhizimusi weku Nigeria, Va Tony Elumelu, gore papera nechinangwa chekubatsira vechidiki venyika dzakasiyana siyana muAfrica vane mabhizimusi achiri kutanga. Vakapinda muchirongwa chekutanga ichi, vanosvika chiuru chimwe chete uye vekuZimbabwe vari gumi nevaviri. Mumwe nemumwe achapihwa mari inosvika zviuru gumi zvemadhora kubva kuTony Elumelu Foundation yekuvabatsira kudzamisa mabhizimusi avo. Pamari yakapihwa, vachange vachizodzosera zviuru zvishanu zvemadhora nekufamba kwenguva. Vamwe vemuZimbabwe vanosanganisira Va Mcwilton Chikwenengere, VaMehluli Dube, VaIgnatius Tichaona Dzingirai, Muzvare Senzeni Mpofu, VaKevin Victor Mtutu, VaJohn Muketsi, VaIan Mutamiri, Tendayi Muwomo, VaHerbert Nderezina naVaTinashe Nyoni. No media source currently available

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri Kunze Zvokurudzirwa Kutaura neZwi Rimwe
text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zviri kukurudzirwa kuti zvitaure nezwi rimwechete kuitira kuti zvichemo neshuviro dzavo zvive nemutsindo pazvinenge zvosvitwa kuhurumende kumusha. Izvi zvinonzi zvinokwanisika chete kuburikidza nekushanda pamwe kwemasangano akasiyanasiyana anomirira vana veZimbabwe vari munyika dzakasiyanasiyana, zvinove zviri kuitwa nesangano reZimbabwe Diaspora Nation Building Initiative, iro rinobatanidza masangano ari munyika dzakasiyanasiyana. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Diaspora Nation Building Initiative uye vari sachigaro veZimbabwe Diaspora Network-UK, Doctor Paul Matsvai, vanoti sangano ravo rine masangano anomirira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri munyika dzakasiyanasiyana akawanda, uye vane mamwe mapoka avari kuvaka iye zvino izvi kune dzimwe nzvimbo dzanga dzisati dzave nemasangano akadai, kwakaita sekuSouth Africa. "Chikuru chinoitika ndechekuti. munoona kana ukangomira uri mumwechete uchikumbira pane chimwe chunhu chinonetsa iwe semugari wekunze, kashoma kuti uwane vanhu vangakuteerera vakawanda. Asi makaungana makaenda makarongeka, izwi renyu rinodiniwo, rinobva ranzwika zvakajeka. Saka kubatana kwenyu kunoitawo futi nezvamunenge muchida kuitira nyika zvikukumuke," vanodaro Doctor Matsvai. Vanoti chikuru chiri kuitwa nesangano ravo pane ino nguva kuongorora kugadziridzwa kwemutemo weZimbabwe Diaspora Policy, uyo unonzi uri kutsvaga kuzadzisa zvinodiwa nevana veZimbabwe vari kunze, zvinosanganisira nyaya dzezvehupfumi, zvemabhizimusi, kodzero yekuvhota vari munyika dzavagere, uyewo kuti vave zvizvarwa zvenyika mbiri, Zimbabwe nenyika dzavagere. Hurumende inonzi yakatambira gwaro rekuumbwa kwemutemo weZimbabwe Diaspora Policy muna Nyamavhuvhu wegore rino uye zvinonzi pave nemisangano yave kuitwa yekukwenenzvera gwaro iri nekuti ringe rave nezvose zvinobva kune mapoka ane chekuita nehurongwa uhwu panopera mwedzi uno waGunyana. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Voudza Dzimwe Nyika Zvinoda Kuitwa muNyaya dzeHutano, Asi Vanamukoti muNyika Vachironga Kuramwa Mabasa
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nemusi weMuvhuro vakavhura zviri pamutemo musangano webazi reUnited Nations rinoona nezvehutano kana kuti World Health Organization kuVictoria Falls wechimakumi matanhatu nesere kana kuti 67th Session of the WHO Regional Committee for Africa Conference. Asi pabva paita mhute munyika apo vanamukoti vakazivisa kuti vapa hurumende mavhiki maviri ekuti vave kuda kukanda mapadza pasi zvekare nenyaya yekusawirirana panyaya dzemihoro. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu VaMugabe vati nyika dzemuAfrica dzinofanira kutsvaga mari kuendesa mari kumabasa ezvehutano uye vatiwo Zimbabwe yakaedza kuita izvi nekuumba homwe yeAids levy yave kubatsirawo munyaya yekurapa chirwere chegomarara. Nyika dzemuAfrica dziri kukundikanawo chibvumirano chadzakaita kuAbuja, Nigeria muna 2001 chekuona kuti mari inosvika zvikamu gumi neshanu zvebhajeti yenyika zvaenda kunyaya dzezvehutano. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnock Dongo vanoti havasi kufara nenya yekuti vamwe vanamukoti vanoita basa rehumaneja nevanodzidzisa vanotambira mari shoma zvichienzaniswa nevari pasi pavo kana vari pasi ava vakashanda maawa akati wandei pane akatarwa kana kuti e"over time". Vanoti vanamukoti vakatoendesa tsamba kuHealth Services Board, bhodhi rinoona nezvemari dzavo vachitaura nezvekuda kuramwa mabasa kwavo. No media source currently available Asi mukuru weHealth Services Board Dr Lovemore Mbengeranwa vanoti vari kuziva dambudziko iri asi pari zvino hurumende haina mari. No media source currently available

headline: ZIMTA Inoti Nhengo Dzayo Hadzichakwanisa Kuramba Dzichienda Kumabasa
text: Rimwe sangano rinomirira varairidzi, re Zimbabwe Teachers Association (ZIMTA), rabatanawo nemamwe masangano evarairidzi pakuzivisa kuti nhengo dzaro hadzichakwanisa kuramba dzichienda kumabasa sezvo dzisisina mari dzekufambisa. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaRichard Gundani, vanoti nhengo dzavo dzichange dzichienda kumabasa kaviri chete pasvondo, Muvhuro neChishanu. VaGundani vanoti danho ratorwa nesangano ravo rinotsinhira danho rakaziviswa nesangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende, re APEX Council, rekuti vashandi vehurumende vakanga vasisakwanise kuramba vachienda kumabasa mazuva ose. Asi mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaEnergy Mutodi vakaudza Studio 7 neSvondo kuti hurumende yakasununguka kuramba ichiita hurukuro nevashandi vayo pamusoro pemihoro yavo. Masangano anomiririra varairidzi, e Propgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe neAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, ndemamwe masangano evarairidzi akatozivisa kare kuti nhengo dzawo dzakanga dzisisakwanise kuramba dzichienda kumabasa. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, sangano rinomiririra varairidzi vekumaruwa, re Amalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, rinoti nhengo dzaro dzave kutangidza kuratidzira vhiki yega yega kusvika hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvevarairidzi. Mutungamiriri wesangano iri, VaObert Masaraure, vaudza Studio 7 kuti sangano ravo richatangidza kudzidzisa nekubatsira vana vechikoro pa nzvimbo dzavachazivisa asi kwete muzvikoro. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kubazi re zvedzidzo kuti izvi zvichibvumidzwa here nemitemo yenyika. No media source currently available

headline: VaZuma Vanoti Havasi Gweta Nekudaro Havangataure nezveNyaya yaAmai Mugabe Yekusaendeswa kuMatare
text: Mutungamiri wenyika wenyika yeSouth Africa VaJacob Zuma nemusi weChina vakaudza dare reparamende renyika yavo kuti hapana chavanokwanisa kutaura nenyaya yemudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika yeZimbabwe Amai Grace Mugabe padanho rakatorwa nehurumende yavo rekuti vasaendeswe kumatare kana kuti kupihwa “diplomatic immunity” Vanotungamira bato rinopikisa reDemocratic Alliance muSouth Africa VaMmuse Maimane ndemumwe akabvunza nezvekuregererwa kwaAmai Mugabe. Amai Mugabe vari kupomerwa mhosva yekurova imwe tsvarakadenga Gabriella Engels mushure mekumuwana ari muhotera kuSandton, Johannesburg nevana vavo vaviri, Robert Junior naChatunga Bellamine. Kunyangwe hazvo Amai Mugabe vakadzokera kumusha, gweta raMuzvare Gabriella VaWillie Spies vaudza Studio 7 kuti dare repamusoro muSouth Africa richazeya kuti zvainge zvakakodzera here. Nyaya iyi iri kunzwikwa musi wa 19 Gunyana. Gweta VaGabriel Shumba vanoti nyaya yaAmai Grace Mugabe inokonzera matambudziko kuhurumende yeSouth Africa ndosaka zvichinetsa kuti VaZuma vanyatsobuda pachena kuti chii chakatora nzvimbo. No media source currently available

headline: Zuva reInternational Literacy Day Rinosvika Dzidzo Iri Parumananzombe neCovid-19
text:
Nyika dzepasi rose dzacherechedza zuva reInternational Literacy Day nhasi panguva iyo pasi rese riri kuvhiringirwa dzidzo nedenda reCovid-19. Zuva ranhasi nderekurangarira kukosha kwakaita kugona kunyora nekuverenga. Asi zuva iri racherechedzwa nhasi pasi rose rakatarisana nedenda reCovid-19 iro riri kuvhiringa dzidzo munyika dzakawanda. Mumwe mudzidzisi ari nhengo yeProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaRosten Mutapa, vati denda reCovid-19 riri kutadzisa vana vakawanda kuti vadzidze sezvo zvikoro zviri kuvharwa nguva dzakawanda, uye vabereki vasina mari dzekuti vana vavo vashandise madandemutande.

Mutungamiri weAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vatiwo dambudziko reCovid-19 riri kutadzisa kuti vana vatange chikoro vave nezera rinodiwa uye vamwe vachatorega chikoro sezvakaita vamwe miriyoni imwechete kubva gore rapera.

Mutauriri weZimbabwe Teachers Association, VaGoodwill Taderera, vati kudzidza kuburikidza nepamaredhiyo hazvishande sezvo vana vasina zvikwanisiro zvikuru vana vekumaruwa.

Asi mutauriri webato rinopikisa reMDC T, VaWitness Dube, vati nyaya
yechirwere cheCovid-19 haisi iyo iri kutadzisa kuti vana vasadzidze
sezvo vana vari kudzidza mudzimwe nyika munguva ino yeCovid-19.

Mutauriri webazi rezvedzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro, vati hurumende
iri kuedza zvikuru kupa mukana wekudzidza kuvana kuburikidza nekudzidza pamadandemutande pamwe nemaredhiyo.

Zuva reInternational Literacy Day rakatanga kucherechedzwa mugore ra1966 uye mhemberero dzegore rino dziri kuitwa pasi pedingindira
rekuti:“Literacy for a human-centered recovery: Narrowing the digital
divide”. No media source currently available

headline: Covid-19 Inobata Vanhu Vanodarika Zviuru Zvina neMazana Masere
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vakanga vabatwa nechirwere che Covid-19 munyika vaive vasvika pazviuru zvina nemazana masere negumi nevasere, kana kuti 4 818. Vanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika yose vachiri zana nevana kana kuti 104, uye vapona vasvika kuchiuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi mana nevana, kana kuti 1 544. Vanhu vanoita makumi manomwe, kana kuti 70, ndivo vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi pavanhu chiuru nemazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu, kana kuti 1 795 vakavhenekwa pachishandiswa nzira ye Polymerase Chain Reaction kana kuti PCR. Vanhu vose vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi ndevaya vagara vari munyika vasina nhoroondo yekubuda kunze. Nhepfenyuro yeZBC yakazivisawo nezuro kuburikidza nedandemutande reTwitter kuti vashandi vayo makumi matatau vakabatwa ne Covid-19. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reZBC pamusoro pevanhu vakabatwa neCovid-19 ava. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano vari chiremba, Doctor Gilson Mandigo, vanoti vari kuona kuti pave nemusiyano mukuru pahuwandu hwevanhu vave kubatwa nekushaya nechirwere ichi, zvichienzaniswa nepakatanga chirwere ichi kuwanikwa munyika sezvo vanhu vave kuwanikwa vaine chirwere ichi vari vanhu vagara vari munyika, kwete vari kubva kunze kwenyika. Doctor Mandigo vanoti zvinoratidza kuti vanhu vanofanirwa kusimbisa nyaya dzekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Dzidziso yeNhomba yeCovid-19 Yokurudzirwa Kupihwa Veruzhinji
text: Mukuru wesangano riri kudzidzisa veruzhinji nezvechirwere cheCovid-19 rePerch Media, VaCollen Magobeya, vanoti vapedza kubayiwa nhomba dzavo mbiri vachiti semunhu anoshanda neveruzhinji zvinovabatsira kuti vasatapurirwa kana kutapurira vamwe chirwere. VaMagobeya vanoti havo dzidziso ichiri kudiwa kuitira kuti veruzhinji vanzwisise nezvenhomba iyi kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisadzoke zvakare zvine hukasha. Zimbabwe ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi. Asi vanhu vabayiwa nhomba iyi kusvika pari zvino vachiri vashoma zvichienzaniswa nevanotarisirwa kunge vabayiwa. Mukuzeya nyaya iyi, tabata VaMagobeya. No media source currently available

headline: Kurudziro yaVaChombo Yekudzinga Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa Yotsviriridza
text: Vanhu vakawanda vanoti kutengeswa kwezvinhu mumigwagwa zvisina kurongeka dziko kuri kukonzera dambudziko remarara muguta reHarare nemamwe maguta. Vanhu ava vanotiwo izvi zviri kukonzerawo zvirwere sezvo marara ari kungorasirwa pose pose. Mashoko everuzhinji aya anotevera mashoko anonzi akataurwa negurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu, VaIgatius Chombo, ekuti vanhu vari kutengesera mumigwagwa vanofanirwa kubviswa nekukasika. Asi veruzhinji vanoti hurumende yaVaChombo ndiyo honzeri sezvo iri kukundikana kuwanisa vanhu mabasa uye yakaregerera vanhu ava vachiita pamadiro kubva kare. Vachitaura mukupera kwesvondo pamusangano wepagore wemameya pamwe nemasachigaro emakanzuru wechimakumi manomwe nenhatu (73rd Urban Councils Association of Zimbabwe), wakaitirwa kuBulawayo, VaChombo vanonzi vakati panofanirwa kutorwa matanho nechimbichimbi ekuti vanotengesera mumigwagwa vange vachibviswa sezvo vari kukanganisa nyaya dzehutano uye nzvimbo dzinogara vanhu. Studio7 yakundikana kubata VaChombo panyaya iyi. Asi meya weguta reHarare, VaBernard Manyenyeni, avo vakapindawo musangano uyu, vabvuma kuti ichokwadi kuti VaChombo vakataura mashoko aya. VaManyenyeni vanoti dzimwe nguva mabatirwo anoitwa zvitengeswa zvinosanganisira zvekudya, anotyora mitemo yekutengeswa kwezvekudya. Vanoti dzimwe nguva vanotengesa zvinhu ava vanotiza mapurisa vachipedzisira voviga zvinhu zvavo zvinosanganisira zvekudya munzvimbo dzisina kukodzera dzakaita semumigero inorasa mvura. No media source currently available No media source currently available

headline: Vanorarama neKutengesa Vonyunyuta neKusiiwawo muHurongwa Hwemari yeKubatsira veMabhizimusi
text: Sangano Vendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, kana kuti VISET, rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru nemashoko egurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube ekuti mari yekubatsira vemabhizimi munguva yekurwisa denda reCovid-19 yakaiswa parutivi nehurumende inosvika mabhiririyo gumi nemasere kana kuti 18 billion RTGS haisi kuzopihwa vanozviitira mabasa emaoko. VaChitaura mudare reparamende svondo rapera, VaNcube vakati mari iyi ichakwereteswa vemabhizimisi makuru kuburikidza nemabhanga uye RBZ iri kuisa mari yechibatiso inosvika zvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana. VISET inoti vemabhizimi madiki nevanozviitira mabasa emaoko vari kudawo rubatsiro sezvo vari kutatarika kumutsiridza mabhizimisi avo akanganiswawo nechirwere cheCovid-19. Mukuru weVISET VaSamuel Wadzayi vanotiwo hurumende inokwanisa kushanda nemakanzuru kugadziridza misika yekuti vakwanise kushanda vakasungunuka. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaNcube sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reCoomunity Working Group on Health Ropa Dzidziso Pamusoro peCovid-19
text: Mukuru wesangano reCoomunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti sangano ravo riri kushanda mumatunhu akawanda emunyika richidzidzisa vanoita zvehutano munharaunda pamwe vechidiki pamusoro pekudzivirirwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19, avo vanozodzidzisawo vamwe. Izvi zvinouya panguva iyo matunhu anoti Bulawayo, Matabeleland North neMatabeleland South ari kusangana nedambudziko rekukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kufa pamwe nekubatwa nechirwere kubva mwedzi wapera. VaRusike vanotiwo sangano ravo riri kushandawo mumatunhu anoti Manicaland, Masvingo neMidlands, uko vari kubatana nanambuya hutano mukupa dzidziso kuti veruzhinji vazive nzira dzekudzvirira kupararira kwedenda iri. Sangano reCommunity Working Group on Health riri kukwanisa kupinda mumaruwa kuburikidza nemabhasikoro arakapiwa nesangano reWorld Bicycle Relief. Asi vanoti kuti nyika ibudirire kudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiwana hunokonzera chirwere ichi, hurumende pamwe nemakanzuru zvinofanirwa kuona kuti vanhu vawaniswa mvura kayachena yekushandisa kugeza maoko pamwe nekuzvishambidza, uyewo vari kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vachengetedze mitemo yakatarwa nebazi rezvehutano pamwe neWorld Health Organisation. Asi VaRusike vanoti kana hurumende yakazofunga kutora matanhu ekurambidza veruzhinji kufambafamba, haifanirwe kubva yavhara nyika yose sezvakamboitika pakutanga, sezvo vazhinji vevanhu munyika vachirarama nekuzviitira mabasa emaoko. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Vonanga kuNew York Kunopfachura Nyika Isina Mari yeMushonga
text: Hurumende iri kushorwa zvikuru nenyaya yekusafambisa mari dzebhajeti zvakanaka zvopa kuti vanhu vambopota vachishaya mishonga yakaita semaARV, nemishonga yegomarara, uye mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. Kunyangwe hazvo bhanga guru renyika riri kutatarika kuburitsa mari dzekutenga zvinhu zvakakosha izvi, mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vari kutarisirwa kuenda kuNew York, muAmerica nevana vavo, vakuwasha, vamwe vehukama nemakurukota vanosvika makumi manomwe uye vanonzi vari kupihwa mari yakawanda zvikuru. VaMugabe nechikwata chavo ichi vari kutarisirwa kunge vari muNew York musi wa 19 kusvika musi wa 23 Gunyana. Nyanzvi munyaya ndzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti zvinhu muhomwe yehurumende hazvina kumira zvakanaka nenyaya yekutadza kubata bhajeti yenyika zvakanaka. Vaimbova gurukota rezvemari, VaTendai Biti, vanoti pose panobuda VaMugabe munyika vanobuda nemari inosvika mamiriyoni mana emadhora zvinopa kuti nyika izotadza kutenga zvinhu zvakakosha. Va Kanyenze vanoti mari iri kuendeswa kuhofisi yaVaMugabe yakawandisa uye kunyika yakaita seZimbabwe zvinokonzera matambudziko. Asi nhengo yeZanu-PF inova sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaKindness Paradza, vanoti VaMugabe semutungamiri wenyika vane kodzero yekufamba. Mukuru wesangano reThe AIDS and Arts Foundation Zimbabwe Program iro rinoshanda nevechidiki vanorarama neHIV/AIDS, VaEmmanuel Gasa, vanoti mimwe mishonga iri kumbopota ichishomeka nenyaya yekusakosheswa kwenyaya dzezvehutano. Asi vachitaura paVOA LiveTalk, mazvikokota munyaya dzezvehutano, Dr Elophi Sibanda, vakati mushonga weAbacavir wave kuda kubviswa nekuti uri kukonzera mamwe marwadzo. VaGasa vatendawo izvi asi vakati kuda kutenga mimwe mishonga kuri kukona n’anga murapwa achida. VaGasa vanotiwo kushandisa mari yemabond notes kuri kutopa kuti zvinhu zviome. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Dr Edgar Munatsa, vatiwo mishonga mizhinji iri kushaikwa muzvipatara zvehurumende. Kunyangwe vatenda kuti mari iri kunonoka kuuya kubva kuReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, gurukota rinoona nezvehutano, Dr David Parirenyatwa, vati mishonga yange yave kushaikwa yavepo. Mune mamwe madhorobha munonzi muri kumbopotawo muchishaikwa mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari zvinonzi nenyanzvi zvichapa kuti hupfumi hutoenda kumawere. Zimbabwe yakatarisana nedambudziko rekushaya simba kwemari yayo zvakapa kuti ishandise mari dzekunze dzakawanda muna 2009. Asi nekutadza kugadzirisa hupfumi uye nyaya yehuori, hupfumi hwaenda kumawere. Hurumende inoti zvayo matambudziko ari kukonzerwa nezvirango zvayakatemerwa nenyaya yekutora minda kubva kuvachena. Asi vanopikisa vanoti zvirango zvakakonzerwa nekutonga nedemo. No media source currently available

headline: IMF Inoti Zimbabwe Yatsvaira Chikwereti Chayo neSangano Iri
text: Sangano reInternational Monetory Fund, IMF, rinoti Zimbabwe yakwanisa kupedza kubhadhara chikwereti chayo chemari inoda kusvika $108 million, icho change chave nemakore gumi nemashanu.
