Mashoko aburitswa nemukuru wezvekufambiswa kwemashoko muIMF, VaGerry Rice anoti Zimbabwe yakwanisa kuzadzisa basa rayo kuboka reIMF rePoverty Reduction and Growth Trust, kuburikidza nekutamisa mari ingangosvika $107.9 million yanga ichi chengetwa muhomwe yesangano iri, ichiendeswa kuPoverty Reduction and Growth Trust. VaRice vanoti izvi zvave kureva kuti Zimbabwe haichina chikwereti sezvo yave kufambidzana nezviga zveIMF. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara vanoti danho ratorwa neZimbabwe idanho rakakosha zvikuru muhurongwa hwayo hwekubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo. VaChitambara vanoti izvi zvinoita kuti mamwe masangano anokweretesa mari akwanisewo kuchitarisa Zimbabwe nemamwe maonero kubva pamamiriro ayanga yakaita. Vanotiwo izvi zvichaita kuti vemabhizimusi vemuZimbabwe vakwanisewo kukwereta pamisika sezvo zita renyika rinenge ranaka. Asi VaChitambara vanoti izvi hazvisi kuzobatsira Zimbabwe kuti ikwanise kupiwa zvimwe zvikwereti, sezvo ichine zvikwereti kuWorld Bank neAfrican Development Bank. Zimbabwe ine chikwereti chinodarika bhiriyoni remadhora kuWorld Bank, kuchitiwo chimwe chemari inodarika mamiriyoni mazana matanhatu emadhora kuAfrican Development Bank. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvehupfumi, VaPatrick Chinamasa, kanawo gavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe Doctor John Mangudya. No media source currently available

headline: Vakaremara Vokurudzira Kuti Mabhiri eMitemo Anyorwe neMitauro Yose
text: Vanhu vasingaone nevamwe vane hurema hwakasiyana siyana vakawanda vanoti havasi kufara nekusiiwa kwavanoitwa munyaya dzkakosha sezvo zvinyorwa zviri kuburitswa munyika zvinenge zvisiri zve braille kana mune mimwe mitauro inoshandiswa munyika. VaTafadzwa Chidewu, avo vasingaoni, vanoti nguva zhinji panoitwa hurongwa hwekugadziriswa mitemo, paramende haisi kuwanisa vanhu vakaisa saivo magwaro akanyorwa neBraille kuitira kuti vazviverengerewo vonzwisisisa mitemo inenge ichiumbwa. VaChidewu vakaudza Studio 7 kuti: “Zvinhu zvakaita seBraille izvi tinofanirwa kuzvipuwa paine nguva uye zviri in braille tigowerengawo tega tigonzwisisa kuti zviri kuendepi kana kuti zviri kubvepi, nekuti apa chimwe chingezi chacho hatizochinzwisisi asi kana zviri kwedu tinozvinzwisisa. Saka munoziya kuti vazhinji vanorarama nehurema mikana yekuenda kuchikoro yange iri mishoma saka hatina kunyanya kudzidza.” Amai Cathrine Sithole, avo vanogara mumusha weSakubva, vanoti zvakakosha kuti magwaro enyika ange achikwanisa kuverengwa nemunhu wese kuitira kuti munhu wese akwanisewo kupa pfungwa dzake. Mugari wekuHobhouse kwaMutare, VaJames Gweta, vanotiwo hurumende inosungirwa kukoshesa kushandisa mitauro yose iri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika kuitira kuti vanhu vanzwisise mabhiri emitemo yenyika nezvimwe zvine chekuita nenyika. “Panyaya yatiri kuona iyi kune ma-citizens zvikuru kunesu vane ma-disabiliities tinoona pane nyaya ye exclusion pakuti hazvisi muma-local languages edu zvose zvinenge zvichiitwa munyika uyezve kana braille haipo,” vanodaro VaGweta. Pfungwa idzi dzakabudawo pamusangano wakaitirwa maMutare apo paizeyiwa mabhiri emitemo mitsva, uye vanhu vachinzi vapewo pfungwa dzavo. Pamusangano uyu painge pasina zvinyorwa zveBraille, izvo zvisina kufadza vasingaoni. Nhengo yedare reSeneti, VaDavid Parirenyatwa veZanu PF, vakaudza musangano uyu kuti chinangwa chavo chekupinda muvanhu chaive chekunzwa zvinodiwa neveruzhinji, kusanganisira vasingaoni nevamwe vane hurema hwakasiyana siyana. Masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu anotiwo zvakakosha kuti zvose zvinenge zvichiiswa muvanhu zvinge zviri mumitauro inonzwisiswa neveruzvinji sezvo bumbiro remitemo yenyika richiremekedza mitauro yose iri gumi nemitanhatu, kwete kuti mitauro mishoma inge ichishandiswa munyika. No media source currently available

headline: VaSikhala Vopomerwa Dzimwe Mhosva
text: Mumiriri weZengeza West mudare reParamende VaJob Sikhala vakamiswa zvekare pamberi pedare redzimhosv vachipomerwa imwe mhosva itsva. mhosvaVari kupomerwa yekuti vaida kuvhiringidza mapurisa kuferefeta nyaya yekupondwa kwamuzvare MoreBlessing Ali kuNyatsime kuchitungwiza. VaSikhala vanonzi vakati pavhidhiyo muzvare Ali vainge vapondwa nevatsigiri veZanu-PF zviri kunzi nemapurisa aive manyepo. VaSikhala vanova gweta remuhuri yamuzvare Moreblessing Ali vari mutirongo kuChikurubi sezvo vakapomerwa mhosva yekupesvedzera mhirizhonga parufu rwaMuzvare Ali. Magweta anoti mhosva idzi dzakada kungofanana uye kwave kungotsvaga uta nemugate kwemapurisa. Asi gurukota rezvemitemo vaZiyambi Ziyambi vakaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende haisi kuzopeta maoko kana vanopikisa vakaita saVaSikhala vakada kukonzera kusagadzikana munyika. Mutungamiri wenyika vaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakataurawo mashoko aya nezuro vachiti mapato anopikisa ari kuda kukonzera nyonga nyonga munyika. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reCCC VaGift Ostallos Siziba vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende haidi kuona vanhu vanopokisa bato riri kutonga re ZANU PF, saka vanhu ve bato ravo vari kushungurudzwa. No media source currently available Asi vachipawo pfungwa dzavo, ,mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubato reZanu-PF VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo harishungrudze vanopikisa asi haringapete maoko kana paine vanenge vachida kukonzera mhirizhonga munyika. Vanopikisa nevanorwira kodzero dzevnhu vanoti hurumende iri kushandisa mapurisa nematare kuvambunyikidza.

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kurawara neCovid-19 muNyika Hwowedzera Zvakanyanya
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vari kurwara nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika uho hwainge hwamboderera kusvika pazana nemakumi matanhatu nemana kana kuti 164 musi wa12 Gumiguru hwatanga kuwedzerazve zvakanyanya. NeMugovera bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa kuti vanhu makumi maviri nemumwe vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika uye vose havana nhoroondo yekushanya kunze kwenyika. Izvi zviri kureva kuti vanhu vachiri kurwara nechirwere ichi vave mazana mana nemakumi matatu nevatatu kana kuti 433. MuBulawayo ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vari kurwara vanosvika zana negumi nevatanhatu, Harare ine makumi manomwe nemumwe, Matabeleland South ine makumi matanhatu nemumwe, Matabeleland North makumi mashanu nevatanhatu uye dunhu rine vanhu vashoma shoma vari kurwara iMashonaland West ine vanhu vasere. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi hwasvika pazviuru zvisere nemazana manomwe nemakumi masere nematanhatu kana kuti 8, 786. Vanhu vapora kusvika parizvino vave zviuru zvisere nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu kana kuti 8, 096 mushure mekupora kwevanhu vasere neMugovera. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizino vave mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu nevanomwe kana kuti 257. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 1, 9 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zviuru makumi mana nemasere ane zana nemana kana kuti 47, 104. Vapora vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 1, 6 million. South Africa ine vanhu vave kusvika zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi mashanu kana kuti 750 000 vabatwa nechirwere icgi ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi mashanu nemana kana kuti 54 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica chete vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi mana nemashanu kana kuti 245, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vave kuda kusvika mamiriyoni gumi nechimwe kana kuti 11 miillion. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 1, 9. Asi vapora vachida kusvika mamiriyoni makumi matatu nemashanu kana kuti 35 million. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano uye vakambova mukuru wechipatara cheChitungwiza Dr Enoch Mayida vati vanhu vanofanira kugara vakangwarira nekuti vakarivara chirwere ichi chinogona kudzoka zvine hukasha zvochoiita muAmerica, Britain nedzimwe nyika. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vosvika kuYokohama kuMusangano weAfrica neJapan
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vasvika kuJapan kumusangano wechinomwe we Tokyo International Conference on African Development, kana kuti TICAD 7. Musangano uyu uri kuitirwa kuguta reYokohama kwemazuva maviri kutanga nemusi weChitatu. VaMnangagwa vari kubatana nevamwe vatungamiri vemuAfrica kusanganisira VaPaul Kagame vekuRwanda, VaMuhammadu Buhari veku Nigeria, VaCyril Ramaphosa vekuSouth Africa nevamwe. Mutungamiri wenyika ari kutarisirwa kuita musangano nemutungamiri wehurumende yeJapan, VaShinzo Abe, kumucheto wemusangano uyu. Ko misangano yakadai ingabatsire nyika here kana kuti kupedzera hoko padehwe retsindi? Muzvinabhizimisi uye vari nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaGilbert Muponda, vanoti misangano iyi yakakosha sezvo ichipa Zimbabwe mukana wekuumba hukama nedzimwe nyika sezvo yakatemerwa zvirango nenyika dzakaita seAmerica, Britain nedziri mugungano reEuropean Union. Asi vanoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika mubato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, Muzvare Gladys Hlatywayo, vanoti hazvibatsire kusiya musha uchibvira uchiti uri kuenda kunotsvaga madzisahwira. VaMuponda vanoti havo chitsva chiri murutsoka nekudaro hapana chakaipa kumboenda kune dzimwe nyika. Mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti hurumende inofanira kutanga yagadzirisa mitemo inokwezva vemabhizimisi iyo isina kumira zvakanaka. Doctor Kanyenze varambawo nyaya yekuti zvirango ndizvo zviri kupa kuti nyika iite seyakageza negoka munyama vachiti Zimbabwe inofanira kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu nguva dzose. Asi mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaEnergy Mutodi, vanoti hakuna kodzero dzevanhu dziri kutyorwa. Muzvare Hlatywayo vanoti pane humbowo hunoratidza kuti vanhu vari kumbunyikidzwa muZimbabwe vachiitwa kafiramberi. Zimbabwe inoti iri kutarisira kuti ichanyorerana zvibvumirano zvekutengeserana kumusangano uyu, uye VaMnangagwa vari kuda kukumbira mari yekuisa tara pedyo neMana Pools kuMashonaland West. Vanoti vari kudawo kuti Japan ivabatsire pakuyedza kubhadhara mitero pazvikwereti zveZimbabwe kana kuti ma arrears ayo aona Zimbabwe ichinyimwa mari nemabhanga akaita seInternational Monetary Fund neWorld Bank. Sangano remabhizimusi munyika reZimTrade ririkowo kumusangano uyu. Musangano pakati penyika dzemuAfrica neJapan uyu unoitwa kamwe chete mumakore matatu. Musangano wekupedzisira wakaitirwa muKenya muna 2016. Musangano wegore rino uri kuitwa pasi pedingindira rakanangana nekusimudzira budiriro muAfrica kuburikidza nehumhizha kana kuti “Advancing Africa’s Development through People, Technology and Innovation” No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesera muMigwagwa Voramba Kubva Munzvimbo Dzavari Kutengesra
text: Vanotengesera mumigwagwa vanoti havazi kuzobva munzvimbo dzavanotengesera kunyange hurumende yakavapa maawa makumi mana nemasere kuti vabve munzvimbo idzi. Vanotengesera mumigwagwa vanoti havazi kuzobva munzvimbo dzavanotengesera kunyange hurumende yakavapa maawa makumi mana nemasere kuti vabve munzvimbo idzi. Hurumende yakavimbisa kuti ichatumira mauto kuti azobatsira kubvisa vanotengesa kana vachinge varambira munzvimbo dzavari, izvo zvinova zviri kuitika. Mukuru werimwe sangano revanotengesa reVendors Association of Zimbabwe, VaStendrick Zvorwadza, vanoti nhengo dzavo dzakazvipira kurwisana nemauto uye vakatoamirira kuti auye sezvo vasina kwavangaende. Asi kanzuru yeHarare inoti yakagadzira nzvimbo dzakawanda dzinokwanira vose vanotengesera mumigwagwa, asi vanhu ava havasi kuda kuenda munzvimbo idzi. VaZvorwadza vanoti hazvibatsiri kuti hurumende irwise nekudzinga vatengesi mumigwagwa isina kuvagadzirira dzimwe nzvimbo dzekuti vanotengesera, sechivimbiso chavo kuti vachavagadzirira kwekuenda. VaZvorwadza vasimbisa kuti ivo nevamwe vavo vangatosarudze kuurayiwa zvavo nemabara epfuti pane kuti vabve panzvimbo dzavari nekuti mhuri dzavo dzinoraramira munzvimbo idzodzo. No media source currently available

headline: WFP Inoti Vanhu Vanodarika Mamiriyoni Matatu muMadhorobha Madiki Vanoda Rubatsiro rweChikafu
text: Bazi reUnited Nations rinoona nezvechikafu reWorld Food Program, WFP, rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vari mumadhorobha vanoda chikafu hwasvika pamamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 3,3 million kubva pamamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana maviri kana kuti 2,2 million. NeChitatu WFP yakatanga hurongwa hwekubatsira vasina zvekudya mumaguta nekuvapa mari inosvika madhora gumi nemaviri ekuAmerica panguva iyo huwandu hwevari kuda rubatsiro rwechikafu hwawedzera nekuda kweCovid-19 uye kurasikirwa nemabasa kwevanhu vakawanda nenyaya iyi. Vanhu zviuru zana nezvitatu nemazana manomwe kana kuti 103, 700 vari kupihwa rubatsiro urwu vari kuGokwe, Redcliff, Kwekwe, Ruwa, Chinhoyi, Buhera, Chipinge ne Chegutu. Mari yekubatsira vanhu ava inosvika mamiriyoni gumi ekuAmerica, uye yakabva kubazi rehurumende yeAmerica reUSAID, iro riri kubatsira vamwe vanhu vanosvika miriyoni imwe chete kumaruwa. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau, mukuru weUSAID muZimbabwe, VaArt Brown, vanoti vacharamba vachibatsira vanhu vemuZimbabwe nechikafu uye hutano munguva ino yekurwisa Covid-19. Mukuru weWFP muZimbabwe, Amai Francesca Erdelmann, vati Covid-19 yapa kuti vanozviitira mabasa emaoko vashaye chekubata. Asi mukuru weEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, Doctor Israel Murefu, vanoti vamwe vanhu vakawanda varasikirwa nemabasa sezvo mamwe makambani akundikana kuvhurwa mushure mekumbovharwa munguva yekurwisa Covid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Chiri muSouth Africa, VaNdabambi, Voshuvira Kunotanga Zvirongwa Zvinopa Pundutso kuMusha
text: Muchikamu chedu chatinoita hurukuro nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika, tine hurukuro nemutyairi wemagonyeti, VaBernard Ndabambi, vanove mumwe wevatungamiri vesangano rinomirira vatyairi vemagonyeti, reUnited Truck Drivers Association riri muSouth Africa. VaNdabambi, avo vanobva kuGokwe mubhuku rekwaNdabambi vakaberekwa naVaPfichani, uye ivo vane mhuri yavowo yevana vanomwe, vasikana vatatu nevakomana vana. Vanoti vakabuda munyika muna 2011 vachienda kuMozambique kunotsvaga mafuro manyoro mushure mekuona kuoma kwakanga kwoita zvinhu mune zvehupfumi, asi vakanoita dambudziko remutauro zvakazoita kuti vayambuke zvakare muganhu vachipinda muSouth Africa. MuSouth Africa VaNdabambi vanoti vakaedza kutsvaga mabasa asi vaisangana nezvimhingamipinyi zvemagwaro ebasa adiwa nevaridzi vemakambi, kunyange hazvo basa ravo vairiziva. Nekuda kwaizvozvo, vakapedzisira umo vanoti vave kuita mabasa akasiyanasiyana kusvika vazopinda pabasa rekutyaira magonyeti ravari kuita pari zvino. VaNdabambi vanoti kunyange hazvo zvinhu zvakavarerukira munyaya dzekuwana mari, vanosangana nematambudziko akasiyanasiyana anosanganisira ekushungurudzwa nezvizvarwa zvenyika yeSouth Africa, uye kutambiriswa mari dzakasiyana nezvizvarwa zvenyika iyi nemamwe makambani,. Vac hipindura kuti zvirongwa zvipi zvavari kuita kumusha, VaNdabambi vanoti vane shungu dzekuti vaite zvirongwa zvinovapa mari asi pari zvino vachiri kumboongorora kuti zvirongwa zvipi zvavangaite, uye zvakaoma nezvakareruka ndezvipi. No media source currently available

headline: VaMunyeza Vanotadziswa Kutaura seMunyarikani muHarare
text: Chimwe chipangamazano chemutungamiri wenyika, Dr Shingi Munyeza, nhasi vavhiringidzwa nevanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vasori vakatadza kutaura pamusangano wekuparura sangano reZimbabwe Institute of Strategic Thinking muchiitiko chashorwa nevanhu vakawanda vapinda mumusangano uyu. Dr Munyeza, avo vanove nhengo yePresidential Advisroy Council, ndivo vange vari munyarikani pachiitiko chanhasi, asi pange pave kuda kutanga musangano ndopasimuka vamwe vanhu vachiita ruzha vachiti vange vachida mari yavo kubva kuna Dr Munyaza. Mushure mechinguvana Dr Munyeza vazobuda mange muchiitirwa musangano ndokubva vaenda vasina kupa mashoko avo. Dr Munyeza vaudza Studio 7 kuti havazive vanhu vavavhiringidza nhasi asi vakati hazvivatyise sezvo zviri zvinhu zvavange vachitarisira kubvira pavakatanga kutaura pfungwa dzavo pamusoro pezviri kuitika munyika. Vatiwo vange vagara vatorumwa nzeve nevamwe kuti kune vanhu vange vakaronga kuvhiringidza hurongwa uhwu. Vati izvi ndozvinoitika kana kodzero dzevanhu dzisingaremekedzwe uye bumbiro remitemo yenyika risingatevedzwe. Dr Munyeza vati vacharamba vachitaura nezvekumbunyikidzwa kwekodzeo dzevanhu zvisinei nezvaitika nhasi. Mumwe muzvinabhizimisi, VaNigel Chanakira, vashora zvaitika nhasi vachiti Zimbabwe haina kwainosvika kana vanhu vachirambidzwa kupa pfungwa dzavo pamusoro pezviri kuitika pamwe nematongerwo ari kuitwa nyika yavo Mukuru wesangano rePlatform for Youth and Community Development, VaClaris Madhuku, vatiwo zvaitika zvinoratidza kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka vachiti chinangwa cheZimbabwe Institute for Strategic Thinking ndechekuti vana veZimbabwe vafunge zvakdzama pamwe nekuisa pfungwa dzavo pamwe chete kuitira kuti nyika ifambire mberi. VaMadhuku vati kunyange hazvo paine mapato maviri anopikisa anoti Zanu PF neMDC Alliance, nhaurirano dzekupedza matambudziko eZimbabwe dzave kuda mapato ese, vedzisvondo nemamwe masangano akasiyanana vachiti izvi chete ndizvo zvinogona kupedza matambudziko akatarisana nenyika. Mushandi mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vati bato ravo harineyi nezvaitika kwanga kuina VaMunyeza. Studio haina kukwanisa kubata munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, sezvo vanga vasiri kubatika panherembozha yavo. Zimbabwe Institute for Strategic Thinking iyo yaparurwa nhasi, inotungamirirwa naVaTinashe Muzamindo, uye chinangwa chayo chikuru kupangamazano nehurumende, mapato ezvematongerwo enyikanemasangano akazvimirira, pamwe nekukurudzira nhaurirano pakati pemasangano aya kuitira kuti ashande pamwe mukusimudzira nyika. No media source currently available

headline: China Yotumira Gurukota Rayo Kunoshanya muZimbabwe
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvekudzivirirwa muChina, General Chang Wanquan, vakapinda munyika neChitatu murwendo rwunonzi nevanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika nezvechiuto hwakanangana nekusimbaradza mauto eZimbababwe panguva iyo munyika zvinhu zvakaita manyama amire nerongo. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakati rwendo urwu rwakakosha zvikuru uye Zimbabwe inotenda China zvakanyanya nekuibatsira kwainoita. Hurumende inoti General Chang vari kuda kuona kuti zvibvumirano zvakanyoreranwa pasi gore rapera pakati peZimbabwe neChina zvazadzikiswa. Asi vakawanda munyika vanoti havana chavari kuona pazvibvumirano izvi sezvo zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichienda kumawere munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Kunze kwekutengesera Zimbabwe zvombo zvehondo, China yakavakirawo Zimbabwe muzinda wemauto uye kambani yekunyika iyi yemauto yeAnjin iri pamakambani ange achichera mangoda kuChiyadzwa. Mauto emuZimbabwe ave kunyanya kuzemberana neChina kubva zvakatamerwa nyika zvirango nehurumende dzekumawirira ichipomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaTakura Zhangazha, avo vanoshanda nesangano reVoluntary Media Council of Zimbabwe vanoti Zimbabwe haifanire kungoringa kumabuda zuva chete panyaya yekudyidzana asi kuti itarisi kumativi mana ose enyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vanopikisa Voshora Dare reMakurukota raVaMnangagwa Rizere Varume Chete
text: Mapato anopikisa anoti haasi kutambira nemufaro dare remakurukota rakadomwa nemusi weChina nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Makurukota aya ari kutarisirwa kutoreswa mhiko neMuvhuro. VaMnangagwa vakadoma dare remakurukota makumi maviri nevaviri, uye riine vanhukadzi vatatu chete vari mudare iri. VaMnangagwa vakadomawo makurukota ematunhu gumi zvichireva kuti makurukota pasi pehurumende yavo anenge ari makumi matatu nevaviri, kunyange hazvo makurukota anomirira matunhu asingapinde mudare remakurukota. Vakadzi vatatu vari mudare remakurukota ndiAmai Sithembiso Nyoni, gurukota rezvemadzimai nevechidiki; Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri, gurukota rezvemamiririro ekunze uye Amai Priscah Mupfumira, gurukota rezvekushanyirwa kwenyika. Vanhukadzi vatatu vakaitwa makurukota ematunhu vanoti Amai Angeline Masuku (Bulawayo); Amai Rutendo Chikukwa (Harare), uye Amai Monica Mutsvangwa (Manicaland). Mapato anopikisa anoti VaMngangwa vaifanira kunge vakaremekedza zviri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika zvinovasungira kuti vaone kuti zvinzvimbo zvevanhukadzi zvawedzerwa muhurumende. Mutungamiri wechimwe ckwata chePeople's Democratic Party, PDP, Amai Lucia Matibenga, vanoti vakagara vazviona kare kuti VaMnangagwa munhu weZanu PF nokudaro havatarisiri kuona kushanduko inobva kumunhu weZanu PF. Chimwe chikwata che PDP chinotungamirwa naVaTendai Biti. Amai Matibenga vanoti vanhukadzi vacharemekedzwa zvido zvavo kana veruzhinji vakabvisa Zanu PF musarudzo dzegore rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: Dzimwe Nyanzvi Munyaya dzeHupfumi Dzinoti Vanhu Vanofanirwa Kufarira Mutemo weStatutory Instrument 127
text: Apo sangano reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe riri kuyambira kuti zvinhu zvinogona kutanga kushaikwa muzvitoro nekuda kwemutemo mutsva wechimbi chimbi wehurumende, weStatutory Instrument 127, wakadzikwa svondo rapera, dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dze zvehupfumi dzinoti mutemo uyu wakanaka zvikuru sezvo wakanangna nekubatsira vanoshaya uye vasingatambiri mari yakawanda. Mutemo uyu unomanikidza vemabhizimisi kuti vatengese zvinhu nemutengo unoendererana newepamusika wemari, webhanga guru renyika, re Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe Foreign Exchange, kwete wepamusika wemukoto. Nyanzvi munyaya dze zvehupfumi, vachishanda ne kambani ye Percycon Global Fund Managers, VaPersistence Gwanyanya, vanoti vanhu havafaniri kunetseka nemutemo uyu sezvo zvakaitwa nehurumende izvi zvakanangana nekubatsira vanoshaya munyika, vachiti mutemo uyu wagara uripo uye uchishanda zvakanaka kwemwedzi mizhinji yapfuura. VaGwanyanya varumbidza danho iri vachiti richaramba richidzisa mitengo yezvinhu sezvange zvichiitika kwemwedzi mizhinji yapfuura. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vokurudzirwa Kuvhenekwa Chirwere cheShuga neKudya Zvine Hutano
text: Zimbabwe nhasi yatabatana nenyika dzepasi rese kucherechedza zuva rechirwere cheshuga kana kuti World Diabetes Day veruzhinji vachikurudzirwa kuvhenekwa navanachiremba, kudya chikafu chine hutano uye chinoita kuti vasabatwe nedenda iri. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzashandisa zuva ranhasi kuongorora vanhu pachena pamwe nekuvadzidzisa pamusoro pudenda iri. Mumwe murapi pane chimwe chipatara chakazvimirira muHarare, Amai Fungai Priscillar Gomba vati hirwere cheshuga chiriri kupararira munyika asi munhu anogona kurarama pasina dambudziko kana atavedza dzidziso kubva kunana chiremba. Vanoti zvimwe zvikonzero zvinoita kuti vanhu vabatwe shuga kana kuti diabetes inyaya yekuzvarwa mumhuri ine nhoorondo yechirwere ichi, mararamire anoita munhu nechikafu chaanodya kana kuti kuti Lifestyle pachirungu. Vaenderera mberi vachiti vashandisa zuva ranhasi kungorora vanhu kuti vane denda iri here pamwe nekuti vangararame sei vasingapinde munjodzi. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzekuongorora zvirwere, VaEdmore Mahureva, vanoti vashandisa zuva ranhasi kuita ongororo dzakaita seHBCa1 yekungoora shuga yemunhu mukati memwedzi mitatu yapfuura uye vaita izvi pachena vachiti zvinobatsira kuti munhu azive pamire nedenda iri. Mutungamiriri wesangano remachiremba anoshanda akazvimirira, re Medical and Dental Private Practitioners Association Dr Johannes Marisa kuti nhasi vange vachibatsirawo vanhu pachena kuti vasafe nedenda iri. Amai Maonei Tiki avo vakabatwa shuga muna Chikumi gore rino uye vakatobviswa gumbo nekuda kwedenda iri vanoti vafara chose neruzivo rwavawana nhasi. Ambuya Agnes Zioni ndevamwe vari kurarama nedenda iri uye vanoti zvakakosha kutevedza dzidziso yanachiremba. Gore rapfuura, shuga yakauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvitatu nemazana manomwe kana kuti 3,400 uye zvinofundidzirwa kuti denda iri rinobata munhu mumwe chete pavanhu gumi pasi rese. Zuva reWorld Diabetes Day iro rinocherechedzwa musi 14 Mbudzi, racherechedzwa pasi pendingindira rine chinangwa chekuti vanhu vawane zivo yakakwana kuti vakwanise kurapwa nekuita kurarama nzira dzinoita kuti denda iri risarambe richipararira kana kuti Education to Protect Tomorrow, Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi kana mashoko ehurumende pazuva iri sezvo mutauriri webazi iri VaDonald Mujiri vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yedu patataenda pamhepo.

headline: Zimbabwe Inocherechedza Zuva reKubatana kweZanu PF nePF Zapu
text: Zimbabwe neMuvhuro yakacherechedza makore makumi maviri nemanomwe echibvumirano chokubatana chakanyoreanwa pakati peZanu PF nePF Zapu musi wa 22 Zvita mugore ra 1987. Chibvumirano ichi chakakwanisa kupedza kusagadzikana kwakanga kwapinda munyika kubva panguva yekuwana kuzvitonga kuzere. Chibvumirano ichi chakaita kuti pave nehurumende yemushandira pamwe pakati pebato reZanu PF raVaRobert Mugabe nerePF Zapu raitungamirirwa nevakazove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, mushakabvu VaJoshua Nkomo. Chibvumirano ichi chakasunga kuti vatungamiri vemapato maviri aya ndivo vanenge vachiumba hutungamiri hwenyika, VaMugabe vari mutungamiri vachiteverwa naVaNkomo. Asi vamwe vanoti chibvumirano ichi hachichina hudzamu nechiremera chakaita kuti chivepo, sezvo bato reZanu PF rave kuonekwa serisiri kuchiremekedza zvakanyanya. Vaive murwiri wehondo yerusununguko vari kubato rePF Zapu, VaMax Mkandla, vanoti izvi zvakaonekwa nekusadomwa kwemutevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika anobva kubato re PF Zapu zvichitevera kushaya muna Ndira wegore rapera kwevaive mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutunganiri wenyika vachibva kuPF Zapu, VaJohn Nkomo. VaMkandla vanotiwo kusasimba kwechibvumirano ichi kunoonekwa zvakare nekubuda muchibvumirano ichi kwevamwe vakaita saVaDumiso Dabengwa nevamwe vachinomutsiridza bato reZapu. Asi nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vanoti kunyunyuta kwevashoma hakumisi bhazi rerunyararo sezvo vanonzi vakabuda muchibvumirano ichi vakazvibudira pachezvavo sevanhu, kwete sebato. VaChirumhanzu vanotiwo vanoona kudomwa kwaVaPhelekezela Mphoko vaive kuPF Zapu kuti vave mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika chiri chiratidzo chekuti chibvumirano chichakabata. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari vemuMasvingo Vanoti Mari yeChirongwa cheKuendesa Masimba Kumatunhu Ngaigadziriswe Dambudziko reMvura
text:
Vagari vemudhorobha reMasvingo vanopfuura chiuru vakanyorera dare reparamende gwaro kuti rikurudzire hurumende kuti iise mutemo wekuti mari yechirongwa chekuendesa masimba kumatunhu kana kuti devolution muMasvingo ishandiswe mukutenga mishina mitsva inopomba mvura sezvo iripo isiri kushanda zvakanaka. Vagari ava vachitungamirirwa nesangano ravo reMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance kana kan kuti MURRA, vakasiya gwaro iri kumunyori wedare reparamende, VaJacob Mundenda, vachiti vaneta nedambudziko rekushomeka kwemvura iro rinogona kupedzwa zvachose kana
pakatengwa ne kuvandudza mishina inopomba mvura kudhamu reMutirikwi.

Vanona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muMURRA, Muzvare Rumbidzai Magurupira vanoti danho iri ndiro chete ringapedze dambudziko remvura. Vagari vanoti mari yedevolution iri kuuya iri kuiswa kune zvimwe zvirongwa zvakafanana nekuvandudza mapaipi esuweji nekugadzira migwagwa izvo vanoti hazvina kunyanya kukokosha.
Mumwe mugari akasainawo gwaro iri, Amai Sungano Zvarebwanashe vanoti sevagari vane simba rekutaura zvavanoda kuti zviitwe. Mishina iripo iyo yachembra inopomba mvura inosvika mamega litres makumi matatu, ayo anokwana vagari zviuru makumi mana nevashanu pazuva, asi mudhorobha rave nevagari vanopfuura zviuru zana. Vagari zana vanoda mamega litres anosvika makumi mashanu pazuva. Studio 7, yatadza kubata mutauriri wedare VaMundenda avo vange vasingadairi nharembozha yavo kana kupindura tsamba kuti tinzwe divi ravo uye
nezvetsamba iyi. Asi sangano reMURRA raratidza Studio 7, gwaro racho rine chidhindo
chedare reparamende chekutenda kuti rakagamuchirwa. Nhengo yeparamende yeMasvingo Urban, VaJacob Nyokanhete, vebato reMDC-Alliance, vati vanotsigirana nevagari veMasvingo.

Izvi zvatsigirwawo negurukota redunhu reMasvingo, VaEzra Chadzamira, vanozvazve nhengo yeparamende kuMasvingo West, vari vebato reZanu PF vatiwo.
Meya weguta reMasvingo, VaCollen Maboke, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti danho rakatorwa nevagari rakanaka, uye sekanzuru vanotsigirana navo vachiti panodiwa mari inosvika mamirioni makumi matanhatu ekuAmerica kuti paitwe chirongwa chekutenga mishina mitsva kuti
dambudziko remvura ripere zvachose. No media source currently available

headline: Hupfu Hwowedzedzerwa Mutengo Zvakanyanya
text: Mutengo wehupfu hwakwira zvakanyanya mushure mekunge gurukota rinoona nezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vabvisa mari yange ichibhadharwa nehurumende kuti chibage chinotengeswa kuGrain Marketing Board kana kuti GMB chinge chakaderera mutengo. VaNcube vakazivisa nezvedanho iri pavakaparura hurongwa hwavo hwekushandiswa kwemari kana kuti bhajeti regore rinouya. Kunyangwe hazvo vemuzvitoro vange vatowedzera mutengo nemadhora makumi matatu, veGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe GMAZ vanoti vachaita musangano wechimbi chimbi kuti vaone kuti voita sei nenyaya yemutengo. Mutauriri weGMAZ VaGarikai Chaunza vaudza Studio 7 kuti ivo havatare mitengo yehupfu sezvo ravo basa riri rekugaya chete chibage chavanenge vatenga kuGMB. No media source currently available Kuwedzerwa kwemutengo hwehupfu kuri kuuya apo nyika yakatarisana nenzara inotyisa yapa kuti masangano anopa rubatsiro aparure hurongwa hwekupa vanhu vemumadhorobha vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri chikafu. Kumaruwa vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mashanu vakatarisanawo nenzara.

headline: Senator Hlalo Vanodzingwa muMDC-T
text: Bato reMDC-T rinoti radzinga seneta Matson Hlalo mushure mekunetsana kunotyisa kunonzi kuri kuitika mubato iri mudunhu reBulawayo. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato iri kuBulawayo VaFelix Magalela Mafa Sibanda vaudza Studio 7 kuti National Executive Council yebato iri yakadzinga VaHlalo nenyaya yehunhubu. VaSibanda vanoti VaHlalo vakapihwa tsamba yekudzingwa mubato nemusi weChina. VaSibanda vanoti VaHlao vakapihwa mukana wekuuya kuzozvichenura kudare reNational Couuncil asi vakaramba. VaHlalo vanzi vachadzingwawo kuva nhengo yedare resenate. No media source currently available Sezvo Studio 7 ichitema isina divi rainorerekera yabatawo VaHlalo avo vati mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato iri Muzvare thokozane Khupe ndivo vari kutungamira mabasa ekuvadzinga mubato. Vati havasi kuzotambira kudzingwa uku vachiti hakusi kutevera bumbiro remutemo webato. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Exiles Forum Yojekesa Zvekuita neChirongwa cheZimbabwe Exemption Permit
text: Hurumende yeSouth Africa yakawedzera kusvika musi wa 31 Ndira gore rinouya kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri munyika iyi zvakanyorera kumutsiridza magwaro azvo pasi pechirongwa cheZimbabwe Exemption Permit zvikwanise kuendesa magwaro anotsigira chikumbiro chazvo chekugara munyika iyi. Zuva rekunyorera kumutsiridza magwaro aya padandemutande rekugumisira musi wa 30 Mbudzi 2017. Asi vanhu vapihwa kusvika kupera kwaNdira gore rinouya kuti vaendese magwaro anodiwa. Chirongwa cheZimbabwe Exemption Permit chiri kutsiva che Zimbabwe Special Permit chakaparurwa muna 2014, icho chiri kupera kushanda musi wa 31 Zvita 2017. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Exiles Forum, Advocate Gabriel Shumba, vanoti vana veZimbabwe vari kumutsiridza magwaro avo aya vanofanirwa kunzwisisa kuti chakawedzerwa inguva yemagwaro chete, kwete kunyoresa. Advocate Shumba vanoti zvakakosha zvikuru kuti vanhu vanzwisise izvozvo, sezvo vamwe vatotanga kare kuratidza kuti vari kufunga kuti nguva yekunyorera magwaro ndiyo yawedzerwa. Vanoti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa zviri kuteverawo nemaziso matsvuku zviri kuitika kumusha kubva pakashanduka hutungamiri hwehurumende. No media source currently available

headline: Mari yeMudyandigere yeNSSA Yowedzerwa Kusvika paMadhora Makumi Matatu ekuAmerica
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi nemagariro evanhu Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vaudza Studio 7 kuti kutanga mwedzi uno mari dziri kutambirwa nevari pamudyandigere dziri kuwedzerwa kusvika pamadhora makumi matatu ekuAmerica kana kuti US$30. VaMavima vati hurumende ine chido chekuti vari pamudyandigere vatambire mari inosvika makumi matanhatu emadhora kana kuti US$60 inokurudzirwa nesangano reInternational Labour Organization mukupera kwegore. No media source currently available Mari iri kuwedzerwa inenge ichipihwa vari pamudyandigere vaibhadhara mari kuNational Social Security Authority kana kuti NSSA nemadhora emunyika ichienzaniswa neyepamusika wemari weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe kana kuti RBZ foreign currency auction. Asi munyori mukuru wesangano reAssociation of National Social Security Retirees VaGideon Shoko vanoti mari iri kutambirwa iyi haikwane sezvo iri pasi zvakanyanya pamari yekuti mhuri irarame. Zimbabwe National Statistics Agency inoti mhuri ine vanhu vashanu inoda mari inodarika zviuru makumi maviri nemasere pamwedzi kana kuti ZW$28, 000. No media source currently available

headline: UNDP Yovimbisa Zimbabwe Zvose Zvainoda Kuitira Sarudzo Dzakachena
text: Mukuru weUnited Nations Development Program, UNDP, VaAchim Steiner, avo vasvika muHarare neChina, vaudza vatori venhau kuti UNDP ichabatsira Zimbabwe nezvese zvainoda kuita sarudzo dzejekerere. Vachitaura nevatori venhau pane imwe hotera muHarare mushure mekusangana negurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSteiner vati vachabatsira Zimbabwe nemari yezvese zvingadiwe neZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC. VaSteiner vati pamusoro pekuzvipira kweUNDP mukuona kuti Zimbabwe yaita sarudzo dzisina mvongamupopoto, vatiwo vakazvipira kushanda neZimbabwe kuti ibude mumatope maiiri munyaya dzehupfumi. VaSteiner vati vachasangana nemapazi ehurumende akasiyana-siyana pamwe nemamwe masangano kuti vaite hurukuro dzekuzeya kuti zvii zvangade kuitwa kuti sarudzo dzegore rino dzive dzakachena. Gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, Doctor Sibusiso Moyo, vaudzawo vatori venhau kuti rwendo rwuno hurumende yeZimbabwe yakazvipira kuita sarudzo dzakachena huye dzisina mhirizhonga. VaMoyo vatiwo sarudzo dzakachena dzichabatsira kuti Zimbabwe idyidzane nedzimwe nyika zvakasununguka zvinozobatsira kuunza budiriro munyika. VaSteiner vachasangana nevanhu pamwe nemasangano akasiyasiyana kusvika nemusi weMugovera panopera rwendo rwavo rwekushanyira Zimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Veruzhinji vonyunyuta neKukwidzwa kweMutengo weMafuta eKufambisa
text: Veruzhinji vanoti havasi kufara nekukwidzwa kwakaitwa mutengo wemafuta edzimotokari nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mngangagwa neMugovera vachiti izvi zvhichaita kuti hupenyu huomere veruzhinji munyika. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa neMugovera vakazisivisa kuti peturu yave kutengwa nemadhora matatu nemasendi makumi matatu nerimwe parita, ukuwo dhiziri rave kutengwa nemadhora matatu ane masendi gumi nerimwe chete parita. VaMnangagwa vakati vezvitoro havafanire kukwidza mitengo yezvinhu zvichitevera kukwidza kwakaitwa mafuta edzimotokari. Asi mutungamiri wesangano revanofamba nemotokari dzinotakura veruzhinji VaTafadzwa Goliati, vanoti veruzhinji vachadhurirwa nekufamba sezvo vemakombi nemabhazi vatokwidza mari dzekufamba. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Muzvare Nester Mutikani, vanoti zvichaomera hurumende sezvo vachiti hurumende icharamba ichipinza ruoko muhomwe mayo kuti ikwanise kutenga mafuta aya. Zvichakadaro, muutungamiri wesangano revadzidzisi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti vashandi ndivo vachanyanyoomerwa sezvo hurumende isina kuwedzera vashandi vayo mari dzemihoro, uku ichikwidza mutengo wemafuta edzimotokari. VaMnangagwa vakati hurumende yavo iri kutarisira kuwedzera vashandi vayo mihoro muna Kubvumbi wegore rino. Mutauriri wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reHashatag Tajamuka, VaPromise Mkwananzi, vanoti chave kudiwa ndechekuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvitaure nezwi rimwe chete vachiti zvave pachena hurumende yaVaMnangagwa iri kumhanya nemakarimwa. Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakawedzera mitengo yemafuta edzimotokari, veruzhinji vaswera vari mumitsetse yekutsvaga mafuta aya sezvo vemagaraji mazhinji vanga vachiti havana mafuta acho. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Makumi Maviri neVaviri Vanofa Mutsaona kuTsholotsho
text: Tsaona yakaitika neMugovera ku Tsholotsho ku Matabeleland North inonzi yakatora hupenyu hwevanhu makumi maviri nemumwe pakaitika tsaona, mumwezve ndokufira kuchipatara. Tsaona iyi yakaitika apo vanhu makumi matanhatu vakange vari murhori yehurumende vachiendeswa kunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana kunorwisa chirwere che malaria kwa Sipepa, ku Tsholotsho kwakare. Vari munzira kuenda kubasa, zvinonzi muchairi werhori anonzi akatadza kutyaira zvakanaka rhori iyi kuti irambe iri mumugwagwa payakasvika panomonyoroka mugwagwa, ndokubuda mumugwagwa ichibva yapinda musangano umo yakabheukira. Mukuru anoona nezvehutano mudunhu reMatabeleland North, Doctor Nyasha Masuka, vanoti hurumende iri kubatsira vakashaya mutsaona iyi. Vatiwo munhu akashaya mutsaona iyi ari kuwana mari inoita chiuru chemadhora. Dr Masuka vatiwo pane vanhu vari kurapwa muzvipatara zvinoti Tsholotsho, Mpilo Central Hospital ne United Bulawayo Hospitals zvichitevera tsaona iyi. Studio7 haina kunzwa divi remapurisa panyaya iyi. Muna Chikunguru gore rino, vanhu gumi nevaviri vakafa vazhinji vakakuvara ku Kamativi ku Matebeleland North kwekare. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vanoongorora zveMatongerwo eNyika Vanoti Zvishoma Zvashanduka Kubva Zvakabva VaMugabe
text: Musi wa 19 Mudzi gore rapera, Central Committee yebato reZanu-PF yakagara musangano wechimbi chimbi ikati sebato yainge yabuda nechisungo chekuti yainge yodzora vaive mutungamiri webato iri VaRobert Mugabe kuti vasave mumiriri webato iri vachitungamira hurumende. VaMugabe vakabva vapihwa kusvika nenguva dza12 masikati nemusi wa 20 Mbudzi kuti vange vaenda pamudyandigere. Kubviswa kwaVaMugabe pachigaro kwakapa vamwe kuti vafunge kuti zvinhu munyika zvikuru munyaya dzezvehupfumi zvaizogadzikana. Asi vazhinji vanoti zvizhinji zvinoda kugadziriswa munyika sezvo zvizhinji zvakavimbiswa vanhu zvisati zvaitwa. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vaimbova mumwe wevakuru vevadzidzi paUniversity Of Zimbabwe VaPromise Sande vanoti veruzhinji varikushushikana nehuwori hwatekeshera munyika uye nekuwondomoka kwehupfumi. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoshevedzera Musangano weKuedza Kumisa Kuramwa Mabasa kweVashandi
text: Hurumende inonzi yashevedzera musangano wechimbichimbi nevashandi vayo senzira yekuedza kudzivirira kuramwa mabasa kwevashandi mushure mekupera kwemazuva gumi nemana avakanga vaipa kuti igadzirise zvinhu, kukundikana kwavo vaizotanga kuramwa mabasa neMuvhuro svondo rino. Sachigaro wesangano rinomirira vashandi, reApex Council, Amai Cecilia Alexander, vanoti vakokwa nehurumende kuti vasangane neMuvhuro kuti vaedze kutsvaga nzira dzekudzivirira kuramwa mabasa kwevashandi mushure mekunge dzimwe nhaurirano dzavakamboita dzatadza kuburitsa chimuko. Asi Amai Alexander vanoti sangano ravo harisati rashevedzera kuramwa mabasa kunyange hazvo mazuva gumi nemana akadarika. Vanoti zvichabuda mumusangano uyu ndizvo zvichavapa gwara rekutora kuenda mberi. “Hurongwa huripo Vakandemiiri tichienda mberi ndehwekuti, chekutanga, apex Council haisati ya declare strike. Takangosana takawirirana kuti kwasara 48 hours, saka mangwana tiri kuenda kunosangana nehurumende kuseni. “Tarongazve kuti kuseni tine Apex Council yatinozoturira zvatinenge tataura ku meeting yeNational Joint Negotiations Council,” vanodaro Amai Alexander. Vashandi vehurumende vari kuramba kutambira mari inoita mamiriyoni mazana matatu emadhora yakanga yanzi nehurumende imbofanobatsira vashandi kubva mukukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu. Mazuva gumi akanga aziviswa nevashandi akapera nemusi weChishanu svondo rapera, zvichireva kuti vashandi vaifanirwa kutanga kuramwa mabasa kutanga kwesvondo rino. No media source currently available

headline: Varwere vePfungwa paNgomahuru Vogeza Mudziva Rine Ngwena Nekushaya Mvura
text: Dzimwe hama dzevarwere vepfungwa vari pachipatara cheNgomahuru kuMasvingo dzinoti dziri kutyira kuti vanogona kurumwa nemakarwe kana kunyura mumvura apo vanenge vachigeza murwizi sezvo chipatara ichi chaita dambudziko guru rekushaya mvura kubva zvafa pombi dzemvura. Vakuru vepachipatara apa vanoti vave kusvika mwedzi miviri vasina mvura sezvo Zimbabwe National Water Authority(ZINWA) isiri kugadzira muchina unopomba mvura. Mukuru wepachipatara apa, Dr Parirenyatwa Maramba, vati varwere vanofanira kugeza zuva nezuva nekudaro vanotoenda kurwizi rweMagwangwadza, urwo runopinda mudhamu reTugwi Mukosi rine makarwe anorura. Asi izvi hazvisi kufadza hama dzevarwere ava dzinoti dzave kugara dzakabatira hura mumaoko dzichityira kuti vanogona kubatwa nemakarwe kana kunyura mumadziva sezvo pfungwa dzavo dzisinganyatsoita zvakanaka. VaSimbarashe Dhauzi, vane mwana wavo pachipatara apa vanoti vave nenguva vachishungurudzika nekutyira hupenyu hwemwana wavo. Amai Anna Magwaza, vekwa Madamombe, kwaChivi, vane hanzvadzi yavo inogara pachipatara apa vanoti kunze kwekutyira makarwe, hama dzavo dzinogona kutiza vashandi vepachipatara apa pavonobuda muwaya vachienda kurwizi vakazoshaikwa zvachose votetereka nenyika. Vanoona nezvekushanda neveruzhinji pachipatara cheNgomahuru, VaMorgan Manzunzu, vanoti vanotairisa kuti dambudziko iri richagadziriswa nekukurumidza, uye vari kutora matanho kuti varwere vasanyura kana kubatwa nemakarwe. Vaenderera mberi vachiti mvura yekunwa nekubikira varwere vanotora pachibhorani asi yekugeza inodiwa yakawanda nekuwandawo kwakaita varwere ndosaka vachienda kurwizi. Mutauriri weZINWA, Amai Marjorie Munyonga, vati dambudziko riri kugadziriswa uye vanotarisira kutanga kupomba mvura zvakanaka mangwana(Chipriri 16). Chipatara cheNgomahuru chine varwere vepfungwa vanosvika zana nemakumi matatu nevashanu. Varume vari zana negumi uye vakadzi vari makumi maviri nevashanu. Chipatara ichi ndicho choga chevarwere vepfungwa mudunhu reMasvingo uye chiri chimwe chezvishoma munyika yose. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yovimbisa Nhomba yeCovid Mumazuva Mashoma Anotevera
text: Vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori mubazi rezvehutano, Dr Robert Mudyirandima, vaudza paramende kuti nyika yakatora danho rekuti yoshandisa nhomba ipi kudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19 uye pane chiziviso chichaitwa kune veruzhinji pamusoro penyaya iyi mukati memazuva mashonana ari kutevera. Vachipa humbowo maererano nemamiriro akaita denda reCovid-19 munyika nemusi weMuvhuro, Dr Mudyirandima, vanoti pane nhomba dzakawanda dzave kushandiswa nedzimwe nyika uye vange vari kuita ongororo yekuti ndeipi yakanakira nyika. Vati Zimbabwe ichatangawo kushandisa imwe nhomba iyi munguva pfupi iri kutevera. Vatiwo kunyange hazvo hurumende yange isina kubhajeta mari yenhomba iyi, bazi rezvemari nevamwe vemabhizimisi vakavimbisa kuumba homwe yekutenga nhomba iyi. Mukuru anoona nezvezvirwere zvinotapuriramwa mubazi iri, Dr Portia Manangazira, vatiwo kunze kwekutenga nhomba iyi, Zimbabwe ichawana imwe pasi pechirongwa cheWorld Health Organisation cheCOVAX icho chinobatsira nyika dzichiri kubudirira pamwe nechirongwa cheAfrican Union iyo ichawana mishonga yePfizer neAstraZeneca ichiuya kuburikidza nemakambani eSeum Institute of India neJohnson and Johnson. Kunyange hazvo nhomba inopihwa vanhu vane denda iri ichibva kunze kwenyika, mimwe mishonga inopihwa vawere vane denda iri yakaita semapiritsi eParacetamol neZINC anogadzirwa muno. Zvichakadaro, Dr Mudyirandima naDr Manangazira, vazivisa kuti zvipatara zveveruzhinji zvinotora varwere veCovid 19 hazvina kuzara asi vakati pane zvipatara zvakazvimirira zvakaita seHealth Point muHarare zvine varwere vakawanda kudarika vazvinokwanisa kuchengeta. Dr Manangazira vati semuenziso chipatara cheWilkins muHarare icho chine mibhedha makumi matatu nemishanu yeCovid-19 hachina kana murwere mumwe pari zvino, Parirenyatwa ine mibhedha makumi mapfumbabwe nemitanhatu asi zvikamu makumi maviri nezvina zvemibhedha iyi ndizvo zvine vanhu chete. Mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Nurse Association VaEnock Dongo vati nyaya yekuti zvipatara zveruzhinnji hazvina kuzara inoratidza kuti vanhu havadi kuendako nekuti hakuna zvekushandisa uve vashandi veko havana mufaro nemabatirwe nemashandiro avanoita. Vakuru vakuru kubva kubazi rezvehutano vazivisawo kuti vave kuwana mishonga pamwe nezvimwee zvekushandisa pabasa kana kuti Personal Protective Equipment pasi pechirongwa cherubatsiro rwakabva kuGlobal Fund rweemamiriyoni makumi mana nemapfumbabwe emadhora ekuAmerica. VaDongo vati zvakanaka chose kuchengetedza vashandi vehutano kubva kuCovid-19. Dr Mudyirandima vazivisawo kuti munyika mune Oxygen yakawana yekushandisa kuvarwere veCovid-19. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemutungamiriri wesangano rinomirira machiremba anoshanda akazvimirira reMedical and Dental Private Practioners Association of Zimbabwe Dr Johannes Marisa avo vaudza Studio 7 kuti kana pachavo vari kuwanawo Oxygen yevarwere vavo. Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano razivisa kuti vanhu zana nevashanu vari muzvipatara nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 uye vashanu vari mune vari kurwarisa kana kuti Intensive Care Unit. Asi huwandu uhu hunogona kunge hwakakwira kudarika apa sezvo pasina kuziviswa nezvevarwere vari kuMasvingo, Parirenyatwa, Manicaland ne Thongroove. No media source currently available

headline: ZimRights Yoendesa Hurumende kuMatare Ichida Kuti Pajekeswe Hurongwa hweKurwisa Covid-19
text:
Sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyika reZimbabwe Human Rights
Association, ZimRights, raendesa hurumende kudare repamusoro kuitira kuti imanikidzwe kuzivisa veruzhinji hurongwa hwekubayiwa kwenhomba yeCovid-19 munyika yose. Mukuru weZimRights, VaDzikamai Bere, vanoti vakafunga zvekutora danho rekuendesa hurumende kumatare edzimhosva sezvo veruzhinji vasiri kuziva
nezvehurongwa hwehurumende.

VaBere vanoti ibasa rehurumende kuti vanhu vawane zvose zvinoita kuti
vave nehutano hwakanaka pamwe nekudzivirirwa kwezvirwere zvinogona
kuvauraya.

Patabvunza kuti vave papi nenyaya yavakanyorera hurumende svondo
rapera mutauriri weZimbabwe Lawyers fir Human Rights, VaKumbirai Mafunda, vanoti havana mhinduro yavakawana nokudaro magweta avo azoyamura sangano reZimRights kuti risvitse nyaya iyi kumatare edzimhosva. VaMafunda vanoti svondo rakapera vakangonyora tsamba kuhurumende kuti izivise vanhu nezvechirwere cheCovid-19 uye kuti ndeapi matanho airi kutora kuzivisa veruzhinji nemitauro yavanonzwisisa.

Zimbabwe iri kuwana mushonga wenhomba kubva kuChina iyo inoti
mushonga uri kuuya muno wavepo wangomirira kutumirwa kuno. Mimwe mishonga ichapihwa Zimbabwe pasi pechirongwa cheCOVAX iyo ichaona vanoshaya mamiriyoni matanhatu vachibayiwa nhomba iyi. Dzimwe nyika dzakaita seKenya, Botswana, Ghana, Rwanda neSouth Africa dzakatozivisa nhomba dzadzakatenga pamwe nemari dzadzakachengetera kutenga nhomba yechirwere cheCovid-19. Asi Zimbabwe, kuburikidza nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ichatengawo mishona nemari inoita zana remamiriyoni emadhora, kunyange hazvo paine mutauro wekuti hurumende haisati yapihwa mvumo yekushandisa mari iyi kutenga nhomba sezvo pasina mari yekuita izvi mubhajeti rayo ra 2021. No media source currently available

headline: Mabhizimisi Orasikirwa neMamiriyoni Mashanu eMadhora paZuva neNyaya yeKuratidzira
text: Sangano reZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, ZNCC, rinoti mumazuva maviri ekuratidzira nyika yarasikirwa nemari inodarika mamiriyoni gumi emadhora. Mari iyi haisanganisiri mari yezvitoro zvakavharwa kana kupwanya mukuratidzira uku. Mukuru weZNCC, VaChris Mugaga, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka kune vemabhizimisi. VaMugaga vakurudzira hurumende kuti itaurirane nevashandi senzira yekuyedza kupedza kunetsana uku. Gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi, Doctor Sekai Nzenza, vanoti hurumende iri kuzopa vashandi vayo mari iri pakati pezvikamu nemakumi maviri nezvitatu kubva muzana kubva mwedzi uno kusvika muna Kurume nhaurirano dzemuhoro dzichienderera mberi. Vatiwo vari kuda kutanga kuita nhaurirano nevashandi kuburikidza nemisangano yeTripartite Negotiating Forum. Munyori mukuru muZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti hurumende yange yave nemakore akawanda ichiramba kuita nhaurirano nevashandi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, uye vari mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vati zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka kumushandi muZimbabwe zvokonzera kuratidzira. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pari zvino vari kuRussia uye vachashanyira dzimwe nyika shanu vachiyedza kukwezva vekuze vanouchika mari munyika. Asi Doctor Kanyenze vati kuti zvishande, zvinonetsa kana munyika musina kugadzikana. Vashandi vakatanga kuratidzira musi weMuvhuro vachigunun’una nekukwira kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari nezvikamu zana nemakumi mashanu kubva muzana. Mitengo yezvinhu zvekudya yakabva yatangawo kuita chamurambamhuru ichikwira izvo vakawanda vanoti vava kuomerwa nehupenyu. No media source currently available

headline: PRAZ Yotenda Kuti Yakakanganisa Kupa Kupa Paramende Mvumo Yekuti Itenge maComputer neMari Yakawandisa.
text:
Kambani yeProcurement Authority of Zimbabwe (PRAZ) inoti iyo neparamende, vakakanganisa kupa matenda ekutenga maComputers kumakambani eBlinart neMid-End Computers nemari iri pamusoro soro vachiti ndosaka vakakurudzira kuti paramende isiyane nematenda aya bazi rezvemari risati raramba kubhadhara matenda aya. Izvi zvataurwa nemukuru wePRAZ, VaClever Ruswa, paongororo iri kuitwa nekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemashandisirwo emari yehurumende yePublic Accounts Committee. VaRuswa vaudza komiti iyi kuti paramende yakapa makambani aya matenda kunyangee hazvo aive nemitengo yakapetwa kana kudarika mari yayainge yatara kuti ichashandisa kutenga maLaptop neComputer aya.

Blinart yaitengesa Laptop imwe chete neUS$9 300. ukuwo Mid-End ichida mari inodarika US3 000 paDesktop imwe chete. VaRuswa vabvuma kuti ivo sePRAZ vakakanganisa kupasisa magwaro ematenda pamakambani maviri aya vachiti zvakaitwa nemushandi wavo ainge achongopinda basa. Vati izvi ndizvo zvakaita kuti komiti yavo inoongorora matenda yeSpecial Procurement Oversight Committee ipasise magwaro eparamende kunyange hazvo painge paine humbowo hwekuti paramende yaida kutenga maComputer aidhura kudarika zvayainge yakaraonga kutenga. Vachibvunzurudzwa kuti sei vakasvika pamitengo we US9 9314.49, paLaptop imwe chete, mukuru weBlinart, Amai Elizabeth Muchenje, vati mutengo uyu wakakwira nekuti pane zvimwe zvaidiwa uyewo waisanganisira mitemo yeZimbabwe Revenue Authority, mari yavo yekufambisa, nekutakura
zvinhu, pamwe neyekurara muhotera apo vaizoenda kuDubai kunotenga maLaptop. Vatiwo vaizobhadharwa mari iyi ari maRTGSs. Asi vange vakafanobata chigaro chasachigaro wekomiti, VaWillas Madzimure, veCitizens Coaliton for Change havana kufara kuti Amai Muchenje vainge vabhadharisa US39???? paLaptop imwe pamaLatop ese zana nemakumi manomwe nematatu semari yepekurara kana kuti Accomodation. Mumiriri, weNorton VaTemba Mliswa vati nyaya yekushanda kweBlinart haina kunyatsojeka. Vaenderera mberi vachiti pane vamwe vanhu vari kuda kusvibisa kambani iyi. Asi VaMadzimure vavaudza kuti paramende ine mvumo yekuvabunza mibvunzo yese yavanoda. Imwe nhengo yekomiti iyi, VaMarko Raidza veZanu PF vanomirira, Mberengwa North vaudzawo Amai Muchenje kuti vanofanira kupindura mibvunzo yose semunhu atora mhiko yektaura chokwadi. Vachipawo humbowo pamusoro penyaya iyi, mukuru weMid End Computres VaSaulu Sakudya, avo vakawanawo tenda vati vanotenga maComputer avo kuDubai uyewo mitengo yavo vakaisa profit yezvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana kana kuti 20 percent pamwe nemitengo yezvimwe zvinhu zvaida kuwedzerwa pamaComputer aya zvakaita seSoftware. Vanotiwo dzimwe nguva vanotokwereta zvinhu kuDubai sezvo vasingawane mari pamusika weRBZ nenguva.
Zvichakadai mukuru wekambani yeAvantis, VaAri Goldstein, vaudza komiti iyi kuti vakanyorera munyori mubazi rezvemari, VaGeorge Guvamatanga, pamwe neZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission mushure mekunge vashaya tenda kuparamende asi vaive nemitengo iri pasi. VaGolstein yaida kutengesera Parliament laptop imwe chete nemutengo weUS3, 395 uye desktop imwe neUS$2 124. Ongororo yenyaya iyi iri kuenderera mberi uyewo ZACC yave kuferefeta nyaya iyi.

headline: VaJulius Malema Vokurudzira Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Kuti Zvisavhotere VaMnangagwa
text: Mutungamiriri webato rinopikisa muSouth Africa, reEconomic Freedom Fighters, VaJulius Malema, vanoti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa zvinofanira kudzokera kumusha kunovhota kuti zvibvise hurumende yeZanu PF pachigaro asi vanoongorora nyaya dzematongerwo enyika vanoti chinodiwa kuti vana veZimbabwe vabvumirwe kuvhota vari kunyika dzavanogara kusanganisira South Africa. VaMalema vakataura mashoko aya nezuro kumhomho yevatsigiri vebato ravo muPretoria pamhemberero dzekuwana rusunguko kweSouth Africa dzeFreedom Day. Vakakurudzira mamiriyoni ezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvino fungidzrwa kuti zvinogara munyika iyi kuti zviende kumusha kuno vhotera shanduko. VaMalema vakashora mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachiti vakatadza kuita zvavakavimbisa apo vakatora matomu muna 2017. Asi mukuru wesangano rePlatform for Youth and Community Development, VaClaris Madhuku, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vano bvumirana naVaVaMalema kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinofanira kuvhota asi kuti zvinofanira kuvhota zviri chero kunyika ipi zvayo. Izvi zvatsigirwa naDoctor Wellington Gadzikwa avo vano dzidzisa paAfrica University vati chikuru chinodiwa kuti mutemo uvandudzwe kuti vanhu ava vabvumidzwe kuvhota vari kunze kwenyika sezvinoitwa pasarudzi dzenyika zhinji pasi rese. Doctor Gadzikwa vatiwo panoda kuvandudzwa mutemo nemafambisirwe esarudzo muZimbabwe vachiti kana zvinhu zvikaramba sezvazviri kuvhota hakuna zvakuno shandura. Kunyange hazvo VaMalema vakati zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogona kudzokera kuSouth Africa zvavhota. Asi VaMadhuku vati nyaya yekushungurudzwa kuri kuitwa zvizvarwa zvekunze kwenyika muSouth Africa inogona kutadzisa vakawanda kudzokera kunyika iyi. Vakasafanobata chinzvimbo chemutevedzeri wasachigaro mubato reCitizens Coalition for Change, VaJob Sikhala, vanyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter kuti VaMnangagwa vanofanira kubviswa pachigaro uye vakurudzira vana veZimbabwe vari kuSouth Africa vaterere mashoko aVaMalema ekuti vadzoke kuzovhota. Mutauriri webato riri kutonga reZanu PF, VaChris Mutsvangwa, varamba kupa pfungwa dzebato ravo pamashoko aVaMalema. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi sezvo gurugota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaFrederick Shava, vange vasiri kudaira nhare mbozha nyayo. VaMalema vakatsigira VaMnangagwa pakavapinda panyanga muna2017 asi hukama hwavo nebato reZanu PF hwave kupota huchidziya nekutonhora dzimwe nguva. Zimbabwe iri kuita sarudzo dzemutungamiriri wenyika, paramende nemakanzuru gore rinoouya uye VaMalema vanoti vanhu ngavavhotere shanduko. Zvichakadaro, komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo, yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission (ZEC) nhasi yati yati vanhu vakwanda vave kuenda kunonyoresa kuvhota pasi pechirongwa chayo chechipiri chekupinda munzvimbo dzinogara vakawanda ichinyoresa vanhu kuvhota. Mutauriri weZEC, VaJasper Mangwana, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo chirongwa ichi chichipera nemussi wemugovera hazvifanira kushaisa vanhu mufaro nekuti vanokwanisa kuramba vachinyoresa kuvhota kumahofisi ekomisheni iyi. VaMangwana vati vanhu vanokwanisa kuramba vachinonyoresa kuvhota kumahofisi avo makumi makumi manomwe nematatu ari mmumatunhu ese munyika. Kusvika musi wa18 mwedzi uno pane vanhu zviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu vainge vanyoresa pasi pechirongwa ichi chakatanga musi wa11 mwedzi uno. Vanhu zviuru makumi masere vakanyoresa kuvhota nyika yese pasi pechirongwa chekutanga cheZEC kana kuti Blitz asi vanhu vakawanda vanotarisirwa kunyoresa pasi pechirongwa chinpera nemugovera sezvo chiri kuita apo paine chirongwa chekupa vanhu zvitupa munzvimbo dzinogarar vazhinje neveCivil Registry Department. Nyaya yekushaya zvitupa ndeimwe inotadzisa vakawanda kunyoresa kuvhota. Asi VaMangwana vatiwo imwe nyaya inoita kuti vakawanda vasanyoresa kuvhota inyaya yemanyepo anotaurwa nemamwe mapato kuti ZEC inobira sarudzo. Vanhu havamakidzwe kuvhota muZimbabwe uye VaMangwana vati ndizvo zvinoita kuti vamwe vanokwanisa kuvhota varegedze. Asi vatiwo chinofadza pachirongwa chavari kuita mazuvano inyaya yekuti pane vamwe vanhu vanemakore makumi masere vakanyoresa kuvhota. VaMangwana vati vachizivisa huwandu hwevanhu vanenge vanyoresa kuvhota pasi pechirongwa ichi kana chapera nemusi weMugovera. No media source currently available

headline: VaMudede Vooresa Moyo Vanoda Kunyoresa Kuvhota
text: Nyaya yekunyoresa kuvhota kwevanhu vane vabereki vasina kuberekerwa muZimbabwe vanonzi ma Aliens iri kuramba ichitemesa musoro vakawanda sezvo paine kunakurirana nyoka mhenyu pakati pemapazi akasiyana siyana ehurumende, sangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, uye mapato ezvematongerwo enyika. Vamwe vanhu vane zvitupa zvinoratidza kuti vabareki vavo havana kuberekerwa muZimbabwe zvakanzi Alien kana kuti NCR vanoti vari kukundikana kuti vanyorese kuvhota. Sachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Amai Rita Makarau, vanoti ivo havanei nechekuita nenyaya iyi sezvo riri basa ramabharani mukuru wehurumende kana kuti Registrar General, VaTobaiwa Mudede. Studio 7 yabatawo VaMudede avo vati hapana munhu anonyoresa kuvhota aine chitupa chakanzi alien. Asi VaMudede vati havasi kuzovandudza mutemo kuti vanhu ava vanyorese kuvhota nechimbi chimbi. Gweta, uye vari nhengo yePolitburo yeZanu-PF, VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana, vatiwo vose vakaberekerwa muZimbabwe asi vaine vabereki vanobva munyika dziri muSADC vanofanirwa kupihwa zvitupa zvitsva nehofisi yaVaMudede. VaMangwana vati vanotenderana nezviri kutaurwa naVaMudede pamatanho anofanira kutorwa nevanhu vane zvitupa zvakanzi alien kuti vakwanise kuvhota. Asi mutungamiri webato rePeople’s Democratic Party, vari gweta, VaTendai Biti, vati zviri kuitwa naVaMudede neZEC ndezvemugotsi matsuro. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemunyori mukuru muMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora. Nekunetsana uku, magweta mazhinji audza Studio7 kuti zvakakosha kuti vari kunzi ma aliens ava vaende kuhofisi yaVaMudede vagadzirise mapepa avo asi zvikanonoka vonanga kumatare. No media source currently available

headline: VaMandiwanzira Vanoramba Kuti Hurumende Yakambovhara Whatsapp Kuti Vanhu Vasaratidzire
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvehumhizha mukufambiswa kwemashoko VaSupa Mandiwanzira varamba kuti hurumende nemusi weChitatu yakambovhara dandemutande rekufambiswa kwemashoko reWhatsapp. Vanhu vakawanda vakaudza Studio 7 kuti nharembozha dzavo dzange dzisiri kushanda mangwanani ose. Vakawanda vanoti hurumende yaiedza kuita izvi kuda kudzivisa vanhu kuti vasaratidzire vachinyunyuta nekutadza kutungamira kwavanoti kuri kuitwa nehurumende yemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Asi VaMandiwanzira vati pamwe chakonzera kuti dandemutanda ridonhe inyaya yekuti vanhu vakawanda vange vachirishandisa panguva imwe chete. VaMandiwanzira vati titaure nevenharembozha. Asi mukuru weEconet VaDouglas Mboweni vati ichokwadi kuti dandemutande ravo rabodonha. Asi varamba kutaura kuti chii chaitika. Zvichakadaro, sangano rePostal and Telecommunications Regulatory Authority of Zimbabwe (POTRAZ) pamwe nevanoona nezvekufambiswa kwenhare nenharembozha vaburitsa mashoko vachiti pane vanhu vakawanda vari kutumira mashoko ekunyomba panharembozha vakati izvi zvinogona kuvapinza muna taisireva. Vati vanhu vose vari kutumira mashoko ekukurudzira kuratidzira vachasungwa. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvekufambiswa kwemashoko dzinoti zviri kutaurwa nePOTRAZ ndezvemugotsi matsuro sezvo zvichinetsa kusora Whatsapp. Magweta anotiwo hazvisi pamutemo kuvhara nharembozha kana dandemutande reWhatsapp. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yokundikana Kuzadzikisa Zvayakazvitarira neZvaitarisirwa neWHO paNyaya yeNhomba yeCovid-19
text: Zimbabwe iyo yave nenhomba dzinodarika mamiriyoni gumi nematanhatu kana kuti 16 million ichiri kutatarika kubaya vanhu nhomba sezviri kuitikawo munyika dzakawanda dzemuAfrica. Vanhu zvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana ndivo vabayiwa nhomba mbiri munyika kusvika parizvino kunyangwe chinangwa chehurumende chaive chekuti vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana vange vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 mukupera kwegore rapera. Asi kunyangwe Zimbabwe isati yasvitsa huwandu uhu, yatangawo kubaya vamwe nhomba kechitatu. Nhomba yeCovid-19 yakatanga kubayiwa muZimbabwe musi wa 17 Mbudzi gore rapera. Nhomba dziri kubayiwa munyika dzinoti Sputnik V yekuRusssia pamwe nedzekuChina dzinoti Sinopharm neSinovac, Covaxin yekuIndia uye Janssen yeJohnson and Johnson dziri kushandiswa muZimbabwe. Kunyangwe hazvo vanhu vakawanda vachiri kuzengurira kubayiwa nhomba, mukuru anoona nezvekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 munyika Dr Agnes Mahomva vanoti, nhomba inobatsira nekuti. Zimbabwe haina kungokundikana pane zvayainge yazvitarira chete pakubaya nhomba yeCovud-19 asi pane zvimwe zvainge zvatarwa nesangano reWorld Health Organization kana kuti WHO. WHO yainge yatiwo yainge iine chivimbo chekuti panopera gore ra2021, nyika dzemuAfrica dzinenge dzabaya vanhu vadzo zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana nhomba. A si nyika shoma shoma dzisingadarike gumi kusanganisira, Seychelles, Mauritius, Morrocco, Rwanda neBotswana chete kuchamhembe kweAfrica ndidzo dzakwanisa kuita izvi. MuAfrica yose, vanhu zvikamu zviviri nechidimbu kubva muzana kana kuti 2, 5% ndivo vabayiwa nhomba zvichienzaniswa nezvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kana kuti 60% kubva kunyika dzakabudirira. Kunyangwe hazvo nyanzvi munyika nekunze dziri kuti zvave pachena kuti vanenge vabayiwa nhomba kaviri kana katatu vane mukana wakakura wekuti vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 vasafe, vanhu vashoma zvikuru vemuAfrica havana kubayiwa nezvikonzero zvakasiyana siyana. Vamwe vachiri kutya kutivanogona kutadza kuita mbereko vamwe vachiti chitendero hachivabvumidze zvose izvi zviri kutenderedzwa pamadandemutande akasiyana siyana pasi rose. Vamwe vanhu vari kushaya chivimbo nenhomba vachiti vamwe vakabayiwa nhomba dzose mbiri kana nhatu vari kungorwara. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvezvirwere zvekutapuriranwa, Muzvinafundo Davison Sangweme vatiwo kushanduka kwechirwere kana kuti virus ndiko kunopa kuti chiiuye nedzimwe mhando chobata vakabayiwa nhomba ava. Ko huurumende yeZimbabwe ingaite sei kuti vanhu vakawanda vabayiwe nhomba? Tabvunza mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyaya dzezvehutano reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike vanoti hurumende inofanira kunyengetedza vanhu kuti vabayiwe nhomba. Nhomba muAfrica dziri kuuyawo kuburikidza nesangano reAfrican Union pasi pechirongwa chinonzi Vaccine Acquisition Trust kana kuti AVAT nechimwe cheWorld Health Organization chinonzi COVAX. Asi munyika dzakaita seNigeria, Malawi neSouth Sudan, dzimwe nhomba dzakapiswa sezvo mazuva akatarwa kuti dzinge dzashandiswa ainge adarika dzichiri mumatura. African Union iri kuchema chema kuti dzimwe nhomba dziri kuita zvekuraswa kuAfrica. Sangano iri rinotiwo chimwe chiri kupa kuti zvinetse kubaya vanhu nhomba inyaya yekuti dzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica hadzina zvimwe zvinodiwa mukushandiswa mukubaya nhomba zvakaita semafacemask, donje nemotokari dzekutakurisa nhomba kuendesa kune mamwe matunhu kanawo mafiriji ekuchengetera dzimwe nhomba. Sangano reTony Blair Institute for Global Change rinoti nhomba dzinosvika zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana dziri muAfrica hadzina kushandiswa nezvikonzero zvakasiyana siyana. Mukuru weAfrica Centres for Disease Control VaJohn Nkengasonga vanoti dzimwe nyika hadzisiwo kana kutouya kuzotora mishonga kumatura avo. Asiwo vakawanda vanoti nyika dzakabudirira ndidzo dzakonzera dambudziko kunyanya nekusada kubatsira dzevarombo nenhomba. No media source currently available

headline: Nhamo Yoramba Yakabata Vamwe Vagari kuChimanimani
text: Vamwe vagari vekuChimanimani vanodarika gumi nevaviri vanonzi vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Izvi zvakaitika mushure mekunge hurumende yati vanhu vanodarika mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu vange vambotama musha nekutyira kuyeredzwa nemafashamu emvura vadzokere kumisha yavo yekumatende avari kugara kubva muna 2019 apo vakaparadzirwa misha nedutumupengo reCyclone Idai. Vanhu ava vakambotamiswa mushure mekunge dunhu iri rapindazve munzira yemafashamu emvura nemadutumupengo emhepo maviri kana kuti Tropical Storm Chalane yakarova muna Zvita, uye Tropical Storm Eloise mwedzi uno. Manicaland ndiro dunhu riri kutevera Harare pavanhu vakawandisa vari kurwara neCovid-19 pari zvino vanove mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matatu nevasere kana kuti 938. Hatina kukwanisa kubata sachigaro mubazi rekudzivirira njodzi kuManicaland kana kuti Civil Protection Committee chairperson, VaEdgars Seenza, vange vachitungamira hurongwa hwekubatsira vanhu ava. Asi tabata mumwe mugari wekuChimanimani kuNgangu VaPardon Maguta. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Votsigira Danho reMDC Rekuratidzira, Vamwe Vachiti Bato iri Ngaribatane neVamwe muNhaurirano
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMDC, VaNelson Chamisa vakazivisa nezuro kuti bato ravo rave kuzopinda mumigwagwa richiratidzira pamusoro pemabatirwo avakati ari kuitwa nyaya dzehupfumi hwenyika nehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa.  VaChamisa vakataura mashoko aya pamusangano wavakaita nevatori venhau muHarare neChitatu, vakati misangano yavakaita nenhengo dzavo mumatunhu gumi emunyika yakavaratidza kuti vanhu vaneta nekuparara kwehupfumi.  Mutungamiri weMDC uyu akati vatsigiri vebato rake vave kuda kuti vapinde mumigwagwa, vachiti iyi ndiyo chete nzira yekugadzirisa nayo zvinetswa izvi.  Mushure memusangano uyu, vechidiki veMDC mudunhu reHarare vakabva vapinda mumigwagwa vachiratidzira vachikurudzira kuti VaMnangagwa vasiye basa. Varatidzira ava vakazoparadzwa nemapurisa achishandisa utsi hunokachidza.  Zvichitevera mashoko aya, pave nemaonero akasiyana pamusoro pedanho riri kukurudzirwa navatsigiri veMDC iri, vamwe vachiti pane nzira dzakawanda kwazvo dzekugadzirisa nadzo matambudziko ari munyika dzisiri kupinda mumigwagwa.  Ukuwo, vamwe vari kuti mutauro unonzwisiswa nehurumende chete ndewekuti vanhu vapinde mumigwagwa, uye izvi zvinobvumirwa mubumbiro remitemo yenyika.  Mukuru weCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu ndemumwe wevari kukurudzira kuti vanhu varatidzire murunyararo, vachiti hapana chinobatika chati chaitwa nehurumende mukuratidza kuti ine zvairi kuita mukugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika.  Asi izvi zvinoshoropodzwa nasachigaro vevechidiki vebato reZanu PF mudunhu reHarare, VaAlex Gakanje, avo vanotsoropodza pfungwa yaVaMaguwu yekuti vanhu varatidzire, vachiti VaMaguwu vari kufurira vanhu kuti vapinde mumigwagwa vachityora mutemo.  Asi VaMaguwu vanoti chinhu chinozivikanwa nemunhu wese kuti kubva muna 2000 nyika haina kwairi kuenda, iri kungotenderera panzvimbo imwechete nekuti hurumende iri kungoramba ichipa pfungwa dzisina zvadzinobatsira nyika nazvo. VaGakanje vanoti mhirizhonga iri kukurudzirwa neMDC iyi inotora hupenyu hwevanhu vanenge vaiswa pamhene nemaitiro akadai. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Votadza Kutora Mari Dzavo kuMasvingo
text: Vagari vekuMasvingo vatadza kutora mari dzavo mumabhanga nhasi, izvo vakawanda vanoti zvichavhiringa hurongwa hwavo hwezororo rekisimusi. Muguta reMasvingo manga musina mufaro nhasi zvichitevera kutadza kutora mari kumabhanga kwaitwa nevagari vakawanda. Mumwe wevanhu vasiri kufara, uye ari mutori wenhau, Energy Bara, anoti atadza kutora mari kubhanga rake reCBZ. "Zvinhu zvacho zviri kuita zvichitoshata pakapinda mutungamiri mutsva takafunga kuti zvichaita nani but zvavakutoshata ike zvino nhasi ndatouya kubank handina kana kuwana kana cent, pa bank hapana vanhu nhasi not nekuti pane mari asi hapana kana mari saka hapana kana shanduko yatati taoona sevana veZimbabwe," Bara anotsanangura. Mitsetse inogara iri mumabhanga mazuva ose, yange isiko, sezvo mabhanga asiri kupa vanhu mari. VaPilani Ngoniye vanoti kushaikwa kwemari panguva ino kunorwadza zvikuru uye zvinhu zviri kutowedzera kushata chero hazvo pava nehurumende tsva. “Tashaiwa mari kana cent tatodzoserwa kumusha totoshaya kuti tofamba neyi kudzokera kumusha uyezve handifungi kuti kisimusi yedu ichanakidza sezvo muMasvingo muno hamuna kana bank riri kupa vanhu mari, haa hurumende tsva iyi yakangofana neyaivapo sharu, yaivapo ikange nani, vakangoita recycle vanhu asi system ndoimwe, it’s from bad to worse,” vadaro VaNgoniye. Muzvare Esther Chimanikire vati kushaikwa kwemari kunovhiringa mufaro wevanhu pazororo rekisimusi rinofanira kufarwa. “Isu hatitozivi kuti krisimasi yedu inenge yakamirasei, izvezvi ndatodzosewa kubanka hanzi hatina mari apa ndinoda kuenda kumusha hakuna eco cash, kana swipe hakushandiswi card saka mbudzi dzacho tinouraya sei, zvakatotiomera kana vanobva joni vanochinjisa sei ma rands avo,” vadaro VaChimanikire. Mumwe mushandi wemubhanga aramba kudomwa zita rake anoti kushaikwa kwemari muMasvingo kwakatanga nemusi weMugovera. Vanhu vakambopembera apo vemabhanga vakawedzera mari yavaipa vanhu svondo ragadzwa mutungamiri wenyika asi iye zvino zvadzokera pazvaiva. Mabanga emuMasvingo akaita seZB ne NMB ari kupa vanhu makumi maviri emadhora pazuva, ukuwo mabhanga eCBZ, Standrad Charted neBarclays achipa makumi mashanu emadhora pasvondo rose. No media source currently available

headline: CCZ Inoti Mhuri yeVanhu Vatanhatu Yoda Mari Inodarika Zviuru Makumi Maviri zveMadhora paMwedzi
text: Sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevatengi pamwe nekuvadzivirira, reConsumer Council of Zimbabwe, CCZ, rinoti mhuri ine vanhu vatanhatu yava kuda mari inoita madhora emunyika zviuru makumi maviri nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi masere nemashanu kana kuti ZWL$20 985.00 pamwedzi kuti ikwanise kurarama. Sangano iri rinoti mari iyi ndeye mhuri inotambira mari shoma ichigara muguta. Mhuri iyi inonzi inoda madhora emunyika zviuru gumi nechimwe nemazana matatu ane gumi nerimwe, kana kuti ZWL$11 311.00 pamwedzi yekutenga chikafu chete, kuchitiwo chiuru chemadhora emunyika nemakumi matanhatu ekutenga sipo dzekugezesa nekuwachisa. Pamusoro pezvo, mhuri iyi inodawo madhora emunyika zviuru zvisere nemazana matanhatu negumi nemashanu, kana kuti ZWL$8 615.00 pamwedzi yepekugara, mvura, magetsi, hutano, dzidzo, zvekupfeka pamwe nezvekufambisa pamwedzi. Mutungamiri wesangano revashandi, reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti kunyange hazvo gwaro reCCZ iri raburitsa kutambura kuri kuita vashandi, harina kunyatoburitsa zvose zvakakwana zvinofanirwa kunge zvichiwanikwa nemushandi kuitira kuti ararame zvakanaka nemhuri yake. VaMutasa vanoti vashandi vakawanda vari kutambira mihoro iri pasi kwazvo kumari inodiwa nemhuri ine vanhu vatanhatu iyi . No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vanoti vanowirirana netsvakurudzo yeConsumer Council of Zimbabwe iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Mauto, Vasori neMapurisa Voshandiswa Kumanikidza Varimi Kuti Vaendese Chibage kuGMB
text: Varimi vakawanda munyika vari kuchema chema nedanho rehurumende rekuti mauto, vasori nemapurisa pasi peJoint Operation Command vaone kuti vamanikidzwa kutengesa chibage kuGrain Marketing Board. Vakuru muhurumende vaudza Studio 7 kuti izvi zviri kuitwa sezvo zviri kutyirwa kuti kushaikwa kwehupfu kunogona kukonzera kusagadzikana munyika. Mutsamba yakanyorwa nemunyori mukuru mubazi rezvekurima Doctor John Basera kuGMB iri mumaoko eStudio 7, pachibage matani zviuru makumi matatu zvakohwewa kana kuti 30, 000 metric tonnes, matani zviuru zvishanu kana kuti 5000 metric tonnes chete ndizvo zvaendeswa kuGMB. Patabata VaBhasera vati tivatumire mibvunzo asi vange vasati vapindura. Hurumende yakadzika mutemo wechimbi chimbi weStatutory Instrument 145/19 kumanikidza varimi kutengesa chibage kuGMB kana paita goho shoma Mapurisa, mauto nevasori vari kunzi mutsamba iyi vaende kumapurazi vachiona kuti varimi havasi kuviga chibage here kana kutengesa pamukoto. Vanonziwo vaite maroad blocks kuona kuti hapana vari kutakura chibage zvisina mvumo yeGMB here. Asi nhengo yeparamende yakazvimirira vachimirira Norton vari murimi vaTemba Mliswa vashora zvikuru zviri kuda kuitwa nehurumende izvi. Vaudza Studio 7 kuti varimi vanoda kupihwa mari inoendererana nemari yavakashandisa pakurima. Vati zvekurimisa zvakaita sembeu nefotereza zvinotengwa nemadhora ekuAmerica.  No media source currently available Sachigaro weGrain Millers Association of Zimbabwe VaTafadzwa Musarara vakaudzawo Studio 7 kuti vainge vatenga chibage chinosvika matani zviuru mazana mana kana kuti 400, 000 metric tonnes kubva kuZambia neMalawi. Varimi vakawanda vari kuZambia vakatorerwa mapurazi muZimbabwe.. Kuyedza kugadzirisa nyaya yenzara, hurumende iri kuitawo misangano nebazi reUnited Nations reWorld Food Programme kuti ipihwe chikafu sezvo zvinhu zvakaita manyama amire nerongo. Munyori mubazi rezvemagariro evanhu VaSimona Masanga vanoti misangno iyi iri kuenderera mberi. WFP inoti kubva mwedzi uno kusvika muna Gumiguru, Zimbabwe inoda mari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi mashanu nematatu kana kuti US$53 million kubatsira vanhu mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 5,3 million.

headline: Vanhukadzi Vechidiki Vokurudzirwa Kupinda Musarudzo
text: Sangano reInstitute for Young Women’s Development rinoti riri kushanda nemamwe masangano evechidiki mukukurudzira vanhukadzi vechidiki kumaruwa kuti vatore zvigaro zvematongerwo enyika musaruzdzo dza 2018. Mukuru wesangano iri, Muzvare Glanis Changachirere, vanoti vakatanga basa iri zvichetevera musangano wavakaita gore rapfuura uyo wakaratidza kuti madzimai echidiki kumaruwa haana zvigaro mungava mumakanzuru kana muparamende. Muzvare Changachirere vanoti madzimai aya anosangana nematambudziko akawanda akaita sekushaiswa mukana, mhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika nezvimwe uye ivo vari kuita basa rekuvadzidzisa nezvekodzero panyaya dzesarudzo. Muzvare Changachirere vanoti kana madzimai aya akasadaro, anosarira munyaya dzebudiriro nekuti hapana anenge achisumdzira nyaya dzavo mumakanzuru kana muparamende. Vanotiwo kunze kwemuparamende nemumakanzuru, madzimai echidiki anofanira kutora zvigaro zvehutungamiriri munzvimbo dzavanogara. Muzvare Charity Chaturuka vesangano reZimbabwe Young Women for Peace Building vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kubuda pachena kuti madzimai echidiki ekumaruwa haana ruzivo nezvekodzeo dzavo. Vanotiwo rimwe dambudziko rine madzimai nderekushaya mari dzekuti vatsvagise rutsigiro kana vachida kupinda musarudzo. Mumwe wevechidiki, VaKudakwashe Makanda, avo vanoshanda ne Youth Initiative for Community Development Trust, vanotiwo vari kubatsira vechidiki vangave madzimai kana varume kuti vazive kodzero dzavo musarudzo. Vati ichokwadi kuti kunyange vechidiki vakada kumira pasarudzo, nyaya yemari inonetsa uye panofanira kutsvagwa nzira yekuvapa mari dzekuti vapinde musarudzo. Vanoti semamimiriro akaita zvinhu vane mari kana vanobva kumhuri dzakapfuma ndivo chete vane mikana yekupinda musarudzo. Muzvare Changachirere vanoti pasi pechirongwa chavo che Her Right of Way Give Way Campaign vari kukuridzira hurumende, mapato ezvematongerwo enyika nemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira kuti apewo mukana kune vechidiki kuti vakwikwidze musarudzo dzinotevera. Vanoti vanozviziva kuti izvi zvinogona kutora nguva asi pari zvino vari kuda kuti pazvigaro makumi matanhatu zvinopihwa madzimai zvisingakwikwidze muNational Assembly makumi matatu zvinofanira kupihwa vechidiki. Mamwe masangano ari kushanda neInstitute for Young Women’s Development ndeanoti Zimbabwe Organisation for Youth in Politics, Platform for Youth Development, Plumtree Development Trust pamwe neMission To Live Trust. No media source currently available

headline: ZEC Inoudzwa Kuti Chinowandiswa Ivhoti Kwete Mifananidzo
text: Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemataongerwo enyika Doctor Pedzisayi Ruhanya avo vari kushanda neUniversity of Johannesburg vanoti ZEC inofanira kuburitsa gwaro remazita evavhoti rine mifananidzo yevanhu sezvinodiwa nechirongwa chitsva cheBVR. Doctor Ruhanya vanoti chiso chemunhu hachifanire kuwandiswa asi chinofanira kuwandiswa ivhoti. Mashoko aya anotevera kutsika madziro kuri kuita sachigaro weZEC Amai Priscilla Chigumba vachiti havasi kuzoburitsa gwaro revavhoti rine mifananidzo. Zvichakadaro, sangano rinoona nezvemitemo nemashandiro eparamende reVeritas raramba mashoko ari kubuda mubepanhau reHerald kunyanya kuti riri kuda kukanganisa mashandiro esangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission kana kuti ZEC nekuriendesa kumatare edzimhosva richipomera mhosva yekutyora mitemo yesarudzo. Bepanhau iri rinotiwo veVeritas vanoda kusvibisa zita remutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Sangano iri ratiwo rakatanga basa rekuti mutemo wesarudzo ugadziriswe muna 2013 pakatambirwa bumbiro remutemo idzva. Asi veVeritas vanoti izvi ndezvemugotsi matsuro sezvo nyaya zhinji vakadzikwidza kumatare VaMnangagwa vasati vatora masimba vachishandisa mauto kubva kune vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Veritas yati haina bato rematongerwo enyika rainotsigira asi yakurudzira kuti bumbir remutemo richengetedzwe uye kuti munyika muitwe sarudzo dzakachena. Sangano iri ratiwo rinoda kuti kana sarudzo dzaitwa mapato asazoenda kumatare achidzipikisa nekuti bumbiro remutemo rinenge risina kuteverwa. Veritas yatiwo pamutemo ZEC inofanira kungotevera mutemo kwete kuda kutara iyo mitemo nekupikisa nyaya dzose dzinenge dzaendeswa kumatare kunyangwe iri risiri basa rayo. No media source currently available

headline: Ambassador Nichols Vanoti Mitemo Ngaienderane neBumbiro reMitemo yeNyika
text: Mumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe, Ambassador Brian Nichols, vanoti hurongwa hwakaturwa mudare reparamende nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, hwakanaka chose asi chasara ndechekuti hutevedzwe. Vachitaura pachirongwa chekambani ye263Chat, Ambassador Nichols vati zvakakosha kuti hurongwa uhu hutevedzwe kuitira remangwana rakanaka renyika. Vatiwo Zimbabwe inogona kubudirira chose kana mabhiri ese makumi maviri nemanomwe akataurwa naVaMnangagwa akapaswa neparamende. Vatiwo mitemo yose inofanirwa kuti ienderane nebumbiro remitemo yenyika kuitira kuti zvinhu zvifambe zvakanaka munyaya dzemitemo nekodzero dzevanhu Vatiwo nyika yavo iri kubatsira Zimbabwe munyaya dzedzidzo, chikafu nezvimwe uye vati kutaura kudai pane nyanzvi kubva kubazi rehurumende yeAmerica reCenters for Diseases Control dziri kuuya kuZimbabwe kuzobatsira kurwisa chirwere chekorera icho chatekeshera nenyika yose. Ambassador Nichols, avo vaitawo musangano negurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika, Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri, vatiwo kunyange hazvo sarudzo dzemuZimbabwe dzisina kusvika paitarisirwa nenyika dzepasi rese, danho rekudoma komisheni yekuongorora kupfurwa kwevanhu musi wa 1 Nyamavhuvhu rakakosha chose. Vati hazvifaniri kuperera mukuongorora chete asi kuti vanenge vabatwa nemhosva vanofanira kurangwa. Zvichakadai, nhengo dzeparamende dzatanga kuzeya mosheni yekurumbidza mutungamiri wenyika nemashoko avo pakuvhura paramende. Amai Goodlucky Kwaramaba ndivo vatura mosheni iyi kudare vachirumbidza mutungamiriri wenyika nemabhiri avakati azeyiwe nedare iri. Vamwe vataurawo pamusoro pemosheni iyi vanosanganisira mumiriri weBuhera South, VaJoseph Chinotimba, avo vasekesa nenhengo dzedare iri apo vati kubuda kwakaita nhengo dzebato rinopikisa paivhurwa paramende huwori.
