Asi mutauriri wedare iri, Advocate Jacob Mudenda, havana kufara nekuita kwaVaChinotimba. Mumiriri weNorton, VaThemba Mliswa, avo vasina bato ravanomirira vatenda vanhu vekuNorton nekuvatsigira vachisiya mapato makuru munyika eZanu PF neMDC. Vatendawo VaMnangagwa nechitsidzo chavo chekurwisa huwori asi vakati havasi kufara kuti mamwe makurukota ehurumende pamwe nenhengo dzeparamende dziri kuita huwori havasi kusungwa. Vati makurukota anodoma nhengo dzemabhodhi emakambani ehurumende anobatwa nemhosva dzehuwori anofanira kusungwawo. Vapa semuenzaniso vaive gurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Priscah Mupfumira, avo vati vaifanirawo kusungwa pakasungwa nhengo dzebhodhi rekambani yeNational Social Security Authority nenyaya dzehuwori. VaMliswa vatiwo vanotarisira kuona makurukota ehurumende achidzingwa pamwe nekusungwa nenyaya dzehuwori. No media source currently available

headline: Mumwe weVatevedzeri vaVaTsvangirai Ovimbisa Kugadzirisa Kunetsana Kuri muBato reMDC-T
text: Mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMDC-T, VaNelson Chamisa vanoti svondo rino bato ravo richagadzirisa nyaya iri kunetsa yekuti ndiyani anenge achifanobata matomu mutungamiri webato iri VaMorgan Tsvangirai vari kuchipatara muSouth Africa. VaTsvangirai vane vatevedzeri vatatu vanoti VaChamisa, VaElias Mudzuri uye Muzvare Thokozane Khupe. Vatatu ava vave makara asionane panyaya yehutungamiri. Vachitaura pamusangano wekutsvaga rutsigiro rwemubatananidzwa weMDC Alliance munhandare yeMamutse kuMasvingo, VaChamisa, avo vari kumiririra VaTsvangirai mumubatanidzwa uyu, vakaudza zviuru nezviuru zvevatsigiri vavo kuti vachaedza kugadzirisa makakatanwa ari mubato ravo svondo rino. “Kureva kuti pane nyaya yanga ichitaurwa, musatambura kuti bato ringaita dambudziko. Hazvirevi kuti musoro ukatema mutumbi wese vafa, kunogona kusanzwisisana bhichana asi zivai kuti zvinowanikwa saka vhiki ino toda kupedza nyaya dzose dzewowowo kumusoro uko, tova nechinhu chimwe chete. Kana paita anoramba kunzwisisa tinodzidzisa nedzidziso yedu yeshanduko tibatane titarisane neZanu yava marengenya.” Vamwe vatsigiri vebato iri vari kutyira kuti rinogona kutsemuka nepakati kana vatungamiri ava vakasaita mubatira pamwe. Vachitaurawo pamusangano uyu, mutevedzeri wasachigaro weMDCT, VaMorgan Komichi vakatsiura vatungamiriri vari kunetsana kuti vataurirane vapedze nyaya yavo svondo risati rapera. VaKomichi vanoti kurwisana uku kunorwadza vatsigiri vakawanda munyika avo vakamirira shanduko. “I am instructing leadership of MDCT to come to sense to compromise to resolve the problem as matter of fact in a week’s time, we cannot continue sacrifice hope yevana veZimbabwe, vana ve Zimbabwe vanoda kuenderera mberi, vanoda kudya Mnangagwa ne Zanu yake, vanoda zvipatara havadi kunzwa kutukana kwenyu.” Vachitaura pamusangano mumwewo, mutungamiriri we PDP vari nhengo yeMDC Alliance VaTendai Biti vakayambira vanhu kuti vabatane vavhotere mubatanidzwa wavo kunyangwe Zanu PF ikaita mhirizhonga. “Gore rino tirikupedza hondo yatakatanga mugore ra1999, istruglle ine makuva saka 2018 we are finishing what we started, vane zvicheme se MDCT allaiance vana ngavawane mabasa, come Septemeber 2018 tinemge tine hurumende itsva yaMorgan Tsvangirai.” Mutungamiriri MDC, Professor Welshman Ncube vakatsinhirawo VaBiti vachiti gore rino vanhu veZimbabwe vanofanira kubuda mukutambura kwavari kuita ne kuda kwehutongi hweZanu PF . Vamwe vatungamiri vakanga vari pamusangano uyu vanosanganisira VaJacob Ngaribvume veTransform Zimbabwe, naVaAgrippa Mutambara veZimbabwe People First. VaMudzuri vainge varipowo pamusangano uyu, asi havana kuwana mukana wekutaura, vamwe vachiti vashaya mukana nekuda kwemvura yakanaya yakawanda. Asi vamwe vanoti havana kupiwa mukana wekutaura nekuda kwemakakatanwa ehutungamiri ari pakati pavo naVaChamisa. No media source currently available

headline: Paramende Yodaidza VaChinamasa Kuti Vajekese Kwakabva Mari yeKubhadhara Chikwereti kuWorld Bank
text: Vanoona nezvehupfumi mubato reMDC, VaTapiwa Mashakada, uye vari nhengo yekomiti yedare reparamende inoona nezvehupfumi, vanoti komiti yavo ine hurongwa hwekudaidza kudare iri gurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, kuti vataure nezvekubhadhara chikwereti chenyika. VaMashakada vanoti vanoda kuti VaChinamasa vazotsanangure nyaya yemari inosvika bhiriyoni imwe chete yemadhora yavanoti vakawana kubhadhara mari yakawedzerwa pazvikwereti zveZimbabwe kuWorld Bank neAfrican Development Bank. VaChinamasa havana kutaura kuti mari iyi yainge yabva kupi. Asi bepanhau reZimbabwe Independent rakabva raburitsa nyaya yekuti mari iyi yainge yabva kukambani yekuSingapore inonzi Trafigura. Asi mutauriri wekambani iyi, Amai Zohra McDoolley-Aimone, varamba mashoko ekuti kambani yavo yakapa Zimbabwe mari inodarika bhiriyoni imwe chete yemadhora yekuti ibhadhare chikwereti kuWorld Bank neAfrican Development Bank. Vachipindura mubvunzo kubva kuStudio7, Amai McDoolley-Aimone vati vainge vanzwa mashoko kubva kumapepanhau ekuti Trafigura yainge yapa Zimbabwe mari asi vakati aya manyepo. Vatiwo vane mabhizimisi muZimbabwe uye makambani avo akazvipira kuramba achifambisa basa achishanda nehurumende asi panyaya yekukweretesa Zimbabwe, asi kambani yavo iri kuzorwa mafuta enguruve yavasina kudya.. Kambani yeTrafigura Group yakapinda muZimbabwe muna 2013 kuburikidza nekuisa hupfumi mukambani yePuma Energy iyo yakaisa zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana mukambani yeRedan Petroleum. Redan ine nzvimbo dzinotengeserwa mafuta edzimotokari makumi manomwe nepfumbamwe, uye inopa mafuta endege panhandare ina. VaMashakada vanoti zvinonetsa kuti pawane mabhanga kana makambani angakweretese Zimbabwe mari kana asinawo kusviba. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Inotambira Kuvepo kweTNF iri paMutemo
text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, rinoti rinotambira nemufaro kuvepo kwemutemo unotara mashandiro eTripartite Negotiating Forum kana kuti TNF. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti sevashandi vanofara kuti pave nehwaro hwekuti nhaurirano pakati pevashandi, vashandirwi nehurumende dzive pamutemo, sezvo kwemakore makumi maviri adarika TNF yanga ichishanda zvisiri pamutemo. Musangano wekutanga weTNF pave nemutemo uyu uri kutarisirwa kuitwa nemusi weChitatu svondo rino, apo panotarisirwawo kukurukurwa zvakati wandeyi zvinobata TNF zvakaunganidzwa masvondo maviri adarika pamusangano wakaitwa kuKadoma. VaMoyo vanoti zvimwe zvichakurukurwa zvichabva kukomiti yakaiswa kuti itarise matambudziko akatarisana nenyika mune zveupfumi uye zvinosanganisira matambudziko akatarisana nenyika anosanganisira kushaikwa kwemagetsi nemvura munyika. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata divi revashandirwi pamwe nehurumende. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inovharwa kweMasvondo Matatu Kutanga neMuvhuro
text: Zimbabwe inoti ichange isingachabvumidze vanhu kubuda mudzimba dzavo kutanga nemusi weMuvhuro senzira yekuyedza kumisa kupararira kwaita chirwere cheCoronavirus pasi rose. Vachitaura neChishanu manheru pamusoro pematanho atorwa nehurumende yavo, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vati vanhu vachange vachigara kudzimba dzavo kwemasvondo matatu kutanga neMuvhuro senzira yekudzivirira chirwere chiri kuita chamurambamhuru chichibata vanhu pasi rose. Chirwere ichi chabata vanhu vanodarika mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu ezviuru kubva zvachaputika kuChina gore rapera, uye vanhu vanodarika makumi mana ezviuru, vafa pasi rose, kusanganisira Zororo Makamba, uyo akashaya neMuvhuro muZimbabwe. VaMnangagwa vati vashandi vemuzvipatara pamwe nevashandi vehurumende ndivo chete vachange vachibvumidzwa kuenda kumabasa avo. VaMnangagwa vati vose vanotengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa vachange vasingabvumirwe kuita izvi kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe, zvitoro zvichange zvichivhurwa kwemaawa mana pazuva; madutavanhu ose achange asingabvumidzwe kutakura vanhu kunze kweZupco chete. Zvitoro zvinobvumidzwa kuvhura ndezviya zvinotengesa chikafu, mishonga nemamwe mabhizinisi akakosha kuvanhu muhupenyu hwavo nguva dzose. VaMnangagwa vati mauto nemapurisa achange achifamba achiona kuti vanhu vagara kudzimba dzavo. Zimbabwe yakavhara miganhu yayo nemusi weMuvhuro, uye ikabhana kuungana kwevanhu vanodarika makumi mashanu. Vanhu vashanu vabatwa nechirwere cheCoronavirus, kusanganisira Zororo Makamba, uyo akavigwa nemusi weChipiri.

headline: Nyanzvi muNyaya dzezveHutano Dzotyira Kupararira kweChimbwamupengo
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti dziri kutyira zvikuru kuti chirwere chechimbwamupengo chichapararira zvakanyanya zvikuru sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kurumwa nembwa dzisina kubaiwa jekiseni rinodzivirira chirwere ichi. Vanhu vanodarika mazana mana vanonzi vari kurumwa svondo rega rega nembwa dzisina kubaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere chechimbwamupengo, izvo zvava kutyirwa kuti dambudziko rechirwere ichi, rinogona kuvhiringa hutano hwemunhu vakawanda vanenge varumwa. Imbwa dziri kuruma vanhu idzi dzinonzi dzinenge dzisina kuchengetedzwa mudzimba, zvinopa kuti dziswere dzichizvifambira muguta reHarare. Nyazvi munyaya dzezvehutano, Dr. Josephat Chiripanyanga, vanoti kana munhu arumwa nembwa, anofanira kuona muridzi wembwa yamuruma kuitira kuti azive kana yakabaiwa nhomba yechimbwamupengo. Dr. Chiripanyanga vanoti chirwere chechimbwamupengo chinonetsa kurapa zvokuti murwere akanonokerwa kurapwa, anoguma ave kuhukura sembwa kusvikira azofa nokuti anenge anonokerwa kurapwa. Dr. Chiripanyanga vanoti munhu anofanira kuenda kuchipatara mukati memazuva matatu kubva paanenge arumwa nembwa kuitira kuti majekiseni aanozobaiwa akwanise kushanda kuuraya huturu hwechimbwamupengo. Nyanzvi yezvirwere zvinotapuriranwa mubazi rehutano, Dr. Portia Manangazira, vanoti vanhu vanodarika mazana mana vanorumwa nembwa uye zhinji dzacho dzinenge dzisina kubaiwa nhomba yechimbwamupengo. Dr. Manangazira vanoti pasi rose hakuna munhu akararama mushure mokunge arumwa nembwa ine chimbwamupengo. Sekuru Kamwelo Banda veku Cranborne vanoti zvinoshamisa kuona vanhu vanogara nembwa dzinodarika gumi padzimba dzavo zvinova zvinhu zvisingabvumirwe pamutemo weHarare City Council. Dr. Manangazira vanoti mutemo wePublic Health Act unoraira maguta ose kuti vatevedzere zvakatarwa maererano nehuhwandu hwembwa hunofanirwa kuchengetwa paimba yoga yoga vakati asi mutemo uyu hausi kutevedzerwa. Dr. Manangazira vanoti vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvisere vakarumwa nembwa gore rakapfuura munyika zvikaonekwa kuti chikamu chikuru chembwa idzi dzaiva dzisina kubaiwa nhomba yechimbwamupengo. Studio 7 yakaedza kunzwa kubva kumutauriri weHarare, VaMichael Chideme, kuti sei kanzuru yavo isiri kutevedzera mitemo inovasungira kuona kuti imbwa dzemuguta dzabaiwa nhomba here kana kuti kwete, asi havana kuda kutaura nezvazvo. Asi VaChideme vanoti munhu wese anosungirwa kuchengetera imbwa dzake pamba pakakomberedzwa nemudhuri uye paine ghedhe rinovharwa kuitira kuti dzisaruma vanhu vanenge vachizvifambira. VaChideme vanoti kanzuru yavo iri kushushikana zvikuru nenyaya yembwa dziri kungomhanya mhanya munzvimbo dzakawanda dzisina muridzi wadzo. Mumwe mushandi wekuZimbabwe Society for The Prevention of Cruelty to Animals, uyo akaramba kudomwa nezita rake, sezvo asingabvumidzwe kutaura nevatori venhau, anoti vanhu vazhinji vari kutadza kuchengeta imbwa dzavo nepamusana pekuoma kwaita zvinhu munyaya dzehupfumi. No media source currently available

headline: Madzimai ekuHwande Oratidzira muHarare Achinyunyuta kuHurumende
text: Madzimai evashandi vekuHwange Colliery vari kuronga kuratidzira neChina muHarare vachinyunyuta nekusapindira kwehurumende mukugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nevashandi vepakambani inoshandira varume vavo. Madzimai ekuHwange ave nemazuva anodarika zana achiratidzira senzira yekutsutsuma kusabhadharwa kwevarume vavo kwemakore mashanu apfuura. Kuratidzira uku kuchange kuchitsigirwa nesangano reZimbabwe Coalition on Debt and Development. Muzvare Janet Zhou, avo vanoshanda nesangano reZimbabwe Coalition on Debt and Development, vati vacharatidzira serutsigiro kumadzimai ekuHwange, uye kuti hurumende ione kuti pane dambudziko rinoda kugadzirwa. Imwe nhengo yekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvezvicherwa, Amai Fanny Chirisa, vatiwo zvinosuwisa kuti hurumende haisi kubuda pachena panyaya yekusabhadharwa kwevashandi vepakambani iyi, kunyange hazvo hurumende ine zvikamu zvakawanda zvehupfumi mukambani iyi. Sachigaro wekomiti inoona nezvemadzimai, Amai Priscilla Misihairambwi Mushonga, vanotiwo semadzimai ari mudare reparamende vanofanirwa kunyara nekuregerera madzimai aya achiratidzira kwenguva ndefu vasina kupindira munyaya iyi. Kambani yeHwange Colliery inonzi ine mari dzeveshandi dzinopfuura mamiriyoni makumi manomwe emadhora. Vachibvunzwa mudare reparamende nezvemadzimai ari kuratidzira aya kuHwange Colliery, gurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Petronella Kagonye, vati madzimai aya ari kushandiswa nevanhu vari mune zvematongerwo enyika. Amai Kagonye vati sehurumende vakagadzirisa nyaya dzezvevashandi. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Anonetsana Zvakare neVanotengesera muMigwagwa muGuta reHarare
text: Sechave chigariro musoro wetsuro kushaya nyanga, vanotengesera mumigwagwa yemuguta reHarare nemapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police vaswera zvakare vachitandanisana, izvo zvinonzi zvaita kuti mapurisa aridze pfuti pamwe nekushandisa hutsi hunokachidza mukuedza kudzikamisa zvinhu. Mumwe wevanorarama nekutengesera mumigwagwa aona zvichiitika, uyo ati anoda kunzi VaTodzidambura Mhandu, vanoti vashamisika panguva dzemasikati kuona mapurisa achienda pavanoshandira panosangana migwagwa Kwame Nkrumah Avenue naAngwa Street, pedyo nechitoro chinotengesa mishonga cheQV Pharmacy. VaMhandu vanoti mapurisa aya, ayo anga achitungamirwa nemukuru wemapurisa muHarare, azoedza kusunga mumwe mukomana anotengesa mbatya vasina kana kumbotanga vamuudza mhosva yaapara, izvo zvazoita kuti mukomana uyu arambe kusungwa. Vanoti izvi ndizvo zvazoita kuti paite mhirizhonga yaunganidza vanhu, zvazoitawo kuti mapurisa aridze pfuti pamwe nekukanda utsi hunokachidza. Vanotiwo mapurisa aya aenda nembatya dzanga dzichitengeswa nemukomana uyu, dzinosanganisira midhebhe neshangu. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vanoti manyepo kuti mapurisa aridzira vanhu pfuti, vachiti mapurisa anga achitokanganiswa kuita basa ravo mushure mekunge aedza kuferefeta nyaya yekupambwa kwemumwe murume anogadzira pamwe nekutengesa nharembozha nevanhu vana. Assistant Commissioner Nyathi vanoti mushure mekunge vanotengesera mumigwagwa ava vaungana, mumwe wevanhu ava abva apwanya fafitera rechitoro cheQV uye kuita ruzha nekutuka mapurisa izvo zvazoita kuti mumwe mupurisa azoburidza pfuti yake yebasa achiedza kuvatyisidzira achimirirawo kusvika kwemamwe mapurisa, ayo azodira utsi hunokachidza. Mutauriri wemapurisa uyu ati mapurisa anga achiri kuferefeta nezvenyaya iyi, sezvo vanhu vapamba murume wemafoni uyu vamumanikidza kuti avabhadhare mari, iyo vanoti yatobva kumba nemudzimai wake. Assistant Commissioner Nyathi vakurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vasiyane netsika yekuvhiringidza mapurisa paanenge achiita basa rawo. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Yoyambira Hurumende Kuti Iremekedze Zvibvumirano Zvinoitwa muTNF
text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, rinoti hurumende haisati yapindura chikumbiro chayo chekuti hurumende isiyane nenyaya yekurambidza kushandiswa kwemari yekunze. Sangano iri rinoti kusavimbika kwehurumende kuchapa kuti vashandi vapinde mumigwagwa. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vaudza Studio7 vanoti zviri pachena ku kuti hurumende haisi kuremekedza nyaya dzevashandi pasi pehurongwa hwe Tripartite Negotiating Forum, TNF. VaMoyo vanoti vashandi vanoda chose kutaurirana nehurumende nevashandirwi asi vanoda vanhu vakavimbika. Hurumende yakadzora kushandiswa kwemari yemuno kana kuti Zimbabwe Dollar mwedzi uno pachishandiswa SI 142 izvo zvakashamisa vanhu vakawanda. VaMoyo vanoti havabvumirani neWorld Bank panyaya yavo yekusimudzira Zimbabwe panyaya yekufambisa zvinhu zvakanaka munyaya dzemabhizimisi. VaMoyo vanoti masangano akaita seWorld Bank ne International Monetary Fund masangano anoita zvinhu zvinofadza vatongi kwete veruzhinji. Mukuru wesangano weZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedziysai Runhanya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo zvichiita sekuti World Bank ne IMF dziri kunakirwa nezviri kuitwa neZimbabwe, masangano aya anoita zvisingafadze veruzhinji. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Sekesai Nzenza, kuti timwe divi ravo panyaya iyi sezvo vanga vasingadaire nharembozha yavo. Asi ZCTU iri kuramba yakatsika madziro ichiti hurumende ikatadza kubuda nehurongwa hunotambirwa nevashandi paichaita musangano wayo wedare remakurukota, vashandi vacharatidzira zvakasimba. ZCTU yakadaidzira kuti vanhu vagare mudzimba dzavo muna Ndira kwemazuva matatu. Mumhirizhonga yakaitika mumazuva matatu aya, pane vanhu vakapfurwa vakafa, uye mazana nemazana evanhu vakasungwa. No media source currently available

headline: Mizinda yeZimbabwe Yoendeswa kuMatare eDzimhosva Nekuda kweKukundikana Kubhadhara Mitero
text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvinoti zviri kushushikana zvikuru nekukundikana kwehurumende kubhadhara mitero yezvivakwa zvairi kushandisa semizinda yenyika munyika dzakawanda. Izvi zvinonzi zvave kukanganisa mafambisirwo emabasa kumizinda iyi, sezvo mina yemizinda iyi yave kuendeswa kumatare edzimhosva munyika dzairi. Mizinda yave kuendeswa kumatare inoti uri kuLondon, uri kuHong Kong, uri kuNew York pamwe nemumwe usina kutaurwa nezita. Zvinhu zvinonziwo hazvina kumira zvakanaka kumizinda yakaita seuri kuBotswana nekuEthiopia, pakati pemimwe iri kutaraika. Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekudzidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaJoey Bimha neChipiri vakapa mufananidzo unonzi unosiririsa apo vaipupura mamiriro akaita zvinhu kumizinda yenyika kukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika. VaBimha vanonzi vakaudza komiti iyi kuti zvinhu hazvina kumirawo zvakanaka kuvashandi vekumizinda iyi, sezvo vari kutatarikawo kuwana mihoro yavo. Vanonzi vakati vamwe vevashandi ava vakatobuda mudzimba dzehurumende dzavanga vachigara nekuda kwekutadza kubhadhara mitero. Mihoro yevashandi vehurumende vari kunze kwenyika inonzi yave kubva kuboka reSalary Service Bureau, iro rinonzi riri kutatarikawo kuisa mihoro paine nguva. Vamwe vevashandi ava vanonzi vari kuita dambudziko rekuti vazotora mihoro iyi munyika dzavagere. VaBimha vanonzi vakaudzawo komiti iyi kuti panzvimbo yekugadzirisa matambudziko, danho rekuti vashandi vekumizinda vawane mihoro yavo ichibva kubazi rezveupfumi rakatowedzera matambudziko. Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kukurudzira kuti hurumende ivhare mimwe mizinda, asi sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende iyi vachimirira Makonde VaKindness Paradza veZanu PF, vanoti danho iroro rinogonekwa chete kupasiswa nemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. VaParadza vanoti rimwe dambudziko riri pakuti bazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika harina zvivakwa zvaro sezvo zvivakwa izvi zviri pasi pebazi rezvekutongwa kwematunhu. Vanoti komiti yavo ichaedza kusangana negurukota rezveupfumi VaPatrick Chinamasa kuti vaone kuti vangabatsira sei kuti mizinda iyi iwane mari. Vanoti vachasanganawo zvakare naVaKasukuwere kuti vaone kuti bazi ravo ragadzirisa here zvimwe zvezvivakwa zvinonzi hazvichatarisika, zvakaita semuzinda wenyika uri kuEthiopia uyo unonzi unoda kuvandudzwa. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Voenda kuChina Mukuyedza Kugadzirisa Hupfumi hweNyika
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vainge vachitarisirwa kusimuka manheru eChishanu vachienda kuChina kumusangano weForum on China-Africa Cooperation. Musangano uyu wakanangana nezvekutengeserana kweChina nenyika dzemuAfrica. VaMnangagwa vakatarisana nedambudziko guru rekugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi munyika. Zviri kubuda kubva kubazi reZimbabwe National Statistics Agency kana kuti Zimstats zviri kuratidza kuti zviri kutengwa neZimbabwe kunze kwenyika zvakawedzera nezvikamu makumi matatu nezvitanhatu kubva muzana. Mari yezviri kutengwa kunze kusanganisa mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari nemagetsi nezvimwe zvirimwa yasvika pabhiriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mashanu emadhora zvichienzaniswa negore rapera mukati memwedzi minomwe pasingaverengwe Ndira nemwedzi wapera sezvo michina yeZimra inonzi yaisashanda zvakanaka. Asi mukuru weConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaSifelani Jabangwe, vanoti Zimbabwe yakakwanisawo kuti wedzerei zvayakatengesa kunze uye ine zvakawanda zvainokwanisa kudzidza kubva kuChina. Vati China yaimbotatarika seZimbabwe isati yatanga kugadzirisa zvinhu kuburikidza nekuvandudza makambani ayo ichitora mienzaniso kubva kune dzimwe nyika. No media source currently available

headline: Mamwe Madzimai Anochenura Amai Grace Mugabe paKudonhedzwa kwaVaMugabe neMauto
text: Kunyangwe hazvo zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvichipa kumudzimai wevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika Amai Grace Mugabe mhosva yekuwisira VaRobert Mugabe pasi, mamwe madzimai anovachenesa achiti vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika ava vanga vasingachadiwi neveruzhinji. Mumwe mudzimai ari mune zvematongerwo enyika uye vachitarisira kukwikwidza senhengo yeParamende yakazvimiririra Muzvare Linda Masarira, vanoti maitiro Amai Mugabe ndoakakonzera kuti murume wavo arasikirwe nechigaro chehutungamiriri. Muzvare Masarira vanoti Amai Mugabe vakazvidza chigaro chemutungamiriri wenyika kusvika chisisina chiremera izvo zvakazoita kuti murume wavo abviswe pachigaro ichi. Izvi zvatsigirwawo naAmai Fadzai Nhamo mugari wekumusha weEpworth, avo vanoti madzimai anofanirwa kuva vavaki pamwe nekuita hany’a nehupenyu hwevanhu vese kwete kungotarira zvemumba mavanenge vari chete. Asi mumwe wevechidiki Muzvare Sibonokuhle Buhlungu vanoti Amai Mugabe vakazongosundidzira danda ranga ragara roda kuwa zvaro. Muzvare Buhlungu vanoti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakanga zvagara zvaneta nehutongi hwaVaMugabe asi zvichishaya mukana wekuratidza nyunyuto yazvo. Muzvare Buhlungu vanotiwo chidzidzo chikuru chavakawana pakusiya basa kwaVaMugabe ndechekuti madzimai anofanirwa kuzvininipisa zvisinei nezvigaro zvavanazvo. Amai Lucy Makhaza Mazingi vanotiwo zvakaitika kunaMai Mugabe zvinogona kuitika kune mamwe madzimai. Amai Mazingi vanoti Amai Mugabe vakashandiswa nevanhurume, vakayambira madzimai, kunyanya ari munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika kuti vanofanira kuzvimiririra kwete kutsamhira pazvigaro zvevarume vavo. Amai Mugabe vaive nembiri yekupopota nekutuka nhengo dzebato reZanu PF pamisangano yebato iri kana payi zvapo payiunganiwa. Amai Mugabe ndovakatanga kubuda pachena kuti vaimbove mutevedzeri wemutungamiriri wenyika Amai Joice Mujuru vakanga vasingachavadi mubato reZanu PF. Izvi zvinonziwo nevamwe madzimai pachavo havana kubatana uye havatsigirane kana mumwe ari pachigaro. Amai Mugabe vazokadzokorodza maitiro avo zvakare kusvika pakazodzingwa VaEmmerson Mnangagwa gore rino avo vave mutungamiriri wenyika mushure mekubatsirwa nemauto kubvisa VaMugabe pachigaro. No media source currently available

headline: Kusarudzwa kwaVaGoba seMuchuchusi weNyika Kwoshorwa
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakasarudza VaRay Goba kuti vave muchuchusi mukuru wenyika. VaGoba ndivo vange vakafanobata chinzvimbo ichi kubva gore rakapera apo VaJohannes Tomana vakabviswa pachigaro ichi vachipomerwa zvehuori. Mutauriri we MDC-T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti vaziva VaGoba sagweta kwemakore makumi matatu uye vanofunga kuti VaGoba vanokodzera kuita basa iri kunyange paine nyaya dzisina kunaka pamazuva avange vachishanda ku Namibia. VaGutu vanoti VaGoba vanofanira kupiwa nguva yokuratidza vanhu kuti basa iri vanogona kuriita vasina kwavakarerekera. Vanotiwo nyaya dzakamirira kupinzwa mumatare dzinosanganisa nyaya yegurukota redzidzo yepamusoro, VaJonathan Moyo, ndidzo dzicharatidza kuti VaGoba vangakwanisa kuita basa iri zvakanaka pasina kwavakarerekera. Asi mutungamiri we Transform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume, vanoti VaMugabe vakasarudza munhu asingakodzeri kupiwa basa iri. VaNgarivhume vanoti VaGoba munhu we Zanu-PF akazara naizvozvo pavamire panozikanwa sezvo “muti wemumengo haufe wakadonedza maranjisi”. VaNgarivhume vanoti VaGoba havafaniri kupiwa basa rokuita muchuchusi mukuru wenyika nekuti vane mhosva dzavakapara dzinozivikanwa zvinove zvisingafaniri kuva pamuchuchusi wenyika. No media source currently available No media source currently available

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zvove neMaonero Akasiyana paNyaya yeDual Citizenship
text: Chagara chiri chishuvo chevana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika chekuti vabvumidzwe kuve zvizvarwa zveZimbabe panguva imwecheteyo vave zvizvarwa zvenyika dzavagere, kana kuti dual citizenship. Kunyange hazvo izvi zvichibvumidza mubumbiro remitemo raknyorwa muna 2013, hurumende haisati yatora matanho ekucherechedza mutemo uyu zvizere. Asi izvi zvave kuzoshanduka zvichitevera danho riri kutorwa neparamende rekupa zvizvarwa zvezimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika magwaro anozvibvumidza kuve zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe panguva imwechete zvisingarasikirwi nekodzero yazvo yekuve zvakare zvizvarwa zvenyika dzazvigere. Sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika vachimirira Makonde muparamende, VaKindness Paradza veZanu PF, vanoti kutanga mwedzi unouya vachange vachitenderera vachisangana nevana veZimbabwe vachivapa magwaro aya. VaParadza vakaudza Studio 7 kuti basa iri irchange richiitwa nemizinda yeZimbabwe iri kunze. Vana veZimbabwe vari kunze vagarawo vachida kupiwa kodzero dzekuvhota vari munyika dzavagere, zvichireva kuti kana vapiwa magwaro aya, vanenge vave nekodzero idzi. Sachigaro veZimbabwe Diaspora Network North America, ZDNNA, VaEsau Mavindidze, vanoti vanotambira nemufaro danho iri nemufaro nekuti vagara vachikurudzira kuti vana veZimbabwe vapiwe mukana wekuve zvizvarwa zvenyika dzavagere panguva imwechete vasingarasikirwe nekodzero dzavo kumusha. Panyaya yekubvumidzwa kuzovhota vanhu vari munyika dzavagere, VaMavindidze vanoti vanombotarisa zvatanga kuiswa patafura, zvimwe izvo zvozoonekwa pamashure. Asi vamwe vakaita saVaTino Mambeu vesangano reZimbabwe Exiles Forum vanoti chekutanga chinofanirwa kuitwa nehurumende kupa vana veZimbabwe kodzero dzavo dzekuvhota, zvekuve chizvarwa chenyika mbiri izvo zvozotevera mumashure. Asi VaParadza vati panofanirwa kutanga pavandudzwa mutemo wezvesarudzo weElectoral Act, kuti ubvumidze vanhu vasiri munyika kuvhota, pasati pabvumidzwa vanhu kuvhota vari munyika dzavagere, vachiti pachine zvakawanda zvinoda kutanga zvagadziriswa. No media source currently available

headline: Varimi veFodya Voshaiswa Mufaro neMutengo weFodya
text: Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakabvisa mutero wezvikamu zviviri kubva muzana weElectronic Transaction Tax pakutengwa kwefodya, varimi vari kunyunyuta kuti mutengo wefodya uri kuramba uri pasi. Asi vemisika yefodya vanoti mitengo yave kukwira kana zvichienzaniswa nemitengo yaivepo pakavhurwa misika iyi svondo rapfuura. Pakavhurwa misika yefodya neChitatui chapfuura, varimi vakawanda vakabvisa fodya yavo pamusika nekuda kwekuti mutengo waive pasi zvakanyanya sezvo vanotenga fodya vaigunun’una kuti vazorasikirwa nemari yakawanda nekuda kwemutero weElectronic Transfer Tax pakutenga fodya. Asi zvichitevera kubviswa kwemutero uyu svondo rino, mitengo yefodya haina kukwira zvakanyaya, izvo zvisiri nkufadza varimi. Ongororo yaitwa neStudio 7 pamisika yefodya inoratidza kuti varimi vakawanda vachiri kugunun’una nemitengo iyi. Murimi wekuKazangarare kuKaroi, VaLast Kawani, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanoona sekuti mitengo yakaderedzwa nenyaya yekuti madhora ekuAmerica haasisina kufanana huremu nemaRTGS dollars. Mumwe murimi, VaNomore Sakala, avo vataura neStudio7 mushure mekutengesa fodya yavo pamusika weTobacco Sales Floor, TSF, vati mutengo wange uri pasi pewavange vakatarisira. Nhasi mutengo wepasi pasi paTSF wange uri dhora rimwe chete pakirogramu kana zvichienzaniswa nemasenzi makumi mashanu pakirogiramu pakavhura misika svondo rapfuura. Kumusika weBoka Tobacco Floor, zvinhu zvange zviri kufamba zvakanaka uye vanoona nekufambiswa kwebasa pamusika uyu, VaMoses Bias, vati vese vanotenga fodya vave kuuya kumusika wavo zvichitevera kugadziriswa kwezvichemo zvavo nehurumende. Vatiwo kuwanda kwevanotenga ndiko kwave kuita kuti mutengo wefodya ukwire pamusika wavo. Mumashoko avo atsigirwa nevamwe vanotenga fodya, VaBias vati mutengo wefodya unenge wakadzikira pamazuva ekutange sezvo varimi vachitengesa mhando yepasi vachiti vanotarisira kuti mitengo iyi ichakirwa zvinofadza varimi. Zvichakadai, varimi vatiwo havasi kufara nenyaya yekuti bhanga guru renyika, reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe neTobacco Industiries Markeing Board, vakadzokera kumushure pachibvumirano chavainge vaita chekuti varimi vaizopihwa imwe mari yavo ari madhora ekuAmerica, imwe iri maRTGS. Zvichitevera kuvhurwa kwemisika yefodya, varimi vave kupihwa mari yavo yese ari maRTGS asi vachipihwa mikana wekutenga madhora ekuAmerica kumabhanga avo kana vachida kuita izvi. Gore rapfuura, Zimbabwe yakawanda mari inosvika bhiriyoni remadhora ekuAmerica kubva mukutengesa fodya kunze kwenyika. Asi gore rino mari iyi ichadzikira sezvo imwe fodya yakaparadzwa nezuva uye imwewo iparadzwa neCyclone Idai. No media source currently available

headline: VaChamisa Vanoshanyira Zvipatara Vachiona Varwere
text: Mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaNelson Chamisa, vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise matambudziko ari kusangana nanachiremba nevana mukoti munyika kuitira kuti nyika isarasikirwe nehupenyu hweveruzhinji. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mushure mekushanyira chipatara chehurumende cheHarare Central uko vana chiremba nevana mukoti vari kuramwa mabasa vachigunun’una nemari dzemihoro, VaChamisa varatidza kushushikana zvikuru nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzezvehutano. Mumwe murwere anga ari muchipatara, VaFungai Mahachi, vati havasi kunyatsorapwa zvakakwana sezvo vana chiremba nevana mukoti vari kuramwa mabasa. VaChamisa varumbidza vana chiremba nevakoti vashoma vanga vari pabasa nhasi vachibatsira vanhu vakazvitakura pamwe nevanga vachisununguka vachiti tsiye nyoro dzavari kuita dzekubatsira vanhu ava panguva iyo vari kuramwa mabasa chinhu chinokudzwa zvikuru. VaChamisa vati kana bato ravo richinge rapinda mumasimba vachaedza kugadzirisa matambudziko ose ari kusangana nenyika zvikuru sei munyaya dzehutano. Zvichakadai, sangano rinomirira vanachiremba reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association raburitsa mashoko ekuti nhengo dzaro dzicharamba dzakakanda mapadza pasi kudzamara nhuna dzavo dzanzwikwa nehurumende. Sangano iri rinoti vana chiremba vanodarika chiuru havasi pamabasa sezvo vari kuda kuti zvichemo zvavo zvigadziriswe. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kudivi regurukota rezvehutano, Va David Parirentatwa. Vana chiremba vava nemasvondo anodarika maviri vachiramwa basa sezvo vasiri kuwirirana nehurumende panyaya dzemihoro. No media source currently available

headline: Gavhuna weRBZ VaMangudya Vanoti Kushandisa Rand Hakupedze Dambudziko reKushomeka kweMari
text: Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, Doctor John Mangudya vanoti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari riri munyika haripedzwe nekushandisa mari yerand yekuSouth Africa seviri kutaurwa nedzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi. VaMangudya vakataura mashoko aya paUniversity of Zimbabwe muHarare musi weChitaru apo pange pari kuitwa musangano kana kuti symposium wenyanzvi dzezvehupfumi. VaMangudya vati Zimbabwe ichaenderera mberi ichishandisa mari dzakasiyana siyana nekuti kushandisa rand chete handiko kungagadzirisa dambudziko rakomba munyika rekushomeka kwemari. Doctor Mangudya vati mamwe ematanho anofanirwa kutorwa ekugadzirisa mamiriro ehupfumi haasi kuitwa. Vatiwo kuwondomoka kwemakambani ehurumende kan kuti maparastatals ndokumwe kuri kupa kuti hupfumi hwenyika hubve hwaenda kumawere. Gavhuna weRZ atiwo nyika inofanirwawo kugadzirisa zvematongerwo enyika kukwezva vane mari dzekunze. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezveupfumi yataurawo pamusangano uyu VaNyasha Kaseke vati kuti nyika iwane mari yekunze vemakambani neveruzhinji vanofanirwa kunotengesera zvinhu kunze kwenyika. VaKaseke vati vemakambani vanofanirwa kutarisa kuti vogadzira sei zvinhu zvine mutengo wakaderera kuti vakwanise kuwana vatengi kunze kwenyika. Pamusangano uyu, nyanzvi dzezveupfumi dzakurudzirawo kuti kushandiswa kwemacards ekumabhanga pamwe nEcocash zviitwe kunzvimbo dzese munyika kusanganisira kumaruwa. VaMangudya vati kunyangwe zvazvo vanhu vanenge vachiti vane mari kumabhanga nyika haina mari iyi uri musvo izvo zviri kukonzera kuti kushaikwa kwemari kurambe kuchienderera mberi. Vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vafarire kutenga nemacards ekubank nedzimwe nzira dzakadayi seecocash zvisingadi mari chaiyo vakati izvi zvinogona kurerutsa myaya yekushomeka kwemari. Vatiwo kupedza dambudziko rehuori pamwe nekugadzirisa dambudziko rekubudiswa kwemari yekunze zvisiri pamutemo zvinogona kubatsira zvakanyanya dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari. Vamwe vari pamusangano uyu vanosanganisa CZI, ZNCC, veZimbabwe Stock Exchange. No media source currently available

headline: Vanotyaira Magonyeti Votakura Zvinodhaka?
text: Sangano rinoona nezvemotokari dzinotakura zvinorema reTransport Operators Association of Zimbabwe,TOAZ, rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru nevatyairi vari kutakura zvinodhaka, uye rakatosungisa vamwe vatyairi gumi nevashanu pazororo rekisimusi. Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa musangano iri, VaJeremiah Maruza, vanoti donzvo ravo nderekuti motokari dzenhengo dzaro dzisashandiswe kutakura zvinodhaka izvo zvinopesana nemitemo yenyika. VaMaruza, avo vanoti vari kuita chirongwa chekuongorora motokari dzenhengo dzavo kuti hadzisi kutakuriswa zvinodhaka, vanoti vakatobata vatyairi gumi nevashanu kubva musiwa 18 Zvita kusvika 26 Zvita. VaMaruza vanoti vakawanda vevatyairi vakasungwa vainge vakatakura zvinodhaka zvakaita sembanje, hwahwa nemapiritsi pamwe nemabhero ehembe. VaMaruza vanoti basa ravo riri kudzoserwa kumashure nemapurisa ayo vanoti havasi kunyatsoshandirana pamwechete navo. Vanoti mapurisa vari kugarira nyaya dzavanenge vavapa zvinoratidza kuti panenge paitwa huori. Sangano reTOAZ rinoti rimwe dambudziko guru ravanosangana naro ndere nhengo dzavo dzinosungirwa mhosva inenge yaparwa nevatyairi vavo zvichinzi motokari dzavo ndidzo dzinenge dzakatakura zvisingabvumirwe. Mumwe anotengesa mbatya dzemumabhero anoda kuzivikanwa nezita rekuti Antony anoti vanoshandisa motokari dzinotakura zvinorema nekuti hadziongororwe zvakanyanya sezvinoitwa mabhazi. Mutauriri wemapurisa mudunhu reMashonaland West, VaClemence Mabgweazara, vanobvuma kuti pane vatyairi vakasungwa asi havana huwandu hwavo. VaMaruza vanoti vamwe vatyairi gumi nevaviri vakasungwa kuBeitbridge vamwe vana vakasungwa kwaMutare paForbes. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, Vanodoma Makurukota Avo
text: Mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, nemusi weChina vakadoma makurukota ehurumende yebato ravo kana kuti shadow ministers makumi maviri nematanhatu, pamwe nemamwe gumi achange ari makurukota ematunhu, kana kuti provincial ministers. Vamwe vevakadomwa kuve makurukota vanosanganisira VaMorgen Komichi, avo vakadomwa kuve gurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika; VaTapiwa Mashakada vari gurukota rezvehupfumi; Dr. Ruth Labode segurukota rezvehutano; Amai Paurina Mpariwa vari gurukota rezvevashandi nemabasa, kuchitiwo VaPeter Moyo vachidomwa segurukota rinoona nezvekugadzikana kwenyika. Mwanakomana wevakave mutungamiri weMDC wekutanga, mushakabvu VaMorgan Tsvangirai, VaVincent Tsvangirai, vakadomwawo kuve gurukota rinoona nezvevechidiki, mitambo netsika. Vakadomwa kuve makurukota ematunhu vanosanganisira VaMorgen Femai, avo vachange vari gurukota redunhu reHarare; VaGift Konjana vari gurukota redunhu reMashonaland West; Amai Jane Chifamba vari gurukota reMashonaland East; VaGift Chimanikire vari kuMashonaland Central, kuchitiwo VaGiles Mutsekwa vari gurukota redunhu reManicaland. Mutauriri waVaMwonzora, VaLloyd Damba, vanoti mutungamiri webato ravo akatora danho iri achitevera kodzero dzinowanikwa munyika ine hutongo hwejekere idzo dzinobvumidza mapato anopikisa kuti aumbewo dare remakurukota rinenge richiona kuti hurumende yemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa iri kushanda sei. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanorumbidza Major General Mugoba Vachivaviga kuHeroes Acre
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaviga gamba renyika, Major General Trust Mugoba, vachiti kushaya kwavo, pamwe nekushaya kwevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, kwasiya nyika yarasikirwa zvikuru. Vachitaura pakuradzikwa kwaVaMugoba, VaMnangagwa vati nyika yakarasikirwa zvikuru svondo rapfuura apo pakashaya VaMugabe naVaMugoba musi mumwe chete. Vati ndufu dzemagamba maviri aya dzinoita kuti veruzhinji varangarire hondo yerusununguko. Vati VaMugoba munhu akakura muchiuto kubvira panguva yehondo uyewo zvichitevera rusununguko muna 1980, vakati izvi ndizvo zvaita kuti varadzikwe paHeroes Acre. VaMnangagwa vati VaMugoba, avo vashaya vaine chigaro chepamusoro muchiuto kuAfrican Union kuEthopia, munhu aiziva kukosha kwerunyararo muAfrica uye zvakakosha kuti runyararo urwu ruchengetedzwe. Vatendawo mauto nekuchentegedza runyararo munyika vachiti hurumende yavo haisi kuzorega vanhu vachiita zvavanoda kukanganisa runyararo nerusununguko hwakaunzwa nevanhu vakaita semushakabvu. VaMnangagwa vati mutemo uchashandisa pane avo vanoda kukanganisa ruranyararo munyika. Vati vanoziva kutambura kuri munyika nekuda kwezvirango zvakatemerwa nyika pamwe nezvirongwa zvekuvandudza uye vari kutora matanho ekugadzirisa izvi. Mutevedzeri wemukuru wedare reSeneti, Retired Major General Mike Nyambuya, avo vakashanda nemushakabvu vati VaMugoba munhu aiziva nekuita basa rake nemazvo. VaMugoba vakashaya vave nechinzvimbo chepamusoro mumauto eAfrica National Union kuEthopia. Vange vave nemakore makumi matanhatu ekuberekwa. No media source currently available

headline: ZLHR Yoronga Kucherechedza Zuva reKodzero dzeVanhu neMusi weChina
text: Sangano remagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, ZLHR, rinoti richabatana nedzimwe nyika pasi rose mukucherechedza zuva rekodzero dzevanhu, reHuman Rights Day nemusi weChina svondo rino. Mutauriri weZHLR, VaKumbirai Mafunda, vanoti sangano ravo rakabatana nerimwe sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Human Rights NGO Forum vane zvirongwa zvakati kuti zvakatara pazuva iri. Asi VaMafunda vanoti chirongwa chikuru chavanacho ndechenhauro pamusoro pekutarisisa mabatirwo ari kuitwa bumbiro remitemo idzva nehurumende, iyo ichakokerwa neVaDeprose Muchena avo vanoshanda neAmnesty International. Vanoti vachakurukura nehurumende kuburikidza neboka reZimbabwe Human Rights Commission iro vavakokawo pamwe chete neProsecuting Authority. Zuva reHuman Rights Day iri riri kunanganawo nekusvitsa mwedzi mipfumbamwe mumwe murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu, VaItai Dzamara, avo vapambwa ndokutsakatika mwedzi mipfumbamwe yapfuura. Apo nyika dzepasi rose dzichange dzichicherechedza zuva rekodzero dzevanhu nemusi weChina, vechidiki vemuZimbabwe vari kuchemachema kuti kodzero dzavo hadzisi kuremekedzwa nehurumende yeZanu PF. Munyori mukuru wesangano reUnited Nations, VaBan ki Moon, vanoti veruzhinji vanofanirwa kutora mukana uyu kuzvipira mukuremekedza pamwe nekukoshesa kodzero dzevechidiki. Vanotiwo kutsakatika kwaVaItai Dzamara kuri kuvatyisa uye kunoratidza kuti Zimbabwe haisi kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaKennedy Masiye, vanoti sevechidiki vemunyika hurumende haisati yasvika pachinhanho chekuti sevechidiki hurumende yacho yakamira papi munyaya dzekodzero dzavo. No media source currently available No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vashoma Vanonyoresa Zvakare Muchikamu Chechipiri cheBVR
text: Chikamu chechipiri chechirongwa chekunyoresa chapera neMuvhuro, Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, ichiti vanhu vanyoresa kusvika musi weSvondo vangoti pfuureyi zvishoma mamirion maviri nemazana matatu ezviuru, pasingatarise vanyoresa neMuvhuro. Zvaburitswa neveZEC zvinoratidza kuti dunhu reBulawayo rine vanhu zviuru makumi masere nezvitatu, kana kuti zvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana zvevanhu vanyoresa. Dunhu reMatabeleland South ranyoresa vanhu zviuru makumi mapfumbamwe nezvina, ukuwo dunhu reMatabeleland North riine zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvipfumbamwe. Dunhu reHarare rine vanhu vakawanda vanove zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe nezvitatu, vanove zvikamu makumi maviri nezvinomwe kubva muzana. Dunhu reManicaland ndiro riri panzvimbo yechipiri pahuwandu hwevanhu vanyoresa kuvhota. Dunhu iri rine vanhu zviuru mazana matatu, zvinove zvikamu makumi matatu nezvitatu kubva muzana. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kune veZEC kuti vatipe huwandu hwose kusvika papera chirongwa ichi. Asi sachigaro reZimbabwe Election Support Network, ZESN, VaAndrew Makoni, vaudza Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo zvinhu zviri kufamba zvakanaka munzvimbo dzakawanda munyika, sangano ravo riri kushushikana nenyaya yekuti vanhu vanyoresa vachiri vashoma. VaMakoni vati vanoshushikana nenyaya yekuti vaongorori vavo pamwe nevamwe vanhu kunyanya kumaruwa, vari kutyisidzirwa nemadzishe kana masabhuku, izvo zvatsinhirwa naAmai Rindai Chipfunde-Vava vanove mukuru weZESN. Kushaya magwaro ekuzvarwa pamwe nekuunza magwaro asiri iwo anodiwa ndizvo zvimwe zvezvikonzero zviri kunzi neveZEC zviri kutadzisa vanhu vakawanda kunyoresa. VaTafadzwa Mujeri, avo vari muchirongwa chevechidiki vebato reMDC T chekukurudzira vanhu kuti vanyorese kuvhota chinoziikanwa kunzi “Bereka Mwana Tiende” vaudza Studio 7 kuti ongororo yavo inoratidza kuti kushaikwa kwemagwaro ekuzvarwa ndiro remamwe matambudziko makuru akatarisana nevanhu munzvimbo yeBulilima mudunhu reMatabeleland South. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuhofisi yeRegistrar General panyaya iyi. Murongi wemabasa musangano reAbammeli Human Rights Lawyers’ Network, VaTineyi Mukwewa, vanoti sangano ravo rine chirongwa chekubatsira vanhu kuti vawane magwaro ekuzvarwa. Chikamu chechitatu chechirongwa chekunyoresa vanhu kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota chinotanga musi weChina, Mbudzi 16 chichipera musi waZvita 1. Chikamu chechina chinove chekupedzisira, chinotanga musi waZvita 4 chopera musi was Zvita 19. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Yoronga Kupikisa Mutongo weElectoral Court kuChegutu East
text: Bato rinopikisa reMDC rinoti riri kuronga kuenda kudare repamusorosoro reSupreme Court richipikisa mutongo wakapiwa nedare reElectoral Court wekuti vakakwikwidza vakamirira Zanu PF musarudzo dzekutsvaga mumiriri weChegutu East muparamende, VaDexter Nduna ndivo vakakunda VaGift Konjana veMDC musarudzo iyi. VaKonjana vakanga vakwira kudare reElectoral Court vachida kuti rirase zvakanga zvaziviswa neZimbabwe Electoral Court zvekuti vaNduna Ndivo vakanga vakunda, sezvo iyo ZEC yakanga yatenda kuti yakanga yakanganisa kuti VaNduna ndivo vakakunda, ichiti iyo yakanga isina masimba ekudzora zvainenge yazivisa. Asi dare iri rakarasa nyaya iyi richiti magweta aVaKonjana akanga asina kutevera mutemo zvinodiwa nemutemo wesarudzo. Mutauriri weMDC, VaJacob Mafume vanoti bato ravo rinoona sekuti rakabirwa nemutongo uyu, izvo zvaita kuti vade kukwira kudare repamusorosoro. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yotenda Kuti Vanhu Vave Kufa neKuratidzira kwaVanaChiremba
text: Sangano rinomirira ana chiremba vehurumende avo vari kuramwa mabasa parizvino rinoti munyika mungangosara musina anachiremba zvichitevera kudiwa kuri kuitwa madhokotera nezvipatara zviri kunze kwenyika. Mashoko aya anouya apo hurumnde yave kutenda kuti varwere vari kufa muzvipatara zvehurumende nekuda kwekutaridzira kwavanachiremba vave nemavhiki matatu vachiratidzira. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mu Harare neChina, mutauriri Zimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, VaFrancis Rwodzi, vati kuramwa kwemabasa nana chiremba kucharamba kuchienderera mberi zvichitevera kutadza kuwirirana kuri kuita ana chiremba nehurumende panyaya yekuwedzerwa kwemari dzemihoro. Madhokotera ari kuramwa mabasa anoti anoda kuwedzerwa mari yaari kutambiriswa kubva pamadhora mazana maviri nemakumi masere nemaviri ($282) kusvika pamadhora chiuru nemazana maviri ($1200) asi hurumende inoti homwe yayo yakabooka zvekuti haikwanise kupa ana chiremba ava mari dzavari kuda idzi. Zvichakadai, VaRwodzi vati zvipatara zvekunze kwenyika zvizhinji zvirikukoka ana chiremba vemuZimbabwe kuti vanoshandira kuzvipatara izvi zvavati zvichaita kuti hupenyu huomere veruzhinji. VaRwodzi vati hurumende haina hany’a neraramo yavana chiremba uye vanoti hurumende inokoshesa kupa mari yakawanda kumadzishe asina basa guru raanoita muhupenyu hwevanhu ichisiya kubhadhara madhokotera zvine mwero. Zvichakadaro, munyori mukuru mubazi rezvehutano Dr Gerald Gwinji vanoti vanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa vanofanira kuti vadzokere kumabasa. Vachitaura nebepanhau reHerald Dr Gwinji vanoti varwere vave kufa muzvipatara zvehurumende nenyaya yekuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba. Dr Gwinji vanoti zvipatara zvehurumende zvinokwanisawo kudaidza vanachiremba kubva kumauto. Asi vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanachiremba vadzokere kumabasa nhaurirano dzichiitwa. Mashoko aDr Gwinji anoteverawo kurudziro yakapihwa negurukota rezvehutano Dr david Parirenyatwa yekuti vanachiremba vadzokere kumabasa asi hurukuro dzichienderera mberi. Asi mashoko aya anenge akatowedzera peturu mumoto nekuti vanachiremba muzvipatara zvekumatunhu makuru nemadiki vakabva vatangawo kuramwa mabasa. Sangano rakazvimirira reZimbabwe Peace Project raburitsawo mashoko richiti riri kushushikana nekuramwa mabasa kwavanavanachiremba richiti vanhu vave kurasikirwa nehupenyu. Sangano iri riri kuti riri kushushikana nemashoko akabuda mubepanhau reThe Southern Eye Newspaper nezuro ekuti pane varwere vana vakashaya kuMpilo nenyaya yekuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba. Mune imwewo nyaya, sangano revanotengesa mumigwagwa re National Vendors Union of Zimbabwe, kana kuti Navuz, rinoti harisi kutambira hurongwa hwekanzuru yeHarare hwekuda kubvisa vanotengesa mumigwagwa pakati pedhorobha. Munyori musangano re Navuz, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vati sangano ravo, iro ravati rine nhengo dzinodarika zviuru gumi nezvitatu, riri kushushikana zvikuru nehuruongwa hwekanzuru iyo iri kuda kubvisa vese vanotengesera mumigwagwa mudhorobha. VaWadzayi vati sangano ravo rine nzira dzakawanda dzarichashandisa kurwisana nezviri kurongwa nekanzuru iyo yavati yakaronga kluvadzinga ichishanda pamwechete nemauto. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naMeya we Harare, VaBernard Manyenyeni kana mutauriri wekanzuru VaLeslie Gwindi, kuti tinzwe divi rekanzuru panyaya iyi asi kanzuru inogara ichimhanyisana nevanotengesera mumigwagwa nguva nenguva. Mune imwewo nyaya zvakare, bhodhi resangano rinoshanda rakazvimirira re Crisis in Zimbabwe Coalition rinoti harisi kuzosuduruka pachisungo charo chekuti mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaMcDonald Lewanika, vasiye basa pakupera kwegore panopera nguva yavakasainira kuti vange vari mutungamiri wesangano iri. Sachigaro webhodhi re Crisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaDewa Mavhinga, vakaudza vatori venhau muHarare neChina kuti nyangwe zvazvo panga paine mukana wekunyorerana patsva kuti VaLewanika vapinde muchibvumirano chitsva, bhodhi ravo rakawona zvakakodzera kuti VaLewanika vasiye basa sezvo pane humbowo hwekuti havana kufambisa zvakanaka mari yesangano iri. Zvichakadaro, VaLewanika vanoti vari kuronga musangano mukuru wemasangano ese anove nhengo dze Crisis in Zimbabwe Coalition uchaitwa mwedzi uno uine chinangwa chekuchinja zvakabvumiranwa nebhodhi resangano iri asi VaMavhinga vati musangano uyu hauna zvaunoreva uye vati uri kunze kwemutemo. Mune imwe nyaya nemusi weChina wakare, mapositori gumi neumwechete vakabatwa vaine mhosva yekurova mapurisa nevatori venhau kuBudiriro uye vamwe vavo makumi maviri nevatanhatu vawanikwa vasina mhosva nedare. Vabatwa nemhosva ava vatongerwa kugara mujeri kwemakore mana. Mapurisa nevatori venhau vakarohwa nemapositori aya kuBudiriro mushure mekunge mapositori aya apomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevana zvinosanganisira kurambidza vana kuenda kuchikoro.

headline: Zanu PF Inonzi Iri Kunyima Rubatsiro Vanopikisa kuManicaland
text: Bato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru nekwarinoti kupindira kwehurumende yeZanu PF munyaya dzekugoverwa kwerubatsiro kuvanhu vekuManicaland. Mugwaro raburitswa nemutauriri webato iri, Va Jacob Mafume, MDC inoti zvinonyadzisa kuti bato rakatadza kubatsira vanhu munguva yetsaona yedutumupengo reCyclone Idai, rava kuenda kunobvutira vanhu rubatsiro rwuri kubva kune vane tsiye nyoro. VaMafume vati kune vanhu vakawanda vakarasikirwa nehupenyu hwavo, vamwe havana pekugara, midziyo yakaparadzwa, uye vanhu ava vanoda rubatsiro nechimbi chimbi. Asi VaMafume vati dambudziko re Cyclone Idai rakanyanya kuvhiringa hupenyu hwevanhu nepamusana pekutadza kuronga kweZanu PF. VaMafume vati vanhu vemuZimbabwe vanofanirwa kubatana, kuitira kuti vamise maitiro eZanu PF. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri weZanu PF, Va Simon Khaya Moyo, kuti tinzwe pamire bato ravo panyaya iyi. Asi mumiriri weChipinge South muparamende, uye vari nhengo ye Zanu PF, VaEnock Porusingazi, varamba mashoko aya, vachiti vari kutotanga kuanzwawo kubva kuStudio7. Kunze kweMDC, kune vamwe vanhu vari kupomerawo dzimwe nhengo dzeZanu PF mhosva yekugovera chikafu cherubatsiro dzichishandisa nyaya dzemapato, izvo zvinonzi zviri kuita kuti vatsigiri veZanu PF chete vawaniswe rubatsiro. Zvinonzi mhuri dzakawanda dziri kurara nenzara mumatunhu akawirwa netsaona iyi kuChimanimani neChipinge, uko hutungamiri hweZanu PF, kusanganisira vamiriri vematunhu aya mudare reparamende, vari kupomerwa mhosva yekunyima chikafu vanhu vanozivikanwa kuti vanotsigira mapato anopikisa. Mumwe mumiriri weparamende anonzi mukupera kwesvondo akatungamira mukugoverwa kwerubatsiro rwakabva kusangano reUnited Nations Children’s Fund, UNICEF, rwaipiwa vanhu paBiriwiri Business Centre, akanyima vanopikisa bato reZanu PF, izvo zvinonzi zvakazokonzera kuti paite zhowezhowe. Vamwe vagari, kusanganisirawo mumiriri wedunhu reManicaland muparamende pasi pehurongwa hweProportional Representation, Amai Lynette Karenyi, veMDC, vakaudza Studio 7 kuti chikafu chiri kugoverwa ichi “chine maziso”, izvo zvinonzi zvinoreva kuti chiri kupiwa vekuziva chete, vanove vebato riri kutonga. Asi VaPorusingazi varamba mashoko ekuti veZanu PF vari kunyima vamwe chokafu, vachiti vari kutotanga kuanzwawo kubva kuStudio 7. VaPorusingazi, avo vanoti naivowo vakarasikirwa nechikafu zvekuti vari kutoponawo nekupiwa rubatsiro, vanoti Zanu PF ndiro bato rakatotanga kumhanya kunochema nevanga vachichema, uye kunopa rubatsiro kuvanhu vakawirwa netsaona iyi. "Panguva yatiri hatipinzi zvematongerwo enyika nekuti tinovada (vanhu) vese. Vana ndeveZimbabwe vese, and hatina akanyora kana mabheji anoratidza kuti uyu ndewe bato rakati," vanodaro VaPorusingazi. Vanoti vari kuyambirawo kana paine vebato reZanu PF vari kuita izvi vachishandisa tsaona iyi kuti vasiyane netsika iyoyi, vachiti bato reZanu PF rinozivikanwa nekubatsira vanhu, zvikuru mutsaona yeCyclone Idai iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Kukwira kweMitengo yeZvakawanda Kwosiya Veruzhinji, Varimi, Vaomerwa
text: Kunyange hazvo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mngangagwa vakavimbisa masvondo mashoma adarika kuti hurumende ichadzorera mari muzvitengeswa senzira yekubatsira vanhu, vanhu vari kuti hapana chati chamboshanduka munyaya dzemitengo yezvinhu. Vanhu vakawanda vanonzi vari kuchema kuti mitengo yezvinhu zvavanoda zuva nezuva, kusanganisira zvekurimisa zvemwaka uno, iri kukwira zvisina mukare akamboona, izvo zvave kusiya vakawanda vachishaya pekutangira. Mutengo wezvekudya zvinosanganisira upfu nechingwa unonzi uri kungokwirawo pamadiro. Semuenzaniso, mutengo wechingwa unonzi wakakwira kubva pamadhora gumi nemana anemasendi makumi manomwe nemashanu ukaenda pamadhora gumi nemasere ane masendi makumi mana nemashanu parofu. Mutengo weupfu wakakwirawo mwedzi wapera nezvikamu zana kubva muzana. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachitungamira sangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu uku hakufanirwe kukatyamadza vanhu nekuti hurumende yakatozivisa kare kuti mitengo yezvinhu ichafambidzana nemisika yemari, iyo inomirawo nemari yekunze kwenyika, zvikuru nedhora rekuAmerica. Doctor Kanyenze vanoti zvinozivikanwa kuti musika wemari uyu hauna kumira zvakanaka sezvo uri kungoenda nzira imwechete, yekudonha kwehuremu hwemari yemunyika. Mutewedzeri wemunyori mukuru weZImbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaThomas Masvingwe vanoti kukwira kwemutengo wechingwa uku kwaomesera veruzhinji, zvikuru vashandi zvikuru, avo vanga vave kurwisa kuti vangokwanisa kuwana chikafu kaviri pazuva, mangwanani nemanheru. Matambudziko ekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu anonzi haasi kunzwengawo varimi, avo vanonzi vapererwa nemazano nekuda kwekuramba mitengo yezvikwanisiro ichikwira. Mukuru weTobacco Industries and Marketing Board, Doctor Andrew Matibiri vanoti kukwira kwemitengo yezvekurimisa kuri kubata varimi vose, kusanganisira varimi vefodya, izvo zvinogona kudzikisa ndimo mwaka uno. Doctor Matibiri vanoti chimwe chiri kunyanyonetsa varimi kushaikwa kwemagetsi, ayo ari kudzimwa dzimwa, izvo zviri kukanganisa vaya varimi vakanga vadyara fodya yekudiridzira. Tsaga refotereza yepamusoro rine huremu hwemakirogiramu makumi mashanu rinonzi rave kutengeswa muzvitoro zvakawanda zvinotengesa zvekurimisa nemutengo uri pakati pemadhora mazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe nemazana matanhatu. Tsaga refotereza yepasi rine huremu hwumwechetehwo rinonzi rave kutengesewawo nemadhora emunyika ari pakati pemazana mana nemakumi manomwe nemazana mashanu emadhora, zvichienderana nekuti uri kushandisa nzira dzipi dzekubhadhara. Chimwe chinonzi chiri kukonzera kukwira kwemitengo zvakanyanya mutengo wemafuta edzimotokari, uyo wanga uchikwidzwa svondo roga roga. Doctor Kanyenze vanoti dambudziko remunyika iri rinogona kupedzwa chete kana pakaitwa munonera pamwe chuma chemuzukuru mune zveupfumi pamwe nezvepatongerwo enyika. Kusvika izvi zvaitika, veruzhinji vanonzi vacharamba vachinonga svosve nemuromo. No media source currently available

headline: America Yoshora Hurumende yeZimbabwe neKutyora Kodzero dzeVanhu
text: America inoti hurumende yeZimbabwe kuburikidza nemapurisa, vasori nemauto iri kuramba ichityora kodzero dzevanhu munyika. Izvi zviri mugwaro richangobuditswa nebazi reState Department rinoongorora nyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu rinonzi State Department Human Rights Report 2016. Gwaro iri rinodorongodza nyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu uye huwori hunonzi hunenge huchiitika munyika dzakawanda pasi rose. MuZimbabwe zvinonzi nyaya yekuita vanhu kafiramberi ichiri kuitwa kunyangwe uku kuri kutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Semuenzaniso, mapurisa muHarare anonzi akapfura nekuuraya VaPassmore Mazariro kumba kwavo vachifungidzirwa kuti vainge vaba nharembozha. Mapurisa anonzi haanawo zvaari kuita kutsvaga murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu VaItai Dzamara vave nemakore maviri vapambwa. Hurumende inonzi haisi kuongororawo mhosva dzekupondwa kwevanhu munguva yeGukurahundi uye musarudzo dzose dzapfuura. Kupambwa kwevanhu kusanganisira vanoita zvemitambo, VaSylvanos Mudzvova, kunonzi kuri kuenderera mberi. Mapurisa, mauto nevasori avo vanonzi vari pasi pehofisi yemutungamiri wenyika vari kutyorawo kodzero dzevanhu asi vasina zvavanoitwa. Masangano aya ari kupomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanopikisa kunyangwe vachiratidzira murunyararo. Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaChris Mushowe, uye munyori mubazi ravo vari mutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaGeorge Charamba, vanonzi vanotaura mashoko ekutyisidzira vatori venhu. Nyaya yehuwori inonzi yatekesherawo uye mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaPhelekezela Mphoko, vari kushorwawo nekuburitsa muhusungwa muHarare vamwe vana muzvinabhizimisi gore rapera vachishandisa masimba avo mbune kwete mutemo wenyika. Asi vaimbova gurukota uye nhengo yePolitburo yeZanu-PF, VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana, vati gwaro iri harisi kutaura chokwadi panyaya yekodzero dzevanhu muZimbabwe. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vari chipangamazano musangano reHuman Rights Watch, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti hurumende yaVaMugabe inogara yakazivikanwa nekutyora kodzero dzevanhu..

headline: BAZ Yoshambadzira Mamwe Marezinesi eKutepfenyura
text: Broadcasting Authority of Zimbabwe yadoma nzvimbo gumi dzinokwanisa kunyoreswa kuwana marezinhesi enhepfenyuro dzenharaunda muchiziviso chavakokawo nhepfenyuro dzemaunivhesiti pamwe nezvivhitivhiti kuti dzinyorere marezinhesi. BAZ yazivisa kuti pamusoro pekupa nhepfenyuro dzenharaunda marezinesi gumi munzvimbo dzavadoma vachapawo zvivhitivhiti marezinesi matanhatu uyewo marezinesi gumi nemapfumbamwe kuzvikoro zvedzidzo yepamusoro zvinodzidzisa zvidzidzo zvekutora nhau. Mukuru weMedia Institute of Sothern Africa Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo vati kunyangwe hazvo bandiko rehurumende iri radeedzera marezinhesi vanokatyamadzwa nekudomwa kwenzvimbo dzichapiwa marezinesi enhepfenyuro dzenharaunda vakati izvi hazvina kujeka kuti sei hurumende iri kuda kupa dzimwe nzvimbo dzimwe dzisiri kupiwa. VaMoyo vanoti havagutsikani kuti hurumende ichapa marezinesi aya zvakasununguka sezvo vatodoma nzvimbo dzichawana. VaMoyo vatiwo zvichaomera vari kuda marezinesi zvakanyanya kuti vakwanise kushanda sezvo mutemo uri kugadzirwa weBroadcasting Services Bill usingavatenderi kupihwa mari nevekunze inodarika zvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana. Nyanzi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vaive mutori wenhau Doctor Pedzisai Ruhanya vati vachatenda maruva vadya chakata. VaRuhanya vatiwo kutepfenyura kunoda mari yakawanda zvakanyanya vakati kana hurumende ine chido chekusunungura masai-sai inofanirwa kudzikisa mari dzinodiwa pakuwana marezinesi. Imwe nhengo yekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekubudiswa kwemashoko VaSettlement Chikwinya vati kunyangwe vari kugamuchira shuviro yekuwedzerwa kwevanotepfenyura munyika vati vanoda kuti marezinesi awa apiwe zvejekerere. Vati parizvino varikutoshamiswa kuti imwe terevhizheni yeZimpapers yatova nemichina nechakare yekutepfenyura marezinesi asati apiwa. VaChikwinya vatiwo vachaongorora mari iri kudiwa kunyorera marezinesi iyi vakati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti idzike zvichienzaniswa nedzimwe nyika dzakaita seKenya. Kunyangwe hazvo vamwe vari kugunun’una nenyaya yemarezinesi aya kune vamwewo vatambira danho iri nemufaro. Mukuru weGreat Zimbabwe University Campus Radio, VaGolden Maunganidze vati vatambira nemufaro kudaidzirwa kwemarezinesi uku vachiti zvichavabatsira kubudisa vadzidzi vane hunyanzvi hwepamusoro. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaStanford Nyatsanza vati vafarira zvikuru zvaitwa nehurumende. Mumwe mutori wenhau, Muzvare Margaret Chinowaita vatiwo vafadzwa nedanho iri sezvo kuwedzera kwevanotepfenyura kuchirevawo basa kune vatori venhau. Vakurudzirawo vanhukadzi kuti vanyorerewo marezinesi aya. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, VaEnergy Mutodi vaudza Studio 7 kuti nzvimbo dzadomwa idzi hadzisviki masai-sai kunenhepfenyuro nezvivhitivhiti zviriko nekudaro ndidzo dzinoda kutangwa. Asi vati hurumende ine hurongwa hwekupa marezinesi makumi mana kunhepfenyuro dzenharaunda. Panyaya yemari yemarezinesi VaMutodi vati bhizinesi hariitwi nevarombo. Aka ndekekutanga kubva zvaumbwa BAZ kukoka vanoda kutepfenyura kuti vaise mapepa ekupihwa marezinesi. No media source currently available

headline: VaGakanje Kandishaya Voshanyira Vanopikisa Vavanoti Vari Kutengesa Nyasa
text: Mukuru weZimbabwe Citizens Forum, uye vari mutsigiri veZanu PF, VaAlex Gakanje Kandishaya, vanoti vachange vachishanyira mahofisi nedzimwe nzvimbo dzinoitirwa misangano yavati yekutengesa nyika nevari mumapato anopikisa. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau nhasi muHarare, VaKandishaya vapomera matambudziko ese ari kusanganiwa nawo munyika kune vavati vatengesi vanotsvaka kuti nyika dzekumavirira dzigare dzichisHora nekusada kubatsira Zimbabwe. VaKandishaya vati ivo nevamwe vechidiki vachange vachishanyira mahofisi aya nedzimwe nzvimbo kwavanoti kune honzeri dziri kuita kuti hupfumi hwenyika hurambe huchidonha pasi pechirongwa chavari kudana kuti, “Emotional Tour.” Vatiwo vachange vachishanyira mahofisi emumwe wevatevedzeri wemutungamiri webato idzva reCitizens Coalition for Change, VaTendai Biti. Vachibvunzwa neStudio7 kuti chinangwa chavo chinenge chiri chei, VaKandishaya vati izvi vari kuzviitira kuti varatidze vechidiki kuti matambudziko avo ari kubva kupi. VaKandishaya vati vataura nemapurisa vakatiwo nzendo dzavo idzo vati vachaita mumaguta akasiyana siyanadzinenge dziri dzedzidzo nekudaro hazvinei nekuwana mvumo kubva kumapurisa. Asi VaBiti vati zviri kuda kuitwa izvi hazvisi zvitsva vachiti VaKandishaya ndizvo zvavanogaroita zvekushanyira mahofisi avo kunoita mhirizhonga. VaBiti vati zviri kuitwa izvi runongova ruvengo kwavari pamwe nebato ravo. VaBiti vatiwo chinangwa chikuru ndechekuvatyityidzira nekutyityidzira bato reCitizens Coalition for Change asi vati izvi hazvisi kuzoitika. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda nesangano re Platform for Youth Development, VaOwen Dhliwayo, vashora mashoko aVaKandishaya. VaDhliwayo vatiwo zviri kurongwa naVaKandishaya zvinotyora mitemo yenyika pamwe nekutyora kodzero dzevamwe vanhu. Tsvakurudzo yakabudiswa neTransparency International svondo rapera inoratidza huori ndihwo huri kuvhiringa zvakanyanya hupfumi hwenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Dare reSeneti Rinotambira Kudomwa kwaAmai Amanda Bennett seMukuru Kana Kuti CEO weBoka reNhau reUSAGM
text: Dare reseneti muAmerica nemusi weChina rakatambira kudomwa kwaAmai Amanda Bennett semukuru, kana kuti Chief Executive Officer mutsva weboka rehurumende yeAmerica rakazvimirira rinotepfenyura nhau nekuburitsa mashoko, reUnited States Agency for Global Media, kana kuti USAGM. Vachizivisa nezvekudomwa kwaAmai Bennett uku, vakafanobata chigaro chaChief Executive Officer veUSAGM, Amai Kelu Chao, vakati Amai Bennett mutori wenhau ane hunyanzvi hunoratidzwa kuburikidza nekuwana kwavo mubairo wePulitzer Prize kaviri. Vakaenderera mberi vachiti munhu ari kuunza pachigaro ichi ruzivo rwunodarika makore makumi mana rwekuferefetwa kwenhau muAmerica pamwe nekunze kweAmerica, ruzivo rwekutungamira boka remabhizimusi, uye kutungamira muhurumende. Amai Chao vakati chakanyanya kukosha ndechekuti Amai Bennett vanogoverana nevamwe kuzvipira kwakadzama kwekutorwa kwenhau kwepamusoro, chidokwadokwa chekutorwa kwenhau dzechokwadi uye kwakasununguka, kuzvipira kuchengetedzeka kwevatori venhau nevateereri vavo, nekusarerekera mativi pakuzadzisa zvisungo zvemashandiro eboka reUSAGM. Amai Chao vakati kutambirwa kwaAmai Bennett nedare reseneti mucherechedzo wekukosha kweboka reUSAGM mukuwanisa vanhu nhau dzechokwadi uye kutsigira rusununguko nehutongo hwejekerere pasi rose.

headline: Chikwata cheCommonwealth Chotarisirwa muNyika neMugovera Kuzoona Kana Zimbabwe Yave Kukodzera Kutambirwa Zvakare muSangano iri
text: Chikwata cheCommonwealth Assessment Mission chiri kutarisirwa kusvika munyika Mugovera kuzoongorora kana Zimbabwe yakakwanisa kuzadzisa zviga zvayakatemerwa kuti ikwanise kutambirwa zvakare mugungano iri. Commonwealth igungano renyika makumi mashanu nenhanhatu iri, zhinji dzacho dziri dzaimbove pasi pehutongi hweBritain. Mashoko akaburitswa padandemutande reTwitter nebazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika anoti chikwata ichi chichange chiri munyika mushure mekukokwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuti chione nhanho dzafambwa neZimbabwe kubva zvayakanyorera kuti ibvumidzwe kudzoka mugungano iri muna 2018. Bazi iri rinoti chikwata ichi, icho chichange chichitungamirwa nemutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru wesangano iri, Muzvinafundo Luis Franceschi, chichange chiri munyika kwesvondo rose kusvika musi wa 18 mwedzi uno. Chinotarisirwa kusangana nemutungamiri wenyika VaMnangagwa, gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaFrederick Shava, mamwe makurukota pamwe nevakuru vakuru muhurumende, uye masangano enhau pamwe nevamwe vane chekuita nenyaya iyi vanoonekwa sevakakodzera kusanganikwa navo nesangano iri. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaShava, kuti tinzwe zvizhinji pamusoro pekushanya kwechikwata ichi. Zimbabwe yakabuda yoga mugungano reCommonwealth muna 2003 munguva yevaive mutungamiri wenyika mushakabvu VaRobert Mugabe mushure mekunetsana nenyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu. Nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, VaRejoice Ngwenya, vanoti hapana zvati zvashanduka, zvikuru panyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu, sezvo hurumende iri kuramba ichimbunyikidza vanhu uye kudzika mitemo inoomesera mashandiro emasangano akasiyanasiyana. VaNgwenya vanotiwo kuti sangano iri rinyatsonzwisisa mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika rinofanirwa kusanganawo nevemapato anopikisa pamwe nevemasangano akazvimirira kuitira kwete kungogumira mukusangana nevehurumende chete. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Voteerera Kurudziro yeHurumende yeKufamba Vakapfeka "maMask"
text: Vanhu vakawanda vateerera kurudziro yemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa yekuti vapfeke zvidziviriro ka kuti mamask asi vamwe vachishora hurumende nekutadza kuvapa zvinhu izvi pachena sezvinoitwa nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika munguva yesarudzo zvekupa vanhu nhumbi. Amai Sithembile Kawocha avo vanga vakavhara muromo nemhuno yavo nedhuku ravo rakasakara vanoti kupfeka mask chinhu chakanaka mukudzivirira kupararira kwehutachiona hwecoronavirus asi vanoti hurumende ingadai yakapa vanhu vose mamask aya pachena. Amai Kawocha avo vanoita basa rekutenga nekutengesa vanoti havana mari yekutenga chidziviriro chinokurudzirwa navanachiremba sezvo vasiri kuenda kubasa. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nemumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi Amai Tafadzwa Karonga. VaMunesu Munesu vanoti zvidziviriro zvinokurudzirwa zviri kudhura nekudaro vakagadzira chavo vega. VaMunesu vanoti vanhu havafanirwe kupfekera mapurisa asi kuchengetedza hutano hwavo. Kurudziro yekuti vanhu vapfeke mamask yakabva yaita kuti mitengo yacho ikwire zvakanyanya. Ongororo yaitwa neStudio 7 inoratidza kuti mamask ari kutengeswa nemari inobva padhora rimwechete kusvika pamadhora mashanu ekuAmerica. VaJeremiah Maruza vanoti chimwe chiri kunetsa ndechekuti mamaski haasi kuwanikwa uye paanowanikwa anenge achidhurira vakawanda. Vamwe vanhu vanoti mari dzemafaindi kune munhu anowanikwa asina kupfeka mask iyo inobva pamadhora mazana mashanu kusvika pamadhora zvuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu-ZWL$36 000-kana kugara mujeri kwegore kana kuti faindi nekugara mujeri yakawandisa. Mutori wenhau webepa reMirrior VaDennis Kagonye vanoti kupfeka masiki kwakanaka zvikuru asi vanoti mutongo wekusapfeka masiki wakanyanya. Gweta reMISA Zimbabwe Muzvare Nompilo Simanje vanoti mutemo uyu hauna kunyatsojeka uye unogona kuisa vanhu munjodzi. Vanotiwo Zimbabwe inokoshesa zvemitemo inoomesera vanhu kwete kushanda navo kuti vagadzirise matambudziko avanenge vatarisana nawo. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa Dr Henry Madzorera vanoti mutongo wakatarwa nehurumende wakanyanya vachiti hurumende inenge yave kuda kutsvaka mari sezvo dzemitero dzave shoma panguva ino yekuti vanhu vari kunzi vagare mudzimba. Dr Madzorera vanoti mamask anonyanya kushanda kana munhu wese akaapfeka . Ongororo yaitwa neStudio 7 inoratidzawo kuti mapurisa anga asinei nevanhu vanga vasina kupfeka mamasiki mumaguta. Vamwe vezvitoro zvikuru zvakaita seOK, TM, Gain neMetro Peech vanga vasinga bvumire vanhu vanga vasina mamask kupinda muzvitoro zvavo asi change chichishamisa ndechekuti vatengi vange vachizobvisa mamask kana vave mukati vachitenga. Vashandi vemuzvitoro vange vakabvisawo mamask avo. Hurumende yakawedzera mazuva ekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba nemasvondo maviri kusvika musi wa17 Chivabvu ichibva yaisa mitemo inosanganisira kupfekwa kwemamask nemunhu wese anenge achifamba paruzhinji. No media source currently available

headline: Kubviswa kweRutsigiro rweMari neHurumende muZvimwe Zvitengeswa Kwoomesera Veruzhinji
text: Zvinhu zvinonzi zviri kuramba zvichiomera veruzhinji munyika kuburikidza nekukwira kwemitengo yezvinonyanyodiwa muhupenyu, zvikuru zvekudya pamwe nemafuta edzimotokari, asi mihoro yevashandi vazhinji isina kwairi kuenda. Izvi zvinotevera kukwira kutanga svondo rino kweupfu zvichitevera danho rinonzi rakatorwa nehurumende rekubvisa rutsigiro rwemari mukutengwa kwechibage negorosi nevanogaya upfu. Rutsigiro urwu rwunonzi rwaibatsira kuti mitengo yezvinhu zvakaita seupfu nechingwa irambe iri pasi, sezvo vanogaya upfu vaiwana dzimwe dzemari dzavanoda kubva kuhurumende. Vachitura hurongwa hwemashandisirwo emari nehurumende mugore rinouya, gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vakazivisa kuti hurumende yaizotora danho iri senzira yekuderedza nayo mari yainoshandisa. Asi imwe nyanzvi mune zveupfumi, vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti danho rehurumende rekubvisa rutsigiro rwemari iri rakatoita kuti zvinhu zvinyanye kuomera veruzhinji. Semuenzaniso, katsaga keupfu hwerudzi rwe roller meal kane huremu hwemakirogiramu gumi kanonzi kakakwira mutengo kubva pamadhora makumi mashanu nemashanu kuenda pamadhora zana nerimwe nemasendi makumi matanhatu nematanhu. Peturu yakakwirawo mutengo kubva pamadhora gumi nemanomwe ane masendi manomwe kuenda pamadhora gumi nemanomwe ane masendi makumi mana nemana parita, kuchitiwo dhiziri richenda pamadhora gumi nemanomwe ane masendi makumi mapfumbamwe parita, richibva pamadhora gumi nemanomwe ane masendi makumi manomwe nemana. Mutewedzeri wemunyori mukuru wesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, VaThomas Masvingwe, vanoti kukwira kwemitengo uku kuri kuomesera vashandi zvakanyanya nekuti mihoro yavo haisi kufambirana nezviri kuitika mune zveupfumi. VaMasvingwe vanoti mari iri kutambirwa nevashandi haichagoni kuti vararame, vachiti zvose izvi zviri kukonzerwa nehurongwa hwehurumende hwekuvandudza upfumi, kana kuti austerity measures. Izvi zvinotsinhirwawo naDoctor Chitambara, avo vanoti mihoro yevashandi yedonha zvakanyanya zvichienzaniswa nehuremu hwedhora rekuAmerica. Asi vaimbove gurukota rezvemaindasitiri nekutengesera, VaMike Bimha, vanoti hongu, vanhu vangaona sekunge zvinhu zviri kukwira mitengo asi pane zvakawanda zvaikanganisa hupfumi zviri kuedza kugadziriswa nehurumende. Vanoti zvose izvi zvichapfuura zvinhu zvichitogadzikana zvakanaka kwazvo munyika. Panyaya yekuti zvose izvi zviri kuremera vashandi, VaBimha vanoti mhinduro inofanirwa kunge ichibva kuvashandirwi kuti vari kuzviona sei, asi vanoti ibasa revashandirwi kuona kuti vashandi vavo vadzivirirwa kubva mumatambudziko akasiyanasiyana. VaMasvingwe vanoti hupenyu hucharamba huchiomera veruzhinji, zvikuru vashandi, kana mitengo yakaramba ichiita chamurambamhuru pasina ari kuiisa matomu. Vanoti pasvika zvinhu pari zvino pave kutongoda kuti vashandi vagare zvavo kudzimba dzavo, sezvo vasina mari dzekufambisa, pamwe nekuti vatenge chikafu kudzimba. Vakuru vanoti chakatanga ndicho chakachenjedza, nekudaro vakawanda vanoti vari kutarisa mberi vachiyeuka matambudziko akasangana nenyika mumakore a 2007 na 2008, apo veruzhinji vakanonga svosve nemuromo. Kusvika zvinhu zvagadzikana mune zveupfumi, vazhinji vacharamba vachitya mimvuri yavo. No media source currently available

headline: VaChamisa Vokurudzira Kunamatirwa kweNyika
text: Mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa munyika, reMovement for Democratic Change, MDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vari kukurudzira vana veZimbabwe vari munyika nekunze kwenyika, uye vemakereke akasiyanasiyana, kuti vanamatire nyika, kunamatiranawo pachavo, uye kutsanya kwemazuva manomwe vasati vafunga kutora matanho avangati akakosha mukugadzirisa matambudziko ari munyika. VaChamisa vanoti vari kukurudzira kuti kubva nemusi weMuvhuro 29 Chikunguru kusvika musi weSvondo 4 Nyamavhuvhu, pakati penguva dza 1 na 2 masikati vanhu vasimudze maoko avo vachinamata, vachipira mwoyo yavo kuna Mwari vachimukumbira kuti avape simba, huchenjeri, uye kuvachengetedza kuti vakwanise kubuda mumatambudziko avakatarisana nawo. VaChamisa vanoti vasvika pakukurudzira danho iri nekuona kutambura kuri kuita vana veZimbabwe nekuda kwekushaikwa munyika kwemafuta edzimotokari, magetsi, mapasipoti, kushaikwa kwemabasa pamwe nezvekudya. Vanotiwo vashandi vehurumende, varairidzi, mapurisa nemauto vari kupiwa mihoro isingavakwanire, vachitiwo vari pamudyandigere nevakarwa hondo havachatokwanise kurarama kwacho. VaChamisa vanoti huwori hwadzikawo midzi munyika zvekusvika pakuita serwiyo rwenyika kana kuti national anthem. Mashoko aVaChamisa anouya panguva iyo bato ravo riri kurongawo kutanga neMugovera kuita misangano munyika yose richinzwa zvinofunga vanhu nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika mune zvematongerwo enyika pamwe nezveupfumi. VaChamisa vanoti kana bato ravo ranzwa zvichabva muvanhu, ndipo chete parinozokwanisa kuziva matanho ekutora kuenda mberi. Vanoti bato ravo richatorawo mukana wemisangano iyi kuparurawo chirongwa chavo cheRELOAD. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanotadza Kuenda kuMusangano weKunamatira Runyararo Munyika
text: Vedzisvondo vaparura hwaro hwekuti munyika muitwe nhaurirano dzekutsvaga nzira dzekugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika. Asi vamwe vashora zvikuru kusauya kwemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, avo vatumira sachigaro webato ravo reZanuPF, Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri, kuzovamirira. Zvisineyi nekusauya kwaVaMnangagwa, munyika maratidzo chido chikuru chekugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika, apo vakuru vakuru vemachechi pamwe nevatungamiri vezvematongerwo enyika, avo vanosanganisira mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, mutungamiri weNational Constitutional Assembly, VaLovemore Madhuku, nevamwe , vaungana muHarare pamusangano wekunamatira nyika kuitira kuti nyika ibudirire zvakanaka, uye murusununguko. Munyori weZimbabwe Council of Churches, Reverend Kenneth Mtata, vati musangano uyu ndewekuunza Zimbabwe yose pamwe chete kuitira kuti paitwe hurukuro dzekutsvaga nzira dzekupedza gakava riri munyika. VaMtata vati kunyange hazvo VaMnangagwa vasina kuuya mbune, vafadzwa nekubudirira kwemusangano uyu. VaMtata vati danho repiri ravachatora semakereke ndere kugara pamwe chete naVaMnangagwa naVaChamisa, vokurukura zviri kunetsa munyika. Vachitaurawo pamusangano uyu, VaChamisa vatenda vedzisvondo nekuumba mukana wekuti nyika iite hurukuro dzekupodzana pamwe nekuumba nyika. VaChamisa, avo vasina kuenda kumusangano wakakokerwa naVaMnangagwa neChitatu, vatiwo hazvibviri kuti pasati pave nekuvimbikana, vokokwa kunzvimbo yakarerekera kubato reZanu PF. Mumwe wemadzimai apinda mumusangano wanhasi achibva kuguta reBulawayo, Amai Hingani Mkandla, vati zuva ranhasi ravapa tariro yekuti zvinhu zvinogona kugadzirisika munyika asiwo vati havana kuvafara nekusauya kwemutungamiriri wenyika kumusangano uyu. Vataura pamusangano uyu vakamirira vechidiki, Muzvare Namatai Kwekweza, vatiwo shuviro yavo ndeyekuti panotaurwa zverunyararo pataurwe chokwadi chezvakaitika. Vati zvakakosha kutaura kutyorwa kwakaitwa kodzero dzevanhu, vakatyora kodzero idzi vobvuma, pamwe nekukumbira ruregerero, pasati pataurwa zverunyararo. Vachitaura vakamirira VaMnangagwa, Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri, vati zvaitwa nevedzisvondo zvakanaka huye zvakakosha sezvo zviri kubatsira mukubatanidza vanhu. Vakurudzirawo kuti munhu wese ave nechekuita mukuunza runyararo munyika. Vatiwo hurumende yagara ichishanda nevedzisvondo huye vane tarisiro yekuramba vachishanda navo. Vakurudzira vedzisvondo kuti varambe vachinamatira runyararo nekupodzana kwemaronda munyika. Vedzisvondo vanamatirawo hutungamiriri hwakanaka munyika, kupedzwa kwehuori pamwe nerudo munyika. Musangano uyu wakokerwa nemasangano anosanganisira Zimbabwe Council of Churches, Zimbabwe Catholic Bishops’ Conference, neEvangelical Fellowship of Zimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoronga Kubatira Mitero yeHutano
text: Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekuparura chirongwa chekuti vanhu vose vange vachiwana mukana wekurapwa kuburikidza nekubhadharisa mitero vari kushanda nevari kuwana mari kukambani yeNational Social Secutiy Authority, NSSA. Izvi zvakabuda pamusangano wakaitwa muHarare neMuvhuro weTripartite Negotiating Forum, TNF. Musangano uyu unounza pamwe chete hurumende, vashandi nevashandirwi. Uyu ndiwo musangano wekutanga weTNF kubva mugore ra2010. Misangano yeTNF yakambomiswa nenyaya yekusawirirana pakati pemapoka matatu aya. TNF yakaumbwa paine chinangwa chekuti nhaurirano dzipe kuti pave nechinangwa chimwe chete munyika pakuyedza kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, ndivo vakaparura gwaro reKadoma Declaration muna 2010 iro rinotara zvinangwa zveTNF. Gwaro iri ndiro rine zvibvumirano zvemisangano yeTNF izvi zviri kunetsa kuzadzikisa. Gurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Priscah Mupfumira, vanoti hurongwa hwekuona kuti vanhu vawana hutano kuzadzikisa bumbiro remitemo rinoti vanhu vose vanofanira kuwana mukana wekurapwa.. No media source currently available Sangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, nerevashandirwi re Employers’ Confederation of Zimbabwe, EMCOZ, anoti anotambira nemufaro kutanga kwemisango yeTripartite Negotiating Forum achiti zvichabatsira mukuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika hwaenda kumawaere. Asi masangano EMCOZ neZCTU anoti pari zvino haasi kutambira chirongwa chehurumende chekuti NSSA itungamire hurongwa hwekutora mitero kuvanhu semari ichashandiswa munyaya dzehutano hwevanhu. Mutungamiri wesangano reEMCOZ, VaJohn Mufukari, vanoti misangano yeTNF inobatsira asi havatenderane nenyaya yekubhadhara mari yemitero yezvehutano. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanotiwo vashandi havana chivimbo neNSSA. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Votungamira Kuradzikwa kweRimwe Gamba kuHeroes Acre neChitatu
text: Mutungamiri wenyika vamnangagwa vari kutarisirwa mangwana kutungamira hurongwa hwekuradzikwa kwegamba renyika Brigadier General Retired Benjamin Mabenge kumarinda eHeroes Acre muHarare. Mutumbi waVaMabenge waendeswa kupurazi ravo kuKwekwe nhasi nendege dzeAirforce of Zimbabwe. Munguva yehondo vaizivikanwa nerekuti Freddie Matanga.

headline: Vanhu Makumi Masere neVavaviri Vourayiwa neDutumupengo Idai
text: Vanhu makumi masere nevaviri vashaya parizvino nenyaya yedutumupengo reTropical Cyclone Idai kuManicaland. Asi huwandu uhu huri kutarisirwa kukwira sezvo vanhu vakawanda vasiri kuzivikanwa kuti varipi. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa avo vange vamboenda kuUnited Arab Emirates vari kutarisirwa kudzoka kumusha kuti vazoita mubatira pamwe nenyika yawirwa nedutumupengo remvura nemhepo kana kuti Tropical Cyclone Idai. Asi vamwe vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika nevanhuwo zvavo vari kushora VaMnangagwa kuti vakasimuka munyika kunyangwe hazvo zvange zviri pachena kuti nyika yainge yotarisana nedambudziko redutumupengo. Vanhu ava vari kutumira mashoko kuStudio 7 uye kunyora pamadadendemutande akaita seTwitter neFacebook. Asi vamwe vari kuvatsigira vari kuti vaita zvakanaka kudzoka kumusha uye vari kuUnited Arab Emirates ikoko vakatangawo kutsvaga rubatsiro kuRed Crescent yekunyika iyi. Munyori mukuru bazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vanoti VaMnangagwa vakaenda vasingazive kuti dambudziko iri raizokura uye havasi kudzika vari maoko chete sezvo vakabva vatanga kutsvaga rubatsiro vari kunze. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro mamwe makurukota mana ehurumende anosanganisira VaJuly Moyo, VaPerence Shiri, Doctor Sekesai Nzenza naVaJoel Biggie Matiza vakamboyedza kushanyira nzvimbo dzakaparadzwa nedutumupengo iri. Asi vanonzi vasangana nematambudziko makukutu sezvo kusiri kufambika. Mukuru weCivil Protection Unit VaNathan Nkomo vanoti mauto ari kuyedza napose paanogona kugadzira migwagwa isiri kufambika.
