No media source currently available Dutumupengo iri rakatanga kuparadza zvinhu kuMozambique musi wa 14 Kurume risati rapinda muZimbabwe richinorova kuChipinge neChimanimani kunyanya richiuraya vanhu nekuparadza zvivakwa. Dzimwe nzvimbo dziri kutarisirwa kusangana nedambudziko iri dzinoti Mashonaland East, Mashonaland Central, Mashonaland West, Masvingo neMidlands. Asi vebazi rezvemamiriro ekunze kana kuti Metrological Services Department vanoti vari kutarisira muguta reHarare nemamwe matunhu eMatabeleland achasanganawo zvishoma nedambudziko remhepo nemvura.

headline: Amai Prisca Mupfumi neVamwe Voita Misangano muLondon
text: Gurukota rezvekushanyirwa kwenyika, Amai Prisca Mupfumira, nevamwe vakuru muhurumende, vari muLondon kuBritain kwavapinda musangano wezuva rimwechete we Investment Forum waitrirwa pa London Hilton Canary Wharf iri muCentral London. Musangano uyu wakarongwa neZimbabwe Investment and Development Agency iyo yakaburitsa gwaro neChitatu ichiti chinangwa chemusangano uyu change chiri chekushambadza Zimbabwe nemikana iri munyika munyaya dzezvemabhizinesi nekushanyirwa kwenyika. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi vashoropodza danho rehurumende rikuita rwendo rwune vanhu vakawanda vanobva kuZimbabwe vachienda kuLondon kunokwezva vekunze vachiti misnagano yakadai inogona kurongwa nemuzinda weZimbabwe muBritain. Vanhu ava vanoti Zimbabwe iri parumananzomba sezvo zvisina zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyaya dzemari. Hatina kukwanisa kubata Amai Mupfumira kuti tinzwe tivi ravo. Sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekushanyirwa kwenyika, Amai Concilia Chinanzvavana vanoti basa ravo sekomiti nderekuona kuti zvirongwa zvebazi rekushanya kwevanhu munyika zvaitwa negwara rakanaka here. No media source currently available

headline: VaKasukuwere Vobvisa kuDare Nyaya yeKudzinga Meya weGweru neMakanzura Basa
text: Dare repamusorosoro reSupreme Court nemusi weMuvhuro rakatambira kubvisa kwakaitwa nemagweta egukurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu VaSavior Kasukuwere kwekupikisa mutongo waive wapiwa nedare reHigh Court wekuti kudzinga kwavakaita makanzura eguta reGweru kwaive kusiri pamutemo. Izvi zvinoreva kuti makanzura aya ave kudzoka pabasa. Vatongi vedare repamusorosoro iri vanoti Amai Elizabeth Gwaunza, VaChinembiri Bhunu naVaBharat Patel vakatambira kubviswa kwekupikiswa kwemutongo uku, kana kuti “withdrawal of appeal” mushure mekunge vanzwa kubva kumagweta ainge akamirira VaKasukuwere namagweta ange akamirira makanzura aya. Amai Gwaunza vakaudza dare kuti vainge vatambira kubviswa kwekupikisa mutongo uku sezvo ivo nevamwe vavo vakaona pasina chiri pamutemo chingatadzise kubviswa kwekupikisa mutongo uku. Muna Kukadzi wegore rino dare reHigh Court raive rapa mutongo wekuti kumbomiswa basa kwaive kwaitwa makanzura eguta reGweru naVaKasukuwere kwaive kusiri pamutemo sezvo bumbiro remutemo risingapi gurukota rezvematunhu masimba ekuita izvi. Muna Nyamavhuvhu wegore rapera VaKasukuwere vainge vamisa basa makanzura ose gumi nemasere kusanganisira meya VaHamutendi Kombayi vachivapomera mhosva yekutadza kuita basa nemazvo pamwe nehuwori. VaKombayi nemamwe makanzura gumi vaive vakwira kudare vachipikisa kumiswa basa kwavo uku, asi kusvika pari zvino komiti yevanhu vatatu inotungamirwa naVaTsunga Mhangami ndiyo iri kufambisa mabasa ekanzuru muguta reGweru. Komiti iyi yakadomwa naVaKasukuwere. Magweta aVaKasukuwere vachitungamirwa naVaEphraim Mukucha wekuhofisi yemuchuchisi mukuru wehurumende vange vakumbira kuti dare reSupreme Court ritambire kuti kunyange hazvo VaKasukuwere vaive vaita zvisiri pamutemo vaive vaita izvi senzira yekudzivirira kutadza basa kwavati kwaiitwa nemakanzura eGweru. Asi vatongi vakati hazvaigona kuti vatambire chikumbiro ichi sezvo zviri pachena kuti VaKasukuwere vaive vaita zvisiri pamutemo. Mushure mekubvunzurudzwa kwekanguva, VaMukucha vazoti vawona zvakakodzera kuti vabvise kupikisa kwavo mutongo wakaitwa nedare reHigh Court, dare reSupreme Court rakabva ratambira izvi asi rati VaKasukuwere vabhadhare mari dzose dzine chekuita nenyaya iyi. Magweta emakanzura eguta reGweru VaReginald Chidawanyika, VaEsau Mandipa naVaLeopold Mudisi vakatambira zvakaturwa nedare izvi. Asi VaChidawanyika vaudza Studio 7 kuti pane kuti ritambire zvaitwa nemagweta aVaKasukuwere zvekubvisa kupikisa mutongo weHigh Court, shuviro yavo yange iri yekuti dai dare reSupreme Court rarasa zvachose kupikiswa kwemutongo uku. VaCharles Chikozho vanove mumwe wemakanzura eGweru variwo mutevedzeri wameya vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo pange pave nenguva yakareba nyaya iyi isati yapetwa vafara kuti vave kukwanisa kudzokera kunoita basa ravakasarudzirwa nevagari. Vati havatarisire kuti VaKasukuwere vachadazve kuvatsvagira imwe mhosva. Bato rinopikisa reMDC-T rinogara richichema chema kuti gurukota rezvematunhu rinopindira munyaya dzemafambisirwo emabasa mumakanzuru emumaguta nemadhorobha. Asi VaKasukuwere vanoti vanopindira kana pachiitwa zvehuwori. Asi vamwe vanoti hofisi yavo ndiyo inotopesvedzera zvehuwori mumakanzuru. No media source currently available

headline: America Yozeya Mutemo Wekubvisa Zvirango Zvakatemerwa Vamwe Vakuru muHurumende
text: Nhengo dzekomiti yedare reseneti rekuAmerica rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika re Foreign Relations Committee, VaChris Coons vebato remaDemocrats naVaJeff Flake vemaRepublicans vakatura bhiri mudare ravo rakanangana nekuvandudza mutemo weZimbabwe Democracy and Economic Recovery Act kana kuti ZIDERA. Mutemo uyu wakadzikwa nedare reCongress muna 2001 uchitemera zvirango vamwe vakuru vehurumende vaipomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Asi vakuru muhurumende vanoti vakatemerwa zvirango izvi nenyaya yekuti Zimbabwe yainge yatora mapurazi kubva kuvachena ichipa vatema. Mubhiri ravo VaCoons naVaFlake vanoti kuti zvirango izvi zvibviswe, Zimbabwe inofanira kuita sarudzo dzakachena, kuvandudza hupfumi pamwe nekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Amai Getrude Moyo vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kurongwa neparemende yeAmerica zvakanaka chose. Mutauriri we MDC inotungamirirwa naVaWelshman Ncube, VaKurauone Chihwayi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana chakaipa pabhiri rave kuzeiwa nekongiresi yekuAmerica. VaRichard Chimbiri vanoona nezvesarudzo muMDC vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakakosha kuti America nenyika dzepasi rese dzipe muono wadzo pasarudzo dze muZimbabwe. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakazvimirira, VaVivid Gwede,vanoti mutemo urikuda kudzikwa neAmerica wakanaka chose. Vanoti mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vawana mukana wekuzvichenura nekuita sarudzo dzakachena sekuvimbisa kwavo. Murairidzi wepaGreat Zimbabwe Univeristy, VaJoel Mukusha, vanoti kunyange hazvo America iine kodzero yekudzika mutemo wainoda hazvina kunaka kuti iudze dzimwe nyika kuti dzozvitonga sei. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemurairidzi wezvidzidzo zvematongerwo enyika paUniveristy of Zimbabwe, Professor Charity Manyeruke avo vati Zimbabwe inyika yakazvimirira isingafanire kuudzwa zvekuita neAmerica. Vati Zimbabwe ine paramende yayo inogadzira mutemo wayo. Vaenderera mberi vakati hapana chinoshamisa pane zviri kuitika nekuti mapato anopikisa anoda kuti Zimbabwe igare ichiomeserwa pane zvose, zvikuru MDC. Asi veMDC vanoti Zanu-PF ndiyo yakazvigokera moto muziso nenyaya yekutonga nedemo. Vanokokera nhengo dzebato ririkutonga reZanu PF muparamende, VaLovemore Matuke vaudza Studio 7 kuti paramende yekuAmerica yakasununguka kudzika mitemo yainoda. Vatiwo Zimbabwe iri kuronga sarudzo dzakachena dzine vaongorori vekunze. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakavimbisawo kuti hurumende yavo ichaita sarudzo dzakachena uye vachatambira chero zvichabuda musarudzo. No media source currently available

headline: ZITF Inotanga muBulawayo Vakawanda Vasina Mufaro
text: Vamwe vagari vemuBulawayo vanoti havachawone kukosha kwegungano remabhizimisi rinoitwa pagore rega rega reZimbabwe Internatiomnal Trade Fair ratanga muguta reBulawayo neChipiri. Vamwe vagari vemuBulawayo vanoti havachawone kukosha kwegungano remabhizimisi rinoitwa pagore rega rega reZimbabwe Internatiomnal Trade Fair kana kuti ZITF, iro ratanga muguta reBulawayo neChipiri. Vamwe vagari vataura neStudio 7 vati gungano reZITF raivapa mukana wekuti vaende nemhuri dzavo kunoona zvakasiyana siyana kuZITF asi vati mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi ave kuita kuti vasaona kukosha kwechiitiko ichi. Mumwe weavo vataura neStudio 7 ndemumwe mugari uyo angozvidoma nezita rekuti Amai Tawonga. Amai Tawonga vati ZITF iri kuuya panguva iyo vari kutotemwa nemusoro kuti vabatanidze mari yekubhadharira vana vavo chikoro sezvo zvikoro zviri kuvhurwa svondo rinouya. Mumwewo mugari, Muzvare Clara Moyo, vati vanosiendawo nevana vavo kuTrade Fair asi vati pari zvino zvinhu zvakavawomera, vakatsinhirawo kuti vari mushishi rekutsvaga mari yechikoro yevana vavo. VaTaipanei Mutadza vaimboshandira imwe yaive kambani hombe yaigadzira mbatya muBulawayo asi yakazovhara. VaMutadza vati vaive mumwe wevashandi vekambani iyi vaigara vachienda kuTrade Fair kunoratidza zvinhu zvaigadzirwa nekambani iyi. VaMutadza vanoti ivo semunhu ave kuedza kutangawo kuzvishandira pachavo vega, vanoona gungano reZITF rakakosha sezvo richivapa mukana wekuwana mazano ebhizimisi kune vamwe. Mumashoko avo kuvatapi venhau muBulawayo, sachigaro weZITF, VaBekhithemba Nkomo, vati kunyange hazvo mamiriro ezvehupfumi munyika asina kumira zvakanaka, vari kufadzwa nezviratidzwa zviri pagungano reZITF regore rino vachiti zviratidzwa izvi ndezvemhando yepamusoro kupfuura mamwe makore mashoma apfuura. Gungano reZITF richavhurwa zviri pamutemo nemusi wechishanu uye mutungamiri wenyika yeTogo ndiye achange ari munyarrikani pachiitiko ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Mahofisi eMauto, Mapurisa neVamwe Ovharwa Mvura KuMasvingo neNyaya yeZvikwereti
text: Kanzuru yeMasvingo yakatanga chirongwa chekuvharira vemabhizimusi nemapazi ehurumende mvura pakati pedhorobha kuti vabhadhare zvikwereti zvavo zvakakura, Godfrey Mtimba anotipa nyaya inotevera. Izvi hazvina kutambirwa zvakanaka nevanoshandira mudhorobha vachiti zvinogona kukonzera kupararira kwezvirwere zvakaita secholera netyphoid mudhorobha sezvo zvivakwa zviri kuvharirwa mvura zvichishandira vanhu vakawandisa. Meya weguta reMasvingo VaCollen Maboke vati vari kuvhara mvura nekuti mapazi ehurumende nevemabhizimusi ndivo vane zvikwereti zvakakura.\n\nVanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano rinomirira vagari reMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance kana kuti MURRA, Muzvare Rumbidzai Magurupira, vati kunyange hazvo vasinga kurudziri kusabhadharwa kwemvura nani zvake, kuvhara mvura pakati peguta kunogona kukonzera zvirwere uye kutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Kanzuru yeMasvingo inoti mapazi ehurumende nevemabhizimusi vane zvikwereti zvinoda kusvika mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe emadhora emunyika kana kuti $270 000. Mapazi ehurumende anezvikwereti zvikuru anosanganisira, mauto, mapurisa pamwe nezvipatara. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa.

headline: VaThabo Mbeki Vanoita Hurukuro Nevemakereke MuZimbabwe
text: Vaimbove mutungamiriri weSouth Africa, VaThabo Mbeki vange vachishanya mu Zimbabwe uko vakasangana nevatungamiriri vemapato ezve matongerwo enyika, kusanganisa mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nemutungamiriri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa nevamwe. VaMbeki varikuedza kuuyisa mapato aya pamwe chete nemamwe masangano kuti vagare pasi vaite hurukuro pamusoro pemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika, izvo zvinonzi zvave kunyanya kukanganisa South Africa. VaMbeki vakaitavo musangano nevemakereke. Munyori weZimbabwe Council of Churches, Doctor Kenneth Mtata, vaudza Studio 7 kuti parizvino VaMbeki varikuedza kukurudzira kuti paitwe nhaurirano munyika, kwete kuti ndivo mutongi gava. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi yeHutano hwePfungwa Yokurudzira Kutsigirwa kweVarwere vePfungwa neVehukama
text: Imwe nyanzvi yezvehutano hwepfungwa inoti zvakakosha chose kuti vanhu vane dambudziko rehutano hwepfungwa vapiwe rutsigiro nevanhu vari pedyo navo kuitira kuvabatsira kuti vakwanise kurarama munharaunda dzavagere. Doctor William Guri, avo vanoshanda neboka rezvehutano hwepfungwa kuvana vadiki kuBritain, vanoti basa ravo ndere kupa rutsigiro muzvikoro, kuvana, kuvadzidzisi nekuvabereki, nechinangwa chekuti vana vakwanise kuwana rutsigiro vachiri vadiki kuitira kuti vazokura vakasimba muhutano hwavo hwepfungwa. Doctor Guri vanoti basa rehutano hwepfungwa rinogona kuonekwa nevamwe sebasa risina kukosha, asi ibasa rakaskosha kwazvo rinofanirwa kutsigirwa nedzihurumende pamwe neveruzhinji. Vanoti pane zvakawanda zvinokonzera kuti munhu arware nepfungwa, zvinosanganisira kuomerwa nehupenyu, hurwere hweshuramatongo hweHIV/AIDS, kana kushaya basa chaiko. Doctor Guri vanotiwo ongororo dzavari kusanganawo nadzo dziri kuratidza kuti chirwere chiriko iye zvino ichi che Covid-19, chiri kukonzerawo zvakare kuti vanhu vakanganiswe hutano hwepfungwa kuburikidza nekugara vanhu vakavharirwa mudzimba vasingasangane nevamwe kungava kumabasa, kunzvimbo dzekudyira, kana kumitambo. Vanotiwo murwere weCovid-19 kana akasashanyirwa kuchipatara nehama neshamwari, anogona kukanganisika pfungwa zvakare. No media source currently available

headline: VaKasukuwere Vanombomisa Basa Makanzura eBulawayo
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvematunhu VaSavior Kasukuwere vakambomisa basa makanzura mashanu eguta reBulawayo kusanganisira mutevedzeri wameya uye vari kanzura weWard 5 VaGift Banda. Makanzura aya ari kupomerwa mhosva yekuita zvehuwori. Vamwe vamiswa basa pamwechete naVaBanda ndaVaCharles Moyo vanove kanzura weWard 9, VaMazama Dube veWard 25, VaJames Sithole weWard 7 pamwe naVaReuben Matengu vanove kanzura veWard 21. Vamwe vamiswa basa pamwechete naVaBanda ndaVaCharles Moyo vanove kanzura weWard 9, VaMazama Dube veWard 25, VaJames Sithole weWard 7 pamwe naVaReuben Matengu vanove kanzura veWard 21. VaKasukuwere vanonzi vazivisa kuti vatora danho iri mushure mekunge vaona kuti kanzuru yeguta reBulawayo haisi kutevedzera mutemo mukufambiswa kwemabasa. Vanonzi vatiwo ibasa ravo rekuona kuti zvinhu zvagadziriswa mukanzuru iyi. Vatiwo zvinokanganisa kuona kuti mukati memakanzura makumi maviri nevapfumbamwe vashanu chete ndivo vasiri kuita zvehuwori. Asi bato reMDC T, rinove rine nhengo dzamiswa basa idzi, rinoti riri kuongorora nyaya iyi riine chinangwa chekutorera VaKasukuwere matanho akakodzera nezvavaita izvi. Mutauriri webato iri VaObert Gutu vanoti bato ravo rine humbowo hwekuti VaKasukuwere vari kuda kuparadza makanzuru ose ari pasi pebato reMDC T, vachiti vakazivisa izvi pavakatora bazi rezvekutongwa kwematunhu. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata VaKasukuwere kuti tinzwewo divi ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoti Hapana Mwana weChikoro Afa neCovid-19 Kunyangwe Vakawanda Vabatwa neChirwere Ichi
text: Mukuru anoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika Dr Agnes Mahomva vanoti kunyangwe huwandu hwevana vechikoro vari kubatwa neCovid-19 huri kuramba huchikwira, hapana mwana ati afa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizvino. Vana vechikoro mazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe kana kuti 839 vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 mumavhikimnaviri adarika chete. Pavanhu zana nemakumi manomwe nevaviri vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nemusi weSvondo, makumi maviri nemumwe vana vechikoro. Izvi zvasiya vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru mazana maviri zvine makumi matatu nemashanu nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi manomwe nemashanu kana kuti 235 975. Nemusi weSvondi bazi rezvehutano rinoti hakuna munhu akafa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vafa nacho vachingori zviuru zvishanu nemazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevana kana kuti 5 394. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu mamiriyoni mana nezviuru mazana matatu zvine makumi mashanu nezvishanu nemazana mashanu nemakumi masere kana kuti 4 355 580 vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yeCovid-19. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba kaviri vave mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana matatu zvine makumi masere nezvipfumbamwe nemazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevanomwe kana kuti 3 389 597. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba katatu vave zviuru zana nemakumi maviri zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nevatatu kana kuti 120 673. Bazi rezvehutani rinoti rine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuti inyatsoshanda zvakanaka. Hurumende yave kukurudzirawo kuti vana vane makore gumi nemaviri kuti vabayiwe nhomba zvanzi naDr Mahomva zvinogona kubatsira kuti vana vakawanda vasabatwe neechirwere ichi.

headline: IMF Yorumbidza Zimbabwe Pakurwisa Huwori
text: Mutevedzeri wemukuru weInternational Monetary Fund kana kuti IMF Amai Antoinette Sayeh, vanoti Zimbabwe iri pakati penyika dzemuAfrica dziri kuyedza kudzika hurongwa hwakanangana nekuona kuti hupfumi hwenyika huri kubatsira munhu wese senzira yekuderedza huori nenhamo munyika. Asi vamwe vanopikisa vanoti hurumende inongodzika mitemo asi hapana zvainozoita kuitevedzera. Vachivhura zviri pamutemo musangano wemazuva maviri wekusimudzira hutongi hwejekerere uye kurwisa huwori weHigh-Level Conference on the Promotion of Good Governance and Fight Against Corruption muguta reGaborone nhasi, mutevedzeri wemukuru weIMF, Amai Antoinette Sayeh Antoinette vati Zimbabwe imwe yenyika dziri kuyedza kudzika hurongwa hwakanangana nekurwisana nehuwori. Vaenderera mberi vachiti vatungamiriri vemuAfrica, kusanganisira VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vari kuita zvese zvavanogona maringe nekuti zviwanikwa zveveruzhinji zvishandiswe nemazvo. Amai Sayeh vati nyika dzinoti Botswana, Zimbabwe, Mauritius pamwe chete neGhana dzakagadzira hurongwa hwakanaka hwekugadzirisa hupfumi kunyanya munyaya dzemari dzisina kuchena kana kuti money laundering muchirungu. Muhurukuro neStudio7 kumucheto wemusangano uyu, mukuru muchikamu chekuferefeta mabasa emari inogona kuzoshandiswa mumabasa ehutororo nezvimwe zvisiri pamutemo kana kuti Financial Intelligence Unit munyika, VaOliver Chiperesa, avo vapinda mumusangano uyu, vanoti IMF yabaya dede nemukanwa mukupembedza kwayo Zimbabwe. Kubva zvakaumbwa chikamu ichi munyika, VaChiperesa vati vakawanda vasungwa. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi musangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaProsper Chitambara vanoti hurumende yakafanira kudzikisa gejo mukuona kuti mitemo yakadzikwa iri kushanda nemazvo. Masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu nemamwe mapazi eUnited Nations anoona nezvemafambisirwo emari ari kupomerawo hurumende yeZimbabwe mhosva yekushandisa mitemo yakaita seweFinancial Action Task Force wekuona kuti mari hadzipinde nemunyika kunobatsira zvikwata zvinopfurikidza mwero kudzvinyirira masangano akazvimirira oga. Mukuvandudza mutemo weFATF uye Zimbabwe yakabva yati yave kuvandudza mutemo unoona nezvemashandiro emasangano akazvimirira wePrivate Voluntary Organization Act izvi zviri kushorwa nevanorwira kodzero dzevanhu. Hurumende inoti hayo iri kurwisa huori ichipa muenzaniso wekukandwa mujeri svondo rakapera kwaAmai Petronella Kagonye, avo vaimbowe gurukota rezvevashandi, vawanikwa vaine mhosva panyaya yekuba malaptop. Pane vanhu vakati wandei vanosanganisira vaimbova gurukota rezvematunhu VaIgantious Chombo pamwe nevaimboiva gurukota rezvevashandi , Amai Prisca Mupfumira vachine nyaya dziri mumatare vachinzi vakashandisa masimba avo zvisirizvo pavaiva muhurumende. No media source currently available

headline: Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe Choshura Mare neKurima Bindu muSouth Africa
text: Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muSouth Africa chiri kushura mare nekurima miriwo yendudzi dzakasiyanasiyana, izvo zvave kuchipa raramo yachakanga chisingatarisire muhupenyu hwacho mushure mekumboomerwa nezvinhu munyika iyi. VaLeonie Kuchakanya, avo vane makore makumi matatu ekuberekwa, vanoti vakafunga kutamba nevhu mushure mekunge vaona kuti zviroto zvemafuro manyoro vari muSouth Africa zvakanga zvisiri kubereka michero. VaKuchakanya, avo vanobva kuMasvingo asi vakakurira mumusha weOld Highfield muHarare, vanoti pavakapinda munyika iyi vaive netarisiro yepamusoro sevakawanda vanobva kuZimbabwe, asi izvi handizvo zvakaitika, izvo zvakazoita kuti vashande mabasa akawanda asi hazvina kugadzirisa matambudziko avo. Vaona kuti zvinhu zviri kuramba kubatana, vanoti vakazofunga kuedza mamwe mabhindauko izvo zvakazoita kuti muna 2016 vatsvage nzvimbo yekurima muPretoria, uko vakawana gombo ravakatotanga kugobora voga. Mushure memakore mashanu, VaKuchakanya vanoti vave kudya cheziya ravo sezvo vave mumwe wevarimi vepamusoro vari kuwanisa vanhu muriwo wendudzi dzinosanganisira makabheji, tsunga, hanyanisi, matomati nezvimwe zvakawanda. Vanoti vanhu vanotenga zvirimwa zvavo vanobva muPretoria nenzvimbo dzakapoteredza, kusanganisirawo neguta reJohannesburg, uko vakawanda vanobva vachinohodha zvekuzotengesawo mberi. Asi VaKuchakanya vanoti hausi mutserendende nguva dzose mubasa ravo sezvo vari kusangana nedambudziko guru rembavha dziri kuvashanyira dzichifunga kuti vari kuchengeta mari mumba. Vanotiwo munguva ino yechirimo vanosangana nedambudziko remvura, izvo zvinoita kuti vade kuisa bhohoro kana mukana wacho wawanikwa. Vanokurudzirawo zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika kuti zvishande nesimba kunyange munguva yekuomerwa, pane kuti zvitsvage ruramo kuburikidza nekuita mabasa erima. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Yave neHutungamiri Hutsva
text: Sangano revashandi reZCTUmukupera kwesvondo rakadoma hutungamiri hutsva, hwakatsiva hwaivepo hwaitungamirwa naVaGeorge Nkiwane. Vakadomwa kutora chigaro chemutungamiri ndiVaPeter Mutasa, vaine vatevedzeri vavo vatatu vanoti Amai Florence Taruvinga, VaJohn Chirenda naVaJuniel Manyere. VaJaphet Moyo, vanove munyori mukuru wesangano iri vakaramba vari pachigaro chavo, asi vave nevatevedzeri vatsva vanoti VaSylvester Mutindindi naVaThomas Masvingwe. Mubati wehomwe akadomwa ndiVaLovemore Mangwarati kuchitiwo dzimwe nhengo dzekomiti kana kuti maTrustee vari VaReason Ngwenya, VaRwatipedza Chigwagwa naVaNyasha Benza. VaMoyo vaudza Studio 7 kuti temu yechikwata chaVaNkiwane yakanga yakwana izvo zvakaita kuti sangano ravo ritevere bumbiro remitemo richisarudza humwe hutungamiri. Vanoti chikwata chitsva ichi chichaendesa mberi basa ranga richiitwa nehutungamiri hwakasiya basa. No media source currently available

headline: Vaive Mukuru weBulawayo Polytechnic Engineer Mabasa Vakashaya neCovid-19 Voradzikwa
text: Mukuru wechikoro cheBulawayo Polytechnic Engineer Gilbert Mzenzi Mabasa avo vakashaya nemusi weChishanu nechirwere cheCovid-19 kuArundel Hospital chiri pe kuUnited Bulawayo Hospital’s vakaradzikwa nemusi weSvondo kuBulawayo kumarinda eAthlone. Vachitaura nebepanhau reSunday News, gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro Muzvinafundo Amon Murwira vati VaMabasa munhu ainge ari mbariro munyaya dzedzidzo sezvo ainge akazvipira kuvandudza dzidzo munyika uye nyika yarasikirwa zvikuru. Engineer Mabasa vaizivikanwa zvikuru nerekuti “The Teacher” semunhu aida kudzidzisa vanhu zveshoko raMwari nehupenyu. Vange vave nemakore makumi matanhatu nemashanu ekuberekwa. Vakazivisa musi wa 6 Nyamavhuvhu kuti vainge vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. VaMabasa vasiya mudzimai nevana vatanhatu. Mumwe akashanda naEngineer Mabasa inhengo yeparamende yeMDC Alliance yaive sachigaro wedzidzo VaDaniel Molokele. Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rinoti nemusi weMugovera vanhu gumi nevatanhatu vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya vafa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru zvina nemazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe kana kuti 4, 390. Vanhu zana nemakumi matatu nemumwe vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatwa nacho kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zana rezviuru nemakumi maviri nemana zvine mazana matatu nemakumi matanmhatu nemanomwe kana kuti 124, 367. Vanhu mazana maviri nemakumi maviri nevatanhatu kana kuti 226 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi zvasiya vapora vave zana rezviuru negumi nemazana manomwe nemakumi manomwe nemashanu kana kuti 110, 775. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mashanu zvine makumi mapfumbamwe nemakumi matanhatu nemazana matatu nemakumi masere nemumwe kana kuti 1, 596 381 vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kapiri sezvinotarisirwa. Vabayiwa nhomba kekutanga vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mashanu negumi nematanhatu zvine mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu nematatu kana kuti 2, 513, 353. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kutin inyatsoshanda zvinotarisirwa kudzivirira kuparira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kubatwa neCovid-19 Hworamba Huchikwira
text: Hurumende yakazivisa neChitatu kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa ne Covid-19 munyika hwakakwira kusvika pachiuru nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 1 089, zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwevamwe vanhu makumi maviri nevashanu vaine chirwere ichi. Vanhu vakavhenekwa chirwere ichi nezuro vanosvika zviuru zviviri nemazana matanhatu negumi nevaviri, kana kuti 2 612. Vanhu vakanga vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi kusvika nezuro vaive mazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu kana kuti 395, uye vashaya vachiri makumi maviri. Mumwe chiremba, Dr Edgar Munatsi, avo vari ku Britain, vanoti dambudziko rekukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vave kuwanikwa vaine chirwere ichi, zvikuru muvanhu vagara vari munyika, richanetsa kudzivirira nekuti vanhu vanga vasiri kutevera zvakadzama mitemo yekuvhara kumeso pamwe nekugeza maoko. No media source currently available

headline: Bato reCCC kuMasvingo Ropomera Zanu PF Mhosva yeKumanikidza Masabhuku Kutinha Vanhu Kunovhota muSarudzo yeBy-Election kuWard 21
text: Bato Rinopikisa reCitizens’ Coalition for Change, CCC, riri kupomera bato reZanu PF mhosva yekumanikidza masabhuku kuti atungamirire vanhu vavo kundovhotera bato riri kutonga iri musarudzo ye by election iri kuitwa ku Ward 21 kuMasvingo West neMugovera. Bato reCCC, iro riri kumirirwa naVaOnias Mawarire, richange richitatsurana neZanu PF, iyo inenge ichimiririrwawo naVaChenjerai Mumbire. Mamwe mapato anopikisa akaita seMDC inotungamirirwa naVaDouglas Mwonzora, akatadza kupinda musarudzo idzi zvakasiya makwikwi ari pakati pe Zanu PF neCitizens’ Coalition for Change chete. Vatsigiri veCCC mu Ward iyi vanoti vechidiki veZanu PF pamwe nevatungamiriri vavo vaitenderera svondo rino mumaruwa vachiudza sabhuku wega wega kuti aende nevanhu vake kusarudzo iyi vachiti anenge aramba vaizoona zvekuita naye. Vechidiki ava vanonzi vaivimbisa kuti bato ravo rine mazita evanhu vose vari mumabhuku uye munzvimbo dzekuvhotera nekudaro vakakundwa kucharohwa vanhu uye kunyimwa chikafu cherubatsiro rwunopiwa. Vari kumirira CCC musarudzo iyi, VaMawarire, vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato rinotonga reZanu PF rakaudza masabhuku kuti vadzinge avo vanenge vasina kurivhotera kana rakangokundwa musarudzo. Mumwe mutsigiri weCCC, VaGift Mapondera, vanoti nekuda kwezvirikuitwa neZanu PF kumasabhuku vamwe vatsigiri vave kutotya kuzodzingwa mumabhuku kana kurohwa nekudaro vachatopedzisira vavhotera bato ravasingadi. Vanoti nyaya dzekutyisidzirwa idzi dzakawedzera svondo rino sezvo zuva resarudzo raswedera, asi vanoti uku kutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Vemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu muMasvingo vanoti kushandiswa kuri kuitwa madzishe nemadzimambo nebato rinotonga kutyora mutemo nekuti bumbiro remutemo wenyika haribvumidzi kuti madzishe nemasabhuku vaite zvematongerwe enyika. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kumadzishe ari munzvimbo iri kuitirwa sarudzo iyi, kanawo mutungamiri wemadzishe munyika VaFortune Charumbira. Asi sachigaro veZanu PF mudunhu reMasvingo, VaRobson Mavhenyengwa, vati ivo vanoshanda nemadzishe asi havavamanikidzi kuvhotera bato ravo uye vanotarisira kukunda zvine mutsindo musarudzo yamangwana iyi. Asi munyori anopona nezvesarudzo muMasvingo mubato reCCC, VaGodfrey Madzikanda, vati Zanu PF yave kusimbirira kumanikidza masabhuku nekuti inoziva kuti vanhu havachaidi. Vati vanotarisira kukunda musarudzo iyi kunyange vanhu vakatyisidzirwa nekuvimbiswa kunyimwa chikafu munguva yenzara. Sarudzo ye by-election iyi iri kuitwa mushure mekushaya kwevaiva kanzura we Ward 21 VaTinago Mupinga, vaive vebato reZanu PF, muna Kurume gore rino. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaBiden, neMutungamiri weChina VaXi, Vanoita Nhaurirano Pamusoro peHondo yeRussia neUkraine
text: Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaJoe Biden vataura nemutungamiri weChina VaXi Jinping neChishanu, zuva rimwe chete mumwe mumiriri mukuru muhurumende yavo azivisa kuti Washington ine chokwadi chekuti Beijing iri kuda kubatsira mune zvechiuto kupinda kweRussia muUkraine. Mashoko abva kuWhite House anoti musangano pakati pevatungamiri vaviri ava, uyo waitwa parunhare uye unowe wekutanga pakati pevaviri ava kubva pakapinda Russia muUkraine, watora maawa maviri. Nemusi weChina gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muAmerica VaAntony Blinken vakatsinhira mashoko eanhau akabuda kutanga kwesvondo rino ekuti China ingangopindira kunobatsira Russia. “Tiri kushushikana nekuti vari kuronga kubatsira Russia nezvikwanisiro zvechiuto zvekushandisa muUkraine,” vakadaro VaBlinken vachiudza vatori venhau. Havana kupa humbowo hwezvipomerwa izvi, izvo Moscow neBeijing vakaramba. Vachitsinhira zvakataurwa nevamwe vakuru-vakuru, VaBlinken vakayambira Beijing kuti inotarisana nedambudziko gukutu kana yakabatsira hondo yaVaPutin kunyange vasina kujekesa kuti zvii zvinozoitika. Zvichakadaro, mashoko aburitswa neBeijing pamusoro pehurukuro yevatungamiri vaviri ava anoti VaXi vavimbisa VaBiden kuti nyika yavo haina chido chekupindira muhondo iri muUkraine. “Mutungamiri VaXi vaburitsa pachena kuti China haidi kuona zvinhu zvichisvika pazviri muUkraine,” gwaro raburitswa razivisa kudaro. “Mativi ose anofanirwa kutsigira Russia neUkraine kuti dziite nhaurirano.” Bejing yakamboti mashoko ekuti iri kutsigira Moscow akanangana nekuda kunzvenga chokwadi.

headline: Mutungamiri weSangano reYARD, VaMliswa Vanoburitswa neDare muHusungwa
text: Mukuru wesangano revechidiki reYouth Advocacy for Reform and Democracy, YARD, VaTemba Mliswa, avo vakasungwa neSvondo kuEsigodini mudunhu reMatabeleland South, vakamiswa pamberi pedare redzimhosva kuEsigodini kwakare vachipomerwa mhosva yekutyora mutemo wePublic Order and Security Act kana kuti POSA. Gweta raVaMliswa, VaLizwe Jamela vanoshanda nesangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights vanoti mutongi wedare aona zvakakodzera kuti VaMliswa vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo vasina kubvisiswa mari yechibatiso. “VaMliswa vakasungwa nezuro (Svondo) vaine vamwe vavo 23 vavaifamba navo, vachibva kuBulawayo vakasvika kuEsigodini vakati regai timbotura zvedu mafemo, vavane zvekudya sezvo aive masikati, vachibva vatonzi watove musangano,” VaJamela vanodaro. Vanoti vakabva vasungwa vari makumi maviri nevana vachipomerwa mhosva yekuita musangano vasina kutanga vapiwa mvumo. VaJamela vanoti VaMliswa dzimwe nhengo makumi maviri nenhatu dzeYARD idzi dzakazoregwa dzisina mhosva yadzakapomerwa, kukasara VaMliswa, avo vakarara usiku humwechete muchitokisi chemapurisa. VaJamela vanoti VaMliswa vanzi vadzoke mudare musi wa 22 Chikumi. Vasati vasungwa, VaMliswa vanonzi vakambonetsana nemumwe kanzura mudunhu iri, VaPatson Sibanda, avo vaiti VaMliswa vakanga vavazvidza zvikuru nekuita musangano mudunhu ravo vasina kutanga vavakumbira mvumo kana kuvazivisa. No media source currently available

headline: Kurwisana Pakati peMauto eUkraine neRussia Kunonzwikwa muGuta Guru reUkraine reKyiv
text: Kuputika kwemabhambu pamwe nekurira kwepfuti kunonzi kwanga kuchinzwikwa neMugovera muguta guru reUkraine, reKyiv, apo mauto eRussia nemauto eUkraine akanga achirwira kuti guta guru iri rive pasi pavo. Vakuru veguta reKyiv vanonzi vadzika mutemo unorambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu kubva nenguva dza 5 manheru kusvika nenguva dza 8 mangwanani ezuva rinotevera. Vakuru muhurumende yeUkraine vari kukurudzira zvizvarwa zvenyika iyi kuti zvibatsire kudzivirira guta reKyiv kubva kumauto eRussia. Kamba yemauto iri muguta guru iri yarwiswa asi mauto eUkraine anoti kurwiswa uku kwadzivirirwa. Chimwe chivakwa chemuturikidzwa chiri muguta guru iri charwiswawo mambakwedza. Gurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muUkraine rati chivakwa ichi charohwa nechombo cheRussia. Mumwe mushandi anonunura vanhu munjodzi audza sangano renhau Associated Press kuti vanhu vatanhatu vakuvadzwa mukurwiswa nechombo chemuchadenga uku. Mifananidzo yepamavhidhiyo inoratidza kuti chivakwa ichi chaparadzwa zvakanyanya , zvikuru mumipanda yepamusoro. Mutungamiri weUkraine, VaVolodymyr Zelenskyy vakanga vayambira kuti kurwiswa kweKyiv kwaizowedzerwa neMugovera, vakati guta guru iri raida kudzivirirwa vachiti havangarasikirwi naro. VaZelenskyy vanyorawo padandemutande reTwitter kuti vataura nemutungamiri weFrance VaEmmanuel Macron, vachiti zvombo nezvikwanisiro kubva kune vavanodyidzana navo zviri munzira kuenda kuUkraine. Ukuwo, gurukota rezvekudyidana nedzimwe nyika muRussia rati mauto eRussia atora guta riri kuchamhembe kwakadziva kumabvazuva kweUkraine reMelitopol. Vakuru vakuru muAmerica pamwe nenyika dzekumawirira vanoti hurongwa hwemauto eRussia hwekufora achipinda muKyiv nemamwe maguta senzira yekudimura nekuparadza hurumende yeUkraine hunenge hwadzikira mutsindo. MuKyiv, VaZelenskyy vasarudza kukurudzira nyika yavo, vachiramba runyerekupe rwekuti vatiza guta iri vachisimbisa kuti ivo nevamwe vakuru vehurumende vachirimo vose vachidzivirira rusununguko rwavo nenyika yavo.

headline: Hurumende Inoramba Mashoko eKuti iri Kuparura Mari Itsva yeNyika Svondo Rino
text: Hurumende pamwe nagavhuna vebhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, Doctor John Mangudya, varamba mashoko ekuti nyika iri kuparura mari yayo svondo rino. Zvichitevera mashoko aburitswa padande mutande reTwitter nevakambove gurukota rezvemari muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, VaTendai Biti, ekuti svondo rino hurumende iri kuparura mari yenyika itsva, Doctor Mangudya vanoti vanhu havafanirwe kuteerera mashoko enhema akadai, ayo vanoti anokanganisa zvinhu mune zveupfumi. Doctor Mangudya vanoti Zimbabwe haina hurongwa hwakadaro munguva pfupi inotevera. Ukuwo, bazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko raburitsawo mashoko ekuramba nezvehurongwa uhwu, richiti hurumende iri kushushikana zvikuru nemanyepo ari kutenderedzwa nemamwe mapoka ezvematongerwo enyika ekuti nyika iri kuparura mari yayo svondo rinouya. Aka hakasi kekutanga kuti hurumende inzi iri kuda kuparura mari itsva. Masvondo mashoma adarika mashoko aya akamboduawo zvakare, zvikuru mumadandemutande. Asi mwedzi wapera gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakazivisa kuti nyika isunge dzisimbe sezvo paine hurongwa hwekuparura mari itsva yenyika mukupera kwegore rino. No media source currently available

headline: Dare Rinoti Nyaya yeKuri Kudhindwa Magwaro eKuvhotesa Inzwikwe Chimbichimbi
text: Dare repamusoro ratura mutongo wekuti nyaya yekutengwa kwebepa rinogadziriswa gwaro rekuvhotera pamwe ne ink ichashandiswa pakuvhota musarudzo dzemwedzi unouya inzwikwe nechimbichimbi. Mutongi wedare repamusoro, VaPisirayi Kwenda, vatura mutongo uyu panyaya yakakwidzwa kudare nemutungamiri wePeople’s Democratic Party, PDP, VaTendai Biti, pamwe nemutauuriri webato iri, VaJacob Mafume, vachiti inzwikwe musi wa 30 mwedzi uno usati wadarika. VaBiti naVaMafume vakaenda kudare repamusoro vachida kuti komisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, kana kuti ZEC, iise pajekerere nyaya yekutengwa kwebepa richagadziriswa mapepa ekuvhotesa pamwe ne ink ichanyikwa zvigunwe nevanhu vanenge vavhota musarudzo dzemwedzi unouya. Gweta raVaBiti naVaMafume panyaya iyi, VaJeremiah Bhamu, vaudza dare kuti nyaya iyi inofanira kunzwikwa nechimbichimbi sezvo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakatotara zuva resarudzo uye vachakwikwidza musarudzo idzi vachitarisirwa kusvitsa mazita avo kudare rinotambira mazita evachada kukwikwidza musarudzo idzi re nomination court neChina. Mumapepa ari pamberi pedare, VaBiti naVaMafume vanoti kutengwa kwebepa richagadziriswa mapepa ekuvhotesa kunofanira kuitwa zviri pachena kuitira makambani ose anokwanisa kutengesera ZEC bepa iri awane mukana wakaenzana uye zvinhu zvichiitwa zviri pachena kwete zvakaitwa neZEC kuti yakangofuma yave kutaura kuti bepa iri richabva kune imwe kambani iri kuSouth Africa yaisiri kubudira veruzhinji pamwe nevemapato ezvematongerwo enyika pachena. Gweta reZEC, VaTawanda Kanengoni, vabvuma kuti nyaya iya inzwikwe nechimbichimbi pasina kupikisana naVaBamu. Zvichakadai, mapato mazhinji ari kuda kukwikwidza musarudzo dzegore rino aswera achimhanya-mhanya kuti aendesa mapepa awo ku nomination court iyo ichagara mangwana mumatunhu ose emunyika mangwana. No media source currently available Zvichakadai, matare awanawo vaimbova gurukota rezvematunhu, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, vasina mhosva pamhosva yavanga vachipomerwa yekubuda munyika zvisiri pamutemo. Mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti, Amai Josephine Sande, vatura mutongo wekuti vaimbova gurukota rezvematunhu, VaSaviour Kasukuwere, avo vanga vachipomerwa mhosva yekubuda munyika zvisiri pamutemo, havana mhosva yavakapara. Mutongi wedare ati makasha embumburu dzakashandiswa dzakawanikwa kumba kwaVaKasukuwere pamwe nekuboorwa kwemadziro pamwe nekupwanyika kwakaitwa mahwindo emba yavo kwakakonzerwa nekuridzwa kwakaitwa pfuti munguva yeOperation Restore Legacy zvakazoita kuti vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vasiye basa, zvinoratidza kuti hupenyu hwaVaKasukuwere hwakange hwave panjodzi. Mutongi wedare aenderera mberi achiti nehupfumi huna VaKasukuwere uye semunhu anofamba nepasipoti yevanhu vanoremekedzwa, kana kuti diplomatic passport, hazvaikodzera kuti VaKasukuwere vangobuda munyika zviri kunze kwemutemo pasina chikonzero chakati tsvikiti. VaKasukuwere vati vafara zvikuru nemutongo waturwa nedare. VaKasukuwere ndevamwe vemakurukota ehurumende akatiza munyika pakaitwa chirongwa che Operation Restore Legacy nemasoja achitungamirwa nemukuru wawo panguva iyi, VaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vakazoitwa mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika mushure mekunge VaMugabe vapidigurwa. VaKasukuwere vakazodzoka munyika mwedzi wapera mushure mekupedza mwedzi mitanhatu vari kunze kwenyika kwavakaenda muhupoteri. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Voratidzira muHarare Vachirwisana neMapurisa
text: Zvinhu zvinonzi zvafuma zvakaita manyama amire nerongo muHarare nenzvimbo dzakapoteredza sezvo vemakombi nevanhuwo zvavo vari kurwisana nemapurisa. Zvinonzi pane bata murefu bata mupfupi munzvimbo dzakaita seHatfield, Epworth, Ruwa, Zimre Park, Mabvuku neTafara. Vanhu vakawanda vanonzi vatotadza kuenda kumabasa nekuda kwekurwisana uku. Mapurisa ari kukandira vanhu hutsi hunokatyidza uku vanhu vachikanda matombo. Vemakombi vakamboratidzirawo kwaMutare vachigunun'una nenyaya yehuori yavanoti iri kuitwa nemapurisa uye maroad blocks avanoti akawandisa mumigwagwa. Kurwisana uku kuri kuuya kunyangwe vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muZanu-PF vari gurukota rezvematunhu VaSaviour Kasukuwere vakayedza kutyisidzira vanhu vanoratidzira nemhirizhonga. Izvi zvakatevera kuratidzira kwakaitika kuBeitbridge nemusi weChishanu vanhu vachiramba kutambira chirongwa chehurumende chekurambidza kupinda munyika zvimwe zvinhu zvinotengwa nevanhu kuSouth Africa nemutengo wakaderera zvozotengeswa muZimbabwe. Vanhu makumi manomwe nevaviri vakasungwa vamwe gumi nevanomwe vakamiswa pamberi pedare nemusi weSvondo. Tichakupai zvizere munguva pfupi inotevera.

headline: Mitumbi yeVanhu Gumi Vakafa neHutsi Yoongororwa kuUBH kuBulawayo
text: Mapurisa aburitsa mazita evanhu gumi vakafa mushure mekutadza kufema nehutsi hwemoto wavaiyedza kudzima uchipisa sora papurazi rinonzi Rodrose kuEsigodini nezuro. Mitumbi yevanhu ava yakaendeswa kuchipatara cheUnited Bulawayo Hospitals kuti inovhenekwa navanamazvikokota. Mumashoko padandemutande reTwitter, mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi vati vanhu vakashaya vanoti VaKessary Sibanda vane makore makumi mashanu nematau-53, VaIan Mudimba vane makore gumi nematatu nemasere 38, VaSimon Mdlongwa vane makore makumi matatu nemapfumbamwe, 39, VaNelisingwane Dlamini vane makre makumi mana nemanomwe-47, VaLuzibo Tshuma vane makore asina kuziviswa, VaOliver Mudimba vane makore makumi matatu nemapfumbamwe, VaBafana Moyo, vane makore makumi mashanu nematatu, 53, VaEngland Moyo vane makore makumi maviri 20, VaThabani Mpofu vane makore makumi mana nematanhatu, uye VaMenelisi Ngwenya vane makore makumi maviri-20 zvekare. Mapurisa atiwo achasunga vanhu vari kupisa masango izvi zviri kukonzera kufa kwevanhu.

headline: VaXi Jinping Vanopedza Rwendo Rwavo kuZimbabwe
text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeChina, VaXi Jinping, vapedza rwendo rwavo rwemazuva maviri muZimbabwe mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vachiti rwendo urwu rwasimbaradza hushamwari pakati penyika mbiri dzi zvikuru sei munyaya dzehupfumi. Mutungamiri wenyika yeChina, VaXi Jinping, vapedza rwendo rwavo rwemazuva maviri muZimbabwe mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vachiti rwendo urwu rwasimbaradza hushamwari pakati penyika mbiri dzi zvikuru sei munyaya dzehupfumi. VaXi vasimuka muHarare vakananga kuJohannesburg South Africa uko vari kunopinda mumusangano weAfrica-China Co-operation. VaMugabe vanotarisirwawo kupinda mumusangano wekuSouth Africa uyu. No media source currently available VaXi vanga vari muZimbabwe kwemazuva maviri akaona zvibvumirano zvakawanda zvichinyoreranwa pakati peZimbabwe ne China. Zvimwe zvezvirongwa zvakasainwa zvinosanganisira chirongwa chebhiriyoni nechidimbu chemadhora chekuvandudza gwenya remagetsi rekuHwange, chirongwa chemadhora makumi mapfumbamwe nemasere chekuvandudza kambani yenhare yehurumende, yeTelone, pamwe nechibvumirano chekupa rubatsiro rwekuchengeta mhuka dzemusangano. Zvimwe zvibvumirano ndezvekuvakwa kweparamende itsva, kuvakwa kwemuzinda wekuchengeterwa mishonga, kudyidzana munyaya dzekufamba kwendenge, chirongwa chekudyidzana munyaya dzepfumi pamwe nechirongwa chegwenya remagetsi ezuva nezvimwe. Vachitaura pamabiko avakaitira VaJinping, kuState House nChipiri manheru, VaMugabe vakati zvinofadza kuti zvimwe zvirongwa zvavakaita neChina zvave kutoitwa. Vakati China iri kutsigira zvirongwa zvakawanda munyika uye nezuro chaiko yakasaina zvibvumirano zveku tsigira zvimwe zvirongwa zvakawanda chose zvichasimudzira hupfumi. VaMugabe vakati vanofara chose kuti China yakaramba yakamira neZimbabwe apo Zimbabwe yainge yakatemerwa zvirango zvehupfumi. Vakatiwo vanofara chose kuti hushamwari hwenyika mbiri idzi huri kuramba huchikura uye pari zvino hwave kuenda kunyaya dzehupfumi. VaXi vakati China neZimbabwe dzinofanira kuti hushamwari hwadzo huenderere mberi huchibatsira zvizvarwa zvenyika mbiri idzi. Mukuru werimwe sangano revanomirira vemabhizimisi, reZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, VaDavison Norupiri, vanoti itariro yavo yekuti rwendo rwaVaXI ruchazarura mikana yevemabhizimisi vemuno nevekuChina. China yakapa zvikwereti Zimbabwe zvinokosha mamiriyoni akawanda emadhora uyewo pane makambani anobva kunyika iyi ave kutoshanda muZimbabwe munyaya dzakasiyana siyana dzakaita semurima pamwe nekuchera mangoda negoridhe. Pari zvino China iri kutsigira zvirongwa zvebudiriro nemari yakawanda kudarika nyika zhinji. Pabhajeti regore rinouya nyika dzekumavirira dziri kubatsira Zimbabwe nezana nemakumi masere emamiriyoni emadhora gore rese.

headline: VaMliswa: Amai Mujuru Ngavasimudze Musoro
text: Vakadzingwa sasachigaro weZanu PF kudunhu reMashonaland West, Va Temba Mliswa, vashora kunyarara kuri kuita vakadzingwa semutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru, nezviri kuitwa kuvanhu vaivatsigira pavaifurufushwa mu Zanu PF. No media source currently available Vachitaura nevatori venhau mu Harare nhasi, Va Mliswa vasvora Amai Mujuru nekuramba vakanyarara vatsigiri vavo vachifurufushwa mu Zanu PF vachiti Amai Mujuru vaifanira kushandisa rutsigiro rwavaiva narwo mu Zanu PF kuti vatore matomhu kubva kumutungamiri wenyika, Va Robert Mugabe. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura na Amai Mujuru sezvo nharembozha yavo yanga isiri kudairwa. Asi vari kutaura vakamirira vari kutsigira Amai Mujuru, Va Rugare Gumbo, avo vakadzingwawo zvakare mu Zanu PF, vati Amai Mujuru vakaedza pose pavanogona napo asi pane vasina kuteerera muZanu PF kunyange hazvo vachiti Va Mliswa vane kodzero dzekuva nemuonero wavo. Va Mliswa vatiwo gurukota rinowona nezvemvura, Va Saviour Kasukuwere, gurukota rinowona nezvekubuditswa kwemashoko, Va Jonathan Moyo, pamwe negurukota rinowona nezvematunhu, Va Ignatious Chombo, vanhu vari kugadzirira kuda kutora matomhu kubva kuna Va Mugabe kana vachinge vazobva pachigaro. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuna Va Kasukuwuere, Va Moyo pamwe naVaChombo kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Asi Va Moyo vakaudza BBC mazuva mashoma adarika kuti hazvisi pachena kuti mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmersonMnangagwa, ndivo vachatora matomhu kubva kunaVa Mugabe sezvo vachifanira kuvhoterwa neruzhinji rweZimbabwe vachiti Mnangagwa naVa Phelekezela Mphoko vanhu vakaita zvekudomwa naVa Mugabe kuti vavabatsire basa. Zvichakadai, Va Mliswa vati ku Hurungwe West kwaberekera ingwe sezvo vachiti kwave nemasoja ari kushungurudza vanhu pamberi pesarudzo dze by-election dzichaitwa musi wa 10 Chikumi mudunhu iri. Vatiwo vari mubishi rekuda kukwidza kumatare nyaya yekushungurudzwa kuri kuitwa vanhu ne Zanu PF ku Hurungwe West vachiti Zanu PF inofanira kurambidzwa kukwikwidza musarudzo idzi nepamusana penyaya yemhirizhonga. Zvichakadai, Va Mliswa varumbidza masangano anoshanda akazvimirira akaita se Zimbabwe Peace Project, Election Resource Centre, Zimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights nemamwe ayo ari kushanda muHurungwe West achikurudzira runyararo pamwe nekuti sarudzo dzifambiswe mune zvakanaka.

headline: Vamwe Vashandi veMuzvipatara Vozengurira Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-189 neKuda kweKushaya Ruzivo Rwakakwana
text: Huwandu hwevashandi vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba vari kubayiwa nhomba yeSinopharm yakapihwa Zimbabwe neChina huchiri hushoma zvakanyanya. Kusvika nemusi weMugovera kwange kwabayiwa nhomba vanoshanda muzvipatara zviuru gumi nezvishanu zvine mazana manomwe nevashanu kana kuti 15, 706. Mukuru mubazi rezvehutano anoona nezvekurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 Dr Agness Mahomva vakaudza bepanhau reSunday Mail kuti vamwe vave kutya kubaiwa nhomba nekuda kwemashoko enhema ari kutenderera pamadandemutande akasiyana siyana achikurudzira vanhu kuti vasatambire nhomba iyi. Asi mutungamiri wesangano revakoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnoch Dongo vanoti hapana dzidziso yakakwana nezvenhomba iyi kubva kuhurumende zvopa kuti vamwe vazengurire kubayiwa nhomba. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inotara Mitemo Inoomesera Vanofungidzirwa Kuti Vanozvidza Nyika?
text: Dare remakurukota rakapasisa kuvandudzwa kwechikamu chemutemo weCriminal Law (Codification and Reform) Act, izvo zvinenge zvave kuita kuti ive mhosva kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvishande nenyika dzekunze dzinonzi nehurumende imhandu. Hurumende inoti kushanda nemhandu dzenyika kunorwadziswa vana veZimbabwe pamwe nekusagadzikana kwenyika. Mutemo uyu uchaitawo kuti kuti ive mhosva kuvanhu vanenge varatidzira panguva dzakanangana nemisangano mikuru kana kushanyirwa kwenyika nevekunze. Nyaya dzekuti munhu anoti atochwa kana kupambwa asi pasina humbowo dzinonzi dzinenge dzave kuitawo kuti munhu asungwe nekutongwa. Zvinonzi mutemo uripo iye zvino hauite kuti munhu asungwe nemhosva yekushoropodza nyika yake achishanda nenyika dzekunze. Izvo zvakaziviswa neChipiri manheru negurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvagwa, mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota. Asi gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, uye vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, avo vanopomerwawo nevamwe veZanu PF nehurumende mhosva yekukurudzira zvirango, vanoti zvaitwa nedare remakurukota izvi ndezvemugotsi matsuro. VaMavhinga vanoti kudzika mitemo inoomesera zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe hakusi iko kunounza budiriro munyika. No media source currently available

headline: WFP Yowedzera Kubatsira Zimbabwe Mushure Mekunge VaMugabe Vati Nzara Yapfunya Chisero muNyika
text: Mutauriri wesangano reWorld Food Programme kuchamhembe kweAfrica VaDavid Orr vanoti mashoko emutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe ekuti Zimbabwe inyika iri parumananzombe kana kuti state of disaster panyaya yechikafu ave kureva kuti vave kusimbisa mabasa ekutsvaga mari yekubatsira vanhu vemuZimbabwe. WFP yainge yati ichabatsira vanhu vanopfuura zviuru mazana masere munyika asi inogona kuwedzerwa huwandu uhu. Payakati inoda kubatsira vanhu ava zvainzi vanhu vanosvika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mashanu ndivo vaida chikafu munyika asi ikozvino vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mana. Mukuru weChristian Care, rimwe sangano rinobatsira nechikafu richishanda neWFP, Reverend Stanlus Chatikobo vanoti nzara yapfunya chisero munyika uye kuwana zvekudya kuri kunetsa. VaChatikobo vati kana vawana mari vanobatsira vanhu nemadhora gumi pamunhu mumhuri. Vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni makumi matatu kusanganisa kuSouth Africa kusingawanzopihwe chikafu vanonzi vakatarisana nenzara inotyisa kudunhu rekuchamhembe kweAfrica. No media source currently available

headline: Komisheni Inoona neZvekuregerana Yoita Misangano Yakakosha muHarare
text: Mutauriri wekomisheni inoona nezvekuregererana yeNational Truth and Reconciliation VaObert Gutu vanoti muhurongwa hwavo hwekutenderera mumatunhu, nemusi weChipiri vanenge vari kutarisira kuita misangano muHarare. Vanoti vachaita misangano negurukota rinoona nezvedunhu reHarare VaOliver Chidawu. Meya weHarare VaStewart Mtizwa, vakuru vemapurisa uye vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika kuti vatsvage nzira dzekuyedza kuunza runyararo muHarare nguva dzose. VaGutu vari kuenderera havo mberi nebasa sakomishina kunyangwe hazvo sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Human Rights Association rakavaendesa kudare repamusoro richiti vanofanira kusiya basa nekuti kudomwa kwavo nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kutyora bumbiro remitemo sezvo vanonzi vakabuda pachena vachiti inhengo yeZanu-PF. Komisheni iyi pamutemo inoda vanhu vakazvimirira. VaGutu kunyangwe vakaenda kuState House vachiti vave nhengo yeZanu-PF vanoti havana kumbova nhengo yebato iri zviri pamutemo. Vanoti vanokwanisa kuita basa vakazvimirira pasina kurerekera rimwe bato. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi vekuMabhanga Voramba Mihoro yeMadhora eMunyika
text: Vashandi vemumabhanga vanonzi vave kuramba mihoro iri mumadhora emunyika vachiti haina chaichatenga sezvo zvinhu zvizhinji munyika zvave kutengeswa nemari yekunze. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vashandi vemumabhanga reZimbabwe Banks and Allied Workers Union, ZIBAWU, VaTwanda Mutemi, vanoti vashandi vemumabhanga vari kuda kuti mihoro yavo inge iri mumadhora ekuAmerica, uye idzoserwe pamari dzavaitambira mua 2018 apo mushandi wepasi aitambira madhora mazana mapfumbamwe ($900.00) ekuAmerica pamwedzi. VaMutemi vanoti vashandirwi vari kuda kuramba vakamira pachisungo chakaitwa muna 2011 chekuti mihoro inowedzerwa chete pachishandiswa inflation yegore rinenge richangobva kupera, icho vanoti hachichabatsira pachitariswa mamiriro aita nyaya dzehupfumi. Vanotiwo nhaurirano nevashandirwi dzakapedzisira kuitwa gore rapera uye nyaya yavo yatove pamberi pebazi rezvevashandi nemabasa nekuda kwekusawirirana kuripo. Studio 7 yaedza kubata mutungamiri wesangano revashandirwi reBank Employers Association of Zimbabwe, VaSimba Makombera, asi vanga vasati vapindura mibvunzo yedu pataenda pamhepo. Asi VaMutemi vanoti vashandi vachatora hondo yavo vachienda nayo kumabhanga akasiyanasiyana vachiratidzira ikoko kusvika zvichemo zvavo zvanzwikwa. No media source currently available

headline: Mauto Anoti Agadzirira Kudzokera kuMakamba Avo Sezvo Apedza Basa
text: Mumwe mukuru wemauto Major-General Douglas Nyikayaramba vanoti mauto akwanisa kuunza runyararo mushure mekuratidzira kune mhirizhonga mukati nekudaro vagadzirira kudzokera kumakamba avo kana mapurisa ati haachadi rubatsiro. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare nezuro, VaNyikayaramba vakati mauto achaita ongororo yezvavari kupomerwa zvekutyora kodzero dzevanhu asi vakati pane vanhu vakaba pfuti nehembe dzemauto vakanobata madzimai chibharo nekupfura vanhu. Nyaya yekuti mauto ari kushungurudza vanhu iyi imwe nyaya yakapa kuti bato guru rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa rirambe kuita hurukuro nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nezuro. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemutauriri weNPF VaJealousy Mawarire vanoti hakuna nhaurirano dzingaitwa mauto achirura mudzimba dzevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa, Vasori neVeChidiki veZanu-PF Vobatana Kumisa VaNgarivhume Kubvisa Marara kuMbare
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reTransform Zimbabwe VaJacob Ngarivhume vanoti nemusi weChina vakarambidzwa zvekare nevasori, mapurisa nevechidiki vebato reZanu-PF kubvisa marara kuMatapi, Mbare. VaNgarivhume vakambochengetedzwa zvekare nemapurisa ekuMbare . Vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti mapurisa akati vanofanira kutanga vavakumbira mvumo. Nzvimbo yeMbare sedzimwe nzvimbo dzakawanda mumaguta amazhinji haisi kutakurwa marara sezvo makanzuru ari kuchema chema kuti haana mari achitiwo vanhu havasi kubhadhara mari dzemitero pamwedzi. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemukati menyika VaKazembe Kazembe kana revasori VaOwen Ncube vanzi vange vari mudare reparamende nemimwe misangano. Tatumirawo mubvunzo kumukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muZanu- PF VaTafadzwa Mugwadi asi vange vasati vapindura pataenda pamhepo. No media source currently available

headline: Doctor Dzamara Vanombochengetedzwa neMapurisa Pamusoro peKuramwa Mabasa Kwakaitika muNyika
text: Doctor Patson Dzamara vanoti vambobvunzurudzwa nemapurisa edivi reLaw and Order epaHarare Central Police Station pamusoro pekuramwa mabasa nekuratidzira kwakaitika munyika nemusi weChitatu. Doctor Dzamara vanoti vanga vaenda pakamba yemapurisa iyi vachida kunopa chikafu kune vamwe vavo vakasungwa mukuratidzira kwakaitika nemusi weMuvhuro, apo vaonekwa nematikitivha mana vave kubuda kubva mukamba iyi. “Saka pavandiona vabva vandishevedza vachibva vanditi vanga vachitonditsvaga nemhosva yekukurudzira vanhu kuti vapandukire hurumende. “Saka vabva vati mumwe wangu wandanga ndinaye aende zvake vachibva vapinda neni mune imwe hofisi,” Doctor Dzamara vanodaro. Vanoti vave muhofisi umu vabvunzurudzwa nezvechinangwa chavo, zvavachaita mune remangwana uyewo kuti vane pfuti here. Vanoti mapurisa avaudzawo kuti ari kutsvagawo Pastor Evan Mawarire pamusoro penyaya imwecheteyo. Asi vanoti vazoregwa kwapera nguva inodarika awa rimwe vasina mhosva yavapomerwa. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vomanikidzwa Kutenga Hupfu neZvitupa
text: Vamwe vagari vemuChinhoyi vanoti havasi kufara nedanho rakatorwa nevamwe vanotengesa hupfu rekuti munhu aburitse chitupa chake kuti atenge hupfu. Zvitoro zvakaita seN. Richards, Gain Wholesale neOK Zimbabwe zvave kutengesera hupfu kune munhu anenge ayine chitupa chete. Danho iri riri kushorwa nevakawanda avo vari kuti zvinosiya vanhu vakawanda vasina zvitupa vachifa nenzara. Mumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi VaBasildon Kanonge vanoti zvekudya ikodzero yemunhu nekudaro haafanirwe kutadza kudya nekuti haana chitupa. Izvi zvatsigirwa naVaIsrael Nyandoro avo vanoti vanhu vakawanda havasikupihwa zvitupa kwamudzviti zvichinzi havana mapepa anogadzira zvitupa. Asi vamwe vakaita saAmai Cornilia Matekenya vanoti kutenga hupfu munhu aburitsa chitupa zviri kuita kuti hupfu hutengwe nevanhu vakawanda uye zvinoderedza huori. VaDesire Mapfumo vanoti zvose zviri kuitika zvinoreva kuti chikafu chishoma munyika nekudaro hurumende inofanirwa kuunza hupfu hwakawanda kuvanhu. Mukuru wechitoro cheN. Richards VaJohn Matikiti vanoti vari kuti munhu anoda hupfu anofanirwa kuuya nechitupa kuti vazvichenure kana vazobvunzwa kuti vakatengesera ani hupfu. Hupfu hweRoller Meal uhwo hwavekutengwa nemadhora makumi manomwe emabhondi kana RTGS sezvo vanohugaya vachipihwa mari nehurumende huri kunetsa munyika yose. Hurumende iri kufungawo kupa vanhu vanoshaiwa makuponi ekutenga hupfu senzira yekupedza huori munyaya dzezve kugaya nekutengeswa kwehupfu. Vamwe vanhu vari kupomerwa mhosva yekutanga hupfu muzvitoro nemari iri pasi vonoutengesa nemutengo wepamusoro pamukoto. World Food Programme inoti vanhu vanoda kusvika mamiriyoni masere vakatarisana nenzara inotyisa munyika uye vanoda kupihwa chikafu nechimbi chimbi. Izvi zvinonzi nesangano iri zvakakonzerwa nekusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura uye mitemo yehurumende iri kungovandudzwa chero nguva. No media source currently available

headline: TIMB Inovhara Misika yeFodya Ichifara, Asi Varimi Vachisara Vakasuwa
text: Tobacco Industries Marketing Board (TIMB) inoti mwaka wekutengesa fodya wakabudiria gore rino zvisinei kuti kwaive nedenda reCovid-19. Asi varimi vanoti havasi kufara sezvo vasina kuona kukosha kwefodya yavo nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakasiyana siyana. Vachitaura neStudio7 mushure mekuvharwa kwemisika yefodya, mukuru weTIMB, VaMeanwell Gudu, vati zvange zvakaoma kutengesa fodya panguva yeCovid -19. Vati vakarasikirwa nevarimi, vatengi vefodya nevamwe vanoshanda muindasitiri asi vakati mwaka wakafamba zvakanaka chose. Vatiwo denda iri rakavavhura meso vachiti rakaita kuti vavhure misika yekutengesa fodya kunzvimbo dzakaita seKaroi neMarondera, uko vati kwakatengwa zvikamu makumi mana nechimwe zvefodya yese gore rino. Asi varimi vaudza Studio 7 havana kufara nemitengo yefodya, mabatirwo avaitiwa kumisika nezvimwe. Mumwe murimi asina kudomwa nezita audza Studio 7 kuti anogona kusarima fodya nekuti haasi kugutsikana nemamabitirwo aakaitwa. Mukuru weZimbabwe Farmers Union, VaPaul Zakariya, vati ichokwadi kuti varimi vakatarisana nematambudziko akawanda anosanganisira kutorerwa fodya yavo nemakoronyera aivapa mari shomanana achizonotengesa fodya iyi kumisika nemari yepamusoro. VaZakariya vatiwo rimwe dambudziko guru rakatarisana nevarimi nderekuti vaya vanobatsirwa nemakambani nezvekurimisa kana kuti, Contract Farming, havana chavanobura sezvo vachizobatirwa mari yakawanda kana kupetwa kaviri pane mitengo yezvinhu zvavanenge vapihwa. Zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe nezvinomwekubva muzana zvefodya yese inorimwa munyika zvinoitwa pasi peContract Farming iyo inotsigrwa nemakambani ekunze kwenyika. VaZakariya vati mambani ekunze aya anodzvinyira varimi. Asi VaGudu vati Contract Farming ndiyo nzira yave kushandiswa pasi rose uye hapana chitsotsi chinoitika apa. VaGudu naVaZakariya vanobvumirana kuti hurumende inofanira kutsigira mabasa ekurimwa kwefodya pachishandisa makambani akaita seAgricultural Finance Corporation kuitira kuti mari inowanikwa pakutengesa fodya isabude munyika yese. Misika yefodya yakavhara nezuro asi fodya yakarimwa pasi peContract Farming icharamba ichitengeswa kwemavhiki anotevera. Kusvika pari zvino patengeswa makirogiramu mamiriyoni zana nemakumi masere nemashanu (185) anokosha mamiriyoni mazana mashanu negumi nemanomwe emadhora ekuAmerica. No media source currently available

headline: Vakuru muHurumende Vozvidza Komiti yeParamende Mushure Mekudaidzwa
text: Munyori wedare remakurukota, Dr Misheck Sibanda, pamwe nemutevedzeri wavo, Dr Ray Ndhukula, varamba neChishanu kumira pamberi pekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemigodhi nemamhando dzemoto kuti vape humbowo maererano nekuti muzvina bhizimisi, VaWicknell Chivhayo, vakapihwa sei tenda yekuvaka gwenya remagetsi ezuva reGwanda National Solar Project. VaChivhayo vakaudza komiti iyi kuti mushure mekunyimwa tenda yegwenya remagetsi iri pakutanga vakanyorera kuvaviri ava negurukota rinoona nezvemanhando dzemoto pamwe neState Procurement Board izvo zvakazoita kuti vapihwe basa rekuvaka gwenya iyi. Mutsamba yavanyorera kuparamende Dr Ndhlukula varamba kuti vakasangana kana kuona tsamba yakabva kuna VaChivhayo uye vati bazi rezvemhando dzemoto ndiro rinofanira kubvunzurudzwa panyaya iyi. Vati havaoni chikonzero chekuti vamire pamberi pekomiti iyi vachiti basa ravo ivo nderekuongorora kuti mapazi ehurumende aita basa rawo nemazvo here. Asi sachagiro vekomiti iyi, VaTemba Mliswa, vati tsamba yaDr Ndhlukula haina basa uye vaviri ava vanofanira kuuya kuzozvichenura pamberi pekomiti yavo. Vati vacharonga zvakare rimwe zuva rekuti vaviri ava vauye kuzopa humbowo. VaMliswa vati komiti yavo yatambira chikumbiro chevaimbove gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto, VaElton Mangoma, chekuti vazozvichenura mushure mekunge vadomwawo panyaya yaVaChivhayo. VaMliswa vati komiti yavo yaita chisungo chekukoka vese vaive makurukota ezvemhando dzemoto nevanyori vebazi iri kubvira pakatanga nyaya yematenda eGwanda National Solar Project kuti vazotsanangura kuti zvakafamba sei. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakazvimirira, VaOwen Dhliwayo vaudza Studio7 kuti zviri kuitwa nevakuru vakuru vehurumende zvekuramba kuenda kuparamende zvinoratidza kuti vachiri kurarama muhurumende yaVaMugabe. VaDhliwayo vati mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanofanira kuona kuti makurukota avo nevashandi vehurumende vachinja maitiro uye vanofanira kuremekedza paramende nekuti inomirira veruzhinji. VaChivhayo vakabhadharwa mamiriyoni mashanu emadhora kuti vavake gwenya remagetsi rekuGwanda asi hapana basa ravakaita izvo zvaita kuti paramende iongorore kuti zvakafambasei kuti vawane basa iri pamwe nekutadza kuriita ivo vakapihwa mari. Masvondo mashoma apfuura gurukota rezvemukati menyika, VaObert Mpofu, vakatsidza kuti havasi kuzomira pamberi pekomiti iyi kuti vape humbowo pamusoro pemangoda ekwaMarange. Komiti iyi iri kuda kuti VaMpofu vape humbowo hwekuti zvinhu zvakafamba sei sezvo vaive gurukota rezvemigodhi panguva inonzi nevaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pakatsakatika mangoda anokosha mabhiriyoni gumi nemashanu emadhora. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Voziya neNzara Sezvo Hurumende Isina Mari yeChikafu Mubhajeti Rayo
text: Kunyange hazvo nyaya yekuwanisa vanhu chikafu iri kodzero yevanhu mubumbiro remitemo yenyika, izvi handizvo zviri kuitika munyika sezvo hurumende isina kuisa mari yakakwana parutivi yekuwanisa vanhu zvekudya mubhajeti ra2016 ramirira kutambirwa nedare reparamende. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kukurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise nyaya yechikafu munyika sezvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kuziya nenzara huri kuramba huchikwira nemamiriro akaita hupfumi uye kunze sezvo mvura isiri kunaya zvakanaka. Sangano reWorld Food Program rinoti vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mashanu vakatarisana nenzara munyika. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi dzinoongorora nyaya dzechikafu dzinoti nemamiriro aita zvinhu mumadhorobha, huwandu uhu hwawedzera zvakanyanya. Vanhu vakawanda vari kutaura neStudio 7 kubva kumatunhu ose enyika vari kugunun’una kuti vave kunonga svosve nemuromo. Masangano anopa rubatsiro ari kutatarika kuwana mari yekubatsira Zimbabwe kuti itengere vanoshaya chikafu uye pave kutotarisirwa kuti hurumende ibatsire vanhu vayo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze vanoshanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe vanoti hurumende iri kungovimba kuti ichabatsirwa nevekunze asi izvi hazvina njere. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaRejoice Ngwenya, avo vanoshanda nesangano reLiberal Solutions, vanoti hurumende yakavhiringidza hurongwa hwekurima. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokundikana Kubatsira Vakaremara kuMasvingo
text: Apo hurumende yakawedzerazve mazuva ekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba kana kuti lockdown, kuitira kurwisa kupararira kwehutachiona hwecoronavirus kana kuti Covid-19, vamwe vakaremara mudunhu reMasvingo vave kuchema chema kuti nzara yapfunya chisero mudzimba dzavo. Vemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevakarema vanoti nhengo dzavo dziri kunonga svosve nemuromo munguva ino yelockdown sezvo dzisisina kana nzira dzekutsvaga raramo dziri mudzimba. Vakawanda vakaremara ava vanorarama nekutengesa mumigwagwa uye nekupemha asi nenyaya yekunzi vagare mudzimba havachakwanisi kuita izvi nekudaro mari yekutenga chikafu yakapera kare. VaHenry Chivhanga, veSangano reDisability Amalgamated Community Trust(DACT) vanoti nenyaya yekushaikwa kwechikafu kune vakaremara, kodzero dzavo dziri kumbunyikidzwa. Vamwe vakaremara ava vanoti vari kusanganawo nemamwe matambudziko akaita sekushaiwa mvura munguva ino, iyo inouya kwenguva pfupi pfupi mudzimba dzavo. Muzvare Nyaradzo Mutande, vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano reInstitute of Community Development Trust, vanoti vakaremara nevanovabatsira vari kushaya zvipfeko zvekudzivirira kutapuriranwa kwechirwee checoronavirus. Vamwe vemasangano aya vanoti rubatsiro ruri kupuwa vamwe nehurumende harusati rwasvika mudunhu reMasvingo nekudaro vari panguva yakaoma. Hurumende yakavimbisa kupa vanhu rubatsiro rwemari inosvika mazana matatu emadhora emabond pamwedzi asi haisati yauya. Gurukota rinoona nezvemagariro akanaka evanhu Muzvinafundo, Paul Mavhima, avo vanga vari mumusangano pavabatwa ne Studio 7 vati vari kubatsira vakaremara munguva ino uye hurongwa uhu hwagara huripo. Mutauriri we Covid-19 Taskforce muMasvingo, VaRogers Irimayi, vatsigira Muzvinafundo Mavhima, vachiti komiti yavo iri kushanda nebazi iri kubatsira vakaremara munguva ino. Asi, Pastor Cover Mugwadi, vesangano, reZimbabwe Disability Advocacy, Empowerment, Rehabilitation and Technology, vanoti hurumende haisi kutaura chokwadi nekuti hapana chavarikuwana mudunhu reMasvingo. Vamwe vazhinji vevakaremara vanoti vari kushushikana kuwana matsamba ekuti vakwanise kufamba kuti vaitewo mabasa vawane chekudya sezvo hurumende yave kutendera vanhu kuti vaitewo mamwe mabasa. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yova Nyika Yekutanga muAfrica Kubaya Vanhu Jekiseni reMushonga weHIV/AIDS
text: Zimbabwe nemusi weChina yakabatana nedzimwe nyika mukucherechedza World Aids Day vanorarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS vachiti pane zvichiri kuda kugadziriswa kuti Zimbabwe izadzise donzvo rekupedza denda iri panozosvika 2030 . Zimbabwe ndiyo nyika yekutanga muAfrica kushandisa mushonga wejekiseni rekudzikisa hukasha hwechirwere cheHIV rinonzi cabotegravir uye nyanzvi dzinoti iri kuita zviri nani kurwisa denda iri kudarika nyika dzakawanda. Dunhu reSADC ndiro rine vanhu vakawanda vane chirwere ichi pasi rose zvikuru muSouth Africa. Vachitaura kumhemberero dzaitwa kuMarondera kuRudhaka Stadium nhasi mukuru weNational Aids Council, Doctor Bernard Madzima vatiwo zvakakosha kuti munhu wese akwanise kuwana rubatsiro kana ane chirwere cheHIV/AIDS vachiti izvi ndizvo zvinobatsira nyika kuti ikwanise kuzadzikisa chiga chekuderedza nekupedza kupararira kwehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS Vachitaura neStudio 7 Amai Martha Tholanah vave nemakore makumi maviri nerimwe vachirarama nehutachiona hweHIV/ AIDS vati Zimbabwe inofanirwa kugadzirisa matambudziko akadai sehurombo nemhirizhonga yekushungurudzwa kwevana vadIko pabonde mukuedza kuzadzikisa tarisiro yekupedza kupararira kwehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS. Amai Tholanah vatiwo mapiritsi anoshandiswa nevanorarama neHIV/AIDS anogona kukonzerawo mamwe matambudziko nekudaro zvakakosha kuti nyika iise zvirongwa zvinoita kuti vanorarama nehutachiona vaongororwe pachena nguva nenguva zvinhu zvakadai sechiropa neitsvo . Mumwezve anorarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS Pastor Maxwell Kapachawo vati kupedza dambudziko rekupararira kwehutachiona zvakakosha kuti nyika igadzirise matambudziko arimunyaya dzezvehutano. Amai Olive Thabeni mukuru werimwe sangano rinoshanda nevanorarama neHIV/AIDS reLife Empowerment Support Organisation vati zvakakosha kuti vanhu vanorarama nechirwere ichi vabatsirwe kudzivirira zvimwe zvirwere zvakadai segomarara rechibereko pachena . Zuva reWorld Aids Day rinocherechedzwa musi wa1Zvita gore negore richishandiswa sezuva rekurangarira avo vakashaya ne kuda kwechirwere cheAIDS pamwe nekuyeuchidzana nezvechirwere ichi. Zuva iri rakatanga kucherechedzwa muna 1988 zvakurudzirwa nesangano rinoona nezvehutano pasi rese reWorld Health Organisation. Dingindira regore rino ririkukurudzira kuti munhu wese anorarama nehutachiona awane kubatsirika zvisinei nechimiro chake. No media source currently available

headline: Zanu PF Inoti Haina Hurongwa hweKuumba Hurumende yeMubatanidzwa neMDC Alliance
text: Munyori wezvemutemo mubato reZanu-PF VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana vanoti parizvino bato ravo harina hurongwa hwekuita hurumende nemubatanidzwa nebato reMDC Alliance rinotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakazivisa kuti mukova wavo hwakavurika kuita nhaurirano naVaChamisa. Asi VaChamisa avo vakarambawo zvehurumende yemubatanidzwa vanoti hakuna munhu kubva kuhurumende kana bato reZanu-PF akauya kuzotaura navo zviri pamutemo nenyaya yenhaurirano. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yozengurira Kudzinga Vashandi Vayo Vasati Vabayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19 seZvayanga Yavimbisa
text: Vashandi vakawanda vehurumende vasati vabaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 neMuvhuro vakaenda kubasa zvisinei nemutemo wechimbi chimbi wehurumende wekuti vange vasati vabayiwa nhomba kusvika musi wa 15 Gumiguru vamire kuenda kubasa vachinziwo havasi kuzotambiriswa mari dzemihoro Gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vanoti hurumende haisi kuzodududza padanho iri kunyangwe ichitambira zvichemo zvevamwe vashandi vasati vabayiwa. Vati vanogara kunzvimbo dzisati dzasvika nhomba vanofanira kunge vabayiwa musi wa 31 Zvita usati wadarika. Vayambira vari kutsika madziro kuti vachadzingwa basa. Asi mutauriri wesangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende reZimbabwe Conferderation of Public Sector Trade Union, VaGibson Mushangu vati hurumende haifanire kuita zano ndega panyaya iyi vachiti havasi kuziviswa kuti zvii zviri kuitwa kuvashandi. VaMushangu vati kunyange hazvo zvakakosha kuti vashandi vabaiwe nhomba kuti vazvidzivirira kubva kuCovid-19, hurumende inofanirawo kukoshesa kuwedzera vashandi mari dzemihoro. Mutungamiriri we Amalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe VaObert Masaraure, vaudza Studio 7 vati kunyangwe hazvo vari kukurudzira nhengo dzavo kuti dzibayiwe nhomba, parizvino vari kukurudzira nhengo dzisina kubayiwa kuti dziende kumabasa vachitiwo hurumende haisi kutarisa zvichemo zvavo. Mutungamiriri weProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pane dzimwe nhengo dzesangano ravo dzisina kuenda asi vakadzikurudzira kuti dziende kubasa mangwana. VaZhou vati pane zvikonzero zvakawanda zviri kuita kuti varairidzi vasabaiwe nhomba. VaZhou vati sekuziva kwavo, varairidzi vanodarika zviuru makumi matatu chete ndivo vega vabaiwa nhomba mbiri uye varairidzi vanodarika zviuru zana havasati vatambo baiwa nhomba yekutanga. Mutauriri mubazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro, vati bazi rehutano ndiro rinoziva kuti varairidzi vangana vakabaiwa nhomba asi vakati zvikamu makumi mapfumbabwe kubva muzana zvevarairidzi vese munyika zviri kuenda kubasa. Sangano guru revashandi reZCTU rakaenda kumatare richiti kumanikidza vashandi kubayiwa nhomba kutyora bumbiro remutemo asi nyaya iyi yakanzi haisi nechimbi chinbi nematare. Hurumende yakaburitsa mutemo wekuti vanhu vabayiwe kuburikidza negwaro rayo kana kuti Government Gazette.

headline: Zimbabwe Human Rights Commission Inoti Zanu-PF Iri Kuita zveMatongerwo eNyika paNyaya yeChikafu
text: Komisheni inoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu yeZimbabwe Human Rights Commision nhasi yazivisa kuti ongororo yayakaita inoratidza kuti vanhu vemapato anopikisa vari kunyimwa chikafu, mbeu nezvekurimisa nevashandi vehurumende pamwe nevatsigiri vebato riri kutonga reZanu PF. Vachizivisa zvakabuda mukuferefeta kwavakaita zvichetevera zvichemo zvakaturwa kukomisheni iyi nevanhu vakawanda kubva kumatunhu eBikita East, Mazowe Central, Muzarabani North neSouth neBuhera North, sachigaro we komisheni iyi, VaElasto Mugwadi vati kunyange hazvo mutungamiriri wenyika vakati hapana munhu anofanira kunyimwa chikafu, vanhu vari kunyimwa nemhaka yekuti havasi nhengo dzebato reZanu PF. VaMugwadi vati zviri kuitwa izvi kutyora kodzero dzevanhu ava pamwe nebumbiro remutemo wenyika. Vati hurumende kuburikidza nebazi revashandi nekuchengetedzwa zvakanaka kwevanhu rinofanira kuona kuti vashandi varo vapa vanhu chikafu vasingaite zverusarura uye vanenge vaita rusarura vanofanira kurangwa. Vati mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police anofanira kushanda asina divi raakarekera uye vati zvinofadza chose kuti mapurisa akaosunga nhengo dzeZanu PF dzakarova mumwe kanzura webato reMDC kuBuhera North panyaya dzechikafu. VaMugwadi vatiwo makanzura nenhengo dzeparamende vanofanira kumirira vanhu vese kwete nhengo dzemapato avo. Vatiwo zvavakawana muongororo yavo zvichapihwa kune vese vane chekuita nazvo nechinangwa chekuti vagadzirise dambudziko iri. Mapato anopikisa, nemasangano anoshanda akazvimiriria agara achitaura kuti chikafu nezvekurimisa zviri kugovewa nerusarura. Vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vachishanda musangano reHuman Rights Watch, VaDehwa Mavhinga, vati Zimbabwe Human Rights Commission yaburitsa pachena rusarura rurukuitika panyaya dzechikafu munyika. Vaenderera mberi vachiti chasara kuti hurumende ichigadzirisa dambudziko iri uye komisheni iyi inofanira kumanikidzira mapurisa kuti aite basa ravo nemazvo. Vamwewo vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu VaVivid Gwede vanoshanda nesangano reZIMRIGHTS vaudza Studio 7 kuti gwaro reZimbabwe Human Rights Commission richaita kuti masabhuku nemadzishe achinje maitiro awo. Gurukota rinoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwevanhu Amai Priscah Mupfumira vakamboramba kuti izvi zviri kuitika vachiti vanenge vaine humbowo vauye nahwo kumahofisi avo. Kana mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakambotaurawo kuti hapana vanofanira kunyimwa chikafu. Asi mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMDC-T VaMorgan Tsvangirai vanoti vatsigiri vavo vari kunyimwa chikafu. Zimbabwe yakatarisana nenzara inotyisa uye pane vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mana varikuda rubatsiro rwechikafu. Chikafu chekubatsira vanhu ava chiri kutengwa nehurumende uye chimwe chirikubva kunyika dzakasiyana siyana dzakaita seAmerica pamwe nemasangano anobatsira akaita se World Food Program. No media source currently available

headline: VaNick Mangwana Vovimbisa Nhepfenyuro Dzakawanda paHurukuro yeVOA neZimbabwe Television Network
text: Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNdabaningi Nick Mangwana, vanoti hurumende ichavandudza mitemo inombunyikidza vatori venhau uye mashandiro avo zvekuti vari kutarisira kuti mukupera kwegore kunenge kwave nedzimwe nhepfunyuro makumi maviri nena. VaMangwana vakataura mashoko aya pachirongwa che Zimbabwe Television Network ichishanda neVoice of America chinonzi Fourth Estate chaive nedingindira rekuti, Mapping Zimbabwe’ Media Landscape nezuro manheru. Vakatiwo vanoda kuti mabasa ekutapwa nekuburitswa kwenhau avandudzwe kuti pave nemakambani akawanda nemaredhiyo, materevhizheni nemapenhau vachiti izvi zvinoita kuti vana vakawanda vanobva muzvikoro zvepamusoro vawane mabasa. Vakatiwo vanoda kuona nhepfenyuro dzemumatunhu dzichivhurwa vachiti izvi zvichabatsirawo kana vasiri mumabasa enhau. VaMangwana vakatiwo izvi zvinobatsira zvikuru mukushambadza nyika pasi rese. Mupepeti wenhau weZim Fact Platform, VaChris Chinaka, vakatiwo vanotambira mashoko ehurumende aya nemufaro. Vachitaurawo pachirongwa ichi, VaChinaka vakati chimwe chave kunetsa munyika inyaya yekuti munhau mave kufambiswa mashoko asiri echokwandi akawanda. Vakati zvino suwisa kuti vazhinji munyika havachina chivimbo nezvinobuda mumapenhau. VaChinaka vakati chakakosha kuti vatapi venhau vanyore nhau sekutaurwa kwadzinenge dzaitwa kwete kuisa pfungwa dzavo. Mutori wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira, Muzvare Grace Mutandwa, akatiwo haafari nemashandire ari kuita vatori venhu munyika achiti mihoro yavo iri pasi izvo ati zvinokanganisa mashandire avo. Vamwe vakataurawo pachirongwa ichi, ndiVaJeoff Nyarota, vakamboita mupepeti wemapepanhau akaita seChronicle neDaily News avo vakati vanoona sekuti mabasa ekutapa nhau aderera munyika uye kuti pane kupokana pakati pevatapi venhau vanoshandira mapepanhau ehurumende neavo vanoshanda vakazvimirira. Mumwe mupepeti mukuru mukambani yeZimpapers, varidzi veZTN, VaWilliam Chikoto, vakati mukaha uyu wakawedzera muna2000 zvichitevera kuumbwa kwebato guru rinopikisa reMDC muna 1999 asi vakati kambani yavo inoedza napose painogona kuita basa nemazvo. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwezvirongwa musangano reMedia Instutitute of Southern Africa, VaNyasha Nyakunu, vakati chikuru chavakatarisira kuona hurumende ichashandura mitemo inombunyikidza vatapi venhau vachiti izvi zvinoita kuti vaite basa ravo nemazvo. Chirongwa ichi chakatepfenyurwawo panhepfuro dzeVoice of America uye VaChinaka vakati mushandirapamwe weVOA neZimpapers wakanaka chose uye unokurudzirwa sezvo uchiratidza pachena kuti Zimbabwe yazvipira kushanda nedzimwe nyika. Aka hakasi kekutanga makambani aya achishanda pamwe sezvo muna Nyamavhuvhu akaita chimwe chirongwa zvakare ichi chakaburitswa pasi rese kusanganisira paVOA nedzimwe nhepfenyuro dzainoshanda nadzo apo pakaitwa gakava rekutanga munyika musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika kunyangwe vamwe vatungamiri vakaita saVaEmmerson Mnangagwa veZanu-PF naVaNelson Chamisa vasina kupinda muhurongwa uhu. No media source currently available

headline: Rtd Lieutenant Gen. Moyo, VaChinamasa naVaMangudya Voyedza Kukwezva VeMabhizimi muAmerica
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika Doctor Sibusiso Moyo vari muNew York umo vari kutungamira chikwata cheZimbabwe kumisangano yakanangana nekuyedza kukwezva vekunze vanoda kutanga mabhizimisi munyika uye kusanganawo nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe. Vari kutarisirwawo kuita misangano nevamwe vakuru vehurumende yeAmerica kuyedza kuumbiridza hukama. VaMoyo vari kufamba nemamwe makurukota anosanganisa gurukota rezvehupfumi vapatrick chinamasa uye gavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe Doctor John Mangudya. VaMangudya vanoti vekunze vanokwanisa kupinda muzimbabwe kuti vatange mabasa munyaya dzezvicherwa uye kurima. Dr Moyo vaudza Studio 7 kuti Zimbabwe yaparura gwara idzva munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye yave kuda vekunze vanouya kuzotanga mabhizimisi munyika. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Inoti Vashandi Vari Kutora Nguva Refu Kuti Vasvike Kumba Vapedza Basa
text: Munyori mukuru wesangano revashandi, reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti vashandi vari kunetsekana zvakanyanya nezvekufambisa zvopa kuti vamwe vasungwe vatadza kubata nguva iri kunzi vanhu vange vave mudzimba. Izvi zviri kuitirwa kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau padandemutande reTwitter, mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistance Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vakati mapurisa ari kuzosimbaradza kuona kuti mitemo yakaturwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pakurwisa denda reCovid-19 yatevedzerwa. Vakatiwo vanhu vanofanira kunge vave mudzimba nenguva dza6:30 manheru kusvika na6:30 mangwanani. VaMnangagwa vakati vanofamba zvisina maturo vachasungwa. VaMoyo vanoti zvave kutorera vamwe vashandi maawa mana kuti vasvike kudzimba dzavo mushure mekupedza basa. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yozeya Mutemo Unobharisa Mazana Mashanu Kune Vanoputira Fodya Paruzhinji
text: Hurongwa hwehurumende hwekuda kudzika mutemo uchakonzera kuti vaputi vefodya vasabvumirwe kuputira paruzhinji hwakonzera mutauro kubva kune veruzhinji munyika. Hurumende ine hurongwa hwekuwunza bhiri kuparamende richange richisungira vaputi vefodya kuti vasaputire fodya pane veruzhinji. Pasi pebhiri iri, munhu anenge abatwa achiputa fodya paruzhinji achange achisungirwa kubhadhara mazana mashanu emadhora semari yefaindi kana kugara mujeri kwemwedzi mitanhatu. Vaputi vefodya vakaita saVaFibion Munhuwa vanogara mumusha weEpworth vanoti havasi kuzofa vakaregedza kuputa fodya kunyangwe mutemo uyu ukadzikwa vachiti vanonzwa parere moyo kana vachinge vaputa fodya. Asi VaNigel Gwekwerere vanoti kuputira fodya paruzhinji kunokanganisa hutano hwevasingapute zvikurusei kuvana nemadzimai akazvitakura nokudaro vanoti vanotambira nemawoko maviri hurongwa hwehurumende uhwu.
