Izvi zvatsinhirwa naVaMalvern Samhembere vanogara mumusha we Kuwadzana muno muHarare. VaSamhembere vanoti hapana chinovaka muviri chinowanikwa mufodya. Amai Gladys Runyowa vanogara mumusha we Greendale vanoti vanhu vasingapute fodya vazhinji vanobata zvirwere zvakanyanya kudarika vanhu vacho vanenge vachiputa fodya. Asi mugari wekubudiriro, VaClayton Ndlela vati zviri kutaurwa nehurumende hazvina musoro sezvo Zimbabwe iri imwe yedzimwe nyika dzinorima fodya yakawanda pasi rose. VaNdlela vanoti Zimbabwe haifanire kutomborima fodya zvachose kana vasingade kuti fodya iputwe. Zvichakadai, VaAlbert Chidhakwa vanoti faindi iri kutaurwa nehurumende yakawandisa kana pakatariswa mari dzemihoro dziri kutambirwa nevanhu vazhinji munyika. Zvataurwa nava chidhakwa zvatsinhirwa naVaTichaona Murandu avo vanogara mumusha weHatcliffe muHarare. VaMurandu vanoti zviri kurongwa nehurumende izvi kuita kwehurumende yapererwa irikuedza kutorera veruzhinji twumari twushoma twunenge twuri muhomwe dzavo. Vanoti kunyangwe hazvo vari munhu asingapute fodya, mari iri kutaurwa nehurumende yakawandisa zvikuru. Zvichakadai, muzvare Faith Musarurwa avo vakakwikwidza musarudzo dzeparamende ku muzarabani vakamirira MDC-T vanoti vari kutambira hurongwa hwehurumende uhwu asi hurumende inofanira kutanga yatara nzvimbo dzinobvumidzwa kuti vanoputa vaputire kwete kungodzika mutemo isati yaongorora zvinhu zvakadai. Makambani anogadzira fodya akatonyorawo pazvipepa zvinenge zvine fodya kuti fodya inogona kukanganisa hutano. Dzimwe nyika dzakawanda pasi rose kusanganisa america hadichabvumidze kuti fodya iputirwe pose-pose. Mukuru anowona nezvezvinodhaka mubazi rezvehutano, amai Dorcas Sithole vakaudza bepanhau reSunday Mail kuti hurumende iri kuedza kudzivirira veruzhinji kuti vasabatwe nezvirwere zvinokonzereswa nefodya vachiti vanhu vakawanda vari kubatwa nezvirwere zvegomarara remumapapu. Amai Sithole vanotiwo bazi ravo rakamirira kupasiswa kwebhiri re national alcohol control policy kuti hurongwa uhwu hutange kushanda. Vanotiwo kudhakwa nekuputa zvakanyanyisa ichange iri mhosva pasi pemutemo uyu kana uchinge wapasiswa. Mutemo uyu uchange uchipawo huwandu hwedoro richabvumidzwa kutengeserwa munhu mumabhawa. Amai Sithole vanotiwo Zimbabwe inofanirwa kuita zvinhu zvakaringana nezvakatarwa nesangano re World Health Organization maererano nekuputwa kwefodya zvichitevera kusaina kwakaitwa ne Zimbabwe muna kurume wegore rino kuve nhengo yebazi re who rinowona nezvekuputwa kwefodya zvine mwero. WHO inoti vanhu mamiriyoni matanhatu vanofa pagore nenyaya yezvirwere zvakanangana nekuputa fodya. No media source currently available

headline: Chirongwa cheKuongorora Mazita Chinotanga neChinono muMasvingo
text: Mudhorobha reMasvingo dzimwe nzvimbo dzanonoka kuvhurwa, mushure mekunge zvikwanisiro zvakita sezvigaro pamwe nemagwaro evavhoti zvanonoka kuendeswako neZEC. Apowo vagari vazhinji vanga vachiuya mumwe mumwe zvichiratidza kuti vazhinji havasi kuziva nezvechirongwa ichi nekuda kwekuti hachina kunyatsoshambadzwa. VaMuranganwa Chanyau, veku Ward 3 muMasvingo vati vaongorora zvinyorwa zvavo, asi basa rambononoka kutanga. “Inspection ndainda ndikaona zita rangu ririmo but patanga process ichifana kutanga na 7 am yanonoka panga pasina ma materials se funirture uye mamwe ma premises anga akavharwa zvichiratidza kuti zvanga zvisina kunyatsorongeka.” Asi vamwe vakaita saVaChrispen Mutyavakuru, vanoti kunyange pambononokwa, chirongwa ichi chakanaka zvikuru uye chazofamba zvakana. “Ndinoona zvinhu zvacho zvakarongeka zvisingambobviri zvekuti dai vanga vashambadzira kuti vanhu vave vanouya vakawanda vachiona mazita akabhukiwa zvakanaka.” VaInnocent Taweni vakurudzira boka reZEC kuti rivandudze zvirongwa zvekushambadza chirongwa ichi vachiti vanga vasingatozivi nezvacho, asi vangosangana nacho vauya pazvitoro kuzobvisa bhabharasi. Zvichakadaro vamwe vanoti chirongwa ichi chatanga chakaneta nekuti vashandi veZEC vakabva kuhurumende vari kuita basa iri vari kushanda vasingafari zvichitevera kudzikiswa kwakaita mari dzavanofanirwa kubhadharwa pazuva. ZEC yakaudza vashandi ava, vazhinji vavo vakaita basa rekunyoresa vavhoti, kuti yave kudzikisa mari kubva pamadhora makumi matatu kusvika pamakumi maviri ichiti yaita izvi nekuda kwekuti hurumende haina mari. Izvi zvinonzi hazvina kufadza vashandi avo vakapika kuti vachashanda zvishoma nezvishona, semumwe mushandi akataura neStudio 7 akaramba kudomwa zita rake. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata mukuru weZEC muMasvingo, VaZex Pudurai kuti vatipewo pfungwa dzavo pane zvaitika. Asi Amai Priscilla Chigumba, vanove sachigaro veZEC, vakabvuma kuti mari yevashandi yakadzikiswa asi hapana zvavaikwanisa kuita nekuti hurumende haina mari. Chirongwa ichi chatanga nhasi nyika yose uye chinopera musi wa 29 Chivabvu. Asi vamwe vanoti chakaramba chichiitwa nechinono uye chisina kuwedzera kushambadzwa, vazhinji vachatadza kuongorora mazita avo kuitira kuti vanenge vasina kunyorwa zvakanaka vakwanise kunyoresa patsva pachirongwa chekunyoresa, icho chakawedzerwawo nzvimbo dzekunyoresera. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoenderera Mberi neKuputsa Zvivakwa muMbare
text: Mapurisa ekanzuru yeHarare akabatana nemapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police nemusi weSvondo akaenderera mberi achiputsa zvivakwa zvavari kuti zvakavakwa zvisiri pamutemo mumusha unogara vazhinji weMbare zvasiya vakawanda vasina pekugara kana pekutengesera kuti vawane kurarama. Vanhu vakawanda vemumusha umo vataura neStudio 7 vanoti havasisina kana pekutangira zvekuti vave kutokumbira masangano anopa rubatsiro kuti vavepewo rubatsiro rwepakugara nekudya. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mudunhu reHarare nenzvimbo dzakapoteredza VaTafadzwa Muguti vaudza Studio 7 kuti parizvino havasi kutaura nevatori venhau uye vachakwanisa kuita izvi kana dare remakutukota ravanoti ndiro rakatora chisungo chekuchenesa maguta raga nemusi wechipiri. Asi mutungamiri werimwe sangano revanotengesa mumigwagwa reVendors Initiative for Social Transformation VaSamuel Wadzai vati vachaendesa VaMuguti kumatare vachiti vari kuzvidza mutongo wedare repamusoro wakati kupwanywa kwezvivakwa kumbomira sezvo kwakaitwa zvisiri pamutemo. No media source currently available

headline: ZESN Inoti Mauto Haafaniri Kushandiswa Munyaya dzeSarudzo
text: Mashoko anonzi akataurwa negurukota rinomirira dunhu reMasvingo, VaJosiah Hungwe, pamwe chete nechipangamazano chemutungamiri wenyika, VaChris Mutsvangwa, ekuti bato riri kutonga reZanu-PF richashandisa mauto mukutsvaga rutsigiro musarudzo dzegore rinouya, ari kushorwa zvikuru neveruzhinji. Mumwe wevari kushoropodza mashoko aya ndisachigaro weZimbabwe Election Support Network, ZESN, VaAndrew Makoni. VaMakoni vanoti zvekushandisa mauto mukutsvaga rutsigiro hazvisi pamutemo, uye pane mimwe mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo inofanirwa kuvandudzwa kana nyika ichida kuita sarudzo dzakachena uye dzisina mutauro gore rinouya. “Kuti sarudzo yegore rinouya iitwe zvakanaka, tinofanira kuve ne voters’ roll itsva, munoziva kuti pane chirongwa cheBVR chirikuitwa nguva ino, chinonzi chingangopamidzirwa mazuva, saka tinofanira kuva tine voters’ roll itsva uyezve tinofanira kuvatagadzirisa mitemo inechokuita nesarudzo uye nemitemo inongombundikidza kodzero dzevanhu,” VaMakoni vanodaro. Vanoti kana vanoita zvematongerwo enyika vaine chido chekugadzirisa zvinhu, nguva yacho ichiripo yekuzvigadzirisa. Panyaya yasachigaro weZimbabwe Election Commission, ZEC, VaMakoni vanoti havasati vanzwa kuti sachigaro uyu achadomwa riini asi vanokuridzira hurumende kuti ikurumidze kuwana sachigaro weZEC vachiti pane basa rakawanda rinofanira kuitwa sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reVashandi kuChamhembe kweAfrica Roshora VaMnangagwa neKusungwa Nhengo dzeZCTU
text: Rimwe sangano revashandi kuchamhembe kweAfrica reSouthern African Trade Union Coordination Council (SATUCC) rashora zvikuru mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nekusungwa kwakaitwa vakuru nenhengo dzesangamo reZimbabwe Conress of Trade Unions kana kuti ZCTU nemusi weChina. VeZCTU ava vaida kuratidzira kusafararira mutero we kubatira vanhu masendi maviri padhora rega rega kana vachitenga zvinhu nekadhi pamari iri pasi pemadhora gumi. Munyori mukuru wesangano iri VaAustin Muneku mumashoko avo kuvatori venhau vashora zvikuru VaMnangagwa avo vati pavakasarudzwa vakavimbisa kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu nevashandi asi havasi kuita saizvozvo. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri waVaMnangagwa VaGeoerge Charamba. Asi munyori mukuru weZCTU VaJaphet Moyo vanoti zviri pachena kuti hapana zvakawanda zvakasiyana pakati pevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe naVaMnangagwa. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Votaura Nhasi Kekutanga kuUnited Nations General Assembly
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nhasi manheru vari kutarisirwa kutaura kekutanga kudare reUnited Nations General Assembly, asi mashoko avo ari kutarisirwa kuti anenge akasiyana zvikuru neaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe avo vainge vaine mbiri yekutuka nyika dzekunze zvikuru America neBritain pamagungano aya. VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kutaura kuti Zimbabwe pasi pehutungamiri hwavo yatora gwara itsva uye kuti vanoda kutanga kudyidzana nedzimwe nyika kwete kukandirana makobvu nematete nenyika dzakabudirira sezvaiitwa naVaMugabe. Asi VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kukurudzira nyika dzakaita seAmerica nedziri musangano reEuropean Union kuti dzibvise zvirango zvakatemerwa ivo nevamwe vakuru vemuhurumende yavo. Asi vamwe vakuru kubva kusangano reAfrican Union vataura neStudio 7 vanoti kubva zvakabviswa VaMugabe pachigaro, nyika dzichiri kubudirira dzarasikirwa nezwi rakasimba raikurudzira kuvandudzwa kwedare reUnited Nations Security Council iro rine nyika shanu chete dzakabudirira. Asi AU yakatambira hayo kubviswa kwaVaMugabe pachigaro nemauto muna Mbudzi gore rapera. Kunyangwe hazvo VaMnangagwa vari kuti Zimbabwe yave kutora rimwe gwara munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, vanopikisa vanoti hapana chanyanya kuchinja sezvo vanopikisa vari kuramba vachibatwa neseri kweruoko vachisungwa nekumbunyikidzwa kodzero dzavo. Mutauriri wemutungamiri weMDC VaNelson Chamisa, Doctor Nkululeko Sibanda vakaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo haricherechedze VaMnangagwa semunhu akakunda musarudzo. Nhasi mangwanani VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwawo kupinda mumusangano wekudzivirira kuroodzwa kwevana vasati vabva zera. Mutungamiri wenyika yeZambia, VaEdgar Lungu vari kutarisirwawo kupinda mumusangano uyu pamwe nechizvarwa cheZimbabwe vari munyarikani weAfrican Union kana kuti Goodwill Ambassador, Amai Nyaradzai Gumbonzvanda avo vanoti Zimbabwe ichazeyiwa nezvayao pamusangano uyu. VaMnangagwa nhasi vari kupindawo mune mumwe wekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cherurindi kana kuti TB. Parizvino Zimbabwe iri kutatarika kuwana mapiritsi eTB zvotyirwa kuti zvichapa kuti denda iri ritonyanya kukomba. Chirwere cheTB chiri kuuraya vanhu vakawanda zvikuru vanorarama neHIV/AIDS. Zvichakadaro, kumucheto wemusangano weUnited Nations General Assembly uyu, VaMnagagwa nezuro vakaita musangano nemunyori mukuru weUnited Nations VaAntonio Guterres, mutungamiri wehurumende yeBelgium VaCharles Michel, uye vatungamiri venyika yeSwitzerland. VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kudzokera kuZimbabwe nemusi weChina.

headline: Musika weFodya Unovhurwa Asi Mitengo Iri Pasi
text: Misika yefodya yavhurwa muHarare mitengo yefodya iri pasi asi hurumende ichiti inotarisira kuti mitengo ichakwira nekufamba kwenguva. Gurukota rinoona nezvekurima, VaPerence Shiri, ndivo vaparura mwaka wekutengesa fodya zviri pamutemo pamusika weTobacco Sales Floor muHarare, uye vati vafara nemutengo kunyange hazvo wange uri pasi. VaShiri vati izvi ndizvo zvinogaroitika mwaka yese sezvo varimi vachitanga kuitengesa foya yemhando yepasi. Bhero rekutanga ratengwa nemadhora mana eku America pakirogiramu kozotiwo bhero repasi ratengwa nemasendi makumi mapfumbabweeku America pakirogiramu rimwe chete. VaShiri vaudza Studio7 kuti zvinofadza kuti misika yefodya yavhura kunyange hazvo paine dambudziko rechirwere cheCoronavirus. Asi mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira varimi vefodya munyika reTobacco Association of Zimbabwe, VaGeorge Seremwe, vaudza Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo misika yavhurwa, havasi kufara nemitengo iripo. VaShiri vatiwo kunyange hazvo paine dzimwe nyika dzakawanda dzinorima fodya pasi rese, Zimbabwe ine mbiri yekurima fodya yemhando yepamusoro uye inokwikwidzana neBrazil chete pasi rese. VaShiri vati kurimwa kwefodya kuri kusimukira zvakanyanya munyika uye ishuviro yavo kuti dai vanorima zvimwe zvirimwa vadzidza kubva kuvarimi vefodya. Vatiwo kunyange hazvo Coronavirus yakavhiringa hupfumi hwenyika dzinotenga fodya kubva kuZimbabwe dzakaita seChina, hazvisati zvave pachena kuti, izvi zvichakakanganisa kutengwa kwefodya yeZimbabwe here VaShiri vatiwo vati hurumende inoda kuti varimi vatevedze marimirwo anoitwa kufodya pakurimwa zvimwe zvirimwa zvakaita sechibage, nembanje dzinioshandiswa kurapa dzakaita seHemp neCannabis. Sachigaro vebhodi remakambani yehurumende inoona nezvekutengeswa kwefodya, yeTobacco Industries Marketing Board, TIMB, VaPat Devenish, vati misika yefodya ingadai yakavhurwa mwedzi wapfuura asi izvi zvakatadziswa nekuda kweCoronavirus. Vatiwo mwaka uno zvinhu hazvisi kufambiswa semamazuva ose nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 uye mwaka uno varimi havasi kubvumidzwa kupinda mumisika uye vachange vaine vanhu vanovamiririra. Mumisika mange muine vatengi chete nevanhu vashomanana uye vanhu vese vange vari pamusika vange vakapfeka maMask, vachigeza maoko nekuita zvese zvinofanirwa kuitwa pakudzivirira Coronavirus. VaDevenish vazivisawo kuti huwandu hwevarimi vefodya hwakadzikira gore rino nezvikamu guni nezvinomwe kubva muzana. Vatiwo varimi vachange vachibhadharwa mari yavo nezvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana ari madhora ekuAmerica, uye imwe yacho iri mari yemuno. No media source currently available

headline: Nhengo dzeMDC-T Dzobatwa neMhosva yeKuponda Mupurisa
text: Nhengo nhatu dzeMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai nemusi weChipiri dzakabatwa nemhosva yekuponda mupurisa mumusha weGlenView muHarare muna 2011. Vachitura mutongo wavo panyaya iyi, mutongi wedare repamusoro, VaChinembiri Bhunu, vawana vanhu vatatu vaine mhosva yekuponda VaMutedza. VaBhunu vati kunyangwe hazvo zvisina kubuda pachena kuti ngana ndiye akapotsera dombo rakatema VaMutedza zvakazokonzera kuti VaMutedza vafe zviri pachena kuti vatsigiri veMDCT ava vaiva nechinangwa nechekuponda sezvo mumwe mufakazi akapa humbowo pakutongwa kwenyaya iyi akati akanzwa mumwe munhu achidaidzira kuti mapurisa arohwe sezvo achidyidzana nebato riri kutonga reZanu PF. Vabatwa nemhosva yekuponda ava ndiVaLast Maengehama avo vaimbova nhengo yekomiti yepamusoro muMDCT, VaTungamirai Madzokere vanove kanzura mukanzuru yeHarare pamwe naMuzvare Yvonne Musarurwa vanove nhengo yeboka revechidiki muMDC-T. VaPhineas Nhatarikwa, avo vanoshanda semutyairi muMDC-T, vabatwa nemhosva yekubatsira Muzvare Musarurwa naVaMadzokere kubva panzvimbo yakaparirwa mhosva iyi mushure mekuvatakura nemotokari pakaitika kurwisana pakati pemapurisa nevechidiki ve MDCT. Vamwe vatatu vanoti VaEdwin Muingiri, VaLazarus Maengehama naVaPaul Rukanda vasunungurwa sezvo zvanzi nedare hapana humbowo hunoratidza kuti vaivepo pakapondwa VaMutedza. VaRukanda vaudza Studio 7 kuti havasi kufara nemutongo waturwa nedare sezvo zviri pachena kuti pari kuitwa zvematongerwo enyika. Pakatanga nyaya iyi, paive nevasungwa makumi maviri nevapfumbamwe asi vamwe makumi maviri nevaviri vakawanikwa vasinawo mhosva pakanzwikwa nyaya iyi. Vanhu ava vaisanganisira VaPaul Madzore avo vaimbove sachigaro kuboka revechidiki muMDCT vasati vabuda mubato iri. Pakutongwa kwenyaya iyi, nhengo dzeMDC-T idzo dzairamba mhosva iyi dzichiti dzaishungurudzwa zvine chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika. Gweta revasungwa ava Amai Beatrice Mtetwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanhu ava vachadzoka kudare nemusi weChina kuti patange kuzeyiwa chirango chavo. Vati kusvika izvi zvaitwa havana zvakawanda zvavakataura nevatori venhau.  No media source currently available

headline: Meya weHarare Oparura Gwaro Rinoburitsa Mamiriro Akaita Guta Iri
text: VaManyenyeni vanoti pane zvinhu zvakawanda zvinofanirwa kugadziriswa nekanzuru yavo kuitira kuti hupenyu hwevagari vemuguta iri huve nani. Meya weguta reHarare, VaBernard Manyenyeni, vaparura neChipiri gwaro remamiriro akaita zvinhu muguta iri. VaManyenyeni vanoti pane zvinhu zvakawanda zvinofanirwa kugadziriswa nekanzuru yavo kuitira kuti hupenyu hwevagari vemuguta iri huve nani. VaManyenyeni vanoti shuwiro yavo ndeyekuti zvinhu zvigadzirike muguta iri kuitira kuti vagari vavimbike nekanzuru. VaManyenyeni vanoti vachayedza kushandura mafambisirwo ari kuitwa zvinhu mukanzuru kusanganisira mafambisirwo emari dzinobhadharwa nevagari kuitira kuti guta re Harare richishandise mari zvine hungwaru. "Zvakakosha kuti tigadzirise zvinhu mukanzuru kuitira kuti vanhu vabhadhare mari dzemitero vakafara kuitira kuti mabasa afambe zvakanaka muguta reHarare," Va Manyenyeni vaudza Studio7. VaManyenyeni vaenderera mberi vachiti vachatarisa mihoro yevashandi vekanzuru vepamusoro kuti vawone kuti mari dzavanotambira dziri kuenderana here nemari dziri kutambirwa nevamwe vashandi vanoita mabasa aya kune dzimwe nzvimbo sezvo veruzhinji vari kushoropodza kanzuru vachiti iri kupa mari kuvashandi vepamusoro asi vane mabasa epasi vachinonga svosve nemuromo. "Zvakakosha kuti mihoro yevashandi vedu vane zvinzvimbo zvepamusoro ienderane nevamwe vanoita mabasa aya kune mamwe makambani. Takambodzikisa mari dzinotambirwa nevamwe vashandi kuti zvienderane nemamiriro emunyika saka ticharamba tichiita izvi kusvika zvinhu zvagadzirisika," Va Manyenyeni vaudza Studio7. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vabatwa neCOVID-19 Munyika Hwave Makumi Matatu neVasere
text: Bazi rezvehutano nekuchengetwa kwakanaka kwevana rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hwakwira kusvika pamakumi matatu nevasere zvichitevera kuwanikwa kwakaitwa munhu mumwe chete aine chirwere ichi muHarare nemusi weChina. Bazi iri razivisawo kuti vafa nechirwere ichi vachiri vana munyika yose, uye vapona kubva kuchirwere ichi vari gumi nevatatu. Izvi zvinobuda panguva iyo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vari kutarisirwa kuzivisa nezvekuti vari kuwedzera mazuva here kana kubvisa mutemo unorambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu, kana kuti lockdown, uyo vakaderedza kuenda pachinhanho chepiri, kana kuti Level 2 masvondo maviri adarika. Mutemo uyu uri kutarisirwa kupera nemusi weSvondo. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica inoti vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose vadarika mamiriyoni mana nemazana mana ezviuru (4.4 million) uye vafa nechirwere ichi vasvika pazviuru mazana matatu nezvitatu nemazana matatu nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe (303 389). Gweta uye vari chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri ku Britain, Doctor Simba Mavaza, vanoti kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemunhu mumwe chete kunoratidza kuti chirwere ichi hachisati chadzika midzi munyika. Dctor Mavaza vanoti izvi zvinogona kunge zviri kukonzerwa nenyaya yekuti vanhu vari kutevedzera kurudziro yekuti vazvichengetedze, kana matanho ari kutorwa nehurumende ekuchengetedza kwavo voga vose vanenge vaponda munyika vachibva kunze. Panyaya yekuti mutungamiri wenyika owedzera here kana kubvisa mazuva ekusafambafamba kwevanhu, Doctor Mavaza vanoti vanofunga kuti VaMnangagwa vachavhura makambani ose uye kubvumidza vanhu kufambafamba sezvo pakatoiswa kare matanho anofanirwa kuteverwa nevemakambani mukuona kuti vashandi vavo vakadzivirirwa kubva kuchirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, Votarisirwa Kukunda Musarudzo?
text: Mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, vari kukwikwidza musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika vakamirira mapato manomwe. Sarudzo iyi iri kuonekwa nevakawanda sesarudzo ichanakidza zvikuru. Mukuru weZimbabwe Democracy Institute, Doctor Pedzisayi Ruhanya, vanoti VaChamisa vane nhoroondo yehutungamiriri kubvira vari mudzidzi. VaRuhanya vanoti kuwaniswa kwaVaChamisa zvigaro zvakasiyana siyana mubato reMDC T pamwe nemumubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance kunoratidza kuti vane hutungamiri hwakanaka. VaRuhanya vanoti nyika zhinji dziri kusarudza vatungamiriri vechidiki. VaRuhanya vanoti kana kukaitwa sarudzo dzejekerere, vanoona VaChamisa vachikunda musarudzo yemutungamiriri wenyika. Imwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, Doctor Bekezela Gumbo, vanoti vanoona VaChamisa vari munhu akanaka kusarudzwa semutungamiri nekuti havana rutsugiro rwemauto semutungamiriri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. VaGumbo vanoti kusava nerutsigiro rwemauto zvinoita kuti vanhu vave vakasununguka munyika. Asiwo VaGumbo vanoti VaChamisa vari kutadza kuumbiridza bato ravo reMDC sezvo vamwe vanhu vaive vari mubato iri vari kupesana naVaChamisa, vamwe vachipinda musarudzo vakazvimirira mushure mekusawirirana nemaitiro aVaChamisa. Gweta huye vari murwiri wekodzero musangano reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti VaChamisa vane chaunga chevatsigiri. Asiwo vanoti dai vari chipangamazano chaVaChamisa, vangadai vakavakurudzira kuenda kunosarudzwa kutungamirira bato kukongiresi pamwe nekuti varemekedze kodzero dzevanhu nekuratidza kuti havadi mhirizhonga. Nhengo yeparamende yeMutare Central, VaInnocent Gonese, vanova nhengo yeMDC vanotiwo hutungamiri hwaVaChamisa hwakanaka zvikuru sezvo vachida ramangwana renyika rakanaka. Sangano ravana chipangamazano reAfrobarometer rakaburitsa gwaro mwedzi wapera richiti dai sarudzo dzakaitwa munguva yarakaita tsvakiridzo, VaMnangagwa vangadai vakakunda musarudzo iyi, asi zvisina mutsindo, zvaizoita kuti paitwe imwe sarudzo, kana kuti run off, pakati paVaChamisa naVaMnangagwa. Asi veruzhinji vanoti zviri pachena kuti sarudzo dzikaitwa nemazvo, VaChamisa vanogona kukunda VaMnangagwa. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yovimbisa IMF Kudzikisa Bhajeti reVashandi veHurumende
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vavimbisa sangano rinokweretesa mari pasi rose, re International Monetary Fund, IMF, kuti Zimbabwe ichange yadzikisa mari yebhajeti inobhadharwa vashandi kubva pazvikamu makumi masere nemaviri kubva muzana, kusvika pazvikamu makumi mashanu nezviviri kubva muzana panosvika gore ra 2019. Gurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vavimbisa sangano rinokweretesa mari pasi rose, re International Monetary Fund, IMF, kuti Zimbabwe ichange yadzikisa mari yebhajeti inobhadharwa vashandi kubva pazvikamu makumi masere nezviviri kubva muzana, kusvika pazvikamu makumi mashanu nezviviri kubva muzana panosvika gore ra 2019. VaChinamasa vange vachitaura muHarare nemusi weChitatu vaine vakuru vechikwata cheIMF chiri munyika kubva musi wa 24 Kukadzi kusvika musi wa 11 Kurume. Vari kutungamira chikwata ichi, VaDomenico Fanizza, vaudzawo vatori venhau kuti Zimbabwe yakwanisa kuzadzikisa zvimwe zvayakazvitarira kuti inoda kuita mukugadzirisa hupfumi. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, kana iyo IMF yacho, vanotenderana kuti zvimwe zvakavimbiswa neZimbabwe zvekuti ichabhadhara mitero yakaiswa pazvikwereti zvinosvika bhiriyoni imwe chete nemazana masere emamiriyoni emadhora muna Kubvumbi kunyika nemabhanga ekunze, zvichanetsa kuzadzisa. Kutadza kubhadhara zvikwereti ndiko kwapa kuti Zimbabwe isakwereteswa mari neIMF ne World Bank. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paUniversity of Zimbabwe uye vari chipangamazano chehuruemnde, Doctor Gift Mugano, vanoti zvekudzikisa mari inobhadharwa vashandi vehurumende chete hazvina zvazvinobatsira kana hupfumi hwenyika husiri kufamba zvakanaka.

headline: Hurumende Yokwereta Mari Kuti Ibhadhare Vashandi Mabhonasi eGore Rapera
text: Hurumende yave kuyedza kukwereta mari kuburikidza nekutengesa maTreasury Bills kuti ikwanise kubhadhara vashandi vayo mabhonasi. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kuyambira kuti hurumende zvikwereti zvakadai munongedzo wekukundikana munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Gurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vanoti hurumende iri kuda mari inosvika mamiriyoni zana nemakumi masere kubhadhara mabhonasi egore rapera. Uku kuwedzera zvikwereti pabhajeti yegore rapera inosvika mabhiriyoni mana emadhora. VaChinamasa vanoti nyika ine mari inosvika mabhiriyoni maviri kuburikidza nematreasury bills aya. Asi chii chaizvo chinonzi treasury bill? Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa rePeople's Democratic Party, uye vaimbova gurukota rezvemari, VaTendai Biti, vanoti ma treasury bills aya anotengeserwa kumabhanga kunyanya uye anenge ari zvibatiso zvekuti hurumende inenge yatenda kuti ine chikwereti. Asi vamwe vanoti VaChinamasa, avo vakagara vati havana mari, havangazorwe mafuta enguruve yavasina kudya. Vanoti mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, avo vakati vashandi vapihwe mabhonasi kunyangwe pasina mari, ndivo vakaresva. Gurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Prisca Mupfumira, vanoti zvinhu zvakaoma asi vachazadzikisa zvavakavimbisa vashandi. Asi VaBiti vanoti kutadza kuronga kwaVaChinamasa segurukota rezvemari vachiti shiri yakangwara inovaka dendere rayo mvura isati yaturuka. Hurumende dzakawanda pasi rose dzinoshandisawo matreasury bills aya kana dzichida kukwereta mari. Asi VaBiti vanoti matreasury bills aya anokanganisa zvikuru hurongwa hwekugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika kana hurumende ichiita zvekupaza dura nguva dzose. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paUniversity of the Free State, VaCalvin Mdzingiri, vanoti vana veZimbabwe vachasara vasina kana nhaka nenyaya yezvikwereti. Mashoko aya anotsinhirwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vaimbotungamira sangano reZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, VaLuxon Zembe. VaZembe vanotenda kuti hurumende dzinoshandisa matreasury bills asi vachiti hazvidi kubva zvaita mugariro musoro wetsuro kushaya nyanga. Ko chii chingatitwe neZimbabwe kuti isarambe ichikwereta mari? VaMdzingiri vanoti Zimbabwe inotoda kuzvipira kumisa nyaya dzekungoshandisa mari isipo uye kuona kuti yakwezva vekunzwe kuti vatange makambani munyika anozobhadhara mitero inoshandiswa nehurumende. VaBiti vanotenderana nemaonero aya vachiti hurumende inouraya mbeva yodya seyabaya nzou. Zimbabwe ine chimwe chikwereti kunze kwenyika chinodarika mabhiriyoni gumi nerimwe emadhora kumasangano akaita seWorld Bank, IMF, European Investment Bank, African Development Bank nedzimwe nyika. Kutadza kubhadhara chikweri ichi kuri kupa kuti hurumende dzakawanda dzitadze kukweretesa Zimbabwe mari. No media source currently available

headline: Mazuva Odarika Makumi Mana VaDzamara Vasingazivikanwi Kwavari
text: Murwiri wekodzero uye vari mutori wenhau, VaItai Dzamara, nemusi weChina vasvitsa mazuva makumi mana nematanhatu vapambwa, uye mapurisa achinzi akati haana zvitsva zvaati awana zvakasiyana nezvaakazivisa kare. Asi mapurisa anoti ari kuenderera mberi nekutsvaga murwiri wekodzero uyu. Gwaro rakaburitswa neChitatu nesangano remagweta, reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, pamusoro penyaya iyi rinoti gwaro rakasvitswa nemapurisa kudare neMuvhuro svondo rapera rekuzivisa nezvekutsvaga kwawo VaDzamara rakangofanana nezvaakambonyora pekutanga. Sangano iri rinoti gwaro remapurisa iri raive risina hudzamu hwekutsanangudza kuti vari kutsvaga nenzira ipi, uye kuti vakataura nani mukutsvaga kwavo VaDzamara. Dare repamusoro rakapa mutongo wekuti mapurisa azivise nyika paanenge asvika mukutsvaga kwawo VaDzamara pakupera kwemasvondo maviri oga oga. VaDzamara vakapambwa nevarume vasingazivikanwi musi wa 9 Kurume gore rino mumusha weveruzhinji weGlen View muHarare. Kubva zuva iri kusvika pari nhasi, hapana kana ati aziva kuti varipi uye kuti vakapambwa nani. Asi mutauriri webato rinopikisa reMDC T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti vanhu vakaita izvi vasori vari muhurumende yeZanu PF. VaGutu, avo vanoti vari kukurudzira vebato reZanu PF ava kuti varegerere VaDzamara sezvo mhuri yavo yavatarisirawo kuti vadzoke vari vapenyu. Asi nhengo yeZanu PF, VaNick Mangwana, vanoti bato reMD- T harifaniri kumhanyira kupomera mhosva Zanu PF iro risina humbowo, uhwo hunonzi nemapurisa ari kuda kuti akwanise kuwana kuna VaDzamara. VaMangwana vanoti bato raVaGutu harifanire kushandisa mukana wekutsakatika kwaVaDzamara mune zvematongerwo enyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vana Chiremba Vanopinda Muzuva Repiri Vachiramwa Mabasa
text: Vana chiremba vapinda neChina muzuva repiri rekuramwa mabasa. Vana chiremba avo vanoti pamusangano wavaita nebazi rezveutano, hurumende yavimbisa kutambira chinyunyuto chimwe chete chete. Vachitaura neStudio7, mutungamiri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Association, Dr Edgar Munatsi, vati nhengo dzavo zhinji hadzisi pabasa sezvo vakamirira kuti zvichemo zvavo zvigadziriswe nehurumende. VaMunatsivati vanotorwadziwa zvikuru sanachiremba kuti hupenyu hwevanhu huri parumananzombe nekuda kwekuramwa mabasa kwavo uku. Vakurudzira hurumende kuti ikurumidze kugadzirisa zvinyunyuto zvavo. VaMunatsi vatinhengo dzavo dziri kutyityidzirwa nevamwe vakuru vemuzvipatara asi vati mumusangano wavaita nehurumende nhasi, vavimbiswa kuti kuita kwakadai kuchamiswa. Vana chiremba vanoti pahurukuro dzavaita nhasi nehurumende, hurumende yavimbisa kugadzirisa chinyunyuto chimwechete chekuvawanisa mabasa kana vapedza zvidzodzo zvavo zvepamusoro. Pari zvino hurumende yange ichibatirira kuzvitupa zvana chiremba ava kwegore kunyange hazvo hurumende yange isingavapi mabasa. Mubati wehomwe musangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Association, VaInnocent Zano, vati chinangwa chavo ndechekuti hurumende igadzirise zvinyunyuto zvavo zvese, vonyorerana pasi kuti vadzokere kubasa. Pashanyirwa chipatara cheParirenyatwa, vana chiremba vange vakatogara zvavo vachitaura nyaya nguva dzebasa. Studio 7 yatadza kutaura nevarwere sezvo kwange kuchidiwa tsamba kubva kubazi rezveutano . Asi VaBrian Paradza, avo vashanyira hama yavo kuParirenyatwa vakurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise dambudzo iri vakati murwere wavo kubva nezuro haasati awonekwa nachiremba. Bazi rezvautano rabudisa gwaro rekukurudzira vana chiremba kuti vadzokere kumabasa apo zvichemo zvavo zvinenge zvichigadziriswa. Asi MDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai yaburitsa mashoko ichiti haisi kufara nezviri kuitwa nehurumende yeZanu PF iyo iri kuvhiringa hutano hwenyika yese nekutadza kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavana chiremba. No media source currently available

headline: Madzimai eWomen of Dominion International Osendeka Musangano wePagore Nekuda kweCoronavirus
text: Sangano reWomen of Dominion International rinoti harisi kuita musangano waro wepagore gore rino nekuda kwechirwere che coronavirus. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, Pastor Marvelous Ndhlovu, vanoti madzimai anobva munyika dzakasiyanasiyana anga achitarisirwa kusangana ku Los Angeles mudunhu reCalifornia muna Chikumi asi nekuda kwekurudziro yekuti vanhu vasaungana senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwe coronavirus, vaona zvakakosha ] kuti musangano wavo usaitwa. Pastor Ndhlovu vanoti sezvo mamwe madzimai achibva kunze kweAmerica, miganhu yenyika dzakawanda yakavharwa pari zvino zvekuti kana dai zvinhu zvakazogadzikana panenge pasisina nguva yekuti madzimai aya agadzirire. "Ndinoda kutenda Mwari nekuwana mukana wekutsanangura kuti gore rino takaona zvakakodzera kuti tisaita musangano wedu weWomen of Dominion watanga tichifanirwa kuita muna June, June 25 kusvika 28 tiri kuLos Angeles, California. "Saka takazogara sedare takakanzura musangano iwoyo. Gore rino tanga tichi celebrator nine years dzekunge tiri Women of Dominion, kubva patakatanga tichitanga kusangana gore ra2012." Pastor Ndhlovu vanoti chakanyanyoita kuti vakanzure musangano wegore rino zvikonzero zvakati wandeyi, chekutanga chiri chechirwere che coronavirus. "Patakatarisa nekunyatsoongorora, uyezve nekunyanyonzwisisa nezvatiri kunzwa nema forecast takaona kuti izvo musangano iwoyo uchanetsa kuti ubudirire, uye zvinogona kuti strainer isusu vanotungamirira Women of Dominion nevano attender as well. "Dambudzo rekutanga tichiziva kuti tose coronavirus yaka affecter even kubva vanhu kumabasa. Even kuLos Angeles kwatiri kuenda it's one of the cities iri kunzi ichaita ma cases akawanda, saka kuti June tifokasite kuti zvinhu zvinenge zvave nani panguva iyoyo in that city nemaonero edu uye nekunzwa pamweya, hatina kuona kunge zviri zvinhu zvakanga zvakanakira musangano wedu," vanodaro Pastor Ndhlovu. Women of Dominion International yave nemakore mapfumbamwe yaumbwa uye inobatanidza madzimai anobva kuZimbabwe ari munyika dzakasiyanasiyana mukurarama mushoko raMwari. No media source currently available

headline: Dare raMejastiriti Robvumidza Crisis in Zimbabwe Coalition Kuratidzira Mushure Mekumborambidzwa neMapurisa
text: Dare ramejasiatiriti muHarare nemusi weMuvhuro rakatura mutongo wekubvumidza sangano reCrisis In Zimbabwe Coalition kuti riratidzire kusafara kwaro nekunonoka kuri kuitwa nehurumende kuvandudza mitemo inobata sarudzo munyika. Mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti VaLanzini Ncube vakatura mutongo wekuti sangano reCrisis In Zimbabwe Coalition rienderere mberi nehurongwa hwaro hwekuratidzira muHarare neChitatu mushure mekunge sangano iri rarambidzwa nemapurisa kuratidzira richinzi rinozokanganisa runyararo muguta. Mutongi wedare ati kuratidzira uku kuri kuenderere mberi vachiti bumbiro remitemo rinobvumidza vanhu kuratidzira uye mapurisa haafanire kufungidzira kuti vanhu vachapara mhosva ivo vasina chokwadi nazvo. Sangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition rakarambidzwa kufora muHarare nemapurisa mushure mekuvazivisa kuti nhengo dzaro dzichazofora dzichiratidza kusafara kwadzo nekunonoka kuri kuita hurumende kuvandudza mitemo inobata sarudzo. Sangano iri rinoti mitemo yesarudzo inofanira kuvandudzwa kuitira kuti iringane nebumbiro idzva renyika pamwe nezviga zvinobata nyaya dzesarudzo zvakatarwa nesangano renyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica re SADC kana kuti SADC Principles Governing the Conduct of Democratic Elections. Mutauriri weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaThabani Moyo vanoti vafara zvikuru nemutongo waturwa nedare. Zvichakadaro, imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda vakazvimirira VaDavid Nyamanhindi vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kuitwa nemapurisa zvekurambidza misangano izvi zvinhu zvagara zvino zivikanwa kuti ndizvo zvavanoita pose panenge pave kuendwa kusarudzo vachiti mapurisa haafanire kuve nedivi raanorerekera. Zvichakadaro, mutongi wedare uyu audza mapurisa kuti achengetedze nhengo dzeCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition padzichange dzichifora muHarare neChitatu. No media source currently available

headline: Nyakupfura VaPatrick Kombayi Muna 1990, VaChivamba, Vanoshaya
text: Mutevedzeri wasachigaro weZanu-PF mudunhu reMidlands Province, VaKizito Chivamba, avo vange vari nhengo yeparamende inomirira Chiwundura, vakashaya kuchipatara cheGweru nemusi weChitatu. VaChivamba vakatanga kuva nhengo yeZanu muna 1972 uye vanoti vainge vari mujibha kubva muna 1977 kusvika muna 1979. Vange vari nhengo yeparamende kubva muna 2008. Mufi anonzi ange arwara kwenguva yakareba. Kunyange hazvo veZanu-PF mudunhu iri vari kuchema vachiti vaive gamba, vamwe vanopikisa vanoti nyaya yavo yekupfura muchakabvu Patrick Kombayi vachibatsirana naVaElias Kanengoni musori, avo vakaitwa gamba renyika munongedzo wekuti muZimbabwe hamuna hutongo hwejekerere. Muna 1990 munguva yesarudzo, VaChivamba naVaKanengoni vakapfura VaKombayi vainge vari kubato reZimbabwe Unity Movement. VaKombayi vaikwikwidzana nevaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika mushakabvu Simon Muzenda kuGweru. Dare repamusoro soro rakavatongera kugara mujeri kwemakore manomwe asi mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakabva vavaregerera vachishandisa masimba avo semutungamiri wenyika. Munguva yehondo yeChimurenga, VaKombayi vaibatsira zvikuru varwiri verusununguko vainge vari kuZambia. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaDewa Mavhinga, avo vanoshanda nesangano reHuman Rights Watch, vanoti tsika yehurumende yeZanu-PF yekuregerera vanotyora kodzero dzevanhu iri kudzosera hutongo hwejekerere kumashure. No media source currently available

headline: Vadzidzi vepaGreat Zimbabwe University Vonyunyuta neKukwidzwa kweMutengo weChikafu
text: Vadzidzi vepachikoro chepamusorosoro che Great Zimbabwe University vochema-chema mushure mekukwidzirwa mitengo yechikafu chavanodya pachikoro nezvikamu zana kubva muzana, izvo vanoti zvichaita kuti vatakatike nenzara. Vachitaura neStudio 7 vadzidzi vazhinji vanoti pamusoro pazvo Chikoro chakavazivisa kuti hachichakwanisi kuti vadye sadza nenyama nekuti yave kudhura, nekudaro vave nemazuva vachidya sadza nebhinzi, mukaka pamwe ne makabheji. Chikoro chakawedzera mari iyi kubva pamadhora mashanu kusvika kumadhora gumi emari yemunyika pandiro yechikafu yoga yoga. Vadzidzi vanoti kazhinji vanodya katatu pazuva izvo zvave kuita kuti mari yechikafu pazuva isvike kumadhora makumi matatu. Vadzidzi ava vanoti mari iyi yakavawandira sezvo vabereki vavo vasiri kukwidzirwawo mari dzemihoro uye vakaomerwawo nehupenyu semunhu wese munyika. Mumwe mudzidzi ada kuzivikanwa nerekuti Bla Petso kuti asazoshungurudzwe nevakuru vechikoro, anoti huwandu hwechikafu mundiro hwakatoderedzwa kunyange vakakwidzirwa mutengo. Vamwewo vana vechikoro vanoti nyaya yechikafu iyi ichakanganisa kudzidza kwavo sezvo mabhuku achinetsa kunzvera munhu kana achinge akarumwa nenzara. Mumwewo mudzidzi ada kudanwa nekunzi Muzvare Sasha Blond, anoti vave kutodya kamwe pazuva nekuti mitengo iyi havaikwanisi. Mutauriri we GZU, VaAnderson Chipatiso, vamanya kuramba kuti havasati vakwidza mitengo yechikafu, asi vati chikoro chavo hachina kusarawo nekuomwerwa nekukwira kuri kuita zvinhu munyika nekudaro vanogona kuzokwidzawo. Asi vadzidzi vanoti chikafu chatokwidzwa kutanga nhasi uye vakatotanga kupuwa zvekudya zvishoma kutanga svondo rapfuura. Mumwe mudzidzi aramba kudomwa nezita rake achityira kuzodzingwa chikoro, anoti mitengo yakatokwidzwa uye vakaziviswa nevanobika kuti havachadyi nenyama. Mutungamiriri we sangano rinomirira vadzidzi pachikoro ichi, reStudent Executive Council (SEC), VaTakudzwa Ngadziore, varamba kutaura neStudio 7 vachiti vanotya kuzoshungurudzwa nevakuru vechikoro. Ukuwo, vadzidzi vakawanda vari kuchema-chema kuti vamiriri vavo havasi kuita basa rekuvamiriria nemazvo vachiti vane rimwe nevakuru vechikoro. Kukwidzwa kwemutengo wechikafu kunouya apo chikoro chakakwidza mari yekudzidza pakavhurwa kotoro yetatu ino, izvo zvakaomera vamwe vadzidzi vanoti vane zvikwereti zvakakura kuchikoro. Zvikoro zvepamusorosoro zvakawanda munyika zvinonzi zviri kunetsekawo kupa vadzidzi chikafu chakakwana nenyaya yekukwira kuri kuramba kuchiita zvinhu munyika, apo hupfumi hwenyika huri kuramba huchienda kumawere. No media source currently available

headline: Zvinhu Zvoita Manyama Amire Nerongo kuChipatara cheMplilo
text: Mukuru wechipatara cheMpilo abvuma kuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka pachipatara ichi zvichitevera danho ravana chiremba vakuru munyika rekukanda mapadza pasi. Mukuru wechipatara cheMpilo VaLeonard Mabande vati pana vana chiremba vadiki makumi mashanu nemumwe vadzingwa basa pachipatara ichi kusvika pari zvino. Chipatara cheMpilo icho chinove ndicho chipatara chikuru chechipiri munyika china vanachiremba mazana maviri nevana uye VaMabande vati kudzingwa kwavana chiremba vadiki kuri kuita kuti zvinhu zviome. Asi vati vari kuedza nepose pavanogona kuti vabatsire varwere vachiti vari kubatsirwawo nemadhokotera echiuto asi havana kukwanisa kutaura kuti vangani. Vamwe varwere vange vachiuya kuzvikamu zvevanorapwa vachibva kumba zveOutpatients neCasualty vange vachidzorerwa kumba nekuda kwekushomeka kwavana chiremba. Mumwe wevanhu vakadai ndiVaJohn Ndlovu avo vati vanonzwa musana asi vaudzwa kunzi vadzokere kumba nekuti pachipatara pange pasina vana chiremba. VaNdlovu vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti hurumende igadzirise zvichemo zvavana chiremba. Pachipatara cheUnited Bulawayo Hospitals pange paine varwerewo vakawanda kuzvikamu zveOutpatients neCasualty uye vamwe vange vachidzokera kumba vasina kukwanisa kuonekwa navana chiremba. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemukuru wechipatara ichi Amai Nonhlanhla Ndlovu sezvo vanzi vange vari mumusangano. Mumwe murume angozvidoma nezita rekuti Sithole ange aine mwana wake uyo ave nenguva achirwara. Ati nekuda kwekusave pabasa kwavana chiremba anomboenda nemwana wake uyu kuzvipatara zvakazvimirira asi ati haangakwanise kuita izvi nguva nenguva. Akurudzirawo kuti hurumende naana chiremba vataurirarane vanzwisisane. Dr Tawanda Zvakada avo vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors’ Association vanoti nhengo dzavo dziri kuti hadzisi kuzotsvaga basa kuhurumende zvekare sezviri kukurudzirwa nebazi rezvehutano. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi neVashandirwi Votambira Bond Notes Zvakasiyana
text: Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, VaJohn Mangudya, nemusi weMuvhuro vakaparura mari yemabond notes iyo iri kutambirwa zvakasiyana siyana munyika. Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, VaJohn Mangudya, nemusi weMuvhuro vakaparura mari yema bond notes iyo iri kutambirwa zvakasiyana siyana munyika. Zimbabwe iri kuda kuyedza zvisati zvamboitwa munhoroondo yenyika dzepasi rino zvekurega kushandisa mari yekune dzimwe kusanganisa dhora rekuAmerica ichishandisa mari yayo. Zimbabwe yakatanga kushandisa mari yekune dzimwe nyika muna 2009 mushure mekunge mari yenyika yashaya simba. Asi ma bond notes akaparurwa aya anenge asina kusvika zvakanaka. Vanoita basa rekuchinja mari vanonzi vatotanga kuitengesa pamukoto. Kuti munhu awane dhora rimwe chete rekuAmerica anoda ma bond notes gumi nematatu, uye kuti awane rand rimwe chete anoda mabond notes gumi. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wesangano reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, VaCallisto Jokonya, vanoti vemabhizimisi vari kutambira mari iyi nemufaro. Panyaya yekuti zviri kuitwa neZimbabwe zvakafanana nekufa uchimuka, sezvo zvisati zvamboitika, VaJokonya vanoti zvinokwanisika. Mutungamiri wesangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailer’s, VaDenford Chimutashu, vanotenderana naVaJokonya vachiti mabond notes ari kurerutsira vanhu vange votadza kutenga zvinhu nekushaya mari. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kuyambira kuti kuparurwa kwemari iyi kuchapawo kuti madhora ekuAmerica ashaike zvichapa kuti zvinhu zvitange kudhura muzvitoro. Vamwe vanoti izvi zvave kutooneka nekunetsa kuri kuita mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. Asi VaChimutashu vanoti mari yekuAmerica yange ichishandiswa zvisizvo uye ikozvino inenge yave kuwanikwa. Asi mutungamiri wesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti sevashandi havasi kutambira kuparurwa kwemari iyi uye vari kuzoratidzira. Imwe nyaya iri kunetsa inyaya yekuti mari yakaparurwa iyi iri pamutemo here. Magweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu uye vemapato anopikisa kusanganisira Zimbabwe People First vakatokwira kumatare vachipikisa kuturwa kwemari iyi. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakashandisa masimba avo vakadzika mutemo unoshanda kwemwedzi mitanhatu kuti vaparure mari itsva iyi. Asi vanokokera bato reMDC-T mudare reparamende, VaInnocent Gonese, vanoti zvakaitwa naVaMugabe hazvisi pamutemo. Ikozvino dare reparamende riri kuenda kuvanhu kunovabvunza nezvekuparurwa kwemari iyi. Asi vamwe vanoti uku kuyeuka bako mvura yanaya. VaGonese vanoti havo zvakakosha kuti vanhu vape pfungwa dzavo kuitira mangwana. Zvinhu muZimbabwe panyaya yemari zvakaita manyama amire nerongo munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti kuti zvinhu zvifambe Zimbabwe inoda kuti igadzirise hupfumi hwayo kwete kuparura mari itsva. Kuti mabond notes achashanda sezviri kuparidzwa nehurumende? Aiwa apa ndipo panonzi navanasorojena totenda maruva tadya chakata. No media source currently available    .

headline: Sangano reFamily Aids Caring Trust Rosvitsa Makore Makumi Matatu
text: Sangano reFamily Aids Caring Trust, FACT rapemberera kusvitsa kwaro makore makumi matatu raumbwa richipa vagari vekwaMutare mukana wekuvhenekwa pachena zvirwere zvakasiyana-siyana zvinosanganisira gomarara, HIV, kuchecheudzwa nezvimwewo. Vanhu vakawanda vemaMutare vafara zvikuru mushure mekubatsirwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzehutano pahurongwa hwekucherechedza mabasa anoitwa neFACT. Mumwe wevabatsirwa ndiAmai Bekiwe Mazuru avo vane gomarara. Amai Mazuru vati vafara nekubatsirwa kwavaita sezvo vasina mari yekuti vavhenekwe zvirwere. Studio 7 yataura nevabatsirwa avo vange vachirumbidza zvaitika izvi. Mumwe mugari wemuguta iri, VaAleck Matega, vafara zvikuru sezvo ivo nemhuri yavo, vabatsirwa pasina muripo. VaSolomon Makina, avo vanoshanda nesangano reFACT, vanoti chiitiko ichi chimwe chezvironga zvavari kuita mumatunhu akawanda munyika. Sangano reFACT rakatanga kwaMutare ndokuzopinda mumatunhu anoti Masvingo, Midlands, Mashonaland East neMashonaland Central. Chirongwa cheFACT, icho chapoindwa nevanhu vanosvika zviuru zviviri, change chichitsigirwa nemasangano anoti National Aids Council, UK-Aid, US Aid, Eco-Sure, Nyaradzo Funeral Service nemamwe, uye vaimbi, Killer T, Sir Calaz naHwindi President. No media source currently available

headline: Zvinhu Zvogadzikana Munyika paNyaya yeMitengo Uye Kuwanikwa Kwazvo
text: Sangano ravana chipangamazano munyaya dzehupfumi, reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, rinoti zvinhu zvinenge zvadzokera pazvaive zviri masvondo apera zvichitevera kushaikwa kwezvimwe zvinodiwa nevanhu zuva nezuva, uye kukwira mitengo kwezvimwe. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachishanda nesangano iri, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti ongororo yakaitwa nesangano ravo inoratidza kuti zvinhu zvose zvakaita semafuta ekubikisa nemafuta edzimotokari zvakanga zvave kushaikwa pamisika zvave kuwanikwa, kunyange hazvo vamwe vatengesi vasati vadzikisa mitengo. Mitengo yezvinhu izvi yakanga yakwidzwa zvichitevera kushaikwa kwazvo. Semuenzaniso, mafuta edzimotokari akanga akwira nemasendi matatu parita kubva padhora nemasendi makumi matatu nemana kuenda padhora nemasendi makumi matatu nemanomwe. Mafuta ekubikisa anonzi akanga akwirawo zvakanyanya mune zvitoro zvizhinji. Semuenzaniso, marita maviri emafuta akanga otengeswa nemari iri pakati pemadhora mashanu nemadhora matanhatu, kubva pamadhora matatu nemasendi makumi mashanu. Doctor Chitambara vanoti havaoni mitemo iri kudzikwa nehurumende yekutara mitengo yezvinhu ichibatsira. Asi vanoti dambudziko remari richiri kuenderera mberi kunyange hazvo hurumende iri kuti yakadzika mutemo unosunga vanotengesa mari nevasiri kuisa mari kumabhanga. No media source currently available

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri Kunze kweNyika Zvoumba Homwe Ichabatsira Musarudzo dza2023
text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri munyika dzakasiyana siyana, zvakaumba sangano, reCitizen Action For Change, iro zvinoti rinotsvaka mari yekubatsira panguva yesarudzo dza2023. Mukuru wesangano iri, VaJuma Ulete, vaudza Studio 7 kuti sangano iri rinoda kuona sarudzo dzakachena, naizvozvo mari yavari kuunganidza ichashandiswa mukubatsira kunyoresa vanhu kuti vavhote uye nekuchengetedzwa kwemavhoti panguva yesarudzo. Citizen Action For Change inoti vanhu vaneta nekubirwa kodzero dzavo nguva dzose panoitwa sarudzo naizvozvo vanoda kuona kuti izvi zvinomiswa, vachiti imwe yemari iyi ichashandiswa kubhadhara vanhu vanochengetedza mavhoti kubva panguva inovhota vanhu kusvika pakuverengwa kwawo. “Isusu hatina bato ratinoshandira. Tiri zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe. Chatinoda ndechekuti pave nejekerere. Chido chedu ndechesarudzo yakachena kuti vana veZimbabwe vagosarudza zvavanoda kuti vaenderere mberi,” vanodaro VaUlete. Vakafanobata chigaro chemurongi wemisangano muZanu-PF, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakaudza vatori venhau mwedzi wapera kuti bato ravo rakaisa ziso raro pabato reMDC Alliance kuona kuti hariwani mari inobva kunze kwenyika inozoshandiswa musarudzo muZimbabwe. VaUlete vanoti mari yavari kuunganidza ndeyezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinoda kugadzirisa zvunhu munyika yazvo. Mutaurii weMDC Alliance, Muzvare Fadzai Mahere, vaudza Studio 7 kuti nyaya iyi iri kuitwa nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvine kodzero yekuita izvi naizvozvo hapana mutemo unovatadzisa kuenderera mberi nebasa ravari kuita iri. No media source currently available

headline: VaChamisa Vanoti VaMnangagwa Vakundikana Kugadzira Nyaya Dzekupambwa kweVanhu muNyika
text: Mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa reMDC Alliance VaNelson Chamisa vanoti mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa havasi kuratidza hutungamiri panyaya iri kupomerwa mapurisa nevasori yekuva nechekuita nekupambwa kwenhengo dzevechidiki nhatu dzebato ravo vachidzokorora kuti zvave kuda kuti United Nations ipindire. Vati vakatonyorera tsamba kuUnited Nations kuti munyika mapindwa naPongwe nekudaro inofanira kuongorora nyaya dzekupambwa kwevanhu. VaChamisa vati VaMnangagwa vawana mikana miviri yekutaura nenyika nezuro kumarinda eHeroes Acre uye neMugovera panyaya yelockdown asi havana kana kutaura nezvekupambwa nekushungurudzwa kwenhengo yeparamende inomiririra Harare West mudare reparamende Muzvare Joanna Mamombe, nemutevedzeri wasachigaro weMDC Youth Assembly Muzvare Cecilia Chimbiri uye mutevedzeri wemurongi wemabasa musangano revechidiki iri, Muzvare Netsai Marova. Vatatu ava vanonzi vakapambwa kuWarren Park vakazowanikwa kuBindura. Gurukota rezvemukati menyika VaKazembe Kazembe vanoti vakakumbira mukuru wemapurisa VaGodwin Matanga kuti vaongorore nyaya iyi. Vanotiwo vanhu vanofanira kumirira ongororo iyi kwete kutaura zvisina humbowo. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutauriri Asi VaChamisa vanoti havana chivimbo nezviri kuitwa izvi. No media source currently available

headline: Nyaya yeZimbabwe yeKusaremekedza Kodzero dzeVanhu Yotsviriridza kuMusangano weKodzero dzeVanhu weUN Human Rights Council kuGeneva
text: Nyaya yeZimbabwe yekusaremekedza kodzero dzevanhu inonzi yakatsviriridza kumusangano wekodzero dzevanhu wechimakumi mashanu weUnited Nations Human Rights Council uri kuitirwa kuGeneva kuSwitzerland. Zimbabwe inonzi yakatarirwa neUnited Nations kuti izadzise kurudziro dzinosvika mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu neina, 264, asi iyo inonzi yakangotambira kurudziro zana nemakumi maviri nenomwe, 127 chete. Asi gurukota rezvemitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vanonzi vakazivisa musangano uyu kuti nyika yavo yatsigira kurudziro zana nemakumi matanhatu nesere kubva pane zvavakakomekedzwa neUnited Nations. Zimbabwe inonzi iri kutyora kodzero dzevanhu kuburikidza nekumbunyikidza vanhu vanenge vachida kuungana, kusungwa kwevanopikisa pamwe nevanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, uye bhiri rePrivate Voluntary Organisation (PVO) rinonziwo nemamwe masangano ari kupindawo musangano uyu, richambunyikidza mashandiro emasangano akazvimirira. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota VaZiyambi sezvo nhare yavo yanga isiri kudairwa. Mutauriri weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaObert Masaraure, vanoti ichokwadi kuti kodzero dzevanhu dziri kutyorwa uye hurumende haisi kuda kutora matanho ari kukurudzirwa neUnited nations. Asi nhengo yeZanu PF vari gweta, VaSimba Mavaza, vanoti Zimbabwe haimanikidzwe kutambira zviga zvinoityorerawo kodzero yayo senyika. Musangano uyu wakatanga musi wa 13 Chumi uye unopetwa musi wa 06 Chikunguru. No media source currently available No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yosimbaradza Mitemo yeCovid-19 Lockdown
text: Hurumende inoti yadzosa mitemo yose yakashandiswa pakatanga kubuda chirwere cheCovid-19 gore rapera sezvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kuramba vachibatwa pamwe nekufa nechirwere cheCovid 19 huri kuramba huchikwira munyika. Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota ehurumende, gurukota rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakati hurumende yadzosa mirawu yose yekuona kuti vanhu vatevedzera zvose zvinodiwa kuitira kurwisa denda reCovid-19 iro riri kuramba richikura munyika. Vakati vanobatwa nemhosva yekutyora mitemo yakatanga kushandiswa gore rapera, vacharangwa zvakasimba, uye vane mabhizinesi anotyora mitemo iyi, vachatorerwa marezenisi avo. Amai Mutsvangwa vakatiwo pane vanhu vari kurwara nechirwere cheCovid-19 mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu nevapfumbamwe vari muzvipatara zvehurumende, avo vari kushandisa zvikamu makumi maviri nechimwe kubva muzana chenzvimbo dzakachengeterwa kuti dzishandiswe nevarwere veCivid-19 muzvipatara zvehuruymende. Amai Mutsvangwa vakati makurukota ehurumende akatenderera nzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana achiona nzvimbo dziri kusangana nematambudziko anosanganisira zvekushandisa, kushomeka kwevashandi vezvehutano, kushomeka kwemweya unobatsira kufema varwere, kana medical oxygen nezvimwe. Amai Mutsvangwa vakatiwo dare remakurukota rakurudzira kuti bazi rezvemari riwanise nechimbi chimbi mari inoita mamiriyoni mazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu nemasere kana kuti 368 million RTGS kuti ishandiswe mukuona kuti vanhu vatevedzera mitemo yeLockdown Asi munyori anoona nezvehutano muMDC Alliance, uye vakambove gurukorta rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vanoti matambudziko ari kutaurwa nehurumende akagara ariko huye hurumende ingadai yakagadzirisa matambudziko aya. VaMadzorera vanotiwo vanokatyamadzwa nehuwandu hwevarwere veCovid-19 vanonzi vari muzvipatara vachiti zvimwe zvipatara zvakatozara kare nevarwere ava. Zvipatara zvehurumende zvakawanda pamwe nedzimwe nzvimbo dziri kuchengeterwa varwere veCovid-19 dzinonzi hadzina mweya wekubatsira kufema, medical oxygen, varwere veCovid-19 vanenge varwarisa. No media source currently available

headline: Makomishina eZEC neMapato Vodzidza Mafambisirwo eSarudzo kuSouth Africa
text: Sachigaro veZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, Amai Priscilla Chigumba, vari kutungamira chikwata chine vamiriri vemapato ane nhengo mudare reparamende chiri kushanya kuSouth Africa kunodzidza nezvemafambisirwo esarudzo kubva kusangano rinoona nezvesarudzo munyika iyi reIndependent Electoral Commission of South Africa. South Africa iri kugadzirira sarudzo dzayo idzo dzichaitwa musi wa 8 Chivabvu gore rino. Vari kumirira mapato avo vari muchikwata ichi vanoti munyori mukuru weMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaDouglas Mwonzora; munyori wezvemitemo muZanu PF, VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana; mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weMDC inotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe, VaObert Gutu; VaMasango Matambanadzo vebato re National Patriotic Front, VaTemba Mliswa avo vakazvimirira, pamwe nemamwe makomishina eZEC anoti VaQhubani Moyo naVa Utoile Silaigwana. VaGutu vanoti chikwata chavo chadzidza zvakawanda kwazvo kubva kukomisheni yesarudzo yemu South Africa iyi mumazuva maviri avari munyika iyi. Zimbabwe inotarisira kuzoita sarudzo dzayo muna 2013. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kupota Ichizivisa Vanhu Nezve Vanofa Kana Kurwara Vabayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Vaimbove gurukota rinoona nezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa Dr Henry Madzorera vanoti hurumende inofanira kupota ichiburitsa huwandu hwevanhu vanenge varwara kana kufa mushure mekubayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19. VaMadzorera vati izvi zvinopa vanhu chivimbo chekuti vabayiwe nhomba vaine ruzivo rwakakwana nezvavanofanira kutarisira. No media source currently available Izvi zvinotevera mashoko eMedicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe kubepanhau reSunday Mail ekuti vanhu makumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu vakarwa mushure mekubayiwa nhomba uye vamwe vana vakafa. Pane vakafa ava, vanhu vaviri vanonzi vainge vaine zvimwe zvirwere asi chakauraya vamwe vaviri chichiri kuongororwa. Asi mukuru anoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika Dr Agnes Mahomva vati havo vanhu vakawanda vari kufa nechirwere cheCovid-19 havana kubayiwa nhomba. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Youth Development Foundation Trust Yopa Chiedza Kune Vanotambura Kumusha
text: Basa rekubatsira vanoshaya chinhu chinonzi nechimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri mudunhu reTexas muAmerica, Advocate James Bayanai, chiri muropa ravo. Kubva muna 2010, Advocate Bayanai kuburikidza nesangano ravo reZimbabwe Youth Development Foundation Trust, vari kubatsira vana vechikoro pamwe nemhuri dzinoshaya vari mumaruwa muZimbabwe kuburikidza nekuunganidza rubatsiro rwakasiyanasiyana rwunosanganisira mabhuku nezvimwe zvinodiwa mukudzidza. Advocate Bayanai vanoti kubva nguva yavakatanga sangano reZimbabwe Youth Development Foundation Trust iri, vakwanisa kubatsira zvikoro zvakawanda kwazvo zvemunharaunda yeChirumhanzu mudunhu reMidlands pamwe neHurungwe kuMashonaland West. Vanoti kuburikidza nesanganpo ravo, vana vezvikoro zvakawanda vanoitawo makwikwi ezviperengo, kana kuti Spelling Bee Competition, ayo anozoita kuti vanenge vabudirira vazonokwikwidzana nevamwe vana vanobva kunyika dzakasiyanasiyana dzemuAfrica. Mwedzi wapera Advocate Bayanai nesangano ravo vakatambanudza rubatsiro rwavo vachi[inda mumajeri umo vakawanikwa vachipa rubatsiro rwechikafu pamwe ne wheelchair kuvasungwa vekujeri reChikurubi Maximum Security Prison. Vanoti vakaberekerwa kwaChirumhanzu vakadzidza kuzvikoro zveko pamwe neMutasa mumusha weHighfield, vachizodzokera zvakare kwaHama Secondary School kuChirumhanzu kunoita zvidzidzo zvesekendari, pashure vakazoenda kuUniversity of Zimbabwe kwavakanoita zvidzidzo zvehugweta. Muna 2015 Advocate Bayanai vakazobuda muZimbabwe vachienda kuAmerica kunoita zvidzidzo zvavo zvepamusorosoro zvehugweta paTulane University Law School kudunhu New Orleans, vakazonogara kuDallas mudunhu reTexas mushure mekupedza zvidzidzo zvavo. Advocate Bayanai ndemumwe wezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zviri kunze kwenyika zviri kubatsira kusimudzira hupenyu neraramo zvevanhu vari kumusha paine tarisiro yekuvapa ramangwana rakajeka. No media source currently available

headline: Varairidzi veKumaruwa Voyambira Kuramwa Kwavo Mabasa
text: Sangano revarairidzi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, razivisa hurumende neMuvhuro nezvenhengo dzaro dziri kuda kuramwa mabasa pamusoro pekukundikana kwePublic Service Commission kuzivisa mazuva achabhadharwa vashandi vehurumende mabhonasi egore rapera. Munyori mukuru wesangano iri, VaRobson Chere, vanoti vasvitsa gwaro rinopa mazuva gumi nemana kumahofisi emukuru wePublic Service Commission, kugurukota rezvemabasa nevashandi pamwe nekugurukota rezvedzidzo yepasi. VaChere vanoti kukundikana kwavo kunzwa kubva kuhurumende mukati memazuva gumi nemana aya nhengo dzavo dzinozoramwa mabasa. Zvinonziwo masangano anomirira vashandi haasi kuwiriranawo pamatanho ekutora pamusoro pekuti vawedzerwe mihoro, vamwe vachinzi vari kuti hazvibatsire kutora matanho iyo hurumende yacho iri kutotadza kuvabhadhara mabhonasi avo uye mihoro yavo paine nguva. Musangano wakaitwa svondo rapera pakati pevamiriri vevashandi nevamiriri vehurumende pamusoro pemari dzemabhonasi unonzi hauna chawakaburitsa sezvo vashandi vakaramba kutambira zvose zvaive zvaiswa patafura nehurumende. Hurumende inonzi yakati ichadzoka nemhinduro musi wa20 mwedzi unouya, asi mamwe masangano evashandi anoti uku kudakutenga nguva chete kuri kuitwa nehurumende. No media source currently available

headline: Mutongi weDare reHigh Court Anotadza Kupa Mutongo paNyaya yaMuzvare Mamombe naMuzvare Chimbiri
text: Mutongi wedare repamusoro reHigh Court, Justice Tawanda Chitapi, vanonzi vakundikana kupa mutongo wavo pachikumbiro chenhengo mbiri dzeMDC Alliance, Muzvare Joana Mamombe, avo vanova mumiriri weHarare West mudare reNational Assembly, pamwe nemutevedzeri wasachigaro wevechidiki mubato iri, Muzvare Cecilia Chimbiri, chekuti vatongwe vachibva kumba vachinzi varwara nezino. Justice Chitapi vave kutarisirwa kupa mutongo wavo neChitatu. Mutongo uyu waifanirwa kunge wakapiwa svondo rapera, asi VaChitapi vakakundikana zvakare vachiti vakanga vasina kupedza kuugadzira. Mune imwewo nyaya yanga iri kumatare, kutongwa kwevaimbove meya weHarare, VaHerbert Gomba panyaya yavari kupomerwa yekupa mvumo yekutengeswa kwenzvimbo yekuvakira dzimba zviri kunze kwemutemo yaendeswa mberi kumusi wa 26 Chivabvu. Asi VaGomba vari kutarisirwa kudzoka zvakare kudare neChitatu neimwe mhosva zvakare yavari kupomerwa yekutengeswa kwenzvimbo kune mumwe mushandirapamwe muna 2016. Ukuwo, kutongwa kwenhengo yeZanu PF, VaGoodman Tamuona Musariri, avo vaimbove sachigaro vedunhu duku kuMashonaland Central, kwakakundikana kuenderera mberi neMuvhuro kuBindura mushure mekunge vafakazi vakundikana kuenda kudare. VaMusariri, avo vakasungwa muna 2020, vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuzvidza hurumende mushure mekufambisa mashoko pa WhatsApp, ayo anonzi aikurudzira mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga kuti vabvise VaMnangagwa pachigaro. Mutongi wedare anonzi akazoti nyaya idzoke kudare musi wa 12 Chivabvu unove mwedzi uno. Mutauriri wemagweta eZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, anove ari kumirira vasungwa vose ava, VaKumbirai Mafunda, vanoti panyaya yemadzimai eMDC Alliance, semagweta vanzwisisa kuti mutongi arwara nezino uye vane tarisiro yekuti VaChitapi vachabudirira kupa mutongo wavo sezvavavimbisa. VaMafunda vanoti madzimai maviri aya anga akatarisirawo kuti vachapiwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso kuitira kuti vatongwewo Vachibva kudzimba dzavo. Muzvare Mamombe naMuzvare Chimbiri vari kujeri reChikurubi Maximum Prison mushure mekusungwa vachipomerwa mhosva yekutyora mutemo unorambida kuungana senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19 vachinzi vakataura kuvatori venhau panze pedare ramejasitiriti muna Kurume. No media source currently available

headline: Pasi Rose Rinocherechedza Zuva reHutongo hweJekerere, reInternational Democracy Day
text: Zimbabwe neSvondo yakabatana nepasi rose mukucherechedza zuva rehutongo hwejekerere, kana kuti International Day of Democracy. Dingindira regore rino rakanga rakanangana nekuyeuchidza dzihurumende kuti hutongo hwejekere hwakanangana nevanhu. Zimbabwe, sedzimwe nyika dzakawanda mupasi rose, inotarisiswawo mabatiro ainoita kodzero dzevanhu, uye kuti iri kutevera zvakadii hutongo hwejekerere. Dzimwe nyika, zvikuru dzekumawirira, pamwe nezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe, vanopomera hurumende yeZimbabwe mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Izvi zvinonzi ndizvo zvakazosvitsa kuti vamwe vakuru muhurumende yevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe, kusanganisira naivo VaMugabe, vatemerwe zvirango. Vamwe vanotiwo hapana shanduko yati yavepo pasi pehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa, iyo iri kupomerwawo mhosva yekutowedzera kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu ichishandisa mapurisa nemauto. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Human Rights Association, VaOkay Machisa, vanoti kunyange hazvo vaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakabatsira mukusunungura Zimbabwe, matongero avakanga vozoita mumashure akanga afanana nekuti vakanosungirira zvakare nyika pavakanga vasunungura. Vanoti hutongo hwejekerere hunoonekwa nemafambisirwo anenge achiitwa sarudzo munyika, pachitariswa kuti vanhu vari kuvhota murunyararo here, uye kuti zvabuda musarudzo zviri kutambirwa zvakadii. VaMachisa vanoti kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe ichiita sarudzo, zvinozobuda musarudzo idzi zvinowanzopikiswa nemamwe mapato anenge apinda musarudzo idzi, izvo zvinozoita kuti paonekwe sekunge hutongo hwejekerere husiri kuteverwa. Vanotiwo nyaya dzekupambwa kwevanhu vanofungidzirwa kuti vanopikisa nehurumende dzeimwe nyaya inosvibisa hurumende panyaya yehutongo hwejekerere. No media source currently available

headline: Amai Mujuru Vanoparura Bato Ravo Kune Veruzhinji
text: Vachitaura nevatori venhau mu Harare neChipiri, Amai Mujuru vati nhaurirano dzekuwumba mubatanidzwa pakati pemapato anopikisa hurumende yeZanu PF pamberi pesarudzo hadzisati dzavepo. Vaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru, avo vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri webato idzva re Zimbabwe People First, vanoti vakazvipira kushandira kuti hupenyu hweveruzhinji husimukire. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mu Harare neChipiri, Amai Mujuru vati nhaurirano dzekuwumba mubatanidzwa pakati pemapato anopikisa hurumende yeZanu PF pamberi pesarudzo hadzisati dzavepo. Mashoko aAmai Mujuru aya anotevera mashoko anga achibuda mumapepanhau ekuti ekuti nhaurirano idzi dzave pachinhanho chepamusoro. Zvataurwa naAmai Mujuru zvinotsigirawo mashoko akataurwa nemutungamiri weMDC, Va Morgan Tsvangirai, mwedzi wapera ekuti hapana nhaurirano dzati dzaitwa. Va Tsvangirai vanonzi vakaudza vatsigiri vavo kuti pari zvino vanofanira kugadzirira sarudzo dzemuna 2018 sebato kwete kuswerofunga nezvenhaurirano dzisipo. Zvisinei, Amai Mujuru vati vakazvipira kuita nhaurirano nemamwe mapato vaine chinangwa chekunyurura vana veZimbabwe kubva mumadhaka mavari. Vatiwo vanoda kuti mitemo yose ine chekuitwa nekufambiswa kwesarudzo igadziriswe sarudzo itsva dzisati dzaitwa sezvinowanzotaurwawo nemamwe mapato anopikisa. Vati pari zvino bato ravo riri kugadzirira kuti riite kongiresi yaro yekutanga ichasarudzo hutungamiri huchaita basa rekugadzirira kuti bato iri ripinde musarudzo dzemuna 2018. Amai Mujuru vaenderera mberi vachiti Zimbabwe inyika inofanira kudyidzana nedzimwe nyika vachiti kana vachinge vakunda musarudzo dzemuna 2018, vachadzosera nyika mumubatanidzwa weCommonwealth. Zimbabwe yakabuda muCommonwealth mushure mekunge mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vapomerwa mhosva yekubirira musarudzo pamwe nekutyora kodzero dzevanhu izvo zvavasina kutambira. Amai Mujuru vati vari muchiuto havafanire kupindira mune zvematongerwo enyika sezvavari kuita pari zvino uye vati vane hurongwa hwakakomba kwazvo hwekuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika kuitira kuti veruzhinji vawane chouviri kuburikidza nekupedza huori hwavati hwatekeshera muhurumende. Vachipindura mubvunzo wemumwe mutori wenhau wekuti hukama hwavo naVaMugabe hwakamira sei pari zvino, Amai Mujuru vati havana nguva yekuswera vachitaura nezvaVaMugabe vachiti chakakosha kutungamidza zvido zveveruzhinji mberi. Vati havafunge kuti VaMugabe, avo vakasvitsa makore makumi mapfumbamwe nemaviri mwedzi wapera, havararangarire zvimwe zvituko zvavakashandisa vachivatsvinyira. Vatiwo havana mhosva yavakapara ndokusaka pasina kana mupurisa mumwe chete zvake akambovasunga nezvenyaya dzehuori nekuda kuponda VaMugabe dzavaipomerwa pavakazodzingwa muZanu PF. Pavapedza musangano nevatori venhau, Amai Mujuru vawana vakamirirwa nevatsigiri vavo panze pehotera yavanga vachiitira musangano uyu avo vavatambira nemufaro mukuru. Amai Mujuru vaudza vanhu ava kuti vakazvipira kuvashandira uye vashoropodza nyaya dzemhirizhonga ine chekuita nezvematongerwo enyika. Mumwe wevatsigiri vavo, Amai Nester Chikowore, avo vati vanogara muBudiriro, vati vari kufara zvikuru kuti Amai Mujuru vakawumba bato vachiti vanotarisira kuti vachatungamidza zvido zvemadzimai pamberi sezvo ivo Amai Mujuru vari mudzimai pachezvavowo. Zvichakadai, Amai Chikowore vakurudzira kuti Amai Mujuru vashande pamwe nemamwe mapato kuti vabvise hutongi hweZanu PF. Mumwe mutsigiri webato reZimbabwe People First, Muzvare Charlene Kanoshambira, vati vane tarisirowo yekuti kupinda kwaAmai Mujuru mukupikisa hurumende yaVa Mugabe kuchabatsirawo kugadzirisa nyaya yekushayikwa kwemabasa. Amai Mujuru pavaita musangano wavo nevatori venhau, panga paine vanomirira nyika dzekunze nevamwe vari mune zvematongerwo enyika vanosanganisira Va Didymas Mutasa, Va Rugare Gumbo, Va Dzikamai Mavhaire, Va Ibbo Mandaza, Retired Major Kudzai Mbudzi, Va Sylvester Nguni, Va Bright Matonga, Va Pearson Mungofa nevamwe. No media source currently available

headline: America Yokurudzira Zimbabwe Kuremekedza Mitemo neKodzero dzeVanhu
text: America inokurudzira kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe nemapato ese ezvematongerwo enyika varemekedze bumbiro remitemo yenyika, uye kuona kuti mitemo iyi yatevedzerwa. Bazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muAmerica rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru nekushandiswa kwezvematongerwo enyika mukutyora kodzero dzevanhu mushure mesarudzo. Gwaro raburitswa nebazi iri rinoti mhirizhonga nekutyorwa kwemitemo zvinhu zvisingafanirwe kuitwa, uye vose vanopara mhosva vanofanirwa kurangwa nemitemo yenyika. America inoti iri kukurudzira hurumende kuti iite nhaurirano navose vari munyika kuitira kuti hurongwa hwekuvandudza mitemo yesarudzo pamwe nenyaya dzehupfumi zvibudirire. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nesangano reEuropean Union iro ratiwo rikazvipira kutsigira Zimbabwe mukuunza runyararo munyika uye mitemo inofanira kushandiswa mukuchengetedza kodzero dzevanhu nekurwira zvizvarwa zvose pasina rusarura. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu uye vari mukuru wesangano reHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDhewa Mavhinga, vanoti masangano eEuropean Union neAmerica kusanganisira dzimwe nyika dzekunze vanga vakatarisisa mafambisirwo esarudzo senzira yekuona nayo kuti Zimbabwe yazvipira here mukugadzirisa nyaya dzemitemo. VaMavhinga vanoti nyika idzi dziri kuisa mazivo nenzeve paZimbabwe kuitira kuti dzione kana zvava kukodzera kuti dzidyidzane ne Zimbabwe. Vati kurudziro yekuti vatungamiriri vemapato vabatane, vashande pamwechete yakanaka nekuti inoita kuti nyika igadzikane. No media source currently available

headline: Vedzimotokari Vochemachema neKukwira kweMutengo weMafuta eDzimotokari
text: Vamwe vatyairi vedzimotokari vanoti havasi kufara nekukwidzwa kwakaitwa mutengo wemafuta edzimotokari neZimbabwe Energy Regulatory Authority, ZERA, nezuro panguva iyo vakawanda vari kuti hupfumi hwenyika hauna kumira zvakanaka. Zimbabwe Energy Regulatory Authority, kana kuti ZERA, yakazivisa nezuro manheru kuti mutengo wemafuta edzimotokari wakwira nemasendi manomwe ekuAmerica zvaita kuti rita rimwechete repeturu nedhiziri ritengwe nemari inoita dhora rimwe nemasendi makumi mashanu nerimwechete iri mari yekuAmerica, kana kuti $1.51. Mumwe anofamba nemotokari, VaHerbert Zungura vati masendi manomwe awedzerwa nawo mutengo wemafuta imari yakawanda zvikuru kana pakatariswa kuti makambani mazhinji haasi kuwedzera vashandi mari dzemihoro. Muzvare Rhodah Garakasha vatiwo vave kutyira kuti mitengo yezvinhu ichatangawo kukwira zvichaita kuti raramo yeveruzhinji iwome. Mutungamiri wesangano revezvitoro reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers, VaDenford Mutashu, vatiwo kukwira kwemitengo yemafuta uku kwakonzerwawo kekukwira kwemafuta pasi rose. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vachishanda nesangano re Labour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chatambara, vati kurwiswa kuri kuitwa Ukraine nemauto eRussia pamwe nekusimuka kwehupfumi hwenyika dzepasi rose ndiko kuri kukonzera kukwira kwemitengo yemafuta. Hamusi muZimbabwe chete muri kukwidzwa mitengo yemafuta. Mitengo yemafuta iyi iri kukwira munyika dzakawanda pasi rose. Kune mamwe matunhu muAmerica garoni repeturu rinonzi rakwirawo kusvika pamadhora mana nemasendi makumi matanhatu nemanomwe, $4.67, uye mitengo iyi inosiyana zvichienderana nematunhu. South Africa yakakwidzawo mitengo yemafuta svondo rapera zvakaita kuti gurukota rezvemari munyika iyi, VaEnoch Godongwana vazivise pavakaparura bhajeti renyika yavo kuti zvinhu zvakaita sedoro nefodya zvakange zvokwidzwa mitengo. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vanhu Vashanu Vofa neChirwere cheCovid-19 muNyika
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vafa nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwakwira kusvika pagumi nevasere kana kuti 18 mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu vashanu vashaya. Vanhu vatatu vakafa vari munharaunda dzakasiyana siyana vamwe vaviri vakafa vari munzvimbo dzinochengeterwa vanenge vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vaabatwa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizvino vanosvika mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi masere nevashanu kana kuti 985. Izvi zvinotevera kubatwa kwevamwe vanhu vatatu nechirwere ichi nezuro. Pavanhu ava, vaviri vakabva kuSouth Africa uye mumwe akachitapurirwa munyika. Harare ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi vanosvika mazana maviri nemakumi masere nemasere kana kuti 288 ichiteverwa neBulawayo ine vanhu zana nemakumi masere nevatatu 183, Mashonaland Central ndiyo ine vanhu vashoma vabatwa nechirwere ichi vanova gumi nemumwe. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi vanosvika mazana matatu nemakumi maviri kana kuti 320. Vanhu vavhenekwa chirwere ichi munyika vadarika zviuru makumi masere nezvisere kana kuti 88 000. Kunyangwe hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nekufa kwechirwere checoronavirus huri kuramba huchiwedzera, vashandi vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba vave nemazuva makumi maviri nematanhatu vachiramwa mabasa nekuda kwekushomeka kwemari dzavari kutambiriswa. Hatina kukwanisa kubata vakafanobata chigaro chegurukota rezvehutano VaAmon Murwira sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakaudza dare resenate kuti hurumende yakazvipira kuita hurukuro nevashandi vayo vari kuramwa kuita mabasa. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnoch Dongo vanoti vari kusangana Muvhuro uno neveHealth Services Board vanoona nezvemari dzinotamburiswa vashandi vemuzvipatara. No media source currently available

headline: Kambani yeKwese TV Inopihwa Rezenisi Kuti Itepfenyure paDandemutande
text: Sangano reZimbabwe Institute of Southern Africa-Zimbabwe rinoti rinotambira nemufaro kupihwa kwemarezenisi matatu ekutepfenyura padandemutande kuKwese TV neBroadcasting Authority of Zimbabwe asi richiti chinodihwa kusunungura masaisai kuti vanhu vakwanise kutepfenyura mateverevhizheni pamwe nemaredhiyoemumatunhu. Kambani yeEconet, muridzi weKwese TV, yakazivisa neChina kuti yainge yapihwa marezenisi matatu ekutepfeunyura padandemutande. Nhengo yebhodhi remaTrustees eMISA Zimbabwe, VaChris Chinaka, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo vachitambire zvose zvinovandzudza kufambiswa kwemashoko, BAZ haisati yatanga kuburitsa marezenisi avanonyanyoda. Mukuru weMISA Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vati marezenisi apihwa Kwese TV ndeemakambani anoita zvemabhizimisi uye ivo vanoda marezenisi eFrequency Modulation ayo anoita kuti veruzhinji vawane mashoko nemutengo uri pasi. Vatiwo ivo marezenisi apihwa Kwese TV anodhura zvakanyaya sezvo achiita madhora zviuru makumi mashanu pagore uye rezenesi racho rinoti zvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana zvemari inenge yawanikwa nekambani yacho, zviendeswe kuBAZ pagore rega rega. VaMoyo vati chinodiwa kusunungura mitemo yezvekutepfenyura kuti pavhurwe mateverevhizheni nemaredhiyo akawanda munyika. VaChinaka vatiwo zvakakosha kuti hurumende ivandudzwe mabasa enhau nekutepfenyura vachiti izvi ndizvo zvisumudzira mabasa ebudiriro munyika. Vatiwo hurumende haifaniri kuona sekuti iri kuitira vatapi venhau dzvene vachiti ibasa rehurumende kuona kuti vanhu vawana mashoko nenhau dzavanoda. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reEconet panyaya iyi sezvo vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yedu pataenda pamhepo. Hatinawo kunzwa kubva kune vBAZ kuti makambani mangani akanyorera kuti apihwe marezenisi akaita seakapihwa kuKwese TV. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inoti Haichapa Makambani ekuChina Mvumo yeKuchera Marasha kuHwange National Park
text: Dare remakurukota neChipiri rakazivisa kuti harichatenderi makambani maviri ekuChina anoti Afrochine Energy neZimbabwe Zhongxin Coal Mining Group kuchera marasha kuHwange National Park mushure mekunge vanhu vakawanda vagunun’una nezvedanho iri. Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa vakaudza vatori venhau muHarare kuti hurumende haichape makambani aya mvumo yekuchera zviwanikwa mumasango anochengeterwa mhuka. MuHwange mune mhuka dzesango dzakawanda dzinosanganisira nzou, zvipembere, nyati nedzimwe. Mukuru wesangano reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu vanoti hurumende yaita zvakanaka kuteerera vange vachigunun'una nedanho rayo rekuda kuti vekuChina vacehere marasha munzvimbo yakakosha inochenetrwa mhuka dzesango. No media source currently available

headline: Paramende Inoudzwa Kuti Hapana Mutemo Unosungira Vabereki Kutenga Maunifomu Muzvikoro
text: Hurumende inoti zviri kunze kwemutemo kukwidza mari yechikoro nezvikamu zvinodarika makumi maviri kubva muzana pamwe nekumanikidza vabereki kutenga maunifomu pachikoro ichiti vabereki vakasunguka kutenga muzvitoro zvavanoda kana kuzvisonera maunifomu vega. Izvi zvaviswa nevakafanobata chinzvimbo chegurukota rezvedzidzo yepasi, Muzvare Kirsty Coventry, mumashoko avo kuNational Assembly, vachipa zvikonzero zvekuti sei zvimwe zvikoro munyika zviri kufoira zvakanyanya zvokutoshaya kana mwana mumwe zvake anopasa. Muzvare Coventry vati pane zvikonzero zvakawanda zvinonoita kuti vana vafoire zvakaiat sekushomeka kwevarairidzi, kushomekwa kwemabhuku, nekudhura kwemari yechikoro. Vati mari yechikoro iri kudhura zvakanyanyisa zvekuti vabereki vakawanda havakwanisi kubhadhara mari iyi. Muzvare Covenrty vati hakuna chikoro chinofanira kukwidza mari iyi nezvikamu zvinodarika makumi maviri kubva muzana. Vati mari inokwira kudarika apa inenge yave kuda mvumo kubva kubazi ravo. Vatiwo zvikoro zvizhinji munyika zviri kumanikidza vabereki kutenga maunifomu anodhura zvakanyanya muzvikoro uye izvi hazvibvumidzwe. Vatiwo vabereki vakasununguka kutenga maunifomu kwavanoda kana kuzvisonera. Muzvare Coventry vazivisa kuti bazi ravo rinoda kupinza varairidzi zviuru gumi nezvishanu kuti vana vawane varairidzi vakwana muzvikoro. Vati vakapihwa mvumo yekupinza basa varairidzi zviuru zvishanu gore rinouya vachiti izvi hazvikwanisi kupedza dambudziko rekushomeka kwevarairidzi muzvikoro. Sachigaro vekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvedzidzo yepasi, Amai Priscillar Misihairabwi-Mushonga, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vabereki vanobvumirana kukwidza mari dzechikoro mumasangano avo emaSchool Development Association asi vozofamba vachichema chema kuti mari yechikoro yadhura. Vati nekuda kwekuti nyaya iyi inogara ichitaurwa nezvayo asi zvikoro zvisingaterere, paramende yaita chisungo chekuti bazi redzidzo yepasi richaburitsa gwaro rinotaura zvese zvinodiwa richapihwawo kunhengo dzeparamende kuti dzibatsire kuona kuti mutemo watevedzwa. Nhengo dzeparamende dzaratidzawo kusafara nekushomeka kwevarairidzi pamwe nekuti zvikoro zviri kufoira zvakanyanya zviri kumaruwa nematunhu ekuMatabeleland uye kuti varairidzi vanonzi vandoshandira kune nzvimbo dzine mutauro yavasingagone kutaura. Zvimwe zvisinawo kufadza nhengo dzeparamende inyaya yekuti varairidzi vari kupihwa mihoro iri pasi pasi pamwe nekuti vadzidzi havana dzimba dzekudzidzira dzakakodzera zvekuti vamwe vanodzidzira mudzimba dzekugadzirira fodya. Muzvare Coventry vati vachapa zvichemo zvose izvi kugurukota rezvedzidzo yepasi, VaCain Mathema, avo vange vasipo sezvo ivo nemutevedzeri wavo, vatove pazororo. No media source currently available

headline: Komisheni Yakadomwa naVaMnangagwa Yokonzera Mutauro Munyika
text: Vaongorori vezvematongerwo enyika vari kutambira nenzira dzakasiyana siyana komisheni yakaumbwa nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti iongorore zvakaitika nezvekakonzera mhirizhonga yakaitika musi waNyamavhuvhu 1, 2018, iyo yakasiya vanhu vanosvika gumi vafa mushure mekupfurwa nemauto. Komiti iyi ine vanhukadzi vaviri, vanoti Amai Charity Manyeruke, vanova sachigaro wemadzimai eZanu PF kuMashonaland East; Amai Vimbai Nyemba, vanova sachigaro westate procurement regulatory authority of Zimbabwe board; uye varume vashanu vanoti sachigaro veNational Constitutional Assembly, VaLovemore Madhuku; vaimbove munyori mukuru muCommonwealth, VaEmeka Anyaouku vekuNigeria; vakambove mutungamiri weSouth Africa, uye vari sachigaro vekomisheni iyi, VaKgalema Motlanthe, vaimbova mukuru wemauto kuTanzania, VaDavies Mwamunyange; pamwe negweta rin mukurumbira muBritain, VaRodney Dixon. Imwe nyanzvi inodzidzisa paTswane University of Technology muSouth Africa, VaRicky Mukonza, vanoti kana vakatarisa basa rakaitwa nedzimwe nhengo dzekomisheni iyi dzakaita saVaAnyaouku, vanhu havafanire kuvatyira nekuti vane ruzivo rwakakosha zvikuru sezvo vakashanda nenyika dzakawanda pavaive muCommonwealth. VaMukonza vanoti VaDixion vane mukurumbira pasi rose, uye vakamboita muongorori wemhirizhonga yakamboitika ku Sri Lanka. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi dzinoti VaDixon havana kuratidza hany’a nekodzero dzevanhu zvakadzama mugwaro ravo ravakatura pamhirizhonga yakaitika kuSri Lanka. VaMukonza vanotiwo VaMwamunyange vakadomwa sezvo vane ruzivo munyaya dzechiuto, izvo zvichabatsira muongorori yemuZimbabwe sezvo ichabatawo mauto, ayo akapinda mumigwagwa kunge ari muhondo pakaitika mhirizhonga iyi.
