Asi vamwe vanoti VaMwamunyange havangoni kubuda negwaro rinoroverera hurumende yaVaMnangagwa nemhosva, sezvo vaine husahwira naVaMnangagwa pamwe nemutevedzeri wavo, VaConstantino Chiwenga, uhwo hwakatanga munguva yehondo, apo mauto eZanla aidzidziswa mabasa ehondo kuTanzania munguva yehondo yeChimurenga. Mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti VaMnangagwa vakatora danho rakanaka chose, kunyange hazvo pasina chiratidzo chekuti zvichabuda muongororo iyi, zvichaziviswa kumunhu wese. VaMavhinga vanoti ongororo iyi inofanirwa kuitwa muzvikwamu zviviri kuitira kuti veruzhinji vanzwisise zviri mumagwaro achabudiswa nemakomishina aya. Asi VaTrust Matsilele, avo vari kuita zvidzidzo paUniversity of Johannesburg, vanoti vanhu havafanirwe kutarisira zvakanyanya kubva kukomisheni iyi, sezvo iine vanhu vakaita saAmai Manyeruke, avo vari mukomisheni iyi vachimirira zvido zvebato ravo, pamwe nezvemutungamiri wenyika, kwete zvido zveveruzhinji. Nhengo yeZimbabwe Solidarity Forum, VaMunjonzi Mutandiri, vanotiwo VaMnangagwa vakatyora bumbiro remitemo yenyika, zvikuru section 110 subsection 6, iyo inosungira mutungamiri wenyika kuumba komisheni mushure mekuzeya nyaya iyi nedare remakurukota. Komisheni iyi yakagadzwa musi wa 29 Nyamavhuvhu munyika musina dare remakurukota, izvo VaMutandiri vanoti kutyorwa kwebumbiro Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi imwe nhengo yeZanuPF inogara muJohannesburg, VaTongai Hwema, vanoti havaoni chakaipa pakugadzwa kwekomishoni iyi. Vamwe vakataura neStudio7 vanoti kunyange hazvo vachiremekedza VaMadhuku semunhu anotaura zviri pachena asina divi raakarerekera, vanonetsekana nekuva kwavo mukomisheni iyi sezvo vakatobuda pachena vachishora maitiro eMDC Alliance pamhirizhonga iyi. Pavakadoma komisheni yavo, VaMnangagwa vakati komisheni iyi ichatsvagiridza zvakakonzeresa mhirizhonga, kutsvaga vanhu vaive pamberi, chinangwa chavo, uye zvavaishandisa mukuratidzira, kuongorora zvakaitwa nemapurisa mukuchengetedza mitemo nekugadzikana kwenyika, uye kuongorora zvakaita kuti mauto apindire mukubatsira kuchengetedza runyararo. Vakatiwo vanoda kuti simba rakashandiswa nemauto pamhirizhonga iyi riongororwe kuti raikodzera here kushandiswa sezvakaitika musi uyu. Komisheni yaVaMnangagwa haisati yatoreswa mhiko yekuti ichitanga kushanda. No media source currently available

headline: Varwere Votambura Hurumende naVanachiremba Vachinetsana
text: Zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara zvehurumende zvinoshandiswa neveruzhinji vasina mari kuti varapwe. Kusamira zvakanaka uku kwatonyanya kuwedzerwa nekuramwa mabasa kwavana chiremba avo vapinda musvondo retatu vachikanda mapadza pasi. Kunyange hazvo zvipatara zveParirenyatwa Group of Hospitals neHarare Central zvakavhurwa, hapana zvakawanda zviri kuitwa mukubatsira varwere sezvo vanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa. Vari kubatsirwa chete ndevaya vanenge vachirwarisa kana vanenge vapinda mutsaona. Mota dzinotakura vanhu vanorwara, pamwe nedzavanhuwo zvavo, dzanga dzichitaukura varwere kubva pachipatara cheParirenyatwa vachienda kune zvimwe zvipatara. Vatataura navo vanoti vange vari kubvisa hama dzavo sezvo dzisiri kuwana rubatsiro pachipatara ichi. Mumwe wevanhu ava, VaWakefield Mlilo, vanoti ivo nehama dzavo vaburitsa muni’nina wavo muchipatara sezvo asina kumbobvira awona chiremba kubvira paakapinda muchipatara ichi nemusi weChina chapfuura. VaMlilo vanoti vave kuenda nehama yavo kuchipatara che All Souls Mission kwaMtoko. Amai Ruramai Phiri vanogara mumusha weRugare vanoti kubvira pakatanga vanachiremba kurwamwa basa, munzvimbo mavo mafa vanhu vaviri mushure mekushaiwa rubatsiro kubva kuchipata cheHarare Central. VaNesbet Nyoni avo vange vauya kuzoona hama yavo paHarare Hospital vaudza Studio7 kuti zvinosuwisa kuti zvipatara izvi zviri kudzorera varwere kudzimba dzavo vasina kubatsirwa kunyange vaye vanenge vapinda mutsaona. VaNyoni vanoti hurumende ngaigadzirise zvichemo zvana chiremba kuitira kuti zvinhu zvifambe muzvipatara. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaJoseph Murawu, vanoti hurumende inofanira kugadzirisa nyaya dzehuwori kuitira kuti ikwanise kubhadhara vanachiremba mari dzavari kuda. Vanachiremba vemuzvipatara zvehurumende pasi pesangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association vakatanga kuramwa mabasa musi wa27 Gumiguru vachida kuti mari dzavanotambiriswa dziwedzerwe kubva pamadhora mazana maviri nemakumi masere kusvika pachuru nemazana maviri emadhora pamwedzi. Izvi zvavhiringa basa muzvipatara zvese zvehurumende uye kana vanotengesa mumigwagwa pazvipatara izvi vanoti basa ravo radzikira sezvo varwere nevanhu vanoenda kuzvipatara izvi vave vashoma. Vamwe amai vanoshandira paParirenyatwa vasina kuda kudomwa nezita vanoti bhizimisi ravo radzikira chose kubvira pakatanga kuramwa vanachiremba kuramwa basa. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi revakuru vakuru vezvipatara izvi sezvo vati havana kupihwa mvumo yekutaura nevatori venhau kubva kubazi rezvehutano nekuchengetedzwa kwevana. Vana chiremba vari kuramwa basa vari kutarisirwa kuita musangano nevatori venhau mangwana apo vachazivisa zvabuda munhaurirano dzavari kuita nehurumende. Vamwewo vashandi vanoita zvehutano vatataura navo vakaita sana mukoti nevamwe, vasina kuda kudomwa nemazita vati vanotarisira kuti hurumende ichavawedzerawo mari vachiti vacharamwawo mabasa kana vasina kuwedzerwa mari mari dzavanotambira. No media source currently available

headline: PTUZ Yoramwa Mabasa Kutanga neChishanu
text: Rimwe remasangano anomirira vadzidzisi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, rinoti nhengo dzaro dzichatanga kuramwa mabasa mangwana richiti mari iri kutambiriswa vadzidzisi ishoma zvikuru. Izvi zvouyawo panguva iyo sangano rinomirira vashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions richiti riri kuenderera mberi nekuronga kuratidzira munyika yose. Mutungamiri wePTUZ, VaTakavafira Zhou, vaudza Studio7 kuti nhengo dzesangano ravo dzichatanga kuregedza kuenda kubasa neChishanu vachiti hurumende yaramba yakaisa zvimiti munzeve pachikumbiro chavo chekuti iwedzere vadzidzisi mari dzemihoro dzine musoro. VaZhou vati sangano ravo rinoda kuti hurumende ivape mari inoita madhora mazana maviri ekuAmerica kana yakaringana nemari iyi ari maRTGS, kubhadharirwa mari dzechikoro dzevana vatatu pamudzidzisi wega-wega uye kupihwa masitendi ekuti vadzidzisi vakwanise kuvaka dzimba dzekugara. Danho ratorwa nePTUZ rekutanga kusaenda kubasa mangwana rinouyawo apo mutungamiri wesangano revadzidzisi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vachiti nhengo dzesangano ravo dzichatangawo kurega kuenda kubasa neMuvhuro uye havasi kutambira zvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana zvekurerutsa raramo yavo zvavapihwa nehurumende. Munyori musangano rinomirira vashandi vari mune zvehutano reHealth Apex, VaEdwick Nhema, vanotiwo sezvo hurumende ichiti ine imwe mari yakasara pabhajeti renyika, inofanira kuvapa mari iyi kuitira kuti vakwanise kurarama. ZCTU inotiwo iri kuenderera mberi nekuronga kuratidzira kwakasimba munyika yose. Munyori mukuru muZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vati sangano ravo riri pakati pekunzwa pfungwa dzemasangano akawanda nezvenyaya yekuratidzira iyi vachiti kuratidzira uku kunogona kuitwa kubva svondo rinouya zvichienda mberi. Danho riri kutorwa neZCTU iri rinouyawo panguva iyo hutungamiri hweZCTU huchiti huri kutyisidzirwa nepamusana pehurongwa hwekuratidzira uhwu. Gurukota rezvevashandi, Amai Sekai Nzenza, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti hurumende iri kunzwa zvichemo zvevashandi vayo uye vati vari kutsvaga nzira dzekuti nhuna dzevashandi dzingagadziriswa sei kubudikidza nekutaurirana pakati pavo sehurumende nevashandi pasi peTripartite Negotiating Forum.

headline: Vanhu Vanodarika Zviuru Makumi Maviri neZvishanu Vonyoresa kuVhota
text: Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, Amai Rita Makarau, vanoti huwandu hwevanhu vanyoreswa kuvhota kumatunhu akasiyana siyana kubva zvakaparurwa chirongwa chekunyoresa vavhoti muna Gunyana hwapfuura zviuru makumi maviri nezvishanu. Vatiwo sangano ravo rave mubishi kuunza munyika mimwe michina yose inodiwa kuti vaumbe gwaro idzva revavhoti iri. NeChipiri svondo rinouya, ZEC inenge yopinda mumatunhu akawanda vachinyoresa vavhoti uye nhasi vaparura hurongwa hwekuzivisa vanhu nezvinenge zvoitwa svondo rinouya. Amai Makarau vanoti mukati memavhiki maviri vanenge vave nemuchina wekuvheneka minyoro yemimwe kana kuti mafinger prints kuona kuti hapana munhu anoresa kaviri.

headline: Hurumende Yoronga Kumutsiridza Kambani yeHwange
text: Hurumende yadoma VaBekithemba Moyo avo vaimbova mukuru wekambani yeDBF Capital Partners kuti vambotungamira hurongwa hwekumutsiridza kambani yemarasha yeHwange Colliery. Kambani iyi yave nemakore ichitatarika uye ine chikwereti chinosvika mamiriyoni zana nemakumi mashanu kuHurumende. Gurukota rinoona nezvemutemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi vakaburitsa mashoko ekumutsiridza Hwange mubepanhau rehurumende reGovernment Gazette nemusi weMuvhuro. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paNelson Mandela Metropolitan University Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vanoti hurongwa uhwu hahwuna kuipa nekuti hunobatsira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe asi panoda kutarisiswa kuti vanosarudzwa kuita basa iri vave vakakodzera. Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano vanoti zvirongwa zvakadai vakazviona zvichibatsira kumutsa mamwe makambani akanga adonha mumwaka iri kumashure asi zvakanga zvaitwa nenzira yakanaka. Vanoti shuviro yavo ndeyekuti vanopiwa basa iri vapiwe simba rekuronga zvavanoona kuti zvinobatsira kwete kuvapa basa asi vasina masimba ekutora matanho mukambani iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Vanamazvikokota Votarisa Pachena Vane Dambudziko reMwoyo kuChinhoyi
text: Vamwe vanhu vari kurwara nezvirwere zvemoyo vari kufarira chirongwa chekuvhenekwa pasina muripo navana mazvikokota vezvirwere zvemoyo avo vari kubatsira varwere ava pachipatara chikuru chemuChinhoyi. Vanhu vakawanda vari kufara nechirongwa ichi, icho china chiremba vatatu vanobva ku Italy. Vana chiremba ava vari kutarisa zvikonzero zviri kuita kuti vanhu varware nemoyo vachivaendesa kunana chiremba vepamusoro soro kuti vanorapwa mushure mekuvhenekwa dzambudziko rinenge riripo. Mumwe wevatariswa nana chiremba ava, ndiVaPeter Phiri avo vabva kuMasvingo. VaPhiri\nvanoti vanzi moyo wavo unotoda kuvhiyiwa kunze kwenyika sezvo pasina vanachiremba vanogona kuvhiya nekugadzirisa mavharuvhu ari pamoyo pavo ayo anonzi akakanganisika. VaPhiri vanoti vanzi nyika iri pedyo inokwanisa kuvhiya moyo pasina dambudziko iSouth Africa kana kuenda kuIndia kana kuItaly. VaPhiri vanoti iye zvino zvave nani nekuti vave kuziva zviri kudikanwa. Mumwe avhenekwa akawanikwa moyo wake uzere mvura ndiVaCainos Beremauro avo vanzi vaende kuchipatara chikuru chemuHarare cheParirenyatwa kuti vanobviswa mvura yakawandisa mumoyo. VaBeremauro vanoti chirongwa chekutarisa moyo chiri kuyamura sezvo kuvhenekwa kwavayamura kuti vazive dambudziko ravanaro. Vanhu vari kurapwa vari kuita mutsetse wakakura paimba yekuvhekwa havasi kufara nevashandi vepachipatara ichi avo vari kupinza hama dzavo mberi idzo dzinenge dzanonoka kubva kumba. Mumwe murwere anonetsekana nemoyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti huori haupere munyika sezvo hwatekeshera nemuzvipatara. Chirongwa chekuvheneka varwere vemoyo chatanga neMuvhuro uye chichapera neChishanu svondo rino. Mukuru wepachipara chikuru chemuChinhoyi, Supt Collet Mawire, vanoti vari kutarisira kuvhenekwa vanhu vanosvika makumi maviri pazuva vachibatsirwa nana chiremba vatatu. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi veTongaat neTriangle Votemeswa Musoro neNyaya yeKutorwa kweMinda yeNzimbe neZanu-PF
text: Vashandi vekambani yeTongart kuHippo Valley kuChiredzi ne Triangle vari kutsutsumwa mushure mekunzwa kuti vamwe vavo vacharasikirwa nemabasa mushure mekunge bato reZanu PF raparura chirongwa chekutora minda ye shuga yekambani iyi. Hurumende yakabuditsa mashoko ekuti ichatora zviuru zvina zvemahectare eminda yenzimbe ye kambani iyi yogovera kuvatsigiri vayo pamwe chete ne madzishe. Izvi zvinonzi zvakonzera nyonga nyonga pa kambani iyi sezvo vamwe votyira kuti vachagumurwa mabasa. Amai Emily Makamure vanova mumwe anoshandira muminda iyi vanoti vakapindwa nekutya kukuru nekunzwa kuti vangangorasikirwa ne basa ravo sezvo vasina imwe nzira yakuzoraramisa mhuri yavo. “Ndava nemakore anosvika gumi ndichishandira pano asi izvi zvoitika zvinotyisa zvikuru. Zvinoshungurudza nekuti ndaikwanisa kuchengeta mhuri yangu saka handizivi kuti basa rikapera ndichakwanisa kuichengeta here kana kuendesa vana kuchikoro.” Mumwewo mushandi wekambani iyi, VaElias Gwamure vanotiwo remangwana ravo harina kujeka. “Pari kutorwa minda ndopatino sevenzera pakambani yedu manje pakatorwa hatizivi kuti tichashandira papi uye tichararamisa sei mhuri dzedu. Ndipo patairaramira.” Vamwewo vashandi vanosanganisira VaTemba Gumbo vanoti havasi kufara nezviri kuda kuitwa nehurumende vachiti iri kuramba ichitora minda izvo zviri kuita kuti vashandi varasikirwe nemabasa asi iyo yakavimbisa kugadzira mabasa anosvika mamirioni maviri panguva dzesaraudzo dzemuna 2013. “ Zvatibata zvakaoma mukoma, tikatarira hurumunde payaifamba ichida kuti tiva vhotere yakativimbsia mabasa mamirioni maviri asi iye zvino yoda kudzingisa vanhu mabasa vanosvika zviuru zviviri. Hatizivi kuti ndokugadzira mabasa kwacho here ikoku. Vacho vachiuya hagoni kana kurima.” Studio seven yakundikana kubata Gurukota rezviminda, VaDouglas Mombeshora nhasi , Asi vhiki rapera vakaudza vatori venhau kuti kuganhurwa kweminda iyi kuti ipuwe vanhu kwakatotanga. “Takaraira hofisi yedu ye Masvingo kuti ichitotanga kuganhura minda iyi kuti tigovere vanhu saka izvezvi hatizivi kuti vava papi asi tinotarisira kuti basa ririkufamba uye tichagovera vanhu zvikamu zvavo zvakaenzana.” Kutorwa kweminda yekambani ye Tongart inova iyo yoga inorima nzimbe nekugadzira shuga munyika kunonzi ndiko kuri kuita kuti kugadzirwa kweshuga kudzikire chaizvo, sezvo varimi vatsva vanopuwa minda iyi vachizokundikana kurima. Kambani iyi svondo rino yakaburitsa mashoko ekuti mari yainoita yakadzikira gore rino apo yakawana mirioni imwe chete yemadhora eku America kubva pamamiriyoni makumi matatu nemazviuru mazana mashanu mugore ra2015. No media source currently available

headline: Vemabhizimusi Madiki Vochema neKusafamba kweBhizimusi seZvavanga Vakatarisira paNguva Ino yeZororo reKisimusi
text: Apo kwasara zuva rimwechete kuti vanhu vapinde muzororo reKisimusi, vemamwe mabhizimusi madiki pamwe nevanotengesera mumigwagwa vanoti bhizimusi harina kusimuka gore rino sezvinotarisirwa panguva yezororo rakadai . Mumwe wevari kuchema-chema nekuderera kwebhizimusi ndiMuzvare Patricia Ticharwa vane chitoro chinotengesa mbatya mudhorobha. Muzvare Ticharwa vati sezvo gore rino zvinhu zvanga zvisinganyatsofamba vanga vane tarisiro yekuti kana vanhu vogadzirira Kisimusi zvinhu zvichachinja. Amai Benhilda Konje, avo vane vana vatatu, vanotengeserawo mumusha weGlenview, vatsigirawo vachiti veruzhinji vari kuratidza kuti havana mari uye havasi kutengerwa sezvavange vachitarisira. Amai Jane Sanhuwe, mumwe mutengesi vatiwo kushaikwa kwemari kuchakanganisawo zvirongwa zvavo zvekugadzirira vana pakuvhurwa kwezvikoro. Vanoongorora zvehupfumi, VaMasimba Manyanya, vati kuderera kwebhizimusi panguva ino hakukatyamadzi vachiti vanhu vari kutambira mari shoma dzisingakwani. Vaendererawo mberi vachiti mari haisi kutenderera munyika sezvo zvinhu zvinogadzirwa munyika zviri zvishoma izvo zvoitawo kuti vanokwanisa vanoshandisira mari dzavo kunze kwenyika. Vamwewo ndivo vari kuchengetedza mari dzavainadzo kuitira kuzobhadharira vana zvikoro gore rinouya, sezvo zvikoro zvakawanda zvemunyika zvakatozivisa kare kuti zvichakwidza mari dzechikoro gore rinouya. Gore rino Kisimusi ichange ichicherechedzwa musi weSvondo asi vazhinji vachichemachema nekuoma kwezvinhu munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Varwere Votambura Zvichitevera Kuramwa Mabasa Kuri Kuitwa Muzvipatara
text: Varwere vari kuchema chema zvikuru kuhurumende kuti igadzirise zviri kudiwa nanachiremba kuitira kuti vasarasikirwe nehupenyu hwavo. Varwere vanotiwo kuramwa basa kwavana chiremba kuri kuisa hutano hwavo parumananzombe. Pashanyirwa chipatara cheHarare Hospital nhasi neStudio7 varwere vanorwarisa chete ndivo vange vachibatsirwa vamwe vachinzi vadzokere kumba vozorapwa kana vana chiremba vadzoka kubasa. Amai Sekai Ganyani Mushandu, avo vane mwana ane dambudziko remoyo, vanoti havachaziva zvekuita nemwana wavo uyo anonyorerwa mishonga mwedzi wega wega. Amai Mushandu vati chikumbiro chavo ndechekuti hurumende igadzirise zviri kunetsa kuitira vanaChiremba vadzokere pamabasa. Amai Previous Sachinda, avo vaenda kunorapwa kuHarare Hospital vakadzokera kumba vasina kuwana rubatsiro, vaudza Studio7 kuti varwadziwa zvikuru kudzorerwa kumba vachidzimbikana nemuviri. Vamwe amai varamba kudomwa nezita vane mwana ane mazuva matanhatu azvarwa, pachishandiswa oparesheni sezvo matumbu ake aive akazvimba, vati vana chiremba havasi kuuya nguva dzese kuzowona vana vari muwadhi mavo izvo zvoitawo kuti vatyire hutano hwemwana wavo Mukuru weHarare Central Hospital, Amai Peggy Zvavamwe, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti vanachiremba havasati vadzoka kumabasa. Amai Zvavamwe vati vanga vari kupinda mumusangano wekuongorora kuti kuramwa mabasa uku kuri kuvhiringa varwere zvakadii. Munyori mubazi rezveutano, Dr Gerald Gwinji, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kuramwa basa kwanachiremba uku kuri kukanganisa mabasa ezveutano. VaGwinji vati bazi ravo richiri kukukurukura nehurumende kuti vangagadzirisa sei dambudziko asi vakatiwo chikumbiro chavo kunana Chiremba ndechekuti dai vakwanisa kudzokera kumabasa hurumende ichigadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Zimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Association inoti nhengo dzayo dzinodarika chiuru dziri kuramwa mabasa. Zvichemo zvanachiremba ava zvinosanganisira mari shoma pamwe nekusapiwa mukana wekuti vatenge mota pasina kubhadhariswa mutero kubva kunze kwenyika kuitira kuti vafambe nyore vachienda kubasa. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi veHurumende Voramba Kufanotambira Zana reMadhora, Voronga Kuramwa Mabasa
text: Mamwe masangano evashandi vehurumende atobuda pachena kare kuti nhengo dzawo hadzisi kuzotambira zana remadhora rinonzi nehurumende ichapa kuvashandi vayo nemusi weChishanu svondo rino kuti vawane chekufanoshandisa pavanenge vakamirira mihoro yavo yaChikumi, iyo ichauya mwedzi. Mutungamiri wesangano reProfessional Educators Union of Zimbabwe, VaWilson Makanyaire vanoti sangano ravo rimwe remasangano ane nhengo dzaramba kutambira mari iyi, vachiti ichi chituko chaicho kuvarairidzi. “Nhasi musangano wataita kuMarondera wekunzwa pfungwa dzevarairidzi unoratidza kuti havasi kuzotambira mari iyi. Varairidzi vari kuti kana hurumende ichida kutipa mari ngaitipe mihoro yedu yese yakakwana mwedzi uno,” VaMakanyaire vanodaro. Vanoti sangano ravo rasunga kuti varairidzi vapinde mukuramwa mabasa kana vasina kutambira mihoro yavo panosvika musi wa 1 Chikunguru. “Zvatiri kukumbira kuvarairidzi ndezvekuti zvisineyi kuti uri wesangano ripi, ngatibataneyi maoko tipinde mukuratidzira, tipinde mukuramwa mabasa nekuti ndiwo mutauro unoteererwa nemushandirwi,” vanodaro VaMakanyaire. No media source currently available Iri danho ratsigirwa nerimwe sangano revarairidzi, reProgressive Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, iro rinoti nhengo dzaro dzarambawo kutambira hurongwa hwehurumende uhwu. Mutungamiri wesangano iri VaTakavafira Zhou vanoti zana remadhora iri imari isina zvainovabatsira sezvo ichiperera kumabhanga. “Varairidzi vane zvikwereti kumabhanga saka mari iyi inobva yangobatwa ikoko isati yasvika kwavari. Kana vakaitambira mari yacho vachienda kumabasa, ko mhuri dzavo dzinosara dzichidyeyi?” VaZhou vanobvunza. VaZhou vanoti nhengo dzavo hadzisi kuzoenda kumabasa kubva musi wa 1 mwedzi unouya kusvika dzapiwa mihoro yadzo yakakwana. Vanoti vari kukurudzira vashandi vose vehurumende kuti vaende kumusangano wevashandi uchaitwa muHarare neMugovera, apo pachapiwa mukana vose vanoda kutaura zvavanofunga. No media source currently available Sangano reRural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe rakaudzawo Studio 7 kare kuti harisi kuzotambira zana remadhora iri, sezvo zvichiratidza pachena kuti hurumende haina hany’a nevashandi vayo. Munyori mukuru weRural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, VasRobson Chere vakati nhengo dzavo dzichatora matanho ekuramwa mabasa kana dzisina kupiwa mihoro yadzo yaChikumi muna Chikumi, kwete muna Chikunguru sezviri kurongwa nehurumende. Ukuwo sangano reZimbabwe Teachers Association, Zimta rakaudzawo bepanhau reHerald kuti kunyange richiri kunzwa pfungwa dzenhengo dzaro pamusoro penyaya iyi, varairidzi vari kudya magaka mambishi sezvo vari kuramba kutambira mari isina kwainovasvitsa.

headline: Vaiva Vashandi veMakambani eMangoda Vononga Svosve neMuromo kwaChiyadzwa
text: Vaimbove vashandi vemakambani anochera mangoda kwaChiadzwa vari kuyaura nenzara uye kudya nhoko dzezvironda mushure makambani aya akatorerwa marezinesi ekuramba achichera nehurumende. Vashandi ava kunyanya vagari venharaunda dzakapoteredza Marange vanoti varohwa nenhamo zvakanyanya. Vazhinji vakamiswa mabasa nechimbichimbi vange vakatadza kuwaniswa mari dzemihoro yavo. Makambani aichera mangoda anosanganisira Anjin, Mbada Diamonds, Kusena, DMC, Marange Resources nemamwe akamiswa kushanda zvikapa kuti vashandi vanopfuura churu vamiswe mabasa. Vamwe vevashandi ava kunyanya vagari venzvimbo iyi vava kuomerwa nehupenyu sezvo nharaunda iyi isina zvizhinji zvinokwaniswa kuitwa zvinopa chouviri uye yave zvakare nzvimbo yakachengetedzwa. VaGodknows Murire mumwe wevaimbove vashandi kukambani yeAnjin Investments yaichera mangoda avo vanoti kupera kwebasa nenguva yavaisatarisira kwakavapidza munyatwa yakaomarara. “Kunzi basa rapera kwakati kanganisa zvakanyanya sezvo hapana aitarisira izvi panguva iyoyo, nekuti tange tisina gadziriro or kuti kupihwa notice chaiyo. Vanoenderera mberi vachiti, "Kungomiswa suddenly kwataitwa kwakakuvadza nemhuri yose nokuti hurongwa hwange husipo wokuti pamwe ndizvo zvichazoitika.” VaMurire vanoti kupera kwakaita basa kwakapa kuti vazhinji vasare vaine zvikwereti kumabhanga, zvitoro, munharaunda nekwakawanda wanda izvo zvikwereti zvacho zvonetsa kubhadharika nekuti basa rakapera. “Panyaya yezvikwereti zvopa kuti tishupike kuzvibvisa kana kudzosera, apawo taingopihwa tumari tushoma tushoma apo takamiswa mabasa. Nekuwanda kwemaneeds sevanhu vaviva pabasa tasara tiri munhamo yekuti tobhadhadhara vanhu vaye seyi iwe wagara.” Vanodaro VaMurire VaCharles Kusena mumwezve mushandi wekuminda yemangoda akamiswa basa, avo kuchemawo nenyaya yezvikwereti izvo vanoti zvakatovapedzera zvipfuyo zvavo votengesa kuitira kudzosera mari yemabhanga neyemuvanhu vonge vonetsa voda kuvaendesa kumatare edzimhosva. Amai Mary Munjoma mugari wekuHot Springs pedyo nenzvimbo yaicherwa mangoda nekambani yeAnjin vane murume akamiswa basa. Amai Munjoma vanoti nhamo yapfunya chisero mumusha wavo izvo zvopa kuti vandosunza kana kuita maricho kunzvimbo dzakavapoteredza kuti vararamise mhuri yavo. “Kubva pakamiswa baba basa hupenyu hwatiomera zvekuti tave kuita marikicho sezvo pachisina chekuita baba vakagara. Mamwe mabasa ekutotiraramisa mhuri kuteza huni nekuita mikando, tave kupfeka mazitye atinopfekedza vana zvemadhora dhora nekuti chekuita chacho hapana.” VaBiggie Vheremu vaishandirawo imwe kambani yaichera mangoda kwaChiadzwa. Vanoti kumira kwavakaita basa mwedzi yodarika makumi maviri yapfuura kwovatemesa musoro nekuti havachazivi kuti zvichemo zvavo zvemari dzisina kupera kubhadharwa vachazviendesa kunaani uye nemari dzemazuva erivhi. “Tiri kuti tiri kushaya kwekuti tinozonanga ani pakuda kuti tinzwe kuti mari tichabhadharwa nani. Vaimbove vakuru vedu vekambani takavabvunza izvozvo asi hatina zvakare kupihwa mhinduro inogutsa saka ipapo pari kutinetsa kusvika parizvino.” Vaimbove vashandi vemakambani emangoda ava pamwechete nemhuri dzavo vari kuronga kuratidzira mumazuva mashoma ari kutevera vachinyunyuta nekusabatwa zvakanaka kwavari kuitwa nemapurisa ari kuchengetedza minda yemangoda iyi pamwechete nemasoja avo anoti ari kushungurudza vagari zvisakafanira. Vagari venzvimbo dzinoti, Hotsprings, Tonhorai, Chakohwa vari kunyunyuta zvakare nekusvibisirwa mvura yemunzizi dzavo zvakare kusapihwa mabasa pakambani yeZimbabwe Consolidated Diamond Mining Company kana ZCDMC. Vagari ava vari kushanda pamwe chete nesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanogara munzvimbo dzinowanikwa zviwanikwa reCentre for Research and Development, CRD. Mukuru weCRD VaJames Mupfumi vanoti ikodzero yevagari vekwaChiadzwa nenyaya yekushungurudzwa kwavo. “Isusu nyaya yedu tiri kuzama kushanda nemaCBOs (Community Based Organisations) ari kuno panyaya yaari kuda kuita ratidziro yavo nenyaya yeharassment yavari kusangano nayo mucommunity, angave maissues e-unemployment evana venyu, abuse yevana zvekare nyaya yewater pollution environmental degradation yemakomba akasiyiwa akadaro nemacompanies. Vanotiwo, "Tiri kunzwa zvakare kuti vana vari kumanikidzwa kufushira makomba aya vachinzi magweja, saka iorced labour iri kuuya kabisira futi.” Vagari venharaunda yeChiadzwa vanoti nenyaya yekusvibisirwa kwemvura murwizi Odzi nemakambani aimbochera mangoda vazhinji varasikirwa nezvipfuyo kunyanya mombe dzinosvika mazana masere, uye mbudzi nehwayi. No media source currently available

headline: Dunhu reGauteng Roronga Kudzika Mitemo Inosarura Vabvakure
text: Mukuru wedunhu reGauteng muJohannesburg, VaDavid Makhura, vakazivisa neChipiri kuti nekufamba kwenguva, dunhu ravo richadzika mutemo unorambidza vekune dzimwe nyika kutanga mabhizimisi mudunhu ravo, sezvo izvi zviri kutadzisa zvizvarwa zvemuSouth Africa, kuti zviwanewo chekubata. VaMakhura vakataura mashoko aya mudare ravo redunhu, apo vakange vachipindura mibvunzo yaibva kune dzimwe nhengo dzedare ravo. Vanoona nezvekodzero dzavanhu vanoti mashoko akataurwa naVaMakhura anokonzeresa kuti pave neruvengo pakati pevanobva kunze kwenyika nezvizvarwa zvemuSouth Africa. Mumwe muzvinabhizimusi muSouth Africa neZimbabwe, VaBrighton Sangore, vanoti mashoko akadai anobata zvizvarwa zvisiri zvemuSouth Africa, agara achitaurwa kwenguva yakareba muSouth Africa. Sachigaro weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti mashoko akadai haafanirwe kunge achibva pamuromo pemunhu anonyarikana saVaMakhura. VaMavhinga vanoti mashoko aVaMakhura anotyora kodzero dzevanhu uye handicho chaive chido chevaimbove mutungamiri weSouth Africa, mushakabvu Nelson Mandela. Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Exiles Forum, VaGabriel Shumba, vanotiwo mashoko aVaMakhura anotyora mitemo yenyika, iyo isina rusarura pakuvambwa kwemabhizinesi. VaShumba vanoti kana vekunze vachivhura mabhizimusi muSouth Africa, vanenge vachibatsira kusimudzira hupfumi hwenyika iyi. VaShumba vanoti VaMakhura vanofanirwa kukumbira ruregerero kuzvizvarwa zvose zvekune dzimwe nyika zviri muSouth Africa. VaShumba vanoti sangano reZimbabwe Exiles Forum riri kuita hurukuro nemamwe masangano akasiyanasiyana, senzira yekugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa. Mashoko aVaMakhura anouya mushure mokunge zvitoro zvezvizvarwa zvekunze kweSouth Africa zvapazwa nekupiswa, ukuwo vatyairi vemagonyeti vachimbunyikidzwa kodzero dzavo, vamwe vachimanikidzwa kusiya basa nesangano rinozviti All Truck Drivers Foundation. Sangano reHuman Rights Watch rinoti vanhu mazana maviri vafa mumhirizhonga yemuSouth Africa kubva muna Kurume gore rapera, vazhinji vavo vari vatyairi vanobva kune dzimwe nyika. No media source currently available

headline: VaBiden Votarisirwa Kutora Mhiko Pasina Ruzhinji neNyaya yeCovid-19
text: Pane hurongwa hwekuti vakasarudzwa kutungamira nyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden vachatoreswa mhiko musi wa 20 Ndira gore rinouya vanhu vasina kuungana paWashington Mall muguta reWashington DC sezvinoitwa makore ose nekuda kwekupararira zvakanyanya kwechirwere checoronavirus. Hurongwa uhu hunonzi huchaitwa padandemutande kana kuti Virtual Inauguration. VaBiden vanenge vachitora mhiko semutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica wechimakumi mana nematanhatu. VaBiden nevamwe vanyarikani vashoma shoma nevanhu vashoma vachatora mhiko pamberi pemukova wedare reparamende kana kuti Congress sechigariro vozofamba nemugwagwa, Pennsylvania Avenue, kuenda kumuzinda weWhite House. Gadziriro yehurongwa uhu yatotanga muWashington DC pachiiswa zvivakwa zvakasiyana siyana. Mutungamiri wenyika VaDonald Trump havasati vatenda kuti vakakundwa sarudzo uye vamwe vanoti vacharegedza kuenda panenge pachitoreswa mhiko VaBiden inova tsika inoremekedzwa pakutambidzana masimba muAmerica. VaTrump vari kufungidzirwa kuti vachaita musangano neveruzhinji musi uyu muchinangwa chekuda kutotanga gadziriro yekukwikwidzazve musarudzo dzemuna 2024. Zvichakadaro VaBiden vari kutarisirwa kudoma vaive mukuru wemauto vari pamudyandigere Retired U.S. Army General Lloyd Austin kuti vave munhu mutema wekutanga kuve gurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika.

headline: Mutengo weMafuta eDzimotokarei Unokwira Zvakare keChipiri Mukati meMazuva Manomwe
text: Boka re Zimbabwe Energy Regulatory Authority, ZERA, razivisa kuti mutengo wemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari wakwira, peturu ichikwira kuenda pamadhora manomwe nemasendi makumi mana nemapfumbamwe parita rogaroga, kuchitiwo dhiziri richikidzwa kuenda pamadhora manomwe nemasendi gumi nemapfumbamwe parita. Svondo rapera mafuta aya akakwidzwa zvakare peturu ichenda pamadhora matanhatu nemasendi gumi, ukuwo dhiziri richienda pamadhora mashanu ane masendi makumi masere nemana parita. Mutauriri wesangano revemabhazi anotakura vanhu, reChitungwiza Commuter Omnibus Operators Association, VaFarai Muza vanoti iri danho raomesera nhengo dzavo zvakanyanya sezvo dzisiri kukwanisa kuwedzera mari dzinobhadharwa nevanhu vanokwira mabhazi avo nekuda kwekuti vanhu vavanotakura havana kuwedzerwawo mihoro yavo. No media source currently available

headline: Zvipingaidzo Zvobuda muChirongwa cheNhomba yeCovid-19
text:
Bazi rezvehutano rinoti harikwanise kuongorora vanhu vose vari kuda
kubayiwa nhomba vasati vabayiwa nhomba iyi sezvinokurudzirwa nevakagadzira nhomba yeSinopharm. Vachitaura nevatori venhau nezuro mukuru webazi rezvehutano mudunhu
reMashonaland West, Dr Gift Masoja, vakati hurumende haikwanise kuongorora sezvo vasina zvikwanisiro zvinokwanira munhu wese ari kuda kubayiwa nhomba. Dr Masoja vakati chimwe chikonzero ndechekuti nguva yekubayiwa nhomba inozowandisa zvakanyanya sezvo zvichitora maawa maviri kana kudarika munhu akamirira zvichabuda muongororo inenge yaitwa iyi.

Dr Masoja vakati munhu akamborwara nechirwere cheCovid-19 anogona
kubayiwa nhomba sezvo paine mukana wekuti anogona kurwara nechirwere ichi zvakare.

Nyanzvi yezvehutano uye vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende
yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vanoti hurumende yakatadza kare kuti iwongorore vanhu nekudaro vakada kuzviita chirongwa chekubaya nhomba chinodzokera kumashure.

Dr Madzorera vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kukurudzira vanhu vari kuda
kubayiwa nhomba kuti vataure chokwadi kuti vane hutano hwakasimba
here,kana kuti kwete.

Dunhu reMashonaland West iro rakapihwa majekiseni enhomba anosvika
zviuru gumi rechimwe chete, rabaya vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nezana
nemakumi masere nevasere, kana kuti 1188 mumazuva
mashanu kusvika nezuro. Munyika yose, vanhu zviuru gumi nezviviri nemazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe nevapfumbamwe, 12579, vakange vabayiwa nhomba iyi mukupera kwezuva ranezuro. Chirwere ichi chakauraya vanhu vashanu nezuro, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa munyika yose pachiuru nemazana mana nemakumi matanhatu nevatatu, 1463. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika vava zviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu nemakumi mana nevana, 36044, zvichitevera kubatwa kwevanhu makumi mashanu nechirwere ichi nezuro. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Oyedza Kurambidza Hurongwe hweKuratidzira Huri kunzi "Munhu Wese muRoad"
text: Masangano akawanda munyika anoti achange achiratidzira nemusi weChishanu pasi pechirongwa chinonzi “Munhu wese muRoad”. Masangano ari kuratidzira anosanganisira #Tajamuka/Sesijikile, #This Flower, #This Flag, Occupy Africa Unity Square, Bulawayo Youth Arise, ZINASU nemamwe. Masangano aya anoti haasi kufara nenyaya kuda kuparurwa kwemari yemabond notes nehurumende uye nyaya yehuori hunonzi hwatekeshera nenyika zvikuru muhurumende. Asi mapurisa kuburikidza nemukuru muHarare, Officer Commanding Police Harare Central District Chief Superintendent JT Chizemo vari kuramba kupa mvumo masangano aya kuti aratidzire. Mapurisa anodzivirira mhirizhonga atozara muHarare uye neChishanu anonzi achafumobata jongwe muromo kunodzivirira kuti vanhu vasaratidzire. Mapurisa anonzi ari kuda kusungawo VaStern Zvorwadza ve#This Flower naDr Patson Dzamara veOccupy Africa Unity Square vachi vapomera mhosva yekuronga kuratidzira uku. Asi VaJason Zhuwawu vebato reZanu-PF vanotungamira Team ZANU-PF Live, iyo ino buritsa mashoko ezvinenge zvichiitwa nebato iri, vati vanhu vari kuratidzira havana kana pfungwa dzekuvaka uye vanofanira kutaurirana nehurumende kwete kuratidzira. Asi VaZvorwadza vanoti hurumende inhinhi, haidi kunzwa pfungwa dzevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inoti Yakagadzirira Kutaurirana neEthiopia paNyaya Yekudzoserwa kwaMengistu Akatongerwa Rufu neHumhondi
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika VaFrederick Shava vanoti Zimbabwe yakagadzirira kutaura neEthiopia panyaya yevaive mutungamiri wenyika wenyika iyi Mengistu Haile Mariam uyo akatongerwa rufu nenyaya dzekuponda vanhu. aShava vaudza Studio 7 kuti Zimbabwe yakagadzirira kutaura neEthiopia ikaite zvinotarisirwa munyaya dzekudyidzana kwenyika. Mengistu akapotera muZimbabwe muna 1991 mushure mekutungamira Ethiopia kwemakore gumi nemana. Mauto ake aizivikanwa nekuti Derg akwanikwa aine mhosva dzekuponda vanopikisa pamwe nehama dzavo. Muna 2008, dare remuEthiopia rakatongera Mengistu rufu richimupomera mhosva dzekuponda zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu. Asi Zimbabwe haina kuratidza chido chekuti adzokere kuEthiopia kunyangwe ainge abatwa nemhosva idzi. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu VaKennedy Masiye vaudza Studio 7 kuti Zimbabwe iyo isingadi kuisa ruoko rwayo pazvibvumirano zvinorambidza kuitwa kwevanhu kafiramberi uye zvimwe zvekuendesa vanpara mhosva dzehondo kumatare kana kuti kuti International Criminal Court inoratidza kuti haina kuzvipira kuomesera vanoponda vakaita saMengistu.

headline: Tajamuka/Sesijikile Yopa Hurumende Mazuva Mashomashoma eKuti Igadzirise Zvinhu
text: Sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reTajamuka/Sesijikile, rinoti riri kupa hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa mazuva mashoma-shoma ekuti igadzirise zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi nezvematongerwo enyika, kukundikana kwayo vanhu vanozopinda mumigwagwa nehuwandu hwavo. Izvi zvinotevera kukwira kunonzi kwakaita chingwa kubva pamadhora maviri nemasendi makumi matatu kuenda pamadhora matatu nemasendi makumi mashanu kutanga svondo rino. Mukuru wesangano iri VaPromise Mkwananzi vanoti chinorwadza ndechekuti mitengo yezvinhu zvinodiwa nevanhu nguva dzose iri kukwira, asi mihoro isina kwairi kuenda. VaMkwananzi vanoti sangano ravo harisi kuzopa vehurumende mukana wekufema kana vasina kugadzirisa zvinhu nekukasika, vachiti kukundikana vanhu vachaita zvakaonekwa kunanaAlgeria nekuSudan zvekubuda vachipinda mumigwagwa vachishandisa nzira dzine runyararo mukati. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kubata vehurumende kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Vatori veNhau veNewsDay Votarisirwa Kumiswa Mudare Vachinzi Vakazvidza VaMugabe?
text: Vatori venhau veNewsDay vari kutarisirwa kumiswa pamberi pematare edzimhosva chero nguva vachipomerwa mhosva yekuzvidza hofisi yemutungamiri wenyika. Kumiswa kwavo pamberi pematare kuchaitwa pachishandiswa masamanisi. Izvi zvinotevera kusungwa nemapurisa neChishanu kwevashandi vekambani yeAlpha Media Holdings, iyo inodhinda bepanhau reNewsDay. Vakasungwa neChishanu ava vachibva vaiswa mumaoko emagweta avo mupepeti wenhau, Wisdom Mudzungairi, nemutori wake wenhau, Richard Chidza, uye mumiriri wekambani, Sifikile Thabete. Vatatu ava vari kumirirwa negweta ravo, VaObey Shava, avo vabvuma kuti vatatu ava vaiswa mumaoko emagweta avo kuitira kuti vazoenda kumatare pachishandiswa masamanisi. Bepanhau reNewsDay rakaburitsa nyaya yekuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakabuda zvechimbi chimbi munyika vachienda kuSingapore kunorapwa. Rakatiwo VaMugabe vanoenda kunorapwa maziso avo kuSingapore nguva dzose, asi kune mamwe mashoko ari kubuda anoti VaMugabe vari kunetsekana nechirwere chegomarara repanhengo dzemunhurume. Chipangamazano munyaya dzekutorwa kwenhau kuMisa – Zimbabwe, VaNyasha Nyakunu, vati havatarisiri kusungwa kwevatori venhau munyaya dzakadai. VaNyakunu vati kushungurudzwa nekusungwa kwevatori venhau kwange kwaderera zvikuru izvo zvanga zvichivafadza sesangano. Munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Union of Journalists, VaFoster Dongozi, vashorawo kusungwa kwevatori venhau ava vakakurudzira kuti hurumende inofanirwa kubudisa pachena zvinenge zvichiitika pamutungamiri wenyika kana vabvunzwa nevatori venhau. Asi hurumende inoti vatori venhau ava vakatyora mutemo nekuzvidza hofisi yemutungamiri wenyika kuburikidza nezvavakanyora. Mutauriri waVaMugabe, VaGeorge Charamba, vakaudza mapepa ehurumende kuti VaMugabe vaive vagara vachifanirwa kunoonekwa nanachiremba vavo. Vatori venhau veNewsDay ndivo vekutanga muna 2017 kusungwa nemapurisa vachipomerwa mhosva yekutyora mutemo vachiita basa ravo. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yoshorwa neKuda kuBhadhara IMF Ichitadza kuBhadhara Vashandi
text: Zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi munyika hazvina kumira zvakanaka zvopa vamwe kuti vayambire kuti nyika inogona kuguma yaenda kumazivandadzoka zvakaitika kuZaire pasi pehutongo hwaMobuto Sese Seko zvakapa kuti nyika iite donga Watonga muzinda wenyuchi. Nyaya iri kunetsa ndeyekuti hurumende iyo isina kana kobiri yobhadhara here kana kuti kwete mari yechikwereti kuInternational Monetary Fund nemamwe mabhanga nenyika dzekunze kana kuti kubhadhara vashandi vayo. Gavhuna weRBZ Dr. John Mangudya vanoti vakawana mari kubva kubhanga reAfrican Export Import. Asi hazvina kujeka kuti Zimbabwe ichapihwa here imwe mari kana yakabhadhara mitero pazvikwereti zvayo. Mutauriri weIMF VaGerry Rice vanoti Zimbabwe ikabhadhara chikwereti hapana chivimbiso chekuti ichapihwa imwe mari sezvo pari kudiwa kuti itange yagadzirisa zvimwe zvinhu zvakaita sezvegwara rehupfumi nezvematongerwo enyika. Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa rePeople’s Democratic Party VaTendai Biti, avo vaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi, vanotenderana nemaonero aya. VaBiti vanotiwo Zimbabwe inofanira kubvuma kuti yakundikana yoedza kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa. Asi Zimbabwe yobhadhara chikwereti chekunze ichi here kana kuti yobhadhara vashandi vayo? Nyazvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe VaProsper Chitambara vanoti hurumende inofanira kukoshesa vashandi. Kubhadhara vashandi kuchanetsawo sezvo Zimbabwe Revenue Authority kana kuti ZIMRA yave kukundikanawo kuunganidza mari dzemitero dzinoshandiswa kubhadhara vashandi. Mumwedzi mina yapfuura, ZIMRA yakakundikana kusvitsa mari yayainge yakatarisira. Zimbabwe iri kukundikanawo kukwezva vokunze vane mari yekutanga mabhizimisi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi nenyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dziri kuyambirawo kuti Zimbabwe yakasagadzirisa mamiriro akaita zvinhu, nyika inogona kuzoguma yaenda kunataisireva sezvakaitika kunyika dzakaita seZaire neAfghanistan uko kwakapedzisira kwoita kurwisana. Kuti izvi zvisaitike, sangano reInternational Crisis Group rinoti Zimbabwe inofanira kugadzirisa zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Sangano ravanachipangamazano iri rinoti panofanira kutaurwa pachena kuti VaMugabe vakasiya basa ndiyani achatora masimba uye panofanira kuitwa nhaurirano pakati pebato reZanu-PF nemapato ano pikisa pamwe nemamwe masangano akazvimirira, kuti vanyukure nyika mumoto mayavekudondera. No media source currently available

headline: SADC Yokurudzira Nhengo Dzayo Kutora Matanho paNyaya yeZvirango zveZimbabwe
text: Sangano remubatanidzwa wenyika dziri kumaodzanyemba kweAfrica, reSADC, riri kukurudzira nhengo dzaro kuti dzitore matanho akasimba musi wa25 Gumiguru, unove mwedzi uno, mukukurudzira kubviswa kwezvirango zvehupfumi zvinonzi zvakatemerwa vamwe vatungamiri muhurumende pamwe nemamwe makambani ainodyidzana nawo. No media source currently available Munyori mukuru wesangano reSADC, Doctor Stergomena Tax, vanoti nyika gumi nenhanhatu idzo dzinoumba sangano iri dzakatarisirwa kuita kana chii zvacho asi chiine hudzamu mukukuridzira kubviswa kwezvirango zvehupfumi izvo vanoti zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nenyika yeAmerica pamwe nedzimwe dziri kumawirira. Doctor Tax vanoenderera mberi vachiti sangano ravo rakatora danho rekubatsirana neZimbabwe mukurwa hondo yekubviswa kwezvirango izvi nokuti ndizvo zviri kuita kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvidye nhoko dzezvironda. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzemutemo, uye vachidzidzisa mutemo paGaborone University College of Law and Professional Studies, VaCharles Kungwengwe vanoti SADC yakafanira kutsvaga kuti chakaita kuti musoro uteme chii muZimbabwe. VaKungwengwe vaudza Studio7 kuti SADC yakafanira kutora chidzidzo munyika yeAmerica neidzo dziri kumawirira nokutemerawo Zimbabwe zvirango zvehupfumi senzira yekukurudzira hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuti igadzirise zvinhu munyika. Vachitsigira mashoko aVaKungwengwe, chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe icho chinogara nekurarama nechamuka inyama mudhorobha reFrancistown, VaAlex Chikwanda vanoti huwori nehumbimbindoga ndizvo zvaita kuti zvinhu zvite manyama amire nerongo munyika. Asi Muzvare Memory Mutizira, avo varorarama nekuruka misoro mudhorobha reGaborone vanoti matambudziko ari munyika ava kuda kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviise misoro pamwechete kuti zvinhu zvigadzirisike nekukasika. Chisungo chekubatsira Zimbabwe chakatorwa pamusangano wechimakumi matatu nepfumbamwe wevatungamiri venyika dzemuSADC uyo vakaitirwa muTanzania mumwedzi waNyamavhuvhu gore rino. Mugore ra2001, hurumende yeAmerica yakadzika mutemo weZimbabwe Democracy and Economic Recovery Act kana kuti ZIDERA, senzira yekukurudzira hutongi hwejekerere pamwe nekuwandudza hupfumi hwenyika muZimbabwe.

headline: Zimbabwe Yotambira neMufaro Kupihwa Mvumo yeKushandiswa kweNhomba yeSinopharm neWHO
text: World Health Organization kana kuti WHO nemusi weChishanu yakapa mvumo nhomba yeSinopharm yekuChina, iyo iri kushandiswa muZimbabwe, kuti ishandiswe nechimbi chimbi kana kuti "Emergency use authorization" Mukuru anoona nezvekurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 munyika Doctor Agnes Mahomva vanoti vari kufara kuti Sinopharm yapihwa mvumo yekushanda zvakagara zvaonekwa nenyanzvi dzemuZimbabwe dzakakurudzira kuti ibayiwe vanhu. Zimbabwe yakatanga kushandisa nhomba iyi muna Kukadzi payakapihwa nhomba dzinosvika zviuru mazana maviri neChina. No media source currently available Iyi ndiyo nhomba yekutanga isiri kubva kunyika dzekumawirira kupihwa mvumo yakadai. Izvi zvave kureva kuti Sinopharm yave kupinda pachirongwa cheCOVID-19 Vaccines Global Access kana kuti COVAX chekubatsira nyika dzichiri kubudirira nenhomba. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano vari nhengo yeMDC Alliance Dr Henry Madzorera vanoti vanhu vange vachizengurira kubayiwa nhomba iyi vave kuchifanira kurega kutya sezvo yatambirwa neWHO. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, bazi rezvehutano rinoti nemusi weSvondo hakuna munhu akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 zvasiya huwandu hwevafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira huchiri pachiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe nevatanhatu, 1 576. Vanhu gumi nemumwe vakabatwawo nechirwere ichi neSvondo zvekare izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi pazviuru makumi matatu nezvisere nemazana mana negumi nevana kana kuti 38 414. Vamwe vanhu gumi nemumwe vakaporawo zvasiya vapora vave zviuru makumi matatu nematanhatu nemakumi mashanu nevaviri kana kuti 36, 052. Vanhu vachiri kurwara munyika vave mazana manomwe nemakumi masere nevatanhatu kana kuti 786. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa kuti kusvika musi weSvondo vanhu vabayiwa nhomba munyika yose vainge vava zviuru mazana mashanu nepfumbamwe nemazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nevana kana kuti 509, 274. Pavanhu ava, vabayiwa nhomba kaviri sezvinokurudzirwa vave zviuru zana nemakumi mana nevasere nemazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nevana kana kuti 148, 564. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi senzira yekumisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi.

headline: Amai Mugabe Vokurudzira Murume Wavo Kudzinga Amai Mujuru
text: Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, vakurudzira murume wavo uye vari mutungamiri wenyika, Va Robert Mugabe, kuti vadzinge basa mutevedzeri wavo, Amai Joice Mujuru, avo vavari kupomera mhosva yekuronga zvekubvisa Va Mugabe pachigaro vachishandisa chisimba. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita neMuvhuro nevadzidzi vemuzvikori zvepamusoro soro pamwe nevatsigiri ve Zanu PF, Amai Mugabe vakurudzira VaMugabe kuti vadzinge basa Amai Mujuru avo vavave nenguva vachiti vanofanira kusiya basa. Zvichitevera mashoko akabuda mubepanhau re Sunday Mail neSvondo ekuti Amai Mujuru vaironga zvekuuraya VaMugabe, Amai Mugabe vati vane humbowo hwevhidhiyo inoburitsa pachena kuti Amai Mujuru vairongawo kuvauraya ivo pachezvavo. Vati Amai Mujuru vari kupihwa mari nehurumende dzekunze yavari kushandisa muhurongwa hwekuda kubvisa hurumende zvisiri pamutemo Vaenderera mberi vachiti nekuda kweizvi, Amai Mujuru vanofanirwa kusungwa vachipomerwa mhosva yekuda kupidigura hurumende. Vatiwo kubva zvavakagadzwa semutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, hapana chavakaita chinoratidza kuti vaimirira zvido zvemadzimai munyika. Vatiwo vachashanda zvakasimba kuti makurukota ese ehurumende pamwe nevatevedzeri vaVa Mugabe vachasarudzwa pakongiresi ye Zanu PF vanogona kuvadzingisa zvakare kana vasiri kuita zvinhu nemazvo. Tabata Amai Mujuru kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi, asi vakati vari mumusangano vachatifonera kana vapedza zvavari kuita. Asi mashoko avakaburitsa nezuro anoti havana chavanoziva nezvenyaya dziri kutaurwa mazuvano naAmai Mugabe pamwe nevamwe vari muZanu PF avo vari kuvapomera mhosva yehuori, kusagona basa pamwe nekutengesa kune venyika dzekunze. Vanoti vakatosvitsa nyaya iyi kumagweta avo kuti atore matanho pamusana pekusvibiswa kuri kuitwa zita ravo. Zvichakadai, mutungamiri wesangano re Zimbabwe Congress of Students iro rinobuda pachena kuti rinotsigira Zanu PF, Va Leopold Chakanyuka, vaudza vanhu vanga vari pamusangano uyu kuti gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro, Amai Olivia Muchena, pamwe negurukota rinoona nezvevechidiki, Va Francis Nhema, vanofanira kusiya mabasa avo nhasi chaiye vachipomera vaviri ava mhosva yekusakoshesa zvido pamwe nezvirongwa zvevechidiki pamwe nevadziddzi. Zvichakadai, Amai Mugabe vati vanhu vese vari kutsigira Amai Mujuru vachatorerwa matanho akaomarara mu Zanu PF. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokomekedza Mapazi Ayo Kuti Aferefete Kupambwa kwaDr Magombeyi
text: Dare remakurukota razeya nyaya yachiremba akapembwa nemusi weMugovera, Dr Peter Magombeyi, uye raita chisungo chekuti mapazi ese ehurumende anoona nezvekuchengetedzwa nekudzvirirwa kwenyika, atsvage kuti chiremba ava vari kupi. Izvi zvaziviswa nevakasanobata chinzvimbo chemugurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaKazembe Kazembe, avo vati vese vane chavanoziva nenyaya iyi vanofanira kuenda nehumbo kumapurisa. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo negurukota rinoona nezvevasori, VaOwen Ncube, avo vati hurumende inoshushikana kuti nyaya yekuti vanhu vanonzi vapambwa panennge pave kuda kuitwa misangano yakakosha. Gurukota rezvedzidzo, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavhima, vati vanhu vanofanira kupa hurumende nguva yekuita ongororo vachiti pari zvino zvave kuita sekuti hurumende inoziva kuti Dr Magombeyi vari kupi. Vana chiremba vemuzvipatara zvese munyika vave kuramwa mabasa vachiti Dr Magamboyi ngavadzorwe vasati vadzokera kumabasa. Gurukota rezvehutano, Dr Obadiaha Moyo, vati vanoshushikana zvikuru kuti vashandi vave vashoma muzvipatara uye vati vave kubatsira nemapurisa nemasoja. Dr Magombeyi, avo vanove vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, vakapambwa nemusi weMugovera usiku nevanhu vatatu sekutaura kwavakaita panguva yavakapambwa. Vasati vapambwa, Dr Magombeyi vakaudza vamwe vavo kuti vari kugara vakatyityidzirwa nevanhu vanogara vachivatumira mashoko panharembozva yavo. Pava nevanhu vanodarika makumi mashanu vapambwa kubva kutanga kwegore rino. Vanhu ava vanosanganisira mutungamiri weAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaOrbert Masaraure, pamwe nevarwiri vekodzero dzavanhu vanosanganisira VaTinashe Mombeyarara nevamwe. Zvichakadai, dare remakurukota rawedzerawo mari dzinotambirwa nevashandi vemudzimba richiti vanhu vanofanira kubhadhara vashandi mari dzinoenderana nemamiriro aita zvinhu munyika. Mari yemushandi wemumba yepasi pasi yave zana nemakumi matanhatu emadhora pamwedzi.

headline: Mutewedzeri weMutungamiri weZanu PF, VaMohadi, Vokurudzira Vanhu Kunyoresa Kuvhota
text:
Mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri webato reZanu PF, VaKembo Mohadi, vanoti
zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vanyorese kuvhota kuitira kuti vagokwanisa kuvhotera vatungamiri vavanoda pazvigaro zvakasiyana siyana. 

Vachitaura muBulawayo nhasi masikati pamusangano wekutsvaga rutsigiro musarudzo dzema by-election dziri kuitwa muna Kurume, VaMohadi vati vafara zvikuru kuti vatsigiri
vebato ravo reZanu PF vaungana nehuwandu hwavo pamusangano uyu.

Asi VaMohadi vati hazvibatsiri kuti vanhu vangouya kumisangano yakadai
vasina kunyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. Vati zvakakosha kuti vanhu vavhote kuti vagokwanisa kusarudza vatungamiri vavanoda kuti vapinde pazvigaro zvakasiyana siyana zvekumiririra vanhu.

Sachigaro weZanu PF mudunhu reBulawayo, VaJabulani Sibanda, vati
migwagwa yemuguta reBulawayo yaparara uye maindasitiri akawanda
haachashandi vakati bato ravo rine hurongwa hwakajeka hwekumutsiridza
hupfumi hwenyika. Vakurudzirawo vatsigiri vebato ravo kuti vanyorese kuti
vagokwanisa kuvhota.

VaFreedom Murechu, vanove sachigaro wevechidiki mudunhu reBulawayo
vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kukurudzira vechidiki kunyanya kuti
vanyorese kuvhota nekuti kusanyoresa kwavo kunogona kuita kuti matunhu
eMatabeleland azove nevamiriri vashoma.

VaBlessing Chebundo, avo vakave nhengo yeZanu PF mushure mekuve mumwe
wevanhu vakavamba bato reMDC, vati pane vamwe vanhu vakawanda vanovati
mutengesi asi vati ivo vanopokana nazvo.

Vati vakayambuka kuenda kubato reZanu PF nekuti vakaona kuti bato iri
rave negwara rakanaka rekuti nyika ibudirire.

Dunhu reBulawayo rine matunhu maduku maviri kana kuti constituency achaitwa sarudzo dzeparamende anoti Nkulumane nePumula South uye mawadhi ekanzuru maviri. No media source currently available

headline: Madzimai Oronga Zvinopa Mari kuBotswana
text: Madzimai anobva kuZimbabwe ari kushanda nekugara muBotswana anoti akaumba sangano ravo rinonzi Zimbabwe Business Women in Botswana. Chinangwa chesangano iri ndechekupangana mazano munyaya dzehupfumi kuitira kuti madzimai aya akwanise kuriritira mhuri dzavo. Madzimai aya anoti donzvo ravo nderekukurudzirana semadzimai anhasi kuti vashande nesimba kuitira kuti hupenyu hwavo huchinje mukuita zviri nani. Muzvare Pretty Ganyani, avo vakaronga pfungwa yekuunganidza madzimai aya, vanoti vanowirirana nemashoko anoti gona rehupfumi idikita, izvo zvakapa kuti vazvipire kuita chero chinovapa kurarama kwakanaka. Muzvare Ganyani vanoti nhengo zhinji dzesangano ravo vanhu vaishanda mudzimba dzevanhu, asi vakaona kuti hazvina pundutso mukusimudzira hupenyu hwavo. Imwewo nhengo yesangano iri, Amai Ritah Willie, avo vane makore makumi matatu nematatu, vanoti sangano ravo rakavabatsira kuti vakwanise kutenga mota yavo uye kutengera vabereki nehama chikafu chekudya pakirisimusi. Imwe nhengo yesangano iri, Amai Headwick Majoni, vanotiwo sangano iri rakavamutsa muhope zvikuru munyaya dzekusagarira maoko. Vanoti vava kuzivawo kunomira mumutsetse yekubhanga nokuda kwesangano iri, iro vanoshandisa mukuchengeta mari vachizogovana mukupera kwegore. Kunyange hazvo zvinhu zviri kuvafambira, Amai Mujoni vanoti vanosanganawo nematambudziko ekutengesa zvizere zvimwe zvinhu zvavanogadzira. Nokubudirira kuri kuita chirongwa chesangano ravo, madzimai aya anoti vanoona ramangwana ravo rakajeka vachiti chinangwa chavo ndechekuita mabhizinesi ane mukurumbira nekupindana kwenguva. No media source currently available

headline: America Yowedzera VaMnangagwa neVamwe Vavo Zvirango kweGore
text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden vawedzera negore zvirango zvakatamerwa mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakuru muhurumende mavo nemauto nenyaya yavari kupomerwa yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Mumashoko kudare reCongress kuti riwedzere zvirango izvi, VaBiden vati: “Gore rose rapera vanoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika yeZimbabwe, mapurisa, nevasori vange vachimbunyikidza vanhu uye kuita mhirizhonga yakananga nemapato anopikisa, vamiriri vevashandi uye vatori venhau.” Vaenderera mberi vachiti, “Kushaikwa kweshanduko inoremekedza mutemo, hutongo hwejekerere, uye kodzero dzevanhu kuri kusiya vana veZimbabwe vari panguva yakaoma uye zvave kukonzera kusagadzikana kwedunhu rekuchamembe kweAfrica.” Asi hurumende yeZimbabwe inoti yakatemerwa zvirango nekuda kwekuti yakatora minda kubva kuvachena ichipa vatema. Kubva muna 2020 vakawedzera pamazita evakatemerwa zvirango vanosanganisira VaAnsele Sanyatwe vaive mukuru wemauto uye vave mumiriri weZimbabwe kuTanzania, vaive gurukota rezvevasori VaOwen Ncube uye VaKudakwashe Tagwirai muzvinabhizimisi vari chipangamazano chaVaMnangagwa.

headline: Meya veVictoria Falls, VaDlamini, Vanosungwa neZACC Vachipomerwa Kuita zveHuwori
text: Meya veguta reVictoria Falls, VaSomvelo Dlamini vanonzi vakasungwa neMugovera nemapurisa eZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission, ZACC, vachipomerwa mhosva dzekuita zvehuwori munyaya dzenzvimbo dzekuvakira dzimba. Vane ruzivo nezvenyaya iyi vasina kuda kudomwa nemazita vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaDlamini, vanove vebato reMDC Alliance, vakasungwa vachipomerwa mhosva nhatu, yekutanga iri yekuti vakatengeserwa nzvimbo yekuvakira imba nemari iri pasi mushure mekunge vasarudzwa kuve kanzura, sezvinofanirwa kuita pamutemo, asi ivo vanonzi vakaitengesa. Mhoasva yepiri inonzi ndekutengesa kwavanonzi vakaita imwezve nzvimbo yekuvakira bhizimusi yavakanga vawana kukanzuru. Mhosva yetatu iri kupomerwa VaDlamini inonzi yakauya mushure mekunge vaedza kuwana imwe nzvimbo yekuvakira imba vachishandisa zita remudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Auxilia Mnangagwa. Vanonzi vari kutarisirwa kumiswa pamberi pedare mangwana. Mutauriri weZACC uye vari komishina, VaJohn Makamure, vatenda kuStudio 7 kuti VaDlamini vakasungwa, asi vati havagoni kutaura nezvemhosva dzavari kupomerwa sezvo vanga vasati vaverenga gwaro remhosva dzacho, kana kuti charge sheet.

headline: MDC Inopemberera Kusvitsa Makore Makumi Maviri Yaumbwa
text: Bato reMDC raita mhemberero munhandare yeRufaro yekusvitsa makore makumi maviri kubva parakaumbwa muna Gunyana 1999. Asi mhemberero idzi dzisati dzatanga, mapurisa afumobata jongwe muromo ndokuvhara muzinda webato iri weMorgan Tsvangirai House uye abva azara mumigwagwa yose yeHarare kusanganisira uko kunhandare yeRufaro kuMbare kwange kuchiitirwa musangano uyu, Mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vati havana kufara nezvange zvaitwa nemapurisa zvekuvhara muzinda wavo. Vachitaura kumhomho yevatsigiri vavo vanga vari muRufaro, Chamisa vati vanoda kuita hurukuro nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, asi vati vanoda kugovana njere, kwete masimba. VaChamisa vatiwo nhaurirano dziri kuitwa pari zvino naVaMnangagwa nemamwe mapato anopikisa, kutungana kwembudzi. Mutungamiri weMDC ataurawo nezvenhoroondo yebato rake. VaChamisa vavimbisawo kuti bato ravo rechine hurongwa hwekuratidzira zviri pamutemo kunyange pari zvino vari kurambidzwa nemapurisa ayo ari kuti anotya kuti vanozopanywa zvinhu. Asi danho iri riri kushorwa nevemapato anorwira kodzero dzevanhu munyika nekunze achiti kutyora bumbiro remitemo. Vamwe vataura pamhemberero idzi vanosanganisa vatungamiri vesangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, sangano revadzidzi reZimbabwe National Students Union, nemamwe masangano akazvimirira. Mumiriri weNorton mudare reparamende, VaTemba Mliswa, vataurawo pachiitiko ichi asi havana kutambirwa nevanopikisa avo vatanga kuita ruzha kuti vasataure. Vamiriri venyika dziri muEuropean Union, Netherlands, nevange vakamirira mumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe, nevamwe vanyarikani, vange vari pamhemberero idzi. Vanhu vange vachifadzwawo nenzimbo kubva kune vaimbi vakawanda vanosanganisira Baba Harare, Beverly Sibanda, Shinsoman, Tryson Chimbetu nevamwe. Bato reMDC rakaumbwa muna Gunyana 1999 richitungamirwa namuchakabvu Morgan Tsvangirai avo varumbidzwa zvikuru nevatauri vakawanda. Vanhu vaive muhutungamiri hwebato parakavambwa vachiri muhutungamiri pari zvino ndiVaChamisa, avo vakava sachigaro wekutanga wevechidiki mubato, pamwe nemumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri webato, VaWelshman Ncube, avo vakava munyori mukuru wekutanga webato iri muna 1999. Vamwe vaive muhutungamiri hwebato muna 1999, ndimuchakabvu Gibson Sibanda, avo vaive mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato, muchakabvu Isaac Matongo, avo vaive sachigaro; muchakabvu Learnmore Jongwe, avo vaive mutauriri webato; muchakabvu Roy Bennett, avo vaive mubati wehomwe. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaJoe Biden, Vove Pakati peVatungamiri veDzimwe Nyika Vari KuBritain paKuvigwa kwaMambokadzi Elizabeth Vepiri
text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden nemudzimai wavo Amai Jill Biden vari muLondon kurufu rwaMambokadzi Elizabeth Vepiri, avo vari kutarisirwa kuradzikwa nhasi kuKing George VI Memorial Chapel. VaBiden, avo vakasvika kuBritain neMugovera, nezuro vanyorawo mashoko avo enyaradzo mubhuku rekuchema Mambokadzi. VaBiden ndemumwe wevatungamiri venyika dzakawanda vachange vari parufu rwaMambokadzi Elizabeth Vepiri pamwe nemadzimabo anobvawo kunyika dzakasiyanasiyana. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vari kumirirwa kurufu urwu negurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaFrederick Shava, sezvo ivo VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kunge vachienda kuNew York svondo rino kumusangano weUnited Nations Genreal Assembly, UNGA. Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muBritain, Doctor Simba Mavaza, vanoti kuvepo kwaVaBiden kurufu rwaMambokadzi Elizabeth Vepiri pamwe nekuradzikwa kwavo zvinoratidza kukosha kwehukama hwaivepo pakati paMambokadzi neAmerica, uye kudyidza kweBritain neAmerica. No media source currently available

headline: Dare Roudzwa Kuti VaMwonzora Vakayedza Kuruka Zano neveMajeri Kuti Vaone VaSikhala Avo Vakatsika Madziro
text: Amai Beatrice Mtetwa gweta rine mukurumbira munyika riri kumiririra VaJob Sikhala vanomiririra Zengeza West mudare reparamende naVaGodfrey Sithole vanomirira Chitungwiza North, vaudza dare ramejastiriti kuti vakuru vemajeri vakayedza kumanikidza vaviri ava kuti vaite musangano nemutungamiri weMDC-T VaDouglas Mwonzora kujeri reChikurubi. VaSithole naVaSikhala inhengo dzebato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change. VaMwonzora vanonzi vakangoenda kuChikurubi vasina kukokwa vakaudzwa naVaSikhala naVaSithole kuti vaisada kuvaona. Amai Mtetwa vanoti kunyangwe vakaita saVaMwonzora vakabvumidzwa kupinda mujeri iri kuti vaone vasungwa, mudzimai waVaSikhala, Amai Ellen Sikhala , dzimwe hama dzavo uye vanachiremba, magweta avo nemutungamiri webato ravo VaNelson Chamisa vairambidzwa kuvaona. Vemajeri vanonzi vakange vatogadzirawo nzvimbo yekutandarira yakanaka kuti VaMwonzora vasangane naVaSikhala naVaSithole asi vaviri ava vakaramba vakatsika madziro. Nyaya yekurambidzwa kuona hama, magweta navanachiremba iyi ndiyo yakapa kuti magweta aVaSikhala aendese vemajeri kudare ramejastiriti. Vachipa mutongo wavo panyaya yekurambidzwa kwevanhu kuona VaSikhala, mejastiriti Trynos Utahwashe vakati hama dzavo, magweta uye vanachiremba vanofanira kubvumidzwa kuonekwa sezviri mubumbiro remitemo. Vatiwo VaSikhala naVaSithole vanofanira kubvumidzwa kupihwa chikafu, nehama neshamwari dzavo. Mudzimai waVaSikhala akarambidzwa kuvapa keke musi webhavhudhe ravo. Vachuchusi vehurumende havana kupisa mutongo uyu. Vachitaura neStudio 7 mutauriri webato reMDC-T VaWitness Dube vakati VaMwonzora vainge vaenda kuChikurubi nekuti ndivo vanotungamira nhengo dzeparamende dzinopikisa mudare iri. VaSikhala, VaSithole nedzimwe nhengo dzeCCC gumi neshanu vakasungwa kuNyatsime, Chitungwiza vachipomerwa mhosva yekuda kupesvedzera mhirizhonga. Izvi zvakatevera kupondwa kwainge kwaitwa imwe nhengo yeCCC Muzvare Moreblessing Ali. VaSikhala igweta remhuri yaMuzvare Ali.

headline: Vagari vemuHarare Vokumbira Kuti Nguva yeKubayiwa Nhomba yeTyphoid Iwedzerwe
text: Vamwe vagari vemuHarare vari kukumbira hurumende kuti iwedzere nguva yechirongwa chekuti vanhu vabaiwe nhomba yekudzivirira chirwere chetyhoid nedzimwe nhomba dzezvimwe zvirwere sezvo chisina kushambadzirwa zvakakwana. Guta reHarare ndiro rine dambudziko guru rechirwere chetyphoid munyika yose. Hutachiona hwetyphoid hunopa kuti munhu anzwe kupisa muviri, kuita manyoka uye kurutsa. Chirwere ichi chinokwanisa kutapuriranwa mumvura kana chikafu kana munhu asina kugeza maoko nemvura yakachena. Amai Juliana Musengi vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakamborwara neTyphoid katatu kubva zvavakatamira kuHarare vachibva kuMashonaland Central sezvo vachiti vainge vasingazive kuti mvura yemugurta haina kuchena. Vamwe vabereki vanonziwo vari kuramba kubayisa vana nhomba nekushaya ruzivo sezvo pasina kunyatsoshambadzirwa nekupihwa dzidziso yakakwana. Sachigaro weWomens Coalition Harare Chapter, Amai Charity Mandishona vakarudzira vabereki kuti vabayise vana nhomba vachiti kusaita izvi kunoisa hupenyu hwavo munjodzi yekufa kana kuremara. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano inoshanda mukanzuru yeHarare Dr Michael Vere vati chirongwa chekubaya nhomba ichi chinosanganisirawo kubayiwa majekiseni egomarara nezvimwe uye vanoti chirongwa ichi chakatanga musi wa4 Chivabvu chikapera musi wa 4 Chikumi. Doctor Vere vati vari kufara nekutambirwa kuri kuitwa nhomba yeHPV yekudzivirira gomarara repamuromo wechibereko. Mukuru mubazi rezvirwere zvekutapuriranwa kana kuti Department of Chemical Pathology paUniversity of Zimbabwe, Muzvinafundo Hilda Matarira vatiwo kuwandisa kwaita vanhu muHarare nekushaikwa kwemvura yakachena ndiko kwave kupa kuti vanhu varware netyphoid. Kubva muna 2010, chirwere cheTyphoid chakatanga kupararira zvakanyanya muZimbabwe uye muna 2018 bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu zviuru zvina kana kuti 4000 kusanganisira vana vakabatwa nechirwere uye vanodarika zvikamu makumi manomwe nezvitatu kubva muzana kana kuti 73% vari muHarare. Rimwe dambudziko range rave rekuti chirwere ichi chainge chisidadavire mimwe mishonga. Asi ikozvino vana ava vari kubayiwa nhomba inonzi inoshanda zvakanaka kudzivirira kuparira kwechirwere ichi inonzi Typhoid Conjugate Vaccine kana kuti TCV. Nhomba yeTVC iyi yakatanga kubayiwa munyika muna 2019, paine chinangwa chekubaya nhomba vana mamiriyoni matanhatu nezviuru mazana maviri kana kuti 6, 2 million. Vana vari kubayiwa vari pakati pemwedzi mipfumbamwe nemakore gumi nemashanu. Asi chirongwa change chambomiswa sezvo hurumende yange yorwisa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Hurumende iri kushanda nesangano rePATH kuti vanhu vawane nhomba iyi. No media source currently available

headline: MDC-T Yoyambirwa Kusaita Rusarura Rudzi Kuitira Kuti Ibatane Zvakasimba
text: Apo makakatanwa ari mubato reMDC T ave kukonzera mhirizhonga pakati pevamwe vakuru vakuru nevamwe vatsigiri vebato iri vamwe vanhu vanoti vatungamiri mune zvematongerwo enyika vanofanirwa kuita zvose zvavanogona kuti pasave nekusarurana kuchishandiswa marudzi munyika sezvo izvi zvichigona kuparadza nyika. Nyanzvi mumitauro uye vanoshandawo neChris Hani Institute kuSouth Africa, VaSamukele Haedebe, vanoti kupatsanurana kuchishandiswa marudzi idambudziko ragara riripo pasi rose uye muAfrica. Vanoti dambudziko iri rinoramba riripo nekuda kwekuti marudzi akasiyana-siyana akabataindzwa pamwe chete kuve munyika dzakasiyana-siyana dzakavepo mushure mekuwana kuzvitonga. VaHadebe vanoti vanhu vakatungamira mukuti nyika dzemuAfrica dziwane kuzvitonga vakadai saana mushakabvu Joshua Nkomo vainzwisisa dambudziko iri ndosaka vaiedza pose pavaigona napo kuti vanhu vasazvipatsanura kuchishandiswa marudzi. Vakanangana nekurwisana kuri kuitika mubato reMDC T uko kunonzi nevamwe kwave kutora ruvara rwemarudzi, VaHadebe avo vanoti vakashanda namushakabvu VaMorgan Tsvangirai pamwe naMuzvare Thokozani nevamwe vakuru vakuru vebato iri, vanoti vanorwadziwa zvikuru kuwona kurwisana uku. Vanoti sekuziva kwavo, mushakabvu pamwe naMuzvare Khupe vanhu vasaita zvekusarura vanhu vachishandisa rudzi. VaHadebe vanoti kune vanhu vakawanda vanogona kuda kushandisa nyaya yemarudzi kuti vawane rutsigiro mune zvematongerwo enyika asi vanoti zvakakosha kuti vatungamiri vave vanobuda pachena vachishora nyaya iyi nekuti inogona kuparadza nyika. VaHadebe vanoti VaNkomo naVaTsvangirai vanhu vakapa mucherechedzo wekuti vatungamiri vanogona kuwana rutsigiro kubva kune veruzhinji zvisinei nerudzi, vachitiwo vanhu vanofanirwa kukoshesa mucherechedzo wakadaro. Mutauriri webato reZAPU, VaIpithule Maphosa, vanoti semaonero avo, mhodzi yerusarura kuchishandiswa marudzi munyika yakasimwa apo vatungamiri vehondo yerusunguko vakabuda mubato reZAPU vachinovamba bato reZANU mugore ra1963. Vanoti rusarura urwu rwakazonyanya kuwedzera panguva yehutongi hwevamboive mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. VaMaphosa vanoti kushandisa nyaya yerudzi mune zvematongerwo enyika itsika inoratidza kuve kumashuresa munyaya dzebudiriro vachitiwo vanhu, kunyanya vatungamiri mune zvematongerwo enyika, vanofanirwa kugara vachitaura pachena nezvekuipa kwerusarura rwakadai. Vanoti munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vanhu vanofanirwa kusarudzwa kuve vatungamiri nekuda kwezvavanoziva kana zvavanogona kwete kuti ndeve rudzi rupi. VaMaphosa vanoti vanhu vanofanirwa kudzidza pane zvakaitika pakurayana kwakaita vanhu muRwanda mugore ra1994 pakati pevanhu munyika iyi verudzi rwechiHutu neverudzi rwechiTutsi kwakaurayisa mazana nemazana ezviuru zvevanhu. VaTyanai Masiya avo vanodzidzisa public administration paUniversity of Pretoria muSouth Africa, vanoti vanoona kupokana kuri kuitika iko zvino mubato reMDC T kune chekuita nenyaya yemarudzi. Vanoti hazvishamise kuti mune zvematongerwo enyika vamwe vanhu vashandise nyaya yemarudzi asi vanoti iyi haizi tsika yakanaka. VaMasiya vanoti vanhu vanogona kudzidza zvakawanda kubva kunhoroondo yaVaBarak Obama avo vakambove mutungamiri weAmerica zvisinei kuti ndeve rudzi rwechitema urwo rwunove nevanhu vasina kunyanya kuwanda munyika iyi zvichienzaniswa nemamwe marudzi. MuMDC T muri kuita makakatanwa ekuti ndiyani wotungamira bato iri mushure mekufa kwevaive mutungamiri webato iri, VaMorgan Tsvangirai uye makakatanwa aya ave kukonzera mhirizhonga pakati pevatsigiri VaNelson Chamisa neVaMuzvare Khupe. VaChamisa vanoti ndivo mutungamiri webato iri mushure mekudomwa neNational Council yebato iri. Asi Muzvare Khupe vanoti zvakaitwa izvi hazvisi pamutemo uye ndivo vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri webato sezvo vari ivo vakasarudzwa semutevedzeri waVaTsvangirai pakongiresi yakaitwa mugore ra2014. No media source currently available

headline: VaDos Santos Varadzikwa Nhasi Vopinda Muchikwata cheVatungamiri veNyika dzemuAfrica Kusanganisira VaMugabe Vakafira Kunyika Dzakabudirira
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vabatana nhasi kuLuanda, Angola nevamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica parufu rwevaive mutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaJose Eduardo dos Santos avo vakashayikira kuSpain musi wa 8 Chikunguru. VaDos Santos varadzikwa nhasi pazuva ravangadai vasvitsa makore makumi masere. Vamwe vatungamiri vange vari parufu apa vanosanganisira VaCyril Ramaphosa, South Africa, VaFelix Tshisekedi, DRC, uye mutungamiri wePortugal VaMarcelo Rebelo de Sousa. VaDos Santos vari pakati pevatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vakafira kunyika dzekumawirira nekumabudazuva vachirapwa sezvo zvipatara zvakawanda munyika dzavo nemuAfrica zvisina zvikwanisiro. Vamwe vatungamiri vakafira kunze vanosanganisira VaRobert Mugabe vakafira kuSingapore, VaLevy Mwanawasa vekuZambia vakafira kuFrance, VaMichael Sata vekuZambia zvekare vakafira kuBritain, VaMeles Zenawi vekuEthiopia vakafira kuBelgium, VaUmaru Musa Yar’Adua vekuNigeria vakafira kuSaudi Arabia. Ko chii chinopa kuti vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vanorapwa kunze kana vachinge varwara uye dzimwe nguva kufa vari kunyika dzakabudirira? Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano munguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa Dr Henry Madzorera vaudza Studio 7 kuti vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica havaendese mari kumapazi ezvehutano sezvinosungirwa nechibvumirano chavakanyorerana cheAbuja Declaration. Chibvumirano ichi chinokurudzira hurumende kuti dziendese zvikamu gumi nezvishanu kubva muzana zvebhajeti kubazi rezvehutano. No media source currently available

headline: Kushungurudzwa kweZvizvarwa zveKunze Zvichirambidzwa Kupinda muZvipatara neChikwata cheOperation Dudula muSouth Africa kwoenderera Mberi
text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muSouth Africa zvinoti zvinhu hazvichina kumira zvakanaka sezvo nyaya dzekushungurudzwa nezvizvarwa zvenyika iyi dziri kuenderera mberi, kunyange hazvo hurumende dzenyika mbiri idzi dziri kuti dziri kutaurirana. Nhengo dzechikwata cheOperation Dudula, icho chiri kurwisa kuti zvizvarwa zvekunze kweSouth Africa zvibude munyika iyi, dzaenderera mberi nekurambidza vekunze kupinda muzvipatara nemakiriniki zvehurumende zviri muJohannesburg nemuPretoria. Chikwata ichi changa chakamira pamikova yemakiriniki ari muJohannesburg anosanganisira Hillbrow Community Health Centre, uye chinonzi chakatanga kurambidza vekunze kupinda muzvipatara neMuvhuro apo chakavhara mukova wechipatara chikuru cheKalafong Provincial Tertiary Hospital chiri mudunhu re Gauteng. Nhengo dzebato rinopikisa reEconomic FreedomFighters (EFF) dzinonzi dzanga dziri pachipatara ichi neChitatu dzakagarira veOperation Dudula ava kuti vasarambidza varwere kupinda muchipatara ichi. Izvi zviri kuuya mushure mekunge mumwe mukuru wezvehutano mudunhu reLimpopo, Dr. Phophi Ramathuba svondo rapera vanyadzisa chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chairwara chiri mune chimwe chipatara mudunhu iri vachiti vekunze vari kupedzera vemuSouth Africa mishonga nezvikwanisiro. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende kanawo mapurisa panyaya iyi. Asi chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri muPretoria muSouth Africa, Mufundisi Richard Moyo, avo vari kutevera zviri kuitika, vanoti nhau iyi inhau inosiririsa uye kurwadza kuona zviri kuitwa vekunze nezvizvarwa zvaSouth Africa, uchiona kuti vari kushungurudzwa ava vanenge vari varwere kana vari kuperekedza varwere. Mufundisi Moyo vanoti kunyange hazvo mapurisa ari kuzama kubatsira, havaoni ari kuita zvinoita kuti kushungurudzwa uku kumiswe, vachiti vanopa mhosva yose iyi kuhurumende yeSouth Africa, iyo vanoti haisi kumisa chikwata cheOperation Dudula. No media source currently available

headline: Amai Makarau Vobvuma Kuti Chirongwa cheBVR Chine Zvinetswa
text: Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, Amai Rita Makarau, vanoti matambudziko ari kusangana nevanhu vari kuvhota vange vakaatarisira sezvo chirongwa chavo chekunyoresa vavhoti chichiri kutanga. ZEC yakatanga kunyoresa vanhu kuvhota nemusi weMuvhuro kunyange hazvo vamwe vari kuchema chema kuti havana ruzivo rwakakwana nezvechirongwa ichi. Mimwe michina inonzi yange ichimboramba kushanda zvakanaka kumatunhu makumi matanhatu nematatu munyika yose. Amai Makarau vasimbisawo kuti vanhu vanokwanisa kunyoresa nezvitupa zvesimbi uye vanofanira kuuya netsamba dzinoratidza kwavanogara kuti vakwanise kukurumidza kunyoreswa. ZEC inoti inotarisira kuti muchina mumwe chete unge uchinyoresa vanhu makumi masere pazuva. No media source currently available

headline: Mumwe Mudzimai weChidiki Ofa neCovid-19 muHarare
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti mumwe mudzimai wemuHararare ane makore makumi maviri nerimwe okuberekwa akashaya nemusi weMugovera nechirwere cheCovid19. Mudzimai uyu anonzi ainge asina nhoroondo yekuenda kunze kwenyika zvinonzi navanachiremba zvinogona kureva kuti chirwere cheCovid19 chiri kutenderera munharaunda vanhu vasingazvizive. Pave nevanhu vasere vashaya munyika nekuda kwechirwere ichi. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi hwakwirawo kusvika pamazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemasere kana kuti 698. Izvi zvinotevera kubatwa kwevamwe vanhu makumi manomwe nevatatu nechirwere ichi neMugovera. Pavanhu ava, makumi mashanu nevashanu kana kuti 55 vakabva kuSouth Africa, vatatu kuBotwana, vamwe vatatu kuMozambique, vaviri kuAmerica mumwe chete kubva kuZambia uye vamwe vasere vakachitapurirwa munyika. Pavanhu vakabatwa nechirwere munyika vaviri ndivo chete vanozivikanwa kuti vakachiwana sei asi patotanga chipatapata chekutsvaga kuti vamwe vatnhatu vakachiwana sei. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi munyika izana nemakumi masere nemumwe kana kuti 181. Vanhu vavhenekewa chirwere ichi munyika vadarika zviuru makumi manomwe nemasere kana kuti 78 000. Kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kuri kuuya apo vashandi vakawanda vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vanachiremba nevakoti vari kuramwa mabasa vachiti mari yavari kutambiriswa ishoma zvikuru. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kugurukota rezvehutano Doctor Obadiah Moyo sezvo vasati vapindura mibvunzo yatakavatumira. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Edgar Munatsi vanoti kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kuSouth Africa avo vanodarika zviuru zana zvine makumi masere nemasere kana kuti 188 000, zvinhu zvinogona kuipirawo Zimbabwe. Vafa muSouth Africa vadarika zviuru zvitatu. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana mana ane makumi matanhatu nevatatu kana kuti 463, 000 vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muAfrica uye vashaya vadarika zviuru gumi nerimwe zvine makumi masere nematanhatu kana kuti 11, 086. Vapora vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri ane makumi maviri kana kuti 222,000. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni gumi nerimwe ane zviuru mazana maviri kana kuti 11,2 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi ichiteverwa neBrazil. Vanhu vafa muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana zvine makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 129, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana masere kana kuti 2,8 million. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nerimwe kana kuti 531,000. Vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni matanhatu kana kuti 6 million.

headline: VaMnangagwa Votura Mashoko kuNyika Vachiti Vari Kugadzirisa Hupfumi hweNyika
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mngangagwa neChina vakatura mashoko emamiriro akaita zvinhu pamwe nekuvhura zviri pamutemo chikamu chechitatu cheparamende yechipfumbamwe vachiti hurumende yavo iri mubishi kugadzirisa nhuna dzevashandi vayo pamwe nehupfumi hwenyika. Vachitaura vari kuState House, VaMnangagwa vati hurumende yavo iri kuedza nepainogona napo kugadzirisa nyaya dzemari yemihoro dzevashandi vayo avo vari kunyunyuta kuti mari dzavari kutambiriswa dzakafanana nemutero wembwa. VaMnangagwa vatiwo kunyange hazvo nyika yakatemerwa zvirango nenyika dzekumavirira, hupfumi hwenyika huri kuratidza kusimukira vachiti kusaenda-enda kwemagetsi kuri kuita kuti makambani anyatsoshanda zvakanaka izvo zvavati zviri kuita kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire zvichipa kuti mabasa awande munyika. Vakurudzira nyika dzakavatemera zvirango dzakaita sedziri muEU uye America kuti dzizvibvise . Vaenderera mberi vachiti kuvandudza kwavari kuita hupfumi hwenyika kuri kukonzera kuti nyika itenge zvinhu zvishoma kubva kunze uye kudzerawo zvairi kutengesa zvavati zviri kupa kuti nyika iwanewo mari yekunze yakawanda. Vati zvakare hurumende yavo ichaongorora mashandiro emasangano akazvimirira. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatswayo, vati zvataurwa naVaMnangagwa hazvina musoro sezvo veruzhinji munyika vari kunonga svosve nemuromo vasina kana mabasa acho. Vatiwo nhengo dzavo dziri mudare reparamende hadzina kuenda kudare reparamende uko kwanga kuine nhengo dzeZanu PF neMDCT inotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe dzanga dzichitevera zvanga zvichitaurwa naVaMnangagwa kuState House vachiti havacherechedze kusarudzwa kwaVaMnangagwa. Pamashoko avo anga akanangana nekuvhurwa kwechikamu chechitatu cheparamende yechipfumbamwe kana kuti 3rd Session of the 9th Parliament, VaMnangagwa vati mudare reparamende muchaunzwa mabhiri akawanda akanangana nekusiumidzirwa kweraramo yevanhu pamwe nehutongi hwejekere vakakurudzira nhengo dzeparamende kuti dzizeye mabhiri achauya aya nekukasika kuti igova mitemo yenyika. Vati dare reparamende rakapasisa mabhiri gumi chete pamakumi matatu nemapfumbamwe akaunzwa kudare iri. VaMnangagwa vati vakatarisirwa kuti paunzwewo mabhiri akanangana nezvevechidiki pamwe nekushanyirwa kwenyika uye rimwe bhiri rakananganawo nezvekuvandudzwa kwemitambo munyika pamusoro pemamwe mabhiri. Vachipeta mashoko avo, VaMnangagwa vakurudzirawo ruzhinji rweZimbabwe kuti rwubatane mukushanda zvakasimba kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Inoti Haisi Kuzopinda Mugungano RePOLAD
text: Mapato ezvematongerwo enyika ari mugungano re Political Actors Dialogue, kana kuti POLAD, anoti anoda kuita misangano nemasangano ekunze kwenyika anosanganisira SADC, African Union, European Union nenyika dziri mumubatanidzwa weUnited Nations kuti atsanangure zvavari kuita. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiriri weMDC-T, VaObert Gutu, vaudza bepanhau reHerald kuti nhengo dze POLAD dzinoda kubatsira hurumende mukuona kuti zvematongerwo enyika pamwe chete nekupindudzwa kwe bumbiro remitemo zvaitwa. Asi sachigaro weMDC North America inotungamirirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, VaTawanda Dzvokora, vanoti bato ravo harineyi nezviri kuitwa nePOLAD nekuti rinoziva zvinodiwa nevanhu. VaDzvokora vanoti POLAD haigoni kubudirira nekuti irikubatsira hurumende mukuita zvese zvisingadiwi nevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vanodarika Miriyoni Imwe Chete Vobayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19 Kaviri muNyika
text: Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 munyika kechipiri sezviri kukurudzirwa vadarika miriyoni imwe chete kunyangwe poita mutauro panyaya yekuti vanhu vomanikidzwa kubayiwa nhomba here kana kuti kwete. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana masere nemakumi mashanu nechimwe zvine mazana mana nemanomwe kana kuti 1, 851 407 vabayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kekutanga. Vamwe miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru zviviri nemazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu kana kuti 1002 261 vabayiwa nhomba kechipiri sezviri kukurudzirwa. Vanhu makumi maviri nemumwe kana kuti 21 vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 neMugovera zvasiya vanhu zviuru zvitatu nemazana masere nemakumi maviri nevatanhatu kana kuti 3, 826. Vanhu mazana mana nemakumi mana nevasere kana kuti 445 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi neMugovera wakare zvasiyawo vabatwa nacho vave zana negumi nemashanu zvine mazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe kana kuti 115, 890. Vanhu mazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe kana kuti 890 vakabatwa necchirwere ichi zvasiya vapora vave zviuru makumi masere nezvinomwe zvine mazana mana nagumi nevatanhatu kana kuti 87, 416.

headline: Munhu Mumwe Chete Ofa neCovid-19 kuBulawayo Asi kuMash.East neCental Hakuchina Ane Chirwere Ichi
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti munhu mumwe chete akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muBulawayo nMugovera. Izvi zvinoreva kuti vanhu vafa nyika yose vave mazana maviri nemakumi mana nevatatu kana kuti 243.
