Vanhu vashanu vakabatwawo nechirwere ichi uye vose vari muBulawayo makare munova mavakachitapurirwawo munharaunda zvekare. Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika vave zviuru zvisere nemazana matatu ane makumi matanhatu nemanomwe kana kuti 8, 367. Vanhu gumi vakaporawo kubva kuchirwere ichi, uye vanomwe vacho vari muBulawayo vamwe vatatu kuMasvingo. Vapora nyika yose vave zviuru zvinomwe nemazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevana kana kuti 7, 894. Vanhu vachiri kurwara mazana maviri nemakumi matatu kana kuti 230. Pavanhu vari kurwara ava, zana nevaviri kana kuti 102 vari muBulawayo uye makumi matanhatu nevatatu vari muHarare. Asi kuMashonaland East neMasvingo hakuchina kana munhu mumwe chete ari kurwara neCovid-19 parizvino. kuMashonaland Central kune munhu mumwe chete chete. Nezuro kwakavhenekwa vanhu mazana matanhatu nemakumi masere nemumwe kana kuti 681. Pavanhu ava, mazana mashanu nevatanhatu kana kuti 530 vari muHarare muBulawayo makumi mana nevapfumbamwe uye Manicaland makumi mapfumbamwe nevana. Ko chii chiri kupa kuti zvinhu zviite kunge zvisina kumira zvakanaka muBulawayo? Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano uye vakambotungamira Chitungwiza Hospital, Dr Enoch Mayida vanoti vamwe vanhu vanonzi vanenge vabatwa nechirere ichi muBulawayo vanenge vari vemumamwe maguta asi vavhenekerwa mudhorobha iri. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vagari vemuGweru Vochema Chema neMutengo weMagetsi
text: Vamwe vagari vemuGweru vanoti havasi kunzwisisa nezve mutengo mutsva wemagetsi zvisinei netsananguro yeveZimbabwe Electricity Supply Authority, vachitiwo magetsi aya ave kudhura zvakanyanya. Kutsutsumwa kwevamwe vagari ava kwabuda mushure memusangano waitwa nevagari nhasi nevagari nevamwe vakuru vakuru vekambani yeZESA. Mumwe mugari, Amai Patience Musambasi vati havana kugutsikana netsananguro yapihwa neveZESA. Vati magetsi ave kudhura vakatiwo kambani iyi yakaunza matengeserwo emagetsi matsva aya isina kupa vanhu dzidziso yakakwana pamusoro penyaya iyi. Ambuya Winfriedah Chimwango vati vave pamudyandigere vatsinhirawo kuti mutengo mutsva wemagetsi haunzwisisike vachitiwo magetsi ave kudhura zvoomesera varombo. Amai Immaculate Madzimure vati matengesero ave kuita veZesa magetsi ane hukoronyera mukati. Izvi zvatsinhirwavo naVaSimbarashe Chirara avo vati kunyange hazvo munhu akatenga magetsi emari yakawanda aunozowana ekushandisa chaiwo anenge ari mashoma. VaChirara vachema-chemawo nenyaya yekuti magetsi acho anogara asipo nguva zhinji. Mukuru anooona nezvekutengeswa kwemagetsi mudunhu rekuchamhembe kwenyika VaEdward Nyoni ndivo vange vakatungamira chikwata cheveZESA pamusangano uyu. Varamba kutaura neStudio 7 pamhepo sezvo vati havabvumirwe kutaura nevatori venhau. Mutauriri weZESA vaFullard Gqasira vanoti kambani yavo yakakwidza mutengo wemagetsi mwedzi wapera uye yave nematengesero ekuti munhu ukaramba uchitenga magetsi kakawanda mukati memwedzi mumwe chete, mutengo wemagetsi aya unoramba uchikwira. Nemusi weChishanu veruzhinji vakaungana pamahofisi eZesa munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana munyika vachida kunzwisisa nezvemutengo wemagetsi mutsva uyu. Zesa inoti inotarisira kuti mhuri yega yega inoshandisa zvikamu mazana maviri zvemagetsi mukati memwedzi mumwe chete. Magetsi aya anotengeswa nemari inoita mashereni makumi mana pazvikamu makumi mashanu zvekutanga (41 cents for the first 50 units) uye mashereni makumi mapfumbamwe nesendi rimwe chete pazvikamu zana nemakumi mashanu zvinotevera. Kana munhu ukapfuudza zvikamu mazana maviri zvinotarsisirwa kuti ushandise pamwedzi unenge wave kuzotenga chikamu chimwe chete chemagetsi nemadhora matatu mashereni makumi masere nemasendi mapfumbamwe ($3.89 per every unit.) Mune imwewo nyaya vamwe vagari vemuGweru vari kuchema-chema kuti vashandi vekanzuru vari kuvabvisira mametre emvura pamba pavo vachinzi vane zvikwereti. Amai Ruth Dube vati vakabvisirwa mita yavo zvisinei nekuti vaiva vawirirana nekanzuru kuti vaizobhadhara chikwereti chavainacho zvishoma-nezvishoma. Muzvare Tariro Kaseke vati vakabvisirwa mita yemvura yepamba pavo zvisinei nekuti vaive vakabhadhara chiwereti chavainzi vaive nacho kukanzuru. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kukanzuru yeGweru panyaya iyi. Asi vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori wekanzuru VaDouglas Chikwekwe vakabuda pane imwe nhepfenyuro yemuGweru mazuva mashoma apfuura vachikumbira ruregerero pamusoro penyaya iyi vachiti hauzi mutemo wekanzuru kubvisira vagari vane zvikwereti kukanzuru mametre emvura ari padzimba dzavo. No media source currently available

headline: Dare Rinopa Mutongo Unoti Vechidiki Vakatora Muzinda weMorgan Tsvangirai House neSvondo Vabviswe
text: Dare ramejasitiriti muHarare rakatura neChipiri mutongo wekuti bato reMDC-T iri kufanotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe ribvise vechidiki vanonzi ndivo vakabvuta muzinda weMorgan Richard Tsvangirai House uri muHarare neSvondo vachiti vanobuda chete mumuzinda uyu kana vakuru vemapato eMDC-T neMDC Alliance iri kutungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa vatauarirana kuti vashande pamwechete zvakare. Vechidiki ava vanoti vari kutevera mutongo wedare reSupreme Court wekuti vaive nezvigaro muna 2014 vafambise mabasa muMDC-T, vachiti ndivo vaive pazvigaro gore iri. Bato reMDC-T pamwe nemunyori mukuru waro, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vakakwira dare neMuvhuro vachikwirira bato reMDC Alliance, VaChamisa, VaPaul Gorekore, VaHappymore Chidziva, VaDenford Ngadziore pamwe nemukuru wemapurisa mudunhu reHarare. MDC-T yakatora muzinda uyu kubva kuMDC Alliance muna Chikunguru ichibatsirwa nemapurisa. Mutongi wedare akati vashanu vekutanga vakakwirirwa dare vanofanirwa kudzosera muzinda uyu kuMDC-T, uye vaburitse muhutapwa vanhu vanonzi vakavharirwa mumuzinda uyu. Tabata VaMwonzora kuti tinzwe divi rebato ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatywayo, vanoti vakatoshamiswa nekuona mutongo uyu uchiisawo bato ravo pamwe nemutungamiri wavo VaChamisa mukati sezvo vasineyi nechekuita nezviri kuita pamuzinda weMorgan Richard Tsvangirai House. VaHlatywayo vanoti vakangonzwawo kuti muzinda uyu wakatorwa nevechidi vaiti ndivo vaive pazvigaro muna 2014 pakaitwa kongiresi yebato iri. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weTogo Anovhura ZITF Vanorwira Kodzero Vachinyunyuta
text: Mutungamiri we Togo, VaFaure Gnassingbe, vavhura Zimbabwe International Trade Fair, ZITF, zviri pamutemo muBulawayo vachikurudzira vanhu vemuZimbabwe kuti varambe vakashinga kunyange hazvo vakatemerwa zvirango nenyika dzekunze. Mutungamiri we Togo, VaFaure Gnassingbe, vavhura Zimbabwe International Trade Fair, ZITF, zviri pamutemo muBulawayo vachikurudzira vanhu vemuZimbabwe kuti varambe vakashinga kunyange hazvo vakatemerwa zvirango nenyika dzekunze. Vati nyika yavo yeTogo yakambotemerwawo zvirango pane imwe nguva. VaGnassingbe vange vachifamba nemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe. Nyika dzinosvika gumi nepfumbamwe dzange dzichiratidzira kumusika mukuru uyu, uye dzinosanganisira, Russia, Botswana, Cyprus, China, Ethiopia ne Germany. Mutungamiri weTogo akurudzirawo Zimbabwe nenyika dzemuAfrica kuti dzikoshese kukwenenzvera zvigadzirwa zvadzinotengesa kuti dzikwanisewo kubudirira. VaGnassingbe vapawo mibayiro kumakambani anonzi akagona kushongeza zvinhu anosanganisira yaVaMugabe yeAlpha Omega Dairy, Delta Corporation, bazi rezvekurima, redzidzo, nemamwe. Asi havasi vanhu vose vari kufara munyika nekuuya kwaVaGnassinbe avo vanonzi nevanopikisa munyika mavo vanotonga nedemo. Mutungamiri weTogo uyu akasiirwa chigaro nababa vake Va Gnassingbé Eyadéma avo vakatora simba vachishandisa mauto muna 1967. Vakatonga nyika iyi kusvika vafa muna 2005. Mauto akabva agadza VaFaure Gnassingbe pachigaro nechisimba kunyange hazvo mutauriri wedare reparamende uyo aive kunze kwenyika, aifanirwa kumbobata matomu pamutemo. Nyika dzekumavirira dzakazomanikidza VaGnassingbe kuita sarudzo asi vanhu vanodarika mazana mana vakafa mukurwisana musarudzo dzinonzi nevanopikisa dzakabirirwa. Mutungamiri weTogo uyu akarambawo nyaya yekuti atonge matemu maviri sezvaidiwa nevamwe munyika iyi. Asi munyori mubazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaJoey Bimha, vanoti Zimbabwe senyika yaona zvakakodzera kuti mutungamiri weTogo avhure zviri pamutemo chirongwa cheZITF. No media source currently available  Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika uye vaimboshanda kumuzinda weZimbabwe kuEthiopia, VaClifford Mashiri, vanoti muitiro waVaMugabe hauna kusiyana naVa Gnassingbe, izvo zvakapa kuti vavakoke. No media source currently available

headline: Amai Mugabe Vanoti Chitunha chaVaMugabe Chichatonga Nyika
text: Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, vanoti chitunha chemurume wavo chichavhoterwa ndokana vakafa sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita paSt Johns Primary School kuBuhera, Amai Mugabe, avo vanovazve mutungamiri webazi remadzimai muZanu-PF reWomen’s Leage, vakakatyamadza vanhu vakawanda mushure mekunge vati mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vachatonga kana vari muchakabvu kana chitunha. Amai Mugabe vakashora zvikuru kunetsana kuri muZanu-PF vanhu vachirwira chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika. Vakati ivo ndivo mubati wepembe uye kana pane vanoda kutsaudzira vanoridza pembe. Mubato reZanu-PF mune kunetsana pakati pevari kuzviti G40 vanonzi vanosanganisira ivo Amai Mugabe uye chinozviti Team Lacoste chinonzi chiri kutungamirwa nemumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangangwa. Amai Mugabe vashorawo vaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika vave kutungamira bato reZimbabwe People First, Amai Joyce Mujuru, nekufurira kwavanoti vakaita vanhu kuti vapandukire Zanu-PF. Asi mutauriri weZimbabwe People First, VaJelous Mawarire, vashorawo Amai Mugabe vachiti vanotaura zvisingavake. Amai Mugabe vashorawo vanopikisa vasiri kufarira mabond notes nechirongwa cheZIMASSET vachiti zvinobatsira nyika. Vakawanda munyika vanoti hurumende yaVaMugabe yakundikana kugadzirisa nyaya yehupfumi uye zvirongwa zviviri izvi hazvina zvazvabatsira. Makurukota ehurumende akawanda ange ari pamusangano uyu kusanganisira Amai Mandi Chimene; gurukota rinoona nezvedunhu reManicaland, VaJoseph Made; gurukota rinoona nezvekurima nevamwe. Vachitaurawo pamusangano uyu, Amai Oppah Muchinguri Kashiri vashorawo mutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, Amai Margaret Dongo naVaSimba Makoni veMavambo, Kusile, Dawn vachiti vanotengesa nyika uye kunyadzisa vanhu vemuManicaland nekupikisa bato riri kutonga. Amai Dongo vati mashoko aAmai Mugabe haana nematuro ose. Izvi zvashorwawo nemutauriri weMDC-T, VaObert Gutu, vati Amai Mugabe munhu ave kuvhunduka chati kwatara nekuti vanotya kukundwa musarudzo dza2018. Ko kutanga kwemisangano yaAmai Mugabe uku kunorevei chaizvo? Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaJoy Mabenge, vanoti Amai Mugabe vatotanga nyaya yekutsvagira Zanu-PF rutsigiro sezvo nyika yatarisana nesarudzo. Vanhu vange vari pamusangano uyu vanosvika zviuru gumi kusanganisira vana vechikoro uye papera musangano vanhu vapihwa mupunga, mazowe nezvimwe. No media source currently available

headline: Kubayiwa Nhomba yeCovaxin Konetsa Vanhu Vakawanda muZimbabwe
text: Vanhu vakawanda vakabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yeCovaxin vanoti vari kumiswa kwenguva yakareba kuti vabayiwe nhomba yepiri. Izvi zvinonzi zviri kukonzerwa nekuti kabhodhoro kamwe chete kenhomba iyi, kanofanirwa kushandiswa kubaya vanhu gumi kana kachinge kavhurwa. Izvi zvabuda mutsvagiridzo yaitwa neStudio7 mushure mekunge yanzwa kuti pave nedambudziko guru rekuti vanhu vabayiwe nhomba yepiri yeCovaxin. Izvi zviri kuitika munzvimbo zhinji munyika yose. Mumwe wevanhu vakamirira kubayiwa nhomba yepiri yeCovaxin, Amai Simbiso Sinyoro,vati vaifanirwa kubayiwa nhomba iyi musi wa30 Chikumi, asi izvi hazvisati zvaitika. Amai Sinyoro vati kunyange hazvo vakawana kune nhomba iyi kuchipatara kuMbare vakaudzwa kunzi vanofanirwa kumirira kuti vanhu vatange vasvika gumi kuti vabayiwe nhomba iyi. Mumwe mukoti anobaya nhomba ataura neStudio 7 asina kuda kubuda pamhepo atiwo nhomba yavanayo yeCovaxin haigoni kuvhurwa kana pasina vanhu vakakwana vekubaya nhomba iyi. Mukoti uyu ati vanonyora mazita evanhu vozovazivisa kuti vauye kuzobayiwa musi wakati kana vanhu ava vakwana gumiAtsanangurawo kuti vanonyora vanhu mazita vozovazivisa kana vakwana gumi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano uye vachimiririra Chinhoyi mudare reNational Assembly, VaPeter Mataruse, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kumboshaikwa kwemishonga uku kunogona kuzokanganisa mashandiro akanaka enhomba. VaMataruse vatiwo zvekudzosera vanhu vambouya kuzobaiwa vasina kuwana nhomba zvinokonzerawo kuti vamwe vaore moyo vobva varega zvachose kubayiwa nhomba iyi. Imwe nyanzvi yezvehutano uye vakambove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vati pan homba dzakadai, zvipatara zvinofanirwa kuzivisa veruzhinji mazuva ekuenda kunobayiwa nhomba kuitira kuti vagare vakagadzirira. Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, vaudza Studio 7 kuti bazi ravo ranga risati rawana zvinyunyuto zvekuti vari kuda nhomba yeCovaxin vari kumiswa kwenguva yakareba vasati vabayiwa nhomba iyi. Zimbabwe yakatanga kutambira nhomba dzeCovaxin zviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu, 35 000, kubva kuIndia muna Chivabvu, uye yakava nyika yemuAfria kutanga kushandisa nhomba iyi. Zimbabwe ine mhando ina dzenhomba yeCovid-19 dzinoti Sinovax, Sinopharm, Sputnik V neCovaxin. Hurumende inoti vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga kusvika nezuro vakanga vava zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvivatu nemakumi manomwe nevanomwe 793,077, uye vabayiwa nhomba yepiri vava zviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nezvisere nezana nemakumi matatu nevatatu, 568,133. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba yeCovid-19 vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana zvevanhu vari munyika. Hurumende yakazivisawo nezuro kuti vanhu gumi nevapfumbamwe vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro, uye vanhu mazana masere nevapfumbamwe, 809, vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vava chiuru nemazana masere nemakumi manomwe nevasere (1878) . Vanhu vabatwa neCovid -19 munyika yose vava zviuru makumi mashanu nezvina nemazana mana ane nemakumi manomwe nevana, 54, 474. Huwandu uhu hunotarisirwa kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichizivisa zvayawana nhasi. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weBato Rinopikisa reZTP neVatsigiri Vake Makumi Matatu neVana Vosvika Mwedzi Mina Vari Mujeri
text: Kutongwa kwemutungamiri webato rinopikisa reZimbabwe Transformative Party kana kuti ZTP vakanyenzura paerere kwange kuchitarisirwa kuenderera mberi nezuro mudare ramejastiriti hakuna kuzobudiria sezvo mutongi asina kuzouya. Gweta raVaParere nevamwe vavo, VaEvans Moyo vanoshanda nesangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights vaudza Studio 7 kuti nyaya iyi ichanzwika musi wa 10 Mbudzi. VaParere vakasungwa muna Chikumi pamwe chete nevamwe makumi matatu nevana vanova nhengo dzebato ravo uye dzekereke yavo nonzi Mirirai Jehova Apostolic Church. Vakasungwa pana Copacabana muHarare vachiratidzira nekuda kwekusafara kwavo nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika. Vachuchusi nemapurisa vari kuti vakatyora mutemo weMaintanaince of Peace and Order act kana kuti MOPA vachinzi havana kusuma mapurisa nezvekuda kuratidzira uye vachinzi vaivhara migwagwa. Asi VaParere nenhengo dzebato ravo vari kuramba mhosva yavari kupomerwa iyi. Asi vamwe makumi matatu nevana vachamiswa pamberi pedare nemusi wa 9 Mbudzi No media source currently available

headline: Paramende Youdzwa Kuti Hurumende Haisi Kukoshesa Mishonga yeChivanhu
text: Hurumende yeZimbabwe inonzi haisi kukoshesa varapi vechivanhu pamwe nemishonga yavo sezvo isiri kupa rutsigiro rwakasimba kubazi kuvarapi kunyange hazvo paine humbowo hunoratidza kuti zvikamu masere kubva muzana zvevanhu vemuZimbabwe zvinoenda kun’anga kana kushandisa mushonga yechivanhu pane dzimwe nguva. Ongororo yakaitwa nesangano reWorld Health Organisation yakaratidzawo kuti zvikamu makumi masere kubva muzana zvevanhu vane hutachiwana hweHIV/AIDS pamwe nezvikamu makumi mashanu nezviviri zvemadzimai akazvitakura vanoshandisawo mishonga yechivanhu. Vachipa humbowo nemaererano nemabasa ari kuitwa nehurumende kusimudzira mabasa evarapi vemuno pamwe nemishonga yavo, munyori mukuru mubazi rezvehutano, Doctor Gerald Gwinji, vaudza komiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano kuti kunyange hazvo vanhu vakawanda vachishandisa mishonga iyi, hurumende hasi kuvapa mari yavanoda kusimudzira kushandiswa kwemishona iyi. Doctor Gwinji vati bazi ravo rine chikamu chinoona nezvemishonga iyi asi chikamu ichi hachiwani mari yachinoda. Semuenzaniso, Doctor Gwinji vati gore rega rega, chikamu ichi chinoda zviuru mazana matanhatu zvemadhora nechidumbu asi chinowanzo pihwa churu chemadhora chete izvo zvinoita kuti chitadze kuita basa racho. Vanoti kunze kwekushaya mari vane zvakawanda zvavari kuita zvekuona kuti mabasa evarapi vemuno pamwe nemishonga yavo yasimudzirwa. Vati mutemo we Traditional Medical Practitioners Act 11, Regulations on Complementary and the Traditional Medicine policy ndezvimwe zvavakaitwa kusimudzira mabasa evarapi vemuno. Doctor Gwinji vati kunyange hazvo paine varapi vanodarika churu vakanyoreswa neTraditional Medical Practitioners Council, vanoziva kuti munyika mune n’anga nevarapi vakawanda kudarika apa uye mishonga yechivanhu iri kutengeswa pese pese kunyange munzvimbo dzisina kunyoreswa. Vati zvingave zvakanaka chose kana varapi vese vakadzidziswa kubata mishonga yavo zvakanaka zvinoita kuti vanhu vasakanganiswa nemishonga iyi sezvinoitika pane dzimwe nguva. Vati Zimbabwe inogona kudzidza zvakawanda kubva kune dzimwe nyika zvikuru sei kunyika dzakaita seIndia neChina idzo dzave kushandisa mishonga yechivanhu zvakanyanya. Munyori anoona nezvedzidzo musangano reZimbabwe National Traditional Healers Association, VaPrince Mutandi Sibanda, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo vaine ruzivo rwekusimudzira mushonga yechivanhu, havasi kuwana rutsigirwo rwemari kuti vaite izvi. VaSibanda vati ZINATHA ine nhengo dzakawanda chose zvekuti hazvivanetsi kugadzira mishonga yechivanhu nekubatsira vanhu vese munyika. Muzvare Juliet Chirenje avo vari kudzidzira zvekurapa nemishonga yechivanhu pachikoro cheZINATHA vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende inofanira kuisa mari parutivi yekutsigira vanoshandisa mishonga yechivanhu. Doctor Gwinji vati pari zvino pave nemasangano gumi nematatu anomiriria varapi vemuno akanyoreswa zviri pamutemo uyewo kune makirinika emishonga yemuno gumi nemana. Asi vati mishonga iyi yave kutengeswa pese pese, mumigwagwa nedzimwe nzvimbo zvekuti bazi ravo rinoda kuti itengeswe zviri pamutemo pachitevedzwa hurongwa hweMedicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe pamwe ne Medical Research Council of Zimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yomanikidza Vashandi Vayo Kubvisa Mari yeMisangano yaVaMugabe?
text: Sangano rinomiririra vadzidzisi, reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, riri kutsoropodza hurumende iyo rinoti iri kumanikidza vashandi vayo kuti vabise mari yekuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakwanise kuita musangano nevechikidi vebato ravo kuBindura neMugovera, 9 Gunyana. Sangano iri rinoti zviri kuitwa nehurumende hazvisi pamutemo nekuti vanhu havafaniri kumanikidzwa kubvisa mari dzavo kana kuita zvematongerwo enyika kana vasingadi. VaMugabe vari kuenda mumatunhu ose enyika vachisangana nevechidiki vebato ravo. Mutsamba inonzi yakanyorerwa vashandi vehurumende musi wa 4 Gunyana nemumwe mukuru wekwamudzviti kuGuruve, vashandi vanonzi vakaudzwa kuti vabvise dhora rimwe chete pamunhu kuitira kuti Zanu-PF ikwanise kutenga zvokudya uye kutsvaka dzimotikari dzichatakura vanhu vachaenda kuBindura uko kuchaitirwa musangano naVaMugabe. Dr Takavafira Zhou, avo vanotungamira sangano rePTUZ, vanoti izvi zviri kuitwa nehurumende zvinokanganisa kodzero dzevanhu. Vakatizve vanhu veZanu-PF vanofanira kukumbira vanhu zvakanaka kune vanoda kubvisa, kwete kuita sekuti kana munhu akarega kubhadhara pane zvaachazoona. “Isu tirikuti izvi kutyora kodzero dzavanhu; kutyora kodzero dzevashandi; kumbunyikidza vanhu; kumanikidza vanhu kuti vaite zvavasingadi. Ndinofunga kuti misangano iyi haifaniri kunge ichiitwa nekumanikidza vanhu kuti vabhadhare mari pazvinhu zvavasingade,” VaZhou vakaudza Studio 7. Vapamhidzirawo vachiti, “Takanyora matsamba akawanda zvikuru kwazvo kuMinistry of Education, kune vanoita zvematongerwo enyika, uye kune avo vari mumapato anopikisa neanotonga nekumapurisa asi hationi zvichichinja nekuti tsamba dzinoramba dzichiuya kubva kunana DA nevamwe vemuMinistry of Education.” VaZhou vati chimwe chinonetsa ndechokuti vazhinji vari mubazi rinoona nezvedzidzo vakapiwa mabasa makuru kuri kutendwa kutsigira Zanu-PF kwavanoita saka havazorambidzi Zanu-PF kuita zvairi kuita pazvikoro. Vakapamidzirazve vachiti sangano ravo richaramba richidzidzisa vanhu pamusoro pekodzero dzavo uye kuti vashinge kubuda pachena kuti havasikuzobhadharira mari dzavo pazvinhu zvavasingade. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Voita Musangano weChimbichimbi neMutungamiri weMalaysia
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nemusi weChishanu vakasangana nemutungamiri wehurumende yeMalaysia VaNajib Razak kumusangano wavakangoenda zvechimbi chimbi. Izvi zviri kunzi nevamwe vakuru vehurumende zvakonzerwa nekusamira zvakanaka kwehupfumi zvapa kuti vaende kunosunza. VaMugabe vakasimuka munyika neChina vachiperekedzwa nemudzimai wavo Amai Grace Mugabe, gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu VaJoram Gumbo nevamwe vakuru muhurumende yavo. VaMugabe vakapedzisira kuenda kuMalaysia pachine mutungamiri wehurumende wenyika iyi wavaidyidzana naye VaMahathir Mohamad. Mazuva ano VaMugabe vanowanzoenda kuMalaysia vachienda kunorapwa. Vatungamiri vekuMalaysia vatenda kuti VaMugabe vari munyika iyi asi havana zvizhinji zvavataura mezverwendo urwu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaJoy Mabenge vanoti zviri pachena kuti VaMugabe vave kutsvaga uta nemugate sezvo hupfumi hwaenda kumawere. Zimbabwe yaimbenge iine hushamwari hwebhande nebhurugwa neChina asi mazuva ano panenge paita zinyeke nyeke. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vofarira Hurongwa Hunokweretesa Mari Midziyo Ichiitwa Chibatiso
text: Vemabhizinesi madiki nemamwe achiri kusimukira vanoti vari kufara nechirongwa chebhanga guru renyika chekuti vakwanise kukwereta mari vachishandisa midziyo yavo sechibatiso. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano wezuva rimwe chete wapindwa nevamabhizinesi madiki uyo waitirwa kwaMutare. Vachitaura mushure memusangano uyu, mumwe muzvinabhizinesi, VaSondon Mugaradzoko, vati danho riri kutorwa nebhanga guru renyika richishanda nesangano reZimbabwe Association of Micro Finance Institutions, Zamfi, richabatsira zvikuru, sezvo mabhanga mazhinji achiomesera mabhizinesi madiki kana achida kukwereta mari kumabhanga aya. Mumwe apindawo mumusangano uyu, VaPeter Mavhiri, vatiwo kushandiswa kwezvipfuyo kunopa kuti vekumaruwa vakwanise kukwereta sezvo vasina maTitle Deeds pazvivakwa zvavo. Mukuru we Zamfi, Va Godfrey Chitambo, vanoti sangano ravo, iro rine nhengo zana neshanu, rakatanga hurongwa uhu mushure mekunge raona matambudziko ari kusangana nevemabhizinesi madiki ekuti vawane mari yekusimudzira mabasa avo apo vanenge vasina zvibatiso zvinodikanwa. Mumiriri webhanga guru renyika pamusangano uyu, Amai Grace Chiromo, vati kurerutsa kuwanikwa kwezvikwereti kuchapa budiriro munyika. Vatiwo vari mushishi kuti pave nemutemo wekutambira zvibatiso zvitsva izvi kuitira kuti zvicherechedzwe pazvibvumirano zvekukweretesana. Vanhu vangangosvika makumi manomwe vapinda mumusangano uyu, uye mumwe musangano wakadai uchaitwa kuMasvingo neBulawayo svondo rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: VaLumumba Vozvipira kuMapurisa
text: Sachigaro webato rinopikisa richangoparurwa reViva Zimbabwe, VaAcie Lumumba avo vari kutsvagwa nemapurisa vachipomerwa mhosva yekutuka mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vanonzi vari kuzvipira kumapurisa nhasi masikati. Vanoona nezvemutemo muViva Zimbabwe VaAgency Gumbo vaudza Studio 7 kuti Lumumba vachazvipia kumapurisa ekuHarare Central Police Station masikati anhasi. Mutauriri wemapurisa Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba nemusi weChishanu vakaramba kuti VaLumumba vainge vari mumaoko emapurisa sezvakataurwa nevanoshanda navo. Amai Charamba vakaudza Studio 7 kuti mapurisa ainge ari kutotsvaga VaLumumba vachivapomera mhosva yekunyomba mutungamiri wenyika nemusi weChina. Vakatiwo VaLumumba vaifanira kuzvipira kukamba yemapurisa iri pedyo navo. Pakuparura bato ravo kuAmbassador Hotel muHarare, VaLumumba vanonzi vakatuka VaMugabe.

headline: ZimRights Yokurudzira Veruzhinji Kuramba Vachinyoresa Kuvhota
text: Chirongwa chekunyoresa vanhu kuvhota boka rinoona nezvesarudzo munyika reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, richipinda muvanhu chapera munyika yose paine vanhu vanosvika 4 630,095 vakanga vanyoresa kuvhota pakupera kwezuva musi weMuvhuro. Huwandu uhwu hwaziviswa neboka riri kutungamira sarudzo reZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC. Huwandu uhwu, uhwo hunodarika zvishoma zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana ehuwandu hwaitarisirwa hwemamiriyoni manomwe, huri pasi kwazvo pane zvaitarisirwa neZEC kubva pakatanga chirongwa ichi musi wa14 Gunyana gore rino. ZEC yakazivisa kuti ichawedzera chirongwa ichi nemasvondo mashanu, asi yaiti inoda mari inoita mamiriyoni masere kuti chibudirire. Hurongwa hwekunyoresa kuvhota uhwu hwaive hwakaiswa muzvikamu zvina, chikamu chechina chinove chapera ichi. Asi masangano akawanda pamwe neveruzhinji vaichemachema kuti chirongwa ichi hachisi kufambiswa zvakanaka nekuda kwezvimhingamipinyi zvakasiyanasiyana zvaisangana nevaida kunyoresa kuvhota, izvo zvakazoita kuti vakumbire kuti chirongwa ichi kuti chiwedzerwe nguva. Mukuru wesangano reZimRights, VaOkay Machisa, vanove mumwe wevanhu vaikurudzira kuti chirongwa ichi chiwedzerwe nguva, vanoti vanofara nedanho reZEC rekuti iwedzere nguva, uye vanokurudzira veruzhinji kuti vashandise mukana uyu kunonyoresa kuvhota. VaMachisa vanoti vanhu vanofanirwa kuramba vachinyoresa kuvhota kusvikira panguva ye nomination court. No media source currently available

headline: Masangano Akazvimirira Oshora Kushandiswa kweMauto neMakanzuru
text: Masangano akazvimirira ashora zvikuru zvaanoti kushandiswa kwemauto mumakanzuru pachirongwa chekuchenesa maguta. Masangano aya anoti izvi zvinofanirwa kumiswa izvozvo. Kuda kubviswa kwemakombi muguta kwakakonzera mhirizhonga neChina pamwe nerufu. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau muHarare nhasi, mutauriri weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaTabani Moyo, vashoropodza hurumende nekushandisa mauto kuti apindire munyaya dzekanzuru. VaMoyo vati zvakaitika neChina zvinorangarisa veruzhinji chirongwa cheOperation Murambatsvina chakaitwa muna 2005 chikasiya vamwe vanhu vasisina pekugara. VaMoyo vati maitiro ehurumende aya anoratidza kuti inoda kutanga zvakare chirongwa chakadai izvo vati hazvifanirwi kuregerwa zvichiitwa. Sachigaro weCombined Harare Residents Association, VaSimbarashe Moyo, vashorawo gurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, vakavapomera mhosva yekuda kusvibisa kanzuru yeHarare iyo ine makanzura eMDC akawanda vachiti maitiro eZanu PF kana sarudzo dzosvika. Vakasanobata chigaro chameya weHarare, Va Enock Mupamawonde, varamba kuti kubviswa kwemakombi mudhorobha kune chekuita nekanzuru vakati izvi zvakaitwa nebazi rinoona nezvekutongwa kwematunhu pasina kanzuru. Vatiwo makanzura haawirirani nekushungurudzwa kweveruzhinji vari kutsvaka raramo, vakati matambudziko akatarisanwa nawo neguta anogadzirisika chete kana matambudziko ehupfumi munyika agadziriswa. Kumiswa kwemakombi kuti asapinde muguta kwakazomiswa nehurumende mushure memhirizhonga dzakaitika neChina. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Inobata neRwanda muKurangarira Kurwisana kweMarudzi Muna 1994
text: Mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga neSvondo vabatana nevamwe vatungamiri vedzimwe nyika pamwe nemhuri yeRwanda, avo vaungana muKigali, guta guru renyika iyi, vachirangarira makore makumi maviri nemashanu mushure mekupondwa kwevanhu vanosvika mazana masere ezviuru muna 1994. Kuurayiwa kwevanhu vakawandisa uku kwakaitika mushure mekurwiswa kwemaTutsi vachiurayiwa nemaHutu. Vamwe varwiri vekodzero dzevanhu vanoti Zimbabwe inofanirwa kudzidza kubva kuRwanda kuitira kuti igadzirisewo nyaya yekupondwa kwevanhu mumatunhu eMatabeleland neMidlands munguva yeGukurahundi. Vachitaura munhandare yeAmahoro National Stadium kwakare kuRwanda pagungano rekucherechedza chiitiko ichi, mutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaPaul Kagame vatora mukana uyu kuyeuchidza vanhu kuti nyika yavo yakakwanisa kubva murima rakakonzerwa nekupondana uku, ichipinda muchiedza chakaunzwa nekugarisana. “Muna 1994 pakanga pasina tariro, raive rima chete. Asi nhasi kwave nechiedza chiri kubva panzvimbo ino. Kune vakapona, tinongoti Tatenda. Hushingi hwenyu hunomirira kukunda kweRwanda yose,” VaKagame vadaro. Mumwe murwiri wekodzero dzevanhu uye vari mumwe wevanhu vanoshanda nevamwe vevakabatwa nenyaya yeGukurahundi, VaDumisani Mpofu, vanoti chimwe chezvinhu zvakakosha zvingadzidzwa neZimbabwe kubva kune zvakaitika kuRwanda ndechekuti nyaya yeGukurahundi itaurwe pachena. VaMpofu vanoti panofanirwa kuve nemitemo yakanyatsojeka inobudisa pachena kuti haisi mhosva kutaura kana kuita zvinhu zvine chekuita nekuedza kugadzirisa nyaya yeGukurahundi. VaMbuso Fuzwayo munyori wesangano re Ibhetshu Likazulu, iro rinorwirawo kodzero dzevakabatwa neGukuruhandi. VaFuzwayo vanotsinhira kuti zvakakosha kuti hurumende ibude pachena panyaya yeGukurahundi uye kuti ive pamberi mukuita kuti nyaya iyi igadziriswe. Pamusangano wavakaita nevemamwe masangano anoshanda akazvimirira ega mumatunhu eMatabeleland mwedzi wapera mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakati hakuchina munhu anofanirwa kusungwa nekuda kwekutaura kana kuita zvinhu zvine chekuita nekuedza kugadzirisa nyaya yeGukurahundi. VaFuzwayo vanoti mashoko emutungamiri wenyika aya akakosha asi angadai akataurwa uye anofanirwa kuramba achitaurwa pajekerere kuitira kuti ave nehudzamu. No media source currently available Reverend Useni Sibanda, Mukuru weZimbabwe Christian Alliance vanoti kunyange hazvo zvakakosha kuti hurumende itungamire mukugadzirisa nyaya yeGukurahundi, zvakakoshawo kuti vanhu pachavo vakwanise kutaurawo maonero avo panyaya iyi. Reverend Sibanda vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kuvewo nezvirongwa zvebudiriro zvakanangana nenzvimbo dzakanyanya kubatwa nenyaya yeGukurahundi nekuda kwekuti nzvimbo idzi dzakasarira munyaya dzebudiriro. Mugwaro rekurangarira kuuraiwa kwevanhu muRwanda, sangano reAmnesty International rinoti vezvematongerwo enyika munyika dzepasi rose vanofanirwa kusiya tsika yekushandisa mashoko anozvidza vamwe vanhu kuchishandiswa marudzi kana zvitendero, richiti kuita zvakadai kunogona kukonzera hondo dzemarudzi. VaVincent Chakunda mudzidzisi wezvebudiriro nehutongi paMidlands State Univeristy uye muongorori wezvematongerwo enyika akazvimirira. Vanobvuma kuti pane zvidzidzo zvakakosha kubva kune zvakakitika kuRwanda asi vanoti zvakakosha kunzwisisa kuti nhoroondo yeGukurahundi yakanyanya kukonzerwa nevanhu vashoma vaida masimba ezvematongerwo enyika kwete kuti yaive hondo pakati pemarudzi. Vanhu vanopfuura zviuru makumi maviri vakaurayiwa namuto ehurumende panguva yeGukurahundi mumatunhu eMatabeleland neMidlands mumakore mashoma akatevera nyika ichangowana rusununguko. Nekune riwme diviwo vanhu vanosvika zviuru mazana masere vakaurayiwa muhondo yemarudzi yakaitika kwemwedzi mitatu kutanga muna Kubvumbi mugore ra1994 munyika yeRwanda. Munyika umu makazoita chirongwa chekutaura chokwadi pamusoro pezvakaitika vanhu vakawanda vachireurura izvo zvakabatsira kuti pave nekuregererana. Asi muZimbabwe nyaya yeGukurahundi inoramba ichitsviriridza nekuda kwekuti hapana kuve nehurongwa hwakadaro. Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika dzinoti mashoko emutungamiri wenyika anovaka hwaro hwekuti nyaya yeGukurahundi igadziriswe asi kugadziriswa kwenyaya kungavepo chete kana kutaura uku kukashandurwa kukave muzviito. Zimbabwe yakamirirwa nemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaChiwenga, avo vakasvika muRwanda neMugovera. Rwanda ichapinda mukuchema kwemazuva zana kutanga nhasi senzira yekurangarira nayo chiitiko ichi.

headline: Vanhu Vokurudzirwa Kuvhenekwa Ropa paZuva reKucherechedza HIV/AIDS
text: Zimbabwe yakacherechedza zuva reWorld Aids Day nemusi weMugovera kuGlendale. Mazowe, kuMashonaland Central. Mhemberero idzi dzaiitwa pasi pedingindira rekuti Ziva Paumire rinokurudzira vanhu kuti vachenekwe ropa kuti vaonekwe kuti vane hutachiwana hweHIV here kana kuti kwete. Vanhu vanokurudzirwawo kuti vaongororwe zvimwe zvirwere zvinosanganisira gomarara, zvirwere zvepabonde, rurindi, shuga kana kuti diabetes nezvimwe zvisina zviratidzo zvinooneka. Mhembero dzekucherechedza zuva iri dzakaitirwa kuGlendale, kuMazowe mudunhu reMashonaland Central nemusi weMugovera, zuva rinocherechedzwa World Aids Day pasi rose, uko kwakaungana zviuru nezviuru zvevanhu. Gurukota rezvehutano VaObediah Moyo vakaudza gungano iri kuti Zimbabwe ichiri nerwendo rwukuru maringe nekuti vanhu vange vachiziva pavamire. Vakaenderera mberi vachiti pasina kuongororwa hutachiwana hweHIV, munhu haangakwanise kuti awaniswe mishonga yema anti-retroviral, kana kuti ARVs, kuchecheudzwa uye kuti vanaamai vakazvitakura vakwanisewo kudzivirira hutachiwana uhwu kumwana. VaMoyo vakaenderera mberi vachitsanangura nezvedingidira remhemberero yegore rino, iro rakanangana nekuparadzwa kwechirwere ichi, Zimbabwe paichasvika gore ra2030. Vakati chirwere cheHIV chinopera kana dungamunhu akaziva paamire maererano nezvechirwere ichi izvo zvinozoita kuti vasina chirwere vagozvichengetedzawo. VaMoyo vakayeuchidza vagari vemudunhu reMashonaland Central kuti vaite zvoutsanana hwepamusoro nokuti chirwere cheCholera chakanyukawo kuMount Darwin mudunhu iroro. Studio 7 yakakwanisa kutaura nevamwe vanhu vari kurarama nechirwere cheHIV avo vakataura kuti mishonga yema ARVs, iri kuvabatsira chaizvo. Mumwe wevari kushandisa mishonga iyi ndaAmai Christine Pfidzai. Amai Edna Runeto vakatiwo vakatoroorwa nemunhu asina HIV vakatozvara vana vaviri nokuti vari kunwa mapiritsi aya sekurairwa kwavanoitwa naanachiremba. Amai Joana Kasirori vakati vararama nehutachiwana hweHIV kwemakore anodarika makore makumi maviri zvokuti vatove mukuru wechimwe chikoro muHarare. VaJosephat Chinembiri Tarenyika vati vakambosungwa vakagara mujere vasingawani mishonga, izvo zvakazoita kuti vakwidze nyaya yavo kudare reConstitutional Court kuti vakwanise kupiwa mishonga yeHIV vari mujeri. Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Auxillia Mnangagwa, avo vakanga vari munyarikani pagungano iri, vakati vari kuyedza nepavanokwanisa kuti pashaike mwana anozvarwa aine hutachiwana hweHIV. Vakayambirawo vanhu vari kutaura kuti vawana mushonga unorapa HIV, vakati hakuna mushonga unodarika maARV ari kupiwa varwere kuzvipatara pari zvino. Amai Mnangangwa vakatiwo hapana mudzimai anofanirwa kuzvara mwana ane hutachiwana hweHIV nokuti hurumende yakaisa matanho ekuti mudzimai wese akazvitakura aongororwe uye agopiwa mishonga yekuti mucheche ari mudumbu asabatira hutachiwana. Mumiriri weAmerica muZimbabwe, VaBrian Nichols vakudza gungano iri kuti vanhu makumi mapfumbamwe nevashanu kubva muzana muZimbabwe vari kunwa mishonga yemaARV zvekuti sangano rekuAmerica re President’s Emergency Plan For Aids Relief, PEPFAR, rakatowedzera mari inodarika bhirioni rimwechete remadhora ekuAmeica kuti ishandiswe pakurapa vanhu vane hutachiwana munyika muno. Sachigaro weNational Aids Council, NAC, VaEvaristo Marowa vakataurawo kuti Zimbabwe ine tarisiro yekuzadzikisa zvinangwa zve 90-90-90 Global Targets zvekupedzisa HiV neAids mugore ra2030. VaMarowa vakaenderera mberi vachiti izvi zvinokwanisika bedzi kana vanhu vakaziva pavamire. Zimbabwe ine vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nemazana mana ezviuru, 1, 4million, vari kurarama nehutachiwana hwe HIV uye vari pachirongwa zvakare chekunwa mapiriritsi emaARV. Vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi manomwe nemanomwe, US$77 million, vari kurarama nechirwere cheHIV pasi rose uye vanhu mamiriyoni makumi matatu nemashanu, US$35 million, vakatofa nekuda kweHIV pasi rose. No media source currently available

headline: Mapato Anopikisa Obuda neChisungo paNyaya yeShanduko neSarudzo
text: Mapato ezvematongerwo enyika gumi nemashanu anopikisa hurumende anonzi ari kutarisirwa neChitatu kunyorerana chibvumirano chekuti akurudzire kuti munyika mutange mave neshanduko munyaya dzemitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo pasati paitwa sarudzo. Mutauriri weMDC T, VaObert Gutu, vanoti hurongwa uhwu huchaitirwa paAnglican Cathedral muHarare nenguva dzegumi mangwanani. VaGutu vanoti zvimwe zvezvinhu zvavachakurudzira kuti zvivandudzwe inyaya dzemitemo yezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, mashandiro eZimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, mapurisa, mauto pamwe nevasori munguva dzesarudzo. Asi mamwe mapato anopikisa akaita seRenewal Democrats of Zimbabwe rinotungamirirwa naVaElton Mangoma, nePeople’s Democratic Party rinotungamirirwa naVaTendai Biti, akatozivisa kare kuti haasi muhurongwa uhwu. Mutauriri webato reNational Constitutional Assembly, VaMadock Chivasa, vanoti bato ravo rakabudawo muhurongwa uhwu kunyange hazvo vakanga vambotanga vakabatana nevamawe. VAChivasa vanoti vakatadza kuwirirana mumanyorerwo anofanirwa kuitwa gwaro ravo, sezvo ivo vakaona sekunge rakanyanya kuoma rakanangana nemapoka akaita seZEC, mapurisa pamwe nevasori. “Isu tichiri bato idzva saka takaona kuti hatingabva tangotanga takada kuomesa mwoyo,” vanodaro VaChivasa. Vanoti sebato vachashandawo kuti vaone kuti vasvitsa voga zvichemo zvavo zvavanenge vachida kuti zvishandurwe. No media source currently available Asi VaGutu vanoti hapana chikuru chishashanduka kubva muhurongwa hwavo kunyange hazvo NCA yabuda kubva mugungano iri. “Nhaurirano dzichiri kuenderera mberi nekuti kubuda kweNCA hakusi iko kuguma kwehurongwa hwedu,” vanodaro VaGutu. No media source currently available

headline: Nyaya yeKudzosera Mimwe Minda Kuvachena Younnza Kusawirirana Munyika
text: Hurumende neMuvhuro yakazivisa kuti ichadzosera mamwe mapurazi kuvarimi vachena senzira yekusimudzira nyaya dzekurima uye hupfumi hwenyika. Asi nyaya iyi yakonzera mutauro wakanyanya vamwe vachiti zviri kuratidza kuti hurongwa hwehurumende hwekugovera ivhu kuvatema hwakundikana asi vamwe vachiti zvichabatsira nyika kukwezva vemabhizimisi vekunze vange votya kuti hupfumi hwavo hunogona kupambwa munyika. Vamwe muhurumende vanotiwo zvimwe zvirango zvavanoti zvakatemerwa nyika nenyaya yevhu, zvichabviswa kana vachena vakapihwa minda. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinotenderana kuti musimboti hwehupfumi hwenyika huri mukurima. Asi nyaya yevhu inyaya inounza kukandirana makobvu nematete munyika zvikuru pakuti ndiyani ane kodzero yekurima uye vachena vanofanira kuripwa here kana madzitateguru akatorerwa minda asina chaakapihwa. Gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, uye gurukota rezvekurima, Doctor Anxious Masuka, vakaudza vatori venhau kumahofisi ehurumende eMunhumutapa muHarare kuti hurumende panguva yakakodzera ichazotora mimwe minda kubva kuvatema ichipa vamwe varimi vachena vakambotorerwa mapurazi aya kubva muna 2000. Varimi ava vari kupihwa minda kwemakore makumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe, kana kuti 99 year lease. Mukuita izvi VaNcube vakati chido chehurumende ndechekusimudzira mabasa ekurima. Ko danho rehurumende iri rinorevei chaizvo? Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi inodzidzisa paDurban University of Technology, Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, vanoti zvakanaka kuremekedza midziyo nehupfumi hwevanhu asi Zimbabwe haina mari yekubhadhara varimi vachena ava. Zimbabwe gore rino yakanyorerana chibvumirano nevarimi vachena kuti vapihwe mari yemuripo inosvika mabhiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana mashanu zvemadhora ekuAmerica, kana kuti US$3,5 billion chinonzi Global Compensation Deed kana kuti GCD. Mari iyi ndeyezvikwanisiro zvekurima uye zvivakwa zvakatorerwa varimi vachena ava. Asi vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaRejoice Ngwenya, vanoti zvakakosha kuchengetedza kodzero dzevanhu vanenge vauchika mari munyika zvisinei kuti vachena kana kuti vatema. Asi vati pane zvirehwa rehwa zvakaita sekungonyorwa kwezvinhu izvi pabepa kwete mubumbiro remitemo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga vari munyori anoona nezvedzidzo mudunhu reHarare mubato reZanu-PF, VaGilbert Muponda, vanoti hapana chakaipa chaitwa nehurumende sezvo zviri mubumbiro remutemo kuti varimi vachena varipwe. VaMuponda vanoti izvi zvakakosha nekuti zvinobatsira kugadzirisa hukama pakati peZimbabwe nedzimwe nyika dzainge dzatemera vamwe vatungamiri muhurumende zvirango. Nyaya yekugadzirisa kunetsana panyaya yevhu inyaya yakasimudzwa nehurumende yeAmerica sechimwe chainoti inoda kuti chiitwe kuti zvirango zvibviswe. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera, vanoti hurumende iri kuita izvi pari zvino nekuda kwekuti hurumende yave kushorwa pasi rose nekutonga nedemo. Vanotiwo kudzosera vachena mari munongedzo wekuti zvirongwa zvakaita se Command Agriculture zvakundikana. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvekurima nehupfumi dzinoti nyaya yehuori ndiyo yasvitsa nyika pairi ikozvino nekuti mari dzaifanira kupihwa varimi kuburikidza nezvirongwa zvakaita se Command Agriculture hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka uye vamwe varimi vane minda yakawandisa zvopa kuti vagarire badza nenyaya yehuori. Makambani akaita seSakunda akanzi aite basa iri asi asingatevere mitemo yenyika pakupihwa basa uye asina kuropafadzwa nedare reparamende. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi dzeHutano dzoshushikana neKuderera kweVanhu Vari Kubaiwa Nhomba yeTatu yeCovid-19
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChina kuti vanhu gumi nevatanhatu (16) vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika yose, uye vamwe vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nezana nemakumi maviri (1,121) vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi. Izvi zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose pazviuru zvishanu zvine zana nevasere (5 108), ukuwo vanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kubva zvachatanga vava zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi maviri ane zana nemakumi manomwe nevasere (220 178). Vanhu vapora kubva kuCovid-19 vakasviika pazviuru zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nechimwe (191 000). Kusvika pakupera kwezuva neChina, vanhu vakanga vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yekudzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 vakanga vave mamiriyoni mana ane zviuru zana nemakumi mashanu nezvitatu zvine mazana masere nemakumi manomwe nevapfumbamwe (4,153,879). Vabayiwa nhomba dzose mbiri vave mamiriyoni matatu, ane zviuru zana nemakumi matanhatu nezvipfumbamwe nemazana manomwe nemakumi masere nevashanu, (3,169,785). Vabaiwa nhomba yetatu kubva zvayatanga kubaiwa musi wa Zvita 27, 2021, vakasvika pazviuru zvipfumbamwe nemazana mashanu nevatatu (1,503), huwandu hunonzi nedzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehutano hahufadzi. Nyanzvi yezvehutano vari mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti hurumende nemasangano akazvimirira vanofanirwa kushanda zvakasimba mukupa dzidziso kune veruzhinji pamusoro penhomba iyi, uye kukurudzira kuti vaende kunobaiwa nhomba yetatu iyi. Vanoti panofanirwa kuitwa zvirongwa zvinoita kuti vezvehutano vapinde muvanhu vachibaya nhomba idzi kana nyika ichida kusvitsa huwandu hwainotarisira kubaya, kwete kumirira kuti vanhu vaende kuzvipatara nenzvimbo dziri kubairwa veruzhinji. VaRusike vanotiwo zvakakosha kuti vashandi vari pamberi mukurwisana neCovid-19, vakwegura pamwe nevagara vaine zvirwere zvavanazvo vaende kunobaiwa nhomba yetatu iyi, vachiti inobatsira kuwedzera simba renhomba mbiri dzekutanga. Studio 7 yaedza kubata mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri kuti tinzwe zvizhinji pamusoro penhomba yetatu iyi asi vati havasi munyika. Tatadza kubata vavati titaure navi, Amai Joyleen Chimonyo sezvo nhare yavo yanga isingabatiki. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inobhadhara Chikwereti Chayo kuZESA
text: Hurumende inoti yabhadhara chikwereti chayo chemagetsi kumbani yemagetsi yeZESA uyewo yabhadharwa chikwereti cheZESA kukambani yemagetsi yeESKOM yekuSouth Africa. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota, gurukota rinoona nezvemamhando dzemoto, VaFortune Chasi, vati hurumende yabhadhara chikwereti chayo chemamiriyoni makumi maviri emadhora kuZESA uyewo yapa kambani iyi mamwe mamiriyoni makuma maviri emadhora ekuti kambani iyi ivandudze basa rekugaya magetsi. Vatiwo vabhadhara chikwereti cheZESA kuESKOM chemamiriyoni gumi emadhora ekuAmerica. Vati izvi zvichabatsira kuti nyika ideredze dambudziko rekushomeka kwemagetsi munyika iro raita kuti nyika igove magetsi kana kuti loadshedding. VaChasi vatiwo veruzhinji, makambani nemakanzuru vanofanira kubhadhara magetsi. Vatiwo nyaya yemagetsi inofanira kubatanidza vanhu munyika kuona kuti vogadzirisa sei dambudziko rekushomeka kwemagetsi. Vachitaurawo mushure medare remakurukota, gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vati dare remakurukota ratambira danho rakatorwa nebazi rezvemari svondo rino rekudzora dhora remuno rikati danho iri richaunza kugadzikana munyika munyaya dzehupfumi. Pavabvunzwa nezvekuti vanhu vane maNostro Foreign Currency Account nevaya vanotumirwa mari nemakambani akaita Western Union nemamwe, vachawana mari yavo here kana kuti vachamanikidzwa kuitengesa kumabhanga, Amai Mutsvangwa vati vanhu ava vacharamba vachiwana mari dzavo ari madhora ekuAmerica, mapaunzi nedzimwe mari dzekunze. Asi kunyange hazvo Amai Mutsvangwa vati dare remakurukota ratambira gwaro reStatutory Instrument 142, masangano evashandi pamwe nevemabhizimisi audza hurumende kuti mutemo uyu unofanira kubviswa sezvo wakaitwa pasina kuwirirana sezvinodiwa pasi pemutemo weTNF. Masangano aya atuma gurukota rezvevashandi, Doctor Sekai Nzenza, kuti vaendese nyaya iyi kudare remakurukota svondo rinouya kuti mutemo uyu ubviswe. Zimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions inoti vashandi vacharamwa mabasa kana izvi zvikasaitika. Mutemo uyu, uyo wakaburitswa nemusi weMuvhuro wave pamberi pekomiti yeparamende yeParliamentary Legal Committee iyo inoongorora kuti mitemo haipikisane nebumbiro remutemo here kana kuti kwete. Rimwe gweta risina kuda kudomwa nezita raudza Studio7 kuti rinoona nesekuti mutemo uyo hauna kunyorwa zvakajeka uye zviri pachena kuti hurumende ine vanhu kana makambani ainoda kubata pachishandiswa mutemo uyu. Zvichakadai nhengo dzeparamende nhasi dzati nyaya yekuzvidza paramende kuri kuitwa nemakurukota ehurumende iri kuenderera mberi yave kunganganisa mashandiro eparamende. Sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvedzidzo, Amai Priscillar Misihairambwi Mushonga, vaudza mutauriri weNational Assembly, Advocate VaJacob Mudenda, kuti makomiti ave kutadza kuita basa rawo nekuti makurukota ehurumende pamwe nevanyori vemapazi ehurumende havawanike, sezvo vanenge vasipo nguva dzese. Amai Mushonga vati zviri pachena kuti zvose zvinotaurwa nemutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, hazvisi kuitwa nekuti makurukota avo nevanyori vawo havana basa ravari kuita. Vati nekuda kwazvovo vave kuda kuita musangano wemasachigaro emakomiti eparamende nemutungamiriri wenyika. Advocate Mudenda vatambira chikumbiro chaAmai Mushonga uye vaudza mukuru webasa rehurumende muparamende zvakare vari gurukota rezvemitemo neparamende, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, kuti varonge musangano nemutungamiri wenyika. Chitatu chega chega vatevedzeri vemutungamiriri wenyika, makurukota ehurumende nevatevedzeri vavo vanosungirwa kuenda kuparamende kunopindura mibvunzo kubva kunhengo dzeparamende asi vazhinji vavo havaendi. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Inokunda Musarudzo yeWard 2, Kadoma Central
text: MDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa yakunda musarudzo yemu Ward 2 mudunhu reKadoma Central yakaitwa neMugovera. Mashoko atatambira anoti Amai Shorayi Chiwara veMDC vanonzi vakawana mavhoti mazana manomwe nemakumi masere, ukuwo VaLloyd Nyasha Nyambo veZanu PF vakawana mavhoti mazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu nerimwe. Sarudzo iyi iri yaitwa zvichitevera kuwanikwa nemhosva kwakaitwa VaMichael Gore veMDC avo vatongerwa kugara mujeri kwemakore matatu mushure mekupomerwa mhosva yekukurudzira mhirizhonga pakuratidzira kwakaitwa muna Ndira gore rino. VaGore vari kupikisa mutongo uyu, uye havasi mujeri. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reZimbabwe Electoral Commission panyaya yezvabuda musarudzo yakanzura weWard 2 muKadoma Central. Sangano rinoona nezvesarudzo rakazvimirira, reZimbabwe Election Support Network, kana kuti ZESN, rinoti harisi kufara kuti vanhu vanga vachimiswa kwenguva yakareba kuti vavhote asi vachizoudzwa vapinda mukati kuti mazita avo haapo panzvimbo yekuvhotera iyi. Mukuru wezvirongwa muZESN, Amai Ellen Dingani, vaudza Studio7 kuti chichemo ichi vakachisvitsa ku Zimbabwe Electoral Commission asi hachisati chagadziriswa. No media source currently available

headline: Engineer Mudzuri veBato reMDC-T Vanozivisa Kuti Vakabatwa neChirwere cheCovid-19
text: Mutewedzeri wemutungamiri weMDC-T iri kufanotungamirwa naMuzvare Thozane Khupe, Engineer Elias Mudzuri, vakazivisa neChipiri kuti vakabatwa vaine chirwere cheCovid-19. Vachinyora padandemutande reTwitter, Engineer Mudzuri vakazivisa vana veZimbabwe kuti vakanga vavhenekwa vachiwanikwa vaine chirwere ichi, uye vakanga vatove kune chimwe chipatara uko vakanga vachibatsirwa nevashandi vaive vakazvipira, chinove chinhu chaivapa kugadzikana. Vakatiwo nekuzvipira kwavo pamwe neminamato yevamwe vose vaizokwanisa kukunda chirwere ichi.

headline: USAID Yopa Rubatsiro Kune veChidiki Vanorarama neHutachiona hweHIV
text: Vechidiki vanorarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS vatambira nemufaro mari yerubatsiro yapiwa kusangano rakazvimiririra reAfricaid Zvandiri nesangano nebazi rehurumende reAmerica reUnited States Agency for International Development. Africaid yapiwa mamiriyoni makumi maviri emadhora kuti ishandise muzvirongwa zvevechidiki munyaya dzeHIV/AIDS. Mumwe wevechidiki vari kurarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS achishanda neAfricaid, Tanyaradzwa Vinho ati mari yavawana iyi ichavabatsira kupa dzidziso kune vechidiki munyaya dzechirwere ichi. Izvi zvatsigirwa naVengai Hadji ane makore makumi maviri nematatu anoraramawo nehutachiona uhu. Hadji ati shuviro yake ndeyekuti vechidiki vanorarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS vadzidziswewo mabasa ekuzviraramisa muhupenyu sezvo vamwe vavo vari nherera. Mumwe anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muAfricaid, Amai Martha Maodzeke vaudza Studio 7 kuti vane chivimbo chekuti mari yavapiwa ichavabatsira kuvandudza hupenyu hwevechidiki munyaya dzeHIV/AIDS. Amai Maodzeke vati kubva mumatunhu matanhau avange vachishanda vanenge vawedzera kusvika pamakumi maviri nemaviri. Vanomirira sangano reUnited States Agency for International Development kana kuti USAID muZimbabwe Amai Stephanie Funk vati vanofadzwa nebasa reAfricaid iro ririkupa tarisiro kune vechidiki munyaya dzeHIV/AIDS. Mari yekubatsira vechidiki iyi inouya panguva iyo gwaro reongororo rakabudiswa United Nations Programme on HIV and AIDS kana kuti UNAIDS riri kuburitsa pachena kuti kunyange hazvo ndufu dzine chekuita neHIV/AIDS dziri kuderera kubva mugore ra2005, vechidiki vari pakati pemakore gumi nemashanu nemakore makumi maviri nemana vari kusarira munyaya dzekuongororwa ropa nekuwana mishonga yeHIV/AIDS.

headline: VaJoram Gumbo Vopomerwa Mhosva yeHuori-ZACC Ichiti Haisati Yasumwa
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemhando dzemoto, VaJoram Gumbo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekuita zvehuori apo vaive gurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu. Bepanhau reHerald rinoti kambani yavo yekusona hembe inonzi JMCD yakapihwa basa nekambani yeZinara uye vachinzi vaitorawo mari kubva kukambani iyi yaive pasi pebazi ravo. Asi vachibvunzwa nebepanhau reHerald, VaGumbo vakaramba kuti vanoita zvehuori vachiti kambani yavo inotengeserawo mbatya kuZanu-PF mauto nemamwe mapazi ehurumende. VaGumbo vanonzi vaipihwawo mari kubva kuZINARA dzekuenda kuMalaysia kunoita basa reAir Zimbabwe risinei nekugadzira migwagwa sezvinoshandiswa homwe iyi. Komishina weZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission VaGoodson Nguni vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanga vasati vasumwa nezvenyaya iyi nekudaro hapana chavangataure parizvino. Nhengo yedare reparamende inomirira MDC kuKambuzuma VaWillas Madzimure vanove nhengo yeAfrican Parliamentarians Network Against Corruption uye vari mukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemashandiro emapazi ehurumende avo vanoti zvakakosha kuti makurukota nenhengo dzedare reparamende vabude pachena panyaya yehupfumi hwavo vachangotora mhiko. No media source currently available  .

headline: Komisheni Inoona zveKodzero Yoshushikana neKushomeka kweVanhu Vaongororwa Chirwere cheCOVID-19 Kusvika Nhasi
text: Komisheni inoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu yeZimbabwe Human Rights Commission, inoti iri kushushikana nehuwandu hwevanhu vaongororwa kana vaine chirwere che COVID-19 munyika kusvika pari zvino. Komisheni iyi inoti vanhu zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevana vanozi vainge vaongororwa kusvika musi wa30 Kurume, vaive vashoma zvikuru pachitariswa zviuru zvevanhu zvakapinda munyika kubva pakatanga chirwere ichi kuChina gore rapera. Mugwaro rayakaburitsa neChitatu, Zimbabwe Human Rights Commission inotiwo iri kukurudzira hurumende kuti ipe dzidziso pamusoro peCoronavirus mundimi dzakasiyanasiyana, kusanganisirawo mutauro wemaoko kana kuti Sign Language, senzira yekuti veruzhinji vabatsirikane. Komisheni iyi inotiwo hurumende iri kunonoka kuita kuti kuongororwa kwevanhu kuti vane hutachiwana here kana kuti kwete kuitwe mumatunhu ose emunyika, kwete kuti kungoitwa muHarare chete. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi sezvo gurukota rebazi rinoona nezvekomisheni iyi, reMitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi, vanga vasiri kubatika panharembozha yavo. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu, uye vaive mukuru weZimRights, VaOkay Machisa, vanoti vanobvumirana nemaonero eZimbabwe Human Rights Commission ekuti vanhu vaongororwa vashoma kwazvo pachitariswa huwandu hwevanhu vanopinda munyika nepamiganho yenyika yose, kusanganisirawo nhandare dzendege. Panyaya yekuti shambadzo iitwe nemitauro yose inocherechedzwa munyika, VaMachisa vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kutevera zviri mubumbiro renyika panyaya yemitauro, yoshambadza mashoko kuvanhu vose. Vanotiwo nyaya yekuti matunhu ose akwanise kuongorora vanhu kana vaine hutachiwana hweCoronavirus, vanoti zvakakosha chose kuti matunhu ose awaniswe mukana wekuita ongororo idzi. Pari zvino chipatara cheSally Mugabe Hospital muHarare ndicho chete chiri kuita ongororo dzechirwere cheCOVID-19 munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Huwandu hweVanhu Vari Kukabatwa neCovid-19 Huri Kuramba Huchikwira
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChina kuti huwandu hwevanhu vari kuramba vachibatwa neCovid-19 hwakakwirira zvichitevera kubatwa kwevamwe makumi matatu nevaviri, kana kuti 32, vaine chirwere ichi, pavanhu mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi maviri nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 929 vakavhenekwa. Vese vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi vanhu vagara vari munyika vasina nhoroondo yekubuda kunze. Aka ndekekutanga mukati memazuva anodarika masvondo maviri kuti huwandu hwevanhu vane chirwere ichi hudarike makumi matatu. Izvi zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose hwakwira kusvika pazviuru zvinomwe nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mashanu nemumwe, kana kuti 7 951. Vanhu vakanga vapona kubva kuCovid-19 kusvika nemusi weChina vakanga vave zviuru zvitanhatu nemazana mana ane makumi mana nevatanhatu, kana kuti 6 446, izvo zvakasaiyawo vanhu chiuru nemazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nevatanhatu, kana kuti 1 276, vachiri kurwara. Huwandu hwevanhu vafa hwakaramba huri pamazana maviri nemakumi maviri nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 229, sezvo pasina munhu akashaya pazuva iri. Matunhu akawanikwa vanhu vane chirwere ichi anoti Bulawayo iine vapfumbamwe,Harare iine gumi, Mashonaland East iine vatanhatu neMashonaland West iine vanhu vanomwe. Dunhu reMashonaland Central ndiro chete dunhu rakanga risina kana munhu mumwechete airwara nechirwere ichi, kuchitiwo dunhu reHarare riri iro rine vanhu vakawandisa vanosvika chiuru nezana nemakumi maviri nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 1 129 vari kurwara. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano vachidzidzisa paNottingham Trent University kuBritain, Doctor Mathew Nyashanu, vanoti kukwira kwehuwanda hwevakabatwa vaine chirwere ichi kunoratidza kuti chirwere chichakadzika midzi munyika. Doctor Nyashanu vanoti hurumende inofarnirwa kusimbisa hurongwa hwekuvheneka vanhu mumatunhu ose, sezvo chirwere ichi chave kukwaisa kupararira kubva pakanyevenutswa mutemo wairambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu. Vanotiwo veruzhinji vanofanirwa kuramba vachitevedzera mitemo inodzvirira kupararira kwehutachiwana hunokonzera chirwere ichi, yakaita sekugeza maoko, kuvhara miromo nemhino, kusiya mikaha pakati pavo, uyewo kusabatana maoko pamwe nekuungana. Zvichakadaro, Johns Hopkins University inoti pasi rose vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi matatu nematanhatu nezviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe nezvinomwe, kana kuuti 36,577 000 vabatwa nechirwere ichi, uye vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nrzviuru makumi matanhatu nezviviri, kana kuti 1,062 000, vafa nacho. MuAmerica, umo mune vanhu vakawandisa pasi rose vabatwa neCovid-19, vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni manomwe nezviuru mazana matanhatu nezvipfumbamwe, kana 7, 609 000 vabatwa nacho, uye vanodarika zviuru mazana maviri negumi nezviviri, kana kuti 212 000, vafa nechirwere ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa neVasori Vanosungwawo Munyaya yeGoridhe Yakasungirwa Muzvare Rushwaya
text: Hurumende inoti yasunga vamwe vanhu vatanhatu vane chekuita nenyaya iri kupomerwa vanga vari mutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe Miners Federation, uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, Muzvare Henrietta Rushwaya, avo vakasungwa vachida kubuda negoridhe munyika zvisiri pamutemo. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti vasunga vamwe vanhu vatanhatu vanoti VaAli Mohamed, VaStephen Chengerai Tserayi, VaGift Karanda, VaRaphios Mufandauya, pamwe nemapurisa maviri anoti Superintendent Shoko pamwe naDetective Chief Inspector Chimhungu. VaTserayi vanga vachishanda vari musori anochengetedza mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, uye VaNyathi vati VaKaranda vainyepera kuzviita musori panguva yavanoti vakapara mhosva. VaNyathi vati VaMohamad, avo vane kambani yeAli Japan 786,iyo inoita zvekutengesa motokari ndivo vakanzi naMuzvare Rushwaya ndivo vaive muridzi wegoridhe. Vati pari zvino havasi kutaura zvakawanda sezvo vachiri kuferefeta nyaya iyi vachiti vasungwa ava vakatarisirwa kumiswa mudare. Muzvare Rushwaya vakatarisirwa kudzoka kudare ramejasitiriti mangwana apo pakatarisirwa kuturwa mutongo naVaNgoni Nduna wekuti zvinokodzera here kuti hurumende ishandure pfungwa dzayo dzekubvuma kwayakange yaita kuti Muzvare Rushwaya vapihwe mukana wekubhadhara mari yechibatiso. Vachuchisi venyaya iri kupomerwa Muzvare Rushwaya vakaudza dare kuti vakange voda kuchinja mabatiro enyaya iyi sezvo vachiti vakange vazoona kuti nyaya iyi yakakura kwazvo uye ine vanhu vakawanda vari mairi. Goridhe raida kuburitswa munyika zvisiri pamutemo naMuzvare Rushwaya rinokosha mari inodarika mazana matatu nemakumi matanhatu ezviuru zvemadhora ekuAmerica. Vari kutevera nyaya iyi vanoti kusungwa kwaitwa mapurisa nevasori panyaya iyi kunoratidza kuti hurumende yadzikisa gejo mukurwisa huori. Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatshwayo, vati kusungwa kwemapurisa nevasori haisi nyaya yekuti hurumende yakazvipira kurwisana nehuori asi kuti zvikwata zveZanu PF zviri kurwira bhonzo renyama. Asi VaNyathi mapurisa haasi kuzorega kusunga munhu wese ane chekuita nenyaya iyi vachiti vari kuferefeta zvakare kuti goridhe iri rakanga rabvepi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, VaMasimba Manyanya, avo vaimboshanda mubazi rezvemari, vanoti kubuda kwemari munyika zvisiri pamutemo kwakafanana nababa vanoba mari mumba vachinonwa doro mhuri ichisara ichiziya nenzara. Zvichakadai, bhodhi reZimbabwe Miners Federation rinoti rambomisa basa Muzvare Rushwaya richiti nyaya yavo inosvibisa zita resangano iri. Vanga vari mutevedzeri waMuzvare Rushwaya, VaMarufu Sithole, ndivo vave kumbofanobata chigaro chemutungamiiri weZimbabwe Miners Federation. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Voenda Kumusangano Wavo weKutanga Kumawirira Vari Mutungamiri weNyika
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangawa vaenda kuDavos Switerland nhasi kumusangano weWorld Economic Forum kana kuti WEF uyo uri kutanga mangwana. Musangano uyu unopindwa nevatungamiri venyika dzakabudirira nedzimwe dzichiri kubudirira. Vaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vaisaenda kumisangano iyi nenyaya yekuti vainge vakatemrwa zvirango vachipomerwa mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Vanhu vaenda naVaMnangagwa vanosanganisa gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika Lt-Gen (Rtd) Sibusiso Moyo, gurukota rezvemari VaPatrick Chinamasa, gurukota rezvemaindustry Doctor Mike Bimha, chipangamazano muhofisi yaVaMnangagwa VaChris Mutsvangwa, munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaGeorge Charamba uye gavhuna weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe Doctor John Mangudya. Mukuru weZimbabwe Investment Authority VaRichard Mbaiwa ndemumwe wevemabhizimi vakatoenda kumusangano uyu kunoyedza kukwezva vekunze kuti vatange mabhizimisi muZimbabwe. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries VaCallisto Jokonya vanoti musangano uyu wakakosha zvikuru munyaya dzezvekusimudzira hupfumi munyika. No media source currently available

headline: ERC: Zimbabwe Ngaidzidze Mafambisirwo Akaitwa Sarudzo muZambia
text: Sangano rakazvimirira roga reElection Resource Center, ERC, iro rinokurudzira sarudzo dzakachena, rinoti sarudzo yemutungamiri weZambia yakaitwa nemazvo uye bazi reZimbabwe Electoral Commission (ZEC) rine zvakawanda zvarinogona kudzidza kubva kuElectoral Commission of Zambia. ERC, iyo yakanga ichiona kufambiswa kwesarudzo yeku Zambia, inoti gwaro revavhoti rakapihwa mapato ese akanga achikwikwidza pachine nguva, izvo inoti hazvimboitiki muZimbabwe. Vaimirira bato riri kutonga, VaEdgar Lungu, ndivo vakakunda musarudzo iyi uye vadoma neMuvhuro mutevedzeri wavo, Amai Inonge Wina, avo vakambova gurukota rinonona nezvenyaya dzemadzimai. VaLungu vakatora mhiko neSvondo pamabiko akapindwa nevatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica vanosanganisira, VaRobert Mugabe, avo vanova sachigaro veSadc. Vachitaura kumabiko aya, VaMugabe vakakorokotedza mapato emuZambia pakuita sarudzo iyi murunyararo. Asi pane vatsigiri vemapato anopikisa ekuZambia ikoko akaratidzira nemusi weMugovera achishora hutungamiri hwaVaMugabe kuLusaka. Mapato aya aiimba achiti VaMugabe vanofanirwa kusiya basa. VaMugabe vari kutarisirwa kutora hutungamiri hweAfrican Union pamusangano ichaitwa kuEthiopia mazuva mashoma anotevera. Mukuru weERC, VaTawanda Chimhinyi, vanoti Zimbabwe inofanirwa kudzidza zvakaitika kuZambia. No media source currently available

headline: Bazi reMedicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe Rinopa Mvumo Yekuti Vana Vabayiwe Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Vanoona nezvekushandiswa kwemishonga munyika, veMedicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe (MCAZ), vanonzi vakapa bazi rezvehutano mvumo yekuti vana vane makore ari pakati pegumi nemana negumi nemanomwe vange vachibaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19. Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano nekurerwa kwevana, VaDonald Mujiri, vanoti bazi ravo rakatarirwa zviga neMCAZ zvarinofanirwa kutanga razadzisa risati raparura chirongwa chekubaya vana nhomba yeCovid-19 iyi. Vanoti MCAZ yakakomekedza kuti bazi rehutano ritange raita ongororo inganzi paChirungu Phase 3 clinical trial, yekuona kuti mushonga uyu unoshanda sei muvana vezera iri risati raparura chirongwa ichi. VaMujiri vanoti pari zvino bazi ravo riri mushishi kuzadzisa zvakatarwa neMCAZ izvi kuitira kuzoparura chirongwa ichi. Hurumende yakazivisa masvondo maviri adarika kuti vana vemazera aya vave kuzobaiwa nhomba yakakosha iyi, yekudzivirira Covid-19. Pari zvino vanhu vari kubaiwa nhomba dzeavo vane makore anotangira pagumi nemasere zvichikwira. Mukuru werimwe sangano rinoshanda nenharaunda munyaya dzezvehutano, reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti vanogamuchira zvikuru danho ratorwa neMedicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe iri, vachiti rinobatsira kuchengetedza vana vadiki ava. VaRusike vanoti vana vane makore ari pasi pegumi nemasere vave kubatwawo zvakare nehutachiwana hunokonzera Covid-19, zvikuru hweseDelta Variant, izvo zvavanoti zvinoisa vana ava munjodzi huru. asi VaRusike vanoti vana ava vasati vabaiwa kana kupinda muchirongwa chekuongorora kana nhomba iyi ichishanda zvakanaka kumazera avo, vana ava vanofanirwa kutanga vapiwa mvumo nevabereki vavo kana vanovachengeta vasati vabaiwa., sezvo vari pasi pemakore ekuzvimirira. No media source currently available No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende neVashandi Vayo Votadza Kuwirirana paNyaya yeMihoro
text: Musangano pakati pevamiriri vehurumende nevamiriri vevashandi vehurumende weNational Joint Negotiating Council, uyo wanga wakatarisirwa nevakawanda kuti uchaburitsa chimuko, unonzi hauna chawaburitsa mushure mekunge vashandi varamba mari yanga yaiswa patafura nehurumende. Zvinonzi hurumende yanga yati inokwanisa kuwedzera vashandi vayo mihoro nemadhora makumi mapfumbamwe nemanomwe pamunhu iri mari yemaRTGS, iyo inonzi yarambwa nevamiriri vevashandi ava. Hurumende inonzi yati inokwanisa kuwedzera mari idzi nemari inoita zana nemakumi masere emamiroyoni emari yeRTGS semari ichawedzerwa kubva muna Chikunguru kusvika panopera gore muna Zvita. Izvi zvinosiya mushandi mumwe chete achiwedzerwa nemaRTGS makumi mapfumbamwe nemanomwe pamwedzi wega wega. Vashandi vari munhaurirano idzi vanga vachimirira nemasangano avo vanosvika zviuru mazana matatu nezvipfumbamwe, kunynage hazvo mamwe masangano akaita seProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe asina kupinda mumusangano uyu. Gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, neMuvhuro vakazivisa nyika kuti hurumende yaizozivisa neChipiri nezvemari yairi kuda kuwedzera nayo vashandi vayo, avo vari kuchema kuti vave kukwangwaya nenhamo. Pari zvino mushandi wepasi muhurumende anonzi ari kutambira mari inosvika madhora mazana mana nemakumi matatu yemaRTGS pamwedzi. Vashandi vari kuchema kuti mari yavo haichatenge chinhu sezvo zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichikwira panguva iyo mihoro yavo isina kwairi kuenda. Sachigaro vesangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende reApex Council, Amai Cecilia Alexander, vanoti vashandi vapinda mumusangano uyu vachitarisira kuti hurumende ichapa mushandi wepasi mari inoita RTGS$4750.00 pamwedzi. Amai Alexander vanoti vashandi vehurumende vakatovazivisa kare kuti kana pasina chabuda kubva mumusangano uyu, vanofanirwa kuenderera mberi nehurongwa hwavakange vanahwo muna Kurume hwekukanda mapadza pasi. Vanoti sevashandi, vari kutarisira kuti hurumende ichadzoka kwavari svondo rino risati rapera, uye ivo vachasanganawo seApex Council nemusi weChitatu kuti vapire nhengo dzavo zvabuda mumusangano uyu pamwe nekuti varonge gwara rekutora kuenda mberi. No media source currently available

headline: Vadzidzi Vanomwe Vanobatwa neCovid-19 paChikoro chePrince Edward muHarare
text: Vamwe vabereki vanonzi vatanga kubvisa vana vavo pane chimwe chikoro muHarare mushure mekunge vamwe vadzidzi vepachikoro ichi vawanikwa vaine chirwere cheCovid-19. Gwaro raburitswa nemukuru wechikoro chePrince Edward High School chiri muHarare, Va A.G. Gora, rinoti mushure mekuongororesa vadzidzi vepachikoro chavo nezuro, vana vanomwe vawanikwa vaine chirwere cheCovid 19 uye havasati vawana zvakabuda mukuongororwa kwevamwe kunyange hazvo vadzidzi vese vakaongororwa. VaGora vati vadzidzi vawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi vapatsanurwa kune vamwe vana uye vamirira kunzwa kubazi rezvedzidzo pamusoro pedambudziko ravasangana naro iri. Mumwe mubereki ane vana vanodzidza pachikoro ichi, Amai Revai Gambe, vati vaona zvakakodzera kuti vambobvisa vana vavo pachikoro kudzamara hurumende yatora matanho akasimba ekuti vana vavo vasabatwe nechirwere cheCovid 19. Mumwe mubereki ane mwana anodzidza pachikoro apa abvisawo mwana wake pachikoro apa nhasi, uyo aramba kudomwa nezita, akurudzira hurumende kuti ikurumidze kugadzirisa dambudziko iri kuitira kuti vana vasarasikirwe nenguva yedzidzo sezvo vana vakatora nguva yakareba vasingaende kuzvikoro zvichitevera kuvharwa kwakanga kwakaitwa nyika yose nekuda kwedenda reCovid 19. Mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubazi redzidzo, VaTaungana Ndoro, vaudza Studio 7 kuti bazi ravo harisati rave nedanho raratora panyaya iyi vachiti vachatevedzera zvinenge zvabva kubva kubazi rehutano. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, VaJohn Mangwiro, vati bazi ravo ratumira vanhu kunoongorora mamiriro akaita zvinhu pachikoro apa kuitira kuti vagoona kuti votora matanho api. Pasvika Studio 7 pachikoro chePrince Edward vezvehutano vanga vachifirita chikoro chose. Zvichakadai, vamwe vedzisvondo vari pasi peZimbabwe Catholic Bishops Conference vabaiwa nhomba yeSinopharm pahurongwa hwanga huchitungamirwa nebazi rezvehutano vamwe vafundisi vachikurudzira kuti vose vanoita zvechitendero vabaiwe nhomba iyi kuitira kuti vazvidzivirire kuchirwere cheCovid19. Vabaiwa nhomba ava vafundisi mazana maviri nemakumi masere nevasere. Vanhu vakabayiwa nhomba kekutanga nezuro vakasvika zviuru zvishanu nemazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nevapfumbamwe, 5 269, kusanganisira mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yekutamba vave zviuru makumi mana nezvipfumbamwe nemazana nemazana mana nevana (49 404) uye vabaiwa nhomba yechipiri vave zviuru zviviri nemazana mana nemakumi masere nevapfumbamwe (2489). Bazi rezvehutano rinoti kubva pakatanga chirwere ichi, muZimbabwe mave nevanhu zviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu nemazana manomwe nemakumi mana nevapfumbamwe (36 749) vakabatwa vaine chirwere ichi, uye vakapora vava zviuru makumi matatu nezvina nemazana mana nemakumi manomwe nevatanhatu (34476). Munyika mave nevanhu chiuru nemazana mashanu negumi nevatanhatu, 1 516, vafa nechirwere cheCovid 19 uye huwandu uhwu hunogona kukwira pachaburitswa mamwe mashoko nebazi iri nhasi manheru. No media source currently available

headline: Imwe Nhengo yeKomisheni yeSarudzo muKenya Yopondwa Ukuwo VaOdinga Vachiramba Kutambira Zvakabuda Musarudzo
text: Vakakundwa musarudzo dzekuKenya VaRaila Odinga varamba kutambira zvakabuda musarudzo dzakakundwa naVaWilliam Ruto. VaOdinga vaudza vatori venhau kuti havana kufara nekufambiswa kwakaitwa sarudzo nekomisheni yeIndependent Electoral and Boundaries Commission. Nhengo ina panomwe dzekomisheni iyi dzakti sarudzo hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka. Mapurisa emuKenya ati mumwe komishina VaDaniel Musyoka vakawanikwa vakapondwa mushure mekupambwa nemusi weChina. Sachigaro IEBC iyi VaWafuli Chebukati vati nhengo dzekomisheni yavo dziri kushiungurudzwa zvakanayanya. VaOdinga vane mazuva manomwe ekuti vaende kumatare kunopikisa zvakabuda musarudzo. Asi kunyangwe pachine mutauro pakufambiswa kwesarudzo, mutungamiri wenyikaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakatotumira mashoko ekukorokotedza VaRuto nekukunda musarudzo. Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reNational Constitutional Assembly vari nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemitemo Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku vati bumbiro remutemo weKenya rinobvumidza VaOdinga kupikisa zvakabuda musarudzo.

headline: Dare rePamusoro Rorasa Chikumbiro ChaVaSikhala Chekuti Vabhadhare Mari yeChibatiso, Repasi Richimira Kupa Mutongo
text: Nhasi matare maviri anoti ramejastiriri nedare repamusoro ange achinzwa zvikumbiro zvemumiriri weZengeza West mudare reparamemde VaJob Sikhala zvekuti vapihwe mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso pamhosva dzavari kupomerwa. Dare reHigh Court raramba kutambira chikumbiro chaVaSikhala chekuti vapihwe mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso panyaya yavari kupomerwa yekuti vaida kukanganisa mapurisa kuferefeta nyaya yekupondwa kwaMuzvare Moreblessing Ali nhengo yebato ravo reCitizens Coalition for Change. Rimwe gweta raVaSikhala Amai Beatrice Mtetwa vanove nhengo yesangano remagweta reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights ndivo vange vachimiririra VaSikhala. Rimwe gweta riri muchikwata chinomirira VaSikhala vachishanda nesangano reZLHR zvekare VaJeremiah Bamu vati vamirira VaSikhala kudare ramejastiriti uko mutongo wasendekwa parutivi. Masangano emagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu pasi rose ari kushora kusungwa kwaVaSikhala, mumiriri weChitungwiza West VaGodfrey Sithole nevamwe vasingapihwe mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso. No media source currently available

headline: VaObasanjo Vanoti Kutadza kweAU Kuranga Vakapidigura VaMugabe Kwopa Kuti Mauto Aite Zvivindi ZvekuPidigura Hurumende muAfrica
text: Vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika yeNigeria VaOlesegun Obasanjo vari kushora nyika dzemuAfrica nekusatorera Zimbabwe matanho akasimba muna 2017 apo mauto akapidigura hurumende yamushakabvu Robert Mugabe vachiti izvi zvave kupa kuti dzimwe nyika dzemuAfrica dzitevedzere zvakaitika muZimbabwe izvi. Vachitaura pamberi pedare rePan-African Parliament muJohannesburg, VaObasanjo vati vakatombotaura muna 1999 kuti nyika dzine vatungamiri vakauya nepfuti dzimiswe kuva nhengo dzeAfrican Union asi hapana akavateerera. Vati zvaitaurwa nemauto emuzimbabwe zvekuti vainge vasiri kupidigura hurumende hazvina nematuro ose. Vatiwo vatungamir havafanire kuvandudza mabumbiro emitemo kuti vatonge kusvika madhongi amera nyanga. Vachipindura, mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mubao reZanu-PF VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vati zviri kutaurwa naVaObasanjo hazvina nematuro ose vachiti havaratidze kuti vanonzwisisa matambudziko akatarisana neZimbabwe. No media source currently available Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongero enyika vachitungamira sangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute Doctor Pedzisayi Ruhanya vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kutaurwa naVaObasanjo zvakakosha asi vakati vatungamiri vemuAfrica havadi kugadzirisa matambudziko asati akomba semuenzaniso vati zvinhu muZimbabwe zviri kuratidza kuti hazvina kumira zvakanaka pamberi pesarudzo dza2023 nenyaya yemhirizhonga asi hakuna ari kuda kupindira. No media source currently available Kubva zvapidigurwa hurumende yaVaMugabe, vatungamiri venyika sere muAfrica vapidigurwa nemauto uye mauto akayedza akakundikana kupidigura hurumende kanomwe.

headline: Vaimbove Varwiri veRusununguko Vokumbira Veruzhinji Ruregerero
text: Vamwe vevaimbove varwiri vehondo yerusununguko vakumbira ruregerero kuruzhinji rwavanhu vavakatyorera kodzero dzavo muzimbabwe, vachiti kubva nhasi zvichienda mberi, havasi kuzobvuma kushandiswa nevezvematongerwo enyika, sezvavakaitwa nebato reZanu PF. Mashoko aya abuda apo vaimbove varwiri vehondo ava vanga vachiparura boka idzva rinokurudzira runyararo munyika rinonzi War Veterans Peace Initiative Vachitaura nevatori venhau muHarare nhasi, vaimbove varwiri vehondo ava, avo vari pasi pesangano reZimbabwe National War Veterans Association, ZNLWVA, vanoti munyika hamuna runyararo izvo zvinotadzisa budiriro mukati menyika. Munyori mukuru muboka idzva reWar Veterans Peace Intiative, VaZvakanyorwa Wilbert Sadomba, vati zvinosuwisa kuti makore makumi matatu nemanomwe nyika yawana kuzvitonga, muZimbabwe machine mweya wehondo nemhirizhonga, uye vamwe vavo vachiri kushandiswa kuita zvemhirizhonga. VaSadomba vati izvi ndozvapa kuti vapinde muhurongwa hwekuvaka hwaro hwerusununguko VaSadomba, avo vari muchikwata chinotsigira VaChris Mutsvangwa, sachigaro weZNLWVA, vati apo nyika yakatarisana nesarudzo dza2018, zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvofanirwa kubatana mukurwisa mhirizhonga kuitira kuti munyika muitwe sarudzo dzakachena uye murunyararo. VaSadomba vatiwo zvinosuwisa kuti munyika machine vanhu vasingadi runyararo, vane zvavanowana nemhirizhonga Vachipa muenzaniso waSaul wemubhaibheri, sachigaro weboka rerunyararo iri, VaWilfred Marimo, vati sevarwi verusununguko vanokumbira kuregererwa neruzhinji pane zvavanopomerwa uye zvakaitwa nevamwe vavo vaimbunyikidza veruzhinji. VaMarimo vati vanotarisira kushanda nemasangano akasiyana siyana mukuparidza shoko rerusununguko. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika, VaTinashe Muzamhindo, vanoti zviri kuirwa nevaimbove varwiri verusununguko zvinoratidza kuti vava kuonawo zvavaitadza uye danho ravatora rekukumbira ruregerero rinoita kuti vabatane nevamwe mukurwira kodzero dzemunhu wese. Sangano reZimbabwe National War Veterans Association rine zvikwata zviri kurwira masimba, chimwe chikwata chichitungamirwa naVaPatrick Nyaruwata, chimwe naVaMutsvangwa. Makatanwa aya panyaya yehutungamiri ari mumatare edzimhosva, kunyange hazvo paine mutongo wekuti chikwata chaVaMutsvangwa ndicho chinocherechedzwa nemutemo. No media source currently available

headline: Mumwe Mwana Ofa neChirwere cheTyphoid kuMbare
text: Apo vamwe vanhu vange vari kufara pazororo rekisimusi, imwe mhuri yekuMbare yakafirwa nemwasikana wayo uyo ano fungudzirwa kuti akarwara netyphoid kwenguva pfupi. Vagari vemumusha uyu munzvimbo yeNational vanoti tsvina kana kuti sewage iri kuyerera nepadzimba dzavo iri kupa kuti vatyire hupenyu hwavo. Vagari vemuMbare vanoti chinonyanyorwadza ndechekuti musikana uyu ange akabuda zvinofadza pabvunzo dzake dzeGrade 7 aine 4 units uye kunyange hazvo kanzuru yeHarare yati iri kuongorora kuti chii chakanzozera kufa kwake, vagari vemunzvimbo iyi vati kubuda kwemasiweji achierera mudzimba dzavo ndiko kwakonzera kufa kwemwana uyu. Vagari vakawanda mumigwagwa inoti 8th na 9th vaudza Studio 7 kuti kanzuru yeHarare yange isiri kuterera zvichemo zvavo zvekuti vazogadzira mapaipi emasewage akaputika uye vanhu vakawanda munzvimbo iyi vakatoendeswa kuchipatara vachirwara nemanyoka. Mumwe mugari wemuna 9th uyo asina kuda kudomwa nezita audza Studio 7 kuti kufa kwemwana uyu kwarwadza vanhu vakawanda. Ambuya Anne Marry Karimushanje vanoti mumusha weMbare maita dambudziko guru remasuweji ari kupitika mudzimba zvekutoti vave kutyira kuti vana vakawanda vachafa nezvirwere zvemanyoka. Tinashe Karise uyo ane tuckshop yake munzvimbo iyi audza Studio 7 kuti seweji iri kuerera pese yave kukanganisa bhizimisi rake uye nhunzi dzave kuzara mutuckshop make. Mugwaro ravaburitsa kuvatori venhau, mutauriri weHarare City Council, VaMichael Chideme, vati kanzuru iri kuongorora rufu rwemwana uyu uye vatsinhirawo kuti hanzvidzi yake pamwe nevamwe vanhu vane chitsama kubva munzvimbo iyi vari muchipatara uye vari kufungidzirwa kuti vane typhoid. Vatiwo pane vanhu makumi matatu kubva munzvimbo iyi vakatorapwa sezvo vaifunguidzirwa kuti vane typhoid. Mukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Dr Proper Chonzi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mufi ange achiratidzika kunge ane typhoid asi kanzuru haisati yave nehumbowo hwekuti ange aine typhoid here kana kuti kwete. Dr Chonzi vati zvinokonzera typhoid zvinozikanwa uye kanzuru iri kuedza napose painogona napo kugadzirisa nyaya dzekutakurwa kwemarara nemasiweji senzira yekudzivirira chirwere ichi. VaChideme vatiwo kanzuru yatanga chirongwa chekudzidzisa vanhu pamusoro pezvirwere zvetyphoid necholera pamwe nekukosha kwehutsanana. Kanzuru yeHarare yakazivisa muna Mbudzi kuti yakatarisira kuti zvirwere zvemanyoka zvichawanda panotanga kunaya mvura uye yakati vese vanenge vachirwara nezvirwere izvi vacharapwa pachena. Bazi reCentres for Disease Control rinoona nezvehutano muAmerica rinoti kudzivirira chirwere chetyphoid vanhu vanofanira kubhoirisa chikafu kana mvura, kubika chikafu, kuchimenya kana kutorega kudya muchirungu, “Boil it, cook it, peel it or forget it.”

headline: Vaigara Mupurazi reManzou Voramba Vachishungurudzwa naAmai Mugabe
text: Vagari vepa purazi reManzou, kuMazowe vanoti kunyange hazvo vakaita musangano nekomisheni yezvesarudzo vachitaura nezvekutyorerwa kodzero dzavo nemapurisa anonzi akatumwa naAmai Grace Mugabe kuti avabvise nechisimba papurazi iri, kushungurudzwa kwavo kuri kuenderera mberi. Sachigaro wekomisheni yeZimbabwe Human Rights Commission, VaElasto Mugwadi, vanoti chikwata chavakatumira kuManzou chiri kuita ongororo yekuona kuti kodzero dzevanhu ava dziri kutyorwa here kana kuti kwete. Rimwe sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimRights rashorawo zvikuru nyaya yekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu nemapurisa papurazi iri.
