ZimRights inoti Amai Mugabe nemapurisa vanofanira kutevedzera bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Dare repamusoro rakambotongawo kuti vanhu ava vasabviswe asi hapana akazviteerera uye mapurisa ari kupomerwa mhosva yekutowedzera kushungurudza nekurova vanhu ava. Vagari ava vakatanga kugara papurazi iri muna 2000 asi gurukota redunhu reMashonaland Central, VaMartin Dinha, vanoti purazi iri rakazopihwa Amai Mugabe kuti vachengetere mhuka. Asi vamwe vanoti purazi iri rine goridhe rakawanda rinogona kuva riri iro rakapa kuti paite mutauro wakanyanya. Mumwe mugari wepapurazi iri, Amai Susan Kufakunesu, vanoti zvitangwena zvavange vavaka zvakaputswa pamwe nematanga emombe. Vanoti vave kutorara pamhene nguva dzose nevana vavo. No media source currently available

headline: MDC-T Yoita Kongiresi paChikandiranwa Makobvu neMatete
text: Kongiresi yechimbichimbi yeMDCT iri kufanotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe yekutsvaga anotsiva mushakabvu VaMorgan Tsvangirai yatanga muHarare nhasi zvinhu zvsingafambe zvakanaka panyaya dzekuvhota. Kongiresi yeMDCT yekutsvaga achatora chigaro chakasiyiwa naVaTsvangirai avo vakashaya muna Kukadzi 2018 yatanga mangwanani dzimwe nhengo dzebato iri dzinobva mudunhu reBulawayo dzichidya magaka neminzwa yavo dzichiti dzanga dzichirambidzwa kuvhota zvaita kuti dzitange kuimba. Mumwe wevanhu vanhu ava, VaAnyway Mlotswa, vanoti vanga vachinzi mazita avo haamo mugwaro revavhoti kunyange hazvo vachiti vave nenguva yakareba vari mubato iri. Mushure mechinguvana pachinetsanwa nevanga vachitungamira kuvhotesa, vanhu ava vazobvumidzwa kuti vavhote zvazoita kuti pave nerunyararo. Mumwe wevauya kuzovhota achibva mudunhu reMasvingo, VaPeter Chigaba, vati kongiresi iyi iri kuvapa mukana wekusarudza mutungamiri wavo achatora matomhu aVaTsvangirai oenderera mberi nekurwira hutongo hwejekere. Munyori mubato iri, VaDouglas Mwonzora avo vari kukwikwidzawo vati chavanoda ndechekuti vapedzise rwendo rwakatangwa naVaTsvangirai. Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, avo vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri webato iri uye zvakare vari mumwe wevari kudawo kutsiva VaTsvangirai pakongiresi iyi, vati mushure mekongiresi iyi vari kutarisira kuti vashande zvakasimba kubatanidza vanhu mubato ravo.. Kunze kwaMuzvare Khupe naVaMwonzora, vamwe vari kukwikwidza pakongiresi yechimbichimbi iyi kuti vatsive VaTsvangirai ndiVaElias Mudzuri avo vakambodomwa naVaTsvangirai kuve mutevedzeri wavo pamwe nevaive mutevedzeri wasachigaro weMDC munguva yaVaTsvangirai, VaMorgen Komichi. VaMudzuri vaudza vatori venhau kuti vari kutarisira kuti vachakunda asi vachiti vange vachitarisira kuti vakuru vebato dai vagadzirisa nyaya yemari dzebato dziri kunzi nevakafanobata chigaro chemubati wehomwe VaChief Ndlovu hadzina kufambiswa zvakanaka naVaMwonzora. Mari iyi yakabva kuhomwe yehurumende inopihwa bato rinenge rawana mavhoti akati wandei. VaMwonzora vari kuraba kuti vakaba mari vachiti vavari kukwikwidzana navo vari kuda kuvasungisa kuti vasavhoterwe. Bato iri rinonzi rasara risina kana mari yekushandisa paKongiresi iyi zvapa kuti rikwerete mabhazi eZUPCO rozobhadhara Kongiresi yapera. Zvichabuda pasarudzo dziri kuitwa idzi zvakatarisirwa kuziviswa husiku hwanhasi pachapedza kuverengwa kwemavhoti. Kongiresi iyi yaitwa zvichitevera mutongo wedare repamusoro-soro reSupreme Court uyo wakati mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa havana kusarudzwa zviri pamutemo kuti vatungamirire bato reMDCT. Asi VaChamisa vakati sebato vakatoita kongiresi yavo kuGweru gore rapera saka nokudaro havana chekuita nezviri kuitwa naMuzvare Khupe nevamwe vavo. Mibvunzo yatatumira mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaClifford Hlatshwayo, yanga isati yapindurwa pataenda pamhepo. Zvichakadaro, sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Diaspora Forum muSouth Africa, VaSox Chikowero, avo vakashanda zvikuru naVaTsvangirai muMDC, vasungwa pakongiresi yeMDCT iyi vakaendeswa kukamba yeHarare Central. Kunyange hazvo mutauriri wemapurisa VaPaul Nyathi vati vanga vasati vave neruzivo nezvenyaya iyi, vamwe vari kuziva zviri kuitika muchipurisa vati VaChikowero vasungwa nenyaya ine chekuita nekupfurwa kwakaitwa nhengo yebato reZanu PF kuMbare muna 2007. Pataenda pamhepo, tanga tisati taziva kuti VaChikowero, avo vanga vave nemakore akawanda vasati vadzoka munyika vari muhupoteri vanga vasati vapomerwa mhosva zviri pamutemo. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weNyika VaMnangagwa Vonanga kuMaputo kuMusangano weSADC Troika
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kusimuka vakananga kuMaputo kumusangano weSADC Double Troika, uyo uri kutarisirwa kuzeya dambudziko rekusagadzikana kwakatarisana nedunhu rekuchamhembe kweAfrica pamwe nehondo iri mudunhu reCabo Delgado muMozambique. Nhepfenyuro yeZBC inoti VaMnangagwa vachatungamira chikwata cheZimbabwe chichange chichinopinda mumusangano uyu. Mozambique ndiyo ine husachigaro hweSADC Troika pari zvino, uye Malawi ndiyo yave kuzotarisirwa kutora chigaro ichi. SADC iri kutarisirwa kutumira mauto kudunhu reCabo Delgabo kuitira kuti abatsire hurumende yeMozambique kupedza hondo yakakonzerwa nevanopfurikidza mwero, iyo yasiya vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matanhhatu vatiza misha yavo. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa mavhinga, vanoti zvakakosha kuti VaMnangagwa vabatane nevamwe vatungamiri venyika dzemuSADC kumusangano uyu, asi vatungamiri ava havafanirwe kukanganwawo kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu vavo. No media source currently available

headline: Mitumbi yeVakafa muTsaona yeCyclone Idai Yofukurwa Kubva muMadhaka
text: Mumiriri weManicaland muparamende pasi pehurongwa hwe Proportional Represenation, Amai Lynette Karenyi, veMDC, vanoti basa rekutsvaga mitumbi yevanhu vangadai vakafuchirwa nemadhaka mutsaona yeCyclone Idai pamwe nevamwe vangadai vachiri vapenyu riri kuenderera mberi muChimanimani neChipinge. Amai Karenyi vanoti dzimwe mhuri dziri kuita zvekufukura mitumbi yehama dzadzo dzakafushirwa mumadhaka nematombo pakawondomoka gomo, pamwe nepasi pedzimba dzakaparadzwa vanhu vareremo, mimwe mitumbi ichiwanikwa munzizi. Asi vanoti dambudziko guru richiripo nderekuti vanhu vawane rubatsiro, zvikuru rwechikafu, sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kunzvimbo dziri kure dzakaita sekwaMutsvangwa, vachinzi havasati vakwanisa kuwana rubatsiro rwezvekudya. Vanotiwo mishonga, zvikuru yemaARV, yakwanisa kusvitswa pakirinika yeMutsvangwa, uyewo madzimai matatu pamadzimai gumi nevatatu vakazvitakura vari pakirinika iyi vanonzi vakwanisa kusunuguka zvisina dambudziko. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reARTUZ Rinoti Rabatana neVabereki muGwaro Renyunyuto kuMutungamiri weNyika
text: Rimwe sangano revarairidzi, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, rinoti nhengo dzaro dzakabatana nevabereki vanyorera mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, gwaro renyunyuto vachinyunyuta nemabatirwo avanoti ari kuitwa bvunzo dziri kunyorwa nevana munguva ino yeCovid-19. Mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure vanoti vana vachikoro vari kunzi vanyore bvunzo nemuna Mbudzi asi vasina kudidza zvakakwana nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Vanoti zvimwe zviri mugwaro renyunyuto iri zvinosanganisira nyaya yemihoro yevarairidzi, uye vanoti magwaro enyunyuto aya akwanisa kunyorwa mumatunhu akawanda emunyika uye achaiswa kumahofisi edzidzo mumatunhu iwayo, ayo anozoasvitsa kumahofisi emutungamiri wenyika. VaMasaraure vanoti chavari kuda ndechekuti mutungamiri wenyika vamise bvunzo idzi dzozonyorwa gore rinouya. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata mutauriri wemutungamiri wenyika VaGoerge Charamba kuti tinzwe kana magwaro aya atanga kusvika kumahofisi aVaMnangagwa. No media source currently available

headline: Mishonga yeNhomba yeCovid-19 Yosvika neMuvhuro Ichibva kuChina
text: Zimbabwe ichatanga kugamushira mishonga yenhomba yekudzivirira denda reCovid-19 kubva kuChina nemusi weMuvhuro unouya uye vamwe vashandi vezvehutano vanoti mushonga uyu unofanira kutanga waongororwa usati hwapihwa kwavari pamwe neveruzhinji. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota wekutanga gore rino, gurukota rinoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Seneta Monica Mutsvangwa, vakati mishonga yava kapihwa pachena neChina pamwe nemimwe yakatengwa nehurumende ichatanga kusvika munyika svondo rinouya nemusi weMuvhuro. Vakatiwo mumwe mushonga unotarisirwa kusvika munyika musi wa1 Kurume uye hurumende ine chinangwa chekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kuvadzirira kuCovid-19 ichitanga nemachiremba, vakoti nevamwe vanoshanda muzvipatara. Nyanzvi nevashandi vehutano vanoti hurumende iri kutora matanho akanaka pakuunza mishonga iyi asi panofanira kuitwa ongororo yekuti inoshanda zvakanaka here muZimbabwe. Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vakoti, reZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo, vanoti kunyange hazvo vari kufara kuti hurumende iri kuvatungamidza pamberi pakutanga kubaiyiwa nhomba yeCovid-19, panofanira kutangwa paitwa ongororo yekuti mushonga uyu unoshanda muZimbabwe here vasati vabaiwa veruzhinji. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, zvakare vari munyori anoona nezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Dr Henry Madzorera, vanotsigirana naVaDongo vachiti zvakosha kuti hurumende iite ongororo yekuti mushonga uyu unoshanda zvakadii muZimbabwe. Mutungamiri werimwe remasangano anomirira vanachiremba, reMedical and Dental Private Practitioners Association, Dr Johannes Marisa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kuongorora mushonga uyu usati watanga kushandiswa kunodzivirira. Asi Amai Mutsvangwa vanoti hurumende ichatevedza hunyanzvi hwesainzi panyaya dzemishonga yekudzivirira Covid-19. VaDongo vanoti kunyange hazvo vasati vave neruzivo hwekuti hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba yeCovid-19 huchafamba sei kana kutanga rini, havawoni sekuti zvinganetse kubaya vanhu sezvo vagara vachibaya vanhu nhomba dzezvimwe zvirwere. Kunze kwemishonga iri kubva kuChina, Amai Mutsvangwa, vakazivisawo kuti hurumende ine hurongwa kwekutenga mishonga yeCovid-19 kubva kuIndia neRusssia. Amai Mutsvangwa vanoti Zimbabwe ichatumira ndege kuChina kunotora mishonga yenhomba yeCovid-19 kuitira kuti ipinde munyika musi waKukadzi 15, 2021. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti nhomba dziri kubva kuChina hadzisati dzaitwa ongororo muZimbabwe yekuona kuti inoshanda zvakadii sezvinodiwa nemitemo yenyika mishonga iyi isati yapihwa veruzhinji munyika. Ongororo idzi dzinotora mwedzi yakati kuti dzichiitwa pachikwata chevanhu mishonga iyi isati yapihwa veruzhinji. Asi munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, vanoti zvinhu zvose zviri mugwara. No media source currently available

headline: Inflation Yodzika Asi Hurombo Horamba Huri Munyika
text: Kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu kana kuti inflation uko kwange kuri pazvikamu zvinodarika zana kubva muzana kwemakore maviri adarika kwave nani kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe ichiri panyika ina dzine mitengo yezvinhu iri kukwira zvakanyanyisa pasi rose. Zimbabwe National Staistics Agency inoti Inflation muZimbabwe yadzika zvishoma kusvika pazvikamu makumi mashanu nezvitanhatu nezviga zviviriu kubva muzana kana kuti 56,2% mwedzi uno, zvichienzaniswa nezvikamu zana nezvitanhatu nezviga makumi matanhatu nezvina kubva muzana kana kuti 106, 64%. Pachitariswa nyika dziri kurwisa nyaya yekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu iyi, Zimbabwe iri kumashure kweVenezuela, Sudan neLebanon. muSADC, Angola iri pachidanho chepfumbamwe, Zambia iri pachidanho chegumi. Vachinyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakati vari kutambira nemufaro kudzika kweinflation uku vachiti munongedzo wekuti remangwana renyika rakajeka. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, nemukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Dr Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti zvakakosha kuti gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vatange kusungunura mimwe mitemo yavainge vadzika vachiyedza kugadzirisa hupfumi. Vari kuvakurudzira kuendesa mari kumapazi edzidzo nehutano sezvo bhanga reWorld Bank rakaita ongororo yakaburitsa pachena kuti vanhu mamiriyoni manomwe nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe 7,9 million vakatarisana nenzara inotyisa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaVictor Bhoroma, vanoti nyaya yekushandiswa kwedhora rekuAmerica zvakanyanya ndiyo iri kupa kuti mitengo idzikame. No media source currently available

headline: ARTUZ Inopedza Kongiresi Yayo Ichiti Kushandira Mahara Kwete
text: Kongiresi yeAmalgamated Rural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, yapetwa muGweru sangano iri richibuda nezvisungo zvakasiyana siyana kusanganisira kusadzokere kubasa kwevarairidzi panovhurwa zvikoro svondo rinouya. Musangano uyu wasarudza vatungamiri vatsva vana kuti vave vamwe vevatungamiri vatanhatu vanoumba National Executive Council yesangano iri. VaObert Masaraure vanoramba vari mutungamiri wesangano iri, ukuwo VaRobson Chere, vari munyori mukuru mushure mekunge vaviri ava vasarudzwa pasina avakwikwidza. Aitwa mutevedzeri waVaMasaraure, ndiMuzvare Gaudencia Mandiopera; ukuwo vasarudzwa kuva mutevedzeri waVaChere, ndiVaMunyaradzi Masiyiwa. Asarudzwa kuvamutauriri weArtuz ndiVaNation Mudzitirwa, ukuwo Muzvare Brenda Musavengana vaitwa mubati wehomwe. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, avo vange vari munyarikani pamusangano uyu, vakorokotedza ARTUZ nekukwanisa kuita kongiresi yayo zvisinei nekuoma kwakaita zvimhu. Vatiwo zvakakosha kuti vashandi vose munyika vabatane kuti vakwanise kubuda mumatambudziko avari. VaMasaraure vabvuma kuti kubatana kwakakosha vakati sangano ravo richaramba richiedza kushanda nemamwe masangamo kuti kubatana uku kuvepo. VaChere vaudza Studio7 kuti chimwe chezvisungo zvabuda ndechekuti varairidzi havazi kuzodzokera kuzvikoro pazvinivhurwa asi vati izvi hazvirevi kuti vari kuramwa mabasa. Vamwe varairidzi vange vari pamusangano uyu vaudza Studio7 kuti vanotsigira zvizere zvisungo zvabuda izvi. Muzvare Mary Mupatsi, avo vanodzidzisa kuSilobela, vati varairidzi vekumaruwa vari kurarama hupenyu hwakaoma. Sangano reARTUZ rakavambwa mugore ra2014, uye kongiresi inotevera ichaitwa mushure memakore mashanu. No media source currently available

headline: VaKhaya Moyo Vanobvuma Kuti Chabvondoka muZanu PF
text: Bato re Zanu PF rinoti richasangana svondo rinouya kuti rizeya nyaya yekunetsana kuri mubato iri kana paine vanenge vaine zvichemo zvavanenge vatura kuPolitburo. Mashoko aya ataurwa nemutauriri webato iri, Va Simon Khaya Moyo, zvichiteveraa kunetsana nekurovana uye kukandirana makobvu nematete kuri kuenderera mberi mubato iri pamveri pemusangano waro we National Conference uri kutarisira kuitwa kuVictoria Falls muna Zvita. No media source currently available Vanhu vakawanda mubato iri vave makara asionane zvikuru vanonzi vari kutsigira chikwata chinonzi chinotungamirwa nemumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, nechimwe chinonzi Generation 40 chinosanganisira mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe. Asi Amai Mugabe naVaMnangagwa vanoti havana zvikwata zvavanotungamira. Vanoziva zviri kuitika muZanu PF vanoti chirongwa cheGeneration 40, kana kuti G40, chakauya kuburikidza nepfungwa dzevaimbove gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaJonathan Moyo, vachishanda nemamwe makurukota echidiki muZanu PF Mune kunetsana kunotyisa mumatunhu akawanda muZanu PF kusanganisira Masvingo, Harare, Mashonaland West, Mashonaland East neMashonaland Central. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika uye vachiongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaClifford Mashiri, vanoti zvava kuitika muZanu PF zvinoratidza kuti bato iri chava chitima chisina musoro

headline: R-B-Z Yokurudzirwa Kuti Ikasike Kubhara Vanenge Vahwinha Mari paMusika weMari yeKunze
text: Vemabhizimusi pamwe nedzimwe nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vari kutambira nemufaro kurudziro yekomiti inotara mitemo yemari kubhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, yeMonetary Policy Committee, yekuti bhanga iri ribhadhare mukati memwedzi mari dzisati dzapiwa kumakambani akahwinha pamusika wemari yekunze. Gwaro rakaburitswa nagavhuna veReserve Bank of Zimbabwe Doctor John Mangudya neMuvhuro rinoti komiti iyi iri kukurudzirawo kuti bhanga guru iri ringe richizobhadhara makambani anenge ahwhinha aya mukati memasvondo maviri sezviri pamutemo. Kurudziro yeMonetary Policy Committee iyi inouya panguva iyo makambani nevanhu vakawanda vari kuhwinha mari pamusika wemari yekunze uyu vari kunzi vari kunonoka kubhadharwa mari idzi zvekutotora masvondo anosvika mapfumbamwe, izvo zvinonzi zviri kukanganisa mafambisirwo emabhizimusi nemabasa. Asi mubvunzo mukuru uripo ndewekuti zvinokwanisika here kuti zviitike mukati memwedzi mumwechete uri kukurudzirwa, pachitariswa mari yacho inoda kubhadharwa, iyo inonzi inosvika mamiriyoni zana nemakumi manomwe nemashanu emadhora ekuAmerica? Mutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vezvitoro reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers, VaDenford Mutashu, vanoti itarisiro yevemabhizimusi kuti dai mari yavenenge vahwinha pamusika wemari yekunze uyu vachimbidze vaiwana kuitira kuti vaishandise ichine huremu. VaMutashu vanotiwo kunonoka kuwanikwa kwemari iyi nevemabhizimusi ndiko kuri kupfumbidza nzira yekuenda kune vanotengesa mari yekunze pamusika mutema, izvo zviri kuzokwidzawo zvakare mutengo wemari pamusika uyu. Izvi zvatsinhirwawo nemutungamiri weEmployers’ Confederation ofZimbabwe, VaIsrael Murefu, avo vanoti panofanirwa kuve nekugadzikana munyaya dzemutengo wemari yekunze kuitira kuti vemabhizimusi vakwanise kuronga remangwana. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara vanotiwo idanho rakanaka riri kukurudzirwa neMonetary Policy Committee, asi panofanirwa kuonekwa kuti chii chiri kukonzera dambudziko iri. Ko vanoona here kurudziro yekomiti iyi ichikwanisa kuzadziswa mukati memwedzi mumwechete? Doctor Chitambara vanoti zvinogona kunetsa kunze kwekunge pave kutozoshandiswa mari yakapiwa nyika neInetrnational Monetary Fund yemaSpecial Drawing Rights, kana kuti SDR kuti ibatsire kusimudzira musika wemari yekunze uyu. Muzvinabhizimusi, uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGilbert Muponda vanotsigira Doctor Chitambara vachitiwo mari yakapiwa nyika neIMF iyi inokwanisa chose kubatsira vemakambani kurerutsa dambudziko remari yekunze. Kunze kwekunge R-B-Z yakwanisa kugadzirisa dambudziko iri nekukasika, vakawanda vemabhizimusi vacharamba vachiita hukama nevanotengesa mari yekunze pamukoto, kunyange hazvo vachiitenga nemuripo uri pamusoro, izvowo zvinozoita kluti mitengo yezvinhu zvakawanda ikwire. No media source currently available

headline: Mumwe Mudzimai Osiya Murume neVana Achinochengeta Vabereki Vainge Vabatwa neCovid-19
text: Mumwe mudzimai akaratidza hushing muHarare apo akasiya vana nemurume achienda kunochengeta vabereki vake vainge vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19. Amai Constance Duchess Makoni, vanoti vakanogara kuKuwadzana 6 nevabereki vavo pamwe naambuya vavo, sezvo pakanga pasina munhu aikwanisa kuvachengeta panguva iyo zvinhu zvainge zvisina kumira zvakanaka muzvipatara. Amai Makoni, avo vakamboshanda semutori wenhau, vanoti mushure mekuona kuti vatatu aiva vainge vakabatwa nedzihwa rakasimba vakaronga kuvaendesa kuti vanovhenekwa kana vaine chirwere cheCovid-19, asi baba vavo vakaramba kuita izvi sezvo vaiita sevari nani. Asi vakazobatwa nehurwere zvakasimba. Vanoti vakaedza kuendesa vatatu ava kuzvipatara, asi hapana chipatara chakada kuvatora. Vakayedzawo kutsvaga kutsvaga vakoti vanochengeta varwere vachigara navo pamba pavo, asi pavaingoziva kuti hurwere uhwu hwaiva hweCovid 19 vaibva varamba . Mushure mekushaya vanhu vangabatsira vabereki vavo vanoti vakatora danho guru rokusiya murume wavo nevana kumba vachimocheneta vabereki vavo. Vanoti pavaichengeta vatatu ava, havana kurara kwemazuva matatu aitevedzana, vachiita zvose zvavaiudzwa kuti vape varwere ava, zvaisanganisira kufashaidza mvura yokunatira nezvimwe, uye ivo vachigara kugara vakageza maoko avo nguva dzose, ukuwo vakapfeka mamasiki nguva dzose. Amai Makoni vanoti mbuya vavo, avo vaiva nemakore makumi masere nerimwe ekuberekwa, vakazoshaya mushure memazuva manomwe, chinova chinhu chakavarwadza zvikuru. Vakambove gurukota rezvehutano kwemakore akawanda, Dr David Parirenyatwa, vanoti vanoyemura zvikuru hushingi hwaAmai Makoni vachiti vashoma vanhu vanokwanisa kuzvipira kubatsira varwere veCovid 19. Dr Parirenyatwa vanoti sezvo Covid 19 ichinyanya kubata mapapu, kunatira kunofanirwa kuitwa katatu pazuva kuitira kuti dzihwa rinobva kumhino, risadzike zvokunovhara tsinga dzinofamba nemweya unoenda kumapapu. Mutevedzeri wemukuru anoona nazvematenda asingatapuriranwe mubazi rezvehutano, Dr Justice Mudavanhu, vanoti vari kunyanya kufa pasi rose nechirwere ichi, vanhu vakwegura vane matenda eshuga nezvirwere zvemoyo. Dr Mudavanhu vanoti Covid 19 hairapike uye vakapa muenzaniso wezvinhu zvekutarisira kumunhu anenge abatwa nechirwere cheCovid 19 zvinenge kupisa muviri, chikosoro chakaoma nekutadza kufema zvakanaka. No media source currently available

headline: VaBhasikiti Voruma Nzeve VaMugabe Zviri Kuitwa naAmai Mahofa kuNuanetsi Ranch
text: Vaimbova gurukota rinoona nezvedunhu reMasvingo, VaKudakwashe Bhasikiti, vanoti vanyora tsamba kumutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vachinyuyuta kuti vakatora chigaro chavo, Amai Shuvai Mahofa, vari kushanda nemumwe muzvinabhizimisi, VaBilly Rautenbach, kuti vabvise vanhu kuNuanetsi Ranch kuitira kuti VaRautenbach vatange bhizimisi rekugadzira mafuta enzimbe panzvimbo iyi. No media source currently available Amai Mahofa vakaudza Studio7 svondo rapera kuti mhuri zviuru makumi maviri dzichabviswa kuNuanetsi Ranch dzichiendeswa kumapurazi manomwe akatsvagwa nehurumende. Asi nzvimbo yakagariswa vanhu patsva iyi yagara iine mutauro nekuti kambani yeDevelopment Trust of Zimbabwe yakavambwa nevaive mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, mushakabvu Joshua Nkomo, avo vakatenga purazi iri. VaRautenbach vanonzi vakanyorerana pasi chibvumnirano chekushanda nekambani iyi mukuumba kambani ye Zimbabwe Bio Energy. Asi pange pachikandiranwa makobvu nematete pakati pekambani iyi nehurumende. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaRautenbach sezvo munhu adaira nharembozha yavo ati vachazofona. Asi havana kuita izvi pataenda kumhepo. Amai Mahofa vati vange vari mumusangano. Asi mukuru we Development Trust of Zimbabwe, VaCharles Madonko, vanoti hurumende haineyi neminda iri pasi pekambani yavo, sezvo minda iyi yakatengwa kare. No media source currently available

headline: VanaChiremba Vari Kuramwa Mabasa Vanotadza Kuwirirana neHurumende
text: Hurumende ichimiririrwa nemapazi ezvehutano nemari neMuvhuro yakaita hurukuro navanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa asi zvinonzi hapana kuwirirana zvapa kuti vanachiremba vati vacharamba vachiramwa mabasa. Mubati wehomwe musangano ravanachiremba reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association Dr Prince Butau vanoti kuramwa mabasa kuri kuenderera mberi sezvo pasina kuwirirana nehurumende pakugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo zvinosanganisa kushomeka kwemishonga, zvikwanisiro uye kusawedzerwa kwemari dzavanotambira. Hurumende, kuburikidza neboka reHealth Services Board, yavimbisa kuti mishonga ichawanikwa muzvipatara paine tarisiro yekuti zvicharerutsa dambudziko. Musangano uyu unonzi waudzwawo kuti hurumende iri kuwedzera mari inoita mamiriyoni gumi emadhora yekuti pakwanise kupinzwa vamwe vashandi vezvehutano mumapoka ane dambudziko rekushomeka kwevane hunyanzvi kutanga musi wa 01 Ndira 2019. Hurumende inonzi yakawanisawo mari inosvika mamiriyoni matanhatu emadhora, iyo inonzi yakanga yasara pamari yehomwe yeHealth Workers Vehicle Loan Scheme, yekuti vashandi vezvehutano vakwereteswe mari yekutenga dzimotokari vasingazobhadhariswa mitero yekupinza motokari idzi munyika kubva musi wa 01 Ndira 2019 zvakare. Zvinonziwo hurumende yakaisa hurongwa hwekuti vanachiremba nevamwe vashandi vakamisirwa mihoro yavo yemuna Zvita 2018 vakwanise kuwaniswa mihoro yemuna Ndira 2019 kana vakanyorera kumapoka avanoshandira. No media source currently available

headline: Mugodhi weEldorado Wopedza Vanhu Uchidhirika
text: Vanhu vanokorokoza goridhe vanosvika vana vakafa vanhu vakawanda vakakuvara mumavhiki maviri apera panzvimbo yakatorwa nenhengo dzevechidiki dzeZanu PF kumugodhi weEldorado pedyo neChinhoyi. Mumwe mutumbi wevakafa ava, VaSelestino Sibanda, avo vanga vane makore makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe vachibva kuKadoma, uchiri mumba inochengeterwa vafi pachipatara chikuru chemuChinhoyi. Mumwe mutumbi waVaJabulani Ndlovu wakatorwa neChishanu svondo rakapera. Vamwe vanhu vakawanda vanonzi vari kuwirwa nematombo vachibva vafira mumugodhi apo vanenge vachikorokoza. Mukuru pamugodhi weEldorado apo pari kufira vanhu, VaGerald Sairon, vanoti kunyange hazvo nzvimbo iri kufira vanhu iri yavo, yakatorwa nechisimba nenhengo dzeZanu PF idzo dziri kupinza vanhu basa rekukorokoza vachizopedzisira vafira mumugodhi. VaSairon vanoti vakaedza kuvabvisa asi vakatadza ndokuudza mapurisa ayo akavatadzawo sezvo vakuru vakuru muZanu PF vari kunzi vari kuudza mapurisa kuti asasunge nhengo dzavo. Masvondo maviri apera munyori wezvemabasa muZanu PF, VaIgnatius Chombo, vanonzi vakaudza nhengo dzechidiki kuti dzikorokoze goridhe vasingasungwe nemapurisa. Asi hatina kunzwa divi raVaChombo, avo vanova gurukota rezvemukati menyika, iro rine bazi remapurisa pasi paro. VaSairon vanoti vane nhoroondo yevanhu vana vakafira mumugodhi nevakawanda vakakuvara. VaSaironi vanoti vari kukurudzira mapurisa kuti vasunge nekumisa makorokoza kuti vasapinde pasi vachichera goridhe. Asi mukuru anoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwemugodhi, VaFredy Mbwedza, vanoti pakapinda vechidiki veZanu PF kuchera goridhe pamugodhi wavo vakarohwa zvakaipisisa asi mapurisa hapana matanho avakatora. Kunyange vanhu vari kufa vakawanda, makorokoza anoti vacharamba vachikorokoza vachiti vari kufa nguva yavo inenge yakwana. Mazvikokota wezvekucherwa kwezviwanikwa zvepasi, VaGeorge Mugani, vanoti nzara munyika ndiyo iri kupa kuti vanhu vaise hupenyu hwavo parumananzombe. VaMugani vanoti kucherwa kwezviwanikwa kunofanirwa kuitwa zviri pamutemo pachicherechedzwa kuti nzvimbo iri kucherwa haina njodzi here kune vanenge vachichera. Mugodhi weEldorado wakaiswa mumaoko egweta, Va Jonathan Samkange, nematare edzimhoswa mushure mukunetsana kwezvizvarwa zvekuChina VaChen Shaoliang nemwanasikana wavo Chen Xiandong nekune rumwe rutivi VaZhou Haixi izvo zvairwisana kuti muridzi wemugodhi ndiyani. Mushure mekunetsana nekutyisidzirana kwanga koitika mukutongwa kwenyaya iyi, mutongi wedare, VaNever Katiyo, vakazvibvisa panyaya iyi. Pari zvino matare edzimhosva haasati apa mumwe mutongi kuti atonge nyaya yekuti mugodhi uyu ndewani pakati pezvizvarwa zvekuChina izvi.

headline: VaMahachi Voendesa VaKasukuwere naVaManyenyeni kuMatare
text: Vaimbova mabharani mukuru kana kuti town clerk muguta reHarare VaTendai Mahachi neChipiri vakakwidza kudare repamusoro reHigh Court gurukota rinoona nezve kutongwa kwematunhu VaSaviour Kasukuwere uye meya weHarare VaBernard Manyenyeni vachiti vainge vavadzinga basa zvisiri pamutemo. Kumapepa avakatura kumatare, VaMahachi vanoti vakangodzingwa basa nemakanzura emuHarare vasina kunge vaendesa nyaya yavo kubhodhi rebazi rinoona nezvekutongwa kwematunhu. VaMahachi vanotiwo havasi kuda kuti VaManyenyeni vadzikise mari yavari kutambira iyo inonzi inogona kusvika zviuru makumi maviri nemasere memadhora. Makanzura emuHarare akavhota mukupera kwemwedzi wapera kuti vadzinge VaMahachi basa vachivapomera mhosva yekuzvidza kanzuru nekuramba kuipa magwaro akakosha ane chekuita kuti vaihora mari yakawanda zvakadii uye vachinzi vaikanganisa zvakanyanya kuvandudzwa kwemabasa mukanzuru. Asi VaMahachi vanoti zvose izvi ndezve mugotsi matsuro vachiti vari kuzorwa mafuta enguruve yavasina kudya.

headline: Vaimbove Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaGoerge H. W. Bush Vanoshaya
text: Vakave mutungamiri weAmerica wechimakumi mana nemumwe, VaGeorge H.W. Bush vakashaya neChishanu vave nemakore makumi mapfumbamwe nemana ekuberekwa. VaBush, avo vakasarudzwa kuve mutungamiri wenyika muna 1988 mushure mekuve mutevedzeri wevaive mutungamiri wenyika iyi VaRonald Reagan kwematemu maviri, vakashayira kumba kwavo kuHouston mudunhu reTexas. Kushaya kwaVaBush kunouya mwedzi minomwe mushure mekushaya kwemudzimai wavo, Amai Barbara Bush, avo vakashaya muna kubvumbi gore rino. Rufu rwavo rwunonzi rwakaziviswa nemwanakomana wavo, VaGeorge W. Bush, avo vakambovewo mutungamiri weAmerica. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari nhengo yeZanu PF muAmerica, VaFrenk Guni vanoti America nepasi rose zvarasikirwa zvikuru nekushaya kwaVabush uku, sezvo vanga vari denhe reruzivo. “Munhu akanga ari gamba muno muAmerica, nekuti vachiri mudiki vaibhururutsa ndege dzehondo, vakambopfurwa kuPacific uko vakadonha asi vakararama imomo. "Vakaitawo mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika kuno uku naVaReagan vakazosarudzwa vakatonga. Hutonga hwavo hwakaita hupfupi zvahwo asi hwakanga huchifarirwa nemaAmericans.” Asi VaGuni vanoti kunyange hazvo VaBush vaidiwa nevanhu, pane pano nepapo pavanoshorwawo panosanganisira hondo yeku Iraq yekutanga ya1991. “Zvinonyanya kushorwa panaVaGeorge Bush inyaya yekutumira mauto kunopamba kana ku invader Panama. Asi takadzokera kumashure muhutongi hwavo, semunhu akatonga kwenguva pfupi, vazhinji vakanga vaine chiremekedzo navo chaizvo,” VaGuni vanowedzera. VaBush vakarwa muhondo yepasi rose yechipiri vari mutyairi wendege dzehondo. Chakakonzera kushaya kwavo hachina kunge chaziviswa. No media source currently available

headline: VaChamisa Voshuvira Zimbabwe Zuva Rakanaka Ichicherechedza Kusvitsa Makore Makumi Mana Ichizvitonga
text: Mutungamiri weMDC, Va Nelson Chamisa, vatumira mashoko avo kuruzhinji rwevanhu vemuZimbabwe vachivakorokotedza pakusvika kwaita Zimbabwe makore makumi mana yawana kuzvitonga. VaChamisa vati vari kuziva kushupika kuri kuita veruzhinji munyika panguva iyo nyika yakatarisana nedambudziko rechirwere Coronavirus, uye vachimanikidzwa kugara mudzimba senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi, icho chabata vanhu makumi maviri nevana muZimbabwe, uye kuuraya vanhu vatatu. Chirwere ichi chabata vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nemazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe ezviuru, uye kuuraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi mashanu nezvinomwe. VaChamisa vati zvakakosha kuti nyika itarise kwayakabva, uye zvakaitika mumakore makumi mana apfuura, senzira yekuvaka hwaro hweremangwana renyika. Vati mumakore apfuura aya, pane zvakawanda zvakaitwa munyaya dzekugadzirisa zvaikanganiswa. Asi vati zvinhu zvinosuwisa kuti nyika yakaona kupondwa kwevanhu vanodarika makumi maviri ezviuru kumatunhu e Matabeleland ne Midlands, munguva yeGukurahundi. VaChamisa vatiwo vanhu vakawanda vakatyorerwa kodzero dzavo munguva yeMurambatsvina, uye musarudzo dzakaitwa muna 2008, idzo dzakaona ropa revanhu vakawanda richideurwa. VaChamisa varatidzawo kushushikana nehuori hwavati huri kuitika munyika, uhwo vati huri kuparadza hupfumi hwenyika. VaChamisa vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti muZimbabwe muve nepfungwa yakanangana nekusimudzira hupenyu hwemunhu wese, muve nesarudzo dzinoitwa zvisina kupikisana mukati. VaChamisa vatora mukana uyu kuenzanisa kukosha kwemakore makumi mana nezviri mubhaibheri zvinobata makore mana akaitika akaratidza kusimuka kwevana veIsrael mushure mekushupika kwemakore akawanda vari kunze kwenzvimbo yavo yechipikirwa kwemakore makumi mana. Bhaibheri rinoratidza kuti chinangwa chaMwari chaive chekuti vana veIsrael vatore nyika yavo yavakanga vavimbiswa mukati memazuva, asi izvi zvinonzi zvakazotora makore makumi mana kuti zviitike. Mutungamiri veMDC vatiwo zvisineyi nematambudziko akatarisina neveruzhinji panguva ino, vanoshuvira zororo rakanaka renyika vanhu vachicherechedza kusvika kwavaita makore makumi mana nyika yawana kuzvitonga muna 1980. No media source currently available

headline: VaChamisa Vovimbisa Huchi neMukaka Kana Vakasarudzwa seMutungamiri weNyika
text: Mutungamiri we MDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, vavimbisa vanhu veku Hwedza kuMashonaland East kuti kana vakasarudzwa semutungamiri wenyika, vachasimudzira dunhu reHwedza kuitira kuti vagari vemudunhu iri vasatambudzike sezvavari kuita pari zvino. Vachitaura kuvanhu vakawanda vaungana kumaruwa ekuHwedza, VaChamisa vatora mukana uyu kutenda mutungamiri wenyika, Va Emmerson Mnangagwa, pamwe nemutevedzeri wavo, Va Constantino Chiwenga, nebasa guru ravakaita mukurwira rusununguko rwenyika. Asi VaChamisa vaudza vaviri ava kuti vachisiira matomu kune vechidiki vanokwanisa kugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika. VaChamisa vaudzawo vagari vekuHwedza kuti hurumende yavo ichagadzirisa nyaya dzemari kuitira kuti munyika musashandiswe ma bond notes. VaChamisa, avo vanogara vakataura nyaya yemigwagwa vachiti ichagadzirwa kuita kunge spaghetti, vatiwo vachasimbaradza nyaya dzekurima kumaruwa kuitira kuti vanhu vave nehupenyu hwakanaka. Vati hurumende yavo ichawanisa varimi vese matarakita kuitira kuti vasashandise mombe pakurima. VaChamisa, avo vari pamakakatanwa nemutungamiri9 weimwe MDC-T, Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, panyaya yekuti ndiyani chaiye mutungamiri weMDC-T zvichitevera kushaya kwevaimbove mutungamiri weMDC, Va Morgan Tsvangirai muna Kukadzi gore rino, vatora mukana wemusangano wekuHwedza uyu kuudza madzimai kuti hurumende yavo ichasimudzira hupenyu hwevanhukadzi sezvo vari musimboti wenyika. VaChamisa vapedza kutaura vachivimbisa vanhu vekuHwedza kuti hurumende yavo ichagadzirisa zvipatara nemakiriniki kuitira kuti vanhu varapwe nyore. Dunhu reMashonaland East rinoziivakanwa zvikuru nekuvhotera Zanu PF munguva dzesarudzo. Musarudzo yemutungamiri yakaitwa muna 2013, VaRobert Mugabe veZanu PF vakawana mavhoti 320,719, ukuwo VaMorgan Tsvangirai veMDC vakawana mavhoti 90,165. Nyanzvi munyaya dzematongerwo enyika dzinoti MDC Alliance inofanirwa kushanda zvakasimba kuti ikunde VaMnangagwa veZanu PF musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Mhirizhonga Yoenderera Mberi Apo Nyika Yogadzirira Sarudzo
text: Mapato anopikisa nemamwe masangano akazvimirira oga anoti mhirizhonga munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika iri kuwedzera zvakanyanya. Vanopikikisa vanoti vari kurohwa kana kutyisidzirwa nenhengo dzeZanu-PF asi mapurisa achiramba kusunga vanenge vapara mhosva. KuChitungwiza svondo rapera nhengo dzeMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai dzaifamba dzichikurudzira vanhu kuti vavhote dzakarohwa zvakaipisia asi dzikaguma dzasungwa. Masabhuku kune dzimwe nzvimbo anonzi ari kutyisidzirawo vanhu achitora nhamba dzemapepa avanenge vapihwa apo vanenge vanyoresa kuvhota vachiti vachazozivikanwa kuti vavhotera papi. Vatori venhau nenhengo dzemasangano akazvimirira ago vanotiwo vari kurohwa nekushungurudzwawo. Sachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Amai Rita Makarau, vanoti vakapihwa mazita evamwe vanhu vanonzi vari kutyisidzira vanhu uye vakaaendesa kumapazi akasiyana siyana ehurumende kuti nyaya dzacho dziongororwe. VaJason Zhuwawo vanotungamira Zanu-PF Team Live iyo inoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko pamadendemutande akaita seFacebook vanoti vanhu veMDC-T ndivo vari kukonzera mhirizhonga nekusvokosva veZanu PF. Asi munyori musangano reMDC Youth Assembly mudunhu reHarare, VaDenford Ngadziore, vanoti Zanu-PF ine nhoroondo yekushungurudza vechidiki. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Alliance Inoti Yasvitsa kuZec Nyunyuto Dzakabva Mumatunhu Akawanda
text: MDC Alliance inoti yaunganidza magwaro enyunyuto, ayo akasainwa nevanhu vanodarika mazana matatu ezviuru, vachiratidza kusafara kwavo nekudomwa kwemazita evanhu vachatora zvigaro gumi nezvishanu zvemu National Assembly pamwe nemudare reSenate, kwakaitwa neMDC-T. Izvi zvinotevera kudzingwa kwakaitwa nhengo dzeMDC Alliance mumatare aya, neMDC-T. Sachigaro veZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Justice Priscilla Chigumba, vakazivisa zviri pamutemo mazita evanhu vakadomwa neMDC-T, vakati vanoda kupikisa izvi, vane kodzero yekunyorera komisheni yavo mukati menguva yakatarwa nemutemo.  Asi munyori mukuru weMDC Alliance, Va Chalton Hwende, vanoti Zimbabwe Electoral Commission haitevedzeri mitemo yenyika, asi kuti inotevedzera zvido zveZanu PF. VaHwende vanoti dai Zimbabwe Electoral Commission yaitevedza mitemo ingadai yakadoma mutungamiri wavo, VaNelson Chamisa, semunhu akakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika muna 2018. Zimbabwe Electoral Commission yakazivisa kuti mutungamiri weZanu PF, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ndivo vakanga vakunda musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika, izvo zvakapikiswa neMDC Alliance mudare reConstitutional Court. Asi dare iri rakapa mutongo wekuti zvakataurwa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission ndizvo raimira nazvo, izvo zvakzopa kuti VaMnangagwa vatoreswe mhiko yekutungamira nyika. Asi MDC Alliance haina kugutsikana nemutongo uyu, uye kusvika pari zvino, inoti haitambiri VaMnangagwa semutungamiri wenyika, ichiti VaChamisa ndivo vakakunda musarudzo iyi. VaHwende, avo vanove mumwe wenhengo dzeMDC Alliance dzakatanga kudzingwa mudare neMDC-T iri kufanotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe, vanoti zviri pachena kuti vanhu vakaburitsa zvido zvavo nekusaina magwaro enyunyuto dzavo ayo vakaendesa kumahofisi eZimbabwe Electoral Commission munyika yose.  VaHwende vanoti hazviite kuti vanhu vamirirwe nemunhu akakundwa musarudzo sezviri kuda kuitwa neMDC-T. Asi munyori mukuru weMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vanoti bato rakadzinga munhu muparamende, ndiro rine masimba ekudoma munhu anotsiva akadzingwa wacho pakatariswa mitemo yeProportional Representation pamwe nemadomerwo enhengo dzedare reSenate.  Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumukuru anoona nezvesarudzo munyika yose, VaUtloile Silaigwana, kana vange vatambira magwaro enyunyuto dzakaitwa neMDC Alliance pamwe nevanhuwo vari mumatunhu ane vanhu vakadomwa neMDC-T. Nharembozha yaVaSilaigwana yanga ichinetsa kubata. Asi Justice Chigumba vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti vanga vasati vasumwa nyaya iyi naVaSilaigwana sezvo vasingashande kumahofisi munguva dzose kunze kwekunge kana munyika muine sarudzo dzose dzemakanzura, nhengo dzeparamende nemutungamiri mwenyika, kana kuti harmonized elections. Asi Justice Chigumba vati vanoshanda vachitevedza mitemo, uye hapana mutongo wedare unovarambidza kuenderera mberi nehurongwa hwavo hwema nominations sezvo vari kuita basa ravo zviri pamutemo. Justice Chigumba, avo vanove zvakare mutongi wematare epamusoro, vati vanozviziva kuti kune vanopikisa vakawanda vari kuvapomera mhosva yekushanda vakarerekera divi rimwe chete, vakati mashoko akadai anobva kuvanhu vasingazive mashandiro ekomisheni yavo. Justice Chigumba vati zvakosha kuti vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika vazive zvinoreva nezvinodiwa nemitemo yesarudzo vasati vatanga kutaura zvinozvidza mashandiro ekomisheni yavo. VaHwende vati vachamirira kuona danho richatorwa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission, vozogara pasi vachironga kuti vofambira seyi mberi. No media source currently available

headline: IMF Inoti Haisi Kuzokweretesa Zimbabwe Imwe Mari Kudzamara Yabhadhara Zvimwe Zvikwereti
text: Bhanga guru rinokweretesa mari nyika dzepasi rino reInternational Monetary Fund kana kuti IMF rinoti harisi kuzokweretesa Zimbabwe mari sezvo iine zvikwereti zvakawanda kunze zvairi kukundikana kubhadhara. Zimbabwe ine chikwereti chinosvika mabhiriyoni gumi emadhora ekuAmerica chairi kutadza kubhadhara kuWorld Bank, African Development Bank, European Investment Bank neParis Club. IMF yakatura mashoko aya kuvatori venhau nemusi weChipiri mushure mekupedza mwedzi ichiongorora mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika munyaya dzezvehupfumi. Izvi zvakaitwa kuburikidza nemadandemutande nenyaya yechirwere cheCovid-19. IMF inoti kuti Zimbabwe, yave nemakore makumi isina kukwereteswa mari nebhanga iri ikwereteswe mari, inofanira kubhadhara zvikwereti kana kutenderana nevayakakwereta kuti yobhadhara sei chikwereti ichi. IMF. Kunyangwe hazvo Zimbabwe yakakanganiswa zvakanyanya nechirwere cheCovid-19 sedzimwe nyika. IMF inoti inotarisira kuti hupfumi huchakwira nezvikamu zvitanhatu kubva muzana gore rino. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaVictor Bhoroma, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe igadzirise zvimwe zviri kukurudzirwa neIMF kuitira kuti isimudzire hupfumi hwenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Dzidziso Pamusoro peCOVID-19 Kune Vachadzidzisa Veruzhinji Yotambirwa neMufaro
text: Bazi rezvehutano neMuvhuro rakazivisa kuti huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hwakanga hwasvika pazana nemakumi matatu nevashanu kana kuti 135, kuchitiwo vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vasvika pazviuru zvishanu nemazana matatu ane vasere kana kuti 5 308. Bazi iri rakati vanhu vakanga vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi kusvika neMuvhuro vakanga vasvika pazviuru zvitatu nemazana masere ane makumi mana nevasere kana kuti 3 848, izvo zvakasiya vanhu chiuru nemazana matatu nemakumi maviri nevashanu kana kuti 1 325 vari ivo vachine chirwere ichi munyika yose. Mukuedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi munyika, bazi rezvehutano rakabatana nesangano reUnited Nations Population Fund (UNFPA) riri kupa zvidzidzo kuvanhu vachazonodzidzisawo vamwe pamusoro pemabatirwo anofanirwa kuitwa Covid-19 uye kuti chirwere ichi chingadzivirirwa sei kuti chisapararira. Zvidzidzo izvi zviri kuitirwa kuDomboshawa, uye vari kupinda muzvidzidzo izvi vanozotarisirwa kunodzidzisawo vamwe vari mune zvehutano mumapoka avo, avo vanozodzidzisawo vamwe munharaunda dzavagere. Bazi iri razivisa kuburikidza neTiwtter kuti vapinda muzvidzidzo izvi vanhu vabva kubazi rezvehutano, kumapurisa nemauto, uyewo vamwe vabva kumasangano akazvimirira. Mukuru wesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti hurongwa hwekudzidzisa vadzidzisi uhwu hwakakosha zvikuru sezvo huchizobatsira kuti dzidziso pamusoro pechirwere ichi izokwanisa kupararira nenyika yose. VaRusike vakurudzirawo kuti dzidziso pamusoro pechirwere cheCovid-19 iwandire pamwe nekupararira kunzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji pamwe nekumaruwa, uko vanoti veruzhinji vanenge vari kuratidza kuti havasi kuteerera kurudziro dzebazi rezvehutano pamwe neWorld Health Organisation dzekuti vazvivhare miromo nemhino, kugeza maoko, pamwe nekusiya mukaha pakati pavo nevamwe. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, Johns Hopkins University Hospital yemuno muAmerica, iyo iri kuongorora chirwere ichi inoti pasi rose vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri neimwe nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe negumi nezvisere, kana kuti 21 918 000 vabatwa nechirwere ichi, icho chaurayawo vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi manomwe nezvina nemazana manomwe, kana kuti 774, 700. America ndiyo ichiri pamusoro pahuwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid-19, avo vadarika mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana mana nemakumi mana nezvina, kana kuti 5, 444, 000 Vanhu vafa muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana nemakumi manomwe, kana kuti 170, 000. MuAfrica vanhu vanodarika miriyoni nezviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvisere, kana kuti 1,128 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi, kuchitiwo vashaya vadarika zviuru makumi maviri nezvishanu nemazana masere, kana kuti 25, 800. Vanhu vapona kubva kuchirwere ichi vadarika zviuru mazana masere nemakumi mana nezvitanhatu, kana kuti 846, 000. South Africa ndiyo iri pamusoro muAfrica iine vanhu vanodarika mazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe ezviuru, kana kuti 590, 000 vabatwa nacho. Vanhu vafa nechiwere ichi muSoiuth Africa vadarika zviuru gumi nechimwe nemazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 11, 900.

headline: Zimbabwe Yotarisira Kuwana Mari Yakawanda Kubva kuZvicherwa Gore Rino
text: Zimbabwe iri kutarisirwa gore rino kuwana mari inosvika bhiriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana manomwe nemasere zvemadhora kubva pabhiriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mashanu emadharora akawanikwa gore rapera. Izvi zvakabuda pamusangano wemazuva maviri wezvezvicherwa wakatanga kuMiekles Hotel muHarare nemusi weChipiri. Musangano uyu uri kukokerwa nekambani yekuLondon yeMining Report yakabatana neChamber of Mines Zimbabwe nebazi rezvezviwanikwa. Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru wekambani yeMinerals Marketing Corporation of Zimbabwe, VaMasimba Chandavengerwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti vane tarisiro yakadai sezvo Zimbabwe iri kusimukira munyaya dzekuchera zvicherwa zvikuru koromo negoridhe. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachitungamira sangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, vanoti havasi kushamisika nekuwedzera kwemari iyi sezvo mari yezvicherwa yati wedzerei pamusika wemari. Vamwe vakuru muhurumende nedzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vanoti nyaya yekurerutsira vanoda kutanga mabhizimisi yakaunzwa nehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa ndiyo iri kupawo kuti vekunze vakawanda vade kutanga mabhizimisi munyika uye kuva nechivimbo neZimbabwe zvapa kuti mitengo yezvicherwa iti kwirei. Asi mutungamiri webato rinopikisa rePeople's Democratic Party uye vaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, VaTendai Biti, vanoti kukwira kwemari yezvicherwa hakunei nezviri kuitwa naVaMnangagwa. Vanoti mitengo iri kungokwira pamisika yekunze chete. VaBiti vanoti: “Kana zviri zvemangoda kangwanayi nekuti vanhu ava vanoba.” Pange pachitarisirwa kuuya vanhu kubva kunyika makumi maviri uye vanhu mazana matatu kubva munyika nekunze. Zimbabwe ndiyo ine koromo yakawanda kudarika nyika dzose dzepasi rino uye iri pachidanho chechipiri paplatinum. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti hupfumi hwenyika hukabatwa zvakanaka hunokwanisa kumutsiridzwa nezviwanikwa uye kurima. No media source currently available

headline: Hutongi hwaVaMugabe Hwokonzeresa Kukundwa kwaVaMzembi?
text: Kukundwa kwegurukota rezvekushanyirwa kwenyika, VaWalter Mzembi, musarudzo yemunyori mukuru weUnited Nations World Tourism Organisation (UNWTO), naVaZurab Polilakashvilli vekuGeorgia, kunoratidza kuti Zimbabwe ichine dambudziko rekuti izvichenese pamberi pevakawanda pasi rose. Munyori wezvekushanya nekushanyirwa muMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, Amai Sithembile Mlotshwa, vanoti Zimbabwe, iyo iri pasi pehutongi hwaVaMugabe, hayaigona kukunda musarudzo iyi sezvo iine nhoroondo yakaipa munyaya dzekodzero dzevanhu. Amai Mlotshwa vanoti kuti Zimbabwe ibudirire kuwana zvigaro zviri mumapazi emubatanidzwa wenyika, hurumende inofanirwa kutanga yagadzirisa kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika pamwe nekuchengetedzwa kwemutemo yenyika. Amaia Mlotshwa vanoti izvi ndizvo zvinotariswa nenyika dzakawanda kana yasvika nguva yekusarudza munhu kuti atungamire mapazi emu United Nations. Asi mudzidzi munyaya dzekushanyirwa kwenyika, VaAldrian Mangisi, vanoti kukundwa kwaVaMzembi kwavarwadza zvikuru. VaMangisi vanotiwo kunyange VaMzembi vakundwa, vanga vashanda zvikuru sezvo vakundwa nemavhoti matatu chete. Kunyange hazvo vanhu vaine muonero wakasiyana, dzimwe nyanzvi dzinoti kana dai VaMzembi vakakunda musarudzo iyi, hapana chinganzi chaiwana nyika kunze kwekungoti Zimbabwe inenge iine munhu wayo ari pachigaro chepamusoro, asi pasina pundutso yazvinopa kunyika. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna VaMzembi kuti vanotambira seyi kukundwa kwavo. Sarudzo yemunyori wesangano iri yakaitirwa kuSpain uko VaMzembi vakundwa nemavhoti matatu chete. No media source currently available

headline: Vanachiremba Vanoti Mamasiki Ashandiswa Asabatwabatwa Kunze Kwekuarasa
text: Zvichitevera kutaurwa pachena kwekuti vamwe vanhu vari kunhonga zvinoshandiswa kuvhara mhuno nemiromo, mamasiki, (face masks) anoshandiswa nevanhu mukudzivirira chirwere che coronavirus, bazi rehurumende rinoona nezvehutano rakurudzira vanhu paTwitter paro kuti vanhu vachekecheke mamasiki avashandisa vasati vaarasa kuitira kuti vamwe vanhu vasaanhonga vachiawacha kuti vazoatengesa zvekare. Izvi zvinotevera mashoko ekuti vamwe vanhu varikufamba vachinhonga mamasiki akasviba awa, vachiawacha vachizoatengesera kuvanhu zvekare. PaTweeter pavo, bazi rehurumende rinoona nezvehutano rinokurudzira vanhu kuti vatore mamasiki avo avashandisa vachiachekacheka vasati vamarasa kudzivirira kuti vamwe vanhu vasazoanonga vachiatengesa zvekare. Asi vamwe vanachiremba vanoti bazi rehurumende rezvehutano ririkukurudzira vanhu kuita zvinovapinza munjodzi dzehutano, vachiti mamasiki ashandiswa anenge ave tsvina isingafanirwi kubatwa asi inofanirwa kuraswa isina kubatwa nemaoko kunyange nemuridzi wayo. Dr Simbiso Ranga, vanoshanda mudunhu reNorth Carolina, muAmerica, vanoti kana ‘face mask” yashandiswa, haifanirwi kubwatwa kunze nemuridziwayo asi achiibata zvakanaka uye akachenjera paanoirasa nekuti ndiyo yakabata nekutakura hutachiona hwese hwange huchida kupinda mumuviri wake. Dr Ranga vati kana iri masiki yako unogona kuibata zvakanaka, pakuiwacha nepakuiwomesa kuti ugoishandisa zvekare, iwe muridzi wayo. No media source currently available

headline: Veruzhinji Votarisisa Mazuva Zana VaMnangagwa Vatora Mhiko
text: Hurukuro yakaitwa neStudio 7 yakabatana neMedia Centre muHarare neChitatu yekutarisisa mazuva zana mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vatora mhiko yekutungamira nyika, yakaratidza kuti veruzhinji vane maonero akasiyanasiyana, vamwe vachiti pane shanduko asi vamwe vachiti hapana chati chaonekwa. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakarerekera kubato reMDC, uye vari mutungamiri wePTUZ, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti vaitarisira kuti hurumende itsva iyi ivandudze zvinhu mukati memazuva zana aya asi kusvika pari zvino hapana chayati yaita. Doctor Zhou vanoti tarisiro yeveruzhinji yakanga iri yekuona kuti zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi zvagadzirisika here kuburikidza nekuwanisa vanhu mari, kubviswa kwema bond note, uyewo kuti mune zvematongerwo enyika mave neshanduko kubva kuhurumende yaivepo. Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakarerekera kuZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu vanoti shanduko yavepo huru kwazvo zvikuru mune zveupfumi nezvematongerwo enyika. VaChirumhanzu vanoti vana veZimbabwe vakawana rusununguko rwekuita madiro aJojina, uyewo nyaya dzemari dziri kugadziriswa, sezvaonekwa nebhajeti raturwa negurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube. Asi Doctor Zhou vanoti hapana chikuru chekupemberera bhajeti raVaNcube sezvo matambudziko mune zveupfumi agara aripo atowedzerwa nemitero yavaisa muzvinhu zvinobatsira varombo. No media source currently available

headline: Vakarwira Rusununguko Vokurudzirwa Kurapwa Pfungwa
text: Apo nyika iri kugadzirira kupemberera kusvitsa makore makumi matatau neshanu nyika yawana kuzvitonga neMugovera, imwe nyanzvi yezvirwere zvepfungwa inoti pane vamwe vanhu vakawanda vakarwira rusununguko vasina kuwana rubatsiro rwekuvhenekwa pfungwa dzavo kuti vaonekwe kana vaine zvirwere zvinosaririra mupfungwa mushure mehondo kana tsaona. Nyanzvi yezvirwere zvepfungwa mubazi rezvehutano, Dr Sekayi Nyiwatiwa, vanoti dambudziko rezvirwere zvepfungwa zvinokonzerwa nezvakasangana nemunhu muhondo kana kuti mutsaona, Post Traumatic Stress Disaorder, PTSD, zviri kuwanda munyika. Dr Nyiwatiwa, avo vanoshanda kuchipatara che Parirenyatwa kubazi rezvepfungwa, vanoti zvirwere izvi zvinowanikwa muvanhu vakasiyana siyana kusanganisira vamwe vaive varwiri vehondo yerusununguko. Dr Nyiwatiwa vanoti asi vazhinji vevanhu ava havazivi kuti vanofanirwa kurapwa kuitira kuti dambudziko rekusagadzikana kwepfungwa ripere. Dr Nyiwatiwa vanoti ruzhinji rwevanhu vakarwa muhondo yeChimurenga pavakadzoka, havana kuwana rubatsiro rwunofanirwa kupihwa kuvanhu vanenge vasangana nezvinotyisa, kana zvinosiya pfungwa dzavo dzisina kugadzikana. Kunyange hazvo makore makumi matatu nemashanu apfuura, Dr Nyiwatiwa vanoti vose vanonetsekana nepfungwa vanofanirwa kuenda kunoona vana mazvikokota, kana kuenda kuzvipatara zviri pedyo navo vobatsirwa. Dr Nyiwatiwa vanoti munhu ane PTSD anoonekwa nekuvhunduka apo anorangarira zvakaitika kare, kushaya hope, kubuda dikita kana akarara, pamwe nekutaura ega nezvimwewo. Sangano reUnited Nations Commission for Refugees rinoti chirwere ichi chinobata mamiriyoni nemariyoni evanhu vanobva muhondo pasi rose. Vaimbove murwiri werusununguko, uye vari nhengo yeparamende, Amai Irene Zindi, vanoti ivo neruzhinji rwevamwe vaimbove varwiri vehondo yerusununguko pavakadzoka kubva kuhondo havana kuenda kunotariswa kuti vakange vane chirwere ichi here. Amai Zindi, avo vaizivikanwa muhondo nezita rekuti "Jilly Flamingo," vanoti vane zvizhinji zvavakaona muhondo zvinovashaisa hope pari zvino. Vanoti vanga vasingazive kuti ichi chinogana kunge chiri chirwere. Amai Zindi vanoti zvanga zvisiri nyore kuva muhondo uye vamwe vavo vazhinji vari kutambura pari zvino zvekuti havasi kufunga zvekuenda kunotsvaga rubatsiro rwekurapwa zvirerwe zvepfungwa. Hurumende yakaita chirongwa chekupodza maronda kuburikidza nekubhadhara munhu kukuvara kwaakaita muhondo, pasi pechirongwa che War Victims Compensation Fund. Asi chirongwa ichi chakapedzwa mari nevanhu vasingakodzero sezvo vazhinji vakanyepa kukuvara kwavo mushure mekuongororwa namuchakabvu Dr Chenjerai Hunzvi, avo vakabvuma pamberi pekomisheni yakaferefeta huori hwakaitwa muchirongwa ichi, kuti pazuva vaigona kuongoorora vanhu vanodarika mazana maviri. Chirongwa ichi chakabastira vamwe varwiri verusununguko asi mari zvinji inonzi yakadyiwa nevakuru vakuru munyaya dzematongerwo enyika, avo vanosanganisira mukuru wemapurisa, Va Augustine Chihuri, pamwe nehanzvadzi yemudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, muchakabvu Reward Marufu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzepfungwa dzinoti hukasha hunoburitswa nema War Vets dzimwe nguva, muratidzo mukuru wekuti vamwe vavo vanoda kurapwa nana chiremba kuitira kuti vagare zvakanaka nevamwe muhupenyu. Vaimbove varwiri verusununguko vazhinji vanoti havasi kuona chavakarwira muhondo sezvo vamwe vavo vari kunonga svosve nemuromo, uye vamwe vaine zvirwere zvepfungwa zvinovashungurudza zuva nezuva hurumende pasina chairi kuita. No media source currently available

headline: Kanzuru yeMasvingo Yogadzira Nzvimbo yeKubatsira Vanenge Vabatwa neCoronavirus
text: Kanzuru yeMasvingo inoti iri kutsvaga nzira dzekubatsira vagari vanenge vawirwa nedambudziko rechirwere checoronavirus kunyangwe vamwe vagari vari kuti zviri kuitwa hazvina kukwana. Kanzuru yakaisa chipatara chitsva mumusha wevazhinji weRujeko. Muzvare Rumbidzayi Magurupira, wemumusha weRujeko, anoti chipatara ichi chinogona kusakwana kubatsira vanhu kana coronavirus ikapararira zvakanyanya. Vamwewo vagari vakaita saAmai Tinotenda Mazuru, vanoti danho rekuisa chipatara ichi munzvimbo inogara veruzhinji rinogona kuita kuti chirwere ichi chitekeshere mudzimba dzevanhu vamwe varwere vapoya. Asi Meya weguta reMasvingo, VaCollen Maboke, vanoti vakaita danho iri vaita tsvakurudzo uye vapuwa dzidziso nana Chiremba pamwe nenyanzvi dzebazi rezve hutano. Mukuru webasa, musangano rinomirira vagari, reMasvingo Residents and Rate Payers Alliance(MURRA) VaAnoziva Muguti, vati kanzuru inofanira kuvandudza chipatara ichi kuti chitakure vanhu vakawanda uye kuti paiswe matanho eku chengetedza vanenge vauya nechirwere kuti vasazotapurire vanhu mudzimba. Meya Maboke vari kururdzira vagari kuti vasatye nekuti vakaisa matanho pamwe chete nenyanzvi dzehutano eku chengetedza vanenge vabatwa nechirwere ichi kuti chisatapurirwe mudzimba dzevagari veRujeko. Dhorobha reMasvingo harisati rave nemunhu akabatwa ne chirwere ichi asi vagari vanotyira kuti sezvo riri munzira yemugwagwa inoenda kuSouth Africa chinogona kupararira nevanofamba. VeMurra vanoti kanzuru inofanira kufambisa mashoko neku shambadza kuti vagari vawane ruzivo rwakakwana kuti chirwere ichi chinotapuriranwa sei. No media source currently available

headline: Hurukuro dzeRunyararo Pakati peRussia neUkraine Dzotarisirwa Kutangazve muTurkey
text: Nhaurirano dzeRusssia neUkraine dziri kutarisirwa kutanga svondo rino muTurkey apo hondo pakati penyika mbiri idzi yapinda musvondo rechishanu. Mutungamiri wenyika yeUkraine VaVolodomyr Zelenskyy vanoti rusungunuko rwenyika yavo yose rwakakosha munhaurirano idzi vachiramba zviri kutaurwa neRussia kuti itore mamwe matunhu enyika yavo. Mutungamiri wenyika yeTurkey VaRecep Tayyip Erdogan vakatotaura parunhare memutungamiri weRussia VaVladimir Putin vachikurudzira kuti vambokanda zvombo pasi. United Nations inoti vanhu mamiriyoni gumi vamanikidzwa kuenda muhupoterei muUkraine nekuda kwehondo iyi. Gurukota rinoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika muAmerica VaAntony Blinken vakadzokorora zvakare kuti nyika yavo haisikuda kupidigura hurumende yeRussia mushre mekunge mutungamiti wenyika VaJoe Biden vati VaPutin havafanire kuramba vari pachigaro zvichitevera kurwisa kwavari kuita Ukraine. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Muzvinafundo Mashocha vari muAmerica vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanoona Russia ichibvuma kuita nhaurirano dzekupedza hondo sezvo zvirango zvakaomarara zvayakatemerwa zvichigona kukanganisa hupfumi hwavo zvakanyanya. No media source currently available

headline: General Electric Yotarisa Nzira dzeKuita Bhizimisi muZimbabwe
text: Vakuru vakuru vekambani yeku America yeGeneral Electric vanonzi vari kushanya muZimbabwe kuzotsvaga kuita mabhizimisi. Mumiriri we America muZimbabwe, VaHarry Thomas, vakataurawo mashoko aya padandemutande ravo reTwitter vachiti vainge vaita musangano nevakuru veGE. Izvi zvinotevera kuridziro yemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, yekuti Zimbabwe yagadzirira kudyidzana nedzimwe nyika. General Electric ikambani inokosha madhora anopfuura mabhirioni zana nemakumi maviri nemaviri uye inogadzira zvinhu zvakawanda kubva kune zvemagetsi, mainjini emota nendege kusvika kumafiriji nezvimwe zvinoshandiswa mudzimba. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Doctor Elliot Masocha, avo vanodzidzisa kuOhio muno mu America, vanoti Zimbabwe yave nemumwe mukana wekugadzirisa nyika munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachiti vanofara nezvinoda kuitwa neGeneral Electric. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vakawanda Vofa Munjodzi dzeMumigwagwa
text: Mutauriri wemapurisa, Chief Supritendent Paul Nyathi, vanoti vanhu makumi mana nevasere vashaya kubva musi wa 15 Zvita kusvika pari zvino munjodzi dzemumigwagwa. Masvingo ndiyo inonzi ine vanhu vakawandisa vashaya munjodzi dzemumugwagwa vanove gumi nevana. Kune vamwe vanonzi vashaya vakawanda kuMatabeleland South neMidilands. Mapurisa anoti pane njodzi mazana manomwe negumi nemasere dzitika pari zvino zvichienzaniswa nemazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemapfumbamwe. Vanhu vakuwara gore rino vanosvika mazana mashanu zvichienzaniswa nemazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nevana gore rapera. Mapurisa anoti kusatyaira zvakanaka ndiko kwopa kuti njodzi dzirambe dzichiwanda.

headline: MDC Inoti Gadziriro yeKuratidzira KwaMutare Iri Kufamba Zvakanaka
text: Bato reMDC rinotungamirirwa nevaimbove mutungamiri wehurumende VaMorgan Richard Tsvangirai rinoti hurongwa hwekuratidzira kwaMutare hasvika padanho repamusoro soro. Kuratidzira uku kuri kuitwa musi wa 25 Chikumi. MDC- T inoti iri kuratidzira kusafara nemamiriro ezvehupfumi, zvichionekwa nekuvharwa kwemakambani akawanda zvichisiya vanhu vakawanda vasina mabasa. Bato iri rinoti nyaya yehuwori hwebato riri kutonga reZanu-PF yakonzerawo kuti zvinhu zviomere vakawanda munyika. MDC inoti vanhu vekuManicaland vanofanira kuratidzirawo nenyaya kwekutsakatika kwemari yemangoda ari mudunhu ravo. Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe ndivo vakataura kuti mari inosvika mabhiriyoni gumi nemashanu yainge yabiwa. Mutauriri weMDC-T kuManicaland VaTrevor Saruwaka vanoti gadziriro yavo iri kufamba zvakanaka chose. “Tiri kuenderera mberi nemarch yedu musi wa25 June apo tose tichange tichizotangira kumarcha kubva paSakubva Beit Hall tichienda paSwimming Pool muSakubva zvakare tozofora tichipinda mutown tichinozomira paMeikles Park mutown. Ipapo ruzhinji ruchazo addreswa nehutungamiriri hwedu.” VaSaruwaka vanoti mutungamiriri weMDC vaMorgan Tsvangirai vari kutarisirwa kunge vari pakuratidzira uku. VaSaruwaka vanovazve mumiriri weMutasa Central mudare reparamende vanoti nyaya yehuori kuminda yemandoda kwaChiyadzwa iri kuvashungurudza zvakanyanya sevana veZimbabwe “Ndingati chinhu chiri kunyanya kutaurwa mazuvano chinotibata zvakanyanya kuno kuManicaland inyaya ye$15 billion iri kunzi iri kushaikwa naRobert Mugabe nehurumende yake iyo yakabva kuChiadzwa inova mari yatinotarisira kuti kuno kuManicaland imari yaifanira yakashandawo zvizhinji muupenyu wevanhu vazhinji kuno nenyika yose; ndicho chinhu chekutanga ichi." Vakeenderera mberi vachiti, "Chechipiri inyaya yepfungwa yeZanu PF yekuda kuuyisa maBond Notes, inyaya yatiri kuramba zvachose nekuti tinoziva isusu hupenyu hwatakarara muna 2008 kuburikidza nemabearer cheques izvozvo zviri kutishatirisa, ndizvo zvezvimwe zvatinenge tichiratidzirira” VaSaruwaka vanoti kuvharwa kwemakambani maMutare kuri kuita kuti vakawanda mudunhu iri vanonge svosve nemuromo. “Kudhara kuno kwaMutare kwange kune makambani akaita savanaPG kuchishandwa kunana Karina Textiles, Quest Motoring kuchigadzirwa mota. Asi izvezvi hakuchina kwati tonhoo kunyarara saka vana veManicaland vari kuchema kuda mabasa apa hurumende ya(Va)Mugabe payaikambena yaiti ichapa vanhu 2,2 million jobs asi nanhasi hatisati tawana kana rimwe haro. Tiri kutoona mabasa ange aripo achitopera.” ​Vaimbove murwiri wehondo yerusununguko VaIrwin Mbengo vanova mudzidzisi pachikoro cheAfrica University kwaMutare vanoti kuratidzira ikodzero yevanhu kana paine zvinhu zviri kuitwa nehurumende zvavasiri kufarira. VaMbengo vanoti senyaya yemaBond Notes haifanirwi kumanikidzirwa kuvanhu zvikuru kana vachitarisa zvakaitika mumashure panguva yemabearer cheques. VaJames Mupfumi inyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, vachishanda nesangano reCentre for Research and Development, CRD. VaMupfumi vachitaura vari parunhare vati kunyangwe hazvo ratidziro dzaisashanda kare asi panguva ino dzinokwanisa kupa pundutso. Vanoti panguva ino zvava kuda kuramba vanhu vane pfungwa dzimwechete vachiita muonera pamwe sezvo bato rezanu PF rapatsanuka kusiyana nakare nekudaro ratsidziro dzinokwanisa kupa mutsauko pane kuti vanhu varambe vakanyarara. VaGiles Mutsekwa munyori anoona nezvemukati menyika muMDC-T vati vanotarisira kuti pakuratidzira pavo panenge paine vanhu vanosvika kana kupfuura zviuru gumi sezvo ruzhinji rwevanhu munyika yose rwaomerwa. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vabatwa neCovid-19 Vadarika Zviuru Zvishanu
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muZimbabwe hwadarika zviuru zvishanu zvine zana nemakumi manomwe nematanhatu kana kuti 5176. Izvi zvinotevera kubatwa kwevanhu vanodarika zana nevana kana kuti 104 nechirewere ichi munyika neMugovera. Vanhu vaviri vakafa kuBulawayo neCovid-19 zvichireva kuti munyika yose, vanhu zana nemakumi matatu vafa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vapora vanosvika zviuru zviviri nemakumi mana nemasere kana kuti 2047. Kupararira zvakanyanya kuri kuita chirwere ichi kuri kuuya apo vakoti navanachiremba vave kupinda mumwedzi miviri vachiramwa mabasa vachinyunyuta nemari dzavari kutambiriswa uye kushaya zvikwanisiro zvekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere checoronavirus. Mukuru weHealth Services Board inoona nezvemashandiro avashanmdi vemuzvipatara Dr Paulinus Sikosana vaudza Studio 7 kuti ikozvino havasi pabasa nekudaro havakwanise kutaura nezvenyaya iyi. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika vari gurukota rezvehutano VaConstantino Chiwenga sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Enoch Mayida avo vakambotungamira chipatara cheChitungwiza vanoti huwandu hwwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi hunogona kunge hwakakura nekuda kwekuti vamwe vari kufa vasati vavhenekwa. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru zana vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Vafa vadarika zviuru makumi maviri nemashanu ane mazana matatu nemasere kana kuti 25, 337. Vanhu vapora vadarika zviuru mazana masere nemakumi maviri nematatu kana kuti 823, 000. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nerimwe ane zviuru mazana mana kana kuti 21,4 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana ne makumi matanhatu nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 169, 000. Brazil ine vanhu vafa vanodarika chiuru zana kana kuti 100,000 ndiyo inotevera America pandufu pasi rose. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi pasi rose vadarika zviuru mazana manomwe nemakumi manomwe nerimwe kana kuti 771,000.  Vapora pasi rose vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nematatu ane zviuru mazana mana kana kuti 13,4 million

headline: Vechidiki veMDC Vanobvuta Muzinda weBato reMDC, Harvest House
text: Vechidiki mubato veMDC neSvondo manheru vakatora muzinda webato iri, weMorgan Tsvangirai House, iyo yaimbozivikanwa nezita rekuti Harvest House, vachiti vaneta nekurwisana kuri kuitika mubato iri. MuMDC mave nenguva refu mune kusagadzikana apo bato reMDC-T, riri kufanotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe, richirwisana nebato reMDC Alliance, rinotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa. Mwedzi mina yapfuura, bato reMDC-T rakatora muzinda uyu kubva mumaoko eMDC Alliance. Umwe wevakuru vevechidiki muMDC Alliance, uye vachimirira Highfield East muparamende, VaHappymore Chidziva, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vechidiki vakatora Morgan Tsvangirai House havasi kuti ndeve MDC-T kana MDC Alliance asi vanoda kuti bato reMDC rirwire rusununguko rwevanhu kwete kuswera vachirwisana pachavo. VaChidziva vati vechidiki vatora muzinda uyu vachabudisa zvichemo zvavo nezvavanoda kuti zviitwe pavachataura nevatori venhau mangwanani anhasi, Muvhuro, nenguva dza 10 o’clock pa muzinda uyu. VaChidziva vati, “Vechidiki veMDC, vanove vange vachipokana pamakakatanwa akavapo kubva pamutongo weSupreme Court, vabatana pamwe chete vakati havachada kuti parambe pachiitika matakanana nekuti nyaya yehupenyu hwavo hwamangwana ndiyo yakakosha.” Chimwe chezvinodiwa nevechidiki ndechekuti kupopotedzana nekurwisana mukati mebato iri kupere uye kuti vakuru vebato iri vashande pamwe chete. Sachigaro wevechidiki veMDC-T mudunhu reHarare, VaPaul Gorekore, vanonzi vakashanda zvikuru panyaya iyi uye vakakwanisa kunzwanana nevechidiki veMDC Alliance. VaGorekore vakaudza vatori venhau nemusi weSvondo kuti vechidiki vanoshora Muzvare Thokozani Khupe, vachivapomera mhosva yekubatsira Zanu-PF mukushungurudza vanhu munyika. VaChidziva vati vechidiki vachazivisa vanhu zvizhinji pavachataura nevatori venhau mangwana, Muvhuro, mangwanani. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Vanovhara Kongiresi Vasina Kudoma Hutungamiri Hutsva
text: Kongiresi yeZanu PF yasvika kumagumo neMugovera mutungamiri webato iri, VaRobert Mugabe, vachipihwa masimba nemukana wekumirira bato iri musarudzo dzemutungamiri wenyika dzichaitwa muna 2018. VaMugabe, avo vapihwa zvakare masimba ekusarudza vatevedzeri vavo vaviri nasachigaro webato, vati vachatanga vadzidza pamire vanhu vakadomwa kupinda mu Central Committee kuitira kuti vazosarudze nhengo dze Politiburo itsva. Vati vachaita izvi neChitatu svondo rinouya. Nhengo dzekomiti yebato yepamusoro soro dzinosanganisara vatevedzeri vaviri vemutungamiri webato, sachigaro webato, munyori wezvemabasa emusangano, munyori wezvemitemo, murongi wemisangano nevamwe. Politiburo itsva inenge iine nhengo makumi matatu. Vachitaura pakuvharwa kwekongiresi, VaMugabe vamboti pasi neZanu PF, ndokuzogadzirisa voti pasi neMDC. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti zvabuda mukongiresi yeZanu PF zvinoratidza kuti bato iri rinoremekedza zvikuru VaMugabe avo vanzi vakwikwidze muna 2018 apo vanenge vave nemakore makumi mapfumbamwe nemana. Vanhu vakawanda vanga vakatarisira kuona kuti ndivanani vachadomwa kuva vatevedzeri vaVaMugabe pamwe nasachigaro sezvo mubato mange muine kurwira masimba kunotyisa. Vanga vachirwira masimba vanonzi igurukota rezvemitemo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa pamwe nechikwata changa chichitsigira vanga vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri webato, Amai Joice Mujuru. Asi munzira yekuenda kukongiresi zvinhu zvakaipira Amai Mujuru pakusvika kuti vashorwe zviri pachena naVaMugabe. Amai Mujuru havana kana kumbotsika gumbo ravo kukongiresi. No media source currently available

headline: Mafuta eKufambisa Dzimotokari Otangazve Kunetsa muNyika
text: Dambudziko rekushomeka kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari ratanga zvakare munyika zvopa kuti vanhu vakawanda vatadze kugadzikana. Asi gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto Doctor Joram Gumbo vati kushomeka kwemafuta kuri kukonzerwa nevanhu vari kunyora nhema pamasaisai akaita seFacebook neWhatsApp. Vati parizvino nyika ine mafuta akakwana uye vanhu havafanire kutya. Magaraji akawanda ange asina mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari, mashoma anga aine mafuta aya anga aine mitsetse yakareba yemotokari. Vakawanda vanga vari mumitsetse vashoropodza hurumende vachiti haina kurongeka sezvo iri kungogaronetseka nedambudziko rimwe chete. Mumwe anga ari pamutsetse wegaraji reTreck nhasi VaSolomon Mhango vanoti mushure mekupihwa mafuta anosvika marita zana hurumende ingadai yakaramba ichitsvaga mamwe kwete kumirira kuti apere yozotsvaga mamwe. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa naVaGiverson Tinarwo mumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi. Asi VaLucky Borerwe vanoti semaonero avo, vemagaraji ava vari kushaisa vanhu mafuta senzira yakuda kukwidza mutengo sezvo hurumende yakavarambidza kukwidza mutengo. Mumwe mutyairi wemotokari VaTapera Mlilo vanoti vamwe vanhu vave kutenga mafuta emotokari akawandisa kudarika avarikuda kushandisa nekutya kuzoashaya. Dzimwe nzvimbo dzakaita seBanket, Karoi neChegutu dzinonzi dzanga dziine magaraji mashoma anga aine mafuta izvo zviri kukonzeresa mitsetse yakareba yemotokari dzinenge dzichida mafuta. Vanotengesa mafuta vanoti vari kushaya mari yekuAmerica yekutenga mafuta sezvo ivo vanomanikidzwa kutengesa mafuta nemabond ayo asingatenge kunze kwenyika.

headline: World Bank Inoti Kuda Kutanga Bhizimisi muZimbabwe Kuchiri Kunetsa
text: Gwaro reWorld Bank rinoratidza mamiriro ezvinhu munyika dzepasi rose panyaya dzekuita bhizimisi munyika idzi rinoratidza kuti Zimbabwe ichiri pachinhano chepasi, zvisinei nechinangwa chehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa chekuda kuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika pamwe nemaitirwo ebhizimisi munyika. Mugwaro iri, iro rinonzi “Doing business” regore ra2019, Zimbabwe iri pachinhano chezana nemakumi mashanu neshanu. Mugore rino ra2018 Zimbabwe yange iri pachinhano chezana nemakumi mashanu nepfumbamwe. Chipangamazano musangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe Doctor Propser Chitambara avo vanovewo nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vanoti dambudziko guru panyaya yekuvandudza hupfumi pamwe nemaitirwo ebhizimisi munyika inyaya yekuti hurumende inotaura zvinhu zvaisingaite. Mauritius iyo iri pachinhano chemakumi maviri ndiyo nyika iri pachinhano chepamusoro-soro panyika dzemuAfrica ichiteverwa neRwanda iyo iri pachinhano chemakumi maviri nepfumbamwe. Panyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica South Africa iri pachinhano chemakumi masere nepiri (82) Botswana iri pachinhano chemakumi masere netanhatu (86). Zambia iri pachinzvimbo chemakumi masere nenomwe (87) kozotiwo Namibia iri pachinzvimbo chezana nenomwe (107). Gwaro iri rinotarisa zvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana kusanganisira kuti zvinotora nguva yakareba sei kuti munhu akwanise kutanga bhizimisi, zviri nyore here kuwana magetsi, nezvimwe zvakadaro. VaReginald Shoko vanove mukuru wesangano reAffirmative Action mudunhu reMatabeleland vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kutora muenzaniso wenyika yeRwanda iyo yakabvisa mitemo yakawanda pakuvhura mabhizimisi munyika iyi. VaButler Tambo muongorori wezve budiriro anoshanda akazvimirira vanoti rimwe dambudziko guru rinokanganisa kuvandudzwa kwehupfumi pamwe nekuitwa kwebhizimisi munyika inyaya yemitemo isina kujeka. VaTambo vanotiwo nyaya yekuti muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi iri kupa kuti hurumende ingovimbisa zvaisiri kukwanisa kuita. Vati hurumende inofanira kuzvipira kurwisa huori uho huri kukanganisa nyaya yebudiriro kana kukwezva vanoda kutanga mabhizimisi. VaChitambara vanobvumiranawo nemaonero aya. Mugwaro ra2019 nyika yeDjibouti ndeimwe yenyika dzakasimukira zvikuru kubva pachinhano chezana nemakumi mashanu neina kusvika pachinhano chemakumi mapfumbamwe nepfumbamwe. Gwaro iri rinoti nyika iyi yakkwanisa kuita izvi nekuvandudza mitemo yayo kusanganisira kuita kuti vanhu vakwanise kunyoresa mabhizimisi avo munguva pfupi. Bhanga reWorld Bank rinoburitsa gwaro re”Doing Business” gore rega rega. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi, asi ivo nemutungangamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa pasi pedingidzira ravo rekuti Zimbabwe Yakavhura Magonhi ekuita bhizimisi kana kuti "Zimbabwe Is Open for Business" vanotaura nyaya yekurerutsa kuita mabhizimisi munyika sechinhu chavanonyanya kukoshesa.

headline: Vadzidzi Gumi neVana Vosungwa Vachiratidzira paUniversity of Zimbabwe
text: Vadzidzi vepaUniversity of Zimbabwe vanoti vacharamba vachienderera mberi nekuratidzira kunyangwe vamwe vavo gumi nevana vakasungwa nezuro vachinyunyuta nekuwedzerwa kwemari dzedzidzo. Vachitaura neStudio 7, rimwe remagweta arikumiririra vadzidzi ava vaPaidamoyo Saurombe vanoshanda nesangano remagweta anorwira kodzero reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights vati vadzidzi gumi nevana vakasungwa nezuro havasati vaudzwa mhosva yavari kupomerwa VaSaurombe vanoti pavadzidzi vakasungwa apa pane vamwe vakakuvara. Studio 7 hainawo kukwanisa kubata mutauriri wemapurisa Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Vachitaura nevatori venhau nhasi muHarare vanomiririra vadzidzi vepaUniversity of Zimbabwe vati mari dzechikoro dzirikudiwa dzinokatyamadza sezvo vazhinji vavo vasiri kukwanisa kuzounganidza mari dzirikudiwa idzi. Mutungamiriri we Student Representative Council yepaUZ vaAllan Chipoyi vanoti mari irikudiwa iyi ichasiya vana vevarombo vasingawani dzidzo University of Zimbabwe yakakwidza mari dzechikoro izvo zvichasiya vaibhadhara mari shoma pachikoro ichi vobhadhara mari inosvika zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi mana nezvishanu kana kuti 340 000 kubva pazviuru makumi mashanu nezvinomwe 55 000. Avo vanoda kuita zvidzidzo zveMasters varikutarisirwa kubhadhara mari inodarika miriyoni yemadhora emuno. Munyori mukuru muSRC , VaMunashe Cuthbert Masiyiwa vatsigirawo vachiti ongororo yavakaita inoratidza kuti vadzidzi vazhinji vari pachikoro ichi vanobva kumhuri dzisingawani mari yakawanda. VaMasiyiwa vatiwo vanoda kuti mapurisa asungunure vadzidzi vakasungwa. Vadzidzi ava vanyorawo tsamba yenyunyuto iyo vanoti yasainwa nevadzidzi vanodarika zviuru zvishanu. Vati vachanosiya tsamba yenyunyuto iyi kudare reparamende, kubazi rezvedzidzo yepamusoro pamwe nekuZimbabwe Human Rights Commission. Vadzidzi ava vanotiwo kana mari ikasadzikiswa vachange vachizoendawo kumatare. Muzvare Everjoy Chidindi vebato rinopikisa reLabour Economists and Afrikan Democrats vaudzawo Studio 7 kuti zvinokatyamadza kuti mari dzinodiwa nehurumende hadzienderani nemari irikutambiriswa veruzhinji. Hatinawo kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro Muzvinafundo Amon Murwira kana vakuru vepaUniversity of Zimbabwe. Asi vachinyora padandemutande reTwitter , munyori mubazi rezvekubudiswa kwemashoko vaNick Mangwana vanoti vasingakwanisi kubhadhara mari dzechikoro kumauniversity kune zvirongwa zvakadai sekubhadhara mari padiki padiki pamwe nekupiwa zvikwereti. Vatiwo pane varikuda kupinza zvematongerwo enyika munyaya dzekukwidza kwemari dzechikoro asi izvi zvarambwa nevamiririri vevadzidzi avo vatiwo hazviiti kuti vanzi vabhadhare mari iyi zvishoma zvishoma nekuti yakawandisa. Zvimwe zvikoro zvedzidzo yepamusoro zvakwidzawo mari zvakanyanya zvinosanganisira Masvingo Polytechnic iyo yakakwidza mari dzeNational Certificate kubva pazviuru makumi maviri nezvina zvemadhora emuno 24 000 kuenda pazviuru zana nezvishanu (105 000). Gweru Polytechnic neLupane State University ndovamwewo zvakare vakakwidza mari dzechikoro.

headline: Hama dzaVaMugabe Dzinoti Hadziwirirane naAmai Grace Mugabe
text: Hama dzevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, dzinoti hadziwirirane nemuroora wadzo, Amai Grace Mugabe, nekuda kwekusakudza vakuru mumhuri, uye kutsvinyira kwavanoita vemumhuri, pamwe nekutaura zvisina maturo izvo vanoti zvakakonzeresawo kusawirirana mubato reZanu PF. Hama dzaVaMugabe dzinosanganisira mhuri yekwaMugabe, kwaJenami pamwe neyekwaMatibiri, dzinoti Amai Mugabe munhu asingatsiurike sezvo vaine pamuromo pasingamharwi nenhunzi. Hama idzi dzinoti nekuda kwekusaremekedza vakuru vemumhuri, vainge vasisa fambidzane nemuroora wavo uyo asisaende kumusha kwaZvimba nekuti hapana anomufarira. VaBen Matibiri vanoti Amai Mugabe munhu anotaura zvisina maturo nguva dzakawanda. VaMatibiri vanoti Amai Grace Mugabe vainge vakasiyana zvikuru nemudzimai waVaMugabe wekutanga mushakabvu, Amai Sally Mugabe, uyo vanoti Ainge akanyarara uye aine rudo nevanhu vose. Imwe hama yaVaMugabe yechidiki, Va Clemence Matibiri, vanoti Amai Mugabe vane nharo uye vanopikisana nevakuru mumhuri izvo zvakaita kuti vasagamuchirike kumusha kwaZvimba. Mumwe muvakidzani waVaMugabe kumusha kwaZvimba, VaFidelis Chinhyanyi, vanoti vanoziva mudzimai waVaMugabe wekutanga Amai Sally zvakanyanya vachiti hunhu hwaAmai Sally hwaiyemurwa zvakanyanya nevemhuri pamwe nemunyika yose. Asi VaMunyanyi vanoti Amai Grace Mugabe vaizivikanwa nekutuka kunyange zvinonyadzisira pavanhu nekudzikisira vanhu vakuru. VaMunyanyi vanoti Amai Grace munhu aida kutonga tonga pese pavanenge vari izvo zvazokonzera kusawirirana mubato ravo reZanu PF. Mumwe mugari wekwaZvimba asina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti Amai Grace Mugabe vanoita senzena nenyaya yekutukirira vanhu vose vavasingawirirane navo. Vamwe vanoti zvakaita Amai Grace Mugabe zvekudyara mhodzi yekusawirirana mubato reZanu PF zvakazonakirawo nyika nekuti ndizvo zvakazoita kuti paite kudzingana mubato reZanu PF izvo zvakazokonzera kuti mauto atore masimba munyika, chiitiko chakafadza ruzhinji rwevanhu. Wongororo yakaitwa neStudio7 inoratidzawo kuti vanhu vakawanda mubato reZanu pamwe nemunyika vakabatanidzwa nechishuwo chekumisa Amai Grace Mugabe kuti vasatore chigaro chemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika icho vanga voda kutora pamusangano mukuru webato reZanu PF mwedzi unouya. Amai Grace Mugabe vanga vopihwa mazita emadunhurirwa akawanda anosanganisira mazita akaita saMarujata rinoreva mudzimai anotaurisa uye anokonzeresa kusawirirana kwevanhu mumusha. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Human Rights Commission Yoshora Mabharani Mukuru weHuumende
text: Mabharani mukuru wehurumende VaClemence Masango, vanoti havasi kufara kuti komisheni inoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu, yeZimbabwe Human Rights Commission, yave kutora divi nekuvashora nevashandi vebazi ravo pamwe nekuvapomera mhosva yehuori isati yambonzwawo divi ravo. Komisheni iyi iri kufamba ichinzwa pfungwa dzevanhu pamusoro pekuwaniswa magwaro anosanganisira ekuzvarwa, zvitupa nemapasipoti VaMasangano vatiwo zvimwe zviri kutaurwa zvave kutotyisidzira vashandi vebazi ravo uye vati vanoona sekuti pachinzvimbo chekuongorora zvizere nyaya iyi, komisheni iyi yave kutovaroverera pachipiyaniso isati yave nehumbowo hwekuti chii chiri kuita. VaMasango avo vauuya nemunyori mubazi rezvemukati menyika, VaAaron Nhepera, vaudza komisheni iyi kuti vanogona kuramba kushanda nayo ikada kupindira zvakanyanya mumashandiro ebazi ravo. Asi sachigaro vekomisheni iyi, VaElasto Mugwadi vavimbisa, VaMasango kuti vachaita basa ravo nemazvo uye zviri pachenawo kuti bazi ravo rinodawo zvikwanisiro kuti rikwanise kuita basa raro zvakanaka. VaMasango vati nyaya yekushomeka kwemapasipoti munyika inyaya iri pachena uye inyaya yavagara vachitaura musi nenguva ivo pamwe negurukota rezvemukati menyika. VaMugwadi vati chirongwa chavo icho chave nemwedzi chasvika pachinhanho chekupedzesira vasati vanyorwa gwaro iro vachatura kuparamende. Zvichakadai VaNhepera pamwe naVaMasango vaudza komisheni iyi kuti vachapindura mibvunzo yavapihwa mukupera kwesvondo. Ongororo yakaitwa neZimbabwe Human Rights Commission inoratidza kuti vanhu vakawanda mune dzimwe nzvimbo munyika vari kunetseka kuwana magwaro anosanganisira ekuzvarwa, ekufa nekufambisa. Komisheni iyi inoti chinangwa cheongororo yayo ndeche kugadzirisa matambadziko akatarisana nevanhu mukuwana magwaro aya.
