Ukowo VaMasango vanoti bazi ravo riri kuenda pese parinogona kuvhura mahosifi munzvimbo dzese kuti vanhu vasafambe zvimbo dzakareba kunotora magwaro avonoda. Vanhu vanodarika mazana matatu ezviuru vanonzi vachiri vakamirira magwaro ekufambisa sezvo hofisi iyi ichiti haina mari yekunze yekutenga zvimwe zvinodiwa zvakaita semichina yakawanda uye bepa rinoshandiswa. Vakawanda vataura neStudio 7 vanoti vanofumobata jongwe muromo kuenda kumahofisi aRegistra General kunotsvaga magwaro ekufambisa uye vamwe vavo vanoti kune chikiribidi chakawanda chinoitwa kuti munhu awane gwaro iri. No media source currently available

headline: Cholera Yopa Vanhu Kuti Vasabate Maoko paRufu
text: Zvichitevera kubuda kwakaita chirwere chekorera mumisha inogara veruzhinji yeGlen View neBudiriro, bazi rinoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwezvakatikomberedza, reEnvironmental Management Agency, EMA, rakapa vagari mabhini ekurasira marara anodarika zviuru makumi mashanu senzira yekumisa kupararira kwekorera, iyo yauraya vanhu vanodarika makumi. Bazi reEMA rinoti riri kushanda nekanzuru yeHarare mukuona kuti marara arasirwa munzvimbo dzakakodzera senzira yekuchengetedza hutano, uye kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere chekorera. Mukuru anoona nezvekushambadza mabasa eEMA, VaLeon Mutungamiri, vanoti vakaona zvakakodzera kuti vapinde mumisha inogara veruzhinji vachipa imba yega yega, bhini rekurasira marara. VaMutungamiri vanoti basa ravari kuita richaitwawo mumusha weBudiriro vachipa vagari mabhini pamwe nekuvadzidzisa zvakakoshera kuisa marara mumabhini, uye nzira dzinoiswa nadzo marara mumabhini aya. VaMutungamiri vanoti vari kupawo dzidziso kukanzuru yeHarare kuti ibvise marara ari mupombi dzinotakura mvura dzine tsvina, kuitira kuti madhireni aya asamise kufamba kwemvura inenge yanaya. Vakomana nevasikana vari kushanda neEMA vanoti dambudziko riripo nderekuti vanhu vari kurasira mashizha mumadhireni anofamba nemvura. Vanoti mashizha aya anogona kuchengetwa zvakanaka kuitira kuti ave mufudze, kwete kuarasira munzvimbo dzinofamba nemvura. Mumwe mugari wemuGlen View, Amai Annatolia Mahwindi, vanoti kanzuru inouya kamwe chete pamwedzi kuzotakura marara. Vanotiwo vari kufara nerubatsiro rwemabhini avakapihwa neEMA. Mumwe mugari wemumusha uyu, Va Enos Mahwindi, vanoti vakafara zvikuru nedanho rakatorwa neEma nokuti rinodzidzisa vagari nezvehutsanana kuitira kuti chirwere chekorera chisapararire. Mumwe mugari, Amai Tsitsi Mutekede, vakaratidzawo kufara nemabhini avakapihwa, vachiti vava kuwana pekurasira marara, izvo zvichaita kuti nzvimbo yavanogara, igare yakachena. Mutauri weHarare City Council, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti hachisi chokwadi kuti kanzuru iri kutadza kutakura marara munzvimbo dzinogara veruzhinji. Vanotiwo marori ekanzuru ari mubishi rekubvisa marara akarasirwa pese pese kuGlenview. Meya mutsva weHarare, VaHerbert Gomba, vakatsinhira mashoko aVaChideme izvo zviri kupesana nezviri kutaurwa nevagari vemuGlen View.

headline: VaMugabe Vanoti Havasi Kuzodoma Achavatsiva Sezvo Zviri Kubato reZanu-PF
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nhasi vaita mabiko ekupemberera bhavhudhe ravo rechimakumi mapfumbamwe nematatu kuMatopos Junior School, Matobo kuMatabeleland South. VaMugabe vakasvitsa makore aya nemusi weChipiri kunyangwe hazvo mabiko akarongwa neYouth League yabato ravo pasi pe21st February Movement azoitwa nhasi. VaMugabe vati havasi kuzodoma munhu achatora chigaro chavo sezvo izvi zviri kubato ravo reZanu-PF kusarudza mutungamiri warinoda. VaMugabe vatsidza zvekare kuti havasi kuzosiya chigaro uye vari kukukwidza musarudzo dzegore rinouya ra2018. Vati pane vamwe mubato reZanu-PF vanoda kutyora bumbiro remutemo webato vachida kuti vasiye chigaro ivo vakasarudzwa nevanhu. “So why why do you want to try circumvent the constitution, haunganzvengese constitution se bhora kuti uwane chigaro aiwa hatina kumboita party yakadaro,” Mubato reZanu-PF mune kunetsana kunotyisa pakati pevari kutsigira mumwe mutevedzeri wavo VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nevari kutsigira chimwe chikwata chinonzi Generation 40 icho chnonzi chinotsigirawo mudzimai waVaMugabe, Amai Grace Mugabe. Pamabiko aya mashoko evange vachitaura ange achiburitsawo pachena kuti mubato mapindwa naPongwe. Panyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaMugabe vakati mari yemabond notes ichangoshanda kwenguva pfupi. Asi kunyangwe hazvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyika munyaya dzezvehupfumi zvapa kuti vana veZimbabwe vaende muhupoteri, VaMugabe vakati vanoshamisika nevanhu vanoenda kunopotera kune dzimwe nyika vachipa muenzaniso nyika yeAmerica. VaMugabe vanoti vakateerera mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaDonald Trump vachitaura zvekunetsana kwavo nemuvakidzani wavo Mexico zvekuda kutovaka mudhuri mure refu. Vakati kuita kwakadai kunopa kuti vashamisike kuti sei vana veZimbabwe vachida kubuda munyika vachienda muhupoteri ivo vachizonobatwa neseri kweruoko. Vachitaurawo pamabiko aya vanotungamira vechidiki muZanu-PF Youth League VaKudzi Chipanga vati vanoda kuti VaMugabe vafire pachigaro kana kuti “Life President”. Vati Zanu-PF inofanira kumira kuita sarudzo dzemutungamiri webato yongoita zvekusarudza vatevedzeri chete nekuti VaMugabe havana anokwikwidza. VaMugabe vave kuratidza kukura kwakanyanya vataura kwenguva inodarika awa rimwe chete. Vati kurarama kunobva kunaMwari uye havangazive kuti hupenyu hwavo hunoguma riini. VaMugabe avo vange vachitaura vakabata katebhuru kange kaine bepa rine mashoko avanga vachitaura vati dzimwe nguva vanomboona semunhu ari oga asi vakati havasi kuzobuda mugwara ravari. Zviuru nezviuru zvevatsigiri vavo zvange zviri pamabiko aya. Zvakapfeka hembe dzine mufananidzo waVaMugabe. Nzvimbo yange ichiitirwa bhavhudhe iyi yagara iine mutauro wakanyanya panyaya yemhirizhonga. Panzvimbo iyi pedyo nepakavigwa mutumbi waCecil John Rhodes uyo akauraya vana veZimbabwe vakawanda pakupamba kwake nyika. Asi pakawana kuzvitonga kuzere munzvimbo iyi makaitawo hondo yeGukurahundi apo vanofungidzirwa kuti vanodarika zviuru makumi maviri vakaurayowa nemauto eFifth Brigade muMatabeland neMidlands. Zvinofungidzirwa kuti vamwe vakapondwa munguva iyi vakavigwa pedyo nepange pachiitirwa mabiko aya. VaChipanga vaudza Studio 7 kuti pange paine vanyarikani kubva kunyika dzakaita seZambia, China, Namibia, Botswana, Angola nedzimwe. Vamwe vange vari pamusangano uyu vanosanganisawo mukuru wemauto General Constantino Chiwenga uye mukuru wemapurisa Commissioner General Augustine Chihuri.

headline: Mutengo weRopa Woderedzwa Mushure Mekupindira kweHurumende
text: Sangano reNational Blood Services kana kuti rinoti mari yavakawana kutanga kwegore rino kubva kuhurumende yakavabatsira kuti vadzikise mutengo weropa pamwe nekuti madzimai akazvitakura vano batsirirwa muzvipatara zvehurumende vawane ropa iri pachena. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko musangano iri, Muzvare Esther Masunda, vati NBS yakawana mari inoita mamiriyoni mana nemazana manomwe emadhora. Muzvare Masunda vati mari iyi ndiyo yakaita kuti vadzikise mutengo weropa kusvika pamadhora makumi mashanu papaindi imwe yeropa kubva pamadhora makumi masere muna Zvita. Amai Masunda vati nekuda kwekudzika kwemitengo iyi vanhu vazhinji vave kukwanisawo kutenga ropa iri huye sesangango vari kutsvaga nzira dzekusimudzira huwandu hweropa ravanotengesa. NBS ine mizinda mishanu inotengeserwa ropa inoti Harare, Bulawayo, Masvingo, Gweru neMutare. Muzvare Masunda vanoti nekuda kwemari yavakawana iyi vave kutsvakawo nzira dzekuti vawedzere mizinda inotengeserwa ropa iyi kuti veruzhinji vawanire ropa iri pedyo navo. Munyori webazi rezvehutano, Dr Gerald Gwinji, vanotiwo vanhu vazhinji vanga vasiri kukwanisa kutenga ropa izvo zvinova zvakasunda hurumende kuti ibatsire nemari. VaGwinji vanoti muono webazi rezvehutano ndewekuti mune remangwana ropa riwaniswe vanhu pachena. Vatiwo vari kutarisira kuti panozopera gore rino mutengo uye wadzika kusvika pamadhora gumi chete papaindi imwechete. Sangano reNBS rinowana ropa pachena kubva kune vanobatsira asi vanoti kucheneswa nekuchengetedzwa kweropa iri kunoda mari zhinji uye havagoni kuderedza mitengo kusvika vawana anenge achivabatsira nemari. No media source currently available

headline: Vakarwa Hondo Vanoti Hurombo Hwovatadzisa Kukwikwidza Musarudzo Zvakasimba
text: Mutauriri wesangano reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association VaDouglas Mahiya vanoti kunyangwe hazvo vakanzi vapinde musarudzo dzemaprimary zviri kunetsa nekuti havana mari dzekuti vatsvage rutsigiro. Bato reZanu-PF rakazivisa kuti vose vakarwa hondo yerusununguko vakasungunuka kupinda musarudzo pasin zvirehwa rehwa zvakawanda. Vamwe vari kurambidzwa vachinzi havana makore akawanda vari mubato iri. Asi kunyangwe vakarwa hondo ava vari kupinda musarudzo, VaMahiya vanoti havasi kukwanisa kunyanyogona kuti vakwikwidzane nevamwe vane mari. Vati dai zvaibvira vakarwa honfo vaingoregedzwa vachipinda musarudzo dzenyika sezvo vakasungunura nyika. No media source currently available

headline: VaBiden Vozivisa Nyika Yavo Nezve Kuurayiwa kweMutungamiri weAl Quaida
text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden nezuro vakati America yainge yauraya mutungamiri wechikwata chinopfurikidza mwero cheAl Qaida, Ayman al Zawahri. Al Zawhri akaberekerwa kuEgypyt. Chikwata cheAl Qaida ndicho chakapamba ndege ndokuparadza zvivakwa muNew York, Pentagon nePennsylvania musi wa 11 Gunyana 2001 kukafa vanhu zviuru zviviri nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi manomwe nevanomwe. VaBiden vakati mushure mekutsvaga Al Zawhri kwemakore akawanda, vasori vemuAmerica vakazoziva kuti ainge ave kugara muKabul, Afghanistan nevamwe vepedyo vemhuri yake. VaBiden vanoti Al Zawahri akaurayiwa ari oga kunyangwe mumba maainge ari mainge muine vamwe vanhu. Chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinogara muNew York muzvare Savanna Madamombe, vanoti chiitiko ichi chichabatsira kupodza maronda evanhu vazhinji vakarasikirwa nehama neshamwari muguta iri mugore ra 2011. No media source currently available

headline: MDC-T Inoti Zimbabwe Inoda Mari Yakawandisa Kuti Ivandudze Hupfumi
text: MDC inotungamirwa naVa Morgan Tsvangirai inoti hupfumi hwenyika huri kutoda kuti Zimbabwe iwane mari ine chitsama yainopihwa kamwe chete kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimudzirwe zvine mutsindo. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mu Harare neChishanu, munyori anowona nezvehupfumi mu MDC-T, Va Webber Chinyadza, vati hupfumi hwenyika hwaenda kumawere nepamusana pekutadza kutonga kuri kuita hurumende ye Zanu PF vachiti hupfumi hwenyika huri kutadza kukura kusvika pahwakambosvika muna 1972 nyika isati yawana kuzvitonga kuzere. No media source currently available Kuti zvinhu zvinakire veruzhinji munyika, Va Chinyadza vati pave kutoda mari ine chitsama inopihwa nyika kuti isimudzire kumutsiridzwa kwemaindaisitiri, nyaya dzekurima, kucherwa kwezvicherwa pamwe nezvimwe zvese zvakabata hupfumi hwenyika. Va Chinyadza vati hurumende haisi kukoshesawo nyaya dzekurima dzinove dzakabata hupfumi vachiti hurumende haisi kuisa mari yakawanda munyaya dzekudiridzira sezvo mamiriro ekunze ari kushanduka. Vati panofanirwa kuiswa mari inoita bhiriyoni rimwe nemazana manomwe ezviuru zvemadhora munyaya dzekurima asi chiri kuvashamisa ndechekuti hurumende yakaisa miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana matanhatu zvemadhora munyaya dzekudiridzira zvirimwa mumwaka wegore rino. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemutauriri we Zanu PF, Va Simon Khaya Moyo, kuti tinzwe divi rebato ravo panyaya iyi. Asi mutungamiri wenyika vari zvakare mutungamiri we Zanu PF, Va Robert Mugabe, vakaudza nyika neChipiri kuti vari kutarisira kuti hupfumi hwenyika huchasimuka kubudikidza nekusimbaradza nyaya dzekurima. Zvichakadai, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vachishanda vakazvimiria, Va Masimba Manyanya, avo vaimbova mukuru aiwona nezvehupfumi mubazi rezvemari, vaudza Studio7 kuti pane zvakawanda zvinoda kugadziriswa kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire. Nekune rumwe rutivi, gurukota rezvemari, Va Patrick Chinamasa, neChina vakakumbira masangano anokweretesa mari akaita se International Monetary Fund ne World Bank kuti abatsire Zimbabwe nekuikweretesa mari kuti hurumende igadzirise zviri kunetsa muhupfumi hwenyika. Va Chinamasa vanoti Zimbabwe yave nemakore anodarika makore gumi isati yambowana kana kobiri kubva ku World Bank vachiti hurumende iri kushushikana zvikuru nekusapihwa mari kwairi kuitwa nebhanga repasi rose iri. Asi mumiriri we World Bank mu Zimbabwe, Va Guang Zhen Chen, vakaudza Va Chinamasa kuti Zimbabwe inofanira kugadzirisa mitemo yose nezvimwe zvese zviri kutadzisa kuti vekunze vanoda kuzosima mari munyika vauye. Mumiriri weIMF muZimbabwe, VaChristian Beddies, vakaudza Studio7 kutanga kwesvondo rino Zimbabwe inofanirwa kutanga yabhadhara zvikwereti zvayo zvose kuitira kuti ipihwe chikwereti chitsva. Va Manyanya vati chimwe chinoda kugadziriswa inyaya dzematongerwo enyika kuti Zimbabwe ikwanise kuwana mari yairi kuda iyi. Zimbabwe ine chikwereti kunze chemari inoita mabhiriyoni masere nezviuru mazana mana emadhora. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti kutadza kuri kuita Zimbabwe kubhadhara chikwereti ichi kumasangano anokweretesa mari kuri kuita kuti hurumende isakwanise kupihwa zvimwe zvikwereti zvemiri yairi kuda kusimudzirisa hupfumi hwenyika.

headline: Britain Inoti Inoshuvira Sarudzo Dzakachena muZimbabwe
text:
Mumiriri weBritain muZimbabwe Amai Catriona Laing vanoti nyika yavo inoshuvira kuti muZimbabwe muve nesarudzo dzakachena dzinotambirwa nevanhu vose vachiti Britain iri kutarisa nemaziso matsvuku kuti hurumende ichawana sei michina yeBiometric Voter Registration. Vati nyika yavo inonzwisisa kuchema-chema kwemapato anopikisa panyaya yekuti michina iyi inofanirwa kuwanikwa nenzira yakajeka.

Vachitaura neStudio 7 parutivi pechiitiko chekukumikidzwa zviri pamutemo kwembatya nemimwe midziyo inoshandiswa pakurwisa moto muBulawayo nemusi weMuvhuro Ambassador Laing vati nyika yavo inoshuvira kuti Zimbabwe itevedzere hwaro hwesarudzo hwenyika dzeSADC uyewo kuti iteerere zvakataurwa nevesangano reAfrican Union kuti zvinofanirwa kugadziriswa kuti munyika muve nesarudzo dzakachena.

Amai Laing vati hururmende yeBritain haingakwanise kupindira padanho rakatorwa nehurumende rekuti ndiyo ichatenga michina inoshandiswa pakuita Biometric Voter Registration asi vati muzinda wavo uri kutevera wakatarisa nemaziso matsvuku kuti izvi zvichaitwa nenzira yakajeka. Amai Laing vange vari munyarikani pachiitiko chekukumikidzwa kwembatya nemichina inoshandiswa pakurwisa moto kukanzuru yeguta reBulawayo nevesangano reOperation Florian rinove sangano rekuBritain rinoshanda rakazvimirira rega mukubatsira vanhu vemunyika dzakasiyana-siyana munya dzekurwisa moto.

Ambaasador Laing vatenda vaShephard Ndlovu vanove chizvarwa cheZimbabwe asi vachishanda vari kuBritain avo vakabatsira kuti hukama pakati pekanzuru yeguta reBulawayo nesangano reoperation Florian huvepo. Vati kunyange hazvo hukama pakati pehurumende yeZimbabwe neyeBritain huchimbonetsa rubatsiro rwakapiwa nesangano reOperation Florian hunoratidza kusimba kunoramba kwakaita hukama pakati pevanhu venyika mbiri idzi.


Kanzuru yeguta reBulawayo yakatanga hukama nesangano reOperation Florian mugore ra2009 uye kubvira muna 2011 kusvika pari zvino, kanzuru iyi yawana motokari gumi dzekurwisa moto uye vashandi vayo vachidzidziswawo nezvekurwisa moto.

VaMartin Moyo meya weguta reBulawayo vati rubatsiro rwavari kuwana kubva kusangano reoperation Florian rwakakosha zvikuru kuchitariswa dambudziko rekushikwa kwemari munyika vachitiwo rubatsiro urwu runoita kuti guta ravo rifambirane nemamwe maguta pasi rose munyaya dzekurwisa moto.

Pasi pehukama hwesangano reOpertaion Florian kanzuru yeguta reBulawayo yave kushanda nemamwe makanzuru emamwe madhorobha uye kwemavhiki maviri apfuura, vamwe vashandi vezvemoto vemakanzuru aya vange vachiita zvidzidzo zvakasiyana-siyana zvine chekuita nekudzivirira moto.

VaKhumbulani Ndlovu avo vanove Leading Fire Officer muguta reBulawayo vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kufara zvikuru nezvidzidzo zvaawana uye vave neshungu dzekushandisa zvavakadzidza kuti vabatsire vagari vemuBulawayo.

Rubatsiro rwawanikwa nekanzuru yeguta reBulawayo kusvika pari zvino rwakakosha madhora anopfuura mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mashanu. No media source currently available

headline: MDC Inoti Vanhu vemuZimbabwe Ngavabatane Kukurudzira VaMugabe Kubva paChigaro Vachishandisa Nzira Dziri paMutemo
text: Bato rinopikisa reMDC-T rakaburitsa mashoko kuvatori venhau nemusi weMuvhuro richiti mhuri yeZimbabwe inofanira kubatana yoshandisa nzira dzose dziri pamutemo kuti vamanikidze mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nevamwe vari muhurumende yavo kuti vasiye basa nekuti vakundikana kutonga. MDC-T yati iri kushora zvikuru vanhu veZanu-PF vari kuda kufora nemusi weChitatu vachiratidza kuti vari kutsigira VaMugabe mukufora kwavanoti Million Man March. VeMDC-T vati vanhu veZanu-PF ava vanofanira kufora vachiti VaMugabe vaende pamudyandigere. Vati hurumende yaVaMugabe yaendesa nyika kumawere munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye iri kutonga nedemo. Mutauriri weMDC-T VaObert Gutu vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato reZanu-PF rapererwa nemazano nekudaro rinofanira kukanda mapfumo pasi. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, munyori mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association VaVictor Matemadanda vati vave kukurudzira nhengo dzebato ravo kuti dzibatane nevamwe mukuratidzira uku. Vakarwa hondo yerusununguko vaimbe vatsika madziro vachiti havatenderana nekufora uku sezvo vaiti vamwe vechidiki vebato iri vane pamuromo pasingamharwe nenhunzi. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Vanoda Kuti Vanhu Vatange Vabaiwe Nhomba Svondo Rino
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanoti vari kutarisira kuti vanhu vatange kubayiwa vhiki rino nhomba yeCovid-19 yakasvika munyika neMuvhuro mangwanani kubva kuChina. Hurumende inotiwo ine tarisiro yekuti panozopera gore rino vazhinji vanenge vabaiya nhomba senzira yekudzivirira kutapukira kwechirwere ichi. Vachinyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter, VaMnangagwa vakati vari kutarisira kuti vanu vabayiwe nhomba nechimbichimbi kuitira kudzivirira vanhu uye kuti hupfumi hwenyika hutange kusimukira. VaMnangagwa vakatambira zviri pamutemo nhomba iyi kuState House neMuvhuro masikati kubva kumumiriri weChina muZimbabwe VaGuo Shaochun vange vakamirira mutungamiri wenyika yavo VaXi Jinping. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano Dr John Mangwiro vatsinhirawo mashoko aVaMnangagwa vachiti pamusoro penhomba vakapihwawo majekiseni acho vachiti vari kutarisira kuti kubaiwe kwenhomba iyi kutangwe chero vhiki rino. Dr John Mangwiro vati tarisiro yehurumende ndeyekuti vanhu mamiriyoni gumi vange vabaiwa panopera gore rino. Izvi zvatsigirwa nevakasanobata chigaro chemunyori mukuru mubazi rezvehutano VaRobert Mudyirandima avo vati kunyangwe hazvo hurumende iri kutarisira kubaya huwandu uhwu kuchiri kuitwa hurukuro nemakambani anogadzira nhomba dzeCovid-19. VaMudyirandima vatiwo panenge pachibaiwa nhomba yeSinopharm yakagadzirwa kuChina iyi, hurumende inenge ichitoita tsvakurudzo yekuti nhomba iyi inoshanda here kumhando dzehutachiona weCovid-19 huri munyika. Vachigamuchira nhomba iyi kuRobert Mugabe International Airport gurukota rezvehutano uyewo vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiriri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga varumbidza pamwe nekutenda nyika yeChina. VaChiwenga vatiwo mucherechedzo wehushamwari hwakasimba pakati penyika mbiri idzi. Vachitambidzawo nhomba iyi kunaVaChiwenga, mumiririri weChina muZimbabwe VaGuo Shaochun vatiwo Zimbabwe ishamwari yeChina nekudaro havana dambudziko nekubatsira nyika ino pakuiwanisa nhomba yeCovid-19. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Muzvare Patricia Muchekeza vatiwo kunyangwe hazvo, hurumende yatambira nhomba yekutanga yekupiwa pachena vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti hurumende itenge mishonga iyi nechimbi chimbi. Izvi zvatsigirwawo nevaimbova gurukota rezvehutano, Dr Henry Madzorera avo vati vanga vakatarisira kuti nhomba yekupiwa iyi ichauya pamwechete nenhomba zviuru mazana matanhatu hurumende yaiti vakatenga. VaMadzorera vatiwo hurumende inofanirwa kungwarira kuti vasazosundwe kutenga nhomba yekuChina zvichienzaniswa nedzimwe nekuda kwekuti vapiwa zviuru mazana maviri pachena. Mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Professional Nurses Union VaRobert Chiduku vatiwo kunyangwe hazvo vakoti vachiziva nezvekubaya nhomba vanoda rumwe ruzivo nezvenhomba yeCovid-19 zvinosanganisira kuti vaziviswe kuti nhomba iyi ichange ichibaiwa pai huye rutivi rwupi nezviratidzo kana isina kuwirirana nemuviri wemunhu vasati vabaya kana kubayiwa. Vamwe vanga vari kunhandare yendege pasvika nhomba iy vanosanganisira gurukota rezvemari VaMthuli Ncube, vakasanobata chigaro chegurukota rekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika nemamwe makurukota ehurumende. Vanamazvikokota munyaya dzezvemishonga kusanganisira veMedicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe vari kutarisirwa kuongorora nhomba iyi kuti ndeyechokwadi here kwemazuva maviri isati yatanga kubayiwa vanhu. Vari kutanga kubayiwa vanosanganisira vanachiremba, vakoti nevamwe vanoshanda muzvipatara, vanoshanda pamiganhu nenhandare dzendege uye vane zvirwere zvinovaisa panjodzi yakakura yekufa nechirwere ichi. Nhomba iyi yakagadzirwa nekambani inonzi Sinopharm inova yehurumende yekuChina inogadzira mishonga. China yakapa mvumo kuti nhomba iyi itange kubayiwa vanhu mukupera kwaZvita gore rapera. Nyika yakatanga kushandisa nhomba iyi iUnited Arab Emirates ichiteverwa neBahrain. Dzimwe nyika dziri kutenga mushonga uyu dzinosanganisira Singapore, Turkey, Brazil ne Chile. No media source currently available

headline: Munhu Mumwe Chete Akafa neChirwere CheCovid-19 neSvondo kuMatabeleland South
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti nemusi weSvondo munhu mumwe chete akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kuMatabeleland South zvichireva kuti vanhu vafa vachiri chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe kana kuti 1,557. Vanhu makumi maviri nevaviri kana kuti 22 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatwa nacho vave zviuru makumi matatu nemasere ane makumi masere nevatanhatu kana kuti 38, 086. Vanhu makumi maviri nevaviri vakapora zvasiya vapora vave zviuru makumi matatu nemashanu zvine nezana nemakumi maviri nevatatu kana ktui 35, 123. Vanhu vachiri kurwara vave chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mana nevatanhatu kana kuti 1,406. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga vave zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi matatu nemazana matanhatu kana kuti 336, 600. Vabayiwa nhomba kaviri sezvinokurudzirwa vave zviuru makumi mashanu nematatu zvine mazana mana negumi nevasere kana kuti 53, 418.

headline: Vanhu Vakawanda Vobatwa neZvirwere Zvesiki neZvimwe
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti kunyange hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nezvirwere zvepabonde hwadzikira nezvikamu makumi matanhatu nezvina kubva muzana, mukati memakore gumi nemashanu apfuura, zvirwere izvi zvichakawanda munyika uye zviri kunyanyobata vanhu vane makore makumi maviri nemashanu kusvika pamakore makumi mana nemapfumbamwe. Vachitaura pamusoro pemamiriro akaita zvirwere zvepabonde nerurindi, munyika pamwe nezviri kukonzera zvirwere izvi, kukomimiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvehutano, Dr John Mangwiro, vati munyika mune zvirwere zvapabonde zvakawanda zvakaita seGonorrhea neSyphlis neHIV. Vatiwo huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cherurindi hwakadzikiria zvichitevera kudzikira kubatwa kuri kuitwa vanhu nehutachiwana hweHIV/AIDS. Mukuru anoona nezvezvirwere zvepaponde mubazi iri, Dr Tsitsi Appolo, vati huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nezvirwere izvi hwakawandira kumatunhu eMidlands neMashonaland West. Vati mumatunhu aya zvirwere izvi zvakawandira munzvimbo dzinoitwa zvekuchera goridhe uko kune vanhu vakawanda. Dr Appollo vanoti humbowo hunoratidza kuti munhu mumwe chete pa vanhu vashanu anenge aine chimwe chirwere chapabonde anenge aine hutachiwana hweHIV/AIDS. Vatiwo zvakaonekwa kuti pavanhu gumi vanobatwa nezviwere zvepabonde mumwe chete anenge akambobatwa nechirwere ichi. Vati mekuda kwaizvo vari kuita zvirongwa zvekuona kuti vanhu vanogara munzvimbo dzinobatwa vanhu vakakwanda nechirwre ichi vaongororwa kuti havana zvirwere izvi here, kuvakurudzira kushandisa makondomu pamwe nekushandisa nzira dzepabonde dzisingaparadzire zvirwere. Vazhinji vari kubatwa nezvirwere zvepabonde, vachairi vemotakari hombe kana kumagonyeti, vanorarama nekutengesa bonde, varume vanorara nevamwe varume pamwe nevanofamba muzvimbodzinocherwa goridhe nezvimwe kana kuti maArtisinal miners. Dr Appollo vati pakaita dambudziko pakuendesa makondomu munzvimbo zhinji munyika muna 2018, 2019 pamwe negore rino izvo zvakaitawo kuti vakawanda vabatwe nezvirwere zvepabonde. Vati bazi ravo rine hurongwa hwekurapa zvirwere zvakaita seSyphilis, pamwe nekuti vana vasatapurirwe hutachiwana hweHIV nanamai vavo. Vatiwo munhu wega wega anenge aine chirwere chepadone aakenda kuchipatara kana kirinika anobva aongororwa kuti haana hutachiwana hweHIV here. Asi vati pari zvino nyika haina mishonga yakakwana yekurapa maSTIs uye zvakakosha kuti paramende ione kuti vapihwa mari inokwana kutenga mishonga iyi. Munyori anoona nezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Dr Henry Madzorera, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvakakosha kuti hurumende ikoshese nyaya dzehutano pamwe nekugadzira hupfumi kuti vanhu vawane mabasa vaswera vachikorokoza. Vatiwo mishonga inofanira kuwanikwa muzvipatara kuitira kuti vange vaine zvirwere varapwe. Dr Mangwiro vati pane mimwe mishonga yave kutadza kurapa maSTIs uye vave kuongorora mishonga iyi kuti vaone kuti inokodzera here kuti varambe vachiishandisa. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoendesa Mberi Musangano neveMabhizmisi weKuzeya Mutemo Wayo paMitengo
text: Musangano wange uchifanira kuitwa nemusi weChitatu pakati pehurumende nemasangano anomirira vemabhizimisi uchikokerwa nebazi rezvemari nesangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers (CZR) unonzi wambosendekwa parutivi kusvika svondo rinouya. Izvi zvaitwa kunyange hazvo zvinhu zvaita manyama amire nerongo munyaya dzezvehupfumi zvichitevera danho rakatorwa nehurumende rekudzika mutemo wechimbi chimbi kana kuti Presidential Powers (Temporary Measures) (Financial Laws Amendment) Regulations 127 of 2021. Mutemo wakadzikwa mukupera kwesvondo rapera uyu unomanikidza vemabhizimisi kuti vatengese zvinhu nemutengo unoendererana newepamusika wemari weReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, foreign exchange rate kwete pamukoto. Pakangodzikwa mutemo uyu zvimwe zvinhu zvakabva zvawedzerwa mutengo uku vamwe vemabhizimisi vachiti havachadi kutambira madhora ekuAmerica kunyangwe hurumende iri kuti ngaashandiswe asi nemutengo wepamusika weRBZ kana kuti foreign exchange auction. Mhute yaputira nyika panyaya dzezvehupfumi iyi yapa kuti padaidzirwe musangano wechimbi chimbi uyu. Asi mutungamiri weConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers, VaDenford Mutashu, vati musangano wekuzeya mamiriro ezvinhu wasendekwa parutivi nekuti hurumende yati inoda nguva yekumboona kuti mutemo uyu uri kushanda sei. Gavhuna weRBZ, Doctor John Mangudya, uye mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvemari, VaClemence Chidawu, vange vachitarisirwa kupinda mumusangano uyu. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaMangudya avo takatumirawo mibvunzo yavasati vapindura. Asi mumashoko padandemutande reTwitter RBZ inoti danho nho iri harisi rekuda kuomesera vemabhizimisi asi kuti kuunza kugadzikana pamusika nekumisa huori kune vemakambani vanowana mari kubhanga guru renyika nemutengo uri pasi asi vodhurisa zvinhu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga, uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGilbert Muponda, vanotiwo mutemo uyu hauna kunyanya kuipa nekuti unodzikamisa dhora remunyika neku kuti vatengi vasaomeserwe sezvo vamwe vemabhizimisi vari kuwana mari kuRBZ vari kubatira vanhu. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaVictor Bhoroma, vane maonero akasiyana vachiti havasi vose vari kuwana mari kuRBZ uye bhanga iri riri kutatarika kupa vanenge vanzi vapihwe mari dzacho nenguva. Pasi pemutemo uyu, vanenge vawana mari pamusika wemari weRBZ voishandisa zvisizvo vanonzi vachabhadhairiswa miriyoni imwe chete yemadhora uye vemabhanga vanonzi vanoita zvehuori kupa makambani matsamba ekuti vawane mari pamusika weRBZ vanonzi vachabhadhariswa mamiriyoni mashanu sechirango. Vemabhizimisi vanonzi vanoramba kutambira dhora remuZimbabwe vachabhadhariswa mari inosvika zviuru makumi mashanu kana kuti 50 000. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoburitsa Bhiri reKuvandudza Chimwe Chikamu cheAIPPA
text: Hurumende nhasi yaburitswa mugwaro rayo kana kuti Government Gazette rebhiri reMedia Information Bill rekuvandudza chimwe chikamu chemutemo weAccess to Information and Protection of Privacy Act. Chikamu chiri kuvandudzwa ndechechikamu chegumi kana kuti Section 10:27 kuti chienderane nechikamu chechimakumi matanhatu nembiri kana kuti section 62 chebumbiro remutemo. Chikamu chiri kuvandudzwa ichi chakanangana nekuti vatori venhau vangawane sei mashoko kubva kumapazi ehurumende nemakambani ayo. Munyori mukuru wezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vanoti bhiri iri rinoratidza pachena kuti hurumende yakazvipira kuvandudza mitemo yange ichinzi inodzosera kumashure hutongi hwejekerere nemashandiro evatori venhau. Vati mapazi ehurumende anenge ave nemushandi anenge achishanda nevatori venhau kuvapa zvavanenge vachida zvakakoshera ruzhinji. Asi vamwe vatori venhau vanoti bhiri itsva iri harina kunyanya kusiyana nemutemo weAIPPA. VaMangwana vanoti izvi ndezvemugotsi matsuro. Gweta vari nyanzvi munyaya dzemitemo yekuburitswa kwenhau VaChris Mhike vanoti pachine zvakawanda zvinoda kugadziriswa. Mumwe mutori wenhau anemukurumbira zvikuru vari mupepeti mukuru weZimFact VaChris Chinaka vanoti iri idanho rekutanga asi rwendo rwurefu. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nemutungamiri weMedia Monitors Zimbabwe Muzvare Patience Zirima. Vatori venhau nevanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanoti mitemo yeZimbabwe yakaita seAIPA nePOSA haina kusiyana zvakanyanya nemitemo yaishandiswa nehurumende yeRhodesia yakaita seLaw and Order Maintenance Act, Official Secrets Act, Emergence Powers Act, Censorship of Publications Order of 1965. Asi hurumende inoti iri kuyedza kuvandudza zvinhu uye hurumende inofanirawo kuona kut vatori venhau havafukure hapwa zvinokanganisa nyika sematauriro aVaMangwana. Mutemo uyu uchaendeswa kuvanhu wozodzoswa kudare reparamende mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuti uve mutemo. No media source currently available

headline: Amai Chigumba Vanoti Vozorwa Mafuta eNguruve Yavasina Kudya Pakusaitwa kweSarudzo
text: Sachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission Amai Priscilla Chigumba varamba mashoko ekuti ndivo vari kuramba kuti sarudzo dzema by elections dziitwe vachiti mitemo yeCovid-19 yakadzikwa kuchengetedza vanhu yakapa kuti zvimwe zvinofanira kuitwa pasi pebumbiro remitemo zvimbosendekwa parutivi. Izvi zvinosanganisira sarudzo dzakamiswa kwenguva isina kutarwa nemutemo wechimbi chimbi wakadzikwa nebazi rezvehutano. umashoko avatumira kuStudio 7 vachipindura mibvunzo yedu panyaya yesarudzo dzemaby elections, Amai Chigumba vatiwo mazuva esarudzo anotarwa nemutungamiri wenyika achinzwa kubva kuZEC nekugadzirirawo kwainenge yakaita. Amai Chigumba vatiwo nyaya iyi ichiri kudare repamusoro reHigh Court nekudaro vakasungwa maoko pari zvino. Asi sachigaro wesangano rinoongorora nezvesarudzo rakazvimirira reZimbabwe Election Support Network VaAndrew Makoni vanoti sarudzo idzo dzabe kufanira kuitwa nekuti kune nzvimbo mukanzuru zana nemashanu uye makumi maviri memasere muparamende dzisisina vamiriri kwenguva yakareba nekuda kwekuti vamwe vakadzingwa nebato reMDC-T vachinzi vari kuMDC Alliance, vamwe vakadzingwa neZanu-PF vamwewo vakafa. VaMakoni vati havaone chinotadzisa kupa Zimbabwe kuita sarudzo kana nyika dzakapoteredza dzakaita seZambia neSouth Africa dzichiita sarudzo munguva yeCovid-19.

headline: Harare Agriculture Show Yotanga
text: Kuratidzirwa kwezvirimwa, mabhizimisi nemamwe mabasa paHarare Agricultural Show kwakatanga nemusi weMuvhuro muHarare vanoronga showa vachikurudzira veruzhinji kupinda muchiitiko ichi kuti vawane mikana yekutanga mabhizimisi pamwe nekusimudzira mabasa ekurima. Sachigaro veZimbabwe Agricultural Society, varongi veHarare Agricultural Show, VaIvan Craig, vakaudza Studio 7 kuti huwandu hwevari kuratidza zvirimwa, mabhizimisi nemabasa hwakakwira nezvikamu gumi nezviviri kubva muzana gore rino uye vanotarisira kuti show yegore rino ichanikidza kudarika gore rapfuura. Vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vaende kuHarare Agricultural Show uko vati kunodzidzwa zvakawanda pane nekutandara. VaCraig vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanofara chose kuti varimi vakaunza zvipfuwo nembeu dzemhando yepamusoro gore rino. Vatiwo kunze kwekudzidza zvekurima nemabhizimisi, kuchange kuine mafaro nevaimbi vakawanda pamwe nekutandadzwa nevamauto, mapurisa nezvikwata zvakasiyana siyana. Mukutandara imomo veBuy Zimbabwe avo vanokurudzira kugadzirwa nekutengeswa kwezvinhu munyika vanoti vachange vachishambadzawo zvinhu zvinogadzirwa muno. Mukuru weBuy Zimbabwe Zimbabwe, VaMunyaradzi Hwengwere, vaudza Studio 7 kuti gore rino vachange vachisanganisa mafaro nekupemberera hunyanzvi hwevana vemuZimbabwe. Imwe kambani iri kuratidzira gore rino IFlying Leopard Limited limited iyo inogadzira midziyo inorerutsira vanhu kutakura zvinhu yakaita semabhara anodhonzwa nemabhasikoro. VaDuncan Nyathi vanoti midziyo yavanogadzira inokwanisawo kushandiswa nevanhu vanoita mabhizimisi echidiki vakaita sevanotengesa mumigwagwa. Show yegore rino iyo iri kuitwa pasi pedingindira rekuti Field to Industry: Produce. Connect Develop ichavhurwa zviri pamutemo nemutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nemusi weChishanu. Varimi nevamabhizimisi vanotarisirwa kubuda nemibairo inosvika zana rezviuru zviuru zvemadhora gore rino. Gore rapfuura vanhu zviuru mazana maviri (200 000) vakapinda muHarare Agricultural Show uye gore rino panotarisirwa kuti pachapinda vanhu zviuru mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu. (250 000).

headline: Kanzuru yeChitungwiza Yozivisa Vane Zvivakwa Zvisiri Pamutemo Kuti Vaputse Zvivakwa Izvi
text: Kanzuru yeChitungwiza nhasi yapa vese vakavaka zvisiri pamutemo panzvimbo yemabhizimisi yeTown Centre kuti vaputse zvivakwa zvavo mukati memaawa makumi mana nemasere ari kutevera ichiti kana vakasaita izvi, kanzuru ichaputsa zvivakwa izvi yega. Muchiviso kuvagari, kanzuru yeChitungwiza yati vakavaka vasina mvumo yekanzuru vanofanira kuputsa zvivakwa izvi zvisinei kuti ndivo varidzi venzvimbo here kana kuti kwete. Kanzuru inoti ichashandisa mutemo weRegional, Town and Country Planning Act, zvikamu 32 ne35 kuputsa zvivakwa izvi. Mutaururi wekanzuru yeChitungwiza, VaLovemore Meya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kanzuru inotarisira kuvandudza nzvimbo yeTown Centre ndosaka vari kubvisa vanhu vakavaka zvisiri pamutemo. VaMeya vatiwo vamwe vevanhu vari kuvakava zvisina mvumo vanhu vakatopihwa masitendi asi vari kungotadza kutevedza mutemo. Vati zvivakwa zvichaputswa zvinosanganisira zvitoro, maDurawall pamwe nezvimwe. Asi mukuru weChitungwiza Residents Trust, Muzvare Diana Kuvheya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kanzuru haina mvumo zvekuti magweta avo eZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights atonyorera kukanzuru pamusoro penyaya iyi. Mutauriri weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaObert Masaraure, vashoropodza hurongwa hwekanzuru yeChitungwiza vachiti kanzuru haifaniri kurega vanhu vachivaka pese pese yozomirira kuputsa chete. Vati kanzuru inofanira kugara pasi nevagari vogadzirisa nyaya iyi kwete kuputsa zvivakwa zvavo. Gore rino kanzuru yeChitungwiza yainge yaronga kuputsa dzimba dzese nemisika zvakavakwa zvisiri pamutemo asi ikamiswa kuita izvi nematare edzimhosva ayo akati inofanira kutanga yapa vanhu ava pekugara pamwe nepekutengesera. Tabvunza VaMeya kuti chirongwa chavo hachisi kuzomiswa sezvakaitwa zvimwe here vakati vanopihwa simba nemutemo weRegional, Town and Country Planning Act. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi regurukota rezvematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kubatika. No media source currently available

headline: Madzimai emuZimbabwe Ari kuBotswana Anoti Haachangomirira VanaBaba Mukushavira Mhuri
text: Madzimai akawanda anobva kuZimbabwe ari muBotswana anoti ave kuzviitira mabasa emaoko vachiti kushandira vamwe vanhu kana makambani hakuna pundutso. Aya mazwi emamwe madzimai anobva kuZimbabwe anorarama nekugadzira musoro muguta reFrancistown muBotswana vari kushambadzira vari kudarika nenzira kuti vanogadzira musoro. Mumwe wemadzimai aya ndiMuzvare Nomalanga Sibanda, avo vanoti vakadzidzira kutauro mutauro unotaurwa munyika iyi weSetswana nekukurumidza, kuitira kuti vakwanise kutsvaga vanoda kurukwa musoro. Muzvare Sibanda, avo vanobva kuGokwe, vanoti kugadzira bvudzi kwavo kuri kuita kuti vakawanise kuchengeta vana vavo vakasara kuZimbabwe pamwe nemumwe mudiki wavagere naye kuBotswana kunyangwe hazvo vachigara vachiita hwakitsi nagonzo nemapurisa enyika iyi. Vabvakure havabvumidzwe kuita basa kana bhizinesi rekugadzira musoro muBotswana sezvo hurumende yenyika iyi ichiti ibasa rezvizvarwa zvenyika iyi. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinorarama nekutenga nekutengesa hove, muriwo, shangu nehembe, Amai Florence Manzungu vanoti vakaona kuti kugarira maoko hakuna pundutso vachiti varume vanodawo kubatsirwa Amai Justina Ngwenya, avo vane makore makumi mana nerimwe chete uye vachirima muriwo kumapurazi eGlenn Valley ayo ari pedyo neguta reGaborone, vaudza Studio7 kuti kurima vari kurima asi dambudziko ndekwekutengesera. Amai Tendai Chimombe vakazvarirwa kuBuhera ndookukurira kuMvuma vanoita basa rekusona muguta reFrancistown. Vanoti kushaikwa kwemagwaro akakwana kunoita kuti vasabhadharwe mari inogutsa kwavanoshanda. Kuitira kuti vakwanise kuraramisa mhuri yavo, Amai Chimombe vanotengesawo matemba nedovi zvavanohodha muno senzira yekuwedzera mari yavanowana kubasa. Asi Amai Pauline Marembo vanoti kutsvaga mafuro manyoro uku kwakavaparira sezvo vakabva vaparadzana nemurume ainge asara kumusha. Nzara iri kunzi yapfunya chisero munyika ndiyo iri kutizwa nevanhu vazhinji vachiyenda kunyika dzakapoteredza Zimbabwe dzinosanganisira Botswana, South Africa, Mozambique, Namibia, Zambia nedzimwewo. No media source currently available

headline: VaMphoko Voendesa VaWelshman Ncube kuMatare eDzimhosva
text: Vaimbove mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaPhelekezela Mphoko, vaendesa kudare reHigh Court mumwe wevatungamiri veMDC, VaWelshman Ncube, vachida kubhadharwa mari inopfuura miriyoni imwe chete nemazana mana ezviuru zvemadhora ekuAmerica. Mumagwaro ari kudare reHigh Court ayo awonekwa neStudio7, VaMphoko nemwana wavo, Siqokoqela, vari kuti VaNcube vanofanirwa kuvapa madhora ekuAmerica anopfuura miriyoni nezviuru mazana mana. Vanoti ichi chidimbu chemari inosvika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mapfumbamwe zvemadhora ekuAmerica iyo yavanoti vakapa VaNcube apo vaive gweta revaviri ava panyaya yekambani yavo yeChoppies Enterprises. VaNcube nekambani yavo yeMatonsi-Ncube Law Chambers, vakamiririra mhuri yaVaMphoko panyaya yabata bata Choppies Supermarket. Mugwaro ravakakwidza kuHigh Court neMuvhuro vachimirirwa nemagweta eNcube and Partners, VaMphoko, vanove mumhang’ari wekutanga, naSiqokoqela, anove mumhang’ari wechipiri, vanoti muna Ndira wegore rino VaNcube vakatambira mamiriyoni maviri nemazana mapfumbamwe ezviuru zvemadhora ekuAmerica. Mari iyi yaibva kuChoppies Supermarkets ichienda kumhuri yekwaMphoko semubhadharo wemasheya ainzi aive emhuri iyi mukambani iyi. VaMphoko nemwana wavo vanoti VaNcube vakazivisa mhuri yavo kuti vaive vapiwa mari iyi nekambani yeChoppies vachitiwo vakapa ivo VaMphoko nemwana wavo chidimbu chemari iyi kukasara mari inopfuura miriyoni nezviuru mazana mana iyo vari kuda kupiwa. Mugwaro ravo rekuHigh Court VaMphoko vanoti VaNcube havasi kupindura kuchikumbiro chavo chekuti vavape mari yasara, nokudaro vave kukumbira kuti dare rimanikidze VaNcube kuti vavavpe mari iyi. VaMphoko vanotiwo vanoda kuti vapiwe imwe mari pamusoro yakaberekwa panguva iyo mari iyi yanga iri mumaoko aVaNcube, uye kuti VaNcube vave ivo vanobhadhara dare mari yose ine chekuita nenyaya iyi. VaNcube havasati vaisa mudaro gwaro ravo rekupindura mhosva yavari kupomerwa uye dare reHigh Court harisati ratara kuti nyaya iyi ichanzwikwa riinhi. Studio7 yatadza kubata VaNcube kuti tinzwe divi ravo sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. VaNcube havasati vaswitsa magwaro avo kudare repamusoro. No media source currently available

headline: Kukwidzwa kweMafuta eKufambisa Kworwadza Vagari muChinhoyi
text: Vagari vemuChinhoyi vanoti havasi kufara nemakwidzirwo ari kuita mari dzekufambisa kuenda kunzvimbo dzakasiyana apo zvitoro zvakawanda zvainge zvakavharwa neSvondo. Mari dzekufambisa dzakamuka dzakakwidzwa nezuro mangawanani zvichitevera kukwidzwa kwakaitwa mari yemafuta edzimotokari nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa neMugovera. Dzendo dzose dzemuChinhoyi dzaisiita dhora rimwechete dzave kuita madhora matatu, mari inonzi nevakawanda yakawandisa. Kubva muChinhoyi kuenda kuHarare munhu aimbobhadhara madhora matanhatu, asi iye zvino kwave kubhadharwa madhora gumi nemashanu. Kubva muChinhoyi kuenda kuChegutu kana kuKaroi kwave kuita madhora gumi nemaviri kubva pamadhora matanhatu. Amai Sarudzai Patana vanoti madhora matanhatu pamunhu kuenda kubasa ivo nemurume wavo nemwana wavo anoenda kuchikoro nekombi yakawandisa. Mumwe mudzidzisi, VaItai Mutapa, avo vanoti vainge vave kuenda kubasa kaviri pasvondo, vanoti nhasi havaende kubasa sezvo vasina mari yekufambisa. VaMutapa vanoti pavaenda kunotenga zvekudya zvitoro zvanga zvakavhara zvavapa fungidziro yekuti vezvitoro vari kuda kukwidza mitengo yezvinhu kubva nhasi mangwanani. Asi VaClifford Matambo, avo vanotengesa zvekudya, vanoti mitengo inofanirwa kukwira sezvo mari yekuunza zvinhu zvavanotengesa zvave kuvadhurira nekuda kwemitengo yemafuta yakakwidzwa. Mumwewo mugari wemuChinhoyi anoda kudanwa nezita rekuti Nimrod anoti zvinonyadzisa kuti mutungamiri wenyika VaMnangagwa anozivisa kukwira kwemafuta gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto riripo. Mutungamiri wenyika VaMnangagwa vakazivisa kuti dhiziri rave kutengwa nemadhora matatu nemasendi gumi nerimwe ukuwo peturu yave kuita madhora matatu nemasenzi makumi matatu. Kunyange mafuta edzimotokari akakwidzwa achiri kushaikwa munyika.

headline: Vanhu Makumi Maviri neVaviri Vanowanikwa Vaine Chirwere cneCovid-19 muNyika
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neChitatu kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwakakwira kusvika pazviuru zvinomwe nemazana mashanu ane makumi mapfumbabwe nemasere, kana kuti 7 598 mushure mekunge vanhu makumi maviri nevaviri kana kuti 22, vawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi. Pavanhu ava vanhu makumi maviri nemumwe kana kuti 21 vagara vari munyika, mumwe chete ari akadzoka munyika kubva kuSouth Africa. Hapana munhu akshaya nechirwere ichi izvo zvakaita kuti vanhu vafa varambe vari pamazana maviri nemakumi maviri nevana, kana kuti 224. Vanhu vakanga vapona kubva kuCovid-19 kusvika neChitatu vanonzi vakanga vasvika pazviuru zvishanu nemazana masere ane makumi maviri nevatatu, kana kuti 5 823. Izvi zvakasiya vanhu chiuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi mashanu nemumwe, kana kuti 1 551 vachiri kurwara nechirwere ichi. Pasi rose vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemapfumbamwe nezviuru mazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvisere kana kuti 29 398 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi, icho chaurayawo vanhu vadarika zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matata zvine mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 930 900.

headline: Varairidzi Voita Mumwe Musangano neSvondo neHurumende
text: Hurumende iri kusangana zvakare neSvondo nemasangano evarairidzi pachitsvagwa nzira dzekuti varairidzi vadzokere kumabasa. Musangano uyu unotevera musangano wechimbi chimbi wakaitwa neChishanu manheru pakati pemasangano evarairidzi nehurumende, asi ukasabuda nechinhu chakati tsvikiti. Varairidzi vakatanga kuratidzira musi waKukadzi 5, 2019 mushure mekunge vazivisa hurumende mukati menguva yakatarwa nemitemo kuzivisa mushandirwi nezvekuramwa mabasa. Musangano wakaitwa Chishanu manheru unonzi wakapindwa negurukota rezvedzidzo yepasi, VaPaul Mavima, pamwe nevamiriri vePublic Service Commission. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata VaMavima, kuti tinzwe divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi mutungamiri we Progressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kuona kuti yaruretsira hupenyu hwevarairidzi sezvo vari kutambura. VaZhou vanoti pane zvimwe zvinofanirwa kuitwa nevarairidzi zvisingade mari zvakaita sekuwanira vadzidzisi masitendi ekuvaka dzimba dzavo, uye kuti vana vevadzidzisi vasabhadhariswe mari dzedzidzo muzvikoro zvehurumende. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, Vanosaina Bhiri Richaita Kuti Vanhu Vapiwe Rubatsiro Munguva yeCovid-19
text: Apo zvinhu zvanga zvoratida sekunge mamwe mapazi ehurumende yeAmerica achambovhara kutanga neChipiri nekuda kwekusavepo kwemari yekushandisa, mutungamiri wenyika iyi, VaDonald Trump, neSvondo manheru vakasaina bhiri rinobvumidza kuvepo kwemari $2.3 trillion yekubatsira mapazi aya. Pmari yosei iyi, mazana mapfumbamwe emabhiriyoni emadhora, kana kuti $900 billion, ichabatsira vanhu munguva ino yecoronavirus, kuchiti imwe inoita $1.4 trillion ichashandiswa nemapazi ehurumende kusvika muna Gunyana wegore rinouya. Kunyange hazvo VaTrump vakasaina bhiri iri, vari kugunun’una zvikuru vachiti mari iri kupiwa vanhu kuti vabatsirikane munguva ino ye coronavirus ishoma zvikuru mushure mekunge matare eparamende nekongiresi apasisa bhiri iri svondo rapera. VaTrump vakati vakasaina bhiri iri sedanho rekudzora rubatsiro rwakanga rwuchipiwa vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi nemana vakanga varasikirwa nerubatsiro rwunipowa vasingashande pamwe nemhuri dzakavhiringwa nedenda reCovid-19, uyewo kuitira kupa mukana kune makambani ari kutatarika. Munhu mumwe nemumwe ari kutarisirwa kuwana mari inoita madhora mazana matanhatu kana kuti US$600.00 yekubatsirikana nayo munguva ino ye coronavirus, asi VaTrump vanoti munhu oga oga aifanirwa kupiwa madhora zviuru zviviri zvemadhora. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri kuSouth Carolina muno muAmerica, VaPromise Sande, vanoti zvakaitwa naVaTrump zvakanaka chose sezvo zvichibatsira hurumende pamwe nevanhu vari kutambura. "Zvinhu zvanga zvakatarisirwa uye kusaina kwavo kuchabatsira zvikuru vanhu vemuAmerica," VaSande vanodaro. Vanoti veruzhinji vanogona kutanga kutowana mari idzi mukupera kwemasvondo maviri. No media source currently available

headline: Mbatya Tsaru Dzorambidzwa Kupinda Munyika
text: Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamassa, vaparura hurongwa hwavo hwekuongorora mashandiro ari kuita hupfumi kana kuti mid term fiscal policy review. No media source currently available Mukuparura chirongwa ichi, VaChinamasa vanoti vatora matanho akawanda akanangana nekusimudzira maindasitiri nekuwezdera mari yehurumende. Vchitura muparamende hurongwa hwepakati pegore hwemafambisirwo emari, VaChimanasa vati kunyange hazvo paine mitero yakakura pashangu nembatya tsaru, zvinhu zvange zviri kuramba zvichipinzwa munyika uye zvava kukanganisa maindasitiri emuno. Vati kutanga mwedzi unouya, zvinhu izvi zvinenge zvisisabvumidzwe kupinda munyika, uye zvikabatwa zvichatorwa nekuparadzwa. Vatiwo zvinhu zvakaita semafuta nesipo hazvichabvumidzwe kupinda munyika, sezvo nyika iri kuzvigadzira. Vati mbatya zhinji idzi dzinounza zvirwere munyika. VaChinamasa vawedzera mitero yemotokari tsaru dzinotengwa kunze kwenyika kana kuti surtax charge kubva pazvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana kusvika pazvikamu makumi matatu nezvishanu kubva muzana. Mari iyi inobhadharwa pamusoro peimwe yeduty inove zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana VaChinamasa vatiwo hurumende iri ichasandura mutemo kuti machechi anoita mabasa ekutsvaga mari kana kuti profit abhadhare mutero kana kuti tax. Asi vati mari yechegumi nezvipo haisi kuzobhadhariswa mutero. VaChinamasa vatiwo hurumende iri kushishakana nenyaya yekuti mari zhinji yairi kuwana iri kuenda mukubhadhara vashandi nekudaro dare remakurukota rakatora danho rekuti mari inoenda kuvashandi inofanira kuderedzwa kubva pazvikamu makumi masere nezvitatu kubva muzana kusvika pazvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana. Vanoti izvi zvinoita kuti kurumende iwane mari yekushandisa mumabasa ebudiriro. Vaenderera mberi vachiti mutongo wakapihwa nedare repamusoro reSupreme Court unopa vashandirwi samba rekudzinga vashandi mushure mekuvapa chiziviso chemwedzi mutatu chete wakauya panguva iyo hurumende yange iri kuronga kuvandudza mitemo yevashandi kuti inakire vashandi nevashandirwi. Vati kuvandudzwa kwemutemo wevashandi kunofanira kuitwa pachitarisirwa kuti unofanira kupa mukana wekuti makambani akawanise kushanda zvakanaka vachiti pari zvino makambani akawanda ane zvikwereti zvemari yevashandi izvo zvinoatadzisa kuita basa nemazvo. Vapa semuenzaniso kambani yeZiscosteel iyo vati kunyange yakavhara makore akati kuti apfuura, mari dzevashandi dziri kuramba dzichiwedzera. Vatiwo hupfumi hwenyika hausi kuita zvakanaka uye izvi zviri kukonzerwa nekuti mabasa ekurima haasi kufamba zvakanaka uyewo maindasitiri haasikuita zvakanaka sezvo zvichidhura kuita bhizimisi munyika nekuda kwekudhura kwemari, nekudhura kwezvinhu zvakaita semagetsi nemvura. VaChinamasa vatiwo nekuda kwekusashanda zvakanaka kwehupfumi, hurumende yave kutarisira kuwana $3.6 billion gore rino kubva pane $3.9 billion yavange vachitarisira. VaChinamasa vati hurumende pamwe nevanhu vanofanira kuchinja maitiro avo kuitira kuti hupfumi hwenyika hubudirire. Mukuru wesangano rinomirira vemabhizimisi reZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, VaDavison Norupiri, vanoti matanho atorwa naVaChinamasa ekuchengetedza maindasitiri emuno akanaka chose uye vanoatsgira. Vatiwo zvakakosha kuti hurumende ideredze mari inoenda kuvashandi vachiti izvi zvinoipa mukana wekuita zvirongwa zvebudiriro. Mukuru weConferderation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaBusisa Moyo, vatiwo vanotsigirawo matanho atorwa naVaChinamasa. Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, VaJohn Mangudya, pamwe nemutungamiri weMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vanga vari muparamende vachinzwa VaChinamasa vachitaura

headline: Hurumende Inoti Yabvisa Zvipingaidzo Zvanga Zvichikonzera Mitsetse Mirefu Munzvimbo Dziri Kubayiwa Vanhu Nhomba dzeCovid-19
text: Hurumende inoti vakoti muzvipatara nemakirinika vanofanirwa kunge vachiita basa rebaya vanhu nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 chete kwete kunyora makhadhi nekuvabya sezvavari kuita pari zvino ichiti ndizvo zviri kupa kuti mitsetse irambe yakareba munzvimbo idzi. Vachitaura mushure mekushanyira mamwe makirinika ekanzuru yeHarare ari kubaya nhomba dzeCovid-19 mumisha yeBudiriro neMufakose vaine mumiriri weUnicef muZImbabwe, Dr Tajudeen Oyewale, mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, Dr John Mangwiro, vati vave kupedza dambudziko iri nekupinza vana bharani vachaita basa rekunyora makadhi chete kuitira kuti vakoti vaite basa rekubaya chete. Vati kufamba kwavaita mumakirinika nhasi kwavaratidza kuti basa rekubaya vanhu harisi kafamba sezvinotaririsirwa nekuti vakoti, avo vanotove vashoma, vanopedza nguva vachinyora makadhi pachinhambo chekubaya vanhu. VaMangwiro vatiwo munhu wese anenge aenda pakirinika kana chipatara chipi zvacho anofanira kubaiwa nhomba yaanoda kwete kuudzwa kuti tiri kubaya nhomba yekutanga kana yepiri chete sezviri kuitika pane dzimwe nzvimbo dziri kubaiwa vanhu. Vati nhomba dzirimo munyika nekudaro vanhu ngavabaiwe. Dr Oyewale vati vaona kuti pane gwanza rinoda kuvharwa kutira kuti vakoti vaite basa rekubaya vanhu chete uye vatiwo vanhu vemunharaunda vanofanira kubatsira vakoti kuti vabaiwe nekukasika. Mukuru wezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Dr Prosper Chonzi, vati kunyange hazvo paine matambudziko pano nepapo, huwandu hwevanhu vari kubaiwa nhomba mumakirinika avo huri kukwira zvekuti kiririnika inobaya vanhu vashoma inobaya vanhu vanodarika zana nemakumi mashanu uye dzimwe dzave kubaya vanhu vanodarika mazana matatu pazuva. Asi vagari vemuBudiriro neMufakose vati nzvimbo dzinobairwa vanhu dzinofanirwa kuwedzerwa sezvo dziri shoma. Amai Yvone Katiyo Studio7 vatiwo vakoti vepaMufakose Family Health Care vashoma izvi zviri kupa kuti vawandirwe nevanhu. Mumwe mudzimai ati anonzi Mai Ticha audza Studio7 kuti kuti vangadai vakabaiwa nhomba yepiri musi wa11 Nyamavhuvhu asi izvi zviri kutadza kuitika nekuti vanhu vari kuda kubaiwa vawandisa. Vanhu munzvimbo zhinji munyika vave kuvata pamitsetse yekubaiwa nhomba dzeCovid-19 sezvo makambani akawanda nehurumende vave kuti vasina kubaiwa vave kunzi vasaenda kumabasa kana kurambidzwa kuita zvinhu zvakaita sekushandisa mabhazi ehurumende. Zimbabwe inoti ine hurongwa kwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekudzvirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Nezuro vanhu mazana mashanu negumi nevana vakabatwa neCovid-19, uye gumi nevasere vakafa nedenda iri. Kusvika nezuro vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga vainge vava mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru zana nemakumi mana nezvishanu nemazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nevanomwe (2 145 537, ukuwo vanhu vainge vabaiwa nhomba yepiri vanga vava miriyoni nezviuru mazana matatu nezvina nemazana masere nevaviri (1 304 802.) Vanhu vafa denda iri vave zviuru zvina nezana nemakumi mashanu nevatanhatu (4 156). No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yobatanidzwa neSerbia Panyika Dziri Kutyora Kodzero dzeVanhu Zvakanyanya
text: Rimwe sangano remubatanidzwa wemasangano akazvimirira oga pasi rose reCivicus rinoti apo Zimbabwe yatarisana nesarudzo dzegore ronouya, munyika maberekera ingwe nekuda kwekumbunyikidzwa kwekodzero dzenhengo dzemapato anopikisa hurumende uye masangano akazvimirira oga. Zimbabwe yaiswa munyika dzinonzi dzinoda kutarisiswa zvakanyanya dzinosanganisirawo Sri Lanka, Guatemala, Guinea neSerbia. Sangano iri riri kupomera mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa mhosva yekushandisa mitemo yakaita sewekuvandudza mashandiro emasangano akazvimirira oga kana kuti Private Voluntary Organization Bill kumbunyikidza vemasagano akazvimirira oga uye kuda kuvhara mamwe. Asi gurukota rezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi vakaudza Studio 7 kuti mutemo uyu hauna kuipa sezviri kutaurwa. Vakati unobatsirawo kuti vemasangano akazvimiririra oga vasashandiswe nevanopfurikidza mwero kufambisa mari dzavo. No media source currently available VaMnangagwa vachinyora mubepanhau reSunday Mail vakapomera masangano akazvimirira oga mhosva yekushanda nevekunze kuda kupiddugura hurumende yavo. Vakati hapana kudududza pakuvandudza mutemo uyu. Asi mutauriri wemubatanidzwa wemasangano akazvimirira munyika weCrisis n Zimbabwe Coalition VaObert Masaraure vati vanotenderana neCIVICUS. No media source currently available Mavhiki maviri adarika, hurumende yeAmerica yakatemera zvirango mumwe mukuru muZimbabwe Republic Deputy Commissioner-General Stephen Mutamba zvirango vachivapomea mhosva yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu nekumbunyikidza vanopikisa. VaMutamba vakabva vabatana nevaive gurukota revasori vakazodzingwa basa VaOwen Mudha Ncube uye vaive mukuru wemauto Brigadier General Anseleem Sanyatwe kutemerwa zvirango neAmerica. Hurumende iri kuti hayo panyaya yekutyora kodzero dzevanhu iri kuzorwa mafuta enguruve yaisina kudya uye mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakakurudzira kumusangano kuUnited Nations kuti zvirango izvi zvibviswe vachiti hazvisi pamutemo.

headline: Vakoti Vakawanda Vari Kubatwa neChirwere cheCovid-19 Vachiita Basa Ravo
text: Sangano revakoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru nekukundikana kwehurumende kupa vashandi vemuzvipatara zvikwanisiro zvekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere cheCovid-19. Izvi zvinotevera kubatwa kwevakoti gumi nevasere nechirwere ichi pachipatara cheUnited Bulawayo Hospitals kana kuti UBH mushure mekurapa mumwe murume ainge aine chirwere ichi. Mwedzi wapera vamwe vakoti gumi nevana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi pachipatara cheMpilo. Vamwe vashandi vemuzvipatara paUBH kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba makumi matanhatu nevasere vakambomanikidzwawo kumbogara kudzimba mushure mekurapa mumwezve murwere weCovid-19. Mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba vakuru reSenior Hospital Doctors Association Dr Aaron Musara, vakaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinhu zvakatonyanya kuipa kuzvipatara zvematunhu zvisina zvekudzivirira vashandi zvakakwana. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mukuru anoona nezvekurwisa chirwere ichi, Dr Agnes Mahomva, sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Mutungamiri musangano reZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnoch Dongo, vati zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka kuvakoti nevamwe vashandi vemuzvipatara. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 munyika hwakwira kusvika pamazana masere nemakumi masere nevashanu, kana kuti 885. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kushushikanawo nekukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munharaunda hwakakwira zvakanyanya neChitatu sezvo pavanhu makumi mapfumbamwe nevasere vakabatwa nechirwere ichi, makumi mana nevasere vakachitapurirwa munharaunda pasina nhoroondo yekubuda kunze kwenyika. Vanhu vapora kubva kuchirwere ichi munyika vave mazana maviri nevatanhatu, kana kuti 206. Vanhu vafa vachiri vapfumbamwe uye vavhenekewa chirwere ichi munyika yose vadarika zviuru makumi masere nezviviri kana kuti 82,000. No media source currently available

headline: VanaChiremba Vanoti Vave Kungorapa Vari Kurwarisa neKushaya Zvikwanisiro
text: Vanachiremba vakuru avo vakaratidzira nemusi weChitatu kuchipatara cheParirenyatwa mabasa vanoti vari kurapa vanhu varikurwarisisa chete sezvo vachiti hurumende iri kutadza kuvapa zvikwanisiro zvekuti vaite basa ravo nemazvo. Zvichakadai, kuramwa mabasa uku kunonzi kwapararirawo kune zvimwe zvipatara zvehurumende muHarare. Vanachiremba vakuru vari kuramwa mabasa vanoti hapana chine musoro chakabuda mumusangano wavakaita negurukota rezvehutano VaObediah Moyo. Mumwe wavanachiremba vakuru vepachipatara cheParirenyatwa, Doctor David Chimuka, vakaudza Studio 7 kuti parizvino vari kungorapa varwere vari kurwarisisa muzvipatara zvehurumende sezvo hurumende iri kutadza kuvapa michina yekushandisa pamwe nemishonga yekurapisa varwere. Mumwe chiremba wepaParirenyatwa, Doctor Shingai Chiurunge, vati vave kungopa varwere mapepa ekuti vakwanise kunotenga mishonga yekuti varapwe kana kuti ma prescription sezvo muzvipatara zvehurumende musina mishonga iyi. Vamwe vanachiremba vekune zvimwe zvipatara zvehurumende zvakaita seHarare General Hospital neChitungwiza General Hospital vakaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti havachakwanisiwo kuita basa ravo sezvo vakatarisana nematambudziko akafanana neanachiremba vekuParirenytwa. Vamwe vanachiremba vepa Harare General Hospital vakati vave kungorapawo varwere vari kurwarisisa sezviri kungoitwa paParirenyatwa vachiti bandiko reIntensive Care Unit, kana kuti ICU, iro ranga rave nemasvondo akati kuti risingashande, ratovhurwa neChina kuitira kuti anachiremba vakuru vakwanise kurapa varwere varikurwarisisa chete. Anachiremba ava vanoti kunyange hazvo vavhura bandiko reICU iri, vari kusangana zvakare nematambudziko ekushayikwa kwemimwe michina pamwe nemishonga yekurapisa varwere. Asi gurukota rezvehutano, VaObediah Moyo, vakaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti bazi ravo riri kuyedza pose parinogona napo kuti ritsvage mari yekutenga mishonga yekupa varwere pamwe nekugadzirisa mimwe michina inonzi yakafa kuti anachiremba vakwanise kuishandisa. VaMoyo vakatiwo dambudziko ravainaro sehurumende nderekushaya mari yekunze yekutenga zvimwe zviri kudiwa nanachiremba ava kunyange hazvo vati vari mubishi rekuedza kuti vataure nagavhuna webhanga guru renyika VaJohn Mangudya kuti bazi rezvehutano rikwanise kupihwa mari yekunze kuti vatenge zviri kudiwa izvi. No media source currently available

headline: Vana Chiremba Vakaramwa Mabasa Vobatirwa Mari neHurumende
text: Sangano rinomirira vana chiremba vemuzvipatara zvehurumende, reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, rinoti ranyorera tsamba kudare remakurukota richinyunyuta nekubatirwa mari kwaitwa nhengo dzesangano iri. No media source currently available Sangano iri rinoti ranyorerawo vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pamwe nehutungamiri mubazi rezvehutano richida kuti patorwe matanho echimbichimbi zvichitevera kubatwa kwemari dzavana chiremba vanonzi vakapinda mukuramwa mabasa. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, Dr Fortune Nyamande, vanoti vanyorerawo zvakare kudare redzimhosva repamusoro vachida kuti rinzwe nyaya yavo yekubatwa kwemari dzemihoro iyi nechimbichimbi. VaNyamande vanoti danho iri richatoita kuti vanachiremba vatadze kuenda kumabasa sezvo vazotambiriswa mari shoma shoma kwazvo. Hurumende yakazivisa svondo rino kuti yaizobata mari inoita $264.48 kwemwedzi miviri kuna vanachiremba vakapinda mukuramwa mabasa kwemasvondo matatu. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, Dr Paul Chimedza, vakaudza Studio7 kuti zviri pamutemo kuti munhu anenge aramwa basa haafanirwe kutambiriswa mari yemazuva aanga asiri pabasa. Kuratidzira kwakaitwa navana chiremba kwakavhiringidza kufamba kwemabasa muzvipatara zvehurumende. Dr Nyamande vanoti vaziva nezvekubatirwa mari idzi pavaenda kumabhanga kwavo.

headline: Hurumende Yoparura Homwe yeMari Inosvika Mamiriyoni Gumi eMadhora
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvevechidiki nekuendeswa kwehupfumi kuvatema, VaPatrick Zhuwawo, nemusi weChitatu vakaparura muHarare homwe yemari inosvika mamiriyoni gumi emadhora yekubatsira vechidiki kuti vavambe mabhizimisi. Homwe yakadai yakambokonzera mutauro wakanyanya munguva yapfuura apo vechidiki vakapihwa zvikwereti zvikuru nebhanga reCABS vakatadza kubhadhara mari yacho. Vaive mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvechidiki muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, VaTongai Matutu, vakati vanhu zvikamu makumi mapfumbamwe nezvishanu kubva muzana vakawana mari iyi vaive vechidiki kubva kubato reZanu-PF. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti nyaya yemabasa muZimbabwe iri kunetsa zvakanyanya zvekuti panofungidzirwa kuti vanhu vanopfuura zvikamu makumi masere kubva muzana havana mabasa. Asi hurumende inoti huwandu hwevanhu vasina mabasa hunopfuura zvishoma zvikamu gumi kubva muzana. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Votambira Chibvumirano Pakufamba kweZvitima Pakati peZimbabwe neBotswana
text: Zvizvarwa zvemuZimbabwe neBotswana zviri kutambira nemufaro chubvumirano chakanyoreranwa pakati penyika mbiri idzi chekudyidzana panyaya dzezvitima chinonzi “Through Working Agreement. Chibvumirano ichi chakanyoreranwa neMuvhuro pakati peNational Railways of Zimbabwe kana kuti NRZ neBotswana Railways chichaona zvitima chekuBotswana neZimbabwe zvichidarika miganhu yenyika mbiri idzi. Vanorarama nekutenga muBotswana vachinotengesa kuZimbabwe, Muzvare Primrose Mandeya vanoti havazivi kuti NRZ yavabvirepi sezvo vange vachirasikirwa nemari yakawanda mukuita basa ravo nenyaya yemabhazi nemichovha. Nekuda kwechibvumirano ichi, zvitima kubva kumakambani aya zvinenge zvokwanisa kusvika kuFrancistown nekuBulawayo. Chibvumirano ichi chisati chaitwa, zvitima zvenyika mbiri dzi zvaigumira kuBotswana paPlumtree. Pakusainwa kwechibvumirano ichi, mukuru weNRZ Amai Respina Zinyanduko vakati zvainge zvotora mazuva mana kana mashanu kuti zvinhu zvizotakurwa kubva paPlumtreekupinda muZimbabwe sezvo chitima cheNRZ chisingafambe mazuva ose. Izvi zvinotsinhirwa nemukuru weBotwana Railways Amai Chelesile Malele. Asi kunyangwe vamwe vari kufara, VaAbraham Mangena, avo vanoita zvekutakurira vanhu zvinhu kubva muguta reFrancistown kuenda kunzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana muZimbabwe vanoti hurongwa uhu huchaita kuti vasare vasisina basa. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzataura neStudio 7 dzinoti chibvumirano ichi chichabatsira Botswana zvakanyanya sezvo NRZ isina zvitima zvakakwana uye iine zvikwereti zvakawanda zvairi kutadza kubhadhara. NRZ yamboyedz kuita zvibvumirano nemakambani akaita seTransnet yekuSouth Africa nezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika pasi peDiaspora Infrastructure Development Group asi zvakakona n’anga murapwa achida. Zimbabwe yakambotiwo iri kutaura neRussia kuti ipihwe zvitima asi hapana chakabuda.

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoparura Hwaro Huchashandiswa Mukurwisa Covid-19
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaparura hurongwa huchatevedzerwa nenyika pakurwisa chirwere cheCoronavirus panguva iyo masangano evadzidzisi ari kukurudzira kuti zvikoro zvose zvivharwe. Vachiparura hurongwa uhwu kuState House uhwo huri kudaidzwa kuti National Covid-19 Preparedness and Response Plan, VaMnangagwa vati ibasa remunhu wese ari munyika kuti aone kuti paagere pakashambidzika kuitira kuti chirwere che Coronavirus chisarambe chichitapuriranwa kana chichinge chazopinda munyika. Gurukota rezvehutano, VaObediah Moyo, vatiwo vari kufara kuti chirwere ichi hachisati chapinda muZimbabwe vachiti izvi hazvifanire kuita kuti Zimbabwe irare nezamu mukanwa. Mumiriri weWorld Health Organization muZimbabwe, VaAlex Gasasira, vatiwo chirwere che Coronavirus chiri kupararira nekukasika zvekuti chavakutoda mushandira pamwe pakati pehurumende dzepasi rose pamwe neveruzhinji. Kunyange hazvo VaMnangagwa vakati vanhu vanodarika zana vasaungane seimwe yenzira dzekudzikisa mukana wekuti vanhu vasatapurirane chirwere ichi, mamwe masangano evarairidzi anoti zvikoro zvinofanira kuvharwawo. Muaturiri wesangano revadzidzisi vekumaruwa reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaNation Mudzitirwa, vaudza Studio7 kuti sangano ravo riri kukurudzira kuti zvikoro zvose munyika zvivharwe mangwana chaiye vachiti muzvikoro zvizhinji hamuna mvura zvinowedzera mikana yekuti chirwere che Coronavirus chitapuriranwe. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemunyori musangano reZimbabwe Teachers Association, VaTapson Nganunu Sibanda, avo vaudza Studio 7 parunhare vari kuBulawayo kuti vana vechikoro vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vanogona kunotapurira vamwe kudzimba chirwere ichi chopararira. Mutungamiri wesangano reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaTakavafira Zhou, vati zvikoro zvikasavharwa mangwana vachakurudzira nhengo dzesangano ravo kuti dzisaende kubasa kubva neMuvhuro. Mumwe mubereki ane vana vaviri vanodzidza pane chimwe chikoro chiri muHarare, Amai Blantina Mukwesha, vati vave kutyirawo hupenyu hwevana vavo izvo zviri kupa kuti vatsigire zviri kutaurwa nemasangano evarairidzi. Gurukota rezvedzidzo, VaCain Mathema, vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti havataure neStudio7 vachiti havadi kubvunzwa zvinhu zvisina musoro. Asi VaMnangagwa vakaudza vatori venhau kuState House neChipiri svondo rino kuti zvikoro zvicharamba zvakavhurwa sezvo kwangosara mavhiki matatu chete kuti zvivharwe panopera kotoro yekutanga yegore rino. Sangano reWorld Health Organization rinoti Coronavirus yauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvisere uye vanhu vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi vanodarika mazana maviri nemakumi maviri ezviuru. No media source currently available

headline: Amai Mugabe Voshorwa Zvichitevera Kuzvidza Kwavo VaMnangagwa
text: Vaimbove nhengo yedare reparamende yeZanu PF uye vari mukuru wesangano reYouth Advocacy and Reform Democracy, VaTemba Mliswa, vashora zvikuru mudzimai wemutungumiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, avo vari kufamba vachituka nekushoropodza vamwe vakuru vakuru muhurumende. Vaimbove nhengo yedare reparamende yeZanu PF uye vari mukuru wesangano reYouth Advocacy and Reform Democracy, VaTemba Mliswa, vashora zvikuru mudzimai wemutungumiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, avo vari kufamba vachituka nekushoropodza vamwe vakuru vakuru muhurumende. Mumwe wevanhu vari kushorwa naAmai Mugabe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. VaMliswa vataura mashoko aya pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau neMuvhuro. No media source currently available Musangano uyu waitwa apo panguva iyo vanonongorora zvematongerwo enyika nevanhuwo zvavo vari kushorawo Amai Mugabe vachiti vanofanira kusiyana netsika yavo yekutuka makurukota ehurumende. VaMliswa vati VaMnangagwa nemamwe makurukota ehurumende havachina chimiro nekuda kwetukwa pamisangano iri kuitwa naAmai Mugabe. Pamusangano wakaitwa kuChiweshe, Amai Mugabe vakashoropodza VaMnangagwa vakatukawo mamwe makurukota ehurumende nezvinonyadzisira. VaMliswa vati izvi hazvina kunaka uye hazvitarisirwe kubva kumudzimai wemutungamiriri wenyika. Vati zvichitevera kudzingwa kwevaimbova mutevedzeri waVaMugabe mubato nemuhurumende, Amai Joice Mujuru, pamwe nezviri kuitwa VaMnangagwa pari zvino, zviri pachena kuti Amai Mugabe vave kuda chigaro chekutungamira nyika uye vanoda kudzinga mubato vese avo vanogona kuvakanganisa kutora chigaro ichi. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika zvakare vari mukuru weMedia Centre, VaEnerst Mudzengi, vanoti hapana chichatadzisa Amai Mugabe kutora chigaro ichi kana murume wavo achida. Vamwewo vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, VaFortune Gwaze, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo Amai Mugabe vakamboti havadi kutonga, pamusangano wekuChiweshe wakaitwa nemusi weChishanu vakatobuda pachena kuti ndivo vave panyanga. Pamusangano wekare mutevedzeri wemutungungamiriri wenyika, VaPhelekezela Mphoko, vakatiwo hazvisi pachena kuti mukaranga ndiye achatora chigaro chemutungamiriri wenyika kana VaMugabe vasisipo uye veruzhinji vashora mashoko aya. Mumwe wevasina kufara nemashoko ava ndiva Malvern Mukundu vemauHarare. Mukuru wesangano rinopikisa reDemocratic Party, VaWurayayi Zembe, vashorawo mashoko aya vakati haatarisirwi kubva kumunhu mukuru akaita saVaMphoko. Mukuru wesangano ranachipangamazano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, VaPedzisayi Ruhanya, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mashoko aVaMphoko akashata chose uye hazvina kunaka kuti vapinze nyaya dzemarudzi muhondo dzavo dziri muZanu PF. Vatiwo zvakataura VaMphoko zvinotaridza pachena mafungiro ari mubato reZanu PF. VaMphoko ndivozve vanoona nezvebazi rekuyananisa vanhu pamwe nekuregererena. VaRuhanya vati mashoko aVaMphoko haenderani nebasa ravotarisirwa kunge vachiita muhurumende.

headline: VaMnangagwa Vosvika kuBotswana Kunonyorerana Zvibvumirano zveKudyidzana naVaMosisi
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vasvika kuBotswana kumusangano wekudyidzana unoitwa mukati memakore maviri nenyika iyi kana kuti Bi-National Commission. VaMnangagwa vaenda nemakurukota anosanganisira rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko amai monica mutsvangwa uye rezvehutano dr obadiah moyo. Munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana vati nhaurirano dzakatanga nemusi weChipiri uye mangwana VaMnangagwa nemumwe wavo VaMokgweetsi Masisi vachava zvapupu pakunyoreranwa kwezvibvumirano zvatenderanwa. Zvibvumirano zviri munyaya dzezvekutengeserana, dzidzo uye nyaya dzezvehutano. No media source currently available

headline: Vakawanda Votyira Kudeuka kweRopa Munyika
text: Vanhu vakawanda vanoti vave kutyira kuti munyika munogona kudeuka ropa kana mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakasagadzirisa nyaya yekunetsana kunotyisa kuri kuitika mubato reZanu-PF. NeChina mudzimai waVaMugabe, Amai Grace Mugabe, vakati murume wavo anofanira kubuda pachena kuti ndiyani achatora chigaro chake kuitira kuti kurwisana kunotyisa kwoitika mubato iri kumire. VaMugabe mbune vakatendawo kuti mubato mavo mune kunetsana kunotyisa uye vakati mauto ave kunyanya kupindira mukurwisana kuri mubato ravo. Mumwe ari kutevera zviri kuitika muZanu PF, VaWhisper Makuni, vanoti kunetsana kuri muZanu-PF kunogona kukonzera kusagadzikana kwenyika uye vashora VaMugabe nekusagadzirisa nyaya dziri munyika. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nechimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri kuSouth Africa, VaNhamo Goronga. VaJoseph Dhliwayo, avo vari kuSouth Africa zvekare, vanotiwo VaMugabe ndivo vakazvisikira moto muziso nekugarisa pachigaro vachirambidza vanhu kutaura nezvemunhu achatora chigaro chavo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachidzidzisa paLummumbashi University kuZambia, VaShakespera Hamauswa, vanobumawo kuti nyika yananga kuna taisireva. Mubato reZanu-PF mune kunetsana kukuru pakati pezvikwata zviri kuzivikanwa nerekuti Team Lacoste, iyo inonzi inotungamirwa nemumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, uye Generation 40, iyo inonzi yave kuda kuti gurukota rinoona nezvemauto, VaSydney Sekeramai, vatore chigaro chaVaMugabe. Vaimbova mutauriri weZanu-PF, VaRugare Gumbo, vanoti VaMugabe vagara vachifarira havo VaSekeramai. Vamwe veTeam Lacoste vataura neStudio 7 vati mubato ravo matanga kurwisana kunotyisa pakati pemaKaranga ayo anonzi ari kuti Mazezuru neMaNdebele vabatana kuti Makaranga asatore hutungamiri. Asi nyanzvi gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaDewa Mavhinga, varamba mashoko aya. VaMavhinga vashorawo VaMugabe nekuregerera mauto achipindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachiti zvapa kuti muve nekusagadzikana munyika. Vamwe muZanu-PF vanonzi vari kukurudzira VaMugabe kuti vamise basa mukuru wemauto,General Constantino Chiwenga, nevamwe vakuru vemauto vari kupomerwa mhosva yekupindira mune zvematongerwo enyika. VaGumbo vatiwo nyaya yekutadza kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi nekutukana iri kupa kuti zvinhu zvirambe zvakaita manyama amire nerongo munyika, izvo zvave kukonzera kusagadzikana. Kunyange hazvo vakawanda vari kuti VaMugabe vadome achatora chigaro chavo, mutevedzeri wemunyori wezvemutemo mubato iri, VaMunyaradzi Paul Mangwana, vanoti vatungamira vanosarudzwa nevanhu pakongiresi. Bato reZanu-PF rakatozivisa gore rapera kuti VaMugabe ndivo vachakwikwidza musarudzo dzegore rinouya vakamirira Zanu-PF. Vakadzingwa muZanu PF uye vari mutauriri weZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association, VaDouglas Mahiya, vanoti VaMugabe vanofanirwa kuziva kuti nyika ndeye vanhu vemuZimbabwe, kwete yaivo VaMugabe nemudzimai wavo chete.  Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti makore avo uye hutano hwavo zvinopa kuti vakawanda vasave nekugadzikana. VaMugabe vakapinda musarudzo idzi vanenge vave nemakore makumi mapfumbamwe nemana. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vashanu Vopora Kubva kuCoronavirus muBulawayo
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muZimbabwe hwasvika pamakumi mashanu nevatanhatu kuti 56. Asi vamwe vanhu vashanu kuBulawayo vapora kubva kuhutachiona uhu zvichireva kuti munyika yose vanhu makumi maviri nevatu vapora. Vanhu vafa vachiri vana. Vanhu vari kurwara makumi maviri nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 29. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzeezvehutano dziri kuyambira kuti kushaikwa kwezvikwanisiro zvekuvheneka vanhu vane chirwere ichi kana kuti matest kits kunoreva kuti vanhu vanoona kunge vari kuparadzira chirwere ichi vasingazive nekuti kue vamwe vanhu vanogona kunge vasingakosore kana kupisa muviri asi vachitapurira chirwere. Gurukuta rinoona nezvehutano Doctor Obadiah Moyo vakatenda kuti nyika yave kupererwa nezvekuvheneka vanhu. Vamwe vakabva kunze kwenyika vachimbochengetwa munzvimbo dzakasiyana siyana vanoti vave kunzi vabhadhare mari dzinodarika madhora makumi matanhatu nemashanu ekuAmerica kuti vavhenekwe hutachiona uhu. Asi munyori mukuru mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vanyora padandemutande ravo reTwitter kuti hurumende haibhadharose vanhu kunze kwekunga huri hurongwa hwavo vega. Mukuru musangano reCommunity Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike vanoti danho rehurumende rekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba pasina guva yakatarwa harisi kushanda. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zvuru zana kana kuti 100 000 vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muAfrica uye vashaya vadarika zvuru zvitatu nemazana maviri anemakumi mana nevatanhatu kana kuti 3.246. Vapora vanodarika zvuru zvina nezviviri kana kuti 42, 000 Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni mashanu nezvuru mazana matatu kana kuti 5, 3 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuamerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezvuru mazana matanhatu kana kuti 1,6 million. Vanhu vafa muAmerica vave kuda kusvika pazvuru zana kana kuti 100 000. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika zvuru mazana matatu 300 000 asi vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni maviri kana kuti 2 million. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangawa Votarisirwa Kutaura kuMusangano weUnited Nations neChina Manheru
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa neChitatu vakabatana nevatungamiri vedzimwe nyika pakuvhura zviri pamutemo musangano wechimakumi manomwe nemashanu kana kuti 75th Session weUnited Nations. Musangano uyu uri kupera nemusi weMugovera uye VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwa kutaura neChina manheru kuGeneral Assembly. VaMangangwa sevamwe vatungamiri vachataura vachishandisa vhidhiyo vari muHarare. Vatungamiri venyika vakawanda havasi kuenda kumuzinda weUnited Nations kuNew York semakore ose nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Dingindira regore rino rakanangana neremangwana renyika dzose uye sangano reUnited Nations nekubatana mukurwisa denda reCovid-19. Bepanhau reHerald rinoti VaMnangagwa vari kutarisirwa mangwana kukurudzira kubviswa kwezvirango zvavanoti zvakatemerwa nyika neAmerica, sangano reEU nedzimwe nyika. Nyika idzi dzinoti zvirango zvichabviswa kana vamira nyaya dzekutyora kodzero dzevanhu dzavari kupomerwa. NeChipiri pamusangano wekupemberera makore makumi manomwe nemashanu sangano reUnited Nations raumbwa, mutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa vanove sachigaro weAfrica Union VaCyril Ramaphosa vakakurudzirawo kuti zvirango izvi zvibviswe. Sachigaro wekomiti inoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika mudare reparamende vachimirira Makonde, VaKindness Paradza vebato reZanu-PF vanoti zvirango ngazvibviswe sezvo zvauraya hupfumi hwenyika. No media source currently available Asi gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga vanoti chauraya nyika huori kwete zvirango. No media source currently available

headline: VaBarack Obama Voita Nhoroondo neKushanyira Cuba
text: Mutungamiri weAmerica VaBarack Obama nemusi weMuvhuro vakaita musangano nemutungamiri wenyioka yeCuba VaRaul Castro vachitaura nezvekudyidzana kwenyika mbiri idzi. Rwendo rwaVaObama urwu ndirwo rwekutanga rwemutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica mukati memakore makumi mapfumbamwe. America yainge yakatemera Cuba zvirango zvehupfumi kwemakore makumi mashanu nemashanu izvo zvotanga kurerutswa nehurumende yaVaObama. Vachitaura muguta guru reCuba reHavana, mushure memusangano naVaCastro, VaObama vati vari kufara zvikuru nenhaurirano dzoitika pakati penyika mbiri idzi. Asi vatenda kuti pachine kusawirirana panyaya dzehutongo hwejekerere nekodzero dzevanhu. VaCastro vatambira nemufaro danho ratorwa nehurumende yeAmerica yekurerutsa zvinhu panyaya dzekutengeserana. Vatiwo America inofanora kudzora nzvimbo yeGuantanamo Bay iyo inochengeterwa vanopfurikidza mwero neAmerica. VaObama vakatanga vaenda kunoisa maruva pachiumbwa chinorangarira gamba rerusununguko muCuba VaJose Marti pa Plaa of the Revolution. VaObama vakarumbidza zvikuru VaJose Marti nekuzvipira kwavo kusunungura nyika yavo. Murwendo urwu, VaMugabe vari kutarisirwa kuita misangano nevanhu vakawanda muCuba kusanganisa vakuru muhurumende, vechidiki, vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu nevamwe. Asi nemusi weSvondo vamwe vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu veLadies in White vakasungwa nemapurisa mushure mekuratidzira pedyo neParqu Gandhi kana kuti Gandhi Park. Vamwe vavo vanonzi vakazosunungurwa asi mutunganiri wesangano iri Amai Berta Soler vanoti vamwe havasi kuzivikanwa kuti varipi. Gweta Doctor Alex Magaisa vanoti Zimbabwe inokwanisawo kugadzirisa hukama hwayo neAmerica asi zvinoda kuti vatungamiri venyika vazvipire kuvandudza mashandiro avo. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reMadutazvinhu Rochema Kushaya kwaVaJoel Biggie Matiza
text: Sangano rinomirira vatyairi nemakondakita, reZimbabwe Union Of Drivers And Conductors (ZUDAC) rinoti kushaya kwevaimbove gurukota rinoona nezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, VaJoel Biggie Matiza, kwarwadza vanhu vazhinji vanoshanda mune zvekutakurwa kwezvinhu. Mutungamiri weZUDAC, VaFredrick Maguramhinga, vanoti VaMatiza vakange vachishanda zvakanaka nevanhu nemasangano ane chekuita nezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu. Vanoti VaMatiza vaigara vachiita misangano nemasangano avo vachiratidza kuda kunzwisisa mashandiro avo uye vachivabvunzavo nezvemirairo yavaifunga kuti ingabatsira mukufamba zvakanaka kwebazi iri, vachiti VaMatiza vakabatsira sangano ravo zvikuru.
