VaMaguramhinga varumbidzavo vaimbove gurukota reZimbabwe raiona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, avo vakashaya nemusi weChitatu svondo rapera, mazuva maviri VaMatiza vasati vashayawo nechirwere cheCovid-19. VaMaguranhanga vati VaMoyo vakabatsira vatyairi nemakondakita panguva iyo vanhu muSouth Africa vakange vachirwisa vatyairi vekune dzimwe nyika vaishanda muSouth Africa. VaMoyo naVaMatiza vakapihwa ruremekedzo rwehugamba hwenyika uye vose vacharadzikwa mangwana, Chitatu, paHeroes Acre muHarare, pamwe chete nerimwezve gamba, vaParadzai Zimondi. No media source currently available

headline: America Inobudisa Gwaro Rinoshora Kutyorwa kweKodzero dzeVanhu muZimbabwe
text: Bazi re America rionoona nezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, re State Department, rabudisa gwaro pamusoro pekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kwarinoti kuri kuitwa nehurumende yeZimbabwe. Gwaro iri, kana kuti Zimbabwe 2020 Human Rights Report, rine mapeji makumi mana nemapfumbamwe (49), uye rinobva muongororo yakaitwa muna 2020. Bazi re State Department rinoti hurumende mu Zimbabwe inouraya vanhu pamusoro pezvamatongerwo enyika, inotsakatikisa vanhu, kutocha vanhu nekusabata vasungwa zvakanaka. Gwaro iri rinoshoravo majeri emunyika, pamwe chete nekushora mabatirwo anoitwa ngochani mu Zimbabwe. Tatadza kubata vanoona nezvekubudiswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, uye vange vasati vapindura mibvunzo yatavatumira. Asi gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, uye vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kwe Africa, VaDewa Mavhinga, vati hurumende ye Zimbabwe haifanirwi kumirira kunzwa zvinobva kunze kwenyika, vachiti kana hurumende ikaterera pose panochema vana ve Zimbabwe, haizotyori kodzero dzavo nekuti inenge yave kuziva zvisingadiwi nevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Bhajeti reKanzuru yeMasvingo Rinoramba Kutambirwa neVagari Vakawanda
text:
Vagari vemuguta reMasvingo vari kuramba kutambira bhajeti rekanzuru yavo regore rinouya remadhora mabhiriyoni mana vachiti rakakurisa zvikuru uye vagari vazhinji vachatadza kubhadhara mitero nekuda kwekuoma kwakaita hupenyu munyika.

Vachitaura neStudio 7 mushure mekuitwa misangano yekunzwa dzevanhu pabhajeti iri, vagari ava vanoti ivo zvikamu mazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvishanu kubva muzana zviri kuda kukwidzwa mitero zvakakurisa sezvo vanhu vakawanda vachatadza kubhadhara mitero iyi. Mumwe mugari, Amai Beatrice Hamdziripi, vemumusha we Runyararo West, vanoti ivo kukwidzwa kwemitero uku kunomesera vagari vazhinji avo vasiri kuwedzerwa mari kwavanoshanda nekudaro vanozonetseka kubhadara mari idzi kana dzikakwidzwa nekanzuru.

Mumwe mugari, VaHardlife Tangayi wekuHillside, vanoti zvakaoma kuti kanzuru iwedzere mitero nezvikamu zvakadaro panguva iyo ruzhinji rwevagari rwuri kuvharirwa mvura nekutadza kubhadhara mari iri kudiwa izvozvi, nekudaro gore rinouya dhorobha rose rinogona kuzotadza kubhadhara mvura kana mitero iyi ikakwidzwa.

Gore rino vagari vazhinji vari kubhadhara mari yemvura iri pakati pezviuru
zvitatu nezviuru zvitanhatu zvemadhora pamwedzi. Mari iyi ikakwidzwa gore rinouya, vagari vanenge vobhara mari inotangira pazviuru zvisere nemazana masere ane makumi mashanu emadhora kusvika pazviuru gumi nezvinomwe nemazana manomwe emadhora emaRTGS. Meya weguta reMasvingo, VaCollen Maboke, vanoti kanzuru yakatarisa
zvinhu zvakawanda isati yakwidza mitero iyi, zvinosanganisira kukwira
kwemafuta emotokari dzebasa nemitengo yemishonga yekuchenesa mvura iyo inotengwa kunze kwenyika nemari yekunze.

Asi sangano rinomirira vagari reMasvingo United Residents and Rate
Payers Alliance (MURRA) rinoti kunyange zvinhu zvakakwidzwa mitengo semafuta edzimotokari chikamu chekanzuru chakangokurisa uye vagari vazhinji kwavanowana mari haina kukwidzwa nezvikamu zvakadaro. Anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muMURRA, Muzvare Rumbidzai
Magurupira, vanoti kanzuru iri kuda kusiya mugari ari parumananzombe.

Vamwe vagari vanoti zve chinonyanya kuvarwadza ndechekuti
vanokwidzirwa mari asi mvura yacho ichinetsa kuuya mudzimba dzavo. Mvura inouya kwemaawa mashoma shoma makuseni oga oga yobva yaenda voswera vasina mvura izvo zvinozoita kuti vashandise zvibhorani zviri mumawadhi asi panouya mapepa emvura, mitengo inenge yakakwira zvikuru. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumede Yoronga Mutemo Unoomesera Vari Kutengesa Mari paMukoto
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemutemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi vanoti mutemo uri kuda kudzikwa nehurumende kudzivirira kufambiswa kwemari zvechikiribidi kana kuti Money Laundering wakanangana nekuzadzikisa zvisungo zvemitemo yepasi rino inodzivirira mabasa evanopfurikidza mwero. VaZiyambi vanoti vatotanga kunyora bhiri remutemo uyu sezvo mutemo uri kushandiswa parizvino wakadzikwa muna Mbudzi gore rapera uchishanda kwemwedzi mitanhatu chete nekuti ndewechimbi chimbi unoitwa nemutungamiri wenyika dare reparamende risati razeya. Mutemo uyu unonzi Presidential Powers (Temporary Measures) (Amendment of the Money Laundering and Proceeds of Crime Act and Exchange Control Act) Regulations. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemitemo dzinotiwo hurumende inenge iri kudawo kushandisa mutemo uyu kusunga vari kuchinja mari pamukoto zvikuru dhora rekuAmerica nemaRTGS. VaZiyambi vanoti kuvhunduka chati kwatara hunge uine katuruke vakayambira vanotengesa mari pamukoto kuti vachakandwa mutirongo. No media source currently available

headline: Apex Council Inoti iri Kurwisa Kuti Vashandi veHurumende Vawedzerwe Mari
text: Vatungamiri vesangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende, reApex Council vari kutarisirwa Chitatu chesvondo rino kuita musangano nevamiriri vehurumende wekuzeya mashandiro evashandi vehurumende, pamwe nemihoro yavo, iyo inonzi yave pasi kwazvo zvichienzaniswa nemamiriro ezveupfumi. Musangano uyu wakanga uchitarisirwa kuitwa neMuvhuro , asi sachigaro veApex Council, Amai Cecilia Alexander vanoti vazoziviswa nehurumende kuti wave kuitwa neChitatu. Vanoti nyaya iri pamusoro penhaurwa yavo inyaya yemari inofanirwa kunge yave kutambirwa nemusandi wehurumende wepasi, iyo vanoti inofanirwa kunge yave chiuru nemazana manomwe emadhora pamwedzi ($1700.00). Amai Alexander vanoti chimwe chavanotarisira kukurukura pamusangano uyu inyaya yemari dzemabhonasi evashandi vehurumende, idzo vanoti vashandi vanosungirwa kuwana zvisineyi nezvikonzero zvingadai zvichipiwa nehurumende. Vanoti vari kuita zvekunzwa kuburikidza nemapepanhau kuti vashandi vachawana mabhonasi avo, saka vanotarisira kunzwa kuhurumende paimire panyaya iyi musi wavachasanga.

headline: Hurumende Yononoka Kubhadhara Vashandi Vanobatwa neCovid-19 Vachiita Basa Ravo
text: Vashandi vezvehutano vanoti vazhinji vavo havasati vawana mari dzavanofanirwa kupiwa kana vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid. Vashandi ava vanotiwo havasi kufara nekuvatyityidzirwa kwavari kuitwa nehurumende iyo iri kuti vasina kubaiwa nhomba vachanyimwa mari dzeCovid Allowance. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Nurses Association, Va Enoch Dongo, vati vashandi vezvehutano vakawanda vacho havasati vawana mari dzekubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 vari pabasa kunyange hazvo vave nenguva yakareba vanyorera kuti vawane mari idzi. VaDongo vati nhengo dzavo dzinenge dzichida mari iyi padzinenge dzichirwara kuitira kuti vdzikwanise kutenga zvikwanisiro. VaDongo vatiwo mamiriyoni makumi manomwe nemashanu emadhora (75 million) anonzi akasendekwa parutivi kuitira kuti mari iyi ibhadhare vashandi vezvehutano vanobatwa neCovid-19, haikwani sezvo vakabatwa neCovid-19 vadarika zviuru zvina. Imwe nhengo yeZimbabwe Hospital Association, VaPrince Butau,avo vakabatwa neCovid-19 gore rapera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakazowana mari muna Kurume gore rino kunyange vakange vanyorera mari iyi gore rapera. Asi VaButau vati hurumende inofanirwa kunge ichipa mari kwehupenyu hwese munhu anobatwa neCovid-19 ari pabasa. Mumwe mukoti asina kuda kudomwa nezita audza Studio7 kuti kunyange hazvo akabatwa nechirwere ichi kutanga kwegore rino, haasati awana mari kunyange hazvo akanyora mapepa anodiwa. Panyaya yekutyityidzirwa nehurumende kuti vasina kubaiwa nhomba vachanyimwa mari dziri kupiwa vashandi vese vezvehutano dzeCovid-19 allowance, VaDongo vati zvakaipa zvikuru kumanikidza vanhu kubayiwa nhomba. VaButau vati mari inoita zviuru zvitanhatu nemazana maviri emaRTGS iri kupihwa seCovid-19 allowances ishoma zvakanyanya. Vatiwo hurumende inofanira kugara pasi nevashandi vezvehutano yotaurirana navo pamusoro pekubaiwa nhomba yeCovid-19. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kuHealth Services Board asi gurukota rezvekubudiritswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakaudza vatori venhau nemusi weChipiri kuti hurumende iri kubhadhara mushandi anenge abatwa neCovid-19 ari pabasa mari inotangira pamazana matanhatu emadhora ekuAmerica kusvika pachiuru chimwe chete chemadhora ekuAmerica. Pamusoro pezvo mushandi wezvehutano anopihwa zviuru zvitanhatu nemazanamaviri emaRTGS semari yekubatsirikana munguva yeCivid-19. Vakatiwo Health Services Board yainge yabhadhara vashandi mazana mana nemakumi matatu nevaviri pavashandi vezvehutano zviuru zvina nemazna mana ane makumi mana nevana vakanyorera kuwana mari iyi. Amai Mutsvangwa vakati mari yakaiswa parutivi nehurumemde haikwani kubhadhara vashandi vese vakabatwa neCovid-19 vakati zvinoda kuti hurumende iwedzere mari iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende naVanaChiremba Voyambira Vanhu nezveMushonga waVaMagaya weHIV
text: Bazi rezvehutano raburitsa mashoko kuvatori venhau richikurudzira vanhu vari kurwara nechirwere cheHIV/AIDS kuti varambe vachinwa mishonga yavo vachiongorora mashoko evamwe ekuti vakawana mushonga wekurapa chirwere ichi pamwe nechegomarara. Bazi iri harina haro kudoma nezita Muporofita Walter Magaya vekereke yePHD Ministries avo vakazivisa nezuro kuti vainge vawana mushonga yemiti inowanikwa muMozambique neIndia yekurapa zvirwere izvi. Bazi iri rati iro ndiro rinoongorora kukodzera kwekushandiswa kwemishonga kunyangwe yechivanhu pasi peMedicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe. Zvichakadaro, sangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights-ZADHR- rinoti rapa VaMagaya mazuva matatu kuti vadzore mashoko avo ekuti vainge vawana mushonga unorapa chirwere chegomarara pamwe neAIDS. Sangano ravana chiremba vanorwira kodzero iri rinoti VaMagaya vakatadza kuita izvi richavasungisa. VaMagaya vakaudza nhengo dzechechi yavo nezuro kuti vakawana mushonga uyu vachishanda nevamwe vavo vanobva kunyika yeIndia.\nVaMagaya vanoti zvakatora makore maviri etsvakiridzo kuti vawane mushonga uyu, uyo unogadzirwa kubva pamiti inowanikwa muno munyika nekunyika yeMozambique. Asi sangano reZADHR rinoti zviri kuita VaMagaya hazvina kunaka sezvo zvichigona kukonzera kuti vateveri vavo nevamwewo vanhu vazorega kunwa mishonga yavakapihwa navanachiremba votevera zviri kutaurwa naVaMagaya izvi. Mashoko aVaMagaya ashoropodzwawo nevanhu vakawanda munyika.\nVaBigboy Manatsa vanoti kuita kwaVaMagaya kuchauraisa vanhu vakawanda vanovatevera. Izvi zvinotsigirwa naVaElvis Karonga avo vanoti VaMagaya vanofanirwa kuzozvirova dundundu kana mushonga wavo wagamuchirwa nebazi rezvehutano munyika. Mumwe mugari wekuKaroi, VaTinashe Mhazi, vanoti VaMagaya varatidza kuti havasi vemweya sezvo vave kushandisa midzi yen’anga nekudaro havafanirwe kuteererwa. VaKaronga vanoti VaMagaya vanofanirwa kushanda nebazi rezvehutano votora vanhu vari kurwara nechirwere cheAIDS vovarapa zvonyatsowonekwa kuti vapora vasati vazvipembedza. Asi mumwe mutendi VaRenius Rambanepasi vanoti vanhu vasakurumidze kusvora VaMagaya sezvo Mwari vachigona kushandisa munhu kuuya nemushonga wezvirwere zvisingarapike. Bazi reNational Aids Council, NAC, rabudisa chiziviso chekuti vose vari pachirongwa chekunwa mapiritsi ekudzikisa hutachiwana hweHIV varambe vachinwa mapiritsi avo sezvavakataurirwa kumakiriniki nekuzvipatara. Bazi iri razivisawo kuti hapasati pawanikwa mushonga wechirwere cheAIDS vachiti kana paine munhu anoti ave nemushonga wakadaro unofanirwa kuongororwa nanamazvikokota nekubvumidzwa nebazi rehurumende rezvehutano. Pari zvino vanhu vanosvika miriyoni imwe chete nechidimbu munyika vari pasi pechirongwa chekunwa mapiritsi ekudzikisa utachiwana. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano Idzva Rinorwira Kodzero dzeVarombo Rinoumbwa muHarare
text: Pane sangano idzva raparurwa muHarare rinoti chinangwa charo chikuru ndechekupedza kutambura kweveruzhinji munyika pamwe nekuona kuti varombo vabvumidzwa kuita mabasa ekutengesa mumigwagwa, kutangawo mabhizimisi pamwe nekuti vana vavo vawane dzidzo pachena. Vachiparura sangano rePoverty Liberation Movement, imwe nhengo yesangano iri, VaObert Masaraure, vati vaona zvakakodzera kuva nesangano iri kuitira kuti vabatsire pahondo yekupedza hurombo iyo iri kutorwiwa nemamwe masangano anoshanda akazvimirira. VaMasaraure, avo vanova zvakare mutungamiri weAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, vati kuti nhamo ipere varombo, vanhu vanofanira kubatana vakati chekutanga chichaitwa nesangano ravo kuti vashandi vese munyika vatambire mihoro yavo nemari yemadhora ekuAmerica. Vati vanodawo kuti misika yese ivhurwe munyika kuitira kuti vanhu vawane chouviri kunyange kuine Covid-19. Vatiwo vanodawo kuti vana muzvikoro zvepasi nezvapamusoro kubva varombo nevapfumi, vawaniswe mikana yakafana uye kuti kana izvi zvisangakwanisike, zvikoro zvacho zvacho zvovharwa. Mutungamiriri wesangano rinomirira vadzidzi vemuzvikoro zvepamusoro, Takudzwa Ngadziore, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanotambira masangano kana aine hurongwa hunoita kuti vana vemuZimbabwe vagare zvakanaka. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumivakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vati kunyange hazvo zvaitwa izvi iri danho rakanaka, chikuru chinodiwa handi kuratidzira chete asi kuti panotodiwa kusandura mitemo iyo inodzvinyirira vanhu kuti varambe vari varombo. Vati mitemo iripo inosimudzira vanazvo kare izvo zvinoita kuti vazhinji varambe vachitambura. VaMasaraure vatiwo rimwe donzvo guru resangano ravo kurwisa huwori muhurumende nemakambani izvo vatiwo zviri kuwedzera hurombo munyika. MuZimbabwe mune masangano akawanda anoshanda akazvimirira uye nyanzi dzinoti zvinhu zvichanaka chete kana masangano aya akabatana neveruzhinji mugadzirisa zvinonetsa munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inopa Mari Inopiwa Mapato Pasi peMutemo wePolitical Parties Finance Act kuMDC-T, Kwete kuMDC Alliance
text: Hurumende svondo rapera yakapa mari inopiwa mapato ezvematongerwo enyika pasi pemutemo wePolitical Parties Finance Act inoita mamiriyoni manomwe nemazana mashanu ezviuru zvemadhora emunyika kubato reMDC-T iro riri kufanotungamirwa naMuzvare Khupe, kunyange hazvo bato iri risina kuwana mavhoti anoita kuti rikodzere kupiwa mari iyi. Mari iyi yaifanirwa kupiwa kubato reMDC Alliance riri kutungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, iro rakawana mavhoti akawanda anodarika zvikamu zvishanu kubva muzana zvinofanirwa kuwanikwa nebato pasarudzo kuti rikodzere kuwana mari iyi. Hurumende inonzi yakapa bato iri mari iyi zviichitevera mutongo wedare reSupreme Court, iro rakati MDC Alliance harisi bato rezvematongerwo enyika sezvo yakabva mumubatanidzwa wemapato masere akapinda musarudzo pasi peMDC Alliance. Muna Chivabvu mutongi wedare reHigh Court, Justice Nyaradzo Munangati-Manongwa vakapa mutongo unorambidza hurumende kupa mari iyi kubato reMDC-T mushure mekunge MDC Alliance yaendesa gurukota rezvemitemo VaZiyambi Ziyambi pamwe negurukota rezvemari muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube kumatare richida kuti VaZiyambi varipe mari iyi. Asi hurumende yakazopikisa mutongo uyu kudare repamusorosoro reSupreme Court, iro risati ranzwa nyaya iyi. Bato reMDC-T rinoti ndiro rinokodzera kwana mari iyi sezvo riri iro bato riri pamutemo, richiti MDC Alliance mubatanidzwa waive nemapato manomwe kusanganisira nairo bato reMDC-T. Asi mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC Alliance, VaFelix Magalela Mafa-Sibanda, vanoti zvakaitwa nehurumende zvekupa mari kuMDC-T mucherechedzo wekuti bato iri riri kushandiswa neZanu PF. VaMagalela Mafa vanoti sebato vave kusiya zvose mumaoko evanhu vanove ndivo vane zvido zviri kumbunyikidzwa. No media source currently available Gweta rezvemitemo, vachidzidzisa zvemutemo pa Univesirty of Kent, Doctor Alex magaisa, vanoti izvi zvaitwa nehurumende hazvinyanye kushamisa asi yakapotsa zvikuru sezvo nyaya iyi yanga ichiri kumatare edzimhosva. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vagari vekwaMutoko Vonyunyuta neKushaya Cheuviri Kubva muMatombo Anocherwa Mudunhu Mavo
text: Vamwe vagari vekwamutoko vakapinda mumusangano wakaitwa paMutoko Centre neVOA yakabatana neMedia Centre neChitatu chapfuura vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti itore matanho ekusimudzira mararamiro avo. Vagari ava vakaisawo mibvunzo kune mumwe akapindawo mumusangano uyu, VaShame Kativhu, avo vaimbove kanzura, vachida kunzwisisa kuti makanzura anombotaurawo here pamusoro pematambudziko avanosangana nawo mudunhu ravo pavanoita misangano yavo. Vazhinji vevanhu ava vaidawo kunzwisisa mafambisirwo emari dzinobva mukucherwa kwematombo kana kuti black granite mudunhu mavo, vachiti madzishe namasabhuku vanifanirwa kuona kuti vabata nyaya idzi zvine hungwaru. Chirongwa ichi chaikokerwa nemukuru weMedia Centre VaErnest Mudzengi, uye chakanga chakatsigirwa nemuzinda weAmerica muZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reVaimbove Varwiri veHondo yeRusununguko Ropatsanuka?
text: Chimwe chikamu cheZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association mudunhu reHarare, chashora vamwe vaive varwiri verusununguko vari kuti hutungamiriri wesangano iri hubviswe. Chikwata ichi chatiwo chinotsigira hurongwa hwehurumende hwekuripa varimi vachena vakatorerwa minda yavo sezvo hurongwa uhwu huri kuitwa pachitevedzwa bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Sachigaro wesangano iri muHarare, VaSamuel Bhila, vati vanotsigira hutungamiriri hwaVaChris Mutsvangwa musangano reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association, uye havabvumirane nechikwata chaVaEthan Matibela icho chakati VaMutsvangwa nevamwe vavo vabviswe. VaBhila vati VaMatibela nechikwata chavo havasi nhengo dzeZNLWA uye havafaniri kunge vachitaura pamusoro pesangano iri. VaMatibela nechikwata chavo avo vanoti ndevamwe vaivepo pakaumbwa sangano rinomirira vaive varwiri vehondo yerusununguko, vakaudza vatori venhau nemusi weChitau kuti sangano iri rakaumbwa kuti rigadzirise matambaudziko avo kuti vagare zvakanaka asi vakati izvi hazvisi kuitika nekuti hutungamiriri huripo hauna hany’a navo. Pamashoko aVaBhila, VaMatibela vaudza Studio 7 kuti vaive varwiri vehondo yerusunguko vave kurwisaniswa nevamwe vanhu pachinhambo chekuti vashande pamwe kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. VaBhila vatiwo havasi kufara neimwe nhengo yesangano ravo yechikadzi iyo yakabuda pamadandemutande svondo rino ichinyomba mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, ichiti vatadza kutonga nyika. VaBhila vati vanoziva mudzimai uyu asi varamba kumudoma nezita vachiti havabvumirani nezvaanotaura. Vatiwo vanotsigira chirongwa chehurumende chekuripa varimi vachena vakorerwa minda yavo sezvo chiri kuitwa pachitevedzwa bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Asi chikwata chaVaMatibela hachisi kufara nechirongwa chekuripa varungu ichi cheGlobal Compensation Deed. Pane chimwewo chikwata chinomirira vamwe vakarwa muhondo yerusununguko che War Veterans Pressure Group, icho chakatokwidza nyaya iyi kudare repamusoro chichida kuti chirongwa ichi chimiswe sezvo chichiti chinosarura kubhadhara vachena chichisiya vatema vemuno. Patavabvunza pfungwa dzavo pamusoro pemutauro wasimudzwa nenyaya iyi munyika, mutungamiriri wesangano rinomirira varimivachena munyika reCommercial Farmers Union, VaAndrew Pascoe, vati vanofara kuti hurumende yakabvuma kuvabhadhara uye vari kuedza napose pavanogona kuona kuti mari yacho yawanikwa. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kuna VaMutsvangwa, kanaeo munyori mukuru wesangano ravo, VaVictor Matemadanda, kuti vanoti kudii nekudhonzerana masimba kwava kuitika musangano ravo. No media source currently available

headline: Mukati meHarare Moberekera Ingwe
text: Zvinhu zvanga zvisina kumira zvakanaka muHarare mapurisa achikanda zvombo zvehutsi hunokachidza ukuwo zvitoro zvizhinji nemahosifi mumimigwagwa inoti First, Jason Moyo naNkwame Nkrumah, zvichivharwa sezvo mapurisa ange ave kurwisana neveruzhinji. Bongozozo ratanga mangwanani eChina apo mapurisa akanda masipaiki pakombi yange yakatakura vanhu ikaita tsaona pakakuvara vana vechikoro. Chiitiko ichi chatsamwisa vanhu vakwanda kusanganisira vechidiki avo vanonzi varova mapurisa uye vanonzi vange vave kuda kutorera mapurisa ari muguta masipaiki vachitsutsumwa nekukuvadzwa kwevana vechikoro. Mumwe mugari asina kuda kudomwa nezita rake audza Studio 7 kuti chiitiko ichi ndicho chakakonzeresa muchokoto muguta. Mumwe wevechidiki mubato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, VaDenford Ngadziore, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mapurisa aedzawo kubvisa vanotengesa mumugwagwa pamahofisi eDeed Office muna Nkwame Nkrumah uye pavaramba kubva ndipo pavatanga kukandira vanhu aya hutsi hunokachidza. VaNgadziore vati zvitiko zviviri izvi zvatsamwisa vakawanda uye vati hurumende inofanira kuona zvaingaita nenyaya iyi. Nenguva dzezuva ronyura neChina, mapurisa anga achiri kukanda hutsi hunokachidza uye vanhu vakawanda vari kutadza kubuda mumahosfisi kana muzvitoro mavakavharirwa. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remapurisa pamusoro penyaya yema spike iyo vanhu vanogara chema nayo zuva nezuva. Asi sachigaro vekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwemukati menyika, VaRonald Muderedzwa, vati havana chavanoziva pachiitiko ichi uyewo vati apo komiti yavo yakatenderera nenyika svondo rapfuura, havana kubvunza nezvenyaya yemasipaiki nekuti yaive mumatare edzimhosva. Nyonga nyoga yaitika muHarare yaitika apo gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vange vachiudza musangano mukuru wokuongorora kuti Zimbabwe ingasimukire sei vachiti nyika haichada shanduko munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika asi munyaya dzehupfumi. Asi vamwe vapinda mumusangano uyu vati VaChinamasa vakarashika nekuti kuita kwehurumende zvikuru sei pakutyora kodzero dzevanhu ndiko kunoita kuti nyika isasimukire munyaya dzehupfumi. Mukuru weYouth Forum ,VaWellington Zindove, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hupfumi hwenyika haubudiriri kana nyika ichityora kodzero dzevanhu. Vakawanda vari kupinda mumusangano uyu wemazuva maviri wakarongwa neChartman House, Sapes Trust, Crisis in Zimbabwe Coalition neNED vati Zimbabwe inofanira kutevedza bumbiro rayo remitemo kuitira kuti zvinhu zvifambe munyaya dzehupfumi. No media source currently available

headline: IMF Yotumira Nhumwa kuZimbabwe asi Imwe Nyanzvi Inoti Hurumende Haisi Kuzokwereteswa Imwe Mari
text: Chimwe chikwata kubva kubhanga reInternational Monetary Fund chiri kutarisirwa kupinda munyika muna Kurume kuti chizeye nevakuru muhurumende kuti hupfumi hungagadziriswe sei. Uhu hurongwa hunozivikanwa nekuti Article IV Consultations. Vamwe vakuru vehurumende vasina kuda kudomwa nemazita vanoti vanoda kuti IMF ivabatsire nemari imwe yechikwereti. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Dr Godfrey Kanyenze vanoti kana hurumende isina kubhadhara mari dzemitero kana kuti ma arrears pane zvimwe zvikwereti zvinodarika bhiriyoni imwe chete nemazana matanhatu kumabhanga akaita seWorld Bank neAfrican Development Bank. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reZimbabwe Women In Politics Alliance Rinoti Richaenderera Mberi Nekuratidzira Kunyangwe Rikashungurudzwa
text: Nhengo dzemasangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu anoti re Zimbabwe Activists Alliance, Occupy Africa Unity Square Movement neZimbabwe Women In Politics Alliance dzakabata nevamwe vana veZimbabwe, dzinoti dzirikuenderera mberi nekuratidzida kwavo kusafara nemafambisirwo ari kuitwa zvinhu munyika kunyangwe vachiti vakashungurudzwa mambakwedza eMugovera nevanofungidzirwa kuti mapurisa kana kuti vasori. Nhengo idzi dziri kurara nekuswera mu Africa Unity Square muHarare uye dzinoti dziri kugadzira tsamba yenyunyuto kana kuti petition ichaendeswa kudare reparamende nekune mutungamiri wenyika vaRobert Mugabe. "Kunyangwe vakati shungurudza ticharamba tichienda mberi nekuratidzira kwedu sezvo mararamiro atiri kuita muno munyika asina kumira zvakanaka. Mari mumabhanga hamuna, mabasa hapana, vana vavazi kuenda kuzvikoro apa huwori hwuri kuramba hwuchiwanda munyika asi hapana ari kusungwa. Isu ticharamba tiri muno muAfrica Unity Square kusvika tanzwikwa zvichemo zvedu," Muzvare Lynda Masarira vesangano re Zimbabwe Women In Politics vaudza Studio 7. Muzvare Masarira vanoti vakakwidza nyaya yavo kumagweta avo nemamwe masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu asi havana kuenda kumapurisa sezvo vakambo shungurudzwa nemapurisa aya musi Chishanu. "Hatina kuenda nenyaya yedu kumapurisa asi maphone evazhinji vari kuratidzira nesu akabiwa, ini ndikakuvadzwa ruwoko nechigunwe vamwe vakarohwa nekukuvadzwa asi izvi hazvisi kuzoita kuti tiregedze kuratidzira," Muzvare Masarira vaenderera mberi. Vanoti nemusi weChipiri vachaita musangano nevatori venhau wekuzeya mafambiro arikuita zvinhu mukuratidzira kwavarikuita. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inokurudzirwa Kuendesa Masimba kuMatunhu neChimbi Chimbi
text: Mukuru wesangano revagari, reChitungwiza and Manyame Rural Residents Association, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vanoti sangano ravo raparura chirongwa chekukurudzira hurumende kuti iendese masimba kumatunhu nechimbi chimbi senzira yekuasimudzira. Izvi zvinotevera kuchema chema kwevanhu vari mumatunhu ane zviwanikwa zvakaita segoridhe, mangoda, mhuka, nezvimwe kuti hapana chavari kuwana kubva mazviri. Mubhajeti regore rino, gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vakaisa parutivi mari inosvika mabhiriyoni gumi nemapfumbamwe ane zviuru mazana mashanu, kana kuti $19,5 billion, kuzadzikisa bumbiro remutemo ra2013 panyaya yekuendesa masimba kumatunhu. Asi vamwe vanoti hurongwa hwehurumende huri kutora nguva yakareba kunyangwe hurumende iri kuti yakazvipira uye yaita zvakawanda. No media source currently available

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri KuBritain Zvoronga Kuratidzira Kwakasimba
text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kuBritain zvine hurongwa hwekuungana zvichiratidzira mukupera kwesvondo pasi pehurongwa huri kutungamirwa nesangano rinorwira hutongo hwejekerere, reFree Zimbabwe Advocacy Group. Sachigaro wesangano iri, VaJoshua Chigwangwa vanoti vatora danho iri senzira yekupa mukana kuvana veZimbabwe wekuti vazivise pasi rose nezve mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nemamiriro azvehupfumi. Hurongwa uhwu, uhwo hwuri kuitwa pasi pezita rekuti #zimbabweriseupuktour2016, hwakaonawo sangano iri richikoka varwiri vekodzero vanoti Vasten Zvorwadza, Doctor Patson Dzamara, Muzvare Linda Masarira pamwe nePastor Evan Mawarire ve#thisflag. VaqChigwangwa vanoti hurongwa hwavo hwaifanirwa kutanga neMuvhuro wesvondo rino, asi vakasangana nematambudziko akaita kuti hunonoke, akaita sekunonoka kugadziriswa kwemagwaro ekufambisa aPastor Mawarire pamwe neDoctor Dzamara, asi iye zvino zvinhu zvave kufamba zvakanaka. Vanoti pane hurongwa hwekuti Pastor Mawarire vanotaurawo pamisangano yavakakokwa nemasangano anosanganisira Chatham House pamwe neparamende yeBritain. No media source currently available

headline: VaMangudya Votarisirwa Kuburitsa Hurongwa hweMari
text: Gavhuna veReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, VaJohn Panonetsa Mangudya, vachaburitsa gwaro remashandiro avanotarisira kuita nyaya dzemari munyika, kana kuti Monetary Policy Statement. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti gwaro raVaMangudya rinofanirwa kuratidza gwara rekutevera mari yeZimbabwe isati yadzoswa kuti itsive yekunze kwenyika. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti nguva yekudzora dhora reZimbabwe haisati yasvika. Imwe yenyanzvi mune zvehupfumi nezvemari uye vachishanda nePercycon Global Fund Managers, VaPersistance Gwanyanya, vanoti nguva yekuita dhora remuZimbabwe haisati yasvika. VaGwanyanya vanoti Zimbabwe inofanira kushandisa mari yekunze pari zvino uye hurumende inofanirwa kusapindira mubasa re Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe sezvo zvematongerwo enyika zvisingagone kutungamira mashandiro anoita mabhanga. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, VaRejoice Ngwenya, vanoti havasi kufara nemashandiro ari kuitwa nemabhanga emunyika, vachiti mabhanga haasi kupihwa mukana wekuita mabasa awo akasununguka. No media source currently available

headline: America Inoti Haina Chinangwa cheKuchinja Hurumende muZimbabwe
text: America inoti haina chinangwa chekuchinja hurumende yemuZimbabwe asi kuti inoda chete kuti hurumende yeZanu PF itevedzere hutongi hwejekerere pamwe nekuremekedza kodzero dzemunhu wese ari munyika. Vachitaura nerimwe bepanhau repadandemutande, mumwe mushandi mukuru kumuzinda weAmerica muZimbabwe, VaThomas Hastings, vakaramba mashoko ekuti America inoda kubvisa hurumende yeZanu PF vachiti chinongodiwa neAmerica chete runyararo muZimbabwe, hutongi hwejekerere pamwe nekuremekedzwa kwekodzero dzeveruzhinji. VaHastings vakati kushaikwa kwehutongi hwejekerere nekuremekedzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kunopa kuti America ishushikane zvikuru nezviri kuitika muZimbabwe. VaHastings vakatiwo zvirango zviripo zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru vakuru muhurumende nemadzisahwira avo pamwe nemakambani avnodyidzana nawo. VaHastings vakatiwo vose vakatemerwa zvirango ava vanoziva zvavanofanirwa kuita kuitira kuti hukama huripo pakati peZimbabwe neAmerica husimbaradzwe. Vamwe mubato riri kutonga reZanu PF vanogaropomera America mhosva yekuda kubvisa hurumende yavo nechisimba vachitiwo inobatsira mapato anopikisa mukuedza kuzadzikisa izvi. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa mhinduro kuhurumende pamashoko aVa Hastings sezvo patafonera bazi rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika tanzi titumire mibvunzo yedu iyo yanga isati yapindurwa pataenda pamhepo. Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, uye vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vapokana nezvakataurwa naVaHastings vachiti munyika mune hutongi hwejekerere uye hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa iri kushanda kusimudzira mararamiro everuzhinji Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda nesangano reYouth Platform for Development, VaOwen Dhliwayo, vanoti Zimbabwe haina hutongi hwejekerere vachipa muenzaniso wekusapatsanurika kwemasimba mumapazi akasiyana siyana ehurumende pamwe nekusashanda zvakaenzana kwemitemo. VaDhliwayo vatiwo vanhu vakakurudzirwa kuti vachinje matongero avari kuita hazvina kufanana nekuti vari kuda kubviswa. Vanotiwo hurumende inofanirwa kushanda zvakasimba zvikuri mukugadzirisa kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu nezvimwe zvinoita kuti munyika musave nehutongi hwejekerere. Mutauriri weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaMarvelos Khumalo, vanoti vanowirirana naVaHastings kuti muZimbabwe hamuna hurongi hwejekerere. Vanotiwo zvirango zvehupfumi hazvina kungoiswa pavanhu ava nemadzisahwira avo, asi kuti zvakaiswa mushure mekunge ana veZimbabwe varatidza kunyunyuta pamusoro pezviri kuitika munyika. VaKhumalo vakurudzira hurumende yaVaMnangagwa kuti iite sarudzo dzakajeka pamwe nekuremekedza kodzero dzemunhu wese vachiti izvi zvinobatsira kuti Zimbabwe idyidzane nedzimwe nyika zvakanaka. Kunyange hazvo vakawanda muZanu PF vachiti America yakatemera Zimbabwe zvirango senzira yekuda kubvisa hurumende, zvirango zvakatemerwa vanhu vanosvika makumi masere nevashanu chete, uye makambani anodyidzana nevanhu ava anosvika makumi mashanu nemana.Akapedzisira kuiswa pazvirango neAmerica ndimuzvinabhizimisi VaKuda Tagwirei avo vanodyidzana zvakanyanya nehurumende yeZimbabwe uye vari munhu ari pedyo zvakanyanya naVaMnangagwa. Mumwe akapedzisira kuiswa pazvirango izvi igurukuta revasori, VaOwen Ncube. America inoti hainganzi inoda kukonzeresa hurombo munyika iyo ichibatsira Zimbabwe kupedza hurombo munyika pamwe nekutsigira zvirongwa zvehutano zvakanangana nekurwisa zvirwere zvakasiyana siyana. No media source currently available

headline: Hupfumi hweNyika Hworamba Huchienda kuMawere, Vamwe Vachiti Huwori Ndiyo Honzeri
text: Zvinhu zvinonzi zviri kuramba zvichienda kumawere munyaya dzezveupfumi munyika zvichionekwa nekushaikwa kwemafuta edzimotokari, kushaikwa kwemari yekunze, pamwe nekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu. Vamwe vanoti huwori munyika ndihwo honzeri hombe mumatambudziko aya, ayo anonzi ari kusunga vanhu, zvikuru varombo, zuva nezuva, vachipomera hurumende kutarisa rutivi panoitwa huwori uhwu. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehupfumi munguva yehurumende yemubatanidzwa, uye vari mutewedzeri wasachigaro webato reMDC, VaTendai Biti vanoti matambudziko ari munyika ari kukonzerwa nekusafambiswa zvakanaka kwehurumende nevari kuitungamira. VaBiti vanoti huwori, sehawavanoti huri kuZINARA, huri kuregwa huchitambarara munyika, izvo zvave kukanganisa kukura kwehupfumi. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaProsper Chitambara, vanoti matambudziko ari munyika ari kunyanya kukonzerwa nekushaikwa kwechivimbo nehurumende kune vanoda kutanga mabhizimusi avo kana kudyara mari dzavomunyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzevashandi nemabasa, VaThomas Masvingwe vanotsinhirawo nyaya yekuti huwori dzihwo hwauraya nyika, vachiti matambudziko ose aya ari kurasirwa kuvashandi, avo vavanoti havasati vawedzerwa mihoro kwenguva yakareba kwazvo. Asi nhengo yevechidiki veZanu PF VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vanoramba kuti matambudziko ari munyika ari kukonzerwa nekusagona kutonga kwehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachiti matambudziko aya akasiiwa nehurumende yaVaRobert Mugabe pamwe nezvirango zvavanoti zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe. VaChitambara vanoti matambudziko mune zveupfumi ari munyika anogadziriswa chete kana pakaitwa nhaurirano munyika. Izvi zvinotsigirwawo naVaBiti, avo vanoti kusvika munyika maitwa nhaurirano pakati pavaMnangagwa nemutungamiri weMDC VaNelson Chamisa, zvinhu zvicharamba zvichiomera vanhu, zvikuru varombo. Kusvika matambudziko ose aya agadziriswa, uye vekunze vanoda kudyara mari dzavo munyika vave nechivimbo nehurumende, ruzhinji rwevana veZimbabwe rwucharamba rwuchinonga svosve nemuromo munyika yechipikirwa. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Vave neHukama Hwakasimba naVaMugabe Avo Vari Kurwara Vari kuSingapore
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nezuro vakaita hurukuro neZBC uye bepanhau reHerald ichaburitswa musi wa 18 Kubvumbi pazuva rekupemberera kuwana kuzvitonga kuzere. VaMnangagwa vakati muhurukuro iyi vari kuwirirana zvikuru nevaive mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe avo vanoti vari kurapwa kuSingapore parizvino. Vanoti munhu wavanoremekedza zvikuru. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika VaJoy Mabenge vanoti VaMugabe naVaMnangagwa vashanda vose kwenguva yakareba nekudaro hazvishamise kuti vanoramba vachidyidzana. No media source currently available Vakatiwo vanhu vanofanira kusungunuka kutaura nyaya yeGukurahundi asi vasingakumbire ruregerero pane zvavanonzi vakaita munguva iyi apo vainge vari gurukota rezvevasori.

headline: “One World Together At Home” Inowana Mamirioni Mazana Maviri Anemakumi Manomwe Emadhora Kubatsira Kurwisana neCovid-19
text: Muimbi ane mukurumbira, anozivikanwa nezita rekuti ‘Lady Gaga’, achibatsirana neWorld Health Organisation, akaronga mutambo wemimhanzi apo vaimbi vane mukurumbira vaishaura kuvanhu pasi pose vari mudzimba dzavo muAmerica, United Kingdom, kuEurope nekunedzimwe nyika zhinji pasi pose. Mutambo uyu, uyo unonzi ‘One World Together at Home’, wakaona vaimbi vanemukurumbira vachiimbira vanhu, pakabuda mamirioni nemamirioni emadhora ekubatsira mukurwisana nechirwere che Coronavirus, pamwechete nekubatsira avo vanorapa vanhu asi vasina mbatya dzakakwana dzekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere ichi. Vanhu vanoita mamirioni makumi maviri ne mazana manomwe (270 million) vakaona mutambo uyu uchiitwa paInternet, patelevhizhini nepama ‘social media’ akasiyanasiyana. Mutambo uyu wakaitirwa kutsigira avo vanoshanda vachirapa vanhu vanechirwere che Covid-19 uye kuedza kubatsira kumisa kupararira kwe chirwere ichi. Sangano rinoona nezvehutano pasi pose, reWorld Health Organization, rakabatana naLady Gaga, rakaronga mutambo uyu, uyo wakatora ma awa matanhatu vaimbi vachiyaura. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chinofarira zvemimanzi nemafirimu, Tafadzwa Munjanja, anogara mudunhu reOklahoma, muAmerica, anoti mushure memutambo uyu, pakazoita ma awa maviri apo vaimbi, vamwe vatungamiri venyika neavo vanozivikanwa mukubatsira nemari vakarumbidza vashandi mune zvehutano, vanachiremba neavo vese varikurwisana nechirwere che coronavirus pasi pose. No media source currently available

headline: Vanamukoti Vanoramba Mari Yanga Yauya neHurumende Vachiti Ishoma, Vanovimbisa Kuramba Vari paMabasa
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nemusi weChina kuti huwandu hwevanhu vakanga vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 hwakanga kwasvika pazviuru zvinomwe nemazana mana nemakumi mashanu ane vatatu, kana kuti 7 453. Asi huwandu hwevanhu vanga vafa kusvika pazuva iri hwakaramba huri pamazana maviri nemakumi maviri nevaviri kana kuti 222, sezvo pakanga pasina akafa. Vanhu vakanga vapona kubva kuchirwere ichi munyika yose vakanga vasvika pazviuru zvishanu nemazana matanhatu ane makumi matatu nevashanu, kana kuti 5 635. Vanhu makumi mapfumbamwe nevatatu vakapora kuchirwere ichi izvo zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vakanga vachine chirwere ichi hwaderera kuenda pachiuru nemazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu, kana kuti 1 596. Vanhu mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matanhatu nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 969 ndivo vakavhenekwa kana vaine chirwere ichi, vanhu makumi maviri nevana vakawanikwa vainacho. Johns Hopkins University Hospital yemuAmerica, iyo iri kutevera kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose, inoti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemasere, kana kuti 28 million vabatwa nechirwere ichi pasi rose, icho chasiya vamwe vanodarika zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nezvishanu, kana kuti 905 000 vafa pasi rose. MuAmerica vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matanhatu nemazana matatu ezviuru, kana kuti 6.300 million vabatwa neCovid-19, vamwe vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nechimwe kana, kuti 191 000 vafa. Zvichakadaro, vanamukoti, avo vakadzokera kubasa kutanga kwesvondo rino mushure mekuramwa mabasa kwenguva ingada kusvika kumwedzi mitatu, vanonzi varamba kutambira zvanga zvaiswa patafura nehurumende mukuedza kwayo kugadzirisa nyaya yemihoro yavo. Hurumende inonzi yanga ichida kuvapa zvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana zvemihoro yavo, asi vashandi vanonzi varamba kutambira mari iyi vachiti haigadzirise matambudziko avo Vashandi vanonzi vazivisawo hurumende kuti vari kudawo kuti vapiwe imwe yemari yemihoro yavo iri mumadhora ekuAmerica. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi mutungamiri wesangano ravanamukoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo, vanoti kuramba kutambira kwaita vanamukoti mari iyi hakurevi kuti vave kudzokera zvakare mukuramwa mabasa. VaDongo vanoti vanamukoti vakadzokera kumabasa mushure mechikumbiro chakaitwa negurukota rezvehutano idzva uye vari mutewedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vakati vari kugadzirisa zvichemo zvevashandi vemuzvipatara. VaDongo vanoti vamiriri vehurumende munhaurirano vakavavimbisa kuti zvipatara zvichawaniswa zvekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19, uye vanoti vari kukurudzira nhengo dzavo kuti dziende kumabasa, asi dzisazvipinza munjodzi kuburikidza nekushanda zvisina mhatya dzinodzivirira kutapurira chirwere, kana kuti PPEs. No media source currently available

headline: VaTsvangirai Voita Musangano neVadzidzi Vepa Chinhoyi University of Technology
text: Mutungamiri webato reMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vanoti bato ravo richabatanidza vechidiki vose munyika zvisinei kuti akadzidza here kana kuti kwete nekuti matambudziko avo akafanana. Mutungamiri webato reMDC, VaMorgan Tsvangirai, vanoti bato ravo richabatanidza vechidiki vose munyika zvisinei kuti vakadzidza here kana kuti kwete nekuti matambudziko avo akafanana. Vachitaura nemusi weChina muChinhoyi pamahofisi avo mushure mekunge varambidzwa nevakuru vechikoro vepaChinhoyi University of Technology kuChinhoyi Training Centre, kuti vasangane nevadzidzi pachikoro apa, VaTsvangirai vati zvakakosha kuti vechidiki vabatane zvisineyi kuti vakadzidza here kana kuti kwete nekuti matambudziko avo akaita sekushaya mabasa akafanana. VaTsvangirai vati bato ravo rinoshushikana zvikuru nehupenyu hweuranda huri kurarama vadzidzi muzvikoro zvepamusoro. Vanotiwo vadzidzi vari kushaya pekudzidzira pakafaranuka, kushaya zvekudya zvakakwana uye vanoti vanoshushikana zvikuru nevadzidzi vechisikana vari kupfimbirwa zvekudya muzvikoro nevadzidzisi. Mumwe mudzidzi, Muzvare Joana Mamombe, vati kuti zvinhu zvinake munyika vechidiki vanofanirwa kuenda nehwuwandu hwavo kunovhotera bato reMDC-T kuti muve neshanduko muzvikoro. Vadzidzi vanga vakawanda kudarika mazana maviri vanoti vachatanga kuratidzira muzvikoro zvepamusoro pamusana pekushaya pekudzidzira pakakwana pamwe nekukwidzwa kwemari yekudzidza. VaTsvangirai vati vanotarisira kusangana nevadzidzi vepazvikoro zvepamusoro munyika mwedzi mishoma iri kutevera. Musangano uyu ndewe chipiri VaTsvangirai vachisangana nevadzidzi. VaTsvangirai vakaita musangano nevadzidzi vepaUniversity of Zimbabwe masvondo mashoma apfuura. No media source currently available

headline: Amai Madzongwe Vanoti Madzimai Ngaawande Muparamende
text: Mutungamiri wedare reSenate, Amai Ednah Madzongwe, vanoti kunyange hazvo huwandu hwenhengo dzeparamende dzechidzimai hwawanda zvakanyanya mudare reparamende, pane mukana wekuwedzera nhengo idzi kuti dziwande semawandiro akaita vanhukadzi munyika. Vachitaura pazuva rechipiri rezviratidwa zveparamende zve Parliament Open Day, Amai Madzongwe vati madzimai awanda chose mudare iri kana zvichienzaniswa nepakatanga paramende muna 1924 apo paive nemudzimai mumwe chete mudare iri. Vatiwo huwandu hwemadzimai hwange huri kukura kubva muna 1980 kusvika pari zvino apo pave nenheno dzechidzimai zvikamu makumi matatu nezvina kubva muzana panhengo dzose dzeparamende. Asi vanoti havasi kufara kuti varume dzivo vachakawanda muparamende. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri wedare repararmende reNational Assembly, Amai Marble Chinomona, vatiwo zvakakosha kuti vanhu vahotere madzimai kuvamirira muparamende nekuti ndivo vanonzwisisa matambudziko avo ose. Mukuru wechikoro chepamusoro cheWomen’s University in Africa, Amai Hope Sadza, vanoti zvinogona kuti madzimai akawanda avhoterwe kupinda muparamende vachiti madzimai akawanda pari zvino achiri kutya kupinda munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Amai Madzongwe vanoti budiriro huru yemadzimai yakauya muna 2013 apo pakaumbwa bumbiro remitemo rinopa madzimai zvigaro makumi matanhatu zvisingakwikwidzwe mudare reNational Assembly. No media source currently available

headline: Bato reSACP rekuSouth Africa Rinoti muZimbabwe Mune Dambudziko, Kunyange Hazvo Zanu PF iri Kuramba
text: Bato reSouth African Communist Party, SACP, rekuSouth Africa mukupera kwesvondo rakazivisa kuti muZimbabwe mune matambudziko anoda kutariswa nekukasika, ayo rinoti ari kubatawo South Africa. Vachitaura mushure memusangano weCentral Committee yebato ravo muJohannesburg, munyori mukuru webato iri, VaBlade Nsimande, vanove zvakare gurukota rezvedzidzo, vakati kuramba kuti muZimbabwe hamuna matambudziko kuzvinyepera pachitariswa huwandu hwevana veZimbabwe vari kuvaka misasa munyika iyi. Asi vakati vana veZimbabwe ndivo chete vanofanirwa kugadzirisa matambudziko ari munyika yavo. Mashoko ebato reSACP aya anouya panguva iyo bato reAfrican National Congress, ANC, rakabva kutumira chikwata kuZimbabwe chaitungamirwa nemunyori mukuru webato iri VaAce Magashule kuti chinonzwisisa nezvematambudziko anonzi akatarisa nezimbabwe. Hurumende pamwe nebato reZanu PF vagara vari kuramba kuti munyika hamuna matambudziko, kunyange hazvo vanopikisa pamwe nemamwe masangano akazvimirira vari kuti munyika mune matambudziko. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri weZanu PF, VaPatrick Chinamasa vakaudza vatori venhau kuti Zimbabwe harisi dunhu reSouth Africa, nekudaro nyika iyi inofanirwa kusiyana netsika yekuisa mhino dzayo munyaya dzeZimbabwe. VaChinamasa vakapomerawo hurumende yeSouth Africa kuve pasi pevachena. Studio 7 yaedza kunzwa divi reZanu PF pamusoro pemashoko ebato reSouth African Communist party aya, asi sachigaro veZanu PF mudunhu reSouth Africa, VaKenneth Mandaza vavimbisa kuzopindura mibvunzo yedu nemusi weMuvhuro. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vachitungamira sangano reFastforward Community Development Centre, VaAkson Potera vanoti hazvishamise kuti munyori mukuru weSACP, VaBlade Nsimande vakataura kuti muZimbabwe mune dambudziko nekuti vakaona kuti mune dambudziko. Vanoti VaNsimande munhu akanzvera mabhuku zvakanyanya zvekuti vanogona kuve nemaonero akasiyana kubva kune vamwe. No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesa muMigwagwa Vanoti Havasi Kuzovhunduka Masoja
text: Mutungamiri werimwe sangano revanotengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation kana kuti (VISET) VaSamuel Wadzai Mangoma vanoti havasi kuzovhunduka mashoko egurukota rezvematunhu VaJuly Moyo ekuti vakumbira mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika vari gurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kwenyika Retired General Constantino Chiwenga kuti mauto abatsirane nemapurisa mekanzuru kubvisa vanotengesa mumigwagwa. VaMoyo vakapa vanotengesa mumigwagwa ava mazuva maviri ekuti vange vabuda mumigwagwa. Asi VaWadzi Mangoma vanoti hurumende haina kana kumboyedza kugara navo pasi kuti vaone kuti dambudziko iri ringagadziriswe sei. Nyaya yekushandisa mauto yakamboitwawo panguva yeOperation Restore Legacy asi zvakakona n'anga murapwa achida. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti nyaya yehupfumi husina kumira zvakanaka iri kupa kuti vanhu vakawamda vagume vaenda kunotengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa. No media source currently available

headline: Makambani Akawanda Okundikana Kuvhura Gore Rino Mamwe Achivharwa?
text: Gore rino rinonzi harina kutanga zvakanaka mumakambani akawanda munyika sezvo mamwe akakundikana kuvhura kana kuti akaderedza huwandu hwevashandi kubva pakatanga gore rino ra2015. Munyori mukuru wesangano revashandi vemumabhanga reZimbabwe Banks and Allied Workers Union, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti mabhanga gore rapera chete akarasikirwa nevashandi chiuru chimwe chete kubva muvashandi zviuru zvitanhatu zvaive zviri pamabasa. VaMutasa vanoti gore rino chete vashandi vanosvika mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu vatorasikirwa nemabasa zvichitevera kuvhara kwebhanga reAllied Bank. Sangano iri rinotiwo kana nhaurirano dzekuedza kuponesa rimwe bhanga dziri kuitwa dzikakundikana mukati memazuva gumi ari kutevera, zvinenge zvoreva kuti vamwe vashandi zana nemakumi matatu vanenge vorasikirwa nemabasa avo zvakare. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaProsper Chitambara, vanotiwo dambudziko rekurasikirwa kwevanhu nemabasa harina kubata mabhanga chete asi kuti rakabata makambani ose ari kutatarika. VaChitambara vanoti dambudziko guru ndere kushaikwa kwemari iri kutenderera munyika, uye kusajeka kwemitemo yezvemabhizimusi. Sangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions rinotiwo hurongwa hwekuvandudza mitemo yemabasa huri kuda kuitwa nehurumende huchatoita kuti vashandi vakawanda varasikirwe nebasa sezvo huchipa vashandirwi masimba ekupinza kana kuburitsa munhu basa paanodira. No media source currently available

headline: VaMangudya Votaura Pamusoro peMari Yanetsa Munyika
text: VaMangudya vataura mashoko aya vachitsanangurira nhengo dzekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemari kuti dambudziko remari mumabhangi riri kunyanyokukonzerwa nekuti nyika iri kutenga zvinhu zvakawanda kunze kwenyika asi iyo isina zvakawanda zvainotengesa. Gavhuna webhanga guru munyika, VaJohn Mangudya, vaudza nhengo dzepararamende kuti bhanga ravo nemamwe mabhanga akaunza munyika mari inodarika mamiriyoni mazana maviri emadhora kubva muna Ndira kusvika pakutanga kwemwedzi uno, asi izvi zviri kutadza kupedza dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari munyika. VaMangudya vataura mashoko aya vachitsanangurira nhengo dzekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemari kuti dambudziko remari mumabhangi riri kunyanyokukonzerwa nekuti nyika iri kutenga zvinhu zvakawanda kunze kwenyika asi iyo isina zvakawanda zvainotengesa. Vatiwo nyaya yekuti nyika iri kutenga chibage zvichitevera nzara yakakonzerwa neEl Nino pamwe nekuti vanhu havachina chido chekuchengetera mari dzavo mumabhanga sezvo vari kubhadhariswa mari yakawanda pakushandisa mabhangi. Asi vati zvisinei hazvo bhanga ravo nemamwe vari kuronga kuunza imwe mari munyika kuitira kupedza dambudziko iri. Vatiwo mabhanga matanhatu pamabhanga gumi ari munyika ndiwo chete ari kupinza mari munyika. Vatiwo kutanga kwemwaka wekutengeswa kwefodya kuchaunzawo mari yakawanda munyika. Zimbabwe yakatarisana nedambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari mumabhanga uye VaMangudya vati mabhanga anofanira kubhadharisa vanhu mari shoma pavanoshandisa mabhanga pamwe nekuona kuti veruzhinji vasina mabhuku ekubhanga kumabhanga vapihwa mukana wekuvhura maakaunzi aya. Mabhanga mazhinji ari kupa vanhu mazana maviri emadhora kana mari iri pasi pazuva nekuda kwekushomeka kwemari. Zvinhu zvakanaka, mabhanga anopa vanhu zviuru zviviri zvemadhora kana kudarika pazuva. Pavabvunzwa kuti sei vasiri kushandisa mari yemuno iyo vanokwanisa kudhinda kana yave shoma mumabhanga, VaMangudya vati nyika haisati yakwanisa kuita zvinodiwa kuti itange kushandisa mari yemuno zvekare. Vati chikuru chichapedza dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari munyika kugadzira nekutengesa zvinhu zvemuno kunze pamwe nekuumba mitemo inoita kuti vemabhizimisi vekunze vauye kuzotanga mabhizimisi munyika. Zimbabwe iri kushandisa mabhiriyoni manomwe emadhora kutenga zvinhu zvekunze iyo ichitengesa kunze zvinhu zvinokosha mabhiriyoni matatu chete emadhora. No media source currently available

headline: Kusaenda kuMabasa kwaVanachiremba Kwoomesera Varwere Zvakanyanya
text: Hupenyu hwevarwere hworamba huri munjodzi sezvo vana chiremba vari kuramba vakashinga nerekuti havazi kuzodzokera kumabasa kusvika hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo.\n\nPasvika Studio 7 pachipatara chikuru chemuBulawayo cheMpilo Central nhasi mangwanani vanhu vashoma vange vari kuzvikamu zvinorapwa varwere vanenge vachibva kumba, kwange kuchibatsirwa navana mukoti vachiri kudzidzira basa. Mumawadhi mange muine varwere vashoma vange vachionekwawo navana mukoti. Mumwe murwere anorarama nehurema, VaMalcolm Ndlovu, vati vave nevhiki vachirwara nemudumbu uye vange vauya kuti vazoonekwa navana chiremba asi vanzi vadzokere kumba sezvo vanachiremba vange vasiri pabasa. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kumukuru wavana chiremba paMpilo Central, Doctor Solwayo Ngwenya, sezvo vange vachinzi vari mumusangano. Asi Doctor Mthabisi Bhebhe, vanove munyori weMpilo Doctors Association, vati vanachiremba vepachipatara ichi pamwe nevekuUnited Bulawayo Hospitals uye munyika mose, havazi kuzodzokera kubasa kusvikira hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Doctor Bhebhe, avo vakambovewo mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba vemuzvipatara zvehurumende reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, vatiwo pari zvino hurumende haisati yaita zvinobatika pakugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Pakuti zvinhu zvakamira sei muzvipatara kana kwakatariswa varwere, Doctor Bhebhe vati havakwanise kuziva sezvo vasiri kuenda kubasa, asi vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti hurumende igadzirise zvichemo zvavo nekukasika kuti vakwanise kudzokera kubasa vabatsire varwere. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Kuramwa mabasa kwavana chiremba kwasvika muzuva rechimakumi maviri nemanomwe. Mune imwewo nyaya, kanzuru yeguta reBulawayo inoti iri kushushikana nekuti vagari vari kuramba vachishandisa mvura yakawanda izvo zvinogona kuzosiya madhamu anopa mvura muguta iri asisina mvura. Vachitaura neStudio 7 mushure memusangano nevagari pamusoro pemamiriro akaita zvinhu muguta panyaya dzemvura, munyori wekanzuru, VaChristopher Dube, vakurudzira kuti vagari vashandise mvura zvine mwero. Guta reBulawayo rinowana mvura kubva kumadhamu matanhatu anosanganisira Inyankuni, Lower Ncema, Upper Ncema, pamwe neUmzingwane, uye kwasara zvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana zvemvura mumadhamu ari kushanda pari zvino. Dhamhu reUpper Ncema rakatomiswa kushandiswa pari zvino nekuda kwekushomeka kwemvura uye kanzuru inoti Umzingwane rinogona kumiswawo munguva pfupi inotevera. Panyaya yekuwedzerwa kwemari inoshandiswa nekanzuru kana kuti supplementary budget yakaparurwa nekanzuru svondo rapera, VaDube vatsanangura kuti bhajeti iyi ichashanda chete kana yapasiswa nehurumende. Pabhajeti iyi kanzuru inoti inoda kukwidza mitero nezvikamu zvinosvika mazana matatu kubva muzana uye vamwe vagari vari kutsutsumwa kuti mari iyi yakawandisa. No media source currently available

headline: VaChamisa Vanodoma VaNcube naVaKomichi seVatevedzeri Vavo
text: Mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vadoma VaWelshman Ncube pamwe naVaMorgen Komichi, sevatevedzeri vavo. VaNcube naVaKomichi vari kubatana naVaElias Mudzuri kuva vatevedzeri vatatu vaVaChamisa. VaChamisa vasimudzirawo Muzvare Thabitha Khumalo kuva sachigaro vebato, uye mutevedzeri wavo vari VaTendai Biti, avo vanga vari mutungamiri wePeople's Democratic Party. VaJacob Mafume ndivo mutauriri mutsva webato. VaMafume vanga vari mutauriri wePeople's Democratic Party. Mutauriri waVaChamisa, VaNkululeko Sibanda, vati vakaedza kuti nhaurirano nechikwata cheMDC-T chinotungamirwa naMuzvare Thokozani Khupe asi zvakakona n’anga murapwa achida. Asi mutevedzeri waMuzvare Khupe, VaObert Gutu, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hapana kumbobvira paita nhaurirano dzakadai pakati pechikwata chavo nechikwata chaVaChamisa. VaSibanda vati MDCT yaMuzvare Khupe yave kushanda neZanu PF ndosaka vari kuramba kushanda nevamwe vemapato anopikisa. Asi VaGutu vati zviri kutaurwa naVaSibanda izvi ndezvemugotsi matsuro. VaGutu vatiwo kugadzwa pazvigaro kwakaitwa VaNcube pamwe naVaBiti naMafume, hakusi pamutemo sezvo vachiti zvinzvimbo zvakadai zvinogadzwa vanhu pakongiresi chete. Asi VaMafume vaudza vatori venhau kuti VaChamisa vane masimba mubumbiro ravo remitemo rekuita izvi uye pamusoro pezvo vanoti vakapihwa masimba ekuita izvi nekomiti yepamusorosoro mubato ravo pakati pemakongiresi reNational Council. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nemamwe mapato aive mumubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance akaita seZimbabwe People First neTransform Zimbabwe kuti tinzwe paamire panyaya yekupinda muMDC. Kunyange hazvo tatadza kutaura nemutauriri weTransform Zimbabwe, VaJustin Makota, avo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo, vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika mubato iri vanoti mutungamiri weTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume, vakamirira kuita musangano nehutungamiri hwebato ravo vasati vazivisa kuti votora gwara ripi panyaya iyi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti mapato ose anopikisa ari munyika akabatana kuita bato rimwe chete ane mukana wakakura kwazvo wekubvisa Zanu PF mumasimba pachaitwa sarudzo dzinotevera. No media source currently available

headline: VanaMukoti muZvipatara zveKanzuru Vobatana naVanaChiremba Kuramwa Mabasa
text: Zvinhu munyika munyaya dzezvehutano zvaramba zvakaita manyama amire nerongo sezvo vanamukoti muzvipatara zvekanzuru vatanga kuramwa mabasa ukuwo hurumende iri kutatarika kugadzirisa dambudziko ravanachiremba muzvipatara zvehurumende vapedza mwedzi miviri vachiratidzira. Studio 7 yashanyira chipatara cheParirenyatwa nhasi ikaona kuine varwere vashoma shoma. Vakuru pachipatara ichi vange vachienderera mberi nekutonga vanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa. Matare aya akatanga nemusi weChishanu uye vamwe vanachiremba vachatongwa nemusi weChitatu. Sachigaro weHealth Service Board Dr Paulinus Sikosana vaudza Studio 7 kuti nemusi weChishanu vanachiremba havana kuuya kumatare avainge vadanwa kuti vapindure kuti sei vari kuramba kudzoka kubasa sezvakaturwa nedare reLabour Court. Pavabvunzwa neStudio 7 kuti pane vati vadzingwa here, VaSikosana vati kupindura mubvunzo uyu kungava kufukura hapwa. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutevedzeri wemutungamiriri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, Doctor Masimba Dean Ndoro vaudza Studio 7 mushure memusangano wavaita nenhengo dzavo nhasi kuti dai hurumende yatsvaga nzira dzekuita hurukuro navo kwete kuramba vachitora nzira dzisingagadzirisi dambudziko riripo. Asi Doctor Sikosana vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakagadzirira kuita hurukuro navanachiremba ava chero nguva. Vati svondo rapera vakatomboita hurukuro asi zvakakona n’anga murapwa achida. Zvichakadaro, vanamukoti muzvipatara zvekanzuru vatangawo kuramwa mabasa. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare VaMichael Chideme vatenda kuti vanamukoti vatanga kuramwa mabasa uye vati vari kuyedza kutaurirana navo. Hatina kukwanisa kubata mutungamiri wesangano revashandi vekanzuru reHarare Municipality Workers Union VaCosmas Bungu sezvo vanzi vange vabuda muhofisi vachisiya nharembozha yavo. Makirinika akawanda muguta reHarare ndeekanzuru uye kuramwa mabasa kwavanamukoti kuchapa kuti zvinhu zvitonyanye kuipa muguta rinomboita zvirwere zvakaita setyphoid necholera uye ikozvino mwaka wekunaya. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano uye vari nhengo yeMDC Doctor Henry Madzorera vashora hurumende nekupedza mwedzi miviri isina kugadzirisa dambudziko ravanachiremba vari kuramwa mabasa. VaMadzorera vatiwo idambudziko rehurumende kuda kunenedzera nekusvora vamwe kunyange vari ivo varikukanganisa. Studio 7 haina kukwanisawo kunzwa kubva kugurukota rezveutano VaObadiah Moyo asi mutungamiriri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa svondo rapera vakaudza vechidiki vebato reZanuPF kuti pane vari kunyengedza vana chiremba kuti vasadzokera kumabasa kuti hurumende yavo igoshorwa izvo vanachiremba vari kuramba. No media source currently available

headline: Dare Rosungisa Mupurisa Ari Kuita Hufakazi Pari Kutongwa Chikowore naTakawira
text: Kutongwa kwenyaya yevatori venhau, Frank Chikowore naSamuel Takawira, avo vari kupomerwa mhosva yekutadza kutevedza mutemo wekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19, kwatadza kuenderera mberi mudare remejasiteriti kuMbare mushure mekunge vafakazi panyaya iyi vatadza kuuya kudare vachinzi vange vari kurwara. Vafakazi panyaya iyi vanoti mutikitivha, VaCollin Makore pamwe nemumwe mushandi mukuru wepachipatara cheParktown Hospital, apo pakasungirwa Chikowore naTakawira, VaStuart Efraim, vatadza kuuya kudare vasina kuzivisa dare izvo zvaita kuti mutongi panyaya iyi, Amai Kudzai Hove, vape masamanisi ekuti vaviri ava vasungwe nemhosva yekuzvidza dare kana kuti maWarrant of Arrest pachirungu. Zvaitwa nevafakazi izvi zvatadzisa kuti nyaya iyi ienderere mberi uye yave kutarisirwa kuenderera mberi musi wa29 Chikunguru. Gweta raChikowore naTakawira, VaPaidamoyo Saurombe, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vaenda vakagadzirira asi hapana chafamba sezvo vafakazi vange vasipo. Chikowore naTakawira vakusungwa musi wa22 Chivabvu kuParktown Hospital vachinzi vainge vapinda muchipatara ichi zvisina mvumo. Vainzi vaida kunoita hurukuro sevatori venhau naMuzvare Mamombe, Muzvare Netsai Marova naMuzvare Cecilia Chimbiri vanove nhengo dzeMDC Alliance avo vanoti vakapambwa vakashungurudzwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori. Asi hurumende iri kuramba kuti vatatu ava vakapambwa. Vaviri ava vari kuramba mhosva yavari kupomerwa. Mukuru wesangano reMedia Institute of Southern Africa-Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vati kunyange hazvo vasingapinde panhanga nyaya dzematare vanoshushikana kuti vatori venhau vanoramba vachishungurudzwa panguva ino kunyange hazvo vari vamwe vevashandi vanoita basa rakakosha panguva ino yedenda reCovid-19. VaMoyo vaudza Studio 7 kuti sezvo hurumende iri kuronga kusimbaradza hurongwa hwekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19, vanotyira kuti zvinogona kuwedzera kushungurudzwa kwevatori venhau munyika. Munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaNick Mangwana, vaudza Studio 7 kuti havangataure nezvenyaya dziri pamberi pematare uye vachataura nezvadzo chete kana dzichinge dzapera kumatare. Pane vatapi venhau vanodarika gumi nevatanhatu vakasungwa kubvira pavharwa nyika nekuda kweCovid-19 muna Kurume. Vatapi ava vanosanganisira mutori wenhau weStudio7 anoshandira kuMasvingo, Godfrey Mtimba, uyo akasungwa kutanga kwemwedzi achipomerwa mhosva yekuzvidza mutungamiriri wenyika uye anotairisirwa kumiswa pamberi pedare nguva ipi zvayo. Mtimba aiita basa rake uye akatoburitsa magwaro ake ebasa apo akasungwa nemapurisa KuBeitbridge mutori wenhau weNewsday, Rex Mphisa, pamwe neanotengesa mapepanhau kuZimpapers, Charles Marerwa, vari kutongwa nemhosva yekuti vakatyora mutemo une chekuita nekudzvivirira kupararira kweCovid 19 kunyange hazvo bazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko nedare repamusoro zvakati vatori venhau vanobvumirwa kushanda panguva ino nyika yakavharwa sezvo vachiita basa rakakosha. KuChinhoyi, mumwe mutori wenhau weStudio7, Nunurayi Jena, ari pamberi pematare nekuda kwemhosva imwe cheteyo. No media source currently available

headline: Musangano weInternational AIDS Conference Wotanga muSouth Africa
text: Musangano wemazuva mashanu weInternational Aids Conference wakatanga muDurban South Africane musi weMuvhuro uye uchapera nemusi weChishanu. Musangano uyu uri kuzeya nyaya dzekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheHIV/AIDS uye kuti potsvagwa sei mari yekuita izvi. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa ndivo vavhura musangano uyu zviri pamutemo. VaRamaphosa vakurudzira nyika dzepasi rino nemasangano akazvipira kuti vabatane mukurwisa denda iri. Vamwe vanyarikani vari pamusangani uyu vanosanganisa munyori mukuru weUnited Nation VaBan Ki Moon, vatungamiri venyika dzemuAfrica, muimbi Elton John uye Nevanzi wamambo kana kuti Prince Harry vekuBritain. Musangano uyu wakarongwa nesangano reInternational Aids Society uye unounza pamwe chete nyanzvi dzinosvika zviuru gumi nenomwe kubva kunyika dzose dzepasi rino. Nyanzvi idzi dzinenge dzichiisa misoro pamwe chete kuti dzibatsirane kurwisa denda iri iro rauraya vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi matatu mumakore makumi matatu nemashanu. Vari kutungamira Zimbabwe kumusangano uyu igurukota rinoona nezvehutano Dr David Parirenyatwa avo vanoti Zimbabwe iri kuda kuvhara maburi ose angaite kuti vanhu vatsva vatapurirwe chirwere cheHIV. Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kumusangano uyu zvinosanganisirawo VaDaniel Molokele vanova mukuru wesangano reAIDS Accountability International avo vanoti Zimbabwe ichabatsirikana nekuve pamusangano uyu. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo nasachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Network for Positive Women Amai Martha Tolana vati kunze kwekunzwa zviri kuitwa nevamwe, nyika ichagovawo zvairi kuita. Sangano reUnited Nations rinoti rinoda kupedza mukondombera panosvika gore ra2030 uye panguva imwe cheteyo richiwanirawo vanhu mushonga. Asi UN inoti pachine mutambo sezvo paine vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni makumi matatu vari kurarama nehutachiona pasi rose, vakawanda vari muAfrica. Vanhu vakawanda vanonziwo vari kutapurirwa chirwere ichi zvikuru kuNorth Africa, Middle East nekuRussia. KuRussia kunonzi nyaya iri kupa kuti chirwere chipararire kuramba kutambira nyaya dzechingochani. Asi vakawanda vanoita zvechingochani ava vanonzi vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi zvakanyanya. VaMolokele vanoti Zimbabwe inarowo dambudziko rekusada kupinza ngochani muzvirongwa zvayo. Imwe nyaya iri kupa kuti kurwisa chirwere ichi kunetse inyaya yekuti nyika dzemuAfrica nevanobatsira vave kusunga homwe. Muna Kubvumbi 2001 nyika dzemuAfrica dzakatenderana kuAbuja, Nigeria kuti mumabhajeti adzo dziise mari inosvika zvikamu gumi nezvishanu kubva muzana kunyaya dzezvehutano. Asi zvinonzi nyika imwe chete chete ndiyo yakwanisa kuzadzikisa zvido zveAbuja Declaration. VaMolokela vanoti izvi zvapa kuti kurwisa denda iri kunetse. Amai Martha Tolana vanotendawo kuti kushaya mari kuri kupa kupa kuti zvinhu zvikone n’anga murapwa achida. Kutapuriranwa kwechirwere muZimbabwe kwakadzika kubva pazvikamu gumi kubva muzana kusvika pazvikamu gumi nezvishanu kubva muzana. Asi zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka sezvo Zimbabwe isina mari yakakwana yekubatsira vanorarama nehutachiona hweHIV/AIDS. Zimbabwe iri pachidanho chechishanu panyika dziri pamusoro soro muAfrica pachitariswa nyaya dzekupararira kwemukondombera. Vanhu vanosvika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mana vari kurarama nehutachiona muZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Politburo yeZanu-PF Yozeya Nyaya yeKuratidzira
text: Bato reZanu-PF nemusi weChitatu rakaita musangano waro wePolitburo richizeya nyaya dzezvekuratidzira kuri kuitwa munyika uye nyaya yehupfumi uho hwaenda kumawere. Vane ruzivo nezvemusangano uyu vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato iri riri kuda kusimbaradza mapurisa kuti amise kuratidzira munyika kuri kutungamirwa nevemapato anopikisa. Bato iri range richitarisirwawo kuzeyawo nyaya yekudzingwa kwedzimwe nhengo mubato, gadziriro munyaya dzekurima uye kugadzira sarudzo dzekuNorton ne Chimanimani West kune nhengo dzebato iri dzakadzingwa uye kuBikita West kuna VaMunyaradzi Kereke vari kupika jere mushure mekubata mwana mudiki chibharo. NeChishanu bato iri richaita musangano weCentral komiti kuzeya nyaya idzi zvekare. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muZanu-PF VaIgnatious Chombo vati mutungamiri webato iri VaRobert Mugabe ndivo vanenge vari sachigaro mumisangano miviri iyi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachishanda nesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition VaJoy Mabenge vanoti havaone Zanu-PF ichibuda nemazano anovaka nyika. No media source currently available

headline: Nyakupomerwa Mhosva yeKupisa Musha weNhengo yeZanu PF Anomiswa Mudare kwaMutare
text: Imwe nhengo yeMDC Alliance yekuMutasa Central yakasungwa neMugovera, yamiswa neMuvhuro mudare kwaMutare ichipomerwa mhosva yekupisa musha wenhengo yeZanu PF. Asi mutongi wedare ati nyaya iyi ichanzwikwa mangwana. VaOzwell James Chitere vaudzwa nemutongi wedare, VaTendai Mahwe, kuti nyaya yavo ichainzwa mangwana sezvo vange vakabatikana nedzimwe nyaya dzavanga vachifanirwa kutonga. Izvi zvinoreva kuti chikumbiro chaVaChitere chekuti vapihwe mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso kuitira kuti vatongwe vachibva kumba, chava kunzwikwa neChipiri. Muchuchisi wedare, VaFletcher Karombe, vati VaChitere vakanzwikwa vachiti vachapisa misha yenhengo dzeZanu PF, mushure mekutaura mashoko aya, musha waAmai Kagweda ndokubva wapiswa svondo rapera. VaChitere vari kumirirwa nemagweta anosanganisira VaRangarirai Mubata, VaBlessing Nyamaropa naAmai Peggy Tavagadza. VaMubata vati kunyange vasiri kufara nekuramba kwaVaChitere vari muhusungwa, vanotarisira kuti mangwana nyaya iyi ichapedzwa sekuvimbisa kwaitwa naVaMahwe. Vakasarudzwa zvakare kumirira Mutasa Central mudare reparamende, VaTrevor Saruwaka, vati havafari nekuona nhengo yavo ichiramba ingori muhusungwa. Papinda nyaya iyi mudare nhasi pamuzinda wedare ramejasitiriti pange pazere nhengo dzeMDC Alliance nedzeZanu PF, pamwe nevaongorori vesarudzo veEuropean Union, America nemamwe masangano akasiyana siyana. No media source currently available

headline: EU Inobatsira Zimbabwe neMamiriyoni Makumi Manomwe eMadhora
text: Sangano reEuropean Union, EU, rapa Zimbabwe mamiriyoni makumi manomwe emadhora ekuAmerica semari ichishandiswa mukabatsira kupedza nzara yakatarisana neveruzhinji uye kubatsira munyaya dzehutano nekurima. Izvi zvaziviswa nemumiriri weEU muZimbabwe, VaTimo Okonnen, pamusangano waitwa nechikwata cheEU nechikwata chehurumende yeZimbabwe pamusangano wekuedza kugadzirisa hukama pakati peZimbabwe neEU. VaOkonnen vati kuvandudzwa kwenyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, hupfumi pamwe nekupedza huori zvinhu zvakakosha kuitira kuti hurumende yeZimbabwe ikwanise kudyidzana nedzimwe nyika zvakanaka. Mashoko aVaOkonnen anouyawo apo mutungamiri weMDC, VaNelson Chamisa, vakati hapana vekunze vanoda kusima mari yavo munyika isina kugadzikana, uye izere nehuori pamwe nekusachengetedzwa kwemitemo. Nyaya yekuchengetedzwa kwemitemo nekodzero dzevanhu inyaya yanga iri mudariro zvakare pakati hurumende yeZimbabwe neEU nhasi. Zvichakadai, vakafanobata chigaro chegurukota rezvinoitika kunze kwenyika, VaJuly Moyo, vati vane chivimbo chekuti zvese zvavanenge vasingawirirane neEU vachasvika pakunzwisisana. Hukama pakati peZimbabwe neEU nedzimwe nyika dzekumavirira hwakatanga kusamira zvakanaka pakatemerwa zvirango vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pamwe nevamwe vavo vari muZanu PF zvichitevera kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu munyika uye kusafambiswa zvakanaka kwesarudzo. Zvichakadai, hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa inoti zvirango zvavakatemerwa ivo nevamwe vari muZanu PF zvinofanira kubviswa ichiti zvirango izvi zviri kunze kwemurawo uye zviri kurwadza ruzhinji rweZimbabwe. Asi veEU pamwe neAmerica dzinoti hurumende yeZimbabwe inofanira kuvandudza nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nekuona kuti kodzero dzeveruzhinji dzachenegetedzwa zvirango izvi zvisati zvabviswa. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vokurudzirwa Kugara Vakazvichengetedza Munguva yeCovid-19
text: Vanhu makumi mashanu nemumwe chete vakafa nechirwere che Covid-19 nezuro, uye vanhu mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mashanu nevatanhatu, vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro wakare. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vava zviuru zvitatu nemazana masere nevashanu, uye vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose, vava zviuru zana negumi nezvishanu, nemazana mana nemakumi mana nevashanu. Hurumende yakazivisa nezuro kuti vanhu vabaiwa nhomba yekutanga vakanga vava miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana masere negumi nezvinomwe nemazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevasere, 1, 817,598 uye vabayiwa nhomba yepiri vakanga vava zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi matanmhatu nezvitanhatu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nevaviri, 966, 672. Huwandu uhu hunogona kukwira nhasi manheru apo bazi rezvehutano richazivisa zvarawana muongororo dzaitwa nhasi. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba yeCovid-19 kuvanhu mamiriyoni gumi, kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana, senzira yekumisa kupararira kwedenda iri. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano, Dr Simbiso Ranga, vanoti dambudziko reCovid-19 rava kuda mushandira pamwe kuitira kuti denda iri risarambe richienderera mberi. Dr Ranga, avo vanova chiremba anoshandira mudunhu reNorth Carolina muAmerica, vanoti vanhu vanofanirwa kuchengetedza mitemo kuitira kuti vasabatwe nechirwere Covid-19. Kunyange hazvo hurumende iri kuti iri kufara nechirongwa chekubaya vanhu nhomba, Dr Ranga vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kuita zvakawanda zvakaita sekubaya vanhu nhomba vakawanda pamwe nekuti nhomba idzi dziwanikwe nyore. No media source currently available

headline: Chirwere cheMapapu muVana Vadiki Chinonzi Chabata Guta reHarare
text: Bepanhau reHerald rinoti muHarare maita chirwere chemapapu chiri kubata vana vadiki, pachibudawo mashoko ekuti chipatara chevana vadiki chemunyika cheHarare Children's Hospital, icho chiri paHarare Central Hospital, chiri kukundikana kubatsira vana vose vari kuendeswa pachipatara ichi. Chipatara ichi chinonzi hachina michina inodiwa mukubatsira kuti vana ava vakwanise kufema. Bepanhau iri rinoti nezuro vana vanosvika zana nemakumi mana vaive vatambirwa pachipatara ichi vachinetsekana nechirwere ichi. Mazuva mashoma adarika, hurumende yakazivisawo kuti zvipatara zvayo hazvichina oxygen, izvo zvinonzi zvakaita kuti chipatara chevana cheHarare Children’s Hospital chimbovhara zvimwe zvikamu zvacho. Mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Doctors for Human Rights, Doctor Fortune Nyamande, vanoti kushaikwa kwe oxygen munyika kuchatowedzera dambudziko rechirwere chemapapu chanetsa muguta guru renyika ichi, zvichizoita kuti chirwere ichi chipararire kune mamwe matunhu. Doctor Nyamande vanoti chirwere chemapapu ichi chinonyanyobata vana vane makore mashanu zvichidzika, uye vanenge vachinetseka kufema. Vanoti vabereki vanokwanisa kudzivirira vana vavo kubva kuchirwere ichi kuburikidza nekuita hutsanana, zvikuru pamweya wakavapoteredza. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzozeya Hurongwa hweKudzora Dhora Munyika
text: Hurumende yakazivisanemusi weMuvhuro kuti vanhu vanenge vave kusungirwa kuti vashandise mari yemunyika chete yemaRTGS. Izvi zvakonzera kusawirirana munyika vamwe vachiti zvakanaka asi vamwe vachiti kwave kuita kwewashaya kutsvaga uta nemugate. Vachitaura kuVictoria Falls kumusangano wemhuka dzemusango kana kuti Africa World Summit, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaudza vanhu kuti Zimbabwe yave nyika yagadzikana sezvo yave nemari yayo. Vati vanofanira kuroverwa maoko kuti vakwanisa kudzora dhora remunyika. Asi vaimbova gurukota rezvezvehupfum, VaTendai Biti, vanova mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, vanoti danho rakatorwa nehurumende harishandi zvachose. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMavambo Kusile Dawn, Dr Simba Makoni, avo vakambovewo gurukota rezvemari. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachidzidzisa paNelson Mandela Metropolitan University, Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, vatiwo zviri kuitwa nehurumende hazvinapundutso. VaMakoni vanoti zviri pachena kuti chiriporipocho chakaitwa nehurumende munongedzo wekuti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka vachiti nyaya yevashandi vehurumende vainge vati vanoda mari yekuAmerica yemuhoro ndizvo zvapa kuti hurumende ibve yachinja mutemo. Dr Makoni vanotiwo zvakaitwa nehurumende hazvisi pamutemo sezvo yaifanira kutanga yaenda kudare reparamende kunovandudza mutemo wakadzikwa muna 2009 kuti mari dzose dzishandiswe munyika kusanganisira yeAmerica, South Africa, Botswana nedzimwe. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa naVaBiti avo vati vambosimudza nyaya iyi mudare reparamende. Asi imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaCallisto Jokonya, vanoti zvakaitwa nehurumende hazvina kuipa. Mashoko aVaJokonya atsinhirwawo namuzvinabhizimisi VaGilbert Muponda, avo vanova nhengo yeZanu PF yakakwikwidza ikakundikana musarudzo yekutsvaga mumiriri weWarren Park muparamende. Asi Dr Makoni vanoti zvinoshamisawo kuti sei gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vari kuchinja chinja. Muzvinafundo Mugano vanotiwo zvaitwa izvi zvikasabudirira VaNcube vanenge vazvikanda mukanwa mamupere. Zimbabwe yakapedzisira kushandisa mari yayo chete muna 2009 sezvo dhora range ranyanyaya kushaya simba. Ko zvaitwa zvingashande here? Vanopikisa vanoti kupedzera hoko padehwe retsindi. Asi vehurumende vanoti imbwa hora haifunidzi nhando. No media source currently available

headline: Bato reMDC T Ronyunyuta neKushungurudzwa kweNhengo Dzaro
text: Bato reMDC T rinoti nhengo dzaro mumaruwa akawanda munyika dziri kushungurudzwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri veZanu PF, avo vari kudzivhima vachidzirova kana kuita kafiramberi. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weMDC T Muzvare Thabitha Khumalo vanoti dzimwe nhengo dzavo dzinenge dzasungwa dziri kurohwawo nemapurisa dziri muhusungwa, izvo zvavanoti munongedzo wekuti bato reZanu PF rave kugadzirira sarudzo dza 2018 nenzira yekutyisidzira vemapato anopikisa. Muzvare Khumalo vanoti matunhu ari kunyanya kushungurudzwa nhengo dzavo anosanganisira Mashonaland East, West neCentral, Masvingo, Manicaland pamwe nemumaguta. Vanoti mune mamwe matunhu nhengo dzavo dziri kushungurudzwa kuburikidza nekunyimwa chikafu chinofanirwa kunge chichipiwa pachena. Studio 7 yakundikana kunzwa kubato reZanu PF pamusoro pezvipomerwa izvi. Asi Zanu PF inogara ichiramba kuti iri kushungurudza vanoipikisa. Bato iri rinoti rinozivikanwa nekuda runyararo, richitopomera mapato anopikisa kuti ndiwo anotanga kudenha nhengo dzaro senzira yekutsvaga kuri svibisa. No media source currently available

headline: VaSikhala Vodzoserwa kuChikurubi Nyaya Yavo Ichinzi Ichanzwikwa neDare neChitatu
text: Mumiriri weZengeza West muparamende VaJob Sikhala nhasi vasvitsa chikumbiro chavo chechipfumbamwe chekuti vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo zvichitevera kusungwa kwavakaitwa mazuva zana nemakumi matanhatu adarika. Mutongi wedare, Muzvare Tafadzwa Mhiti, vati vachatura mutongo wavo neChitatu panyaya iyi. Vachisvitsa chikumbiro ichi kudare, gweta raVaSikhala, Adovate Thabani Mhofu, vati nguva yarebesa vari muhusungwa kubva pavakasungwa mazuva zana nemakumi matanhatu apfuura. VaMpofu vati nekufamba kwaita nguva mapurisa akatopedza kare kuferefeta nyaya iyi saka hapana humbowo hungakwanisa kuvhiringidzwa naVaSikhala. Vaenderera mberi vachiti pane zvashanduka kubva pavakasungwa vachiti vamwe vanhu gumi nevashanu vanosanganisira mumiriri weChitungwiza North muparamende VaGodfrey Sithole vakatobuditswa muhusungwa pamhosva ine chekuita nenyaya yakasungirwa VaSikhala. Asi muchuchisi wenyaya iyi, VaGeorge Manokore, vati havaone chachinja kubva VaSikhala pavakambonyimwa mukana wekutongwa vachibva kumba kwavo nedare ramejasitiriti pamwe nedare repamusoro realign Court. Vati VaSikhala vakabuditswa muhusungwa vanogona kuramba vachipara mhosva yakafanana neyavari kupomerwa VaChinosengwa aka hakusi kekutanga kuti VaSikhala vapomerwe mhosva yakadai. Rimwe remagweta aVaSikhaka, VaJeremiah Bamu, vatenda kuti vasvitsa zvikonzero izvi kudare vachiti vanoona sekuti zvavasvitsa kudare zvinhu zvavari kutarisira kuti zvichagutsa dare. Mune imwewo nyaya yavari kupomerwa kuvhiringidza kufambiswa kwenyaya mumatare ine chekuita nekupambwa kwenhengo yebato ravo reCitizens Coalition for Change, Muzvare Moreblessing Ali, dare rati chikumbiro chaVaSikhala chekuti vatongwe vachibva kumba kwavo yanzi igodzoka kudare mangwana kuti chikumbiro chavo chigotanga kunze kunzwikwa sezvo mutongi wedare ati nguva yanga yapera. Panga pachinzwikwa nyaya iyi idzi mudare, mapurisa anorwisa mvongamupotopoto anga achirambidza veruzhinji kupinda mudare kunyange hazvo vanhu vashomanana varivo vakwanisa kupinda mudare vachinzwa nyaya idzi. VaSikhala vakasungwa mushure mekupambwa kwakaitwa Muzvare Ali kuNyatsime nenhengo yeZanu PF, VaPius Jamba, avo vakatobvuma mhosva pamberi predate. Mutumbi waMuzvare Ali wakazowanikwa uri mutsime repane rimwe purazi riri pedyo neBeatrice wave kuora. Hama dzemufi dzinoti hadzisi kuzoviga Muzvare Ali kudzamara VaSikhala vabuditswa mujeri. Mune imwewo nyaya yanga iri mumatare, dare rarasa chikumbiro chemutori wenhau Hopewell Chin’ono chekuti nyaya yaari kupomerwa yekuvhiringidza mafambisirwo enyaya mumatare chiraswe. Chin’ono anonzi akanyora padandemutande rake reTwitter nezve kusungwa kwakaitwa mutungamiri weZimbabwe Miners Federation, Muzvare Henrietta Rushwaya avo vakabatwa panhandare yendege yeRobert Gabriel Mugabe International Airport vachida kubuditsa goridhe rairema makirogiramu matanhatu zviri kunze kwemutemo. Mutongi wedare, Amai Munodawafa Gofa, vati Chin’ono anofanira kuti atongwe nenyaya iyi vachiti mapepa emhosva ari kuburitsa mhosva zviri pachena asi Chin’ono anofanira kupindura mhosva yaari kupomerwa paichatongwa. Gweta raChin’ono, VaGift Mtisi, vatenda kuti izvi ndizvo zvaitika panyaya iyi. Amai Gofa vati Chin’ono agodzoka kudare musi 13 Zvita pachatanga kutongwa nyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Makumi Matanhatu neVapfumbamwe Vofa neCovid-19 muNyika
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika huri kuramba huchikwira mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu vaviri vashaya vari muzvipatara kuBulawayo. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizvino vasvika zviuru makumi matanhatu nevapfumbabwe kana kuti 69. Nemusi weMugovera kwakaita huwandu hunotyisa hwevanhu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi apo vanhu mazana mana nemakumi mapfumbamwe kana kuti 490 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi mushure mekunge vavhenekwa. Pavanhu vose ava kunze kwevashanu chete, vamwe vose vakabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Brighton Chireka vanoti zviri pachena kuti chirwere chadzika midzi munyika. No media source currently available Vanhu vavhenekwa chirwere ichi munyika vadarika zviuru zana nemakumi matatu nevaviri kana kuti 132, 000. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vasvika zviuru zvitatu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi mashanu nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 3,659. Pavanhu vashaya, Harare ndiyo ine vakawandisa vanosvka makumi matatu nemumwe ichiteverwa neBulawayo ine makumi maviri. Pamatunhu ose emunyika, Masvingo chete ndiro dunhu risina kana munhu mumwe chete ashaya. Tichiri panyaya iyi, kunyangwe hazvo zvinhu zvasvika pakaipisisa panyaya yerkupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus, kuramwa mabasa kwevashandi vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba kwave mumwedzi weChipiri kuri kuenderera mberi.
