Nemusi weChishanu mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachitaura kumarinda eHeroes Acre pakuvigwa kwegamba renyika VaPerrance Shiri vakakumbira vanachiremba kuti vadzokere kumabasa sevanhu vane chido chenyika yavo pamoyo. Vakati hurumende iri kuteerera zvichemo zvavo asi hazvifanire kugadziriswa vanhu vachifa. Asi mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba vakuru reSenior Hospital Doctors Association Dr Aaron Musara vanoti hurumende haina kana kubvira yataura navo kubva zvavatangawo kuramwa mabasa nemusi weChina. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnoch Dongo vanotiwo kuramwa mabasa kuri kuendera mberi nekuti zvichemo zvavo hazvisi kugadziriswa. No media source currently available Hatina kukwanisa kubata vakafanobata chigaro chegurukota rezvehutano VaAmon Murwira sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo asi ivo negurukota rezvemari VaMthuli Ncube vakambovimbisa kugadzirisa nyaya yekuramwa mabasa kwevashandi vemuzvipatara. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mana nevana kana kuti 944, 000 vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vafa vadarika zviuru gumi nezvipfumbamwe zvine mazana mapfumbamawe nemakumi maviri kana kuti 19, 920. Vapora vadarika zviuru mazana matanhatu nezviviri kana kuti 602, 000. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni gumi memanomwe ane zviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 17, 5 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana ne makumi shanu nenomwe kana kuti 154, 000. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vadarika zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi masere nemashanu kana kuti 685,000.  Vapora pasi rose vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 10,5 million.

headline: VaJuly Moyo Votarisirwa Kupa Rekupedzisira Pakuti Harare Yokwereta Here Mari Inodarika Bhiriyoni yemuNyika
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvematunhu VaJuly Moyo vave kutarisirwa kupa rekupedzisira pachikumbiro chekanzuru yeHarare chekuti ikwanise kupihwa mukana wekukwereta mari inodarika bhiriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mana emunyika. Nyaya iyi yaunza kusawirirana pakati pekanzuru nemasangano anomirira vagari. Vakafanobata chigaro chameya wemuHarare VaStewart Mtizwa vebato reMDC- Alliance vaudza Studio 7 kuti sezvinodiwa pamutemo vakaendesa kuhofisi yaVaMoyo chikumbiro chavo pamwe nezvakataurwa nevagari. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaMoyo sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa. VaMtizwa vaatti kanzuru yavo haikwanise kuita mabasa makuru kana vakasapihwa mvumo yekukwereta mari iyi. Vagari vainge vapihwa kusvika musi wa 7 Kubvumbi kuti vape pfungwa dzavo uye vakawanda vari kutsika madziro. Mutungamiri werimwe sangano revagari reHarare Residents Trust vaPrecious Shumba varamba zviri kutaurwa naVaMtizwa. Asi mutauriri weguta reHarare vaMichael Chideme vatiwo zvakakosha kuti kanzuru ikwereteswe mari iyi.nekuti izvi ndizvo zvinoiutwawo nemakanzuru ose pasi rino kana vachida kuita mabasa makuru. Izvi zvapikiswa nevanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa mune rimwe sangano rinomiririra vagari reCombined Harare Residents Association VaReuben Akili vati kanzuru haibude pachena kuti yawana marii pazvirongwa zvakafanana nekubhadhariswa kwevanhu mari dzekumbosiya motokari muguta reHarare. Pamutemo, kana kanzuru ichida kukwereta mari inofanira kutanga yagara yobuda nechisungo chinozotambirwa nameya. Kanzuru inozozivisa vanhu kuburikidza nekushambadzira mumapepanhau uye vanhu vane mazuva makumi maviri nerimwe kuti vapindure. Kana izvi zvapera chikumburo uye zvinenge zvataurwa nevanhu zvinozoendeswa kugurukota rezvematunhu kuti rione kuti kanzuru yebvumidzwa here kana kuti kwete kukwereta mari. No media source currently available

headline: VaMangudya Vokurudzirwa Kugadzirisa Dambudziko reKushomeka kweMari muNyika
text: Gavhuna webhanga guru renyika, Doctor John Mangudya, vari kutarisirwa mumazuva mashoma anotevera kuparura chirongwa chekufambiswa kwemari nehurumende kana kuti Monetary Policy Statement. Kunyange hazvo nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kupesana pane zvingaitwe naVaMangudya, vose vanotenderana havo kuti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari rinofanira kugadziriswa. Vakuru vakuru muhurumende vanoti Doctor Mangudya, avo tisina kukwanisa kubata, vanofanira kuparura hurongwa uhu mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vasati vaenda kuDavos, Switzerland kumusangano wezvehupfumi svondo rinouya. Musangano wekuDavos unoitwa kubva musi wa23 kusvika musi wa26 Ndira uyo unopindwa nevatungamiri venyika vakawanda. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wesangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaCallisto Jokonya, vanoti VaMangudya vane mutoro wakakura kuunza mazano anogadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi zvikuru dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari. Mashoko aya atsinhirwawo neimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, uye vari mukuru wsangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze. Asi vaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi vari mutungamiri webato rePeople’s Democratic Party, VaTendai Biti, vanoti havaone paine chinobuda kubva kuna VaMangudya. VaBiti vatiwo nyaya yemari ichanetsa kugadzirisa sezvo hurumende isina kuzvipira. Ko mari dzinombonzi dzawanikwa nenyika kubva kubhanga reAfrieximbank? Doctor Kanyenze vanoti zviri pachena kuti muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi. Asi VaJokonya vanoti vanhu havasi kunyatsonzwisia mafambisirwo emari iyi. Kuti zvinzi VaMangudya vabudirira, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti VaMangudya vanofanira kuparurazve kana kusuma hurumende mazano anopa kuti hupfumi hwenyika hugadzikane sezvo zvinhu zvisiri kufamba zvakanaka munyaya dzezvehupfumi zvapa kuti mitengo yezvinhu iite chamurambamhuru. No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa Vopika Kusabva Munzvimbo Dzavanotengesera
text: Rimwe remasangano anomiririra vanotengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa, reNational Vendors Union, rinoti rinogona kumisa kutengesa zvinhu mumigwagwa kana hurumende ikatambira zvirongwa zvarakaendesa kwairi. Sangano iri rinoda kuti riwaniswewo mabasa ekuita pose panoitwa zvibvumirano nehurumende nemakambani anenge apihwa ma “tender”, sezvo richiti rine vanhu vane hunyanzvi hwakasiyana siyana, asi vasina mabasa avanoita. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaSten Zvorwadza, vanoti vakamirira kunzwa kubva kuhurumende vachiti hazvina musoro kuti hurumende inopa kambani imwe chete basa remamirioni makumi mapfumbamwe emadhora asi isingape rimwe remabasa kune avo vanotengesera mumigwagwa. “Chandinopokana nacho ndechokuti vanotengesera mumigwagwa vongonzi ibvai mumigwagwa pasina kutsvakwa imwe nzira yekuti vararame nayo,” VaZvorwadza vakaudza Studio7. Vatiwo sangano ravo rinoda kuti hurumende ipe vanotengesera mumigwagwa chikamu chema ’tender’ anenge apiwa makambani munyika. No media source currently available Asi mukuru werimwe sangano reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, kana kuti Viset, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vanoti nhengo dzesangano ravo hadzisi kuzobva munzvimbo dzavanotengesera kusvika hurumende yavapa nzvimbo yakanaka yekutengesera. VaWadzayi varatidza kunyunyuta zvikuru nekurohwa kwaitwa vamwe vavo nemapurisa eZRP achishanda nemapurisa ekanzuru. No media source currently available

headline: Masangano Akawanda Oshora Kuvandudzwa kweBumbiro reMitemo
text: Masangano akazvimirira makumi masere nemapfumbamwe abatana pamwe chete mukuramba kutambirwa kwekuvandudzwa kwebumbiro remitemo kekutanga kana kuti constitutional amendment bill number 1 kwakaitwa nedare repasi nemusi wechipiri. Masangano aya anoti uku kudzosera nyika kunguva yebumbiro reLancaster House. Bhiri iri riri kuda kuvandudza mutemo unobata kudomwa kwevatongi vematare edzimhosva vepamusoro, richipa masimba ekuita izvi kumutungamiri wenyika. Mugwaro raaburitsa pamwe chete, masangano aya anoti ari kushushikana zvikuru nekupasiswa kwebhiri iri nenhengo dzeparamende idzi, achiti zvinosuvisa kuti paramende yakundikana kudzivirira pamwe nekuchengetedza bumbiro remitemo uye hutongo hwejekerere sezviri muchikamu 119 chebumbiro remitemo. Masangano aya anotiwo bhiri iri riri kuda kuzvidza rusunguko rwekutongwa kwedzimhosva. Masangano aya ari kukurudzira vana veZimbabwe kuti vatore matanho uye kutaura vasingatyi vachitsoropodza danho rekuda kuvandudza mutemo iri, sezvavatarirwa nebumbiro remitemo. Mukuru wesangano re Election Resource Center, VaTawanda Chimhini, vanoti vanhu vari muparamende havasi kuita zvido zvevanhu vakavavhotera nekuti bumbiri rakabva muvanhu. Bhiri iri rava kutarisirwa kuenda kudare reseneti. Kana dare iri rikaritambirawo, rinenge roenda kumutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, kuti varisaine kuti richiva mutemo unoshandiswa. Kuvandudzwa kwebhiri iri kwakaitika mushure mekunge mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika, uye vari gurukota rezvemitemo, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaunza bhiri iri mudare reNational Assembly kuti rivandudzwe No media source currently available

headline: National Aids Council Yobatsira Vagari vemuBulawayo Pachena
text: Vamwe vanhu vanogara kunze kweguta reBulawayo nemusi weChina vakaongororwa ropa, chirwere cheshuga, maziso nezvimwe pachena pasi pechirongwa cheNational Aids Council. Chirongwa ichi chakaitwa kunzvimbo yeRobert Sinyoka Primary School kunze kweguta reBulawayo pasi pechirongwa cheNational AIDS Council chekukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vaongororwe ropa ravo. Mukuru weLuveve District Aids Awareness Committee Amai Priscilla Mac-Isaac vakaudza Studio 7 kuti chirongwa ichi chaitwa neNAC ichishanda nemamwe masangano akasiyana-siyana, uye chakanangana nevanhu vanoonekwa vari panjodzi yekutapurirwa hutachiwana hweHIV. Vamwe vevanhu vakauya kuchirongwa ichi vakakwanisa kuongororwa ropa ravo pamwe nezvimwe vakati vakafara nechirongwa ichi sezvo chakaunzwa kwavari. Mumwe wevanhu vakabatsirwa ndemumwe wevechidiki anonzi Thomas Nyoni uyo ati anoziva kuti zvakakosha kuti munhu azive kuti ropa rake rine hutachiwana hweHIV here kana kuti kwete. Asi ati vanhu vakawanda vemunharaunda yenzvimbo yeRobert Sinyoka vanotadza kuita izvi nekuti vanoshaya mari yekuenda kuzvipatara zviri pedyo. Izvi zvakatsigirwawo nemumwe musikana uyo angoda kudeedzwa nezita rekuti Patience. Muzvare Margaret Mucheki avo vati vakabatwa nechirwere chemaziso chinonzi glaucoma vati vafarawo kuti vakwanisa kutariswa maziso avo pachena. Amai Mac-Isaac vati veNAC vave kugara vachiita zvirongwa zvekuenda muvanhu senzira yekukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vazive pavamire mairirano nehutachiwana hweHIV/ Aids. Pachirongwa ichi painge paine mamwe masanganowo akasiyana-siyana anosanganisira veZimbabwe National Family Planning Council avo vange vachidzidziswawo nezvekuronga mhuri kuchishandiswa nzira dzekudzivirira kubata pamuviri dzakasiyana-siyana. Mamwe masangano akadai seJustice for Children Trust neChildline vange varipowo vachidzisa vanhu pamusoro pekodzero dzevana uye nezvekudzivirira kushungurudzwa kwevana. No media source currently available

headline: VaMohadi Vokuridziva Vanhu Kuti Vasimbaradze Kuzvidzivirira Kubva kuCoronavirus
text: Mumwe mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaKembo Mohadi nemusi weChina vakakurudzira vanhu kuti vangwarire kutapurirwa chirwere checovid19 icho chiri kubata vanhu vakawanda munyika nepasi rose. VaMohadi vanova sachigaro wekomiti yekurwisa chirwere ichi kana kuti Covid 19 Taskforce vainge vaine mamwe makurukota ehurumende vachishanyira kuChinhoyi University of Technology (CUT) vakakurudzira vanhu kuti vapfeke zvekuzvidzivirira muromo nemhuno kana kuti maface masks. VaMohadi vati chirwere cheCovid-19 chakaita kuti vanhu vamuke nekushandisa ruzivo rwavainarwo kupedza matambudziko ari munyika kusanganisira zvikwanisiro zvekudzivirira hutachiona hwecoronavirus. Asi mumwe mushandi anogadzira maface masks paCUT asina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti mari yavari kuhoreswa ishoma zvikuru zvichienzaniswa neyavari kuwana kana vatengesa zvavanenge vagadzira. Mushandi uyu anoti vari kupihwa mari zvichienderana nekuti vagadzira maface masks mangani achiti mari yakawanda yaakatambira madhora zviuru zvishanu-ZWL$5 000 asi anoti vakambotambira ZWL$300. CUT iri kugadzira maface masks zviuru zvitatu pazuva zvinovapa madhora zviuru mazana matanhatu pamwedzi ZWL$600 000 sezvo face mask imwechete ichitengeswa nemadhora makumi mashanu. Panyaya yekuti sei paCUT paine maface masks nemasanitizer akawanda zvimwe zvipatara zvichiti hazvina zvinhu izvi, mutauriri weCUT VaMusekiwa Tapera vanoti akatengwa kari akamirira kuzotorwa. VaTapera vatadza kuti taurira kuti vakambopihwa marii nehurumende yekutanga kugadzira zvikwanisiro zvinoderedza kutapuriranwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reMDC Alliance VaHlatshwayo vanoti zvinoshamisa kuti vamwe vana nevarikunyoresa bvunzo vari kushaya maface masks asi achigadzirwa muzvikoro. VaHlatshwayo vanotiwo zviri kuitika mukutenga zvikwanisiro zvinoratidza kuti huori hwatekeshera muhurumende. Vamwe vapinda musangano wanhasi vanoti hazvina kujeka kuti ndiani chaiye ari kuwana mari pakutengeswa kwezvikwanisiro zviri kugadzirwa muzvikoro kana zvichitadza kupanana zvikwanisiro. No media source currently available

headline: VanaChiremba Vanorwira Kodzero dzeVanhu Voramba Kuti Typhoid Iri Kudzikira muNyika
text: Sangano ranachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights rinoti kunyange hazvo hurumende ichiti chirwere chemanyoka cheTyphoid chadzikira, humbowo hunoratidza kuti chirwere ichi chakateshera muguta reHarare nenzvimbo zhinji munyika. Vachitaura mushure mekuenda kuchipatara cheBeatrice Infecttious Hospital muHarare uko kuri kurapwa vanhu vanfungidzirwa kuti vanetyphoid, gurukota rinoona nezvehutano Dr David Parirenyatwa vakati kanzuru yeHarare pamwe nebazi ravo vakamisa kupararira kwechirwere ichi. Vakati pavanhu makumi mashanu vanofungidzirwa kuti vane typhoid kuchipatara ichi vazhinji vacho vaibva kuMbare uko kwashaya mwana ane makore gumi nematatu nechirwere ichi musi weKimusi. Asi munyori mukuru weZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights Dr Evans Masitara vati pane vanhu vakawanda zvikuru vari kubatwa neTyphoid muHarare nedzimwe nzvimbo munyika. VaMasitara vati vanhu vakawanda vari kuenda kuzvipatara zvakazvimirira uye vane humbowo hwekuti nyaya yetyphoid haizi kutaurwa nemazvo nebazi rezvehutano. Vanotiwo zvinosuwisa kuti vanhu vari kurwara nechirwere chinokwanisa kudzivirirwa uyewo vati vese vari kubata nezvirwere zvemanyoka vanofanira kuendesa kanzuru yeHarare nedzimwe dziri munzvimbo dzavanogara kumatare kuti varapwe pachena vachiti makunzuru ndiwo anebasa rekuona kuti vanhu vawana mvura yakachena uyewo kuti marara atakurwa. Asi mutauririri we kanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme vanoti kanzuru yavo iri kurapa vanhu vese vane zvirwere zvemayoka pachena. Humbowo kubva kubazi rezvehutano hunoratidzawo kuti mwedzi uno chete pane vanhu vanodarika zviuru gumi vakabatwa nezvirwere zvemanyoka munyika yese uye pane vanhu vana vakatofa nekuda kwezvirwere izvi munyika yese. Zvirwere izvi zvakwanda kuMashonaland Central neManicaland kozotiwo Mashonaland West, Harare neBulawayo. No media source currently available

headline: Munhu Mumwe Chete Ofa neCovid-19 Hurumende Ichirwisa Kuti muZvikoro Musarambe Muine Dambudziko Iri
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti munhu mumwe chete akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nemusi weSvondo zvasiya huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira hwave zviuru zvina nemazana matanhatu nemana kana kuti 4, 604. Vanhu zana nemakumi maviri kana kuti 120 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi uye pavanhu ava zvikamu makumi matatu nemasere kubva muzana vana vechikoro kuManicaland kune gumi, Matabeleland North makumi matatu nemumwe uye vashanu kubva kuBulawayo. Mukuru anoona nezvekurwisa denda reCovid-19 munyika Dr Agness Mahova vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kushanda neStudio 7 kuona kuti chirwere ichi hachirambe chichipararira muzvikoro. Vati vakatenga zvekuvhenekesa chirwere ichi zvakakwana uye vari kufara kuti vari kukwanisa kuti chisapararire munharaunda kubva kuzvikoro. No media source currently available Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira gore rapera vave zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nemapfumbamwe zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi maviri nemashanu kana kuti 129, 625. Vanhu zana nemakumi maviri nemumwe vakapora zvasiya vapora vave zana rezviuru nemakumi maviri nemaviri zvine mazana maviri nemakumi mana nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 122, 249. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba vave mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru makumi matatu nemanomwe zvine gumi nevatanhatu kana kuti 3 037, 013. Vabayiwa nhomba kechipiri sezvinokurudzirwa vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru zana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemanomwe zvine mazana matatu nemakumi matatu nemumwe kana kuti 2 197 331.

headline: Kanzuru yeChinhoyi Yotsamwisa Vatyairi veDzimotokari
text: Vazhinji vataura neStudio7 muChinhoyi vanoti nguva dzakawanda vanosungirwa kusapaka motokari zvakanaka vachiti panenge pasina mitsetse yakajeka pavanopaka motokari dzavo. Mumwe anetsana nemapurisa nhasi ndiMuzvare Agnes Chiwoko avo vanogara nekushanda kuSouth Africa. Muzvare Chiwoko vati pavamisa motokari yavo panga pasina mitsetse yanga yakajeka izvo zvaita kuti vabhadhariswe madhora makumi mashanu nematatu. Muzvare Chiwoko vati vashandi vekanzuru vari kuita huori vachiti vanoda kusunga motokari dzine manhamba ekune dzimwe nyika kuitira kuti vapihwe mari yechioko muhomwe. Mumwe mutyairi wemotokari inotakura veruzhinji, VaTom Mbire, vati kanzuru inofanirwa kugadzirisa pekumisa motokari vasati vaita shave rekutora mari. VaAndrew Chisi vatiwo nzvimbo dzekumisa motokari iduku zvakanyanya uye mutsetse yacho haiwoneke vachiti nguva yavanopihwa kuti vamise motokari dzavo ipfupi padhora rimwechete paawa. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeChinhoyi, VaTichaona Mlauzi, vati mapurisa ari kunzi ndeekanzuru haasi, vakati kanzuru yakapa basa iri kukambani yakazvimirira yeClina Investment. Asi VaMlauzi vati vachaongorora zvichemo zvevanhu sezvo kubata basa kwakaipa kwekambani iyi kuchisvibisa zita rekanzuru. Hatina kunzwa divi rekambani yeClina Investment sezvo mukuru wavo, VaBrian Michels, vanga vasinga davire nharembozha yavo. No media source currently available

headline: Kanzuru yeGweru Yoferefetwa neChikwata Chakadomwa neHurumende
text: Gurukota rezvekutongwa kwematunhu, Va July Moyo, vakaumba komiti yekuti iferefete kanzuru yeguta reGweru. Komiti iyi yakadomwa mwedzi wapera, uye ine vanhu vanomwe, sachigaro wayo ari mumwe mukuru mubazi rekutongwa kwematunhu, vangonzi VaJ. Chinyengetere. VaMoyo vakagadzawo mumwe mushandi mubazi ravo, Amai J. Nyamutenha, semunhu achange achinyora zvose zvichange zvichiitwa nechikwata ichi. Vamwe vari muchikwata ichi ndiMuzvare E. E. Veremu, VaC. Mudavanhu, VaC. Mpengesi, VaA. Nhamo naVaE. Gundumura. Izvi zvakaitwa mazuva mashoma mushure mekunge kanzuru yeGweru yambomisa basa munyori weguta, Amai Elizabeth Gwatipedza, ichivapomera mhosva yekuita huori pamwe nekutadza kuita basa ravo sezvinotarisirwa. Studio7 yaedza kufonera Va Moyo kuti tinzwe divi ravo, asi vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Hatinawo kukwanisa kunzwa divi ra Amai Gwatipedza, sezvo vanga vasiri kubatika panharembozha yavo. Mugwaro ravo ravakatumira kuchikwata chiri kuferefeta kanzuru yeGweru musi wa 22 Gumiguru 2019, VaMoyo vanoti komiti iyo ichaferefeta kanzuru yeGweru, ichabatata nyaya dzakawanda, kusanganisirawo zvakaitika kusvika pakuti Amai Gwatipedza vambomiswa basa. Meya weGweru, Va Josiah Makombe, vanoti ichokwadi kuti pane chikwata chakadomwa naVaMoyo kuti chiferefete zviri kuitika mukanzuru yavo. VaMakombe vanoti vakaziviswa naVaMoyo nezvechikwata ichi uye vanotambira zvakaitwa naVaMoyo sezvo vakatevedza mutemo. Asi vanoti komiti yakadomwa iyi inofanirwa kuita basa rayo ichitevedza mitemo yenyika pasina nyaya dzekupumhana huroyi. pakombomiswa basa kwakaitwa Amai Gwatipedza, VaMakombe vanoti kanzuru yavo yakaita ongororo zviri pamutemo pakaonekwa kuti munyori weguta aikundikana kuita basa rake sezvinotarisirwa. Chimwe chiri kukushushikana naVaMakombe inyaya yekuti chikwata chakadomwa naVaMoyo chiri kuita basa racho panguva iyo kanzuru yavo iri kuferefetawo zvakapa kuti Amai Gwatipedza vaombomiswa basa, izvo vanoti zvinogona kuvhiringwa nechikwata chiri kuferefetawo kanzuru yavo. "Kana kanzura achidiwa nekomiti yaVaMoyo, ukuwo achidiwa kuti ape humbowo kukomiti yekanzuru yedu panoitwa seyi? Zvinoreva kuti zviri kuitwa nekanzuru zvinotombomiswa kuitira kuti munhu uyu amire pamberi pechikwata ichi. Zvinodzosera shure basa redu," vadaro VaMakombe. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vakawanda Vanoti muZimbabwe Hamuna Runyararo
text: Nyika dzepasi rose dzacherechedza zuva rerunyararo pasi rose, kana kuti International Day of Peace. Asi vakawanda vanoti hapana runyararo muZimbabwe nekuda kwezvehupfumi nezvematongerwo enyika zvisina kumira zvakanaka. Vakawanda vanoti munyika hamuna runyararo nekuda kwezvinhu zvakawanda zvinosanganisira kufa kwevanhu vakawanda nechirwere chekorera, kushaya mari kumabhangi, kutadza kutenga zvekudya nekuda kwemitengo yakakwira, pamwe nekumbunyikidzwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kwakaitwa musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika. VaClifford Jabangwe vanoti hapana runyararo munyika panguva ino apo mapurisa ari kuswera achitandanisa vanhu vanotengesa zvinhu zvavo mumigwagwa. VaJabangwe vanoti vanhu vakawanda vari kushungurudzwa mupfungwa. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaPassmore Nyakureba, vanoti runyararo zvinoreva kugadzikana kwezvinhu mupfungwa nemanzwiro evanhu kana vachirarama munyika. VaNyakureba vanoti vanhu vakawanda hapana chavanopemberera zuva rerunyararo ivo vachirara mumitsetse yemabhangi vachitsvaka mari, vechidiki vasina mabasa uye kuzvipatara vanhu vachifa nekushaya mishonga. Vamwe vagarii vanoti kuurayiwa kwevanhu nemasoja vachiratidzira muHarare mwedzi wapera mucherechedzo wekuti munyika hamuna runyararo. Asi mumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi, VaLangton Mubaiwa, vanoti munyika mune runyararo. VaMubaiwa vanoti zviri kuita mapurisa zvekubvisa vanotengesera mumigwagwa idanho rekuisa runyararo munyika. Chiyero chenyika dzine runyararo cheGlobal Peace Index 2018 chinoratidza kuti nyika dzemuAfrica dzakawanda hadzina runyararo rwakakwana sezvinotarisirwa. Global Peace Index 2018 inoratidza kuti Iceland nedzimwe nyika dzakaita seNew Zealand, Austria, Portugal neDenmark ndidzo dziri pamusoro kuve nerunyararo pasi rose. Syria ndiyo inonzi ine mhirizhonga yakawanda pasi rose pamwe nenyika dzakaita seAfghanistan, South Sudan, Iraq pamwe neSomalia. Zuva reInternational Day of Peace rinocherechedzwa musi waGunyana 21 gore rega rega, uye gore rino ndereche makumi manomwe kubva pakatarwa zuva iri kuti richerechedzwe nenyika dzose zdiri muUnited Nations. No media source currently available

headline: Makambani Opindawo Muhurongwa hweKutenga Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Vemabhizinesi vaparura chirongwa chekubaya vanhu nhomba vachishanda pamwe chete nehurumende nechinangwa chekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Vemabhizinesi vaparura chirongwa chinonzi Business Preparedness, Prevention and Response to Covid -19 kana kuti BPPRI kuti vabatsirane nehurumende kudzikisa huwandu hwevanobatwa neCovid-19 kuburikidzanekutenga nhomba nezvimwe zvekushandisa muzvipatara kurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19. Vachitaura pakuparurwa kwechirongwa ichi nhasi muHarare, sachigaro weBPPRI, Amai Getrude Mashonganyika, vati vemabhizimusi vanoda kuti dambudziko reCovid-19 ripere kuitira kuti mabhizinesi avo abudirire izvo zvakavasunda kuti vatengewo nhomba dzeCovid-19 kuitira kuti nyika ikurumidze kuva nehuwandu hunotarisirwa hwevanhu vabayiwa nhomba munyika yose, kana kuti herd immunity. Kambani yeCIMAS ndiyo ichange ichitungamirira vemabhizimusi muchirongwa chekutengwa kwenhomba idzi. Vachitaura pachiitiko ichi, sachigaro weCimas, Amai Emma Fundira, vatiwo chinangwa chavo ndechekuti vanhu vakawanda vazvidzivirire kuchirwere chinouraya ichi. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezveutano, Dr John Mangwiro, vatiwo vafadzwa zvikuru nekubatana kwemabhizimusi nehurumende mukurwisa chirwere cheCovid-19 VaMangwiro vatiwo vari kutarisira kuti makambani aya achapawo veruzhinji, kunyanya kunzvimbo dzakasarira shure, ruzivo pamusoro pezvakanakira kubaiwa kwenhomba. VaMangwiro vatiwo hurumende yakasarudza kushandisa nhomba yeSinopharm neSinovac nedzimwewo nekuti ndidzo dzinogona kuchengetedzeka zvakanaka munyika. CIMAS inoti vemabhizimusi vakaisa madhora ekuAmerica miriyoni imwe chete kutsigira chirongwa chekutengwa kwenhomba. Nezuro, vanhu zviuru gumi nezvinomwe nemazana matatu nemakumi mana nevashanu, 17 345, vakabayiwa nhomba yekutanga nezuro wakare, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga pazviuru mazana matatu nemakumi masere nezvisere nemakumi maviri nemumwe chete, 388 21. Vanhu zvuru zvitanhatu nemazana manomwe nemakumi maviri nevapfumbamwe, 6 729, vakabayiwa nhomba yepiri nezuro wakare, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabayiwa nhomba yepiri pazviuru makumi matanhatu nezvipfumbamwe nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri, 69 992. Zimbabwe iri kushandisa mishonga yeSinovac neSinopharm kubaya vanhu, kunyange hazvo World Health Organization ichiti haisati yapa mishonga iyi chitambi chekuti ishandiswe kuruzhinji rwevanhu. Zimbabwe inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni gumi. No media source currently available

headline: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe Zviri muAmerica Zvawaniswa Mukana Weku Tenga Dzimba ne Steward Bank
text: No media source currently available Bhanga re Steward Bank rinoti rine hurongwa hwekuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muAmerica zvikwanise kutenga dzimba pasina kusungirwa kubhadhara zvikamu kubva muzana zvemari yemba inenge ichida kutengwa. ​Mumwe weavo vari kuronga chirongwa ichi muAmerica vakamirira Steward Bank, muzvare Revesayi Nyahasha, vanoti vachange vachiparura chirongwa ichi kuzvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kuDallas Texas neMugovera. Izvi zvinotevera chirongwa chekutanga chakaitirwa muWashington DC neChishanu chapfuura. Muzvare Nyahasha vanoti zvakakosha kuti vanhu vawane pekusvikira kana vachinge vashanya kumusha pavanoti pavo, uye vanokwanisawo kuchengeta hama dzavo mudzimba idzi dzinenge dziri mumazita avo. "Chirongwa ichi chirikutambirwa zvakanaka chaizvo muAmerica uye tiri kushandisa chizvino zvino chema Apps mukubatsira vanenge vachida kupinda muchirongwa ichi padandemutande. Vanokwanisa kushandisa app yedu mukuvhura bhuku rekubhangi yedu uye mukuzo tenga imba pasi pechirongwa chedu ichi," Muzvare Nyahasha vaudza Studio 7.

headline: Mapato Onyorerana Pasi Kuita Sarudzo Dzisina Mhirizhonga
text: Mapato ose ezvematongerwo ari kukwikwidza musarudzo dzegore rino anyorerana chibvumirano chekuti achachengetedza pamwe nekukurudzira runyararo pamberi pesarudzo. Vari kukwikwidza pasarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika vari makumi maviri nevatatu nhasi vatora mhiko yekuti ivo nemapato avo vachachengetedza runyararo pamberi pesarudzo. Vachitaura pakutora kwavaita mhiko iyi, vanga vakamirira MDC-T inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa, uye vari sachigaro webato iri, VaMorgan Komichi, vati hurumende inofanira kuona kuti masoja ose ari mumaruwa abviswa kuitira kuti mumaruwa ese muve nerunyararo uye veruzhinji vasagare vachitya. VaKomichi vatiwo vari muchiuto vanofanira kubuda pachena vachitaura kuti vacharemekedza anenge akunda musarudzo zvisinei nekuti akaenda kuhondo here kana kuti kwete. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemutauriri weMDC yavaWelshman Ncube, VaKurauone Chihwayi, avo vati sarudzo dzose dzakapfuura dzaiitwa zvine mhirizhonga mukati zvaipa kuti sarudzo idzi dzisatambirike. Mutungamiri webato reNational Constitutional Assembly, VaLovemore Madhuku, vati zvakakosha kuti mapato asangangotaura chete kuti kusave nemhirizhonga vachiti vemapato varemekedze zvavazvipira kuita. Vanga vakamirira mutungamiri weZanu PF uye vari mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, VaObert Mpofu, avo vanove munyori anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muZanu PF uye vari gurukota rinoona nezvinoitika mukati menyika, vati sebato riri kutonga pamwe nehurumende vachaita zvose zvinodiwa kuitira kuti sarudzo dzegore rino dziiitwe zviri pachena. Imwe nhengo yeZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vati kuita sarudzo murunyararo kwakakoshera kusimbaradza chimiro chenyika. Mutungamiri webato reUnited Democracy Movement, Amai Violet Mariyacha, vati kazhinji vanhukadzi ndivo vanonyanyorwadziswa pose panoitwa mhirizhonga vachiti zvakakoshera madzimai kuti sarudzo dziitwe pasina mhirizhonga. Sachigaro wekomisheni inoona nezvesarudzo yeZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Amai Priscilla Chigumba, vakurudzira mapato ezvematongerwo enyika kuti vaedze kugadzirisana murunyararo kana paita gakava panguva dzekutsvaga rutsigiro vachishandisa komiti yekomisheni yavo yeMulti-Party Liason Committee iyo yavati ichaumbwa nekomisheni yavo munguva pfupi iri kutevera. VaFrancis Danha vebato reHashtag 1980 Freedom Movement Chinhu Chedu vadzingwa pachiitiko ichi nemapurisa mushure mekunge vatukirira Amai Chigumba vachiti havafanire kutaura sezvo vachiti vanofanira kusiya basa vachivapomera mhosva yekutadza kufambisa basa zvakanaka pamberi pesarudzo. VaDanha vakatadzisa kuumbwa kweMulti-Party Liason Committee svondo rapera nezvikonzero zvimwechetezvo. Kutorwa kwaitwa mhiko yekuchengetedza runyararo kwaitwa nevemapato ezvematongerwo enyika kwanga kwakarongwa nekomisheni inoona nezverunyararo nekupodzwa kwemaronda yeNational Peace and Reconciliation Commission. No media source currently available

headline: Rimwe Sangano reVarimi Rotsigira Hurongwa hweKubhadhara Vachena Vakatorerwa Minda
text: Rimwe sangano revarimi reZimbabwe Farmers Union (ZFU), rinoti rinotambira nemufaro hurongwa hwehurumende hwekuti varimi vatema vari mumapurazi akatorerwa vachena vabhadhare mitero ichashandiswa mukuripa vachena ava budiriro dzavakanga vaita pamapurazi avo. Mukuru weZFU, VaPaul Zakariya vanoti kubhadhara zvivakwa nebudiriro zvakasiya zvaitwa nevachena ava kunopa varimi vechitema ava chiremera chekuti vakabhadhara zvavari kushandisa, kwete kuti vakaita zvekubvuta. “Handiona sekuti chingave chinhu chingaremera vanhu kuti vave ne ownership yakadzika pamusoro peminda yavanenge vachishandisa. Idanho rinokwanisa kuti ritipe chiremera munharaunda yatinogara uyewo nepasi rose kuti vakanga varipo paminda iyoyo vakabhadharwa,” VaZakariya vanodaro. VaZakariya vanoti kubhadhara kwavari kuita mari idzi kuburikidza nemitero iri kubhadhariswa varimi vakagariswa patsva ava hakusi kuti vari kutenga ivhu ravari kurima kwete. “Varimiri vanenge vachibhadhara zvivakwa nebudiriro dzakaitwa nevachena ava, kwete kuti tiri kutenga ivhu redu, kwete.” Mukutanga kwemwedzi uno gurukota rezveupfumi VaPatrick Chinamasa vakazivisa kuti hurumende yakanga yave kutanga kuita ongororo mumapurazi kuti ione kukosha kwakaita budiriro dzakasiiwa nevachena vakatorerwa mapurazi ava. Vakati izvi ndizvo zvinozovapa ruzivo rwekuti murimi oga oga obhadhara marii, uye murimi wechichena akabviswa papurazi apa anozopiwawo marii. Kutanga muna 2000, vachena vanodarika zviuru zvina vanonzi vakabviswa zvine chisimba pamapurazi avo achipiwa kune vatema, asi minda mizhinji yakararira nekuda kwekushaiwa zvikwanisiro kwevarimi vatsva ava. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reBuy Zimbabwe Rinoti Vanhu Ngavatenge Zviri Kugadzirwa muNyika
text: Sangano reBuy Zimbabwe iro rinokurudzira kuti vanhu vatenge zvinhu zvinogadzirwa munyika rinoti kuita izvi kunobatsira kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi. Chirongwa cheBuy Zimbabwe ichi chakaparurwa muZimbabwe muna 2011 asi change chiri kunetsa kushambadzira nenyaya yekushaya mari. Vachitaura pamazana evanhu, muChinhoyi nemusi weMugovera, mukuru weBuy Zimbabwe Muzvare Letwin Mutasa vakati kutenga zvigadzirwa zvemunyika kunopa kuti dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari ripere sezvo mari yakawanda isingapere nekutenga zvinhu kune dzimwe nyika. Izvi zvakatsigirwa naMeya veChinhoyi VaTest Michaels avo vanga vari munyarikan pagungano iri. VaMichaels vakati Buy Zimbabwe inoita kuti makambani akavharwa avhurwe izvo zvinoita kuti munyika muve nemabasa. Gavhuna weRBZ Dr John Mangudya vanoti nekuda kwekushomeka kwemari uku, nyika ichaparura mabond notes ayo okonzerawo mutauro munyika vamwe vachiti achatoita kuti zvinhu zviende kumawere. Mukoti mukuru pachipatara cheChinhoyi Dr Kirsty Smith vanoti zvekudya zvinorimwa munyika hazvina maGMO ayo anozokonzera zvirwere. Muzvare Shamiso Kachere avo vanogadzira doro nekambani yeMbarure Distillers vanoti hwahwa hunogadzirwa munyika hwakanyorwa zviri mukati (alcohol content) kwete zvemakambani edzimwe nyika vasingataure chokwadi izvo zvinozoita kuti vanhu vararadze. Kambani yeBuy Zimbabwe yaikuridzira kuti vanhu vashandise zvigadzirwa zvemunyika yakabatana nekambani yeMetro Peech iyo yakapa mubayiro yakawanda kune vakatenga zvinhu zvakagadzirwa munyika mumwedzi mina yapfuura. Nekuvharwa kwemakambani akawanda munyika, Zimbabwe yave kutenga zvinhu kunyika dzakaita seSouth Africa neChina. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti kuti chirongwa ichi chishanda, vanogadzira zvinhu munyika vanofanira kugadzira zvinhu zvemhando yepamusoro soro uye zvinhu izvi zvinofanira kutengeswa nemutengo uri nani kwete kudhurisa. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi veForestry Commission Voyaura neNhamo
text: Vashandi veForestry Commission vanoti vanoda rubatsiro nekuti vave nemakore akawanda vasingapiwe mari dzavo dzakakwana. Mumwe wevashandi ava, uyo aramba kudomwa nezita, ati anovimba kuti gurukota idzva rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vachavabata zviri nani pane zvavaiitwa nevaimbove gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa. Mushandi uyu anoti VaChinamasa ndivo vakaita kuti Forestry Commission isave pasi pehurumende muna 2015. Munyori mukuru we National Employment Council for Lumber Milling, Timber Processing and Trading Industry, VaZakia Tagwirei, vanoti chimwe chakakonzera izvi ndechokuti vashandi ava havasi pasi pesangano rinomirira vashandi. “Zvave nenguva chaizvo, kusvika kumakore matanhatu vashandi ivava ava vachipihwa mari dziri pasi pedzakatarwa pamutemo,” VaTagwirei vaudza Studio 7. “Havana kumbosvika kwatiri kuzotsvaka rubatsiro. Ndinoona sekuti chinovatadzisa kusvika kusaziva kuti veNational Employment Council inovabatsira kusvika papi…asi tichavabatsira kana vakatiudza.” Vashandi vakawanda vari mudambudziko iri ndivo vanoita basa recheka matanda vachiatengesa. No media source currently available

headline: CHRA Inoti Harare Iri Kusiya Madzimai Akazvitakura Asina Rubatsiro paGlen View Polyclinic
text: Sangano revagari vemuguta guru reHarare, reCombined Harare Residents Association kana kuti CHRA, rinoti zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka paGlen View Poly Clinic apo panonzi pane vakoti vashoma. Mukuru wezvirongwa muCHRA, VaReuben Akili, vanoti paGlen View Polyclinic panobatsirwa madzimai anenge akazvitakura, uye vanhu vari kubayiwawo nhomba yeCovid-19 pachipatara ichi. VaAkili vanoti chipatara ichi hachina mvura yekushandisa, izvo zvave kuisa hupenyu hwemadzimai akazvitakura panjodzi. VaAkili vanoti matambudziko akatarisana neGlevn View Polyclinic akabuda pachena pamusangano wakaitirwa padandemutande nguva pfupi yapfuura uyo waizeya matambudziko ari kusangana nemadzimai munzvimbo iyi. Musangano uyu wakanzwawo kuti vamwe varwere vave kuendeswa kuBudiriro 1 kuti vanorapwa. Kubudiro 1 kunonzi kwakamanikidzanawo zvekuti madzimai akazvitakura anogona kuguma atapurirwa chirwere ccheCovid-19. CHRA inoti vanoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko mukanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vakati kanzuru ine vakoti vashoma sezvo vakawanda vari kuenda kunotsvaga mafuro manyoro. Studio 7 yatumira mibvunzo kuna VaChideme asi vange vasati vapindura pataenda pamhepo. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokundikana Kugara Dare Kutonga Vakoti Vayakamisa Basa
text: Hurumende, iyo yange yadaidza neChina chikwata chekutanga chevakoti pachipatara cheUBH kuBulawayo kuti chimire pamberi pedare, kana kuti tribunal, vachipomerwa mhosva yekutyora mutemo wevashandi, yati nyaya iyi yave kuzonzwikwa svondo rinouya sezvo pane zvimwe zvanzi zvichiri kuda kuitwa. Dare remakurukota rakati rine hurongwa hwekuranga vakoti churu nezana nemakumi maviri nevasere vari kuti havana kwanise kushanda kwemazuva mashanu nekuti havana mari. Mukuru wechipatara cheUBH, Dr Narcisius Dzvanga, mutsamba yavakatumira vakoti vakamiswa basa musi wa 30 Gumiguru, vakati vakatyora mutemo we Labour (National Employment Code of Conduct) Regulations, Statutory Instrument 15 of 2006 nekuti vakange vaudzwa kuti vashande mazuva mashanu vakatsika madziro. Vakoti ava vakanzi vasauye kubasa sezvo vachigona kuvhiringidza zvapupu zvisina kudomwa. Magweta eZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaJabulani Mhlanga naMuzvare Prisca Dube, ndivo vari kumirira vakoti ava. Hatina kukwanisa kubata munyori mubazi rezvehutano, Air Commodore Jasper Chimedza, vanzi vange vari mumusangano asi vakaudza dare reparamende svondo rino kuti bazi ravo riri kupihwa mari yebhajeti shoma zvave kuri kanganisa kuita mabasa. Asi mutungamiri weZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnoch Dongo, vanoti hurumende iri kumbunyikidza kodzero dzevashandi. No media source currently available

headline: ZCTU Yoita Hurukuro naVaMnagagwa Apo Mitengo Yoita Chamurambamhuru
text: Zvinhu munyika zvaramba zvakaita manyama amire nerongo munyaya dzezvehupfumi zvopa kuti vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi nezvematongerwo enyika vati hurumende yave kungopumha vanoipikisa huroyi ichishandisa mapepanhau akaita seHerald kurova bembera. Asi mutugamiri weZCTU, VaPeter Mutasa, vanoti mushandi ave kudya nhoko dzezvironda. VaMutasa vanoti sesangano revashandi vachasangana neChitatu nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachivaudzawo nhuna dzevashandi. Vanoti gurukota rezvevashandi, Doctor Sekai Nzenza, ndivo vakaronga musangano uyu mushure mekunge ZCTU yakumbira musangano wakadai. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kubata Doctor Nzenza kana mutauriri waVaMnagagwa, VaGeorge Charamba, sezvo nharembozha dzavo dzange dzisiri kudairwa. Bepanhau reHerald riri kuti vemabhizimisi ndevamwe vanofanira kuongororwa kana vakwidza mitengo sezvo vari kuda kuti vanhu vapandukire hurumende vachitsigina neAmerica nebato rinopikisa reMDC. Izvi zvinotevera kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu muzvitoro. Zvinhu zvawedzerwa mitengo zvinosanganisira hupfu, chingwa, mupunga, Mazowe nezvimwe. Marita maviri eMazowe awedzerwa kusvika pamadhora emaRTGS makumi maviri nerimwe kana kuti 21 RTGS dollars kubva pamadhora gumi nematatu nemasendi makumi mashanu, 13,50 emaRTGS. Mutauriri weGrain Millers Association, VaGarikai Chaunza, vanoti vakwidza mitengo sezvo zvavanoshandisa kusanganisa mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari zvawedzerwa mutengo. Asi VaChaunza vanoitiwo seGMAZ vanenge votumira vanhu kunoongorora kuti hapana vari kudhurisa zvinhu here. Asi mutauriri weMDC, VaJacob Mafume, vanoti hurumende yeZanu-PF yakundikana kugadzirisa zvinhu. Asi muzvinabhizimisi vari nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaGilbert Muponda, vanoti mitengo ichagadzikana asi zvinogona kutora makore maviri sezvakavimbiswa negurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube. Zvimwe zvitoro zvinoti zvave kutengesa nemadhora ekuAmerica chete zvinonzi nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Doctor Godfrey kanyenze vanotungamira sangano reLabour and Economic Reform Institute of Zimbabwe hazvishamise. Ko chii chingaitwe kuti zvinhu zvigadziriswe? Doctor Kanyenze vanoti munyika munoda kugadziriswa nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika nekutaurirana. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti nyaya yehouri nekutadza kutungamira ndiyo yakanganisa hupfumi hwenyika. Asi hurumende inoti iri kukanganiswa nezvirango zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru muhurumende. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanoti Zvirango Zvokanganisa Zimbabwe Kugadzirisa Dambudziko reKushanduka kweMamiriro eKunze
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa neChipiri vakataura pamberi pemusangano wekushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze kana kuti Climate Change kuGlasgow, Scotland vachiti Zimbabwe yakazvipira kuita zvose zvinodiwa kuti ideredze kusvibiswa kwemweya wekufema. Asi vakatiwo vari kumbokanganiswa nezvirango zvavanoti zvakatemerwa nyika. Vatiwo nyika dzakabudirira dzinofanira kubatsira dzevarombo dzisiri kukanganisa zvakanyanya mamiriro ekunze Vachitaurawo pagungano iri, mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaJoe Biden vakakumbira ruregerero nedanho rainge ratorwa nevaive mutungamiri wenyika wavakakunda musarudzo VaDonald Trump rekumbobuda muchibvumirano cheParis Agreement chekukurudzira nyika kuti dzitore matanho ekuti mamiriro ekunze asanyanye kushanduka. VaBiden vatiwo nyika dzichiri kubudirira dzinoda mari inosvika zana remabhiriyoni kana kuti US$100 billion pagore mukuderedza nyaya dzekushanduka kwemamiriro ekunze. Vati America ichaparura hurongwa hwemabhiriyoni matatu kana kuti 3 billion pagore mukubatsira munyaya dzekugadzirisa mamiriro ekunze. Asi panyaya yezvirango veAmerica neEuropean Union vari kurambawo vakamira semusambangwena vachiti hurumende yaVaMnangagwa inofanira kuvandudza zvinhu munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Hurumende yeZimbabwe yange ichitiwo VaMnangagwa vachasangana nemutungamiri wehurumende yeBritain VaBoris Johnson asi pane mashoko ari kubva kuhurumende yeBritain ekuti zvinenge zvakona n’anga sezvo vati vakabatikana havakwanise kutaura naVaMnangagwa. Mukuru musangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu kuchamhembe kweAfrica VaDewa Mavhinga vati Zimbabwe inoziva hayo zvinoda kuitwa zvakafana nekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. Musangano wekuScotland uri kukokerwa neUnited Nations uchapetewa musi wa 12 Mbudzi. No media source currently available

headline: Vaive Varwiri veHondo yeRusununguko Vapfumbamwe Vange Vari Muhusungwa Voregererwa
text: Gweta riri kumirira vaimbove varwiri vehondo yerusununguko vapfumbamwe vange vari muhusungwa, VaPaidamoyo Saurombe, vanoti vsungwa ava vazoregedzwa vahienda kudzimba dzavo nhasi mambakwedza kunyangwe hazvo vange vambonzi vachamiswa pamberi pedare. VaSaurombe vanoti zvinhu zvinokatyamadza kuti vaive varwiri verusununguko vanobatwa nekuseri kweruoko zvakadayi panguva ino yeCovid-19. VaSaurombe vaudza Studio7 kuti zvakanga zvichiitwa nevanhu ava zvakange zviri pamutemo sezvo vakange vachida kunyatsonzwa zvizere pamusoro pemari dzavanopihwa idzo vanoti dzishoma.    Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi remapurisa panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Zec Inoti Yakagadzirira Zvakakwana kuMashonaland West
text: Zimbabwe Election Commission, Zec, mudunhu reMashonaland West rinoti rakagadzirira zvakakwana kuita sarudzo. Mukuru weZec mudunhu reMashonaland West, VaAustin Ndlovu, vanoti vashandi vavo vakagadzirira sarudzo kudarika mamwe makore ose. VaNdlovu vanoti vashandi vavo vakaenda munzvimbo dzekuvhotera mazuva maviri apfuura uye nezuro vakaswera vachiona kuti zvinhu zvose zviri kushanda here. VaNdlovu vanoti kukosha kwesarudzo dzanhasi kwakaita kuti vaite zvose zvavanokwanisa kuti sarudzo dzive dzakachena. VaNdlovu vanoti dambudziko rekushaikwa kwedzimotokari dzekufambisa midziyo yekuvhotesa pamwe nemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari rakagadziriswa. Mumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi, VaTemba Kureya, avo vaona vashandi veZec vatove panzvimbo dzekuvhotera vanoti rwendo rwuno Zec yaratidza kurongeka. VaKureya vanoti vanhu vamirira kuvhota uye anenge akundwa hapana chaanochema nacho. Musarudzo dzakare Zec yaitadza kuvhura dzimwe nzvimbo dzekuvhotera nenguva uye pane dzimwe nzvimbo painge pasina zvekuvhotesa zvakakwana. No media source currently available

headline: Amai Grace Mugabe Votuka Zvakare Amai Mujuru neMDC
text: Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mygabe, vati vaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Joice Mujuru, havazofa vakavigwa pamarinda anovigwa magamba enyika nepamusana pekuti vakapandukira mutungamiri wenyika,Va Robert Mugabe. Vachitaura neChitatu nevatsigiri vebato ravo paChimhanda Secondary School ku Rushinga mudunhu reMashonaland Central, munyori muboka remadzimai reZanu PF reWomen’s League, Amai Grace Mugabe, vashora Amai Mujuru nekuda chigaro chaVa Mugabe vachiti Amai Mujuru havazofi vakavigwa pa Heroes Acre nokuti vakazvidza mutungamiri wenyika. No media source currently available Amai Mugabe vati kunze kunotonhora kana munhu achinge asiri mu Zanu PF. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kutaura naAmai Mujuru kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi. Amai Mugabe vaenderera mberi vachiti mapato anopikisa haafanirwe kubvumidzwa kupinda mudunhu reMashonaland Central vachiti dunhu iri ndere Zanu PF. Amai Mugabe varambawo mashoko ari kubuda mumapepanhau ekuti ndivo vari kutungamira chipoka chemuZanu PF chiri kudaidzwa kuti G40 kana kuti Generation 40 icho chinonzi chakateya kutora masimba kubva kuna Va Mugabe kana vachinge vabva pachigaro. Zvinonzi muZanu PF mune kusawirirana zvakanyanya panyaya yekuti achatora matomhu kubva kuna Va Mugabe ndiyani. Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika atorawo zvakare mukana uyu kutsoropodza vaimbova mutungamiri weBritain, Va Tony Blair, pamwe naVa George Bush vaimbova mutungamiri weAmerica vachiti vaviri ava vanofanirwa kutongwa kudare re International Criminal Court. Va Mugabe vanowanzotukawo America ne Britain pese pavanowana mukana wekutaura paruzhinji sezvaitwa nemudzimai wavo nhasi. Kunyange hazvo mhuri yaVa Mugabe ine mapurazi akawanda, mazhinji acho ari pasi pekambani inonzi Gushungo Holdings, Amai Mugabe vashora vakuru vakuru muhurumende vakatora mapurazi akawanda avasiri kushandisa nemhazvo. Zvichakadai, Amai Mugabe vatorawo mukana uyu kutuka vatori venhau vachiti vanonyora manyepo. Mumwe mutori wenhau ane mukurumbira munyika uye vari mupepeti webepanhau re The Observer, Va Barnabas Thondlana, varatidza kusafara nemashoko aAmai Mugabe aya vachiti vatori venhau vanofanirwa kusiiwa vachiita basa ravo vakasununguk Amai Mugabe vasiya vagovera matarakita, mbatya, shangu, ma computer pamwe nechikafu kuvagari veku Mashonaland Central vachiti havana basa nekuti vemapato anopikisa anoti chii panyaya dzekutenga mavhoti vachiti yatokwana nguva yekuti bato ravo ritsvage rutsigiro pamberi pesarudzo dzemuna 2018. Amai Mugabe vakatarisirwa kuita misangano nevatsigiri vavo mumatunhu ose enyika kwavanoti vachafamba vachigovera zvinhu vachiti zvavari kuita kuzadzikisa zviri muchirongwa chekuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika che Zimbabwe Agenda for Sustainable Socio Economic Transformation kana kuti Zimasset.

headline: Hurumende Inoti Pane Vari Kuronga Kupidigura VaMnangagwa
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemukati menyika VaCain Mathema vanoti mapurisa ave kugara akadzipakatira sezvo vachiti pane vari kuda kupidigura hurumende yemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kuburikidza nekuratidzira. Vatiwo pane vemasangano ekunze vari kuda kushanda nevemasangano akazvimirira kuronga kuratidzira munyika. VaMathema vaudza vatori venhau muHarare nhasi kuti hurumende haisi kuzopeta maoko ichirega vanhu vachiratidzira vachitungamirwa nevemapato anopikisa nevemasangano akazvimirira oga. No media source currently available Gurukota iri raramba kuti hurumende ndiyo iri kupa kuti zvinhu zvisagadzikana munyika nenyaya yemitemo yayo yapa kuti hupfumi huende kumawere. Vati zvirango zvavanoti zvakatemerwa nyika ndizvo zvapa kuti zvinhu zviite manyama amire nerongo. Vati zvakakokerwa neMDC uye vakayambira bato iri kuti risaratidzire risina mvumo yehurumende. Asi nyika dzakatemera Zimbabwe zvirango dzinoti zvakatemerwa vamwe vakuru venyika vanotonga nedemo. Mutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe Yadzokoa/Mayibuye IZimbabwe Doctor Victor Chimhutu vati zviri kuitwa nehurumende zvekutadza kugadzirisa hupfumi ndizvo zviri kupa kuti zvinhu zvisagadzikana munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Votyira Hutano Hwavo Sezvo Kanzuru yeHarare Yoronga Kuvhara Mvura
text: Kanzuru yeHarare inoti ichatanga chirongwa chekumbomira kupa vagari mvura mamwe mazuva sezvo yave shoma mumadhamu. Dzimwe nzvimbo dzinonzi dzichatora mazuva mashanu dzisingawane mvura izvo zvoita kuti vagari uye vana chiremba vatyire kuti zvirwere zvinogona kupararira. Dambudziko iri riri kuwanikwa nemakanzuru eBulawayo neChitungwiza. Vanhu vakawanda vataura neStudio 7 vati nyaya yekushaya mvura kwemamwe mazuva imviro mviro yekutanga kwekupararira kwezvirwere zvakaita setyphoid. Vagari vemumusha wevazhinji weWarren Park vanoti vagara vachinetseka kuwana mvura uye vave kutokatyamadzwa kuti danho idzva rokuvhara mvura rinorevei. Muzvare Shandurai Zireva anoti madzimai nevanasikana ndivo vanoiswa parumananzombe zvakanyanya nekushomeka kwemvura. VaDonald Mavhudzi mumwe mugari wemuHarare vatiwo kanzura inofanirwa kutsvaka nzira dzekuzadzikisa kodzero yekuwanisa vanhu mvura yakachena iri mubumbiro remutemo. Amai Cecelia Mhondiwa vachema chemawo vakati sevanhukadzi kushaikwa kwemvura kuri kuvakonzeresa hurombo sezvo nguva zhinji vanenge votsvaka mvura pachinzvimbo chekubata mabasa emaoko. Vati kanzura inofanirwa kutsvaka nzira dzekuwanisa vanhu mvura. Hapana kuwiriran kuti chii chichaitwa mazuva anenge achishaikwa mvura. Vagari vanoti kanzuru inofanira kuunza motokari dzinotakura mvura kumisha yevanhu. Asi mutauriri weHarare City Council VaMichael Chideme vanoti vanhu vanofanira kuchereredza mvura. Vanotungamira sangano reCombined Harare Residents Association VaMfundo Mlilo vanoti hurumende nekanzuru vanofanira kutenda kuti mutoro wekuwanira vanhu mvura wavaremera kuti vape masangano ekunze mukana wekubatsira. Kumisha mizhinji inogara vanhu muHarare, zvibhorani zvishoma zviriko zvakaiswa nemasangano akazvimiririra asi nekuda kwekuwandirwa nekushandiswa zvakanyanya, zvibhorani izvi zvinofa nguva zhinji uye hakuna anogadzira. Muna 2009 vanhu vanodarika zviuru zvishanu vakashaya nekuda kwechirwere cheCholera. Vana vakawanda vanombofa nezvirwere zvemanyoka. Vana chiremba vakawanda vari kuchema chema kuti kuzvipatara zvakawanda hakuna mishonga nekudaro pakaita zvirwere zvinogona kupararira nekukurumidza. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vodzokera kuMusha neMugovera
text: Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmerson Mnangagwa, vapedza rwendo rwavo rwemazuva mashanu ku China vachiita misangano mumatunhu madiki ari ku Hangzhou uko kwaitirwa musangano we Zimbabwe- China Business Forum. Mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmerson Mnangagwa, vapedza rwendo rwavo rwemazuva mashanu ku China vachiita misangano mumatunhu madiki ari ku Hangzhou uko kwaitirwa musangano we Zimbabwe- China Business Forum. Uyu musangano waitwa nevemabhizinesi nemakurukota ehurumende yeku China navana muzvinabhizinesi nemakurukota ehurumende vekuZimbabwe. VaMnangagwa, avo vari kutarisirwa kudzoka kusvika kumusha neMugovera, vanonzi vakanyorerana zvibvumirano zvinomwe nehurumende pamwe nemakambani ekuChina. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi dzinoti zvibvumirano izvi hazvina zvazvinoreva kana pasina chinobuda mazviri. Muongorori wezvebudiriro, uye vachidzidzisa pa Africa University, Doctor Iris Shiripinda vanoti kunyorana zvibvumirano chinhu chisinganetsi nekuti kuwirirana zvamunoda kuitirirana asi kuzochizadzisa rimwe basa rinoda kuti vanhu vacherechedze zvese zvavanenge vawirirana kuitirana sezviri muchisungo chavo Doctor Shiripinda vanoti ruzhinji rwenyika harwufaniri kungopemberera kutaurwa kwe zvibvumirano, asi kuti vaone kuti nekufamba kwenguva zvazogonekwa kuzadziswa ndezvipi. Vanoti rwendo rwaVaMnangagwa nderwekunovhima saka mhemberero inoda kuzouya kana vazoona zvabuda murwendo urwu. Vatiwo zvinoda kuti vatungamiriri venyika vatarise zvinogona kuitika kwete kutaura zvisingagoneki kune ve kuChina ava kuti zvibvumirano izvi zvisazoperere ku hope chete. No media source currently available

headline: Vashoma Vovhenekwa Chirwere cheGomarara Rinoita paZamu
text: Kunyange hazvo mwedzi waGumiguru uchizivikanwa nekucherechedza gomarara repazamu, sangano reCancer Association of Zimbabwe rinoti kunyange hazvo huwandu hwevanhu vakauya kuzoongororwa gomarara repazamu hwakawanda kudarika Gumiguru wegore rapera, veruzhinji havasati vonyanyotambira zvekuongororwa. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, Muzvare Anna Zvarehwanashe, vanoti kunyange hazvo vakaongororwa vanoti nguva zhinji zvinonetsa kungoti munhu anoongororwa pasina paanonzwa panorwadza izvo zvinozoita kuti vanhu vaongororwe kana paita zviratidzo zvekuti pangangove negomarara remazamu. Muzvare Zvarehwanashe vatiwo kushomeka kwenzvimbo dzinoongorora gomarara munyika kunoitawo kuti veruzhinji vatadze kunoongororwa nguva nenguva zvirwere zvakadai segomarara repazamu. Kunyange hazvo gomarara repazamu richinyanyouraya vanhukadzi, vanhurume vanobatwawo negomarara iri. Mumwe murume, VaJoseph Murwira, vatiwo kunyange hazvo vachiziva kukosha kwekuongororwa gomarara rezamu, vati vanhurume vazhinji vanozvitora sezvinhu zvedambe. VaMurwira vatsigirawo pfungwa dzaMuzvare Zvarehwanashe kuti kushomeka kwenzvimbo dzinoongorora gomarara ndozvezvimwewo zvinoshaisa varume vazhinji shungu. Mumwe mugari wekumusha weMkoba muguta reGweru, Amai Musa Shumba, vanotiwo kunyange hazvo gomarara repazamu riri kuuraya vanhu vakawanda kunyanya vanhukadzi, vatiwo ruzivo rwechirwere ichi rwuchiri rwushoma. Amai Shumba vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti dai gomarara remazamu rarapwa pachena. Vachitaura neStudio7 parunhare, mukuru weCancer Association of Zimbabwe, Amai Junior Mavu, vabvuma kuti kumamisha hakuna nzvimbo dzakawanda dzekuti vanhu vaongororwe gomarara repazamu asi vakakurudzira kuti vanhu vaende kuzvipatara zvinenge zviri pedyo navo. Vatiwo muzvirongwa zvavo vachange voita dzidziso kumamisha nezvenyaya yegomarara. Amai Mavu vati muHarare vanhu churu nemazana matanhatu vakaongororwa gomarara rezamu mumwedzi waGumiguru zvichienzaniswa nevanhu churu nemazana mashanu vakaongororwa nguva imwechete gore rapera Sangano reCancer Registry rinoti muna 2014 gomarara repazamu ranga riri gomarara rechitatu mumagomarara akanyanyobata vanhu huye zvikamu zvinomwe kubva muzana zvakabatwa negomarara iri mugore rimwero. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vanoti VaChamisa Vachakunda Musarudzo yeMutungamiri Muna 2023
text: Vakawanda vanoshanda vari muBotswana vanoti vanoshuvira kuti MDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa ikunde musarudzo dzichaitwa munyika sezvo hurumende iripo pari zvino, iri kutadza kugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika. Nyanzvi dzinoongorora mafambiro anoita nyaya dzematongerwo enyika dzinoti VaChamisa vane mukana mukuru wekukunda mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, musarudzo yemutungamiri wenyika ichaitwa muna 2023. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti VaChamisa vari kuratidza kuti vachiri vechidiki, uye vakawanda vanotarisira kwavari kuti vagadzirise zviri kunetsa munyika, izvo zviri kutadza kuitwa naVaMnangagwa. Imwe nyanzvi mune zvematengerwo enyika, uye vari mudzidzisi wemutemo paGaborone University College of Law and Professional Studies, VaCharles Kungwengwe, vanoti VaMnangagwa vava hari yofanzira kufa kana vachienzwaniswa naVaChamisa. Izvi zvinotsigirwa naVaNicholas Mutambanengwe, avo vanodzidzisa zvematongerwo enyika paUniversity of Botswana. VaMutambanengwe vanoti mamiriro ezveupfumi ndivo achaita kuti Zanu PF ibviswe pachigaro. Chimwewo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri kuita zvidzidzo paBotswana Open University, VaSolomon Gurajena, vanoti kushandira pamwe kwaVaChamisa, nevatevedzeri vavo vakasarudzwa pakongiresi yebato ravo, VaTendai Biti, Amai Lynette Karenyi KorenaVaWelshman Ncube, kuchapa MDC chiremerera. Imwe nyanzwi mune zvematongerwo enyika, VaPhineus Murombedzi, vanoti mamiriro ehupfumi munyika ari kusiya VaMnangagwa vari panyanga dzamushore. Mumwe muongorori wezvematengerwo enyika, VaTerrence Sangara, vayambira VaChamisa kuti vatsvage rubatsiro kubva kumasangano akafanana neSADC, African Union, pamwe neUnited Nations mukuona kuti mitemo inobata sarudzo yavandudzwa. Asi kune vamwe vanoti Zanu PF inogona kukunda musarudzo dzichaitwa munyika sezvo pachine nguva yekugadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyaya dzehupfumi. Mumwe wevanhu vane pfungwa dzakadai, VaNdabezile Ncube, vanoti VaMnangagwa vakagadzirisa zviri kunetsa munyika, veruzhinji vachavavhotera zvakare. Pachaitwa sarudzo muna 2023, VaMnangagwa vanenge vave nemakore makumi masere nerimwe, ukuwo VaChamisa vaine makore makumi mana nemashanu. Izvi zvinonzi nevakawanda zvinopa mukana kuna VaChamisa sezvo nyika dzakawanda dziri kuvhota dzichisarudza vatungamiri vachiri kukura, kwete vakwegura. Asi kupindira kwemauto munyaya dzematongerwo enyika, sezvaakaita pana vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, muna Mbudzi 2017, kunopawo vakawanda pfungwa yekuti kunyange mapato anopikisa akakunda musarudzo, havaoni Zanu PF ichitambira kukundwa sezvo iine rutsigiro rwemauko. Asi vakawanda vari munyika nekunze kwenyika vanoti vamirira kusvika kwa2023 kuti vaone kuti ndeupi mukono ucharigwa pakati paVaMnangagwa naVaChamisa. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoronga Kuunza Mari Itsva
text: Bazi rezvemari rinoti richawedzera mari pamwe chete nekuunza mari ine huremu hwakakura munyika senzira yekugadzirisa dambudziko remari munyika. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau muHarare nhasi, munyori mubazi iri, VaGeorge Guvamatanga, vati zvanga zvisingagoni kuti vatange nekuunza mari ine huremu hwakakura izvo zvakaita kuti vatange nemari yemadhora maviri neyemadhora mashona. VaGuvamatanga vatiwo bazi ravo rinoziva kuti mari iri munyika ishoma, uye hurumende ichagadzirisa dambudziko iri. Vachibvunzwa kuti vachatora matanho api kupedza dambudziko rekutengeswa kwemari pamukoto, mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvemari, VaClemence Chiduwa, vati vanhu vanotenga zvinhu kunze kwenyika vachabvunzwa kuti mari iyi vakaiwana sei. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya yezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabor and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaNyasha Muchichwa, vati hurumende inogona kukunda nyaya yekutengeswa kwemari pamukota kana chete ikaisa mari inokwana munyika kusanganisira mari yekunze. VaMuchichwa vatiwo nyaya yekusunga vanotengesa mari mumugwagwa haigadzirisi dambudziko iri sezvo vanozviita vachingoregera kwemazuva mashoma asi vachizosimidzira mabasa aya zvakare. Bazi rezvemari rabvumawo kuti mari yakaiswa kubazi rezveutano haikwani zvichienzaniswa nematambudziko aripo panyaya yehutano asiwo vakati vacharamba vachigadzirisa. Gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vaudzawo vatori venhau pamusangano uyu kuti vari kufadzwa nematanho avakatora panyaya dzekuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika uye zvinhu zviri kufamba negwara. Asi vaimbove gurukota rezvemari muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, uye vari mumwe wevatevedzeri vatatu veMDC, VaTendai Biti, vanoti dambudziko remari riri kunetsa munyika sezvo bhanga guru renyika, re Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe, riri kuita mamwe mabasa arinofanirwa kunge risingaite, izvo zviri kupa kuti nyika irasikirwe nemari yakawanda. VaBiti, avo vanove zvakare sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemari, vanoti bazi rezvemari,pamwe nebhanga guru renyika, zvinofanirwa kushanda zvichitevedza mitemo, uye nenzira dzinoita kuti mari dzenyika dzisanganyangarika sezvakaita mari dzakakwereteswa vamwe vakuru vakuru munyika nebhanga guru renyika. Asi bazi rezvemari iri rinoti veruzhinji vanofanira kuziva kuti panga pave nemakore akawanda zvakanyanya mari yenyika isingashandiswi mukuvaka nyika, nekudaro kugadzirisa zvinonetsa kuchatora nguva. No media source currently available

headline: Nyika Dzakapoteredza Zimbabwe Dzotora Matanho paCoronavirus
text: Nyika dzakakomberedza Zimbabwe mudunhu dziri kutora matanho ekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCOVID-19 kana kuti Coronavirus izvo zvoita kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvisare zvomerwe pakupinda munyika idzi. Nyika dzakapoteredza Zimbabwe dzinoti Botswana, Zambia, Mozambique neSouth Africa dziri kutora matanho ekudzivirira kupinda kwe Coronavirus munyika idzi kubudikidza nekutora matanho akasimba panzvimbo dzinopinda nevanhu vachibva kune imwe nyika. Botswana yakazivisa kuti yavhara miganhu yayo nemusi weChipiri ukuwo South Africa iri mubushi rekukurudzira kuti vagari vemunyika iyi vasabude mudzimba kutanga neChina, Kurume 26, kwemasvondo matatu. Zambia, Namibia neMozambique dziri kuitawo mushandirapamwe nedzimwe nyika dziri mudungu reSADC mukuvhara zvikoro uye kurambidza kuungana kwevanhu vazhinji senzira dzekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere icho chakatanga mudhorobha reWuhan KuChina muna Zvita gore rapera. Asi matanho ari kutorwa nenyika dzakakomberedza Zimbabwe ari kuita kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviomerwe kupinda munyika idzi. Sachigaro wesangano reVendors Initiative and Economic Transformation, VaSamuel Wadzai, vaudza Studio7 kuti kuvharwa kwemabhodha kuchaita kuti vanhu vadye nhoko dzezvironda sezvo ruzhinji rwuchirarama nekutenga midziyo kuvavakidzani veZimbabwe kuti vatengese munyika. VaWadzai vanoti hurumende yakafanira kuona kuti ingabatsire sei hungwandangwanda hwevanhu vanorarama nekutenga nekutengesa sezvo kutengesa ndiko kuri kuwanisa ruzhinji cheuviri. Chimwewo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe icho chinotyaira bhazi rinofamba pakati pedhorobha reFrancistown muBotswana neHarare, VaMicheal Muzondiwa, vanoti mamiriro ezvinhu aita kuti vapererwe nebasa. Asi Muzvare Peace Gwatidzo vanoti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinofanirwa kutevedzera yambiro dziri kupihwa nemapazi ezvehutano enyika dzakapoteredza Zimbabwe nokuti ndiyo nzira chete ingapedze kupararora kweCoronavirus. Hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa yakavharawo mabhodha nemusi weMuvhuro mushure mekunge Zororo Makamba ashaika nokuda kwechirwere cheCoronavirus. Nyika iri mudambudziko guru rechirwere cheCoronavirus mudunhu reSADC iSouth Africa iyo ine vanhu mazana manomwe nevapfumbamwe vakabatwa nechirwere ichi.

headline: Mapato Anopikisa Anocherechedza "Unity Day" Achiti Haadi Kuona Rusarura muZimbabwe
text: Mapato ezvamatongerwo enyika gumi nematatu aungana neChipiri muHarare achikurudzira kuti zuva rekucherechedza runyararo pamwe nekubatana kwevanhu rinofanirwa kubatanidza zvizvarwa zvese zvemuZimbabwe, kwete kuita rusarura. Mapato ezvamatongerwo enyika gumi nematatu aungana neChipiri muHarare achikurudzira kuti zuva rekucherechedza runyararo pamwe nekubatana kwevanhu rinofanirwa kubatanidza zvizvarwa zvese zvemuZimbabwe, kwete kuita rusarura. Masangano aungana aya anoti kunyange hazvo zuva rekucherechedza runyararo munyika rakaumbwa pasi pemapato maviri eZanu PF ne PF Zapu, zuva iri rinofanirwa kuva zuva remunhu wese ari muZimbabwe. Masangano anopikisa hurumende aya ari kushandawo pamwe chete muchirongwa che National Electoral Reforms Agenda, Nera, icho chine chinangwa chekuona zvinhu zvose zvine chekuita nesarudzo zvichigadziriswa sarudzo dza 2018 dzisati dzaitwa. No media source currently available Munyori mukuru kubato reMDC rinotungamirirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vati kubatana munyika kunounza runyararo nekudaro kunofanirwa kuva nezuva rerunyararo nekubatana renyika yese. Mutungamiri webato reAfrican Democratic Party, Muzvare Marcelina Chikasha, vati zvinonyadzisa zvikuru kuti kunzi pane zuva rezororo rekucherechedza runyararo nekubatana, izvo zviri pachena kuti munyika hamuna kubatana kwacho. Muzvare Chikasha vatora mukana uyu kushoropodzavatungamiriri vehurumende avo vavati ndivo vari kukonzeresa kusabatana kweveruzhinji munyika. MutungamiriweDemocratic Assembly for Restoration and Empowerment, VaGilbert Dzikiti, vati zuva ranhasi rapembererwa kuchivigwa nhengo yeZanu PF Senator Georgias Aguy kuHeroes Acre izvo zvavati zvinounza kunyunyuta kukuru kubva kumapato anopikisa . VaDzikiti vati nyaya yekuti vanhu vanotsigira bato reZanuPF ndivo chete vari kuvigwa kuHeroes Acre zvinoratidza kuti munyika hamuna kubatana zvachose. Mutungamiri weTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume, vatiwo kubatana kwemapato anopikisa achida kuti sarudzo dziitwe zvejekerere pasi peNera, zvinoratidza mushandira pamwe chete uri kuitwa nemapato anopikisa. Mugwaro raro rekucherechedza National Unity Day, sangano reNational Peace Trust riri kukurudzira kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvirambe zvakabatana. Asi sangano iri ratiwo zvinosuwisa kuti runyararo nekubatana zviri kuramba zvichiderera muZimbabwe. Zuva reNational Unity Day rakatanga kuremekedzwa sezororo zviri pamutemo muna 1997, makore gumi mushure mekunge mutungamiri weZanu, VaRobert Mugabe, pamwe nemutungamiri weZapu, mushakabvu Joshua Nkomo, vanyorerana chibvumirano cherunyararo pamwe nekubatana kwemapato maviri aya achiumba bato rimwe chete reZanu PF.

headline: Voruzhinji Vokurudzirwa Kuti Vabayiwe Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Veruzhinji vari kukurudzirwa kuti vabaiwe nhomba yeCovid-19 uye kuti vasateerere zvinobuda pamadandemutande zvisingabvi kunyanzvi dzehutano pamusoro penhomba dze Covid-19 sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kupedzisira vapinda muna taisireva. Imwe nyanzvi yezvehutano, Dr Brighton Chireka, vanoti veruzhinji vanofanirwa kusaungana kundufu panguva ino yedenda reCovid-19 uye vateerere zvinotaurwa nebazi rezvehutano pamusoro pehuwandu hwevanhu vanofanirwa kunge vari parufu. Dr Chireka vanoti panguva ino yeCovid-19, chakakosha kubaiwa nhomba yechirwere ichi nekutevedzera kurudziro yeWorld Health Organisation yekuti vanhu vapfeke mamasiki, vageze mawoko uye vagare vakataramukana kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire. "Tinokurudzira zveruzhinji kuti vaende kunobayiwa nhomba yeCovid-19 kuitira kuti vawane kuzvidzivirira ivo nemhuri dzavo sezvo denda iri riri kuuraya vazhinji uye dzimwe dzimba dzave kuto vharwa sezvo vanhu vazhinji vemhuri imwe vari kushaika panguva imwe,"vadaro Dr Chireka. "Tiri kuyambira vanenge vafirwa kuti vasaende nehuwandu kurufu sezvo kuri iko kuri kupararira zvakanyanya denda iri reCovid-19," vadaro Dr Chireka. Denda reCovid-19 rauraya vanhu zviuru zvina nemakumi mana nevanomwe, 4,047, uye kubata vanhu zviuru zana negumi nezvisere nemazana manomwe nemakumi mashanu nevana, 118,754 No media source currently available

headline: Masangano eSADC neAfrican Union Anoyambirwa Pamusoro Pezvirikuitika muSouth Africa
text: Sangano remakanzuru emakereke echi Kristu munyika dziri kuchamhembe kwe Africa, reFellowship of Christian Councils in Southern Africa, kana kuti FOCCISA, rayambira masangano eSADC neAfrican Union kuti asaita zvekutamba nezvirikuitika muSouth Africa asi kuti ashande nesimba kudzivirira zviri kuitika izvi kuti zvisaramba zvichiitika. FOCCISA yati panofanirwa kuve negwara rekuti zvisarambe zvichiitika sezvo kasiri kekutanga vanhu vemu South Africa vachiita mhirizhonga vachiuraya vekunedzimwe nyika. FOCCISA isangano remakanzuru emakereke echiKristu emunyika dzese dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica. Sangano iri ririkuti vanhu vemunyika dzakasiyana siyana vanoenda kwese kwavanoona kuti vangawana chekuita kuti variritire mhuri dzavo. Sachigaro weFOCCISA, Reverend Doctor Kenneth Mtata, vaudza Studio 7 kuti sangano ravo raudza SADC neAfrican Union kuti dzibatsire nyika dzinevanhu vazhinji vanobuda madziri vachienda kunotsvaka mararamiro kunedzimwe nyika, vachitizve nyika idzi dzinogona kuve nedambudziko rekusagadzikana mune zvematongerwo enyika kana munyaya dzezvehupfumi hwenyika naizvozvo dzinofanirwa kubatsirwa kuti zvinhu zviite zvakanaka mukati madzo. No media source currently available

headline: Mitengo yeZvinhu Yotarisirwa Kukwira Zvichitevera Kukwira kweMitengo yeMafuta
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kuyambira kuti kukwidzwa kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari neZimbabwe Energy and Regulatory Authority kana kuti ZERA kuchapa kuti mitengo yezvinhu ikwire zvakanyanya. Mukuru weZERA, VaEddington Mazambani ,vaudza Studio 7 kuti kukwira kwemitengo yekuunza mafuta aya munyika ndiko kuri kupawo kuti vawedzera mutengo. ZERA inoti kunyangwe yatara mitengo, vanotengesa mumagaraji havafanire kudhurisa mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari aya zvakanyanya. GlobalPetrolProces.com iyo inoongorora mitengo yemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari pasi rose inoti muAfrica, Zimbabwe iri pachidanho chechipiri kubva kuSenegal pakudhura kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaVictor Bhoroma, vanoti nyaya yekukwira kwemafuta aya chave chigariro musoro wetsuro kushaya nyanga. VaBhoroma vanoti izvi zvinoshamisa zvikuru nekuti Zimbabwe inosanganisa mafuta ainotenga kunze neanogadzirwa nenzimbe dzinorimwa kuChisumbanje. Munyori mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti kukwira kwemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari kunopawo kuti mitengo yezvinhu zvakawanda iwedzerwe asi vashandi vasiri kuwedzerwa mari. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga VaGilbert Muponda vanoti panofanira kudzamiswa pfungwa pasati pakwidzwa mutengo wemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari nekuti zvinokonzera kusagadzikana kwehupfumi. VaMuponda vatiwo havo haisi Zimbabwe chete iri kukwidza mitengo nekuti South Africa iri kutarisirwa kuita zvimwe chetezvo munguva pfupi inotevera. Mutungamiri weEmployers Confederaition of Zimbabwe, Doctor Israel Murefu, vati kukwira kwemitengo kuchakonzera kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu kana kuti inflation vachiti sevemabhizimisi vari kunetsekana nekusagadzikana kwemutengo wemafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vozeya Zvinoreva Kuzorodzwa kwaVaChiwengwa
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mngangagwa, vachinja neMuvhuro chimiro chevari muchiuto nemuchipurisa zvaita kuti vanga vari mukuru wemauto, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vazorodzwe vakamirira kupihwa rimwe basa. Mashoko aburitswa nemunyori muhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika pamwe nedare remakurukota ehurumende, VaMisheck Sibanda, anoti VaMnangagwa vazorodza VaChiwenga basa vakamirira kupihwa rimwe basa. Liutenant General Phillip Valerio Sibanda ndivo vakwidziridzwa kutora chinzvimbo change chiina VaChiwenga. VaSibanda vatsiviwa naMajor General Edzai Chimonyo avo vakwidziridzwa kuitwa Lieutenant General. Air Marshal Perrance Shiri, avo vanga vari mukuru wemauto, vakwidziridzwa kuita Air Chief Marshal vasati vazorodzwa zvichitevera kudomwa kwavakaitwawo kuve gurukota rinoona nezvekurima. VaSibusiso Moyo, avo vakagadzwa kuve gurukota rinoona nezvinoitika kunze kwenyika, vakwidzirirdzawo kuita Lieutenant General vasati vazorodzwa uye VaEngelbert Rugeje, avo vakaitwa murongi wemisangano muZanu PF, vakwidziridzwawo kuitwa Lieutenant General vasati vazorodzwa zvakare. VaMnangagwa vakwidziridzawo vanga vari mutevedzeri wemukuru-mukuru wemapurisa, VaGodwin Matanga, ndivo vadomwa naVaMnangagwa kuti vafanobata matomhu emukuru-mukuru wemapurisa apo VaAugustine Chihuri vari pazororo vakamirira kuenda pamudyandigere pakupera kwemwedzi uno. Zvichakadai, nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika, VaVivid Gwede vaudza Studio 7 parunharare noti zvave pachena kuti VaChiwenga ndivo vachaitwa mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika asi vati zvaitwa izvi zvinoratidza kuti VaMnangagwa vanoda kuve nevanhu vatsva muchiuto nekune rumwe rutivi vachizvikomberedza nevanga vari muchiuto muhurumende yavo. VaChiwenga ndivo vakatungamira masoja kuti amanikidze vaimbova mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, kuti vasiye basa zvakazoita kuti VaMnangagwa, avo vakange vadzingwa semutedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, vazotora matomhu kubva kuna VaMugabe. Zvichakadai, VaValerio Sibanda vazivisa kuti masoja apedza chirongwa cheOperation Restore Legacy icho chakaita kuti VaMugabe vasiye basa. Asi veruzhinji vatataura navo mumigwagwa vakaita saVaTimothy Kambarami vati havasi kufara kuti masoja ave kubva mumigwagwa vachiti vanotyira kushungurudzwa nemapurisa. Mumwe wevanotengesera mumigwagwa, Muzvare Chenesai Chakadya, vati vafara kuti masoja anzi abve mumigwagwa asi hazvina zvazvinobatsira kwavari sezvo vachiti huchangoramba huri hwekiti negozno pakati pevanotengesera mumigwagwa nemapurisa ekanzuru. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Amai Charity Charamba, vati vachazotaura pamusoro pezvichange zvichitwa nemapurisa mukati memazuva maviri ari kutevera zvichitevera danho ratorwa nemasoja rekupedza chirongwa cheOperation Restore Legacy icho chakatanga musi wa13 Mbudzi. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzinoti Hapana Chinoshamisa Kunzwa VaMugabe Vachiremekedza VaMnangagwa
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongewrwo enyika dzinoti kucherechedzwa kwakaitwa mutungamiri wenyik, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, semunhu akasarudzwa zviri pachena kwakitwa nevaimbova mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nemudzimai wavo, Amai Grace Mugabe, hachisi chinhu chinonyanyoshamisa zvikuru sezvo VaMugabe naVaMngangagwa vari vanhu vainzwanana kwenguva yakareba. Vachitaura parufu rwaamai vemudzimai wavo nezuro, VaMugabe vakati vari kutambira kusarudzwa kwakaitwa VaMnangagwa semutungamiri wenyika musarudzo dzemusi wa30 Chikunguru idzo dzinonzi neMDC Alliance dzakabirirwa zvemahndo yepamusoro-soro. VaMugabe vakakurudzira kuti vemapto anopikisa vabvumidzwe kuita misangano yavo pasina anovavhiringidza. VaMugabe vakati yave nguva yekuti munhu wese achitsigira hurumende iripo parinzvino sezvo sarudzo dzakapfuura. Vachitaurawo parufu urwu, Amai Grace Mugabe vakatenda VaMnangagwa nekuvabhadharira ndege yakavatakura kubva kuSingapore kuuya kuHarare kuti vazochema amai vavo. Amai Mugabe vakatiwo vachanamatira VaMnangagwa nekune rumwe rutivi VaMugabe vachiti hutongi hwaVaMnangagwa hwakanatsurudzwa nekukunda kwavakaita musarudzo dzemusi wa30 Chikunguru zvichitevera kupinda panyanga kwavakaita mushure mekupindira kwakaita masoja munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika gore rapera. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vari mutugamiri wesangano revadzidizisi vekumaruwa reAlamgamted Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vati hapana chinovakatyamdza nemashoko aVaMugabe nemudzimai wavo sezvo VaMugabe vagara vari bhandi nebhurugwa kunyange hazvo vakazonyandurana pakapindira masoja mune zvematongerwo enyika gore rapera zvakazoita kuti VaMugabe vasiye basa. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaConrad Gweru, vaudza Studio 7 kuti mashoko aAmai Mugabe anoratidzawo kufara nezvakaitwa naVaMnangagwa zvekuvatsvagira ndege. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda vakazvimirira zvakare, VaVivid Gwede, vanoti kutsigira kwakaitwa zvakabuda musarudzo naVaMugabe kunoratidza kuti VaMugabe munhu ari kutsvaga kuchengetedzwa naVaMnangagwa. VaGwede vatiwo VaMugabe haasi zvakare munhu angateerererwa panyaya dzesarudzo sezvo sarudzo dzose dzavakaita dzaive sarudzo dzisiri pachena. Mutungamiri weMDC Alliance, VaNelson Chamisa, vari kuramba kutambira zvakabuda musarudzo dzemusi wa30 Chikunguru vachiti dzakabirirwa zvemhando yepamusorosoro. VaChamisa vanoti bato ravo riri mubishi kubvunza vatsigiri varo kuti votora gwara ripi sebato zvichitevera kusafamba zvakanaka kwavanoti kwakaita sarudzo idzi. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vowedzera neMavhiki Maviri Mazuva eKuti Vanhu Vagare Mudzimba Kurwisa Coronavirus
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nezuro vakazivisa kuti vainge vawedzera nemamwe mavhiki maviri mazuva ekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba kusvika musi wa 3 Chivabvu. Izvi zvinotevera kusvika kumagumo kwemavhiki matatu avainge vambotara kuti vanhu vagare mudzimba ayo ange achifanira kupera nhasi. Vachitaura kunyika kuState House, mumashoko apihwa Studio 7 mvumo yekushandisa nebazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, VaMnangagwa vakati zviri pachena kuti mumavhiki matatu avainge vambotara huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi hutori kuwedzera. Vakati Zimbabwe haisatiwo yazadzikisa zvose zvinoda kunzi zviitwe neWorld Health Organization kuti vanhu vanzi vabude mudzimba. Bazi rezvehutano razivisa kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus hwawedzera kusvika pamakumi maviri nemashanu mushure mekunge mumwe mudzimai abatwa nechirwere ichi kuManicaland. Mudzimai uyu ainge adzoka munyika kubva kuFrance. Asi pane vanhu vaviri vapona kusvika parizvino. Vanhu vatatu ndivo vafa nechirwere ichi. Asi vati vemakambani emigodhi vanofanira kutanga basa mushure mekunge vashandi vose vavhenekwa. Vatiwo vemakambani akakosha vanokwanisawo kuita basa. VaMnangagwa vati bazi rezvemagariro evanhu richabatsira vamwe vave kunonga svosve nemuromo parizvino nenyaya yenzara. Vanhu vakawanda vari kuudza Studio 7 kuti nzara yapfunya chisero mudzimba dzavo. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa kuStudio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kusangano rinoongorora nyaya dzezvirwere muAfrica reAfrica Centres for Disease Control Prevention anoti vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muAfrica vave kudarika churu chimwe chete nemakumi masere Vabatwa nechirwere ichi vave kusvika zviuru makumi maviri nechimwe. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora nyaya dzechirwere checornavirus pasi rose inoti huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere checoronavirus hwadarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mana. Vanhu vafa vave kudarika churu zana nemakumi matanhatu. America ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vafa nechirwere ichi pasi rose vanodarika zviuru zvina

headline: VaChamisa Votambirwa Zvine Mutsindo kuGweru
text: Zviuru nezviru zvevanhu zvaungana munhandare yeMkoba muGweru nhasi pamusangano webato idzva richangoumbwa reCitiozens Coalition for Change kana kuti Tripple C rinotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa. VaChamisa vatambirwa nenziyo uye detembo. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu VaChamisa vashora zvikuru nyaya yemhirizhonga munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika yakapa kuti vanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri veZanu-PF vauraye mumwe wevatsigiri wavo VaMboneni Ncube kuKwekwe svondo rapera. VaChamisa vavimbisawo kuti vachadzora dhora remuAmerica vakamirira kugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi. Izvi zvatsinhirwa nemumwe akafanobata chigaro chemutevedzeri webato iri VaTendai Biti avo vakambovawo gurukota rezvehupfumi. Panyaya yekutungamira VaChamisa vati vashakabvu vakawanda vaive vatungamiri vanosanganisira VaMorgan Tsvangirai veMDC, VaDumiso Dabengwa veZapu uye VaRobert Mugabe vakafa vavatambira kuti vave mutungamiri wenyika. Pamusangano vamwe vanhu vekuGweru varatidza kusafara nezviri kuitwa nezvimwe zvizvarwa zvekuChina munyika zvavanoti kuvhiringidza hupfumi hwenyika nekutyora kodzero dzevashandi. Asi muzinda weChina muZimbabwe unoti vemabhizimisi vakawanda vari kungozorwa mafuta enguve yavasina kudya vachiti vari kusimudzira nyika. Vamwe vataura pamusangano uyu mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru musangano revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions VaKudakwashe Munengiwa avo vati vahsnadi vanoda kuti dhora remunyika ridzoswe. Mutungamiri wesangano revadzidzi reZimbabwe National Students Unions atiwo pamusangano uyu zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka muzvikoro nenyaya yekuramwa basa kwevarairidzi. Asi vachitaura neStudio 7 panyaya yemhirizhonga, mukuru anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashaoko mubato reZanu-PF VaTafadzwa Mugwadi vakati bato ravo harisi zvemangoromera. Sarudzo dzemaby-elections kutsiva nhengo dzepamende dzakadzingwa neMDC-T dzichinzi dzaitsigira VaChamisa uye vamwe vakadzingwa kuZanu-PF nevakafa. No media source currently available

headline: VanaChiremba Voramba Kurudziro yeHurumende Yekuti Vadzokere kuMabasa
text: Vanachiremba munyika varamba kutambira kurudziro yehurumende yekuti vadzokere kumabasa nhasi vakatiwo vave kuda kubuda musangano rinomirira vashandi vehurumende reHealth Apex Council. Vanachiremba ava vaungana muHarare vakaratidzira pachipatara cheParirenyatwa vachiti hazvibatsiri kuti hurumende ivatyisidzire kuti vadzokere kumabasa vasina mari. Mumwe chiremba anga achiratidzira Dr Learnmore Shoti vati kuda kuvatyisidzira kuti vadzokere kumabasa hakuna zvakunoshanda sezvo vari kunonga svosve nemuromo. Mumwe chiremba asina kuda kudomwa nezita atiwo sezvo hurumende iri kukwidzawo zvinhu zvakaita semafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari, magetsi nezvimwewo zvichienderana nehuremu hwedhora rekuAmerica (Interbank Exchange Rate), naivo vanodawo kuti mari dzavo dzemihoro dzienderane nerate inenge iripo pavanotambira. Vanachiremba varatidzira vakananga kumahofisi eHealth Services Board uko vanosiya tsamba yenyunyuto vachishora nyaya yekutyisidzirwa uye vachitiwo vari kuda kubuda zviri pamutemo kubva musangano reHealth Apex Council rinomirira vashandi vose vehurumende. Vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori musangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Association, Doctor Tawanda Zvakada vati vanachiremba vaona zvakakodzera kubuda mumubatanidzwa wevashandi vari pasi pebazi rezvehutano sezvo risisamirire zvido zvavo. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutevedzeri wemutungamiriri wesangano ravanachiremba reZHDA, Doctor Masimba Dean Ndoro vati vari kuda kuti HSB itsvake imwe nzira yekuti vanzwe zvichemo zvavanachiremba kuitira kuti dambudziko ravo rigadziriswe.
