Vana chiremba vashoma shoma ndivo vanga varikubatsira pachipatara cheParirenyatwa izvo zvasiyawo varwere vari panyanga dzamushore. Amai Sandra Mushonga avo vane mwana ari muchipatara cheParirenyatwa vati mwana wavo haasi kuonekwa nanachiremba nguva dzese. Vati dai hurumende yagadzirisa zviri kudiwa navanachiremba kuitira kudzivirira kurasikirwa nehupenyu. Kunyangwe hazvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka kuzvipatara, sachigaro weHealth Services Board, Dr Paulinus Sikhosana vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanachiremba vadzokere kumabasa. Dr Sikhosana vatiwo kuumba rimwe boka rekuti vawane kutaurirana nanachiremba zvinotora nguva. Health Apex Council ine masangano anosvika gumi nemaviri anomirira vashandi vakasiyasiyana vari mubazi rezvehutano kubvira kune vanoita zvekuchenesa muzvipatara. Vana chiremba vanoti kusangana kwevanhu vanoita mabasa akasiyana-siyana kuri kupa kuti vamwe vashandi vabvume mari dzinenge dzataurwa nehurumende chero dziri shoma shoma. Kuramwa mabasa kwavana chiremba uku kwakatanga musi wa3 Gunyana. No media source currently available

headline: Kunetsa kweMari Munyika Kwoita Kuti veMabhanga Vape Musvo weMasendi
text: Kuenderera mberi kwedambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari kumabhanga emunyika kunonzi kwave kupa kuti mamwe mabhanga ape vanenge vachitora mari dzavo kumabhanga mari dzinosvika zana remadhora pazuva dziri dzemusvo wemasendi gumi. Asi izvi zvinonzi hazvisi kuderedza kureba kwemitsetse kumabhanga, kunyange hazvo mabhanga ari kukwanisa kupa vanhu mari dzemusvo idzi. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi, vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti chimwe chiri kuwedzera dambudziko remari munyika inyaya yekuti makadhi ekumabhanga haasi kukwanisa kushandiswa kumaruwa, uko vanhu vachiri kuda kushandisa mari chaiyo. Doctor Chitambara vanoti chikuru chiri kuita kuti dambudziko rirambe raita ndambirira sehosha yekurwere kushaya chivimbo munyaya dzezveupfumi hwenyika kuri kuitwa nevanhu. Doctor Chitambara vanoti vanokurudzira kuti dai hurumende yarasa ma bond note, yoshandisa mari yeRand yekuSouth Africa, zvimwe dambudziko remari raipera. No media source currently available

headline: Vanamukoti Vanosungwa Mushure Mekuedza Kuungana paChipatara cheHarare Hospital
text: Sangano rinomirira vanamukoti vanoshanda muzvipatara zvehurumende, reZimbabwe Nurses Association, ZINA, rinoti nhengo dzaro dzasungwa neMuvhuro mushure mekunge dzaedza kuungana pachipatara cheHarare Central Hospital apo dzanga dzichitarisira kuita musangano. Mutungamiri weZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo vanoti vanamukoti ava vanga vachiedza kusangana kuti vazeye matambudziko ari kusangana navanamukoti anosanganisira mihoro, kuramwa mabasa kwavari kuita pamwe nekudzingwa kuri kuitwa vari kuramwa mabasa vari kugara mudzimba dzepachipatara cheParirenyatwa Group of Hospitals. VaDongo vanoti vanamukoti vasungwa ava vabva kuzvipatara zvinoti Parirenyatwa, Harare Central neChitungwiza, uye panguva yataenda pamhepo vanga vasati vanzwa kuti vari kupomerwa mhosva ipi, asi vanga vakachengetedzwa pakamba yemapurisa yeMbare. Sangano remagweta reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights razivisa mugwaro raraburitsa kuti vanamukoti vasungwa vanosvika gumi nevatatu, uye vacharara muhusungwa vachitarisirwa kumira pamberi pedare neChipiri. Kusungwa kwavanamukoti ava kunouya panguva iyo vanamukoti muzvipatara zvehurumende zvekuBulawayo zvinoti Mpilo, United Bulawayo Hospitals neEngutsheni, varatidzirawo vachinyunyuta kuti hurumende haisati yavapindura zvichemo zvavo. Vanamukoti vari kuda kuti hurumende ivape mihoro yavo nemari yekuAmerica yavaitambira muna Gumiguru 2018. Studio yaedza kubata mutauriri wemapurisa, Assistant Commissioner Paul Nyathi, kuti tinzwe pamusoro penyaya iyi, asi vati vanga vari pane imwe nhare nekudaro vanga vasingakwanise kutaura nesu. No media source currently available

headline: Kubaiwa kweNhomba Munyika Kuri Kuitwa Zvisina Mutsindo
text: Chirongwa chekubaya nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 kuvashandi vezvehutano mudunhu reMasvingo chapinda muzuva retatu, bazi rehutano richiti huwandu hwevanhu vari kubayiwa nhomba huri kuwedzera kunyange hazvo risina kupa huwandu hwacho. Mukuru webazi rehutano muMasvingo, Dr Amedus Shamu, vati kunyange hazvo chirongwa ichi chakatanga zvishoma nemusi weMuvhuro, vashandi vakazobaiwa nhomba iyi nezuro nanhasi vawedzera. Dr Shamu vaudza Studio 7 kuti musi wekutanga vashandi vazhinji vaisagutsikana nenhomba iyi asi mushure mekutsanangurirwa, vazhinji vave kubaiwa. Kunyange hazvo Dr Shamu vati hofisi yavo haisati yapuwa huwandu hwevashandi vose vabaiwa pari zvino sezvo vashandi vavo vakabuda vachipinda muzvipatara zvemumaruwa, vanotarisira kubaya vashandi chiuru gumi nechimwe mudunhu rose pamazuva gumi. Asi vamwe vashandi vataura neStudio7 vati vashandi vemubazi rezvehutano vakawanda vari kuramba kubaiwa nhomba iyi, iyo yakabva kuChina. Vashandi vepachipatara cheMasvingo General Hospital vari kubaya vanhu nhomba vange vari pachipatara cheMushagashe neSummetone nhasi. Chipatara ichi chiri kunze kwedhoroba reMasvingo uko kwabaiwa vanhu vashoma vasingapfuuri gumi. Mumwe mushandi aramba kudomwa nezita rake paMushagashi audza Studio 7 kuti haasati ave nechivimbo chekuti nhomba iyi yakanaka. Vashandi vabaiwa nhasi varamba kutaura neStudo 7 iyo yatumirwa mapurisa kuti ibve pavange vachibairwa nhomba. Mutauriri weCovid-19 Taskforce muMasvingo, VaRodgers Irimayi, vati havasati vave nehuwandu hwevanhu vabaiwa nhomba pamazuva matatu asi musi wekutanga chete vashandi vakabaiwa mudunhu rose vakasvika zana nemakumi matanhatu nevasere. Vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kutyira nhomba iyi, asi Dr Shamu vakurudzira kuti vanhu ava vabaiwe vachiti nhomba iyi yakanaka sezvo yakatendedza nebazi rezveutano pamwe neWorld Health Organisation. Dunhu reMasvingo rakapiwa nhoma yevanhu zviuru makumi maviri nezviviri(22 000) kunyange hazvo iyo iri kuda kubaya vashandi zviurugumi nemumwe(11 000) pachirongwa chekutanga chiri kuitwa mumazuva gumi. Nezuro vanhu vakange vabaiwa nhomba munyika yose vanosvika zviuri zvina nemakumi mana nemumwe chete, (4041) Nezuro vanhumakumi mana nevasere vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika mose, vanomwe vakashaya. Nyika pari zvino yave nevanhu zviuru makumi matatu nezvishanu nemazana mapfumbamwe negumi vabatwa nechirwere ichi, (35 910), uye vapora vave zviuru makumi matatu nezviviri nemazana maviri ane makumi masere nevasere, (32 288). Vafa nechirwere ichi munyika yose vave chiuru chimwe nemazana mana nemakumi mana nevasere, (1448). No media source currently available

headline: MDC Alliance Inonzi Haisati Yatambira Zvichemo zveBato reTransform Zimbabwe
text: Mubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa, weMDC Alliance, unoti hausati waona zvichemo zveimwe nhengo yemubatanidzwa uyu, Transform Zimbabwe, iyo iri kunyunyuta kuti imwe nhengo yemubatanidzwa uyu, MDC-T, yave kutodoma nhengo dzebato rayo dzichakwikwidza mumatunhu anonzi akapihwa Transform Zimbabwe pasi pechirongwa chekushanda pamwe chemapato aya. Mutungamiri weTranform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume, vaudza vatori venhau kuti musangano wekongiresi yebato ravo wakaitwa mukupera kwesvondo, wakaratidza kusafara nenyaya yekuti MDC-T yekuti yave kutodoma vanhu vachaimirira musarudzo mumatunhu avo. Vati vakatokwidza chichemo ichi kuMDC Alliance. Asi vachitaura vakamirira mutungamiri webato ravo reMDC, VaWelshman Ncube avo vanove mutauriri weMDC Alliance, mutauriri weMDC, VaKurauone Chihwayi vati sekuziva kwavo vakuru-vakuru muAlliance havasati vawana chichemo cheTransform Zimbabwe ichi. Chimwewo chinonzi chisiri kufadza veTransform Zimbabwe ndechekuti pazvigaro zvese gumi nezvipfumbamwe zveNational Assembly zvakapihwa bato iri, hapana kana chimwe chiri mumatunhu ekuMatatabeleland ese ari matatu. Asi VaChihwayi vati mapato ese ari mumambatanidzwa weMDC Alliance akagara pasi asati abuda nechisungo icho vakazobvumirana vese. Mutauririri weMDC-T, Muzvare Tabitha Khumalo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo vasingataure vakamirira MDC Alliance, bato ravo rino remekedza mubatanidzwa uyu, uye riri kutevedza zvese zvakabvumiranwa pasi pawo. Vati nekuda kwaizvozvo bato ravo haringasarudze vanhu kuti vakwikwidze munzvimbo dzakapihwa mapato avanoshanda nawo. VaNgarivhume vanoti tariro yavo ndeyekuramba vari muMDC Alliance, uye vanotarisira kuti zvichemo zvavo zvigadziriswe mukati mesvondo rinotevera. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vakazvimirira, VaVivid Gwede, vanoti matambudziko akadai anowanikwa pamibatanidzwa yese uye anogadzirika. Mutauriri wemubatanidzwa wemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira, weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaTabani Moyo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakakosha kuti vatungamiriri muMDC Alliance vagadzirise zvichemo zvenhego dzavo. Pasi pemubatanidzwa weMDC Alliance, MDC-T, ndiyo ichange iine vamiriri vakawanda kudarika mapato ese, uye inotarisirwa kunge iine nhengo zana negumi neina. Mamwe mapato ari mumbatanidza uyu, anoti People’s Democratic Party, ZimPF, Zanu Ndonga neMulti Racial Christian Democrats. No media source currently available

headline: VaSimon Khaya Moyo Vanoradzikwa kuMarinda eHeroes Acre
text:
Gamba renyika, avo vaive mutauririri webato reZanu PF, VaSimon Khaya Moyo, vakaradzikwa neMuvhuro kumarinda eNational Heroes Acre, mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vachivarumbidza semunhu aive akatendeka vachiti vashandi vehurumende pamwe neveruzhinji vanofanira kutevera hunhu hwamushakabvu. 

Vachitaura pakuvigwa kwaVaMoyo, VaMnangagwa vati nyika yarasikirwa negamba nemunhu aifarira basa nenyika yake. Vati hunyanzvi hwaVaMoyo zvikuru sei munyaya dzekufambiswa kwemashoko hwakabatsira hurumende neZanu PF pakudyidzana nedzimwe nyika pamwe nekuti munyika muve nerunyararo. 


Vatsanangura mushakabvu semunhu aive akazvininipisa, asina hutsinye uye aida kuti vanhu vabatane vachiti hunhu hwavo ndihwo hwakaita kuti vawane zvigaro zvepamusoro mubato pamwe nemuhurumende. 

VaMnangagwa vatiwo kunyange hazvo VaMoyo vaishanda pedyo nevatungamiriri kubvira kuhondo yerusununguko, vainge vasina hundyire kana huwori. Vaenderera mberi vachiti mabasa emushakabvu anofanira kukurudzira veruzhinji munyika nekunze kuti vashande nehurumende pakuvakanyika yavo. 
VaMnangagwa vatiwo zvakakosha kuti munyika mugare musina mhirizhonga, pave nerunyararo nekubatana sezvo nyika yatarisana nesarudzo muna 2022 na2023. 

Zimbabwe ichaita sarudzo dzemaby-Elections gore rinouya kuzadzisa nzvimbo dzemakanzura nenhengo dzedare reparamende dzaakafa kana kudzingwa basa. 

Vachitaurawo pakuradzikwa kwemukoma wavo, VaIsaac Moyo,vati mushakabvu aive mutungamiriri akanaka mumhuri pamwe nemuhurumende uye semhuri vachaumba sangano kana kuti Trust yekuti vaite zvirongwa zvebudiriro nezvimwe zvaidiwa nemukoma

VaMoyo vakazvarwa musi wa1 Gumiguru muna 1945 vakashaya musi wa14 mwedzi uno kuchipatara cheMater Dei kuBulawayo mushure mekurwara kwenguva yakareba nechirwere chegomarara. 

Mhuri yavo yatenda hurumende nekuvarapisa kuzvipatara zvepamusoro kuSouth Africa, India nemuno. VaMoyo vakambova sachigaro webato reZanu-PF uye vakava gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, rezvemhando dzemoto pamwe nerezvemigodhi nezvakatipoteredza. 

VaMoyo vakambomirirawo Zimbabwe kuSouth Africa. 
Zvichakadai VaMnagangwa, vakurudzirawo veruzhinji kubaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira hutachiwani hweCovid-19, vachiti nyika ine nhomba dzekubaya vese vanoda kubaiwa. 

Mukuru musanganio rinoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu munyaya dzezvehutano ReCommunity Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike vati zvakakosha vanhu vaterere kuridziro yekubayiwa nhomba. 

Hurumende ine hurongwa kwekubaya vanhu kwekubaya nhomba vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana zvikamu makumi matanhatu zvevanhu vese kuti idzivirire kupararira kweCovid-19 munyika.

headline: VaChivhayo Vooneswa Ndondo neNyaya yeHuori muDare reParamende
text: Muzvinabhizimisi, Wicknell Chivhayo, nemusi weMuvhuro vakabvuma mudare reparamende kuti vakashandisa vezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nevakuru vakuru vehurumende kuti kambani yavo yeIntratrek iwanane basa rekuumba gwenya remagetsi ezuva reGwanda Solar Project kunyange hazvo vange vasingakodzeri. Vachipa humbowo kukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvemighodhi nezvemhando dzemoto kuti kambani yavo yeIntratrek yakawana sei basa rekuvaka gwenya remagetsi reGwanda Solar Project, VaChivhayo vabvuma kuti pakutanga kambani yavo yakatadza kuwana basa iri uye rakapihwa kune imwe kambani yekuChina. Vati izvi zvaitika, vakaenda kune vaiva gurukota rezvemando dzemoto, VaDzikamai Mavhaire, vakandotsutsumwa kuti sei vainge vashaya basa iri ivo vari ivo vainge vauuya nepfungwa yekuvaka gwenya iyi. Vatiwo vakanyorera kumunyori wedare remakurukota, Chief Secretary to the President and Cabinet pamwe nasachigaro weState Procurement Board vachichema chema nenyaya yavo yekushaya basa iri. Vati izvi zvakazoita kuti veState Procurement board vape kambani yavo pamwe nedzimwe mbiri basa rekuvaka magwenya emagatsi kunzvimbo nhatu munyika uye ivo vakapihwa basa rekuGwanda. Vati mushure maizvozvo vakatanga kuita basa rekutanga kana kuti Feasibility Study asi kambani yemagetsi yeZimbabwe Power Company yakaramba kuvabhadhara mamiriyoni maviri emadhora avaida sezvo vaive vasina magwaro ekubhanga airatidza kuti ivo vaivewo nemari mubhanga mavo. Pavabvunzwa nemumiriri weKwekwe Central VaMasangano Matambanadzo kuti sei vaida kubhadharwa asi vasina kutevedza mutemo, VaChivhaya vati mari yaidiwa yange yakawandisa. VaChivhayo vati mushure mekuramba kubhadharwa nemukuru weZPC, Vakabva vadzokera zvakare kune vange vave gurukota rezvemhando dzemoto, VaSamuel Undenge, kundochema chema zvakare izvo zvakazoita kuti ZPC ivabhadhare mari inosvika mamiriyoni mabiri nechuru zana chemadhora kana kuti 2, 1 million dollars. Mumiriri weGlen View North, VaFani Munengami vati semaonero avo maitiro aVaChivhayo anoratidza kuti vaiita zvinhu vasingatevedzi gwara uye vanenge vaiita zvehuwori. No media source currently available

headline: RBZ Yoparura Mari yemaBond Notes
text: Mabhanga guru munyika nemusi weMuvhuro akatanga kupa vanhu mari yemabond notes kunyange hazvo vamwe vezvitoro, pamwe nevanotengesa mumigwagwa vakambotanga vachiramba kutambira mari iyi mangwanani. Bhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe rakaparura mari yemabond notes iyo yange yave nenguva yakareba ichingonzi ichauya. Zvitoro zvikuru muHarare zvakaita seOK Zimbabwe nePickNPay zvakambotanga zvichiramba kutambira mari iyi zvichiti zvainge zvakamirira kuwana tsanangudzo kana kuti masecurity features. Patatenderera muguta panguva dzekuma10, zvitoro zvakawanda zvange zvisingatambiri mari iyi zvichiti zvainge zvakamirira kunzwa kubva kuRBZ. Asi pakazotendera zvekare Studio 7 panguva dzekumasikati, zvitoro zvakawanda kusanganisira OK ne PickNPay zvange zvave kutambira mari iyi. Mumwewo anotengesa mumugwagwa muHarare achigara kuChitungwiza uyo ati anonzi John audza Studio 7 kuti vatanga kutambira mari iyi sezvo iriiyo mari yave kushandiswa. John uyo anonoka kupinda muguta sezvo kwange kuri kunaya ati kunyange vedzimotokari dzinotakura vanhu vange vave kutambira mari itsva iyi. VaRichard Bvirindi vanoti kunyange hazvo veRBZ vange vari kushambadza nezvemaBond Notes, vange vasina ruzivivo rwekuti maBond Notes anenge akamira sei. Zvichakadaro, mukuru werimwe sangano rinomirira vane zvitoro reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers, VaDenford Mutashu vaudza Studio 7 kuti nhengo zhinji dzesangano ravo dzatambira mabond notes. VaMutashu vanoti huwandu hwezvitoro zvange zviri kutambira mabond notes hwange huri kuwanda nekufamba kwezuva uyewo kunyange vamwe vanotengesa mafuta edzimotokari vange vari kutambira mari iyi. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemumwe mugari we muHarare, VaTatenda Moyo vanotiwo semaonero avo, mari iyi yazotambirwa kunyange hazvo yange iri kurambwa mangwanani. VaBenard Nyasha ndemumwe wevakwanisa kutora mabond notes mubhanga mavo uye vanoti vashandisa mari iyi kutenga airtime. Mugari wemuHarare VaTinashe Eric Muzamhindo vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo pamboita kamweya kekuramba mari iyi, vanoona sekuti yatambirwa asi havazive kuti zvicharamba zvakadaro kusvika rini. Vatiwo havaoni sekuti mari iyi ichapedza dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari munyika sezvo iri mari shomanana kana zvichienzaniswa nemari inoda kushandiswa munyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi, VaJohn Robertson, vanoti kunyange hazvo veruzuhinji vange vasina chivimbo nehurumende nehuromgwa hwayo hwemabond notes zvichanyatsobuda pachena mukati memazuva mashonana anotevera kuti veruzhinji kana maindasitiri vachatambira mabond notes here kana kuti kwete. Imwewo nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfuumi vachishanda vakazvimira, VaJames Johwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti kunyange hazvo vanhu vanogona kunge vatambira mabond notes nekuda kwekunetsa kwemari munyika, izvi handizvo zvichapedza dambudziko rekushaikwa kwemari.. Vati chikuru chinodiwa kuti nyika ikwezve mabhizimisi pamwe nekuve nemutemo inota kuti mabhizimisi nemaindasitiri ashande zvakanaka achigadzira zvinhu zvekutengesa kunze izvo zvinounza mari munyika. Nyaya yekunetsa kwemari yekunze munyika, ndiyo yaita kuti RBZ ipinze pamusika mabond notes anosvika mamiriyoni mazana maviri emadhora achitsigirwa nemari inobva kuAfrica Export and Import Bank. VeRBZ vanoti vambotanga kuparura mabond notes e$10 million ari muzvikamu zve$1, $2 ne$5. VeRBZ vanoti munhu anobvumidzwa kutora mabond notes $50 pazuva uye $150 pasvondo. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura neveRBZ kuti tinzwe divi ravo pane zvaitika musi watanga kuparurwa mabond notes. Kunyangwe hazvo mabond notes aatanga kushandiswa mitsetse yevanhu vanoda mari yange yakareba zvikuru sei mumabhanga emuno akaita seZB, CABS, POSB neCBZ. Mabond notes akapinda pamusika kunyange hazvo vemapato anopiksa pamwe nemasangano akasiyana siyana munyika anosanganisira Tajamuka/Sisijikile, Zimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions ange ari kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vasatambira mari iyi. Zvichakadaro, imwe nhengo yeTajamuka, VaPromise Mkwananzi vakasungwa neMuvhuro muHarare mushure mekunge vaita musangano wekutaura nezvemabond notes. Imwe nhengo yesangano iri, VaDenford Ngadziore vanoti pamusangano uyu VaMkwananzi vange vari kutaura nezvehurongwa hwekuratidzira pamusoro pemabond notes uwho huchatwa musi nemusi wechitatu. VaNgadzirore vanoti kuratidzira uku kuchaenderera mberi zvisinei nekuti vapihwa mvumo nemapurisa here kana kuti kwete. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Voungana kuMusangano weBuilding For The Future Conference Mudunhu reKansas
text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muAmerica zviri kuungana neChishanu kusvika neSvondo, Chikunguru 01, 2018, apo zvichange zvichipana mazano mumabasa ekusimudzira hupenyu nenharaunda dzavari pari zvino pamwe nekwavakabva. Vanhu ava vari kusangano pasi pesangano rinonzi Building for the Future 2018. Mumwe wevakatanga musangano uyu makore mashanu apfuura, Reverend Jacob Tozoona Maforo, avo vanogara kuKansas muno muAmerica, vanoti vari kufara nekukura nekubudiira kuri kuita sangano ravo gore negore. Kuburikidza nesangano iri vanhu vari kuwana mukana wekupana mazano panyaya dzehupenyu, kuzeya zvimhingamipinyi zvavanosangana nazvo, pamwe nekuyechidzana zvakakoshera kutarisa shure kwavakabva vachibatsirawo vamwe vanodawo kusimudzira hupenyu hwavo. Mufundisi Maforo, avo vanopinda kereke yeUnited Methodist, vanotiwo kumusangano wavo uyu vanokoka vanhu vemakereke ose echiKristu, hausaruri, naizvozvo vanhu vanofanirwa kuuya vakasununguka nekuti vamwe vanogona kutyira kuti zvimwe ndewezvematongerwo enyika. Mufundisi Maforo vanoti havaneyi nekuti munhu anotsigira bato ripi rezvematongerwo enyika, sezvo chinangwa chiri chekushumira pamwe sevana veZimbabwe. "Kune vasati vanzwa nemusangano uyu tinoti huyai kumusangano weBuilding for the future Conference. Pane vamwe vangava nepfngwa dzekuti zvimwe tinenge tichiita zvematongerwo enyika, kwete, yedu program, ndeyevanhu vane chishuvo chekuti zvavari kuita zvinobatika, zvikurukurwe pamusoro pezvazvo." No media source currently available

headline: Murwiri weKodzero dzeVanasikana Muzvare Betty Makoni Vobatwa neCovid-19 keChipiri
text: Murwiri wekodzero dzevanasikana uye vakavamba sangano reGirl Child Network muZimbabwe, Muzvare Betty Makoni vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kechipiri gore rino. Vachitaura neStudio 7 vari kuBritain, Muzvare Makoni vati vave kunzwa zviri nani uye vanachiremba vatovapa tsamba yekuratidza kuti vapora. Muzvare Makoni vanoti nyaya yekuti vanomboshanda vachipinda muzvipatara nedzimwe nzvimbo dzine vanhu vakawanda inopa kuti vapindewo munjodzi yekutapurirwa chirwere ichi. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano dzinoti munhu paanobatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kekutanga anokwanisa kungopedza mwedzi mitatu chete masoja emuviri wake akamudzivirira. Ana chiremba vachiri kuzeya nyaya nyaya dzevanhu vanobatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kaviri sezvo vachiri vashoma. Nyika dzine vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kechipiri dzinosanganirsira America, Britain, Hong Kong, Belgium, the Netherlands ne Ecuador. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Mark Pandori vanova mukuru paNevada State Public Health Laboratory muAmerica vanoti kubatwa nechirwere ichi kechipiri kwevanhu ava munongedzo wekuti kunyangwe ukapora kubva kuCovid-19 unofanira kugara wakazvichengetedza kunyangwe wambopora kubva kuchirwere ichi. Vanokurudzira vanhu kuti vapfeke mamamask, kugeza maoko uye kusangoita magungano. No media source currently available

headline: Kupisa Kwekunze Kotarisirwa Kuenderera Mberi Kunzvimbo Dzakawanda Zvokanganisa Varimi
text: Bazi rezvemamiriro ekunze remeteorological Services Department rinoti kupisa kwekunze kuchaenderera mberi kunzvimbo dzakawanda kunyangwe dzimwe nzvimbo dzichawana mvura pano neapo. Bazi iri rinoti kutanga musi wa 10 mwedzi uno ndipo pari kutarisirwa kuti pachanaya mvura. Vanokokera mabasa muzimbabwe Farmers Union Amai Margaret Hoshiki vanoti kusanaya kwemvura kwave kupa kuti varimi vakawanda vaomerwe sezvo pasina tarisiro yekuti goho remwaka uno rinenge rakanaka. Vakurudzira varimi kuti vasarambe vachidyarurura Mbeu dzinonoka kuibva. "Tino kurudzira kuti varimi varime zvirimwa zvakadayi semamapfunde mapfupi anokurumbidza kuibva, ne mbesa dzinokurumidza kuibva kana kuti ma "small grain" sezvo mwaka usina kumira zvakanaka," Amai Hoshiki vaudza Studio 7. Vaenderera mberi vachiti, "Tinokurudzira kuti kana mvura yango tanga kunaya varimi ngava kande mbesa dzinokurumbidza kuibva kana chiri chibage ngava kande mbese chechibage chinonzi tsoko icho chinokurumbidza kuibva." No media source currently available

headline: Seneti Inopasisa Bhajeti ra2020
text: Dare reseneti rapasisa bhajeti regore rinouya zvechichimbi izvo zvafadza gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, avo vati izvi zvinoratidza kuti dare iri rinobvumirana nazvose zviri mubhajeti iri. Seneti yapasisa bhajeti iri mushure menguva pfupi pfupi pasina zvashandurwa pamapasiro arakaita kudare reNational Assembly nezuro manheru. Gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvinofadza kuti bhajeti rapasa nekukasika vachiti izvi zvinoita kuti vatange kutoita basa pakutanga kwegore. Vati zvaitika izvi zvaratidza kuti nhengo dzeseneti dzinobvumirana nezvose zviri mubhajeti uye chave chijana chavo chekutevedza hwaro hwebhajeti iri uhwo hunokurudzira kugadzirwa kwezvinhu pamwe nekuvepo kwemabasa. Dingindira rebhajeti remadhora mabhiriyoni makumi matanhatu nematatu nechidimbu, rinoti Gearing for Higher Productivity, Growth and Job Creation. Mune imwewo nyaya nhengo dzeparamende dzeMDC dzazivisa kuti hadzisi kuzomira pamberi pekomiti yakaumbwa neparamende kuti iongorore maitiro adzo apo dziri kuramba kuremekedza kana kutambira, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, semutungamiriri wenyika. Komiti iyi, iyo ine nhengo dzeZanu PF chete, yakaumbwa nekomiti inotungamira mabasa eparamende, yeStanding Rules and Orders Committee, SRCO, mushure mekunge nhengo dzeMDC mukomiti iyi dzabuda mumusangano weSROC dzichiti dzainge dzisingabvumirane nezvainge zvave kurongwa mukomiti iyi. SROC inotungamirirwa nemutauriri weparamende, Advocate Jacob Mudenda, vebato reZanu PF. Vanokokera nhengo dzeMDC muNational Assembly, VaProsper Mutseyami, vaudza Studio7 kuti hapana nhengo yebato ravo ichamira pamberi pekomiti iyi sezvo ichitori nedivi rayakarekera. Nhengo dzeMDC dzakatomborangwa neparamende, nekunyimwa mari yadzo yemihoro, peturu nezvimwe nekuda kwenyaya iyi. Asi VaMutseyami vati izvi hazvisi kuzovadzorera kumashure. Munyori weMDC anoona nezvebumbiro remitemo neparamende, VaKucaca Phulu, pamwe nemunyori wemutemo, VaInnocent Gonese, vaudza VaMudenda kuti havachina chiremera nekuti vave kuita basa ravo vane divi ravakarekera. Vaviri ava vati zvava kuitwa naVaMudenda hazvienderani nezvinotarisirwa kuvatauriri vemaparemende pasi rese. VaMudenda varamba kutaura pamusoro pekomiti iyi sezvo isati yapedza basa rayo. Komiti iyi, yePriviledges Committee, iyo inotungamirirwa naVaJonathan Smakange, yakapihwa kusvika musi wa 28 Kukadzi kupedza basa rayo. Rimwe gweta rinoshandira muHarare, VaKudzia Kadzere, vaudza Studio7 kuti vanoona sekuti danho ratorwa nenhengo dzeMDC rakanaka chose sezvo komiti inofanira kunge ichiongorora nhengo dzeMDC, ichifanira kunge ine nhengo kubva kumapato ose ari muparamende. MDC yakaita chisungo pakongiresi yayo chekuti haitambiri VaMnangangwa sumutungamiriri wenyika nekudaro pose pavanouya kuparamende, nhengo dzayo dzinobuda mudare kana kuti hadzivaremekedzi. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa Anorova Zvakaipisisa Vatori veNhau veNewsDay
text: Mapurisa arova nekusunga vatapi venhau vebepanhau reNewsday avo vange vari kutora mifananidzo yemapurisa ange ari kurova mumwe muchairi wekombi muHarare. Izvi zvaitika apo gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoka, VaChris Mushowe, varamba kumira pamberi pekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko kuti vataure kuti chii chiri kuitwa nebazi ravo kuvandudza mitemo yezvekutapwa kwenhau pamwe nekuona kuti vatapi venhau vashanda vasingashungurudzwe. Vatori venhau, Obey Manayiti, Shepard Tozvireva, Abigai Matsikidze nemuchairi wavo, Raphael Phiri, vasungwa muHarare nemapurisa ayo asina kufara nebasa ravange vachiita. Kutaura kudai vamwe vatatu vasunungurwa uye Manayiti achiri muhusungwa achipomerwa mhosva yekurova mapurisa. Asi mupepeti mebepanhau reNewsday, VaWisdom Mudzungairi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti Manayiti ndiye arohwa zvakaipisa nemapurisa uye mapurisa ange ati Manayiti abhadhare faindi asi aramba kuita izvi sezvo ari iye arohwa nemapurisa. VaMudzungairi vati Manayiti anzi achaenda kudare mangwana. Masangano anomirira vatapi venhau, eVoluntary Media Council of Zimbabwe, neMedia Insitute of Southern Africa Zimbabwe Chapter, ashora kuita kwemapurisa. Vanoona nekufambiswa kwezvirongwa muVMCZ, Muzvare Faith Ndhlovu, vati zvinosuwisa kuti apo bumbiro remitemo riri kuti vatapi vanhau vashande zvakanaka pasina kushungurudzwa, mapurisa ari kurova vatori venhau vachiita basa ravo. VaNjabulo Ncube veZimbabwe National Editors Forum vati kuita kwemapurisa kunoratidza kuti zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichioma munyaya dzekutapwa kwenhau. Mumwe mutapi wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira, Byron Mutingwende, ashaora kuita kwemapurisa achiti kutapa nhau haisi mhosva. Mumwewo mutapi wenhau, Judith Kajuma, ati mapurisa ari kushungurudza veruzhinji uye hapana chakaipa pane zvange zvichiitwa nevatori venhau veNewsday. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba, vati havana zvavanoziva nekurohwa kwaManayiti nevamwe vake sezvo vasiri ivo vanosunga vanhu. Kushungurudzwa kwevatori venhau veNewsday kwaitika apo gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemshoko, VaChris Mushowe varamba kumira pamberi pedare kechina kuti vazotaura kuti chii chiri kuitwa nebazi ravo kuvandudza mitemo yezvekutapwa kwenhau pamwe nekuti vatori venhau vashande pasina kushungurudzwa. VaMushowe vaonekwa vari kumusangano weZanu PF kumuzinda webato iri uko mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, vange vachitaura pamusoro pemakakatanwa ari mubato ravo. Vanoona nezvekushambadzwa kwezvirongwa muMISA Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vati VaMushowe igurukota risina hany’a nebasa raro. Imwe nhengo yeMDCT muparamende, VaJames Maridadi, vashora zviri kuitwa naVaMushowe. Nhengo dzeMDC nedzeZanu PF muparamende hadzisi kuwirirana pamatanho anofanirwa kutorerwa VaMushowe nekuzvidza kwavari kuita komiti iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Ongororo Yakaitwa neHofisi yaAmai Chiri Inoti Makanzuru Ari Kutadza Kuita Mabasa Awo neMazvo
text: Mukuru wehofisi yaComptroller and Auditor- General, Amai Mildred Chiri, vanoti makanzuru emaguta nemadhorobha akawanda munyika haasi kuita basa nemazvo akaita sekutakura marara nekuwanisa vanhu mvura yakachena. Gwaro rakaburitswa nehofisi iyi rinoratidza kuti makunzuru akawanda munyika ari kuita basa asingatevedze mitemo inobata mashandiro emakanzuru aya. Gwaro iri rinoitwo pamusoro pekusatevedza mitemo, makanzuru aya ari kutadza kuita basa nemazvo. GWaro iri rinoti kanzuru yeChitungwiza iri kungopa vanhu nzvimbo dzekuvakira dzimba nemabhizimisi pasina mvura, migwagwa nezvimwe zvinodiwa kuvepo nzvimbo isati yavakwa. Kanzuru yeMasvingo inonzi inogaya 30 megalitres dzemvura pazuva asi guta iri richida 48 mega litres pazuva. Kanzuru yeMutare inonzi haiendesi kubhanga mari yese yainowana uye kuGweru makanzura anonzi haasati abhadhara masitendi aakapihwa nemutengo uri pasi pasi kunyange hazvo aisungirwa kunge akabhadhara masitendi aya. Zvimwewo zvakawonekwa inyaya yekuti midziyo inenge yatengwa nemakunzuru inotora gore kana kudarika isati yaendeswa kumakanzuru aya. Sachigaro weUrban Councils Association of Zimbabwe, zvakarre vari meya veGweru, VaJosiah Makombe, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanobvumirana nemaonero aAuditor-General, asi vakati zvimwe zvacho zvakatogadziriswa. Asi VaMakombe vati nyaya yekupa vanhu mvura yakakwana nekutakura marara inonetsa kugadzirisa nekuti havasi kuwana rutsigro rwakakwana kubva kuhurumende. Vati mafuta emotokari dzekutakura marara anotengeswa nemari yekunze asi ivo vachibhadharisa mitero nemari yemunyika. Vatiwo kunyange hazvo vakapihwa mvumo yekuti vagari vanoda vabhadhare mitero nemari yekunze, hakuna vari kuita izvi nekuti simba remari yekunze rakadzikira mumabhanga kana zvichienzaniswa nepamukoto. Vati nekuda kwaizvo vanhu vanochinja mari yavo pamukoto vobhadhara mitero kumakunzuru nemari yema RTGS. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwebasa musangano rinomirira vagari vemuMasvingo, Amai Rumbidzao Mugurupira, vaudza Studio 7 kuti gwaro raAG raburitsa pachena zvavanogaro taura kuti hapana chinobatika chiri kuitwa nekanzuru yavo kuratidza kuti vari kubhadhara mitero. Sachigrao veHarare Metropolitan Residents Forum, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vatiwo hurumende inofanira kuvandudza bumbiro remitemo yenyika kuitira kuti makanzuru akwanise kushanda akasanunguka. Vati pari zvino pane kupindira kunoitwa nehurumencde uko kunokanganisa makunzuru aya. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi sezvo gurukota rezvematunhu, VaJuly Moyo, vange vasiri kudaira nhare mbozha yavo. Vachitaura mushure mekutambira mabhajeti emakanzuru aya gore rino vasina kuaderedza, VaMoyo vakati vainge vaita izvi nekuti vaida kuti makanzuru aya awane mari yekuti akwanise kuita mabasa akaita sekuwanisa vanhu mvura yakachena nekutakura marara nguva dzose. VaMoyo vakatiwo vanotarisira kuti makanzuru achashandisa mari dzekuvandudzwa kwematunhu kana kuti Devolution kusimudzira magariro evanhu. Asi VaMakombe vati makanzuru akatomirira mari idzi nemaziso matsvuku kubva kuhurumende, sezvo asati apihwa mari idzi. No media source currently available

headline: Nhomba yeCovid-19 Iri Kubva kuChina Ichapihwa Vanhu Isina Kuongororwa muZimbabwe
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzinoti mushonga wekudzivirira Covid-19 uyo uri kutanga kusvika nemusi weMuvhuru ichibva China, unofanira kutevedza gwara rinoshandiswa pamishonga yese inopinda munyika rekuti unotanga waongoororwa kuti unoshanda sei muZimbabwe zvichienderana nemhando yehutachiwana huri muno usati wapihwa veruzhinji. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vanoti mushonga usati watengwa, Zimbabwe, kuburikidza nebazi rehutano, inotanga yaongorora kuti mushonga uyu wakagadzirwa sei kunyika kwaunobva, uye kuti zvawakashatira ndezvipi veruzhinji vasati vapihwa mushonga uyu. Vati panopinda mushonga uyu munyika, unofanira kutanga waongororwa sezvo wakagadzirwa kudunhu repasi rino rakasiyana neZimbabwe. VaMadzorera vati ongororo iyi inogona kuitwa mukati meguva pfupi sezvo denda reCovid-19 riri kupararira nekusaika. VaMadzorera vati pari zvino havana ruzivo kuti izvi zvakaitwa here kana kuti kwete sezvo hurumende isiri kubuda pachena nehurongwa hwayo. Imwe nyanzvi yezvehutano, Dr Peter Mataruse, vatiwo tarisiro yavo ndeyekuti Medicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe, ichaongorora mishonga yeCovid-19 sezvainoita pamishonga yese inopinda munyika sezvinodiwa nemitemo yakaita kuti bazi iri riumbwe munyika. Vati ongororo idzi dzinogona kuitwa kunyange hazvo mushonga watove munyika. Sachigaro wekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, Dr Ruth Labode, vatsinhira mashoko emamwe machiremba, vachiti paramende inotarisira kuti bazi rehutano richavapakurira zvizere nemusi weChipiri pavanotanga kugara dare reNational Assembly. Mukuru weMedicine Control Authority of Zimbabwe, VaRichard Rukwata, vatiwo vakapa hurumende mvumo yekuunza mishonga yeCovid-19 munyika mushure mekunge yatevedza zvese zvinodiwa pasi pemitemo yenyika. Pasi pechibvumirano cheZimbabwe Covid-19 National Development and Vacccination Strategy, Medicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe inopa mvumo yekuunza nekushandisa mishonga iyi mukati memazuva mashanu ichinge yapihwa humbowo hunoratidza kuti mishonga iyi yakanyoreswa munyika dzayakagadzirwa, uye kuti yakanyoreswawo nesangano reWorld Health Organisation here kana kuti kwete. Vati panofanirawo kuitwa ongororo yekuona kuti mishonga iyi haikanganise here vanhu munyika yose. Vati kunyange hazvo ongororo dzakadai dzichikwanisa kutora nguva yakareba, dzinokwanisa kuitwa mukati memazuva manomwe sezvo mishonga iyi iri kushandiswa zvechimbichimbi. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvehutano, Dr John Mangwiro, vati hurumende yakatevedza zvese zvinodiwa uye vari kutevedza hunyanzvi hwesainzi pamatanho ese avari kutora. Gurukota rezvehutano, uye vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantino Chiwenga, vati zvinhu zose zviri mugwara uye mushonga uri kusvika munyika, uchabva wapihwa vanhu vari muchikamu chekutanga kuwana nhomba iyi. Vanhu ava vanosanganisira vana chiremba, vakoti, vashandi vemuzvipatara nevose vanoita mabasa anonzi akakosha zvikuru. Izvi zvinoburitsa pachena kuti hurumende haina hurongwa hwekutanga yaongorora nhomba iyi isati yapihwa veruzhinji. Mutangamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanotarisira kugamuchira mishonga yeSinopharm inosvika mazana maviri ezviuru nemusi weMuvhuro painosvika munyika ichibva kuChina. No media source currently available

headline: VaMugabe Voratidzwa Kuti Havachadiwi neVakawanda
text: Vakarwa muhondo yerusununguko vari kuita musangano wekutenda zvakaitwa nemauto ayo akabvisa mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, pamasimba ekutonga. Vakarwa hondo ava vatiwo vari kuda kuratidza VaMugabe kuti havachadiwa neveruzhinji Sachigaro wesangano revakwirwa hondo yerusununguko, VaChris Mutsvangwa, vatiwo pasi paGen Chiwenga uto reZimbabwe raratidza kuti iuto revanhu uye rinoda kuti vanhu vagare zvakanaka munyika mavo. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika, VaItai Madzivaidze, vati kunyange hazvo kutambura kwevana veZimbabwe pasi pehutongo hwaVaMugabe kwakatanga kare, vamwe vaitungamira uto kare havana kuratidza hushingi sehwaratidzwa naVaChiwenga hwekubvisa VaMugabe pachigaro. Veruzhinji munyika nevarwi vehondo yerusununguko vachaita gungano guru muHarare mangwana kutanga nekutsigira basa rakaitwa nemauto rekubvisa VaMugabe pachigaro. VaMugabe vari kuramba vakaoma musoro vachiti ndivo vachiri kutungamira kunyange hazvo veruzhinji vari kufarira kuti vasiye basa. No media source currently available

headline: VanaMukoti Voramwa Mabasa kuChipatara cheMpilo
text: Vamwe vana mukoti varatidzira paMpilo Hopital nhasi mangwanani vachiti havasi kusafara nemashandiro avo. Vana mukoti vange vachisvika zana vaungana kwenguva inoda kusvika awa imwe chete pamusiwo mukuru wechipatara ichi vachiimba vamwe vavo vakabata zvinyorwa zvakasiyana-siyana zvichiratidza kusafara kwavo. Mukuru weZimbabwe Nurses Association mudunhu reBulawayo VaDonald Chidowore vati vari kutsutsumwa nedanho rekuti vave kunzi vashande kwemazuva mashanu pavhiki pane kuti vashande mazuva maviri sezvavari kuita pari zvino. Vati havawone chikonzero chekuti vashande kwenguva yakareba seizvi sezvo mari yavari kutambira isiri kuvakwanira uye vasina zvikwanisiro zvekushanda. Munyori mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEventhough Siziba avo vange varipowo pakuratidzira uku vati zvimwe zvinyunyuto zvavana mukoti zvinosanganisira kuti havakwanise kubatsira varwere zvakakwana sezvavanotarisirwa nekuti zvipatara zvakawanda munyika hazvina mishonga. Vatiwo hutano hwaana mukoti huri panjodzi sezvo vasingapiwe mishonga kana zvipfeko zvinovadzivrira kuzvirwere kunyanya panguva ino hutachiwana hwecoronavirus huri kupararira pasi rose. Vamwe vevana mukoti vange vari pabasa vazozodzokera pabasa papera kuratidzira uku. Vanoziva nezviri kuitika vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanamukoti vanzi vamboenderera mberi vachishanda mazuva maviri pasvondo kusvika nyaya iyi yagadziriswa nevakuru vakuru. Taedza kunzwa kubva kumukuru wemabasa ekurapwa paMpilo Dr Solwayo Ngwenya asi vati hapana zvavange vachikwanisa kutaura panyaya iyi nekuti vari pazororo pari zvino. Mukuru wechipatara VaLeonard Mabande vaudzawo Studio parunhare kuti vari kuHarare uko vari kumusangano webazi rezvehutano. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano Dr John Mangwiro vaudza Studio 7 parunhare kuti vanganyatsoziva nezvekuti vana mukoti vanofanirwa kushanda mazuva managani munyori webazi iri Dr Agnes Mahomva asi tatadza kuvabata sezvo nherembozha yavo yange isingabatike. Vana mukoti pamwe navana chiremba munyika vave nenguva yakareba vachinyunyuta pamusoro pemashandiro avo uye kuti mari yemihoro yavanowana haivakwanire. No media source currently available

headline: VaMagaya Vokonzera Mutauro muNyika neKuti Vawana Mushonga weHIV
text: Muporofita Walter Magaya vechicgi yeProphetic Healing Deliverance kana kuti PHD vakonzera mutauro munyika nezuro mushure mekunge vati ivo nevamwe vavari kushanda kubva kuIndia vachiti vawana mushonga wekurapa chirwere cheHIV. Aka hakasi kekutanga VaMagaya vachitaura mashoko akadai sezvo muna 2016 vakambotaura kwaMutare kuti mweya mutsvene kuburikidza nemavari unokwanisa kurapa chirwere ichi. Vakambotiwo vanorapa chirwere chegomarara. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaMagaya kuti tinzwe divi ravo. Asi vakataura mashoko aya panhepfenyuro yavo yeYadar TV vachiti pane muti wavakawana unosanganiswa nemumwe unowanikwa kuMozambique. Asi vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano Dr Henry Madzorera vati vanhu vanofanira kuramba vachinwa mishonga yavo yemaARV kwete kurega vachiti kwaita mushonga unorapa chirwere ichi kusvika vanachiremba vaita ongororo izere.

headline: Sangano reBill and Melinda Gates Rowanisa Vanhu Dzimba muHarare
text: Rimwe sangano rekuAmerica, reBill and Melinda Gates Foundation, irapedza chirongwa charo chekuvakira vanotambura dzimba muHarare apo ratambidza dzimba zviri pamutemo kumhuri mazana mana nemakumi masere mumusha weDzivaresekwa Extenstion muHarare. Vachitaura pachiitiko ichi, mumwe mukuru anoona bezvekufambiswa kwezvirongwa musangano iri, Amai Melanie Walker, vati chirongwa ichi, icho chine mamiriyoni makumi mashanu emadhora, chabudirira chose. Vati ishuviro yavo kuti kanzuro yeHarar,e ichashanda nemamwe masangano anopa rubatsiro,ichaenderera mberi ichivakira vanoshaya dzimba kuti vagare zvakanaka sezvo sangano ravo rapedza chirongwa charo. Meya veguta reHarare, VaBenard Manyenyeni, vatenda sangano iri uye vati chirongwa ichi chakabudirira chose zvekuti kanzuru yavo yave kutoronga kushandisa chirongwa ichimukugadzirisa dambudziko revanhu vari kugara munzvimbo dzisingakodzeri muguta. Pasi pechirongwa cheBill and Melinda Gates Foundation, kanzuru yakapihwa mari yekugadzira migwagwa, kugadzira pombi dzemvura nesiweji uyewo vanhu vakazopihwa mari dzekuvaka dzimba dzine mipanda miviri miviri. Vazhinji vakawana rubatsiro nedzimba pasi pechirongwa ichi ndevaya vakabviswa munzvimbo dzavaigara apo hurumende yaigadzirira kushanya muZimbabwe kwaMambokadzi wekuEnglanda, Queen Elizabeth, muna 1992 pamwe nevamwe vakaputsirwa dzimba dzavo paOperation Murambatsvina muna 2005. Mumwe wevanhu ava, Amai Grace Tagarisa, vanoti vanofara chose kuti vavewo nepekugara zvichitevera rubatsiro rwakabva kuBill and Melinda Gates Foundations. Vanoti kunze kwemba vakadzidziswa kuita mabasa ekuzvibatsira akaita sekusona. Mumwe wevanhu vakawana rubatsiro kubva kusangano iri, Ambuya Netty Mahachi, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanofara chose kuti vave nepekugara mushure mekutambura kwenguva yakareba. VaManyenyeni vati zvichitevera kufamba zvakanaka kwechirongwa ichi, kanzura ichabvisa mumhuri zana nemakumi maviri neimwe dziri kugara zviri kunze kwemutemo mumusha weGunhill vodzivakira dzimba kuMabvuku. Vaenderera mberi vachiti kanzuru yavo iri kuedza napose painogona napo kuti munhu wese awane pekugara muHarare zvisinei nekuti murombo here kana kuti kwete Vati kanzuro yavo ine chinangwa chekuvaka dzimba dzinodarika zana rezviuru kusvika mugore ra2018.

headline: VaMahlangu Voradzikwa neMugovera
text: Mumiriri weNkulumane mudare reparamende VaThamsanqa Mahlangu avo vakashaya neMuvhuro vave kutarisira kuradzikwa muBulawayo neMugovera. VaMahlangu mumwe wevakabatsira kuumba bato reMDC muna 1999.  VaMahlangu vakashaya nechirwere chegomarara. Pakushaya kwavo vange varizve mutevedzeri wemunyori anoona nezvekurongwa kwemabasa muMDC uye vakambovawo mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvevechidiki. Mutauriri weMDC VaObert Gutu vanoti vacharadzikwa kumarinda eLady Stanley kuBulawayo. Iyi inzvimbo inoradzikwa magamba emuBulawayo. Mutungamiri webato reMDC VaMorgan Tsvangirai nevamwe vatungamiri mubato ravo vari kutarisirwa kunoradzika VaMahlangu. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Nurses Association Yomirira Kunzwa kuNhengo Dzayo Pamusoro peMihoro
text: Sangano rinomirira vanamukoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association, rinoti richamirira kunzwa kubva kunhengo dzaro pamusoro pemari yekubatsirikana yakapiwa vashandi nehurumende, pamwewo nehurukuro dzemihoro pakati pehurumende nevashandi vayo, idzo dzinonzi dzichiri kuenderera mberi. Izvi zvinotevera musangano wakaitwa pakati pevashandi vehurumende nehurumende neChitatu, apo hurumende yakazivisa kuti yapa vashandi vayo zvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana zvemari dzemihoro yavo mumwedzi uno waChikunguru kuitira kuti vabatsirikane vakamirira kuona zvichabuda muhurukuro dziri kuitwa. Munyori mukuru wesangano ravanamukoti iri, VaEnock Dongo, vanoti vashandi havana kupiwa mukana wekuramba kana kutambira mari idzi, sezvo dzakangoiswa mumabhanga avo kutanga kwesvondo rino. Asi VaDongo vanoti sezviri kungoitwawo nevamwe vashandi vehurumende vese, nhengo dzavo dzakarambawo kutambira madhora makumi mapfumbamwe nemanomwe akanga aiswa patafura nehurumende, vachiti vanoda kuti mari dzavo dzifambirane nemamirira ezvinhu pari zvino.

headline: VeMDC Vanoti Pane Nhaurirano dzeMapato Ose Asi Zanu-PF Yotsika Madziro
text: Mapato anopikisa reMDC rinotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai nerimwe rinotungamirwa naVaWelsman Ncube anoti ichokwadi kuti pane nhaurirano dziri kuitwa nemapato ose emunyika. Bepanhau reNewsday rinoti mapato aya akasangana kuGhana nekuKenya kuti paitwe hurumende yemubatanidzwa. Asi mapato matatu aya anoti izvi ndezvemugotsi matsuro. Mutauriri weZanu-PF VaSimon Khaya Moyo vatsika madziro vachiti hakuna musangano wakadai wakaitwa. Vaudza Studio 7 kuti Zanu-PF haina chekutaura nevanopikisa. Asi mutungamiri weMDC VaWelshman Ncube vaudza Studio 7 kuti nhaurirano idzi dzirikuitwa asi hadzinei nechekuita nekuumba hurumende yemubatanidzwa. Muzvinafundo Ncube vati pane zvinhu zvinoda kugadziriswa nechimbichimbi zvakaita sebumbiro remitemo nemitemo yesarudzo. Mashoko aVaNcube atsinhirwawo naVaObert Gutu mutauriri weMDC inotungamirwa naVaTsvangirai. No media source currently available Kubva zvakabuda nyaya iyi, kukandirana makobvu nematete kunenge kwanyanya zvotyirwa kuti musangano wange wakarongwa kuitwa musi weChina, 24 Gunyana kuVictoria Falls unogona kutadza kuitwa. Muna 2009, Zimbabwe yakaita hurumende yemubatanidzwa zvichitevera mhirizhonga inotyisa yakaitika muna 2008 musarudzo dzechipiri dze mutungamiri wenyika. African Union neUnited Nations ndiwo masangano aiona kuti chibvumierano chemubatanidzwa chatevedzerwa here. Muyananisi mukuru panyaya iyi akatanga ari vaimbove mutungamiri weSouth Africa VaThabo Mbeki vachizotorerwa naVaJacob Zuma avo vakavatsiva.

headline: Nyanzvi Dzinoti Hupfumi hweZimbabwe Hwonanga Kumakore eKare Aikwira Mitengo Katatu paZuva
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dziri kukurudzira hurumende kuti isimbaraze mabasa ekusimudzira makambani emunyika kuyedza kudzikisa mutengo wekukwira kwezvinhu kana kuti inflation uyo wananga kumawere zvekare. NeMugovera bazi reZimbabwe National Statistics Agency kana kuti Zimstats rakazivisa kuti mitengo yezvinhu kana kuti inflation yakwira kusvika pazvikamu mazana masere nemakumi matatu nemanomwe kubva muzana kana kuti 837, 53%. Muna Chikumi, mitengo yezvinhu yaive pazvikamu mazana manomwe nemakumi matatu nemanomwe kubva muzana kana kuti 35, 53%.  Izvi zvinorevei? Tabvunza nyanzvi munyaya dzezvemabhanga VaGilbert Muponda vanoti kushaya simba kwedhora remunyika kuri kupa kuti mitengo ikwire zvakanyanya. Asi pane zviri kuitwa here nehurumende kuona kuti hupfumi hwagadzirika? VaMuponda vanoti hurumende iri kuyedza kusimudzira mabasa ezvicherwa asi vachiti zvinoda kusimbaradzwa. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi VaVictor Bhoroma vanoti kutengwa kwemafuta nedhora rekuAmerica kuri kupawo kuti mitengo iite chamurambamhuru. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezveupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Research Institute of Zimbabwe Dr Chitambara vanoti mitengo zvikuru pamwedzi ikakwira kusvika pazvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana kwemwezdi yakati wandei Zimbabwe inenge yadzokera kumakore ekuma 2007 na2008 apo mitengo yezvinhu yaikwira katatu pazuva kana kuti hyperinflation. Munyori mukuru mune rimwe sangano revashandi reZCTU VaJaphet Moyo vanoti havana chivimbo neZimstats vachiti kuda kuteerera zvairi kuburitsa kuchengetesa bere chitunha. Vanoti mitengo yezvinhu inogona kunge yakawedzer kudarika zviri kutaurwa nebazi iri. VaMoyo vati Zimbabwe yave kutoteverana neVenezuela panyaya yekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu. Inflation yekuVenezuela parizvino iri pazvikamu zviuru zvina kubva muzana kana kuti 4,000 percent. Nyika iyi neZimbabwe ndidzo dzazezesa pasi rose munyaya dzekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu kana kuti inflation. No media source currently available

headline: VaChiwenga Vanoviga Magamba Matatu paHeroes Acre
text: Vakafananobata chigaro chemutungamiri wenyika, VaConstantine Chiwenga, varadzika magamba matatu ehondo yerusununguko vachiudza nyika kuti chirwere cheCovid-19 chave nehukasha hwakanyanya. Chirwere ichi chakauraya vaive gurukota rezvekudyidzana nedzimwe nyika, VaSibusiso Moyo, vaive kurugukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, VaJoe Biggie Matiza, pamwe nevaive mukuru wemajeri, VaParadzai Zimondi, avo vavigwa semagamba ehondo. Vachiviga vatatu ava paHeroes Acre, VaChiwenga vati aka ndekekutanga izvi zvichiitika uye zvakonzerwa nedenda reCovid-19. Vati zvinosuwisa kuti vaviga mamwe magamba nhasi mushure mekuradzika mamwe magamba maviri nguva pfupi yapfuura anoti, VaMorton Malianga, pamwe nevaive gurukota redunhu reManicaland, Amai Ellen Gwardzimba, avo vakshaya mushure mekubatwawo neCovid-19. VaChiwenga vati Covid-19 yavadzidzisa kuti munhu wese anofa sezvo iri kuuraya varombo nevapfumi. Vati zvava kuda kuti vanhu vose vabatane mukurwisa denda iri kuti Zimbabwe ikunde chirwere ichi. VaChiwenga vati magamba matatu aya kashanda zvakasimba kuti veruzhinji vave neraramo yakanaka kubva muna 1980 kusvika pakushaya kwavo. Vatsanangura VaMoyo semunhu aidadisa kushanda naye vakati kunyange vakabuda muchiuto, vakaramba vachiita basa guru rekugadzirisa hukama hweZimbabwe nedzimwe nyika. Vatiwo VaZimondi vakavandudza nekusimudzira majeri munyika. VaChiwenga vatiwo VaMatiza vange vari kuita basa guru rekugadzirisa migwagwa nenhandare munyika. VaMoyo vakashaya musi wa21 Ndira, VaMatiza naVaZimondi vakashaya musi wa22 Ndira. Kunyange hazvo mitemo weWorld Health Organisation uchiti vanofan neCovid-vanofanira kuvigwa mukati memazuva matatu, vatatu ava vachengetwa mazuva aya adarika. Mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vatii mutemo unofanira kutevedzwa zvisinei kuti munhu igamba here kana kuti kwete. Vatiwo hurumende inofanira kutenga mishonga yenhomba yeCovid-19 pajekerere. Vati hurumende inofanira kuzivisa veruzhinji kuti mishonga ichashandiswa ichange ichibva kumakambani api uye kutsanangurira vanhu kuti hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu nhomba iyi huchange hwakamira sei. Zvichakadai, vatori venhau vese vaenda kuHeroes Acre vaongororwa paHeroes Acre pakare kuti vane hutachiwana hweCovid-19 here kana kuti kwete. No media source currently available

headline: VaSikhala, VaSithole Voramba Vari Mutirongo
text: Nhengo dzedare reparamende dzebato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change VaJob Sikhala vanomiririra Zengeza West naVaGodfrey Sithole veChitungwiza North vacharamba vari mutirongo kuChikurubi kusvika nemusi weChina. Vachuchusi vehurumende vari kuti havasati vapedza kuzeya nezvechikumbiro chavo chekuti vapihwe mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso here kana kut Vaviri ava vari kupomerwa mhosva yekukonzera mhirizhonga kuNyatsime pakapomdwa nhengo yebato reCCC naPius Jamba ari muhusungwa. Asi VaSikhala naVaSithole vari kuramba mhosva iyi. Imwe nhengo yebato iri VaAmos Chibaya nezuro vakadaidzwa kumapurisa vakaendeswa kumatare vachipomerwawo mhosva yekuita musangano pasina mvumo yemapurisa. VaChibaya vanoti zvose zviri kuitwa izvi kuda kuvatyisidzira asi vakati hazvishande.

headline: Vamwe Vagari vemuWard 17 kuChitungwiza Vonetseka Kuwana maTitle Deeds eDzimba Dzavo
text: Vamwe vagari vemu Ward 17 kuChitungwiza vanonzi vari kuchema-chema nedambudziko ravari kusangana naro kuti vakwanise kuwana magwaro edzimba dzavo, kana kuti ma title deeds. Izvi zvakabuda pamusangano wakaitwa neChipiri pakati pevagari nemasangano anomiririra vagari vechitungwiza, anoti reChitungwiza Community Development Network nereChitungwiza Residents Trust, CHITREST. Musangano mukuru uyu unonzi waitarisa zvichemo zvine vagari, zvinosanganisira nyaya yekunetseka kwavari kuita kuwana magwaro edzimba dzavanoti vakatenga kukanzuru mugore ra1979 pasi pehurongwa hwekubhadhara pamwedzi pamwedzi. Mukuru weCHITREST, Muzvare Alice Kuvheya, vanoti varidzi vedzimba idzi vari kunzi vabhadhare mari inoita mazana mashanu emadhora ekuAmerica kuti vakwanise kuwana magwaro aya. Asi vanoti vazhinji vevaridzi vedzimba idzi vakwegura zvekuti hakuna kwavanogona kuwana mari yakadai. Studio 7 yakundikana kunzwa divi rekanzuru yeChitungwiza panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yoyambira Vashandi Vayo Vasati Vabayiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19 Kuti Havapindi paBasa
text: Hurumende inoti vashandi vayo vasina kubaiwa nhomba dzeCovid 19 kusvika mukupera kwezuva ranhasi havachabvumidzwe kuuya kubasa uye vasina kubaiwa nhomba idzi vacharangwa zvakaomarara. Asi vashandi vehurumende vanoti zviri kutaurwa nehurumende izvi hazvina musoro. Text: Munyori mubazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko VaNick Mangwana vazivisa padandemutande ravo reTwitter nhasi kuti hurumende haisi kudzokera kumashure nedanho rayo rayakatora rekuti vashandi vayo vose vasina kubaiwa nhomba dzekudzivirira Covid-19 havachazobvumidzwa kuenda kubasa kubva mangwana zvichienda mberi.  VaMangwana vati vashandi vehurumende vose vacharamba kubaiwa nhomba idzi vacharangwa zvakawomarara uye vati panguva yavanenge vasiri kuenda kubasa vashandi ava havasi kuzobhadharwa mihoro yemazuva iwayo.  Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvehutano uye vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaConstantino Chiwenga, avo vari kuDubai pari zvino uye mutevedzeri wavo VaJohn Mangwiro vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo kuti tinzwe kuti matanho api ari kutorwa nebazi ravo kuona kuti vashandi vehurumende vakwanisa kuwana nhomba idzi nekukasika.  Zvichakadai gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi, Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima, vatenda kuti vashandi vese vehurumende vanofanira kuti vabaiwe nhomba idzi uye vati vazhinji vevashandi vehurumende vakatobaiwa nhomba dzeCovid 19 kare.  ///////act 1-------mavima/////  VaMavima vati vashandi vehurumende vanofanira kuziva kuti kusabayiwa nhomba idzi kune mubayiro wacho kubva pakataurwa nyaya iyi nehurumende.  /////////act 2------mavima/////  Asi mutevedzeri wemuyori mukuru musangano revashandi vehurumende reZimbabwe Confederation of Public Sector Trade Unions, VaGibson Mushangu, vati danho rehurumende iri harina zvarinoreva kwavari nekuti havana kutambira tsamba kubva kuhurumende kubva zvakatorwa danho iri nedare remakurukota ehurumende.  ///////act 3------mushangu/////////  Mutungamiri wesangano revadzidzisi vekumaruwa reAmalgamted Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaObert Masaraure, vati hurumende haifaniri kuedza kutsvaga nzira dzekusabhadhara vashandi vayo kubudikidza nekudzinga mabasa vashandi vasina kubaiwa nhomba dzeCovid 19. VaMasaraure vati hurumende inofanira kugadzirisa nyaya dzemihoro yevashandi vayo kwete kuswera ichidzinganisana nezvinhu zvisina musoro.  ///////act 4----masaraure////////  Zvichakadai, imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vakamboshanda sachipangamazano munyaya dzehupfumi mubazi rezvemari, VaMasimba Manyanya, vati hurumende haifanire kumanikidza vashandi vayo kubaiwa nhomba dzeCovid-19 vachiti izvi zvinotyora kodzero dzevashandi. VaManyanya vati kana hurumende ikaenderera mberi nehurongwa hwayo uhwu zvichakanganisawo hupfumi hwenyika sezvo vashandi vehurumende vane basa rakakura kwazvo mukusimudzirwa kwehupfumi hwenyika.  /////////act 5-------manyanya///////  Hurumende iri kukurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vabaiwe nhomba dzeCovid-19 idzo dziri kubaiwa pachena muzvipatara zvehurumende nemakanzuru senzira yekuedza kudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi munyika. Zvipatara zvinoshanda zvakazvimirira zviri kubhadharisawo mari shomanana kubaya nhomba idzi.  Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba vanhu mariyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana pakupera kwegore rino senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid 19.

headline: ZCTU Inoti Haisi Kuona Hupfumi Huchikadzikana
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe nemusi weChitatu vakati hurumende yavo iri kuyedza zvose zvainogona kuti igadzirise hupfumi hwenyika uho hwaenda kumawere. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, nemusi weMuvhuro vakati hurumende yavo iri kuyedza zvose zvainogona kuti igadzirise hupfumi hwenyika uho hwaenda kumawere. Asi sangano re, Zimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, rinoti zvinhu zvichiri zvakaita manyama amire nerongo mumakambani. Mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru weZCTU, VaGideon Shoko, vanoti sevashandi havana chavari kuona chasanduka sezvo vakawanda vari kurasikirwa nemabasa. VaMugabe vakataura mashoko aya kuNational Sports Stadium kumhemberero dzekuwana kuzvitonga. VaMugabe vakatiwo Zimbabwe iri kuyedza kugadzirisa hupfumi kunyangwe hazvo paine zvirango zvavanoti zvakatemerwa nyika neAmerica nedzimwe nyika dzekumawirira. Pamakambani avanoti Zimbabwe yakamutsiridza, VaMugabe vakapa muenzaniso makambani akaita seLobels Bread, Cairns holdings, Rio Zim, Delta Corporation, Border Timbers, Olivine Industries, Caps Pharmaceutical nemawe. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti mamwe makambani ari kutaurwa naVaMugabe agara achishanda. Mashoko aVaMugabe ari kukonzera mutauro wakanyanya munyika sezvo vamwe vari kutsika madziro vachiti hupfumi hwenyika hwatozvika kumaziva ndadzoka uye hurumende yapererwa nemazano. Asi vamwe vanoti pachine chivimbo. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri weEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe kana kuti EMCOZ, VaCallisto Jokonya, vanoti zvimwe zviri kutaurwa nemutungamiri wenyika ichokwadi. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vatatu Vofa neKuda kweMafashamu eMvura kuManicaland
text: Mafashamu emvura nedutumupengo remhepo zvinonzi zvakauraya vanhu vatatu nekuparadza misha yakawanda kuManicaland asi zvave kuenda zvichiita nani. Dutumupengo rakabva nekuMozambique iri rinonzi Eloise. Ku Chipinge neChimanimani zvikoro zvakawanda zvapwanywa nemafashamu emvura aya uye vamwe vanhu vari pedyo nerwizi Save vave kutamiswa kuenda kwakakwirira. Kunaya zvakanyanya kwemvura kwapawo kuti mamwe madhamu maviri anoti Manyuchi neTugwi Mukosi azarise zvopa kuti mvura ivhurwe kuti irasike. Mukuru wesangano rePlatform for Youth Development VaClaris Madhuku avo vanoti dzimwe nzvimbo hadzisi kusvikika nekuda kwemiti yakadonhera mumigwagwa. No media source currently available

headline: Varimi vePurazi reWadzanayi kuLalapanzi Vonetsana neKambani yekuChina YeAsia Ferry Yakapinda muPurazi Ravo
text: Varimi vepapurazi remushandirapamwe reWadzanayi Cooperative kuLalapanzi mudunhu reMidlands vanoti vari kushungurudzwa neimwe kambani yekuChina yeAsia Ferry, iyo vari kuti yakatora chidimbu chepurazi ravo uye vashandi vayo vari kugezera chicherwa che chrome mupurazi ravo. Varimi ava vanotiwo zvizvarwa zvekuChina izvi zvatove kuchengeta makwai mupurazi ravo. Munyori wemushandirapamwe uyu, VaDominic Mngwabi, vanoti kambani iyi inonzi yakapinda muchibvumirano nemuridzi wepurazi iri pedyo neyavo chekuti ishandise, asi yakatobvisa muganhu waivepo kare ichipinda mupurazi ravo. Vanotiwo chiitiko ichi chakanganisa mhuri dzinosvika zana nemakumi manomwe nesere dziri papurazi reWadzanayi iri, kuburikidza nekuisa hutano hwavo pamwe nehwezvipfuwozvavo munjodzi yekukanganiswa nemishonga iri kushandiswa kugeza matombo ari kucherwa nekambani iyi. VaMngwabi vanoti vakamboedza kuti vagare pasi nemukuru wekambani iyi anonzi Tony asi vanoti akaramba kutaura navo, akatovirima achiti vaende kunomhang'ara kwavanoda uye kuganza achiti haana zvavanomuita. Vanoti vakazoperekedzwa negweta ravo neChitatu svondo rino vachinosiya gwaro rine nyunyuto dzavo kuhofisi yekambani iyi iri papurazi ravo, asi havasati vawana mhinduro. Vanotiwo vakaedza kugara pasi nemuridzi wepurazi kuti varatidzane miganho yemapurazi avo iye achiedzawo kutaura vekambani iyi kuti vagarisane zvakanaka nevavakidzani vavo. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata vakuru vekambani yeAsia Ferry kuti tinzwe divi ravo. VaMngwabi vanoti rimwe dambudziko riri kukonzerwa nekambani yezvizvarwa zvekuChina iyi ndeye kuparadzwa kwemigwagwa yavopamwe neguruva ravanoti rave kutadzisa vagari kana kuwacha mbatya vachiyanika pamisha yavo. No media source currently available

headline: VeZCTU neZFTU Vanoti Vakuru Vakawanda kuNSSA Ngavamiswe Basa neNyaya yeHuori
text: Masangano evashandi anoti reZimbawe Congress of Trade Union ne Zimbabwe Federation of Trade Unions anoti haasi kufara nedanho rasachigaro weNational Social Security Authority Doctor Percy Toriro rekumisa basa mukuru wekambani iyi VaArthur Manase voga basa. Munyori mukuru weZCTU VaJaphet Moyo vanoti huori huri kupomerwa vakuru vekambani iyi hwakakura zvekuti hapadi kuti munhu mumwe chete akandwe pasi pebazi. VaMoyo vati bhodhi rose rinofanira kumbomiswa basa. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa nemunyori mukuru weZFTU VaKennias Shamuyarira vanoti masangano evashandi anofanira kumbofanobata matomu pachiitwa ongororo. Gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi Muzvinafundo Paul Mavima vanoti vashandi vanofanira kunzwisa kuti vanhu vanonzi vabatwa nemhosva chete kana papedza kuitwa ongororo. Vati vashandi vanofanira kumirira kuti hurumende ipete ongororo yayo. Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakanyora mubepanhau reSunday Mail mavhiki adarika vachiti havasi kufara nemabatirwo ebasa kuNSSA zvakapa kuti paparurwe ongororo iyi. Asi vashandi vanoti vange vave nemakore vachiti NSSA iri kuvabata neseri kweruoko kana vave pamudyandigere ichivapa mari shoma asi vakuru vekambani iyi vachidya noriva nekupura nyemba nemusana.

headline: Vanhu Vanodarika Mazana Mapfumbamwe Vokumbira Kuvhenekwa Coronavirus
text: Zimbabwe neChitatu yakapinda muzuva retatu nyika yakavharwa senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCoronavirus, icho chabata vanhu vasere, uye kuuraya munhu mumwe chete. Bazi rezvehutano muZimbabwe rinoti pane vanhu vanosvika mazana mapfumbamwe ne gumi nevashanu vakachaya nhare kwariri vachifungidzira kuti vane chirwere cheCoronavirus kubva musi wa 28 mwedzi wapera. Vanhu vari kukurudzirwa kufona panhamba dzinoti 2-0-1-9 kana vachifungidzira kuti vabata chirwere ichi. Asi pane vakakwanisa kuongororwa vakaonekwa vaine chirwere ichi vanomwe vanonzi vari kunzwa zviri nani. Chirwere ichi, icho chakatanga kuChina gore rapera, chabata vanhu vanodarika mazana masere nemakumi masere ezviuru pasi rose, uye kuuraya vanhu zviuru makumi mana nezvina. Italy ndiyo iri kutungamira pakufirwa nevanhu vanodarika zviuru gumi nezviviri; Spain ichifirwawo nevanhu vanopfuura zviuru zvipfumbamwe, ichiteverwa ne America, iyo yarasikirwa nevanhu vanodarika zviuru zvina, ukuwo China iine vanhu zviuru zvitatu nemazana matatu ane gumi nevaviri vafa nechirwere ichi. Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, vari kuyambira kuti nyika yavo inogona kurasikirwa nehupenyu hwevanhu vanogona kusvika pamazana maviri nemakumi mana ezviuru. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi mu America vadarika zviuru zana nemakumi masere nezvishanu. Mukuru wezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare, Dr Prosper Chonzi, vanoti vanenge vasingakwanise kupora vari kumba vanoendeswa kuWilkins Hospital neBeatrice Infectious Unit muHarare, kanawo kuti Thorngrove kuBulawayo.

headline: “Huyai Titaurirane”  - Hurumende Youdza Vashandi Voronga Kuramwa Mabasa
text: Hurumende iri kukurudzira vashandi vayo kuti vambomira zvekuramwa Mabasa zvisinei nemari shoma yavanotambira. Izvi zvinotevera gwaro ranyorwa nemamwe masangano anomiririra vashandi vehurumende vachizivisa kuti kana hurumende ikasagadzirisa nyaya yemihoro yavo mumazuva gumi nemana vachange vachizoramwa mabasa. Masangano anyora tsamba iyi anoti, Public Service Association, the Federation of Educators Unions of Zimbabwe neNurses Federation of Zimbabwe. Asi vachitaura neStudio 7, gurukota rinoona nezvevashandi VaPaul Mavhima vatiwo vashandi nevashandirwi vari kuzoita hurukuro nemusi weMuvhuro . VaMavhima vati hurumende inokoshesa hurukuro Asi mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnoch Dongo vanogara vachiti hurumende haidi zvenhaurirano pachine nguva vati vari kutambiriswa mutero wembwa. Munyori mukuru werimwe sangano revarairidzi Progressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe VaRaymond Majongwe vanotiwo sevashandi vanodawo mari inokwanisa kuti vararame sezvo vakatodzidzira mabasa avo. Mutauriri weZimbabwe Teachers Association VaGoodswill Taderera vatiwo vashandi vehurumende vave kuita mushandirapmwe kuti vawedzerwe mari. Asi VaMavhima vatiwo kuramwa mabasa kunokanganisa mabasa akakosha ehurumende. Pave nenguva hurumende nevashandi vayo vasiri kuwirirana panyaya yemihoro. Vashandi vanotiwo vanoda kupiwa mihoro nemari yekunze vachiti zvinhu zvese zvave kungoda kubhadharwa nemari yekuAmerica panguva iyo vashandi vari kutambiriswa madhora emunyika.

headline: Vakuru Vakuru muBazi rezveHutano Votungamira Kubayiwa Nhomba muBulawayo
text:
Chirongwa chekubaiwa nhomba inodzivirira chirwere cheCovid-19 kwevakoti, vanachiremba nevamwe vanoshanda muzvipatara chakatanga munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana munyika kusanganisira muBulawayo nemusi weMuvhuro. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika VaConstantino Chiwenga ndivo vakaparura chirongwa ichi nemusi weChina muHarare.

Mudunhu vanhu vakabayiwa nhomba pazvipatara zvakaita seUnited Bulawayo Hospitals, kana kuti UBH, Mpilo, Ingutsheni uye neMater Dei.

Mukuru weHealth Services Board Dr Paulinus Sikhosana ndivo vakatanga kubaiwa vachiteverwa nevakafanobata chinzvimbo chemukuru weUBH Dr Narcissus Dzvanga pamwe nevakafanobata chinzvimbo chaProvincial Medical Director wedunhu reBulawayo Dr Welcome Mlilo. Gurukota redunhu reBulawayo Amai Judith Ncube vange varipowo pachiitiko ichi semunyarikani.

Dr Dzvanga vakaudza Studio 7 kuti chipatara chavo cheUBH chakapiwa nhomba dzinosvika chiuru nemazana manomwe idzo vati dzinokwana kubaya vashandi vose vari pachipatara ichi. Vakakurudzira vashandi vezvehutano pamwe neveruzhinji kuti vabaiwe nhambo iyi.

VaElijah Maouranga avo vanoshanda vachibatsira vakoti paIngutsheni Hospital ndemumwe wevashandi vepachipatara ichi vatanga kubaiwa nhomba iyi. VaMapuranga vaudza Studio 7 kuti vanoona zvakakosha kuti ivo semunhu anoshanda mune zvehutano vabaiwe nhomba iyi, uye vakurudzirawo veruzhinji kuti vasatye kubaiwa.

Vakafanobata chinzvimbo chemutauriri weMpilo Hospital Sister Sanelisiwe Nyamandi, vati kunyange havo ivo vange vasati vabaiwa vanotambira kuvepo kwenhomba yeCovid-19 sechinhu chakakosha zvikuru pakudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi.

Pane zvikwata zvina zvine vanhu vashanu zviri kubaya vanhu nhomba mudunhu reBulawayo uye zvikwata zviviri zvichange zviri paUBH nepaMpilo kozotiwo zvimwe zviviri zvichange zvichifamba munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana kusanganisira makiriniki ekanzuru zvichibaya vanhu. Chikamu chekutanga ichi chinotarisirwa kupera mukati memazuva gumi, uye vanenge vabaiwa vanozobaiwazve mushure memazuva makumi maviri nemasere.

Dunhu reBulawayo rakawana nhomba zviuru gumi nezvitatu nemazana maviri uye Dr Mlilo vati tarisiro yavo ndeyekuti pane vashandi vanopfuura zviuru zvitanhatu vachabaiwa nhomba iyi mudunhu iri.

Kuparurwa kwechirongwa chekubaya vanhu nhomba munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana kunouya mushure mekunge nyika yapihwa pachena nhomba zviuru mazana maviri kubva kunyika yeChina.

Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano VaDonald Mujiri vabvuma parunhare kuti chirongwa ichi chatanga munzvimbo dzakasiyana-siyana munyika asi vati vange vasingakwanise kutaura kuti vanhu vangani vabaiwa pazuva ranhasi sezvo vange vastai vave neruzivo urwu. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Voomerwa neHupenyu neKushaya Mabasa
text: Nyaya dzekuvharwa kwemakambani dzinonzi dziri kuramba dzichiwedzera huwandu hwevanhu vasina mabasa munyika, izvo zvinonzi zvave kuita kuti veruzhinji vararame nekutengesa chero chinobatika. Mazuva apera hurumende yakazivisa kuti inogona kuvharisa kambani yenharembozha yeTelecel Zimbabwe, ichiti kambani iyi iri kushanda isina rezinesi. Kana danho iri rikabudirira, izvi zvinenge zvoreva kuti vashandi vanodarika chiuru vanenge vorasikirwa zvakare nemabasa. Mamwe makambani akawanda anosanganisira yeZimpapers, iyo inodhinda mapepanhau ehurumende, anonzi ari mushishi yekumisawo vashandi mabasa. Masvondo maviri apfuura, kanzuru yeChitungwiza yakazivisawo kuti ine hurongwa hwekumisa vashandi vanodarika mazana matanhatu mabasa nekuda kwekuoma kwezvinhu munyaya dzeupfumi. Kubva kutanga kwegore rino, mabhanga akawanda akaputsika uye vashandi vanodarika chiuru vakarasikirwawo nemabasa. Dzimwe nyanzvi mune zveupfumi dzinoti izvi zvinoreva kuti vose vanhu vari kurasikirwa nemabasa ava vanenge vopinda mukuita mabasa ekuzviriritira, umo mazara nechekare. Nyanzvi munyaya dzevashandi uye vachitungamira sangano reConcerned Affiliates of the ZCTU, VaLovemore Matombo, vanoti mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika haachadi kuti vashandi nevashandirwi vabatane pahuro, sezvo iri risiri dambudziko revashandi. VaMatombo vanoti kugadzirisa dambudziko iri panofanirwa kutanga pagadziriswa kuti matambudziko enyika ave upfumi hwenyika. Vanoti izvi zvinogadzirisika chete kana hurumende ikatora danho rekugadzirisakuburikidza nekudzokera kuchibvumirano cheKadoma Declaration, icho chakanyoreranwa mugore ra2001. Mukuru wesangano revashandirwi, reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, EMCOZ, VaJohn Mufukare vanotiwo vanobvumirana nemaonero aVaMatombo, sezvo mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika iye zvino asisina kufanana nemamiriro akanga akaita zvinhu mugore ra2001. Sangano remubatanidzwa wemasangano evashandi, reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, rinoti vashandi vakawanda vakarasikirwa nemabasa mugore rino chete mushure mekuvhara kwemakambani akawanda. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weCitizens' Coalition for Change, VaChamisa, Vanosangana neVatsigiri Vavo kuGwanda Vachipembera Kukunda kweBato Ravo
text: Mutungamiri webato reCitizens’ Coalition for Change, VaNelson Chamisa, vanoti kukunda kwakaita bato ravo musarudzo dzichangobva kuitwa dzema by-election mucherechedzo wekuti vanhu vaneta nekukundikana kwehurumende yeZanu PF, vachiti izvi zvicharatidzwa musarudzo dziri kuuya gore rinouya. VaChamisa vataura mashoko aya kuvatsigiri vebato ravo munhandare yePhelandaba kuGwanda pamusangano wekupemberera kukunda kwaVaJastone Mazhale vebato ravo musarudzo dzakaitwa musi wa 26 Kurume. VaChamisa vakurudzira kuparadzirwa kwakaenzana kwehupfumi hwenyika, izvo vati zvinozoita kuti vagari vemunzvimbo dzakaita seGwanda, uko vati kune zvicherwa zvakaita segoridhe, vawane mabasa kwete kuramba vachienda kuSouth Africa kwavari kurwiswa nekupondwa. VaChamisa vari kutenderera nenyika yose vachiita misangano yekutenda nekupemberera kukunda kwebato ravo musarudzo dzichangobva kuitwa idzi, uye kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vanyorese kuvhota musarudzo dza 2023. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reCitizens’ Coalition for Change, VaGift Ostalos Siziba, avo vanga vari kuGwanda, vanoti VaChamisa vavimbisa vagari vemuGwanda kuti kana bato ravo rakapinda muhurumende richagadzirisa matambudziko ose ari kusanganikwa nawo nevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: IMF Inoti Hupfumi hweZimbabwe Huri paRumananzombe
text: Hupfumi hweZimbabwe hunonzi huri parumananzombe, uye hurumende inofanirwa kutora matanho akasimba mukuona kuti matambudziko akatarisana nenyika agadziriswa. Izvi zvakabuda muongororo yakaitwa nechikwata cheInternational Monetory Fund, IMF, icho chakashanya muZimbabwe kubva musi wa 2 kusvika musi wa13 Chivabvu pasi pechirongwa che 2017 Article IV. IMF yakapedza rwendo rwayo ndokubuda nekomekedzo dzakati kuti dzinofanirwa kuteverwa nenyika kuti ibude mumatope mairi munyaya dzeupfumi. Chikwata ichi, icho chaitungamirwa naAmai Ana Lucia Coronel, chakaita misangano nevamiriri vehurumende, vemakambani akazvimirira, vashandi pamwe nevemasangano akazvimirira. Nyaya dzinonzi dzakakurukurwa dzainangana nebudiriro mune zveupfumi, zvimhingamipinyi pamwe nenzira dzingadzora kugadzikana munyaya dzezveupfumi. Chikwata ichi chinoti kumutsiridzwa kwebandiko rezvekurima pamwe nezvicherwa kuchasimudza hupfumi gore rino, asi izvi hazvigoni kuti zvirambe zvakasimbisa upfumi kana pasina kutorwa matanho anosanganisira kuderedzwa kwemari inoshandiswa nehurumende, kusanganisira mari dzinotambirwa nevashandi vehurumende. IMF inotiwo hurumende inoifanirwa kurwisa huwori, kubuda pachena mukufambiswa kwezvicherwa uyewo kusapindira mukutarwa kwemitengo pamisika, sezvo izvi zvichi tadzisa kukwezva kwevekunze vanoda kuzotanga mabhizimusi avo munyika. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Prosper Chitambara, vanoti vanotambira chose kurudziro yeIMF iyi, asi panodiwa kuzvipira kwehurumende mukuvandidza zviri kukurudzirwa nesangano iri. “Ma reforms ari kudikanwa acho ma reforms anongoda kutsigirwa nema key stakeholders ese, especially, eeh, political support, political will, ne political commitment,” Doctor Chitambara vanodaro. Vanoti zvimwe zvakaita sekuderedza mari dzinotambirwa nevashandi vehurumende, havaoni zvichi tambirwa sezvo hurumende isingade kukanganisana nevashandi vayo vanove bandiko rakakosha, iyo nyika yatarisana nesarudzo dzegore rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri weBotswana, VaMasisi, Vanovhura Harare Agricultural Show Vachiti Covid-19 Yakaratidza Zinyenyeke Riri munyika dzeSADC neAfrica
text: Mutungamiriri weBotswana, VaMokgweetsi Masisi, vavhura zviri pamutemo Harare Agricultural Show vachiti Covid-19 nehondo yekuUkraine zvakaratidza zinyenyeke riri munyika dzeSADC neAfrica yose panyaya dzekurima. Vati zviviri izvi zvakapinza nzara uye yave nguva yekuti nyika dzemuAfrica dzishandise michina yechizvinozvino kusimbaradza mabasa ekurima kuti pasave nenzara kunyange pakaita matambudziko akaita seCovid-19. VaMasisi vati Zimbabwe neBotswana dzinofanira kusimbaradza kudyidzana kwadzo panyaya dzekurima vachiti Zimbabwe inyanzvi pakurima zvirimwa zvakaita sechibage, ukuwo nyika yavo ine hunyanzvi panyaya dzekugadzira mishonga yezvipfuyo yakaita seyekurapa zvirwere zvakaita se newcastle ne foot and mouth. Vatiwo Zimbabwe ine nyanzvi munyaya dzekurima uye dzimwe dzacho dzave kutoshanda munyika yavo. VaMasisi vati hurumende dzenyika mbiri idzi dziri kushanda pamwe kurwisa dambudziko rekubiwa kwezvipfuyo pamuganhu wenyika mbiri idzi iro rakonzera mutauro. Nyanzvi munyaya dzekurima uye vari nhengo yeZimbabwe Agricultural Society, Va Ivan Craig vaudza Studio kuti vanowirira nemashoko aVaMasisi ekuti Covid-19 nehondo yeUkaraine zvakaburitsa zinyekenyeke panyaya dzekurima muAfrica. Vati izvi zvinofanira kusvinudza nyika dzemuAfrica kuti dzinofanirwa kuzvirimira chikafu chakakwana nekuti dzine zvese zvinodiwa kuita izvi. Zvichakadai Zimbabwe National Army ndiyo yatora mubairo wezviratidzwa zvakakunda vese pashowo yegore rino. VaJonathan Musoki ndivo vawana mubairo wekutanga pavarimi yefodya. Vamwe vawana mibairo vanosanganisira Amai Priscillar Marauka, avo vawana wekuve murimi wepamusorosoro, kana kuti Best Agro Produce Farmer, purazi re Zvikomborero richiwana mubairo wekutanga pavarimi vemombe. VaConcern Mutasa vekuZaka ndivo vawana mubairo wekutanga pavarimi vePfumvudza uye vapiwa mubairo wetirakita. VaMutasa vanoti vafara nekukunda kwavaita vachiti kurima nepfumvudza hakurwadzi sezvinofungidzirwa nevakawanda. Aka ndekutanga mukati memakore maviri veruzhinji vachibvumidzwa kupinda mushowo iyi nehuwandu hwavo zvichitevera kurerutswa kwehurongwa kwekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Kunze kwevarimi nemakambani emuno, pane makambani kubva kunyika nhanhatu dzinosanganisira Botswana, South Africa, Malawi neIndia ari kuratidzira pashowo iyi iyo inopera neMugovera. No media source currently available

headline: Kushomeka kweMari kuMabhanga Kotadzisa Varairidzi Kutora Mari Dzavanoda
text: Dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari kumabhanga rinonzi ratadzisa varairidzi kuwana mihoro yavo yemwedzi uno. Dambudziko rekushomeka kwemari kumabhanga rinonzi ratadzisa varairidzi kuwana mihoro yavo yemwedzi uno. Mutungamiri weProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, PTUZ, VaTakavafira Zhou, vanoti varairidzi vakawanda vaenda kumahofisi avo vachi nyunyuta kuti vari kutadza kutora mari dzavanoda kumabhanga. Vanoti varairidzi ava vanga vachiti mabhanga mazhinji anga achingovapa mari inoita madhora makumi mashanu chete pamunhu, inove shoma kune zvavanenge vachida. “Varairidzi vanenge vakatarisira kuti mari idzi ndidzo dzavachashandisa kutenga zvavanoda uyewo kubhadharira vana vavo school fees sezvo zvikoro zvave kuvhurwa. Asi zvose izvi zvapinda musango,” VaZhou vanodaro. Mumwe anoshanda kune rimwe bhanga asina kuda kudomwa nezita sezvo asingabvumidzwi kutaura nevatori venhau audza Studio7 kuti mabhanga haasi kukwanisa kuwana mari yaanoda kubva kubhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, izvo zvave kuita kuti mabhanga amirire kuwana mari kubva kune vanenge vachida kuchengetesa mari dzavo. Mukutanga kwemwedzi uno gavhuna veRBZ, VaJohn Mangudya, vakaudza paramende kuti mabhanga emunyika akapinza mari inodarika mazana maviri emamiriyoni emadhora kubva kutanga kwegore rino kusvika mwedzi uno, asi mari iyi ichiri kutadza kugutsa misika. VaMangudya vakati bhanga ravo riri kutora matanho akawanda anosanganisira kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vashandise makadhi ekumabhanga pakutenga nekubhadhara zvinhu. Vakatendawo kuti vanhu vakawanda havachada kuchengetera mari dzavo kumabhanga nekuda kwemitero yakakwira yekumabhanga pamwe nekuderera kwemari dzinoberekwa. Asi VaZhou vanoti vakuru vehurumende vanofanirwa kumbosendeka kusawirirana kwavo nevemamwe mapato vogara pasi kuti vagadzirise zvinhu munyika. “Inini ndinoona sekuti vakuru venyika, eeh, VaRobert Mugabe nevamwe, nevakuru vema opposition ngavambogara pasi vataurirane vachitaurirana chokwadi kuti nyika ingafamba ichienda mberi sei,” VaZhou vanowedzera. Panya yemabhonasi evarairidzi, vanoti hurumende yakavazivisa varairidzi kuti vachawana mari idzi musi wa 30 Kubvumbi. Asi vanoti kukundikana kwehurumende kubhadhara varairidzi mabhonasi avo, ayo vatarisira kwenguva ndefu, kucharevawo kuti zvikoro zvichangovhurwa zvakavharwa, zvichireva kuti varairidzi havasi kuzoenda kubasa pachavhurwa zvikoro musi wa 3 Chivabvu. No media source currently available

headline: Madzimai Matatu eMDC Achiri Kurapwa Akachengetedzwa neMapurisa
text: Sangano remagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights rinoti riri kutarisira zvikuru kuti nyanzvi dziri kurapa vechidiki vatatu veMDC vanoti vakapambwa vakatochwa vari mumaoko emapurisa, dzichaita basa radzo nemazvo. Vatatu ava, Muzvare Joanna Mamombe, Muzvare Cecilia Chimbiri naMuzvare Netsai Marova, vari kurapwa vari muchipatara chemuHarare zvichitevera kutochwa zvakaipisisa kwavanoti vakaitwa mushure mekupambwa.  Vatatu ava, avo vari muchipatara vakachengetedzwa nemapurisa, vanoti vakapambwa musi wa 13 Chivabvu vakazowanikwa vakakuvara zvakaipisisa vari kuBindura musi wa 15 Chivabvu. Mutauriri wemapurisa, VaPaul Nyathi, vakambobvuma musi wapambwa vatatu ava kuti vainge vasungwa zvichitevera kuratidzira kwavakaita vachityora mutemo weCovid-19. Asi mapurisa akazodudza oti akange asingazivi kuti chii chainge chaitika kuvatatu ava uye vakange vasiri mumaoko emapurisa. Kunyange hazvo nhengo dzeMDC dziri kurapwa, vamwe vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika vanoti vatatu ava havasati vaonekwa nenyanzvi munyaya dzezvirwere zvepfungwa idzo dzinokwanisa kunyatsoongorora kuti kutochwa kwakaitwa madzimai matatu aya kwakashata zvakadii. Pane kutyirwawo kuti muZimbabwe hamuna nyanzvi dzizere dzinokwanisa kupa rubatsiro kumadzimai aya kuti asarambe achishungurudzika mupfungwa kubudikidza nezvavakaitwa apo vakapambwa. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kumumwe wevana chiremba vari kuona vatatu, Dr Norman Matara veZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, sezvo vanga vasiri kubatika panharembozha yavo. Asi mutauriri weZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaKumbirai Mafunda, vanoti vakamirira kunzwa zvichikurudzirwa navana chiremba vavari kushanda navo kuitira kuti vatore matanho akakodzera kuvarwere ava. Sangano reZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights ndiro rine magweta ari kumirira madzimai matatu eMDC aya. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vabatwa neCovid-19 Vapfuura Mazana Mashanu Hurumende Ichiti Ichawedzera Dzidziso muVanhu
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwakakwira neMuvhuro kusvika pamazana mashanu negumi nevaviri (512) mushure mekunge vamwe vanhu makumi maviri nevatatu (23) vawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi pavanhu mazana mashanu nemakumi matatu nevashanu (535) vakaongororwa nezuro. Huwandu hwevanhu vapona kubva kudenda iri huchiri pamakumi matanhatu nevana (64), kuchitiwo vashaya vachiri vatanhatu kana kuti 6. Kuwanda kwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 uku kwaita kuti bazi rezvehutano riburitse mashoko padandemutande reTwitter richiti rave kuzosimbisa nyaya yekudzidzisa veruzhinji pamusoro pechirwere ichi pachiteverwa zvisungo zvakatarwa neWorld Health Organisation. Nyanzvi mune zvehutano dzakawanda dzagara dziri kukurudzira hurumende kuti iwedzere vanhu vari kuongororwa chirwere ichi pazuva, uye kuendesa dzidziso kumaruwa kuitira kuti veruzhinji vanzwisise nekukasika zviri kuitika kuitira kuti vasazobatwa vakavarairwa. Johns Hopkins University Hospital yemuAmerica inoti vanhu vabatwa neCovid-19 pasi rose vadarika mamiriyoni mapfumbamwe nezana rezviuru (9.1 million), America iri iyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nemazana matatu ezviuru (2.3 million) ichiteverwa neBrazil, iyo yadarikawo miriyoni nezana rezviuru (1.1 million).
